一=nhat [yi1]\n\t1. Mot, la so dung dau cac so dem. Pham vat gi chi co mot deu goi la Nhat ca.\n\t2. Cung. Nhu sach Trung Dung 中庸 noi. Cap ki thanh cong nhat da 及其成工一也 nen cong cung nhu nhau vay. \n\t3. Dung ve loi noi hoac gia the chang. Nhu van nhat 萬一 muon mot, nhat dan 一旦 mot mai, v.v. \n\t4. Bao quat het thay. Nhu nhat thiet 一切 het thay, nhat khai 一概 mot muc nhu the ca, v.v. \n\t5. Chuyen mon ve mot mat. Nhu nhat vi 一味 mot mat, nhat y 一意 mot y, v.v.
丁=dinh, chenh [ding1|zheng1]\n\t1. Can Dinh, can thu tu trong muoi can. \n\t2. Dang. Nhu dang de tang cha me goi la dinh uu 丁憂 nghia la dang o luc dau xot vay. \n\t3. Nguoi. Nhu thanh dinh 成丁 nghia la nguoi den tuoi thanh nhan. \n\t4. Da lon, la da phai dong thue. Nhu ta 18 tuoi phai dong suu vao so dinh goi la dinh tich 丁藉. \n\t5. Ke lam lung. Nhu bao dinh 庖丁 la nguoi nau bep, vien dinh 園丁 la nguoi lam vuon, v.v. \n\t6. Ran bao ky cang. Nhu dinh ninh 丁寧. \n\t7. Chu. Nhu muc bat thuc dinh 目不識丁. \n\t8. Mot am la chenh. Nhu phat moc chenh chenh 伐木丁丁 chat cay chan chat.
七=that [qi1]\n\t1. Bay, ten so dem. \n\t2. Co nghia chi ve the van. Nhu loi van that van that dap 七問七答 cua Mai Thua, loi van song that cua ta.
万=van, mac [mo4|wan4]\n\t1. Muon, cung nhu chu van 萬. \n\t2. Mot am la Mac. Nhu la Mac Ky 万俟, ho Mac Ky.
丈=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Truong, muoi thuoc ta la mot truong. \n\t2. Do. Nhu thanh truong 清丈 nghia la do xong so ruong dat nao roi. \n\t3. Gia ca. Nhu lao truong 老丈, truong nhan 丈人 (nguoi gia ca). Bo vo goi la nhac truong 岳丈.
三=tam, tam [san1]\n\t1. Ba, ten so dem. \n\t2. Mot am la tam. Hai ba lan, doc di doc lai. Nhu. Nam Dong tam phuc bach khue 南容三復白圭 ong Nam Dong doc di doc lai tho bach khue.
上=thuong, thuong [shang3|shang4]\n\t1. Tren. pham o tren deu goi la thuong. Nhu thuong bo 上部 bo tren, thuong quyen 上卷 quyen tren, thuong dang 上等 buc tren, v.v. \n\t2. Ngay vua goi vua la Chu thuong 主上 goi ong vua dang doi minh la Kim thuong 今上. \n\t3. Mot am la thuong. Len. Nhu thuong duong 上堂 len them. \n\t4. Dang len. Nhu thuong thu 上書 dang to thu, thuong bieu 上表 dang bieu, v.v. 
下=ha, ha [xia4]\n\t1. Duoi, doi lai voi chu thuong. Pham cai gi o duoi deu goi la ha. \n\t2. Be duoi, nhoi noi nhun minh voi nguoi tren. Nhu ha tinh 下情 tinh ke duoi. ha hoai 下懷 tam long ke duoi. \n\t3. Mot am la ha. Xuong, tu tren xuong duoi. Nhu ha son 下山 xuong nui, ha lau 下樓 xuong lau. 4. Cuon. Nhu ha ki 下旗 cuon co, ha duy 下帷 cuon man, v.v.
与=du [yu2|yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 與.
不=bat, phau, phu, phi [bu2|bu4]\n\t1. Chang. Nhu bat kha 不可 khong the, bat nhien 不然 chang the, v.v. \n\t2. Mot am la phau. La nhoi noi luong lu chua quyet han. Nhu duong phuc nhu thu phau 當復如此不 se lai nhu the chang ? Cung doc la chu phu. \n\t3. Mot am la phi. Lon. Nhu phi hien tai van vuong mo 不顯哉文王謀 ca ro ret thay muu vua Van Vuong.
丐=cai [gai4]\n\t1. Xin. Nhu khat cai 乞丐 nguoi an may, an xin. 2. Cho. Nhu thiem cai hau nhan 沾丐後人 de on lai cho nguoi sau.
丑=suu [chou3]\n\t1. Mot chi trong 12 chi. Tu 1 gio dem den 3 gio sang la gio suu. \n\t2. Vai he trong tuong tau cung xung la suu.
且=tha, thu [ju1|qie3]\n\t1. Va, nhoi noi giao dau. Nhu tha phu 且夫 va chung. \n\t2. Nhoi noi chuyen sang cau khac. Nhu huong tha 況且 phuong chi lai. \n\t3. Hay the. Nhu tam tha 暫且 hay tam the. Lam viec gi luom thuom, chi cau cho tac trach goi la cau tha 苟且. \n\t4. Sap. Nhu tha tan 且盡 sap het. \n\t5. Lai. Nhu kinh Thi noi. quan tu huu tuu da tha chi 君子有酒多且旨 quan tu co ruou nhieu lai ngon. \n\t6. Vua, loi noi luc voi vang. Nhu tha chien tha tau 且戰且走 vua danh vua chay. \n\t7. Mot am la thu. Loi noi long, tieng noi con rot giong ra. Nhu kinh Thi noi. ki lac chi thu 其樂只且 thua vui vui lam thay !
丕=phi [pi1]\n\t1. Lon lao. Nhu phi co 丕基 nghiep lon.
世=the [shi4]\n\t1. Doi, ba muoi nam la mot doi, het doi cha den doi con cung goi la mot doi. Nhu nhat the 一世 mot doi, the he 世系 noi doi. \n\t2. Ho nha vua thay doi cung goi la nhat the 一世 cho nen sach thuong goi tom lai cuoc doi la the. Nhu thinh the 盛世 doi thinh, qui the 季世 doi suy. \n\t3. Lai co nghia noi ve su giao tiep cua xa hoi. Nhu the co 世故 thoi doi. \n\t4. Noi doi. Nhu bac ruot goi la the phu 世父 con truong cua chu hau goi la the tu 世子. \n\t5. Cho quen cu. Nhu the giao 世交 doi choi voi nhau, the nghi 世誼 nghia cu voi nhau, het thay ai co tinh choi voi hang tren minh truoc deu goi la the ca. Nhu con thay hoc minh goi la the huynh 世兄.
丘=khau, khieu [qiu1]\n\t1. Cai go, tuc la dong dat nho. \n\t2. phep tinh dien ngay xua chia bon tinh la ap, bon ap la khau. \n\t3. Hop, ngay xua goi sach dia du la cuu khau 九丘 nghia la cac thu trong chin chau deu hop ca o day. \n\t4. Nhon, ngay xua goi chi dau truong la khau tau 丘嫂. \n\t5. Ten duc Khong tu, vi the sach nha Han doi chu 丘 lam 邱. \n\t6. Mot am la khieu. Nhu ti khieu 比丘 dich am tieng Phan, nguoi tu hanh dao   Phat da chiu du 250 gioi luat, lan luot den cac nha xin an, tren cau tu cho thanh Phat, duoi hoa do cho chung sinh.
丙=binh [bing3]\n\t1. Mot can trong muoi can. Nha tu luyen xua cho can binh thuoc hanh hoa, nen co nghia la lua. Nhu pho binh 付丙 cho lua vao dot.
丞=thua, chung [cheng2]\n\t1. Giup do. Nhu thua tuong 丞相 chuc quan giup vua. cac nha co dat nguoi giup viec cung goi la thua. Nhu phu thua 府丞, huyen thua 縣丞 v.v. Nguyen am la chung.
丟=dau [diu1]\n\t1. Mat han, cai gi di khong lai nua goi la dau.
丢=dau [diu1]\n\t1. Mat han, cai gi di khong lai nua goi la dau.
両=lang [liang3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 兩.
丢=dau [diu1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu dau 丟.
丣=dau [you3]\n\t1. Tuc la chu dau 酉
两=lang [liang3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 兩.
並=tinh [bing1|bing4]\n\t1. Gom, deu. Nhu tinh lap 並立 deu dung, tinh hanh 並行 deu di, v.v. Co cho viet 竝.
并=tinh [bing1|bing4]\n\t1. Gom, deu. Nhu tinh lap 並立 deu dung, tinh hanh 並行 deu di, v.v. Co cho viet 竝.
丨=con [gun3]\n\t1. Bo con.
个=ca [ge3|ge4]\n\t1. Cai, tung cai mot goi la ca, cung mot nghia voi chu ca 箇. \n\t2. Cai nha xep, hai ben ta huu nha Minh Duong ngay xua goi la ta huu ca 左右个. 
丫=nha [ya1]\n\t1. Xoe, pham vat gi tren phan tung tranh xoe ra goi la nha 丫. Tuc goi con hau gai la nha hoan 丫環 vi dau no co hai trai dao vay.
中=trung, trung [zhong1|zhong4]\n\t1. Giua, chi vao bo vi trong vat the. Nhu trung uong 中央 cho giua, trung tam 中心 giua ruot, v.v. \n\t2. Trong. Nhu doi voi nuoc ngoai thi goi nuoc minh la trung quoc 中國, doi voi cac tinh ngoai thi goi cho kinh do la trung uong 中央, v.v. \n\t3. O khoang giua hai ben cung goi la trung. Nhu thuong, trung, ha 上中下 tren, giua, duoi. Nguoi dung giua gioi thieu cho hai nguoi khac goi la trung nhan 中人 cung do mot nghia ay. \n\t4. Ngay, khong veo khong lech, khong qua khong thieu, cung goi la trung. Nhu trung dong 中庸 dao phai, trung hanh 中行 lam phai, trung dao 中道 dao chan chinh khong thien ben nao v.v. \n\t5. Nua. Nhu trung do 中途 nua duong, trung da 中夜 nua dem, v.v. \n\t6. Chi chung tat ca cac cho. Nhu Ngo trung 吳中 trong dat Ngo, Thuc trung 蜀中 trong dat Thuc, v.v. \n\t7. Mot am la trung.Tin. Nhu ban tin goi la xa trung 射中, noi dung goi la ngon trung 言中, v.v. \n\t8. Bi phai. Nhu trung phong 中風 bi phai gio, trung thu 中暑 bi phai nang, v.v. \n\t9. Hop cach. Nhu thi cu lay do goi la trung thuc 中式, do khong dung duoc goi la bat trung dung 不中用, v.v.\n\t10. Day du, nhu che trung nhi thien thach 制中二天石 phep du hai nghin thach. \n\t11. Cung am nghia nhu chu trong. Nhu em thu hai goi la trong de 仲第.
丯=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Sac co tuoi tot, sau muon de ta cai sac xinh dep nhu phong than 丰神 than dep, phong thai 丰采 ve dep, v.v.
丱=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Tet toc lam hai mui hai ben.
串=xuyen [chuan4]\n\t1. Suot, mot quan tien goi la nhat xuyen 一串, cai giay bien thu tien goi la xuyen phieu 串票. \n\t2. Mot am la quan, nguoi cung quen nhon voi minh goi la than quan 親串, cung mot nghia voi chu quan 慣, cung co khi doc la xuyen.
丶=chu [zhu3]\n\t1. Pham cai gi can co phan biet, su gi can biet nen chang, long da co dinh, thi danh dau chu chu de nho lay.
丸=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Vien, pham vat gi nho ma tron deu goi la hoan. Nhu dan hoan 彈丸 vien dan. \n\t2. Thang than. Nhu tung bach hoan toan 松柏丸全 cay tung cay bach thang than.
丹=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Dan sa, tuc la chu sa doi xua dung lam thuoc mui, deu goi tat la dan 丹. Nhu noi ve su ve thi goi la dan thanh 丹青, noi ve su xet sua lai sach vo goi la dan duyen 丹鉛, dan hoang 丹黄, v.v. \n\t2. Do, cung dien doi xua deu chuong sac do, cho nen goi san he nha vua la dan tri 丹墀, dan be 丹陛, v.v. \n\t3. Te thuoc. Nha tu tien dung thuoc gi cung co dan sa, cho nen goi te thuoc la dan 丹. \n\t4. Ten nuoc. Nuoc Dan Mach 丹麥 (Denmark) o phia tay bac chau Au, goi tat la nuoc Dan.
主=chu [zhu3]\n\t1. Vua, vua coi soc tat ca viec nuoc nen goi la chu 主. \n\t2. Nguoi chu, ke giu quyen nhat nha goi la chu 主. \n\t3. Nguoi co quyen ve su gi. Nhu quyen lap phap o ca trong tay mot ong vua goi la quan chu quoc 君主國, quyen o ca nghi hoi goi la dan chu quoc 民主國. \n\t4. Ke co quyen co cua ay cung goi la chu. Nhu dien chu 田主 chu ruong, vat chu 物主 chu do, v.v. \n\t5. Y chuyen chu ve cai gi cung goi la chu. Nhu chu truong 主張, chu y 主意, v.v. \n\t6. Chu la mot tieng phan biet minh voi nguoi trong khi giao te, pham su gi minh khoi len thi minh la chu nhan 主人, ma moi nguoi la khach 客. \n\t7. Con gai vua goi la chu, con gai vua di lay chong, do quan tam cong chu hoa, nen goi la cong chu 公主 (Ta quen goi la cong chua).
丿=phiet, triet [pie3]\n\t1. Ta goi la cai phay, la mot net phay cua chu.
乀=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Ta goi la cai mac, la mot net mac cua chu.
乂=nghe [ai4]\n\t1. Tri, cai tri duoc dan yen goi la nghe. \n\t2. Tai gioi. Nhu tuan nghe tai quan 俊乂在官 nguoi hien tai lam quan.
乃=nai, ai [nai3]\n\t1. Ben, tieng noi noi cau tren. \n\t2. Tieng goi may tao. Nhu nai huynh 乃兄 anh may, nai de 乃第 em may. \n\t3. Mot am la ai, ai ai loi hat cheo do. Co cho viet la 廼, cung mot nghia nhu chu 乃.
久=cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Lau, noi thi gio da lau. Nhu cuu mo 久慕 men da lau, cuu nguong 久仰 kinh da lau. \n\t2. Doi. Nhu qua quan di vi minh chu chi co thi di cuu tu 寡君以為盟主之故是以久子 toi vi lam nguoi chu the nen phai cho doi anh.
乆=cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Xem chu cuu 久
之=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Chung, dung ve loi noi lien noi nhau. Nhu dai hoc chi dao 大學之道 chung dao dai hoc. \n\t2. Di. Nhu Dang Van-Cong tuong chi So 滕文公將之楚 Dang Van-Cong sap di sang nuoc So. \n\t3. Den. Nhu chi tu my tha 之死靡他 den chet chang toi ai. \n\t4. Day, la tieng dung thay mot danh tu nao. Nhu Thang su nhan van chi 湯使人問之 vua Thang khien nguoi hoi day (hoi ai ? tuc la hoi Cat Ba, chu chi day la thay hai chu Cat Ba). \n\t5. Ay. Nhu chi tu vu quy 之子于歸 nguoi ay ve nha chong.
乍=sa [zha4]\n\t1. Chot, thot nhien xay ra goi la sa 乍. Nhu kim nhan sa kien nhu tu 今人乍見孺子 nay nguoi chot thay dua be.
乎=ho, ho [hu1]\n\t1. Vay, oi, u, ru ! Nhoi noi co y nghi hoac. Nhu quan tu gia ho 君子者乎 quan tu ay u ? \n\t2. Tieng goi. Nhu Sam ho 參乎, nguoi Sam kia oi ! \n\t3. Nhoi noi tan than. Nhu nguy nguy ho 巍巍乎 cao voi voi vay oi !, tat da chanh danh ho ! 必也正名乎 at vay phai chanh cai danh vay oi ! \n\t4. Chung. Nhu so cau ho tu 所求乎子 cau chung dao lam con. \n\t5. Mot am la ho. Nhoi xot thuong. Nhu o ho 於乎. Cung nghia voi chu ho 呼.
乏=phap [fa2]\n\t1. Thieu, khong co du. \n\t2. Moi met, chu tu khach khong tiep goi la dao phap 道乏 met lam xin thu cho.
乖=quai [guai1]\n\t1. Trai, nguoc, khong hoa voi nhau goi la quai 乖. Nhu quai le 乖戾 ngang trai. \n\t2. Lau linh. Nhu quai sao 乖巧 kheo leo, quai giac 乖覺 sang bom, v.v.
乘=thua, thang [cheng2|sheng4]\n\t1. Cuoi, dong. Nhu dong xe vao ngua goi la thua ma 乘馬. noi rong ra thi pham cai gi no o duoi no cho minh, deu goi la thua. Nhu thua chu 乘舟 di thuyen, thua phu 乘稃 di be, v.v. \n\t2. Nhan vi. Nhu thua hung nhi lai 乘興而來 nhan hung ma lai. \n\t3. Tinh nhan. Nhu nhan ba ba la chin goi la thua. \n\t4. Buc, Phat hoc chia buc cao buc thap. Nhu tieu thua 小乘 buc tu chi tu do duoc minh, cung nhu co xe nho chi cho duoc minh, dai thua 大乘 buc tu da tu do minh lai do cho nguoi. Nhu co xe lon cho duoc nhieu nguoi, v.v. Nha Duong ban tho, nguoi nao y tu cao ky, goi la thuong thua 上乘 cung bat chuoc nghia ay. \n\t5. Mot am la thang. Co xe, xe bon ngua keo goi la mot thang. Doi xua danh nhau bang xe, tinh thue ruong ra linh, cho nen tinh so thue ruong cung goi la thang. Nhu thien thang chi quoc 千乘之國 nuoc co so nghin co xe, bach thang chi gia 百乘之家 nha co tram co xe. \n\t6. Bon. Nhu sach Manh tu noi phat thang thi nhi hau phan 發乘失而後反 ban bon ten roi sau tro lai. \n\t7. Sach vo, nhung sach ghi chep moi viec goi la thang. Nhu Tan chi thang 晉之乘 sach chep viec nuoc Tan, gia pha cung goi la gia thang 家乘, v.v.
乙=at [yi3]\n\t1. Can at, can thu hai trong muoi can. \n\t2. Xem sach den luc thoi danh dau lai cung goi la at 乙, viet co cho mat, ngoac cai dau 乙 de chua cung goi la at. \n\t3. Ruot. Nhu kinh Le noi. ngu khu at 魚去乙 ca bo ruot.
九=cuu, cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Chin, ten so dem. \n\t2. Mot am la cuu 九 hop. Nhu Hoan Cong cuu hop chu hau 桓公九合諸侯 vua Hoan Cong tu hop cac chu hau, cung nghia voi chu cu 糾.
乞=khat, khi [qi3]\n\t1. Xin. Nhu khat thuc 乞食 xin an. \n\t2. Mot am la khi. Cho, lay do cua minh cho nguoi goi la khi (chu nay it dung).
也=da [ye3]\n\t1. Vay, nhoi noi het cau. Nhu nghia gia nghi da 義者宜也 nghia, ay la su nen the thi lam vay. Co cho dung lam nhoi mo dau. Nhu da tri huong tin nhat ung so 也知鄉信日應疎 vay biet tin lang ngay phai thua.
乩=ke [ji1]\n\t1. Boi, dieu gi ngo thi boi xem goi la ke 乩, cac thay cung hay phu dong tien lay but go dao viet vao mam cat goi la phu ke 扶乩.
乳=nhu [ru3]\n\t1. Cai vu, cac loai dong vat deu co vu de cho con bu. \n\t2. Sua, mot chat bo de nuoi con. \n\t3. Cho bu. \n\t4. Sinh, cac giong de ra co nhau goi la nhu. Nhu tu nhu 孳乳 vat sinh san mai. \n\t5. Non, loai dong vat moi sinh goi la nhu. Nhu nhu yen 乳燕 con yen non.
乾=kien, can [gan1|qian2]\n\t1. Mot que dau tam que (que kien) la cai tuong lon nhat nhu troi. Nhu vua, nen goi tuong troi la kien tuong 乾象, quyen vua la kien cuong 乾綱. \n\t2. Que kien ba hao duong ca, cho nen ve ben nam vi nhu que kien. Nhu noi ngay thang sinh con trai thi goi kien tao 乾綱, nha con trai o thi goi la kien trach 乾宅, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la can. Kho. Nhu can sai 乾柴 cui kho. \n\t4. Kho kiet. Nhu ngoai cuong trung can 外疆中乾 ngoai co thua ma trong thieu. \n\t5. Tieng hao (ho), khong co su thuc ma duoc tieng hao goi la can. Nhu can gia 乾爺 cha ho, can nuong 乾娘 me ho.
亂=loan [luan4]\n\t1. Loan, boi roi khong yen goi la loan. Nhu loan the 亂世. \n\t2. Giac gia, quan linh danh giet bua bai goi la loan. \n\t3. Roi rit. Nhu loan ti 亂絲 to roi. \n\t4. Toi tam. Nhu tinh than mau loan 精神瞀亂 tinh than toi tam me man. \n\t5. Pha hoai. Nhu hoai phap loan ky 壞法亂紀 pha hoai phep luat. \n\t6. Dam ta. Nhu trong ho chim chuot lan nhau goi la loan dam 亂婬. \n\t7. Tri yen. Nhu Vo-vuong huu loan than thap nhan 武王有亂臣十人 vua Vo-vuong co muoi nguoi bay toi tri loan. \n\t8. Chu dung cho dut cau ca nhac. Nhu quan thu chi loan 關雎之亂 cuoi tho quan thu. Tuc thuong viet la 乱.
乱=loan [luan4]\n\t1. Loan, boi roi khong yen goi la loan. Nhu loan the 亂世. \n\t2. Giac gia, quan linh danh giet bua bai goi la loan. \n\t3. Roi rit. Nhu loan ti 亂絲 to roi. \n\t4. Toi tam. Nhu tinh than mau loan 精神瞀亂 tinh than toi tam me man. \n\t5. Pha hoai. Nhu hoai phap loan ky 壞法亂紀 pha hoai phep luat. \n\t6. Dam ta. Nhu trong ho chim chuot lan nhau goi la loan dam 亂婬. \n\t7. Tri yen. Nhu Vo-vuong huu loan than thap nhan 武王有亂臣十人 vua Vo-vuong co muoi nguoi bay toi tri loan. \n\t8. Chu dung cho dut cau ca nhac. Nhu quan thu chi loan 關雎之亂 cuoi tho quan thu. Tuc thuong viet la 乱.
亅=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Tuc la cai net xo co moc.
了=lieu [le5|liao3]\n\t1. Hieu biet. Nhu lieu nhien u tam 了然於心 long da hieu biet. \n\t2. Xong. Nhu lieu su 了事 xong viec.
予=du, du [yu2|yu3]\n\t1. Ta, toi. Tieng xung cua minh doi voi nguoi. \n\t2. Mot am la du 予. Cho.
事=su [shi4]\n\t1. Viec. \n\t2. Lam viec. Nhu vo so su su 無所事事 khong lam viec gi. \n\t3. Tho. Nhu tu su phu mau 子事父母 con tho cha me.
二=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Hai, ten so dem.
亍=xuc [chu4]\n\t1. Buoc ngan, chan trai buoc di goi la xich 彳 , chan phai buoc di goi la xuc 亍 , hai chu hop lai thanh chu hanh 行 la di.
于=vu, hu [yu2]\n\t1. Di. Nhu vu quy 于歸 con gai di lay chong. \n\t2. Di lay. Nhu tru nhi vu mao 晝爾于茅 som di lay co tranh. \n\t3. Chung, dung lam loi tro ngu. Nhu chi vu ky ha 至于岐下 den chung duoi nui Ky. \n\t4. So. Nhu vu Thang huu quang 于湯有光 so voi vua Thang co y sang sua hon. \n\t5. Nhon nho, lo mo. Nhu ky giac da vu vu 其覺也于于 thua biet vay lo mo. \n\t6. Mot am la hu , tieng tan than. Nhu hu ta lan he 于嗟麟兮 chao oi con lan kia !
云=van [yun2]\n\t1. Rang. Nhu ngu van 語云 nhoi que noi rang. \n\t2. Van van v.v. nhoi ke cac su con dai, chi ke mot hai cai lam mau. Nhu lang toi co det vai, voc, nhieu, v.v. \n\t3. Nhung nhuc. Nhu van vat van van 萬物云云 muon vat nhung nhuc.
互=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Dap doi hai ben cung thay doi voi nhau.
五=ngu [wu3]\n\t1. Nam, ten so dem.
井=tinh [jing3]\n\t1. Gieng, dao sau lay mach nuoc dung goi la tinh. \n\t2. Ngay xua dao gieng giua pho cho hang pho cung dung, nen goi pho la thi tinh 市井 , dao gieng o giua lang de ca lang cung dung goi lang la huong tinh 鄉井. \n\t3. Ngay xua chia ruong lam chin khu, tam nha lam tam khu, con mot khu giua cua vua goi la tinh dien 井田. \n\t4. Ranh mach. Nhu trat tu tinh nhien 秩序井然 thu tu ranh mach co dieu ly. \n\t5. Sao Tinh, mot ngoi sao trong Nhi thap bat tu.
亘=tuyen, hoan [gen4]\n\t1. Pho bay. \n\t2. Mot am la hoan. Cung nhu chu hoan 桓 . Nhu O Hoan 烏亘 nuoc O Hoan.
亙=cang [gen4]\n\t1. Dai suot, khoang dai tu dau nay den cuoi kia goi la cang . Nhu cang co 亙古 suot tu xua den nay.
亘=cang [gen4]\n\t1. Dai suot, khoang dai tu dau nay den cuoi kia goi la cang . Nhu cang co 亙古 suot tu xua den nay.
些=ta, ta [xie1]\n\t1. It. Nhu nhat ta 一些 mot it. \n\t2. Mot am la ta, dung lam tro ngu, dung o cuoi cau tho thuong cam.
亞=a [ya4]\n\t1. Thu hai. Nhu a thanh 亞聖 kem thanh mot it. \n\t2. Ten mot chau trong nam chau, chau A-te-a 亞細亞.
亚=a [ya4]\n\t1. Thu hai. Nhu a thanh 亞聖 kem thanh mot it. \n\t2. Ten mot chau trong nam chau, chau A-te-a 亞細亞.
亟=cuc, khi [ji2|qi4]\n\t1. Kip. Nhu nhu dung tham cuc 需用甚亟 can dung rat kip. \n\t2. Mot am la khi. Luon luon. Nhu khi van khi quy dinh nhuc 亟問亟饋鼎肉 hoi luon dua thit an luon.
亠=dau [tou2]\n\t1. Khong co y nghia gi.
亡=vong, vo [wang2|wu2]\n\t1. Mat. Nhu Luong vong 梁亡 nuoc Luong mat roi. \n\t2. Tron. Nhu luu vong 流亡 doi khat troi giat mat, vong menh 亡命 tron buoc hoan nan. \n\t3. Chet. Nhu vong de 亡第 nguoi em da chet, dieu vong 悼亡 vo chet. \n\t4. Mot am la vo. Nghia nhu chu vo 無.
亢=khang, cang, cuong [kang4]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu bat khang bat ti 不亢不卑 khong kieu ngao khong siem ninh. \n\t2. Qua. Nhu khang duong 亢陽 chan duong thai qua, khang han 亢旱 nang qua. \n\t3. Che cho. Nhu khang tong chi tu 亢宗之子 dua con co the lam phen che cho cho ho duoc. \n\t4. Mot am la cang. Co. Nhu ach ky cang 搤其亢 bop thua co. \n\t5. Sao Cang, mot vi sao trong Nhi thap bat tu, cung doc la chu cuong.
交=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Choi. Nhu giao du 交遊 di lai choi boi voi nhau, tri giao 知交 cho choi tri ky, giao te 交際 hai ben lay le ma giao tiep voi nhau, giao thiep 交涉 nhan co su quan he ve viec cong, bang giao 邦交 nuoc nay choi voi nuoc kia, ngoai giao 外交 nuoc minh doi voi nuoc ngoai. \n\t2. Lien tiep. Nhu dong cay chu thap 十, cho ngang doc lien tiep nhau goi la giao diem 交點. \n\t3. Co moi quan he voi nhau. Nhu to boi giao uoc voi nhau goi la giao hoan 交換, mua ban voi nhau goi la giao dich 交易. \n\t4. Nop cho. Nhu noi giao nop tien luong goi la giao nap 交納. \n\t5. cung. Nhu giao khau xung du 交口稱譽 moi nguoi cung khen. \n\t6. Khoang. Nhu xuan ha chi giao 春夏之交 khoang cuoi xuan dau he. \n\t7. Phoi phoi. Nhu giao giao hoang dieu 交交黃鳥 phoi phoi chim vang anh (ta hinh trang con chim bay di bay lai). \n\t8. Dam duc, giong duc giong cai dam duc voi nhau goi la giao hop 交合, la giao cau 交媾, v.v.
亥=hoi [hai4]\n\t1. Chi hoi, mot chi cuoi cung trong muoi hai chi. Tu chin gio den muoi mot dem goi la gio hoi.
亦=diec [yi4]\n\t1. Cung, tieng giup loi noi. Nhu tri diec tien, loan diec tien 治亦進亂亦進 tri cung tien len, loan cung tien len. \n\t2. Lai, nhoi tro ngu. Nhu diec tuong huu di loi ngo quoc ho 亦將有以利吾國乎 lai cung co lay loi nuoc ta u ?
亨=hanh, huong, phanh [heng1]\n\t1. Thong. Nhu thoi van hanh thong 時運亨通 thoi van hanh thong. \n\t2. Mot am la huong. Huong thu. Nhu cong dung huong vu thien tu 公用亨于天子 tuoc cong duoc Thien tu thet yen. \n\t3. Lai mot am la phanh. Nau nuong. Nhu dai phanh di duong thanh hien 大亨以養聖賢 nau nuong nhieu thu de nuoi thanh hien.
享=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Dang, dem do le len dang nguoi tren hay dem cung te goi la huong. thet dai khach khua cung goi la huong. \n\t2. Huong thu. Nhu huong phuc 享福 duoc huong thu phuc troi.
京=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. To, cho vua dong do goi la kinh su 京師 nghia la cho dat rong ma nhieu nguoi. Lai dong nghia voi chu nguyen 原. Nhu cuu kinh 九京 bai tha ma. Mo ma quan nha Tan deu chon o Cuu kinh nen sau goi bai tha ma la Cuu kinh, cung nhu noi noi cuu nguyen 九原 vay.
亭=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Cai dinh, ben duong lam nha cho khach qua lai tro goi la qua nhai dinh 過街亭. Trong cac vuon cong, xay nha cho nguoi den choi nghi ngoi ngam nghia goi la luong dinh 涼亭. \n\t2. Phep nha Han chia dat cu muoi dam la mot dinh, muoi dinh la mot lang, nen nguoi coi viec lang la dinh truong 亭長, tuc ly truong bay gio. \n\t3. Dong dong. Nhu dinh dinh ngoc lap 亭亭玉立 dong dong cao nhu ngoc dep, ta cai dang nguoi dep. \n\t4. Den. Nhu den trua goi la dinh ngo 亭午.
亮=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Sang. Nhu luong giam 亮鑑 sang soi. \n\t2. Thanh cao. Nhu cao phong luong tiet 高風亮節 pham hanh thanh cao. \n\t3. Ten nguoi, ong Gia Cat Luong 諸葛亮 nguoi doi hau Han.
亯=hanh [heng1] Cung nhu chu hanh 亨.
亳=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Dat Bac, cho kinh do vua Thang, o tinh Ha Nam ben Tau bay gio.
亶=dan [dan3]\n\t1. Tin. Nhoi tro ngu.
亹=vi, men, mon [wei3]\n\t1. Co gang. Nhu vi vi 亹亹 gang goi. \n\t2. Mot am la men. Nghia la mang nuoc, cho nuoc chay trong khe nui hai ben thanh doi nhau nhu hai canh cua. cung doc la chu mon.
人=nhan [ren2]\n\t1. Nguoi, giong khon nhat trong loai dong vat. \n\t2. Tieng doi lai voi minh. Nhu tha nhan 他人 nguoi khac, chung nhan 眾人 moi nguoi, vo nhan nga chi kien 無人我之見 khong co phan biet minh voi nguoi, v.v. thau duoc nghia nay, trong dao Phat cho la buc tu duoc nhan khong 人空.
什=thap [shen2|shi2]\n\t1. Muoi, cung nhu chu thap 十. \n\t2. Hang chuc, trong quan doi cu moi hang nam nguoi goi la hang ngu, hai hang ngu goi la hang thap. \n\t3. Mot quyen, Kinh Thi cu muoi thien cho la mot quyen, nen mot thap tuc la mot quyen. \n\t4. Cac do. Nhu thap vat 什物 cac do lat vat.
仁=nhan [ren2]\n\t1. Nhan. Nhan la cai dao ly lam nguoi, phai the moi goi la nguoi. Yeu nguoi khong loi rieng minh goi la nhan. \n\t2. Cai nhan o trong hat qua. Nhu dao nhan 桃仁 nhan hat dao. \n\t3. Te liet. Nhu chan tay te dai khong cu dong duoc goi la bat nhan 不仁.
仃=dinh [ding1]\n\t1. Linh dinh 伶仃 di vo vo mot minh.
仄=trac [ze4]\n\t1. Nghieng. Nhu phan trac 反仄 nghieng ngua, trao tro. \n\t2. Tieng trac, doi lai voi tieng bang.
仆=pho [pu1|pu2]\n\t1. Nga. Nhu pho dia 仆地 nga lan xuong dat.
仇=cuu [chou2|qiu2]\n\t1. Thu dich. Nhu phuc cuu 復仇 bao thu lai. \n\t2. Gian tuc. Nhu cuu thi 仇視 coi lay lam tuc gian (coi nhu ke thu han).
今=kim [jin1]\n\t1. Nay, hien nay, bay gio goi la kim 今.
介=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Coi, o vao khoang giua hai cai goi la gioi. Ngay xua giao tiep voi nhau, chu co nguoi than ma khach co nguoi gioi 介 de giup le va dem nhoi nguoi ben nay noi voi nguoi ben kia biet. Nhu mot nguoi o giua noi cho nguoi thu nhat va nguoi thu ba biet nhau ma lam quen nhau goi la gioi thieu 介紹 hay moi gioi 媒介 v.v. \n\t2. Giup. Nhu di gioi my tho 以介眉壽 lay giup vui tiec tho. \n\t3. Ao. Nhu gioi tru 介胄 ao day mu tru. \n\t4. Co nghia la vay. Nhu gioi thuoc 介屬 loai o nuoc co vay. \n\t5. Loi ton quy. Nhu noi em nguoi ta thi ton la quy gioi de 貴介第 em ton quy cua ngai. \n\t6. Ven bo. Nhu giang gioi 江介 ven song. \n\t7. Mot nguoi. Nhu nhat gioi chi si 一介之士 mot ke hoc tro. \n\t8. Nho, cung nghia nhu chu gioi 芥 (hat cai) nhu tiem gioi 纎介 nho nhat, gioi y 介意 hoi de y. \n\t9. Bam buc. Nhu gioi gioi 介介 long bam buc.
仌=bang [bing1]\n\t1. Cung nghia nhu chu 冰 nuoc da. 
仍=nhung [reng2]\n\t1. Nhan, van. Nhu nhung cuu 仍舊 nhu cu. \n\t2. Luon luon. Nhu co can nhung tran 飢饉仍臻 kem doi luon mai.
从=tong [cong2]\n\t1. Cung nghia nhu chu tong 從 theo.
仔=tu, te [zai3|zi1|zi3]\n\t1. Gach vac. Nhu tu kien 仔肩 ganh lay trach nhiem. \n\t2. Ky. Nhu tu te 仔細 ky luong. \n\t3. Mot am la te, nghia la nho be (tieng Quang dong hay dung).
仕=si [shi4]\n\t1. Quan. Nhu xuat si 出仕 ra lam quan, tri si 致仕 ve huu (thoi khong lam quan), v.v.
他=tha [ta1]\n\t1. Khac, la ke kia. Nhu tha nhan 他人 nguoi khac, tha su 他事 viec khac, v.v. \n\t2. Long khac. Nhu chi tu thi mi tha 之死失靡他 the den chet chang hai long.
仗=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Cac thu do binh khi. Hai ben danh nhau goi la khai truong 開仗. quan sang ra ngoai co linh cam do binh ho ve goi la nghi truong 儀仗. \n\t2. Cay, nho va the luc cua nguoi goi la y truong 倚仗.
付=pho [fu4]\n\t1. Giao pho cho 交付. \n\t2. Tieu ra, so tien tieu ra goi la khoan pho 款付.
仙=tien [xian1]\n\t1. Tien, nha dao si luyen thuoc tru com tu hanh, cau cho song mai khong chet goi la tien 仙. \n\t2. Dung de ngoi khen nguoi chet. Nhu tien du 仙遊 choi coi tien, tien the 仙逝 di ve coi tien, v.v. \n\t3. Dong xu, muoi dong xu la mot hao.
仝=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Cung, cung nhu chu dong 同.
仞=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Nhan, nha Chu dinh tam thuoc la mot nhan (chung sau thuoc bon tac tam phan bay gio).
仟=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Nguoi dung dau mot nghin nguoi. Bay gio thuong dung nhu chu 千 ngan, goi la chu thien kep.
仡=ngat [ge1]\n\t1. Ngat ngat 仡仡 luc luong.
代=dai (5 n) [dai4]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu han thu diet dai 寒暑迭代 ret nong thay doi. \n\t2. Thay. Nhu dai ly 代理 lieu tri thay ke khac. \n\t3. Doi. Nhu Han dai 漢代 doi nha Han, tam dai 三代 doi thu ba, v.v.
令=lenh, linh [ling2|ling3|ling4]\n\t1. Menh lenh, nhung dieu ma chinh phu dem ban bo cho dan biet goi la lenh. \n\t2. Thoi lenh. Nhu xuan lenh 春令 thoi lenh mua xuan. \n\t3. Ten quan. Nhu quan huyen goi la huyen lenh 縣令. \n\t4. Tot, gioi nhu noi den anh nguoi khac thi ton la lenh huynh 令兄 noi den em nguoi khac thi ton la lenh de 令第 v.v. \n\t5. Mot loi van trong cac tu khuc. Nhu mot dieu ngan goi la tieu lenh 小令. \n\t6. Trong cac tro dua, lap ra mot cach nhat dinh bat ai cung phai theo, cung goi la lenh. Nhu tuu lenh 酒令 lenh ruou. \n\t7. Mot am la linh. Khien. Nhu linh nhan khoi kinh 令人起敬 khien nguoi nay long kinh, su linh 使令 sai khien, v.v.
以=di [yi3]\n\t1. Lay. \n\t2. Lam. Nhu thi ky so di 視其所以 coi thua su lam. \n\t3. Dung. Nhu di tieu dich dai 以小易大 dung nho doi nhon. \n\t4. Nhan. Nhu ha ky cuu da tat huu di da 何其久也必有以也 sao thua lau vay, at co nhan gi vay. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu di 已.
仰=nguong, nhang [yang3]\n\t1. Ngua, ngua mat len goi la nguong. \n\t2. Kinh men. Nhu cuu nguong dai danh 久仰大名 lau nay kinh men cai danh lon. \n\t3. Loi ke tren sai ke duoi, trong tu trat nha quan thuong dung. \n\t4. Nha Phat cho nhung ke kiem an bang nghe xem thien van la nguong khau thuc 仰口食. \n\t5. Mot am la nhang. Nhu nhang truong 仰仗 nho cay.
仲=trong [zhong4]\n\t1. Giua. Nhu thang hai goi la trong xuan 仲春 giua mua xuan, em thu hai la trong de 仲第 v.v.
仳=ty [pi3]\n\t1. Lia re. Nhu ty ly 仳離 lia re (vo chong ly di nhau).
仵=ngo [wu3]\n\t1. Ngo tac 仵作 ten mot chuc lai de kham xet cac nguoi tu thuong.
件=kien [jian4]\n\t1. Phan biet, phan biet cai nay cai khac. \n\t2. Mon, tuc goi mot mon do dung trong mot cai bo hay cai sot la mot kien.
价=gioi [jia4|jie4|jie5]\n\t1. Thien, lon. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu gioi 介. 
任=nham, nham [ren2|ren4]\n\t1. Doc long thanh, lay tam y cung tin nhau goi la nham. \n\t2. Chiu, duong. Nhu chung no nan nham 眾怒難任 chung gian kho duong, vo nham kich thiet binh dinh chi chi 無任激切屏營之至 cam kich thiet tha hai hung khon xiet. \n\t3. Ganh vac. Nhu nham lao 任勞 ganh vac lay su kho nhoc, nham oan 任怨 chiu lay su oan trach. \n\t4. Mot am la nham. Viec. Nhu toi lam cai chuc phan cua minh goi la pho nham 赴任. \n\t5. Dung. Nhu tri nhan thien nham 知人善任 biet nguoi kheo dung. \n\t6. Mac. Nhu nham y 任意 mac y.
份=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu ban 彬 ngay xua, nay muon dung lam chu phan mot phan da chia ranh roi.
仿=phang, phong [fang3]\n\t1. Phang phat 仿弗 thay khong duoc ro rang, cung cung nghia nhu chu 髣髴. \n\t2. Mot am la phong. Bat chuoc. Nhu phong tao 仿造 bat chuoc ma lam.
企=xi [qi3]\n\t1. Ngong. Nhu vo nham kieu xi 無任翹企 mong ngong khon xiet, xi nghiep 企業 mong ngong cho thanh nghe nghiep, v.v.
伃=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu du 妤.
伉=khang [kang4]\n\t1. Khang le 伉儷 sanh doi, vo chong lay nhau goi la khang le.
伊=y [yi1]\n\t1. Kia, ay. Nhu y nhan 伊人 nguoi kia.
伋=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Ten tuc ong Tu Tu, chau duc Khong tu.
伍=ngu [wu3]\n\t1. Hang ngu, nam nguoi linh sap mot hang goi la ngu. \n\t2. Bang hang. Nhu Han Han Tin giang tuoc vi hau, tu tam du Khoai dang ngu 漢韓信降爵為侯自慚與噲等伍 Han Tin bi giang xuong tuoc hau, phai bang hang voi bon Phan Khoai tu lay lam then. \n\t3. Nam, cung nhu chu ngu 五 tuc goi la chu ngu kep, dung de viet to boi cho khoi chua di duoc.
伎=ky [ji4]\n\t1. Tai. Nhu ky xao 伎巧 tai kheo. \n\t2. Con nha nghe. Nhu ky nu 伎女 con hat.
伏=phuc [fu2]\n\t1. Nep, nam phuc xuong. \n\t2. Nap, giau. Nhu phuc binh 伏兵 giau binh mot cho de rinh giac den thi danh.
伐=phat [fa2]\n\t1. Danh, dem binh di danh nuoc nguoi goi la phat. \n\t2. Nen. Nhu phat co 伐鼓 danh trong. \n\t3. Chat. Nhu phat moc 伐木 chat cay. \n\t4. Khoe cong. \n\t5. Dam chem danh giet cung goi la phat.
休=huu [xiu1]\n\t1. Tot lanh. \n\t2. Nghi ngoi, phep nha Duong, cac nguoi lam quan cu muoi ngay duoc nghi mot ngay goi la tuan huu 旬休. \n\t3. Thoi nghi. Nhu bai huu 罷休 bai ve. \n\t4. Ve nghi, lam quan gia ve nghi goi la huu tri 休致. \n\t5. Cai to bo vo goi la huu thu 休書.
伕=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Cung nghia nhu chu 夫.
伙=hoa [huo3]\n\t1. Trong doi quan cho muoi nguoi cung an mot mam goi la hoa ban 伙伴 (cung thoi ma an). Khong cung o voi nhau nua goi la tan hoa 散伙. Tuc goi cac do thap vat la gia hoa 家伙.
伯=ba [bai3|bo2]\n\t1. Bac, anh bo goi la ba phu 伯父. Dan ba goi anh chong la ba. \n\t2. Tuoc ba, doi xua che ra nam tuoc la. cong hau ba tu nam 公侯伯子男. \n\t3. Cung nghia nhu chu ba 霸 la mot vua chu hau gioi, dung len doc suat ca cac vua chu hau ve chau phuc thien tu.
估=co [gu1|gu4]\n\t1. Danh gia. Nhu co gia 估價 danh gia xem vat ay dang gia bao nhieu.
伱=ne [ni3]\n\t1. May, cung viet la 你.
伴=ban [ban4]\n\t1. Ban. Nhu dong ban 同伴 nguoi cung an voi minh. 2. Tiep. Nhu ban thuc 伴食 ngoi tiep an uong.
伶=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Linh Luan 伶倫 ten mot vi nhac quan ngay xua, vi the nen goi quan nhac la linh quan 伶倌. \n\t2. Uu linh 優伶 phuong cheo. \n\t3. Le. Nhu linh dinh co kho 伶仃孤苦 lenh denh kho so. \n\t4. Nhanh nhen. Nhu linh li 伶俐 lanh le.
伸=than [shen1]\n\t1. Duoi. Nhu dan than 引伸 keo duoi ra. \n\t2. Lam cho phai le. Nhu than oan 伸冤 go cho ke oan duoc to le thang. 
伺=ty, tu [ci4|si4]\n\t1. Do xet, ta quen doc la tu.
伻=binh [beng1]\n\t1. Sai khien.
似=tu [shi4|si4]\n\t1. Giong nhu. \n\t2. Con chau, cung nghia nhu chu tu 嗣. \n\t3. Hau ha. \n\t4. Tua nhu (loi noi chua quyet han).
伽=gia [ga1]\n\t1. Dich am tieng Pham. Nhu gia da 伽陀 loi van tan tung, tuc la bai ke. \n\t2. Ten cay. Nhu cay gia nam 伽楠.
佃=dien [dian4|tian2]\n\t1. Lam ruong. Nguoi lam ruong thue ruong ma lam goi la dien ho 佃户. \n\t2. Di san.
但=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Nhung. nhoi noi chuyen cau. \n\t2. Chi. Nhu bat dan nhu thu 不但如此 chang nhung chi nhu the.
佇=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Dung lau.
伫=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Dung lau.
佈=bo [bu4]\n\t1. Khap, bao cho moi nguoi deu biet goi la bo cao 佈告. Thuong dung chu bo 布 nhieu hon.
佋=thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 紹 noi. \n\t2. Mot am la chieu, cung nhu chu 昭.
位=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Ngoi, cai cho ngoi cua minh duoc o goi la vi. Nhu dia vi 地位, tuoc vi 爵位, v.v. \n\t2. Vi, nhoi ton kinh nguoi. Nhu chu vi 諸位 moi ngai, cac vi 各位 cac ngai, v.v.
低=de [di1]\n\t1. Thap, doi lai voi chu cao. \n\t2. Cui. Nhu de dau 低頭, de hoi 低回 nghi luan quan, v.v. \n\t3. Khe. Nhu de ngu 低語 noi khe.
住=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Thoi. Nhu vien thanh de bat tru 猿聲啼不住 tieng vuon keu khong thoi. \n\t2. O. Nhu tru son ha 住山下 o duoi nui. \n\t3. Con day, nha Phat noi muon su muon vat o the gian cai gi cung co bon thoi ky. thanh tru hoai khong 成住壞空. He cai gi dang o vao thoi ky con day thi goi la tru. Nhu tru tri tam bao. Phat tuy tich roi. Nhung con tuong ngai luu lai, cung nhu Phat o doi mai the la tru tri Phat bao. Phat tuy tich roi. Nhung kinh sach con luu truyen lai the la tru tri Phap bao. Phat tuy tich roi. Nhung con cac vi xuat gia tu hanh ke tiep lam viec cua Phat, the la tru tri tang bao. Vi the nen mot vi nao lam chu trong nom ca mot ngoi chua goi la vi tru tri. \n\t4. Luu luyen (dinh bam) nhu vo so tru 無所住 khong luu luyen vao day.
佐=ta [zuo3]\n\t1. Giup. \n\t2. Thu hai. Nhu huyen ta 縣佐 chuc quan giup viec quan huyen.
佑=huu [you4]\n\t1. Giup do.
体=the [ti1|ti3]\n\t1. Chinh la chu ban 笨 nang ne, tuc muon viet thay chu the 體, goi la chu the don.
佔=chiem, chiem [zhan1|zhan4]\n\t1. Dom xem. \n\t2. Mot am la chiem. Chiem lay. Nhu chiem cu 佔據 chiem giu lay.
占=chiem, chiem [zhan1|zhan4]\n\t1. Dom xem. \n\t2. Mot am la chiem. Chiem lay. Nhu chiem cu 佔據 chiem giu lay.
何=ha [he2]\n\t1. Sao, gi, loi noi van lai. Nhu ha co 何故 co gi ? ha da 何也 sao vay ?
佗=da, tha [tuo2]\n\t1. Uy da 倭佗 ung dung, ta cai dang ung dung tu dac. Mot am la tha. \n\t2. Khac. Nhu quan tu chinh nhi bat tha 君子正而不佗 nguoi quan tu chinh ma khong doi khac, cung nghia nhu chu tha 他.
佘=xa [she2]\n\t1. Ho Xa.
余=du [yu2]\n\t1. Ta.
佚=dat [yi4]\n\t1. Roi. Nhu an dat 安佚 yen roi. \n\t2. Tron, an nhu an dat 隱佚 nguoi tron doi khong cho doi biet, di dat nhi bat oan 遺佚而不怨 bo sot minh o an ma khong oan.
佛=phat [fo2|fu2]\n\t1. Dich am tieng Pham, noi du phai noi la Phat da 佛陀, bac tu da toi coi giac ngo hoan toan, lai giao hoa cho nguoi duoc hoan toan giac ngo. Nhu duc Thich ca 釋迦 bo het cong danh phu quy, lia ca gia dinh, tu hanh khac kho, phat minh ra het cho me lam cua chung sinh, de te do cho chung sinh, the la Phat. Vi the nen nhung phuong phap ngai noi ra goi la Phat phap 佛法, giao ly cua ngai goi la Phat giao, nguoi tin theo giao ly cua ngai goi la tin do Phat giao, v.v. \n\t2. Phat lang 佛郎 dich am chu franc, quan tien Tay.
作=tac [zuo1|zuo4]\n\t1. Nhac len. Nhu chan tac tinh than 振作精神. \n\t2. Lam, lam nen. Nhu phu tac chi 父作之 cha lam nen.
佞=ninh [ning4]\n\t1. Tai, minh tu nhun minh xung la bat ninh 不佞 ke chang tai nay. \n\t2. Don ngot, ninh not, noi kheo pho nguoi goi la ninh .
佟=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Cho Dong.
佩=boi [pei4]\n\t1. Deo, deo vang ngoc lam do trang suc la boi. Nhu boi ngoc 佩玉 deo ngoc, boi dao 佩刀 deo dao, v.v. \n\t2. Nho mai. Nhu boi phuc 佩服 phuc mai. phuc mai nhu deo vao minh khong bao gio quen.
佯=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Gia vo. Nhu duong cuong 佯狂 gia cach ro.
佰=bach [bai3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu百, tuc goi la chu bach kep.
佳=giai [jia1]\n\t1. Tot. \n\t2. Dep. Nhu giai nhan 佳人 con gai dep, nguoi dep.
佻=dieu, dieu, dieu [tiao1]\n\t1. Tho lay, bac. Nhu khinh dieu 輕佻 khinh bac, cung doc la chu dieu . \n\t2. Mot am la dieu, lam cham tre lai.
佽=thu [ci4]\n\t1. Tien loi.
佾=dat [yi4]\n\t1. Hang dat. Trong le dinh vua Thien tu duoc bat sau muoi tu nguoi mua bai bong, moi hang tam nguoi goi la mua bat dat.
使=su, su [shi3]\n\t1. Khien, sai khien nguoi ta goi la su. \n\t2. Gia su, loi dat dieu ra. Nhu sach Manh tu noi nhu su nhan chi so duc tham vu ky sinh 如使人之所欲甚于其生 gia khien long muon cua nguoi hon ca su song. \n\t3. Mot am la su. Di su. Nhu cong su 公使 quan su, su quan 使君 chuc quan di su, v.v. Chuc quan thu su cung goi la su quan.
侃=khan [kan3]\n\t1. Cung thang. Nhu khan khan nhi dam 侃侃而談 cung coi ma noi.
侄=chat [zhi2]\n\t1. Ben. Tuc muon lam chu diet 姪 chau.
來=lai, lai [lai2]\n\t1. Lai. \n\t2. Ve sau. Nhu tuong lai 將來 ve sau nay. \n\t3. Mot am la lai. Yen ui, vo ve yen ui ke den voi minh.
来=lai, lai [lai2]\n\t1. Lai. \n\t2. Ve sau. Nhu tuong lai 將來 ve sau nay. \n\t3. Mot am la lai. Yen ui, vo ve yen ui ke den voi minh.
侈=xi [chi3]\n\t1. Phi. Nhu xa xi 奢侈 xa phi.
例=le [li4]\n\t1. Le, vi, lay cai nay lam mau muc cho cai kia goi la le. Nhu the le 體例, dieu le 詞例, luat le 律例, v.v.
侌=am [yin1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu am 陰.
侍=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Hau. Nhu thi toa 侍坐 ngoi hau. \n\t2. Ke hau. Nhu noi thi 內侍 ke hau trong. \n\t3. Nhoi noi nhun minh cua ke duoi noi voi be tren. Nhu thi sinh 侍生 vao han lam sau nguoi ba khoa thi tu xung la thi sinh.
侏=chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Chu nho 侏儒 dang mat tun mun.
侑=huu [you4]\n\t1. Giup. Nhu huu thuc 侑食 kheo moi cho an duoc nhieu them.
侔=mau [mou2]\n\t1. Deu, la ngang hang.
侖=lon [lun2]\n\t1. Con lon 昆侖 ten nui Con lon. co khi viet la 昆崙.
仑=lon [lun2]\n\t1. Con lon 昆侖 ten nui Con lon. co khi viet la 昆崙.
侗=dong, thong [dong4|tong2|tong3]\n\t1. Khong biet gi. \n\t2. Mot am la thong. Lung thong 儱侗 thang muc.
侘=sa [cha4]\n\t1. Sa se 侘傺 bo pho, ta dang nguoi that chi.
侚=tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Nhanh nhen. \n\t2. Lai co nghia nhu chu 殉.
供=cung [gong1|gong4]\n\t1. Bay, dat. Nhu cung truong 供帳 bo man san cho nguoi ngu. \n\t2. Vang. Nhu cung chuc 供職 vang giu chuc viec minh. \n\t3. Loi cung. tra hoi ke khac, ke khac xung het su minh goi la cung. Nhu khau cung 口供, than cung 親供 v.v.
依=y, y [yi1]\n\t1. Nuong. Nhu y khoc 依靠 nuong nho. \n\t2. Y theo, cu chieu cung cach nguoi ta da dinh ma lam, ma thuan goi la y. \n\t3. Y nhien, van cu nhu cu. \n\t4. Mot am la y. Nhu phu y 斧依 mot cai do nhu cai binh phong tren theu chu nhu luoi bua de cho oai.
侮=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Khinh nhon. Nhu khi vu 欺侮 lua gat ha hiep. \n\t2. Ke lan ap. Nhu ngu vu 禦侮 chong ke den lan ap minh.
侯=hau [hou2|hou4]\n\t1. Tuoc hau. cac nha de vuong dat ra nam tuoc de phong cho bay toi, tuoc hau la tuoc thu hai trong nam tuoc. Doi phong kien, thien tu phong ho hang cong than ra lam vua cac xu, goi la vua chu hau, doi sau nhan the, muon lam tieng goi cac quan sang. Nhu quan hau 君侯, ap hau 邑侯, v.v. \n\t2. Bui, dung lam nhoi phat ngu nhu chu duy 唯. \n\t3. Cai dich ban, tam vai cang dai muoi thuoc, trong ve cai dich cho ke thi ban, goi la hau, co khi viet la 矦.
侵=xam [qin1]\n\t1. Tien dan. Nhu xam tam 侵尋 dan da. \n\t2. Danh ngam, ngam dem binh vao bo coi nuoc khac goi la xam. \n\t3. Bung. Nhu xam than 侵晨 sang tan suong roi. \n\t4. Xam lan, khong phai cua minh ma cu lan hiep goi la xam. Nhu xam doat 侵奪 xam cuop, xam chiem 侵占, v.v.
侶=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Ban. cung di cung o lam quen voi minh goi la lu.
侣=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Ban. cung di cung o lam quen voi minh goi la lu.
侷=cuc [ju2]\n\t1. Co quap. bi vat gi han che, lam cho khong duoi thang duoc, goi la cuc.
便=tien [bian4|pian2]\n\t1. Tien. Nhu tien loi 便利. \n\t2. Yen, cai gi lam cho minh duoc yen goi la tien. Nhu tien dien 便殿, tien cung 便宮 cung dien nghi duoc yen, v.v.
係=he [xi4]\n\t1. Buoc, cung nghia nhu chu he 繫. \n\t2. Nhoi noi giup loi. Nhu uy he 委係, nguyen uy la xac he 確係 dich xac la, v.v.
促=xuc [cu4]\n\t1. Gat, su can kip den noi goi la xuc. Nhu cap xuc 急促 voi gap, doan xuc 短促 ngan gat, xuyen xuc 喘促 tho gat, v.v. \n\t2. Thuc duc.
俄=nga [e2]\n\t1. Choc lat. Nhu nga khoanh 俄頃 thoang ti. \n\t2. Ten nuoc Nga, goi du la Nga La Tu.
俊=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Tai gioi, tai tri hon nguoi goi la tuan, pham su vat gi co tieng hon doi deu goi la tuan.
俎=tro [zu3]\n\t1. Cai thot. \n\t2. Cai mam dung de cac muong sinh dang len le. Tuc quen viet la 爼.
俏=tieu [qiao4]\n\t1. Giong. \n\t2. Dep.
俐=li [li4]\n\t1. Nhanh nhen sang suot. Nhu lanh li 伶俐 lanh loi.
俑=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Tuong go. \n\t2. Nguoi nao xuong len thoi ac truoc nhat goi la tac dung 作俑.
俗=tuc [su2]\n\t1. Phong tuc. Tren hoa ke duoi goi la phong 風, duoi bat chuoc tren goi la tuc 俗. \n\t2. Tuc tan, nguoi khong nha nhan goi la tuc. Nhung cai ham chuong cua doi, ma bi ke tri thuc cao thuong che deu goi la tuc.
俘=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Bat duoc, danh bat duoc quan giac goi la phu.
俚=ly [li3]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu vo ly 無俚 cung nhu noi vo lieu 無聊 khong nho cai gi cho khuay khoa duoc. \n\t2. Que kech. Nhu ly ca 俚歌 cau hat que kech cua nguoi nha que hat.
俛=phu, mien [mian3]\n\t1. Cui, cung nghia voi chu phu 俯. Mot am la mien. \n\t2. Gang, cung nghia voi chu mien 勉.
保=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Ganh vac, ganh lay trach nhiem goi la bao. Nhu bao chung 保證 nhan lam chung, bao hiem 保險 nhan giup do luc nguy hiem, trung bao 中保 nguoi dung giua nhan trach nhiem gioi thieu ca hai ben. \n\t2. Giu. Nhu bao ho 保護, bao ve giu giang. \n\t3. Ke lam thue. Nhu tuu bao 酒保 ke lam thue cho hang ruou. \n\t4. Bau. Nhu bao cu 保舉 bau cu ai len lam chuc gi.
俞=du [shu4|yu2]\n\t1. Phai, vang, loi, noi dap lai. Nhu phung chi vua da ung cho goi la du duan 俞允. Tuc viet la 兪.
俟=si [qi2|si4]\n\t1. Doi, co khi viet la 竢.
俠=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Hao hiep, lay quyen lay suc ma giup nguoi goi la hiep 俠. pham nhung nguoi vi nghia ma cuu giup nguoi goi la hiep. Nhu nghia hiep 義俠, hiep si 俠士, v.v.
侠=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Hao hiep, lay quyen lay suc ma giup nguoi goi la hiep 俠. pham nhung nguoi vi nghia ma cuu giup nguoi goi la hiep. Nhu nghia hiep 義俠, hiep si 俠士, v.v.
信=tin [xin4]\n\t1. Tin, khong sai loi hen la tin. Nhu trung tin 忠信 tin thuc. \n\t2. Khong ngo gi. Nhu tuong tin 相信 cung tin nhau, tin dung 信用 tin dung, tin thi 信施 nguoi tin dao Phat biet dem cua bo thi cung dang. \n\t3. Ngu tro den hai lan goi la tin. \n\t4. Dau hieu de lam tin. Nhu an tin 印信, tin phieu 信票 cai ve lam tin ve tien bac. \n\t5. Tin tuc. Nhu thu tin 書信 cai thu hoi tham. \n\t6. Tieu tuc. Nhu phong tin 風信 tin gio, suong tin 霜信 tin suong, nghia bong la tin tuc o ngoai dua den. \n\t7. Ten thu da doc, thach tin 石信 tuc thu da an chet nguoi, san o Tin chau, ta thuong goi la nhan ngon.
修=tu [xiu1]\n\t1. Sua, sua cho hay tot goi la tu. Nhu tu than 修身 sua minh, tu duc 修德 sua duc, tu ly cung that 修理宮室 sua sang nha cua. \n\t2. Dai. Nhu tu truc 修竹 cay truc dai. \n\t3. Tu-da-la dich am tieng Pham, nghia la kinh. Dem nhung loi Phat da noi chep lai thanh sach, goi la kinh. Noi du phai noi la khe kinh nghia la kinh Phat noi dung ly dung co, khong sai mot chut nao vay. Co ban dich la tu-do-lo. \n\t4. Tu-la 修羅 mot loai giong nhu quy than, la mot dao trong luc dao thien, nhan, tu-la, suc sinh, nga quy, dia nguc.
俯=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Cui. Nhu nguong quan phu sat 仰觀俯察 ngua xem cui xet. \n\t2. Nhoi ke duoi doi voi nguoi tren cung goi la phu. Nhu phu sat 俯察 ru long xet xuong, phu duan 俯允 ru long ung cho, v.v.
俱=cau [ju1|ju4]\n\t1. Deu. Nhu phu mau cau ton 父母俱存 cha me deu con.
俳=bai [pai2]\n\t1. Bai uu 俳優 phuong cheo.
俵=bieu [biao3]\n\t1. Chia cho. Ta dem cai gi cho ai goi la bieu, co nhe cung noi chu nay.
俶=thuc, thich [chu4]\n\t1. Moi, truoc tu. \n\t2. Chinh te. Nhu thuc trang 俶装 sam sua hanh trang chinh te. \n\t3. Mot am la thich. Cung nghia nhu chu thich 倜, thich thang 俶儻 loi lac.
俸=bong [feng4]\n\t1. Bong loc.
俺=yem [an3]\n\t1. Ta day.
俾=ti [bi3]\n\t1. Khien. Nhu ti nhi xi nhi xuong 俾爾熾而昌 khien cho may tot ma thinh. \n\t2. Theo. Nhu vong bat xuat ti 罔不出俾 khong ai khong noi theo.
倀=tranh [chang1|tang3]\n\t1. Long bong. Nhu tranh tranh vo so tri 倀倀無所知 long bong chang co duong loi nao. \n\t2. Ngay xua bao rang ho an thit nguoi, hon nguoi khong biet di dau, lai theo con ho, de dua ho ve an thit nguoi khac, vi the nhung ke giup ke ac lam ac deu goi la tranh.
伥=tranh [chang1|tang3]\n\t1. Long bong. Nhu tranh tranh vo so tri 倀倀無所知 long bong chang co duong loi nao. \n\t2. Ngay xua bao rang ho an thit nguoi, hon nguoi khong biet di dau, lai theo con ho, de dua ho ve an thit nguoi khac, vi the nhung ke giup ke ac lam ac deu goi la tranh.
倂=tinh [bing4]\n\t1. Cung, deu.
倅=thoi, tot [cui4]\n\t1. Chuc pho, chuc pho giup viec quan chinh goi la thua thoi 承倅. \n\t2. Mot am la tot. Phep nha Chu tram nguoi linh goi la tot.
倆=luong [lia3|liang3]\n\t1. Ky luong 伎倆 tai kheo. Nhu ky luong di cung 伎倆已窮 khong con tai kheo gi nua.
俩=luong [lia3|liang3]\n\t1. Ky luong 伎倆 tai kheo. Nhu ky luong di cung 伎倆已窮 khong con tai kheo gi nua.
倉=thuong, thang [cang1]\n\t1. Cai bich dung thoc. \n\t2. Mot am la thang. Nhu thang thot 倉卒 voi vang hap tap. \n\t3. Co khi dung nhu chu thuong 凔. Nhu thuong hai 倉海 be xanh.
仓=thuong, thang [cang1]\n\t1. Cai bich dung thoc. \n\t2. Mot am la thang. Nhu thang thot 倉卒 voi vang hap tap. \n\t3. Co khi dung nhu chu thuong 凔. Nhu thuong hai 倉海 be xanh.
個=ca [ge3|ge4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ca 箇.
个=ca [ge3|ge4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ca 箇.
倌=quan [guan1]\n\t1. Quan nhan 倌人 chuc bay toi nho coi viec dong xe ngua cho vua. Tuc goi ke lam thue cho nha hang com la duong quan 堂倌.
倍=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Gap. Nhu boi nhi 倍二 gap hai, boi tam 倍三 gap ba, v.v. \n\t2. Phan boi, la trai lai. Nhu su tu nhi boi chi 師死而倍之 thay chet ma phan lai ngay.
倏=thuc [shu1]\n\t1. Chot. Nhu thuc hot 倏忽 chop nhoang, noi trong thoi gian bien doi qua nhanh khong lieu kip.
們=mon [men5]\n\t1. Bon. Nhu nga mon 我們 bon ta.
们=mon [men5]\n\t1. Bon. Nhu nga mon 我們 bon ta.
倒=dao [dao3|dao4]\n\t1. Nga. \n\t2. Lon. Nhu dao huyen 倒懸 treo lon nguoc len. \n\t3. Kien thuc khong dung goi la dao kien 倒見. Nhu the gian khong co gi la thuong ma cho la thuong mai, the la dao kien.
倔=quat [jue2|jue4]\n\t1. Quat cuong 倔彊, cung coi uong nganh.
倖=hanh [xing4]\n\t1. May. Nhu kieu hanh 僥倖 cau may. cung cung nghia nhu chu hanh 幸 may.
倘=thang [chang2]\n\t1. Vi. Nhu thang su 倘使 vi khien.
候=hau [hou4]\n\t1. Do ngong. Nhu van hau 問候 tim hoi tham ban, trinh hau 偵候 do xet, deu la cai y nghia lang doi do xet ca. \n\t2. Chuc. Nhu dang hau 等候 cho chuc. \n\t3. Khi hau. phep nha lich cu nam ngay goi la mot hau, ba hau la mot khi tiet, vi the nen tom goi thi tiet gioi la khi hau 氣候, tiet hau 節候, v.v. \n\t4. Cai tinh trang cua su vat gi cung goi la hau. Nhu hoa hau 火候 the lua, chung hau 症候 tinh the, chung benh.
倚=y [yi3]\n\t1. Nhan. Nhu hoa he phuc so y 禍兮福所倚 va kia la cai nhan sinh ra phuc. \n\t2. Dua, ngoi nam dua vao cai gi, hay de cai gi ghe vao cai gi, deu goi la y. Nhu trac y 卓倚 cai dang dua, y ki 倚几 ghe dua. \n\t3. Cay. Nhu y the lang nhan 倚勢陵人 cay the lan nguoi.
倜=thich [ti4]\n\t1. Thich thang 倜儻 loi lac, khong ai bo buoc duoc.
借=ta [jie4]\n\t1. Vay muon, minh vay cua nguoi hay minh cho nguoi vay deu goi la ta. \n\t2. Muon, cai gi von khong co ma muon dung thi goi la ta.
倡=xuong, xuong [chang4]\n\t1. Hat, lam tho lam ca, ai lam truoc goi la xuong 倡 ke noi van sau goi la hoa 和, vi the nen ai lam gi truoc nhat deu goi la de xuong 提倡. \n\t2. Mot am la xuong. Xuong uu 倡優 con hat. \n\t3. Xuong cuong 倡狂 ro dai (sang bay), co khi viet la 猖.
倢=tiep (10 n) [jie2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 婕.
倣=phong [fang3]\n\t1. Bat chuoc, cung viet la phong 仿.
値=tri [zhi2]\n\t1. Cam. Nhu tri ki lo vu 値其鷺羽 cam thua canh co. \n\t2. Dang. Nhu tri nien 値年 dang nam, tri nhat 値日 dang ngay, nghia la phai lam moi viec nam ay, ngay ay vay. \n\t3. Danh gia (gia tien voi do xung dang nhau). \n\t4. Gap.
倥=khong [kong1]\n\t1. Khong dong 倥侗 voi vang sap ngua.
倦=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Moi met.
倨=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Ngong lao.
倩=thien, sai [qian4]\n\t1. Xinh dep. Nhu xao tieu thien he 巧笑倩兮 kheo cuoi tuoi dep lam sao. \n\t2. Re. Nhu muoi thien 妹倩 em re, diet thien 姪倩 chau re. \n\t3. Mot am la sai. Muon thay nhu sai dai 倩代 nho nguoi do thay ho.
倪=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Be nho, tre con goi la nghe. \n\t2. Chia coi. Nhu doan nghe 端倪 moi khoe (noi cho chia ro dau moi manh khoe cua mot su gi).
倫=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu luan ly 倫理 cai dao thuong nguoi ta phai noi theo. \n\t2. Loai, buc. Nhu sieu quan tuyet luan 超羣絕倫 tai gioi hon ca cac buc.
伦=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu luan ly 倫理 cai dao thuong nguoi ta phai noi theo. \n\t2. Loai, buc. Nhu sieu quan tuyet luan 超羣絕倫 tai gioi hon ca cac buc.
倬=trac [zhuo1]\n\t1. Ro ret, lon lao.
倭=uy, oa, nuy [wo1]\n\t1. Uy tri 倭遲 xa tham tham. \n\t2. Mot am la oa. Lun, nguoi Nhat ban thap be nen xua goi la oa nhan 倭人. Tuc quen doc la chu nuy.
倮=khoa [luo3]\n\t1. Tran truc, nguoi khong mac quan ao la khoa than 倮身.
偃=yen [yan3]\n\t1. Nep, xep. Nhu yen ki 偃旗, nep co xuong. \n\t2. Nam. \n\t3. Nghi. Nhu yen vu tu van 偃武修文. \n\t4. Yen kien 偃蹇 kieu ngao. Cung co nghia la bi bep. 
假=gia, gia [jia3|jia4]\n\t1. Gia. Nhu gia mao 假冒, gia thac 假託, v.v. \n\t2. Vi. Nhu gia su 假使 vi khien. Mot am la gia. \n\t3. Nghi tam goi, vi the nen xin phep nghi goi la thinh gia 請假, thuong cho nghi goi la thuong gia 賞假, v.v.
偈=ke [ji4|jie2]\n\t1. Loi ke, cac bai tho cua Phat goi la ke.
偉=vi [wei3]\n\t1. La, lon. Nhu tu vi 秀偉 tuan tu la, vi di 偉異 lon lao la, v.v. deu la dung de hinh dung su vat gi qui bau, hiem co, va hinh voc cao lon khac thuong ca. Nguoi nao co cong to nghiep lon deu goi la vi nhan 偉人.
伟=vi [wei3]\n\t1. La, lon. Nhu tu vi 秀偉 tuan tu la, vi di 偉異 lon lao la, v.v. deu la dung de hinh dung su vat gi qui bau, hiem co, va hinh voc cao lon khac thuong ca. Nguoi nao co cong to nghiep lon deu goi la vi nhan 偉人.
偋=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu binh 屏.
偌=nha [ruo4]\n\t1. Nhu the. Nhu nha dai 偌大 lon nhu the.
偎=oi [wei1]\n\t1. Than gan. Nhu oi y 偎倚 tua sat ben minh.
偏=thien [pian1]\n\t1. Lech, mech, o vao hai ben mot cai gi goi la thien, nang ve mot mat cung goi la thien. Nhu thien lao 偏勞 nhoc rieng ve mot ben, thien ai 偏愛 yeu rieng ve mot ben. Cai gi khong dung voi le trung binh deu goi la thien. \n\t2. Nhoi noi giup nhoi, su gi xay ra khong ngo toi goi la thien. Nhu thien bat thau xao 偏不湊巧 ro that kheo kheo sao !
偕=giai (11 n) [xie2]\n\t1. Deu.
做=to [zuo4]\n\t1. Lam.
停=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Dung, nua chung dung lai goi la dinh. Nhu dinh luu 停留 dung o lai, dinh bac 停泊 do thuyen lai, v.v. \n\t2. Cu dinh 居停 khach tro. \n\t3. Tuc cho so nguoi da co dinh la dinh. Nhu thap dinh trung khu lieu cuu dinh 十停中去了九停 trong muoi dinh mat mat chin dinh roi (cung nhu ta noi mot nhom mot top vay).
健=kien [jian4]\n\t1. Khoe. Nhu dung kien 勇健 khoe manh. \n\t2. Khoe khoan. Nhu khang kien 康健 suc voc khoe khoan.
偪=buc [bi1]\n\t1. Buc bach, cung nhu chu buc 逼.
偭=man [mian4]\n\t1. Trai. Nhu man quy viet cu 偭規越矩 cu dong trai phep. Cung doc la chu dien.
偲=ti, tai [si1]\n\t1. Ti ti 偲偲 cung ran do nhau (gang goi). \n\t2. Mot am la tai ram rau, rau xom xoam. 
側=trac [ce4|ze4|zhai1]\n\t1. Ben. Nhu trac dien 側面 mat ben, trac that 側室 vo le. \n\t2. Long. Nhu vo trac thinh 無側聽 cho nghe long. \n\t3. Nghieng. Nhu trac muc 側目 nghe mat, trac than 側身 nghieng minh. \n\t4. Hen dot. Nhu trac lau 側陋 hen kem.
侧=trac [ce4|ze4|zhai1]\n\t1. Ben. Nhu trac dien 側面 mat ben, trac that 側室 vo le. \n\t2. Long. Nhu vo trac thinh 無側聽 cho nghe long. \n\t3. Nghieng. Nhu trac muc 側目 nghe mat, trac than 側身 nghieng minh. \n\t4. Hen dot. Nhu trac lau 側陋 hen kem.
偵=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Rinh xet. Nhu trinh tham 偵探 do xet.
侦=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Rinh xet. Nhu trinh tham 偵探 do xet.
偶=ngau [ou3]\n\t1. Chot. Nhu ngau nhien 偶然 chot vay, khong hen the ma lai the la ngau nhien. \n\t2. Doi, la so chan, pham so chan deu goi la ngau. \n\t3. Pho tuong. Nhu moc ngau 木偶 tuong go. \n\t4. Bang vai. Nhu phoi ngau 配偶 sanh doi.
偷=thau [tou1]\n\t1. Trom cap, rinh luc nguoi ta khong phong ma tho lay goi la thau. dom trom nguoi ta goi la thau khan 偷看 deu la nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Cau tha, tre nhac. \n\t3. Bac beo.
偹=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 備. 
傀=khoi [gui1|kui3]\n\t1. To lon, vam vo. \n\t2. Quai la. \n\t3. Mot am la quy. Nhu quy loi 傀儡 tuong go.
傅=pho, phu [fu4]\n\t1. Giup rap. Nhu su pho 師傅 quan thay day vua chua khi con nho tuoi. \n\t2. Mot am la phu, lien dinh. Nhu bi chi bat ton, mao tuong yen phu 皮之不存毛將安傅 da da chang con, long bam vao dau.
傍=bang, bang [bang4]\n\t1. Ben, cung nhu chu bang 旁. \n\t2. Mot am la bang, tua nhu y bang 依傍 nuong tua.
傎=dien [dian1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dien 顛 ro dai.
傑=kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Gioi la. Tri khon gap muoi nguoi goi la kiet. Nhu hao kiet chi si 豪傑之士 ke si hao kiet. Pham cai gi khac han deu goi la kiet. Nhu kiet xuat 傑出 noi nguoi hay vat gi sinh ra khac han moi loai. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Hao kiet cong danh thu dia tang 豪傑功名此地曾 (Bach Dang hai khau 白藤海口) Hao kiet da tung lap cong danh o dat nay.
傒=he [xi1]\n\t1. Doi Luc trieu che nguoi Giang huu goi la nguoi he.
傔=khiem [qian4]\n\t1. Ke hau. Phep nha Duong quan Chanh su, quan Pho su deu co nguoi hau, ma goi la khiem nhan 傔人 cung nhu chuc thua sai bay gio.
傖=sanh [cang1]\n\t1. Thang cha, tieng goi khinh bi.
伧=sanh [cang1]\n\t1. Thang cha, tieng goi khinh bi.
傘=tan [san3]\n\t1. Cai tan.
伞=tan [san3]\n\t1. Cai tan.
備=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Du. \n\t2. Du san. Nhu du bi 預備 du san cho du dung.
备=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Du. \n\t2. Du san. Nhu du bi 預備 du san cho du dung.
傚=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Bat chuoc. Thuong dung chu hieu 效.
傢=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Gia hoa 傢伙 cac do dung trong nha.
僃=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bi 備.
僊=tien [xian1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tien 仙
僌=tai [zai3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tai 載.
催=thoi [cui1]\n\t1. Thuc duc.
傭=dong [yong1]\n\t1. Lam thue.
傲=ngao [ao4]\n\t1. Lao xac.
傳=truyen, truyen, truyen [chuan2|zhuan4]\n\t1. Truyen. Dem cua nguoi nay ma trao cho ke kia la truyen. Nhu truyen vi 傳位 truyen ngoi, truyen dao 傳道 truyen dao, v.v. \n\t2. Sai nguoi bao. Nhu truyen kien 傳見 truyen cho vao yet kien. \n\t3. Mot am la truyen. Day bao. Nhu Xuan Thu Ta thi truyen 春秋左氏傳 ho Ta giai nghia kinh Xuan Thu de day bao nguoi. \n\t4. Truyen ky. Nhu Liet nu truyen 列女傳 truyen cac gai hien. \n\t5. Mot am nua la truyen, nha tram. Nha de dua ke di don ke lai cung goi la truyen.
传=truyen, truyen, truyen [chuan2|zhuan4]\n\t1. Truyen. Dem cua nguoi nay ma trao cho ke kia la truyen. Nhu truyen vi 傳位 truyen ngoi, truyen dao 傳道 truyen dao, v.v. \n\t2. Sai nguoi bao. Nhu truyen kien 傳見 truyen cho vao yet kien. \n\t3. Mot am la truyen. Day bao. Nhu Xuan Thu Ta thi truyen 春秋左氏傳 ho Ta giai nghia kinh Xuan Thu de day bao nguoi. \n\t4. Truyen ky. Nhu Liet nu truyen 列女傳 truyen cac gai hien. \n\t5. Mot am nua la truyen, nha tram. Nha de dua ke di don ke lai cung goi la truyen.
傴=u [yu3]\n\t1. U lu 傴僂 cong lung (gu).
伛=u [yu3]\n\t1. U lu 傴僂 cong lung (gu).
債=trai [zhai4]\n\t1. No. Nhu phu trai 負債 mang no.
债=trai [zhai4]\n\t1. No. Nhu phu trai 負債 mang no.
傷=thuong [shang1]\n\t1. Vet dau. \n\t2. Hai. Nhu trung thuong 中傷 bi ke lam hai. \n\t3. Thuong. Nhu thuong cam 傷感 cam thuong.
伤=thuong [shang1]\n\t1. Vet dau. \n\t2. Hai. Nhu trung thuong 中傷 bi ke lam hai. \n\t3. Thuong. Nhu thuong cam 傷感 cam thuong.
傺=se [chi4]\n\t1. Sa se 侘傺 bo pho, ta dang nguoi that chi.
傻=xoa [sha3]\n\t1. Lau linh, u me khong biet cai gi cung goi la xoa.
傾=khuynh [qing1]\n\t1. Nghieng. Nhu khuynh nhi nhi thinh 傾耳而聽 nghieng tai ma nghe. \n\t2. Nghieng do, con gai dep goi la khuynh thanh 傾城 nghia la cai dep co the lam nghieng nuoc do thanh vay. \n\t3. De up. Nhu khuynh ham 傾陷 dung muu ke hai nguoi cung nhu dung vat gi de up chet nguoi vay. \n\t4. Doc het. Nhu khuynh nang 傾囊 doc tui. \n\t5. Kinh phuc nguoi het suc cung goi la khuynh dao 傾倒 nghia la kinh phuc qua khong con dau diem gi trong long. 
倾=khuynh [qing1]\n\t1. Nghieng. Nhu khuynh nhi nhi thinh 傾耳而聽 nghieng tai ma nghe. \n\t2. Nghieng do, con gai dep goi la khuynh thanh 傾城 nghia la cai dep co the lam nghieng nuoc do thanh vay. \n\t3. De up. Nhu khuynh ham 傾陷 dung muu ke hai nguoi cung nhu dung vat gi de up chet nguoi vay. \n\t4. Doc het. Nhu khuynh nang 傾囊 doc tui. \n\t5. Kinh phuc nguoi het suc cung goi la khuynh dao 傾倒 nghia la kinh phuc qua khong con dau diem gi trong long. 
僂=lu [lou2|lu:3]\n\t1. U lu 傴僂 cong lung (gu).
偻=lu [lou2|lu:3]\n\t1. U lu 傴僂 cong lung (gu).
僅=can [jin3|jin4]\n\t1. Nung, it, chi co the goi la can.
仅=can [jin3|jin4]\n\t1. Nung, it, chi co the goi la can.
僇=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Nhuc nha.
僉=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Deu, cung, moi nguoi deu noi the.
佥=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Deu, cung, moi nguoi deu noi the.
働=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Tu minh van dong goi la dong. Nhu lao dong 勞働.
僎=soan, chuyen [zhuan4]\n\t1. Du, thuong dung nhu chu soan 撰. Chinh am la chuyen.
像=tuong [xiang4]\n\t1. Hinh tuong. Nhu to tuong 塑像 to tuong. \n\t2. Giong. Nhu sau khi Phat tich, chi con tho tuong giong nhu luc con, goi la doi tuong phap 像法.
僑=kieu [qiao2]\n\t1. O nho, di o nho lang khac hay nuoc khac goi la kieu cu 僑居, kieu dan 僑民.
侨=kieu [qiao2]\n\t1. O nho, di o nho lang khac hay nuoc khac goi la kieu cu 僑居, kieu dan 僑民.
僕=boc [pu2]\n\t1. Day to. \n\t2. Ke cam cuong, ngay xua co chuc Thai boc tu 太僕寺 coi ve viec xe ngua cho vua. \n\t3. Ke hen nay, nhoi thu tu noi nhun minh goi la boc. \n\t4. Loc coc. Nhu phong tran boc boc 風塵僕僕 di lai loc coc, nghia la phai xong pha gio bui, khong duoc nghi ngoi.
僖=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Vui mung.
僚=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Nguoi bang vai, la nguoi ban cung lam viec. Nhu quan lieu 官僚 nguoi cung lam quan voi minh, cung goi la dong lieu 同僚. \n\t2. Anh em re cung goi la lieu te 僚婿.
僝=san, san [chan2]\n\t1. Neu to. \n\t2. Mot am la san, san sau 僝僽 nhoi mang rat te.
僞=nguy [wei3]\n\t1. Doi tra. \n\t2. Trom giu lay. Nhu ke loan than len cuop ngoi cua chua goi la nguy trieu 僞朝.
僣=thiet [jian4]\n\t1. Thiet thoat giao hoat, tuc muon lam chu tiem 僭.
僥=nghieu [jiao3|yao2]\n\t1. Tieu nghieu 僬僥 nguoi lun. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu, kieu hanh 僥倖 cau may, ta cai dang cau loi khong chan.
侥=nghieu [jiao3|yao2]\n\t1. Tieu nghieu 僬僥 nguoi lun. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu, kieu hanh 僥倖 cau may, ta cai dang cau loi khong chan.
僦=tuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Thue. Nhu tuu oc 僦屋 thue nha.
僧=tang [seng1]\n\t1. Su nam, dan ong di tu dap Phat goi la tang. Nguyen tieng Pham goi la Tang gia 僧伽 nghia la mot doan the de tu Phat, trong luat dinh bon vi su tro len moi goi la Tang gia.
僨=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Do nga, hong. Nhu phan su 僨事 hong viec.
偾=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Do nga, hong. Nhu phan su 僨事 hong viec.
僩=gian [xian4]\n\t1. Cung coi. Ta cai dang oai vo.
僬=tieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Tieu nghieu 僬僥 nguoi lun.
僭=tiem [jian4]\n\t1. Dinh lan, ke duoi gia thac lan ngoi nguoi tren goi la tiem. Nhu tiem thiet 僭窃, tiem viet 僭越 , v.v.
僮=dong [tong2|zhuang4]\n\t1. Thang nho.
僱=co [gu4]\n\t1. Thue. Nhu co cong 僱工 thue tho.
僵=cuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Nga. \n\t2. Cung. Nhu dong cuong 凍僵 gia ret cung do ra, co khi viet la cuong 殭.
價=gia [jia4|jie4|jie5]\n\t1. Gia ca, gia cai gi dang bao nhieu goi la gia.
价=gia [jia4|jie4|jie5]\n\t1. Gia ca, gia cai gi dang bao nhieu goi la gia.
僻=tich [pi4]\n\t1. Hep, cai gi khong phai la buc chinh dinh thong dat cung noi goi la tich 僻. Nhu hoang tich 荒僻 noi hoang huy hep hoi, van chuong dung chu dien tich quai quy nguoi ta it biet goi la quai tich 怪僻, ta tich 邪僻, v.v.
僽=sau [zhou4]\n\t1. San sau 僝僽 nhoi mang rat te.
僾=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Ai nhien 僾然 phang phat, lo mo 
僿=tai [sai4]\n\t1. Lo vo, khong co long trung thanh.
儀=nghi [yi2]\n\t1. Dang. Nhu uy nghi 威儀 co cai dang nghiem trang dang so. \n\t2. Lam mau, lam phep. Nhu nghi khi 儀器 do de cho nguoi bat chuoc. \n\t3. Do le, ha nghi 下儀 do le mung.
仪=nghi [yi2]\n\t1. Dang. Nhu uy nghi 威儀 co cai dang nghiem trang dang so. \n\t2. Lam mau, lam phep. Nhu nghi khi 儀器 do de cho nguoi bat chuoc. \n\t3. Do le, ha nghi 下儀 do le mung.
儁=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tuan 俊.
儂=nong [nong2]\n\t1. Tuc tu xung nong la ta day, dat Ngo goi nguoi la nong, nen goi nguoi dat Ngo la nong nhan 儂人 . Tuc thuong doc la nung.
侬=nong [nong2]\n\t1. Tuc tu xung nong la ta day, dat Ngo goi nguoi la nong, nen goi nguoi dat Ngo la nong nhan 儂人 . Tuc thuong doc la nung.
億=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Uc, muoi van la mot uc. \n\t2. Lieu luong. Nhu uc tac lu trung 億則屢中 luong thi thuong trung. \n\t3. Yen. Nhu cung uc 供億 cung cap cho du dung, cho duoc yen on. 
亿=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Uc, muoi van la mot uc. \n\t2. Lieu luong. Nhu uc tac lu trung 億則屢中 luong thi thuong trung. \n\t3. Yen. Nhu cung uc 供億 cung cap cho du dung, cho duoc yen on. 
儆=canh [jing3]\n\t1. Ran, cung nhu chu canh 警.
儈=quai [kuai4]\n\t1. Nguoi dung len hoi hop nguoi trong cho goi la nha quai 牙儈, tuc goi la thi quai 市儈. Nhu nguoi lai nguoi moi o cho vay.
侩=quai [kuai4]\n\t1. Nguoi dung len hoi hop nguoi trong cho goi la nha quai 牙儈, tuc goi la thi quai 市儈. Nhu nguoi lai nguoi moi o cho vay.
儉=kiem [jian3]\n\t1. Tan tien, co tiet che ma khong phung pha lao goi la kiem. \n\t2. Thieu. Nhu ban kiem 貧儉 ngheo thieu, kiem bac 儉薄 it oi nho mon. \n\t3. Nam mat mua cung goi la kiem tue 儉歲.
俭=kiem [jian3]\n\t1. Tan tien, co tiet che ma khong phung pha lao goi la kiem. \n\t2. Thieu. Nhu ban kiem 貧儉 ngheo thieu, kiem bac 儉薄 it oi nho mon. \n\t3. Nam mat mua cung goi la kiem tue 儉歲.
儋=dam [dan1]\n\t1. Ganh vac, bay gio thuong dung chu dam 擔.
儌=kieu [jiao3]\n\t1. Kieu hanh 儌倖 cau may, dom nom ngap nghe cai khong chac duoc, thuong dung nhu chu kieu 徼.
儎=tai [zai3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tai 載.
儐=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Nguoi giup le. Nhu tan tuong 儐相 nguoi tiep dai khach khua. Co khi doc la tan.
傧=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Nguoi giup le. Nhu tan tuong 儐相 nguoi tiep dai khach khua. Co khi doc la tan.
儒=nho [ru2]\n\t1. Hoc tro. Ten chung cua nhung nguoi co hoc. Nhu thac hoc thong nho 碩學通儒 nguoi hoc gioi hon nguoi. \n\t2. Nho nha. Pham cai gi co van ve ne nep deu goi la nho. Nhu nho phong 儒風, nho nha 儒雅, v.v. \n\t3. Dao Nho, bay gio thuong goi dao hoc cua duc Khong la Nho giao 儒教 de phan biet voi Dao giao 道教, Phat giao 佛教 vay.
儔=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Lu. Nhu tru lu 儔侶 nguoi cung bon.
俦=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Lu. Nhu tru lu 儔侶 nguoi cung bon.
儕=sai [chai2]\n\t1. Hang, bon. Nhu ngo sai 吾儕 hang ta, lu ta, chung ta, v.v.
侪=sai [chai2]\n\t1. Hang, bon. Nhu ngo sai 吾儕 hang ta, lu ta, chung ta, v.v.
儗=nghi [ni3]\n\t1. Vi, cung nhu chu nghi 擬.
儘=tan [jin3]\n\t1. Het tiet. \n\t2. Het cu. Nhu tan so 儘數 het so, tan truoc 儘著 tinh het nuoc.
儛=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Mua, cung nhu chu vu 舞. \n\t2. Mot ten nui. Nui Trieu Vu 朝儛.
償=thuong [chang2]\n\t1. Den. Nhu thuong hoan 償還 den tra. Bu. Nhu dac bat thuong that 得不償失 so duoc chang bu so mat.
偿=thuong [chang2]\n\t1. Den. Nhu thuong hoan 償還 den tra. Bu. Nhu dac bat thuong that 得不償失 so duoc chang bu so mat.
儡=loi [lei3]\n\t1. Khoi loi 傀儡 tuong go. 
儤=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Tuc chuc. Nhu bao tuc 儤宿 chuc quan lai chau chuc luon luon.
儩=tu [si4]\n\t1. Het, muon noi khong biet goi la bat tu 不儩, thuong viet chu tu 賜.
優=uu [you1]\n\t1. Nhieu. Nhu uu ac 優渥 thua thai. \n\t2. Thua. Nhu uu vi 優為 thua suc lam. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu uu thang liet bai 優勝劣敗 hon duoc kem thua. \n\t4. Phuong cheo.
优=uu [you1]\n\t1. Nhieu. Nhu uu ac 優渥 thua thai. \n\t2. Thua. Nhu uu vi 優為 thua suc lam. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu uu thang liet bai 優勝劣敗 hon duoc kem thua. \n\t4. Phuong cheo.
儷=le [li4]\n\t1. Doi. Khang le 伉儷 vo chong (doi lua).
俪=le [li4]\n\t1. Doi. Khang le 伉儷 vo chong (doi lua).
儺=na [nuo2]\n\t1. Le cau mat.
傩=na [nuo2]\n\t1. Le cau mat.
儻=thang [tang3]\n\t1. Thang. Thich thang 倜儻 loi lac. \n\t2. Hoac gia the, khong ki the ma lai the goi la thang. Thuong viet la thang 倘. Nhu thang lai chi vat 倜來之物 vat den bong dung.
傥=thang [tang3]\n\t1. Thang. Thich thang 倜儻 loi lac. \n\t2. Hoac gia the, khong ki the ma lai the goi la thang. Thuong viet la thang 倘. Nhu thang lai chi vat 倜來之物 vat den bong dung.
儼=nghiem [yan3]\n\t1. Ta cai dang kinh so. Nhu vong chi nghiem nhien 望之儼然 coi dang nghiem trang dang so.
俨=nghiem [yan3]\n\t1. Ta cai dang kinh so. Nhu vong chi nghiem nhien 望之儼然 coi dang nghiem trang dang so.
儿=nhan [er2]\n\t1. Nguoi. Chu nhan 人 giong nguoi dung, chu nhan ㄦ giong nguoi di.
兀=ngot [wu1|wu4]\n\t1. Cao ma bang dau. Bay gio quen goi la cao chot. Nhu dot ngot 突兀 chot vot. \n\t2. Ngay ngat. Nhu hang ngot ngot di cung nien 恆兀兀以窮年 thuong lo dau dau suot nam. \n\t3. Lai la loi tro ngu, trong cac bai tu nha Nguyen ho hay dung. \n\t4. Ngot gia 兀者, ke bi chat gay mot chan.
允=duan [yun3]\n\t1. Thanh thuc. \n\t2. Dang. Nhu binh duan 平允 xu doan phai chang.
元=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Moi, dau nam vua moi len ngoi goi la nguyen nien 元年 nam dau (thu nhat). Nua chung muon doi nien hieu khac, cung goi la cai nguyen 改元. Lich tay, lay nam chua Gia-to giang sinh, de ghi so nam, nen goi nam ay la ky nguyen 紀元, nghia la so mot bat dau tu day. Pham dau so gi cung goi la nguyen. Nhu thang gieng goi la nguyen nguyet 元月, ngay mong mot goi la nguyen nhat 元日. \n\t2. To lon. Nhu la nguyen lao 元老 gia ca. Nuoc lap hien co nguyen lao vien 元老院 de cac buc gia ca ton trong du vao ban viec nuoc. \n\t3. Cai dau. Nhu dung si bat vong tang ky nguyen 勇士不忘喪其元 ke si manh thuong nghi chet mat dau cung khong so. Vi the nguoi dai bieu ca mot nuoc goi la nguyen thu 元首. Pham nguoi thu nhat deu goi la nguyen. Nhu trang nguyen 狀元 ke thi do dau khoa thi dinh. \n\t4. Nguyen nguyen 元元 tram ho, dan den goi la le nguyen 黎元 Nha tu dao cho gioi, dat, nuoc la tam nguyen 三元 tuc la ba cai co truoc vay. \n\t5. Phep lich cu dinh ngay ram thang gieng la thuong nguyen 上元, ram thang bay la trung nguyen 中元, ram thang muoi goi la ha nguyen 下元, goi la ba ngay nguyen. Nhu thuong nguyen giap ty 上元甲子, ha nguyen giap ty 下元甲子, v.v. \n\t6. Nha Nguyen, giong o Mong co vao lay nuoc Tau, noi doi lam vua hoi nam \n\t1275. \n\t7. Dong, tuc thuong dung chu nguyen (cung nhu chu vien 圓) de goi ten tien. Nhu ngan nguyen 銀元 dong bac. \n\t8. Ten huy vua nha Thanh la Huyen 玄, nen sach vo in ve doi ay deu lay chu nguyen thay chu huyen.
兄=huynh [xiong1]\n\t1. Anh. \n\t2. Cung choi voi nhau cung goi la huynh. Nhu nhan huynh 仁兄 anh ban nhan duc (tieng ton xung ban).
充=sung [chong1]\n\t1. Day. Nhu tinh than sung tuc 精神充足 tinh than day du. \n\t2. Sung so 充數 du so, v.v. \n\t3. Lap chat. Nhu sung nhi bat van 充耳不聞 lap chat tai chang nghe. \n\t4. Duong ganh vac chuc viec cua minh goi la sung duong 充當.
兆=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Diem, doi xua dung mai rua boi, dot mai rua, roi coi nhung duong nut ma doan tot xau goi la trieu. Pham dung cai gi de xem tot xau deu goi la trieu. Nhu cat trieu 吉兆 diem tot. \n\t2. Hinh tuong. Nhu tram trieu 朕兆 su gi da phat ra hinh tuong mat trong thay duoc. \n\t3. Trieu, muoi uc la mot trieu, tuc la mot tram van. \n\t4. Huyet. Nhu boc trieu 卜兆 boi tim huyet chon.
兇=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. So hai. \n\t2. Du ton. Nhu hung do 兇徒 quan hung ton.
先=tien, tien [xian1]\n\t1. Truoc. \n\t2. Nguoi da chet goi la tien. Nhu tien de 先帝 vua doi truoc, tien nghiem 先嚴 cha xua. \n\t3. Mot am la tien. Lam truoc. Nhu tien nga truoc tien 先我著鞭 lieu the lam truoc ta.
光=quang [guang1]\n\t1. Sang, cac nha khoa hoc bay gio nghien cuu cai nguyen ly ve bong sang, chat sang goi la quang hoc 光學. \n\t2. Ve vang. Nhu quang lam 光臨, quang giang 光降 nguoi ta toi den minh la ve vang cho minh. \n\t3. Ruc ro. Nhu quan quang thuong quoc 觀光上國 xem cai van minh cua nuoc gioi. Nhu da doa vao noi toi tam lai khoi phuc lai ruc ro, da thua mat thanh mat nuoc lai danh lay lai duoc goi la quang phuc 光復. \n\t4. Bong, vat gi mai giua ky sang bong goi la quang. \n\t5. Het nhan.
克=khac [ke4]\n\t1. Hay. Nhu bat khac thanh hanh 不克成行 khong hay di duoc. \n\t2. Duoc, danh duoc goi la khac. Nhu khac phuc 克復 lay lai duoc cho dat da mat. Nhu khac ki phuc le 克己復禮 danh do long muon xang cua minh de lay lai le. Cac nha buon ban giam gia hang cung goi la khac ki. \n\t3. Hieu thang. Nhu ki khac 忌克 ghen ghet nguoi, thich hon nguoi.
兌=doai [dui4]\n\t1. Que doai, mot que trong tam que (bat quai). \n\t2. Doi. Nhu doai hoan 兌換 doi tien. \n\t3. Thang. Nhu tung bach tu doai 松柏斯兌 cay tung cay bach ay thang. \n\t4. Suot. Nhu hanh dao doai hi 行道兌矣 lam dao duoc suot vay.
兑=doai [dui4]\n\t1. Que doai, mot que trong tam que (bat quai). \n\t2. Doi. Nhu doai hoan 兌換 doi tien. \n\t3. Thang. Nhu tung bach tu doai 松柏斯兌 cay tung cay bach ay thang. \n\t4. Suot. Nhu hanh dao doai hi 行道兌矣 lam dao duoc suot vay.
免=mien, van [mian3]\n\t1. Bo. Nhu mien quan 免冠 trat mu. \n\t2. Khoi. Nhu mien tu 免死 thoat khoi chet. \n\t3. Truat, cach. Nhu mien quan 免官 cach chuc quan. \n\t4. Mot am la van. Nhu dan van 袒免 ao tang de tray tay ra.
兎=tho [tu4]\n\t1. Tuc viet thay chu 兔.
兒=nhi, nghe [er2]\n\t1. Tre con. Tre giai goi la nhi 兒, tre gai goi la anh 嬰. \n\t2. Con. Con doi voi cha me tu xung la nhi 兒. \n\t3. Nhoi noi giup cau, tuc ngu hay dung. Nhu hoa nhi 花兒 cai hoa. \n\t4. Mot am ma nghe. Ho Nghe. Nha Han co ten Nghe Khoan 兒寬.
儿=nhi, nghe [er2]\n\t1. Tre con. Tre giai goi la nhi 兒, tre gai goi la anh 嬰. \n\t2. Con. Con doi voi cha me tu xung la nhi 兒. \n\t3. Nhoi noi giup cau, tuc ngu hay dung. Nhu hoa nhi 花兒 cai hoa. \n\t4. Mot am ma nghe. Ho Nghe. Nha Han co ten Nghe Khoan 兒寬.
兔=tho [tu4]\n\t1. Con tho. \n\t2. Mat trang. Ngay xua bao cai bong den trong mat trang la con tho, vi the nen tuc goi mat trang la ngoc tho 玉兔.
兕=huy [si4]\n\t1. Con Huy, tuc la con te giac. Sung no tien dung lam chen uong ruou, nen goi la huy quang 兕光.
兗=duyen [yan3]\n\t1. Chau Duyen, thuoc tinh Son-dong va Truc-le ben Tau.
兖=duyen [yan3]\n\t1. Chau Duyen, thuoc tinh Son-dong va Truc-le ben Tau.
党=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Giong Dang, tuc la giong Duong-co giac bay gio, chinh la chu dang 黨.
兜=dau [dou1]\n\t1. Dau mau 兜鍪 cai mu tru. Cai mu luc ra danh tran thi doi. \n\t2. Dung dang sau om lai goi la dau. Nhu dau na 兜拿 om bat. Nhu ta noi khoa canh.
兢=cang [jing1]\n\t1. Nom nop. Ta cai dang kieng de can than.
入=nhap [ru4]\n\t1. Vao, doi lai voi chu xuat 出 ra. \n\t2. Dung vao, buoc vao. Nhu nhap thu 入手, co nhap 故入 buoc toi vao, sat nhap 詧入 thu nop vao. Dem cho no nop cho cho kia. \n\t3. Duoc, khoang tien thu vao goi la nhap khoan 入款. \n\t4. Hop. Nhu nhap dieu 入調 hop dieu, nhap cach 入格 hop cach. \n\t5. Tieng nhap, am chu co bon am la binh thuong khu nhap 平上去入. Tieng ngan ma gat la tieng nhap.
內=noi, nap [nei4]\n\t1. O trong, doi voi chu ngoai 外 ngoai. \n\t2. Cung cam. Nha vua goi la dai noi 大內. \n\t3. Vo. Nhu noi tu 內子, noi nhan 內人, tien noi 賤內deu la tieng minh tu goi vo minh khi doi voi nguoi ho hang ve ben nha vo goi la noi than 內親, anh em vo goi la noi huynh de 內兄第, v.v. \n\t4. Mot am la nap. Nop, cung nhu chu 納. Lay van tu co buoc nguoi vao toi goi la chu nap 周內.
内=noi, nap [nei4]\n\t1. O trong, doi voi chu ngoai 外 ngoai. \n\t2. Cung cam. Nha vua goi la dai noi 大內. \n\t3. Vo. Nhu noi tu 內子, noi nhan 內人, tien noi 賤內deu la tieng minh tu goi vo minh khi doi voi nguoi ho hang ve ben nha vo goi la noi than 內親, anh em vo goi la noi huynh de 內兄第, v.v. \n\t4. Mot am la nap. Nop, cung nhu chu 納. Lay van tu co buoc nguoi vao toi goi la chu nap 周內.
全=toan [quan2]\n\t1. Xong, du. \n\t2. Ven. Nhu toan quoc 全國 ven ca nuoc. \n\t3. Giu cho toan ven. Nhu toan hoat tham da 全活甚多 cuu song cho duoc han rat nhieu.
兩=luong, lang [liang3]\n\t1. Hai, doi. \n\t2. Mot am la lang. Co xe. Mot doi giay cung goi la nhat lang 一兩. \n\t3. Lang, can ta, muoi dong can goi la mot lang, muoi sau lang la mot can.
两=luong, lang [liang3]\n\t1. Hai, doi. \n\t2. Mot am la lang. Co xe. Mot doi giay cung goi la nhat lang 一兩. \n\t3. Lang, can ta, muoi dong can goi la mot lang, muoi sau lang la mot can.
八=bat [ba1]\n\t1. Tam, so dem.
公=cong [gong1]\n\t1. Cong, khong tu tui gi, goi la cong. Nhu cong binh 公平, cong chinh 公正, v.v. \n\t2. Chung, su gi do moi nguoi cung dong y goi la cong. Nhu cong cu 公舉, cong nhan 公認, v.v. \n\t3. Cung chung. Nhu cong chu dong hieu 公著同好 de doi cung thich chung. \n\t4. Cua chung. Nhu cong so 公所 so cong, cong san 公產 cua chung, v.v. \n\t5. Viec quan. Nhu cong khoan 公款 khoan cong, cong su 公事 viec cong. \n\t6. Quan cong, ngay xua dat quan Thai Su, Thai Pho, Thai Bao la tam cong 三公. \n\t7. Tuoc cong, tuoc to nhat trong nam tuoc. \n\t8. Bo chong. \n\t9. Ong, tieng nguoi nay goi nguoi kia. \n\t10. Con duc, trong loai muong nuoi, con duc goi la cong, con cai goi la mau 母.
六=luc [liu4|lu4]\n\t1. Sau, so dem.
兮=he [xi1]\n\t1. Vay, chu, loi tro ngu trong bai hat.
共=cong, cung [gong4]\n\t1. Cung, chung. Vua Le Vuong nha Chu-hu, ong Chu-cong, ong Trieu-cong hai ong cung giup vua tri nuoc goi la cong hoa 共和. Cac quan cung hoa voi nhau ma cung lam viec, vi the nen bay gio nuoc nao do dan cung cong cu quan len de tri nuoc goi la nuoc cong hoa 共和. \n\t2. Cong, tinh gop ca cac mon lai lam mot goi la cong. \n\t3. Mot am la cung. Kinh, cung nhu chu cung 恭. \n\t4. Du. Nhu cung truong 共張 bay dat du het moi cai, thuong dung nhu chu cung truong 供帳.
兵=binh [bing1]\n\t1. Do binh. Cac do nhu sung ong, giao mac deu goi la binh khi 兵器. Linh, phep binh bay gio chia lam ba. 1) hang thuong bi ; 2) tuc bi ; 3) hau bi. Hien dang o linh goi la thuong bi binh, het han ba nam ve nha ; co viec lai ra la tuc bi binh ; lai dang han ba nam nua roi ve la hau bi binh, lai het bon nam cho ve huu han, lai nhu dan thuong.
其=ky, ky, ki [ji1|qi2]\n\t1. Thua, loi noi chi vao cho nao. Nhu ky nhan ky su 其人其事 nguoi ay su ay. \n\t2. Mot am la ky. Nhu bi ky chi tu 彼其之子 con nguoi nhu the kia. \n\t3. Lai mot am la ki, loi noi dua day. Nhu da nhu ha ki 夜如何其 dem the nao kia, dem the nao u !
具=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Bay du. Nhu cu thuc 具食, bay bien du cac do an. \n\t2. Goi la du so. Nhu cu than 具臣 goi la du so bay toi chu chang co tai can gi, cu van 具文 goi la du cau du cach, chang co hay gi. \n\t3. Du, hoan bi, du ca. \n\t4. Do. Nhu nong cu 農具 do lam ruong, ngoa cu 臥具 do nam, v.v. \n\t5. Co tai nang cung goi la tai cu 才具.
典=dien [dian3]\n\t1. Kinh dien, phep thuong. Nhu dien hinh 典刑 phep tac. Tuc viet la 典型. \n\t2. Su cu, sach ghi cac su cu goi la co dien 古典. Viet van dan dien tich ngay xua la dien. \n\t3. Giu, chu truong mot cong viec gi goi la dien. Nhu dien tu 典祀 quan coi viec cung te. Nha chua co chuc dien toa 典座, coi chin viec ve cho nam cho ngoi. \n\t4. Cam co. The cai gi vao de vay goi la dien.
兼=kiem [jian1]\n\t1. Gom. Nhu kiem quan 兼管 gom coi, kiem nhan 兼人 mot nguoi lam viec gom ca viec cua hai nguoi. Tuc viet la 蒹.
冀=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Chau Ki, thuoc tinh Ha Nam nuoc Tau bay gio. \n\t2. Muon. Nhu hy ki 希冀 mong moi.
冂=quynh [jiong1]\n\t1. Dat o xa ngoai coi nuoc, kinh truyen deu dung chu quynh 坰.
冉=nhiem [ran3]\n\t1. Ho Nhiem. Nguyen viet la 冄.
册=sach [ce4]\n\t1. Bai van sach menh. Nhu vua phong tuoc cho ai goi la sach phong 册封. \n\t2. Ban sach, mot quyen sach goi la sach, cung co khi viet la 冊.
再=tai [zai4]\n\t1. Hai, lai. Nhu tai tam 再三 luon mai, tai pham 再犯 lai pham lan nua, tai tieu 再醮 dan ba lay chong lan thu hai.
冑=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Mu tru. Mu doi ra tran phong ten dan.
胄=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Mu tru. Mu doi ra tran phong ten dan.
冒=mao, mac [mao4|mo4]\n\t1. Trum day. \n\t2. Pham, cu viec tien di khong e so gi goi la mao. Nhu mao hiem 冒險 xong pha noi nguy hiem, mao vu 冒雨 xong mua. \n\t3. Hap tap. Nhu mao muoi 冒昧 lo mang, khong xet su ly cu lam bua. \n\t4. Tham mao. Thay loi lam lieu goi la tham mao 貪冒. \n\t5. Gia mao. Nhu mao danh 冒名 mao ten gia. \n\t6. Mot am la mac. Nhu Mac Don 冒頓 ten chu ro Hung no.
冓=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Trung cau 中冓 trong cung kin. Kinh Thi co cau trung cau chi ngon 中冓之言 loi noi trong phong kin, vi the nen viec bi an trong cho vo chong trong nha goi la trung cau.
冔=hu [xu3]\n\t1. Cai mu hu. Thu mu mien doi nha Anh.
冕=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Mu mien. Tu quan dai phu tro len duoc doi mu mien.
冖=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Trum, lay khan trum len tren do.
冗=nhung [rong3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nhung 宂.
冠=quan, quan [guan1|guan4]\n\t1. Cai mu. \n\t2. Mot am la quan. Le doi mu. Ngay xua, con trai hai muoi tuoi thi lam le doi mu, cho nen con trai moi hai muoi tuoi goi la nhuoc quan 弱冠, chua den hai muoi tuoi goi la vi quan 未冠. \n\t3. Dau so, cam dau cho tat ca moi nguoi goi la quan. Nhu quan quan 冠軍 do dau so. Bat cu thi ve khoa hoc gi, nguoi do dau deu goi la quan quan.
冢=trung [zhong3]\n\t1. Mo cao, ma dap cao goi la trung. Bay gio thuong dung chu trung 塚. \n\t2. Nhon. Nhu trung tu 冢子 con truong, trung te 冢宰 quan coi ca tram quan, tuc la quan Te tuong.
冤=oan [yuan1]\n\t1. Oan khuat. \n\t2. Oan thu. Nhu oan gia 冤家 ke cuu thu.
冥=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Chon u minh. Cho mu mit khong co anh sang. Nhu minh trung 冥中 trong chon u minh. Tuc cho la cho nguoi chet o, vi the nen ngay sinh nhat ke da chet goi la minh tho 冥壽, do ma goi la minh khi 冥器, v.v. \n\t2. Ngu toi. \n\t3. Man mac. Nhu thuong minh 蒼冥, hong minh 鴻冥 deu la noi cho troi cao xa man mac mat khong trong thau. \n\t4. Nghi ngam. Nhu minh tuong 冥想 tuong ngam, nghi thau noi sau xa.
冩=ta [xie3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ta 寫
冪=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Cai khan phu mam com. \n\t2. Cach do be ngoai. Nhu mich tich 冪積 do thanh dien tich o mat ngoai.
幂=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Cai khan phu mam com. \n\t2. Cach do be ngoai. Nhu mich tich 冪積 do thanh dien tich o mat ngoai.
冫=bang [bing1]\n\t1. Cung nghia nhu chu bang 冰 nuoc da.
冬=dong [dong1]\n\t1. Mua dong. Theo lich ta tu thang muoi den thang chap goi la mua dong. Theo lich tay thi tu thang chap tay den thang hai tay la mua dong.
冰=bang [bing1]\n\t1. Nuoc gia. Ret qua nuoc dong lai goi la bang. Xem han thu bieu khi thuy ngan xuong den het do goi la bang diem 冰點 nghia la xuong den do ay thi ret qua ma nuoc dong lai. \n\t2. Trong, lanh. Nhu nhat phien bang tam 一片冰心 mot tam long trong nhu gia, dien hiep bang suong 面挾冰霜 net mat lanh lung nhu suong gia. \n\t3. Bang nhan 冰人 nguoi lam moi.
冱=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Ret dong lai.
冲=xung [chong1|chong4]\n\t1. Hoa, sau. Nhu xung hu 冲虛 chan hoa nhat nheo nhu hu khong. \n\t2. Tho be. \n\t3. Vot. Tuc dung nhu chu xung 衝. Nhu nhat phi xung thien 一飛冲天 bay mot cai vot tan troi. Nhu ti ngo tuong xung 子午相冲 ti ngo xung nhau, nghia la phuong vi cung doi thang voi nhau.
决=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 決.
况=huong [kuang4]\n\t1. Phuong chi, la mot tieng giao dau. Nhu gia bat tu co, huong u quoc ho 家不自顧况於國乎 nha ma chang trong coi duoc, phuong chi la nuoc u ?
冶=da [ye3]\n\t1. Duc. Nhu da phuong 冶坊 xuong duc do sat. \n\t2. Dep. Nhu yeu da 妖冶 dep long lay. Nhu da dong 冶容 lam dang, phan nhieu ta ve dang dieu con gai. Cho nen dat con gai di choi goi la da du 冶遊.
冷=lanh [leng3]\n\t1. Lanh. \n\t2. Nhat nheo. Nhu lanh tieu 冷笑 cuoi nhat, lanh ngu 冷語 noi dai boi, v.v. \n\t3. Thanh nhan. Nhu lanh quan 冷官 chuc quan nhan, it bong. \n\t4. Lang le. Nhu lanh lac 冷落 diu hiu, lanh tinh 冷靜 lanh ngat, v.v. Lai nhu noi ban khong tuc tiu goi la lanh tuan 冷雋. Co khi viet la 泠.
冽=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Khi ret. Nhu thanh liet 清冽 ret gia.
凂=moi [mei3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 浼.
凄=the [qi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 淒.
准=chuan [zhun3]\n\t1. Dinh dung. \n\t2. So sanh. Nhu luat chuan dao luan 律准盜論 cu luat cung cho nhu an trom. \n\t3. Chuan cho. \n\t4. Cu. Nhu chuan mo bo tu hanh 准某部咨行 cu nhu ban tu van bo mo. Chu chuan 准 tuc van dung nhu chu chuan 準.
凇=tung [song1]\n\t1. Khi ret dong lai nhu hat chau goi la tung. Ve phia bac hay co, ho goi la vu tung 霧凇.
凈=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 淨.
凉=luong [liang2|liang4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 涼.
凊=sanh [jing4]\n\t1. Mat. Nhu dong on ha sanh 冬溫夏凊 mua dong am ap mua he quat mat.
凋=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Tan, rac. Nhu dieu linh 凋零 roi rac tan tac. Co khi viet la dieu 雕 hay 彫.
凌=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Lop vang, nuoc gia tich lai tung lop no lop kia goi la lang.
凍=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Nuoc dong, nuoc da. \n\t2. Pham chat long dong lai tuc cung goi la dong. \n\t3. Thuong da mo trong suot cung goi la dong. \n\t4. Ret. Nhu dong noi 凍餒 doi ret.
冻=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Nuoc dong, nuoc da. \n\t2. Pham chat long dong lai tuc cung goi la dong. \n\t3. Thuong da mo trong suot cung goi la dong. \n\t4. Ret. Nhu dong noi 凍餒 doi ret.
减=giam [jian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 減.
凑=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 湊.
凓=lat [li4]\n\t1. Ret.
凔=suong, sang [cang1]\n\t1. Ret, cung co khi dung chu thuong 滄. Cung doc la chu sang.
凘=tu [si1]\n\t1. Gia tan chay ra.
凙=dac [suo2]\n\t1. Giot gia o tren mai gianh ro xuong.
凛=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lam 凜.
凜=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Lam liet 凜冽 ret qua.
凛=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Lam liet 凜冽 ret qua.
凝=ngung [ning2]\n\t1. Dong lai. Chat long dong lai goi la ngung.
凟=doc [du2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 瀆.
几=ky [ji1|ji3]\n\t1. Cai ghe dua. \n\t2. Cai ki tre.
凡=pham [fan2]\n\t1. Gom. Nhoi noi noi tom het thay. \n\t2. Hen. Nhu pham dan 凡民 dan hen, pham nhan 凡人 nguoi pham. \n\t3. Coi pham, khac noi tien canh.
処=xu [-]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu 處 chon.
凭=bang, bang [ping2]\n\t1. Tua ghe. Mot am la bang.
凰=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Con phuong cai.
凱=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Vui hoa. Nhu khai phong 凱風 gio nam, khai toan 凱旋 danh duoc tran ve. \n\t2. Nguoi thien, nguoi gioi.
凯=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Vui hoa. Nhu khai phong 凱風 gio nam, khai toan 凱旋 danh duoc tran ve. \n\t2. Nguoi thien, nguoi gioi.
凳=dang [deng4]\n\t1. Cai ghe ngoi.
凴=bang [ping2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 凭, tuc muon dung nhu chu bang 憑.
凵=kham [qu1]\n\t1. Ha mieng.
凶=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Ac. Nhung hung bao 凶暴 ac du. \n\t2. Giet nguoi. Nhu hung thu 凶手 ke giet nguoi, hung khi 凶器 do giet nguoi. \n\t3. Mat mua. \n\t4. Xau, su gi khong tot lanh deu goi La hung.
凷=khoi [kuai4]\n\t1. Hon dat. Le ngay xua de tang nam rom goi dat, tam thiem cham khoi 寢笘枕凷. Cho nen co tang cha me goi la thiem khoi hon me 笘凷昏迷 la boi nghia ay.
凸=dot [tu1]\n\t1. Loi.
凹=ao [ao1]\n\t1. Lom.
出=xuat, xuy [chu1]\n\t1. Ra ngoai, doi lai voi chu nhap 入 vao. \n\t2. Mo ra. Nhu xuat khau thanh chuong 出口成章 mo mieng nen van chuong. \n\t3. Bo, duoi. Nhu xuat the 出妻 bo vo. \n\t4. Sinh ra. Nhu nhan tai boi xuat 人才輩出 nhan tai ra nhieu. \n\t5. Pham cai gi tu khong ma ra co thi goi la xuat. Nhu xu thai bach xuat 醜態百出 lo ra tram thoi xau. \n\t6. Hien ra. Nhu ha xuat do 河出圖 song hien ra ban do. \n\t7. Hon. Nhu xuat loai bat tuy 出類拔萃 sieu viet hon ca moi nguoi. \n\t8. Tieu ra. Nhu nhap bat phu xuat 入不敷出 so vao chang bang so ra. \n\t9. Mot am la xuy. Pham vat gi tu no no ra thi doc la xuat, vat gi tu no khong ra ma cu bat ra thi doc la xuy.
函=ham [han2]\n\t1. Dung duoc. Nhu tich gian ham truong 席間函丈 trong chieu rong toi mot truong.
