Co nhan dai thay giang hoc rong nhu the, de cho du cho chi ve bao ban, vi the bay gio goi thay la ham truong la do nghia ay. \n\t2. Cai phong bi. Cai de boc tho goi la ham. \n\t3. Cai hop. Nhu kinh ham 鏡函 hop dung guong.
刀=dao [dao1]\n\t1. Con dao. \n\t2. Tien, thu tien ngay xua hinh nhu con dao nen goi la dao.
刁=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Dieu dau, mot thu duc bang loai kim, to bang cai dau, quan linh dung cai ay, ngay thi thoi com, dem thi go cam canh. \n\t2. Dieu ac, kheo lua doi. Nhu dieu ngoan 刁頑.
刃=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Mui nhon. \n\t2. Chem giet. Nhu thu nhan 手刃 tu tay minh giet.
刄=lang [liang4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 兩.
刅=sang [chuang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 創.
分=phan, phan [fen1|fen4]\n\t1. Chia. \n\t2. Tach ghe. Nhu ngu coc bat phan 五榖不分 khong phan biet duoc nam giong thoc. \n\t3. Chia re. Nhu phan thu 分手 chia tay moi nguoi di mot nga. \n\t4. Phan, muoi phan la mot tac. \n\t5. Phut (mot gio sau muoi phut). \n\t6. Ve mon so hoc, cai so tru khong het goi la phan so 分數. \n\t7. Dong xu. Nhu bach phan chi nhat 百分之一 mot phan tram cua mot dong bac. \n\t8. Mot am la phan. Nhu danh phan 名分, chuc phan 職分, v.v. \n\t9. Chia phan. Nhu nhat phan 一分, nhi phan 二分, nghia la trong toan so minh duoc mot phan hay hai phan. Tuc cung dung nhu chu phan 份.
切=thiet, the [qie1|qie4]\n\t1. Cat. \n\t2. Khac, sach Dai-hoc noi. nhu thiet nhu tha 如切如磋 hoc phai nghien ngau nhu tho lam sung da khac lai mai cho bong, vi the nen be ban cung gang goi goi la thiet tha 切磋 cung la theo nghia ay. \n\t3. Can kip. Nhu tinh thiet 情切 thuc tinh kip lam. \n\t4. Than gan lam. Nhu than thiet 親切. \n\t5. Thiet thuc. Nhu thiet trung thoi benh 切中時病 trung benh doi lam. \n\t6. Thiet cho, nhoi noi nhat dinh. Nhu thiet ky 切忌 phai kieng nhat. \n\t7. So xem. Nhu thiet mach 切脉 xem mach. \n\t8. Dem am hai chu hop voi nhau, roi doc tat di de biet am chu khac, goi la thiet. Vi du. chu ngoan 頑, ngo hoan thiet 吳完切, ngo hoan hop lai xen thanh ra ngoan. \n\t9. Xien. Nhu phong thiet 風切 gio nhu xien. 10. Mot am la the. Nhu nhat the 一切 noi gop ca, het thay.
刈=ngai [yi4]\n\t1. Cat co.
刊=khan, san [kan1]\n\t1. Chat. Nhu khan moc 刊木 chat cay. \n\t2. Khac. Nhu khan ban 刊本 khac ban in. \n\t3. Tuoc bo. Nhu danh luan bat khan 名論不刊 nhoi ban hay khong bao gio bo duoc. Tuc quen goi la san.
刎=van [wen3]\n\t1. Dam co. Nhu tu van 自刎 tu lay dao dam vao co.
刑=hinh [xing2]\n\t1. Hinh phat. Luat ngay xua dinh xu tu luu do truong di 死流徒杖笞 la nam hinh. Luat bay gio chia ra hai thu. ve viec tien cua cong no la dan su pham 民事犯, ve viec trom cuop danh giet goi la hinh su pham 刑事犯. \n\t2. Phep thuong. Nay thong dung dung chu hinh 型.
划=hoa [hua2|hua4|huai5]\n\t1. Tro thuyen, lay sao tro thuyen goi la hoa. Tuc goi thuyen nho la hoa tu 划子.
刓=ngoan [wan2]\n\t1. Vot.
刖=ngoat [yue4]\n\t1. Chat cang. Mot thu hinh phep doi xua.
列=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Hang loi, cai gi xep mot hang thang goi la hang 行, xep ngang goi la liet 列. \n\t2. So nhieu. Nhu liet quoc 列國 cac nuoc, liet vi 列位 cac vi. \n\t3. Bay. Nhu liet tro dau 列詛豆 bay cai tro cai dau (do tien le).
刘=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 劉.
初=so [chu1]\n\t1. Moi, truoc.
删=san [shan1]\n\t1. Loc bo. Nhu san phon tuu gian 删繁就簡 loc bo cai phien phuc ma dung cai gian tien.
判=phan [pan4]\n\t1. Lia re. Nhu phan due 判袂 chia tay moi nguoi mot nga. \n\t2. Phan quyet. Nhu tai phan 裁判 su kien, van su kien goi la phan.
別=biet [bie2|bie4]\n\t1. Chia. Nhu khu biet 區別 phan biet ra tung thu. \n\t2. Ly biet, tong biet 送別 tien nhau di xa. \n\t3. Khac. Nhu biet tinh 別情 tinh khac, biet co 別故 co khac, v.v.
别=biet [bie2|bie4]\n\t1. Chia. Nhu khu biet 區別 phan biet ra tung thu. \n\t2. Ly biet, tong biet 送別 tien nhau di xa. \n\t3. Khac. Nhu biet tinh 別情 tinh khac, biet co 別故 co khac, v.v.
刦=kiep [jie2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu kiep 劫.
刧=kiep [jie2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu kiep 劫.
刨=bao [bao4|pao2]\n\t1. Giay. Nhu bao phan 刨墳 giay ma.
利=loi [li4]\n\t1. Sac. Nhu loi khi 利器 do sac. \n\t2. Nhanh nhau. Nhu loi khau 利口 noi lem. \n\t3. Loi. Nhu ich quoc loi dan 益國利民, ich cho nuoc loi cho dan, loi tha 利他 loi cho ke khac. \n\t4. Cong dung cua vat gi. Nhu thuy loi 水利 loi nuoc, dia loi 地利 loi dat. \n\t5. Tot loi. Nhu vo vang bat loi 無往不利 toi dau cung tot. \n\t6. Tham. Nhu nghia loi giao chien 義利交戰 nghia loi vat lon nhau. Pham cai gi thuoc su ich rieng cua mot nguoi deu goi la loi. Cao Ba Quat 高伯适. Co lai danh loi nhan, Bon tau lo do trung 古來名利人，奔走路塗中 Xua nay hang nguoi danh loi, Van tat ta ngoai duong sa. \n\t7. Loi, loi thi tam boi 利市三倍 ban lai gap ba. Cho nen cho vay lay tien lai goi la loi tuc 利息.
刮=quat [gua1]\n\t1. Vot. \n\t2. Lay qua (nao het). \n\t3. Gay mo.
到=dao [dao4]\n\t1. Den noi. \n\t2. Khap du. Nhu chu dao 周到.
刱=sang [chuang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 創. Tuc viet la 剏.
刲=khue [kui1]\n\t1. Cat.
刳=kho [ku1]\n\t1. Mo.
刴=doa [duo4]\n\t1. Chat.
刵=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Cai tai.
制=che [zhi4]\n\t1. Phep che. Phep gi da dat nhat dinh roi goi la che. Nhu phap che 法制 phep che, che do 制度 the le nhat dinh cho ke lam viec theo. \n\t2. Nhoi cua vua noi cung goi la che. Nhu che thu 制書, che sach 制策, v.v. \n\t3. Lam. Nhu che le tac nhac 制禮作樂 che lam le nhac. \n\t4. Cam. Nhu che ky tu menh 制其死命 cam cai song chet cua nguoi. \n\t5. De tang ba nam goi la thu che 守制, theo le ngay xua che ra. Danh thiep bay gio he co chua chu che, ay la nguoi dang de tang ba nam. \n\t6. Cai quan. Nhu thong che 統制, tiet che 節制 deu co nghia la cai quan ca.
刷=xoat, loat [shua1|shua4]\n\t1. Tay xach. \n\t2. Cai ban chai, nha in dung cai ban chai, chai cho dep chu, nen goi su in la an xoat 印刷. Tuc thuong doc la chu loat.
券=khoan [quan4|xuan4]\n\t1. Khoan, tuc nhu cai giay hop dong bay gio, moi ben giu mot cai giay de lam bang cu. Pham van tu de lam tin deu goi la khoan. \n\t2. Khoan la cai bang cu de lay do, cho nen su tinh duoc tat thanh goi la thao khoan 操券 nghia la tat duoc vay.
刺=thu, thich [ci1|ci4]\n\t1. Dam chet. Ke giet nguoi goi la thu khach 刺客. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi quan Tri chau la thu su 刺使. \n\t3. Lua loc. Nhu ca mot bai van ngat lay mot doan goi la thu thu 刺取. \n\t4. Cham, tiem, lay kim dam vao goi la thu. \n\t5. Gai nhon. \n\t6. Viet ten ho minh vao thu goi la thu, vi the cac danh thiep ta dung goi la danh thu 名刺. \n\t7. Trach nhu co thu 譏刺 che trach. \n\t8. Mot am la thich. Cam giu. Nhu thich thuyen 刺船 cam giu thuyen. \n\t9. Theu. Nhu thich tu 刺繡 theu voc. 10. Rinh mo. Nhu am thich 陰刺 rinh ngam. \n\t11. Nhai nhai. Nhu thich thich bat huu 刺刺不休 noi nhai nhai khong thoi. \n\t12. Dam, lay dao dam giet. Ta quen doc la chu thich ca.
刻=khac [ke4]\n\t1. Khac, lay dao cham tro vao cai gi goi la khac. \n\t2. Thoi khac, ngay xua dung cai gao dong, giua cham mot lo de nuoc dan dan ro xuong, de dinh thoi gio, goi la khac lau 刻漏. Theo dong ho bay gio dinh cu muoi lam phut la mot khac, bon khac la mot gio. \n\t3. Ngay tuc thi. Nhu lap khac 立刻 lap tuc. \n\t4. Boc lot. Nhu khac bac 刻剝 boc lot cua nguoi. \n\t5. Sau sac. Nhu ha khac 苛刻 xet nghiet nga, khac bac 刻薄 cay nghiet, v.v.
刼=kiep [jie2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 劫.
刾=thich [ci4]\n\t1. Cung dung nhu chu 刺.
剃=the [ti4]\n\t1. Cat toc. Cat toc di tu goi la the phat 剃髮.
剄=hinh [jing3]\n\t1. Lay dao cat co.
刭=hinh [jing3]\n\t1. Lay dao cat co.
則=tac [ze2]\n\t1. Phep. Noi cac che do khuon mau gi deu goi la tac, nghia la de cho nguoi coi do ma bat chuoc vay. Nhu ngon nhi vi thien ha tac 言而為天下則 noi ma lam phep cho thien ha. \n\t2. Bat chuoc. \n\t3. Thoi, nhoi noi giup cau. Nhu hanh huu du luc tac di hoc van 行有餘力則以學文 lam cho thua suc thoi lay hoc van.
则=tac [ze2]\n\t1. Phep. Noi cac che do khuon mau gi deu goi la tac, nghia la de cho nguoi coi do ma bat chuoc vay. Nhu ngon nhi vi thien ha tac 言而為天下則 noi ma lam phep cho thien ha. \n\t2. Bat chuoc. \n\t3. Thoi, nhoi noi giup cau. Nhu hanh huu du luc tac di hoc van 行有餘力則以學文 lam cho thua suc thoi lay hoc van.
剉=toa [cuo4]\n\t1. Chat dut.
削=tuoc [xiao1|xue1]\n\t1. Vot. \n\t2. Doat han. Nhu tuoc chuc 削識 cach mat chuc quan, tuoc dia 削地 triet mat phan dat. \n\t3. Cai tuoc (cai nao). Doi xua chua co giay, viet chu vao the tre, nham thi lay cai nao nao di, goi la cai tuoc. Duc Khong-tu lam kinh Xuan-thu, cho nao nen de thi viet, cho nao chua thi nao di, vi the nen chua lai van tu goi la but tuoc 筆削. \n\t4. Mon, nguoi gay be di goi la sau tuoc 瘦削.
剋=khac [ke4]\n\t1. Che phuc duoc, cung nhu chu khac 克. Nhu kim khac moc 金剋木 loai kim che phuc duoc loai moc. \n\t2. Tat the, kip. Nhu khac ky 剋期 cu han phai dung hen. Tuc viet la khac 尅.
剌=lat [la4]\n\t1. Trai. Nhu quai lat 乖剌 ngang trai. \n\t2. Ca nhay goi la bat lat 跋剌, cung goi la bat lat 潑剌.
前=tien [qian2]\n\t1. Truoc. Nhu dinh tien 庭前 truoc san. \n\t2. Cai truoc. Nhu tien bien 前編 quyen truoc. \n\t3. Som truoc. Nhu tien hien 前賢 nguoi hien truoc. Ke lam nen truoc minh goi la tien boi 前輩. \n\t4. Tien len. Nhu phan vang truc tien 奮往直前 gang goi buoc len truoc.
剎=sat [cha4|sha1]\n\t1. Dich am tieng Pham la sat sat, goi tat la sat. Cai cot phan. Nguoi tu duoc mot phep, dung cai phan de neu cho ke xa biet goi la sat can 刹干. Vi the cai thap cua Phat cung goi la sat. Bay gio thuong goi chua la sat. Nhu co sat 古刹 la chua co. \n\t2. Sat na 刹那, mot thoi gian rat ngan, chi trong mot moi niem co toi 90 sat na.
刹=sat [cha4|sha1]\n\t1. Dich am tieng Pham la sat sat, goi tat la sat. Cai cot phan. Nguoi tu duoc mot phep, dung cai phan de neu cho ke xa biet goi la sat can 刹干. Vi the cai thap cua Phat cung goi la sat. Bay gio thuong goi chua la sat. Nhu co sat 古刹 la chua co. \n\t2. Sat na 刹那, mot thoi gian rat ngan, chi trong mot moi niem co toi 90 sat na.
剔=dich [ti1]\n\t1. Go, xe. \n\t2. Chon, nhat. Trong mot so nhieu do, chon lay cai tot con cai hu hong bo di goi la dich tru 剔除.
剕=phi [fei4]\n\t1. Chat chan, mot hinh phap ngay xua.
剖=phau [pou1]\n\t1. Phanh ra. Nhu phau giai 剖解 mo sa. \n\t2. Phan tach ro rang. Nhu phau minh 剖明 tach ro nguyen uy cua mot su gi.
剗=san [chan3]\n\t1. Che, vot.
剚=chi, tu [zi4]\n\t1. Cam dao, cung doc chu tu.
剛=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Cung, ben. Co chap khong nghe ai can goi la cuong phuc 剛愎. \n\t2. Vua gap. Nhu cuong phung 剛逢 vua gap, cuong qua 剛過 vua qua.
刚=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Cung, ben. Co chap khong nghe ai can goi la cuong phuc 剛愎. \n\t2. Vua gap. Nhu cuong phung 剛逢 vua gap, cuong qua 剛過 vua qua.
剜=oan [wan1]\n\t1. Khoet.
剝=bac [bao1|bo1]\n\t1. Boc, got. Nhu bac doat 剝奪 boc lot. \n\t2. Lot. Nhu bac bi 剝皮 lot da, bac y 剝衣 lot ao, v.v. \n\t3. Van xau. Nhu kien bac 蹇剝 van rui. \n\t4. Van tai hoa vat cung goi la bac. Nhu bac thuyen 剝船 thuyen nho cho do, bac ngan 剝岸 bo ben. \n\t4. Dap xuong.
剥=bac [bao1|bo1]\n\t1. Boc, got. Nhu bac doat 剝奪 boc lot. \n\t2. Lot. Nhu bac bi 剝皮 lot da, bac y 剝衣 lot ao, v.v. \n\t3. Van xau. Nhu kien bac 蹇剝 van rui. \n\t4. Van tai hoa vat cung goi la bac. Nhu bac thuyen 剝船 thuyen nho cho do, bac ngan 剝岸 bo ben. \n\t4. Dap xuong.
剞=ki, y, ki [ji1]\n\t1. Ki quyet 剞劂 con dao khoam, thu dao dung de cham tro, vi the nen khac ban in sach cung goi la ki quyet. \n\t2. Mot am la ki cung nghia nhu tren. Tuc quen doc la y.
剟=xuyet [duo1]\n\t1. Dam, xien.
剡=diem [shan4|yan3]\n\t1. Sac nhon.
剩=thang [sheng4]\n\t1. Thua. Nhu so thang vo ki 所剩無幾 thua thua khong may.
剪=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 翦.
剮=qua [gua3]\n\t1. Roc thit, mot thu hinh ac ngay xua, tuc la hinh lang tri.
剐=qua [gua3]\n\t1. Roc thit, mot thu hinh ac ngay xua, tuc la hinh lang tri.
副=pho [fu4]\n\t1. Thu hai. Nhu pho su 副使, pho ly 副里, v.v. \n\t2. Thu kem. Nhu chinh hieu 正號 hang nhat, pho hieu 副號 hang nhi, nghia la cung mot thu do ma hoi kem. \n\t3. Xung. Nhu thinh danh chi ha, ky thuc nan pho 盛名之下其實難副 doi voi cai danh tieng lung lay ay, thuc kho xung noi. \n\t4. Bo. Nhu pho ke luc gia 副笄六珈 bo tram sau nhan. Pham vat gi phai gom cac cai lai moi dung duoc deu goi la pho. Nhu nhat pho 一副 mot bo, toan pho 全副 ca bo, v.v.
割=cat [ge1]\n\t1. Cat dut. \n\t2. Chia. Nhu am duong cat hon hieu 陰陽割昏曉 am duong chia som toi. \n\t3. Ton hai. Nhu thang thang hong thuy phuong cat 湯湯洪水方割 mong menh nuoc lut dang lam hai.
剴=cai, cai [kai3]\n\t1. Thiet. Nhu cai thiet 剴切 dich dang, noi dung su dung ly lam. Mot am la cai.
剀=cai, cai [kai3]\n\t1. Thiet. Nhu cai thiet 剴切 dich dang, noi dung su dung ly lam. Mot am la cai.
創=sang, sang [chuang1|chuang4]\n\t1. Bi thuong dau. Nhu trong sang 重創 bi thuong nang. \n\t2. Mot am la sang. Moi. Nhu sang tao 創造 moi lam nen, khai sang 開創 moi mo mang gay dung len.
创=sang, sang [chuang1|chuang4]\n\t1. Bi thuong dau. Nhu trong sang 重創 bi thuong nang. \n\t2. Mot am la sang. Moi. Nhu sang tao 創造 moi lam nen, khai sang 開創 moi mo mang gay dung len.
剷=san [chan3]\n\t1. Phat, lay liem phat co. Nhu san tru yen mieu 剷除煙苗 phat tru mam thuoc, cung co khi dung chu san 鏟.
剸=chuyen, chuyen [tuan2]\n\t1. Dan, chat. Mot am la chuyen, cung nghia voi chu chuyen 專.
剺=ly [li2]\n\t1. Rach. Nhu ly dien 剺面 rach mat.
剽=phieu, phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Cuop boc. \n\t2. Nhanh nhen. \n\t3. Mot am la phieu. Ngon, phieu ban 剽本 goc ngon.
剿=tieu [chao1|jiao3]\n\t1. Cung dung nhu chu 勦.
劂=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Ki quyet 剞劂 con dao khoam, thu dao dung de cham tro, vi the nen khac ban in sach cung goi la ki quyet. Xem chu ki 剞. 
劃=hoach [hua2|hua4|huai5]\n\t1. Rach, lay dao rach ra. \n\t2. Vach ro. Nhu hoach nhat bat nhi 劃一不二 dinh gia nhat dinh.
划=hoach [hua2|hua4|huai5]\n\t1. Rach, lay dao rach ra. \n\t2. Vach ro. Nhu hoach nhat bat nhi 劃一不二 dinh gia nhat dinh.
劇=kich [ju4]\n\t1. Qua lam. Nhu kich liet 劇烈 du qua, kich dam 劇談 ban du, benh kich 病劇 benh nang lam. \n\t2. Tro dua. Nhu dien kich 演劇 dien tro.
剧=kich [ju4]\n\t1. Qua lam. Nhu kich liet 劇烈 du qua, kich dam 劇談 ban du, benh kich 病劇 benh nang lam. \n\t2. Tro dua. Nhu dien kich 演劇 dien tro.
劈=phach [pi1|pi3]\n\t1. Bo, bua ra. \n\t2. Dung. Nhu phach thu sang lai 劈手搶來 gio dung tay ma chop lai.
劉=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Giet. \n\t2. Ho Luu. \n\t3. Giai bay.
刘=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Giet. \n\t2. Ho Luu. \n\t3. Giai bay.
劊=quai [gui4]\n\t1. Chat, chem, ke chem tu bi xu tu goi la quai tu thu 劊死手.
刽=quai [gui4]\n\t1. Chat, chem, ke chem tu bi xu tu goi la quai tu thu 劊死手.
劌=que [gui4]\n\t1. Lam hai, cat.
刿=que [gui4]\n\t1. Lam hai, cat.
劍=kiem [jian4]\n\t1. Cai guom, co phep dung guom rieng goi la kiem thuat 劍術, than ve guom, tuc goi la kiem tien 劍仙, kiem hiep 劍俠. Nguyen viet la 劎.
剑=kiem [jian4]\n\t1. Cai guom, co phep dung guom rieng goi la kiem thuat 劍術, than ve guom, tuc goi la kiem tien 劍仙, kiem hiep 劍俠. Nguyen viet la 劎.
劑=te [ji4]\n\t1. Chat te 質劑 mot thu van tu, lon goi la chat, nho goi la te, cung nhu giay hop dong bay gio. \n\t2. Mot am la te, do nhieu thu gop lai goi la te. Nhu duoc te 藥劑 te thuoc. Uong mot chen thuoc cung goi la nhat te 一劑 mot te. \n\t3. So luong nhieu it da chia ra ro rang goi la phan te 分劑.
剂=te [ji4]\n\t1. Chat te 質劑 mot thu van tu, lon goi la chat, nho goi la te, cung nhu giay hop dong bay gio. \n\t2. Mot am la te, do nhieu thu gop lai goi la te. Nhu duoc te 藥劑 te thuoc. Uong mot chen thuoc cung goi la nhat te 一劑 mot te. \n\t3. So luong nhieu it da chia ra ro rang goi la phan te 分劑.
劓=nhi, ti [yi4]\n\t1. Cat mui, mot thu hinh phep trong nam hinh. Tuc quen doc la chu ti.
劘=mi [mo2]\n\t1. Cat.
力=luc [li4]\n\t1. Suc, khoa hoc nghien cuu ve suc tu dong cua cac vat va suc bi dong cua cac vat khac la luc hoc 力學. \n\t2. Pham noi nao tinh than toi duoc deu goi la luc. Nhu muc luc 目力 suc mat. \n\t3. Cai tai suc lam viec cua nguoi. Nhu the luc 勢力, quyen luc 權力, v.v. \n\t4. Cai cua vat lam nen duoc cung goi la luc. Nhu but luc 筆力 suc but, ma luc 馬力 suc ngua, v.v. \n\t5. Cham chi. Nhu luc dien 力田 cham chi lam ruong. \n\t6. Cot, cham. Nhu luc cau tiet kiem 力求節儉 het suc cau tiet kiem. \n\t7. Lam day to nguoi ta cung goi la luc.
功=cong [gong1]\n\t1. Viec. Nhu nong cong 農功 viec lam ruong. \n\t2. Cong hieu. \n\t3. Cong lao. Nhu cong huan 功勳, cong nghiep 功業, v.v. \n\t4. Do gi lam kheo tot cung goi la cong. \n\t5. Le tang, de tang chin thang goi la dai cong 大功, de tang nam thang goi la tieu cong 小功.
加=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Them. \n\t2. Chat them. Nhu vu tuyet giao gia 雨雪交加 mua tuyet cung chat them len. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu gia nhan nhat dang 加人一等 hon nguoi mot buc.
劣=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Kem, doi lai voi chu uu 優 hon. \n\t2. Kem hen. Nhu dong liet 庸劣 hen kem, ty liet 卑劣 deu la nhoi che kem ca. 
助=tro [zhu4]\n\t1. Giup. Muon suc cai nay giup them cai kia.
努=no [nu3]\n\t1. Gang. Nhu no luc 努力 gang suc.
劫=kiep [jie2]\n\t1. Cuop lay. \n\t2. An hiep. Nhu kiep che 劫制 bat ep. \n\t3. So kiep, doi kiep, tieng Pham la kiep ba 劫波. Tinh tu luc nguoi ta tho duoc \n\t84 000 tuoi, trai qua mot tram nam, lai giam di mot tuoi, giam mai cho den luc chi con tho duoc co muoi tuoi, roi cu mot tram nam tang them mot tuoi, tang cho den 84 000 tuoi, trong mot thoi gian tang giam nhu the goi la mot tieu kiep 小劫. Hai muoi lan tang giam nhu the goi la trung kiep 中劫. Trai qua bon trung kiep thanh, tru, hoai, khong la mot dai kiep 大劫 (tuc la 80 tieu kiep). Tuc quen viet la 刦,刧,刼.
劬=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Nhoc nhan. Nhu cu lao 劬勞 cong cha me sinh de nuoi nang con kho nhoc.
劭=thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Khuyen gang. \n\t2. Tot. \n\t3. Cao.
効=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Cong hieu. Tuc dung nhu chu 效.
劻=khuong [kuang1]\n\t1. Khuong nhuong 劻勷 hap tap, sap ngua.
劼=cat [jie2]\n\t1. Can than.
劾=hac [he2]\n\t1. Hac. Nhu sam hac 参劾 ban hac (du vao viec hac toi nguoi khac). Lam quan co loi tu thu toi minh goi la tu hac 自劾.
勁=kinh [jin4|jing4]\n\t1. Cung, manh. Nhu kinh binh 勁兵 binh manh, kinh thao 勁草 co cung.
劲=kinh [jin4|jing4]\n\t1. Cung, manh. Nhu kinh binh 勁兵 binh manh, kinh thao 勁草 co cung.
勃=bot [bo2]\n\t1. Thot nhien. Nhu bot nhien dong 勃然動 thot nhien dong. \n\t2. Bung bung. Nhu sac bot nhu da 色勃如也 sac mat bung bung, ta cai sac mat thay doi. \n\t3. Un, ta cai ve thinh vuong. Nhu bong bot 蓬勃 len un un.
勅=sac [chi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sac 敕 nghia la ran bao.
勇=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Manh. Nhu dung si 勇士, dung phu 勇夫. \n\t2. Gan ton hon nguoi cung goi la dung. Nhu dung cam 勇敢 gan goc manh ton, viec nguy hiem cung khong chun. \n\t3. Binh linh. Nhu huong dung 鄉勇 linh lang (linh dong).
勉=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Co suc. \n\t2. Gang goi. Nhu mien le 勉勵 gang goi cho nguoi co suc lam.
勑=lai [chi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 徠. Co khi muon dung nhu chu 敕.
勒=lac [le4|lei1]\n\t1. Cai dam, de chang dau va mom ngua. \n\t2. De nen. Nhu lac linh giai tan 勒令解散 bat ep phai giai tan. \n\t3. Khac, khac chu vao bia goi la lac thach 勒石. 
動=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Dong, bat cu vat gi, khong ban la tu suc minh, hay tu suc khac ma chuyen sang cho khac deu goi la dong. \n\t2. Lam. Nhu cu dong 舉動. \n\t3. Cam dong. Nhu co dong 鼓動. \n\t4. Noi day. Pham cai gi moi mo dau goi la dong. Nhu dong cong 動工 bat dau khoi cong, dong but 動筆 bat dau cam but. \n\t5. Tu dong, giong gi tu cu dong deu goi la dong vat 動物. \n\t6. Nhoi tu ngu. Nhu lai vang dong giai kinh nguyet 來往動皆經月 di lai ben deu den hang thang. 
动=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Dong, bat cu vat gi, khong ban la tu suc minh, hay tu suc khac ma chuyen sang cho khac deu goi la dong. \n\t2. Lam. Nhu cu dong 舉動. \n\t3. Cam dong. Nhu co dong 鼓動. \n\t4. Noi day. Pham cai gi moi mo dau goi la dong. Nhu dong cong 動工 bat dau khoi cong, dong but 動筆 bat dau cam but. \n\t5. Tu dong, giong gi tu cu dong deu goi la dong vat 動物. \n\t6. Nhoi tu ngu. Nhu lai vang dong giai kinh nguyet 來往動皆經月 di lai ben deu den hang thang. 
勖=uc [xu4]\n\t1. Gang. Tuc viet 勗 la nham.
勗=uc [xu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 勖.
勘=kham [kan1]\n\t1. So sanh, dinh lai. Nhu xet lai van tu de sua cho nham goi la hieu kham 校勘. \n\t2. Tra hoi tu toi. Nhu tham kham 審勘 xet lai cho tuong tinh tu trong an.
務=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Viec. Nhu thu vu 庶務 cac viec. \n\t2. Chuyen, cham. Nhu tham da vu dac 貪多務得 chi cot tham lay cho nhieu, vu ban 務本 cot cham cai can ban. \n\t3. Tat dung. Nhu vu khat 務乞 can xin, vu tat 務必 can the. \n\t4. So thu thue cung goi la vu. \n\t5. Mot am la vu, cung nghia nhu chu 侮.
务=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Viec. Nhu thu vu 庶務 cac viec. \n\t2. Chuyen, cham. Nhu tham da vu dac 貪多務得 chi cot tham lay cho nhieu, vu ban 務本 cot cham cai can ban. \n\t3. Tat dung. Nhu vu khat 務乞 can xin, vu tat 務必 can the. \n\t4. So thu thue cung goi la vu. \n\t5. Mot am la vu, cung nghia nhu chu 侮.
勛=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 勳.
勋=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 勳.
勝=thang, thang [sheng1|sheng4]\n\t1. Duoc, danh duoc quan giac goi la thang. Nhu bach chien bach thang 百戰百勝 tram tran danh duoc ca tram. \n\t2. Hon. Nhu danh thang 名勝, thang canh 勝景 canh non nuoc dep hon canh khac, thang nghia can 勝義根 tuc la cai cua nam can 五根, mat 眼, tai 耳, mui 鼻, luoi 舌, than 身 van co du, no hay soi to canh, phat ra thuc, la cai sac trong sach.   Thang nghia de 勝義諦 co bon thu. (1) The gian thang nghia 世間勝義 nghia la doi voi   phap hu sang ngu uan cua the gian, ma noi ro cai nghia chan nhu mau nhiem hon.   (2) Dao ly thang nghia 道理勝義 nghia la cac buc Thanh-van soi to cac le trong bon   de 四諦, kho tap diet dao 苦集滅道 tuc la cai nghia mau nhiem hon ca. (3) Chung dac   thang nghia 證得勝義 nghia la buc Thanh-van chung duoc ro le nguoi cung khong 人空   ma phap cung khong 法空, tuc la cai nghia mau nhiem hon. (4) Thang nghia thang   nghia 勝義勝義 tuc la cai nghia nhat chan phap gioi 一真法界 chi co chu Phat moi biet   het chung het, la cai nghia mau hon cac ca cac nghia mau. \n\t3. Do trang suc tren dau. Doi xua cat giay mui lam hoa, de cai vao toc cho dep, goi la hoa thang 花勝. Dan ba con gai bay gio hay tet cac thu doan voc cai dau, goi la xuan thang 春勝, phuong thang 方勝 cung la y ay. Co thu chim goi la dai thang 戴勝 vi dau no co bong mao. Nhu con gai cai hoa vay. \n\t4. Tieng noi doi voi ben da mat roi. Nhu thang quoc 勝國 nuoc danh duoc nuoc kia. \n\t5. Mot am la thang. Chiu hay. Nhu thang nham 勝任 hay lam noi viec, nhuoc bat thang y 弱不勝衣 yeu khong hay mac noi ao, bat thang hoang khung 不勝惶恐 so hai khon xiet.
胜=thang, thang [sheng1|sheng4]\n\t1. Duoc, danh duoc quan giac goi la thang. Nhu bach chien bach thang 百戰百勝 tram tran danh duoc ca tram. \n\t2. Hon. Nhu danh thang 名勝, thang canh 勝景 canh non nuoc dep hon canh khac, thang nghia can 勝義根 tuc la cai cua nam can 五根, mat 眼, tai 耳, mui 鼻, luoi 舌, than 身 van co du, no hay soi to canh, phat ra thuc, la cai sac trong sach.   Thang nghia de 勝義諦 co bon thu. (1) The gian thang nghia 世間勝義 nghia la doi voi   phap hu sang ngu uan cua the gian, ma noi ro cai nghia chan nhu mau nhiem hon.   (2) Dao ly thang nghia 道理勝義 nghia la cac buc Thanh-van soi to cac le trong bon   de 四諦, kho tap diet dao 苦集滅道 tuc la cai nghia mau nhiem hon ca. (3) Chung dac   thang nghia 證得勝義 nghia la buc Thanh-van chung duoc ro le nguoi cung khong 人空   ma phap cung khong 法空, tuc la cai nghia mau nhiem hon. (4) Thang nghia thang   nghia 勝義勝義 tuc la cai nghia nhat chan phap gioi 一真法界 chi co chu Phat moi biet   het chung het, la cai nghia mau hon cac ca cac nghia mau. \n\t3. Do trang suc tren dau. Doi xua cat giay mui lam hoa, de cai vao toc cho dep, goi la hoa thang 花勝. Dan ba con gai bay gio hay tet cac thu doan voc cai dau, goi la xuan thang 春勝, phuong thang 方勝 cung la y ay. Co thu chim goi la dai thang 戴勝 vi dau no co bong mao. Nhu con gai cai hoa vay. \n\t4. Tieng noi doi voi ben da mat roi. Nhu thang quoc 勝國 nuoc danh duoc nuoc kia. \n\t5. Mot am la thang. Chiu hay. Nhu thang nham 勝任 hay lam noi viec, nhuoc bat thang y 弱不勝衣 yeu khong hay mac noi ao, bat thang hoang khung 不勝惶恐 so hai khon xiet.
勞=lao [lao2]\n\t1. Nhoc. Nhu lao luc 勞力 nhoc nhan. \n\t2. Cong lao. Nhu huan lao 勳勞 cong lao. \n\t3. Mot am la lao. Yen ui.
劳=lao [lao2]\n\t1. Nhoc. Nhu lao luc 勞力 nhoc nhan. \n\t2. Cong lao. Nhu huan lao 勳勞 cong lao. \n\t3. Mot am la lao. Yen ui.
募=mo [mu4]\n\t1. Tim rong ra. Treo mot cai bang noi ro cach thuc cua minh muon ken de cho nguoi ta den ung nhan goi la mo. Nhu mo binh 募兵 mo linh. \n\t2. Xin. Nhu mo hoa 募化 thay tu di xin an, mo quyen 募捐 quyen tien gao phat chan.
勠=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Gop. Nhu luc luc dong tam 勠力同心 gop suc cung long, co khi dung chu luc 戮.
勢=the [shi4]\n\t1. The, chi ve cai suc hanh dong. Nhu hoa the 火勢 the lua, thuy the 水勢 the nuoc. Ta cai hinh trang su hanh dong gi cung goi la the. Nhu tran the 陣勢 the tran, tu the 姿勢 dang bo, v.v. \n\t2. The luc. Nhu uy the 威勢 oai the, thanh the 聲勢, truong the 仗勢 cay the, v.v. \n\t3. Hinh the hon ca. Nhu son the tranh vanh 山勢崢嶸 the nui chot vot, dia the binh than 地勢平坦 the dat bang phang, v.v. \n\t4. Cai hat dai. Mot thu hinh thien, doi xua con giai phai cat hat dai goi la cat the 割勢.
势=the [shi4]\n\t1. The, chi ve cai suc hanh dong. Nhu hoa the 火勢 the lua, thuy the 水勢 the nuoc. Ta cai hinh trang su hanh dong gi cung goi la the. Nhu tran the 陣勢 the tran, tu the 姿勢 dang bo, v.v. \n\t2. The luc. Nhu uy the 威勢 oai the, thanh the 聲勢, truong the 仗勢 cay the, v.v. \n\t3. Hinh the hon ca. Nhu son the tranh vanh 山勢崢嶸 the nui chot vot, dia the binh than 地勢平坦 the dat bang phang, v.v. \n\t4. Cai hat dai. Mot thu hinh thien, doi xua con giai phai cat hat dai goi la cat the 割勢.
勣=tich [ji1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 績.
勤=can [qin2]\n\t1. Sieng. \n\t2. An can 殷勤 tiep dai than thiet to y hau dai, cung co khi dung chu an can 慇懃.
勦=tieu [chao1]\n\t1. Hot lay. Cua nguoi ta minh vui lap di ma hot lay lam cua minh goi la tieu. An cap nhoi ban nhoi noi cua nguoi, ma noi la cua minh goi la tieu thuyet 勦說. \n\t2. Chan. Nhu tieu diet 勦滅 chan quan giac lai ma giet het, vi the can giac cung goi la tieu, co khi viet chu tieu 剿.
勩=due [yi4]\n\t1. Kho nhoc.
勰=hiep [xie2]\n\t1. Hoa.
勲=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Cong. Co cong thuong cho mot cai dau hieu de tieu bieu su ve vang goi la huan chuong 勳章 nhu cai men-day bay gio. Ngay xua dung chu 勛, nay cung thong dung.
勵=le [li4]\n\t1. Gang suc. Nhu le chi 勵志 gang chi. \n\t2. Khuyen gang. Nhu tuong le 獎勵 lay loi khen de gang goi nguoi, co khi viet la 厲.
励=le [li4]\n\t1. Gang suc. Nhu le chi 勵志 gang chi. \n\t2. Khuyen gang. Nhu tuong le 獎勵 lay loi khen de gang goi nguoi, co khi viet la 厲.
勷=nhuong [rang2]\n\t1. Khuong nhuong 劻勷 hap tap sap ngua. Tuc hay muon dung nhu chu tuong 襄.
勸=khuyen [quan4]\n\t1. Khuyen, lay nhoi mem mai khuyen ru nguoi ta theo minh goi la khuyen. \n\t2. Khuyen gang. Nhu khuyen mien 勸勉 lay nhoi hay khuyen cho nguoi co len.
劝=khuyen [quan4]\n\t1. Khuyen, lay nhoi mem mai khuyen ru nguoi ta theo minh goi la khuyen. \n\t2. Khuyen gang. Nhu khuyen mien 勸勉 lay nhoi hay khuyen cho nguoi co len.
勹=bao [bao1]\n\t1. Boc.
勺=chuoc, thuoc [shao2]\n\t1. Muc lay. Thuong dung chu chuoc 酌. \n\t2. Cai chuoc, mot phan tram cua mot thung goi la chuoc. Muoi chuoc la mot cap. \n\t3. Cai moi dung de muc canh.
勻=quan [yun2]\n\t1. Deu, nhu dieu quan 調勻 hoa deu.
匀=quan [yun2]\n\t1. Deu, nhu dieu quan 調勻 hoa deu.
勾=cau [gou1|gou4]\n\t1. Cong. Cau co 勾股 ten rieng cua khoa hoc tinh. Do hinh tam giac, duong ngang goi la cau 勾, duong doc goi la co 股. \n\t2. Ngoac di. Ngoac bo doan mach trong van bai di goi la cau. Nhu nhat but cau tieu 一筆勾消 ngoac mot net bo di. \n\t3. Moc lay, nhu cau dan 勾引 du den. Nay dung nghia nhu chu bo 捕 (bat) la do y ay. Nhu cau nhiep 勾攝 du bat.
勿=vat [wu4]\n\t1. Cho. Nhoi cam chi khong duoc the nua.
匃=cai [gai4]\n\t1. Cau. \n\t2. Cho. Tuc dung nhu chu cai 丐 an may.
包=bao [bao1]\n\t1. Boc, dung do boc ngoai cai gi goi la bao. \n\t2. Cai bao, de boc do. \n\t3. Bao dong. \n\t4. Tinh gop lai. Tinh gop cai lon khong tinh lat vat.
匆=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thong 怱 dang voi vang.
匈=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Hung hung 匈匈 ram ri. Cung viet la 洶. \n\t2. Nuoc Hung. Nuoc Hung-nha-loi 匈牙利 (Hungarian) o chau Au, goi tat la nuoc Hung. 
匊=cuc [ju2]\n\t1. Nam, nam do o trong tay. Co khi dung chu cuc 掬.
匍=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Bo bac 匍匐 bo lom ngom, nhu bo bac bon tang 匍匐奔喪 bo dach ve chiu tang, nghia la thuong qua khong di duoc phai chong gay ma bo toi.
匏=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Qua bau. Sach Luan-ngu noi. Ngo khoi bao qua da tai, yen nang he nhi bat thuc 吾豈匏瓜也哉焉能繫而不食 Ta ha phai la qua bau dau ! Sao hay treo ma an khong duoc. Tuc goi ke si khong duoc dung lam quan la bao he 匏繫 nghia la de ho hao thoi, khong co dung lam gi. \n\t2. Tieng bau, mot thu tieng trong bat am.
匐=bac [fu2]\n\t1. Bo bac 匍匐 bo lom ngom. Xem chu bo 匍 o tren.
匕=chuy [bi3]\n\t1. Cai thia. Nhu noi cuoc doi yen lang thi goi la chuy xuong bat kinh 匕鬯不驚 nghia la van duoc vo su ma an uong yen lanh. \n\t2. Chuy thu 匕首 mot thu guom, dau nhu cai thia, ngan ma tien dung, cho nen goi la chuy thu.
化=hoa [hua1|hua4]\n\t1. Bien hoa. Bien doi vo hinh. Nhu hoa than 化身, hoa trang 化粧 nghia la bien doi hinh tuong khong cho ai biet. Phat vi muon cuu chung sinh, phai hoa xuong lam than nguoi goi la hoa than. Pham vat nay mat ma vat kia sinh ra goi la hoa. Nhu hu thao hoa vi huynh 腐草化為螢 co thoi hoa lam dom dom. Thoat xac bay len tien goi la vu hoa 羽化. Dan dan it di, co roi lai khong cung goi la hoa. Nhu tieu hoa 消化 tieu tan vat chat hoa ra chat khac, phan hoa 焚化 lay lua dot cho tan mat, dung hoa 溶化 cho vao nuoc cho tan ra. Khoa hoc ve vat chat chia ghe cac vat ra tung chat, hay pha lan may chat lam thanh mot chat goi la hoa hoc 化學. \n\t2. Hoa sinh. Nhu ta goi troi dat la tao hoa 造化, la hoa cong 化工 nghia la sinh diet duoc muon vat. \n\t3. Cam hoa. Chuyen di tinh chat, cai luong dan tuc goi la hoa. Nhu giao hoa 教化 nghia la dan bao chung, cam ngan chung, khien cho chung thuan tong vay. Lay an nghia ma cam goi la duc hoa 德化, lay chanh tri ma cam goi la phong hoa 風化, lay le giao ma cam goi la van hoa 文化. Cho nen ke o coi ngoai, khong theo su giao hoa cua minh goi la hoa ngoai 化外, bi minh cam hoa cung nhu theo minh goi la dong hoa 同化. \n\t4. Cau xin. Nhu hoa mo 化募, hoa duyen 化緣 nghia la lay nhoi dao nghia ma cam hoa, khien cho nguoi sinh long tu thien ma cho ma giup.
北=bac [bei3]\n\t1. Phuong bac. \n\t2. Trai, cung ngang trai nhau. Nhu si vo phan bac chi tam 士無反北之心 tuong si khong co long ngang trai. \n\t3. Thua. Nhu tam chien tam bac 三戰三北 danh ba tran thua ca ba.
匙=thi [chi2|shi5]\n\t1. Cai thia. \n\t2. Thuoc thi 鑰匙 cai chia khoa.
匚=phuong [fang1]\n\t1. Cai do de dung do.
匜=di, di [yi2]\n\t1. Do rua mat doi xua. Cung doc la di.
匝=tap [za1]\n\t1. Mot vong, quanh khap mot vong goi la nhat tap 一匝 nguyen la chu tap 帀.
匟=khang [kang4]\n\t1. Khang sang 匟床 cai giuong ngoi. 
匠=tuong [jiang4]\n\t1. Tho moc, bay gio thong dung de goi ca cac thu tho. Nhu dong tuong 銅匠 tho dong, thiet tuong 鐵匠 tho sat, v.v. \n\t2. Lanh nghe. Chuyen tinh ve mot nghe goi la tuong. Nhu tu tuong 序匠 viet gioi, hoa tuong 畫匠 ve kheo. Khen nguoi tai gioi goi la ton tuong 宗匠. \n\t3. Kheo, nguoi co y kheo goi la y tuong 意匠, tuong tam 匠心, v.v.
匡=khuong [kuang1]\n\t1. Sua cho chinh lai. Nhu khuong cuu 匡救 cuu cho di vao duong phai de khoi lam loi. \n\t2. Giup. Nhu khuong tuong 匡襄 giup rap.
匣=hap [xia2]\n\t1. Cai hop.
匪=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Chang phai. \n\t2. Tap lam su bat chinh. Nhu tho phi 土匪 giac co, phi loai 匪類 do bay ba, v.v.
匭=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Cai hom. Bay gio bo phieu bau cac nguoi ra lam viec cong goi la dau quy 投匭 nghia la bo ve vao trong cai hom.
匦=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Cai hom. Bay gio bo phieu bau cac nguoi ra lam viec cong goi la dau quy 投匭 nghia la bo ve vao trong cai hom.
匯=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Quanh lai. Nuoc chay quanh lai. \n\t2. Rot vao, cho cac dong nuoc deu chay vao. \n\t3. Gui. Nhan tien cua xu A gui cho xu B nhan lay goi la hoi doai 匯兌 tuc la cach gui mandat vay. Cai mandat de linh tien goi la hoi phieu 匯票.
汇=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Quanh lai. Nuoc chay quanh lai. \n\t2. Rot vao, cho cac dong nuoc deu chay vao. \n\t3. Gui. Nhan tien cua xu A gui cho xu B nhan lay goi la hoi doai 匯兌 tuc la cach gui mandat vay. Cai mandat de linh tien goi la hoi phieu 匯票.
匱=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Cai hom ruong. \n\t2. Het. Nhu quy phap 匱乏 thieu thon.
匮=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Cai hom ruong. \n\t2. Het. Nhu quy phap 匱乏 thieu thon.
匳=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Cai hop guong. Cai hop dung cac do phan sap. Pham cac cai hop de dung do deu goi la liem. Nhu an liem 印匳 hop an, thi liem 詩匳 hop tho, v.v. Bay gio goi cac do cua con gai ve nha chong la trang liem 粧匳. Tuc viet la liem 奩.
匵=doc [du2]\n\t1. Cai hom lon.
匸=he [xi3]\n\t1. Che day, khac han chu phuong 匚.
匹=that [pi3]\n\t1. Xep, con. Tinh so vai lua goi la that, doi xua tinh dai bon truong la mot that. Mot con ngua cung goi la nhat that 一匹. Tuc cung dung ca chu that 疋. \n\t2. Doi. Nhu that dich 匹敵, that tru 匹儔 nghia la day day bang vai xung doi cung nhau. \n\t3. Don, le. Nhu that phu 匹夫, that phu 匹婦 mot nguoi dan ong thuong, mot nguoi dan ba thuong.
匾=bien [bian3]\n\t1. Giep. Cai gi chieu doc be, chieu ngang to deu goi la bien. \n\t2. Cai bien. Viet chu vao tam van treo len goi la bien.
匿=nac [ni4]\n\t1. Tron, dau. Nhu dao nac 逃匿 tron tranh khong cho nguoi biet.
區=khu, au [ou1|qu1]\n\t1. Chia tung loai. Nhu khu biet 區別 phan ra tung khu tung thu. \n\t2. Coi, chia dat ra tung gioi han goi la khu. Cac nha canh gac chia ra tung khu, moi tui coi gac mot cho goi la canh khu 警區, chuc quan coi mot khu ay la khu truong 區長, mot cai nha cung goi la nhat khu 一區. \n\t3. Khu khu 區區 mon mon. \n\t4. Mot am la au. Cai au, mot thu dau doi xua, bon thung la mot dau, bon dau la mot au. \n\t5. Ho Au.
区=khu, au [ou1|qu1]\n\t1. Chia tung loai. Nhu khu biet 區別 phan ra tung khu tung thu. \n\t2. Coi, chia dat ra tung gioi han goi la khu. Cac nha canh gac chia ra tung khu, moi tui coi gac mot cho goi la canh khu 警區, chuc quan coi mot khu ay la khu truong 區長, mot cai nha cung goi la nhat khu 一區. \n\t3. Khu khu 區區 mon mon. \n\t4. Mot am la au. Cai au, mot thu dau doi xua, bon thung la mot dau, bon dau la mot au. \n\t5. Ho Au.
十=thap [shi2]\n\t1. Muoi. \n\t2. Du het. Nhu 'thap thanh 十成, thap toan 十全 ven du ca muoi, y noi duoc day du ca.
千=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Nghin, muoi tram la mot nghin. \n\t2. Rat muc. Nhu thien nan 千難 kho rat muc.
卄=nhap, chap [nian4]\n\t1. Hai muoi. Ta quen doc la chu chap.
卅=tap [sa4]\n\t1. Ba muoi.
升=thang [sheng1]\n\t1. Thung, muoi le la mot thung. \n\t2. Len. Nhu thang duong 升堂 len them. \n\t3. Thang. Lam quan duoc hon len mot buc goi la thang.
午=ngo [wu3]\n\t1. Chi ngo, chi thu bay trong 12 chi. Tu 11 gio sang den 1 gio chieu la gio ngo. \n\t2. Giua trua, gan trua goi la thuong ngo 上午, qua trua goi la ha ngo 下午. \n\t3. Giao. Nhu bang ngo 傍午 bay dat ngon ngang. \n\t4. Lich cu tinh sao dau den thang nam thi chi ve ngo, nen thang nam goi la ngo nguyet 午月, mong nam thang nam la tet doan ngo 端午. Ta thuong quen goi la tet doan ngu vi the.
半=ban [ban4]\n\t1. Nua. Vat chia doi moi ben mot nua goi la ban.
卌=tap [xi4]\n\t1. Bon muoi.
卉=huy [hui4]\n\t1. Ten goi tom cac thu co.
卐=van [wan4]\n\t1. Chu nay trong kinh truyen khong co, chi trong kinh nha Phat co thoi. Nha Phat 佛 noi rang khi Phat giang sinh truoc nguc co hien ra hinh chu 卐 nguoi sau moi biet chu ay. Trong bo Hoa Nghiem 華嚴 Am Nghia noi rang. chu 卐 nguyen khong co, den nien hieu Trang Tho thu hai doi nha Chu 周 moi che ra va am la van, nghia la muon duc tot lanh deu hop ca o day. Lai chu 卐, nguyen tieng Pham la Srivatsalaksana. Cac ngai Cuu Ma La Thap 鳩摩羅什 (344-413), Huyen Trang 玄奘 (600-664) dich la duc 德, ngai Bo De Luu Chi 菩提流支 dich la van 萬. O ben An Do 印度 thi tuong truyen la cai tuong cat tuong, dich la duc la noi ve cong duc, dich la van la noi ve cong duc day du. Song nguyen 卐 la hinh tuong chu khong phai chu, cho nen dich la cat-tuong hai-van-tuong ma theo hinh xoay ve ben huu la phai hon. Vi xem nhu nhieu Phat thi nhieu ve ben huu, hao quang cua Phat o khoang long may phong ra cung xoay ve ben huu, thi biet xoay ve ben huu moi la tuong cat tuong, co cho lam xoay ve ben ta 卍 la lam.
卑=ti [bei1]\n\t1. Thap. \n\t2. Hen. \n\t3. Tieng noi nhun nhuong voi nguoi tren. Nhu ti nhan 卑人 nguoi hen mon nay, ti chuc 卑職 chuc hen mon nay.
卒=tot, tuat, thot [cu4|zu2]\n\t1. Quan linh. Nhu binh tot 兵卒 binh linh, tau tot 走卒 linh hau. \n\t2. Mot am la tuat. Tron. Nhu tuat su 卒事 tron viec, tuat nghiep 卒業 tron nghiep. \n\t3. Nhoi tro tu, nghia la trot lot, la rut cuc. Nhu tuat nang thanh su 卒能成事 rut cuc hay nen viec. \n\t4. Quan dai phu chet goi la tuat, tho khao cung goi la tuat. Bay gio thong dung nhu chu tu 死. Nhu sinh tuat 生卒 song chet. \n\t5. Lai mot am nua la thot. Chot, voi vang. Nhu thot nhien 卒然, thang thot 倉卒, v.v.
卓=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Cao chot. Nhu trac thuc 卓識 kien thuc cao hon nguoi, trac tuyet 卓絕 tai tri tuyet tran. \n\t2. Dung vung. Nhu trac nhien 卓然. \n\t3. Cai dang.
協=hiep [xie2]\n\t1. Hoa hop. Nhu dong tam hiep luc 同心協力, hiep thuong 協商 cung ban de dinh lay mot phep nhat dinh. \n\t2. Co y nghia la giup do. Nhu luong thuc cua tinh khac dem den giup tinh minh goi la hiep huong 協餉, giup nguoi chu su chi moi viec goi la hiep ly 協理, v.v.
协=hiep [xie2]\n\t1. Hoa hop. Nhu dong tam hiep luc 同心協力, hiep thuong 協商 cung ban de dinh lay mot phep nhat dinh. \n\t2. Co y nghia la giup do. Nhu luong thuc cua tinh khac dem den giup tinh minh goi la hiep huong 協餉, giup nguoi chu su chi moi viec goi la hiep ly 協理, v.v.
南=nam [na1|nan2]\n\t1. Phuong nam. \n\t2. Ten bai nhac. Nhu chu nam 周南, trieu nam 召南 ten bai hat nhac trong kinh Thi.
博=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Rong. \n\t2. Thong suot. Nhu uyen bac 淵博 nghe thay nhieu lam. \n\t3. Danh bac. \n\t4. Lay. Nhu di bac nhat tieu 以博一笑 de lay mot tieng cuoi.
卜=boc [bo5|bu3]\n\t1. Boi rua. Dot mai rua de xem xau tot goi la boc. Nhu mai boc cong than, duy cat chi tong 枚卜公臣惟吉之從 boi xem cac bay toi ai la tot hon. Doi sau dung quan te tuong goi la mai boc 枚 la theo nghia ay. \n\t2. Boi thu. Nhu xem chim sau keu ma doan xem mua nang goi la boc. Bay gio goi su da du ky (預期) la dinh boc 定卜, goi su chua biet (未知) la vi boc 未卜.
卞=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Nong nay, bon chon.
占=chiem, chiem [zhan1|zhan4]\n\t1. Xem, coi diem gi de biet xau tot goi la chiem. Boi cho khoi ngo cung goi la chiem. \n\t2. Mot am la chiem. Tu tien chiem cu cua nguoi. \n\t3. Lam tho lam ca chua viet ra goi la khau chiem 口占.
卡=tap [ka3|qia3]\n\t1. Cac noi quan ai dap u, dong linh canh phong goi la thu tap 守卡. Chinh tri nha Thanh cu cac noi xung yeu deu dat so thu thue hang hoa goi la tap. Cung doc la chu khai.
卣=duu [you3]\n\t1. Do dung ruou thoi xua.
卦=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Que, ho Phuc Hy 伏羲 che ba vach (hao) la mot que. Hao lai chia ra hao am   hao duong, cung phoi hop nhau thanh tam que, tinh gap len thanh 64 que.
卩=tiet [jie2]\n\t1. Bo tiet.
卬=ngang [ang2]\n\t1. Ta. Ngay xua dung nhu chu ngang 昂 va chu nguong 仰.
卭=ngang [ang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 卬.
卮=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Cai chen. Mot chen ruou goi la nhat chi 一卮, nguon loi gian ra ngoai goi la lau chi 漏卮. Cung viet la 巵.
卯=mao [mao3]\n\t1. Chi mao. Chi thu tu trong 12 chi. Tu nam gio sang den bay gio sang la gio mao. \n\t2. Le cac quan lam viec tu gio mao, cho nen diem ten goi la diem mao 點卯, xung den ten da len goi la ung mao 應卯, so sach goi la mao ba 卯簿. Lap ra ki hen de thu tien luong va so sanh nhieu it goi la ti mao 比卯.
印=an [yin4]\n\t1. Cai an (con dau). Phep nha Thanh dinh, an cua cac quan than vuong tro len goi la bao 寶, tu quan vuong tro xuong goi la an 印, cua cac quan nho goi la kiem ki 鈐記, cua cac quan kham sai goi la quan phong 關防, cua nguoi thuong dung goi la do chuong 圖章 hay la tu an 私印. \n\t2. In. Khac chu in chu goi la an, cai do dung in bao in sach goi la an loat khi 印刷器. \n\t3. Nhu in vao, cai gi con co dau dinh vao vat khac deu goi la an. Hai ben hop y cung long goi la tam tam tuong an 心心相印, nhan cai no biet cai kia goi la ho tuong an chung 互相印證.
危=nguy [wei1]\n\t1. Cao, o noi cao ma ghe so goi la nguy. Cai the cao ngat nhu muon do goi la nguy. Nhu nguy lau 危樓 lau cao ngat, nguy tuong 危牆 tuong ngat. Ngoi ngay thang khong tua vao cai gi goi la chinh kham nguy toa 正襟危坐. \n\t2. Nguy, doi lai voi chu an 安. Nhu nguy cap 危急. \n\t3. Sao nguy, mot sao trong nhi thap bat tu.
卲=thieu, thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu nien cao duc thieu 年高德卲 tuoi gia duc cao. Cung doc la chu thieu.
即=tuc [ji2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuc 卽.
卵=noan [luan3]\n\t1. Cai trung. Nhu nguy nhu luy noan 危如累卵 nguy nhu trung xep chong, the nhu noan thach 勢如卵石 the nhu trung voi da. Nghia la cung mem khong chiu noi nhau vay. Nuoi nang cung goi la noan duc 卵翼 nghia la nhu chim ap trung vay. \n\t2. Cai hat dai. 
卷=quyen, quyen, quyen [juan3|juan4]\n\t1. Quyen. Tranh sach dong thanh tap de gap mo duoc goi la quyen. Van bai thi cung goi la quyen. Nhu lam xong dem nop goi la nap quyen 納卷. \n\t2. Cac van an cua quan de lai cung goi la quyen. Nhu an quyen 案卷 quyen van an. \n\t3. Mot am la quyen. Thu xep lai. \n\t4. Lai mot am la quyen. Cong, cung co nghia nhu quyen 拳 (nam tay). Nhu nhat quyen thach chi da 一卷石之多 chi con mot nam da. Lai cung nghia voi chu con 袞. 
卸=ta [xie4]\n\t1. Thao, coi. Hoa rung cung goi la hoa ta 花卸. Lai do do do o thuyen ra cung goi la ta. \n\t2. Khong lam viec nua cung goi la ta. Nhu ta kien 卸肩 trut ganh. Vay va cho nguoi de thoat minh goi la ta qua 卸過 trut loi, ta toi 卸罪 trut toi, ta trach 卸責 trut trach nhiem; v.v.
卹=tuat [xu4]\n\t1. Thuong xot. Nhu thuong cho nhung nguoi chet vi viec nuoc goi la tu tuat 賜卹, tuat dien 卹典, v.v. cung mot nghia nhu chu tuat 恤.
卺=can [jin3]\n\t1. Lay qua bau tien lam chen uong ruou de dung trong le cuoi goi la chen can. Tuc goi le vo chong lam le chuoc ruou voi nhau goi la le hop can 合卺 la boi nghia do.
卻=khuoc [que4]\n\t1. Tu gia. Nguoi ta cho gi minh tu khong nhan goi la khuoc. \n\t2. Lui ve. Nhu khuoc dich 卻敵 danh duoc giac lui. \n\t3. Mat, tieng noi giup loi. Nhu vong khuoc 忘卻 quen mat. \n\t4. Lai. Nhu cac tieu thuyet, cu dau mot hoi lai nhac lai rang khuoc thuyet 卻說 nghia la noi bai tren ma noi. Tuc viet la khuoc 却.
却=khuoc [que4]\n\t1. Tu gia. Nguoi ta cho gi minh tu khong nhan goi la khuoc. \n\t2. Lui ve. Nhu khuoc dich 卻敵 danh duoc giac lui. \n\t3. Mat, tieng noi giup loi. Nhu vong khuoc 忘卻 quen mat. \n\t4. Lai. Nhu cac tieu thuyet, cu dau mot hoi lai nhac lai rang khuoc thuyet 卻說 nghia la noi bai tren ma noi. Tuc viet la khuoc 却.
卽=tuc [ji2]\n\t1. Toi, gan. Nhu kha vong nhi bat kha tuc 可望而不可卽 kha trong ma chang kha toi gan. \n\t2. Ngay. Nhu le minh tuc khoi 黎明卽起 sang som day ngay, tuc khac 卽刻 ngay lap tuc, v.v. \n\t3. Tuc la. Nhu sac tuc thi khong 色卽是空 sac tuc la khong, y noi hai ben nhu mot. \n\t4. Du, nhoi noi vi thu. Nhu thien tuc vo thuong, diec bat kha bat vi thien 善卽無賞亦不可不為善 lam thien du chua duoc thuong, cung phai lam thien. Thuong viet la 即.
卿=khanh [qing1]\n\t1. Quan khanh. Ngay xua co quan chanh khanh 正卿, quan thieu khanh 少卿. Chuc tong ly coi viec nuoc bay gio cung goi la quoc vu khanh 國務卿. \n\t3. Minh, anh. Tieng goi nhau. Nhu vua goi bay toi la khanh, goi ke ngang hang cung dung chu khanh. Doi Luc-trieu cho la tieng goi nhau rat than yeu, nen nay vo chong thuong goi nhau la khanh khanh.
厂=han [an1|chang3]\n\t1. Cho suon nui nguoi ta co the o duoc.
厄=ach, ngoa [e4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ach 阨 nghia la khon ach. \n\t2. Mot am la ngoa. Cai dot go. \n\t3. Xuong tran khong co thit.
厎=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Den. \n\t2. Dinh. Lai co nghia nhu chu chi 砥 nghia la da mai.
厓=nhai [ya2]\n\t1. Ben. Nhu nhai ngan 厓岸 ben bo. Cung nhu chu nhai 崖, 涯.
厔=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cho nuoc uon cong. \n\t2. Ten mot huyen ben Tau.
厖=mang [pang2]\n\t1. Day, to. Nhu mang nhien dai vat 厖然大物 su su vat lon. \n\t2. Lan lon.
厘=ly [li2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ly 釐.
厙=xa [she4]\n\t1. Ho Xa.
厍=xa [she4]\n\t1. Ho Xa.
厚=hau [hou4]\n\t1. Chieu day. \n\t2. Hau, doi lai voi chu bac 薄. Pham binh su vat cai nao tot hon, nhieu hon, day hon deu goi la hau. \n\t3. Hau dai hon. Dai nguoi than trong hon goi la tuong hau 相厚.
厝=tho, thac [cuo4]\n\t1. De. Nhu tich tan tho hoa 積薪厝火 chua cui de gan lua, noi vi nhu o vao noi nguy hiem cung nhu ngam de cui gan lua co khi chay nha vay. \n\t2. Quan. Nguoi chet chua kip chon con quan mot cho goi la tho. \n\t3. Mot am la thac, cung nghia voi chu 錯.
原=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Canh dong. Cho dat bang phang goi la nguyen. Nhu binh nguyen 平原 dong bang, cao nguyen 高原 dong cao, v.v. Noi dat o giua ca nuoc goi la trung nguyen 中原 . \n\t2. Noi tha ma, cuu nguyen 九原 cho quan khanh dai phu doi nha Tan de ma, ve sau cu dung lam chu goi noi tha ma la boi co do. \n\t3. Goc, dai nguyen 大原 goc lon. Tuc goi ong quan da di la nguyen nham quan 原任官 nghia la ong quan nguyen da cai tri truoc. \n\t4. Suy nguyen, suy cau cho biet toi cai co no nhu the nao goi la nguyen. Nhu nguyen cao 原告 ke to cao truoc, nguyen chat 原質 vat chat thuan tuy khong the phan tach ra duoc, nguyen ly 原理 chan ly luc nguyen thuy, nguyen tu 原子 cai phan cua vat chat rat nho, rat tinh, nguyen thuy yeu chung 原始要終 suy cung cai truoc, rut gon cai sau, v.v. \n\t5. Tha toi, nghia la suy den coi nguon chan tinh co the tha thu duoc. 
厠=xi [ce4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu xi 廁.
厤=lich [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu lich 曆.
厥=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Thua. \n\t2. Phat quyet, khi nghich len chan tay da lanh goi la quyet.
厦=ha [sha4|xia4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ha 廈.
厩=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cuu 廏.
厫=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ngao 敖.
厪=can [jin3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu can 廑.
厭=yem, ap, yem, ap [yan4]\n\t1. Day du. Nhu tham dac vo yem 厭 tham lam khong chan. \n\t2. Chan ghet. Nhu yem van 厭聞 chan nghe. \n\t3. Mot am la ap. De, cung nhu chu ap 壓. \n\t4. Lai mot am la yem. Nhu yem yem 厭厭 yen yen. \n\t5. Lai mot am la ap. Nhu ap ap 厭厭 uot at, lap nhap.
厌=yem, ap, yem, ap [yan4]\n\t1. Day du. Nhu tham dac vo yem 厭 tham lam khong chan. \n\t2. Chan ghet. Nhu yem van 厭聞 chan nghe. \n\t3. Mot am la ap. De, cung nhu chu ap 壓. \n\t4. Lai mot am la yem. Nhu yem yem 厭厭 yen yen. \n\t5. Lai mot am la ap. Nhu ap ap 厭厭 uot at, lap nhap.
厮=tu [si1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tu 廝.
厯=lich [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu lich 歷.
厰=xuong [chang3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu xuong 廠.
厲=le, lai [li4]\n\t1. Da mai, thuong dung chu le 礪. \n\t2. Mai. Nhu mat ma le binh 秣馬厲兵 cho ngua an mai do binh. \n\t3. Gang goi. Nhu mien le 勉厲 khuyen nhu co gang len, khich le 激厲 choc tuc cho gang len, v.v. \n\t4. Manh du. Nhu tai tiep tai le 再接再厲 lai danh lai cang hang du. \n\t5. Ac, bao nguoc. \n\t6. Benh dich le 疫厲. \n\t7. De ca ao loi qua nuoc cung goi la le. \n\t8. Tren. Nhu tai bi ky le 在彼淇厲 o tren song Ky. \n\t9. That lung buong mui xuong. \n\t10. Mot am la lai. Benh hui.
厉=le, lai [li4]\n\t1. Da mai, thuong dung chu le 礪. \n\t2. Mai. Nhu mat ma le binh 秣馬厲兵 cho ngua an mai do binh. \n\t3. Gang goi. Nhu mien le 勉厲 khuyen nhu co gang len, khich le 激厲 choc tuc cho gang len, v.v. \n\t4. Manh du. Nhu tai tiep tai le 再接再厲 lai danh lai cang hang du. \n\t5. Ac, bao nguoc. \n\t6. Benh dich le 疫厲. \n\t7. De ca ao loi qua nuoc cung goi la le. \n\t8. Tren. Nhu tai bi ky le 在彼淇厲 o tren song Ky. \n\t9. That lung buong mui xuong. \n\t10. Mot am la lai. Benh hui.
厴=ap [yan3]\n\t1. Cai yem cua.
厣=ap [yan3]\n\t1. Cai yem cua.
厶=khu [si1]\n\t1. Khu lu 去盧 do an com. Duoi chu khu 去 theo chu khu. Co van la chu tu, duoi chu soan 篡, chu noi 內 deu theo do. Co van viet la quang 厷 tuc la chu 肱. Lai la chu di 以 bot net di, tuc la ben ta chu di 以, chu 台, chu hi 矣 deu theo do.
厺=khu [qu4]\n\t1. Tuc la chu 去.
去=khu, khu [qu4]\n\t1. Di, tu day ma di toi kia goi la khu. \n\t2. Bo. Nhu khu thu 去取 bo lay. \n\t3. Da qua. Nhu khu nien 去年 nam ngoai. \n\t4. Mot tieng trong bon tieng, chu nao doc am nhu danh dau sac la khu thanh. \n\t5. Mot am la khu, cung nghia voi chu khu 驅.
參=tham, xam, sam [can1|cen1|shen1]\n\t1. Xen vao, can du vao. Nhu xam muu 參謀, xam chinh 參正 nghia la cung du vao ma ban ma lam viec vay. Ta quen doc la tham. \n\t2. Vao hau. Nhu xam yet 參謁, xam kien 參見. Cac quan duoi vao hau cac quan tren goi la dinh xam 庭參. Trong nha Phat di toi cac vi dao cao duc trong ma hoi dao goi la di xam. Ta quen doc la tham. \n\t3. Mot am la sam. Thu co quy, dung de lam thuoc. Nhu nhan sam 人參, dang sam 党參, v.v. \n\t4. Sao sam. Mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Sam si 參差 so le. \n\t6. Ba, tuc dung lam chu tam viet kep 叁. 
参=tham, xam, sam [can1|cen1|shen1]\n\t1. Xen vao, can du vao. Nhu xam muu 參謀, xam chinh 參正 nghia la cung du vao ma ban ma lam viec vay. Ta quen doc la tham. \n\t2. Vao hau. Nhu xam yet 參謁, xam kien 參見. Cac quan duoi vao hau cac quan tren goi la dinh xam 庭參. Trong nha Phat di toi cac vi dao cao duc trong ma hoi dao goi la di xam. Ta quen doc la tham. \n\t3. Mot am la sam. Thu co quy, dung de lam thuoc. Nhu nhan sam 人參, dang sam 党參, v.v. \n\t4. Sao sam. Mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Sam si 參差 so le. \n\t6. Ba, tuc dung lam chu tam viet kep 叁. 
叅=xam [can1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 參.
又=huu [you4]\n\t1. Lai.
叉=xoa [cha1|cha2|cha3]\n\t1. Bat treo tay. \n\t2. Cai gi toe ra tren dau goi la xoa.
及=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Kip, den. Tu sau ma den goi la cap. Nhu huynh chung de cap 兄終弟及 anh het den em, cap thoi 及時 kip thoi, ba cap 波及 tran toi, nghia bong la su o noi khac lien luy den minh. \n\t2. Bang. Nhu bat cap nhan 不及人 chang bang nguoi. \n\t3. Cung.
友=huu [you3]\n\t1. Ban, cung long cung chi choi voi nhau goi la huu. Nuoc nao co tinh di lai than thien voi nuoc minh goi la huu bang 友邦. \n\t2. Thuan, an o voi anh em phai dao goi la huu. Nhu duy hieu huu vu huynh de 惟孝友于兄弟 bui hieu thuan chung anh em. Bay gio goi anh em la huu vu 友于 la boi nghia do.
双=song [shuang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 雙.
反=phan, phien [fan3]\n\t1. Trai, doi lai voi chu chinh 正. Ben kia mat phai goi la mat trai. \n\t2. Tra lai, tro ve. \n\t3. Nghi, xet lai. Nhu cu nhat ngung tac di tam ngung phan 舉一隅則以三隅反 (Luan ngu 論語) cat mot goc thi nghi thau ba goc kia. Nhu tu phan 自反 tu xet lai minh, v.v. \n\t4. Tro, quay. Nhu phan thu 反手 tro tay. \n\t5. Trai lai. Nhu muu phan 謀反 muu trai lai, phan doi 反對 trai lai, khong chiu. \n\t6. Mot am la phien. Lat lai. Nhu phien vi 反胃 benh da day lat len, phien an 反案 lat an lai, khong phuc xu the la dung toi, v.v.
叔=thuc [shu1]\n\t1. Be, anh goi em la thuc. Nhu nhi thuc 二叔 chu hai. \n\t2. Chu, em bo goi la thuc. Nhu thuc phu 叔父 chu ruot.
取=thu [qu3]\n\t1. Chiu lay. Nhu nhat gioi bat thu 一介不取 mot may chang chiu lay. \n\t2. Chon lay. Nhu thu si 取士 chon lay hoc tro ma dung. \n\t3. Dung. Nhu nhat trang tuc thu 一長足取 mot cai gioi du lay dung. \n\t4. Lay lay. Nhu tham nang thu vat 探囊取物 tho tui lay do. \n\t5. Lam. Nhu thu xao 取巧 lam kheo.
受=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Chiu nhan lay. Nguoi nay cho, nguoi kia chiu lay goi la thu thu 受受. \n\t2. Vang. Nhu thu menh 受命 vang menh. \n\t3. Dung chua. Nhu tieu thu 消受 huong dung, thu dung 受用 duoc dung, y noi duoc huong thu cac su tot lanh, cac mon sung suong vay. 
叙=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 敘.
叚=gia [jia3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 徦.
叛=ban [pan4]\n\t1. Lam phan. Trai lai, khong cung long voi minh nua.
叟=tau [sou3]\n\t1. Ong gia.
叠=diep [die2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 疊.
叡=due [rui4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 睿.
叢=tung [cong2]\n\t1. Hop. Suu tap so nhieu de vao mot cho goi la tung. Nhu tung thu 叢書, tung bao 叢報 tich gop nhieu sach bao lam mot bo, mot loai. \n\t2. Bui ram. Nhu tung lam 叢林 rung ram, cay moc tung bui goi la tung. Bay gio goi chua la tung lam 叢林 vi xua Phat to thuyet phap thuong o cac noi rung ram vang ve sach se, cho tang chung tien cho tu hanh vay.
丛=tung [cong2]\n\t1. Hop. Suu tap so nhieu de vao mot cho goi la tung. Nhu tung thu 叢書, tung bao 叢報 tich gop nhieu sach bao lam mot bo, mot loai. \n\t2. Bui ram. Nhu tung lam 叢林 rung ram, cay moc tung bui goi la tung. Bay gio goi chua la tung lam 叢林 vi xua Phat to thuyet phap thuong o cac noi rung ram vang ve sach se, cho tang chung tien cho tu hanh vay.
口=khau [kou3]\n\t1. Cai mieng. Phep tinh so dinh, mot nha goi la nhat ho 一戶, mot nguoi goi la nhat khau 一口, cho nen thuong goi so dinh la ho khau 戶口. Ke da thanh dinh goi la dinh khau 丁口. \n\t2. Con duong ra vao phai can, cac cua ai deu goi la khau, ngoai cua o goi la khau ngoai 口外. Hinh phep ngay xua bi day ra ngoai cua o cung goi la xuat khau 出口 deu theo nghia ay ca. \n\t3. Nha Phat cho nhung toi boi mieng ma ra la khau nghiep 口業.
古=co [gu3]\n\t1. Ngay xua. \n\t2. Khong xu phu thoi doi. Nhu co dao 古道 dao co, cao co 高古 cao thuong nhu thoi xua, v.v.
句=cu, cau, cau [gou1|ju4]\n\t1. Cau. Het mot nhoi van goi la nhat cu 一句 mot cau. \n\t2. Mot am la cau, nguyen la chu cau 勾 nghia la cong, la moc. \n\t3. Mot am la cau. Nhu cau duong 句當 nguoi phai lieu bien moi viec cong goi la cau duong. Ta quen goi la cau duong.
另=lanh [ling4]\n\t1. Rieng. Nhu lanh phong 另封 goi rieng.
叨=thao [dao1|tao1]\n\t1. Tham. Chiu on cua nguoi goi la thao. Ta on nguoi ta trong dai minh goi la thao nhieu 叨擾 quay qua. \n\t2. Lam duoc. Nhu thao tai tri ky 叨在知己 lam duoc cho la tri ky (nhoi noi nhun minh).
叩=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Go. Nhu khau mon 叩門 go cua, khau quan 叩關 go cua quan, v.v. \n\t2. Hoi. Nhu nga khau ky luong doan 我叩其兩端 ta gan hoi thua hai moi. \n\t3. Lay rap dau xuong dat. Nhu bach khau 百叩 tram lay.
只=chi [zhi1|zhi3]\n\t1. Nhoi tro ngu. Nhu lac chi quan tu 樂只君子 vui vay nguoi quan tu. \n\t2. Chi. Nhu chi thu nhat gia 只此一家 chi mot nha ay.
叫=khieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Keu. Nhu dai khieu nhat thanh 大叫一聲 keu to mot tieng. Tuc viet la 呌 la nham.
召=trieu [shao4|zhao4]\n\t1. Voi, lay tay vay lai la trieu, lay loi goi lai la trieu.
叭=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Lat ba 喇叭 cai loa. \n\t2. Mot giong cho o phuong bac goi la lat ba 喇叭.
叮=dinh [ding1]\n\t1. Dinh ninh 叮嚀 dan di dan lai.
可=kha, khac [ke3|ke4]\n\t1. Ung cho. \n\t2. Kha. Nhu kha da 可也 kha vay. \n\t3. Mot am la khac. Khac han 可汗 cac nuoc ben Tay-vuc goi vua chua ho la khac han.
台=thai, dai, di [tai1|tai2]\n\t1. Sao thai. Tam thai 三台 sao Tam-thai. Sach thien van noi sao ay nhu ngoi Tam-cong 三公, cho nen trong thu tu ton ai cung goi la thai. Nhu goi quan tren la hien thai 憲台, goi quan phu huyen la phu thai 父台, goi cac nguoi tren la thai tien 台前 deu la theo cai nghia do. \n\t2. Thai cat 台吉 ten tuoc quan, ben Mong-co chia ra bon thu de phong cac con em nha vua. \n\t3. Mot am la dai. Tuc dung nhu chu dai 臺. \n\t4. Dai diem 台站 don canh gac ngoai bien thuy. \n\t5. Mot am la di. Ta. \n\t6. Vui long.
叱=sat [chi4]\n\t1. Quat. \n\t2. Keu len. Nhu sat danh thinh an 叱名請安 keu ten minh len ma hoi tham nguoi tren (trong thu tu thuong dung).
史=su [shi3]\n\t1. Quan su. Mot chuc quan coi ve viec van thu. Nhu quan noi su 內史, quan ngoai su 外史, quan ta su 左史, quan huu su 右史, v.v. \n\t2. Chuc quan o gan vua luon luon la ngu su 御史, cung nhu quan bi thu bay gio. Chuc quan coi giu cac sach vo trong cung va bien chep sua soan su sach goi la quan thai su 太史. Ve sau thi chuc ngu su chi chuyen ve viec xet hac toi cac quan va can ngan vua, so cua cac quan ay lam viec goi la do sat vien 都察院, con cac chuc thai su thi so vien han lam kiem ca, vi the goi han lam la thai su, le nha Chu co quan nu su 女史 de coi cac viec le nghi cua hoang hau cung phi, chon cac dan ba con gai co hoc vao lam, cho nen con gai co hoc goi la nu su 女史. \n\t3. Sach su, thu ghi cac su tich trong nuoc tu xua toi nay goi la lich su 歷史, quoc su 國史.
右=huu [you4]\n\t1. Ben phai. \n\t2. Giup, cung nhu chu huu 佑. Nhu bao huu 保右 giup giu. \n\t3. Ben tren. Doi xua cho ben phai la tren. Nhu huu van huu vu 右文右武 trong van trong vo. Vi the nen ho sang goi la huu toc 右族, nha hao cuong goi la hao huu 豪右, v.v. \n\t4. Phuong tay. Nhu Son huu 山右 tuc la Son-tay. Giang huu 江右 tuc la Giang-tay.
叵=pha [po3]\n\t1. Khong the kha. Nhu pha tin 叵信 khong the tin duoc, pha nai 叵耐 khong the chiu duoc, v.v. \n\t2. Ben, cung nghia nhu chu toai 遂.
叶=hiep [xie2|ye4]\n\t1. Co van la chu 協. Van co lam lac, nguoi nha Tong sua lai cac chu khong hop van goi la hiep van 叶韻.
号=hieu [hao2|hao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hieu 號.
司=ti, tu [si1]\n\t1. Chu. Moi chuc quan coi mot viec goi la ti. Nhu huu ti 有司, so ti 所司, v.v. Bay gio cac bo deu chia rieng moi nguoi giu mot viec, goi la ti truong 司長. \n\t2. So quan. Nhu bo chanh ti 布正司 so quan coi ve viec tien luong, cung goi la phien ti 藩司, an sat ti 按察司 so quan coi ve hinh an, cung goi la niet ti 臬司. Cung doc la chu tu.
吁=hu [xu1|yu4]\n\t1. Oi ! Chao oi !
吃=cat [chi1]\n\t1. Noi lap. \n\t2. An. Cung nhu chu khiet 喫.
各=cac [ge3|ge4]\n\t1. Deu. Moi nguoi co mot dia vi rieng, khong xam lan duoc. Nhu cac bat tuong muu 各不相謀 deu chang cung muu. 
合=hop, cap [ge3|he2]\n\t1. Hop. Nhu dong tam hop luc 同心合力 cung long hop suc. \n\t2. Gop lai. Nhu hop tu 合資 gop von lai cung lam an, hop muu 合謀 cung gop y kien cung muu toan. \n\t3. Lien tiep. Nhu hop vi 合圍 quan linh lien tiep lai vay, hop long 合龍 sua sang viec song nuoc, de vo han khau lai cung goi la hop long. \n\t4. Hop cach. Nhu hop phap 合法 phai phep, hop thuc 合式 hop cach, v.v. \n\t5. Khap xem. Doi xua dung the tre ghi chu roi che doi, moi nguoi giu mot nua, khi co viec cu khap xem, dung khop moi phai, nen goi la phu hop 符合, hoac dung giay ma thi goi la hop khoan 合券 . \n\t6. Gop ca. Nhu hop huong 合鄉 ca lang, hop ap 合邑 ca ap, v.v. \n\t7. Coi, bon phuong va tren troi duoi dat, goi la luc hop 六合. \n\t8. Hai ben cung lam to ky ket voi nhau goi la hop dong 合同. \n\t9. Mot am la cap. Le, muoi le la mot thung.
吉=cat [ji2]\n\t1. Tot lanh. Pham viec gi vui mung deu goi la cat, doi lai voi chu hung 凶.
吊=dieu [diao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dieu 弔.
同=dong [tong2|tong4]\n\t1. Cung nhu mot. Nhu tu vu su phu di mau nhu ai dong 資于事父以事母而愛同 nuong dao tho cha de tho me ma long yeu cung nhu mot. \n\t2. Cung nhau. Nhu dong hoc 同學 cung hoc, dong su 同事 cung lam viec, v.v. \n\t3. Hop lai. Nhu phuc loc lai dong 福祿來同 phuc loc cung hop ca toi. \n\t4. Hoa. Nhu dai dong chi the 大同之世 coi doi cung vui hoa nhu nhau, nhan dan cung long voi nhau khong tranh canh gi. \n\t5. Loi dong 雷同 noi duoi, an cap van tu cua nguoi tu xung la cua minh cung goi la loi dong.
名=danh [ming2]\n\t1. Danh, doi lai voi chu thuc. Nhu noi cai quat ca moi vat goi la cong danh 公名, noi rieng tung thu goi la chuyen danh 專名, o trong phep van deu goi la danh tu 名詞. \n\t2. Ten nguoi, doi voi nguoi tren thi xung ten cai minh, doi voi ban be thi chi xung ten tu minh thoi, co duc co vi thi luc chet doi ten khac, goi ten cu la ten hem. \n\t3. Danh du, nguoi thien thi duoc tieng tot ("my danh 美名), nguoi ac thi bi tieng xau ("ac danh 惡名). Thuong dung de khen cac nguoi gioi. Nhu danh than 名臣 bay toi gioi, danh tuong 名將 tuong gioi, v.v. Cao Ba Quat 高伯适. Co lai danh loi nhan, Bon tau lo do trung 古來名利人，奔走路塗中 Xua nay hang nguoi danh loi, Van tat ta ngoai duong sa. \n\t4. Van tu, co nhan goi mot chu la nhat danh 一名. \n\t5. Loi tieng. Nhu su xuat huu danh 師出有名 xuat quan ra co tieng, nghia la vi co dieu tieng gi moi dem quan ra danh nuoc ngoai vay. \n\t6. Mot nguoi cung goi la mot danh. Nhu su thi cu thi noi lay may danh may danh. \n\t7. Danh giao. Trong luan ly dinh ranh phan tren duoi, danh phan tren duoi chinh dinh roi moi ra ve, nen goi la danh giao 名教. \n\t8. Danh gia. Mot mon hoc trong chin mon ngay xua. Dai y cot de bien biet cho khac cho cung, cu danh ma tim su thuc, khong the vo vao lan lon duoc. Ve sau xen vao nha hoc ve hinh phep, cung goi la hinh danh chi hoc 刑名之學, hoac goi la danh phap 名法. Mon hoc bien luan ben Tay cung giong y chi ay, nen Tau dich la danh hoc, tuc la mon Luan ly hoc vay.
后=hau [hou4]\n\t1. Vua, doi xua goi cac chu hau la quan hau 羣后. \n\t2. Ba hoang hau (vo vua). \n\t3. Cung nhu chu hau 後. Nhu tri chi nhi hau huu dinh 知止而后有定 biet noi yen o roi moi dinh duoc chi. \n\t4. Than dat goi la hau tho 后土.
吏=lai [li4]\n\t1. Sua tri. Chuc xu su tri dan goi la lai, vi the nen quan cung goi la lai. Cai viec chuc phan cac quan dia phuong phai lam goi la lai tri 吏治. \n\t2. Ke lai, cac chuc duoi quyen quan goi la lai. Nhu thong lai 通吏, de lai 題吏, v.v.
吐=tho [tu3|tu4]\n\t1. Tho ra. Vi benh gi ma cac do an uong o trong da day thoc ra goi la tho. Nha lam thuoc co phep tho, nghia la cho uong thuoc tho het ta doc ra cho khoi benh. \n\t2. Noi nang. Nhu tho tu phong nha 吐詞風雅 noi nhoi ra phong nha. \n\t3. No ra. Nhu hoa no goi la tho tu 吐秀. \n\t4. Tho lo. Nhu tho lo chan tinh 吐露真情 bay to het tinh thuc. \n\t5. Nha ra, nha tu tien nha cai cu ra, nuot cai moi vao goi la tho nap 吐納. \n\t6. Vut bo. Nhu tho khi 吐棄 nho vut di.
向=huong [xiang4]\n\t1. Ngoanh ve, huong ve. Ngoanh ve phuong vi nao goi la huong. Nhu nam huong 南向 ngoanh ve huong nam, bac huong 北向 ngoanh ve huong bac, v.v. Y chi nga ve mat nao goi la chi huong 志向, xu huong 趨向, v.v. \n\t2. Ngay xua. Nhu huong gia 向者 truoc ay. \n\t3. Sap. Nhu huong than 向晨 sap sang.
君=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Vua, nguoi lam chu ca mot nuoc. \n\t2. Nghiem quan 嚴君 cha, cha la chu ca mot nha, cho nen lai goi la phu quan 府君. \n\t3. Thien quan 天君 tam nguoi. Nhu thien quan thai nhien 天君泰然 trong tam yen vui tu nhien. \n\t4. Tieu quan 小君 vo cac vua chu hau doi xua. Vi the bay gio nguoi ta cung goi vo la te quan 細君. Sac hieu phong cho dan ba xua cung goi la quan. Nhu minh goi me la thai quan 太君, cung nhu danh hieu Thai phu quan 太夫君 vay. \n\t5. Anh, ban be ton nhau cung goi la quan. Nhu Nguyen quan 阮君 anh ho Nguyen, Le quan 黎君 anh ho Le, v.v.
吝=lan [lin4]\n\t1. Tiec (sen). Tiec khong cho nguoi la lan. Nhu khan lan 慳吝 keo cu, lan sac 吝嗇 co ke. Bi lan 鄙吝, v.v. \n\t2. Hoi lan 悔吝 nhoi boi toan, cung nhu hoi han vay. Tuc viet la 恡.
吞=thon [tun1]\n\t1. Nuot, an khong nhai cu nuot ngay xuong goi la thon. \n\t2. Diet mat. Danh lay dat nuoc nguoi ta thu lam dat nuoc minh goi la tinh thon 并吞. Cung viet la 併吞.
吟=ngam [yin2]\n\t1. Ngam. Doc tho doc phu keo giong dai ra goi la ngam. Nhu ngam nga 吟哦, ngam vinh 吟詠, v.v. Nguoi om dau ren ri goi la than ngam 呻吟.
吠=phe [fei4]\n\t1. Cho can.
否=phu, bi [fou3|pi3]\n\t1. Khong. Nhu thuong ki chi phu 嘗其旨否 nem xem ngon khong ? \n\t2. Mot am la bi. Ac. Nhu tang bi 臧否 thien ac. \n\t3. Bi tac, ten mot que trong kinh Dich. Van tot goi la thai 泰, van xau goi la bi 否.
吩=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Phan pho 吩咐 dan bao. Tieng nguoi tren dan bao ke duoi.
吪=ngoa [e2]\n\t1. Dong day. \n\t2. Hoa. Nhu Chu-cong dong chinh tu quoc thi ngoa 周公東征四國是吪 ong Chu-cong di danh ben dong, bon nuoc deu cam hoa.
含=ham [han2]\n\t1. Ngam, ngam o trong mom khong nha khong nuot la ham. \n\t2. Dung duoc, nhan duoc. Nhu ham suc 含蓄, ham dong 含容 nghia la bao dong nhin nhuc duoc, khong voi gian voi cuoi. \n\t3. Le ngay xua nguoi chet thi bo gao va cua quy vao mom goi la ham. Ta thuong goi la do van ham.
吭=hang, hang [hang2|keng1]\n\t1. Co hong. Nhu dan hang trang minh 引吭長鳴 gan co keu dai. Cung doc la hang.
吮=duyen [shun3]\n\t1. Mut. Nhu duyen nhu 吮乳 mut sua.
吱=chi [zhi1|zi1]\n\t1. Chi chi 吱吱 tieng keu. \n\t2. Tat chi 嗶吱 do det bang long.
吴=ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ngo 呉.
吵=sao [chao1|chao3]\n\t1. Sao nao 吵閙 noi ram ri.
吶=not, niet [na4]\n\t1. Not not 吶吶 ap ung (tri trong). Noi nang can than, nghi ngoi ky luong roi moi noi. \n\t2. Reo ho cho them oai thanh goi la not ham 吶喊. Cung doc la chu niet.
呐=not, niet [na4]\n\t1. Not not 吶吶 ap ung (tri trong). Noi nang can than, nghi ngoi ky luong roi moi noi. \n\t2. Reo ho cho them oai thanh goi la not ham 吶喊. Cung doc la chu niet.
吸=hap [xi1]\n\t1. Hut hoi vao, doi lai voi chu ho 呼.
吹=xuy, xuy [chui1]\n\t1. Thoi. Nhu xuy tieu 吹簫 thoi tieu, xuy dich 吹笛 thoi sao, v.v. \n\t2. Mot am la xuy. Co xuy 鼓吹, nao xuy 鐃吹deu la ten khuc nhac doi xua ca.
吻=van [wen3]\n\t1. Mep. \n\t2. Khau van 口吻 giong noi. \n\t3. Van hop 吻合 giong in. Su vat gi giong in nhu nhau goi la van hop.
吼=hong [hou3]\n\t1. Rong. Tieng keu cac loai thu manh keu.
吽=hong [hong1]\n\t1. Tieng than chu trong tieng Phan.
吾=ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Ta, toi minh ma noi goi la ngo. Nhan nguoi ma noi goi la nga 我. Nhu nga thien duong ngo hao nhien chi khi 我善養吾浩然之氣 ta kheo nuoi cai khi hao nhien cua ta. \n\t2. Chong giu, phep quan nha Han co chuc chap kim ngo 執金吾 y la cam cai do binh de chong giu viec phi thuong.
吿=cao, coc [gao4]\n\t1. Bao, bao nguoi tren goi la cao. \n\t2. Cao. Nhu cao lao 吿 cao rang gia yeu phai nghi, cao benh 吿 cao om, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la coc. Trinh. Nhu xuat coc phan dien 出吿反面 nghia la con tho cha me di ra thi xin phep, ve thi trinh mat vay.
呀=nha [ya1|ya5]\n\t1. Nhoi tro tu. Nhu hai nhi nha 孩兒呀 con a !
呂=lu, la [lu:3]\n\t1. Luat lu 侓呂 tieng dieu hat, xem chu luat 侓. \n\t2. Ho Lu, ta quen doc la La.
吕=lu, la [lu:3]\n\t1. Luat lu 侓呂 tieng dieu hat, xem chu luat 侓. \n\t2. Ho Lu, ta quen doc la La.
呃=ach [e4]\n\t1. Nac. Ach nghich 呃逆 chung nac. Nguyen viet la 呝.
呆=ngoc [dai1]\n\t1. Ngay dai.
呈=trinh [cheng2]\n\t1. Bao. To ra. \n\t2. Trinh. Ke duoi noi cho nguoi tren biet goi la trinh. To keu voi quan tren cung goi la trinh.
呉=ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Nuoc Ngo, ho Ngo, dat Ngo. \n\t2. Ram ri.
呌=khieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khieu 叫.
呎=xich [chi3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu xich 尺 thuoc do cua nuoc Anh-cat-loi, tuc la 9 tac 5 phan 2 ly tay. Ta goi la mot ma.
呢=ni, ni [ne5|ni2]\n\t1. Ni nam 呢喃 ri ram, tieng chim yen keu. \n\t2. Mot thu det bang long giong nhu gia. Ta goi la ni.
呦=u [you1]\n\t1. U u 呦呦 tieng huou keu.
周=chu [zhou1]\n\t1. Khap. Nhu chu dao 周到, chu chi 周至 nghia la tron ven truoc sau, khong sai suyen ti gi. \n\t2. Vong, khap mot vong tron goi la chu 周. \n\t3. Chu cap. Nhu quan tu chu cap bat ke phu 君子周給不繼富 nguoi quan tu chu cap cho ke tung thieu chang them giau cho ke giau co. \n\t4. Nha Chu, vua Vu Vuong 禹王 danh giet vua Tru 紂 nha Thuong 商, len lam vua goi   la nha Chu 周 (1066-771 truoc Tay lich). Ve doi Nam Bac trieu 南北朝, Vu Van Giac   宇文覺 noi len goi la Bac Chu 北周 (557-581). Ve doi Ngu dai Quach Uy 郭威 len lam   vua cung goi la Hau Chu 後周 (951-960).
呪=chu [zhou4]\n\t1. Nguyen rua. \n\t2. Than chu. \n\t3. Theo nghia kinh nha Phat thi chu nghia la chuc nguyen.
呫=chiep [che4]\n\t1. Chiep chiep 呫呫 thi tham.
呱=oa [gu1|gua1|gua3]\n\t1. Oa oa 呱呱 oe oe, tieng tre con khoc.
味=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Mui, chua, dang, ngot, cay, man la nam mui ("ngu vi 五味). \n\t2. Nem, xem vat ay la mui gi goi la vi. Cai gi co hung thu goi la huu vi 有味.
呴=ha [gou4]\n\t1. Mang. Nhu ha xich 呵斥 mang duoi. \n\t2. Ha ha 呵呵 tieng cuoi ha ha. \n\t3. Ha hoi. Ha hoi cho nong goi la ha.
呶=nao [nao2]\n\t1. Ram ri.
呷=hap [xia1]\n\t1. Hit vao. Hut ma uong vao goi la hap.
呸=phi [pei1]\n\t1. Tieng cai nhau.
呻=than [shen1]\n\t1. Ren ri.
呼=ho, ha [hu1]\n\t1. Tho ra. \n\t2. Goi. \n\t3. Keu to, goi to. \n\t4. Mot am la ha. Thet mang.
命=menh [ming4]\n\t1. Sai khien. \n\t2. Truyen menh. Truyen bao su lon goi la menh 命, truyen bao su nho goi la lenh 令. Loi cua chuc Tong-thong tuyen cao cho quoc dan biet goi la menh lenh 命令. \n\t3. Nhoi vua ban thuong tuoc loc gi goi la cao menh 告命. \n\t4. Menh troi. Pham nhung su cung, thong, duoc, hong, hinh nhu co cai gi chu truong, suc nguoi khong sao lam duoc, goi la menh. \n\t5. Mang, duoc chet lanh goi la khao chung menh 考終命, khong duoc chet lanh goi la tu u phi menh 死於非命. \n\t6. Ten, ke bo xu so minh tron di xu khac goi la vong menh 亡命 (mat ten trong so dinh). \n\t7. Tu menh (loi van hoa). \n\t8. Dao. Nhu duy thien chi menh 維天之命 bui chung dao troi.
咀=tro [ju3|zui3]\n\t1. tro tuoc 咀嚼 nham nuot.
咂=tap [za1]\n\t1. Tra vao mom.
咄=dot, doat [duo1]\n\t1. Dot dot 咄咄 oi chao ! tieng kinh so. \n\t2. Mot am la doat. Tieng quat thao.
咆=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Bao hao 咆哮 gam het, gam ghe, tieng giong thu du tuc ma het len, ke pham phu gao het cung goi la bao hao.
咈=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Trai y, y khong ung the, goi la hu phat 吁咈.
咋=trach, tra [za3|zha1|zha4]\n\t1. Tieng to. \n\t2. Mot am la tra. Tam.
和=hoa, hoa [he2|he4|hu2|huo2|huo4]\n\t1. Hoa, cung an nhip voi nhau. \n\t2. Vua phai, khong thai qua khong bat cap goi la hoa. Mua gio phai thi goi la thien hoa 天和. \n\t3. Khong trai voi ai goi la hoa. Nhu hoa khi 和氣. \n\t4. Thuan hoa. Nhu hoa than 和親, hoa hieu 和好, v.v. Dang tranh gianh ma xu cho yen vui goi la hoa. Nhu hai nuoc danh nhau, muon thoi thi phai ban voi nhau uoc voi nhau thoi khong danh nhau nua goi la hoa nghi 和議, hoa uoc 和約, kien nhau lai gian hoa voi nhau goi la hoa giai 和解, hoa tuc 和息, v.v. \n\t5. Vui, nhan dan ai nay deu yen vui lam an thoa thuan goi la hoa. Nhu chanh thong nhan hoa 政通人和 chanh tri thong dat nhan dan vui hoa. \n\t6. Bang, deu. Lam cho gia do deu nhau goi la hoa gia 和價. \n\t7. Pha deu. Nhu hoa canh 和羹 hoa canh, hoa duoc 和藥 hoa thuoc, v.v. \n\t8. Cai chuong xe, cung co khi goi la loan 鸞, cho nen cung co khi goi chuong xe la hoa loan 和鸞. \n\t9. Tam van dau ao quan, doi xua goi la tien hoa 前和, bay gio goi la hoa dau 和頭. \n\t10. Nuoc Nhat-ban goi la hoa quoc 和國, nen chu Nhat-ban goi la hoa van 和文. \n\t11. Hoa hieu 和較 danh tu ve mon so hoc. So nay so voi so kia thi so tang len goi la so hoa, so sut di goi la so hieu. \n\t12. Hoa-nam 和南 dich am tieng Pham nghia la chap tay lam le, la gioc long kinh le. \n\t13. Hoa thuong 和尚 dich am tieng Pham, nghia la chinh ong thay day minh tu hoc. \n\t14. Cung. Nhu nga hoa ne 我和你 ta cung may. \n\t15. Mot am la hoa. Hoa lai, ke xuong len truoc la xuong 唱, ke ung theo lai la hoa 和. Nhu ta noi xuong hoa 唱和, phu hoa 附和, v.v.
咎=cuu, cao [jiu4]\n\t1. Xau, huu cuu 休咎 tot xau. \n\t2. Loi. Nhu cuu vo kha tu 咎無可辭 loi khong kha tu. \n\t3. Mot am la cao, cung nhu chu cao 皐.
咏=vinh [yong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu vinh 詠.
咐=phu, pho [fu4]\n\t1. Ha hoi. \n\t2. Mot am la pho. Phan pho 吩咐 dan bao ke duoi.
咕=co [gu1]\n\t1. Co nong 咕噥 noi dai (lai nhai).
咖=gia [ga1|ka1]\n\t1. Gia phe 咖啡 cay ca phe.
咤=tra [zha4]\n\t1. Quat thet. \n\t2. Noi lung bung (vua an vua noi).
咥=hy, diet [xi4]\n\t1. Cuoi am. \n\t2. Mot am la diet. Can.
咦=di [yi2]\n\t1. Gao. Tuc dung lam nhoi noi kinh quai. Nhu ta noi. Chao oi chao ! v.v.
咨=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Tu ta 咨嗟 than tho. \n\t2. Muu ban. \n\t3. Tu di, tu len. Van thu cua cac quan di lai goi la tu van 咨文.
咪=me, mi [mi1]\n\t1. Me dot 咪突 dich am chu metre cua Phap, mot thu thuoc do cua nuoc Phap. \n\t2. Mot am la mi. Tieng de keu.
咫=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Thuoc, nha Chu dinh tam tac la mot chi.
咬=giao [yao3]\n\t1. Can vao xuong. Nguyen la chu giao 齩.
咯=lac, khach [ge1|ka3|lo5]\n\t1. Cai le. \n\t2. Mot am la khach. Khac ra mau goi la khach huyet 咯血. Ta quen doc la khac huyet.
咱=cha [za2|zan2|zan5]\n\t1. Tuc tu xung minh la cha. Cung doc la gia.
咲=tieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tieu 笑.
咳=khai [hai1|ke2]\n\t1. Ho (ho khong co dom). Cung nhu chu khai 欬.
咷=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Tieng gao khoc.
咸=ham [xian2]\n\t1. Khap ca. \n\t2. Deu, het thay. \n\t3. Mot am la giam, cung nghia voi chu giam 減.
咻=huu, hu [xiu1]\n\t1. Noi ram ram. \n\t2. Mot am la hu. U hu 噢咻 yen ui mot cach thiet tha sot xa.
咽=yet, yen, e [yan1|yan4|ye4]\n\t1. Co hong. \n\t2. Mot am la yen. Nuot xuong. \n\t3. Lai mot am la e nghen ngao. Nhu nganh e 梗咽 nghen co khong noi ra duoc.
咿=y [yi1]\n\t1. Y ngo 咿唔 tieng ngam nga.
哀=ai [ai1]\n\t1. Thuong. \n\t2. Khong co me goi la ai. Ke de tang me ma con cha goi la ai tu 哀子.
品=pham [pin3]\n\t1. Nhieu thu. Vat co nhieu thu nen goi la vat pham hay pham vat 品物. Mot cai cung goi la pham. \n\t2. Pham ham. Ngay xua dat ra chin pham chinh tong, tu nhat pham chi cuu pham, de phan biet pham tuoc cao thap. \n\t3. Pham gia. Nhu nhan pham 人品 pham gia nguoi. \n\t4. Can luong. Nhu pham de 品題, pham binh 品評 nghia la can luong dung roi moi de moi noi.
哂=san [shen3]\n\t1. Mim cuoi.
哄=hong [hong1|hong3|hong4]\n\t1. Hong phien 哄騙 danh lua, toi ru re. \n\t2. Tieng am am.
哆=si, da [duo1]\n\t1. Ha mieng. Cung doc la da, trong than chu thuong dung.
哇=oa [wa1|wa5]\n\t1. Tho ra.
哈=cap [ha1|ha3|ha4]\n\t1. Uong nuoc. \n\t2. Ca ngap mieng. \n\t3. Cap cap 哈哈 tieng cuoi hang hac, khanh khach.
哉=tai [zai1]\n\t1. Tieng tro ngu, nghia la vay thay !. \n\t2. Moi, am lich cu den ngay mong ba goi la tai sinh minh 哉生明 nghia la ngay mat trang moi sang.
响=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huong 響.
員=vien, van [yuan2|yun2|yun4]\n\t1. So quan. Nhu thiet quan nhuoc can vien 設官若干員 dat ngan nay vien quan. \n\t2. Buc vien 幅員 coi dat rong hep. Tuc quen viet la 貟. \n\t3. Mot am la van, cung nghia nhu chu van 云.
员=vien, van [yuan2|yun2|yun4]\n\t1. So quan. Nhu thiet quan nhuoc can vien 設官若干員 dat ngan nay vien quan. \n\t2. Buc vien 幅員 coi dat rong hep. Tuc quen viet la 貟. \n\t3. Mot am la van, cung nghia nhu chu van 云.
哥=ca [ge1]\n\t1. Anh, em goi anh la ca.
哦=nga [e2|o2|o4]\n\t1. Ngam nga.
哨=tieu, tieu, sao [shao4]\n\t1. Meo mieng. Cung doc la tieu. \n\t2. Mot am la sao. Sao tu 哨子 cai coi. \n\t3. Sao, phep binh nha Thanh mot tram ten linh goi la mot sao. Doi quan di tuan phong goi la tuan sao 巡哨 hay phong sao 放哨.
哩=ly [li1|li3|li5]\n\t1. Tieng dem cuoi cau noi, nha Nguyen hay dung. \n\t2. Dam nuoc Anh (mile). Moi dam Anh la 5029 thuoc, mot tac Tau.
哭=khoc (10 n) [ku1]\n\t1. Khoc to.
哮=hao [xiao4]\n\t1. Gam het, tieng thu du phat khung keu gao. \n\t2. Hao suyen 哮喘 benh hen.

唁=nghien [yan4]\n\t1. Hoi tham. Hoi tham nguoi song goi la nghien.
唄=bai [bai4|bei5]\n\t1. Tieng Pham, nghia la chuc tung. Ben Tay-vuc co cay Bai-da, nha Phat dung la no viet kinh goi la bai diep 唄葉, cung goi la bai-da-la. \n\t2. Canh, tang do doc canh tan tung cac cau ke goi la bai tan 唄讚.
呗=bai [bai4|bei5]\n\t1. Tieng Pham, nghia la chuc tung. Ben Tay-vuc co cay Bai-da, nha Phat dung la no viet kinh goi la bai diep 唄葉, cung goi la bai-da-la. \n\t2. Canh, tang do doc canh tan tung cac cau ke goi la bai tan 唄讚.
唆=toa [suo1]\n\t1. Xuyt lam, xui lam. Nhu toa tung 唆訟 xui kien.
唇=than [chun2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu than 脣.
唈=ap [yi4]\n\t1. O-ap 嗚唈 ngan hoi (tho hon hen).
唉=ai [ai1|ai4]\n\t1. Loi than tho ve su dang ghet. Nhu ta noi chao oi !.
唏=hi, hy [xi1]\n\t1. Sut sit, thuong ma khong khoc goi la hi. \n\t2. Mot am la hy, cung nghia nhu chu 欷.
唐=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Noi khoac, noi khong co dau moi gi goi la hoang duong 荒唐, khong cham nghe nghiep chinh dinh cung goi la hoang duong. \n\t2. Ho Duong 唐. Vua Nghieu 堯 ho la Dao Duong 陶唐氏 (2308 truoc Tay lich). Ly   Uyen 李淵 lay nuoc cua nha Tuy 隋 cung goi la nha Duong (618-907). \n\t3. Nuoc Duong 唐. \n\t4. Nuoc Tau, doi nha Duong 唐 dem binh danh chan cac noi, nen nguoi nuoc ngoai moi goi nuoc Tau la nuoc Duong, nguoi Tau cung van tu xung la nguoi Duong.
唕=tao [zao4]\n\t1. La tao 羅唕 duc lac ram ri.
唘=khai [qi3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khai 啟.

售=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Ban di, ban ra.

唾=thoa [tuo4]\n\t1. Nho, nho nuoc dai di goi la thoa. \n\t2. Chan ghet. Nhu thoa khi 唾棄, thoa ma 唾罵 mang nhiec, v.v.
啁=chu [zhao1|zhou1]\n\t1. Chu chiet 啁哳 tieng chim keu (riu rit).
啄=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Mo, chim an goi la trac.
商=thuong [shang1]\n\t1. Dan do. Nhu thuong luong 商量, thuong chuoc 商酌 nghia la ban bac, dan do voi nhau. \n\t2. Buon. Nhu thuong nhan 商人 nguoi buon, thuong gia 商家 nha buon, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng thuong, mot trong nam thu tieng. Tieng thuong thuoc ve mua thu, nen gio thu goi la thuong tap 商飈. \n\t4. Sao thuong, tuc la sao hom. \n\t5. Nha Thuong, vua Thang thay nha Ha len lam vua goi la nha Thuong (1700 truoc CN). \n\t6. Khac, dong ho ngay xua cho mat troi lan ba thuong la buoi toi, thuong tuc la khac vay.
問=van [wen4]\n\t1. Hoi, cai gi khong biet di hoi nguoi khac goi la van. \n\t2. Tra hoi, tra hoi ke co toi tuc goi la van. \n\t3. Hoi tham. Nhu van nhan u tha bang 問人於他邦 tham tang nguoi o nuoc khac. \n\t4. Lam qua. \n\t5. Tin tuc. Nhu am van 音問 tin tuc. \n\t6. Le an hoi goi la le van danh 問名. \n\t7. Menh lenh. \n\t8. Nghe, cung nghia nhu chu van 聞.
问=van [wen4]\n\t1. Hoi, cai gi khong biet di hoi nguoi khac goi la van. \n\t2. Tra hoi, tra hoi ke co toi tuc goi la van. \n\t3. Hoi tham. 啓=khai [qi3]\n\t1. Mo. Nhu khai mon 啟門 mo cua to y minh ra, cung goi la khai. \n\t2. Khai xu 啟處 yen nghi. \n\t3. Bay giai. Nhu khai su 啟事 bay giai cong viec. To boi cung goi la thu khai 書啟.

喬=kieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu kieu moc 喬木 cay cao. Kinh thi noi. xuat tu u coc, thien vu kieu moc 出自幽谷遷于喬木 tu hang toi ra, thien len cay cao, y noi chim no con biet chon cho cao, huong chi nguoi, nay dung hai chu kieu thien 喬遷de to y len chon cao thuong sang lang, la noi theo cai y nay vay. \n\t2. Gia. Nhu kieu trang 喬妝 an mac gia lot. \n\t3. Cai moc tren cai dao. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu kieu 驕.

單=dan, thien, thien [chan2|dan1|shan4]\n\t1. Don, doi lai voi chu phuc 複 (kep), mot cai goi la dan. \n\t2. Co don. 噦=uyet, hoi [hui4|yue3]\n\t1. Oe, co vat non ra ma khong co tieng goi la tho 吐, co tieng ma khong co vat gi ra goi la uyet 噦, co vat non ra va co tieng goi la au 嘔. \n\t2. Mot am la hoi, tieng chuong ngua loong coong.

囝=kien, cuong, te, nga, nien [jian3|nan1]\n\t1. Nguoi Man goi con la kien, co noi doc la cuong, la te, la nga, la nien, deu nghia la con ca.
回=hoi, hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Ve, di roi tro lai goi la hoi. \n\t2. Cong queo. \n\t3. Hoi, mot thien tieu thuyet goi la mot hoi. \n\t4. Dao Hoi, mot ton giao cua Muc-han Mac Duc nguoi A-lap-ba dung len, den doi Tong, Nguyen cac nuoc Hoi-hoi moi theo va truyen vao nuoc Tau, goi la Hoi giao. \n\t5. Giong Hoi, dan o Tan-cuong nuoc Tau theo dao Hoi nhieu, nen goi la giong Hoi. \n\t6. Hoi hoi 回回 ten mot nuoc ngay xua, sau bi nha Nguyen lay mat. \n\t7. Doai lai. \n\t8. Chiu khuat. \n\t9. Hoi huong 回向 chu trong kinh Phat, nghia la dem cong duc cua minh ma huong   ve noi khac, dai khai co the chia lam ba thu. (1) Dem cong duc cua muc A da   tu ma hoi huong cho muc B. Nhu lam cac viec tu thien, ma muon lay cong duc ay   de cau lay cai phuc duoc vang sinh sang nuoc Cuc-lac, (2) Lay cong duc cua   minh tu ma hoi huong cho nguoi. Nhu tu minh niem Phat le bai, ma quy cong duc   cho nguoi chet khien cho nguoi chet duoc sieu sinh, (3) Dem muon phuc muon   thien cua Phat ma hoi huong cho chung sinh nho cong duc ay deu duoc vang sinh   noi Tinh-do. 10. Mot am la hoi. So lanh.
囟=tin [xin4]\n\t1. Cai thop cho dinh dau, luc be so vao thay no may dong.
因=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Nhung, van the. \n\t2. Nuong tua. \n\t3. Nguyen nhan. \n\t4. Tinh nhan, tinh gap len goi la tinh nhan. \n\t5. Cho duyen theo do ma phat ra. Nhu nhan qua 因果. Nha Phat cho phan da lam ra la nhan, phan phai chiu lay la qua, lam ac phai toi, lam thien duoc phuc, the la nhan qua.

圍=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Vay quanh. Nhu vi thanh 圍城 vay thanh. \n\t2. Vay bat, chang luoi bat cac giong thu goi la da vi 打圍. \n\t3. Thuoc tron, dung de do cac do tron goi la vi. Hoac cho 5 tac la mot vi hoac cho mot chet la mot vi.
围=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Vay quanh. Nhu vi thanh 圍城 vay thanh. \n\t2. Vay bat, chang luoi bat cac giong thu goi la da vi 打圍. \n\t3. Thuoc tron, dung de do cac do tron goi la vi. Hoac cho 5 tac la mot vi hoac cho mot chet la mot vi.
