園=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Vuon, cho dat de trong hoa qua, rau dua. \n\t2. Cho de choi rieng. \n\t3. Lang tam cac vua doi xua va mo ma cac phi tan cung deu goi la vien ca.
园=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Vuon, cho dat de trong hoa qua, rau dua. \n\t2. Cho de choi rieng. \n\t3. Lang tam cac vua doi xua va mo ma cac phi tan cung deu goi la vien ca.
圓=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Chi ve hinh-the. Tu giua ruot do ra den ngoai vanh cho nao cung deu nhau thi cho giua ay goi la vien tam 圓心 ruot tron, cho vanh ngoai goi la vien chu 圓周 vong tron. \n\t2. Tron, pham cai gi khong lo canh goc ra deu goi la vien. Nhu vien thong 圓通, vien hoat 圓活, v.v. \n\t3. Day du. Nhu vien man 圓滿, vien tuc 圓足, v.v. \n\t4. Dong bac. \n\t5. Tu benh vuc cai thuyet cua minh. \n\t6. Khong tro ngai, ton Thien-thai chia Phat-giao lam 4 buc, buc Vien-giao la buc cao nhat, vi chung den buc ay thi cong-hanh vien-man, tu-tai vien-dung, khong co gi tro ngai nua.
圆=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Chi ve hinh-the. Tu giua ruot do ra den ngoai vanh cho nao cung deu nhau thi cho giua ay goi la vien tam 圓心 ruot tron, cho vanh ngoai goi la vien chu 圓周 vong tron. \n\t2. Tron, pham cai gi khong lo canh goc ra deu goi la vien. Nhu vien thong 圓通, vien hoat 圓活, v.v. \n\t3. Day du. Nhu vien man 圓滿, vien tuc 圓足, v.v. \n\t4. Dong bac. \n\t5. Tu benh vuc cai thuyet cua minh. \n\t6. Khong tro ngai, ton Thien-thai chia Phat-giao lam 4 buc, buc Vien-giao la buc cao nhat, vi chung den buc ay thi cong-hanh vien-man, tu-tai vien-dung, khong co gi tro ngai nua.
圖=do [tu2]\n\t1. Cai tranh ve. Nhu do hoa 圖畫 tranh ve, dia do 地圖 tranh ve hinh dat. \n\t2. Toan muu. Nhu hi do 希圖 toan mong, do muu 圖謀 toan muu, v.v.
图=do [tu2]\n\t1. Cai tranh ve. Nhu do hoa 圖畫 tranh ve, dia do 地圖 tranh ve hinh dat. \n\t2. Toan muu. Nhu hi do 希圖 toan mong, do muu 圖謀 toan muu, v.v.
團=doan [tuan2]\n\t1. Hinh tron. Nhu doan doan 團團 tron tran, doan loan 團圝 sum vay, v.v. \n\t2. Pham nhieu nguoi hop lai ma lam nen cai gi cung goi la doan. Nhu doan the 團體, doan luyen 團練, v.v. Vat gi dot lai lam mot cung goi la nhat doan 一團 mot nam.
团=doan [tuan2]\n\t1. Hinh tron. Nhu doan doan 團團 tron tran, doan loan 團圝 sum vay, v.v. \n\t2. Pham nhieu nguoi hop lai ma lam nen cai gi cung goi la doan. Nhu doan the 團體, doan luyen 團練, v.v. Vat gi dot lai lam mot cung goi la nhat doan 一團 mot nam.
圜=vien, hoan [huan2|yuan2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu vien 圓. Chu vien 圓 dung ve loai chu hinh dong, chu vien 圜 dung de noi ve loai chu danh vat. \n\t2. Mot am la hoan, cung nghia voi chu hoan 環.
圝=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Doan loan 團圝 tron.
土=tho, do, do [tu3]\n\t1. Dat. Nhu niem tho 黏土 dat tho, sa tho 沙土dat cat, v.v. \n\t2. Dat o. Nhu huu nhan thu huu tho 有人此有土 co nguoi ay co dat. \n\t3. Vat gi chi o dat ay moi co goi la tho. Nhu tho san 土產, tho nghi 土儀, v.v. Nguoi sinh truong o dat nao thi goi nguoi xu ay la tho truoc 土著. \n\t4. Giong tho, nguoi tho. Dung nguoi tho lam quan cai tri tho goi la tho ty 土司. \n\t5. Khong hop voi su ua thich cua doi cung goi la tho, cung nhu ta che nguoi khong hop thoi-trang la giong muong, nguoi muong vay. \n\t6. Tieng tho, mot thu tieng trong bat am. \n\t7. Sao tho. \n\t8. Mot am la do. Nhu Tinh-do 淨土. Theo trong kinh Phat thi coi Tinh-do la mot the gioi rat sach se sung suong o Tay-phuong. Vi the ton phai tu cau duoc vang sinh ve ben ay goi la ton Tinh-do. \n\t9. Lai mot am nua la do. Vo re cay dau.
在=tai [zai4]\n\t1. O. Nhu tai ha vi nhi bat uu 在下位而不憂 o ngoi duoi ma chang lo. \n\t2. Con. Nhu phu mau tai bat vien du 父母在不遠遊 cha me con song khong choi xa. \n\t3. Nhoi tro ngu, chi vao cho nao goi la tai. Nhu tai chi u chi thien 在止於至善 o han vao noi chi-thien. 
圩=vu [wei2|xu1]\n\t1. Bo dap. Cho nuoc song cao hon mat ruong, phai dap bo de ngan nuoc goi la vu.
圬=o [wu1]\n\t1. O nhan 圬人 tho trat nha (tho ne).
圭=khue [gui1]\n\t1. Ngoc khue. \n\t2. Cai khue, mot thu do de dong ngay xua, dung duoc 64 hat thoc goi la mot khue, cung la mot thu can, can nang duoc muoi hat thoc goi la mot khue.
圮=bi [pi3]\n\t1. Do nat.
圯=di [yi2]\n\t1. Cau di.
地=dia [de5|di4]\n\t1. Dat, dung chua muon vat coi doi goi la dia. \n\t2. Dia vi, cai ngoi cua minh duoc toi, trong phep Phat chia ra muoi ngoi bo-tat goi la thap-dia 十地 de dinh ro cho tu hon kem nhau. \n\t3. Chat, nen, pham ve cai gi cung phai lam nen roi moi boi cac mui duoc, the la dia. \n\t4. Khu dat. \n\t5. Cho nao y chi minh toi duoc goi la dia. Nhu tam dia 心地, kien dia 見地, v.v. \n\t6. Nhung. Nhu nghia chu dan 但. \n\t7. Dung lam tieng giup loi. Nhu hot dia 忽地, dac dia 特地, cung nhu ta noi chot vay, dac cach the, v.v.
圻=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Coi dat vuong nghin dam goi la ky.
圾=ngap, sac [ji1]\n\t1. Nguy. \n\t2. Lap ngap 垃圾 bui bam chong chat, cung goi la chu sac.
址=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Cai nen.
坂=phan [ban3]\n\t1. Suon nui.
均=quan, van [jun1]\n\t1. Deu, khong ai hon kem goi la quan. \n\t2. Cung. Nhu loi ich quan chiem 利益均霑 ich loi cung huong. \n\t3. Khuon dong gach ngoi. \n\t4. Mot do dong ngay xua, 2500 thach la mot quan. \n\t5. Mot do am nhac ngay xua. \n\t6. Mot am la van. Cung nhu chu van 韻. 
坊=phuong [fang1|fang2]\n\t1. Phuong, ten goi cac ap cac lang. \n\t2. Trong thanh chia ra tung khu de cai tri cho de cung goi la phuong. \n\t3. Mot vat gi xay dap de tieu-bieu cac nguoi hien o cac lang mac cung goi la phuong. Nhu trung hieu phuong 忠孝坊, tiet nghia phuong 節義坊, v.v. \n\t4. Trang so. Nhu tac phuong 作坊 so che tao cac do. \n\t5. Cai de, cung nghia nhu chu phong 防.
坌=bon [ben4]\n\t1. Hop, deu. Nhu bon tap 坌集 cung hop. \n\t2. Bui.
坍=than [tan1]\n\t1. Dat lo.
坎=kham [kan3]\n\t1. Que kham. Mot que trong bat quai 八卦, nghia la hom vao, la hiem hoc, nen cho nao hom sau xuong deu goi la kham. \n\t2. Cai chen nho. \n\t3. Thung thung.
坏=phoi, bui [huai4|pi1]\n\t1. Ngoi moc. \n\t2. Mot am la bui. Lay dat lap lo hang lai. \n\t3. Tuong vach.
坐=toa [zuo4]\n\t1. Ngoi. \n\t2. Buoc toi. Toi xu dung luat khong thay doi duoc goi la toa. Nhu phan toa 反坐 buoc toi lai, ke vu cao nguoi vao toi gi, xet ra la oan lai bat ke vu cao phai chiu toi ay. \n\t3. Nhan vi. \n\t4. Co giu. \n\t5. Duoc tu nhien, khong nhoc nhan gi ma duoc. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu toa 座.
坟=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phan 墳.
坡=pha [po1]\n\t1. Suon nui. Cho hinh dat cao thap nghieng lech ma van lien vao nhau.
坤=khon [kun1]\n\t1. Que khon, vi nhu dat, la mot que trong bat quai. \n\t2. Thuan noi ve duc hanh ben dan ba. Nhu khon trach 坤宅 nha gai.
坦=than [tan3]\n\t1. Phang phan. Trong long khong vuong vit gi goi la than nhien 坦然.
坩=kham [gan1]\n\t1. Do bang dat. Nhu noi, chum, vo, lo, v.v.
坪=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cho dat bang phang. \n\t2. Phep do nuoc Nhat-ban cho 36 thuoc vuong be mat la mot binh.
坫=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Cai buc, cai be. \n\t2. Goc nha. \n\t3. Cho dap bang dat de chua do an o trong nha.
坯=boi [pi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu boi 坏
坰=quynh [jiong1]\n\t1. Ngoai dong, ngoai rung.
坳=ao [ao4]\n\t1. Cho dat trung xuong (ho).
坵=khau [qiu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khau 丘.
坷=kha [ke1|ke3]\n\t1. Kham kha 坎坷 gap ghenh, noi bong la su lam khong duoc troi chay. Ta quen doc la kham kha.
坺=bat [ba2]\n\t1. Dao dat. \n\t2. Mao bat 茅坺 me co.
坻=tri, de [chi2|di3]\n\t1. Cai dong dat cao o trong nuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la de. suon nui (thung lung)
坼=sach [che4]\n\t1. Nut ra.
坿=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu phu 附.
垂=thuy [chui2]\n\t1. Ru xuong. \n\t2. Cung nhu chu thuy. Bien thuy 邊垂 ngoai ven nuoc. \n\t3. Sap. Nhu su tai thuy thanh 事在垂成 viec o sap nen. \n\t4. Nhoi nguoi tren doi voi ke duoi. Nhu thuy niem 垂念 ru long nghi toi.
垃=lap [la1]\n\t1. Xem chu ngap 圾 o tren.
型=hinh [xing2]\n\t1. Cai khuon. Cai khuon bang dat de duc cac do goi la hinh. \n\t2. Noi bong nghia la lam khuon phep.
垓=cai, giai [gai1]\n\t1. Cai, van van goi la cai. \n\t2. Cho dat bo hoang xa ngoai chin chau goi la cuu cai 九垓 bat duyen 貟埏 vi the nen cho dat rong ma xa goi la cai duyen 垓埏. \n\t3. Mot am la giai. Bac.
垛=doa [duo3|duo4]\n\t1. U dat, u dat de tap ban goi la xa doa 射垛. \n\t2. Chong chat. \n\t3. Cai go, cai dong. \n\t4. Do vat gi co cho loi ra cung goi la doa.
垠=ngan [yin2]\n\t1. Bo. \n\t2. Ngan. Nhu ki dai vo ngan 其大無垠 thua to khong ngan.
垢=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Cau ban. \n\t2. Nho nhuoc.
垣=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Tuong thap. \n\t2. Thanh tat co tuong, nen goi noi tinh thanh la tinh vien 省垣. \n\t3. So quan. \n\t4. Trong khu vuc cua ngoi sao.
垤=diet [die2]\n\t1. Dong kien dun. \n\t2. Dong dat nho.
垻=ba [ba4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ba 壩.
埂=canh [geng3]\n\t1. Cai ho nho. \n\t2. Dien canh 田埂 thua ruong.
埃=ai [ai1]\n\t1. Bui, gio thoi cat bay goi la ai.
埄=bong, dang, canh [peng2]\n\t1. Bui mu. Tuc doc la chu canh. Nhu son than dang canh 山 灘蕩埄 ven nui dat hoang (cho ruong thue nhe hon).
埋=mai [mai2|man2]\n\t1. Chon, dam ma chon khong hop le goi la mai. \n\t2. Vui xuong dat. \n\t3. Che lap.
城=thanh [cheng2]\n\t1. Cai thanh, o trong goi la thanh 城 o ngoai goi la quach 郭. \n\t2. Dap thanh.
埏=duyen [shan1]\n\t1. Cho dat bo hoang xa ngoai chin chau goi la cuu cai 九垓, bat duyen 貟埏 vi the nen cho dat rong ma xa goi la cai duyen 垓埏. \n\t3. Mot am la giai. Bac.
埒=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Cai tuong xay quanh kho. \n\t2. Ngang hang. Nhu tuong liet 相埒 bang dang (ngang hang). \n\t3. Bo coi. \n\t4. Mach suoi, dau ngon suoi.\n\t1. Ten dat.
埕=trinh [cheng2]\n\t1. Cai hu.
埜=da [ye3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu da 野.
埝=niem [nian4]\n\t1. Vu niem 圩埝 dap dat de ngan nuoc.
域=vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Bo coi. \n\t2. Nuoc. Nhu Tay-vuc 西域 nuoc phia Tay. \n\t3. Trong khu vuc mo ma.
埠=phu [bu4]\n\t1. Ben do. Cho thuyen buon do xep cac hang hoa.
埤=bi [pi2|pi4]\n\t1. Phu them, tang them, ap them, thuong dung nhu chu ti 裨. \n\t2. Cai tuong thap.
埧=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Bo de.
埭=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Dap dat, lay dat dap ngan nuoc lai, hai ben bo chon truc quay, co thuyen nao qua lai thi buoc day vao duoi thuyen ma quay, hoac dung suc trau suc nguoi quay truc cho thuyen di.
埴=thuc [zhi2]\n\t1. Dat dinh, dat tho. \n\t2. Doan thuc 摶埴 tho gom.
埶=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Von la chu nghe 藝. Cung muon lam chu the 勢.
執=chap [zhi2]\n\t1. Cam. \n\t2. Giu. \n\t3. Cau chap 拘執 khong biet bien thong cu tu cho minh la phai. \n\t4. Bat. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. Ban dong chi goi la chap huu 執友 vi the nen goi bo anh em ban la phu chap 父執. 
执=chap [zhi2]\n\t1. Cam. \n\t2. Giu. \n\t3. Cau chap 拘執 khong biet bien thong cu tu cho minh la phai. \n\t4. Bat. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. Ban dong chi goi la chap huu 執友 vi the nen goi bo anh em ban la phu chap 父執. 
埸=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Bo ruong. Bo coi nuoc ngoai cung goi la cuong dich 疆埸. Bo coi khu lon goi la cuong, bo coi khu nho goi la dich.
培=boi, bau [pei2]\n\t1. Vun bon. \n\t2. Tai boi 栽培 vun trong. Noi bong la duong duc nhan tai. \n\t3. Mot am la bau. Bau lu 培塿 dong dat nho.
基=co [ji1]\n\t1. Nen nha. Nhu can co 根基, co chi 基址 o duoi cho vat gi dung vung duoc deu goi la co. \n\t2. Coi goc. \n\t3. Truoc. \n\t4. Muu. \n\t5. Gay dung. \n\t6. Do lam ruong. Nhu cac thu cay bua.
埽=tao [sao4]\n\t1. Von la chu tao 掃.
堂=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Gian nha chinh giua, cai nha de lam le. \n\t2. Ruc ro. Nhu duong duong 堂堂, duong hoang 堂皇, v.v. \n\t3. Minh goi me nguoi cung goi la duong. Nhu ton duong 尊堂, lenh duong 令堂, v.v. \n\t4. Anh em cung mot to goi la dong duong huynh de 同堂兄弟 goi tat la duong huynh de 堂兄弟 anh em cung mot cu goi la tung duong 從堂, cung mot ki goi la tai tung duong 再從堂, v.v. \n\t5. Cung dien. Nhu mieu duong 廟堂, trieu duong 朝堂, v.v. \n\t6. Cho nui bang phang cung goi la duong.
堃=khon [kun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khon 坤.
堅=kien [jian1]\n\t1. Ben chat. \n\t2. Day chac. \n\t3. Co suc. \n\t4. Than mat. \n\t5. Cac loai thuoc ve ao day mu tru. \n\t6. Cho binh giac cung manh. \n\t7. Co suc yen dinh. \n\t8. Khong lo so.
坚=kien [jian1]\n\t1. Ben chat. \n\t2. Day chac. \n\t3. Co suc. \n\t4. Than mat. \n\t5. Cac loai thuoc ve ao day mu tru. \n\t6. Cho binh giac cung manh. \n\t7. Co suc yen dinh. \n\t8. Khong lo so.
堆=doi [dui1]\n\t1. Dap. \n\t2. Dong.
堊=ac [e4]\n\t1. Dat mui, dat tho trang. \n\t2. Trat bun.

堍=mien [tu4]\n\t1. Ve cau.
堙=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Lap. \n\t2. Nui dat.
堝=qua [guo1]\n\t1. Kham qua 坩堝 do gom, cai noi de nau vang bac.
埚=qua [guo1]\n\t1. Kham qua 坩堝 do gom, cai noi de nau vang bac.
堞=diep [die2]\n\t1. Cai tuong ngan tren thanh.
堠=hau [hou4]\n\t1. Cai u. Cho linh dong don dap mot cai u bang dat de dom xem giac o dau goi la hau. Ta goi la cai sang, hinh nhu cai lo-cot.
堡=bao [bao3|bu3|pu4]\n\t1. Bao chuong 堡障 cai thanh nho, bo luy trong lang dap de phong giac cuop.
堤=de [di1]\n\t1. Cai de. \n\t2. Do gom duoi dit bang phang goi la de.
堤=chi [di1]\n\t1. Von la chu de 邸. Tuc muon lam chu de 隄.
堦=giai [jie1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu giai 階.
堪=kham [kan1]\n\t1. Chiu duoc. Nhu bat kham 不堪 chang chiu duoc. Co khi dung nhu chu kha 可. Nhu kham di cao uy 堪以告慰 kha lay noi cho yen ui duoc. \n\t2. Kham nhan 堪忍 dich nghia chu Pham la Sa-ba, tuc la coi doi ta o day, la coi chiu nhin duoc moi su kho.
堯=nghieu [yao2]\n\t1. Vua Nghieu, mot vi vua rat thanh hien doi xua. \n\t2. Cao.
尧=nghieu [yao2]\n\t1. Vua Nghieu, mot vi vua rat thanh hien doi xua. \n\t2. Cao.
堰=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Dap dat. Xem chu dai 埭 o tren.
報=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Bao tra, thu dap lai. \n\t2. Qua bao. \n\t3. Bao ro, vi the nen to nhat-trinh goi la bao chi 報紙, tin day thep goi la dien bao 電報, v.v. \n\t4. Ke duoi dam voi nguoi tren. \n\t5. Voi va.
报=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Bao tra, thu dap lai. \n\t2. Qua bao. \n\t3. Bao ro, vi the nen to nhat-trinh goi la bao chi 報紙, tin day thep goi la dien bao 電報, v.v. \n\t4. Ke duoi dam voi nguoi tren. \n\t5. Voi va.
場=trang, truong [chang2|chang3]\n\t1. San, sua cho dat khong cho phang phan goi la trang. \n\t2. Pham nhan viec gi ma tu hop nhieu nguoi deu goi la trang. Nhu hoi trang 會場 cho hop, hi trang 戲場 cho lam tro, v.v. \n\t3. Tuc goi moi mot lan la mot trang, nen su gi moi mo dau goi la khai trang 開場, ket qua goi la thu trang 收場.
场=trang, truong [chang2|chang3]\n\t1. San, sua cho dat khong cho phang phan goi la trang. \n\t2. Pham nhan viec gi ma tu hop nhieu nguoi deu goi la trang. Nhu hoi trang 會場 cho hop, hi trang 戲場 cho lam tro, v.v. \n\t3. Tuc goi moi mot lan la mot trang, nen su gi moi mo dau goi la khai trang 開場, ket qua goi la thu trang 收場.
堵=do [du3]\n\t1. Cai tuong ngan, tuong mot truong goi la ban, nam ban goi la do. \n\t2. Yen do 安堵 yen vung. \n\t3. Phong do 防堵 ngan ngua.
塊=khoi [kuai4]\n\t1. Hon, pham vat gi tich dan lai thanh tung hon goi la khoi. 2 Khoi nhien 塊然 lu vay. Dung tro troi mot minh khong cau chi goi la khoi nhien.
块=khoi [kuai4]\n\t1. Hon, pham vat gi tich dan lai thanh tung hon goi la khoi. 2 Khoi nhien 塊然 lu vay. Dung tro troi mot minh khong cau chi goi la khoi nhien.
塋=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Mo ma, cho dat chon nguoi chet.
茔=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Mo ma, cho dat chon nguoi chet.
塌=thap [ta1]\n\t1. Dat trung. \n\t2. Xa ra.
塍=thang [cheng2]\n\t1. Thua ruong cay lua.
塏=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Dat cao rao. Nha o cao rao goi la sang khai 爽塏.
垲=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Dat cao rao. Nha o cao rao goi la sang khai 爽塏.
塑=to [su4]\n\t1. Dap tuong.
塒=thi [shi2]\n\t1. O ga. Duc tuong cho ga dau goi la thi.
埘=thi [shi2]\n\t1. O ga. Duc tuong cho ga dau goi la thi.
塔=thap [ta3]\n\t1. Cai thap. Nguyen tieng Pham la thap ba hay tuy de ba.
塗=do, tra [tu2]\n\t1. Bun bun, dai nguoi tan ac goi la do than 塗炭 lam than. \n\t2. Duong, cung nhu chu do 途. \n\t3. Lap, xoa di. \n\t4. Mot am la tra. Boi, ma. Lay pham mui boi len tren mat do cho dep goi la tra. Tuc viet la tra 搽.
塘=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Cai de. \n\t2. Cai ao vuong.
塚=trung [zhong3]\n\t1. Cai ma cao.
冢=trung [zhong3]\n\t1. Cai ma cao.
塞=tac, tai [sai1|sai4|se4]\n\t1. Lap kin. \n\t2. Day day. \n\t3. Dat hiem yeu. \n\t4. Be tac, van bi tac. \n\t5. Mot am la tai. Cho canh phong o noi ngoai ven nuoc goi la tai. Ben Tau tu ngoai trang thanh tro ra goi la tai thuong 塞上.
塟=tang [sang4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tang 喪.
塡=dien, tran, dien, tran [tian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 填 . 
填=dien, tran, dien, tran [tian2]\n\t1. Lap, lap cho day ho goi la dien. \n\t2. Pham to boi gi in mau san chua cho de bien ten ho, v.v. vao goi la dien. \n\t3. Do dac gi da cham tro hoa lai them cac mui goi la dien. \n\t4. Am am, tieng danh trong. \n\t5. Mot am la tran. Lau. \n\t6. Lai mot am la dien. Het, om. \n\t7. Lai mot am nua la tran, cung nghia voi chu tran 鎭.
塲=trang [chang3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trang 場.
塵=tran [chen2]\n\t1. Bui, cho xe ngua dong duc goi la tran hieu 塵囂. \n\t2. Dau vet. Nhu vong tran vat cap 望塵勿及 men trong cai dau vet cua nguoi ma khong the kip. \n\t3. Tran. Phat cho sac, tieng, huong, vi, xuc (cham biet) va phap la sau tran, nghia la bao nhieu thu ham muon bay ba deu vi sau mon do ma khoi len lam loan chan tinh. \n\t4. Tran tuc. \n\t5. Nho ban. \n\t6. Lau, co y nghia nhu chu tran 陳. \n\t7. Sach dao Lao cho mot doi la nhat tran 一塵.
尘=tran [chen2]\n\t1. Bui, cho xe ngua dong duc goi la tran hieu 塵囂. \n\t2. Dau vet. Nhu vong tran vat cap 望塵勿及 men trong cai dau vet cua nguoi ma khong the kip. \n\t3. Tran. Phat cho sac, tieng, huong, vi, xuc (cham biet) va phap la sau tran, nghia la bao nhieu thu ham muon bay ba deu vi sau mon do ma khoi len lam loan chan tinh. \n\t4. Tran tuc. \n\t5. Nho ban. \n\t6. Lau, co y nghia nhu chu tran 陳. \n\t7. Sach dao Lao cho mot doi la nhat tran 一塵.
塹=tiem [qian4]\n\t1. Cai hao. Dao hao chung quanh thanh cho kin goi la tiem.
堑=tiem [qian4]\n\t1. Cai hao. Dao hao chung quanh thanh cho kin goi la tiem.
塼=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu chuyen 甎.
塾=thuc [shu2]\n\t1. Cai chai nha. Gian nha hai ben cua cai goi la thuc. La cho de cho con em vao hoc, cho nen goi cho chai hoc la gia thuc 家塾. Doi sau nhan the moi goi trang hoc tu la tu thuc 私塾, ma goi thay hoc la thuc su 塾師 vay.
塿=lu [lou3]\n\t1. Boi lu 培塿 cai dong nho.
墀=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Tren mat them cac vua doi xua dung son lang mat them goi la dan tri 丹墀, lay ngoc da xay goi la ngoc tri 玉墀. 
墁=man [man4]\n\t1. Quet voi.
境=canh [jing4]\n\t1. Coi. \n\t2. Canh ngo. Nhu canh thuan, canh nghich, v.v. \n\t3. Canh tri. Nhu thang canh 勝境, giai canh 佳境, v.v.
墅=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Ruong, nha, ngoai cho nha o lai lam rieng mot cho de nghi ngoi goi la biet thu 別墅.
墉=dong [yong1]\n\t1. Cai thanh nho. Dap dat lam tuong vach cung goi la dong, cho tuong phia bac trong nha cung goi la dong.
墊=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Thap xuong. \n\t2. Chet duoi. \n\t3. Dem, pham ke dem cho cao cho day len goi la diem. \n\t4. Cai dem. \n\t5. Khoan tien thay nguoi tam giao di goi la diem khoan 墊欵.
垫=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Thap xuong. \n\t2. Chet duoi. \n\t3. Dem, pham ke dem cho cao cho day len goi la diem. \n\t4. Cai dem. \n\t5. Khoan tien thay nguoi tam giao di goi la diem khoan 墊欵.
墍=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Ngua len ma trat. \n\t2. Lay. \n\t3. Nghi.
墐=can [jin3]\n\t1. Boi, trat.
墓=mo [mu4]\n\t1. Cai ma.
増=tang [zeng1]\n\t1. Them.
墜=truy [zhui4]\n\t1. Roi, rung.
坠=truy [zhui4]\n\t1. Roi, rung.
墟=khu [xu1]\n\t1. Cai go lon, cung co khi goi nam ma khu mo 墟墓. \n\t2. Thanh cu. Truoc co vat gi da xay dap ma nay pha phang di goi la khu. \n\t3. Cho buon ban sam uat.
墠=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Quet don dat de te le.
墡=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Dat tho trang dung de trat cua cung nhu mat-tit.
墦=phien [fan2]\n\t1. Cai ma.
墨=mac [mo4]\n\t1. Sac den. \n\t2. Muc. \n\t3. Hinh mac. Mot thu hinh phap doi xua thich chu vao mat roi boi muc vao. \n\t4. Tham mac, quan lai tham tien lam sai phep goi la mac lai 墨吏. \n\t5. Dao Mac, doi Chien-quoc co ong Mac Dich 墨翟 lay su yeu het moi nguoi nhu minh lam ton chi, cho nen goi la Dao Mac. \n\t6. Nuoc Mac, goi tat nuoc Mac-tay-kha 墨西哥 (Mexico) o chau My. \n\t7. Mot thu do ngay xua, nam thuoc la mot mac.
墩=don [dun1]\n\t1. Cai u dat.
墮=doa, huy [duo4]\n\t1. Roi xuong, do, nguoi moi ngay mot hu hong goi la doa lac 墮落. \n\t2. Muoi, cung nghia voi chu noa 惰. \n\t3. Mot am la huy. Do nat.
堕=doa, huy [duo4]\n\t1. Roi xuong, do, nguoi moi ngay mot hu hong goi la doa lac 墮落. \n\t2. Muoi, cung nghia voi chu noa 惰. \n\t3. Mot am la huy. Do nat.
墳=phan, phan, bon [fen2]\n\t1. Cai ma cao. \n\t2. Bo ben. \n\t3. To lon. Sach cua vua Phuc Hy 伏羲, vua Than Nong 神農, vua Hoang De 黃帝 goi la tam phan 三墳. Vi the nen goi sach vo co la phan dien 墳典. \n\t4. Mot am la phan. Dat tot. \n\t5. Lai mot am la bon. Dat rom len.
坟=phan, phan, bon [fen2]\n\t1. Cai ma cao. \n\t2. Bo ben. \n\t3. To lon. Sach cua vua Phuc Hy 伏羲, vua Than Nong 神農, vua Hoang De 黃帝 goi la tam phan 三墳. Vi the nen goi sach vo co la phan dien 墳典. \n\t4. Mot am la phan. Dat tot. \n\t5. Lai mot am la bon. Dat rom len.
墻=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuong 牆.
墼=kich [ji1]\n\t1. Tho kich 土墼 ngoi moc.
墾=khan [ken3]\n\t1. Khai khan, dung suc vo cac ruong hoang ra ma cay cay goi la khan.
垦=khan [ken3]\n\t1. Khai khan, dung suc vo cac ruong hoang ra ma cay cay goi la khan.
壁=bich [bi4]\n\t1. Buc vach. \n\t2. Suon nui doc. \n\t3. Sao bich. \n\t4. Luy dap trong trai quan.
壅=ung, ung [yong1]\n\t1. Lap, nhan co gi ma lam cho tren duoi khong ro nhau goi la ung te 壅蔽. \n\t2. Dap, vun them dat cho cay goi la boi ung 培壅. \n\t3. Ung tre, cung doc la chu ung.
壇=dan [tan2]\n\t1. Cai dan. Chon cho dat bang phang dap dat de cung te goi la dan.
坛=dan [tan2]\n\t1. Cai dan. Chon cho dat bang phang dap dat de cung te goi la dan.
壈=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Kham lam 坎壈 uc uat, bat dac chi.
壎=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Cai huan, mot thu am nhac nan bang dat nung do, duoi phang tren nhon, tren chom mot lo, dang truoc hai lo, dang sau ba lo, thoi vao thi keu, vi the anh em hoa thuan goi la huan tri 壎箎.
壑=hac [he4]\n\t1. Hang hoc, cho rung nui hiem hoc goi la hac. Nhu lam hac 林壑 xo rung, nham hac 巖壑 hom nui, v.v. Cho chua nuoc cung goi la hac. Nhu song be goi la dai hac 大壑. \n\t2. Cai ngoi, cai ao.
壓=ap [ya1]\n\t1. De ep. \n\t2. De nen. \n\t3. Buc bach den ben.
压=ap [ya1]\n\t1. De ep. \n\t2. De nen. \n\t3. Buc bach den ben.
壔=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Cai thanh nho. \n\t2. Phep hoc tinh ve phan cot tron cat ra goi la vien dao 圓壔, phat cot nhieu canh goi la giac dao 角壔.
壕=hao [hao2]\n\t1. Cai hao.
壖=nhuyen [ruan2]\n\t1. Dat ven be.
壘=luy, luat [lei3]\n\t1. Bo luy, tuc la tuong chan trong dinh quan. \n\t2. Mot am la luat. Uat Luat 鬱壘 ten mot vi than co. Doi thuong co co hai anh em la Than Do 神荼, Uat Luat 鬱壘 kiem soat loai qui lam can, bat cho ho thit, vi the doi cho la vi than tru su khong lanh, bay gio hay tho lam than coi cua, mon than 門神.
垒=luy, luat [lei3]\n\t1. Bo luy, tuc la tuong chan trong dinh quan. \n\t2. Mot am la luat. Uat Luat 鬱壘 ten mot vi than co. Doi thuong co co hai anh em la Than Do 神荼, Uat Luat 鬱壘 kiem soat loai qui lam can, bat cho ho thit, vi the doi cho la vi than tru su khong lanh, bay gio hay tho lam than coi cua, mon than 門神.
壙=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Cai huyet, dao huyet chon nguoi chet goi la khai khoang 開壙. \n\t2. Dong ang.
圹=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Cai huyet, dao huyet chon nguoi chet goi la khai khoang 開壙. \n\t2. Dong ang.
壚=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Dat tho den. \n\t2. Duong lu 當壚 nguoi ban ruou. Dap dat de cai vo cho vung goi la lu.
垆=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Dat tho den. \n\t2. Duong lu 當壚 nguoi ban ruou. Dap dat de cai vo cho vung goi la lu.
壜=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Cai vo ruou.
壞=hoai [huai4|pi1]\n\t1. Huy nat. \n\t2. Thua. \n\t3. Pha hoai.
坏=hoai [huai4|pi1]\n\t1. Huy nat. \n\t2. Thua. \n\t3. Pha hoai.
壟=lung [long3]\n\t1. Cai ma. \n\t2. Cai go. \n\t3. Lung doan 壟斷 ke tai muu loi. Choan noi tien loi cua nguoi ma long het loi vao minh.
垄=lung [long3]\n\t1. Cai ma. \n\t2. Cai go. \n\t3. Lung doan 壟斷 ke tai muu loi. Choan noi tien loi cua nguoi ma long het loi vao minh.
壤=nhuong [rang3]\n\t1. Dat mem. \n\t2. Qua dat. Nhu thien nhuong 天壤 troi dat. \n\t3. Giau co day du, cung nghia nhu chu nhuong 穰. \n\t4. Bi hai.
壩=ba [ba4]\n\t1. Mang nuoc, chan ngang song cho nuoc chay thang bang thong tha de hai ben bo song huong lay cai loi tuoi rot khong bi dai han khong bi ngap lut goi la ba.
坝=ba [ba4]\n\t1. Mang nuoc, chan ngang song cho nuoc chay thang bang thong tha de hai ben bo song huong lay cai loi tuoi rot khong bi dai han khong bi ngap lut goi la ba.
士=si [shi4]\n\t1. Hoc tro, nhung nguoi nghien cuu hoc van deu goi la si. \n\t2. Quan si, chuc quan doi xua, co thuong si 上士, trung si 中士, ha si 下士. \n\t3. Quan coi nguc goi la si su 士師 tuc quan Tu phap bay gio. \n\t4. Binh si. Nhu giap si 甲士 quan mac ao giap, chien si 戰士 linh danh tran, v.v. \n\t5. Con gai co tu cach nhu hoc tro goi la nu si 女士. \n\t6. Co nghia nhu chu su 事.
壬=nham [ren2]\n\t1. Can nham, can thu chin trong muoi can. \n\t2. Thiem nham 僉壬 ke tieu nhan. \n\t3. To lon. \n\t4. Gian ninh. \n\t5. Chiu, cung nghia voi chu nham 任. \n\t6. Co mang, cung nghia voi chu nham 妊.
壯=trang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Manh me. Nguoi den ba muoi tuoi goi la trang, nghia la dang luc tinh luc dang manh me vay. Pham cai gi be trong day du ma be ngoai co ve lon lao deu goi la trang. Nhu hung trang 雄壯, bi trang 悲壯, hoanh trang 宏壯, v.v. \n\t2. Nhanh chong. \n\t3. Moi, thay thuoc dung moi ngai dot chua benh, moi lan dot goi la mot trang.
壮=trang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Manh me. Nguoi den ba muoi tuoi goi la trang, nghia la dang luc tinh luc dang manh me vay. Pham cai gi be trong day du ma be ngoai co ve lon lao deu goi la trang. Nhu hung trang 雄壯, bi trang 悲壯, hoanh trang 宏壯, v.v. \n\t2. Nhanh chong. \n\t3. Moi, thay thuoc dung moi ngai dot chua benh, moi lan dot goi la mot trang.
声=thanh [sheng1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thanh 聲.
壳=xac [ke2|qiao4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu xac 殼.
壹=nhat [yi1]\n\t1. Chuyen nhat. \n\t2. Mot, cung mot nghia nhu chu nhat 一, trong van tu phai dung chu 壹 de cho khoi chua gian duoc. \n\t3. Hop. Nhu thong nhat 統壹 hop ca lam mot. \n\t4. Be tac.
壺=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Cai ho, cung nhu cai nam. \n\t2. Mot thu qua an. Nhu qua bau.
壶=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Cai ho, cung nhu cai nam. \n\t2. Mot thu qua an. Nhu qua bau.
壻=te [xu4]\n\t1. Chang re. Vo goi chong cung dung chu te. Nhu phu te 夫壻 thay no.
壼=khon [kun3]\n\t1. Loi di o trong cung, doi sau quen dung nhu chu khon 閫. Cho nen nguoi con gai nao co le phep dang lam khuon phep cho doi goi la khon pham 壼範.
壽=tho [shou4]\n\t1. Lau dai. Co tuoi goi la tho. Tram tuoi la thuong tho 上壽. Tam muoi goi la trung tho 中壽. \n\t2. Ngay sinh nhat cung goi la tho. \n\t3. Chuc, doi xua dem vang lua tang cho nguoi ton kinh hay lay ruou ma chuoc cung goi la tho.
寿=tho [shou4]\n\t1. Lau dai. Co tuoi goi la tho. Tram tuoi la thuong tho 上壽. Tam muoi goi la trung tho 中壽. \n\t2. Ngay sinh nhat cung goi la tho. \n\t3. Chuc, doi xua dem vang lua tang cho nguoi ton kinh hay lay ruou ma chuoc cung goi la tho.
夀=tho [shou4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tho 壽.
夂=tri [zhi3]\n\t1. Bo tri. Theo sau ma den. Ngay xua dung nhu chu chung 終. Chu nay 夂 viet khong co net lo ra phia tren goc ben trai, khac voi chu tuy 夊 co net lo ra phia tren goc ben trai.
处=xu, xu [chu3|chu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 處.
夊=tuy [sui1]\n\t1. Dang di cham chap.
夏=ha, gia, gia [xia4]\n\t1. Mua he, lich tay dinh tu 6 thang 5 den 8 thang 8 la mua he, lich ta dinh   thang 4, 5, 6 la mua he. \n\t2. Mot am la gia. Giua nuoc goi la gia. Nhu Hoa gia 華夏 y noi nuoc Tau la nuoc van minh o giua, ngoai ra la man moi. \n\t3. To lon. Nhu gia oc 夏屋 nha to. \n\t4. Nha Gia, vua Vo chiu ngoi vua cua vua Thuan truyen cho goi la nha Gia   (2000-1500 truoc T.L.) \n\t5. Nuoc Gia, vua phong vua Vo ra nuoc Gia, nay thuoc tinh Ha Nam. Dau hoi nha Tong, Trieu Nguyen Hao 趙元昊 tu lap lam vua goi la nha Tay gia 西夏. \n\t6. Lai mot am la gia. Gia so 夏楚 mot thu hinh trong trang hoc doi xua, de danh nhung ke khong giu khuon phep. ta quen doc la chu ha ca. 
夔=quy [kui2]\n\t1. Ngay xua bao la mot giong quai o go da. Nhu con rong co mot chan goi la con quy. Cac do chuong dinh bay gio khac con ay goi la quy van 夔紋. \n\t2. Ong Quy, mot vi quan nhac rat hien doi vua Thuan. \n\t3. Quy quy 夔夔 kinh can so hai.
夕=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Buoi toi. \n\t2. Dem. \n\t3. Tiep kien ban dem. \n\t4. Veo.
外=ngoai [wai4]\n\t1. Ngoai, pham cai gi o be ngoai deu goi la ngoai, khong phai o trong pham minh cung goi la ngoai. Nhu ngoai mao 外貌 mat ngoai, ngoai vu 外侮 ke ngoai khinh nhon, v.v. Ve ben ho me cung goi la ngoai. \n\t2. Vo goi chong cung la ngoai tu 外子, vi con trai lam viec o ngoai, con gai o trong nen goi la ngoai. \n\t3. Con so khong coi than thua goi la kien ngoai 見外. \n\t4. Dong vai dan ong (trong tuong Tau).
夙=tuc [su4]\n\t1. Som. \n\t2. Ngay xua. \n\t3. Cu. \n\t4. Kinh can.
多=da [duo1]\n\t1. Nhieu. \n\t2. Khen tot. Nhu da ky huu le 多其有禮 nguoi co le lam. \n\t3. Hon.
夜=da [ye4]\n\t1. Ban dem. \n\t2. Di dem.
够=cu, hu [gou4]\n\t1. Nhieu, day du. Ta quen doc la chu hu.
夢=mong, mong [meng4]\n\t1. Chiem bao, nam me. \n\t2. Mot am la mong. Mong mong 夢夢 lo mo, nghia la khong biet dich xac gi cu lo mo nhu nguoi nam me. Tuc viet la 夣.
梦=mong, mong [meng4]\n\t1. Chiem bao, nam me. \n\t2. Mot am la mong. Mong mong 夢夢 lo mo, nghia la khong biet dich xac gi cu lo mo nhu nguoi nam me. Tuc viet la 夣.
夤=di, dan [yin2]\n\t1. Tien len. Nhan dut lot ma duoc chuc no chuc kia goi la di duyen 夤緣. \n\t2. Xa. \n\t3. Cho that lung. Cung doc la chu dan.
夥=khoa [huo3]\n\t1. Nhieu. \n\t2. Tuc goi nhung nguoi cung giup viec kiem an voi minh la khoa ke 夥計.
大=dai, thai [da4|dai4]\n\t1. Lon. \n\t2. Tieng noi gop. Nhu dai pham 大凡 het thay, dai khai 大概, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng noi ton trong nguoi. Nhu khen su truoc tac cua nguoi la dai tac 大作 nghia la van chuong sach vo lam ra to tat rong lon lam. Cac bac tren nhu cha, anh, quan truong cung goi la dai nhan 大人. Anh lon nhat goi la dai 大. \n\t4. Cho la to. \n\t5. Hon. \n\t6. Mot am la thai. Nhu thai hoa 大和, thai cuc 大極, thai lao 大牢, v.v. deu cung am nghia nhu chu thai 太.
天=thien [tian1]\n\t1. Bau troi. \n\t2. Cai gi ket qua tu nhien, suc nguoi khong the lam duoc goi la thien. Nhu thien nhien 天然, thien sinh 天生, v.v. \n\t3. Nha ton giao goi cho cac than linh o la thien. Nhu thien quoc 天國, thien duong 天當, v.v. \n\t4. Ngay. Nhu kim thien 今天 hom nay, minh thien 明天 ngay mai. \n\t5. Thi tiet troi. Nhu nhiet thien 熱天 troi nong, lanh thien 冷天 troi lanh. \n\t6. Pham cai gi khong the thieu duoc cung goi la thien. Nhu thuc vi dan thien 食為民天 an la thu can cua dan. \n\t7. Dan ba goi chong la thien, cung goi la so thien 所天. \n\t8. Ong troi, co nhieu nha tu xua cho troi la ngoi chua te ca muon vat, giang hoa ban phuc deu quyen o troi ca. Nha Phat thi cho troi cung la mot loai co cong tu thien nhieu hon, duoc sinh vao coi doi sung suong hon nguoi ma thoi. \n\t9. Hinh phat khac chu cham vao tran goi la thien.
太=thai [tai4]\n\t1. To lam, co khi viet chu 大, co khi viet chu 泰. \n\t2. Tieng goi nguoi ton truong hon nguoi ton truong. Nhu thai lao ba 太老伯 hang ton truong hon bac. Goi nguoi ton truong cua ke sang cung goi la thai. Nhu lao thai gia 老太爺 cu co ong, thai phu nhan 太夫人 cu co ba, v.v. \n\t3. Ngay xua phong vo cac bay toi to la thai quan 太君, nay goi vo cac quan la thai thai 太太 cung do nghia ay.
夫=phu, phu [fu1|fu2]\n\t1. Dan ong. Con trai da nen nguoi khon lon goi la truong phu 丈夫. Ke di lam cong cung goi la phu. \n\t2. Chong. \n\t3. Mot am la phu. Nhoi mo dau, co y chuyen chi vao cai gi. Nhu phu dat da gia 夫達也者 oi dat vay ay. \n\t4. Loi noi doan roi than. Nhu the gia nhu tu phu 逝者如斯夫 di ay nhu the kia u ?
夬=quai [guai4]\n\t1. Que quai, nghia la quyet han.
夭=yeu, yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Yeu yeu 夭夭 net mat vui ve on ton. \n\t2. Ron ron, nhan sac mau mo dang yeu. \n\t3. Tai va. \n\t4. Mot am la yeu. Chet non.
央=uong [yang1]\n\t1. O giua. \n\t2. Nua. Nhu da vi uong 夜未央 dem chua qua nua dem. \n\t3. Cau canh. Nhu uong nhan tac bao 央人作保 cau canh nguoi lam bau chu. \n\t4. Uong uong 央央 ro ro.
失=that [shi1]\n\t1. Mat. \n\t2. Loi. \n\t3. Bo qua. \n\t4. Co khi dung nhu chu dat 佚.
夲=bon [ben3]\n\t1. Von la chu thao, nghia la tien thu. Tuc muon dung lam chu bon.
夷=di [yi2]\n\t1. Ro moi. \n\t2. Cong bang. Nhu di khao ki hanh 夷考其行 lay long cong bang ma xet su hanh vi cua nguoi. \n\t3. Bi thuong. \n\t4. Giet het, xua ai co toi nang thi giet ca chin ho goi la di. \n\t5. Dep long. \n\t6. Ngang, bang. \n\t7. Bay bien. \n\t8. Thuong, cung nghia voi chu di 彝.
夸=khoa, khoa [kua1]\n\t1. Noi vien vong. \n\t2. Mot am la khoa. Tu khoe minh. \n\t2. Tot dep.
夹=giap [ga1|jia1|jia2]\n\t1. Kem cap. Giu ca hai ben goi la giap. Ao lot hai lan goi la giap y 夹衣 ao kep. \n\t2. Gan. \n\t3. Cai dip, cai cap de gap do. \n\t4. Cai cap dung sach. \n\t5. Ben do thuyen.
夾=giap [ga1|jia1|jia2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giap 夹
夹=giap [ga1|jia1|jia2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giap 夹
奄=yem, yem [yan3]\n\t1. Bao la. Bao la co het cac cai goi la yem huu 奄有. \n\t2. Chot, voi. \n\t3. Yem nhan 奄人 quan hoan. \n\t4. Mot am la yem. Lau, cung nhu chu yem 淹.
奇=ki, co [ji1|qi2]\n\t1. La. Vat hiem co ma kho kiem goi la ki. Khien cho nguoi khong luong duoc cung goi la ki. \n\t2. Mot am la co. So le. Nhu mot, ba, nam, bay, chin la so le. \n\t3. Thoi van trac tro goi la so co 數奇. \n\t4. So thua. Nhu nhat bach huu co 一百有奇 mot tram co le.
奈=nai [nai4]\n\t1. Nai ha 奈何 nai sao.
奉=phung, bong [feng4]\n\t1. Vang, kinh vang menh y cua nguoi tren goi la phung. \n\t2. Dang, dem vat gi dang bieu nguoi tren goi la phung. \n\t3. Hau ha cung phung. Ton sung. \n\t4. Mot am la bong. Doi xua dung nhu chu bong 俸.
奎=khue [kui2]\n\t1. Sao khue, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. Nha thien van ngay xua cho sao khue chu ve su van hoa, cho nen noi ve van van hay dung chu khue. 
奏=tau [zou4]\n\t1. Tau, ke duoi trinh bay voi nguoi tren goi la tau. \n\t2. Cu am nhac len cung goi la tau. \n\t3. Su gi tien hanh duoc cung goi la tau. Nhu tau hieu 奏效 dung co hieu, tau dao 奏刀 van dung con dao. \n\t4. Chay. \n\t5. Cung nhu chu tau 腠. \n\t6. Cung dung nhu chu tau 輳.
奐=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Ban hoan 伴奐 ung dung tu dac. \n\t2. Ruc ro, ta cai dang van ve ruc ro. \n\t3. Thinh.
奂=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Ban hoan 伴奐 ung dung tu dac. \n\t2. Ruc ro, ta cai dang van ve ruc ro. \n\t3. Thinh.
契=khe, tiet, khiet, khat [qi4]\n\t1. Uoc, lam van tu de tin goi la khe. \n\t2. Hop, mot cai giay viet lam hai manh, xe doi ra, moi nguoi giu mot manh goi la khe, tuc nhu giay hop dong bay gio. \n\t3. Y chi hop nhau goi la tuong khe 相契. \n\t4. Do dot mai rua de boi. \n\t5. Mot am la tiet. Ong Tiet la bay toi vua Thuan va la to nha Thuong. \n\t6. Lai mot am la khiet. Khiet khoat 契闊 nhoc nhan. Ban be xa cach nhau cung goi la khiet khoat. \n\t7. Lai mot am nua la khat. Khat dan 契丹 ten mot nuoc nho ngay xua, thuoc tinh Truc-le bay gio. sau doi la nuoc Lieu.
奔=bon [ben1|ben4]\n\t1. Chay voi. \n\t2. Lam viec ham ho so thua nguoi goi la bon xu 奔趨. \n\t3. Danh tran thua chay goi la bon. \n\t4. Cuoi xin khong du le goi la bon.
奕=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Dich dich 奕奕 to lon (lu lu) cung co nghia la lo. Tinh than dich dich 精神奕奕 tinh than sang lang. \n\t2. Dich diep 奕葉 noi doi. \n\t3. Tuc dung nhu chu dich 弈.
套=sao [tao4]\n\t1. Pham vat gi chap chung deu goi la sao. Mot bo quan ao goi la nhat sao 一套. Chen nho de lot vao trong chen to duoc goi la sao boi 套杯. \n\t2. Cai bao o ngoai do goi la sao. Nhu but sao 筆套 thap but. \n\t3. Bi nguoi ta lung lac goi la lac sao 落套 gian di moc mac khong bi xo day voi doi goi la thoat sao 脫套 nghia la thoat khoi cai vong tran tuc. \n\t4. Pham bat chuoc luom lay van tu nguoi khac hay noi duoi nguoi ta deu goi la sao. Nhu sao ngu 套語 cau noi da thanh loi. \n\t5. Cho dat cong cung goi la sao. Nhu ha sao 河套 khuc song cong. 
奘=trang [zang4|zhuang3]\n\t1. To lon. \n\t2. Ten nguoi, doi Duong co ngai Huyen-trang phap su.
奚=he [xi1]\n\t1. Dua o. \n\t2. Loi ngo hoi, nghia la sao the ? Nhu tu he bat vi chinh 子奚不為政 nguoi sao chang lam chinh.
奠=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Dinh yen. \n\t2. Tien cung. \n\t3. Dat de.
奡=ngao [ao4]\n\t1. Khoe, cung, cung cap. Ngao nguoc.
奢=xa [she1]\n\t1. Xa xi. \n\t2. Qua doi. Nhu xa vong 奢望 mong moi thai qua. \n\t3. Nhieu.
奥=ao, uc [ao4]\n\t1. Than ao, doi xua tho than o goc tay nam nha goi la than ao. \n\t2. Sau xa, pham su gi tinh than sau xa kho hieu deu goi la ao. Nhu ao chi 奥旨, ao nghia 奥義 deu nghia la y nghia uyen ao vay. \n\t2. Nuoc Ao, nuoc Ao-dia-loi o chau Au. \n\t3. Mot am la uc, cung nhu chu 燠.
奩=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu liem 匳.
奁=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu liem 匳.
奪=doat [duo2]\n\t1. Cuop lay, lay hiep cua nguoi ta goi la doat. Nhu sang doat 搶奪 giat cuop, kiep doat 劫奪 cuop boc, v.v. Pham lay suc ma lay duoc hon nguoi cung goi la doat. \n\t2. Quyet dinh. Nhu tai doat 裁奪, dinh doat 定奪 deu la nghia quyet dinh nen chang ca. \n\t3. Van tu co cho rach mat cung goi la doat. Duong hep.
夺=doat [duo2]\n\t1. Cuop lay, lay hiep cua nguoi ta goi la doat. Nhu sang doat 搶奪 giat cuop, kiep doat 劫奪 cuop boc, v.v. Pham lay suc ma lay duoc hon nguoi cung goi la doat. \n\t2. Quyet dinh. Nhu tai doat 裁奪, dinh doat 定奪 deu la nghia quyet dinh nen chang ca. \n\t3. Van tu co cho rach mat cung goi la doat. Duong hep.
奭=thich [shi4]\n\t1. Do khe. \n\t2. Ten nguoi.
奮=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Chim dang canh bay. Chim to sap bay, tat dang canh quay quanh may cai roi moi bay len goi la phan, nguoi ta gang suc len cung goi la phan. Nhu phan phat 奮發 nhuc day, phan dung 奮勇 hang hai, v.v. \n\t2. Rung dong.
奋=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Chim dang canh bay. Chim to sap bay, tat dang canh quay quanh may cai roi moi bay len goi la phan, nguoi ta gang suc len cung goi la phan. Nhu phan phat 奮發 nhuc day, phan dung 奮勇 hang hai, v.v. \n\t2. Rung dong.
女=nu, nu, nhu [nu:3]\n\t1. Con gai. \n\t2. Sao nu. \n\t3. Mot am la nu. Ga con gai cho nguoi. \n\t4. Lai mot am la nhu. May, cung nhu chu nhu 汝.
奴=no [nu2]\n\t1. Dua o. Luat ngay xua nguoi nao co toi thi bat con gai nguoi ay vao hau ha nha quan goi la no ty 奴婢, ve sau ke nao ngheo kho ban minh cho nguoi, ma nuong theo ve ho nguoi ta cung goi la no. \n\t2. Tieng noi nhun minh cua con gai.
奶=nai [nai3]\n\t1. Tieng goi chung cua dan ba. \n\t2. Tuc goi sua la nai.
奸=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Gian doi, nay thong dung nhu chu gian 姦. \n\t2. Mot am la can. Can pham. \n\t3. Cau.
好=hao, hieu [hao3|hao4]\n\t1. Tot, hay. \n\t2. Cung than. Ban be choi than voi nhau goi la tuong hao 相好. \n\t3. Xong. Tuc cho lam xong mot viec la hao. \n\t4. Mot am la hieu, nghia la yeu thich.
奼=xa [cha4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu xa 姹. 
妁=chuoc [shuo4]\n\t1. Lam moi, nghia la cham chuoc, hai ho xung nhau moi lam moi.
如=nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Bang, cung. Dung de so sanh. Nhu ai nhan nhu ki 愛人如己 yeu nguoi nhu yeu minh. \n\t2. Dung de hinh dung. Nhu tuan tuan nhu da 恂恂如也 lu lu nhu the vay. \n\t3. Loi noi vi thu. Nhu nhu huu dung nga gia 如有用我也 bang co dung ta. \n\t4. Nai sao. Nhu Khuong nhan ki nhu du ha 匡人其如予何 nguoi nuoc Khuong ho lam gi ta duoc u ! \n\t5. Di. Nhu nhu Te 如薺 di sang nuoc Te. \n\t6. Nguyen nhu the, trong kinh Phat cho rang van con nguyen chan tinh khong nhiem tran ai la nhu.
妃=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Sanh doi, cung nhu chu phoi 配. Nhu hau phi 后妃 vo ca cua vua. \n\t2. Kem buc hau la phi, vo le cua vua goi la phi tan 妃嬪. \n\t3. Vo ca thai tu va cac vua cung goi la phi.
妄=vong [wang4]\n\t1. Sang, can. Nhu vong ngu 妄語 noi sang, trai lai voi chu chan 真.
妊=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Chua (co mang, co thai). Dan ba chua goi la nham phu 妊婦.
妍=nghien [yan2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghien 姸.
妒=do [du4]\n\t1. Ghen, dan ba ghen goi la do, minh khong bang nguoi sinh long ghen ghet cung goi la do.
妓=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Con nu phuong cheo, con di nha tho.
妖=yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Dep (mi mieu). Ta cai sac con gai lam cho nguoi ta say me. Nhu yeu nhieu 妖嬈, yeu da 妖冶 deu ta cai dang con gai dep long lay ca. \n\t2. Quai la. Nhu yeu quai 妖怪 loai yeu quai.
妗=cam [jin4]\n\t1. Mo, vo anh me.
妙=dieu [miao4]\n\t1. Kheo, hay, than dieu lam. Tinh than kheo leo mau nhiem khong the nghi nghi duoc goi la dieu. Tuoi tre goi la dieu nien 妙年.
妝=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Trang suc, dung cac thu phan sap vang ngoc ma chai chuot cho dep them goi la trang.
妆=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Trang suc, dung cac thu phan sap vang ngoc ma chai chuot cho dep them goi la trang.
妞=nuu [niu1]\n\t1. O chau Man goi con nguoi la nuu nuu, ve phuong bac goi con be sinh la nuu nuu.
妣=ti [bi3]\n\t1. Me da chet.
妤=du [yu2]\n\t1. Tiep du 婕妤 mot chuc quan dan ba.
妥=thoa [tuo3]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu thoa thiep 妥帖, thoa dang 妥當, v.v.
妨=phuong, phuong [fang2]\n\t1. Hai, ngai, co khi doc la phuong.
妬=do [du4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu do 妒.
妮=ny [ni1]\n\t1. Con doi.
妯=truc, truu [zhou2]\n\t1. Truc ly 妯娌 chi em dau. \n\t2. Mot am la truu. Tam dong (chot da).
妲=dat [da2]\n\t1. Dat ki 妲己 vo vua Tru nha An.
妺=muoi [mei4]\n\t1. Em gai.
妻=the, the [qi1|qi4]\n\t1. Vo ca. \n\t2. Mot am la the. Ga chong cho con gai.
妾=thiep [qie4]\n\t1. Nang hau, vo le. \n\t2. Tieng con gai tu xung nhun minh. Nhu thiep ban nho gia nu 妾本儒家女 thiep toi von la con gai nha hoc tro.
姆=mo [mu3]\n\t1. Thay day con gai. \n\t2. Dan ba goi chi dau minh la mo.
姊=ti [zi3]\n\t1. Chi gai.
始=thuy, thi [shi3]\n\t1. Moi, truoc. \n\t2. Mot am la thi. Tieng tro ngu. Nhu vi thi 未始 chua tung.
姍=san, tien [shan1]\n\t1. San tieu 姍笑 che cuoi. \n\t2. Mot am la tien. Tien tien 姍姍 dang con gai di tha thuot.
姗=san, tien [shan1]\n\t1. San tieu 姍笑 che cuoi. \n\t2. Mot am la tien. Tien tien 姍姍 dang con gai di tha thuot.
姐=ta, thu [jie3]\n\t1. Tuc goi chi gai la ta. \n\t2. Tieng thong dung de goi ve con gai nhu tieu ta 小姐, dai ta 大姐 co a. Ta quen goi la thu.
姑=co [gu1]\n\t1. Me chong. \n\t2. Chi dau goi em gai chong la tieu co 小姑. \n\t3. Chi em voi bo cung goi la co. \n\t4. Me vo cung goi la ngoai co 外姑. \n\t5. Tieng goi chung cua dan ba con gai. Tuc goi con gai chua chong la co. \n\t6. Tieng giup loi, nghia la hang, hay. Nhu co xa nhu so hoc nhi tong nga 姑舍汝所學而從我 hay bo cai may hoc ma theo ta. \n\t7. Co tuc 姑息 num nau, yeu khong phai dao goi la co tuc.
姒=tu, ti [si4]\n\t1. Chi em dau goi nhau la tu. Vo anh goi la tu phu 姒婦, vo em goi la de phu 第婦. Cung doc la chu ti.
姓=tinh [xing4]\n\t1. Ho. Con chau goi la tu tinh 子姓, thu dan goi la bach tinh 百姓.
委=uy, uy [wei1|wei3]\n\t1. Uy thac, giao pho cho viec gi goi la uy. \n\t2. Chong chat, van thu be bon goi la dien uy 填委. \n\t3. Ngon. Nhu cung nguyen canh uy 窮源竟委 cung nguon het ngon. \n\t4. Thuc la. Nhu uy he 委係 thuc he vi. \n\t5. Vat bo. \n\t6. Mot am la uy. Uy di 委蛇 ung dung tu dac. Nhu uy di uy khuc tu dac chi mao 委蛇，委曲自得之貌 (Mao hanh 毛亨). \n\t7. Guong theo, uon minh ma theo. Nhu uy khuc 委曲, uy khuat 委屈 deu la cai y uyen chuyen thuan tong ca.
姘=phanh [pin1]\n\t1. Trai gai di lai trom voi nhau.
姙=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nham 妊.
姚=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Ho Dieu, con chau vua Thuan. \n\t2. Phieu dieu 票姚 nhanh nhen cung coi. Nha Han goi quan binh la phieu dieu. \n\t3. Ve mat dep (xinh tuoi).
姜=khuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Ho vua Khuong. Vua Than Nong o ben song Khuong, nhan lay ten song lam ho.
姝=xu [shu1]\n\t1. Con gai dep. Kinh thi co cau bi xu gia tu 彼姝者子 dep sao ga kia, nguyen y la khen nguoi hien, bay gio cung goi con gai dep la bi xu.
姞=cat [ji2]\n\t1. Ho Cat. Con gai nuoc Yen goi la Yen cat 燕姞.
姣=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Dep.
姤=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Que cau, nghia la gap. \n\t2. Tot.
姥=mo, mu [lao3|mu3]\n\t1. Ten dat, cung nhu chu 姆. Cung doc la mu.
姦=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Gian giao. Nhu chu gian 奸. \n\t2. Gian dam. \n\t3. Ke ac.
姨=di [yi2]\n\t1. Di. Chi em voi me goi la di. \n\t2. Chi em vo cung goi la di. Ngay xua cac vua chu hau ga chong cho con gai, thuong ken may con gai trong ho di theo de lam ban voi con, cho nen sau goi vo le la di.
姪=diet [zhi2]\n\t1. Chau, tieng xung ho doi voi chu bac.
姬=co [ji1]\n\t1. Tieng goi sang trong cua dan ba. Ho Co la ho ton that nha Chu, cho nen dung lam tieng goi cac ba quy phai. \n\t2. Nang hau, vo le.
姮=hang [heng2]\n\t1. Hang nga 姮娥 tuong truyen Hang-nga la vo Hau-nghe, an cap thuoc trang sinh roi chay tron vao mat trang, hoa lam con coc, cung goi ten la Thuong nga 嫦娥 nua.
姱=khoa [kua1]\n\t1. Tot, dep.
姸=nghien [yan2]\n\t1. Tuoi tinh, xinh dep.
姹=xa [cha4]\n\t1. Con gai be, nha tu luyen goi thuoc luyen bang dan sa thuy ngan la xa nu 姹女. \n\t2. La. Cung nhu chu xa 詑.
姻=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Nha trai. \n\t2. Bo vo goi la hon 婚, bo chong goi la nhan 姻. hai chu nay nay hay dung lan lon, nen goi su ket hon la de nhan 締姻. \n\t3. Tuc goi cac ba con ben ngoai la nhan, cung viet la 婣.
姿=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Dang dap thuy mi. Cho nen goi dang dieu con gai la tu sac 姿色. \n\t2. Cung nhu chu tu 資.
威=uy [wei1]\n\t1. Oai, cai dang ton nghiem dang so goi la uy.
娃=oa [wa2]\n\t1. Gai dep. \n\t2. Tuc goi tre con la oa oa.
娉=phinh [ping1]\n\t1. Phinh dinh 娉婷 dang dep, mat dep.
娌=ly [li3]\n\t1. Truc ly 妯娌 chi em dau.
娑=sa [suo1]\n\t1. Ba sa 婆娑 dang mua loa xoa, dang di lai lat dat. \n\t2. Sa ba the gioi 娑?世界. Sa-ba la dich am tieng Pham, trong kinh Phat goi la coi doi ta o la coi Sa-ba, nghia la coi doi phai chiu nhieu phien nao.
娓=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Vi vi 娓娓 y vi lien noi khong dut goi la vi vi. Nhu vi vi kha thinh 娓娓可聽 noi giang giang nghe thich lam.
娘=nuong [niang2]\n\t1. Nang, con gai tre tuoi goi la nuong tu 娘子 hay co nuong 姑娘 co nang. \n\t2. Me cung goi la nuong, nguyen la chu nuong 嬢. \n\t3. Tieng goi ton cac ba. Nhu cac cung phi goi hoang hau la nuong nuong 娘娘. Tuc thuong goi dan ba la dai nuong 大娘.
娛=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Vui.
娱=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Vui.
娜=na [na4|nuo2]\n\t1. A na 婀娜 mum mim, dang dep mem mai.
娟=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Xinh dep, ta cai dang dep cua nguoi. Nhu quyen quyen 娟娟, thien quyen 嬋娟, v.v.
娠=than [shen1]\n\t1. Chua, dan ba co mang da du hinh the goi la than.
娣=de, de [di4]\n\t1. Em gai, doi xua chi a di lay chong cho em di boi goi, la de. \n\t2. Mot am la de. Vo anh goi la tu phu 姒婦, vo em goi la de phu 娣婦.
娥=nga [e2]\n\t1. Tot dep, cho nen con gai hay dat ten la nga.
娩=van, mien [mian3]\n\t1. Uyen van 婉娩 thuy mi, ta cai net con gai nhu thuan. \n\t2. Mot am la mien. Dan ba de con goi la phan mien 分娩.
娬=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu vu 嫵.
娶=thu [qu3]\n\t1. Lay vo.
娼=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Con hat. Cung nhu chu xuong 倡.
婀=a [e1]\n\t1. A na 婀娜 xinh dep, thuot tha, mum mim, mem mai.
婁=lau, lu, lu [lou2]\n\t1. Sao lau, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t2. Ho Lau. \n\t3. Mot am la lu. Thuong. \n\t4. Buoc trau. \n\t5. Lai mot am nua la lu. Keo ven.
娄=lau, lu, lu [lou2]\n\t1. Sao lau, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t2. Ho Lau. \n\t3. Mot am la lu. Thuong. \n\t4. Buoc trau. \n\t5. Lai mot am nua la lu. Keo ven.
婆=ba [po2]\n\t1. Ba, dan ba gia goi la ba. Tuc goi me chong la ba. \n\t2. Ba sa 婆娑 dang mua loa xoa, dang di lai lat dat.
婉=uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Nhun thuan. \n\t2. Dep.
婕=tiep [jie2]\n\t1. Tiep du 婕妤 chuc quan dan ba doi xua.
婚=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Lay vo, con dau.
婢=ti [bi4]\n\t1. Con doi. \n\t2. Tieng dan ba xua tu xung nhun minh. Nhu ti tu 婢子 nghia la ke hen mon nay, kinh le va ta truyen dung nhieu.
婥=suoc [chuo4]\n\t1. Suoc uoc 婥約 tot dep.
婦=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Vo. \n\t2. Nang dau. Tuc goi con dau la tuc phu 媳婦. \n\t3. Dan ba con gai da lay chong goi la phu.
妇=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Vo. \n\t2. Nang dau. Tuc goi con dau la tuc phu 媳婦. \n\t3. Dan ba con gai da lay chong goi la phu.
婪=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Tham lam.
婭=a [ya4]\n\t1. Hai anh em re cung nhau goi la a.
娅=a [ya4]\n\t1. Hai anh em re cung nhau goi la a.
婷=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Phinh dinh 娉婷 dang dep, mat dep.
婺=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Sao vu nu 婺女. \n\t2. Ten dat.
媒=moi [mei2]\n\t1. Moi, muu cho hai ho ket dau gia voi nhau goi la moi. \n\t2. Nhan cai gi ma den cung goi la moi. Nhu moi gioi 媒介 moi dat. \n\t3. Vi cai co gi gay nen va goi la moi nghiet 媒糵.
媚=mi [mei4]\n\t1. Tuoi dep. Con gai lay nhan sac lam cho nguoi yeu dau goi la mi. Canh vat dep cung goi la mi. Nhu xuan quang minh mi 春光明媚 bong sang mua xuan sang dep, cung la noi cai y ay. \n\t2. Ninh not, ke duoi ninh hot nguoi tren de hy do vinh hien goi la mi. \n\t3. Yeu, than gan.
媛=vien, vien [yuan2|yuan4]\n\t1. Con gai dep, co khi doc la vien.
媟=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Nhon (nham nho) yeu nhau khong co le goi la tiet.
媢=mao [mao4]\n\t1. Mao tat 媢嫉 ghen ghet.
媧=oa [wa1]\n\t1. Nu oa 女媧 mot vi vua doi xua luyen da va troi.
娲=oa [wa1]\n\t1. Nu oa 女媧 mot vi vua doi xua luyen da va troi.
媲=be [pi4]\n\t1. Sanh ngang. Nhu be mi 媲美 dep ngang.
媳=tuc [xi2]\n\t1. Con dau.
媵=dang [ying4]\n\t1. Nang hau, cac vua chu hau ngay xua ga chong cho con gai, luc vu quy cho them may dua em gai hay chau gai di boi va lam hau le cho chong con nua goi la dang. \n\t2. Dinh theo, tang cho nguoi do gi ma lai phu them vat gi nua cung goi la dang.
媸=xuy [chi1]\n\t1. Xau.
媼=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Ba lao.
媪=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Ba lao.
媽=mu, ma [ma1]\n\t1. Me, tuc goi me la ma ma. \n\t2. Tuc goi vu gia la mu, va quen doc la ma.
妈=mu, ma [ma1]\n\t1. Me, tuc goi me la ma ma. \n\t2. Tuc goi vu gia la mu, va quen doc la ma.
媾=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Lai ket dau gia. Nhu cuu hon cau nghia la hai doi cau ket dau gia hoa hieu voi nhau, nen hai nuoc giang hoa cung goi la cau. \n\t2. Hop.
媿=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quy 愧.
嫁=gia [jia4]\n\t1. Lay chong, Kinh le dinh con gai hai muoi tuoi thi lay chong goi la xuat gia 出嫁. \n\t2. Vay cho, vay tieng ac cho nguoi goi la gia hoa 嫁禍.
嫂=tau [sao3]\n\t1. Chi dau. Pham nguoi nao minh goi bang anh thi vo nguoi ay minh deu goi la tau.
嫄=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Me ong Hau Tac la ba Khuong Nguyen 姜嫄.
嫉=tat [ji2]\n\t1. Ghen ghet, thay nguoi ta duc hanh tai tri hon minh sinh long ghen ghet lam hai goi la tat.
嫋=nieu [niao3]\n\t1. Nieu nieu 嫋嫋 ta cai dang mem mai nho nhan, gio nho thoi canh lieu phat pho goi la nieu nieu. Tieng nhac con diu dat am lai cung goi la du am nieu nieu 餘音嫋嫋.
嫌=hiem [xian2]\n\t1. Ngo, cai gi hoi giong su thuc khien cho nguoi ngo goi la hiem nghi 嫌疑. \n\t2. Khong duoc thich y cung goi la hiem.
嫏=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Ngoc kinh lang hoan 玉京嫏環 cho troi de sach vo.
嫖=phieu [piao2]\n\t1. Nhanh nhen, bay gio muon dung de goi ke co bac rong la phieu do 嫖賭.
嫗=au, u [yu4]\n\t1. Me, tieng goi chung cua cac ba gia. \n\t2. Mot am la u. Hu u 喣嫗 om ap au yem.
妪=au, u [yu4]\n\t1. Me, tieng goi chung cua cac ba gia. \n\t2. Mot am la u. Hu u 喣嫗 om ap au yem.
嫚=man [yuan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu man 慢.
嫜=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Bo chong, tuc goi bo me chong la co chuong 姑嫜.
嫠=ly [li2]\n\t1. Dan ba goa.
嫡=dich [di2]\n\t1. Vo ca, con vo ca goi la dich tu 嫡子.
嫦=thuong [chang2]\n\t1. Thuong nga 嫦娥 nhu chu Hang nga 姮娥.
嫩=non [nen4]\n\t1. Non, vat gi chua gia goi la non. \n\t2. Moi khoi len.
嫫=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Mo mau 嫫母 ten mot nguoi con gai xau doi xua.
嫵=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Dep, lam cho yeu dau. Ta cai ve mem mai dang yeu cua con gai.
妩=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Dep, lam cho yeu dau. Ta cai ve mem mai dang yeu cua con gai.
嫺=nhan [xian2]\n\t1. Nhan nha, tap quen, cai gi da thuan thuc roi deu goi la nhan.
嬀=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Song Quy. Doi Xuan-thu co ho Quy.
嬃=tu [xu1]\n\t1. Nguoi nuoc So goi chi la tu.
嬈=nhieu, nhieu, lieu [rao2|rao3]\n\t1. Kieu nhieu 嬌嬈 xinh dep. \n\t2. Mot am la nhieu, cung nghia voi chu nhieu 擾. \n\t3. Lai mot am nua la lieu. Lieu lieu 嬈嬈 yeu duoi, luot thuot.
娆=nhieu, nhieu, lieu [rao2|rao3]\n\t1. Kieu nhieu 嬌嬈 xinh dep. \n\t2. Mot am la nhieu, cung nghia voi chu nhieu 擾. \n\t3. Lai mot am nua la lieu. Lieu lieu 嬈嬈 yeu duoi, luot thuot.
嬉=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Dua bon, choi.
嬋=thien [chan2]\n\t1. Thien quyen 嬋娟 ta cai dang xinh dep dang yeu, cho nen moi goi con gai la thien quyen.
婵=thien [chan2]\n\t1. Thien quyen 嬋娟 ta cai dang xinh dep dang yeu, cho nen moi goi con gai la thien quyen.
嬌=kieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Co y mem mai dang yeu, nen xua kia goi con gai la a kieu 阿嬌.
娇=kieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Co y mem mai dang yeu, nen xua kia goi con gai la a kieu 阿嬌.
嬍=mi [mei3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu mi 美.
嬖=be [bi4]\n\t1. Hen ma duoc vua yeu dau.
嬗=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Thay doi.
嬙=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Mot chuc quan dan ba ngay xua.  
嫱=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Mot chuc quan dan ba ngay xua.  
嬛=huyen, hoan [xuan1]\n\t1. Bien huyen便 嬛 ta cai dang dep ma lang lo. \n\t2. Mot am la hoan, cung nhu chu hoan 環 . 
嬝=nieu [niao3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nieu嫋 . 
嬡=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Tuc goi con gai nguoi khac la lenh ai 令 嬡 . 
嫒=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Tuc goi con gai nguoi khac la lenh ai 令 嬡 . 
嬪=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Mot chuc quan dan ba ngay xua. Thien tu co cuu tan九 嬪 . \n\t2. Vo. \n\t3. Vo con song goi la the妻 , vo chet roi goi la tan嬪 . \n\t4. Luc nhuc. 
嫔=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Mot chuc quan dan ba ngay xua. Thien tu co cuu tan九 嬪 . \n\t2. Vo. \n\t3. Vo con song goi la the妻 , vo chet roi goi la tan嬪 . \n\t4. Luc nhuc. 
嬭=nai, ne [nai3]\n\t1. Vu sua. \n\t2. Tieng xung ton trong cua dan ba. \n\t3. Mot am la ne. Nguoi nuoc So goi me la ne. 
嬰=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Con tre moi de goi la anh. Co nguoi noi con gai goi la anh嬰 , con trai goi la hai 孩 . \n\t2. Them vao, dung cham den. \n\t3. Vong quanh, chang choi.  
婴=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Con tre moi de goi la anh. Co nguoi noi con gai goi la anh嬰 , con trai goi la hai 孩 . \n\t2. Them vao, dung cham den. \n\t3. Vong quanh, chang choi.  
嬲=dieu, nieu [niao3]\n\t1. Chong gheo nhau. Cung doc la chu nieu. 
嬴=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Day, thua. \n\t2. Ho Doanh. 
嬸=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Thim, vo chu goi la tham. \n\t2. Em dau cung goi la tham. 
婶=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Thim, vo chu goi la tham. \n\t2. Em dau cung goi la tham. 
嬾=lan [lan3]\n\t1. Luoi bieng. 
嬿=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Dep, yen uyen嬿 婉 thuan thu yen vui (hoa thuan). 
孀=suong [shuang1]\n\t1. O goa, dan ba goa. 
孃=nuong [niang2]\n\t1. Xem chu nuong娘 . 
孌=luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Uyen luyen 婉 孌 tuoi tan. \n\t2. Men. 
娈=luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Uyen luyen 婉 孌 tuoi tan. \n\t2. Men. 
子=tu, ty [zi3]\n\t1. Con. Bat luan trai gai deu goi la tu. \n\t2. Nha thay, dan ong nao co duc hanh hoc van deu goi la tu ca. Nhu Khong-tu 孔子, Manh-tu 孟子, v.v. Con chau goi nguoi truoc cung goi la tien tu 先子, vo goi chong la ngoai tu 外子, chong goi vo la noi tu 內子 deu la tieng xung ho ton quy ca. \n\t3. Ga, dung de goi cac ke tam thuong. Nhu chu tu 舟子 chu lai do, si tu 士子 chu hoc tro, v.v. \n\t4. Tuoc tu, tuoc thu tu trong nam tuoc. \n\t5. Mam giong cac loai dong vat thuc vat cung goi la tu. Nhu ngu tu 魚子 giong ca, tam tu 蠶子 giong tam, dao tu 桃子 giong dao, ly tu 李子 giong man, v.v. \n\t6. So le, doi voi so nguyen ma noi. Nhu phan mau 分母, phan tu 分子. Phan von la mau tai 母財, tien lai la tu kim 子金, v.v. \n\t7. Tieng giup loi. Nhu tap tu 摺子 cai cap, chap tu 劄子 cai the, v.v. \n\t8. Co nghia nhu chu tu 慈. \n\t9. Mot am la ty, chi dau trong muoi hai chi. Tu muoi mot gio dem den mot gio dem la gio ty.
孑=kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Don chiec. Nhu mi huu kiet di 靡有孑遺 chang con mot ai. Tro troi. Nhu kiet nhien doc lap 孑然獨立 tro troi dung mot minh. \n\t3. Kiet cung 孑孒 con bo gay, sau hoa ra con muoi. \n\t4. Cai kich khong co mui nhon.
孒=quyet, cung [jie2]\n\t1. Ngan, vat gi thang ma ngan goi la quyet. \n\t2. Mot am la cung. Kiet cung 孑孒 con bo gay, sau hoa ra con muoi.
孔=khong [kong3]\n\t1. Rat, lam. Nhu muu phu khong da 謀夫孔多 nguoi muu rat nhieu. \n\t2. Lo. Nhu ty khong 鼻孔 lo mui. \n\t3. Thong suot. Nhu khong dao 孔道 duong di thong suot. \n\t4. Ho Khong. \n\t5. Rong khong, hay dung duoc cac cai.
孕=dung [yun4]\n\t1. Chua (co mang, co thai).
字=tu [zi4]\n\t1. Van tu, bat chuoc hinh trang tung loai ma dat goi la van 文, hinh tieng cung hop lai voi nhau goi la tu 字. \n\t2. Ten tu, kinh le dinh con trai hai muoi tuoi lam le doi mu roi moi dat ten. Nhu con duc Khong-tu ten la Ly 鯉, ten tu la Ba-ngu 伯魚. Con gai nhan loi ga chong moi cai tram va dat ten tu, cho nen nhan loi ga chong cung goi la tu nhan 字人. \n\t3. Sinh san, nguoi ta sinh con goi la tu. Chu tu o trong van tu cung la noi o nghia ay ma ra, y noi nay no ra nhieu vay. \n\t4. Yeu, phu tu 撫字 vo ve nuoi nang.
存=ton [cun2]\n\t1. Con, trai lai voi chu vong 亡 mat, cho nen sinh tu cung goi la ton vong 存亡. \n\t2. Xet toi. Nhu ton van 存問 tham hoi, ton tuat 存恤 xet thuong. \n\t3. Dang, con. Nhu that ton 實存 con thuc. \n\t4. De gui. \n\t5. Chat de. Nhu ton tam trung hau 存心忠厚 de long trung hau.
孚=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Tin, trung phu 中孚 ten mot que trong kinh Dich. \n\t2. Phu giap 孚甲 nut nanh, nghia la cay co nut nanh no ra hat ra la. \n\t3. Cung co nghia nhu chu phu 孵.
孛=bot [bei4]\n\t1. Sao choi. \n\t2. Bung mat.
孜=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Tu tu 孜孜 cham cham (xa xa).
孝=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Thao, con tho cha me het long goi la hieu. \n\t2. Tuc goi do tang phuc la hieu. Nhu xuyen hieu 穿孝 mac do tang, thoat hieu 脫孝 trut do tang (doan tang), v.v. 
孟=manh, mang [meng4]\n\t1. Lon, con trai truong dong dich goi la ba 伯, con trai truong dong thu goi la manh 孟. \n\t2. Moi, truoc. Thang dau mua goi la manh nguyet 孟月. Nhu thang gieng goi la thang manh xuan 孟春, thang tu goi la thang manh ha 孟夏, v.v. \n\t3. Co gang, manh tan 孟晉 gang goi tien len. \n\t4. Mot am la mang. Mang lang 孟浪 bop chop, lo mo. Ta cai dang khong tinh te, khong thiet thuc.
季=quy [ji4]\n\t1. Nho, em be goi la quy de 季弟. \n\t2. Cuoi, thang cuoi mua goi la quy. Nhu thang ba goi la thang quy xuan 季春. Doi cuoi cung cung goi la quy the 季世. \n\t3. Mua, ba thang la mot quy, nen bon mua cung goi la tu quy 四季. 
孤=co [gu1]\n\t1. Mo coi, mo coi cha som goi la co. \n\t2. Co doc. Nhu co lap vo tro 孤立無助 troi mot minh khong ai giup. Hoc thuc dot nat hep hoi goi la co lau 孤陋, tinh tinh ngang trai goi la co tich 孤僻 deu la cai y nghia khong cung hoa hop voi chung ca. \n\t3. Troi trot, vat gi vuot ra hon cac vat khac goi la co. Nhu co son 孤山 nui troi, co thu 孤樹 cay troi, v.v. \n\t4. Quan co, duoi quan Tam-cong co quan tam co 三孤, tuc thieu su 少師, thieu pho 少傅, thieu bao 少保. \n\t5. Tieng noi nhun minh cua cac vua chu hau, nghia la minh tu khiem minh la ke duc do kem. Doi sau goi cac vua la xung co dao qua 稱孤道寡 la theo y ay. \n\t6. Phu bac. Nhu co an 孤恩 phu on.
孥=no [nu2]\n\t1. Con, co nghia goi chung ca vo con. Nhu toi nhan bat no 罪人不孥 bat toi khong bat den vo con. \n\t2. Dua o.
孩=hai [hai2]\n\t1. Tre con cuoi, bay gio deu goi tre be la hai.
孫=ton, ton [sun1]\n\t1. Chau. \n\t2. vat gi tai sinh cung goi la ton. Nhu dao ton 稻孫 lua tai sinh (lua trau). \n\t3. Mot am la ton. Nhun nhuong.
孙=ton, ton [sun1]\n\t1. Chau. \n\t2. vat gi tai sinh cung goi la ton. Nhu dao ton 稻孫 lua tai sinh (lua trau). \n\t3. Mot am la ton. Nhun nhuong.
孰=thuc [shu2]\n\t1. Ai, chi vao nguoi ma noi. Nhu thuc vi 孰謂 ai bao. \n\t2. Gi, chi vao su ma noi. Nhu thi kha nhan da, thuc bat kha nhan da 是可忍也孰不可忍也 su ay nhan duoc thi gi cha nhan duoc. \n\t3. Chin.
孱=san [can4|chan2]\n\t1. Yeu duoi (yeu duoi hay om). \n\t2. Hen kem. \n\t3. Quan bach.
孵=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Ap, loai chim ga ap trung no con goi la phu.
孶=tu, tu [zi1]\n\t1. Tu tu 孶孶 cham cham. \n\t2. Mot am la tu. Nhieu. Nhu tu nhu 孶乳 sinh no dong duc.
學=hoc [xue2]\n\t1. Bat chuoc, chiu nghe nguoi ta day bao ma bat chuoc lam goi la hoc. \n\t2. Cho hoc. Nhu hoc duong 學堂, hoc hieu 學校, tuc la trang hoc bay gio. \n\t3. Pham cac su vat gi vi nghien cuu ma biet toi giuong moi nganh ngon cua no deu goi la hoc nhu hoc thuat 學術, khoa hoc 科學, v.v. \n\t4. Nha Phat chia ra hai hang. 1) huu hoc 有學 hang con phai hoc moi biet. 2) vo hoc 無學 hang khong can phai hoc cung biet.
学=hoc [xue2]\n\t1. Bat chuoc, chiu nghe nguoi ta day bao ma bat chuoc lam goi la hoc. \n\t2. Cho hoc. Nhu hoc duong 學堂, hoc hieu 學校, tuc la trang hoc bay gio. \n\t3. Pham cac su vat gi vi nghien cuu ma biet toi giuong moi nganh ngon cua no deu goi la hoc nhu hoc thuat 學術, khoa hoc 科學, v.v. \n\t4. Nha Phat chia ra hai hang. 1) huu hoc 有學 hang con phai hoc moi biet. 2) vo hoc 無學 hang khong can phai hoc cung biet.
孺=nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Tre con. \n\t2. Thuoc ve. Nhu vo con quan dai phu goi la nhu nhan 孺人 nghia la nguoi ay thuoc ve cua chong, khong dam tu chuyen vay, doi sau deu goi vo la nhu nhan. Tu doi nha Tong tro xuong deu dung chu nhu nhan lam cai ten hieu phong cac vo quan. \n\t3. Vui, thu.
孻=nai [lai2]\n\t1. Dua hai nhi vua lot long, ma me la mot ba gia.
孼=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Con vo le nang hau. \n\t2. Yeu hai. Loai yeu ve sau bo goi la nghiet. Bay gio thuong goi cac vat quai la yeu nghiet 妖孼. Nhan xau. Nhu tac nghiet 作孼 lam ra cai nhan tai va. Tuc thuong viet la 孽.
孿=loan [luan2]\n\t1. De sinh doi
孪=loan [luan2]\n\t1. De sinh doi
宀=mien [mian2]\n\t1. Lop trum nha ngoai voi nha trong.
宁=tru [ning2|ning4]\n\t1. Giua khoang cai binh phong voi cua.
宂=nhung [rong3]\n\t1. Tan mat. Nhu nhung vien 宂員 chuc quan nhan roi vo su, chuc quan thua, nhung phi 宂費 phi nham, deu la cai nghia thua khong ich gi ca. \n\t2. Voi vang. Nhu phien nhung 煩宂, nhung tap 宂雜 deu la cai y noi vi viec lat vat lam ban vay. Gac bo moi su goi la bat nhung 撥宂. \n\t3. Dan khong co cho o yen. \n\t4. Hen kem. 
它=tha, xa [ta1]\n\t1. Doi xua dung nhu chu da 佗 khong phai, khac. \n\t2. Ngay xua dung nhu chu xa 蛇. Doi thuong co o hang o to, hay bi ran can, nen hoi tham nhau deu hoi vo xa ho 無它乎 nghia la khong viec gi chu ?
宄=qui [gui3]\n\t1. Gian, trom cuop khoi o trong ra goi la gian 姦, khoi o ngoai vao goi la qui 宄.
宅=trach [zhai2]\n\t1. Nha o, o vao day cung goi la trach. \n\t2. Trach trieu 宅兆 phan mo (mo ma). Nay goi nha o la duong trach 陽宅, mo ma la am trach 陰宅 la noi o nghia ay. \n\t3. Yen dinh.
宇=vu [yu3]\n\t1. Duoi mai hien, nha o cung goi la vu. Nhu quynh lau ngoc vu 瓊樓玉宇 lau quynh nha ngoc. \n\t2. Bon phuong tren duoi. Nhu goi thien ha la vu noi 宇內, hoan vu 寰宇 nghia la o trong gam troi vay. \n\t3. Co nghia chi ve rieng tung bo. Nhu khi vu 器宇 khi cuc, my vu 眉宇 dau long may, v.v. \n\t4. Vu tru 宇宙 vu la chi ve khoang khong gian, tru la chi ve khoang thoi gian, y noi la het thay trong khoang troi dat vay.
守=thu, thu [shou3]\n\t1. Giu, coi. Nhu bao thu 保守 om giu. \n\t2. Quan thu, phep nha Han ong quan dung dau mot quan goi la thai thu 太守, doi sau goi quan tri phu 知府 la thu la do nghia ay. \n\t3. Thao thu (giu tron tiet nghia), ngay thang canh goc, khong lay sang cua ai mot ti gi goi la huu thu 有守. \n\t4. Doi. Nhu noi thu hau 守候 cho doi. \n\t5. Mot am la thu. Nhu tuan thu 巡守 di tuan dia hat minh giu.
安=an [an1]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu binh an 平安, tri an 治安, v.v. \n\t2. Dinh, khong mien cuong gi goi la an. Nhu an cu lac nghiep 安居樂業 yen o vui voi viec lam. \n\t3. Lam yen. Nhu an phu 安撫 phu du cho yen, an uy 安慰 yen ui. \n\t4. Tieng giup loi. Nghia la Sao vay. Nhu ngo tuong an nguong 吾將安仰 ta hau nguong vong vao dau ? Nhi kim an tai 而今安在 ma nay con o dau ? \n\t5. De yen. Nhu an tri 安置 de yen mot cho, an phong 安放 bo yen day.
宋=tong [song4]\n\t1. Nuoc Tong. \n\t2. Nha Tong (420-478), Tong Vu de 宋武帝 duoc nha Tan trao ngoi cho, lam vua   duoc 59 nam, sau trao cho Te. Sau lai co Trieu Khuong Dan 趙匡胤 duoc nha Chu   trao ngoi cho cung goi la nha Tong (960-1279), lam vua duoc duoc 320 nam roi   bi nha Nguyen diet mat.
完=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Du, ven. \n\t2. Xong. Nhu hoan cong 完工 xong cong viec. \n\t3. Giu duoc tron ven. \n\t4. Ben chat, kin dao. Nhu thanh quach bat hoan 城郭不完 thanh quach chang ben chat. Y ly bat hoan 衣履不完 ao giay chang lanh, v.v. \n\t5. Nop xong. Nhu hoan luong 完糧 nop xong luong thue.
宏=hoanh [hong2]\n\t1. To tat, rong rai.
宓=mat, phuc [mi4]\n\t1. Yen lang. \n\t2. Mot am la phuc. Cung nhu chu phuc 伏.
宕=dang [dang4]\n\t1. Y khi ngang doc khong chiu kiem che goi la dang. Cung nhu chu dang 蕩. \n\t2. Tuc goi bo lung viec khong lam cho xong la dang. \n\t3. Mo da.
宗=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Ong tong, ong to nhat goi la to, thu nua la tong. Thuong goi la tong mieu, nghia la mieu tho ong to ong tong vay. Tuc thuong goi cac doi truoc la to tong 祖宗. \n\t2. Ho hang dong truong la dai tong 大宗, dong thu la tieu tong 小宗, cung ho goi la dong tong 同宗. \n\t3. Chu. Nhu tong chi 宗旨 chu y quy ve cai gi. \n\t4. Dong phai, dao phat tu ong Ngu-to tro ve sau chia lam hai dong nam bac, goi la nam tong 南宗 va bac tong 北宗. \n\t5. Tuc goi mot kien la mot tong. Nhu tap van tu goi la quyen tong 卷宗, mot so do lon goi la dai tong 大宗.
官=quan [guan1]\n\t1. Chuc quan, moi nguoi giu mot viec gi de tri nuoc goi la quan. \n\t2. Ngoi quan, cho ngoi lam viec o trong trieu dinh goi la quan. \n\t8. Cong, cai gi thuoc ve cua cong nha nuoc goi la quan. Nhu quan dien 官田 ruong cong. \n\t4. Co quan. Nhu. tai, mat, mieng, mui, tim la ngu quan 五官 cua nguoi ta, nghia la moi cai deu giu mot chuc trach vay. \n\t5. Duoc viec, yen viec.
宙=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Xua di nay lai goi la tru. Nhu noi vu tru 宇宙 suot gam troi, vu 宇 la noi ve khoang hu khong (khong gian), tru 宙 la noi ve khoang thi gio (thoi gian) nghia la khong gi la khong bao quat het ca o trong do vay.
定=dinh, dinh [ding4]\n\t1. Dinh, xep dat duoc yen on, khong bi lay dong nua goi la dinh. \n\t2. Dep cho yen. Nhu an bang dinh quoc 安邦定國 yen dinh nha nuoc, hon dinh than tinh 昏定晨省 toi xep dat cho yen cho som tham hoi yen khong, nghia la toi thi don dep man giuong chan chieu cho cha me duoc yen giac, sang thi tham hoi xem co duoc manh khong. \n\t3. Dinh lieu. Nhu tham dinh 審定 xet ro moi le roi dinh lieu su lam. \n\t4. Dinh han. Nhu dinh nghia 定義 dinh nghia cu the la dung. \n\t5. Hop dinh, hai ben hiep uoc voi nhau goi la dinh. Nhu thuong dinh 商定 ban dinh. Trai gai lam le ket hon cung goi la van dinh 文定, ha dinh 下定, v.v. \n\t6. Tinh, nha Phat co phep tu khien cho tam yen dinh khong vong dong duoc, goi la dinh, tuc la phep ta quen goi la nhap dinh vay. \n\t7. Mot am la dinh. Sao dinh. \n\t8. Cai tran. Nhu lan chi dinh 麟之定 tran con lan.
宛=uyen, uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Uyen nhien 宛然 y nhien (ro the). \n\t2. Nho be. \n\t3. Mot am la uyen. Dai uyen 大宛 ten mot nuoc o Tay-vuc doi nha Han.
宜=nghi [yi2]\n\t1. Nen. Nhu nghi that nghi gia 宜室宜家 nen vo nen chong. Tinh giong vat nao hop o cho nao cung goi la nghi. Nhu tho nghi 土宜 nghia la thu ay la thu ua o xu ay. Nhu ta goi vai o Quang la tho nghi (tho ngoi) nghia la vai trong o day ngon hon trong cho khac. \n\t2. Nen the. Nhu bat diec nghi ho 不亦宜乎 chang cung nen u ! \n\t3. Te nghi. Nhu nghi ho xa 宜乎社 te nghi o nen xa.
客=khach [ke4]\n\t1. Khach, doi lai voi chu 主. \n\t2. Gui, tro, o ngoai den o nho goi la khach. \n\t3. Muon tam. Nhu khach khi dung su 客氣用事 muon cai khi hao huyen ma lam viec, nghia la dung cach kieu ngao hao huyen ma lam, cho khong phai la chan chinh. Tuc cho su gia bo ngoai mat khong thuc bung la khach khi 客氣. Nhu ta quen goi la lam khach vay. 
宣=tuyen [xuan1]\n\t1. To lon. Nhu tuyen that 宣室 cai nha to, vi the nen tuong vach xay toi sau tac cung goi la tuyen, thong dung nhu chu 瑄. \n\t2. Tan khap. Nhu tuyen bo 宣布 bao khap moi noi. Ba cao cho moi nguoi cung biet goi la tuyen ngon 宣言. \n\t3. Ban bo. Nhu tuyen chieu 宣詔 ban bo chieu chi ra. Truyen dat menh vua goi la tuyen trieu 宣召, v.v. \n\t4. Thong suot. Nhu tuyen triet duy nhan 宣哲惟人 duy nguoi ay thong suot ma khon. Dung thuoc cho no tan cai khi uat ra goi la tuyen tan 宣散. \n\t5. Bao ro. Nhu tuyen thi 宣示 bao ro. \n\t6. Het suc. Nhu tuyen lao 宣勞, tuyen luc 宣力 nghia la co het suc vay. \n\t7. Het. Nhu cuoi to boi noi rang bat tuyen 不宣 chang het, nghia la khong the to het khuc nhoi duoc.
室=that [shi4]\n\t1. Cai nha. \n\t2. Vo, con trai lay vo goi la thu that 受室, con gai chua chong ma trinh khiet goi la that nu 室女. \n\t3. Sao that, mot ngoi sao trong thap nhi bat tu. \n\t4. Huyet chon. \n\t5. Tui dao.
宥=huu [you4]\n\t1. Rong thu, tha thu cho. \n\t2. Rong rai, sau xa. \n\t3. Cung nghia nhu chu 侑.
宦=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Lam quan, ra lam quan goi la du hoan 游宦. \n\t2. Hau ha, dem than hau ha nguoi goi la hoan nhu hoan nu 宦女 con hau, hoan quan 宦官 quan hau trong, v.v. Tu thien minh di de vao hau trong cung goi la hoan quan. 
宮=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Cung, nha xay tuong cao ma tren uon cong xuong goi la cung. Nha cua vua o va nha de tho than deu goi la cung. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi trong nha vua la cung ca. Nhu ba hoang hau goi la chinh cung 正宮, cac phi tan goi la luc cung 六宮, thai tu goi la tru cung 儲宮 hay dong cung 東宮, cac hau gai o trong cung goi la cung nu 宮女, an mac loi trong cung goi la cung trang 宮裝, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng cung, mot thu tieng trong nam tieng, cung 宮, thuong 商, gioc 角, chuy 徵, vu 羽. \n\t4. Hinh cung, ngay xua, ai pham toi dam, con trai cat dai, con gai giam trong cung goi la cung hinh 宮刑. \n\t5. Phep lam lich lay ba muoi do lam mot cung, tuc la lay mot phan trong 12 phan quanh khap vay.
宫=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Cung, nha xay tuong cao ma tren uon cong xuong goi la cung. Nha cua vua o va nha de tho than deu goi la cung. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi trong nha vua la cung ca. Nhu ba hoang hau goi la chinh cung 正宮, cac phi tan goi la luc cung 六宮, thai tu goi la tru cung 儲宮 hay dong cung 東宮, cac hau gai o trong cung goi la cung nu 宮女, an mac loi trong cung goi la cung trang 宮裝, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng cung, mot thu tieng trong nam tieng, cung 宮, thuong 商, gioc 角, chuy 徵, vu 羽. \n\t4. Hinh cung, ngay xua, ai pham toi dam, con trai cat dai, con gai giam trong cung goi la cung hinh 宮刑. \n\t5. Phep lam lich lay ba muoi do lam mot cung, tuc la lay mot phan trong 12 phan quanh khap vay.
宰=te [zai3]\n\t1. Chua te. Nhu tam gia dao chi chu te 心者道之主宰 tam la cai chua te cua dao. Vi the nen bay gio goi ke y thuc khong nhat dinh la hung vo chu te 胸無主宰 nhu sach Su ky noi te che van vat 宰制萬物 nghia la lam chua cai tri het cac loai. \n\t2. Quan Te, dung dau coi mot viec gi goi la te. Nhu ke coi viec com nuoc goi la thien te 膳宰 hay bao te 庖宰, chuc quan coi ca tram quan goi la trung te 冢宰, v.v. Ke dung dau bon gia than cung goi la te. Nhu Nhiem Cau vi quy thi te 冉求為季氏宰 (Luan ngu 論語) ong Nhiem Cau lam chuc dau ban gia than cho ho Quy. Chuc quan coi dau mot ap cung goi la te. Tuc goi quan huyen la ap te 邑宰. \n\t3. Cat, lam thit. Nhu Tran Binh te nhuc tham quan 陳平宰肉 甚均 Tran Binh cat thit rat deu. Nay ta goi ke lam thit muong sinh la do te 屠宰 cung la theo nghia do.
害=hai, hat [hai4]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu di hai vo cung 貽害無窮 de hai khong cung. \n\t2. Lam hai. Nhu hai thoi 害時 nghia la lam hai mua lam ruong. \n\t3. Ghen ghet. Nhu tam hai ky nang 心害其能 long ghen ghet nguoi tai. Nhu muu hai 謀害 muu toan lam hai, ham hai 陷害 ham hai nguoi ta vao noi tung cuc, v.v. \n\t4. Cho dat trong yeu goi la noi yeu hai 要害 nghia la giu mot cho ay la chen het loi song cua nguoi. \n\t5. Mot am la hat. Nao, sao. Nhu hat can hat phu 害澣害否 cai nao giat cai nao khong.
宴=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Yen nghi. \n\t2. Thet, an yen. Lay ruou thit thet nhau goi la yen. \n\t3. Vui.
宵=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Dem. Nhu trung tieu 中宵 nua dem. \n\t2. Nho be, ke tieu nhan goi la tieu nhan 宵人.
家=gia, co [jia1|jie5]\n\t1. O. \n\t2. Cho o (nha). \n\t3. Vo goi chong la gia 家, cung nhu chong goi vo la that 室. \n\t4. O trong mot cua goi la mot nha. Nhu gia truong 家長 nguoi chu nha, gia nhan 家人 nguoi nha, v.v. \n\t4. Co cai hoc van gioi rieng ve mot mon goi la gia. Nhu van hoc gia 文學家, nha van hoc, chinh tri gia 政治家 nha chinh tri, v.v. \n\t5. Tu xung nguoi ton truong cua nha minh cung goi la gia. Nhu gia phu 家父 cha toi, gia huynh 家兄 anh toi, v.v. \n\t6. Giong gi nuoi o trong nha cung goi la gia. Nhu gia cam 家禽 giong chim nuoi trong nha, gia suc 家畜 giong muong nuoi trong nha. \n\t7. Mot am la co, cung nhu chu co 姑. Thai co 太家 tieng goi quan trong cua con gai. Nhu Ban Chieu 班昭 vo Tao The Huc 曹世叔 doi nha Han, vi co duc hanh lai co hoc gioi, duoc cu vao day vo con vua nen goi la Tao thai co 曹太家.
宸=than [chen2]\n\t1. Cai nha o rat sau (tham cung). \n\t2. Ngay xua goi nha vua o la than. Nhu phong than 楓宸, dan than 丹宸, tu than 紫宸 vi nha Han trong cung den vua hay trong cay phong, cu den luc co suong thi la no do, nen goi cung vua deu ngu y mau do ca.
容=dong [rong2]\n\t1. Bao dong chiu dung. Nhu huu huu huu dong 休休有容 long long co luong bao dong, nghia la khi cuc rong lon bao dong ca duoc moi nguoi. Cai vat gi chua duoc bao nhieu goi la dong luong 容量. \n\t2. Nghi dong (dang dap). \n\t3. Loi noi giup loi. Nhu vo dong 無容 khong can. \n\t4. Nen. Nhu dong hoac huu chi 容或有之.
宼=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khau 寇.
宿=tuc, tu [su4|xiu3|xiu4]\n\t1. Do, dem do lai nghi goi la tuc, nen mot dem cung goi la nhat tuc 一宿. Vat gi de lau cung goi la tuc. Nhu tuc vat 宿物 do cu, tuc tat 宿疾 benh lau ngay. \n\t2. Giu. Nhu tuc truc 宿直 phong giu, nghia la canh gac ban dem cho nguoi ngu yen. Ta thuong noi cac quan vien dem phai mu ao chinh te de hau thanh la tuc truc la noi theo nghia ay. \n\t3. Von co, lao luyen. Nhu tuc tuong 宿將 tuong gioi, tuc hoc 宿學 hoc gioi, tuc nho 宿儒 hoc tro lao luyen, v.v. deu la cai nghia da tung kinh nghiem va hoc co can ban ca. \n\t4. Yen, giu. \n\t5. Luu lai. \n\t6. Da qua. Nhu tuc the 宿世 doi qua khu, tuc nhan 宿因 nhan da gay tu truoc. \n\t7. Mot am la tu. Cac ngoi sao. Nhu nhi thap bat tu 二十八宿.
寀=thai [cai4]\n\t1. Dat cua quan goi la thai 寀, cung hang quan goi la lieu 寮, vi the nen quan cung hang cung goi la lieu thai 寮寀, cung viet la 采.
寂=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Lang yen. Nhu tich mich 寂寞. \n\t2. Im. Nhu tich nhien bat dong 寂然不動 im phac chang dong. Nha Phat cho tu hanh sach het me vong, vao noi rong lang, huong thu chan thuong la tich diet 寂滅 tam than lang yen, tu nhien soi to, khong sot ti gi goi la tich chieu 寂照.
寃=oan [yuan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu oan 冤.
寄=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Pho thac. Nhu kha di ki bach ly chi menh 可以寄百里之命 co the pho thac cho cong viec cai tri mot tram dam duoc. Vi the nen chiu ganh vac cong viec phong thu ngoai coi nuoc goi la cuong ki 疆寄. \n\t2. Gui, nhu ki tin 寄信 gui tin. \n\t3. Nho. Nhu ki cu 寄居 o nho. \n\t4. Truyen dat.
寅=dan [yin2]\n\t1. Chi Dan, mot chi trong muoi hai chi. Tu ba gio sang den nam gio sang la gio dan. \n\t2. Kinh. \n\t3. Cung lam quan voi nhau goi la dong dan 同寅, quan lai choi voi nhau goi la dan nghi 寅誼.
密=mat [mi4]\n\t1. Ram rap, lien kin. Nhu mat mat tang tang 密密層層 chap chong lien kin. \n\t2. Bi mat, viec gi can phai giu kin khong cho ai biet goi la mat. \n\t3. Lien gan, lien ke. Nhu mat nhi 密邇, mat thiet 密切 nghia la cung hop voi nhau, co y khang khit lam. Tuc viet la 宓. \n\t4. Mat tong 密宗. Trong nha Phat co mot phai tu ve phep bi mat Tung chu an quyet khien ba nghiep than, mieng, y cung ung voi nhau, tuc thi chuyen pham nen thanh, cong dung khong the nghi ban toi. Nhu the chi co Phat moi biet duoc, nen goi la mat tong, cung goi la chan ngon tong 真言宗, giao nghia cua tong nay goi la mat giao 密教.
寇=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Ke cuop. \n\t2. An cuop. \n\t3. Giac thu.
富=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Giau. \n\t2. Pham cai gi thua thai deu goi la phu. Nhu nien phu 年富 tuoi khoe, van chuong hoanh phu 文章宏富 van chuong rong rai doi dao.
寐=mi [mei4]\n\t1. Ngu say.
寒=han [han2]\n\t1. Ret, khi hau mua dong. Nhu han lai thu vang 寒來暑往 ret lai nong di, mua dong tat ret nen noi chu han la biet ngay la noi ve mua dong. \n\t2. Lanh. Nhu han thuc 寒食 an lanh. \n\t3. Cung quan. Nhu nhat han chi thu 一寒至此 cung quan den the u ! Hoc tro ngheo goi la han si 寒士, ai ngheo tung mua ret cung khong du ao am , nen noi den chu han la biet ngay la ngheo kho tung doi vay. \n\t4. Thoi. Nhu han minh 寒盟 tieu het loi the. \n\t5. Run so. Nhu han tam 寒心 ghe long.
寓=ngu [yu4]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu ngu cu 寓居 o nho. \n\t2. Noi bong. Nhu ngu ngon 寓言 noi truyen nay ma ngu y o truyen kia. \n\t3. De vao day. Nhu ngu muc 寓目 de mat vao day. \n\t4. Gui toi. Nhu ngu thu 寓書 gui thu toi.
寔=that [shi2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu that 實.
寖=tam [jin4]\n\t1. Tham dan. Nhu tam thinh tam suy 寖盛寖衰 dan thinh dan suy.
寘=tri [shi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 置.
寞=mich [mo4]\n\t1. Tich mich 寂寞 yen lang.
察=sat [cha2]\n\t1. Xet lai. \n\t2. Ro ret. \n\t3. Xet net nghiet nga. \n\t4. Xet net be bat, ngay xua goi toa ngu su la sat vien 察院 nghia la giam sat ve viec quan lai vay.
寡=qua [gua3]\n\t1. It. \n\t2. Nam muoi tuoi ma chua co chong goi la qua. \n\t3. Goa chong. \n\t4. Loi noi nhun minh. Cac vua chu hau ngay xua tu xung minh la qua nhan 寡人, nguoi nuoc nay noi chuyen voi nguoi nuoc kia, co noi den vua minh cung goi la qua quan 寡君 nghia la noi nhun minh la nguoi it duc tot.
寢=tam [qin3]\n\t1. Ngu. \n\t2. Nha, trong nha cho de lam viec goi la chanh tam 正寢, cho de nghi ngoi goi la noi tam 內寢. \n\t3. Lang tam, cho mo ma nha vua goi la lang tam 陵寢. \n\t4. Thoi, nghi. Nhu ki su di tam 其事已寢 thua viec da thoi het. Toai tam ki nghi 遂寢其議 ben bo thua dieu da ban. \n\t5. Hun hoan, ngan ngui, thap be, ta cai dang bo nguoi xau xi. 
寝=tam [qin3]\n\t1. Ngu. \n\t2. Nha, trong nha cho de lam viec goi la chanh tam 正寢, cho de nghi ngoi goi la noi tam 內寢. \n\t3. Lang tam, cho mo ma nha vua goi la lang tam 陵寢. \n\t4. Thoi, nghi. Nhu ki su di tam 其事已寢 thua viec da thoi het. Toai tam ki nghi 遂寢其議 ben bo thua dieu da ban. \n\t5. Hun hoan, ngan ngui, thap be, ta cai dang bo nguoi xau xi. 
寤=ngu [wu4]\n\t1. Thuc day. Nhu ngu mi cau chi 寤寐求之 thuc ngu cau day.
寥=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Cho hu khong. Nhu tich lieu 寂寥 lang le menh mong. Lieu lac 寥落 le te, vang ve. Pham vat gi it oi deu goi la lieu.
實=that [shi2]\n\t1. Giau, day nich. Nhu than gia an that 身家殷實 minh nha giau co. \n\t2. That, cai gi thuc co goi la that. Nhu that tai 實在 that con, that tinh 實情 tinh that, v.v. \n\t3. Chung thuc. Nhu di that ngo ngon 以實吾言 lay chung thuc loi ta noi, nghia la to ro duoc loi minh noi khong phai la ngoa. Vi the nen co cai co gi de vin lay ma noi goi la khau that 口實. \n\t4. Su tich. Nhu neu su tich thuc ra goi la su that 事實. \n\t6. Cac pham vat. Trong san nha bay la liet cac do goi la dinh that 庭實, cac do binh khi trong dinh quan goi la quan that 軍實.
实=that [shi2]\n\t1. Giau, day nich. Nhu than gia an that 身家殷實 minh nha giau co. \n\t2. That, cai gi thuc co goi la that. Nhu that tai 實在 that con, that tinh 實情 tinh that, v.v. \n\t3. Chung thuc. Nhu di that ngo ngon 以實吾言 lay chung thuc loi ta noi, nghia la to ro duoc loi minh noi khong phai la ngoa. Vi the nen co cai co gi de vin lay ma noi goi la khau that 口實. \n\t4. Su tich. Nhu neu su tich thuc ra goi la su that 事實. \n\t6. Cac pham vat. Trong san nha bay la liet cac do goi la dinh that 庭實, cac do binh khi trong dinh quan goi la quan that 軍實.
寧=ninh [ning2|ning4]\n\t1. Yen on. \n\t2. Tham hoi. Con gai o nha chong ve tham cha me goi la quy ninh 歸寧. \n\t3. Tha, loi thuan theo. Nhu ninh kha 寧可 tha kha, ninh su 寧使 tha khien. Xet ra chu ninh viet 寧 va viet 甯 hai chu y nghia hoi giong nhau ma co phan hoi khac nhau. Nhu an ninh 寧, dinh ninh 寧 deu dung chu ninh 寧, con ten dat hay ho thi dung chu ninh 甯.
宁=ninh [ning2|ning4]\n\t1. Yen on. \n\t2. Tham hoi. Con gai o nha chong ve tham cha me goi la quy ninh 歸寧. \n\t3. Tha, loi thuan theo. Nhu ninh kha 寧可 tha kha, ninh su 寧使 tha khien. Xet ra chu ninh viet 寧 va viet 甯 hai chu y nghia hoi giong nhau ma co phan hoi khac nhau. Nhu an ninh 寧, dinh ninh 寧 deu dung chu ninh 寧, con ten dat hay ho thi dung chu ninh 甯.
寨=trai [zhai4]\n\t1. Cai trai, cam tre cam go xung quanh de phong giu trom giac goi la trai.
審=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Xet ro, xet ki. \n\t2. Xet doan, xet hoi. Nay nha tu phap co mot toa goi la tham phan sanh 審判廳 la cho xet hoi hinh nguc kien tung vay. \n\t3. Dung lam tieng giup loi, co cai y quyet dinh han. Nhu tham nhu thi da 審如是也 xet qua dung nhu the vay.
审=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Xet ro, xet ki. \n\t2. Xet doan, xet hoi. Nay nha tu phap co mot toa goi la tham phan sanh 審判廳 la cho xet hoi hinh nguc kien tung vay. \n\t3. Dung lam tieng giup loi, co cai y quyet dinh han. Nhu tham nhu thi da 審如是也 xet qua dung nhu the vay.
寫=ta [xie3]\n\t1. Doc het ra, thao ra. Nhu kinh Thi noi di ta nga uu 以寫我憂 de doc het long lo cua ta ra. Nay thuong noi su uu du tu dac la ta y 寫意 nghia la y khong bi uat uc vay. \n\t2. Viet, sao chep. \n\t3. Phong theo net but. Nhu ve theo tam anh da chup ra goi la ta chan 寫真 ve theo hinh voc loai vat song goi la ta sinh 寫生. \n\t4. Duc tuong.
写=ta [xie3]\n\t1. Doc het ra, thao ra. Nhu kinh Thi noi di ta nga uu 以寫我憂 de doc het long lo cua ta ra. Nay thuong noi su uu du tu dac la ta y 寫意 nghia la y khong bi uat uc vay. \n\t2. Viet, sao chep. \n\t3. Phong theo net but. Nhu ve theo tam anh da chup ra goi la ta chan 寫真 ve theo hinh voc loai vat song goi la ta sinh 寫生. \n\t4. Duc tuong.
寬=khoan [kuan1]\n\t1. Nha rong, pham vat gi dung chua con co cho rong thua thai deu goi la khoan. \n\t2. Khoan thai, rong rai. \n\t3. Be rong, chieu rong. \n\t4. Tha. Nhu khoan ki ki vang 寬其既往 tha cho dieu loi da lam roi.
宽=khoan [kuan1]\n\t1. Nha rong, pham vat gi dung chua con co cho rong thua thai deu goi la khoan. \n\t2. Khoan thai, rong rai. \n\t3. Be rong, chieu rong. \n\t4. Tha. Nhu khoan ki ki vang 寬其既往 tha cho dieu loi da lam roi.
寮=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Cai cua so nho. \n\t2. Dong lieu 同寮 cung nhu dong song 同窗 nghia ke cung lam quan mot so voi minh, co khi viet chu lieu 僚. \n\t3. Cai am cua su o. Pham cai nha nho deu goi la lieu ca. Quan ban nuoc cung goi la tra lieu 茶寮.
寯=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Tai gioi.
寰=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Trong coi dat cua thien tu cai tri goi la hoan. \n\t2. Pham noi ve bo coi rong lon deu goi la hoan. Nhu doanh hoan 瀛寰, hoan vu 寰宇, cung nhu ta noi hoan cau vay. \n\t3. Noi bao la ve cac coi khong dau. Nhu tien hoan 仙寰 coi tien, tran hoan 塵寰 coi tran, v.v.
寳=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bao 寶.
寵=sung [chong3]\n\t1. Yeu, an hue, ve vang. \n\t2. Tuc goi vo le la sung, nen lay vo le goi la nap sung 納寵.
宠=sung [chong3]\n\t1. Yeu, an hue, ve vang. \n\t2. Tuc goi vo le la sung, nen lay vo le goi la nap sung 納寵.
寶=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Bau, pham vat gi quy deu goi la bao ca. \n\t2. Cai an, con dau. Cac vua doi xua dung ngoc khue ngoc bich lam cai an cai dau. Nha Tan goi la ti 璽, nha Duong lai doi la bao 寶. \n\t3. Tien te cung goi la bao. Nhu nguyen bao 元寶 nen bac, thong bao 通寶 dong tien, v.v. Tuc viet la 寳.
宝=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Bau, pham vat gi quy deu goi la bao ca. \n\t2. Cai an, con dau. Cac vua doi xua dung ngoc khue ngoc bich lam cai an cai dau. Nha Tan goi la ti 璽, nha Duong lai doi la bao 寶. \n\t3. Tien te cung goi la bao. Nhu nguyen bao 元寶 nen bac, thong bao 通寶 dong tien, v.v. Tuc viet la 寳.
