寸=thon [cun4]\n\t1. Tac, muoi phan la mot tac. \n\t2. Noi vi du cac su nho be. Nhu thon bo nan hanh 寸步難行 tac buoc kho di, thon am kha tich 寸陰可惜 tac bong quang am kha tiec, v.v.
寺=tu [si4]\n\t1. Dinh quan. \n\t2. Tu nhan 寺人 ke hau trong (hoan quan). \n\t3. Chua, doi vua Han Minh de 漢明帝 moi don hai vi su ben Thien Truc 天竺 sang, vi chua co cho o rieng moi don vao o so Hong lo tu, vi the nen ve sau cac cho su o deu goi la tu.
対=doi [-]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu doi 對.
封=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Phong cho, vua cho cac bay toi dat tu tri lay goi la phong. \n\t2. Nhan lam quan duoc vua ban cho cac ten hieu hay cung goi la phong, la cao phong 誥封. Con lam quan, cha duoc phong tuoc goi la phong ong 封翁 hay phong quan 封君. \n\t3. Bo coi. Nhu chuc quan giu viec coi ngoai bo coi nuoc goi la phong nhan 封人. Nay thuong goi cac quan dau tinh la phong cuong trong nham 封彊重任. \n\t4. To lon. \n\t5. Dap. Nhu phong phan 封墳 dap ma. \n\t6. Giau co. Nhu to phong 素封 von giau. \n\t7. Day, day lai. Nhu tin phong 信封 phong tho. \n\t8. Ngan cam. Nhu co tri tu phong 故智自封 nghia la khong biet giang cau cai hay moi ma cu ngan cam minh trong loi cu.
専=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Chuyen, lam viec gi chu y ca vao viec ay goi la chuyen. \n\t2. Chi co mot. Nhu chuyen mi 専美 dep co mot, chuyen loi 専利 loi chi mot minh duoc. \n\t3. Cam rieng. Nhu chuyen quyen 専權 cam rieng quyen chinh.
射=xa, da, dich [she4]\n\t1. Ban, cho ten vao cung no ma ban ra goi la xa. Pham co cai gi tong manh roi but ra xa deu goi la xa. \n\t2. Tim kiem, cai gi chu y ma toan muu cho duoc goi la xa. Nhu xa loi 射利 tranh cuop moi loi. \n\t3. Soi. Nhu than quang tu xa 神光四射 anh sang than soi toe bon ben. \n\t4. Mot am la da. Nhu boc da 僕射 chuc quan boc da nha Tan. \n\t5. Lai mot am la dich. Chan, vo dich 無射 khong chan.
尅=khac [ke4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khac 剋.
將=tuong, thuong, tuong [jiang1|jiang4]\n\t1. Sap, se, roi moi. Nhu tuong lai 將來 thoi gian sap toi, sau nay. \n\t2. Cau tha, lam viec cau tha goi la tuong tuu 將就. \n\t3. Nuoi. Nhu bat hoang tuong phu 不遑將父 chang roi nuoi cha. Nay cung goi su nghi ngoi la tuong tuc 將息. \n\t4. Dua. Nhu bach lang tuong chi 百兩將之 tram co xe dua tien day. \n\t5. Cam. Nhu tuong tuong nhi chi 相將而至 cung cam tay ma den, nghia la cung nhau cam tay ma deu di den. \n\t6. Tien. Nhu nhat tuu nguyet tuong 日就月將 ngay toi thang tien. \n\t7. Ben. \n\t8. Manh. \n\t9. Dai. \n\t10. Theo. \n\t11. Mot am la thuong. Xin. \n\t12. Thuong thuong 將將 tieng em dem, dang nghiem chinh. \n\t13. Lai mot am la tuong. Ong tuong. Nhu dai tuong 大將, tuong si 將士, v.v. \n\t14. Coi tat ca. Nhu tuong trung quan 將中軍 cam quyen thong xuat ca trung quan.
将=tuong, thuong, tuong [jiang1|jiang4]\n\t1. Sap, se, roi moi. Nhu tuong lai 將來 thoi gian sap toi, sau nay. \n\t2. Cau tha, lam viec cau tha goi la tuong tuu 將就. \n\t3. Nuoi. Nhu bat hoang tuong phu 不遑將父 chang roi nuoi cha. Nay cung goi su nghi ngoi la tuong tuc 將息. \n\t4. Dua. Nhu bach lang tuong chi 百兩將之 tram co xe dua tien day. \n\t5. Cam. Nhu tuong tuong nhi chi 相將而至 cung cam tay ma den, nghia la cung nhau cam tay ma deu di den. \n\t6. Tien. Nhu nhat tuu nguyet tuong 日就月將 ngay toi thang tien. \n\t7. Ben. \n\t8. Manh. \n\t9. Dai. \n\t10. Theo. \n\t11. Mot am la thuong. Xin. \n\t12. Thuong thuong 將將 tieng em dem, dang nghiem chinh. \n\t13. Lai mot am la tuong. Ong tuong. Nhu dai tuong 大將, tuong si 將士, v.v. \n\t14. Coi tat ca. Nhu tuong trung quan 將中軍 cam quyen thong xuat ca trung quan.
尉=uy, uat [wei4|yu4]\n\t1. Quan uy, cac quan coi nguc va bat trom giac doi xua deu goi la uy. Nhu dinh uy 廷尉, huyen uy 縣尉 deu lay cai nghia tru ke gian cho dan yen ca. \n\t2. Quan uy, quan binh doi Tan deu goi la uy. Nhu thai uy 太尉, do uy 都尉, hieu uy 校尉, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la uat. Uat tri 尉遲 ho Uat-tri.
尊=ton [zun1]\n\t1. Ton trong. Nhu ton truong 尊長 nguoi ton truong, ton khach 尊客 khach quy, v.v. \n\t2. Kinh. Nhu ton xu 尊處 cho ngai o, ton phu 尊府 phu ngai, lenh ton 令尊 cu ong nha ngai, v.v. \n\t3. Cai chen, nay thong dung chu ton 樽. \n\t4. Mot pho tuong than hay Phat cung goi la nhat ton 一尊. \n\t5. Quan dia phuong minh cung goi la ton. Nhu phu ton 府尊 quan phu toi.
尋=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Tim. \n\t2. Cai tam, tam thuoc goi la mot tam. \n\t3. Van. Nhu nhat tam can qua 日尋干戈 ngay van danh nhau. \n\t4. Bong, sap. Nhu tam cap 尋及 sap kip, bach phat xam tam 白髮侵尋 toc da bac dan, nghia la sap gia. \n\t5. Lai. Nhu tam minh 尋盟 lai dinh loi the cu. \n\t6. Dung. Nhu tuong tam su yen 將尋師焉 se dung quan vay.
寻=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Tim. \n\t2. Cai tam, tam thuoc goi la mot tam. \n\t3. Van. Nhu nhat tam can qua 日尋干戈 ngay van danh nhau. \n\t4. Bong, sap. Nhu tam cap 尋及 sap kip, bach phat xam tam 白髮侵尋 toc da bac dan, nghia la sap gia. \n\t5. Lai. Nhu tam minh 尋盟 lai dinh loi the cu. \n\t6. Dung. Nhu tuong tam su yen 將尋師焉 se dung quan vay.
對=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Thua, dap. Nhu doi sach 對策 tra loi cau nguoi ta hoi, doi pho 對付 ung pho, v.v. \n\t2. Doi. Nhu doi chung tuyen ngon 對眾宣言 doi truoc moi nguoi ma noi ro, tuong doi vo ngon 相對無言 cung doi nhau ma khong noi gi. Den truoc cua toa de quan hoi kien la doi chat 對質. \n\t3. Doi, hai ben song voi nhau, goi la doi. Nhu doi lien 對聯 cau doi. \n\t4. Hop, su gi khong hop le goi la bat doi 不對. \n\t5. Xet lai. Nhu hieu doi 校對 so sanh xet lai.
对=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Thua, dap. Nhu doi sach 對策 tra loi cau nguoi ta hoi, doi pho 對付 ung pho, v.v. \n\t2. Doi. Nhu doi chung tuyen ngon 對眾宣言 doi truoc moi nguoi ma noi ro, tuong doi vo ngon 相對無言 cung doi nhau ma khong noi gi. Den truoc cua toa de quan hoi kien la doi chat 對質. \n\t3. Doi, hai ben song voi nhau, goi la doi. Nhu doi lien 對聯 cau doi. \n\t4. Hop, su gi khong hop le goi la bat doi 不對. \n\t5. Xet lai. Nhu hieu doi 校對 so sanh xet lai.
導=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Dan dua, di truoc duong goi la tien dao 前導. \n\t2. Chi dan. Nhu khai dao 開導 mo loi, huan dao 訓導 day bao, v.v. \n\t3. Dao su 導師 ong thay chi ve cho minh biet cho me lam ma di ve duong chinh.
导=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Dan dua, di truoc duong goi la tien dao 前導. \n\t2. Chi dan. Nhu khai dao 開導 mo loi, huan dao 訓導 day bao, v.v. \n\t3. Dao su 導師 ong thay chi ve cho minh biet cho me lam ma di ve duong chinh.
小=tieu [xiao3]\n\t1. Nho. \n\t2. Hep hoi. Nhu khi tieu di doanh 器小易盈 do hep de day. \n\t3. Khinh thuong. Nhu vi mien tieu thi 未免小視 chua khoi coi la ke tam thuong, nghia la coi chang vao dau ca. \n\t4. Nang hau.
少=thieu, thieu [shao3|shao4]\n\t1. It. \n\t2. Tam chut. Nhu thieu khoanh 少頃 ti nua. \n\t3. Che, che nguoi goi la thieu chi 少之. \n\t4. Mot am la thieu. Tre. Nhu thieu nien 少年 tuoi tre. \n\t5. Ke giup viec thu hai. Nhu quan thai su 太師 thi lai co quan thieu su 少師 giup viec.
尒=nhi [ni3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu nhi 爾.
尖=tiem [jian1]\n\t1. Nhon, pham cai gi mui nhon deu goi la tiem. Pham nghi ngoi, noi nang, van tu, tieng tam sac mac deu goi la tiem. Nhu van tho kheo tia tot tung ly tung ti goi la tiem xao 尖巧. \n\t2. Cai gi tot tuc cung goi la tiem. \n\t3. Nhung noi de cho khach di doc duong an uong nghi ngoi, tuc cung goi la da tiem 打尖.
尙=thuong [shang4]\n\t1. Ngo hau. Nhu thuong huong 尙饗 ngo hau huong cho. \n\t2. Con. Nhu thuong huu dien hinh 尙有典型 con co khuon phep. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu vo di tuong thuong 無以相尙 khong lay gi cung tranh hon. \n\t4. Chuong, tren. Nhu thuong duc 尙德 chuong duc, thuong si 尙齒 chuong tuoi, v.v. \n\t5. Chu, het thay cac nguoi giu viec tien do cho vua dung deu goi la thuong. Nhu thuong y 尙衣 chuc quan coi ao cua vua, thuong thuc 尙食 chuc quan coi ve viec an cua vua. Ngay xua dinh phep quan, ong nao dung dau mot bo nao trong sau bo thi goi la quan thuong thu. Nhu quan dau bo quan lai goi la Lai bo thuong thu 吏部尙書. \n\t6. Sanh doi, lay cong chua goi la thuong, vi ton la con nha vua nen khong dam keu la thu.
尟=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tien 鮮.
尢=uong [wang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu uong 尪.
尤=vuu [you2]\n\t1. La, rat, cang. Nhu thu vuu tuyet tich 殊尤絕迹 la lung het muc, nghia la no khac han cac cai tam thuong. Con gai dep goi la vuu vat 尤物. \n\t2. Oan trach, lam loi. Nhu hieu vuu 效尤 bat chuoc lam dieu lam lac. \n\t3. Hon.
尨=mang, mong [pang2]\n\t1. Cho xom. \n\t2. Lan lon. \n\t3. Mot am la mong. Mong nhung 尨茸 roi rit.
尪=uong [wang1]\n\t1. Khieng chan. \n\t2. Gay yeu.
尫=uong [wang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu uong 尪.
尬=gioi [ga4]\n\t1. Dam gioi 尲尬 di khap khenh. Su gi sinh lam cai loi thoi kho bien cho ranh le duoc, tuc goi la dam gioi.
就=tuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Nen, su da nen goi la su tuu 事就. \n\t2. Toi, theo. Nhu khu tuu 去就 bo toi. \n\t3. Nhoi suy chac. Nhu tuu linh 就令 toi khien. \n\t4. Hay. Nhu tuu dung menh yen 就用命焉 hay dung theo menh vay. 
尲=dam [gan1]\n\t1. Dam gioi 尲尬 di khap khenh. Su gi sinh lam cai loi thoi kho bien cho ranh le duoc, tuc goi la dam gioi.
尸=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Than thi, ngay xua cung te, dung mot dua be len ngoi tren ngai de cho than nuong vao day goi la thi, doi sau moi dung tranh anh thay vao. \n\t2. Thay, nguoi chet chua chon goi la thi, ke song ma khong co tinh than, tuc mia la ke hanh thi tau nhuc 行尸走肉 thit chay thay di. \n\t3. Chu. Nhu kinh Thi noi thuy ki thi chi, huu Te quy nu 誰其尸之有薺季女 ai thua chu viec com canh, co con gai ut nuoc Te. \n\t4. Bay. Nhu Ta truyen chep So Vu vuong Kinh thi 楚武王荆尸 vua So Vu-vuong nuoc So dan quan o dat Kinh. \n\t5. Ngoi khong, khong co ich gi cho cai ngoi chuc cua minh goi la thi. Nhu thi vi 尸位 ngoi hao, thi quan 尸官, quan thua, v.v.
尹=duan [yin3]\n\t1. Tri, chinh. \n\t2. Ten quan, chuc trum truong. Nhu su duan 師尹 quan tuong quoc, huyen duan 縣尹 quan huyen, v.v. \n\t3. Thanh tin.
尺=xich [che3|chi3]\n\t1. Thuoc, muoi tac la mot thuoc.
尻=khao, cuu [kao1]\n\t1. Xuong cung dit. Ta quen doc la chu cuu.
尼=ni, ne, nac, nat [ni2]\n\t1. Ni khau 尼丘 nui Ni-khau, duc Khong-mau (Nhan thi) cau nguyen o nui ay sinh ra duc Khong-tu, nen moi dat ten ngai la Khau. \n\t2. Su nu, tieng Pham la ti khieu ni nghia la vi su nu da thu gioi cu tuc (400 dieu gioi), tuc goi la ni co. \n\t3. Mot am la ne. Ngan can. Nhu ne ki hanh 尼其行 ngan khong cho di len, co noi doc la nac. \n\t4. Lai mot am la nat. Than gan. Cung nhu chu 昵.
尾=vi [wei3|yi3]\n\t1. Duoi. \n\t2. Cuoi. Nhu thu vi bat ung 首尾不應 dau cuoi chang ung nhau. \n\t3. Sao vi, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t4. So cuoi. \n\t5. Theo sau. \n\t6. Vun vat. \n\t7. Chim muong giao tiep nhau.
尿=nieu [niao4|sui1]\n\t1. Nuoc dai (nuoc giai).
局=cuc [ju2]\n\t1. Cuoc, bo phan. Chia lam bo phan rieng deu goi la cuc. Nhu viec quan chia rieng tung bon de lam rieng tung viec goi la chuyen cuc 専局, cho nen nguoi duong su goi la duong cuc 當局 nguoi dang cuoc, cuc noi 局內 trong cuoc, cuc ngoai 局外 ngoai cuoc, v.v. Nghe danh bac cung chia moi nguoi mot viec cho nen cung goi la cuc. Moi mot van co goi la mot cuc (mot cuoc). Thoi the bien thien nhu the ban co, cho nen goi viec nuoc van doi la dai cuc 大局 hay thoi cuc 時局. \n\t2. Khi phach do luong cua mot nguoi cung goi la cuc. Nhu khi cuc 器局, cuc luong 局量, v.v. nghia la cai do luong dung duoc la bao nhieu vay. \n\t3. Co. Nhu cuc xuc 局促 co quap.
屁=thi [pi4]\n\t1. Hoi tiet xuong duoi. Tuc goi danh ram la phong thi 放屁.
居=cu, ki [ju1]\n\t1. O. Nhu yen cu 燕居 nhan, nghia la luc o trong nha nhan roi khong co viec gi. \n\t2. Tich chua. Nhu hoa cu 化居 doi cai cua minh da tich ra, cu tich 居積 tich chua cua cai, cu ki 居奇 tich cua doi luc dat moi ban. De y lam hai nguoi goi la cu tam bat luong 居心不良. \n\t3. Chiem. Nhu cu ki da so 居其多數 chiem thua so nhieu. \n\t4. Yen. Nhu cu nhien nhu thu 居然如此 yen nhien nhu the. \n\t5. Cu si 居士 dan ong o nha tu theo Phat phap, giu nam dieu gioi thanh tinh goi la cu si, cac nha hoc gia o an khong ra doi bon tau cung goi la cu si. \n\t6. Mot am la ki. Loi noi giup loi. Nhu ha ki 何居 sao den nhu the ?
屆=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Den. Nhu gioi thoi 屆時 toi thoi, mot lan cung goi la nhat gioi 一屆.
届=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Den. Nhu gioi thoi 屆時 toi thoi, mot lan cung goi la nhat gioi 一屆.
屈=khuat, quat [qu1]\n\t1. Cong, pham su gi cong khong duoi duoc deu goi la khuat. Nhu ly khuat tu cung 理屈詞窮 le khuat loi cung, bi oan uc khong to ra duoc goi la oan khuat 冤屈, v.v. \n\t2. Chiu khuat. Nhu khuat tiet 屈節 chiu bo cai tiet cua minh ma theo nguoi. \n\t3. Mot am la quat. Nhu quat cuong 屈疆 cung coi.
届=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 屇.
屋=oc [wu1]\n\t1. Nha o. \n\t2. Mui xe. Nhu hoang oc ta dao 黃屋左纛 mui xe vang co tiet mao cam ben ta.
屍=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Thay nguoi chet.
屎=thi, hi [shi3]\n\t1. Cut (phan). \n\t2. Mot am la hi. Dien hi 殿屎 ren ram.
屏=binh [bing3|ping2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 屛.
屐=kich [ji1]\n\t1. Cai guoc go.
屑=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Mat vun. Nhu thiet tiet 鐵屑 mat sat. \n\t2. Vun vat. \n\t3. Them. Nhu bat tiet 不屑 chang them. \n\t4. Sach. \n\t5. Khinh thuong.
展=trien [zhan3]\n\t1. Giai, mo. Boc mo ra goi la trien. \n\t2. Khoan hen. Nhu trien ki 展期 khoan cho them hen nua. \n\t3. Tham. Nhu trien mo 展墓 vieng tham mo. \n\t4. Xem xet. \n\t5. Ghi chep. \n\t6. Thanh thuc. \n\t7. Hau, an o trung hau.
屙=a [e1]\n\t1. Di ia.
屛=binh, binh [ping2]\n\t1. Che, cai binh phong. Vua thien tu phong cho cac ho hang va cong than ra lam vua chu hau cac dia phuong goi la binh phien 屛藩 nghia la de che cho cho nha vua vay. \n\t2. Ken may buc ve lai lam mot mang cung goi la binh. Nhu binh dieu 屛條, binh doi 屛對 nghia la ken cac buc tranh lai de treo cho kin tuong vach cho dep. \n\t3. Binh dinh 屛營 so hai. \n\t4. Mot am la binh. Tru di, duoi di. \n\t5. Lui, dung hau khep nep goi la binh tuc di dai 屛息以待 nghia la khep nep dung lui mot ben hau khong dam tho to vay.
屜=the [ti4]\n\t1. Cai giat co lot trong giay dep. \n\t2. Cac thu ro ra ba phu vao cac do khac, tuc goi la truu the 抽屜. \n\t3. Cai lot tren yen ngua.
屉=the [ti4]\n\t1. Cai giat co lot trong giay dep. \n\t2. Cac thu ro ra ba phu vao cac do khac, tuc goi la truu the 抽屜. \n\t3. Cai lot tren yen ngua.
屝=phi [fei4]\n\t1. Cai dep co.
屠=do, chu [tu2]\n\t1. Mo, giet. Nhu do duong 屠羊 giet de, danh thanh giet het ca dan trong thanh goi la do thanh 屠城. \n\t2. Ke giet loai vat ban goi la do te 屠宰, ke ban ruou goi la do co 屠沽. \n\t3. Mot am la chu. Huu chu 休屠 ten hieu vua nuoc Hung-no.
屢=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Thuong, luon.
屡=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Thuong, luon.
屣=ti, xi [xi3]\n\t1. Giay. Nhu te ti 敝屣 giay rach, noi bong la cai cua khong co gia tri gi, cung doc la xi.
層=tang [ceng2]\n\t1. Tung, lop, hai lan. Nhu tang lau 層樓 gac hai tung. Pham cai gi hai lan chap chong deu goi la tang. Su gi co trat tu goi la tang thu 層次.
层=tang [ceng2]\n\t1. Tung, lop, hai lan. Nhu tang lau 層樓 gac hai tung. Pham cai gi hai lan chap chong deu goi la tang. Su gi co trat tu goi la tang thu 層次.
履=ly [lu:3]\n\t1. Giay da, giay di dong bang da goi la ly. \n\t2. Giay xeo. Nhu lam tham ly bac 臨深履薄 toi cho sau xeo vang mong, noi y la su nguy so. \n\t3. Loc. Nhu phuc ly 福履 phuc loc. \n\t4. Su hanh vi, chi ve su tich da lam nen. Nhu thao ly 操履 cai dau tich da giu duoc trong cac su da qua, ly lich 履歷 cho kinh lich tai chuc vu trong doi da lam ra.
屧=tiep [xie4]\n\t1. Cai guoc.
屨=lu [ju4]\n\t1. Dep da bang gai. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu lu 屢.
屦=lu [ju4]\n\t1. Dep da bang gai. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu lu 屢.
屩=cuoc [jue2]\n\t1. Giay dan bang gai.
屬=chuc, thuoc, chu [shu3|zhu3]\n\t1. Lien, noi. Nhu quan cai tuong chuc 冠蓋相屬 du mu cung lien noi. \n\t2. Pho thac, dan nguoi lam giup su gi goi la chuc. Tuc dung nhu chu chuc 囑. \n\t3. Day du. Nhu chuc yem 屬厭 thoa thich long muon. \n\t4. Bam dinh. Nhu phu chuc 附屬 phu thuoc vao khoa nao. \n\t5. Chuyen chu vao cai gi cung goi la chuc. Nhu chuc y 屬意 chu y, chuc muc 屬目 chu muc, v.v. \n\t6. Ton tuat (thuong giup). \n\t7. Mot am la thuoc. Thuoc ve mot dong. Nhu than thuoc 親屬 ke than thuoc, lieu thuoc 僚屬 ke lam viec cung mot toa. \n\t8. Loai, lu, buc. Nhu nhuoc thuoc 若屬 lu ay. \n\t9. Chap va. Nhu thuoc van 屬文 chap noi van tu. \n\t10. Vua gap. Nhu ha than bat hanh, thuoc duong nhung hang 下臣不幸屬當戎行 ke ha than chang may, vua phai ra hang tran. Tuc quen viet la thuoc, chuc 属. \n\t11. Lai mot am la chu. Rot ra.
属=chuc, thuoc, chu [shu3|zhu3]\n\t1. Lien, noi. Nhu quan cai tuong chuc 冠蓋相屬 du mu cung lien noi. \n\t2. Pho thac, dan nguoi lam giup su gi goi la chuc. Tuc dung nhu chu chuc 囑. \n\t3. Day du. Nhu chuc yem 屬厭 thoa thich long muon. \n\t4. Bam dinh. Nhu phu chuc 附屬 phu thuoc vao khoa nao. \n\t5. Chuyen chu vao cai gi cung goi la chuc. Nhu chuc y 屬意 chu y, chuc muc 屬目 chu muc, v.v. \n\t6. Ton tuat (thuong giup). \n\t7. Mot am la thuoc. Thuoc ve mot dong. Nhu than thuoc 親屬 ke than thuoc, lieu thuoc 僚屬 ke lam viec cung mot toa. \n\t8. Loai, lu, buc. Nhu nhuoc thuoc 若屬 lu ay. \n\t9. Chap va. Nhu thuoc van 屬文 chap noi van tu. \n\t10. Vua gap. Nhu ha than bat hanh, thuoc duong nhung hang 下臣不幸屬當戎行 ke ha than chang may, vua phai ra hang tran. Tuc quen viet la thuoc, chuc 属. \n\t11. Lai mot am la chu. Rot ra.
屭=hi [xi4]\n\t1. Bi hi 贔屭 hang, ta cai dang co suc. \n\t2. Mot loai giong nhu rua rua, xem chu bi 贔.
屮=triet [che4]\n\t1. Cay co moi moc, tuc la chu thao 艸 co.
屯=truan, don [tun2|zhun1]\n\t1. Kho, kho tien len duoc goi la truan chien 屯邅. \n\t2. Mot am la don. Don, hop. Cho dong binh giu cac noi hiem yeu goi la don. Dong binh lam ruong goi la don dien 屯田. Bay gio hop nguoi khai khan ruong nuong cung goi la don dien la do nghia ay. \n\t3. Cai dong dat.
山=san, son [shan1]\n\t1. Nui, giua cho dat phang co cho cao go len, hoac toan dat, hoac toan da, hoac lan ca dat ca da nua, cao ngat goi la nui, thuan dat ma thap goi la doi. Vi trong tim dat phun lua ra ma thanh nui goi la hoa son 火山 nui lua. \n\t2. Mo ma. Nhu san lang 山陵, san huong 山向 deu la ten goi mo ma ca. \n\t3. Ne tam, tam len ne goi la thuong san 上山. Cung doc la chu son.
屹=ngat [ge1|yi4]\n\t1. Ngat ngat 屹屹 cao chot vot, nguoi dung mot minh khong cau den ai goi la ngat nhien bat dong 屹然不動.
屺=di [qi3]\n\t1. Nui troc, kinh Thi co cau trac bi di he, chiem vong mau he 陟彼屺兮瞻望母兮 treo len nui Di chu, nhin ngong me chu. Doi sau noi su nghi nho me la trac di 陟屺 la boi nghia do.
岌=ngap [ji2]\n\t1. Cao ngat. Ngap ngap 岌岌 nguy hiem.
岐=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Nui Ki. \n\t2. Duong re. \n\t3. Troi trot. Nhu ki nguc 岐嶷 be ma co khi tranh vanh khac nguoi.
岑=sam [cen2]\n\t1. Nui nho ma cao.
岔=xoa [cha4]\n\t1. Nga ba, cho duong chia ba nga.
岛=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dao 島.
岡=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Suon nui.
冈=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Suon nui.
岢=kha [ke3]\n\t1. Kha Lam 岢嵐 nui Kha Lam.
岣=cau, cu [gou3]\n\t1. Cau Lu 岣嶁 nui Cau Lu. Cung doc la chu cu.
岧=thieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Thieu nghieu 岧嶢 cao chot vot.
岩=nham [yan2]\n\t1. Da nham, mot chat lan ca da cat de lam thanh vo dat boc qua dia cau. Do khi nong cua dat ma thanh goi la hoa thanh nham 火成岩, do gio thoi nuoc chay mon goi la thuy thanh nham 水成岩.Tuc dung nhu chu nham 巖.
岫=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Hang nui. \n\t2. Ngon nui tron.
岬=giap [jia3]\n\t1. Ve nui. Giua khoang hai qua nui goi la giap. Nui the vao be cung goi la giap.
岱=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Nui dai, tuc nui Thai Son 泰山.
岳=nhac [yue4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nhac 嶽, nam nui Nhac, nui Thai Son cung la mot qua nui trong Ngu Nhac, tren co mot ngon nui la truong nhan phong 丈人峯 vi the nen bo vo goi la nhac truong 岳丈, tuc dung chu nhac nay ca.
岵=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Nui co cay co, kinh Thi 詩經 co cau trac bi ho he, chiem vong phu he 陟彼岵兮瞻望父兮 treo len nui Ho chu, nhin ngong cha chu. Nay noi su nghi nho cha la trac ho 陟岵 la boi do.
岷=dan, man [min2]\n\t1. Nui Dan. Cung doc la chu man.
岸=ngan [an4]\n\t1. Bo. Nhu de ngan 堤岸 bo de. \n\t2. Tu dao chung cho cung cuc goi la dao ngan 道岸 nghia la nguoi hu nho co cong tu hoc biet toi coi hay, cung nhu dam duoi nho nguoi cuu vot vao toi bo vay. Trong kinh Phat noi tu chung den coi chinh giac la dao bi ngan 到彼岸, dang giac ngan 登覺岸 deu la cai nghia ay ca. \n\t3. Cao ngat, ngan nhien dao mao 岸然道貌 dang dao cao ca. The phach khoe manh goi la khoi ngan 魁岸. Tinh khong cung hoa voi moi vat goi la nhai ngan 崖岸 cung cung mot y cao ca.
峋=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Lan tuan 嶙峋 cho suon nui chap trung hom hom.
峒=dong [dong4|tong2]\n\t1. Khong dong 崆峒 nui Khong Dong.
峙=tri [shi4|zhi4]\n\t1. Dung tro troi. \n\t2. Sam du, suc tich.
峝=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Cho muon man o goi la dong. Cung dung chu dong 峒.
峨=nga [e2]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu nga quan bac dai 峨冠博帶 mu cao dai rong. \n\t2. Nga mi 峨嵋 nui Nga Mi.
峪=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Gia duc quan 嘉峪關 cua o Gia Duc.
峭=tieu [qiao4]\n\t1. Chot vot, cho nui cao chot vot chom chom goi la tieu bich 峭壁. \n\t2. Tinh nong nay.
峯=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Ngon nui. \n\t2. Cai buou.
峴=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Ten nui.
岘=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Ten nui.
島=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Bai be, cai cu lao, trong be co cho dat can goi la dao.
岛=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Bai be, cai cu lao, trong be co cho dat can goi la dao.
峻=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu tuan linh 峻嶺 dinh nui cao. \n\t2. Lon. Nhu khac minh tuan duc 克明峻德 hay lam sang duc lon. \n\t3. Sac mac, nghiem ngat.
峽=hap, giap [xia2]\n\t1. Cho mom nui the vao trong nuoc goi la hap. \n\t2. Dia hap 地峽 eo dat, cho hai be thong nhau goi la hai hap 海峽. Co noi doc la chu giap.
峡=hap, giap [xia2]\n\t1. Cho mom nui the vao trong nuoc goi la hap. \n\t2. Dia hap 地峽 eo dat, cho hai be thong nhau goi la hai hap 海峽. Co noi doc la chu giap.
崆=khong [kong1]\n\t1. Khong Dong 崆峒 nui Khong Dong.
崇=sung [chong2]\n\t1. Cao. Nhu sung san 崇山 nui cao. \n\t2. Chuong, ton trong. Ngoi vong cao quy goi la sung. Ton trong ai ma mot long kinh phuc goi la sung bai 崇拜. \n\t3. Tron. Nhu sung trieu 崇朝 tron mot buoi som. \n\t4. Day du.
崋=hoa [hua2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu hoa 華.
崎=khi [qi2]\n\t1. Khi khu 崎嶇 duong nui gap ghenh.
崑=con [kun1]\n\t1. Con Lon 崑崙 nui Con Lon.
崔=thoi [cui1]\n\t1. Cao lon.
崖=nhai [ya2]\n\t1. Ven nui, cung nhu chu nhai 厓.
崗=cuong [gang1|gang3]\n\t1. Suon nui. \n\t2. Cho doi xep dung gac goi la cuong vi 崗位.
岗=cuong [gang1|gang3]\n\t1. Suon nui. \n\t2. Cho doi xep dung gac goi la cuong vi 崗位.
崙=lon [lun2]\n\t1. Con lon 崑崙 nui Con Lon.
崚=lang [leng2]\n\t1. Lang tang 崚嶒 cao chot vot.
崛=quat [jue2]\n\t1. Mot minh troi len. Nhu quat khoi 崛起. Mot minh troi len hon ca.
崞=quach [guo1]\n\t1. Ten dat.
崢=tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh vanh 崢嶸 cao ngat (chot vot). Nguoi be ma da co tai hon nguoi thuong goi la dau gioc tranh vanh 頭角崢嶸.
峥=tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh vanh 崢嶸 cao ngat (chot vot). Nguoi be ma da co tai hon nguoi thuong goi la dau gioc tranh vanh 頭角崢嶸.
崤=hao [xiao2]\n\t1. Ten nui.
崦=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Yem Tu 崦嵫 nui Yem Tu, xua bao cho ay la cho mat troi lan, nen luc nha nhem toi goi la nhat bac yem tu 日薄崦嵫.
崧=tung [song1]\n\t1. Nui to ma cao goi la tung.
崩=bang [beng1]\n\t1. Lo, nui sat goi la bang. \n\t2. Hong, mat. \n\t3. Vua thien tu chet cung goi la bang.
崴=uy [wai3|wei1]\n\t1. Hai Sam Uy 海參崴 (Vladivostok) ten dat, la mot cua be cot yeu ben be dong cua nuoc Nga.
崽=te [zai3]\n\t1. Con, tuc goi cac boi tay la te te 細崽. 
嵆=ke [ji1]\n\t1. Ten nui. \n\t2. Ten ho.
嵋=mi [mei2]\n\t1. Nga Mi 峨嵋 nui Nga Mi.
嵌=kham [kan4|qian4]\n\t1. Hom vao. \n\t2. Ta cai dang nui sau.
嵎=ngu, ngung [yu2]\n\t1. Cho nui cong (goc nui), tua cho hiem ma giu goi la phu ngu 負嵎. Ta quen doc la chu ngung.
嵏=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Cuu Tong 九嵏 nui Cuu Tong.
嵐=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Khi nui, khi nui boc len nghi ngut am uot goi la lam khi 嵐氣. \n\t2. Kha Lam 岢嵐 ten nui, ten huyen.
岚=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Khi nui, khi nui boc len nghi ngut am uot goi la lam khi 嵐氣. \n\t2. Kha Lam 岢嵐 ten nui, ten huyen.
嵒=nham [yan2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nham 巖.
嵩=tung [song1]\n\t1. Nui Tung. Han Vo de 漢武帝 len choi nui Tung Son 嵩山, quan, linh deu nghe tieng xung ho van tue den ba lan. Vi the ngay nay di chuc tho goi la tung chuc 嵩祝.
嵫=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Yem Tu 崤嵫 nui Yem Tu, xua bao cho ay la cho mat troi lan, nen luc nha nhem toi goi la nhat bac yem tu 日薄崤嵫.
嵬=ngoi [wei2]\n\t1. Thoi ngoi 崔嵬 cao ngat. \n\t2. Nui da lan dat cung goi la thoi ngoi. \n\t3. Nha Tong goi cai binh ruou la ngoi. Quan hau than cua ong Han The Chung, ong Nhac Phi 岳飛 deu goi boi ngoi quan 背嵬軍 nghia la quan vac binh ruou hau tuong vay.
嵯=tha [cuo2]\n\t1. Tha nga 嵯峨 cao tut vut (chot vot).
嶂=chuong [zhang4]\n\t1. Ngon nui nhu cai binh phong goi la chuong.
嶄=tiem [zhan3]\n\t1. Cao ngat. \n\t2. Cai gi rat moi tuc goi la tiem tan 嶄新.
崭=tiem [zhan3]\n\t1. Cao ngat. \n\t2. Cai gi rat moi tuc goi la tiem tan 嶄新.
嶇=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Khi khu 崎嶇 duong nui gap ghenh.
岖=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Khi khu 崎嶇 duong nui gap ghenh.
嶍=tap [xi2]\n\t1. Ten dat.
嶒=tang [ceng2]\n\t1. Lang tang 崚嶒 cao chot vot.
嶓=ba [bo1]\n\t1. Ba trung 嶓冢 ven nui.
嶙=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Lan tuan 嶙峋 cho suon nui chap trung hom hom.
嶠=kieu, kieu [jiao4|qiao2]\n\t1. Nui cao ma nhon, vien kieu 員嶠 mot qua nui trong ba nui than o trong be. Cung doc la kieu.
峤=kieu, kieu [jiao4|qiao2]\n\t1. Nui cao ma nhon, vien kieu 員嶠 mot qua nui trong ba nui than o trong be. Cung doc la kieu.
嶧=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Ten nui, ten dat. \n\t2. Nui lien noi nhau.
峄=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Ten nui, ten dat. \n\t2. Nui lien noi nhau.
嶰=giai [xie4]\n\t1. Trong khoang khe suoi trong nui. \n\t2. Ten mot cai hang.
嶷=nghi, nguc [yi2]\n\t1. Cuu nghi 九嶷 nui Cuu Nghi. \n\t2. Mot am la nguc. Ki nguc 岐嶷 be ma co khi tranh vanh khac nguoi.
嶸=vanh [rong2]\n\t1. Tranh vanh 崢嶸 cao ngat (chot vot). Nguoi be ma da co tai hon nguoi thuong goi la dau gioc tranh vanh 頭角崢嶸.
嵘=vanh [rong2]\n\t1. Tranh vanh 崢嶸 cao ngat (chot vot). Nguoi be ma da co tai hon nguoi thuong goi la dau gioc tranh vanh 頭角崢嶸.
嶺=linh [ling3]\n\t1. Dinh nui co the thong ra duong cai duoc goi la linh.
岭=linh [ling3]\n\t1. Dinh nui co the thong ra duong cai duoc goi la linh.
嶼=tu [yu3]\n\t1. Cai dao nho, bai be nho.
屿=tu [yu3]\n\t1. Cai dao nho, bai be nho.
嶽=nhac [yue4]\n\t1. Nui cao ma co ve ton trong goi la nhac.
巇=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Nguy hiem. \n\t2. Lo hoc.
巉=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Nui cao ma hiem hoc nhu dao vot nhon goi la sam nham 巉巖.
巋=vi, khuy [kui1]\n\t1. Tro troi, con co mot minh dung duoc goi la vi. Nhu vi nhien doc ton 巋然獨存 tro troi con mot minh, cung doc la chu khuy.
岿=vi, khuy [kui1]\n\t1. Tro troi, con co mot minh dung duoc goi la vi. Nhu vi nhien doc ton 巋然獨存 tro troi con mot minh, cung doc la chu khuy.
巍=nguy [wei1]\n\t1. Ta cai dang cao lon (long long). Nhu nguy nguy ho duy thien vi dai 巍巍乎惟天為大 long long vay chi troi la lon.
巒=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Cho nui quanh co lien noi goi la loan. \n\t2. Nui nhon hoat. \n\t3. Ngon nui tron.
峦=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Cho nui quanh co lien noi goi la loan. \n\t2. Nui nhon hoat. \n\t3. Ngon nui tron.
巓=dien [dian1]\n\t1. Dinh nui.
巖=nham [yan2]\n\t1. Nui cao ngat troi goi la nham. \n\t2. Cho dat hiem yeu goi la nham ap 巖邑. \n\t3. Nham lang 巖廊 mai hien cao. Duoi mai hien goi la nham ha 巖下. \n\t4. Hang nui.
川=xuyen [chuan1]\n\t1. Dong nuoc, nuoc o trong nui dua dat chay ra goi la xuyen, bay gio deu goi xuyen la song ca. \n\t2. Nuoc chay khong luc nao ngung la thuong xuyen 常川. \n\t3. Tinh Tu-xuyen 四川 thuong goi tat la tinh xuyen.
州=chau [zhou1]\n\t1. Chau, ngay xua nhan thay co nui cao song dai moi chia dat ra tung khu lay nui song lam moc nen goi la chau. \n\t2. Le nha Chu dinh 2500 nha la mot chau, nen sau goi lang minh la chau ly 州里 la vi do.
巡=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Di tuan, di xem xet khu dat minh cai tri goi la tuan. \n\t2. Khap ca. Nhu di khap mot vong goi la nhat tuan 一巡, rot ruou het mot luot cung goi la mot tuan. \n\t3. Thuan tuan 逡巡 rut re, quanh co.
巢=sao [chao2]\n\t1. To, to chim goi la sao. Cho trom cuop tu hop goi la tac sao 賊巢 o giac, hay sao huyet 巢穴 hang to giac, v.v.
工=cong [gong1]\n\t1. Kheo, lam viec kheo goi la cong. \n\t2. Nguoi tho. Pham nguoi nao lam nen do cho nguoi dung duoc deu goi la cong. \n\t3. Quan. Nhu than cong 臣工 noi gom ca cac quan. Tram quan goi la bach cong 百工. \n\t4. Cong xich 工尺 mot tieng goi tat trong pha am nhac thay luat lu.
左=ta, ta [zuo3]\n\t1. Ben trai, pham cai gi o ben tay trai deu goi la ta. Nhu hu ta di dai 虛左以待 de chua ben trai xe de doi nguoi den, y noi can dung lam. \n\t2. Phia dong. Cach dinh phuong huong cho phuong dong la ben tay trai, nen son dong 山東 goi la son ta 山左, giang dong 江東 goi la giang ta 江左, v.v. \n\t3. Bat tien. Nhu ta ke 左計 ke khong hay, hai ben khong hop nhau goi la tuong ta 相左. \n\t4. Khong duoc chinh dinh. Nhu ta dao hoac chung 左道惑眾 dao doi lua chung. \n\t5. Giang xuong, quan bi giang chuc goi la ta thien 左遷. \n\t6. Mot am la ta. Giup, cung nhu chu ta 佐. \n\t7. Tieng noi khiem trong thu tu. Nhu di ngu ta huu 以娛左右 nghia la chi de lam vui cho nguoi hau ha, chu khong dam noi ngay den nguoi minh noi vay. \n\t8. Chung nghiem. Nhu chung ta 證左 nguoi lam chung.
巧=xao [qiao3]\n\t1. Kheo. \n\t2. Tuoi. Nhu xao tieu 巧笑 cuoi tuoi. \n\t3. Doi gia. Nhu xao ngon 巧言 noi doi gia. \n\t4. Vua hay. Nhu thau xao 湊巧 khong hen ma gap. \n\t5. Tuc quen cu den ngay 7 thang 7 lam co ban cau cung hai ngoi sao Khien-nguu Chuc-nu de xin ban tai kheo cho dan ba con gai goi la khat xao 乞巧. Tuc goi   thang 7 la xao nguyet 巧月 la boi do.
巨=cu, ha [ju4]\n\t1. Lon, cu that 巨室 nha co tieng lung lay. So nhieu goi la cu van 巨萬. \n\t2. Ha, cung nghia voi chu 詎.
巫=vu [wu1]\n\t1. Dong cot, ke cau cung cho nguoi goi la vu.
差=soa, si, sai, sai [cha1|cha4|chai1|ci1]\n\t1. Sai nham. \n\t2. Mot am la si. Thu, khong deu. Nhu dang si 等差 lan buc, sam si 參差 so le, v.v. \n\t3. Lai mot am la sai. Sai khien. Ta quen doc la chu sai ca. \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la sai. Chut khac, benh hoi bot goi la tieu sai 小差. Tuc thong dung lam chu sai 瘥.
己=ky [ji3]\n\t1. Can ky, can thu sau trong muoi can. \n\t2. Minh, doi lai voi nguoi. Nhu vi ky 為己 chi vi minh, loi ky 利己 chi loi minh. \n\t3. Rieng, long muon rieng.
已=di [yi3]\n\t1. Thoi. Nhu hieu hieu bat di 嘵嘵不已 nhai nhai chang thoi, nghia la cu noi dai mai. \n\t2. Bo, bai quan, goi tat la di. \n\t3. Qua. Nhu bat vi di tham 不為已甚 chang la qua lam u ? \n\t4. Loi noi su da qua. Nhu di nhien 已然 da roi, di nhi 已而 da ma, v.v. \n\t5. Loi noi het. Nhu mat do da di 末由也已 chang biet noi dau nua vay thoi. \n\t6. Ngay xua hay dung nhu chu di 以.
巳=ti [si4]\n\t1. Chi ti, chi thu sau trong muoi hai chi. Tu chin gio sang den muoi mot gio trua la gio ti. Ngay ti dau thang ba goi la ngay thuong ti 上巳. Tuc nuoc Trinh cu ngay ay lam le cau mat.
巴=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Nuoc Ba, dat Ba. \n\t2. Ba Le 巴黎 Paris.
巵=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu chi 卮.
巷=hang [hang4|xiang4]\n\t1. Ngo tat, ngo di tat o trong lang goi la hang.
巽=ton [xun4]\n\t1. Que ton, la mot que trong bat quai 八卦 nghia la nhun thuan. \n\t2. Nhuong, cung nghia voi chu ton 遜.
巾=can [jin1]\n\t1. Cai khan. \n\t2. Mu bit dau, hoc tro nha Minh hay dung thu mu ay, nen ke nao hoc thuc hu bai goi la dau can khi 頭巾氣.
市=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Cho, cho de mua ban goi la thi. Gia hang vi su cung cau cham tre hay can kip ma len xuong gia goi la thi gia 市價. Noi ve trang huong su mua ban goi la thi dien 市面. Ke lam hang sach cho hai ben mua ban ma lay loi goi la thi quai 市儈. Do gi ben tot goi la thi hoa 市貨, do gi khong tot goi la hanh hoa 行貨. \n\t2. Mua. Nhu co tuu thi bo bat thuc 沽酒市脯不食 (Luan ngu 論語) ruou nem mua o cho khong an, thi an 市恩 mua on, v.v.
帀=tap [za1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tap 匝.
布=bo [bu4]\n\t1. Vai. Nhung do det bang gai bang soi bong goi la bo. \n\t2. Tien te. Nhu hoa bo 貨布, toan bo 全布 deu la thu tien ngay xua. \n\t3. Bay, bay dat do dac goi la bo. Dem cac le noi cho moi nguoi nghe cung goi la bo. \n\t4. Cho. Nhu bo thi 布施 cho khap, cho het. Phep tu nha Phat co sau phep tu toi bo-tat, phep bo thi dung dau, vi phep nay tru duoc ngay cai benh tham vay. Dau tinh co quan bo chanh 布政 nghia la chuc quan thi hanh chanh tri vay.
帆=pham, pham [fan1]\n\t1. Buom, mot thu cang bang vai hay bang chieu dung len tren thuyen cho gio thoi thuyen di. \n\t2. Mot am la pham thuyen xuoi gio.
希=hy [xi1]\n\t1. It. Nhu ki hy 幾希 hau it, hiem, hy han 希罕 hiem co, hy ki 希奇 la lung it thay, v.v. \n\t2. Mong. Nhu hy ki 希冀 mong cau, hy vong 希望 mong ngong, v.v. \n\t3. Vo hinh.
帑=no, thang [tang3]\n\t1. Vo con, cung nhu chu no 拏. \n\t2. Mot am la thang. Kho de cua.
帓=mat [ma4]\n\t1. Cai khan bit dau.
帔=bi [pei4]\n\t1. Cai ap vai (choang). Ngay xua con gai ve nha chong mac ao co cai ap vai bang bang hoa my.
帕=mat, phach, pha [pa4]\n\t1. Cai khan bit tran, bay gio dung lam do deo va goi la thu phach 手帕. \n\t2. Boc. \n\t3. Mot am la pha. Cai man, cai khan phu ban.
帖=thiep [tie1|tie3|tie4]\n\t1. Lay lua viet chu vao lua. Doi xua chua co giay, phai viet vao lua goi la thiep. Doi sau viet vao giay cung goi la thiep. Nhu xuan thiep 春帖 cau doi tet, phu thiep 府帖 dau hieu lam tin trong quan trang, dan thiep 柬帖 cai danh thiep, ne kim thiep tu 泥金帖子 cai don hang hay nhan hieu xoa kim nhu, v.v. \n\t2. Cai thiep khac chu vao da goi la bia, rap lay chu o bia ra goi la thiep. Nhung ban chu cua co nhan hay xin cac nguoi chu tot viet cho de tap goi la thiep. \n\t3. Doi Duong, Tong cu trong ca bai van trich ra may cau de thi hoc tro goi la thiep, cho nen nhung van tho de dung vao thi cu goi la thi thiep 試帖. \n\t4. Yen dinh. Nhu thoa thiep 妥帖, xong xuoi ca, phuc tong cung goi la thiep phuc 帖服 nghia la chiu theo menh lenh ca. 
帘=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Cai co bai ruou. \n\t2. Cai man treo cua cung goi la mon liem 門帘.
帙=trat, pho [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai tui nho. Sach vo doi xua deu dong tung cuon, roi cho vao tui boc lai goi la trat. Nay goi mot hom sach la nhat trat 一帙 cung la boi nghia ay.Ta quen doc la pho. Nhu thu nhat trat 書一帙 sach mot pho.
帚=truu [zhou3]\n\t1. Cai choi, cai dung de quet de giat rua deu goi la chuu.
帛=bach [bo2]\n\t1. Lua, thu det bang to tran goi la bach.
帝=de [di4]\n\t1. Vua. \n\t2. Vi than rat ton goi la de. Nhu troi goi la thuong de 上帝.
帢=khap [qia4]\n\t1. Cai mu, thu mu rieng cua Nguy Vu De 魏武帝 che ra.
帥=suat, suy [shuai4]\n\t1. Thong suat. Nhu suat su 帥師 thong suat ca canh quan di. \n\t2. Lam guong, lay minh lam phep cho nguoi ta noi goi la suat. Nhu Nghieu Thuan suat, thien ha di nhan 堯舜帥天下以仁 vua Nghieu Thuan lam guong cho thien ha noi theo lam nhan. \n\t2. Mot am la suy. Tuong coi ca mot canh quan goi la suy. Nhu nguyen suy 元帥 tuong dau. Tuc goi Tong doc la dai suy 大帥 nghia la kiem coi ca viec quan vay.
帅=suat, suy [shuai4]\n\t1. Thong suat. Nhu suat su 帥師 thong suat ca canh quan di. \n\t2. Lam guong, lay minh lam phep cho nguoi ta noi goi la suat. Nhu Nghieu Thuan suat, thien ha di nhan 堯舜帥天下以仁 vua Nghieu Thuan lam guong cho thien ha noi theo lam nhan. \n\t2. Mot am la suy. Tuong coi ca mot canh quan goi la suy. Nhu nguyen suy 元帥 tuong dau. Tuc goi Tong doc la dai suy 大帥 nghia la kiem coi ca viec quan vay.
帨=thue [shui4]\n\t1. Cai khan tay.
師=su [shi1]\n\t1. Nhieu, dong duc. Nhu cho do hoi trong nuoc goi la kinh su 京師 nghia la cho to rong va dong nguoi. \n\t2. Phep nha binh ngay xua dinh cu 2500 nguoi goi la mot su. \n\t3. Day nguoi ta hoc ve dao duc hoc van goi la su. Nhu su pham giao khoa 師範教科 khoa day dao lam thay. \n\t4. Co mot cai so truong ve mot nghe gi cung goi la su. Nhu hoa su 畫師, thay ve. \n\t5. Bat chuoc. Nhu ho tuong su phap 互相師法 dap doi cung bat chuoc. \n\t6. Nguoi trum. Nhu boc su 卜師 quan trum ve viec boi, nhac su 樂師 quan trum coi ve am nhac, v.v.
师=su [shi1]\n\t1. Nhieu, dong duc. Nhu cho do hoi trong nuoc goi la kinh su 京師 nghia la cho to rong va dong nguoi. \n\t2. Phep nha binh ngay xua dinh cu 2500 nguoi goi la mot su. \n\t3. Day nguoi ta hoc ve dao duc hoc van goi la su. Nhu su pham giao khoa 師範教科 khoa day dao lam thay. \n\t4. Co mot cai so truong ve mot nghe gi cung goi la su. Nhu hoa su 畫師, thay ve. \n\t5. Bat chuoc. Nhu ho tuong su phap 互相師法 dap doi cung bat chuoc. \n\t6. Nguoi trum. Nhu boc su 卜師 quan trum ve viec boi, nhac su 樂師 quan trum coi ve am nhac, v.v.
席=tich [xi2]\n\t1. Cai chieu. \n\t2. Nho. Nhan vi. Nhu tich tien nhan chi du liet 席前人之餘烈 nho chung nghiep thua cua nguoi truoc. \n\t3. Cho ngoi, ngay xua giai chieu xuong dat ma ngoi nen goi cho ngoi la tich. \n\t4. Ngay xua giai chieu de lam viec nen goi chuc vu la tich. Nhu hinh tich 刑席, nguoi ban giup ve viec hinh danh. \n\t5. Bao quat. Nhu tich quyen thien ha 席卷天下 cuon sach ca thien ha.
帲=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cai man, binh mong 帲幪 man dung. Cai che o tren goi la mong, cai che o chung quanh goi la binh. Noi bong la che cho. Nhu hanh liet binh mong 幸列帲幪 may duoc vao hang che cho.
帳=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Cang len, duong len. Nhu cung truong 共帳 cang man, duong man, thong dung nhu cung truong 供帳. \n\t2. Man che, quan di den dau, cang vai len lam giap de nghi goi la truong. Nhu doanh truong 營帳, truong bang 帳棚, v.v. Nay ta dung cac thu det dep hay da ho giai phu len cho ngoi cung goi la truong. \n\t3. Tinh so. Nhu truong ba 帳簿 so sach.
帐=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Cang len, duong len. Nhu cung truong 共帳 cang man, duong man, thong dung nhu cung truong 供帳. \n\t2. Man che, quan di den dau, cang vai len lam giap de nghi goi la truong. Nhu doanh truong 營帳, truong bang 帳棚, v.v. Nay ta dung cac thu det dep hay da ho giai phu len cho ngoi cung goi la truong. \n\t3. Tinh so. Nhu truong ba 帳簿 so sach.
帵=oan [wan1]\n\t1. Nhung mieng mun cat thua ra goi la oan.
帶=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Giai ao, cai dai. \n\t2. Deo. Nhu dai dao 帶刀 deo dao, dai kiem 帶劍 deo guom, v.v. \n\t3. Mang theo. Nhu dai linh 帶領, hue dai 攜帶 deu nghia mang dat theo ca. \n\t4. Giai dat, tieng dung de chia khi hau qua dat. Nhu on dai 溫帶 giai dat am, han dai 寒帶 giai dat ret, v.v.
带=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Giai ao, cai dai. \n\t2. Deo. Nhu dai dao 帶刀 deo dao, dai kiem 帶劍 deo guom, v.v. \n\t3. Mang theo. Nhu dai linh 帶領, hue dai 攜帶 deu nghia mang dat theo ca. \n\t4. Giai dat, tieng dung de chia khi hau qua dat. Nhu on dai 溫帶 giai dat am, han dai 寒帶 giai dat ret, v.v.
帷=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Cai man che, dung vai hay lua khau thanh tung buc che cho kin be trong goi la duy. Khong biet tri nha goi la duy bac bat tu 帷薄不修 la boi nghia do.
常=thuong [chang2]\n\t1. Thuong (lau mai). \n\t2. Dao thuong. Nhu nhan nghia le tri tin 仁義禮智信 goi la ngu thuong 五常 nghia la nam ay la nam dao thuong cua nguoi luc nao cung phai co khong the thieu duoc. \n\t3. Binh thuong. Nhu thuong nhan 常人 nguoi thuong, binh thuong 平常, tam thuong 尋常, v.v.
帽=mao [mao4]\n\t1. Cai mu, cac thu dung de doi dau deu goi la mao.
幀=tranh [zhen1]\n\t1. Buc tranh, mot buc ve goi la nhat tranh 一幀.
帧=tranh [zhen1]\n\t1. Buc tranh, mot buc ve goi la nhat tranh 一幀.
幂=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Lay khan phu do. \n\t2. Cai che mat.
幃=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Cai truong don. Phong vi 房幃 noi cho kin trong buong the. \n\t2. Cai tui thom.
帏=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Cai truong don. Phong vi 房幃 noi cho kin trong buong the. \n\t2. Cai tui thom.
幄=ac [wo4]\n\t1. Cai man man du ca tren duoi bon mat goi la ac.
幅=phuc, buc [fu2]\n\t1. Buc, mot tieng dung de do vai lua. Nhu ky phuc 幾幅 may buc ? \n\t2. Sua sang. Nhu tu suc bien phuc 修飭邊幅 sua sang diem dua nhu tam lua phai chai chuot hai ben mep. \n\t3. Mot am la buc. Lay lua quan cheo tu chan den goi nhu sa-cap vay. Ta quen doc la chu buc ca.
幌=hoang [huang3]\n\t1. Man dung. \n\t2. Tuc goi cai co bai ruou la hoang tu 幌子.
幔=man [man4]\n\t1. Man che.
幕=mac, mo, man [mu4]\n\t1. Cai man che o tren goi la mac. Trong quan phai duong man len de o, nen cho quan tuong o goi la mac phu 幕府. Cac ban khach coi viec van thu o trong phu goi la mac huu 幕友, thuong goi tat la mac. Nay thuong goi cac nguoi coi viec to boi giay ma o trong nha la mac, la boi nghia do. Thuong doc la mo \n\t2. Mo man, dong tuong truoc phai cang man, den luc dien tro moi mo, vi the nen su gi moi bat dau lam deu goi la khai mac 開幕 mo man, dan dau. \n\t3. Co khi dung nhu chu mac 漠. \n\t4. Mot am la man. Mat trai dong tien.
幗=quac [guo2]\n\t1. Mot thu de trang suc dau dan ba, cho nen goi con gai la can quac 巾幗.
帼=quac [guo2]\n\t1. Mot thu de trang suc dau dan ba, cho nen goi con gai la can quac 巾幗.
幘=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai khan ven toc.
帻=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai khan ven toc.
幛=chuong, truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Buc chuong, dung vai hay lua viet chu de mung hay vieng nguoi goi la chuong. Cung doc la truong.
幞=phoc [fu2]\n\t1. Cai khan bit dau.
幟=xi [zhi4]\n\t1. Co hieu.
帜=xi [zhi4]\n\t1. Co hieu.
幡=phien [fan1]\n\t1. Co hieu. \n\t2. Lat mat, cung nhu chu phien 翻. Nhu phien nhien cai viet 幡然改曰 tro mat doi giong rang.
幢=chang [chuang2|zhuang4]\n\t1. Cai chang, mot thu co dung lam nghi ve. Nha Phat viet kinh vao co ay goi la kinh chang 經幢, khac vao cot da goi la thach chang 石幢.
幣=te [bi4]\n\t1. Lua, doi xua thuong dung lam do tang nhau. \n\t2. Cua dung, doi xua cho ngoc la thuong te 上幣, vang la trung te 中幣, dao vai la ha te 下幣. Tu nha Han ve sau deu goi tien la te.
币=te [bi4]\n\t1. Lua, doi xua thuong dung lam do tang nhau. \n\t2. Cua dung, doi xua cho ngoc la thuong te 上幣, vang la trung te 中幣, dao vai la ha te 下幣. Tu nha Han ve sau deu goi tien la te.
幧=thieu [qiao1]\n\t1. Thieu dau 幧頭 cai khan ven toc.
幨=xiem [chan1]\n\t1. Cai man xe.
幪=mong [meng2]\n\t1. Trum. Binh mong 帲幪 man dung. Cai che o tren goi la mong, cai che o chung quanh goi la binh. Noi bong la che cho. Nhu hanh liet binh mong 幸列帲幪 may duoc vao hang che cho.
幫=bang [bang1]\n\t1. Chua mep day. \n\t2. Giup, dong dang goi la bang. Nhu mot dang goi la mot bang.
帮=bang [bang1]\n\t1. Chua mep day. \n\t2. Giup, dong dang goi la bang. Nhu mot dang goi la mot bang.
幬=tru, dao [chou2|dao4]\n\t1. Man ngoi thuyen dinh. \n\t2. Man xe. \n\t2. Mot am la dao. Che chum.
帱=tru, dao [chou2|dao4]\n\t1. Man ngoi thuyen dinh. \n\t2. Man xe. \n\t2. Mot am la dao. Che chum.
干=can [gan1|gan4]\n\t1. Pham. Nhu can pham 干犯. \n\t2. Cau. Nhu can loc 干祿 cau loc. \n\t3. Cai moc, mot thu do binh lam bang da de chong do cac mui nhon va ten dan. \n\t4. Giu. Nhu can thanh 干城 nguoi bay toi giu gin xa tac. \n\t5. Ben nuoc. Nhu ha can 河干 ben song. \n\t6. Can. Nhu giap 甲, at 乙, binh 丙, dinh 丁, mau 戊, ki 己, canh 庚, tan 辛, nham 壬, quy 癸 la muoi can. \n\t7. Can thiep. Nhu tuong can 相干 cung quan thiep. \n\t8. Cai. Nhu nhuoc can 若干 ngan ay cai.
平=binh, bien [ping2]\n\t1. Bang phang. Nhu thuy binh 水平 nuoc phang, dia binh 地平dat phang. Hai ben cach nhau ma cung tien len deu nhau goi la binh hanh tuyen 平行線. \n\t2. Bang nhau. Nhu binh dang 平等 bang dang, binh chuan 平準 quan san thue ma bang nhau, v.v. Nay goi su dem gao nha nuoc ra ban re cho gia gao khoi kem la binh thieu 平糶 la boi nghia do. \n\t3. Binh tri. Chiu phuc ma khong dam chong lai goi la binh phuc 平服, yen lang vo su goi la binh yen 平安 hay thai binh 太平. \n\t4. Hoa binh, su gi lam cho trong long tam tuc goi la bat binh 不平. \n\t5. Thuong. Nhu binh nhat 平日 ngay thuong, binh sinh 平生 luc thuong, v.v. Xoang. Nhu binh dam 平淡 nhat nheo, loang xoang. \n\t6. Cai mau nang nhe trong phep can. Tuc dung nhu chu xung 秤. \n\t7. Tieng bang. \n\t8. Mot am la bien. Bien bien 平平 sua tri, chia deu.
年=nien [nian2]\n\t1. Nam. \n\t2. Tuoi. \n\t3. Nguoi do cung khoa goi la dong nien 同年. Hai nha di lai voi nhau goi la nien nghi 年誼. \n\t4. Duoc mua.
幷=tinh, binh [bing4]\n\t1. Hop, gom. \n\t2. Ten dat. Dao o chau Tinh sac co tieng, nen su gi lam duoc mau man nhanh chong goi la tinh tien 幷剪. \n\t3. Mot am la binh, cung nghia nhu chu binh 偋.
幸=hanh [xing4]\n\t1. May, hanh phuc. Su gi dang bi thiet ma lai thoat goi la hanh. \n\t2. Cau, hanh tai lac hoa 幸哉樂禍 cau cho nguoi bi tai va lay lam thich. \n\t3. Yeu dau, bon hoan quan va cac cung phi duoc vua yeu toi goi la dac hanh 得幸.
幹=can [gan4]\n\t1. Minh. Nhu khu can 軀幹 voc nguoi, minh nguoi. \n\t2. Goc, goc cay co goi la can. \n\t3. Cai chuoi. Nhu thuoc can 勺幹 chuoi gao. \n\t4. Tai nang lam duoc viec. Nhu tai can 才幹. Tuc goi nhung nguoi lam viec thao la nang can 能幹.
幺=yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Nho. \n\t2. Tuc goi so mot la yeu, vi so mot la so dau (nho), danh to tom, tai ban, chan, v.v. goi nhat la yeu la vi do.
幻=huyen [huan4]\n\t1. Doi gia, lam gia me hoac nguoi. \n\t2. Gia ma lam het nhu thuc goi la huyen. Nhu huyen tuong 幻象, huyen thuat 幻術, ta quen goi la ao thuat, la quy thuat, nghia la lam gia ma giong nhu co thuc vay. Su vat bien thien, kho tim duoc ro chan tuong goi la huyen. Nhu bien huyen 變幻 hay huyen hoa 幻化, v.v.
幼=au [you4]\n\t1. Nho be, non not. Tre be goi la au tri 幼稚 hoc thuc con it cung goi la au tri, nghia la trinh do con non nhu tre con vay.
幽=u [you1]\n\t1. An nup, sau xa. Pham cai gi giau mot cho kin khong cho ai biet goi la u. Nhu u cu 幽居 o nup, u tu 幽囚 giam cho kin, v.v. Oan gian ai ma khong noi ra duoc goi la u oan 幽怨, u han 幽恨. Cho o lang le mat me goi la u nha 幽雅. \n\t2. Toi tam. Nhu cuu u 九幽 noi am phu. \n\t3. Chau U, thuoc phia dong bac tinh Truc Le va phia tay bac tinh Phung Thien bay gio.
幾=ki, ki, ki [ji1|ji3]\n\t1. Nho, su gi moi diem ra co mot ti goi la ki. Nhu tri ki 知幾 biet co tu luc moi co. \n\t2. Se toi, gan. Nhu thu ki 庶幾 ngo hau, ki cap 幾及 hau kip, v.v. \n\t3. Hen. \n\t4. Xet. \n\t5. Nguy. \n\t6. Mot am la ki. May, bao nhieu. Nhu ki ha 幾何 may hu ? bao nhieu hu ? \n\t7. Lai mot am la ki. Trong mong, cung nghia voi chu ki 覬.
几=ki, ki, ki [ji1|ji3]\n\t1. Nho, su gi moi diem ra co mot ti goi la ki. Nhu tri ki 知幾 biet co tu luc moi co. \n\t2. Se toi, gan. Nhu thu ki 庶幾 ngo hau, ki cap 幾及 hau kip, v.v. \n\t3. Hen. \n\t4. Xet. \n\t5. Nguy. \n\t6. Mot am la ki. May, bao nhieu. Nhu ki ha 幾何 may hu ? bao nhieu hu ? \n\t7. Lai mot am la ki. Trong mong, cung nghia voi chu ki 覬.
广=nghiem, yem [an1|guang3]\n\t1. Mai nha, cung doc la yem.
庀=phi [pi3]\n\t1. Du, sam. \n\t2. Sua tri (coi lam).
庄=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trang 莊.
庇=ti [bi4]\n\t1. Che cho. Nhu ti ho 庇護 che cho giup giu cho.
床=sang [chuang2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu sang 牀.
庋=ki, quy [gui3]\n\t1. Cai chan de do an, vi the nen thu nhat cai gi chua vao mot cho goi la tang ki 藏庋. Cung doc la chu quy.
序=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Hai ben tuong, hai ben giai vu cung goi la luong tu 兩序. \n\t2. Trang hoc trong lang. \n\t3. Thu tu. Nhu truong au huu tu 長幼有序 lon nho co thu tu, tu xi 序齒 ke tuoi ma xep cho ngoi tren duoi. \n\t4. Bay, bai tua, sach nao cung co mot bai dau bay to y kien cua nguoi lam sach goi la tu.
底=de [de5|di3]\n\t1. Day. Nhu thuy de 底水 day nuoc. \n\t2. Ngan, thoi. \n\t3. Den. Nhu my so de chi 靡所底止 chang hay den dau la thoi. \n\t4. Van thu moi thao goi la de. Tuc thuong goi ban thao la de tu 底子. \n\t5. Sao vay. Nhoi ngo ma hoi. Nhu de su 底事 viec gi vay ? de xu 底處 chon nao vay ?
庖=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Bep, boi bep goi la bao dinh 庖丁.
店=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Tiem, cho de chua do cam do, tuc goi nha tro la khach diem 客店.
庚=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Can canh, can thu bay trong muoi can. \n\t2. Tuoi, cung tuoi voi minh goi la dong canh 同庚. \n\t3. Duong. \n\t4. Den tra.
府=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Tu chua sach vo to boi. \n\t2. Tich gop. Cho chua cua cai goi la phu. Nhieu nguoi oan goi la phu oan 府怨. \n\t3. Quan, quan to goi la dai phu 大府.\n\t4. Phu, ten goi cua tung phuong dat da chia. Quan coi mot phu, goi la tri phu 知府. \n\t5. Nha o. Nhu goi nha nguoi ta thi goi la mo phu 謀府. \n\t6. Nha, minh tu xung cha minh la phu quan 府君, cung nhu gia quan 家君.
庠=tuong [xiang2]\n\t1. Trang hoc o lang, trang hoc o huyen goi la ap tuong 邑庠, trang hoc phu goi la quan tuong 郡庠.
庥=huu [xiu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu huu 休
度=do, dac [du4]\n\t1 . Do do, cac do nhu truong thuoc dung de do dai ngan deu goi la do. \n\t2. Chia goc do tron goi la do. Toan ca mat tron co 360 do, moi do co 60 phut,   moi phut co 60 giay. \n\t3. Phep da che ra. Nhu phap do 法度, che do 制度, v.v. \n\t4. Do luong. Nhu khoat dat dai do 豁達大度 y noi nguoi co do luong lon bao dong ca duoc moi nguoi. \n\t5. Dang dap. Nhu thai do 態度. \n\t6. Qua. Nhu ngay moi sinh goi la so do 初度, nghia la cai ngay moi qua, cho nen su gi da qua mot lan goi la nhat do 一度. \n\t7. Sang toi, cung nhu chu do 渡. Nha Phat bao nguoi ta o coi doi nay la coi kho, phai tu theo phep cua Phat vuot qua be kho, vi the nen xuat gia tu hanh goi la the do 剃度. Sau phep bo thi, tri gioi. Nhan nhuc, tinh tien, thuyen dinh, tri tue goi la luc do 六度. Nghia la sau phep ay la phep khien nguoi trong be kho se sang ben coi giac vay. \n\t8. Mot am la dac. Muu toan. Nhu thon dac 忖度 ban luong, dac luong 度量 do luong, v.v.
座=toa [zuo4]\n\t1. Ngoi, toa. Cho de ngoi goi la toa. \n\t2. Cai gia de do dac cung goi la toa. Cho nen mot bo do goi la nhat toa 一座.
庫=kho [ku4]\n\t1. Cai kho. Cho de chua do binh khi cua nha nuoc. Cho de do cung goi la kho.
库=kho [ku4]\n\t1. Cai kho. Cho de chua do binh khi cua nha nuoc. Cho de do cung goi la kho.
庬=mang [pang2]\n\t1. Day du. \n\t2. Lan lon tap nhap.
庭=dinh, thinh [ting2]\n\t1. San truoc. \n\t2. Cho quan lam viec goi la phu dinh 府庭. \n\t3. Thang tuot. \n\t4. Mot am la thinh. Kinh thinh 逕庭 xa lac. Tuc goi nhung su khac nhau la dai tuong kinh thinh 大相逕庭.
庳=bi, bi, ti [bei1|bi4]\n\t1. Ten nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Mot am la bi. Nha thap hep. \n\t3. Lai mot am la ti. Thap, ngan.
庵=am [an1]\n\t1. Cai am, cai nha tranh nho goi la am. \n\t2. Cai nha nho tho Phat goi la am. Co khi viet la 菴.
庶=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Nhieu. Nhu thu dan 庶民 lu dan, thu vat 庶物 moi vat, v.v. Nhan vat dong duc goi la phu thu 富庶, hay phon thu 繁庶. \n\t2. Gan nhu. Nhu Hoi da ki thu ho 回也其庶乎 anh Hoi kia gan dat duoc dao chang ? (Luan ngu 論語) \n\t3. Chi thu. Con vo le goi la thu tu 庶子.
康=khang [kang1]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu khang kien 康健 yen manh. \n\t2. Nga nam, cho nam loi deu qua goi la khang 康, sau loi deu qua goi la trang 莊, duong xa trong pho rong rai sach se goi la khang trang 康莊.
庸=dong [yong1]\n\t1. Dung. Nhu dang dong 登庸 cat len ngoi ma dung. Co khi dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu vo dong nhu thu 無庸如此 khong can dung nhu the. \n\t2. Thuong. Nhu dong ngon 庸言 loi noi thuong, dong hanh 庸行 su lam thuong. \n\t3. Cong. Nhu thu dong 酬庸 den cong. \n\t4. Ngu hen. Nhu dong nhan 庸人 nguoi tam thuong. \n\t5. Ha. Nhu dong phi nhi ho 庸非貳乎 chang phai la hai long u ? \n\t6. Mot phep thue nha Duong, bat dan lam viec cho nha vua goi la dong. \n\t7. Lam thue. Thong dung nhu chu dong 傭. \n\t8. Cai thanh, cung nhu chu dong 墉.
庾=duu [yu3]\n\t1. Cai vua, kho khong co nha phu o tren goi la duu. \n\t2. Cai duu. Do dong ngay xua, 16 dau la mot duu.
廀=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Dau, an cap dau mot cho goi la suu.
廁=xi, trac [ce4]\n\t1. Cai cho, chuong xi. \n\t2. Khoang, cho dat minh vao khoang do goi la xi tuc 廁足 nghia la xen chan minh vao khoang do. \n\t3. Canh giuong. \n\t4. Bo cao ben nuoc. \n\t5. Mot am la trac. Ben canh. Trac tuc 廁足 ghe chan vao.
厕=xi, trac [ce4]\n\t1. Cai cho, chuong xi. \n\t2. Khoang, cho dat minh vao khoang do goi la xi tuc 廁足 nghia la xen chan minh vao khoang do. \n\t3. Canh giuong. \n\t4. Bo cao ben nuoc. \n\t5. Mot am la trac. Ben canh. Trac tuc 廁足 ghe chan vao.
廂=suong [xiang1]\n\t1. Cai trai nha, hai gian nho o hai dau nha goi la suong. \n\t2. Phuong suong 坊廂 mot ten rieng de chia ranh tung khu dat, o trong thanh goi la phuong suong, o trong lang goi la huong do 鄉圖.
厢=suong [xiang1]\n\t1. Cai trai nha, hai gian nho o hai dau nha goi la suong. \n\t2. Phuong suong 坊廂 mot ten rieng de chia ranh tung khu dat, o trong thanh goi la phuong suong, o trong lang goi la huong do 鄉圖.
廈=ha [sha4|xia4]\n\t1. Cai nha, tieng goi chung ve nha o.
厦=ha [sha4|xia4]\n\t1. Cai nha, tieng goi chung ve nha o.
廉=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Goc nha, o ben be them buoc len goi la duong liem 堂廉. Nhu duong cao liem vien 堂高廉遠 nha cao goc be xa, y noi nha vua cao xa lam. \n\t2. Goc, canh. Do vat gi co goc co canh goi la liem. \n\t3. Ngay, biet phan biet nen chang khong lay xang goi la liem. Nhu thanh liem 清廉. \n\t4. Xet, ngay xua co chuc liem phong su 廉訪使 de tra cac quan lai, cho nen ngay xua thuong goi ben quan an la liem phong 廉訪. \n\t5. Tien liem, luong quan chia ra hai thu, bong 俸 la mon luong thuong, liem 廉 la mon luong rieng de tro cap cho khoi an cua dut lam hai dan.
廊=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Mai hien, hanh lang.
廋=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Dau diem. Nhu nhan yen suu tai 人焉廋哉 nguoi sao dau duoc vay thay. \n\t2. Tim, luc, soat, cung nhu chu suu 搜. \n\t3. Goc nui, cho nui uon cong.
廌=tri, trai [jian4]\n\t1. Giai tri 解廌 ten mot giong thu giong con de ma co mot sung, tinh trung truc chi huc giong khong ngay thang, nen nha Han bat chuoc cai y ay ma goi mu cac quan la mu giai tri. Co khi doc la trai.
廏=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Chuong ngua.
廑=can, can [jin3|qin2]\n\t1. Cai nha nho. \n\t2. Chi co, cung nhu chu can 僅. \n\t3. Cung nhu chu can 勤 nhu tuc noi can chu 廑注, can niem 廑念, y noi nho lam. Trong thu tu hay dung. Cung doc la chu can.
廒=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Cai vua de dung thoc.
廓=khuech [kuo4]\n\t1. Lon. Nhu do luong khoi khuech 度量恢廓 do luong lon lao. Lam viec khong thiet thuc goi la khuech lac 廓落, voi doi khong hop cung goi la khuech lac. \n\t2. Mo. Nhu khuech sung 廓充 mo rong ra. Dang nho ma mo mang cho to lon them goi la khuech sung. \n\t3. Bong khong. 
廕=am [yin4]\n\t1. Che cho. \n\t2. Duoc nho on nguoi truoc de lai cho goi la am. Nhu am sinh 廕生, nghia la nhan chuc quan cua ong cha ma con chau duoc lam hoc tro o Quoc tu giam 國子監 roi ra lam quan.
廖=lieu, lieu [liao4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi. \n\t2. Mot am la lieu, ho Lieu.
廐=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cuu 廄.
廚=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Cai bep. \n\t2. Chu, doi hau Han co tam tru, nghia la co tam tay tru phu biet dem cua cuu giup nguoi. \n\t3. Cai hom. Nhu thu tru 書廚 hom sach, y tru 衣廚 hom ao, v.v.
厨=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Cai bep. \n\t2. Chu, doi hau Han co tam tru, nghia la co tam tay tru phu biet dem cua cuu giup nguoi. \n\t3. Cai hom. Nhu thu tru 書廚 hom sach, y tru 衣廚 hom ao, v.v.
廛=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Cho cua mot nguoi dan o goi la trien. \n\t2. Quan cho, doi xua cac cho deu do quan lam. Nhung chi danh thue nha khong danh thue do hang. Nay cung goi cac hang quan la thi trien 市廛. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Cuu nhac tu tan, ky nhan luu lac thi trien, hiep ky di ngao 舊樂死散，其人流落市廛，挾技以遨 doi nhac cu tieu tan, nang luu lac noi quan cho, om dan gay dao. 
廝=tu [si1]\n\t1. Ke chat cui chan ngua goi la tu dich 廝役, nay thong dung goi dua o la tieu tu 小廝. \n\t2. Tu sao 廝抄 quan thao (dua nghich nhau).
廟=mieu [miao4]\n\t1. Cai mieu (de tho cung quy than). \n\t2. Cai dien truoc cung vua, vi the nen moi su cu dong cua vua deu goi la mieu. Nhu mieu toan 廟算 muu tinh cua nha vua. \n\t3. Cho lam viec o trong nha cung goi la mieu.
庙=mieu [miao4]\n\t1. Cai mieu (de tho cung quy than). \n\t2. Cai dien truoc cung vua, vi the nen moi su cu dong cua vua deu goi la mieu. Nhu mieu toan 廟算 muu tinh cua nha vua. \n\t3. Cho lam viec o trong nha cung goi la mieu.
廠=xuong [an1|chang3]\n\t1. Cai xuong. Nha khong vach, de chua do hay tho lam cho rong goi la xuong.
厂=xuong [an1|chang3]\n\t1. Cai xuong. Nha khong vach, de chua do hay tho lam cho rong goi la xuong.
廡=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Hai day nha lam o hai ben nha giua goi la vu.
庑=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Hai day nha lam o hai ben nha giua goi la vu.
廢=phe [fei4]\n\t1. Bo di. \n\t2. Phe tat 廢疾 ke bi tan tat khong lam gi duoc nua. \n\t3. Vat gi khong dung duoc nua deu goi la phe vat 廢物.
废=phe [fei4]\n\t1. Bo di. \n\t2. Phe tat 廢疾 ke bi tan tat khong lam gi duoc nua. \n\t3. Vat gi khong dung duoc nua deu goi la phe vat 廢物.
廣=quang, quang [an1|guang3]\n\t1. Rong. \n\t2. Mo rong. \n\t3. Muoi lam co xe binh goi la mot quang. \n\t4. Ten dat. \n\t5. Mot am la quang. Do ngang, do mat dat, do ve phia dong tay goi la quang 廣, ve phia nam bac goi la luan 輪.
广=quang, quang [an1|guang3]\n\t1. Rong. \n\t2. Mo rong. \n\t3. Muoi lam co xe binh goi la mot quang. \n\t4. Ten dat. \n\t5. Mot am la quang. Do ngang, do mat dat, do ve phia dong tay goi la quang 廣, ve phia nam bac goi la luan 輪.
廨=giai, gioi [xie4]\n\t1. So cong, dinh quan o. Cung doc la chu gioi.
廩=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Kho dun. \n\t2. Cap cho, ngay xua lay gao thit o kho cap cho nguoi goi la lam cap 廩給. Hoc tro ai duoc vua cap luong goi la lam sinh 廩生.
廪=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Kho dun. \n\t2. Cap cho, ngay xua lay gao thit o kho cap cho nguoi goi la lam cap 廩給. Hoc tro ai duoc vua cap luong goi la lam sinh 廩生.
廬=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Nha tranh, leu. Nha o ngoai dong goi la lu. Noi nhun cho minh o goi la te lu 敝廬 nha tranh nat cua toi. \n\t2. Cai nha tuc truc.
庐=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Nha tranh, leu. Nha o ngoai dong goi la lu. Noi nhun cho minh o goi la te lu 敝廬 nha tranh nat cua toi. \n\t2. Cai nha tuc truc.
廱=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ung 雍.
廳=thinh, sanh [ting1]\n\t1. Cho quan ngoi xu su. Ta quen doc la chu sanh.
厅=thinh, sanh [ting1]\n\t1. Cho quan ngoi xu su. Ta quen doc la chu sanh.
廴=dan [yin3]\n\t1. Buoc dai.
延=duyen [yan2]\n\t1. Keo dai. Nhu duyen nien 延年 them tuoi, duyen tho 延壽 them tho, v.v. \n\t2. Keo dai con duong tien di, khien cho khong toi duoc dung ky goi la duyen. Nhu duyen hoan 延緩, duyen dang 延宕 keo dai cho cham tien. Rut lui lai goi la thien duyen 遷延 lan lua. Quanh co, khong tien goi la uyen duyen 宛延. \n\t3. Xa. Nhu duyen mau van du ly 延袤萬餘里 dai suot hon muon dam. \n\t4. Tien nap, moi vao, ruoc toi. Nhu duyen su 延師 ruoc thay, duyen khach 延客 moi khach, v.v. \n\t5. Kip, su gi dat day toi goi la duyen.
廷=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Trieu dinh, cho phat chanh lenh cho ca nuoc theo goi la dinh. Nhu dinh doi 廷對 vao doi dap o chon trieu dinh, dinh nghi 廷議 su ban o trong trieu dinh.
建=kien, kien [jian4]\n\t1. Dung len, dat. \n\t2. Chuoi sao tro vao dau goi la kien. Nhu lich ta goi thang gieng la kien dan 建寅, thang hai goi la kien mao 建卯 nghia la cu coi chuoi sao chi ve dau thi dinh thang vao day vay. Vi the nen goi thang la nguyet kien 月建, thang du goi la dai kien 大建, thang thieu goi la tieu kien 小建, v.v. \n\t3. Ten dat. \n\t4. Mot am la kien. Do up. Nhu kien linh 建瓴 do binh nuoc tu tren xuong, y noi cai the tu tren de xuong rat de vay.
廻=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Ve, cung nhu chu hoi 回. \n\t2. Nay thong dung nhu chu hoi ti 廻避 nghia la tranh di.
廼=nai [nai3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nai 迺 hay chu nai 乃.
廾=cung [gong3]\n\t1. Chap tay.
廿=nhap, chap [nian4]\n\t1. Hai muoi. Ta quen doc la chu chap.
弁=bien, bien, ban [bian4]\n\t1. Cai mu lon doi xua. Chia ra hai thu mu da va mu tuoc, mu da de quan vo dung, mu tuoc de quan van dung. \n\t2. Nhan mu bien bang da la mu quan vo doi nen goi quan vo la bien nhu binh bien 兵弁, tuong bien 將弁, v.v. \n\t3. Hap tap, nong nay. Cung nhu chu bien 卞. \n\t4. So run lay bay. Ta quen doc la bien. \n\t5. Mot am la ban. Vui.
异=di [yi4]\n\t1. Thoi, lui. Tuc muon dung nhu chu di 異.
弄=long [long4|nong4]\n\t1. Man me ngam nghia, nay goi sinh con trai la long chuong 弄璋, sinh con gai la long ngoa 弄瓦. \n\t2. Lay nguoi ra lam tro dua cung goi la long. Nhu hi long 戲弄 dua bon, vu long 侮弄 khinh nhon, v.v. \n\t3. Thoi. Nhu long dich 弄笛 thoi sao. Lai la ten khuc nhac nua. \n\t4. Ngo. Cung nhu chu hang 巷.
弆=khi [ju3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu khi 棄.
弇=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Che trum. \n\t2. Do gi mieng be trong ruot rong goi la yem.
弈=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Danh co. Cung nhu chu dich 奕.
弊=te, te [bi4]\n\t1. Xau, hai, rach. Nhu loi te 利弊 loi hai, te bo 弊布 gie rach, v.v. \n\t2. Lam gian doi. \n\t3. Khon kho. \n\t4. Mot am la te. Xu doan.
弋=dac [yi4]\n\t1. Ban. \n\t2. Lay. Dem binh thuyen di tuan na trom giac goi la du dac 游弋. \n\t3. Sac den.
弌=nhat [yi1]\n\t1. Chu nhat 一 co.
弍=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Chu nhi 二 co.
弎=tam [san1]\n\t1. Chu tam 三 co.
式=thuc [shi4]\n\t1. Phep. Su gi dang lam khuon phep goi la tuc thuc 足式. \n\t2. Che do. Nhu trinh thuc 程式, thuc dang 式樣 deu nghia la cai khuon mau cho nguoi theo ca. \n\t3. Le. Nhu khai hieu thuc 開校式 le khai trang, truy dieu thuc 追悼式 le truy dieu, v.v. \n\t4. Le kinh, xe ngay xua tren co mot cai don ngang, khi gap cai gi dang kinh thi cui xuong ma tua goi la bang thuc 憑式. \n\t5. Loi phat ngu. Nhu thuc vi thuc vi 式微式微 suy lam, suy lam roi ! \n\t6. Dung.
弒=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Ke duoi giet nguoi tren.
弑=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Ke duoi giet nguoi tren.
弓=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Cai cung. \n\t2. So do dat, nam thuoc la mot cung, tuc la mot bo, 360 bo la mot dam, 240 bo vuong la mot mau, vi the nen cai thuoc do dat goi la bo cung 步弓, nguoi do dat goi la cung thu 弓手. \n\t3. Cong, vat gi hinh cong nhu cai cung deu goi la cung. Nhu cung yeu 弓腰 lung cong.
弔=dieu, dich [diao4]\n\t1. Vieng tham, den vieng nguoi chet va hoi tham nhung su khong may cua nhung nguoi than thich cua ke chet goi la dieu. \n\t2. Thuong xot. Nhu hieu thien bat dieu 昊天不弔 troi ca chang thuong. \n\t3. Treo nguoc. Nhu thuong dieu 上弔 treo gioc nguoc. \n\t4. Dieu, mot nghin dong tien goi la mot dieu, cung nhu ta noi la mot quan vay. \n\t5. Xach lay, cat lay. \n\t6. Mot am la dich. Den.
引=dan, dan [yin3]\n\t1. Duong cung. Nhu dan man 引滿 duong het cu cung. \n\t2. Dat. Nhu dan nhi tien chi 引而進之 dat ma tien len. Hai ben cung dat dan voi nhau goi la dan thang 引繩, cung tien cu nhau len con duong ve vang goi la dan trong 引重 hay cap dan 汲引, v.v. \n\t3. Rut ra. Nhu dan dao 引刀 rut dao, dan kiem 引劍 tuot guom, v.v. \n\t4. Bo di. Nhu dan thoai 引退, dan ti 引避 nghia la thao than lui di. \n\t5. Keo dai. Nhu dan canh thu hinh 引頸受刑 vuon co chiu hinh, dan nhi than chi 引而伸之 keo cho duoi ra. \n\t6. Dan du. \n\t7. Ten thuoc do. Muoi truong la mot dan. \n\t8. Phep ban muoi lay dan tinh nhieu it, moi dan la hai tram can, nen cho ban muoi goi la dan ngan 引岸, so ban duoc bao nhieu goi la dan ngach 引額. Cac hang hoa khac cung co khi dung chu ay. Nhu tra dan 茶引 che ban duoc bao nhieu, tich dan 錫引 thiec ban duoc bao nhieu. \n\t9. Mot am la dan. Day keo xe dam ma. Nay cung goi su dua dam ma la phat dan   發引. 10. Khuc hat, Sai Ung nha Han co bai tu quy dan 思歸引. \n\t11. Ten the van cung nhu bai tua. Nhu tren dau cac cuon tho tu co mot bai tua ngan goi la tieu dan 小引.
弗=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Chang. Nhu phi nghia phat vi 非議弗為 chang phai nghia chang lam. \n\t2. Tru di. \n\t3. Mot nguyen chat trong hoa hoc, dich am chu Flourine.
弘=hoang [hong2]\n\t1. Lon, mo rong ra, lam cho rong lon hon.
弛=thi [chi2]\n\t1. Buong day cung. \n\t2. Buong ra, mot mat giu mot mat buong goi la thi truong 弛張. \n\t3. Bo tre.
弟=de, de [di4]\n\t1. Em trai. \n\t2. Mot am la de. Thuan. Cung nhu chu 'de 悌. \n\t3. De dai. Nhu khai de 豈弟 vui ve de dai.
弢=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Cai tui cung, vo cung. \n\t2. Cung co khi dung nhu chu thao 韜. Luc thao 六弢 ten mot thien trong binh thu nha Chu.
弤=de [di3]\n\t1. Cai cung co cham tro hinh ve va chu.
弥=di [mi2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu di 彌.
弦=huyen [xian2]\n\t1. Day cung. \n\t2. Dan, mot thu am nhac lay to cang de gay hay keo cho keu, nay thuong dung chu huyen 絃. \n\t3. Tuan huyen, luc mat trang moi hien nen nua hinh nhu cai cung nen goi la   huyen. Lich ta chia ngay 7, 8 la thuong huyen 上弦, ngay 22, 23 la ha huyen 下弦 \n\t4. Mach huyen. Sach thuoc noi xem mach thay mach chay gang ma mau nhu the duong cung goi la mach huyen. \n\t5. Co nhan vi vo chong nhu dan cam, dan sat, cho nen goa vo goi la doan huyen 斷弦, lay vo ke goi la tuc huyen 續弦.
弧=ho, o [hu2]\n\t1. Cai cung go. Nhu tang ho 桑弧 cung dau. Le ngay xua de con trai thi treo cai cung go o ben cua tay trai, to y con trai phai co chi bon phuong, vi the nen de con trai goi la huyen ho 懸弧. \n\t2. Vong tron cat ra lam ba goc goi la ho tam giac 弧三解. \n\t3. Mot am la o. Cong.
弩=no [nu3]\n\t1. Cai no.
弭=nhi [mi3]\n\t1. Chuoi cung. \n\t2. Thoi, nghi. Nhu nhi binh 弭兵 thoi cho binh nghi khong danh nhau nua.
弱=nhuoc [ruo4]\n\t1. Yeu, suy. \n\t2. Tuoi con nho goi la nhuoc. Hai muoi tuoi goi la nhuoc quan 弱冠, nay thuong goi cac nguoi tuoi tre la nhuoc quan. \n\t3. Mat. Nhu huu nhuoc nhat ca 又弱一个 lai mat mot cai.
張=truong, truong [zhang1]\n\t1. Duong. Nhu truong cung 張弓 duong cung. Cang day to vao dan cung goi la truong. Su gi can phai cach goi la canh truong 更張, nghia la phai thay doi lai nhu dan hong day phai cang day khac. \n\t2. Lon. Nhu ki the phuong truong 其勢方張 thua the dang lon. \n\t3. Pho truong. Nhu truong hoang 張黃, pho truong 鋪張, v.v. Tinh tinh ngang trai goi la quai truong 乖張, y khi nong noi goi la hieu truong 囂張, doi gia da doan goi la chu truong 譸張 cung theo mot nghia ay ca. \n\t4. Mo ra. Nhu hap truong 翕張 dong mo. \n\t5. Dat. Nhu truong am 張飲 dat tiec ruou, truong nhac 張樂 mo cuoc am nhac. Lay y minh ma xep dat goi la chu truong 主張. \n\t6. Vay bat chim muong, nghia la dang luoi de bat cai loai chim muong, vi the nen vo vet tien cua cung goi la truong la 張羅. \n\t7. Pham vat gi cang len lai buong xuong duoc deu goi la truong. Nhu mot cai dan cam goi la truong, mot manh giay cung goi la nhat truong 一張. \n\t8. Sao Truong, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t9. Mot am la truong, cung nhu chu truong 帳, cung truong 共張 bay dat.
张=truong, truong [zhang1]\n\t1. Duong. Nhu truong cung 張弓 duong cung. Cang day to vao dan cung goi la truong. Su gi can phai cach goi la canh truong 更張, nghia la phai thay doi lai nhu dan hong day phai cang day khac. \n\t2. Lon. Nhu ki the phuong truong 其勢方張 thua the dang lon. \n\t3. Pho truong. Nhu truong hoang 張黃, pho truong 鋪張, v.v. Tinh tinh ngang trai goi la quai truong 乖張, y khi nong noi goi la hieu truong 囂張, doi gia da doan goi la chu truong 譸張 cung theo mot nghia ay ca. \n\t4. Mo ra. Nhu hap truong 翕張 dong mo. \n\t5. Dat. Nhu truong am 張飲 dat tiec ruou, truong nhac 張樂 mo cuoc am nhac. Lay y minh ma xep dat goi la chu truong 主張. \n\t6. Vay bat chim muong, nghia la dang luoi de bat cai loai chim muong, vi the nen vo vet tien cua cung goi la truong la 張羅. \n\t7. Pham vat gi cang len lai buong xuong duoc deu goi la truong. Nhu mot cai dan cam goi la truong, mot manh giay cung goi la nhat truong 一張. \n\t8. Sao Truong, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t9. Mot am la truong, cung nhu chu truong 帳, cung truong 共張 bay dat.
强=cuong [jiang4|qiang2]\n\t1. Manh, cung nhu chu cuong 疆. \n\t2. Con mot thoc gao. \n\t3. Tuc dung nhu chu cuong 強
弻=bat [bi4]\n\t1. Lay cho ngay, cai do de lay cung cho ngay. \n\t2. Giup do. Thuong goi quan Te-tuong la phu bat 輔弻 hay nguyen bat 元弻 nghia la nguoi giup do vua vay. Cung viet 弼.
彀=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Cai dich cung. Sach Manh-tu co cau Nghe chi giao nhan sa tat chi u cau 羿之教人射必志於彀 nguoi Nghe day nguoi tap ban phai de chi vao cai dich cung, vi the nen cai khuon mau de lam mot su gi cung goi la cau.
彄=khu [kou1]\n\t1. Mot thu nhu cai vong. \n\t2. Cho dich cung no, cai khac o cai cung cai no de duong day vao day.
彈=dan, dan [dan4|tan2]\n\t1. Cai cung ban dan. \n\t2. Vien dan. \n\t3. Mot am la dan. Ban ra. Vat gi co tinh chun lai roi lai duoi ra goi la dan tinh 彈性. \n\t4. Danh. Nhu dan kiem 彈劍 danh guom, dan cam 彈琴 danh dan. \n\t5. Gay lay dau mong tay hai ngon ma bung ma gay. \n\t6. Dan hac. Nhu dan tham 彈參 hac ke co loi.
弹=dan, dan [dan4|tan2]\n\t1. Cai cung ban dan. \n\t2. Vien dan. \n\t3. Mot am la dan. Ban ra. Vat gi co tinh chun lai roi lai duoi ra goi la dan tinh 彈性. \n\t4. Danh. Nhu dan kiem 彈劍 danh guom, dan cam 彈琴 danh dan. \n\t5. Gay lay dau mong tay hai ngon ma bung ma gay. \n\t6. Dan hac. Nhu dan tham 彈參 hac ke co loi.
彊=cuong, cuong, cuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Cai cung cung. Pham cai gi co suc manh deu goi la cuong. \n\t2. Hon. Nhu sai cuong nhan y 差彊人意 chut hon y nguoi. \n\t3. Du suc. Pham cai gi co thua deu goi la cuong. Nhu thuong tu bach thien cuong 賞賜百千彊 thuong cho hon tram nghin. \n\t4. Khong chiu theo, cung nghia voi chu 強. \n\t5. Mot am la cuong. gang, mien cuong. Nhu cuong nhan so nan 彊人所難 bat ep nguoi lam su kho kham noi. \n\t6. Lai mot am la cuong. Cung nghia voi chu cuong 疆.
彌=di [mi2]\n\t1. Khap, day. Nhu di phung 彌縫 va kin cho khoi khuyet. \n\t2. Tron. Nhu di nguyet 彌月 tron thang. \n\t3. Cang. Nhu nguong chi di cao 仰之彌高 ngua len trong thay cang cao. \n\t4. Xa. Nhu di sanh 彌甥 chau xa.
弥=di [mi2]\n\t1. Khap, day. Nhu di phung 彌縫 va kin cho khoi khuyet. \n\t2. Tron. Nhu di nguyet 彌月 tron thang. \n\t3. Cang. Nhu nguong chi di cao 仰之彌高 ngua len trong thay cang cao. \n\t4. Xa. Nhu di sanh 彌甥 chau xa.
彍=khoac [kuo4]\n\t1. Duong no, binh tuc ve nha Duong goi la khoac ki 彍騎
彐=ky [ji4]\n\t1. Dau con dim (nhim).
彖=thoan [tuan4]\n\t1. Loi thoan, trong kinh Dich moi que co mot doan ban gop nghia ca toan the mot que goi la loi thoan.
彗=tue [hui4]\n\t1. Cai choi. \n\t2. Sao choi, ngoi sao co cai tua dai nhu cai choi goi la tue tinh 彗星. \n\t3. Quet.
彘=tre [zhi4]\n\t1. Con lon se (lon nai).
彙=vi, vung [hui4]\n\t1. Loai, xep tung loai voi nhau goi la vi tap 彙集. Ta quen doc la vung. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu vi 蝟.
彞=di [yi2]\n\t1. Thuong, cac do thuong dung o trong ton mieu goi la di khi 彞器. \n\t2. Cai chen uong ruou. \n\t3. Phep.
彠=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoach 矱.
彡=sam, tiem [shan1]\n\t1. Long dai. \n\t2. Mot am la tiem. Tiem tha 彡姐 ten ho, giong ro Khuong.
形=hinh [xing2]\n\t1. Hinh the. \n\t2. Hinh dang. \n\t3. Hinh dong, tuong tuong ra roi ve cho het hinh trang nguoi hay vat nao ma minh da biet ra goi la hinh. \n\t4. So sanh. Nhu tuong hinh kien chuyet 相形見絀 cung so thay vung. \n\t5. Hien ra. Nhu huu u trung hinh u ngoai 有於中形於外 co o trong hien ra ngoai. \n\t6. Hinh the dat.
彤=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Do, son do. Nhu dong cung 彤弓 cung do. \n\t2. Dong quan 彤管 quan but do. Quan but dung chep su cac dan ba gioi, dung quan do de to cai tam long son vay, vi the cho nen moi dung lam loi khen cac dan ba gioi.
彥=ngan [yan4]\n\t1. Ke si dep gioi (kiem ca tai duc).
彦=ngan [yan4]\n\t1. Ke si dep gioi (kiem ca tai duc).
彧=uc [yu4]\n\t1. Co van ve. \n\t2. Uc uc 彧彧 tot tuoi.
彩=thai, thai [cai3]\n\t1. Tia sang. \n\t2. Ruc ro. Pham canh tranh choi dua deu lay su duoc thua lam vinh nhuc, nen ai giat giai duoc hon goi la dac thai 得彩. Cung vi the ma cai ve so so cung goi la thai phieu 彩票. Ta quen doc la thai.
彪=buu [biao1]\n\t1. Van con ho. Van ve. \n\t2. Con ho con.
彫=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Cham tro. \n\t2. Tan rac. Nhu nhien hau tri tung bach chi hau dieu da 然後知松栢之後彫也 vay sau biet cay thong cay bach chung rac sau vay.
彬=ban [bin1]\n\t1. Co van hoa co moc mac hoan toan hop cach goi la ban hay ban ban 彬彬 hoan hao.
彭=banh, bang, bang [peng2]\n\t1. Ho Banh, ten dat. \n\t2. Mot am la bang. Nhu bang bang 彭彭 luc nhuc, chen chuc. \n\t3. Luc luong, ta cai dang manh thinh. \n\t4. Lai mot am la bang. Nhu bang hanh 彭亨 ran rua, day ray.
彯=phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Phieu phieu 彯彯 long thong, ta cai dang day dai long thong. Cai dai co goi la phieu dai 彯帶.
彰=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Ruc ro, lay van chuong theu det cho ruc ro them goi la chuong. \n\t2. Ro ret.
影=anh [ying3]\n\t1. Bong, cai gi co hinh tat co bong, nen su gi co quan thiep den goi la anh huong 影響. \n\t2. Tam anh.
彳=sach [chi4]\n\t1. Buoc ngan. Buoc chan trai goi la sach 彳, buoc chan phai goi la xuc 亍, hop 彳 voi 亍 lai thanh ra chu hanh 行.
彷=bang, phang [fang3|pang2]\n\t1. Bang hoang 彷徨 bang hoang, y khong yen dinh. \n\t2. Bang duong 彷徉 quanh co. \n\t3. Mot am la phang. Phang phat 彷佛 thay khong duoc ro rang.
役=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Di thu ngoai bien thuy. Di thu xa goi la vien dich 遠役. \n\t2. Viec quan cung goi la dich. Nhu Ta truyen chep Thanh-boc chi dich 城濮之役 viec danh nhau o Thanh Boc. \n\t3. Sai khien, ke hau goi la tu dich 厮役. \n\t4. Hang loi.
彼=bi [bi3]\n\t1. Ben kia. La tieng trai lai voi chu thu. Nhu bat phan bi thu 不分彼此 chang phan biet duoc day voi day. \n\t2. Ke khac, ke kia. \n\t3. Loi noi coi xa khong thiet gi.
彿=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Phang phat 彷佛 thay khong duoc ro rang.
往=vang [wang3]\n\t1. Di. \n\t2. Da qua. Nhu vang nhat 往日 ngay xua. \n\t3. Thuong. Nhu vang vang nhu thu 往往如此 thuong thuong nhu the. \n\t4. Lay do gi dem dua cho nguoi cung goi la vang. \n\t5. Nha Phat cho nguoi tu ve ton Tinh-do, khi chet duoc sinh sang nuoc Phat rat suong goi la vang sinh 往生.
征=chinh [zheng1]\n\t1. Di. \n\t2. Ke tren dem binh danh ke duoi co toi goi la chinh. \n\t3. Lay thue. Nhu chinh phu 征賦 lay thue.
徂=to [cu2]\n\t1. Di. \n\t2. Chet mat. \n\t3. Den, kip.
待=dai [dai1|dai4]\n\t1. Doi. \n\t2. Tiep dai.
徇=tuan, tuan, tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Mang bao hay phat mot ke cho moi nguoi biet goi la tuan. \n\t2. Thuan theo. Dem than theo voi vat goi la tuan. Nhu tham phu tuan tai 貪夫徇財 ke tham phu chet theo cua. Liet si tuan danh 烈士徇名 ke liet si chet theo danh, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la tuan. Chong lai. \n\t4. Lai mot am la tuan. Tuan thong 徇通 chu chi.
很=ngan [hen3]\n\t1. Buong. \n\t2. Ac. Nhu hung ngan 凶很 tan ac. \n\t3. Tham Nhu tam ngan 心很 long tham. \n\t4. Rat, lam. Nhu ngan hao 很好 tot lam. \n\t5. Tranh kien.
徉=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Bang duong 彷徉 quanh co.
徊=hoi [huai2]\n\t1. Boi hoi 徘徊 quanh co khong tien duoc.
律=luat [lu:4]\n\t1. Luat lu, cai do ngay xua dung de xet tieng tam. \n\t2. Luat phep. Nhu quan luat 軍律 phep quan, hinh luat 形律 luat hinh, vi the nen lay phep ma buoc toi cung goi la luat. Nhu luat di phap lenh mo dieu 律以法令某條 lay dieu luat mo ma buoc toi . \n\t3. Nhat luat, deu ca nhu mot, cung nhu phap luat thay deu nhu nhau ca. \n\t4. Cach thuc nhat dinh de lam tho goi la thi luat 詩律.
後=hau, hau [hou4]\n\t1. Sau, noi ve dia vi truoc sau thi dung chu tien hau 前後, noi ve thi gio truoc sau thi dung tien hau 先後. \n\t2. Con noi. Nhu bat hieu huu tam vo hau vi dai 不孝有三無後為大 bat hieu co ba, khong con noi la toi lon nhat. \n\t3. Loi noi dua day. Nhu nhien hau 然後 vay sau, roi sau. \n\t4. Mot am la hau. Di sau, chiu o sau. Truoc cai kia ma sau den cai nay cung goi la hau.
徐=tu [xu2]\n\t1. Di thong tha. \n\t2. Cham cham tu tu. Nhu thanh phong tu lai 清風徐來 gio thanh tu tu lai. \n\t3. Ten dat.
徑=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Loi tat. \n\t2. Thang. Nhu truc tinh kinh hanh 直情徑行 tinh thang thang buoc. \n\t3. Do xem hinh tron lon be bao nhieu goi la kinh. Duong thang goi la truc kinh 直徑, mot nua goi la ban kinh 半徑. \n\t4. Di. \n\t5. Ben, cung nghia voi chu canh 竟.
径=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Loi tat. \n\t2. Thang. Nhu truc tinh kinh hanh 直情徑行 tinh thang thang buoc. \n\t3. Do xem hinh tron lon be bao nhieu goi la kinh. Duong thang goi la truc kinh 直徑, mot nua goi la ban kinh 半徑. \n\t4. Di. \n\t5. Ben, cung nghia voi chu canh 竟.
徒=do [tu2]\n\t1. Di bo. Linh bo binh cung goi la do. Nhu cong do tam van 公徒三萬 bo binh nha vua tam van. Xe cua vua di cung goi la do. nhu do ngu bat kinh 徒御不驚 Xe vua chang so. \n\t2. Lu. Nhu thuc phon huu do 實繁有徒 thuc co lu dong. Doi xua co quan tu do 司徒 chu ve viec coi cac dan chung. \n\t3. Hoc tro. Nhu phi ngo do da 非吾徒也 khong phai la hoc tro cua ta vay. Tuc goi hoc tro la do de 徒弟, dong dang la do dang 徒黨 deu do nghia ay. \n\t4. Khong, do thu 徒手 tay khong. \n\t5. Nhung. Nhu do thien bat tuc di vi chinh 徒善不足以為政 nhung thien khong du lam chinh tri. Lai la tieng tro ngu. Nhu do tu kho nhi 徒自苦耳 nhung chi tu lam kho thoi vay. \n\t6. Toi do. Ngay xua he ke nao co toi bat lam toi to hau cac nha o ngay tinh ke ay goi la toi do. Bay gio dinh ra toi do co ky va toi do khong co ky, deu la toi phat giam va bat lam kho vay.
得=dac [de2|de5|dei3]\n\t1. Duoc. Pham su gi cau ma duoc goi la dac. Nghi ngoi mai ma hieu thau duoc goi la tam dac 心得. \n\t2. Trung. Nhu dac ke 得計 muu duoc trung, duoc nhu y minh muu tinh. Su loi hai goi la dac that 得失. \n\t3. Tham. Nhu lao gia gioi chi tai dac 老者戒之在得 nguoi gia phai ran o su tham. \n\t4. Tu dac. Nhu duong duong tu dac 揚揚自得 nhon nhon tu dac. \n\t5. Hop, cung nguoi hop tinh goi la tuong dac 相得.
徘=boi [pai2]\n\t1. Boi hoi 徘徊 quanh co khong tien len duoc.
徙=ti [xi3]\n\t1. Doi. Don nha di o cho khac.
徜=thang [chang2]\n\t1. Thang duong 徜佯 dua gion, choi nhon. 
從=tong, tung, thung, tung, tung [cong2]\n\t1. Theo. Nhu tong nhat nhi chung 從一而終 theo mot be den chet. \n\t2. Tu dau ra. Nhu tong ha thuyet khoi 從何說 起 tu dau ma noi len ? \n\t3. Nghe theo. Nhu tong gian nhu luu 從諫如流 nghe loi can nhu nuoc chay. \n\t4. Toi, dat minh vao day goi la tong. Nhu tong chanh 從政 lam viec chanh tri. \n\t5. Mot am la tung. Theo hau. Nhu thi tung 視從 theo hau, boc tung 僕從 ke hau. \n\t6. Thu. Buc kem hang chi than goi la tung. Nhu chu bac goi la tung phu 從父, chau doi voi chu bac goi la tung tu 從子, anh em cung mot ong ba goi la tung huynh de 從兄弟, anh em chu bac hai doi goi la tai tung 再從, ba doi goi la tam tung 三從. \n\t7. Ve hinh luat co thu pham 首犯, tung pham 從犯. Ke chu muu goi la thu pham, ke a dua goi la tung pham. \n\t8. Ve quan che cung chia ra chanh voi tung, chuc tung cung nhu chuc pho. \n\t9. Lai mot am la thung. Nhu thung dong 從容 thong tha de dang. \n\t10. Lai mot am nua la tung. Cung nhu chu tung 縱. \n\t11. Lai mot am la tung. Cung nghia voi chu tung 縱. Dong tay goi la hanh 衡, nam bac goi la tung 從.
从=tong, tung, thung, tung, tung [cong2]\n\t1. Theo. Nhu tong nhat nhi chung 從一而終 theo mot be den chet. \n\t2. Tu dau ra. Nhu tong ha thuyet khoi 從何說 起 tu dau ma noi len ? \n\t3. Nghe theo. Nhu tong gian nhu luu 從諫如流 nghe loi can nhu nuoc chay. \n\t4. Toi, dat minh vao day goi la tong. Nhu tong chanh 從政 lam viec chanh tri. \n\t5. Mot am la tung. Theo hau. Nhu thi tung 視從 theo hau, boc tung 僕從 ke hau. \n\t6. Thu. Buc kem hang chi than goi la tung. Nhu chu bac goi la tung phu 從父, chau doi voi chu bac goi la tung tu 從子, anh em cung mot ong ba goi la tung huynh de 從兄弟, anh em chu bac hai doi goi la tai tung 再從, ba doi goi la tam tung 三從. \n\t7. Ve hinh luat co thu pham 首犯, tung pham 從犯. Ke chu muu goi la thu pham, ke a dua goi la tung pham. \n\t8. Ve quan che cung chia ra chanh voi tung, chuc tung cung nhu chuc pho. \n\t9. Lai mot am la thung. Nhu thung dong 從容 thong tha de dang. \n\t10. Lai mot am nua la tung. Cung nhu chu tung 縱. \n\t11. Lai mot am la tung. Cung nghia voi chu tung 縱. Dong tay goi la hanh 衡, nam bac goi la tung 從.
徠=lai, lai [lai2]\n\t1. Doi xua dung nhu chu lai 來. \n\t2. Mot am la lai. Yen ui.
徕=lai, lai [lai2]\n\t1. Doi xua dung nhu chu lai 來. \n\t2. Mot am la lai. Yen ui.
御=ngu, nha [yu4]\n\t1. Ke cam cuong xe. \n\t2. Cai tri tat ca. Vua cai tri ca thien ha goi la lam ngu 臨御 vi the vua toi o dau cung goi la ngu ca. \n\t3. Hau. Nhu ngu su 御史 chuc quan o gan vua giu viec can ngan vua, cac nang hau cung goi la nu ngu 女御. \n\t4. Pham cac thu gi cua vua lam ra deu goi la ngu ca. Nhu ngu thu 御書 chu vua viet, ngu che 御製 bai van cua vua lam ra. \n\t5. Ngan, cung nhu chu ngu 禦. \n\t6. Mot am la nha. Don. Nhu bach lang nha chi 百兩御之 tram co xe cung don day.
徧=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Khap ca.
徨=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Bang hoang 彷徨 bang hoang, y khong yen dinh.
復=phuc, phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Lai. Da di roi tro lai goi la phuc. \n\t2. Bao dap. Nhu phuc thu 復書 viet thu tra loi, phuc cuu 復仇 bao thu, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la phuc. Lai co hai. Nhu tu gia bat kha phuc sinh 死者不可復生 ke chet khong the song lai. \n\t4. Tru. Tru cho khoi di phu phen tap dich goi la phuc. \n\t5. Lai mot am la phu. Cung nghia nhu chu phu 覆.
复=phuc, phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Lai. Da di roi tro lai goi la phuc. \n\t2. Bao dap. Nhu phuc thu 復書 viet thu tra loi, phuc cuu 復仇 bao thu, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la phuc. Lai co hai. Nhu tu gia bat kha phuc sinh 死者不可復生 ke chet khong the song lai. \n\t4. Tru. Tru cho khoi di phu phen tap dich goi la phuc. \n\t5. Lai mot am la phu. Cung nghia nhu chu phu 覆.
循=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Noi, tuan theo. Nhu tuan phap 循法 noi theo phep, tuan ly 循理 noi le. Quan lai thuan luong goi la tuan lai 循吏. \n\t2. Men. Nhu tuan tuong nhi tau 循牆而走 men tuong ma chay. \n\t3. Cung nhu chu tuan 巡. Nhu tuan hanh 循行 di tuan. \n\t4. Nhan tuan, rut re khong dam lam gi goi la nhan tuan. \n\t5. Vo. Nhu phu tuan 拊循 vo ve. \n\t6. Dan dan. Nhu tuan tuan thien du 循循善誘 dan dan kheo bao,theo thu tu ma tien len.
徬=bang [pang2]\n\t1. Nuong tua, cung nhu chu bang 傍. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu bang 彷 bang hoang 徬徨.
徭=dao [yao2]\n\t1. Bat lam viec. Ngay xua co le bat dan lam viec nha vua goi la dao, ai duoc tru goi la mien dao 免徭. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu dao 猺.
微=vi [wei1]\n\t1. Mau nhiem. Nhu tinh vi 精微, vi dieu 微妙 nghia la tinh te mau nhiem khong the nghi ban duoc. \n\t2. Nho. Nhu vi toi 微罪 toi nho, vi le 微禮 le mon. \n\t3. Suy. Nhu thuc vi 式微 suy qua. \n\t4. An, dau khong cho nguoi biet goi la vi. Nhu vi phuc 微服 doi lot ao xau khong cho ai biet minh, vi hanh 微行 di len, v.v. \n\t5. Chang phai, khong. Nhu vi Quan Trong ngo ky bi phat ta nham hy 微管仲吾其彼髮左衽矣 khong ong Quan Trong ta tat bi bui toc mac ao trai vat vay.
徯=he, he [xi1]\n\t1. Doi, cung co khi doc la he. \n\t2. Cung co khi dung chu he 蹊. He kinh 徯逕 loi hep.
徴=trung, chuy, trung [zheng1]\n\t1. Mot dang cua chu trung徵 . 
徵=trung, chuy, trung [zheng1|zhi3]\n\t1. Voi. Nhu trung tap 徵集 voi hop. Cu so dinh ma bat linh goi la trung binh 徵兵. Nha nuoc lay le don nguoi hien goi la trung tich 徵辟, nguoi duoc don moi goi la trung quan 徵軍. \n\t2. Chung co. Nhu ky bat tuc trung da 杞不足徵也 nuoc Ky chang du lam chung vay. Nay goi nguoi nao co tuong tho la tho trung 壽徵 la theo nghia ay. Thanh, nen dua le cuoi de xin goi la nap trung 納徵 nghia la nop cua cho thnh le cuoi vay. \n\t4. Thu. Nhu trung phu 徵賦 thu thue. \n\t5. Hoi. \n\t6. Mot am la chuy. Mot thu tieng trong nam tieng, cung 宮, thuong 商, gioc 角, chuy 徵, vu 羽. \n\t7. Lai mot am la trung. Cung nghia voi chu 懲.
德=duc [de2]\n\t1. Dao duc. Cai dao de lap than goi la duc. Nhu duc hanh 德行, duc tinh 德性, v.v. \n\t2. Thien. Lam thien cam hoa toi nguoi goi la duc chinh 德政, duc hoa 德化. \n\t3. On. Nhu tuy tuu bao duc 醉酒飽德 on cho no say roi, vi the nen cam on cung goi la duc. \n\t4. Cai khi tot (vuong) trong bon mua. Nhu mua xuan goi la thinh duc tai moc 盛德在木, mua he goi la thinh duc tai hoa 盛德在火, v.v. Ten nuoc Duc-y-chi 德意志 thuong goi tat la nuoc Duc.
徹=triet [che4]\n\t1. Suot. Nhu quan triet 貫徹 thong suot. \n\t2. Thue triet. Ngay xua lam phep tinh dien chia moi khu 900 mau, tam nha 800   mau, cua vua 100 mau, tam nha phai lam 100 mau ay cho vua, khi gat tinh mau   thu deu roi lay thoc o ruong vua lam thoc thue goi la thue triet. \n\t3. Bo. Nhu triet khu 徹去 bo di. \n\t4. Lay. Nhu triet bi tang tho 徹彼桑土 boc lay vo dau kia. \n\t5. Pha huy. \n\t6. Sua, lam.
彻=triet [che4]\n\t1. Suot. Nhu quan triet 貫徹 thong suot. \n\t2. Thue triet. Ngay xua lam phep tinh dien chia moi khu 900 mau, tam nha 800   mau, cua vua 100 mau, tam nha phai lam 100 mau ay cho vua, khi gat tinh mau   thu deu roi lay thoc o ruong vua lam thoc thue goi la thue triet. \n\t3.
