Bo. Nhu triet khu 徹去 bo di. \n\t4. Lay. Nhu triet bi tang tho 徹彼桑土 boc lay vo dau kia. \n\t5. Pha huy. \n\t6. Sua, lam.
徼=kieu, kieu, yeu [jiao3|jiao4]\n\t1. Di tuan xet, linh di tuan goi la du kieu 游徼. \n\t2. Ngoai bien. Lay coc dong moc de chia dia gioi voi cac nuoc man di goi la bien kieu 邊徼, phia dong bac goi la tai 塞, phia tay nam goi la kieu 徼, lay cai y nghia nhu che cho trong nuoc vay. \n\t3. Mot am la kieu. cau. Nhu kieu phuc 徼福 cau phuc, kieu hanh 徼幸 cau may, v.v. \n\t4. Rinh mo, do xet. Nhu o kieu di vi tri gia 惡徼以為知者 ghet ke rinh mo lay lam biet ay. \n\t5. Lai mot am la yeu. Ngan che.
徽=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Hay, tot. Nhu xung tung nguoi khac goi la am huy 音徽 tieng tot, phong huy 風徽 thoi hay, v.v. Co net tot luu truyen ve sau goi la di huy 遺徽. \n\t2. Huy hieu, nha vua doi chinh soc goi la dich huy hieu 易徽號. Cai men-day goi la huy chuong 徽章, goi hieu rieng cua nguoi khac la huy hieu 徽徽號 deu do nghia ay ca. \n\t3. Phim dan. \n\t4. Soi day to. \n\t5. Mot thu nhu co quat.
心=tam [xin1]\n\t1. Tim, doi xua cho tim la vat de nghi ngoi, cho nen cai gi thuoc ve tu tuong deu goi la tam. Nhu tam canh 心境, tam dia 心地, v.v. Nghien cuu ve cho hien tuong cua y thuc nguoi goi la tam ly hoc 心理學. Phat hoc cho muon su muon le deu do tam nguoi tao ra goi la phai duy tam 唯心. Nha Phat chia ra lam nhieu thu. Nhung   rut lai co hai thu tam trong yeu nhat. (1) vong tam 妄心 cai tam nghi ngoi lan   man sang bay, (2) chan tam 真心 cai tam nguyen lai van sang lang linh thong, day   du mau nhiem khong can phai nghi moi biet, cung nhu tam guong trong suot, vat   gi qua no la soi to ngay, khac han voi cai tam phai suy nghi moi biet, phai   hoc hoi moi hay. Neu nguoi ta biet ro cai chan tam (minh tam 明心) minh nhu the   ma xep bo sach het cai tam nghi ngoi lan man sang bay di thi tuc thi thanh dao   ngay. \n\t2. Giua, pham noi ve phan giua deu goi la tam. Nhu vien tam 圓心 giua vong tron, trong tam 重心 cot nang, v.v. \n\t3. Sao tam 心, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t4. Cai gai.
必=tat [bi4]\n\t1. At han, loi noi quyet dinh. Nhu tat nhien 必然 su tat the. \n\t2. Mong duoc hy vong ma co y muon cho tat duoc. Nhu vo y vo tat 毋意毋必 dung cu y rieng minh, dung cau at phai the. \n\t3. Han. Nhu huu cong tat thuong 有功必賞 co cong at han duoc thuong.
忉=dao [dao1]\n\t1. Dao dao 忉忉 lo dau dau.
忌=ki, ki [ji4]\n\t1. Ghen ghet. Nhu do ki 妒忌 thay nguoi dep hon ma tuc, goi la do 妒, thay nguoi gioi hon ma tuc goi la ki 忌. \n\t2. So. Nhu vo so ki dan 無所忌憚 khong thua so hai. \n\t3. Ngay ki, ngay dung than chet goi la ki. Pham nhung ngay nao la ngay nguoi truoc minh chet deu goi la ki. Nhu ta goi ngay gio la ngay ki la theo nghia ay. \n\t4. Kieng ki. \n\t5. Mot am la ki, dung lam tieng tro ngu (giup loi).
忍=nhan [ren3]\n\t1. Nhin. Nhu lam viec kho khan cung co lam cho duoc goi la kien nhan 堅忍, khoan dong cho nguoi khong voi trach goi la dong nhan 容忍, v.v. \n\t2. No, lam su bat nhan ma tu lay lam yen long goi la nhan. Nhu nhan tam hai ly 忍心害理 no long lam hai le troi.
忒=thac [te4|tui1]\n\t1. Bien doi. \n\t2. Sai lam. Tuc dung nhu chu thai 太, thuong dung trong cac tu khuc.
忖=thon [cun3]\n\t1. Nghi (nghi ki).
志=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Chi, noi de tam vao day goi la chi. Nhu huu chi canh thanh 有志竟成 co chi tat nen. Nguoi co khi tiet goi la chi si 志士 nghia la tam co chu truong, khong co a dua theo doi vay. \n\t2. Chuan dich. \n\t3. Mui ten. \n\t4. Ghi chep, cung nhu chu chi 誌.
忘=vong [wang4]\n\t1. Quen. \n\t2. Nhang qua. \n\t3. Bo sot. Dung lam chu chuyen cau, nghia la khong.
忙=mang [mang2]\n\t1. Bon ron, trong long voi gap. \n\t2. Cong viec be bon.
忝=thiem [tian3]\n\t1. Nhuc. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam loi noi khiem. Nhu thiem quyen 忝眷 gia quyen cua ke hen mon nay.
忠=trung [zhong1]\n\t1. Thuc, doc long, het bon phan minh la trung.
忡=sung [chong1]\n\t1. Lo.
忤=ngo [wu3]\n\t1. Ngang nguoc. Tuc goi ke bat hieu la ngo nghich 忤逆 nghia la ke khong thuan theo cha me vay.
忩=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thong 悤.
快=khoai [kuai4]\n\t1. Suong thich. Nhu khoai hoat 快活. \n\t2. Chong. \n\t3. Sac. Nhu khoai dao 快刀 dao sac. \n\t4. Linh sai. Nhu bo khoai 捕快 linh bat giac cuop, ha khoai 河快 linh tuan song, v.v.
忭=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Vui thich.
忮=ki [zhi4]\n\t1. Ghen ghet, hai.
忱=tham [chen2]\n\t1. Thuc. Nhu tham khon 忱悃 long thuc, tinh thuc. Bay to y minh voi ke ton quy goi la ha tham 下忱 tinh thuc cua ke duoi nay.
忴=linh [lian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu linh 伶 tuc muon lam chu lien 憐.
念=niem [nian4]\n\t1. Nghi nho. \n\t2. Ngam doc. Nhu niem thu 念書 doc sach, niem kinh 念經 niem kinh, v.v. \n\t3. Hai muoi. Nhu niem ngu nhat 念五日 ngay 25.
忸=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Nuu ny 忸怩 then tho (sac mat then tho).
忻=han [xin1]\n\t1. Hon ho vui ve, cung nhu chu han 欣.
忼=khang [kang1]\n\t1. Khang khai 忼慨 ta cai y trang si bat dac chi ma tuc toi doi nguoc, cung co khi dung chu khang 慷.
忽=hot [hu1]\n\t1. Nhang. Nhu so hot 疏忽 sao nhang, hot luoc 忽略 nhang qua, v.v. \n\t2. Chot. Nhu thuc hot 倏忽 chot thoang, noi su nhanh chong, xuat u bat y, noi gon chi noi la hot. Nhu hot nhien 忽然 chot vay. \n\t3. So hot, phep do co thuoc, tat, phan, ly, hao, ty, hot. Phep can co lang, dong, phan, ly, hao, ty, hot.
忿=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Gian cau, nhan gian phat cau, khong doai gi nua goi la phan. Nhu phan bat duc sinh 忿不欲生 tuc gian chang muon song.
怍=tac [zuo4]\n\t1. Tui then.
怎=cham [zen3]\n\t1. Tieng tro ngu, nghia la the nao. Nhu cham dang 怎樣 nhuong nao ?, cham ma 怎麼 the nao ?, v.v.
怏=uong [yang4]\n\t1. Tam tuc, y khong duoc thoa thich goi la uong uong 怏怏.
怒=no [nu4]\n\t1. Gian, cam thay mot su gi trai y ma noi con cau tuc len goi la chan no 震怒 nghia la dung dung nhu sam nhu set, phan nhieu chi ve su gian cua nguoi ton quy. \n\t2. Phan phat, khi the manh du khong the at duoc goi la no. Nhu no trao 怒潮 song du, no ma 怒馬 ngua bat kham, thao moc no sinh 草木怒生 cay co moc tung, v.v. \n\t3. Oai the.
怔=chinh [zheng1]\n\t1. So run. \n\t2. Chinh xung 怔忡 benh so, trong long nao nao nhu nguoi sap bi bat.
怕=pha [pa4]\n\t1. So.
怖=pho [bu4]\n\t1. Hai. So hai cuong quyt len goi la khung pho 恐怖. \n\t2. Doa nat.
怙=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Cay, Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau vo phu ha ho vo mau ha thi 無父何怙無母何恃 khong cha cay ai, khong me nho ai, vi the nen tuc goi cha me la ho thi 怙恃. Mat cha goi la that ho 失怙, mat me goi la that thi 失恃.
怛=dat [da2]\n\t1. Xot xa, thay nguoi co su bat hanh ma sinh long thuong goi la dat. Tuc goi nguoi chet la dat hoa 怛化 la theo nghia ay. \n\t2. Kinh ngac. \n\t3. Nhoc nhan.
思=tu, tu, tai [sa1|sai1]\n\t1. Nghi ngoi, pham cac su tac dung thuoc ve tam nhu tuong tuong suy xet ghi nho deu goi la tu. \n\t2. Nghi den. \n\t3. Men nho nhu tuong tu 相思 cung nho nhau. \n\t4. Thuong. \n\t5. Tieng dut cau. Nhu bat kha vinh tu 不可泳思 chang kha loi vay. \n\t6. Mot am la tu. Y tu. Nhu thi tu 詩思 y tu tho, van tu 文思 y tu van, v.v. Chu nay ngay xua viet chu tin 囟 duoi chu tam 心 la ngu y rang oc voi tim co quan he thong voi nhau, cac nha khoa hoc bay gio bao nghi o oc, that la dung voi nguoi xua. \n\t7. Lai mot am la tai. Vu tai 于思 rau xom xoam.
怠=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Luoi bieng.
怡=di [yi2]\n\t1. Vui ve, de dang.
急=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Kip. Nhu khan cap 緊急, nguy cap 危急, v.v. Pham cai gi muon cho chong deu goi la cap. Nhu cao cap 告急. \n\t2. Nong nay. Nhu tinh tinh bien cap 性情褊急 tinh tinh hep hoi nong nay.
怦=phanh [peng1]\n\t1. Phanh nhien 怦然 ay nay, ta cai dang dong long. Phanh phanh 怦怦 thang than, ta cai long trung truc.
性=tinh [xing4]\n\t1. Tinh, la mot cai le chan chinh troi bam phu cho nguoi. Nhu tinh thien 性善 tinh lanh. \n\t2. Mang song. Nhu tinh menh 性命. \n\t3. Hinh tinh, chi ve cong dung cac vat. Nhu duoc tinh 藥性 tinh thuoc, vat tinh 物性 tinh vat, v.v. \n\t4. Yen nhien ma lam khong co chap chuoc gi ca. Nhu Nghieu Thuan tinh chi da 堯舜性之也 vua Nghieu vua Thuan cu nhu chan tinh ma lam vay. Nha Phat noi cai tinh nguoi ta nguyen lai van day du sang lang tu bi hy xa mau nhiem tinh than, chi vi vat duc lam me mat chan tinh ay di, nen moi tham lam gian du ngu si ma gay nen het thay moi toi. Neu nhan to ban tinh (kien tinh 見性) cua minh thi bao nhieu su sang bay deu sach het ma chung duoc nhu Phat ngay.
怨=oan [yuan4]\n\t1. Oan gian. \n\t2. Co nghia nhu chu uan 蘊.
怩=ny [ni2]\n\t1. Nuu ny 忸怩 then tho (sac mat then tho).
怪=quai [guai4]\n\t1. La. Nhu quai su 怪事 viec la. \n\t2. Yeu quai. \n\t3. Ngo hai. Nhu dai kinh tieu quai 大驚小怪 so lon hai nho. Tuc cho su bi nguoi quo trach la quai. Nhu kien quai 見怪 thay trach, chieu quai 招怪 voi lay loi trach, v.v.
怫=phat, phi [fei4|fu2]\n\t1. Uat, phat uat 怫鬱 uat tuc qua muon lam cho toang ra. \n\t2. Mot am la phi. Bung bung, ta cai sac noi gian.
怯=khiep [qie4]\n\t1. So khiep (nhat). Tuc goi nguoi hay om la khiep nhuoc 怯弱, ta cai ve con gai luot muot goi la kieu khiep 嬌怯.
怳=hoang [huang3]\n\t1. Hoang nhien 怳然 hoang vay, ta cai dang that y, co khi dung nhu chu hoang 恍.
怵=truat [chu4]\n\t1. So hai. \n\t2. Xot xa. \n\t3. Doa nat. Nhu truat di loi hai 怵以利害 lay le loi hai ma doa nat.
恁=nham [nen4]\n\t1. Nghi, nho. \n\t2. Nhu the.
恂=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Tin. \n\t2. Tuan tuan 恂恂 chac chan, ta cai dang tin can thuc tha. \n\t3. Tuan lat 恂慄 so hai. \n\t4. Voi. 
恃=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Cay, nuong nho. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau vo phu ha ho vo mau ha thi 無父何怙無母何恃 khong cha cay ai, khong me nho ai, vi the nen tuc goi cha me la ho thi 怙恃. Mat cha goi la that ho 失怙, mat me goi la that thi 失恃.
恇=khuong [kuang1]\n\t1. Nhat so.
恉=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu chi 旨.
恍=hoang [huang3]\n\t1. Hoang hot 恍忽, thay khong duoc dich xac goi la hoang hot.
恐=khung, khung [kong3]\n\t1. So. \n\t2. Doa nat. \n\t3. Mot am la khung. E ngai, lo den viec ngoai y tuong deu goi la khung.
恒=hang, cang, cang [heng2]\n\t1. Thuong, lau, ben. Nhu hang san 恒產 cua thuong. Nhu ruong vuon. \n\t2. Mot am la cang. Mat trang vao tuan thuong huyen. Tuan trang dau thang hinh nhu cai cung duong gan cang goi la cang. \n\t3. Khap, tuc quen doc la chu cang. \n\t4. Tuc dung nhu chu hang 恆
恔=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Suong, thich. \n\t2. Tinh ranh.
恕=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Thu, suy bung ta ra bung nguoi, minh khong muon dung bat nguoi phai chiu goi la thu. Luan ngu 論語. Tu Cong van viet. Huu nhat ngon nhi kha di chung than hanh chi gia ho ? Tu viet. Ky thu ho ! Ky so bat duc, vat thi u nhan 子貢問曰：有一言而可以終身行之者乎？子曰：其恕乎！己所不欲，勿施於人 (Ve Linh Cong 衛靈公) Ong Tu Cong hoi rang. Co mot chu nao ma co the tron doi minh lam theo chang ? Duc Khong Tu dap. Co le la chu thu chang ? Cai gi ma minh khong muon thi dung lam cho nguoi khac. \n\t2. Tha thu, nguoi ta co loi, minh rong luong tha cho goi la thu. Nhu khoan thu 寬恕 rong long tha cho.
恙=dang [yang4]\n\t1. Benh xoang. \n\t2. Viec gi. Nhu hoi tham ai thi noi vo dang 無恙 khong viec gi chu ?
恚=khue [hui4]\n\t1. Tuc gian, bao nguoi ta khong nghe mang long tuc gian goi la khue.
恝=kiet [jia2]\n\t1. Quen bang, coi thuong, gap su buon cung coi thuong khong lay lam buon goi la kiet.
恟=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. So.
恠=quai [guai4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu quai 怪.
恢=khoi [hui1]\n\t1. To lon. \n\t2. Lay lai duoc. Vat gi da mat lay lai duoc goi la khoi phuc 恢復.
恣=tu, thu [zi4]\n\t1. Phong tung, tu y lam lao khong kieng ne gi goi la tu. \n\t2. Mot am la thu. Thu tuy 恣睢 tron mat nhin nguoi.
恤=tuat [xu4]\n\t1. Cap giup. Chan cap cho ke ngheo tung goi la tuat. Nhu phu tuat 撫恤, chu tuat 周恤, v.v. Co khi viet chu 卹. \n\t2. Thuong xot. Nhu cang tuat 矜恤 xot thuong. \n\t3. Doai nghi. Nhu vong tuat nhan ngon 罔恤人言 chang doai nghi den loi nguoi ta noi.
恥=si [chi3]\n\t1. Xau ho. \n\t2. Lay lam ho then. \n\t3. Lam nhuc.
耻=si [chi3]\n\t1. Xau ho. \n\t2. Lay lam ho then. \n\t3. Lam nhuc.
恧=nuc [nu:4]\n\t1. Ho then. Bay gio hay dung lam loi hinh dung. Nhu nuc nhien 恧然 ben len.
恨=han [hen4]\n\t1. Oan gian. Su gi da mat hy vong thuc goi la han. Nhu han su 恨事 viec dang gian, di han 遺恨 de su gian lai, am han 飲恨 nuot han, v.v.
恩=an [en1]\n\t1. On. yeu ma giup do ma ban cho cai gi goi la an. \n\t2. Cung yeu nhau. Nhu an tinh 恩情, an ai 恩愛 deu noi ve su vo chong yeu nhau ca.
恪=khac [ke4]\n\t1. Kinh (luc lam viec co y kinh can).
恫=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Dong hat 恫喝 doa nat. Lay tieng hao ma doa nat nguoi. \n\t2. Dau don, cung nhu chu dong 痌.
恬=diem [tian2]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu diem bat vi quai 恬不為怪 yen nhien chang cho lam la. \n\t2. Lang le. Nhu diem dam 恬淡 nhat nheo, phong diem lang tinh 風恬浪靜 gio yen song lang.
恭=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Cung kinh. Su kinh da to lo ra ngoai goi la cung.
息=tuc [xi1]\n\t1. Hoi tho, mui tho ra hit vao mot luot goi la nhat tuc 一息. Tho dai ma than tho goi la thai tuc 太息. \n\t2. Nghi. Nhu huu tuc 休息 nghi ngoi, an tuc 安息 yen nghi, v.v. \n\t3. Con cai, con trai con gai con be goi la nhuoc tuc 弱息. \n\t4. Lai. Tien von goi la mau 母, so lai o tien von ra goi la tuc 息. \n\t5. Thoi. \n\t6. Yen ui.
恰=khap [qia4]\n\t1. Vua van. Nhu khap hao 恰好 vua tot.
恿=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dung 慂.
悁=quyen, quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Tuc gian. \n\t2. Lo. Nhu trung tam quyen quyen 中心悁悁 trong long dau dau, cung doc la chu quyen.
悃=khon [kun3]\n\t1. Chi thuan nhat. Nhu khon khoan 悃欵 khan khoan, khang khang. \n\t2. Khon phuc vo hoa 悃愊無華 thuc tha khong phu hoa. \n\t3. Noi long, tu xung chi minh goi la ha khon 下悃 hay ngu khon 愚悃, v.v.
悄=tieu, thieu [qiao1|qiao3]\n\t1. Lo. \n\t2. Lang yen. Nhu tieu nhien nhi khu 悄然而去 lang yen ma di. Cung doc la chu thieu.
悅=duyet [yue4]\n\t1. Dep long, vui thich. Luan ngu 論語. Hoc nhi thoi tap chi, bat diec duyet ho 學而時習之，不亦悅乎 (Hoc nhi 學而) hoc ma thuong on tap, cung chang thich u ?
悦=duyet [yue4]\n\t1. Dep long, vui thich. Luan ngu 論語. Hoc nhi thoi tap chi, bat diec duyet ho 學而時習之，不亦悅乎 (Hoc nhi 學而) hoc ma thuong on tap, cung chang thich u ?
悉=tat [xi1]\n\t1. Biet het. Nhu tuong tat 詳悉 tuong het. \n\t2. Deu, het. Nhu tat dan binh do ha 悉引兵渡河 deu dan binh sang song.
悌=de [ti4]\n\t1. Khai de 愷悌 vui ve de dang. \n\t2. Thuan, biet dao xu voi anh goi la de.
悍=han [han4]\n\t1. Manh ton. \n\t2. Hung ton. \n\t3. Uong buong tu dung goi la han nhien bat co 悍然不顧.
悒=ap [yi4]\n\t1. Ay nay, lo. Nhu ap ap bat lac 悒悒不樂 ay nay chang vui.
悔=hoi, hoi [hui3]\n\t1. Hoi han, biet loi ma nghi cach doi goi la hoi. Pham su gi da an dinh roi ma lai dinh doi lam cuoc khac cung goi la hoi. \n\t2. Que hoi, ten mot que trong kinh Dich 易經. \n\t3. Mot am la hoi. Xau, khong lanh. Tuc goi su khong tot lanh la hoi khi 悔氣 la do nghia ay.
悖=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Trai le. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu bot 勃.
悚=tung [song3]\n\t1. So.
悛=thuan [quan1]\n\t1. Doi loi, chua.
悝=khoi, ly [kui1]\n\t1. Ten nguoi. \n\t2. Mot am la ly. Lo, buon.
悞=ngo [wu4]\n\t1. Co khi dung nhu chu ngo 誤.
悟=ngo [wu4]\n\t1. To ngo, biet. Trong long hieu thau goi la ngo, doc sach hieu duoc y hay goi la ngo tinh 悟性. \n\t2. Mo, bao cho nguoi biet tinh lai khong me muoi nua.
悠=du [you1]\n\t1. Lo lang. \n\t2. Xa. Nhu du du 悠悠 dang dac.
患=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Lo. Nhu hoan dac hoan that 患得患失 lo duoc lo mat. \n\t2. Tai hoan. Nhu huu bi vo hoan 有備無患 co phong bi khong lo va. \n\t3. Tat benh. Nhu hoan benh 患病 mac benh.
悤=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Thong thong 悤悤 voi vang.
您=nam [nin2]\n\t1. May, cung nhu chu ne 你.
悰=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Vui suong, sung suong.
悱=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Tam tuc, mieng muon noi ma chua noi duoc goi la phi. Nhu bat phi bat phat 不悱不發 chang tuc chang nay ra.
悲=bi [bei1]\n\t1. Dau, khoc khong co nuoc mat goi la bi. \n\t2. Thuong xot, dao Phat lay tu bi lam ton chi, nghia la thuong xot chung sinh ma ra tay te do.
悴=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Khon kho, nguoi vi kho nhoc ma gay go di goi la nhan sac tieu tuy 顏色憔悴.
悵=truong [chang4]\n\t1. Buon ba. Nhu tru truong 惆悵, truong vong 悵惘 deu la cai y that y sinh buon ba ca.
怅=truong [chang4]\n\t1. Buon ba. Nhu tru truong 惆悵, truong vong 悵惘 deu la cai y that y sinh buon ba ca.
悶=muon [men1|men4]\n\t1. Buon buc.
闷=muon [men1|men4]\n\t1. Buon buc.
悸=quy [ji4]\n\t1. Dong long, vi so ma tam rung dong goi la quy.
悻=hanh [xing4]\n\t1. Hanh hanh 悻悻 ta cai dang gian tuc lo ra ngoai.
悼=dieu [dao4]\n\t1. Thuong. \n\t2. Thuong tiec, pham vieng ke da qua doi deu goi la dieu. Nhu truy dieu 追悼 chet roi moi lam le vieng theo.
悽=the [qi1]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu the sang 悽愴, the nhien 悽然 deu nghia la xot thuong ca.
悾=khong [kong1]\n\t1. Thuc tha. \n\t2. Khong khong 悾悾 ngay ngo.
惄=nich [ni4]\n\t1. Con ruot (co y doi). \n\t2. Lo nghi.
情=tinh [qing2]\n\t1. Tinh, cai tinh da phat hien ra ngoai. Nhu mung, gian, thuong, so, yeu, ghet, muon goi la that tinh. \n\t2. Nhan tinh, tam ly moi nguoi cung the ca goi la nhan tinh 人情, nghia la tinh thuong con nguoi ta vay. \n\t3. Thuc, danh tieng qua su thuc goi la thanh van qua tinh 聲聞過情, su thuc hay gia goi la tinh nguy 情偽. \n\t4. Cung yeu. Nhu da tinh 多情. Pham cai gi co quan he lien lac voi nhau deu goi la huu tinh 有情. Nhu lien lac huu tinh 聯絡有情. \n\t5. Chi nguyen, tu dai bay y minh ra goi la tran tinh 陳情. \n\t6. Y rieng. \n\t7. Thu vi. \n\t8. Tinh ai. Tuc cho su trai gai yeu nhau la tinh. Nhu tinh thu 情書 tho tinh.
惆=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Buon ba. Nhu tru truong 惆悵.
惇=don [dun1]\n\t1. Hau, don doc. \n\t2. Tin.
惋=oan, uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Hai hung, an han. Ta quen doc la chu uyen.
惎=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Doc hai. \n\t2. Day bao.
惑=hoac [huo4]\n\t1. Ngo la. Nhu tri gia bat hoac 智者不惑 ke khon khong co dieu ngo la. \n\t2. Me. Nhu co hoac 蠱惑 lay loi noi hay su gi lam me hoac long nguoi. Nha Phat 佛 cho chung sinh doi voi het thay moi phap, khong hieu ro rang tu tinh nguyen la khong, moi sinh ra chap chuoc sang, me mat dao chinh ma bi luan hoi mai. Co   hai su me hoac lon. (1) Kien hoac, nghia la kien thuc me lam. Nhu doi la vo   thuong lai nhan la co thuong, the la kien hoac 見惑, (2) Tu hoac nhu mat thay   sac nghi me say dam sac, tai nghe tieng nghi say me tieng, khong biet sac voi   tieng deu la vong ca, the la tu hoac 思惑.
惓=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Quyen quyen 惓惓 thanh thiet, long thanh thiet (long thiet).
惕=dich [ti4]\n\t1. Kinh so.
惘=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Chan nan. Ta cai dang that chi.
惚=hot [hu1]\n\t1. Hoang hot 恍惚 thay khong dich xac.
惛=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Mo toi (lo mo).
惜=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Dau tiec. Nhan thay nguoi hay vat gi mat di ma khong cam tam goi la tich. Nhu tham kham thong tich 深堪痛惜 rat dang tiec nho lam. \n\t2. Yeu tiec. Nhan vi dang yeu ma qui trong goi la tich. Nhu thon am kha tich 寸陰可惜 mot tac bong quang am cung dang tiec. \n\t3. Tham, keo.
惟=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Muu nghi. \n\t2. Ay la, chi co mot. Nhu duy nhat chanh sach 惟一政策 chi co mot chanh sach. \n\t3. Loi noi mo dau. Nghia la bui. Nhu duy Chu vuong phu van bang 惟周王撫萬邦 bui vua nha Chu vo yen ca muon nuoc. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu tuy 雖.
惠=hue [hui4]\n\t1. Nhan ai. Nhu ki duong dan da hue 其養民也惠 thua nuoi dan vay co long nhan ai. \n\t2. On cho. Nhu hue ham 惠函 on cho phong thu. \n\t3. Cai giao ba canh. \n\t4. Thong dung nhu chu hue 慧.
惡=ac, o, o [e3|e4|wu1|wu4]\n\t1. Ac. \n\t2. Xau. Nhu ac tuong 惡相 tuong xau, ac thanh 惡聲 tieng xau, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la o. Ghet. Kha o 可惡 dang ghet. \n\t4. Xau ho. Nhu tu o chi tam 羞惡之心 chung long ho then. \n\t5. Mot am la o. Sao the ? O. Nhu o thi ha ngon da 惡是何言也 o, the la loi noi gi vay ?
恶=ac, o, o [e3|e4|wu1|wu4]\n\t1. Ac. \n\t2. Xau. Nhu ac tuong 惡相 tuong xau, ac thanh 惡聲 tieng xau, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la o. Ghet. Kha o 可惡 dang ghet. \n\t4. Xau ho. Nhu tu o chi tam 羞惡之心 chung long ho then. \n\t5. Mot am la o. Sao the ? O. Nhu o thi ha ngon da 惡是何言也 o, the la loi noi gi vay ?
惢=nhi [rui3]\n\t1. Von la chu 蕊.
惥=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Khuyen. Xem chu dung 慂.
惪=duc [de2]\n\t1. Von la chu duc 德.
惰=noa [duo4]\n\t1. Luoi bieng. \n\t2. Hinh dang ue oai.
惱=nao [nao3]\n\t1. Nao, buon buc. Nhu ao nao 懊惱 ao nao, trong long tam tuc khong yen.
恼=nao [nao3]\n\t1. Nao, buon buc. Nhu ao nao 懊惱 ao nao, trong long tam tuc khong yen.
惲=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi, ho Uan.
恽=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi, ho Uan.
想=tuong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tuong tuong. Long muon cai gi nghi vao cai ay goi la tuong. \n\t2. Tuong nho. Pham su vat gi da qua ma nho lai hay chua toi ma da du tinh den deu goi la tuong. Nhu hoi tuong duong nien 回想當年 nghi lai nam ay, mien tuong lai nhat 緬想來日 tuong xa den ngay sau, v.v. \n\t3. Lieu dinh. Nhu tuong duong nhien nhi 想當然耳 tuong le phai nhu the vay.
惴=chuy [zhui4]\n\t1. Lo so.
惶=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. So hai. Nhu vo nham hoang tung 無任惶悚 so hai khon xiet.
惸=quynh [qiong2]\n\t1. Lo. Khong co anh em nao cung goi la quynh (tro troi).
惹=nha [re3]\n\t1. Ruoc lay. Nhu nha han 惹恨 ruoc lay su an han. \n\t2. Tuc goi su kheu len goi len mot su gi la nha. \n\t3. Xay ra. \n\t4. Dat dan.
惺=tinh [xing1]\n\t1. Tinh tao, yen lang ma van sang suot goi la tinh. \n\t2. Lang, to ngo.
惻=trac [ce4]\n\t1. Xot xa, bui ngui. Nhu trac nhien bat lac 惻然不樂 bui ngui khong vui. \n\t2. Thuong xot. Trong long thuong xot khong no lam kho ai hay trong thay su kho cua nguoi khac goi la trac an 惻隱.
恻=trac [ce4]\n\t1. Xot xa, bui ngui. Nhu trac nhien bat lac 惻然不樂 bui ngui khong vui. \n\t2. Thuong xot. Trong long thuong xot khong no lam kho ai hay trong thay su kho cua nguoi khac goi la trac an 惻隱.
愀=thieu, sau [qiao3]\n\t1. Xiu mat. Nhu thieu nhien bat lac 愀然不樂 xiu mat khong vui. Co khi doc la sau. 
愁=sau [chou2]\n\t1. Sau, lo, buon tham. \n\t2. Keu thuong, tham dam.
愆=khien [qian1]\n\t1. Toi loi. \n\t2. Sai lam. Nhu khien ki 愆期 sai hen. \n\t3. Benh ac.
愈=du [yu4]\n\t1. Hon. Nhu nhien tac Su du du 然則師愈與 (Luan ngu 論語) the thi anh Su hon u ? \n\t2. Cang. Nhu cau chi du cap, khu chi du vien 求之愈急去之愈遠 cau day cang kip, no cang lang xa. \n\t3. Khoi, benh khoi han goi la toan du 全愈.
愉=du, thau [yu2]\n\t1. Vui ve. Net mat hoa nha vui ve goi la du sac 愉色. \n\t2. Mot am la thau. Cau tha, tam bo.
愊=phuc [bi4]\n\t1. Chi thanh thuc, doc mot chi. Khon phuc vo hoa 悃愊無華 thuc tha khong phu hoa.
愍=man [min3]\n\t1. Xot thuong. \n\t2. Lo.
愎=phuc [bi4]\n\t1. Uong ach, buong, cu tu y lam can khong chiu nghe ai goi la cuong phuc 剛愎.
意=y [yi4]\n\t1. Y chi. trong long toan tinh gi goi la y. Trong van tho co cho de y vao ma khong noi ro goi la ngu y 寓意. \n\t2. Uc dac. Nhu bat y 不意 khong ngo the, y gia 意者 su hoac nhu the, v.v. \n\t3. Y rieng. \n\t4. Nuoc Y (Y-dai-loi). \n\t5. Nha Phat cho y la phan thuc thu bay, tuc la Mat-na-thuc, no hay phan biet nghi ngoi.
愒=khe, khai [kai4]\n\t1. Nghi. \n\t2. Mot am la khai. Tham. \n\t3. Kip, voi.
愔=am, am [yin1]\n\t1. Am am 愔愔 tuoi tinh. Ta cai dang yen on hoa nha. \n\t2. Mot am la am. Lang lang.
愕=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Hot hai, kinh ngac. Ta cai dang so hai cuong cuong.
愚=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Ngu dot. \n\t2. Lua doi. Nhu ngu long 愚弄 lua gat nguoi. \n\t3. Loi noi khiem. Nhu ngu an 愚按 ke ngu si nay xet, ngu y 愚意 nhu y ke ngu dot nay.
愛=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Yeu thich. Nhu ai mo 愛慕 yeu men. \n\t2. Quy trong. Nhu ai tich 愛惜 yeu tiec. Tu trong minh goi la tu ai 自愛. \n\t3. On tham. Nhu di ai 遺愛 de lai cai on cho nguoi nho mai. \n\t4. Than yeu. Nhu nhan mac bat tri ai ky than 人莫不知愛其親 nguoi ta chang ai chang biet yeu thua nguoi than. Tuc goi con gai nguoi khac la lenh ai 令愛, cung viet la 嬡.
爱=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Yeu thich. Nhu ai mo 愛慕 yeu men. \n\t2. Quy trong. Nhu ai tich 愛惜 yeu tiec. Tu trong minh goi la tu ai 自愛. \n\t3. On tham. Nhu di ai 遺愛 de lai cai on cho nguoi nho mai. \n\t4. Than yeu. Nhu nhan mac bat tri ai ky than 人莫不知愛其親 nguoi ta chang ai chang biet yeu thua nguoi than. Tuc goi con gai nguoi khac la lenh ai 令愛, cung viet la 嬡.
愜=khiep, thiep [qie4]\n\t1. Thich y (thoa long). Tuc quen doc la thiep.
惬=khiep, thiep [qie4]\n\t1. Thich y (thoa long). Tuc quen doc la thiep.
感=cam [gan3]\n\t1. Cam hoa, lay loi noi su lam cua minh lam cam dong duoc nguoi goi la cam hoa 感化 hay cam cach 感格. \n\t2. Cam kich, cam dong den tinh tinh o trong goi la cam. Nhu cam khai 感慨, cam kich 感激, v.v. \n\t3. Cam xuc, xong pha nang gio ma om goi la cam mao 感冒. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu 憾.
愠=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu uan 慍. 
愧=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Then, tu lay lam then, goi la quy.
愫=to [su4]\n\t1. Tinh thuc. Nhu nhat khuynh tich to 一傾積愫 doc het chan tinh.
愬=to, sach [su4]\n\t1. Mach bao. \n\t2. Mot am la sach. Nhu sach sach 愬愬 so hai (ta cai dang so hai).
愳=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Chu cu 懼 ngay xua.
愴=sang [chuang4]\n\t1. Thuong xot.
怆=sang [chuang4]\n\t1. Thuong xot.
愷=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Vui. \n\t2. Khuc nhac hat khi thang tran ve goi la khai ca 愷歌.
恺=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Vui. \n\t2. Khuc nhac hat khi thang tran ve goi la khai ca 愷歌.
愼=than [shen4]\n\t1. Ghin, can than. \n\t2. Ran cam. Nhu than doc 愼獨 phai ran cam can than luc mot minh.
愾=hi, khai, khai, hat [kai4]\n\t1. Tho dai. \n\t2. Mot am la khai. Gian. \n\t3. Lai mot am la khai. Day day. \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la hat. Den, cung nghia nhu chu 迄.
忾=hi, khai, khai, hat [kai4]\n\t1. Tho dai. \n\t2. Mot am la khai. Gian. \n\t3. Lai mot am la khai. Day day. \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la hat. Den, cung nghia nhu chu 迄.
愿=nguyen [yuan4]\n\t1. Thien. Can nguyen 謹愿 trung hau thanh thuc.
慁=hon [hun4]\n\t1. Lo lang. \n\t2. Nhuc. \n\t3. Quay roi.
慂=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Khuyen, giuc, minh khong muon the ma ke khac cu xuc lam the goi la tung dung 慫慂.
慄=lat [li4]\n\t1. So run.
慆=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Vui mung. \n\t2. Thao dam 慆滛 phong tung vo do. \n\t3. Ngo. \n\t4. Chua. \n\t5. Qua. Nhu nhat nguyet ky thao 日月其慆 ngay thang thua qua.
慇=an [yin1]\n\t1. Lo. \n\t2. An can 慇勤 an can. \n\t3. Uy khuc.
慈=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Lanh, yeu rat muc. Cha me yeu con goi la tu. \n\t2. Nguoi tren yeu ke duoi cung goi la tu. Chu cap cuu giup cho ke tung thieu khon cung goi la tu thien su nghiep 慈善事業. \n\t3. Me. Cha goi la nghiem 嚴, me goi la tu 慈. Nhu gia tu 家慈, tu mau 慈母, v.v.
慊=khiem, khiet [qian4|qie4]\n\t1. An han, khong thich y. \n\t2. Mot am la khiet. Du.
態=thai [tai4]\n\t1. Thai do (thoi). \n\t2. Tinh trang. Nhu bien thai bach xuat 變態百出 tinh trang bien doi nhieu.
态=thai [tai4]\n\t1. Thai do (thoi). \n\t2. Tinh trang. Nhu bien thai bach xuat 變態百出 tinh trang bien doi nhieu.
慌=hoang [huang1]\n\t1. Lo mo. Nhu hoang hot 慌惚. \n\t2. Voi vang. Nhu hoang mang 慌忙 voi vang hap tap. \n\t3. So hoang.
慍=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Mang long gian, ham han o trong long goi la uan. \n\t2. Tuc gian.
愠=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Mang long gian, ham han o trong long goi la uan. \n\t2. Tuc gian.
慕=mo [mu4]\n\t1. Men, quyen luyen khong roi goi la mo. Nhu nhu mo 孺慕 quan quyt nhu tre con quan cha me. \n\t2. Ham mo, yeu ma muon bat chuoc goi la mo. Nhu mo danh 慕名 ham mo tieng tam, nguong mo 仰慕 van co long kinh mo.
慘=tham [can3]\n\t1. Tham thuong. Nhu bi tham 悲慘 thuong xot tham thiet. \n\t2. Tham doc. Nhu tham khoc 慘酷 tham hai tan ac.
惨=tham [can3]\n\t1. Tham thuong. Nhu bi tham 悲慘 thuong xot tham thiet. \n\t2. Tham doc. Nhu tham khoc 慘酷 tham hai tan ac.
慙=tam [can2]\n\t1. Tui then. Nhu tu tam hinh ue 自慙形穢 tu then minh xau xa.
慚=tam [can2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tam 慙.
惭=tam [can2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tam 慙.
慝=thac [te4]\n\t1. Ac ngam, dieu ac con an nup o trong long goi la thac. \n\t2. Ta, cong. \n\t3. Ke giem pha. \n\t4. Loi don nham. \n\t5. Am khi.
慟=dong [tong4]\n\t1. Thuong qua. Nhu dong khoc 慟哭 gao khoc tham thiet.
恸=dong [tong4]\n\t1. Thuong qua. Nhu dong khoc 慟哭 gao khoc tham thiet.
慢=man [man4]\n\t1. Nhon lao, khinh thuong. Nhu dai man 怠慢 luoi lao, khinh man 輕慢 khinh nhon, v.v. \n\t2. Thong tha, cham chap. Nhu man tinh 慢性 tinh cham, man hanh 慢行 di thong tha, v.v. \n\t3. Phong tung. Nhu man du 慢遊 choi phiem.
慣=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Quen. Nhu tap quan 習慣 tap quen.
惯=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Quen. Nhu tap quan 習慣 tap quen.
慤=khac [que4]\n\t1. Thanh thuc.
慥=thao [zao4]\n\t1. Thao thao 慥慥 cham cham, ta cai dang thiet thuc.
慧=tue [hui4]\n\t1. Tri sang. Lanh le, sinh ra da co tinh sang lang hon nguoi goi la tue can 慧根, co tri sang lang chung minh duoc phap goi la tue luc 慧力, lay tri tue lam tinh mang goi la tue menh 慧命, lay tri tue ma tru sach duoc duyen tran goi la tue kiem 慧劍, co con mat soi to ca qua khu, hien tai, vi lai goi la tue nhan 慧眼.
慨=khai [kai3]\n\t1. Tuc gian bon chon. Nhu khang khai 慷慨. \n\t2. Than tho. Nhu khai nhien 慨然 bui ngui vay.
慫=tung [song3]\n\t1. Khuyen, giuc, minh khong muon the ma ke khac cu xuc lam the goi la tung dung 慫慂.
怂=tung [song3]\n\t1. Khuyen, giuc, minh khong muon the ma ke khac cu xuc lam the goi la tung dung 慫慂.
慮=lu, lu [lu:4]\n\t1. Nghi toan. Nghi dinh toan lam mot su gi goi la lu. \n\t2. Lo. Nhu nhan vo vien lu, tat huu can uu 人無遠慮必有近憂 nguoi khong lo xa, at co su lo den ngay. \n\t3. Vo lu 無慮 gom gop ca, loi tinh gop, ke qua cai so dai luoc. \n\t4. Mot am la lu. Chu lu 諸慮 ten mot thu cay, vo lu 無慮 ten dat.
虑=lu, lu [lu:4]\n\t1. Nghi toan. Nghi dinh toan lam mot su gi goi la lu. \n\t2. Lo. Nhu nhan vo vien lu, tat huu can uu 人無遠慮必有近憂 nguoi khong lo xa, at co su lo den ngay. \n\t3. Vo lu 無慮 gom gop ca, loi tinh gop, ke qua cai so dai luoc. \n\t4. Mot am la lu. Chu lu 諸慮 ten mot thu cay, vo lu 無慮 ten dat.
慰=uy [wei4]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu han uy 欣慰 yen vui, uy lao 慰勞 yen ui.
慳=khan, san [qian1]\n\t1. Keo kiet, lan. Nhu nhat pha khan nang 一破慳囊 mot pha tui keo. Ta quen doc la chu san.
悭=khan, san [qian1]\n\t1. Keo kiet, lan. Nhu nhat pha khan nang 一破慳囊 mot pha tui keo. Ta quen doc la chu san.
慴=triep, diep [zhe2]\n\t1. So, cung co khi doc la chu diep.
慵=thung, dong [yong1]\n\t1. Luoi nhac, tre bieng. Tuc quen doc la chu dong.
慶=khanh, khuong, khanh [qing4]\n\t1. Mung. Nhu tuc goi chuc tho la xung khanh 稱慶. \n\t2. Thuong. Nhu khanh di dia 慶以地 thuong lay dat. \n\t3. Mot am la khuong. Phuc. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu khuong 羌 loi mo dau. \n\t5. Lai mot am la khanh. Cung nghia voi chu khanh 卿.
庆=khanh, khuong, khanh [qing4]\n\t1. Mung. Nhu tuc goi chuc tho la xung khanh 稱慶. \n\t2. Thuong. Nhu khanh di dia 慶以地 thuong lay dat. \n\t3. Mot am la khuong. Phuc. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu khuong 羌 loi mo dau. \n\t5. Lai mot am la khanh. Cung nghia voi chu khanh 卿.
慷=khang [kang1]\n\t1. Khang khai 慷慨 hang hai (co y khi hang hai vi nghia). Tuc bao tieu tien khong co ke la khang khai (hao hiep).
慸=sai, de [di4]\n\t1. Thac mac, trong long co su thac mac khong sao bo bang di duoc goi la sai gioi 慸芥. Tuc doc la chu de.
慼=thich [qi1]\n\t1. Lo lang. Thich thich 慼慼 lo dau dau.
慾=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Ham muon. Boi su ham muon lam chuong duong tu goi la duc chuong 慾障.
憂=uu [you1]\n\t1. Lo, buon rau. \n\t2. Om dau. \n\t3. De tang. Co tang cha me goi la dinh uu 丁憂.
忧=uu [you1]\n\t1. Lo, buon rau. \n\t2. Om dau. \n\t3. De tang. Co tang cha me goi la dinh uu 丁憂.
憃=xuan [chong1]\n\t1. Ngu xuan (dan don khong biet gi).
憇=khe [qi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khe 憩. 
憊=bai [bei4]\n\t1. Moi met. Met qua goi la bai.
惫=bai [bei4]\n\t1. Moi met. Met qua goi la bai.
憎=tang [zeng1]\n\t1. Ghet, trai lai voi tieng yeu. Nhu dien muc kha tang 面目可憎 mat mat kha ghet.
憐=lien, lan [lian2]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu dong benh tuong lien 同病相憐 cung benh cung thuong, co anh tu lien 顧影自憐 trong bong tu thuong. \n\t2. Yeu, tiec (co cho doc la lan).
怜=lien, lan [lian2]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu dong benh tuong lien 同病相憐 cung benh cung thuong, co anh tu lien 顧影自憐 trong bong tu thuong. \n\t2. Yeu, tiec (co cho doc la lan).
憑=bang [ping2]\n\t1. Nuong tua, bang lan 憑欄 tua chan song. \n\t2. Nho cay. \n\t3. Bang cu. Nhu van bang 文憑 van viet lam bang cu.
凭=bang [ping2]\n\t1. Nuong tua, bang lan 憑欄 tua chan song. \n\t2. Nho cay. \n\t3. Bang cu. Nhu van bang 文憑 van viet lam bang cu.
憒=hoi [kui4]\n\t1. Roi ruot, khong hieu su ly gi goi la hon hoi ho do 昏憒糊塗.
愦=hoi [kui4]\n\t1. Roi ruot, khong hieu su ly gi goi la hon hoi ho do 昏憒糊塗.
憔=tieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Tieu tuy 憔悴 khon kho. \n\t2. Hoc hac, nhan sac tieu tuy 顏色憔悴 mat mui hoc hac trong dang thuong lam.
憖=ngan [yin4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ngan 憗. 
憗=ngan [yin4]\n\t1. Tha kha, dung lam tieng phat ngu. \n\t2. Guong. Nhu bat ngan di nhat lao 不憗遺一老 chang guong de sot mot buc gia lai. \n\t3. Thieu.
憙=hi [xi3]\n\t1. Vui long.
憛=dan [-]\n\t1. Kieng so. Nhu tu vo ki dan 肆無忌憚 ngong lao khong kieng so gi. \n\t2. Nan. Nhu qua tac vat dan cai 過則勿憚改 loi thi cho nan doi.
憝=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Oan. \n\t2. Ac. Nhu nguyen ac dai doi 元惡大憝 dau toi ac lon.
憤=phan, phan [fen4]\n\t1. Tuc gian, uat uc qua goi la phan. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. buc tuc, long muon hieu ma chua hieu duoc dam ra buc tuc goi la phan.
愤=phan, phan [fen4]\n\t1. Tuc gian, uat uc qua goi la phan. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. buc tuc, long muon hieu ma chua hieu duoc dam ra buc tuc goi la phan.
憧=sung, trang [chong1]\n\t1. Sung sung 憧憧 long bong y chua dinh han cu long bong hoai goi la sung sung. \n\t2. Ngu xuan. \n\t3. Mot am la trang. Ham trang 戅憧 hung ac.
憨=ham, ham [han1]\n\t1. Ngu si. \n\t2. Mot am la ham. Hai, qua quyet.
憩=khe [qi4]\n\t1. Nghi ngoi. Nhu sao khe 稍憩 nghi mot chut.
憫=man [min3]\n\t1. Thuong xot. \n\t2. Lo.
悯=man [min3]\n\t1. Thuong xot. \n\t2. Lo.
憬=canh [jing3]\n\t1. Hieu biet, tinh ngo, co y lo so ma tinh con me ra goi la canh nhien 憬然.
憮=vu, hu [wu3]\n\t1. Vu nhien 憮然 bui ngui, tai nguoi di, ta cai dang nguoi that y. \n\t2. Mot am la hu. Tuoi dep, cung mot nghia nhu chu vu 嫵. 
怃=vu, hu [wu3]\n\t1. Vu nhien 憮然 bui ngui, tai nguoi di, ta cai dang nguoi that y. \n\t2. Mot am la hu. Tuoi dep, cung mot nghia nhu chu vu 嫵. 
憲=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Phap, yet cac dieu phap luat len cho nguoi biet ma theo goi la hien, nuoc nao lay phap luat ma tri nuoc goi la lap hien quoc 立憲國. Tuc cu goi cac quan tren la hien. Nhu dai hien 大憲, hien dai 憲臺, v.v. (cung nhu ta keu la Cu lon vay).
宪=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Phap, yet cac dieu phap luat len cho nguoi biet ma theo goi la hien, nuoc nao lay phap luat ma tri nuoc goi la lap hien quoc 立憲國. Tuc cu goi cac quan tren la hien. Nhu dai hien 大憲, hien dai 憲臺, v.v. (cung nhu ta keu la Cu lon vay).
憶=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Nho, tuong uc 相憶 cung nho nhau. \n\t2. Ghi nho, nho chon vao tim oc goi la ky uc 記憶.
忆=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Nho, tuong uc 相憶 cung nho nhau. \n\t2. Ghi nho, nho chon vao tim oc goi la ky uc 記憶.
憾=ham [han4]\n\t1. Gian, an nan. \n\t2. Thu gian.
懂=dong [dong3]\n\t1. Mong dong 懵懂 u me, boi roi, ta cai dang tam khong chu dinh. Tuc goi nguoi khong hieu biet ro rang la mong dong 懵懂, ke hieu biet ro rang la dong su 懂事.
懃=can [qin2]\n\t1. An can 慇勤 an can.
懇=khan [ken3]\n\t1. Khan khoan. \n\t2. Khan cau, cau nguoi khac mot cach can thiet goi la khan.
恳=khan [ken3]\n\t1. Khan khoan. \n\t2. Khan cau, cau nguoi khac mot cach can thiet goi la khan.
懈=giai [xie4]\n\t1. Tre luoi.
應=ung, ung [ying1|ying4]\n\t1. Dap. Nhu ung doi 應對 dap thua. \n\t2. Ung theo. Nhu ta dap manh mot cai thi nghe ben ngoai co tieng vang ung theo, goi la huong ung 響應, lam thien duoc phuc, lam ac phai va goi la bao ung 報應, vi long thanh cau ma duoc nhu nguyen goi la cam ung 感應, v.v. \n\t3. Cai trong con. \n\t4. Mot thu am nhac ngay xua, dai 6 thuoc 5 tac. \n\t5. Mot am la ung. Nen the. \n\t6. Nen, loi noi luong tinh truoc. Nhu ung tu 應須 nen phai, chi ung 衹應 chi nen, v.v.
应=ung, ung [ying1|ying4]\n\t1. Dap. Nhu ung doi 應對 dap thua. \n\t2. Ung theo. Nhu ta dap manh mot cai thi nghe ben ngoai co tieng vang ung theo, goi la huong ung 響應, lam thien duoc phuc, lam ac phai va goi la bao ung 報應, vi long thanh cau ma duoc nhu nguyen goi la cam ung 感應, v.v. \n\t3. Cai trong con. \n\t4. Mot thu am nhac ngay xua, dai 6 thuoc 5 tac. \n\t5. Mot am la ung. Nen the. \n\t6. Nen, loi noi luong tinh truoc. Nhu ung tu 應須 nen phai, chi ung 衹應 chi nen, v.v.
懊=ao [ao4]\n\t1. Ao nao 懊惱 tam tuc, buc doc, trong long co su cam tuc nhu nung nhu nau goi la ao nao.
懋=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Khuyen gang. Nhu mau thuong 懋賞 lay phan thuong ma khuyen gang len. \n\t2. Tot tuoi (ham co y lon lao tot dep). \n\t3. Doi chac, cung nghia nhu chu mau 貿.
懌=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Vui long, dep long.
怿=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Vui long, dep long.
懍=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Kinh so. Nhu lam tuan 懍遵 kinh noi theo.
懔=lam [lin3]\n\t1. Kinh so. Nhu lam tuan 懍遵 kinh noi theo.
懟=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Oan gian.
怼=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Oan gian.
懣=muon [men4]\n\t1. Buon ba.
懑=muon [men4]\n\t1. Buon ba.
懥=chi, sy [zhi4]\n\t1. Gian. Ta quen doc la chu sy.
懦=noa, nhu [nuo4]\n\t1. Hen yeu. Co khi doc la chu nhu.
懨=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Yem yem 懨懨 tim thoi thop con mot hoi tho.
恹=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Yem yem 懨懨 tim thoi thop con mot hoi tho.
懲=trung [cheng2]\n\t1. Ran bao, trung tri. Ran bao cho biet so khong dam lam bay nua goi la trung. Nhu bac trung 薄懲 trung tri qua, nghiem trung 嚴懲 trung tri nang.
惩=trung [cheng2]\n\t1. Ran bao, trung tri. Ran bao cho biet so khong dam lam bay nua goi la trung. Nhu bac trung 薄懲 trung tri qua, nghiem trung 嚴懲 trung tri nang.
懵=mong [meng3]\n\t1. Xem chu dong 懂. \n\t2. Mot am la mang. Buon.
懶=lai, lan [lan3]\n\t1. Tang lai 憎懶 ro ghet. \n\t2. Mot am la lan. Luoi, cung nhu chu 嬾.
懒=lai, lan [lan3]\n\t1. Tang lai 憎懶 ro ghet. \n\t2. Mot am la lan. Luoi, cung nhu chu 嬾.
懷=hoai [huai2]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu hoai duc uy uy 懷德畏威 nho duc so uy. \n\t2. Boc, chua, mang. \n\t3. Long, be. Nhu ban hoai 本懷 nguyen long nay. Anh em ruot goi la dong hoai 同懷. \n\t4. Lo nghi. \n\t5. Ve. \n\t6. Lai. \n\t7. Yen. \n\t8. Yen ui. \n\t9. Hoai bao (om trong long).
怀=hoai [huai2]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu hoai duc uy uy 懷德畏威 nho duc so uy. \n\t2. Boc, chua, mang. \n\t3. Long, be. Nhu ban hoai 本懷 nguyen long nay. Anh em ruot goi la dong hoai 同懷. \n\t4. Lo nghi. \n\t5. Ve. \n\t6. Lai. \n\t7. Yen. \n\t8. Yen ui. \n\t9. Hoai bao (om trong long).
懸=huyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Treo, treo thang lang giua khoang khong goi la huyen. \n\t2. Su gi khong co dinh liu vao dau, chua quyet han duoc goi la huyen.
悬=huyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Treo, treo thang lang giua khoang khong goi la huyen. \n\t2. Su gi khong co dinh liu vao dau, chua quyet han duoc goi la huyen.
懺=sam [chan4]\n\t1. An nan, tu thu toi ra de xin sua doi goi la sam hoi 懺悔. \n\t2. Kinh cua nha su lam le cau cung goi la sam, tuc goi la bai sam 拜懺. Phep le sam hoi goi la sam phap 懺法.
忏=sam [chan4]\n\t1. An nan, tu thu toi ra de xin sua doi goi la sam hoi 懺悔. \n\t2. Kinh cua nha su lam le cau cung goi la sam, tuc goi la bai sam 拜懺. Phep le sam hoi goi la sam phap 懺法.
懼=cu [ju4]\n\t1. So hai.
惧=cu [ju4]\n\t1. So hai.
懽=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoan 歡.
懾=nhiep [she4]\n\t1. So nep, bi oai the de nen lam cho mat ca khi phach goi la nhiep.
慑=nhiep [she4]\n\t1. So nep, bi oai the de nen lam cho mat ca khi phach goi la nhiep.
懿=y [yi4]\n\t1. Thuan my (tot dep tinh than). Trong phep dat ten hem ai co du bon net on hoa, nhu mi, sang lang, chi thien thi goi la y, vi the nen thuong dung de khen ve ben dan ba. Nhu y duc 懿德 duc tot, y hanh 懿行 net tot, v.v.
戀=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Men. Trong long vuong vit vao cai gi khong the dut ra duoc goi la luyen.
恋=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Men. Trong long vuong vit vao cai gi khong the dut ra duoc goi la luyen.
戄=quac [ju4]\n\t1. Choang mat. \n\t2. Khep nep, ta cai dang kinh can. Nhu quac nhien cai dong 戄然改容.
戅=trang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu trang 戇.
戇=trang [gang4|zhuang4]\n\t1. Ngu dan, cung thang.
戆=trang [gang4|zhuang4]\n\t1. Ngu dan, cung thang.
戈=qua [ge1]\n\t1. Cai mac, mot thu do binh ngay xua. \n\t2. Danh nhau, nhat tam can qua 日尋干戈 ngay gay su danh nhau. Nguoi trong dang quay lai phan dang goi la dao qua tuong huong 倒戈相向, cung trong mot dang ma danh lan nhau goi la dong that thao qua 同室操戈. \n\t3. Qua thap cap 戈什哈 tieng Man Thanh, nghia la ke hau gan, ke ho ve.
戊=mau [wu4]\n\t1. Can mau, can thu nam trong muoi can.
戌=tuat [qu5|xu1]\n\t1. Chi tuat, chi thu muoi mot trong 12 chi. Tu 7 gio toi den 9 gio toi la gio tuat. \n\t2. Khuat tuat 屈戌 cai ke-mon (cremone).
戍=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Dong thu, linh phai ra dong canh phong ngoai bien goi la linh thu. Co toi bi day ra ngoai bien lam linh thu goi la trich thu 讁戍. \n\t2. O, nha o.
戎=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Do binh, cung, no, giao, mac, kich goi la nam do binh, ngu nhung 五戎, vi the nen cac do quan bi deu goi la nhung ca. \n\t2. Binh linh, quan tong binh goi la tong nhung 總戎. \n\t3. To lon. Nhu nhung thuc 戎菽 giong dau to. \n\t4. Ro, cac giong ro o phuong tay deu goi la nhung. \n\t5. May. \n\t6. Cung. \n\t7. Xe binh.
成=thanh [cheng2]\n\t1. Nen, thanh tuu, pham lam cong viec gi den luc xong deu goi la thanh. Nhu lam nha xong goi la lac thanh 落成, lam quan ve huu goi la hoan thanh 宦成, v.v. \n\t2. Thanh lap. Nhu dai khi van thanh 大器晚成 dai lon muon thanh, tuoi cao duc trong lai duyet lich nhieu goi la lao thanh 老成. \n\t3. Nen, su gi da dinh roi thi goi la thanh. Nhu thu thanh 守成 cu giu lay co nghiep truoc. Cai gi nghi toi truoc ma da an dinh khong doi doi duoc goi la thanh. Nhu thanh tam 成心, thanh kien 成見, v.v. \n\t4. Tron, het. Het mot khuc nhac goi la nhat thanh 一成. \n\t5. Hoa binh, cau hoa goi la cau thanh 求成 hay hanh thanh 行成. \n\t6. Thua vuong muoi dam goi la thanh. \n\t7. Phan so da thanh. Nhu mot cai gi chia ra lam muoi phan thi phan so bay goi la that thanh 七成, phan so tam goi la bat thanh 八成, v.v. \n\t8. Beo tot. \n\t9. Han chac.
我=nga [wo3]\n\t1. Ta (tieng tu xung minh). \n\t2. Minh tu goi minh cung goi la nga. \n\t3. Cua ta, loi noi cho than them. Nhu nga huynh 我兄, anh cua ta, nga de 我弟 em cua ta, v.v. \n\t4. Y rieng ta. Nhu vo nga 無我 dung cu y rieng ta, co chap y kien cua minh goi la nga chap 我執.
戒=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Ran. Nhu khuyen gioi 勸戒. \n\t2. Phong bi. Nhu du huu gioi tam 予有戒心 ta co long phong bi. \n\t3. Trai gioi, truoc khi cung gio an chay tam sach de lam le cho kinh goi la gioi. \n\t4. Lay lam ran. Nhu gioi tuu 戒酒 ran uong ruou, gioi yen 戒煙 ran hut thuoc, v.v. Nguoi nao khong giu cac dieu ran goi la pha gioi 破戒. Dao Phat cho kieng. sat sinh (sat 殺), trom cap (dao 盜), ta dam (dam 滛), noi sang (vong 妄), uong ruou (tuu 酒) la ngu gioi 五戒.
戔=tien, tan [jian1]\n\t1. Tien tien 戔戔 nho nhat. \n\t2. Mot am la tan. Cung nghia voi chu tan 殘.
戋=tien, tan [jian1]\n\t1. Tien tien 戔戔 nho nhat. \n\t2. Mot am la tan. Cung nghia voi chu tan 殘.
戕=tuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Giet, giet hai. Tu giet chet minh goi la tu tuong 自戕.
或=hoac [huo4]\n\t1. Hoac, la loi noi con ngo, chua quyet dinh han. Nhu hoac nhan 或人 hoac nguoi nao, hoac viet 或曰 hoac co ke noi rang, v.v. \n\t2. Ngo, cung nhu chu hoac 惑. \n\t3. Co. \n\t4. Ai.
戚=thich [qi1]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu ai thich chi dong 哀戚之容 cai dang thuong xot. \n\t2. Lo, pham su gi dang lo deu goi la thich. Nhu huu thich tuong quan 休戚相關 mung lo cung quan he. \n\t3. Than thich, ho ngoai goi la ngoai thich 外戚. \n\t4. Cai thich, tuc la cai bua, ngay xua dung lam do binh. \n\t5. Mot thu de mua trong luc hoa nhac.
戛=kiet [jia2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu kiet 戞.
戞=kiet [jia2]\n\t1. Danh se, danh khanh ma danh manh thi goi la kich 擊, danh se goi la kiet 戞. \n\t2. Tro ngo khong duoc thoa thuan. Nhu kiet kiet ho ki nan tai 戞戞乎其難哉 cau cau vay thua kho thay ! Ta cai dang khong vui ve ma hua cho nguoi. \n\t3. Cai giao dai.
戟=kich [ji3]\n\t1. Cai kich. \n\t2. Lay tay tro vao nguoi goi la kich thu 戟手 nghia la nam tay lai tho mot ngon ra xia vao nguoi nhu hinh cai kich vay.
戡=kham [kan1]\n\t1. Giet, danh duoc. Nhu kham loan 戡亂 dep yen duoc loan lac.
戢=tap [ji2]\n\t1. Giau cat di, phuc binh vao mot noi goi la tap, an nup mot cho khong cho nguoi biet cung goi la tap. Nhu tap anh huong vien 戢影鄉園 an nau o chon lang mac khong chiu ra doi. \n\t2. Cup lai. \n\t3. Dap tat. \n\t4. Cam chi. 
戤=ngai [gai4]\n\t1. Cam co, lay mot vat gi de lam tin tien ma lay goi la ngai.
戥=dang [deng3]\n\t1. Cai can tieu ly.
戩=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Het, rat. Nhu tien coc 戩榖 hay rat muc. \n\t2. Phuc.
戬=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Het, rat. Nhu tien coc 戩榖 hay rat muc. \n\t2. Phuc.
截=tiet [jie2]\n\t1. Cat dut. Nhu tiet trang bo doan 截長補短 cat dai va ngan. \n\t2. Doan, vat gi cat ta tung khuc goi la nhat tiet 截 mot doan. \n\t3. Danh chan duong. Nhu tiet sat 截殺 dem binh danh chan doi quan giac, tiet luu 截留 khau bot lai. \n\t4. Tiet nhien, phan biet ro rang dau ra day khong dinh dang gi voi nhau nua. Nhu lay dao ma cat dut han ra, cho nen doi voi su cau cua ai ma nhat dinh khong ung deu goi la tiet nhien 截然. \n\t5. Tiet tiet 截截 xam nam. Ta cai dang lieu bien cong viec.
戮=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Giet. Giet roi phanh thay ra goi la luc. \n\t2. Nhuc, nguyen la chu luc 僇.\n\t3. Chung suc. Nhu luc luc 戮力 cung chung suc vao. \n\t4. Lam nhuc.
戰=chien [zhan4]\n\t1. Danh nhau, hai ben deu bay tran danh nhau goi la chien. Nhu thiet chien 舌戰 tranh cai nhau, thuong chien 商戰 tranh nhau ve su buon ban, v.v. \n\t2. Run ray, ret run lap cap goi la chien. \n\t3. So. Nhu chien chien cang cang 戰戰兢兢 dau dau so hai.
战=chien [zhan4]\n\t1. Danh nhau, hai ben deu bay tran danh nhau goi la chien. Nhu thiet chien 舌戰 tranh cai nhau, thuong chien 商戰 tranh nhau ve su buon ban, v.v. \n\t2. Run ray, ret run lap cap goi la chien. \n\t3. So. Nhu chien chien cang cang 戰戰兢兢 dau dau so hai.
戱=hi [xi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hi 戲.
戲=hi, ho, huy [hu1|xi4]\n\t1. Dua bon. \n\t2. Lam tro. Dien lai su tich cu goi la hi kich 戲劇. \n\t3. Mot am la ho, cung nhu chu ho 呼. Nhu o ho 於戲 than oi ! Cung co khi doc la chu huy, cung nghia voi chu 麾.
戏=hi, ho, huy [hu1|xi4]\n\t1. Dua bon. \n\t2. Lam tro. Dien lai su tich cu goi la hi kich 戲劇. \n\t3. Mot am la ho, cung nhu chu ho 呼. Nhu o ho 於戲 than oi ! Cung co khi doc la chu huy, cung nghia voi chu 麾.
戳=trac, sac [chuo1]\n\t1. Dam. Lay dao dam goi la trac. Cung doc la chu sac.
戴=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Doi, pham de cai gi len dau ma doi deu goi la dai. \n\t2. Ton kinh. Nhu ai dai 愛戴 yeu chuong, yeu ma boc nguoi len goi la ai dai.
戶=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Cua ngo. Cua co mot canh goi la ho 戶, hai canh goi la mon 門. \n\t2. Dan cu. Mot nha goi la nhat ho 一戶. Nhu ho khau 戶口 so nguoi trong mot nha. Doi xua co dat ra bo ho 部戶 de quan ly ve viec thue ma dinh dien. \n\t3. Ngan. \n\t4. Hang.
户=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Cua ngo. Cua co mot canh goi la ho 戶, hai canh goi la mon 門. \n\t2. Dan cu. Mot nha goi la nhat ho 一戶. Nhu ho khau 戶口 so nguoi trong mot nha. Doi xua co dat ra bo ho 部戶 de quan ly ve viec thue ma dinh dien. \n\t3. Ngan. \n\t4. Hang.
戹=ach [e4]\n\t1. Khon ach, cung nhu chu ach 阨. Co khi dung nhu chu ach 厄. \n\t2. Hep. \n\t3. Gian kho.
戼=mao [mao3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu mao 卯.
戽=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Ho dau 戽斗 cai gau day, cai gao muc nuoc trong thuyen. \n\t2. Cai xe keo nuoc, dung de van nuoc len ruong.
戾=le, liet [li4]\n\t1. Den. \n\t2. Thoi, dung lai. \n\t3. Dinh han. \n\t4. Ngang trai. Nhu tinh tinh quai le 性情乖戾 tinh tinh ngang trai, bao le 暴戾 hung ac, v.v. \n\t5. Toi. Nhu can le 干戾 pham toi. \n\t6. Cong queo. \n\t7. Nhanh cung. \n\t8. Mot am la liet. Xoay lai.
房=phong, bang [fang2]\n\t1. Cai buong. \n\t2. Ngan, buong. Nhu phong phong 蜂房 to ong, lien phong 蓮房 huong sen, lang phong 榔房 buong cau, v.v. \n\t3. Sao phong, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t4. Chi, trong gia toc chia ra tung chi goi la phong. Nhu truong phong 長房 chi truong, thu phong 次房 chi thu, v.v. \n\t5. Quan phong, cac quan hoi dong cham thi ngay xua goi la phong quan 房官. \n\t6. Mot am la bang. A bang 阿房 ten cung dien nha Tan. Co khi dung nhu chu phong 防.
所=so [suo3]\n\t1. Xu so. Nhu cong so 公所 so cong, ha so 何所 cho nao ? v.v. Tinh gop het thay cac cai cua minh co goi la so huu 所有. \n\t2. Mot khu nha goi la nhat so 一所. \n\t3. Thua, dung lam loi noi dem. Nhu ai ki so than 愛其所親 yeu thua nguoi than minh. \n\t4. Loi noi chua dinh. Nhu phu khu ly so phuc hoan 父去里所復還 cha di hon dam lai ve. \n\t5. Neu, nghia nhu chu gia 者. \n\t6. Noi, chon, nha Phat cho phan can la nang, phan tran la so. Nhu mat trong thay sac, thi mat la nang, ma sac la so.
扁=bien, thien [bian3|pian1]\n\t1. Giet, cai gi rong ma mong goi la bien. Viet chu ngang tren cua tren cong goi la bien, ta goi la hoanh. \n\t2. Mot am la thien. Nho. Nhu thien chu 扁舟 thuyen nho. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thien dia thien chu phu tu diep 天地扁舟浮以葉 chiec thuyen con nhu chiec la noi giua dat troi.
扃=quynh [jiong1]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu quynh mon 扃門 dong cua, cay go chan ngang tren do vat cung goi la quynh. Nhu dinh quynh 鼎扃 cai que day nap dinh, ta goi la cai tay co. \n\t2. Then ngoai, cai don go dat truoc xe de cam co cung goi la quynh.
扆=y [yi3]\n\t1. Phu y 斧扆 cai chan gio o cua hinh nhu cai bua.
扇=phien, thien [shan1|shan4]\n\t1. Canh cua. \n\t2. Cai quat. \n\t3. Mot am la thien. Quat mat, cung nghia nhu chu 煽.
扈=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Chim ho, thu chim bao tin den mua lam ruong trong dau. \n\t2. Theo sau. Nhu ho gia 扈駕 di theo hau xe vua. \n\t3. Bat ho 跋扈 uong nganh buong binh, khong chiu quy phuc. \n\t4. Ngan cam. 
扉=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Canh cua. Nhu dan phi 丹扉 cua son (cua nha vua). Sai phi 柴扉 cua phen (noi canh nha ngheo). Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ta nhat yem song phi 斜日掩窗扉 mat troi ta ngam chieu cua so.
手=thu [shou3]\n\t1. Tay. \n\t2. Lam. Nhu ha thu 下手 bat tay lam, nhap thu 入手 bat tay vao, dac thu 得手 lam duoc viec, v.v. \n\t3. Tai, lam nghe gi gioi ve nghe ay goi la thu. Nhu quoc thu 國手 tay co tai tri nuoc, nang thu 能手 tay gioi, v.v. \n\t4. Tu tay lam ra. Nhu thu thu 手書 chinh to tay viet, thu nhan 手刃 chinh tay dam, v.v. \n\t5. Cam.
才=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Tai, lam viec gioi goi la tai. \n\t2. Chat. Nhu tai lieu 才料, cung mot nghia nhu chu tai 材. \n\t3. Vua moi. Nhu cuong tai 剛才 vua roi, tai kha 才可 moi kha.
扎=trat [za1|zha1|zha2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trat 札.
扑=phoc [pu1]\n\t1. Dap. Danh se goi la phoc. \n\t2. Cai phoc, mot thu do dung de danh nguoi.
扒=bai [ba1|pa2]\n\t1. Moc ra, boi ra. \n\t2. Tuc goi ke trom ke cap la bai thu 扒手.
打=da [da2|da3]\n\t1. Danh dap. \n\t2. Ve dau. Nhu da na ly tau 打那裏走 chay ve dau, cung nhu chu huong 向. Lai co nghia la lay. Nhu da luong 打糧 lay luong, cung nhu chu 取. \n\t3. Da than 打臣 dich am chu dozen, nghia la mot ta (12 cai). \n\t4. Lam. Nhu bat da cuong ngu 不打誑語 chang lam su noi doi, da ban 打扮 thay lam bo dang khac, da thinh 打聽 nghe ngong, v.v.
托=thac [tuo1]\n\t1. Nang, lay tay ma nhac vat gi len goi la thac. \n\t2. Bay ra. Nhu hoa ban thac xuat 和盤托出 bay het khuc nhoi ra. \n\t3. Cai khay. Nhu tra thac 茶托 khay che.
扛=giang [gang1|kang2]\n\t1. Khieng.
扞=han [han4]\n\t1. Chong giu, cung nhu chu han 捍. \n\t2. Chong cu. Nhu han cach 扞格 chong cu. \n\t3. Vuot dai ra, nan ra. Nhu han mien 扞麵 nan bot.
扢=cot [gu3]\n\t1. Xoa bop. \n\t2. Nen.
扣=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Giang lai. Ngua dang chay keo cuong cho dung lai goi la khau. \n\t2. Khau lay. Vat dang cho ma khau lay khong cho goi la khau. \n\t3. Cai khap. Pham vat gi co the khap vao nhau duoc cho vung goi la khau. Nhu dai khau 帶扣 khoa that lung. \n\t4. Go, cung nhu chu khau 叩. Nhu khau mon 扣門 go cua. \n\t5. So do. Mot tap van tho goi la nhat khau 一扣. \n\t6. Gay, lay tay gay dan goi la khau huyen 扣弦.
扭=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Quay tay.
扮=phan, ban, ban [ban4]\n\t1. Quay, nhao deu. \n\t2. Gom. \n\t3. Mot am la ban. Tuc goi su trang suc la da ban 打扮, cung doc la chu ban.
扯=xa [che3]\n\t1. Xe ra. \n\t2. Tuc goi su dat dan doi doi la xa ca.
扱=trap, hap [xi1]\n\t1. Vai chao tay sat dat. \n\t2. Dat dan, cat len. Tuc goi dung tay xach do de ra cho khac la trap. \n\t3. Mot am la hap. Luom lay.
扳=ban, ban [ban1]\n\t1. Vin, keo. \n\t2. Nam chat, lat. Dung tay ma nam chat vao cho nao hay lat cai gi cho ngua mat len cung goi la ban. Cung doc la chu ban.
扶=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Giup do. \n\t2. Nang do. Nang cho dung day duoc goi la phu. Vat gi sinh doi lien nhau cung goi la phu. Nhu phu tang 扶桑 cay dau sinh doi, phu truc 扶竹 cay truc sinh doi. \n\t3. Cai the dung de danh dau ho. \n\t4. Ben.
批=phe [pi1]\n\t1. Va, lay tay danh vao mat nguoi goi la phe. \n\t2. Phan xu, phan quyet phai trai cho biet goi la phe. Nhu phe binh 批評 y doan the nao la phai la trai roi ghi loi ban vao day, phe bac 批駁 phe chu de bac loi cua ke cau gi hay che van chuong cho nao hong, v.v. \n\t3. Co mot viec cong gi khoi len cung goi la nhat phe 一批. So vat nhieu ma chia ra tung mon de dua dan di cung goi la phe. Nhu de nhat phe 第一批 mon thu nhat, de nhi phe 第一批 mon thu hai, v.v. Vi the nen ban do ma chia tung lo mot goi la phe phat 批發. \n\t4. Vot, che ra tung manh mong cung goi la phe.
扺=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Danh mieng ngang. \n\t2. Chi chuong 扺掌 vo tay.
扼=ach [e4]\n\t1. Giu chen. Nhu ach yeu 扼要 giu chen cho hiem yeu.
找=hoa, trao [zhao3]\n\t1. Boi thuyen. \n\t2. Tuc doc la chu trao. Bu vao cho thieu. \n\t3. Tim kiem.
承=thua [cheng2]\n\t1. Vang. Nhu bam thua 稟承 bam vang theo, thua song duong chi menh 承雙堂之命 vang chung menh cha me, v.v. \n\t2. Chiu. Nhu thua van 承運 chiu van troi, thua an 承恩 chiu on, v.v. Nguoi tren ban cho, ke duoi nhan lay goi la thua. \n\t3. Duong lay. Nhu thua phap 承乏 thay quyen giup ho, thua nhan 承認 dam dang nhan lay, v.v. \n\t4. Phan kem. Nhu Tu San tranh thua 子產爭承 ong Tu San tranh lay phan thue kem. \n\t5. Noi doi. Nhu thua dieu 承祧 noi doi giu viec cung te, thua trong 承重 chau noi chuc con tho ong ba, v.v. \n\t6. Tiep theo. Nhu thua thuong van nhi ngon 承上文而言 tiep theo doan van tren ma noi.
技=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Nghe. Nhu trang ki 長技 nghe tai, mat ki 末技 nghe mat hang, v.v. \n\t2. Tai nang.
抃=bien, bien [bian4]\n\t1. Vo tay. Nhu hoan bien 歡抃 vui mung vo tay. Cung doc la chu bien.
抄=sao [chao1]\n\t1. Lay qua. Tuc goi su tich ki nha cua la sao gia 抄家. \n\t2. Viet ro rang. Nhu thu sao 手抄 ban tay viet, sao ban 抄本 ban sao, v.v. \n\t3. Di re. Di loi re cho den truoc goi la sao can lo 抄近路, bay tran danh up quan giac goi la bao sao 包抄. \n\t4. Muc. Lay thia ma muc chao goi la sao. \n\t5. Mot phan nghin cua mot thung goi la mot sao.
抆=van [wen4]\n\t1. Lau. Nhu van le 抆淚 lau nuoc mat.
抉=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Chon nhat ra, moc ra. Nhu quyet muc 抉目 moc mat ra.
把=ba [ba3|ba4]\n\t1. Cam. Nhu ba ti 把臂 cam tay. Su gi cam chac duoc goi la ba ac 把握. \n\t2. Cai chuoi. \n\t3. Giu. Nhu ba mon 把門 giu cua. \n\t4. Bo.
抑=uc [yi4]\n\t1. De nen. Nhu uc che 抑制. \n\t2. De xuong. \n\t3. Chin, hay loi noi chuyen cau. Nhu cau chi du, uc du chi du 求之與抑與之與 cau day u ? hay cho day u ?
抒=tru [shu1]\n\t1. Thao ra, tuon ra. Nhu nhat tru ngu y 一抒愚意 mot tuon het y mon mon ra. \n\t2. Coi. Nhu tru niem 抒念 coi het su lo nghi, tru nan 抒難 go nan, v.v.
抓=trao, trao [zhua1]\n\t1. Gai. \n\t2. Quap lay, quo lay. Lay mong tay ma quap lay vat gi goi la trao. Co khi doc la chu trao.
抔=boi [pou2]\n\t1. Rum lay, vuc lay.
投=dau [tou2]\n\t1. Nem. Nhu dau ho 投壺 nem the vao trong ho. \n\t2. Quang di. Nhu dau but tong nhung 投筆從戎 quang but theo quan. \n\t3. Tang dua. Nhu dau dao 投桃 tang dua qua dao, dau ham 投函 dua tho, dau thich 投刺 dua thiep, v.v. \n\t4. Den, nuong nho. Nhu dau tuc 投宿den ngu tro, dau hang 投降 den xin hang, tu dau la vong 自投羅網 tu chui vao vong luoi, v.v. \n\t5. Hop. Nhu tinh dau y hop 情投意合 tinh y hop nhau, nghi luan hop y nhau goi la dau ky 投機. Nhan thoi co sa loi goi la dau co su nghiep 投機事業, v.v. \n\t6. Ru.
抖=dau [dou3]\n\t1. Dau tau 抖擻 phan chan. Nhu tinh than dau tau 精神抖擻 tinh than phan chan. \n\t2. Tieng Pham la do da. Tau dich la dau tau hay dau da. Ba mon doc tham, san, si nhu bui ban lam nho mat chan tam, nguoi tu theo hanh dau-da cua Phat hay phan khoi tru sach duoc ba mon doc di. Ta quen goi nha su la dau da la boi do.
抗=khang [kang4]\n\t1. Vac. \n\t2. Chong cu. Nhu khang nghi 抗議 chong cu loi ban, khang menh 抗命 chong cu lai menh lenh. \n\t3. Ngang. Nhu phan dinh khang le 分庭抗禮 chia nha dich le, nghia la cung dung rieng mot phe ma lam le ngang nhau. \n\t4. Giau, cat. \n\t5. Lang khang 狼抗 nang ne.
折=chiet, de [she2|zhe1|zhe2]\n\t1. Be gay. \n\t2. Phan doan. Nhu chiet nguc 折獄 phan doan hinh nguc, chiet trung 折衷 chat chinh su ngo, v.v. \n\t3. Cong, su gi khong phai la su duoc thang suot goi la chiet. Nhu chuyen chiet 轉折, chu chiet 周折 deu la y nghia gang quai mac miu ca. Nghieng minh sap xuong goi la khanh chiet 磬折. \n\t4. Nhun. Nhu chiet tiet ha si 折節下士 nhun minh tiep ke si. \n\t5. Toa chiet, vap nga. Nhu bach chiet bat hoi 百折不回 tram lan toa chiet khong trung. \n\t6. Be bat. Nhu dien chiet dinh tranh 面折廷諍 bat be giua mat o noi trieu dinh. \n\t7. Huy di. Nhu chiet khoan 折券 huy van tu no di. \n\t8. Chet non. Nhu yeu chiet 夭折, doan chiet 短折 deu nghia la chet non ca. \n\t9. So da chia. Nhu so gi chia muoi phan thu bay goi la that chiet 七折, phan   thu tam goi la bat chiet 八折, 75 phan tram goi la that ngu chiet 七五折, v.v. \n\t10. Thieu thon. Nhu chiet ban 折本 lo von. \n\t11. Song ngang, den thay. Nhu chiet sac 折色 lay cai nay den thay cai kia. \n\t12. Dap dat lam cho te. \n\t13. Do tong tang. \n\t14. Mot am la de. De de 折折 de dang, an nhan.
抝=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ao 拗.
抨=phanh, binh [peng1]\n\t1. Be bat, cong kich. \n\t2. Khien, theo, cung doc la binh.
披=phi, bia [pi1]\n\t1. Vach ra, xe ra. Nhu phi van kien nhat 披雲見日 vach may thay mat troi. \n\t2. Chia re. Nhu ly phi 離披 lia re, phi mi 披靡 re luot, v.v. \n\t3. Khoac. Nhu phi y ha sang 披衣下床 khoac ao buoc xuong giuong. \n\t4. Toac ra. \n\t5. Mot am la bia. Cai gia kem ao quan de cho khoi nghieng do.
抬=si, dai [tai2]\n\t1. Danh don. \n\t2. Tuc doc la chu dai. Khieng. Xem 擡.
抱=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Om, be. \n\t2. Hoai bao 懷抱 trong long chua mot cai chi dinh lam mot viec gi goi la hoai bao. \n\t3. Vung. Hai tay vong lai voi nhau goi la hop bao 合抱. Nhu hop bao chi moc 合抱之木 cay to bang mot vung. \n\t4. Giu chac. Nhu bao quan 抱關 ke canh giu noi quan ai. \n\t5. Ap. Nhu ke bao noan 雞抱卵 ga ap trung.
抵=de, chi [di3]\n\t1. Mao pham. Nhu de xuc 抵觸 choc cham den. \n\t2. Chong cu. Nhu de khang 抵抗 chong cu lai, de che 抵制 tay chay, v.v. \n\t3. Dang. Nhu de toi 抵罪 dang toi, de ap 抵押 ngang gia, v.v. \n\t4. Den. Nhu hanh de mo xu 行抵某處 di den xu mo. \n\t5. Quang. Nhu de dia 抵地 quang xuong dat. \n\t6. Dai de 大抵 the ca, dai de, loi noi bao quat tat ca. \n\t7. Mot am la chi. Vo. Nhu chi chuong nhi dam 抵掌而談 vo tay ma ban.
抶=sat [chi4]\n\t1. Danh don.
抹=mat [ma1|mo3|mo4]\n\t1. Boi xoa. Boi nhang nhit goi la do 塗, boi mot vach thang xuong goi la mat 抹. \n\t2. Lau. \n\t3. Quet sach. Nhu mat sat 抹殺 xoa toet het, xo toet, dung loi noi ac nghiet lam cho mat het tu cach pham cach cua nguoi di.
押=ap [ya1]\n\t1. Ky. Nhu hoa ap 花押 ky chu de lam ghi. \n\t2. Giam giu, bo buoc. Nhu ap tong 押送, ap giai 押解deu nghia la bat giai di ca. \n\t3. De lam bao dam (cam). Lay mot vat ngang gia voi do kia de lam bao dam de lay do kia ra goi la de ap 抵押. \n\t4. Tho phu dung van goi la ap, ap la de ep vay. \n\t5. Cai nep manh manh.
抽=truu [chou1]\n\t1. Keo ra. Nhu truu thuy co khi 抽水機器 cai may keo nuoc. \n\t2. Nay ra. Nhu truu nha 抽芽 nay mam. \n\t3. Rut ra. Nhu truu tiem 抽殱 rut the ra. \n\t4. Trich lay, lay mot phan trong toan ca bo ra goi la truu. \n\t5. Nho sach.
拂=phat, bat, phat [fu2]\n\t1. Phay quet. Nhu phat tran 拂塵 quet bui. \n\t2. Phay qua. Nhu xuan phong phat ham 春風拂檻 gio xuan phay qua chan song. \n\t3. Nghich lai, lam trai. \n\t4. Phat tu 拂子 cai phat tran. \n\t5. Danh. \n\t6. Ru. Nhu phat y 拂衣 ru ao. \n\t7. Mot am la bat. Cung nghia voi chu bat 弼. \n\t8. Lai mot am la phat. Ngang trai.
拄=tru [zhu3]\n\t1. Cam, chong do. \n\t2. Che bai.
拆=sach [ca1|chai1]\n\t1. Nut ra. Nhu giap sach 甲拆 nut nanh. \n\t2. Huy di.
拇=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Ngon tay cai, ngon chan cai.
拈=niem [nian1]\n\t1. Gion lay, nhac lay, dung ngon tay lay vat gi goi la niem.
拉=lap [la1|la2]\n\t1. Be gay. \n\t2. Loi keo.
拊=phu, phu [fu3]\n\t1. Vo ve. \n\t2. Tat, va. \n\t3. Cai chuoi do. \n\t4. Cai chuoi dao. \n\t5. Ten mot thu am nhac. \n\t6. Mot am la phu. Ten mot ong thay thuoc doi vua Hoang de la Du phu.
拋=phao [pao1]\n\t1. Nem di, vut di.
抛=phao [pao1]\n\t1. Nem di, vut di.
拌=phan, ban [ban4]\n\t1. Vut bo. Nhu phan menh 拌命 bo lieu mang nguoi. \n\t2. Mot am la ban. Quay deu.
拍=phach [pai1]\n\t1. Va, tat, vo. \n\t2. Dip, cung buc (phim), moi mot cung dan goi la mot phach. \n\t3. Cai phach, dung de danh nhip ma hat. \n\t4. Mot thu do de giu thanh. 
拎=linh [lin1]\n\t1. Xoc len (tay nam vat gi gio len).
拏=noa [na2]\n\t1. Dat dan. \n\t2. Bat ke co toi goi la noa. Tuc dung nhu chu na 拿.
拐=quai [guai3]\n\t1. Quai phien 拐騸 ke min, ke do nguoi dem ban goi la quai tu 拐子. \n\t2. Cai gay.
拑=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu kiem 鉗.
拒=cu, cu [ju4]\n\t1. Chong cu. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. tran hinh vuong, gian quan ra tung phuong. Co khi dung nhu chu cu 矩.
拓=thac, thap [ta4|tuo4]\n\t1. Nang, lay tay nang do len goi la thac, nay thong dung chu thac 扥. \n\t2. An ra, gat ra. \n\t3. Mot am la thap. Rap lay. Lay giay muc in lai cac bai bia cu goi la thap, cung mot nghia nhu chu thap 搨.
拔=bat, boi [ba2]\n\t1. Bat len, chon trong ca bon lay rieng mot nguoi len goi la bat. Nhu de bat 提拔, chan bat 甄拔 deu mot nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Troi chot. Co tai hon ca mot bon goi la bat. Nhu xuat loai bat tuy 出類拔萃 cao chot hon ca moi nguoi. \n\t3. Nho. Nhu lien can bat khoi 連根拔起 nho ca re len. Vay thanh ma lay duoc cung goi la bat. \n\t4. Nhanh, voi. \n\t5. Mot am la boi. Dam canh nay la.
拕=tha [tuo1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tha 拖.
拖=tha, da [tuo1]\n\t1. Keo, cung doc la chu da.
拗=ao, ao, huc [ao3|ao4|niu4]\n\t1. Be. \n\t2. Mot am la ao. Nhu ao le 拗戾 co y ngang trai, chap ao 執拗 co buong. \n\t3. Lai mot am la huc. De nen di.
拘=cau, cu [ju1]\n\t1. Bat. Nhu bi cau 被拘 bi bat. \n\t2. Cau ne, hay tin nham goi la cau. \n\t3. Cau thuc. \n\t4. Han. \n\t5. Bung, lay. \n\t6. Cong. \n\t7. Cau lu xa 拘盧舍 dich am tieng Pham, mot tieng goi trong phep do, mot cau lu xa bang hai dam bay gio, tam cau lu xa la mot do tuan. \n\t8. Mot am la cu. Chau cu 株拘 goc cay go kho.
拙=chuyet [zhuo1]\n\t1. Vung ve. \n\t2. Loi noi tu nhun minh. Nhu chuyet tac 拙作 bai lam cua ke vung ve nay.
拚=bien, phan, phien [pan4|pin1]\n\t1. Vo tay. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. Quet, quet truoc chieu goi la phan. \n\t3. Lai mot am la phien. Cung nhu chu phien 翻.
招=chieu, thieu, thieu [zhao1]\n\t1. Vay. \n\t2. Voi lai. Nay ta goi la cai dau hieu cua hang la cai chieu bai 招牌, to quang cao la chieu thiep 招貼 cung la do cai y voi lai ca. \n\t3. Voi lay. Nhu chieu tai 招災 tu voi lay va, chieu oan 招怨 tu voi lay oan. \n\t4. Co toi tu xung ra cung goi la chieu. \n\t5. Mot am la thieu. Vach to ra. \n\t6. Lai mot am nua la thieu. Cung nghia voi chu thieu 韶.
拜=bai [bai4]\n\t1. Lay. \n\t2. Trao, phong. Nhu phong hau bai tuong 封侯拜相. \n\t3. Be cong.
括=quat, hoat [gua1|kuo4]\n\t1. Bao quat. Bo buoc lai. Nhu quat phat 括髮 quan toc, bui toc. \n\t3. Mui ten. \n\t4. Tim toi (suu tam). \n\t5. Den. \n\t6. Lam. \n\t7. Mot am la hoat. Hoi hop.
拭=thuc [shi4]\n\t1. Lau. Nhu phat thuc 拂拭 lau quet, thuc le 拭淚 lau nuoc mat.
拮=kiet, cat, kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Tay va mieng cung lam (mai lam), kiet cu 拮据 benh tay. Canh huong quan bach cung goi la kiet cu. Ta quen doc la chu cat. \n\t2. Mot am la kiet. Cho xe kep.
拯=chung [zheng3]\n\t1. Cuu vot, lay tay cuu vot nguoi bi chim dam len goi la chung. \n\t2. Gio len.
拱=cung [gong3]\n\t1. Chap tay, chap tay to y cung kinh goi la cung. \n\t2. Chet, hai ban tay vung lai voi nhau goi la cung. \n\t3. Vung quanh, nhieu quanh. \n\t4. Cam.
拳=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Nam tay lai. \n\t2. Nho be. Nhu quyen thach 拳石 hon da con. \n\t3. Quyen quyen 拳拳 cham cham giu lay (khu khu). \n\t4. Nghe cuon, mot mon vo danh bang chan tay khong.
拴=thuyen [shuan1]\n\t1. Ken chon. \n\t2. Buoc. Nhu thuyen ma 拴馬 buoc ngua.
拶=tat [za1|zan3]\n\t1. Buc bach (de ep). \n\t2. Tat chi 拶指 mot thu hinh ac kep ngon tay nguoi de tra khao.
拷=khao [kao3]\n\t1. Danh tra khao.
拼=binh [pin1]\n\t1. Tau hop. Nhu binh am 拼音 danh van. \n\t2. Binh mang 拼命 lieu mang.
拾=thap, thiep, kiep [shi2]\n\t1. Nhat nhanh. \n\t2. Muoi, cung nhu chu thap 十. \n\t3. Cai bao bang da boc canh tay. \n\t4. Mot am la thiep. Lien buoc. Nhu thiep cap nhi dang 拾級而豋 lien buoc noi tung buc ma len. \n\t5. Lai mot am la kiep. Lan luot.
拿=na [na2]\n\t1. Cung dung nhu chu noa 拏.
持=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Cam, giu. Nhu tri tiet 持節 giu tiet, thao tri 操持 giu gin, chu tri 主持 chu truong cong cuoc gi. Ta goi vi su coi ca cua chua la tru tri 住持 cung la do nghia ay ca. Pham noi ve chu tri deu co y chi ve su giu chac khong roi ca. Nhu bao tri 保持 giu giang, ba tri 把持 cam giu lay, hiep tri 挾持 cay the bat buoc nguoi phai theo minh, cang tri 矜持 co danh do cai tinh xau ma giu lay cai hay, bat tu tri 不自持 khong co dinh kien gi, phu tri 扶持 nang do, duy tri 維持 dang giu, chi tri 支持 chong choi, v.v. Hai ben ngang suc chong nhau goi la tuong tri bat ha 相持不下.
挂=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quai 掛.
挆=doa [-]\n\t1. Diem doa 掂挆 can nhac.
指=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Ngon tay. Tay co nam ngon, ngon tay cai goi la cu chi 巨指 hay mau chi 拇指, ngon tay tro goi la thuc chi 食指, ngon tay giua goi la tuong chi 將指, ngon tay deo nhan goi la vo danh chi 無名指, ngon tay ut goi la tieu chi 小指. \n\t2. Tro bao, lay tay tro cho biet goi la chi. Nhu chi diem 指點, chi su 指使, v.v. Pham bieu thi y kien cho nguoi biet deu goi la chi. \n\t3. Y chi, cung nhu chu chi 旨. \n\t4. Chi trich. \n\t5. Tinh so nguoi bao nhieu cung goi la chi.
挈=khiet, khe [qie4]\n\t1. Mang, xach. \n\t2. Dac biet. \n\t3. Mot am la khe. Cung nghia voi chu khe 契. \n\t4. Thieu.
按=an [an4]\n\t1. De xuong. \n\t2. Cu, bang cu cai nay de lam chung cai kia goi la an. \n\t3. Vo. Nhu an kiem 按劍 vo guom, an bi 按轡 cam day cuong, v.v. \n\t4. Xet nghiem, xua co quan tuan an 巡按 nghia la chuc quan di tuan cac noi de xet xem cac quan cai tri dan lam sao. \n\t5. Lan luot toi. Nhu an ho phai dinh 按戶派丁 cu tinh so nha ma lan luot sai phai cac xuat dinh. \n\t6. Dung lai. \n\t7. Vach ra ma hac toi.
挐=noa, nu [na2]\n\t1. Dat dan. \n\t2. Mot am la nu. Cam. \n\t3. Dat.
挑=thieu, thieu, thao [tiao1|tiao3]\n\t1. Ganh. \n\t2. Ken chon. \n\t3. Gat ra. \n\t4. Lua lay. \n\t5. Mot am la thieu. Dan du. Nhu thieu bat 挑撥 kheu choc cho dong day. \n\t6. Lai mot am la thao. Thao dat 挑達 lau linh, ta cai dang ke khinh bac khong co hau.
挖=oat [wa1]\n\t1. Moc, tho tay vao trong hang ma moc thu xem goi la oat.
挨=ai, ai [ai1|ai2]\n\t1. Dun day. \n\t2. Chen lien nhau. Lan luot den nhau cung goi la ai. Bi don danh goi la ai da 挨打. Co khi doc la ai.
挪=na [nuo2]\n\t1. Ve vat. \n\t2. Dich. Lay khoan nay dem dung ve viec kia goi la na.
挫=toa [cuo4]\n\t1. Be. \n\t2. That bai nho goi la toa. \n\t3. Am dieu roi rac cung goi la toa. \n\t4. Khuat nhuc.
振=chan, chan [zhen4]\n\t1. Cuu giup, cung mot nghia nhu chu chan 賑. \n\t2. Nhuc len. Nhu chan tac tinh than 振作精神 phan chan tinh than len. \n\t3. Chan chinh. \n\t4. Nhuc. Nhu uy chan thien ha 威振天下 oai nhuc thien ha. \n\t5. Thu nhan. \n\t6. Thoi, dung lai. \n\t7. Mot am la chan. Chan chan 振振 day dan, dong duc tot tuoi.
挱=sa [suo1]\n\t1. So, xat, xoa, bop.
挵=phan [long4]\n\t1. Lat lai, cung nghia nhu chu phien 翻.
挹=ap [yi4]\n\t1. Rot. Nhu ap bi chu thu 挹彼注此 rot cai nay vao chut kia. \n\t2. Lui, nen di.
挺=dinh [ting3]\n\t1. Troi cao. Nhu thien dinh chi tu 天挺之資 tu chat troi sinh troi hon ca cac buc thuong. \n\t2. Thang. \n\t3. Khong chiu khuat tat cung goi la dinh. \n\t4. Dong. \n\t5. Sinh ra. \n\t6. Khoan. \n\t7. Dat dan.
挼=noa [nuo4]\n\t1. Bop, nan.
挽=van [wan3]\n\t1. Keo lai. Nhu van hoi 挽回 xoay lai, van luu 挽留 keo giu lai, v.v. \n\t2. Loi van. Loi vieng thuong ke chet goi la van ca 挽歌. Xem chu van 輓.
挾=hiep, tiep [jia1|xie2]\n\t1. Cap, xoc nach cho di dung duoc la hiep. \n\t2. Gap. \n\t3. Hiep, cay. Cay co cai chen duoc nguoi ma xu te voi nguoi goi la hiep. Nhu hiep truong 挾長 cay lon, hiep quy 挾貴 cay sang, vv. \n\t4. Mot am la tiep. Vat giau rieng. \n\t5. Dua. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu hiep. Hiep nhat 挾日 muoi ngay.
挟=hiep, tiep [jia1|xie2]\n\t1. Cap, xoc nach cho di dung duoc la hiep. \n\t2. Gap. \n\t3. Hiep, cay. Cay co cai chen duoc nguoi ma xu te voi nguoi goi la hiep. Nhu hiep truong 挾長 cay lon, hiep quy 挾貴 cay sang, vv. \n\t4. Mot am la tiep. Vat giau rieng. \n\t5. Dua. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu hiep. Hiep nhat 挾日 muoi ngay.
捃=quan [jun4]\n\t1. Nhat nhanh, nguyen viet la 攈.
捆=khon [kun3]\n\t1. Ghep chat. \n\t2. Troi.
捉=troc [zhuo1]\n\t1. Nam chat. \n\t2. Bat, bat ep.
捋=loat [lu:3|luo1]\n\t1. Go lay, vach lay. Lay tay go tung cai goi la loat. \n\t2. Vuot.
捌=bat [ba1]\n\t1. Pha, chia. \n\t2. Tam. Tuc muon dung nhu chu bat 八.
捍=han [han4]\n\t1. Giu gin. \n\t2. Ton, cung nghia voi chu han 悍.
捎=sao, sieu [shao1]\n\t1. Luot qua, phay qua. \n\t2. Tru sach. \n\t3. Mot am la sieu. Gui do.
捏=niet [nie1]\n\t1. Nam nan, nam dat goi la niet. \n\t2. Cung co keo phu hoi voi nhau cung goi la niet. Tuc viet la 揑.
捐=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Bo. Nhu quyen quan 捐舘 bo cho o, nghia la chet. \n\t2. Tru bo di. Nhu quyen tru nhat thiet 捐除一切 nhat thiet tru bo het. \n\t3. Giup rieng. \n\t4. Quyen, nop tien cho nha nuoc ban chuc tuoc cho goi la quyen. Dem tien cung vao viec nghia gi cung goi la quyen. \n\t5. Thue quyen. \n\t6. Cai vong xe.
捓=gia [ye2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu gia 揶.\n\t1. Bat, toi thang nha ke co toi ma bat goi la dai 逮, lung duoi ke co toi tron la bo 捕.
捗=due [-]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu due 曳.
捥=oan [wan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu oan 腕.
捧=phung [peng3]\n\t1. Bung.
捨=xa [she3]\n\t1. Vat bo. Nhu xa than hoang dao 捨身弘道 bo minh lam viec dao. \n\t2. Bo. Nhu kien tri bat xa 堅持不捨 co giu chang bo, luyen luyen bat xa 戀戀不捨 quyen luyen khong doi duoc. Doi xua thong dung nhu chu xa 舍. Nhu thi xa 施捨 cho giup, cung viet la 施舍.
捩=liet, le [lie4]\n\t1. Quay, van, be. \n\t2. Mot am la le. Gay dan ty ba.
捫=mon [men2]\n\t1. Vo, so bat. Nhu mon sat 捫蝨 so bat ran, mon tam 捫心 tu xet long minh.
扪=mon [men2]\n\t1. Vo, so bat. Nhu mon sat 捫蝨 so bat ran, mon tam 捫心 tu xet long minh.
捭=bai [bai3]\n\t1. Mo, Quy Coc Tu co mot bai sach goi la bai hap thien 捭闔篇 nghia la bai hoc ve cach up mo de di du thuyet. \n\t2. Hai tay danh.
据=cu, cu [ju1|ju4]\n\t1. Benh tay, kiet cu 拮据 benh tay. Canh huong quan bach cung goi la kiet cu. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. Cung nhu chu cu 據.
捱=nhai [ai2]\n\t1. Chong cu. \n\t2. Lan lua, bi danh don cung goi la nhai da 捱打.
捲=quyen, quyen [juan3]\n\t1. Cuon, cung nhu chu quyen 卷. Tich quyen 席捲 cuon tat (bao quat tat ca). \n\t2. Mot am la quyen. Quyen quyen 捲捲 gang goi (hang hai).
捴=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 總. 
捵=dien [chen1]\n\t1. Nan ra, cang ra. Lay tay se moi cho len cung gi la dien.
捶=chuy [chui2]\n\t1. Danh nga. \n\t2. Dap, da.
捷=tiep, thiep [jie2]\n\t1. Danh duoc, pham su gi nen cong cung goi la tiep ca, thi do cung goi la tiep. \n\t2. Nhanh. Nhu tiep tuc tien dac 捷足先得 nhanh chan duoc truoc. \n\t3. Mot am la thiep. Thiep thiep 捷捷 tieng chep mieng.
捺=nai [na4]\n\t1. De ep, lay tay an manh goi la nai. \n\t2. Cach viet dua but ve ben tay phai xuong goi la nai (cai phay).
捻=niep, niem [nian3]\n\t1. Nan, ve, chu dung trong cac tu khuc. \n\t2. Rut lay cam. \n\t3. Mot am la niem. Nhu chi niem 紙捻 cai le. Doi Gia Khanh o ba tinh Son Dong, Giang To, An Huy thuong co tuc xoe moi giay tam dau thap len lam hoi cung than, den doi Ham Phong ket dang vao quay roi may tinh mien bac, tuc goi la niem tu 捻子 hay niem phi 捻匪 giac Niem. Ta thuong doc la chu nam.
捼=noa [nuo4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu noa 挼.
捽=tot [zuo2]\n\t1. Vuot. Nhu tot phat 捽髮 vuot toc. \n\t2. Cam. \n\t3. Dung cham. \n\t4. Nho len.
掀=hien, han [xian1]\n\t1. Xoc len, nhac len. Lay tay xoc cao len goi la hien. Ta quen doc la chu han.
掂=diem [dian1]\n\t1. Can nhac, lay tay can nhac xem do nang nhe the nao goi la diem doa 掂挅.
掃=tao [sao3|sao4]\n\t1. Quet. Nhu sai tao 洒掃 vay nuoc quet nha. \n\t2. Xong het. Nhu tao so 掃數 tinh xong cac so roi. \n\t3. Phu de lay rom ra danh tung mang de ho de goi la tao tu 掃子.
扫=tao [sao3|sao4]\n\t1. Quet. Nhu sai tao 洒掃 vay nuoc quet nha. \n\t2. Xong het. Nhu tao so 掃數 tinh xong cac so roi. \n\t3. Phu de lay rom ra danh tung mang de ho de goi la tao tu 掃子.
掄=luan [lun1|lun2]\n\t1. Ken chon. Nhu luan tai 掄才 ken chon nguoi tai.
抡=luan [lun1|lun2]\n\t1. Ken chon. Nhu luan tai 掄才 ken chon nguoi tai.
掇=xuyet [duo1]\n\t1. Nhat lay. \n\t2. Hang lay. \n\t3. Dan du nguoi lam bay goi la thoan xuyet 攛掇. \n\t4. Cuop boc. \n\t5. Chon loc lay. \n\t6. Dam, xien.
授=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Cho, trao cho. \n\t2. Truyen thu, thu khoa 授課 day hoc. \n\t3. Trao ngoi quan.
掉=dieu, trao [diao4]\n\t1. Xung dang, su gi dau cuoi ung nhau goi la dieu. Nhu vi dai bat dieu 尾大不掉 duoi to khong xung. \n\t2. Lac. Nhu dieu dau bat co 掉頭不顧 lac dau khong doai. \n\t3. Tuc goi su giao doi la dieu, tuc doc la trao.
掊=boi, phau, bau [pou2|pou3]\n\t1. Keo lay. Nhu boi khac 掊克 bop nan cua dan. \n\t2. Cam. \n\t3. Nam, mot nam. \n\t4. Mot am la phau. Danh. \n\t5. Bua ra. Ta quen doc la chu bau ca.
掌=chuong [zhang3]\n\t1. Long ban tay, quyen o trong tay goi la chuong ac chi trung 掌握之中. \n\t2. Chuc giu. Nhu chuong an 掌印 chuc quan giu an. \n\t3. Ban chan giong dong vat cung goi la chuong. \n\t4. Va.
掎=ky, y, ky [ji3]\n\t1. Co mot ben, chia quan dong hai mat de che quan giac goi la ky gioc 掎角. Ta quen doc la chu y. Cung doc la chu ky.
掏=dao [tao1]\n\t1. Loc chon. \n\t2. Lon tay vao lay do goi la dao.
掐=khap [qia1]\n\t1. Bam lay mong tay vao goi la khap. Bam dot ngon tay tinh cung goi la khap. Lay mong tay hai cac loai rau cung goi la khap.
排=bai [pai2|pai3]\n\t1. Boi ra, gat ra. \n\t2. Duoi, loai di. Nhu de bai 詆排 ruong duoi, bai te 排擠 duoi cut di, v.v. \n\t3. Bay xep. Nhu an bai 安排 bay yen (xap dat dau vao day). Mot hang goi la nhat bai 一排. \n\t4. Phep nha binh ve bo binh, phao binh, cong binh, truy trong binh, thi ba bang la mot bai, quan ky thi hai bang la mot bai.
掖=dich [ye1|ye4]\n\t1. Nach, cung nhu chu dich 腋. \n\t2. Giup. Nhu du dich 誘掖 dan ru minh di truoc du cho nguoi theo sau goi la du 誘,dung o ben ma giup do nguoi goi la dich 掖. \n\t3. O ben. Nhu cai nha o ben cung goi la dich dinh 掖庭, tuong ben dien goi la dich vien 掖垣.
掘=quat [jue2]\n\t1. Dao. Nhu quat dia 掘地 dao dat, quat tinh 掘井 dao gieng. \n\t2. Khat. \n\t3. Troi hon. \n\t4. Hang hoc. 
掙=tranh [zheng1|zheng4]\n\t1. Cua ra, lot bo di. Dung suc ma lot bo ra duoc goi la tranh thoat 掙脫.
挣=tranh [zheng1|zheng4]\n\t1. Cua ra, lot bo di. Dung suc ma lot bo ra duoc goi la tranh thoat 掙脫.
掛=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Treo. Nhu treo pham 掛帆 treo buom, quai niem 掛念 long thac mac, quai hieu 掛號 tho bao dam.
掞=thiem [shan4]\n\t1. Duoi ra.
掠=luoc [lue:3|lue:4]\n\t1. Cuop lay. Nhu xam luoc 侵掠 xam cuop. \n\t2. Phay ngang, net phay chu goi la luoc. \n\t3. Danh don (danh bang roi).
採=thai, thai [cai3|cai4]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu thai lien 採蓮 hai sen, thai cuc 採菊 hai cuc, v.v. \n\t2. Chon nhat. Nhu thai tuyen 採選 chon lay, nguyen viet la chu thai 釆. Ta quen doc la chu thai.
采=thai, thai [cai3|cai4]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu thai lien 採蓮 hai sen, thai cuc 採菊 hai cuc, v.v. \n\t2. Chon nhat. Nhu thai tuyen 採選 chon lay, nguyen viet la chu thai 釆. Ta quen doc la chu thai.
探=tham, tham [tan4]\n\t1. Tim toi. \n\t2. Tim xa. Nhu tham ban cau nguyen 探本窮源 tham den goc tim den nguon. \n\t3. Thu. Nhu tham van khau khi 探問口氣 hoi thu khau khi xem sao. \n\t4. Do xet. Nhu khuy tham 窺探 tham dom, chinh tham 偵探 rinh xet, v.v. \n\t5. Hoi tham. Nhu tham than 探視 tham nguoi than, tham huu 探友 tham ban. \n\t6. Tim kiem. Nhu tham mai 探梅 tim kiem mo, tham hoa 探花 tim kiem hoa, v.v. Ta quen doc la tham.
掣=xe, xiet [che4]\n\t1. Keo. Nhu xe chuu 掣肘 keo canh tay (bo canh), khien xe 牽掣 keo dat nhau. \n\t2. Rut. Nhu xe tiem 掣籤 rut the, cung doc la chu xiet.
接=tiep [jie1]\n\t1. Lien, hai dau lien nhau goi la tiep. \n\t2. Hoi hop. Nhu tiep hop 接洽 hoi hop chuyen tro, truc tiep 直接 thang tiep voi nguoi nghia la minh den tan mat tan noi ma giao tiep, gian tiep 間接 xen tiep, nghia la lai cach mot tung nua moi tiep duoc y kien nhau. \n\t3. Noi tiep. Nhu tiep thu 接手 noi tay lam, tiep bien 接辦 noi sau lieu bien. Cong viec nhieu qua, khong the lam kiem duoc ca goi la ung tiep bat ha 應接不暇 ung tiep chang roi. \n\t4. Lien noi. Nhu tiep chung nhi chi 接踵而至 noi got ma den. \n\t5. Tiep dai. Nhu nghenh tiep 迎接. \n\t6. Thay. \n\t7. Gan. \n\t8. Nhan duoc. \n\t9. Troi tay. \n\t10. Chong voi.
控=khong [kong4]\n\t1. Dan, keo. Nhu khong huyen 控弦 duong cung. \n\t2. Cao mach. Nhu thuong khong 上控 to cao len tren. \n\t3. Cam giu. \n\t4. Nem.
推=thoi [tui1]\n\t1. Day len. \n\t2. Doi doi di. Nhu thoi tran xuat tan 推陳出新 doi cu ra moi. \n\t3. Trut cho, dem cai cua minh nhuong cho nguoi goi la thoi. Nhu giai y thoi thuc 解衣推食 coi ao xe com cho. \n\t4. Khuoc di, tu thoi. \n\t5. Chon ra. Nhu cong thoi 公推 moi nguoi cung chon ma tien cu ra. \n\t6. Tim go cho ra moi. Nhu thoi cau 推求 tim toi, thoi tuong 推詳 tim cho tuong tan.
掩=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Bung, ngam, min, dong. Nhu yem khau 掩口 bung mieng, yem mon 掩門 dong cua, v.v. \n\t2. Che lap. Nhu yem cai 掩蓋 che day, yem te 掩蔽 bung che, v.v. \n\t3. Up lay, chup lay, thua luc khong co phong bi ma up ngay goi la yem, nguyen la chu yem 揜.
措=tho, trach [cuo4]\n\t1. Thi tho ra. \n\t2. Bo. Nhu hinh tho 刑措 nghia la bo khong dung hinh phat nua. \n\t3. Bat tay lam. Nhu tho thu bat cap 措手不及 ra tay khong kip. \n\t4. Lieu. Nhu tru tho 籌措 toan lieu, tho bien 措辦 lieu bien, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la trach. Bat ke trom.
掫=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Canh gac. \n\t2. Cam do di vao nhau.
掬=cuc [ju1]\n\t1. Chet, hai tay chet lai voi nhau goi la cuc. \n\t2. Rut lay, luom lay. Nhu tieu dong kha cuc 笑容可掬 dang cuoi xinh co the luom lay duoc.
掮=kien [qian2]\n\t1. Ganh vac, ke di mua ban ho nguoi goi la kien khach 掮客.
掯=khang [ken4]\n\t1. Khang lac 掯勒 de ep.
掽=banh [peng4]\n\t1. Banh khap 掽搕 danh, khua.
掾=duyen [yuan4]\n\t1. Chuc quan pho. Nhu thua duyen 丞掾, duyen thuoc 掾屬 deu la chuc quan giup viec quan chanh ca.
揀=gian, luyen [jian3]\n\t1. Ken chon. Co khi doc la chu luyen.
拣=gian, luyen [jian3]\n\t1. Ken chon. Co khi doc la chu luyen.
揄=du [yu2]\n\t1. Dat, keo. \n\t2. Du duong 揄揚 khen lao. \n\t3. Gia du 揶揄 treu gheo, che dieu.
揅=nghien [yan2]\n\t1. Xoa bop. \n\t2. Nghien cuu. Nhu nghien kinh 揅經 tim xet nghia kinh.
揆=quy [kui2]\n\t1. Do, luong. Nhu bach quy 百揆 toan luong tram viec, la cai chuc cua quan te tuong, vi the doi sau moi goi quan the tuong la thu quy 首揆, hay hiep quy 協揆 vay. \n\t2. Dao. Nhu ky quy nhat da 其揆一也 thua dao mot vay.
揉=nhu, nhu [rou2]\n\t1. Thuan. \n\t2. Uon nan, go mem co the uon thang uon cong duoc goi la nhu moc 揉木, co khi doc la chu nhu. \n\t3. Lan lon.
揎=tuyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Xan tay ao. Nhu tuyen due lo ty 揎袂露臂 xan ao lo canh tay ra.
描=mieu [miao2]\n\t1. Phong ve, mieu ta, nghia la trong buc ve nao hay chu nao ma ve phong ra, viet phong ra cho giong vay. Cai van tre con viet dam (to lai) cung goi la mieu hong 描紅.
提=de, thi, de [di1|ti2]\n\t1. Nang len, nang do, pham dat cho len tren, keo cho tien len deu goi la de, de hue 提攜 dat diu, de bat 提拔 cat nhac, v.v. \n\t2. Keo day. Nhu de te 提撕 xach day, nhac day. \n\t3. Quan de. Nhu de doc 提督 quan de doc, de tieu 提標 linh duoi dinh quan de doc, v.v. \n\t4. Bay ra, ke ra. Nhu trung de 重提 nhac lai su cu, bat de 不提 chang nhac lai nua. \n\t5. Mot am la thi. Dan chim xum hop. \n\t6. Mot am nua la de. Dut ra, nem vao.
插=sap, trap [cha1]\n\t1. Cam vao, lach vao. \n\t2. Trong, cay. \n\t3. Cai mai, cung doc la chu trap.
揔=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 總. 
揕=cham [zhen4]\n\t1. Dam, danh.
揖=ap [yi1]\n\t1. Vai chao. \n\t2. Co lay, hang lay. \n\t3. Tu. Nhuong.
揗=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Vo ve, yen ui. Pham lay on vo ve nguoi, hay chia buon cho nguoi deu goi la tuan.
揑=niet [nie1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu niet 捏. 
揘=hoanh [nie1]\n\t1. Hoanh tat 揘 畢 kich thich, thuc day. 
揚=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Gio len, boc len. Nhu thuy chi duong ba 水之揚波 nuoc chung gon song, phong chi duong tran 風之揚塵 gio chung boc bui len, v.v. \n\t2. Khen. Nhu xung duong 稱揚 khen ngoi, du duong 揄揚 tam tac khen hoai (gap ai cung noi dieu hay cua nguoi).
扬=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Gio len, boc len. Nhu thuy chi duong ba 水之揚波 nuoc chung gon song, phong chi duong tran 風之揚塵 gio chung boc bui len, v.v. \n\t2. Khen. Nhu xung duong 稱揚 khen ngoi, du duong 揄揚 tam tac khen hoai (gap ai cung noi dieu hay cua nguoi).
換=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Doi, cai. \n\t2. Thay doi. \n\t3. Xac xuoc.
换=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Doi, cai. \n\t2. Thay doi. \n\t3. Xac xuoc.
揜=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Giat lay. \n\t2. Chum, che day. \n\t3. Cuop. \n\t4. Khon don, ngat ngheo.
揠=yet, yen [ya4]\n\t1. Nho len, ta quen doc la yen.
握=ac [wo4]\n\t1. Cam, nam. \n\t2. Nam tay lai. \n\t3. Cam lay. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu ac 幄.
揢=khach [ke2]\n\t1. Chen chat, nam chat. \n\t2. Mot am la kha. Chen co nguoi (bop co).
揣=suy, tuy, doan [chuai1|chuai3|chuai4]\n\t1. Luong, do chieu cao goi la suy. Pham nhung su can nhac do dan deu goi la suy. \n\t2. Tham do. \n\t3. Mot am la tuy. Be, vo cho nat ra. \n\t4. Mot am nua la doan. Dong lai, chau lai.
揩=khai, giai [kai1]\n\t1. Lau, chui. Ta quen doc la chu giai.
揪=thu [jiu1]\n\t1. Niu, xoan lai.
揫=thu [jiu1]\n\t1. Vun thu, tich gop.
揭=yet [jie1]\n\t1. Gio cao, dung len. Nhu yet can khoi su 揭竿起事 dung co noi len. \n\t2. Bao cho ro. Nhu yet thi 揭示. \n\t3. To lo, phoi ra. \n\t4. Ganh, vac. \n\t5. Tieu chuan (lam mau muc).
揮=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Rung dong, lay dong. Nhu huy dao 揮刀 khoa dao, huy hao 揮毫 quay but, v.v. \n\t2. Tan ra. Nhu huy hoac 揮霍 phung pha, phat huy 發揮 lam cho ro ret ra.
挥=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Rung dong, lay dong. Nhu huy dao 揮刀 khoa dao, huy hao 揮毫 quay but, v.v. \n\t2. Tan ra. Nhu huy hoac 揮霍 phung pha, phat huy 發揮 lam cho ro ret ra.
揲=thiet, diep [die2|she2]\n\t1. Dem co thi (cam ma dem). \n\t2. Mot am la diep. Xep gap.
援=vien, vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Vin. Nhu vien le 援例 vin le cu. \n\t2. Keo, dat. Nhu thien ha ninh, vien chi di dao 天下溺援之以道 thien ha chim dam, phai lay dao ma keo dat len. \n\t3. Mot am la vien. Cuu giup. Nhu vien binh 援兵 binh den cuu giup.
揶=gia [ye2]\n\t1. Gia du 揶揄 treu gheo, trong gheo.
揸=tra [zha1]\n\t1. Nan, nhum lay. But to goi la tra but 揸筆.
搆=cau, cau [gou4]\n\t1. Cau nhu 搆擩 lo mo khong hieu viec. \n\t2. Mot am la cau. dat (khien lien). Tuc hay dung nhu chu cau 構.
搉=xac, giac [que4]\n\t1. Go, danh. \n\t2. Mot am la giac. Vin dan. Nhu duong giac 揚搉 dan co gi lam chung, thuong giac 商搉 ban bac lay chung co cho dung, v.v. \n\t3. Chuyen, cung nghia nhu chu giac 榷.
搊=xau [chou1]\n\t1. Gay. \n\t2. Rut chat.
損=ton [sun3]\n\t1. Bot. Nhu ton thuong ich ha 損上益下 bot ke tren them ke duoi. \n\t2. Mat. Nhu ton that 損失, ton hai 損害, v.v. \n\t3. Yeu.
