损=ton [sun3]\n\t1. Bot. Nhu ton thuong ich ha 損上益下 bot ke tren them ke duoi. \n\t2. Mat. Nhu ton that 損失, ton hai 損害, v.v. \n\t3. Yeu.
搏=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Danh, tat. \n\t2. Bat lay. \n\t3. Danh nhau.
搐=suc [chu4]\n\t1. Rut. Nhu truu suc 抽搐 co rut (gan co rut lai dau).
搒=bang, bang [beng4]\n\t1. Day thuyen len. 2 Mot am la bang. Danh don.
搓=tha [cuo1]\n\t1. Xat tay.
搔=tao, trao [sao1]\n\t1. Gai, cao. \n\t2. Quay. \n\t3. Mot am la trao. Mong chan mong tay.
搖=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Lay dong. Nhu dieu thu 搖手 vay tay. \n\t2. Quay nhieu.
摇=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Lay dong. Nhu dieu thu 搖手 vay tay. \n\t2. Quay nhieu.
搗=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dao 擣. 
捣=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dao 擣. 
搘=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Chong choi.
搜=suu, sao [sou1]\n\t1. Tim toi. Nhu suu la 搜羅 tim toi, luc loi, suu kiem 搜檢 tim soat. \n\t2. Roc lay, boc lot. Nhu suu quat 搜括 quan lai boc lot cua dan. \n\t3. Tim nghi. Nhu suu sach kho trang 搜索枯腸 het suc tim toi suy nghi (nan ruot ma nghi). \n\t4. Mot am la sao. Roi loan. 
搡=tang [sang3]\n\t1. Chong cu, an ra, day ra.
搢=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Cam, cai, tan than 搢紳 cam cai hot vao dai. Cac quan doi xua deu mac ao de ru dai ao xuong va cam hot vao ben canh nen goi la tan than. Nay ta goi cac con chau nha quan la tan than la do nghia do. Tuc quen viet la tan than 縉紳.
搤=ach [e4]\n\t1. Nam chat, bop chat, chen, cung nhu chu ach 扼.
搥=truy, doi [chui2]\n\t1. Danh. Nhu truy co 搥鼓 danh trong. \n\t2. Mot am la doi. Nem, vat bo.
搦=nach, nhuoc [nuo4]\n\t1. Bat. \n\t2. Cam. \n\t3. Quap. Nhu suc nach 搐搦 co quap. \n\t4. Xoa bop. Ta quen doc la chu nhuoc.
搧=thien [shan1]\n\t1. Tat, va. \n\t2. Quat mat.
搨=thap [ta4]\n\t1. Rap lay, lay giay muc rap vao cac tam bia cu de lay van goi la thap.
搪=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Duong dot (xong xao). \n\t2. Chong choi. Lam cau tha cho tac trach goi la duong tac 搪塞.
搬=ban, ban [ban1]\n\t1. Tru het, don sach. \n\t2. Mot am la ban. Doi di, khuan. Nhu ban di 搬移 don doi di cho khac.
搭=dap [da1]\n\t1. Phu vao, dap di. Nhu dap xa 搭車 dap xe di, dap thuyen 搭船 dap thuyen di, v.v. \n\t2. Treo len, vat len. \n\t3. De lan lon. \n\t4. Cai ao ngan. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu thap 搨.
搲=oa [wo1]\n\t1. Bat lay, cam lay, boi.
搴=khien [qian1]\n\t1. Nho lay, keo len, co lai.
搶=thuong, thuong, thuong [qiang1|qiang3]\n\t1. Cuop lay. Nhu thuong doat 搶奪 cuop giat. \n\t2. Mot am la thuong. Dap, huc. Nhu di dau thuong dia 以頭搶地 lay dau huc xuong dat. \n\t3. Lai mot am la thuong. Thuyen nguoc gio ma tien len goi la thuong, nay thuong goi ke cho thuyen la trao thuong 掉搶.
抢=thuong, thuong, thuong [qiang1|qiang3]\n\t1. Cuop lay. Nhu thuong doat 搶奪 cuop giat. \n\t2. Mot am la thuong. Dap, huc. Nhu di dau thuong dia 以頭搶地 lay dau huc xuong dat. \n\t3. Lai mot am la thuong. Thuyen nguoc gio ma tien len goi la thuong, nay thuong goi ke cho thuyen la trao thuong 掉搶.
携=hue [xie2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hue 攜. 
搽=tra [cha2]\n\t1. Boi xoa, thep. Nhu tra chi 搽脂 boi sap.
搾=tra [zha4]\n\t1. Ban ep, lay ban ep ma ep cac thu hat co dau de lay dau dung goi la tra.
搿=cach [ge2]\n\t1. Vung, lay hai tay vung lai voi nhau goi la cach.
摑=quac, quach [guai1|guo2]\n\t1. Danh, tat tai, cung doc la chu quach.
掴=quac, quach [guai1|guo2]\n\t1. Danh, tat tai, cung doc la chu quach.
摒=binh [bing4]\n\t1. Bo, ruong duoi. \n\t2. Binh duong 摒擋 thu nhat.
摔=suat [shuai1]\n\t1. Quang xuong dat, quang di.
摘=trich [zhai1]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu trich qua 摘瓜 hai dua, trich qua 摘果 hai qua, v.v. \n\t2. Chon lay. Nhu trich sao 摘抄 chon sao lay mot doan, trich luc 摘錄 chon chep lay tung doan, v.v. \n\t3. Phat ra. Nhu trich gian 摘奸 phat giac duoc su gian ta ra.
摛=si [chi1]\n\t1. Bay ve, vach ra, mo ra. Nhu si tao nhu xuan hoa 摛藻如春華 ve voi van chuong nhu hoa xuan.
摜=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Tap quen, cung nhu chu quan 慣. \n\t2. Quat xuong, cung danh nhau vat nhau cung goi la quan giao 摜交.
掼=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Tap quen, cung nhu chu quan 慣. \n\t2. Quat xuong, cung danh nhau vat nhau cung goi la quan giao 摜交.
摟=lau [lou1|lou3]\n\t1. Keo be. \n\t2. Om ap.
搂=lau [lou1|lou3]\n\t1. Keo be. \n\t2. Om ap.
摠=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 總. 
摧=toi, toa [cui1]\n\t1. Be gay. \n\t2. Diet het. \n\t3. Thuong. \n\t4. Mot am la toa. Phat co.
摩=ma [ma1|mo2]\n\t1. Xoa xat. Nhu ma quyen sat chuong 摩拳擦掌 xoa nam tay xat ban tay. \n\t2. Xat nhau. Nhu nhi man te ma 耳鬢撕摩 mai toc xat qua, nghia la ngoi ke nhau, mai toc no xat qua vay. \n\t3. Mai giua. Nhu ma luyen 摩練 mai giua luyen tap, ma le 摩厲 mai giua de le, v.v. \n\t4. Tan, mat. \n\t5. Thuan.
摭=trich [zhi2]\n\t1. Nhat lay. Lay.
摯=chi [zhi4]\n\t1: Cua lam tin, cung nhu chu chi 贄. \n\t2. Den. Nhu khan chi 懇摯 an can den muc. \n\t3. Manh du, cung nhu chu chi 鷙.
挚=chi [zhi4]\n\t1: Cua lam tin, cung nhu chu chi 贄. \n\t2. Den. Nhu khan chi 懇摯 an can den muc. \n\t3. Manh du, cung nhu chu chi 鷙.
摰=nghiet [zhi4]\n\t1. Nguy hiem, khong duoc yen on.
摳=khu [kou1]\n\t1. Ven, xach. Nhu khu y nhi xu 摳衣而趨 ven ao ma chay rao. \n\t2. Do lay, mo thu.
抠=khu [kou1]\n\t1. Ven, xach. Nhu khu y nhi xu 摳衣而趨 ven ao ma chay rao. \n\t2. Do lay, mo thu.
摴=su [shu1]\n\t1. Su bo 摴蒱 danh su bo, mot loi danh bac ngay xua, cung goi la danh ngu moc 五木.
摶=doan, chuyen [tuan2]\n\t1. Nam, chet, vo tron. \n\t2. Nuong cay. Nhu doan phu dao nhi thuong 摶扶搖而上 nuong gio ca ma bay len. \n\t3. Mot am la chuyen. Nam co.
抟=doan, chuyen [tuan2]\n\t1. Nam, chet, vo tron. \n\t2. Nuong cay. Nhu doan phu dao nhi thuong 摶扶搖而上 nuong gio ca ma bay len. \n\t3. Mot am la chuyen. Nam co.
摹=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Mo phong, co cai mau de trong ma bat chuoc goi la mo. Nhu quy mo 規摹 khuon mau cu.
摺=triep, lap [zhe2]\n\t1. Gap, chep, xep giay thanh tung tap,cung goi la tap. Nhu thu triep 手摺 tap tay viet, tau triep 奏摺 tap so tau, v.v. \n\t2. Mot am la lap. Be gap, cung nhu chu lap 拉.
摽=phieu, phieu [piao3]\n\t1. Danh. \n\t2. Rung, trong kinh Thi co tho phieu mai 摽梅 noi ve su hon nhan phai cap thoi. Nay ta goi con gai sap lay chong la phieu mai la vi co do. \n\t3. Mot am la phieu. Vay. Nhu phieu su gia xuat chu dai mon chi ngoai 摽使者出諸大門之外 vay su gia ra ngoai cua cai. \n\t4. Tit mu, ta cai dang cao xa.
撂=luoc [liao4]\n\t1. Queu lay, kheu ra, gat ra. Nhu luoc khai 撂開 gat ra.
撅=quyet, que, quyet [jue1]\n\t1. Dao. \n\t2. Mot am la que. Om ao, vach ao. \n\t3. Lai mot am la quyet. Danh.
撇=phiet [pie1|pie3]\n\t1. Phay, net phay. \n\t2. Vut di, quang di khong them doai den.
撈=lao, lieu [lao1]\n\t1. Mo, lan vao trong nuoc ma mo vat gi len goi la lao. Nhu lao ngu 撈魚 mo ca, cung doc la chu lieu.
捞=lao, lieu [lao1]\n\t1. Mo, lan vao trong nuoc ma mo vat gi len goi la lao. Nhu lao ngu 撈魚 mo ca, cung doc la chu lieu.
撏=triem, tam [xian2]\n\t1. Nho, vat. Nhu triem mao 撏毛 vat long. \n\t2. Mot am la tam. Lay.
撐=xanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Chong giu, mien cuong chong giu goi la xanh. \n\t2. Cai cot xieu. \n\t3. No, day du. \n\t4. Cho thuyen.
撑=xanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Chong giu, mien cuong chong giu goi la xanh. \n\t2. Cai cot xieu. \n\t3. No, day du. \n\t4. Cho thuyen.
撒=tat, tan [sa1|sa3]\n\t1. Tung ra, buong ra, toe ra. Nhu tat thu 撒手 buong tay. Ta quen doc la chu tan.
撓=nao [nao2]\n\t1. Quay nhieu. \n\t2. Cong, chung. Nhu bat phu nao 不膚撓 chang chung da.
挠=nao [nao2]\n\t1. Quay nhieu. \n\t2. Cong, chung. Nhu bat phu nao 不膚撓 chang chung da.
撕=te, ty [si1]\n\t1. Nhac nhom, tinh thuc, nghia la nhac cho biet ma tinh lai. \n\t2. Mot am la ty. Xe, go. \n\t2. Xat. Nhu ty ma 撕摩 xoa xat.
撙=ton [zun3]\n\t1. Bao theo. Nhu ton tiet 撙節 theo nhu le phep. \n\t2. Nen di. \n\t3. Cat bot di, be di. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu 蹲.
撚=nien, nien, nhien [nian3]\n\t1. Cam, xoe, gay, xeo, dam, cung doc la chu nien, ta quen doc chu nhien.
撞=chang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Khua, danh. Nhu chang chung 撞鐘 danh chuong. \n\t2. Xung dot.
撟=kieu, kieu, kieu [jiao3]\n\t1. Uon len, cong len. Nhu thiet kieu bat nang ha 舌撟不能下 luoi cong len khong xuong duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu. Nan cho ngay. \n\t3. Lai mot am la kieu. Duoi ra.
挢=kieu, kieu, kieu [jiao3]\n\t1. Uon len, cong len. Nhu thiet kieu bat nang ha 舌撟不能下 luoi cong len khong xuong duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu. Nan cho ngay. \n\t3. Lai mot am la kieu. Duoi ra.
撡=thao [cao1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thao 操. 
撣=dan, dan [dan3|shan4]\n\t1. Dan dan 撣撣 ran bao, canh cao cho biet ma ran phong. \n\t2. Phay, quet. \n\t3. Nang giu. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu dan 襌. \n\t5. Mot am la dan. Danh, va phai. \n\t6. Ten nuoc.
掸=dan, dan [dan3|shan4]\n\t1. Dan dan 撣撣 ran bao, canh cao cho biet ma ran phong. \n\t2. Phay, quet. \n\t3. Nang giu. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu dan 襌. \n\t5. Mot am la dan. Danh, va phai. \n\t6. Ten nuoc.
撤=triet [che4]\n\t1. Bo di, tru di, cat di.
撥=bat [bo1]\n\t1. Tru sach, danh tan. Nhu bat khai van vu 撥開雲霧 tru sach may mu. \n\t2. Chuyen, xoay lai. Nhu bat loan phan chanh 撥亂反正 dep loan chuyen lai chanh. \n\t3. Phat ra. Nhu chi bat 支撥 chi phat ra. \n\t4. Kheu, boi. Nhu khieu bat 挑撥 khieu goi, bat thuyen 撥船 boi thuyen, v.v. \n\t5. Gay dan. \n\t6. Cai mong tay gia de gay dan. \n\t7. Cung lat trai lai. \n\t8. Toc len.
拨=bat [bo1]\n\t1. Tru sach, danh tan. Nhu bat khai van vu 撥開雲霧 tru sach may mu. \n\t2. Chuyen, xoay lai. Nhu bat loan phan chanh 撥亂反正 dep loan chuyen lai chanh. \n\t3. Phat ra. Nhu chi bat 支撥 chi phat ra. \n\t4. Kheu, boi. Nhu khieu bat 挑撥 khieu goi, bat thuyen 撥船 boi thuyen, v.v. \n\t5. Gay dan. \n\t6. Cai mong tay gia de gay dan. \n\t7. Cung lat trai lai. \n\t8. Toc len.
撦=xa [che3]\n\t1. Xe ra.
撩=lieu, lieu [liao1|liao2]\n\t1. Vo lay. \n\t2. Kheu choc. Nhu lieu chien 撩戰 kheu chien, cung doc la chu lieu.
撫=phu, mo [fu3]\n\t1. Yen ui, phu du. Nhu tran phu 鎮撫dong quan de giu cho dan duoc yen, chieu phu 招撫 chieu tap cac ke luu tan phan loan ve yen phan lam an, v.v. \n\t2. Vo ve. Nhu phu duc 撫育 vo ve nuoi nang. \n\t3. Cam, tuot, vuot. Nhu phu kiem 撫劍 tuot guom. \n\t4. Mot am la mo. Cung nhu chu mo 摹.
抚=phu, mo [fu3]\n\t1. Yen ui, phu du. Nhu tran phu 鎮撫dong quan de giu cho dan duoc yen, chieu phu 招撫 chieu tap cac ke luu tan phan loan ve yen phan lam an, v.v. \n\t2. Vo ve. Nhu phu duc 撫育 vo ve nuoi nang. \n\t3. Cam, tuot, vuot. Nhu phu kiem 撫劍 tuot guom. \n\t4. Mot am la mo. Cung nhu chu mo 摹.
撬=khieu [qiao4]\n\t1. Cat len, nang len.
播=ba, ba [bo1]\n\t1. Gieo ra, vung ra. Nhu ba chung 播種 gieo hat giong. \n\t2. Lam lan rong. Nhu ba cao 播告 bao cho khap moi nguoi deu biet. \n\t3. Tron. Nhu ba thien 播遷 tron di o cho khac. \n\t4. Duoi. \n\t5. Mot am la ba. Lay dong.
撮=toat [cuo1|zuo3]\n\t1. Dum, phep dong ngay xua cu dem 256 hat thoc goi la mot toat. \n\t2. Dum lay, rut lai. Nhu toat yeu 撮要 rut lay cac cai cot yeu. \n\t3. Tu hop.
撰=soan, tuyen, chuyen [zhuan4]\n\t1. Dat bay, su. \n\t2. Soan, lam van lam sach ghi chep cac viec goi la soan. Nhu soan thuat 撰述 thuat viec theo truoc lam thanh bai thanh sach, soan truoc 撰著 tu lay y minh lam thanh van, thanh sach, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la tuyen. Ken chon. \n\t4. Lai mot am la chuyen. Cam.
撲=phac, bac [pu1]\n\t1. Danh, dap tat. \n\t2. Danh truong. \n\t3. Phay qua. \n\t4. Cai de danh dap. Nhu cau phac 毬撲 cai raquette, cai vot danh bong. \n\t5. Mot am la bac. Cung danh nhau, dau suc. \n\t6. Do nga.
撳=kham [qin4]\n\t1. De manh.
揿=kham [qin4]\n\t1. De manh.
撻=that [ta4]\n\t1. Danh, danh bang roi goi la that. \n\t2. Nhanh chong, mau man.
挞=that [ta4]\n\t1. Danh, danh bang roi goi la that. \n\t2. Nhanh chong, mau man.
撼=ham [han4]\n\t1. Lay. Nhu noi nhung nguoi khong biet tu luong suc minh goi la thanh dinh ham thach tru 蜻蜓撼石柱 chuon chuon lay cot da.
撾=qua [wo1]\n\t1. Danh. \n\t2. Danh trong.
挝=qua [wo1]\n\t1. Danh. \n\t2. Danh trong.
擁=ung, ung [yong1]\n\t1. Om, cam. \n\t2. Giu. Nhu ung ho 擁護 xum theo ho ve. \n\t3. Mot am la ung. Bung che.
拥=ung, ung [yong1]\n\t1. Om, cam. \n\t2. Giu. Nhu ung ho 擁護 xum theo ho ve. \n\t3. Mot am la ung. Bung che.
擂=loi, luy [lei2|lei4]\n\t1. Dam, nghien. \n\t2. Mot am la luy. Danh. Nhu luy co 擂鼓 danh trong. \n\t3. Nem da, lan da tu tren cao xuong.
擄=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Bat duoc, lay duoc. Nhu lo luoc 擄掠 cuop duoc.
掳=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Bat duoc, lay duoc. Nhu lo luoc 擄掠 cuop duoc.
擅=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Chuyen. Nhu thien quyen 擅權 chuyen quyen. \n\t2. Chiem cu. Nhu thien loi 擅利 chiem lay loi rieng.
擇=trach [ze2|zhai2]\n\t1. Chon. Nhu trach lan 擇鄰 chon lang gieng. \n\t2. Khac, phan biet.
择=trach [ze2|zhai2]\n\t1. Chon. Nhu trach lan 擇鄰 chon lang gieng. \n\t2. Khac, phan biet.
擊=kich [ji1]\n\t1. Danh. Nhu kich co 擊鼓 danh trong. \n\t2. Cong kich. Nhu truy kich 追擊 duoi theo ma danh, tap kich 襲擊 danh len, v.v. \n\t3. Cham biet. Nhu muc kich 目擊 chinh mat trong thay. 
击=kich [ji1]\n\t1. Danh. Nhu kich co 擊鼓 danh trong. \n\t2. Cong kich. Nhu truy kich 追擊 duoi theo ma danh, tap kich 襲擊 danh len, v.v. \n\t3. Cham biet. Nhu muc kich 目擊 chinh mat trong thay. 
操=thao, thao [cao1]\n\t1. Cam, giu. Nhu thao khoan 操券 cam khoan. \n\t2. Giu gin. Nhu thao tri 操持, thao thu 操守 deu nghia la giu gin duc hanh ca. \n\t3. Noi. Nhu thao ngo am 操吳音 noi tieng xu Ngo. \n\t4. Tap. Nhu thao dien 操演 tap tran. \n\t5. Mot am la thao. Chi. Nhu tiet thao 節操 chi tiet. Pham dung ve danh tu deu goi la chu thao ca. \n\t6. Khuc dan. Nhu quy son thao 龜山操 khuc dan quy son.
擎=kinh [qing2]\n\t1. Vac, gio cao.
擒=cam [qin2]\n\t1. Bat, voi giu.
擔=dam, dam [dan1|dan3|dan4]\n\t1. Vac, tu ganh lay trach nhiem goi la dam nham 擔任. \n\t2. Mot am la dam. Cai do vac, mot tram can tuc goi la nhat dam 一擔.
担=dam, dam [dan1|dan3|dan4]\n\t1. Vac, tu ganh lay trach nhiem goi la dam nham 擔任. \n\t2. Mot am la dam. Cai do vac, mot tram can tuc goi la nhat dam 一擔.
擕=hue [xie2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hue 攜. 
擗=bich, tich, phich [pi3]\n\t1. Vo bung. Cung doc la chu tich. \n\t2. Mot am la phich. Be, bua ra.
擘=phach, bich [bai1|bo4]\n\t1. Bua ra. \n\t2. Mot am la bich. Ngon tay cai. Ta thuong goi cac nguoi co tieng hon ca mot dan (bay) la cu bich 巨擘 la do y ay. Ta quen doc la chu phach ca.
據=cu [ju1|ju4]\n\t1. Nuong cay. \n\t2. Chung cu. \n\t3. Cu nhe. Nhu cu ly luc tranh 據理力爭 cu nhe le phai ma het suc tranh. \n\t4. Chiem cu. Nhu cu vi ki huu 據為己有 chiem cu lam cua minh, thiet cu 竊據 chiem cu mot phuong, v.v. \n\t5. Chong giu.
据=cu [ju1|ju4]\n\t1. Nuong cay. \n\t2. Chung cu. \n\t3. Cu nhe. Nhu cu ly luc tranh 據理力爭 cu nhe le phai ma het suc tranh. \n\t4. Chiem cu. Nhu cu vi ki huu 據為己有 chiem cu lam cua minh, thiet cu 竊據 chiem cu mot phuong, v.v. \n\t5. Chong giu.
擠=te, te [ji3]\n\t1. Gat, day. \n\t2. Bai te 排擠 de lan, cung doc la chu te.
挤=te, te [ji3]\n\t1. Gat, day. \n\t2. Bai te 排擠 de lan, cung doc la chu te.
擡=dai [tai2]\n\t1. Nang cao, khieng, hai nguoi cung nang do gi len cung goi la dai. \n\t2. Dai gia 擡價 gia cao, len gia.
擢=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Cat len, nhac len. Ke dang o ngoi duoi cat cho len tren goi la trac. \n\t2. Bo di.
擣=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Gia, dam. Nhu dao y 擣衣 dap ao. \n\t2. Cong kich. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu dao 搗.
擥=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu lam 攬.
擦=sat [ca1]\n\t1. Xoa, xat.
擧=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu cu 舉.
擪=ap [ye4]\n\t1. De, nan, bit. Lay mot ngon tay an vao goi la ap.
擬=nghi [ni3]\n\t1. Nghi dinh. Nhu nghi an 擬案 nghi dinh an nhu the. \n\t2. Lam phong theo, giong nhu. Nhu nghi co 擬古 lam phong theo loi co.
拟=nghi [ni3]\n\t1. Nghi dinh. Nhu nghi an 擬案 nghi dinh an nhu the. \n\t2. Lam phong theo, giong nhu. Nhu nghi co 擬古 lam phong theo loi co.
擭=hoach, oach, ho [huo4]\n\t1. Cai cam, de bat cac giong muong. \n\t2. Mot am la oach. bat lay, nam lay. \n\t3. Lai mot am la ho. Go ra.
擯=ban, than [bin4]\n\t1. Ruong duoi. \n\t2. Mot am la than. Nguoi giup le cho chu goi la than 擯, nguoi giup le cho khach goi la gioi 介.
摈=ban, than [bin4]\n\t1. Ruong duoi. \n\t2. Mot am la than. Nguoi giup le cho chu goi la than 擯, nguoi giup le cho khach goi la gioi 介.
擰=ninh [ning2|ning3|ning4]\n\t1. Vat. Nhu ninh thu can 擦手巾 vat cai khan tay.
拧=ninh [ning2|ning3|ning4]\n\t1. Vat. Nhu ninh thu can 擦手巾 vat cai khan tay.
擱=cac [ge1|ge2]\n\t1. De, dat, ke, gac. Nhu ba thu cac ha 把書擱下 de sach xuong. Nguyen Trai 阮廌. Dieu chu ngu han trao cac sa 釣渚魚寒棹擱沙 (Hoa huu nhan yen ha ngu hung 和友人煙霞寓興) Ben cau ca lanh, mai cheo gac len bai cat. \n\t2. Dinh lai, gac lai. Nhu duyen cac延擱 hoan lai.
搁=cac [ge1|ge2]\n\t1. De, dat, ke, gac. Nhu ba thu cac ha 把書擱下 de sach xuong. Nguyen Trai 阮廌. Dieu chu ngu han trao cac sa 釣渚魚寒棹擱沙 (Hoa huu nhan yen ha ngu hung 和友人煙霞寓興) Ben cau ca lanh, mai cheo gac len bai cat. \n\t2. Dinh lai, gac lai. Nhu duyen cac延擱 hoan lai.
擲=trich [zhi4]\n\t1. Nem. \n\t2. Cho, trong tho tu thuong hay dung chu trich ha 擲下 nghia la cho do gi. \n\t3. Chom len.
掷=trich [zhi4]\n\t1. Nem. \n\t2. Cho, trong tho tu thuong hay dung chu trich ha 擲下 nghia la cho do gi. \n\t3. Chom len.
擴=khoach, khoang [kuo4]\n\t1. Mo rong them ra nhu khoach sung 擴充 mo mang cho co ve rong rai hon len. Ta quen doc la chu khoang.
扩=khoach, khoang [kuo4]\n\t1. Mo rong them ra nhu khoach sung 擴充 mo mang cho co ve rong rai hon len. Ta quen doc la chu khoang.
擷=hiet [xie2]\n\t1. Lay, hai lay, ngat lay.
撷=hiet [xie2]\n\t1. Lay, hai lay, ngat lay.
擺=bai [bai3]\n\t1. Mo ra. \n\t2. Bay. Nhu bai bo 擺布 bay dat. \n\t3. Danh dong dua (buoc mot qua can nang vao cai day treo len roi danh cho di di lai lai).
摆=bai [bai3]\n\t1. Mo ra. \n\t2. Bay. Nhu bai bo 擺布 bay dat. \n\t3. Danh dong dua (buoc mot qua can nang vao cai day treo len roi danh cho di di lai lai).
擻=tau [sou3|sou4]\n\t1. Dau tau 抖擻 phan chan. Nhu tinh than dau tau 精神抖擻 tinh than phan chan.
擞=tau [sou3|sou4]\n\t1. Dau tau 抖擻 phan chan. Nhu tinh than dau tau 精神抖擻 tinh than phan chan.
擾=nhieu [rao3]\n\t1. Quay roi. \n\t2. Nuoi cho thuan. \n\t3. Lam cho yen.
扰=nhieu [rao3]\n\t1. Quay roi. \n\t2. Nuoi cho thuan. \n\t3. Lam cho yen.
擿=trich, thich [zhi2]\n\t1. Gai. \n\t2. Nem. \n\t3. Mot am la thich. Kheu lay, ngoeo lay.
攀=phan, phan [pan1]\n\t1. Vin, dung o duoi ma vin len tren goi la phan. \n\t2. Ket dau gia. Nhu phan than 攀親 noi nhun minh la hen ma xin ket dau gia voi noi cao quy. \n\t3. Keo lai. \n\t4. Cung doc la {phan}.
攄=su [shu1]\n\t1. Thu, ha. Nhu su y 攄意 duoc ha da. \n\t2. Vot len.
摅=su [shu1]\n\t1. Thu, ha. Nhu su y 攄意 duoc ha da. \n\t2. Vot len.
攅=toan [cuan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu toan 攢. 
攆=nien [nian3]\n\t1. Duoi di.
撵=nien [nian3]\n\t1. Duoi di.
攈=quan [jun4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu quan 捃.
攏=long [long3]\n\t1. Hop lai. \n\t2. Danh don. \n\t3. Do thuyen.
拢=long [long3]\n\t1. Hop lai. \n\t2. Danh don. \n\t3. Do thuyen.
攔=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Ngan.
拦=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Ngan.
攖=anh, oanh [ying1]\n\t1. Cham toi, den gan. Nhu anh no 攖怒 choc gian. \n\t2. Mac, vuong. Nhu anh hai 攖害 mac hai, anh hoa 攖禍 mac va, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la oanh. Buoc, chang buoc.
撄=anh, oanh [ying1]\n\t1. Cham toi, den gan. Nhu anh no 攖怒 choc gian. \n\t2. Mac, vuong. Nhu anh hai 攖害 mac hai, anh hoa 攖禍 mac va, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la oanh. Buoc, chang buoc.
攘=nhuong, nhuong [rang3]\n\t1. Long bat lay, an trom. \n\t2. Day ra, duoi di duoc. \n\t3. Tru. \n\t4. Ham nhan duoc. \n\t5. Mot am la nhuong. Roi loan. \n\t6. Cung nghia nhu chu nhuong 禳.
攙=sam [chan1]\n\t1. Keo dat, nang do. \n\t2. Bo lan lon.
搀=sam [chan1]\n\t1. Keo dat, nang do. \n\t2. Bo lan lon.
攛=thoan [cuan1]\n\t1. Nem. \n\t2. Dan du nguoi lam bay goi la thoan xuyet 攛掇.
撺=thoan [cuan1]\n\t1. Nem. \n\t2. Dan du nguoi lam bay goi la thoan xuyet 攛掇.
攜=hue [xie2]\n\t1. Mang, dat. \n\t2. Dat diu. Nhu de hue 提攜. \n\t3. Lia ra, roi bo. \n\t4. Lien.
携=hue [xie2]\n\t1. Mang, dat. \n\t2. Dat diu. Nhu de hue 提攜. \n\t3. Lia ra, roi bo. \n\t4. Lien.
攝=nhiep [she4]\n\t1. Ven len. \n\t2. Bat lay. \n\t3. Thu nhiep lai. Nhu nhiep anh 攝影 chup anh, nhiep sinh 攝生 thu nhiep tinh than de nuoi minh cho khoe. \n\t4. Tri cho nghiem chinh. Nhu tran nhiep 鎮攝 lay oai ma khien cho ai nay deu so khong dam lam can. \n\t5. Kiem, thay, nhiep vi 攝位 lam thay dia vi nguoi khac. \n\t6. Bi buc bach. \n\t7. Vay muon.
摄=nhiep [she4]\n\t1. Ven len. \n\t2. Bat lay. \n\t3. Thu nhiep lai. Nhu nhiep anh 攝影 chup anh, nhiep sinh 攝生 thu nhiep tinh than de nuoi minh cho khoe. \n\t4. Tri cho nghiem chinh. Nhu tran nhiep 鎮攝 lay oai ma khien cho ai nay deu so khong dam lam can. \n\t5. Kiem, thay, nhiep vi 攝位 lam thay dia vi nguoi khac. \n\t6. Bi buc bach. \n\t7. Vay muon.
攟=quan [jun4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu quan 捃.
攢=toan, toan [cuan2|zan3]\n\t1. Hop lai, tich gop. \n\t2. Mot am la toan. cung nhu chu toan 鑽 khoet.
攒=toan, toan [cuan2|zan3]\n\t1. Hop lai, tich gop. \n\t2. Mot am la toan. cung nhu chu toan 鑽 khoet.
攣=luyen, luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Buoc, cung rang buoc voi nhau khong roi duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la luyen. Co quap. Nhu cau luyen 拘攣 chan tay co quap.
挛=luyen, luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Buoc, cung rang buoc voi nhau khong roi duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la luyen. Co quap. Nhu cau luyen 拘攣 chan tay co quap.
攤=than [tan1]\n\t1. Vuot ra, lay tay vuot ra. \n\t2. Bay ra, bay hang dem ra ban cac noi. \n\t3. Chia deu, chia cac so lon ra cac phan nho deu nhau.
摊=than [tan1]\n\t1. Vuot ra, lay tay vuot ra. \n\t2. Bay ra, bay hang dem ra ban cac noi. \n\t3. Chia deu, chia cac so lon ra cac phan nho deu nhau.
攩=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Danh. \n\t2. Ngan can.
攪=giao [jiao3]\n\t1. Quay roi, lam roi loan. \n\t2. Quay, lay que hay dua quay cho chat long deu nhau goi la giao.
搅=giao [jiao3]\n\t1. Quay roi, lam roi loan. \n\t2. Quay, lay que hay dua quay cho chat long deu nhau goi la giao.
攫=quac [jue2]\n\t1. Chop lay, vo lay, bat lay.
攬=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Nam ca. Nhu lam quyen 攬權 nam ca quyen vao mot tay. \n\t2. Nhan thau. Nhu thua lam 承攬 nhan trong coi lam tat ca moi viec, cai giay nhan lo lieu tat ca cong trinh hay nhan van tai tat ca cac hang hoa do dac cung goi la thua lam.
揽=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Nam ca. Nhu lam quyen 攬權 nam ca quyen vao mot tay. \n\t2. Nhan thau. Nhu thua lam 承攬 nhan trong coi lam tat ca moi viec, cai giay nhan lo lieu tat ca cong trinh hay nhan van tai tat ca cac hang hoa do dac cung goi la thua lam.
攮=nang [nang3]\n\t1. Day manh. \n\t2. Dam.
支=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Chi, thu. Nhu truong chi 長支 chi truong, chi tu 支子 con thu, v.v. \n\t2. Tranh, nhanh. Nhu chi luu 支流 dong tranh. Pham co mot dong ma chia ra nhieu dong ngang deu goi la chi ca. \n\t3. Giu, cam, co suc ung pho goi la chi tri 支持. \n\t4. Tinh, nha Thanh co bo dac chi 度支 giu viec tinh toan, cung nhu bo tai chinh bay gio. \n\t5. Khoan chi ra. \n\t6. Chia re. Nhu chi ly 支離 vun vat. \n\t7. Dia chi, ti, suu, dan, mao, thin, ti, ngo, vi (mui), than, dau, tuat, hoi goi la muoi hai chi, cung goi la muoi hai dia chi. \n\t8. Chan tay, cung nhu chu chi 肢. \n\t9. Canh, cung nhu chu chi 枝.
攲=khi [qi1]\n\t1. Nghieng lech.
攴=phoc [po1]\n\t1. Danh se.
收=thu, thu [shou1]\n\t1. Bat. Nhu bi thu 被收 bi bat, thu giam 收監 bat giam. \n\t2. Thu nhat. Nhu thu liem 收斂 thu ven, thu thap 收拾 nhat nhanh, v.v. \n\t3. Thu thuc. Nhu thu but 收筆 dong but (gac but), thu trang 收場 xong viec. \n\t4. Cai mu doi nha Ha. \n\t5. Hom xe. \n\t6. Mot am la thu. So gat duoc.
攷=khao [kao3]\n\t1. Xet, cung nhu chu khao 考.
攸=du [you1]\n\t1. Vut, thoang, ta cai dang nhanh chong. Nhu du nhien nhi the 攸然而逝 vut vay ma di. \n\t2. Chon, noi. Nhu tuong du 相攸 ken noi dang lay lam chong. \n\t3. Thua, dung lam tieng tro tu. Nhu danh tiet du quan 名節攸關 danh tiet thua quan he. \n\t4. Du du 攸攸 dang dac.
改=cai [gai3]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu cai tao 改造 lam lai, cai qua 改過 doi loi, v.v.
攻=cong [gong1]\n\t1. Danh, vay danh mot thanh ap nao goi la cong. \n\t2. Sua. Nhu cong kim 攻金 sua vang, cong ngoc 攻玉 sua ngoc, v.v. \n\t3. Cong kich, trach dieu loi lam cua nguoi goi la cong. \n\t4. Lam. \n\t5. ben.
放=phong, phong [fang4]\n\t1. Buong, tha. Nhu phong ung 放鷹 tha chim cat ra, phong hac 放鶴 tha chim hac ra, v.v. \n\t2. Phong tung, buong luong, khong biet giu gin goi la phong tu 放肆 hay phong dang 放蕩. \n\t3. Duoi. Nhu phong luu 放流duoi xa, dem day o noi xa. \n\t4. Phat ra. Nhu phong quang 放光 toa anh sang ra, phong tien 放箭 ban mui ten ra xa, v.v. \n\t5. Buong ra, noi ra. Nhu hoa phong 花放 hoa no, phong tinh 放晴 troi tanh, phong thu 放手 buong tay, khai phong 開放 noi rong ra. \n\t6. Phat. Nhu phong chan 放賑 phat chan, phong trai 放債 phat tien cho vay lai. \n\t7. Quan o kinh bo ra ngoai goi la phong. Nhu phong khuyet 放缺 bo ra cho khuyet. \n\t8. Dat. Nhu an phong 安放 xep dat cho yen. \n\t9. Phong dai ra, lam cho to ra. \n\t10. Mot am la phong. Bat chuoc, cung nghia voi chu phong 倣. \n\t2. Nuong theo. Nhu phong u loi nhi hanh 放於利而行 nuong theo cai loi ma lam.
政=chanh [zheng4]\n\t1. Lam cho chinh, nguoi tren che ra phep tac luat le de cho ke duoi cu the ma noi goi la chanh. \n\t2. Viec quan (viec nha nuoc). Nhu tong chanh 從政 ra lam viec quan, tri chanh 致政 cao quan. \n\t3. Khuon phep. Nhu gia chanh 家政 khuon phep tri nha. \n\t4. Ten quan (chu coi ve mot viec) nhu hoc chanh 學政 chuc hoc chanh (coi viec hoc), diem chanh 鹽政 chuc diem chanh (coi viec muoi). \n\t5. Chat chanh, dem y kien hay van bai nghi luan cua minh den nho nguoi xem ho goi la trinh chanh 呈政. Cung doc la chu chinh.
敁=diem [dian1]\n\t1. Diem xuyet 敁敪 can nhac.
故=co [gu4]\n\t1. Viec. Nhu dai co 大故 viec lon, da co 多故 lam viec, v.v. \n\t2. Co, nguyen nhan. Nhu huu co 有故 co co, vo co 無故 khong co co, v.v. \n\t3. Cu. Nhu co su 故事 viec cu, chuyen cu, co nhan 故人 nguoi quen cu, v.v. \n\t4. Goc, cua minh van co tu truoc. Nhu co huong 故鄉 lang cua minh truoc (que cha dat to), co quoc 故國 xu so dat nuoc minh truoc, v.v. \n\t5. Chet. Nhu benh co 病故 om chet roi. \n\t6. Co tinh. Nhu co sat 故殺 co tinh giet. \n\t7. Cho nen, tieng dung noi theo nghia cau tren.
敂=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khau 叩.
效=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Hoc doi, bat chuoc. Nhu hieu phap 效法 nghia la bat chuoc phep gi cua nguoi, hieu vuu 效尤 bat chuoc su lam lan cua nguoi, v.v. \n\t2. Den cung. Nhu hieu luc 效力 co suc, bao hieu 報效 het suc bao den, v.v. \n\t3. Hieu nghiem. Nhu minh hieu 明效 hieu nghiem ro rang, thanh hieu 成效 da thanh hieu roi.
敉=mi [mi3]\n\t1. Yen, cuoc the da yen on ca goi la mi binh 敉平.
敘=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Bay hang, xep. Nhu thuyen tu 銓敘 cu thu tu ma phong chuc, tuong tu 獎敘 cu thu tu ma thuong cong, v.v. \n\t2. Dau moi (bai tua). Nhu lam mot quyen sach gi thi rut ca dai y trong sach ay bay len tren goi la bai tu. \n\t3. Tuong bay. Nhu suong tu u tinh 暢敘幽情 bay ro cai tinh u an. \n\t4. Tu hop. Nhu trong thiep moi thuong viet hai chu hau tu 侯敘 nghia la xin doi de duoc hop mat. \n\t5. Dinh.
叙=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Bay hang, xep. Nhu thuyen tu 銓敘 cu thu tu ma phong chuc, tuong tu 獎敘 cu thu tu ma thuong cong, v.v. \n\t2. Dau moi (bai tua). Nhu lam mot quyen sach gi thi rut ca dai y trong sach ay bay len tren goi la bai tu. \n\t3. Tuong bay. Nhu suong tu u tinh 暢敘幽情 bay ro cai tinh u an. \n\t4. Tu hop. Nhu trong thiep moi thuong viet hai chu hau tu 侯敘 nghia la xin doi de duoc hop mat. \n\t5. Dinh.
敎=giao, giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Lenh day (lenh truyen), menh lenh cua thien tu goi la chieu 詔 menh lenh cua thai tu, va cua chu hau goi la giao 敎. \n\t2. Day do. Nhu giao duc 敎育 day nuoi, giao su 敎師 thay giao, v.v. \n\t3. Ton giao, goi tat la giao. Nhu giao hoi 敎會 hoi ton giao, hoi giao 回敎 ton giao hoi, v.v. \n\t4. Cac chuc quan coi ve viec hoc deu goi la giao chuc 敎職. \n\t4. Mot am la giao. Sai khien.
敏=man [min3]\n\t1. Nhanh nhen. \n\t2. sang suot. Nhu bat man 不敏 chang sang suot, loi noi tu nhun minh la ke ngu dot. \n\t3. Gang goi. \n\t4. Ten ngon chan cai.
救=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Ngan. Nhu nhu phat nang cuu du 汝弗能救與 may chang ngan noi ho ru. \n\t2. Cuu giup.
敔=ngu [yu3]\n\t1. Cai ngu. Mot thu thuoc ve am nhac.
敕=sac [chi4]\n\t1. Sac lenh, to chieu menh cua vua ban cho quan dan goi la sac. \n\t2. Canh tinh cho biet dao ma chan chinh cho nen cong binh tri (sua tri).
敖=ngao, ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Choi, ngao du. \n\t2. Mot am la ngao. Ngao man (lao).
敗=bai [bai4]\n\t1. Hong, do nat. Nhu vong quoc bai gia 亡國敗家 lam mat nuoc nat nha. Dua con lam hong nha goi la bai tu 敗子, nhuc bai 肉敗 thit da thiu thoi, bai diep 敗葉 la rung, v.v. \n\t2. Nghieng do. Nhu bai bich 敗壁 vach do. \n\t3. Thua.
败=bai [bai4]\n\t1. Hong, do nat. Nhu vong quoc bai gia 亡國敗家 lam mat nuoc nat nha. Dua con lam hong nha goi la bai tu 敗子, nhuc bai 肉敗 thit da thiu thoi, bai diep 敗葉 la rung, v.v. \n\t2. Nghieng do. Nhu bai bich 敗壁 vach do. \n\t3. Thua.
教=giao [jiao1|jiao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giao 敎.
敝=te [bi4]\n\t1. Nat. Nhu te truu 敝帚 cai choi nat. \n\t2. Met lu, te u bon menh 敝於奔命 chay theo nhoc lu. \n\t3. Hep hoi, tieng dung de noi nhun minh. Nhu te xa 敝舍 cai nha hep hoi cua toi, te ap 敝邑 dat nuoc hu bai cua chung toi, v.v. \n\t4. Thua. \n\t5. Bo.
敞=suong [chang3|tang3]\n\t1. Mo, to ro. Nhu khoan suong 寬敞 rong rai. \n\t2. San cao ma bang.
敪=xuyet [duo2]\n\t1. Diem xuyet 敁敪 can nhac.
敢=cam [gan3]\n\t1. Tien len. Nhu dung cam 勇敢 manh bao tien len. \n\t2. Bao dan. Nhu cam tac cam vi 敢作敢為 bao dan ma lam khong e so chi. \n\t3. Dam. Nhu yen cam co tu 焉敢固辭 sao dam co tu.
散=tan, tan [san3|san4]\n\t1. Tan. Nhu van tan 雲散 may tan. \n\t2. Buong, phong ra. Nhu thi tan 施散 phong ra cho nguoi. \n\t3. Gian ra. Nhu tan muon 散悶 gian su buon, giai buon. \n\t4. Mot am la tan. Roi rac. Nhu tan man vo ki 散漫無紀 tan mac khong co phep tac gi. \n\t2. Nhan roi. Nhu tan nhan 散人 nguoi thua (nguoi khong dung cho doi). Minh tu noi nhun minh la ke vo dung goi la xu tan 樗散. \n\t5. Ten khuc dan. Nhu Quang Lang tan 廣陵散 khuc Quang Lang. \n\t4. Thuoc tan, thuoc dem tan nho goi la tan.
敦=don, doi, doi, don [dui4|dun1]\n\t1. Hau. Nhu don doc 敦篤 don doc, don muc 敦睦 doc mot niem hoa muc, v.v. \n\t2. Mot am la doi. Buc bach, thuc duc. \n\t3. Lai mot am la doi. Mot thu do de dung thoc lua. \n\t4. Mot am nua la don. Hon don 渾敦 u me, mu mit. Cung co nghia nhu chu don 沌 , chu don 頓.
敬=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Cung kinh ngoai dang mat khong co ve cot nhot tre nai goi la cung 恭, trong long khong mot chut lao leu goi la kinh 敬. \n\t2. Kinh bieu, muon mot vat gi dua cho nguoi de to long kinh cua minh goi la kinh. \n\t3. Than trong.
敭=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Ngay xua dung nhu chu duong 揚.
敲=xao [qiao1]\n\t1. Dap, go. Nhu xao mon 敲門 go cua. Gia Dao co cau tho rang Tang xao nguyet ha mon 僧敲月下門. Truoc Gia Dao dinh dung chu thoi 推, den khi hoi ong Han Du bao nen dung chu xao 敲 thi hon. Nay ta noi lam viec gi phai cham chuoc, su ly cho ky la thoi xao 推敲 la vi co ay.
敵=dich [di2]\n\t1. Giac thu. Nhu dich quoc 敵國 nuoc thu. \n\t2. Ngang. Nhu dich the 敵體 ngang nhau. \n\t3. Chong cu, doi dich.
敌=dich [di2]\n\t1. Giac thu. Nhu dich quoc 敵國 nuoc thu. \n\t2. Ngang. Nhu dich the 敵體 ngang nhau. \n\t3. Chong cu, doi dich.
敻=quynh, huyen [xiong4]\n\t1. Xa. \n\t2. Mot am la huyen. Kinh doanh, cau canh.
敷=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Bay, mo rong ra, ban bo khap ca. \n\t2. Dap, rit. Nhu phu duoc 敷藥 rit thuoc. \n\t3. Day du. Nhu bat phu 不敷 khong du.
數=so, so, sac, xuc [shu3|shu4|shuo4]\n\t1. Dem, dem so vat xem la bao nhieu goi la so. \n\t2. Trach mang ke co toi. \n\t3. Ke, can nhac. Nhu so dien vong to 數典忘祖 ke dien tich quen ca chuc su cua to, bat tuc so 不足數 khong du ke. \n\t4. Loi tinh phong. Nhu so nhat 數日 vai ba ngay, so khau 數口 vai ba mieng, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la so. So muc. Nhu co so 奇數 so le, ngau so 偶數 so chan, v.v. \n\t6. Thuat so, mon toan hoc dung chan so de luan ve tinh chat va quan he cua so. \n\t7. So menh, so kiep. \n\t8. Lai mot am la sac. Luon luon. Nhu mach sac 脈數 mach chay mau, sac kien 數見 thay luon. \n\t8. Mot am nua la xuc. Nho, dan mau.
数=so, so, sac, xuc [shu3|shu4|shuo4]\n\t1. Dem, dem so vat xem la bao nhieu goi la so. \n\t2. Trach mang ke co toi. \n\t3. Ke, can nhac. Nhu so dien vong to 數典忘祖 ke dien tich quen ca chuc su cua to, bat tuc so 不足數 khong du ke. \n\t4. Loi tinh phong. Nhu so nhat 數日 vai ba ngay, so khau 數口 vai ba mieng, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la so. So muc. Nhu co so 奇數 so le, ngau so 偶數 so chan, v.v. \n\t6. Thuat so, mon toan hoc dung chan so de luan ve tinh chat va quan he cua so. \n\t7. So menh, so kiep. \n\t8. Lai mot am la sac. Luon luon. Nhu mach sac 脈數 mach chay mau, sac kien 數見 thay luon. \n\t8. Mot am nua la xuc. Nho, dan mau.
敺=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Duoi, tuc la chu khu 驅 co.
整=chinh [zheng3]\n\t1. Deu, ngay ngan. Nhu doan chinh 端整, nghiem chinh 嚴整, v.v. \n\t2. Sua sang. Nhu chinh don 整頓 sua sang lai cho chinh te. \n\t3. Nguyen, vat gi con hoan toan chua phan giai goi la chinh.
斁=dich, do [yi4]\n\t1. Chan. \n\t2. Mot am la do. Bai hoai.
斂=liem, liem [lian3]\n\t1. Thu gop lai. \n\t2. Cat, giau. Nhu liem thu 斂手 thu tay, liem tich 斂跡 giau tung tich, v.v. \n\t3. Thu liem (giot dong lai khong tan ra). \n\t4. Rut bot lai. \n\t4. Mot am la liem. Thay ao cho nguoi chet la tieu liem 小斂. Nhap quan la dai liem 大斂.
敛=liem, liem [lian3]\n\t1. Thu gop lai. \n\t2. Cat, giau. Nhu liem thu 斂手 thu tay, liem tich 斂跡 giau tung tich, v.v. \n\t3. Thu liem (giot dong lai khong tan ra). \n\t4. Rut bot lai. \n\t4. Mot am la liem. Thay ao cho nguoi chet la tieu liem 小斂. Nhap quan la dai liem 大斂.
斃=te [bi4]\n\t1. Nga sap, nga chet giua duong.
毙=te [bi4]\n\t1. Nga sap, nga chet giua duong.
斆=hieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Day, giac ngo cho.
文=van, van [wen2]\n\t1. Van ve. Nhu van thach 文石 van da (da hoa). \n\t2. Van tu, hop nhieu chu lai thanh bai goi la van. \n\t3. Van tu, bat chuoc hinh tuong cac loai ma dat ra chu goi la van 文, gop ca hinh voi tieng goi la tu 字. \n\t4. Van, cai dau vet do dao duc le nhac giao hoa ma co ve dep de ro ret goi la van. Nhu van minh 文明, van hoa 文化, v.v. \n\t5. Van hoa, chi cot be ngoai cho dep, khong chuong den su thuc goi la van. Nhu phon van 繁文, phu van 浮文, v.v. \n\t6. Quan van, cac quan lam viec ve van tu goi la quan van. Nguoi nao co ve hoa nha le do goi la van nha 文雅 hay van tinh 文靜, v.v. \n\t7. Phep luat. Nhu vu van 舞文 mua men phep luat buoc nguoi toi oan. \n\t8. Dong tien. Nhu nhat van 一文 mot dong tien. \n\t9. Mot am la van. Van suc. Nhu tieu nhan chi qua da tat van 小人之過也，必文 tieu nhan co loi tat che day (van suc dieu loi cho khong phai la loi).
斌=ban [bin1]\n\t1. Lich thiep, khong van hoa qua khong moc mac qua goi la ban.
斐=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Van ve. Nhu phi nhien thanh chuong 斐然成章 van ve ro ret.
斑=ban [ban1]\n\t1. Lang lo.
斒=ban [ban1]\n\t1. Ban lan 斒斕 sac so.
斕=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Ban lan 斒斕 sac so.
斓=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Ban lan 斒斕 sac so.
斗=dau [dou3|dou4]\n\t1. Cai dau. \n\t2. Cai chen vai, pham do gi giong nhu cai dau deu goi la dau ca. \n\t3. Be nho. Nhu dau thanh 斗城 cai thanh nho. \n\t4. Sao dau. Nhu nam dau 南斗 sao nam dau, bac dau 北斗 sao bac dau, v.v. \n\t5. Cao troi len, chot vot.
料=lieu, lieu [liao4]\n\t1. Do dan, luong tinh, lieu. Nhu lieu luong 料畫 lieu luong, lieu ly 料理 lieu sua (san soc), v.v. \n\t2. Vuot ve. \n\t3. Mot am la lieu. Vat lieu, thu gi co the dung lam do che tao duoc deu goi la lieu. \n\t4. Ngay xua che pha le gia lam ngoc cung goi la lieu. \n\t5. Cac thuc cho ngua trau an nhu co ngo cung goi la lieu. \n\t6. Lieu doan. Nhu lieu su nhu than 料事如神 lieu doan viec dung nhu than. \n\t7. Lieu, hop so nhieu lam mot goi la nhat lieu 一料 mot lieu.
斛=hoc [hu2]\n\t1. Cai hoc, muoi dau la mot hoc.
斜=ta, gia [xie2]\n\t1. Veo. \n\t2. Hinh dat cheo lech cung goi la ta. \n\t3. Mot am la gia. Ten mot cai hang o Thiem tay.
斝=gia [jia3]\n\t1. Cai chen ngoc.
斟=cham [zhen1]\n\t1. Rot. Nhu cham tuu 斟酒 rot ruou. \n\t2. Cham chuoc, lam viec gi cung dan do cho ky roi moi lam goi la cham chuoc. Cung nhu rot ruou thi phai luong xem cai chen no sau nong the nao vay.
斠=dac, cac [jiao4]\n\t1. Ao (luong) cai dau, cai hoc cho bang cho dung. Cung doc la chu cac.
斡=oat, quan [wo4]\n\t1. Quay. Nhu oat toan 斡權 quay van. \n\t2. Mot am la quan. Chu linh, cung nghia voi chu 幹.
斤=can, can [jin1]\n\t1. Cai riu. \n\t2. Can, can ta 16 lang la mot can. \n\t3. Mot am la can. Can can 斤斤 xet ro (tuong tat).
斥=xich [chi4]\n\t1. Duoi, gat ra. \n\t2. Che, bac. Nhu chi xich 指斥 chi cho lam ra ma bac di. \n\t3. Boi thay. Nhu sung xich 充斥 boi thay rat nhieu. Su vat day day cung goi la sung xich. \n\t4. Do xem. Nhu xich hau 斥候 do xet xem tinh hinh quan dich the nao. \n\t5. Khai thac. Nhu xich tho 斥土 khai thac dat cat. \n\t6. Dat man.
斧=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Cai bua. \n\t2. Cua dung. Nhu tu phu 資斧 do an dung, cung nhu ta noi cui nuoc vay. \n\t3. Sua lai. Nhu phu chinh 斧政 sua lai cho dung, dem van chuong cua minh nho nguoi sua lai cho goi la phu chinh.
斨=thuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Cai bua cay vuong (cai bua cho cam cay co lo vuong).
斫=chuoc [zhuo2]\n\t1. Phat, dan, lay dao dan cay goi la chuoc.
斬=tram [zhan3]\n\t1. Chem. Nhu tram thao 斬草 chem co, tram thu 斬首 chem dau, v.v. \n\t2. Dut. Nhu quan tu chi trach, ngu the nhi tram 君子之澤，五世而斬 on trach nguoi quan tu nam doi ma dut. \n\t3. Mot loat, dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu tram tan 斬新 mot loat moi, tram te 斬齊 mot loat deu. Tram thoi 斬衰 ao tang so gau.
斩=tram [zhan3]\n\t1. Chem. Nhu tram thao 斬草 chem co, tram thu 斬首 chem dau, v.v. \n\t2. Dut. Nhu quan tu chi trach, ngu the nhi tram 君子之澤，五世而斬 on trach nguoi quan tu nam doi ma dut. \n\t3. Mot loat, dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu tram tan 斬新 mot loat moi, tram te 斬齊 mot loat deu. Tram thoi 斬衰 ao tang so gau.
斮=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Chem. \n\t2. Vot, deo.
斯=tu [si1]\n\t1. Ghe ra, tach roi ra. \n\t2. Ay. Nhu tu nhan 斯人 nguoi ay. \n\t3. Thi, ben. Nhu thanh tu trac anh 清斯濯纓 trong thi giat leo mu. \n\t4. Trang.
新=tan [xin1]\n\t1. Moi. Nhu thoi tran xuat tan 推陳出新 day cu ra moi (tru cai cu di, dem cai moi ra). \n\t2. Trong sach. Nhu cai qua tu tan 改過自新 doi loi cu de tu sua cho minh trong sach. \n\t3. Moi. Nhu tan nien 新年 nam moi. \n\t4. Ten hieu nam dau cua Vuong Mang moi cuop ngoi nha Han.
斲=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Deo. Nhu trac moc 斲木 deo go. Nguoi lam viec lau co kinh nghiem nhieu goi la trac luan lao thu 斲輪老手.
斵=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Cung dung nhu chu trac 斲.
斷=doan, doan [duan4]\n\t1. Chat dut, chat dut lam hai manh goi la doan. Hai ben khong ua nhau nua cung goi la doan. Nhu an doan nghia tuyet 恩斷義絕 het on dut nghia. \n\t2. Kieng bo. \n\t3. Mot am la doan. Quyet doan. Nhu doan nguc 斷獄 xu doan nguc tu, chan doan 診斷 xem mach doan can benh, v.v. \n\t4. Doan doan 斷斷 thanh that, ta cai dang chi thanh chuyen nhat.
断=doan, doan [duan4]\n\t1. Chat dut, chat dut lam hai manh goi la doan. Hai ben khong ua nhau nua cung goi la doan. Nhu an doan nghia tuyet 恩斷義絕 het on dut nghia. \n\t2. Kieng bo. \n\t3. Mot am la doan. Quyet doan. Nhu doan nguc 斷獄 xu doan nguc tu, chan doan 診斷 xem mach doan can benh, v.v. \n\t4. Doan doan 斷斷 thanh that, ta cai dang chi thanh chuyen nhat.
方=phuong [fang1]\n\t1. Vuong, vat gi hinh the ngay thang deu goi la phuong, nguoi nao tinh hanh ngay thang goi la phuong chanh 方正. \n\t2. Phuong huong. Nhu dong phuong 東方 phuong dong, ha phuong 何方 phuong nao ? \n\t3. Dao duc. Nhu huu diem quan phuong 有玷官方 co vet nhuc den dao duc lam quan, nghia phuong huu huan 義方有訓 co day ve dao nghia, v.v. \n\t4. Nghe thuat. Nhu phuong si 方士, phuong ky 方技 ke chuyen ve mot nghe thuat nhu bua thuoc tuong so, v.v. \n\t5. Phuong thuoc. Nhu cam phuong 禁方 phuong thuoc cam truyen, bi phuong 祕方 phuong thuoc bi truyen, v.v. Cai don thuoc cua thay thuoc ke ra goi la phuong tu 方子. \n\t6. Trai. Nhu phuong menh 方命 trai menh lenh. \n\t7. Duong, tieng dung de giup loi. Nhu phuong kim 方今 duong bay gio, phuong kha 方可 moi kha, v.v. \n\t8. Noi, chon. Nhu vien phuong 遠方 noi xa. \n\t9. Thuat, phep. \n\t10. So sanh, \n\t11. Van go. \n\t12. Loai, giong. \n\t13. Co. \n\t14. Choi. \n\t15. Hai vat cung di deu. Nhu phuong chu 方舟 hai chiec thuyen cung di deu. \n\t16. Lua moi dam bong chua chac.
於=u, o [wu1|yu1|yu2]\n\t1. Chung. Tieng dung de giup loi. Nhu sinh u bac phuong 生於北方 sinh chung phuong bac. \n\t2. O. Nhu tuong u 相於 cung nuong o voi nhau. \n\t3. Mot am la o. Oi, loi than tho, cung nghia voi chu o 嗚.
施=thi, thi, di, thi [shi1]\n\t1. Bay ra, dat ra, dem dung ra cho nguoi hay vat goi la thi. Nhu thi thuat 施術 lam thuat cho ke nao, thi tri 施治 lam phep chua cho ke nao, thi an 施恩 ra on cho ke nao, thi phan 施粉 danh phan, thi le 施禮 lam le chao, v.v. \n\t2. Beu xac. \n\t4. Mot am la thi. Giup, cho, nhu bac thi 博施 rong giup moi nguoi, thi du 施與 cho giup. \n\t5. Lai mot am la di. Dai, lau dai. \n\t6. Lai mot am nua la thi. Di ngoeo, di tat, theo hut. \n\t7. Thay doi. \n\t8. Bo.
斿=du [you2]\n\t1. Leo co.
斾=bai [pei4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bai 旆.
旁=bang, bang, banh, phang [pang2]\n\t1. Ben canh. Nhu nhi lap tai bang 兒立在旁 dua be dung o ben. \n\t2. Mot am la bang. Nuong tua. \n\t3. Lai mot am la banh. Banh banh 旁旁 rong ruoi, sa sa. \n\t4. Mot am nua la phang. Phang bac 旁礡 mong menh, bat ngat.
旂=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Co, nay thong dung dung chu ki 旗.
旃=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Cai co can cong, cung goi la 旜. \n\t2. Ay, day, dung lam tieng dem. Nhu thuong than chien tai 尙愼旃哉 ngo hau can than day vay thay !
旄=mao, mao [mao2]\n\t1. Co mao, co co cam long duoi con bo tot vao can goi la co mao. \n\t2. Mot am la mao. Gia ca. Nhu phan ki mao nghe 反其旄倪 tra lai nguoi gia ke be.
旅=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Lu, nam tram quan ket lam mot toan goi la lu. \n\t2. Khach tro, thuong lu 商旅 khach buon tru ngu, v.v. \n\t3. O tro, di ra ngoai phai o tro goi la lu thu 旅次. \n\t4. Dong, deu. Nhu lu tien lu thoai 旅進旅退 deu tien deu lui. \n\t5. Thu tu. \n\t6. Te lu.
旆=bai [pei4]\n\t1. Mot thu co diem diem nhieu mui sac so nhu canh chim duoi chim. Doi xua di xe di thuyen deu cam mot cai bai len tren, vi the nen dung de noi ve nguoi di. Nhu phan bai 返旆 tro ve. \n\t2. Bai bai 旆旆 long thong, ta cai dang ru xuong.
旉=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phu 敷
旋=toan [xuan2|xuan4]\n\t1. Tro lai. Nhu khai toan 凱旋 thang tran tro ve. \n\t2. Quay lai. Nhu toan phong 旋風 gio loc, toan oa 渦旋 nuoc xoay. \n\t3. Vut choc. Nhu toan phat toan du 旋發旋愈 vut phat vut khoi, hoa bat toan chung 禍不旋踵 va chang kip tro got. \n\t4. Di dai, di tieu.
旌=tinh [jing1]\n\t1. Co tinh, thu co tren ngu co cam long. Doi xua ai di su cung cam mot cai co tinh di, nen goi ke di van tinh 文旌 hay hanh tinh 行旌. \n\t2. Tieu bieu, ai co duc hanh gi dang khen vua cho dung nha treo bien de tieu bieu goi la tinh.
旎=ni [ni3]\n\t1. Y ni 旖旎 co bay phap phoi.
族=toc [zu2]\n\t1. Loai, dong doi, con chau cung mot lieu thuoc voi nhau goi la toc. Tu cha, con den chau la ba dong ("tam toc 三族). Tu ong cao to den chau huyen goi la chin dong ("cuu toc 九族). Giet ca cha me vo con goi la diet toc 滅族. \n\t2. Ho, cung mot ho voi nhau goi la toc. Nhu toc nhan 族人 nguoi ho, toc truong 族長 truong ho, v.v. \n\t3. Loai. Nhu gioi toc 介族 loai co vay, ngu toc 魚族 loai ca, v.v. \n\t4. Bui. Nhu toc sinh 族生 moc tung bui. \n\t5. Hai muoi nham nha la mot lu 閭, bon lu la mot toc 族. \n\t6. Mot am la tau, dung nhu chu tau 奏.
旐=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Co trieu, thu co theu con ran, con rua.
旒=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Leo co. \n\t2. Mien luu 冕旒 tua mu mien.
旓=sao [qiao4]\n\t1. Giai co, leo co.
旖=y [yi3]\n\t1. Y ni 旖旎 co bay phap phoi. \n\t2. Thuot tha. \n\t3. May mu.
旗=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Co, dung vai hay lua buoc len cai can de lam dau hieu goi la ky. \n\t2. Nguoi Man Thanh goi la ky nhan 旗人. \n\t3. Ngay xua cho ve hinh gau ho len lua goi la ky.
旛=phan [fan1]\n\t1. Canh phan, thu co co buc voc hay lua ru xuong goi la phan, cung co khi viet la phien 幡.
旝=quai [guai4]\n\t1. Cai co can cong. \n\t2. Cai xe ban da. Cai xe tren cam mot cot go lon, xep da len tren roi giat may cho da tung ra de danh giac.
旟=du [yu2]\n\t1. Mot thu co de chi huy cho quan di, thu co co ve hinh con dieu hau. \n\t2. Gio len, cong len.
无=vo [mo2|wu2]\n\t1. Tuc la chu vo 無 ngay xua, nghia la khong. Nhu vo cuu 无咎 khong co loi gi.
旡=ky [ji4]\n\t1. Nac.
旣=ky [ji4]\n\t1. Da. Nhu ky vang bat gian 旣往不諫 su da qua khong can nua. \n\t2. Da xong. Nhu am thuc ky tat 飲食旣必 an uong da xong. Mat troi bi an het cung goi la ky.
旤=hoa [huo4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoa 禍.
日=nhat [ri4]\n\t1. Mat troi. \n\t2. Ngay, mot ngay mot dem goi la nhat nhat 一日. \n\t3. Ban ngay. Nhu nhat di ke da 日以繼夜 ban ngay lai tiep den ban dem, vang nhat 往日 ngay hom qua, lai nhat 來日 ngay mai, v.v. \n\t4. Nuoc Nhat, nuoc Nhat Ban 日本 thuong goi tat la nuoc Nhat.
旦=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Som, luc troi moi sang goi la dan. \n\t2. Noi su thot nhien khong luong duoc. Nhu nhat dan dich chi 一旦敵至 mot mai giac den. \n\t3. Vai tuong dong dan ba goi la dan.
旨=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Ngon. Nhu chi tuu 旨酒 ruou ngon, cam chi 甘旨 ngon ngot, v.v. \n\t2. Y chi. Nhu ki chi vien 其旨遠 thua y xa, y noi ham co y sau xa. \n\t3. Chi du, loi vua ban bao toi dan goi la chi. \n\t4. Dung lam tro tu nhu chu chi 只.
早=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Som ngay. Nhu tao san 早餐 bua com som. \n\t2. Truoc. Nhu tao vi chi bi 早為之備 phong bi som truoc.
旬=tuan, quan [xun2]\n\t1. Tuan, muoi ngay goi la mot tuan, mot thang co ba tuan. Tu mong mot den mong muoi la thuong tuan 上旬, tu muoi mot den hai muoi la trung tuan 中旬, tu hai muoi mot den ba muoi la ha tuan 下旬. Tuc bao mot nam duoi tran bang mot ngay tren troi, cho nen su chuc tho goi muoi nam la mot tuan. Nhu that tuan thuong tho 七旬上壽, bat tuan thuong tho 八旬上壽, v.v. \n\t2. Khap. Nhu lai tuan lai tuyen 來旬來宣di khap noi de tuyen bo duc chanh cua vua. \n\t3. Mot am la quan. Mot thu thue bat dan phai lam viec.
旭=huc [xu4]\n\t1. Bong sang mat troi moi moc.
旰=can, han [gan4]\n\t1. Chieu, mat troi lan. Nhu nhat can 日旰 toi ngay, ta thuong doc la chu han.
旱=han [han4]\n\t1. Dai han, nang mai khong mua goi la han. \n\t2. Can. Nhu han lo 旱路 duong can, duong bo.
旹=thi [shi2]\n\t1. Doi xua dung nhu chu thi 時.
旺=vuong [wang4]\n\t1. Sang sua, tot dep. Pham vat gi moi thinh goi la vuong. Nhu thinh vuong 盛旺, hung vuong 興旺, v.v.
旻=man [min2]\n\t1. Mua thu. \n\t2. Cho troi khong. Nhu thuong man 倉旻 troi xanh.
旾=xuan [chun1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu xuan 春.
昂=ngang [ang2]\n\t1. Gio cao. Nhu ngang thu 昂首 nghen dau, de ngang 低昂 cui ngua. Thai do cao ca goi la hien ngang 軒昂 hay ngang tang 昂藏, y khi phan phat goi la kich ngang 激昂, v.v. \n\t2. Gia cao, gia dat. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Me gia bat tham ngang 米價不甚昂 gia gao khong cao qua.
昃=trac [ze4]\n\t1. Xe, mat troi qua trua goi la trac.
昆=con [kun1]\n\t1. Con noi. Nhu hau con 後昆 dan sau. \n\t2. Anh, con ngoc 昆玉 anh em. \n\t3. Nhung nhuc. Nhu con trung 昆虫 sau bo, vi giong sau bo sinh san nhieu lam nen goi la con.
昇=thang [sheng1]\n\t1. Mat troi moi moc. \n\t2. Len, cung nghia nhu chu thang 升. \n\t3. Tien len, thang chuc.
昉=phuong [fang3]\n\t1. Tang tang, moi mo mo sang.
昊=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Troi xanh, troi ca. \n\t2. Mua he.
昌=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Tuong dang, loi noi hay. Nhu Vu bai xuong ngon 禹拜昌言 vua Vu nghe loi noi hay thi kinh ta. Noi thang khong ky huy gi goi la xuong ngon 昌言. \n\t2. Sang sua. Nhu xuong minh 昌明 sang lang ro ret. \n\t3. Thinh. Nhu bang nai ky xuong 邦乃其昌 nuoc moi duoc thinh. \n\t4. Tot dep, day da. \n\t5. Vat duoc thoa su sinh san goi la xuong, vi the nen tram vat goi la bach xuong 百昌.
明=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Sang. Nhu minh tinh 明星 sao sang, minh nguyet 明月 trang sang. Dan toc da khai hoa goi la van minh 文明. \n\t2. Sang suot, sang suot trong sach, khong bi ngoai vat no che lap goi la minh. Nhu cao minh 高明 cao sang, minh giam 明監 soi sang, minh sat 明察 xet ro, v.v. Tuc goi quan tren la minh cong 明公 nghia la vi quan sang suot, la theo nghia do. \n\t3. Phat minh, to ro. Nhu phat minh tan ly 發明新理 phat minh ra le moi, tu minh tam khuc 自明心曲 tu to khuc nhoi (khuc noi), minh minh nhu thu 明明如此 ranh ranh nhu the, quang minh loi lac 光明磊落 sang sua dong dac, v.v. \n\t4. Mat sang. Nhu tang minh 喪明 mu mat, ong Tu Ha con chet khoc mu mat, vi the moi goi su con nguoi chet la tang minh chi thong 喪明之痛. \n\t5. Moi sang. Nhu binh minh 平明 vua sang, minh nhat 明日 ngay mai, minh nien 明年 sang nam v.v. \n\t6. Than minh. Nhu cac dung ve nguoi chet goi la minh khi 明器. \n\t7. Nha Minh 明 (1368-1644), Minh Thai to 明太祖 la Chu Nguyen Chuong 朱元璋 danh duoc nha Nguyen 元 len lam vua goi la nha Minh. 
昏=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Toi. Nhu hoang hon 黃昏 mo mo toi, hon da 昏夜 dem toi, v.v. \n\t2. Toi tam. Nhu hon hoi ho do 昏憒楜塗 toi tam ho do, khong hieu su ly gi. \n\t3. Le cuoi, ngay xua cuoi xin cu den toi moi don dau nen goi la hon le 昏禮, bay gio moi doi dung chu hon 婚. \n\t4. Mo. \n\t5. Con sinh ra chua dat ten ma chet goi la hon.
易=dich, di [yi4]\n\t1. Doi, hai ben lay tien hay lay do ma doi cho nhau goi la mau dich 貿易. \n\t2. Bien doi, thay. \n\t3. Kinh Dich. \n\t4. Tich dich 辟易 lui lai. \n\t5. Mot am la di. De, doi lai voi chu nan 難. \n\t6. Sua tri, lam. \n\t7. Hoa binh. \n\t8. Coi thuong. \n\t9. Yen on.
昔=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Xua, truoc. Nhu tich nhat 昔日 ngay xua. \n\t2. Dem. Nhu nhat tich 一昔 mot dem. \n\t3. Lau ngay. \n\t4. Thit kho.
昕=han [xin1]\n\t1. Som, rang dong, mat troi moi moc goi la han. Nhu han tich 昕夕 som toi.
昚=than [shen4]\n\t1. Doi xua dung nhu chu than 愼.
昜=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu duong 陽.
星=tinh [xing1]\n\t1. Sao. Nhu hang tinh 恆星 sao dung, hanh tinh 行星 sao di, ve tinh 衛星 sao ho ve, tue tinh 慧星 sao chi, v.v. \n\t2. Sao dem moc nhieu, sang lan dan, cho nen vat gi thua it goi la lieu lac than tinh 寥落晨星 vang ve nhu sao ban sang. \n\t3. Sao nho ma nhieu, cho nen so gi nho mon goi la linh tinh 零星, tung giot, tung cai. Nhu tinh tinh bach phat 星星白發 toc bac tung soi. \n\t4. Nghe tinh tuong, nguoi coi ve cac viec xem sao de nghiem tot xau goi la tinh gia 星家, xem ngay thang sinh de roi lay cac ngoi sao ra ma tinh so van nguoi goi la tinh si 星士 thay so. \n\t5. Sao tinh, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t6. Hoa can, trong can can dung hoa trang ghi so can lang, v.v. goi la tinh. \n\t7. Ten mot thu am nhac.
映=anh [ying4]\n\t1. Anh sang gioi lai. \n\t2. Bong rop. \n\t3. Anh sang mat troi xe.
春=xuan [chun1]\n\t1. Mua xuan, tu thang gieng den thang ba goi la mua xuan. \n\t2. Xuan la dau bon mua, muon vat deu co cai canh tuong hon ho tot tuoi, cho nen nguoi ta moi vi nguoi tuoi tre nhu mua xuan ma goi thi tuoi tre la thanh xuan 青春 xuan xanh, y thu hoat bat goi la xuan khi 春氣, thay thuoc chua khoi benh goi la dieu thu hoi xuan 妙手回春. \n\t3. Ruou xuan, nguoi nha Duong hay goi ruou la xuan. \n\t4. Le nha Chu cu den thang trong xuan 仲春 (thang hai) thi cho cuoi xin, vi the moi goi cac con gai muon lay chong la hoai xuan 懷春.
昧=muoi [mei4]\n\t1. Mo mo. Nhu muoi dan 昧旦 mo mo sang. \n\t2. Toi. Nhu hon muoi 昏昧 toi tam khong hieu le gi. \n\t3. Tam muoi 三昧 dich am chu Pham, Tau dich la chinh dinh 正定 nghia la dung cong tu hanh tru sach duoc het tran duyen ma vao coi mot mau rong khong vang lang goi la tam muoi. Nhu du hi tam muoi 遊戲三昧 nhap dinh xuat dinh thuan mac tu nhien. Bay gio hay muon hai chu ay de chi cai ao dieu cua mot mon gi. Nhu ong Hoai To tai viet chu thao, tu cho la dac thao thu tam muoi 得艸書三昧 biet duoc cai cho ao dieu ve nghe viet chu thao.
昨=tac [zuo2]\n\t1. Hom qua. Nhu tac nhat 昨日 ngay hom qua, tac da 昨夜 dem qua, tac nien 昨年 nam ngoai, v.v. \n\t2. Ngay xua. \n\t3. Moi roi.
昫=hu, hu [xu3]\n\t1. Mat troi moc ra am ap. \n\t2. Mot am la hu, cung nghia voi chu hu 煦.
昬=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hon 昏.
昭=chieu [zhao1]\n\t1. Sang sua, ro ret. Nhu chieu chuong 昭章 ro ret. \n\t2. Boc bach cho to ro ra. Nhu chieu tuyet 昭雪 boc bach noi oan cua nguoi ta ra cho moi nguoi deu biet. \n\t3. Hang chieu, trong nha tho giua la be tho to, o ben trai la be tho hang chieu.
是=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Phai, dieu gi ai cung cong nhan la phai goi la thi. Cai phuong cham cua chanh tri goi la quoc thi 國是. \n\t2. Ay the, loi noi chi dinh nhu nhu thi 如是 nhu the.
昱=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Ngay mai. \n\t2. Anh sang mat troi.
昳=diet [die2]\n\t1. Mat troi xe bong.
昴=mao [mao3]\n\t1. Sao mao, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu.
昵=nat [ni4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nat 暱.
昶=suong [chang3]\n\t1. Ngay dai. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu suong 暢.
晁=trieu [chao2]\n\t1. Ho Trieu, cung nhu chu 鼂.
時=thi, thoi [shi2]\n\t1 Mua. Nhu tu thi 四時 bon mua. \n\t2. Thi. Nhu bi nhat thi thu nhat thi 彼一時，此一時 bay gio la mot thi, bay gio la mot thi. \n\t3. Gio, mot ngay chia 12 gio, moi gio goi ten mot chi. Nhu gio ty, gio suu, v.v. \n\t4. Thuong. Nhu thi thi nhu thu 時時如此 thuong thuong nhu the. \n\t5. Dung thoi, dang thoi. Nhu thoi vu 時務 mua lam ruong, viec dang doi, thoi nghi 時宜 hop thoi (cai ma doi ua chuong). \n\t6. Co hoi. Nhu thua thi nhi khoi 乘時而起 nhan co hoi ma noi len. Ta quen doc la chu thoi ca.
时=thi, thoi [shi2]\n\t1 Mua. Nhu tu thi 四時 bon mua. \n\t2. Thi. Nhu bi nhat thi thu nhat thi 彼一時，此一時 bay gio la mot thi, bay gio la mot thi. \n\t3. Gio, mot ngay chia 12 gio, moi gio goi ten mot chi. Nhu gio ty, gio suu, v.v. \n\t4. Thuong. Nhu thi thi nhu thu 時時如此 thuong thuong nhu the. \n\t5. Dung thoi, dang thoi. Nhu thoi vu 時務 mua lam ruong, viec dang doi, thoi nghi 時宜 hop thoi (cai ma doi ua chuong). \n\t6. Co hoi. Nhu thua thi nhi khoi 乘時而起 nhan co hoi ma noi len. Ta quen doc la chu thoi ca.
晉=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Tien len. Nhu manh tan 孟晉 co tien len. \n\t2. Nha Tan 晉. Tu Ma Viem 司馬炎 lay nuoc cua nha Nguy 魏 len lam vua goi la nha   Tan (365-316). \n\t3. Nuoc Tan, doi Ngu dai Thach Kinh Duong noi nha Hau Duong 後唐 len lam vua   goi la nuoc Tan. Su goi la nha Hau Tan 後晉 (936-947). Doi vua Thanh vuong 成王   nha Chu 周 phong em la Thuc Ngu ra lam vua dat Duong 唐, sau doi ra dat Tan cung   goi la nuoc Tan.
晋=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Tien len. Nhu manh tan 孟晉 co tien len. \n\t2. Nha Tan 晉. Tu Ma Viem 司馬炎 lay nuoc cua nha Nguy 魏 len lam vua goi la nha   Tan (365-316). \n\t3. Nuoc Tan, doi Ngu dai Thach Kinh Duong noi nha Hau Duong 後唐 len lam vua   goi la nuoc Tan. Su goi la nha Hau Tan 後晉 (936-947). Doi vua Thanh vuong 成王   nha Chu 周 phong em la Thuc Ngu ra lam vua dat Duong 唐, sau doi ra dat Tan cung   goi la nuoc Tan.
晋=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tan 晉.
晌=thuong [shang3]\n\t1. Trua, toi trua, sap den trua hay qua trua mot chut goi la thuong ngo 晌午. \n\t2. Ban thuong 半晌 mot loang, mot nhat. \n\t3. Thuong, ve phia Dong Tam Tinh nuoc Tau dung lam tieng de do dat, mot   thuong chung do 7 mau, hoac bao khoang dat trong het mot ngay moi khap la mot   thuong.
晏=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Troi trong. Troi trong khong co may goi la yen. Luc nha nuoc duoc binh yen vo su goi la thanh yen 清晏. \n\t2. Muon. \n\t3. Yen. \n\t4. Ruc ro, tuoi tot.
晒=sai [shai4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sai 曬.
晚=van [wan3]\n\t1. Chieu, muon. Nhu van nien 晚年 luc tuoi gia, tue van 歲晚 cuoi nam, v.v. \n\t2. Sau, cham. Nhu tuong kien han van 相見恨晚 tiec rang biet nhau cham qua. \n\t3. Ke tien sau doi voi ke tien truoc thi tu xung la van sinh 晚生 nghia la ke lam nen sau, sinh sau vay.
晜=con [kun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu con 昆 .
晝=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Ban ngay. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tru kien yen ha da kien dang 晝見煙霞夜見燈 ngay nhin khoi rang dem nhin den.
昼=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Ban ngay. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tru kien yen ha da kien dang 晝見煙霞夜見燈 ngay nhin khoi rang dem nhin den.
晞=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Kho rao. \n\t2. Mo mo sang, rang dong.
晟=thinh, thanh [sheng4]\n\t1. Sang. \n\t2. Mat troi ruc ro. \n\t3. Lua chay ran rat. Ta quen doc la chu thanh.
晡=bo [bu1]\n\t1. Buoi qua trua.
晤=ngo [wu4]\n\t1. Gap, doi, cung gap mat nhau goi la ngo dien 晤面. \n\t2. Sang.
晦=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Ngay cuoi thang ta goi la ngay hoi (ngay 30). \n\t2. Toi tam mu mit, nghia van khong duoc ro rang cung goi la hoi. O an mot noi khong cau cho nguoi biet minh goi la duong hoi 養晦 hay thao hoi 韜晦.
晨=than [chen2]\n\t1. Som, luc mat troi moi moc goi la thanh than 清晨 sang som. \n\t2. Ga gay bao tin sang. \n\t3. Sao than.
晬=toi [zui4]\n\t1. Day nam, con tre sinh duoc mot nam goi la chu toi 周晬.
普=pho [pu3]\n\t1. Rong, lon, khap. Nhu giao duc pho cap 教育普及 day do khap ca dan gian. \n\t2. Nuoc Pho, nuoc Pho-lo-si 普魯士 mien trung chau Au (Prussia), goi tat la nuoc Pho.
景=canh [jing3]\n\t1. Canh, cai gi hinh sac phan phoi co ve dep thu deu goi la canh. Nhu phong canh 風景, canh vat 景物, v.v. \n\t2. Canh ngo, quang canh. \n\t3. Ham mo, tuong vong nguoi nao goi la canh nguong 景仰. \n\t4. To lon. Nhu di gioi canh phuc 以介景福 lay giup phuc lon.
晰=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Sang, ro rang.
晳=triet, che [xi1]\n\t1. Sang suot, cung nhu chu triet 哲. \n\t2. Mot am la che. Sao sang, sao sang lap lanh.
晴=tinh [qing2]\n\t1. Tanh, luc khong mua goi la tinh.
晶=tinh [jing1]\n\t1. Trong suot, vat gi co chat sang suot ben no sang ben kia goi la tinh oanh 晶瑩. \n\t2. Thuy tinh, la mot thu da sang suot nhu ngoc. Chat mo ket hop lai thanh hat goi la ket tinh 結晶.
晷=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Bong mat troi.\n\t2. Dung cai neu do bong mat troi, nay goi cai do do bong mat troi de dinh gio khac la nhat quy 日晷.
智=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Khon, trai voi chu ngu 愚, hieu thau su ly goi la tri, nhieu muu ke tai kheo cung goi la tri.
晾=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Phoi gio, hong gio.
暄=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Anh mat troi am (nang am), chu khach hoi tham nhau goi la han huyen 寒暄.
暇=ha [xia2]\n\t1. Nhan roi. \n\t2. Luc vo su. Nhu ha nhat 暇日 luc khong ban co viec gi, vo ha cap thu 無暇及此 khong roi dau toi su ay.
暈=vung [yun1|yun4]\n\t1. Vung sang cua mat troi mat trang. \n\t2. Me, quang. Nhu dau vung 頭暈 dau vang, ngoi len thay canh vat deu quay tit, muc vung 目暈 mat quang. Dang ngoi dung day sam toi mat lai nga ra cung goi la vung.
晕=vung [yun1|yun4]\n\t1. Vung sang cua mat troi mat trang. \n\t2. Me, quang. Nhu dau vung 頭暈 dau vang, ngoi len thay canh vat deu quay tit, muc vung 目暈 mat quang. Dang ngoi dung day sam toi mat lai nga ra cung goi la vung.
暉=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Anh sang mat troi. Manh Giao 孟郊 co cau tho rang. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, bao dac tam xuan huy 誰言寸草心，報得三春暉 ai noi long tac co, bao duoc on ba xuan, y noi on cha me khon cung, kho bao den duoc. Ta thuong noi luc con cha me la xuan huy 春暉 la boi nghia do.
晖=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Anh sang mat troi. Manh Giao 孟郊 co cau tho rang. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, bao dac tam xuan huy 誰言寸草心，報得三春暉 ai noi long tac co, bao duoc on ba xuan, y noi on cha me khon cung, kho bao den duoc. Ta thuong noi luc con cha me la xuan huy 春暉 la boi nghia do.
暋=man [min3]\n\t1. Cung manh. Nhu man bat uy tu 暋不畏死 cung manh chang so chet. \n\t2. Buon buc, me muoi.
暌=khue [kui2]\n\t1. Trai, khue vi 暌違 xa cach.
暍=yet, hat [he4]\n\t1. Cam nang, trung nang. \n\t2. Mot am la hat. Nong.
暎=anh [ying4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu anh 映.
暑=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Nang, nong.
暖=noan [nuan3]\n\t1. Am ap. \n\t2. Ap cho nong am.
暗=am [an4]\n\t1. Toi, tri thuc kem coi cung goi la am. \n\t2. Ngam. Nhu am sat 暗殺 giet ngam.
暘=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Mat troi moc. \n\t2. Tanh rao.
暝=minh, minh [ming2]\n\t1. Toi tam. \n\t2. Mot am la minh. Dem, toi.
暢=suong [chang4]\n\t1. Suong. Nhu thong suong 通暢 thu suong, thong suot, suong khoai 暢快 suong thich. \n\t2. Thich. Nhu suong am 暢飲 uong thich, suong tu 暢敘 ban bac thich (tro chuyen thoa thue).
畅=suong [chang4]\n\t1. Suong. Nhu thong suong 通暢 thu suong, thong suot, suong khoai 暢快 suong thich. \n\t2. Thich. Nhu suong am 暢飲 uong thich, suong tu 暢敘 ban bac thich (tro chuyen thoa thue).
暫=tam [zan4]\n\t1. Choc lat, khong lau. Nhu tam thi 暫時. \n\t2. Bong (thot nhien).
暂=tam [zan4]\n\t1. Choc lat, khong lau. Nhu tam thi 暫時. \n\t2. Bong (thot nhien).
暭=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Sang.
暮=mo [mu4]\n\t1. Toi, luc mat troi sap lan goi la mo. \n\t2. Gia, cuoi. Nhu mo nien 暮年 tuoi gia, tue mo 歲暮 cuoi nam, mo khi 暮氣 hoi tan, v.v. (noi luc y khi da suy kem).
暱=nat [ni4]\n\t1. Than gan.
暴=bao, boc [bao4|pu4]\n\t1. Tan bao. Nhu tham bao 貪暴, bao nguoc 暴虐. Trom giac goi la bao khach 暴客, v.v. \n\t2. Lam hai. Nhu bao dien thien vat 暴殄天物. \n\t3. Voi, chot den. Nhu tat phong bao vu 疾風暴雨 gio tap mua sa, bao lanh 暴冷 chot ret, bao phat 暴發 chot giau. \n\t4. Bao ho 暴虎 bat ho tay khong. \n\t5. Mot am la boc. Phoi. Tuc quen viet la 曝. \n\t6. Boc lo.
暵=han [han4]\n\t1. Phoi (phoi kho).
暹=xiem, tiem [xian1]\n\t1. Bong mat troi loe len. \n\t2. Nuoc Xiem La 暹羅 o phia dong nam chau A, hien goi la nuoc Thai 泰國. Tuc doc la chu tiem.
暾=thon [tun1]\n\t1. Mat troi moi moc.
曀=e [yi4]\n\t1. Troi am tham ma co gio.
曁=ky [ji4]\n\t1. Kip. \n\t2. Den. \n\t3. Ky ky 曁曁 cung coi, ta cai dang qua quyet cuong nghi.
曆=lich [li4]\n\t1. Cai vong cua mat troi, mat trang quay di, nguoi ta cu theo suc quay cua no ma tinh roi dinh ra nam thang thi tiet goi la lich phap 曆法. Lich Tau tinh theo vong mat trang quay quanh qua dat ma dinh thang, dinh nam goi la am lich 陰曆. Lich Tay tinh theo vong qua dat quay chung quanh mat troi ma dinh nam thang goi la duong lich 陽曆. Vi kieng ten vua Cao Ton 高宗 nha Thanh 清 la Lich 曆 nen sau cu viet la 歷.
曇=dam [tan2]\n\t1. May chum (may bua). \n\t2. Kinh Phat goi Phat la Cu dam 瞿曇 nghia den la cay mia. Nguyen truoc ho Phat la ho Cu-dam, sau moi doi la ho Thich. \n\t3. Dam hoa nhat hien 曇花一現 y noi bong thay lai bien di ngay, tuc thuong muon dung de ta su mau sinh mau diet. Tuc lai noi hoa dam tuc la hoa cay sung.
昙=dam [tan2]\n\t1. May chum (may bua). \n\t2. Kinh Phat goi Phat la Cu dam 瞿曇 nghia den la cay mia. Nguyen truoc ho Phat la ho Cu-dam, sau moi doi la ho Thich. \n\t3. Dam hoa nhat hien 曇花一現 y noi bong thay lai bien di ngay, tuc thuong muon dung de ta su mau sinh mau diet. Tuc lai noi hoa dam tuc la hoa cay sung.
曈=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Dong long 曈曨 mat troi moi moc (mo sang).
曉=hieu [xiao3]\n\t1. Som, luc moi hoi mo mo sang goi la pha hieu 破曉. \n\t2. Biet, ro (hieu ro). \n\t3. Bao cho biet. Nhu hieu thi 曉示 bao cho deu biet ro.
晓=hieu [xiao3]\n\t1. Som, luc moi hoi mo mo sang goi la pha hieu 破曉. \n\t2. Biet, ro (hieu ro). \n\t3. Bao cho biet. Nhu hieu thi 曉示 bao cho deu biet ro.
曏=huong [xiang4]\n\t1. Truoc, xua kia. Cung nhu chu huong 向.
曖=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Yem ai 晻曖 mo mit, viec mo toi khong chinh dang ro rang goi la ai muoi 曖昧.
暧=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Yem ai 晻曖 mo mit, viec mo toi khong chinh dang ro rang goi la ai muoi 曖昧.
曙=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Rang dong, sang.
曚=mong [meng1]\n\t1. Mong long 曚曨 mu mit, luc mat troi chua moc.
曛=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Anh sang thua cua mat troi, mat troi da lan con chut anh sang toe ra goi la tich huan 夕曛 hay ta huan 斜曛. Ta goi la nang quai.
曜=dieu [yao4]\n\t1. Bong sang mat troi. \n\t2. Mat troi, mat trang, sao deu goi la dieu. Mat troi mat trang goi la luong dieu 兩曜.
曝=boc [bao4|pu4]\n\t1. Phoi.
曠=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Sang sua mong menh. Nhu khoang da 曠野 dong mong menh sang sua. \n\t2. Bo thieu. Nhu khoang khoa 曠課 bo thieu bai hoc, khoang chuc 曠職 bo thieu cong viec chuc trach cua minh.
旷=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Sang sua mong menh. Nhu khoang da 曠野 dong mong menh sang sua. \n\t2. Bo thieu. Nhu khoang khoa 曠課 bo thieu bai hoc, khoang chuc 曠職 bo thieu cong viec chuc trach cua minh.
曦=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Sac mat troi, anh sang mat troi.
曨=long [long2]\n\t1. Dong long 曈曨 mat troi moi moc (mo sang). \n\t2. Mong long 曚曨 mu mit, luc mat troi chua moc.
曩=nang [nang3]\n\t1. Truoc, xua kia.
曬=sai [shai4]\n\t1. Phoi.
曰=viet [yue1]\n\t1. Rang, dung lam loi phat ngu.
曲=khuc [qu1|qu3]\n\t1. Cong, le khong duoc thang cung goi la khuc. \n\t2. Uy khuc, cho cong queo chat hep. Nhu huong khuc 鄉曲 cho lang xom nho hep, tam khuc 心曲 cai chat chua o trong long (khuc long). \n\t3. Uyen chuyen. Nhu khuc vi chi thuyet 曲為之說 uyen chuyen noi ho. \n\t4. Khuc nhac. \n\t5. Cho be cong. Nhu ha khuc 河曲 cho khuc song uon cong. \n\t6. Viec nho, thien mot ben.
曳=due [ye4]\n\t1. Xem chu due 曵.
更=canh, canh [geng1|geng4]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu canh truong 更張 doi cach chu truong, canh doan 更端 doi dau moi khac, v.v. \n\t2. Canh, mot dem chia lam nam canh. \n\t3. Thay. Nhu canh boc 更僕 doi nguoi khac thay mat minh, noi nhieu loi qua goi la canh boc nan so 更僕難數. \n\t4. Trai. Nhu thieu canh bat su 少更不事 nho chang trai viec (it tuoi chua tung trai may). \n\t5. Den lai. \n\t6. Mot am la canh. Lai them. Nhu canh tham 更甚 them te.
曵=due [ye4]\n\t1. Keo, dat. \n\t2. Kiet luc, met.
曷=hat [he2]\n\t1. Gi. \n\t2. Sao chang. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu hat 蝎.
書=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Sach. \n\t2. Ghi chep, viet. \n\t3. Thu tin. Nhu thuong thu 上書 dang tho. \n\t4. Chu. Nhu thu phap 書法 phep viet chu, biet tinh tuong cac loi chu goi la thu gia 書家. \n\t5. Kinh thu, goi tat ten kinh Thuong thu.
书=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Sach. \n\t2. Ghi chep, viet. \n\t3. Thu tin. Nhu thuong thu 上書 dang tho. \n\t4. Chu. Nhu thu phap 書法 phep viet chu, biet tinh tuong cac loi chu goi la thu gia 書家. \n\t5. Kinh thu, goi tat ten kinh Thuong thu.
曹=tao [cao2]\n\t1. Ben nguyen ben bi, nay thong dung chu luong tao 兩造. \n\t2. Doi, nguoi doi dich voi minh. Nhu phan tao xa phuc 分曹射覆 chia doi canh ban lai. \n\t3. Lu, bon. Nhu nhi tao 爾曹 lu may, chung may, chung may, nga tao 我曹 bon ta. \n\t4. Nha quan, phan chuc lam viec goi la tao. Nhu bo tao 部曹 cac bo quan. \n\t5. Nuoc Tao.
曺=tao [cao2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tao 曹.
曼=man, man [man4]\n\t1. Nho nhan, xinh dep. \n\t2. Dai, rong. \n\t3. Mot am la man. Man man 曼曼 man mac, dai dac. Nhu man duyen 曼延 bo dai.
曾=tang [ceng2|zeng1]\n\t1. Tung. Nhu vi tang 未曾 chua tung. \n\t2. Ben. Nhu tang thi di vi hieu ho 曾是以為孝乎 ben lay the lam hieu u ! \n\t3. Chong chap (gap len) nhu bo sinh ra ong minh goi la tang to 曾祖 con cua chau minh goi la tang ton 曾孫, v.v. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu tang 層.
替=the [ti4]\n\t1. Bo. Nhu the phe 替廢 bo phe. \n\t2. Thay. Nhu dai the 代替 thay the. \n\t3. Suy bai. Nhu hung the 興替 hung thinh va suy bai. 
最=toi [zui4]\n\t1. Rat. Nhu toi hao 最好 rat tot. \n\t2. Gioi hon. Nha Han khao sat quan lai chia ra hai hang, toi 最 va dien 殿. Dien la ke khong xung chuc, toi la ke co tai gioi. \n\t3. Cung tot, dung lam tro tu.
會=hoi, coi [hui4|kuai4]\n\t1. Hop. Nhu khai hoi 開會 mo hoi, hoi nghi 會議 hop ban, v.v. \n\t2. Gap. Nhu hoi minh 會盟 gap nhau cung the, hoi dong 會同 cung gap mat nhau de ban bac su gi, v.v. \n\t3. Thoi. Nhu ki hoi 機會 gap dip, van hoi 運會 van hoi tot, nghia la su voi thoi   dung hop nhau ca. Sach Hoang cuc kinh the noi 30 nam la mot doi 世, 12 doi la   mot van 運, 30 van la mot hoi 會, 12 hoi la mot nguyen 元. \n\t4. Hieu biet. Nhu hoi y 會意 hieu y, linh hoi 領會 linh luoc hieu duoc y nghia gi. \n\t5. Cho nguoi o dong duc. Nhu do hoi 部會 chon do hoi. \n\t6. Mot am la coi. Tinh gop, tinh suot so, tinh so suot nam goi la coi ke nien do 會計年度.
会=hoi, coi [hui4|kuai4]\n\t1. Hop. Nhu khai hoi 開會 mo hoi, hoi nghi 會議 hop ban, v.v. \n\t2. Gap. Nhu hoi minh 會盟 gap nhau cung the, hoi dong 會同 cung gap mat nhau de ban bac su gi, v.v. \n\t3. Thoi. Nhu ki hoi 機會 gap dip, van hoi 運會 van hoi tot, nghia la su voi thoi   dung hop nhau ca. Sach Hoang cuc kinh the noi 30 nam la mot doi 世, 12 doi la   mot van 運, 30 van la mot hoi 會, 12 hoi la mot nguyen 元. \n\t4. Hieu biet. Nhu hoi y 會意 hieu y, linh hoi 領會 linh luoc hieu duoc y nghia gi. \n\t5. Cho nguoi o dong duc. Nhu do hoi 部會 chon do hoi. \n\t6. Mot am la coi. Tinh gop, tinh suot so, tinh so suot nam goi la coi ke nien do 會計年度.
朅=khiet [qie4]\n\t1. Di. Nhu khiet lai 朅來 di lai. \n\t2. Vam vo.
月=nguyet [yue4]\n\t1. Mat trang. \n\t2. Thang.
有=huu, duu [you3|you4]\n\t1. Co. \n\t2. Lay duoc. \n\t3. Day du. \n\t4. Loi noi tro tu. Nhu nha Ngu goi la huu Ngu 有虞. \n\t5. Mot am la duu. Nhu thap duu ngu nien 十有五年 lai 15 nam.
朋=bang [peng2]\n\t1. Be ban. \n\t2. Dang. Nhu bang ti vi gian 朋比為奸 ket dang lam gian. \n\t3. Sanh tay. Nhu thac dai vo bang 碩大無朋 to lon khong gi sanh tay. \n\t4. Nam vo so la mot bang. Doi xua dung vo so lam tien, cho nen ta on nguoi ta cho nhieu cua goi la bach bang chi tich 百朋之錫.
服=phuc [fu2|fu4]\n\t1. Ao mac. Nhu le phuc 禮服 ao le, thuong phuc 常服 ao thuong. \n\t2. Mac ao. \n\t3. Ao tang, tram thoi 斬衰, tu thoi 齊衰, dai cong 大功, tieu cong 小功, ti ma 緦麻 goi la ngu phuc 五服. \n\t4. Phuc tong. \n\t5. Lam viec. Nhu phuc quan 服官 lam viec quan, phuc dien 服田 lam ruong, v.v. \n\t6. Dong xe tu ma, hai con o hai ben don xe goi la phuc. \n\t7. Uong. Nhu phuc duoc 服藥 uong thuoc. \n\t8. Quen. Nhu bat phuc thuy tho 不服水土 chang quen dat nuoc. \n\t9. Deo. \n\t10. Nghi nho. \n\t11. Cai ong ten.
朒=nuc [nu:4]\n\t1. Ngay mong mot ma co mat giang moc o phuong dong. \n\t2. Thieu, chu dung trong phep tinh cuu chuong.
朔=soc [shuo4]\n\t1. Truoc, moi. \n\t2. Ngay mong mot. \n\t3. Phuong bac. Nhu soc phong 朔風 gio bac.
朕=tram [zhen4]\n\t1. Ta day, tieng dung cua ke ton quy. Nhu vua tu noi minh thi tu xung la tram. \n\t2. Tram trieu 朕兆 cai diem bao truoc sap xay ra mot su gi. \n\t3. Duong khau ao giap.
朗=lang [lang3]\n\t1. Sang.
望=vong [wang4]\n\t1. Trong xa. Nhu chiem vong 瞻望 trong mong. \n\t2. Co cai de cho nguoi chiem nguong goi la vong. Nhu danh vong 名望, uy vong 威望, v.v. \n\t3. Qua mong. Nhu trach vong 責望 trach mang de mong cho lam nen. \n\t4. Uoc mong. Nhu dai hi qua vong 大喜過望 mung qua suc uoc mong, nghia la duoc thich long muon qua, that vong 失望 mat su mong uoc, tuyet vong 絕望 het duong mong uoc, v.v. \n\t5. Ngay ram, ngay ram thi mat troi mat trang giong thang nhau goi la vong.
朝=trieu, trieu [chao2|zhao1]\n\t1. Som, sang mai. Tu sang som den luc an com sang xong goi la chung trieu 終朝, mot ngay cung goi la nhat trieu 一朝. \n\t2. Mot am la trieu. Cho nha nuoc lam viec. Nhu trieu dinh 朝廷. \n\t3. Chau, bay toi vao hau vua goi la chau, vao hau ke ton quy, xua cung goi la chau. \n\t4. Trieu dai, ten goi ve thoi dai cua nuoc quan chu. Nhu Han trieu 漢朝 trieu nha Han.
朞=ki [qi1]\n\t1. Suot mot nam cu.
期=ky, ky [ji1|qi1]\n\t1. Ky hen. Nhu khien ky 愆期 sai hen. \n\t2. At the, mong moi. Nhu ky vong 期望 mong hen cho phai thanh. \n\t3. Ky di 期頤 tram tuoi. \n\t4. Mot am la ky. Mot nam. \n\t5. Ong ba chu bac anh em vo con va con dau truong chet phai de tang mot nam goi la ky phuc 期服. \n\t6. Dung lam tieng tro tu. Nhu that duy ha ky 實維何期 thuc o vao dau ?
朦=mong [meng2]\n\t1. Mong long 朦朧 lo mo, luc mat trang sap lan.
朧=long [long2]\n\t1. Mong long 朦朧 lo mo, luc mat trang sap lan.
胧=long [long2]\n\t1. Mong long 朦朧 lo mo, luc mat trang sap lan.
木=moc [mu4]\n\t1. Cay, cay to dung lam nha cua do dac duoc goi la kieu moc 喬木, cay co canh moc la la gan dat goi la quan moc 灌木. \n\t2. Go. Nhu moc khi 木器 do go, nguoi chet goi la tuu moc 就木 nghia la phai bo vao ao quan go vay. \n\t3. Tam moc 三木 mot thu hinh gong cum. \n\t4. Tieng moc, mot thu tieng trong ngu am. \n\t5. Sao moc, mot ngoi sao trong tam vi hanh tinh. \n\t6. Chat phac, moc mac. \n\t7. Tro ra, te dai. Nhu ma moc bat nhan 麻木不仁 te dai khong cam giac gi.
未=vi, mui [wei4]\n\t1. Chi vi, chi thu tam trong 12 chi. Tu mot gio chieu den ba gio chieu goi la gio vi. Thuong quen doc la chu mui. \n\t2. Chua. Nhu vi lai 未來 chua lai, chua toi. \n\t3. Chua, dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu han mai truoc hoa vi 寒梅著花未 mo da no hoa chua ? (Vuong Duy 王維). \n\t4. Khong. \n\t5. Loi noi chua nhat dinh. Nhu vi kha tri da 未可知也 chua the biet duoc.
末=mat [mo4]\n\t1. Ngon. Nhu moc mat 木末 ngon cay, truong mat 杖末 dau gay. Su gi khong phai la can ban cung goi la mat. Nhu di buon goi la truc mat 逐末, theo duoi nghe mon, vi ngay xua trong nghe lam ruong ma khinh nghe di buon vay. \n\t2. Khong. Nhu mat do da di 末由也已 khong biet noi vao dau duoc vay thoi. \n\t3. Het, cuoi. Nhu mat the 末世 doi cuoi, mat nhat 末日 ngay cuoi cung, v.v. \n\t4. Mong, nhe. Nhu mat giam 末減 giam nhe bot di. \n\t5. Phuong tuong dong thay do gia goi la mat. \n\t6. Nho, vun. Nhu duoc mat 藥末 thuoc da tan nho. \n\t7. Mon mon, thap hep. Dung lam loi tu nhun minh. Nhu mat hoc 末學 ke hoc mon mon nay.
本=bon, ban [ben3]\n\t1. Goc, mot cay goi la nhat bon 一本. \n\t2. Coi re, coi nguon, cai coi re cua mot su gi goi la bon. Nhu xa bon truc mat 捨本逐末 bo coi re ma theo ngon nganh. \n\t3. Truoc, von. Nhu bon y 本意 y truoc cua toi. \n\t4. Von lai (nguyen lai) dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu bon cai nhu thu 本該如此 von lai phai nhu the. \n\t5. Cua minh, bon than 本身 than minh, bon quoc 本國 nuoc minh, bon vi 本位 cai dia vi cua minh, bon linh 本領 cai nang luc cua minh, khong phai cau gi o ngoai, v.v. \n\t6. Tien von, tien goc. Nhu nhat bon van loi 一本萬利 mot von muon loi. \n\t7. Phep ngay xua cac tap so tau vua cung goi la bon. \n\t8. Tap, sach vo tranh ve bia thiep deu goi la bon ca. Nhu khac bon 刻本 ban chu khac. Mot quyen sach cung goi la nhat bon 一本. Ta quen doc la chu ban.
札=trat [zha2]\n\t1. Cai the, ngay xua khong co giay, van tu gi cung viet vao van go nho goi la trat. The cho nen thu tu cung goi la trat. Nhu tin trat 信札 cai thu, to cua quan suc cho dan cung goi la trat. \n\t2. Chet non. Nhu yeu trat 夭札 non yeu. \n\t3. Lan ao day.
朮=truat [zhu2]\n\t1. Mot thu cay cu dung lam thuoc duoc. Nhu thuong truat 蒼朮, bach truat 白朮, v.v.
朱=chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Do. \n\t2. Doi xua cho sac do la dep nhat, nen goi cac nha phu quy la chu mon 朱門.
朴=phac [piao2|po1|po4|pu3]\n\t1. Cay phac, vo no dung lam thuoc duoc goi la hau phac 厚朴. Thu moc o tinh Tu Xuyen thi tot hon, nen goi la xuyen phac 川朴. \n\t2. Chat phac, cung nhu chu 樸.
朵=doa [duo3]\n\t1. Bong hoa. \n\t2. Dong. Nhu doa di 朵頤 can do an dong moi. Cung viet la 朶.
朶=doa [duo3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu doa 朵.
朽=hu [xiu3]\n\t1. Go muc, pham vat gi thoi nat deu goi la hu ca. \n\t2. Suy yeu vo dung. Nhu lao hu 老朽 gia ca khong lam gi duoc nua.
杅=vu [yu2]\n\t1. Cai bon dung nuoc.
杆=can [gan1|gan3]\n\t1. Cai gay go, cai con, cai moc. \n\t2. Tuc goi hang chan song ngan o tren cua la lan can 欄杆.
杇=o [wu1]\n\t1. Cai bay, thu do dung de trat tuong vach.
杈=xoa [cha1|cha4]\n\t1. Cai nang cay, chac cay, cho canh cay moc cheo ra goi la xoa. \n\t2. Cai chac, dung de moc bo lua len.
杉=sam [sha1|shan1]\n\t1. Cay sam, la mot thu go thong dung rat nhieu viec.
杌=ngot [wu4]\n\t1. Dao ngot 檮杌 ten mot giong ac thu. Ngay xua dung tieng ay de goi cac ke hu ac. \n\t2. Ngot niet 杌隉 ay nay khong yen. Ngot tu 杌子 cai ghe nho.
李=ly [li3]\n\t1. Cay man. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu ly 理. Nhu tu ly 司李 quan an, cung co khi viet la tu ly 司理. \n\t3. Hanh ly, ai di dau cung phai sam sua do dung khi di duong, nen goi la hanh ly 行李. Chu 李 cung nghia voi chu 理.
杏=hanh [xing4]\n\t1. Cay hanh. Duc Khong tu ngoi day hoc o gian hanh, vi the nen thuong dung lam chu goi ve cua thay hoc. Nha Duong cho cac hoc tro do tien si vao an yen o vuon hanh ("hanh vien 杏園) nen tuc moi goi cac nguoi do la hanh lam 杏林. \n\t2. Ngan hanh 銀杏 cay ngan hanh, qua an duoc, hat no goi la bach qua 白果.
材=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Go dung duoc, pham vat gi cua troi sinh ma co the lay de dung duoc deu goi la tai. Nhu kim, moc, thuy, hoa, tho 金、木、水、火、土 goi la ngu tai 五材. \n\t2. Tinh chat. Nhu tat nhan ky tai nhi doc yen 必因其材而篤焉 at nhan tinh chat no ma boi dap them vay. \n\t3. Cung mot nghia voi chu tai 才.
村=thon [cun1]\n\t1. Lang, xom. \n\t2. Que mua.
杓=tieu, thuoc [biao1|shao2]\n\t1. Chuoi sao bac dau. \n\t2. Gat ra, keo ra. \n\t3. Troi buoc. \n\t4. Mot am la thuoc. Cai moi, cai thia.
杕=de [di4]\n\t1. Cay moc mot minh.
杖=truong, trang [zhang4]\n\t1. Cai gay chong. \n\t2. Ke chong gay goi la truong. \n\t3. Cai truong dung de danh nguoi. Trong nam hinh, truong hinh la mot. \n\t4. Mot am la trang. Cam, tua.
杗=mang [mang2]\n\t1. Cai xa lon.
杙=dac [yi4]\n\t1. Cai coc de buoc trau ngua.
杜=do [du4]\n\t1. Cay do (mot loai le). \n\t2. Mot thu co thom. \n\t3. Lap. Nhu do tuyet tu te 杜絕私弊 lap het te rieng. \n\t4. Pham su gi tu y bay ve ra khong co bang cu gi goi la do soan 杜撰. \n\t5. Tuc goi cai gi xuat ban o dat minh la do. Nhu do bo 杜布 vai ban xu, do me 杜米 gao ban xu, v.v.
杞=ky [qi3]\n\t1. Cay ky, ky co ba giong, mot la cay ky lieu, dung lam moi lam thia, hai la cay ky bach, dung lam ao quan, ba la cay cau ky, dung lam thuoc. Ta thuong goi tat la ky tu 杞子. \n\t2. Ten nuoc.
束=thuc, thu [shu4]\n\t1. Buoc, bo lai. Nhu thuc thu 束手 bo tay. \n\t2. Bo. Nhu thuc thi 束失 bo ten, thuc bach 束帛 bo lua, v.v. \n\t3. Goi, muoi cai nem buoc lam mot goi la nhat thuc 一束 mot thuc. Doi xua dung nem lam qua bieu goi la thuc tu 束脩 vi the tuc moi goi mon tien le thay hoc la thuc tu. \n\t4. Mot am la thu. Han che. Nhu uoc thu 約束 cung hen uoc han che nhau, nay thuong dung ve nghia cai quan coi soc. Nhu uoc thu bat nghiem 約束不嚴 coi soc khong nghiem (thay day hoc tro khong nghiem).
杠=giang [gang1|gang4]\n\t1. Cai can co. \n\t2. Cai cau nho.
条=dieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dieu 條.
杪=dieu [miao3]\n\t1. Canh nho. \n\t2. Cuoi. Nhu tue dieu 歲杪 cuoi nam, nguyet dieu 月杪 cuoi thang, v.v. \n\t3. Ngon cay, ngon canh cay.
杭=hang [hang2]\n\t1. Cai xuong, cung mot nghia voi chu hang 航. \n\t2. Ten dat.
杯=boi [bei1]\n\t1. Cai chen.
杰=kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu kiet 傑.
東=dong [dong1]\n\t1. Phuong dong, tuc goi nguoi chu la dong. Nuoc Trinh noi voi nguoi nuoc So tu xung nuoc minh la dong dao chu 東道主 nghia la nguoi chu o phuong dong. Tuc goi cac chu co phan cong ty la co dong 股東 la do nghia do. \n\t2. Nuoc Nhat Ban o phia dong nuoc Tau nen goi la dong duong 東洋, van tu Nhat Ban goi la dong van 東文. \n\t3. Dong sang 東牀 chang re (theo tich truyen Vuong Hy Chi, doi Tan).
东=dong [dong1]\n\t1. Phuong dong, tuc goi nguoi chu la dong. Nuoc Trinh noi voi nguoi nuoc So tu xung nuoc minh la dong dao chu 東道主 nghia la nguoi chu o phuong dong. Tuc goi cac chu co phan cong ty la co dong 股東 la do nghia do. \n\t2. Nuoc Nhat Ban o phia dong nuoc Tau nen goi la dong duong 東洋, van tu Nhat Ban goi la dong van 東文. \n\t3. Dong sang 東牀 chang re (theo tich truyen Vuong Hy Chi, doi Tan).
杲=cao [gao3]\n\t1. Sang. \n\t2. Cao.
杳=yeu, lieu [yao3]\n\t1. Mo mit, lang bat. Nhu yeu nhien 杳然 mo mit khong co dau vet gi, yeu vo tieu tuc 杳無消息 bat khong tin tuc gi, v.v. \n\t2. Tham tham, mong menh. Ta quen doc la chu lieu.
杵=xu [chu3]\n\t1. Cai chay.
杶=suan [chun1]\n\t1. Cay suan, dung de dong dan.
杷=ba, ba [pa2]\n\t1. Cai bo cao, cung nhu chu ba 耙. \n\t2. Mot am la ba. Goi tat la cay ti ba 枇杷 mot thu cay qua an duoc, la lam thuoc duoc.
杻=nuu, xieng [niu3]\n\t1. Cay nuu. \n\t2. Mot am la xieng. Mot do dung trong hinh nguc.
杼=tru, thu, thu [zhu4]\n\t1. Tru truc 杼柚 cai thoi, cai thoi de det vai. \n\t2. Mong. \n\t3. Mot am la thu. Cai mang thao nuoc. \n\t3. Lai mot am la thu. Cay thu.
松=tung [song1]\n\t1. Cay thong, thong co nhieu thu. Nhu thong do xich tung 赤松, thong den hac tung 黑松, hai tung 海松, ngu tu tung 五鬚松, v.v. Cay thong den mua ret van xanh, nen nguoi moi vi no nhu nguoi co khi tiet va nguoi tho. Nhu trinh tung 貞松 noi nguoi trinh tiet, kieu tung 喬松 noi nguoi tho, v.v.
板=ban [ban3]\n\t1. Van, manh mong. Nhu moc ban 木板 tam van, dong ban 銅板 la dong, ngay xua goi cai hot la thu ban 手板, to chieu la chieu ban 詔板 cung do nghia ay. \n\t2. Ban ban 板板 do dao, nha nuoc hon loan khong co phep luat goi la ban dang 板蕩. \n\t3. Do dan, khong hoat dong. Nhu ngoc ban 呆板 ngo nghech chang biet gi, co ban 古板 co lo vo dung, v.v. \n\t4. Ban in sach. Nhu nguyen ban 原板 ban in nguyen van, phien ban 翻板 ban khac lai, xuat ban 出板 in sach ra. \n\t5. Cai van danh phach, mot thu am nhac dung de danh dip hat. \n\t6. Cai ban va.
枅=phanh, binh [peng1]\n\t1. Phanh lu 枅櫚 cay phanh lu, mot loai nhu cay dua. Ta quen doc la binh.
枇=ti [pi2]\n\t1. Ti ba 枇杷 mot thu cay qua an duoc, la lam thuoc duoc.
枉=uong [wang3]\n\t1. Ta, cong. Nhu uong dao 枉道 dao ta. \n\t2. Oan uong. \n\t3. Uon minh toi. Nhu uong co 枉顧 co tinh doai toi, ha minh doai den. \n\t4. Uong. Nhu uong phi tinh than 枉費精神 uong phi tinh than, nhoc ma khong co ich gi.
枋=phuong [fang1]\n\t1. Cay phuong, dung lam thuoc nhuom.
枌=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Cay phan (cay du du), doi xua moi lap nen mot lang nao deu giong mot thu cay tho ngoi de lam ghi. Phia dong ap phong nha Han co lang phan du 枌榆 (lang vua Han Cao To), doi sau nhan the goi lang minh la phan du, cung nhu nghia chu tang tu 桑梓 vay.
枏=nam [nan2]\n\t1. Cay nam (cay cho).
析=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Go, te ra, chia re. Nhu ly tich 離析 chia ghe. \n\t2. Che. Nhu tich tan 析薪 che cui. \n\t3. Tach bach. Nhu tich nghi 析疑 noi tach bach moi ngo ra.
枑=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Be ho 梐枑 ken go lam hinh mat cheo de lam cai che cua. Cung nhu cai phen mat cao, dung o truoc cac so cong de ngan nguoi khoi tran vao.
枕=cham, cham [zhen3]\n\t1. Xuong trong oc ca. \n\t2. Cai don sau xe. \n\t3. Cai goi. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thuyen song thoi cham dao thien minh 船窗推枕到天明 nam o cua so thuyen tran tro goi den sang. \n\t4. Mot am la cham. Goi dau. \n\t4. Toi, den.
林=lam [lin2]\n\t1. Rung. Nhu sam lam 森林 rung ram. \n\t2. Pham cho nao tu hop dong cung goi la lam. Nhu nho lam 儒林 rung nho (cho nhieu ke hoc gia o). \n\t3. Dong duc. Nhu lam lap 林立 moi vat chen chuc nhu rung.
枘=nhue [rui4]\n\t1. Khap mong, vao mong, vot dau go cho vao vua ngam. Hai ben khong hop y nhau goi la tac nhue 鑿枘.
枚=mai [mei2]\n\t1. Cai qua, goc cay. Nhu tao nhat mai 棗一枚 mot qua tao. Mai boc cong than 枚卜功臣 nhat nhat deu boi xem ai cong hon, doi sau goi su dung quan te tuong la mai boc 枚卜 la boi do. \n\t2. Ham mai 銜枚 ngam ham thiet, ngay xua dem quan di khong muon cho quan giac biet bat ngua dong ham thiet ca lai cho khong keu duoc. \n\t3. Cai vu chuong, cai vau chuong.
果=qua [guo3]\n\t1. Qua, trai cay. Nhu qua dao, qua man, v.v. \n\t2. Qua quyet, qua cam. \n\t3. Qua nhien, su gi da nghiem goi la qua nhien nhu thu 果然如此. \n\t4. Ket qua, su gi da ket cuc goi la ket qua. \n\t5. Lam nhan ac phai va ac, lam nhan thien duoc phuc lanh goi la nhan qua 因果. \n\t6. No. Nhu qua phuc 果腹 no bung.
枝=chi, ky [zhi1]\n\t1. Canh, cac canh moc o than cay ra goi la chi. Pham cai gi do mot the ma chia ra cac the khac deu goi la chi. Nhu cac ho nha vua goi la kim chi ngoc diep 金枝玉葉. \n\t2. Tan loan. \n\t3. Chi the. \n\t4. Chong choi, chong giu. \n\t5. Mot am la ky. Ky chi 枝指 ngon tay moc tranh ra.
枯=kho [ku1]\n\t1. Kho heo. Tuc goi than the ke giau sang la vinh 榮, ke ngheo hen la kho 枯. \n\t2. Can. Nhu le kho 淚枯 can nuoc mat, hinh dang gay mon goi la kho cao 枯橋. \n\t3. Chan tay khong dung gi duoc goi la thien kho 偏枯, su gi khong duoc quan binh cung goi la thien kho. \n\t4. Kho khan. Nhu suu sach kho trang 搜索枯腸 tim moi trong ruot kho khan, noi y la trong long it chu, tim moi kho ra. Van tu khong duoc dien nha phong phu goi la kho tich 枯寂. Thuyen dinh khong biet quan tuong chi ngoi tro, goi la kho thuyen 枯禪, v.v.
