枰=binh, binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cuoc danh bac, nay thong dung goi cuoc co la binh, danh mot van co goi la nhat binh 一枰. \n\t2. Mot am la binh. Van giat giuong. \n\t3. Cay binh.
枲=ti [xi3]\n\t1. Cay gai cai. Thu gai khong co qua goi la ti.
枳=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Cay chi (cay tranh gai) dung lam thuoc duoc. Nhu chi thuc 枳實 thu qua hai con non, chi xac 枳殼 thu qua hai da gia.
枴=quai [guai3]\n\t1. Cai gay nguoi gia chong.
枵=hieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Cay rong. \n\t2. Rong, khong co gi. Nhu hieu trang 枵腹 da trong, hieu phuc tong cong 枵腹從公 suong bung lam viec cong, y noi lam viec khong duoc cai gi bu cong. 
架=gia [jia4]\n\t1. Cai gia. Nhu y gia 衣架 cai gia mac ao, thu gia 書架 cai gia sach, v.v. \n\t2. Gac. Nhu tru thuong gia luong 桂上架樑 gac xa tren cot. \n\t3. Dat dieu vu va. Nhu gia hoa 架禍 dat dieu vu hoa cho nguoi.
枷=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Cai gong, cai cum, dung de cum dau. \n\t2. Lien gia 連枷 cai neo dung de dap lua. 
枸=cau, cu [gou1|gou3|ju3]\n\t1. Cay cau ky, qua dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Cay go dung dung. \n\t3. Mot am la cu. Ten cay.
枹=phu, phu, bao [fu1]\n\t1. Cai dui trong, doi xua dung trong de lam hieu tien binh, cho nen luc nao thai binh vo su goi la phu co bat minh 枹鼓不鳴. Cung doc la phu. \n\t2. Mot am la bao. Cay bao, mot thu cay to dung lam cui dun.
枻=due, tiet [yi4]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo. Nhu co due nhi khu 鼓枻而去 may cheo ma di. \n\t2. Mot am la tiet. Kinh tiet 檠枻 cai do lam no cho ngay cho can.
柁=da, da [duo4|tuo2]\n\t1. Cai banh lai thuyen. Tuc quen doc la chu da.
柄=binh [bing3|bing4]\n\t1. Cai chuoi, vat gi co chuoi co can de cam goi la binh. \n\t2. Mot cai do gi cung goi la nhat binh 一柄. \n\t2. Quyen binh, quyen chinh.
柈=ban [ban4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ban 盤.
柎=phu, phu, phu [fu1]\n\t1. Cai be. \n\t2. Cai bau hoa. \n\t3. Mot am la phu. Do am nhac. \n\t2. Tua. \n\t4. Mot am nua la phu. Rot xuong.
柏=bach [bai3|bo2|bo4]\n\t1. Bien bach 扁柏 cay bien bach. Mot thu cay to, dung de dong do. \n\t2. Trac bach 側柏 cay trac bach la nho nhu kim, dung de lam canh choi va lam thuoc. \n\t3. Coi bach 檜柏 cay coi bach cung la thu cay giong lam canh, cung nghia voi chu bach 迫.
某=mo [mou3]\n\t1. Mo, dung lam tieng dem. Nhu mo ong 某翁 ong mo, mo su 某事 viec mo, v.v.
柑=cam [gan1]\n\t1. Cay cam. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu cam 鉗.
柒=that [qi1]\n\t1. Bay, cung nghia nhu chu that 七, trong cac van tu dung de cho kho chua.
染=nhiem [ran3]\n\t1. Nhuom, dung cac thuoc mui ma nhuom cac thu do goi la nhiem. \n\t2. Nhiem dan, o voi nhung nguoi hay roi minh cung hay, o voi nhung ke hu roi minh cung hu goi la nhiem. \n\t3. Lay, mot ke bi benh lay sang ke khac goi la truyen nhiem 傳染.
柔=nhu [rou2]\n\t1. Mem, mem yeu, mem mai. Nhu nhu nhuyen 柔軟 mem luot, nhu thuan 柔順 nhun thuan, v.v. \n\t2. Phuc, lam cho yen. Nhu nhu vien nhan 柔遠人 lam cho nguoi xa phuc. \n\t3. Cay co moi moc.
柘=cha, gia [zhe4]\n\t1. Cay cha, mot thu cay giong nhu cay dau dung chan tam duoc. \n\t2. Cha chi 柘枝 ten mot khuc hat mua, cung doc la chu gia.
柙=hiep, giap [xia2]\n\t1. Cai cui (cui nhot loai thu du). \n\t2. Cai hop dung guom. \n\t3. Mot am la giap. Cay giap.
柚=duu, truc [you2|you4]\n\t1. Cay duu (cay quyt qua nho). Mot thu cay co qua an duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la truc. Cai thoi, do dung de det.
柜=cu [gui4|ju3]\n\t1. Cay cu, mot loai lieu lon. \n\t2. Cai quay.
柝=thac [tuo4]\n\t1. Mo canh, tam sat cam canh. Ban dem canh gio danh mo hay tam sat de cam canh goi la kich thac 擊柝.
柞=tac, trach [zha4|zuo4]\n\t1. Cay tac, la co rang nhon, ngay xua dung lam luoc chai dau. \n\t2. Thu tac. \n\t3. Mot am la trach. Phat cay. \n\t4. Chat hep. \n\t5. Tieng vang ra ngoai.
柟=nam [nan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nam 枏.
柢=de, de [di3]\n\t1. Re cay. \n\t2. Su gi ben chac goi la tham can co de 深根固柢. Mot am la de.
查=tra [cha2|zha1]\n\t1. Cai be. \n\t2. Tra xet. \n\t3. Qua tra, dung lam thuoc tieu, goi la son tra 山查.
柨=thi, si [shi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 棟.
柩=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cai ao quan, ao quan da de xac nguoi chet goi la cuu.
柬=gian [jian3]\n\t1. Ken chon. \n\t2. Cai tho, cai danh thiep.
柮=dot [duo4]\n\t1. Cot dot 榾柮 goc cay.
柯=kha [ke1]\n\t1. Cai can bua, Kinh Thi co cau phat kha nhu ha, phi phu phat khac, thu the nhu ha, phi moi bat dac 伐柯如何？匪斧弗克；取妻如何？匪媒不得。 chat cay the nao ? khong bua khong duoc, lay vo the nao ? khong moi khong xong. Vi the nen doi sau goi su lam moi la chap kha 執柯. Duc Khong tu co cau rang. Thu vo phu kha. Nhu quy son ha 手無斧柯, 如龜山何 tay khong can bua, phat sao duoc nui Quy, y noi ho Quy lan lap quyen vua. Nhu nui Quy che lap nuoc Lo, minh khong co quyen khong sao tru di duoc. Vi the doi sau moi goi quyen binh la phu kha 斧柯. \n\t2. Cac canh la va do nhanh cay moc ra cung goi la kha, mot than cay hay co cung goi la nhat kha 一柯.
柰=nai [nai4]\n\t1. Qua nai, mot loai nhu qua lan. \n\t2. Nai. Nhu nai ha 柰何 nai sao ? nay thong dung chu nai 奈.
柱=tru, tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Cai cot. \n\t2. Nguoi ma nha nuoc trong cay nhieu. Nhu tru thach 柱石 nguoi bay toi gioi, nha nuoc trong cay nhu cay cot da chong vung cua nha vay. \n\t3. Giu gin chong choi voi cuoc nguy bien goi la trung luu chi tru 中流砥柱. \n\t4. Cai phim dan, con ngua de cang day dan. Su gi lam khong duoc luu loi goi la giao tru co sat 膠柱鼓瑟. \n\t5. Mot am la tru. Chong choi.
柳=lieu [liu3]\n\t1. Cay lieu. \n\t2. Sao lieu, mot sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t3. Xe lieu. \n\t4. Cai truong ben xe dam ma.
柴=sai, ti [chai2]\n\t1. Cui. \n\t2. Te sai, luc te chat cui len tren, xong roi dot di goi la sai. Ken co lam cua goi la sai mon 柴門. \n\t3. Lap. \n\t4. Giu. \n\t5. Mot am la ti. Chua, chat dong.
柵=sach [shan1|zha4]\n\t1. Hang rao, cam tre go lam hang rao de ngan nguoi di goi la sach.
栅=sach [shan1|zha4]\n\t1. Hang rao, cam tre go lam hang rao de ngan nguoi di goi la sach.
柷=chuc [zhu4]\n\t1. Mot thu am nhac.
柹=thi, si [shi4]\n\t1. Cay thi, chinh am la chu si.
栓=xuyen [shuan1]\n\t1. Cai then cua, cai chot cua. Tuc goi cai nut chai la xuyen.
栖=te, the [qi1|xi1]\n\t1. Dau (chim dau). \n\t2. Pham vat gi dung lai nghi deu goi la te. \n\t3. Te te 栖栖 ngo ngac, voi va. Ta quen doc la chu the.
栗=lat [li4]\n\t1. Cay lat (cay de) nhan no an duoc. \n\t2. Kinh ghin, so hai. Nhu su dan chien lat 使民戰栗 khien dan so run. \n\t3. Ben chat, go lat dan lam, cho nen vat gi ben chac goi la than lat 縝栗. 
栝=quat [gua1]\n\t1. Cay quat, tuc la cay coi.
栞=san [kan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu san 删.
栟=kien [bing1]\n\t1. Cai keo cau, cai go bac ngang tren cot de do mai.
校=giao, hieu, hao [jiao4|xiao4]\n\t1. Cai cum chan. \n\t2. Tranh, thi. Nhu khao giao 考校 thi khao, bat du giao luan 不與校論 chang cung tranh danh. \n\t3. Tinh so. Nhu kiem giao 檢校 kiem xet su vat. \n\t4. Tra xet dinh chinh lai sach vo goi la giao. Nhu giao kham 校勘 khao xet lai. \n\t4. Mot am la hieu. Trang. Nhu hoc hieu 學校 trang hoc. \n\t5. Cai chuong ngua. Mot bo quan cung goi la nhat hieu 一校. \n\t6. Mot am la hao. Chan cai bat dau bat cho.
栢=bach [bai3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bach 柏.
栨=thu [ci4]\n\t1. Cai suot ngang cua. Nay goi cai chan song tren duoi cua la ham thu 檻栨.
栩=hu [xu3]\n\t1. Cay hu, ten khac cua cay lich 櫟. \n\t2. Hu hu 栩栩 hon ho, co ve nhu song that.
株=chu, chau [zhu1]\n\t1. Goc cay (goc cay o tren dat). Tong Dien Phu thay con tho dap dau vao goc cay ma chet, moi nghi cay canh giu goc cay mong lai duoc tho den nua, vi the nen nhung ke giu chet mot y kien cua minh goi la thu chu dai tho 守株待兔. \n\t2. Tinh so cay, mot cay goi la nhat chu 一株. \n\t3. Mot nguoi lam toi, va lay den moi nguoi goi la chu lien 株連. Ta quen doc la chu chau.
栱=cung [gong3]\n\t1. Dau cung 斗栱 cai tru ngan tren xa.
栲=khao [kao3]\n\t1. Cay khao. \n\t2. Khao lao 栲栳 cai gio, mot thu dan bang tre hay bang canh lieu de dung do.
栳=lao [lao3]\n\t1. Khao lao 栲栳 cai gio, mot thu dan bang tre hay bang canh lieu de dung do.
栴=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Chien dan 栴檀 mot thu go thom, tuc la cay dan huong (Candana).
核=hach [he2|hu2]\n\t1. Hat qua. \n\t2. Khac hach 剋核 xet nghiet. \n\t3. Tong hach 總核 tinh gop, cung nghia voi chu hach 覈.
根=can [gen1]\n\t1. Re cay. \n\t2. Bo duoi mot vat gi cung goi la can. Nhu thiet can 舌根 cuong luoi. \n\t3. Can do (nhan). Nhu thien can 善根 can thien, cau noi nao khong co bang cu goi la vo can chi ngon 無根之言. \n\t4. Nha Phat goi mat, tai, mui, luoi, than, y 眼、耳、鼻、舌、身、意 la luc can 六根.
格=cach, cac [ge1|ge2]\n\t1. Chinh. Nhu duy dai nhan vi nang cach quan tam chi phi 惟大人能格君心之非 chi co buc dai nhan la chinh duoc cai long xang cua vua. \n\t2. Cam cach, lay long thanh lam cho nguoi cam phuc goi la cach. \n\t3. Xet cho cung. Nhu tri tri tai cach vat 致知在格物 xet cung le vat moi biet het, vi the nen nghien cuu ve mon hoc ly hoa goi la cach tri 格致. \n\t4. Xo xat. Nhu cach dau 格鬪 danh lon. Suc khong dich noi goi la bat cach 不格. \n\t5. Khuon phep. Nhu cap cach 及格 hop cach. \n\t6. Phan luong (so sanh). Nhu lam viec co kinh nghiem duyet lich goi la tu cach 資格. \n\t7. Tung. Nhu mot tung cua cai gia sach goi la nhat cach 一格. \n\t8. O vuong, ke giay ra tung o vuong de viet goi la cach. \n\t9. Mot am la cac. Bo xo. Nhu su cac bat hanh 事格不行 su bo do khong lam nua. \n\t10. Vuong mac.
栽=tai, tai [zai1]\n\t1. Giong (trong). \n\t2. Loai thuc vat con non goi la tai. \n\t3. Mot am la tai. Tam van dai de dap tuong.
桀=kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Ke hay giet hai nguoi, cuoi doi nha Ha co mot nha vua ac, dan goi la vua Kiet. \n\t2. Hinh xe xac. \n\t3. Cung mot nghia voi chu kiet 傑. \n\t4. Ganh vac.
桁=hanh, hang, hang [heng2]\n\t1. Oc hanh 屋桁 cai ram go. \n\t2. Mot am la hang. Cai cum to. Nhu hang duong tuong vuong 桁楊相望 tu toi nhan nhan. \n\t3. Cai cau noi, cung mot nghia voi chu hang 航. \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la hang. Cai mac ao.
桂=que [gui4]\n\t1. Cay que, dung de lam thuoc. Tuc goi cai bong den o trong mat trang la coc, la tho, la cay que. O doi khoa cu, ai do khoa huong goi la thiem cung chiet que 蟾宮折桂 be que cung trang.
桃=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Cay dao, sac dao rat dep, cho nen nguoi dep goi la dao tai 桃腮 ma dao. Tuong truyen rang ba Tay Vuong Mau 西王母 cho Han Vo De 漢武帝 qua dao va bao rang thu dao nay ba nghin nam moi chin mot lan, cho nen chuc tho hay dung chu ban dao 蟠桃. Co nhan bao canh dao tru duoc cac su khong lanh, cho nen den tet nha nao nha nay deu cam canh dao o cua goi la dao phu 桃符, cac cau doi tet cung thuong dung hai chu ay. Ong Dich Nhan Kiet 狄仁傑 hay tien cu nguoi hien, nen doi khen la dao ly tai cong mon 桃李在公門 nghia la nguoi hien deu o cua ong ay ca. Nay goi cac ke mon ha la mon tuong dao ly 門牆桃李 la do nghia ay. \n\t2. Dao yeu 桃夭, mot tho trong Kinh Thi 詩經 noi viec hon nhan chinh dang, nay ta goi con gai di lay chong la dao yeu 桃夭 la vi do. \n\t3. Ong Dao Tiem 陶潛 co bai ky goi la dao hoa nguyen ky 桃花源記 noi ve su nguoi Tan chan doi, vi the ngay nay moi goi nguoi o an la the ngoai dao nguyen 世外桃源. \n\t4. Co nhan co cau dao hoa khinh bac 桃花輕薄 vi the nay moi goi con gai bat trinh   la dao hoa, nha xem so goi la so dao hoa cung la do y do. 5 Du dao 餘桃, Dy Ty   Ha 彌子瑕 an dao thay ngon de danh dang vua Ve, vi the vua yeu, nay goi ke dan   ong duoc ai yeu la du dao la boi co do.
桄=quang, quang [guang1|guang4]\n\t1. Cai suot ngang khung cui, cai bac thang, vi the nen noi ve cai co so cua su vat gi goi la so quang 初桄. \n\t2. Mot am nua la quang. Quang lang 桄榔 cay quang lang, trong loi cay co phan vang lam banh an duoc (mot loai cay giong cay dua).
桅=ngoi, nguy [wei2]\n\t1. Cai cot buom, ta quen doc la chu nguy.
框=khuong [kuang4]\n\t1. Cai khuon, mot thu lam bang go cham tro cac loi de trang suc tuong vach va cua ngo. Cai vanh do gi cung goi la khuong. Nhu kinh khuong 鏡框 vanh guong.
案=an [an4]\n\t1. Cai ban. \n\t2. Cai mam. \n\t3. Khao xet, lam sach tu phat bieu y kien minh ra cung goi la an. \n\t4. Cac ban the le nha nuoc dinh lai le cu hay cac ban kien tung da quyet roi deu goi la an. Nhu cong an 公案, an ban 案本, v.v. \n\t5. Cam vung. Nhu an kiem 案劍 cam vung guom. \n\t6. Lan luot. Nhu an do nhu co 案堵如故 van lan luot yen nhu cu, tu nghia thu ba tro xuong cung mot nghia nhu chu an 按.
桌=trac [zhuo1]\n\t1. Cai dang.
桎=chat [zhi4]\n\t1 ; Cai cum chan. Nhu trat coc 桎梏 gong cum. Bi ngoai vat no bo buoc khong duoc tu do cung goi la trat coc.
桐=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Cay dong (cay vong), mot thu go dung de dong dan. \n\t2. Cay ngo dong, la to bang ban tay, hot an duoc. \n\t3. Cay du dong, qua co dau, ep lay dau dung duoc.
桑=tang [sang1]\n\t1. Cay dau, la dung de chan tam, qua chin an ngon goi la tang tham 桑葚. Kinh thi ve Trinh Phong co bai tho tang trung 桑中 che ke dam bon. Vi the ke dam bon goi la tang trung chi uoc 桑中之約, hay tang boc 桑濮, ta dich la tren boc trong dau, deu la che thoi dam dang ca. \n\t2. Tang tu 桑梓 que nha. Kinh Thi co cau duy tang du tu, tat cung kinh chi 惟桑與梓，必恭敬止 bui cay dau cung cay tu, at cung kinh vay, nghia la cay cua cha me trong thi phai kinh, vi the goi que cha dat to la tang tu. \n\t3. Tang du 桑榆 phuong tay, cho mat troi lan gan sat dat. Nhu that chi dong ngu, thu chi tang du 失之東隅，收之桑榆 mat o goc dong, thu lai goc tay, y noi moi ra lam lo sau lai den bu duoc vay. Tuoi gia suc yeu goi la tang du mo canh 桑榆暮景 bong nga canh dau.
桓=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Cai neu, dung de cam tren nha va mo ma. Phep nha Han tram lam bon goc dung mot cot go lon, giua lap van vuong, goi la hoan bieu 桓表, cung goi la hoa bieu 華表. \n\t2. Hoan hoan 桓桓 manh me, hang hai. Ta cai dang vo dong. \n\t3. Ban hoan 盤桓 quanh co. \n\t4. Cay hoan.
桔=ket [jie2|ju2]\n\t1. Ket canh 桔梗 co ket canh, dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Ket cao 桔槔 con quay dat o tren mat gieng de keo nuoc len cho de.
桕=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. O cuu 烏桕 cay o cuu, hot ep lay dau de lam nen.
桫=sa [suo1]\n\t1. Sa la 桫欏 cay sa la, sinh o nuoc Luu Cau.
桬=sa [suo1]\n\t1. Sa duong 桬棠 cay sa duong.
桮=boi [bei1]\n\t1. Cai chen, nay thong dung chu boi 杯.
桰=quat [kuo4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu quat 栝.
桲=bot [bo2]\n\t1. Ot bot 榲桲 cay ot bot, mot thu cay co qua an ngon.
桴=phu, phu [fu2]\n\t1. Cai xa nhi. \n\t2. Cai dui trong. \n\t3. Mot am la phu. Cai be.
桶=dung [tong3]\n\t1. Cai thung go vuong.
桷=giac [jue2]\n\t1. Cai xa vuong. \n\t2. Cai vo. \n\t3. Cot to.
桹=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Quang lang 桄桹 cay quang lang, trong loi cay co phan vang lam banh an duoc (mot loai cay giong cay dua). Cung viet quang lang 桄榔.
梁=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Cai cau, cho ach yeu cua su vat gi goi la tan luong 澤梁 nghia la nhu cai cau moi nguoi deu phai nho do ma qua vay. Cho dap bo de dom ca goi la ngu luong 魚梁. \n\t2. Cai xa nha. \n\t3. Cho go ghe cua mot vat gi cung goi la luong. Nhu ti luong 鼻梁 song mui, tich luong 脊梁 xuong song, do gi co chuoi de cam xach cho tien deu goi la luong ca. \n\t4. Luc luong 陸梁 chay tan loan, nay goi giac co la tieu xu khieu luong 小醜跳梁. \n\t5. Cuong luong 強梁 quat cuong, hung ho. \n\t6. Nha Luong. Luong Vu De 梁武帝 duoc nha Te trao ngoi cho lam vua goi la nha   Luong (502-507). Luong Thai To 梁太祖 duoc nha Duong trao ngoi cho lam vua goi la   nha Hau Luong (907-923). \n\t7. Nuoc Luong. \n\t8. Chau Luong, mot chau trong chin chau cua nuoc Tau ngay xua.
梃=dinh [ting3|ting4]\n\t1. Mot canh thang, vat gi co mot mat thang duon ra cung goi la dinh. \n\t2. Cai gay, cai con.
梅=mai [mei2]\n\t1. Cay mo, dau xuan da no hoa, co hai thu trang va do. Thu trang goi la luc ngac mai 綠萼梅, no het hoa roi moi nay la, qua chua, chin thi sac vang. Kinh Thu co cau nhuoc tac hoa canh, nhi duy diem mai 若作和羹，爾惟鹽梅 bang nau canh an, bui dung muoi mo. Nay goi quan Te tuong la dieu mai 調梅 hay hoa mai 和梅 la boi y do. Kinh Thi co tho phieu mai 摽梅 noi su trai gai lay nhau cap thoi, nay goi con gai sap di lay chong la boi co do. \n\t2. Mua, cac noi o phia dong nam ben be, dau mua he da doi gio hay mua ma vua gap luc mo chin nen goi mua ay la mai tiet 梅節.
梆=bang [bang1]\n\t1. Cai mo dai, duc thung lung cay go de o cac nha quan de lam hieu goi la bang. Trong khuc nhac cung co thu danh thanh tre lam dip, tuc goi la bang tu xoang 梆子腔.
梏=coc [gu4]\n\t1. Cai cum tay. \n\t2. Roi loan, sach Manh tu noi. Da roi loan luong tam roi, thi khi tot khong con du nua, vi the nen nay goi nhung ke mat het thien luong la da khi coc vong 夜氣梏亡.
梐=be [bi4]\n\t1. Chu be 周梐 nguc tu.
梓=tu [zi3]\n\t1. Cay tu, dung de dong dan. \n\t2. Lam do go, co ao quan cua vua thien tu goi la tu cung 梓宮. \n\t3. Khac chu len ban go. \n\t4. Que cha dat to, cho lang sinh ra minh goi la tu ly 梓里 hay tang tu 桑梓. \n\t5. Cay kieu cao ma ngua len, cay tu thap ma cui xuong, nen goi cha con la kieu tu 喬梓.
梔=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Cay danh danh, hot no la chi tu 梔子 dung de nhuom va lam thuoc, co khi goi la son chi 山梔.
栀=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Cay danh danh, hot no la chi tu 梔子 dung de nhuom va lam thuoc, co khi goi la son chi 山梔.
梗=nganh [geng3]\n\t1. Canh cay. \n\t2. Canh beo, beo co canh khong re, noi tren mat nuoc, khong dinh vao dau, vi the goi cac nguoi bi troi giat la binh nganh 萍梗. \n\t2. Cay co dam vao nguoi goi la nganh, duong sa mac nghen goi la nganh tac 梗塞, lam ngan tro su gi goi la tac nganh 作梗, v.v. \n\t3. Ngang nganh. \n\t4. Nhanh khai, noi luoc qua su gi goi la nganh. \n\t5. Ngay thang. \n\t6. Benh.
條=dieu, thieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Canh nho, cay moi nay canh goi la truu dieu 抽條. Doi thai binh goi la phong bat minh dieu 風不鳴條 nghia la binh yen nhu gio lang chang rung canh. Dieu la cai canh non thang, nen nay goi cac van hoa thang than la lieu dieu 柳條, hinh voc dai ma nho (thon thon) la mieu dieu 苗條, deu la do nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Dieu ly (nganh tho). Nhu huu dieu bat van 有條不紊 co nganh tho khong roi, y noi nhu canh cay thang than ro rang khong co lon xon vay. \n\t3. Vat gi hep ma dai cung goi la dieu. Nhu ngu nhat dieu 魚一條 mot con ca, su nhat dieu 事一條 mot dieu do, vi the nen dang so noi tach ro tung viec goi la dieu tau 條奏, dieu tran 條陳, dieu le 條例, dieu uoc 條約, v.v. \n\t4. Tieu dieu, noi canh tuong tieu dieu nhu la rung trui chi con canh lo tho vay. \n\t5. Mot am la thieu. Canh rung, canh cay gay ra.
条=dieu, thieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Canh nho, cay moi nay canh goi la truu dieu 抽條. Doi thai binh goi la phong bat minh dieu 風不鳴條 nghia la binh yen nhu gio lang chang rung canh. Dieu la cai canh non thang, nen nay goi cac van hoa thang than la lieu dieu 柳條, hinh voc dai ma nho (thon thon) la mieu dieu 苗條, deu la do nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Dieu ly (nganh tho). Nhu huu dieu bat van 有條不紊 co nganh tho khong roi, y noi nhu canh cay thang than ro rang khong co lon xon vay. \n\t3. Vat gi hep ma dai cung goi la dieu. Nhu ngu nhat dieu 魚一條 mot con ca, su nhat dieu 事一條 mot dieu do, vi the nen dang so noi tach ro tung viec goi la dieu tau 條奏, dieu tran 條陳, dieu le 條例, dieu uoc 條約, v.v. \n\t4. Tieu dieu, noi canh tuong tieu dieu nhu la rung trui chi con canh lo tho vay. \n\t5. Mot am la thieu. Canh rung, canh cay gay ra.
梟=kieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Con chim kieu, mot giong chim du giong nhu loai cu vo, ngay nup trong hang, dem mo chim chuot an thit, an thit ca me de. Con kieu 梟 an thit me, con pha kinh 破獍 (giong muong) an thit bo, con pha kinh nguoi ta con goi la no la con kinh 獍, vi the nen goi ke bat hieu la kieu kinh 梟獍. \n\t2. Hinh kieu, mot thu hinh chem dau roi beu len tren cay. \n\t3. Manh me nhu kieu kiet 梟傑 nguoi manh gioi, kieu ky 梟騎 quan ky manh, v.v. \n\t4. Tuc goi su buon muoi lau la diem kieu 鹽梟.
枭=kieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Con chim kieu, mot giong chim du giong nhu loai cu vo, ngay nup trong hang, dem mo chim chuot an thit, an thit ca me de. Con kieu 梟 an thit me, con pha kinh 破獍 (giong muong) an thit bo, con pha kinh nguoi ta con goi la no la con kinh 獍, vi the nen goi ke bat hieu la kieu kinh 梟獍. \n\t2. Hinh kieu, mot thu hinh chem dau roi beu len tren cay. \n\t3. Manh me nhu kieu kiet 梟傑 nguoi manh gioi, kieu ky 梟騎 quan ky manh, v.v. \n\t4. Tuc goi su buon muoi lau la diem kieu 鹽梟.
梠=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Cai nguong cua, cai xa ngang tren cua.
梢=sao, tieu [sao4|shao1]\n\t1. Ngon cay, su gi da ket cuc roi goi la thu sao 收梢. \n\t2. Cai doc lai thuyen. Nhu sao cong 梢公 nguoi lai do. \n\t3. Cai can. \n\t4. Mot am la tieu. Cai ngoi bi nuoc chay xoi rong dan ra.
梦=mong [meng4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu mong 夢.
梧=ngo, ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Ngo dong 梧桐 cay ngo dong. \n\t2. Chi ngo 枝梧 chong choi, co khi viet la chi ngo 支吾. \n\t3. Mot am la ngo. Nhu khoi ngo 魁梧 vam vo, lanh mau. Ta quen doc la chu ngo ca.
梨=le [li2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu le 棃.
梭=toa, thoa [suo1]\n\t1. Cai thoi det cui, cai thoi no di lai rat nhanh, nen noi den thi gio nhanh chong goi la nhat nguyet nhu toa 日月如梭 ngay thang nhu thoi dua. \n\t2. Quan chuc di lai doc suat binh phu goi la toa tuan 梭巡. Ta quen doc la chu thoa.
械=gioi [xie4]\n\t1. Do khi gioi. Nhu binh gioi 兵械 do binh. \n\t2. Cai cum chan tay. \n\t3. Thuat kheo, nguoi hay doi da goi la ky gioi bach xuat 機械白出 doi tra tram dieu. \n\t4. Bo buoc.
梱=khon, khon, ngon [kun3]\n\t1. Cai chot cua, tuc la cai cua ga khi khep hai canh roi keo lai cho canh cua chat lai. \n\t2. Mot am la khon. Deu, xap cho bang deu. \n\t3. Lai mot am la ngon. Ten cay.
梲=chuyet [zhuo2]\n\t1. Cai cot ngan tren xa (cot tru).
梳=so [shu1]\n\t1. Chai dau. \n\t2. Cai luoc thua.
梵=pham [fan4]\n\t1. Net lam cho thanh tinh. Phat giao lay thanh tinh lam ton chi, cho nen su gi co quan thiep den Phat deu goi la pham. Nhu pham cung 梵宮 cai cung tho Phat, pham chung 梵眾 cac chu su, pham am 梵音 tieng pham, v.v. \n\t2. Pham thien 梵天, mot buc tu da sach het tinh duc, sieu thang coi sac. Vi chua te nay goi la Pham vuong, lam thi gia Phat. \n\t3. Cung nghia nhu chu pham 范. 
梹=tan [-]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tan 檳.
棃=le [li2]\n\t1. Cay le. \n\t2. Duong Minh Hoang co tai am nhac, chon ba tram con em nha nghe vao day o trong vuon le, vi the ngay nay moi goi rap hat tuong la le vien 棃園. Tuc viet la 梨. \n\t3. Gia.
棄=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Quen, bo. Nhu nhan khi nga thu 人棄我取 nguoi bo ta lay, thoa khi nhat thiet 唾棄一切 vut bo het thay.
弃=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Quen, bo. Nhu nhan khi nga thu 人棄我取 nguoi bo ta lay, thoa khi nhat thiet 唾棄一切 vut bo het thay.
棉=mien [mian2]\n\t1. Cay bong, thu moc nhu co goi la thao mien 草棉 qua to nhu qua dao, chin thi nut soi bong ra, nguoi ta dung guong keo ra, xe lam soi de det vai, thu nhu than cay goi la moc mien 木棉 cao bay tam truong, mua xuan no hoa ket qua, trong qua co bong, dung lam chan dem duoc.
棋=ky, ki [qi2]\n\t1. Co, mot thu tro choi, hai ben bay quan danh nhau. Nhu the danh tran, ngay xua goi la tuong hi 象戲. \n\t2. Mot am la ki. Coi re.
棍=con [gun4]\n\t1. Cay con. \n\t2. Ke vo lai goi la con do 棍徒. Nhu do con 賭棍 con bac, tung con 訟棍 thay co, thay kien, v.v. \n\t3. Cai con, cai gay.
棐=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Giup. \n\t2. Cay phi, cung mot nghia nhu chu phi 榧.
棒=bong [bang4]\n\t1. Cai gay. \n\t2. Danh gay.
棖=tranh, tranh [cheng2]\n\t1. Cai bac cua. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu tranh 橙. \n\t3. Dung cham. Cung doc la tranh.
枨=tranh, tranh [cheng2]\n\t1. Cai bac cua. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu tranh 橙. \n\t3. Dung cham. Cung doc la tranh.
棗=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Cay tao.
枣=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Cay tao.
棘=cuc [ji2]\n\t1. Cay gai, mot thu cay go dan ruot do nhieu gai, hay moc ao nguoi, nguoi di duong rat so, cho nen duong xa hiem tro goi la kinh cuc 荊棘. Nhu kinh thien cuc dia 荊天棘地 troi dat chong gai, y noi loan lac khong cho nao yen vay, su gi kho lam duoc troi cung goi la cuc thu 棘手. Doi Ngu Dai hoc tro vao thi hay lam ram, quan trang bat trong gai kin ca xung quang trang thi, cam ra vao on ao, nen goi thi huong thi hoi la cuc vi 棘圍. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi la ba quan cong chin quan khanh la tam hoe cuu cuc 三槐九棘, vi the doi sau moi goi cac quan to la cuc. Nhu cuc khanh 棘卿, cuc thu 棘署 dinh quan khanh, v.v. \n\t3. Kip, Kinh Thi co cau khong cuc tha dai 孔棘且殆 rat kip va nguy, vi the nhung nguoi dang co tang tu xung la cuc nhan 棘人. 
棚=bang [peng2]\n\t1. Gac, nha rap. \n\t2. Phep quan ngay xua cu 14 nguoi goi la mot bang 棚.
棟=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Noc mai, noc la mot cai can nhat cua mot cai nha, nen mot cai nha cung goi la nhat dong 一棟. Vat gi nhieu lam goi la han nguu sung dong 汗牛充棟 mo hoi trau rui tren noc. \n\t2. Nguoi co tai ganh vac duoc viec quan trong lon cho nuoc (nhu te tuong) goi la dong luong 棟梁.
栋=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Noc mai, noc la mot cai can nhat cua mot cai nha, nen mot cai nha cung goi la nhat dong 一棟. Vat gi nhieu lam goi la han nguu sung dong 汗牛充棟 mo hoi trau rui tren noc. \n\t2. Nguoi co tai ganh vac duoc viec quan trong lon cho nuoc (nhu te tuong) goi la dong luong 棟梁.
棠=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Cay duong, co hai thu trang va do, thu do dan ma deo, doi xua dung dong can cung, thu trang co qua an duoc. Kinh Thi co cau. te phe cam duong 蔽芾甘棠 ruom ra cay cam duong, noi cho ong Trieu Ba 召伯 xu kien cho dan, nguoi sau luu lam cho ghi nho. Nay goi cai an trach cua quan dia phuong luu lai la cam duong 甘棠, la trieu duong 召棠 la boi co do. \n\t2. Cay sa duong 沙棠 go dung de dong thuyen.
棣=le, dai, the [di4]\n\t1. Cay thuong le 常棣, cay duong le 唐棣. \n\t2. Em, cung nghia nhu chu de 弟. Kinh Thi co tho Thuong le noi anh em an uong vui vay, vi the tuc muon lam chu de. \n\t3. Mot am la dai. Chinh te, ta cai ve khuon phep. \n\t4. Lai mot am la the. Thong suot.
棧=san, xien, tran, chan [zhan4]\n\t1. Cau treo, xep go lam duong goi la san dao 棧道. Nhung cho nui non hiem tro phai duc hai ben suon nui da ma bac van go lam duong di goi la san dao. \n\t2. Nha quan de xep hang hoa va cho khach tro goi la san. Nhu hoa san 貨棧 kho chua, khach san 客棧 quan tro. \n\t3. Xe bang tre. \n\t4. Mot am la xien. Cai chuong, dong tre go lam chuong cho giong muong o goi la xien. \n\t5. Mot am nua la tran. Cai chuong nho. \n\t6. Lai mot am nua la chan. Chan chan 棧棧 bum tum, ta cai ve tot tuoi va nhieu.
栈=san, xien, tran, chan [zhan4]\n\t1. Cau treo, xep go lam duong goi la san dao 棧道. Nhung cho nui non hiem tro phai duc hai ben suon nui da ma bac van go lam duong di goi la san dao. \n\t2. Nha quan de xep hang hoa va cho khach tro goi la san. Nhu hoa san 貨棧 kho chua, khach san 客棧 quan tro. \n\t3. Xe bang tre. \n\t4. Mot am la xien. Cai chuong, dong tre go lam chuong cho giong muong o goi la xien. \n\t5. Mot am nua la tran. Cai chuong nho. \n\t6. Lai mot am nua la chan. Chan chan 棧棧 bum tum, ta cai ve tot tuoi va nhieu.
棨=khe, khai [qi3]\n\t1. Cai kich boc lua hay son do. Cac hang vuong cong ngay xua di dau co linh cam kich boc lua hay son do di truoc cho oai goi la du kich 油戟 hay khe kich 棨戟. Nay ta goi ke sang den nha la khe kich dao lam 棨戟遙臨 la y do. Cung doc la chu khai.
棫=vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Cay vuc.
棬=khuyen, quyen [quan1]\n\t1. Bat dia dan bang may (cai moi). ta quen doc la chu quyen.
森=sam [sen1]\n\t1. Ram rap. Nhu sam lam 森林 rung ram, khi tuong am dam goi la tieu sam 蕭森 nghia la mo mit nhu o trong rung ram khong trong thay bong mat troi vay. \n\t2. Dong duc. Nhu sam lap 森立 dung san sat.
棱=lang [leng1|leng2|ling2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu lang 稜.
棲=te, the [qi1|xi1]\n\t1. Dau, nghi, te tri 棲遲 nghi ngoi, cho de nghi cung goi la te. \n\t2. Cai giuong. Nhu nhi tau su tri tram te 二嫂使治我棲 hai chi dau khien sua giuong ta. \n\t3. Te te 棲棲 ram rap, don dip, hap tap, ta cai dang xem tap xe ngua hap tap. Ta quen doc la chu the ca.
栖=te, the [qi1|xi1]\n\t1. Dau, nghi, te tri 棲遲 nghi ngoi, cho de nghi cung goi la te. \n\t2. Cai giuong. Nhu nhi tau su tri tram te 二嫂使治我棲 hai chi dau khien sua giuong ta. \n\t3. Te te 棲棲 ram rap, don dip, hap tap, ta cai dang xem tap xe ngua hap tap. Ta quen doc la chu the ca.
棵=khoa [ke1]\n\t1. Mot cay, mot goc.
棹=trao, trac [zhao4|zhuo1]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo. Nhu quy trao 歸棹 quay thuyen ve. \n\t2. Mot am la trac. Cai dang. Cung nhu chu trac 桌.
棺=quan, quan [guan1]\n\t1. Cai ao quan. \n\t2. Mot am la quan. Liem xac bo vao ao quan.
棼=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Cai xa ngan. \n\t2. Roi beng. \n\t3. Vai gai, vai bong. \n\t4. Ram rap.
椀=oan [wan3]\n\t1. Cai bat nho, cung mot nghia voi chu oan 盔. Tuc quen viet la oan 碗.
椁=quach [guo3]\n\t1. Cai quach, de boc ngoai ao quan. Co khi viet la quach 槨.
椅=y, y [yi1|yi3]\n\t1. Cay y. \n\t2. Mot am la y. Cai ghe dua.
椇=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cay cu, qua ngot nhu mat, nen cung goi la cay moc mat 木密.
椉=thua [cheng2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu thua 乘.
植=thuc, tri [zhi2]\n\t1. Cac loai co re. Nhu thuc vat 植物 cac cay co. \n\t2. Giong (trong). Nhu chung thuc 種植 giong giot (trong tia). \n\t3. Cam, tua. Nhu thuc ky truong nhi van 植其杖而芸 cam thua gay ma lam co ruong. \n\t4. Phu thuc, vun giong cho con em dong duc kha gia goi la boi thuc. \n\t5. Cai doi cua. \n\t6. Mot am la tri. Cai cot treo ne tam. \n\t7. Chuc coi xet.
椎=chuy [chui2|zhui1]\n\t1. Nen, danh. \n\t2. Cai vo. \n\t3. Cham chap, ngu don.
椏=nha [ya1]\n\t1. Chac cay.
桠=nha [ya1]\n\t1. Chac cay.
椐=cu, cu [ju1]\n\t1. Cay cu, mot ten la cay linh tho 靈壽 go dung lam gay chong, goi la linh tho truong 靈壽丈. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. Cay cu, cung nhu chu cu 櫸.
椒=tieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Cay tieu, hat no goi la hat tieu, dung lam do gia vi. Kinh Thi co cau tieu lieu chi thuc, phon dien doanh thang 椒聊之實，蕃衍盈升 qua cay tieu lieu, nuc niu day thung, vi the moi dung lam tieng de khen nguoi nhieu con chau. Doi xua cu nam moi thi uong ruou hat tieu goi la tieu ban 椒盤, cung cam dung hat tieu trat vao tuong vach cho thom va am, lai duoc tot lanh. Doi nha Han goi hoang hau la tieu phong 椒房, doi sau goi ho nha vua la tieu phong chi than 椒房之親 deu la y ay ca. Thu moc o cac nuoc ngoai goi la ho tieu 胡椒. \n\t2. Dinh nui.
椓=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Danh, dap, nen. \n\t2. Hinh cat dai, vi the nen hoan quan goi la trac.
椗=dinh [ding4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dinh 碇.
椰=gia [ye1]\n\t1. Cay dua.
椳=oi [wei1]\n\t1. Cai chot cua.
椶=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Tong lu 椶櫚 cay moc, cay co, la dung may ao toi, tua dung lam soi khau ao toi.
椷=giam, ham, ham [jian1]\n\t1. Cai hop. \n\t2. Cai phong bi tho, mot phong tho goi la nhat giam 一椷. \n\t2. Mot am la ham. Cai chen. \n\t3. Lai mot am la ham. Dong, chua.
椸=di [yi2]\n\t1. Cai mac ao.
椹=cham, tham [shen4|zhen4]\n\t1. Cai bua bo cui. \n\t2. Mot am la tham. Qua dau.
椽=chuyen [chuan2]\n\t1. Cai don tay.
椾=tien [jian1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tien 牋.
椿=xuan, thung [chun1]\n\t1. Cay xuan. Ong Trang tu noi doi xua co cay xuan lon, lay tam nghin nam lam mot mua xuan, tam nghin nam la mot mua thu, vi the nguoi ta hay dung chu xuan de chuc tho. Nay ta goi cha la xuan dinh 椿庭 cung theo y ay. Tuc doc la chu thung.
楂=tra [cha2]\n\t1. Cay tra, cung mot nghia voi chu tra 查. \n\t2. Tra tra 楂楂 tieng con chim bo cac keu.
楊=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Cay duong, cung giong cay lieu, co mot thu goi la bach duong 白楊 dung lam que diem.
杨=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Cay duong, cung giong cay lieu, co mot thu goi la bach duong 白楊 dung lam que diem.
楓=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Cay phong, la no den mua thu thi do dep, mua xuan thi no hoa xum xit nhu qua bong tron. Doi nha Han, hay giong cay phong o trong cung, vi the doi sau goi noi cung cam la phong than 楓宸 hay phong be 楓陛 la vi le do.
枫=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Cay phong, la no den mua thu thi do dep, mua xuan thi no hoa xum xit nhu qua bong tron. Doi nha Han, hay giong cay phong o trong cung, vi the doi sau goi noi cung cam la phong than 楓宸 hay phong be 楓陛 la vi le do.
楔=tiet [xie1]\n\t1. Cai bao cua, cai ngach cua. \n\t2. Lay vat nay keo vat kia ra goi la tiet. Nhu cac tieu thuyet mo dau thuong noi la tiet tu 楔子 la do nghia do. \n\t3. Chong do. \n\t4. Cai nem, mot cai do giup them suc manh trong mon trong hoc, tren bang phang ma day, duoi det ma nhon, de cho de pha vo duoc moi vat.
楘=moc [mu4]\n\t1. Lay da boc don xe cho dep goi la moc.
楙=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Tot tuoi, cung mot nghia voi chu mau 茂. \n\t2. Cay mau.
楚=so [chu3]\n\t1. Khom cay nho, bui gai. Gia so 夏楚 cai gay con dung de danh ke vo le. Lay roi ma danh nguoi cung goi la gia so. \n\t2. Bong choang, ao mu chinh te goi la te so 齊楚, su lam minh bach goi la thanh so 清楚. \n\t3. Dau don. Nhu toan so 酸楚 chua cay, dau don, kho so 苦楚 kho so, v.v. \n\t4. Nuoc So. \n\t5. Nay goi cac tinh Ho Nam, Ho Bac la dat So.
楛=ho, kho [hu4]\n\t1. Cay ho, doi xua dung lam ten. \n\t2. Mot am la kho, do dac xau xi dang loai ra goi la kho.
楝=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Cay xoan, qua no goi la kho luyen tu 苦楝子 dung lam thuoc ly, tuc goi la kim linh tu 金鈴子.
楞=lang [leng2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu lang 稜. \n\t2. Lang nghiem 楞嚴, lang gia 楞伽 kinh Lang-nghiem, kinh Lang-gia, hai bo kinh nghia ly rat cao tham trong nha Phat.
楠=nam [nan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nam 枏.
楡=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cay du.
楢=do [you2]\n\t1. Cay go mem, dung lam vanh xe va lay lua duoc.
楣=mi [mei2]\n\t1. Cai xa nhi. Nay goi la cai xa ngang gac tren cua, vi the nguoi ta goi be the nha la mon mi 門楣 nghia la coi cai cua to nho ma phan biet cao thap vay.
楥=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu 楦.
楦=tuyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Cai cot giay, cai cot bang go de go giay. Co khi viet la 楥.
楨=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Trinh can 楨榦 cai cot goc tuong. Truoc khi xay tuong, dong coc lam cot cho vung roi moi xay, goi la trinh. \n\t2. Coi goc. Nhu quoc chi trinh can 國之楨榦 nguoi lam can ban cho nha nuoc.
桢=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Trinh can 楨榦 cai cot goc tuong. Truoc khi xay tuong, dong coc lam cot cho vung roi moi xay, goi la trinh. \n\t2. Coi goc. Nhu quoc chi trinh can 國之楨榦 nguoi lam can ban cho nha nuoc.
楫=tiep [ji2]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo.
楬=kiet, ke [jie2]\n\t1. Cai coc moc, cai coc dong de lam neu mot su vat gi. ta quen doc la chu ke.
業=nghiep [ye4]\n\t1. Nghiep. Ngay xua cat mieng go ra tung khop de ghi cac viec hang ngay, xong mot viec bo mot khop, xong ca thi bo ca di, goi la tu nghiep 修業, nay di hoc o trang goi la tu nghiep, hoc het lop goi la tat nghiep 畢業 deu la noi nghia ay ca, noi rong ra thi pham viec gi cung deu goi la nghiep ca. Nhu hoc nghiep 學業, chuc nghiep 職業, v.v.. Cua cai ruong nuong cung goi la nghiep. Nhu gia nghiep 家業 nghiep nha, biet nghiep 別業 co nghiep rieng, v.v. \n\t2. Lam viec, nghe nghiep. Nhu nghiep nho 業儒 lam nghe hoc, nghiep nong 業農 lam ruong, v.v. \n\t3. Su da roi. Nhu nghiep di nhu thu 業已如此 nghiep da nhu the roi. \n\t4. So hai. Nhu cang cang nghiep nghiep 兢兢業業 dau dau so hai. \n\t5. Cai nhan. Nhu nghiep chuong 業障 nhan ac lam chuong ngai. Co ba nghiep khau nghiep 口業 nhan ac boi mieng lam ra, than nghiep 身業 nhan ac boi than lam ra, y nghiep 意業 nhan ac boi y lam ra, ba mon mieng, than, y goi la tam nghiep 三業, tuc nghiep 宿業 ac nghiep kiep truoc da lam kiep nay phai chiu kho goi la tuc nghiep, v.v. Lam thien cung goi la thien nghiep 善業. \n\t6. Cong nghiep. Nhu de nghiep 帝業 cong nghiep vua.
业=nghiep [ye4]\n\t1. Nghiep. Ngay xua cat mieng go ra tung khop de ghi cac viec hang ngay, xong mot viec bo mot khop, xong ca thi bo ca di, goi la tu nghiep 修業, nay di hoc o trang goi la tu nghiep, hoc het lop goi la tat nghiep 畢業 deu la noi nghia ay ca, noi rong ra thi pham viec gi cung deu goi la nghiep ca. Nhu hoc nghiep 學業, chuc nghiep 職業, v.v.. Cua cai ruong nuong cung goi la nghiep. Nhu gia nghiep 家業 nghiep nha, biet nghiep 別業 co nghiep rieng, v.v. \n\t2. Lam viec, nghe nghiep. Nhu nghiep nho 業儒 lam nghe hoc, nghiep nong 業農 lam ruong, v.v. \n\t3. Su da roi. Nhu nghiep di nhu thu 業已如此 nghiep da nhu the roi. \n\t4. So hai. Nhu cang cang nghiep nghiep 兢兢業業 dau dau so hai. \n\t5. Cai nhan. Nhu nghiep chuong 業障 nhan ac lam chuong ngai. Co ba nghiep khau nghiep 口業 nhan ac boi mieng lam ra, than nghiep 身業 nhan ac boi than lam ra, y nghiep 意業 nhan ac boi y lam ra, ba mon mieng, than, y goi la tam nghiep 三業, tuc nghiep 宿業 ac nghiep kiep truoc da lam kiep nay phai chiu kho goi la tuc nghiep, v.v. Lam thien cung goi la thien nghiep 善業. \n\t6. Cong nghiep. Nhu de nghiep 帝業 cong nghiep vua.
楮=chu [chu3]\n\t1. Cay ro, vo dung lam giay. Nhu chu mac nan tan 楮墨難盡 giay ngan noi kho het loi. \n\t2. Tien giay. Nhu minh chu 冥楮 giay ma. Tuc doc la chu do.
楳=ki [mei2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu ky 棋.
極=cuc [ji2]\n\t1. Cai noc nha, nay goi cac su vat gi rat cao la cuc la boi nghia do. \n\t2. Truoc khi troi dat chua chia ranh re goi la thai cuc 太極, ngoi vua goi la hoang cuc 皇極, vua len ngoi goi la dang cuc 登極 deu la y noi rat cao khong ai hon nua. \n\t3. Phan cuc hai dau qua dat goi la cuc. Phan ve phia nam goi la nam cuc 南極, phan ve phia bac goi la bac cuc 北極. \n\t4. Cung cuc. Nhu on cha me goi la vong cuc chi an 罔極之恩 nghia la cai on khong cung. Nhu cuc ngon ky loi 極言其利 noi cho het cai loi, v.v. \n\t5. Moi met. Nhu tieu cuc 小極 hoi met. \n\t6. Su xau nhat, kho nhat. \n\t7. Tron, het, muoi nam goi la mot cuc. \n\t8. Den. \n\t9. Cung nghia voi chu cuc 亟. 
极=cuc [ji2]\n\t1. Cai noc nha, nay goi cac su vat gi rat cao la cuc la boi nghia do. \n\t2. Truoc khi troi dat chua chia ranh re goi la thai cuc 太極, ngoi vua goi la hoang cuc 皇極, vua len ngoi goi la dang cuc 登極 deu la y noi rat cao khong ai hon nua. \n\t3. Phan cuc hai dau qua dat goi la cuc. Phan ve phia nam goi la nam cuc 南極, phan ve phia bac goi la bac cuc 北極. \n\t4. Cung cuc. Nhu on cha me goi la vong cuc chi an 罔極之恩 nghia la cai on khong cung. Nhu cuc ngon ky loi 極言其利 noi cho het cai loi, v.v. \n\t5. Moi met. Nhu tieu cuc 小極 hoi met. \n\t6. Su xau nhat, kho nhat. \n\t7. Tron, het, muoi nam goi la mot cuc. \n\t8. Den. \n\t9. Cung nghia voi chu cuc 亟. 
楷=giai, khai [jie1|kai3]\n\t1. Cay giai. \n\t2. Mot am la khai. Khuon phep, mau. \n\t2. Chu chan, chu viet ngay ngan ro rang goi la khai thu 楷書.
楸=thu [qiu1]\n\t1. Cay thu, go dung dong ban co dep, nen cuoc co cung goi la thu binh 楸枰.
楹=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Cai cot, tinh xem nha co may gian goi la ky doanh 幾楹.
概=khai [gai4]\n\t1. Gat phang. \n\t2. Can luong, phan luong, nguoi co tiet thao goi la tiet khai 節概 hay phong khai 風概 deu chi ve phan khi cuc ma noi ca. \n\t3. Bao quat, tom tat. Nhu nhat khai 一概, dai khai 大概, nganh khai 梗概 deu la y tom tat ca. \n\t4. Cai chen dung ruou. \n\t5. Bang, yen. \n\t6. Canh tuong. \n\t7. Cung nghia voi chu khai 槩.
榑=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Phu tang 榑桑 cay go than, cho mat troi moc ra, nay thong dung chu 扶.
榔=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Tan lang 檳榔 cay cau. \n\t2. Quang lang 桄榔 cay quang lang.
榕=dong [rong2]\n\t1. Cay dong, mot loai cay nhu cay si.
榖=coc [gu3]\n\t1. Cay coc, vo cay dung lam giay.
榘=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cu 矩.
榛=tran [zhen1]\n\t1. Cay tran. \n\t2. Bui cay. \n\t3. Bum tum, vuong vit.
榜=bang [bang3]\n\t1. Cheo thuyen len, cho nen goi lai do la bang nhan 榜人. \n\t2. Danh, hinh danh truong goi la bang luoc 榜掠. \n\t3. Cai bang yet thi. Pham thi cu hoc tro, ken chon quan lai hay cong cu cac nghi vien, ai duoc thi yet ten ho len bang cho moi nguoi deu biet deu goi la bang ca. Hai ben cung tang boc nhau goi la ho tuong tieu bang 互相標榜 deu theo cai y nghia boc lo cho moi nguoi biet ca.
榤=kiet [jie2]\n\t1. Cot buoc cac suc vat.
榦=can, han [gan4]\n\t1. Trinh can 楨榦 cai cot goc tuong. \n\t2. Goc cay. \n\t3. Cai lan can chan gieng, cung doc la chu han.
榧=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Cay phi, hot no co nhan an duoc.
榨=tra [zha4]\n\t1. Tra sang 榨床 cai ban ep dau.
榫=chuan [sun3]\n\t1. Tra ngam, got go cho vao ngam vao mong.
榭=ta [xie4]\n\t1. San, nha tap vo, cai dai co nha o goi la ta.
榮=vinh [rong2]\n\t1. Mai cong. \n\t2. Tuoi tot. \n\t3. Ve vang. Nhu vinh dieu 榮耀, vinh hoa 榮華, v.v. \n\t4. Mau. Nhu vinh ve 榮衞 vinh la mau, ve la khi. \n\t5. Cay vinh, ten rieng cua cay dong.
荣=vinh [rong2]\n\t1. Mai cong. \n\t2. Tuoi tot. \n\t3. Ve vang. Nhu vinh dieu 榮耀, vinh hoa 榮華, v.v. \n\t4. Mau. Nhu vinh ve 榮衞 vinh la mau, ve la khi. \n\t5. Cay vinh, ten rieng cua cay dong.
榱=suy [cui1]\n\t1. Cai rui (cai rui dong tren mai de moc ngoi giat la vao).
榲=ot [wen1]\n\t1. Ot bot 榲桲 cay ot bot, mot thu cay co qua an ngon.
榷=cac, giac [que4]\n\t1. Cai cau doc moc. \n\t2. Phep danh thue, mot phep ly tai cam dan khong duoc lam de rieng nha nuoc ban lay loi, cung nhu sang song chi co mot cay go. Cung doc la chu giac.
榻=thap [ta4]\n\t1. Cai giuong hep ma dai.
榼=khap [ke4]\n\t1. Cai coc, do dung ruou.
榾=cot [gu3]\n\t1. Cot do 榾柮 mau go.
槀=cao [gao3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cao 槁.
槁=cao [gao3]\n\t1. Kho. \n\t2. Go kho.
槃=ban [pan2]\n\t1. Cai mam go. \n\t2. Vui vay.
槅=cach, hach [ge2]\n\t1. Cai don xe to. \n\t2. Mot am la hach, cung mot nghia voi chu 核.
槊=soc, sao [shuo4]\n\t1. Cai giao dai. Ta quen doc la chu sao. \n\t2. Mot tro danh co.
構=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Dung nha, con noi nghiep cha goi la khang duong khang cau 肯堂肯構. \n\t2. Gay nen, xay dap, cau tao. \n\t3. Nha to. \n\t4. Nen, thanh. \n\t5. Xui nguyen duc bi. \n\t6. Cham choc, phan re.
构=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Dung nha, con noi nghiep cha goi la khang duong khang cau 肯堂肯構. \n\t2. Gay nen, xay dap, cau tao. \n\t3. Nha to. \n\t4. Nen, thanh. \n\t5. Xui nguyen duc bi. \n\t6. Cham choc, phan re.
槌=chuy [chui2]\n\t1. Cai vo lon. \n\t2. Danh, dap, nen.
槍=thuong, sanh [qiang1]\n\t1. Deo go lam do binh. \n\t2. Cai sung. \n\t3. Coc rao. \n\t4. Rap. Nhu dau thuong dia 頭槍地 rap dau sat xuong dat. \n\t5. Mot am la sanh. Nhu sam sanh 欃槍 sao choi.
枪=thuong, sanh [qiang1]\n\t1. Deo go lam do binh. \n\t2. Cai sung. \n\t3. Coc rao. \n\t4. Rap. Nhu dau thuong dia 頭槍地 rap dau sat xuong dat. \n\t5. Mot am la sanh. Nhu sam sanh 欃槍 sao choi.
槎=tra [cha2]\n\t1. Chat, chat ngang, phat cay, bo cay. \n\t2. Cai be.
槐=hoe [huai2]\n\t1. Cay hoe, ngay xua goi ba quan cong chin quan khanh la tam hoe cuu cuc 三槐九棘 vi the doi sau goi cac quan khanh tuong la thai hoe 台槐 hay hoe tinh 槐省. Lai goi canh chiem bao la hoe an quoc 槐安國 (giac hoe). Xem chu kha 柯 o tren.
槑=mai [mei2]\n\t1. Chu mai 梅 ngay xua.
槓=cong [gang4]\n\t1. Cong han 槓桿 cai kich (levier), mot thu do nghe de giup suc trong mon trong hoc 重學.
槥=tue [hui4]\n\t1. Cai ao quan nho.
槧=tam, thiem [qian4]\n\t1. Cai vat viet, nay goi la ban in go la tam, ban cu goi la co tam 古槧. Cung doc la thiem.
椠=tam, thiem [qian4]\n\t1. Cai vat viet, nay goi la ban in go la tam, ban cu goi la co tam 古槧. Cung doc la thiem.
槨=quach [guo3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quach 椁.
椁=quach [guo3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quach 椁.
槩=khai [gai4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khai 概.
槭=tuc, sac [qi4]\n\t1. Cay tuc. \n\t2. Mot am la sac. La cay rung.
槱=duu [you3]\n\t1. Chat cui lai ma dot.
槲=hoc [hu2]\n\t1. Cay hoc.
槳=tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo nho.
桨=tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo nho.
槹=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Ket cao 桔槔 con quay dat o tren mat gieng de keo nuoc len cho de.
槼=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quy 規.
槽=tao [cao2]\n\t1. Cai mang cho giong muong an. \n\t2. Cai gac day dan ty ba. \n\t3. Cai gi hai ben cao ma giua trung deu goi la tao. Nhu nghien tao 研槽 cai thuyen tan, duc tao 浴槽 cai bon de tam. \n\t4. Tuu tao 酒槽 cai do dung ruou. \n\t5. Ten cay go mem.
槿=can [jin3]\n\t1. Cay can, tuc la cay dam but.
樁=thung [zhuang1]\n\t1. Danh dap. \n\t2. Mot am la trang. Cai coc.
桩=thung [zhuang1]\n\t1. Danh dap. \n\t2. Mot am la trang. Cai coc.
樂=nhac, lac, nhao [le4|yue4]\n\t1. Nhac, ngu am bat thanh deu goi la am nhac ca. \n\t2. Mot am la lac. Vui, thich. \n\t3. Lai mot am la nhao. Yeu thich. Nhu tri gia nhao thuy 知者樂水 ke tri thich nuoc.
乐=nhac, lac, nhao [le4|yue4]\n\t1. Nhac, ngu am bat thanh deu goi la am nhac ca. \n\t2. Mot am la lac. Vui, thich. \n\t3. Lai mot am la nhao. Yeu thich. Nhu tri gia nhao thuy 知者樂水 ke tri thich nuoc.
樅=tung [cong1|zong1]\n\t1. Cay tung. \n\t2. Chot vot. \n\t3. Khua, danh.
枞=tung [cong1|zong1]\n\t1. Cay tung. \n\t2. Chot vot. \n\t3. Khua, danh.
樊=phien, phan [fan2]\n\t1. Cai long chim. \n\t2. La cai phen quay vuon rau. \n\t3. Phien nhien 樊然 boi roi, hon tap. \n\t4. Quay quanh. \n\t5. Day thang dai ngua. ta quen doc la chu phan.
樑=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu luong 梁.
樓=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Nha lau, pham vat gi co tung tren deu goi la lau.
楼=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Nha lau, pham vat gi co tung tren deu goi la lau.
樗=xu [chu1]\n\t1. Cay xu, cay go khong dung duoc viec gi, nen bay gio tu noi nhun minh la xu tai 樗材 ke vo tai.
標=tieu, phieu [biao1]\n\t1. Ngon, doi lai voi chu ban 本. Nhu tieu ban 標本 ngon goc, cap tac tri tieu 急則治標 kip thi chua cai ngon, v.v. \n\t2. Cai neu, ngay xua lam le dau ho xong, ai duoc thi dung tieu cho nguoi ay, vi the nen ganh lay duoc thua goi la doat tieu 奪標. Co cong viec gi lap mot cach thuc dinh cho nguoi bo tham de quyet dinh nen chang duoc hong goi la dau tieu 投標 bo tham, bo phieu. \n\t3. Neu len. Nhu tieu xi 摽幟 neu mot cai gi cho khac han moi cai cho nguoi ta de biet. Tu cho minh la khac nguoi goi la cao tu tieu thu 高自標樹, la cao tieu 高標, thanh tieu 清標 deu la cai y tu cao ca, cung xung tung nhau goi la tieu bang 標榜. \n\t4. Viet. Nhu tieu de 標題 de chu len tren cai neu de lam dau hieu cho de nho de nhan. \n\t5. Cai tieu, mot thu do binh, cung mot nghia voi chu 鏢. Bao ho cho nguoi di duong duoc binh yen goi la bao tieu 保標. \n\t6. Phep quan nha Thanh cu ba dinh goi la mot tieu, so quan cung goi la tieu. \n\t7. Canh cay. Tuc doc la chu phieu.
标=tieu, phieu [biao1]\n\t1. Ngon, doi lai voi chu ban 本. Nhu tieu ban 標本 ngon goc, cap tac tri tieu 急則治標 kip thi chua cai ngon, v.v. \n\t2. Cai neu, ngay xua lam le dau ho xong, ai duoc thi dung tieu cho nguoi ay, vi the nen ganh lay duoc thua goi la doat tieu 奪標. Co cong viec gi lap mot cach thuc dinh cho nguoi bo tham de quyet dinh nen chang duoc hong goi la dau tieu 投標 bo tham, bo phieu. \n\t3. Neu len. Nhu tieu xi 摽幟 neu mot cai gi cho khac han moi cai cho nguoi ta de biet. Tu cho minh la khac nguoi goi la cao tu tieu thu 高自標樹, la cao tieu 高標, thanh tieu 清標 deu la cai y tu cao ca, cung xung tung nhau goi la tieu bang 標榜. \n\t4. Viet. Nhu tieu de 標題 de chu len tren cai neu de lam dau hieu cho de nho de nhan. \n\t5. Cai tieu, mot thu do binh, cung mot nghia voi chu 鏢. Bao ho cho nguoi di duong duoc binh yen goi la bao tieu 保標. \n\t6. Phep quan nha Thanh cu ba dinh goi la mot tieu, so quan cung goi la tieu. \n\t7. Canh cay. Tuc doc la chu phieu.
樛=cu [jiu1]\n\t1. Cay cu (cay si).
樝=tra [zha1]\n\t1. Cay tra, qua an duoc.
樞=xu [shu1]\n\t1. Cai then cua, cai chot cua. \n\t2. Co quan o trung uong, chuc quan giu ve quan chinh goi la xu mat 樞密. \n\t3. Cay xu. \n\t4. Sao xu, ngoi sao thu nhat trong sao bac dau.
枢=xu [shu1]\n\t1. Cai then cua, cai chot cua. \n\t2. Co quan o trung uong, chuc quan giu ve quan chinh goi la xu mat 樞密. \n\t3. Cay xu. \n\t4. Sao xu, ngoi sao thu nhat trong sao bac dau.
樟=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Cay chuong, co mui thom, cat ra tung mieng cho vao dun, hoi boc len ket thanh phan trang goi la chuong nao 樟腦 dung de lam thuoc va tru trung.
模=mo [mo2|mu2]\n\t1. Khuon mau. Nhu mo pham 模範, mo dang 模樣, v.v. \n\t2. Mo ho 模糊 lo mo. Tuc viet la 糢糊.
樣=dang [yang4]\n\t1. Hinh dang, che tao do gi cung co cai mau de coi goi la dang. \n\t2. Loai, thu. Nhu ky dang 幾樣 may thu. \n\t3. Mot tieng xung ho kinh trong ben Nhat Ban. Nhu mo dang 某樣 cung nhu ta noi ong la ngai vay.
样=dang [yang4]\n\t1. Hinh dang, che tao do gi cung co cai mau de coi goi la dang. \n\t2. Loai, thu. Nhu ky dang 幾樣 may thu. \n\t3. Mot tieng xung ho kinh trong ben Nhat Ban. Nhu mo dang 某樣 cung nhu ta noi ong la ngai vay.
樨=te [xi1]\n\t1. Nguoi Giang Nam goi que la moc te 木樨.
樲=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Cay nhi, thu cay nho ma dang khinh.
樵=tieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Cui. \n\t2. Kiem cui. Ke kiem cui goi la tieu phu 樵夫. \n\t3. Dot chay.
樷=tung [cong2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tung 叢.
樸=phac, boc [po4]\n\t1. Moc mac. \n\t2. Deo, got. \n\t3. Pham do dac dang lam chua xong deu goi la phac. \n\t4. Mot am la boc. Cay boc.
樹=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Cay. \n\t2. Cai binh phong che cua. Nhu bang quan thu tac mon 邦君樹塞門 vua dung binh phong che cua. \n\t3. Trong trot (trong tia). \n\t4. Thu lap (dung nen). Nhu kien thu 建樹 sang lap het thay cac cai. \n\t5. Ten so vat.
树=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Cay. \n\t2. Cai binh phong che cua. Nhu bang quan thu tac mon 邦君樹塞門 vua dung binh phong che cua. \n\t3. Trong trot (trong tia). \n\t4. Thu lap (dung nen). Nhu kien thu 建樹 sang lap het thay cac cai. \n\t5. Ten so vat.
樺=hoa [hua4]\n\t1. Cay hoa, go no che nho boi sap vao thap lam duoc duoc, vi the goi la hoa chuc 樺燭 duoc hoa.
桦=hoa [hua4]\n\t1. Cay hoa, go no che nho boi sap vao thap lam duoc duoc, vi the goi la hoa chuc 樺燭 duoc hoa.
樽=ton [zun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ton 尊 nghia la cai chen.
樾=viet [yue4]\n\t1. Cho bong rop cua hai cay ru xuong goi la viet, chiu de cho nguoi ta che cho cho goi la viet am 樾蔭, kinh Phat goi nguoi bo thi cau cho qua be kho goi la dan viet 檀越, cung co khi viet chu viet nay 樾.
橄=cam [gan3]\n\t1. Cam lam 橄欖 cay tram.
橅=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu mo 模.
橇=khieu [qiao1]\n\t1. Mot thu do di tren bun, hinh nhu cai sot, hai dau venh len, mot chan quy vao trong, mot chan day di.
橈=nao, nhieu [rao2]\n\t1. Cong, chiu uon minh theo nguoi. \n\t2. Be gay. \n\t3. Yeu. \n\t4. Tan, pha tan. \n\t5. Mot am la nhieu. Mai cheo, do thuyen lai goi la dinh nhieu 停橈. 
桡=nao, nhieu [rao2]\n\t1. Cong, chiu uon minh theo nguoi. \n\t2. Be gay. \n\t3. Yeu. \n\t4. Tan, pha tan. \n\t5. Mot am la nhieu. Mai cheo, do thuyen lai goi la dinh nhieu 停橈. 
橊=luu, luu [liu2]\n\t1. Cay luu, ta quen goi la cay luu. Qua no nhieu hat, nen nhieu con trai goi la luu tu 橊子. Hoa no sac do nen vat gi do cung hay vi nhu luu. Nhu luu quan 橊裙 quan do, mua he nang du goi la luu hoa 橊火 lua luu. Ta quen doc la chu luu. Ngay nay thuong dung chu luu 榴.
橋=kieu, khieu, cao [qiao2]\n\t1. Cai cau (cau cao ma cong). \n\t2. Do gi co cai xa gac ngang o tren cung goi la kieu. \n\t3. Cai may hut nuoc. \n\t4. Cay cao. \n\t5. Cay kieu, cha con goi la kieu tu 橋子, tuc hay viet la 喬. \n\t6. Mot am la khieu. Cai xe don thang, tuc la cai dang son. \n\t7. Lai mot am la cao. Nhanh nhen.
桥=kieu, khieu, cao [qiao2]\n\t1. Cai cau (cau cao ma cong). \n\t2. Do gi co cai xa gac ngang o tren cung goi la kieu. \n\t3. Cai may hut nuoc. \n\t4. Cay cao. \n\t5. Cay kieu, cha con goi la kieu tu 橋子, tuc hay viet la 喬. \n\t6. Mot am la khieu. Cai xe don thang, tuc la cai dang son. \n\t7. Lai mot am la cao. Nhanh nhen.
橐=thac [tuo2]\n\t1. Cai tui khong co day. Con lac da 駱駝 co tui dung nuoc lai co buou de do tien, cho nen cung goi la con thac da 橐駝. \n\t2. Do ren duc. Nhu thac luoc 橐籥 cai be tho rao. \n\t3. Thac thac 橐橐 tieng chay gia chan chat.
橕=xanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Cai cot veo, cai cot cheo. Bay gio dung chu 撐.
橘=quat [ju2]\n\t1. Cay quat (cay quyt).
橙=chanh, sap [cheng2]\n\t1. Cay chanh. \n\t2. Mot am la dang. Cai ghe, cai sap. thuong viet la 凳.
橛=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Cai coc buoc suc vat. \n\t2. Cai ham thiet ngua. \n\t3. Chat, chat cay ra lam hai manh goi la luong quyet 兩橛.
機=ky, co [ji1]\n\t1. Cai nay, cai may, pham cai gi do day ma phat dong ra deu goi la ky. Nhu ky quan 機關, su ky 事機, v.v. \n\t2. Ky tru 機杼 cai may det, cai khung cui. \n\t3. Kheo leo bien tra. Nhu ky tam 機心 cai long bien tra kheo leo, ky bien 機變 tai bien tra, v.v. \n\t4. Then chot, cot yeu. Nhu quan ky 軍機 noi then chot ve viec quan. \n\t5. Co hoi. Nhu dau ky 投機 biet don truoc co hoi, thua ky 乘機 thua co hoi tot. \n\t6. Co khi (may moc). Nhu thuy ky 水機 may nuoc, phat dien ky 發電機 may phat dien, v.v. \n\t7. Chan tinh. \n\t8. May moc, co khi, goi tat la ky. Ta quen doc la co.
机=ky, co [ji1]\n\t1. Cai nay, cai may, pham cai gi do day ma phat dong ra deu goi la ky. Nhu ky quan 機關, su ky 事機, v.v. \n\t2. Ky tru 機杼 cai may det, cai khung cui. \n\t3. Kheo leo bien tra. Nhu ky tam 機心 cai long bien tra kheo leo, ky bien 機變 tai bien tra, v.v. \n\t4. Then chot, cot yeu. Nhu quan ky 軍機 noi then chot ve viec quan. \n\t5. Co hoi. Nhu dau ky 投機 biet don truoc co hoi, thua ky 乘機 thua co hoi tot. \n\t6. Co khi (may moc). Nhu thuy ky 水機 may nuoc, phat dien ky 發電機 may phat dien, v.v. \n\t7. Chan tinh. \n\t8. May moc, co khi, goi tat la ky. Ta quen doc la co.
橡=tuong [xiang4]\n\t1. Cay de, hat de. \n\t2. Cay cao-su, nguyen dich la chu tuong bi 像皮, tuc hay viet nham la 橡. 
橢=thoa [tuo3]\n\t1. Dai nhon, hinh trung, hinh tron ma dai goi la thoa vien 橢圓.
椭=thoa [tuo3]\n\t1. Dai nhon, hinh trung, hinh tron ma dai goi la thoa vien 橢圓.
橤=nhi [rui3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nhi 蕊.
橧=tang, tang [zeng1]\n\t1. Chat cui de o. \n\t2. Mot am la tang. Cho lon o, chuong lon.
橫=hoanh, hoanh, quang [heng2|heng4]\n\t1. Ngang, trai voi tieng doc. Doi Chien quoc co nha hoc ve loi ket lien sau nuoc de chong voi nuoc Tan goi la tung hoanh gia 縱橫家. \n\t2. Ben canh. Nhu hoanh xuat 橫出 dam chanh moc ngang ra. \n\t3. Cam ngang. Nhu hoanh dao 橫刀 cam ngang dao. \n\t4. Mot am la hoanh. Ngang nganh. Nhu hoanh hanh 橫行 lam ngang trai, hoanh nghich 橫逆 ngang nguoc, v.v. \n\t5. Lai mot am la quang. Hang hai.
横=hoanh, hoanh, quang [heng2|heng4]\n\t1. Ngang, trai voi tieng doc. Doi Chien quoc co nha hoc ve loi ket lien sau nuoc de chong voi nuoc Tan goi la tung hoanh gia 縱橫家. \n\t2. Ben canh. Nhu hoanh xuat 橫出 dam chanh moc ngang ra. \n\t3. Cam ngang. Nhu hoanh dao 橫刀 cam ngang dao. \n\t4. Mot am la hoanh. Ngang nganh. Nhu hoanh hanh 橫行 lam ngang trai, hoanh nghich 橫逆 ngang nguoc, v.v. \n\t5. Lai mot am la quang. Hang hai.
橱=thu [chu2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 樹.
檀=dan [tan2]\n\t1. Cay dan, lai co thu bach dan 白檀 va hoang dan 黃檀, mui go thom nuc goi la dan huong 檀香 hay tram bach, dung dot cho thom. Lai co thu tu dan 紫檀 go dan ma deo dung dong do rat quy. \n\t2. Nha Phat goi cac nguoi cung dang cau duoc qua coi kho la dan viet 檀越 hay dan na 檀那. \n\t3. Dan no 檀奴, dan lang 檀郎 tieng goi rieng nhung cau dep trai. \n\t4. Mui do lot.
檃=on [-]\n\t1. On quat 檃栝 cai do de nan cac do cong queo. Nan cho khoi cong la on, xan cho vuong la quat.
檄=hich [xi2]\n\t1. Loi hich, loi van cua cac quan doi hoi, hieu du hay trach cu dan goi la hich, co viec can kip thi viet vao manh van cam long ga vao goi la vu hich 羽檄 de to cho biet la su can kip.
檇=tuy [zui4]\n\t1. Nen, lay go ma nen. \n\t2. Tuy ly 檇李 mot thu cay thuoc ve loai man qua an ngon.
檉=sanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Cay sanh, mot cay ve loai cay lieu, mot ten la cay quan am lieu 觀音柳.
柽=sanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Cay sanh, mot cay ve loai cay lieu, mot ten la cay quan am lieu 觀音柳.
檎=cam [qin2]\n\t1. Lam cam 林檎 cay lam cam, mot thu cay an qua, tuc goi la hoa hong 花紅 hay sa qua 沙果.
檐=diem, thiem [yan2]\n\t1. Mai tranh, giot tranh. \n\t2. Vanh mu, ta quen doc la chu thiem.
檔=duong, dang [dang4]\n\t1. Cai phan. \n\t2. Mot am la dang. Ban an bang go mong viet van tu vao day, khi nhieu thi xau day vao lo treo len tuong de luu lai goi la dang an 檔案. 
档=duong, dang [dang4]\n\t1. Cai phan. \n\t2. Mot am la dang. Ban an bang go mong viet van tu vao day, khi nhieu thi xau day vao lo treo len tuong de luu lai goi la dang an 檔案. 
檜=coi [gui4|hui4]\n\t1. Cay coi, cung la mot loai thong. \n\t2. Nuoc coi.
桧=coi [gui4|hui4]\n\t1. Cay coi, cung la mot loai thong. \n\t2. Nuoc coi.
檝=tiep [ji2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tiep 楫.
檟=gia [jia3]\n\t1. Cay gia. \n\t2. Co khi dung nhu chu 榎.
檠=kenh [qing2]\n\t1. Cai do nan cung. \n\t2. Cai re den, chan den. \n\t3. Mot am la kinh. Cai gian.
檢=kiem [jian3]\n\t1. Danh dau, gan xi (cire) len phong tho roi dong dau vao goi la kiem. \n\t2. Kiem che, hanh dong khong co phep tac goi la bat kiem 不檢. \n\t3. Tra xet, luc xet. Nhu kiem diem 檢點 xet net, kiem thu 檢收 xet nhan, v.v. \n\t4. Khuon phep.
检=kiem [jian3]\n\t1. Danh dau, gan xi (cire) len phong tho roi dong dau vao goi la kiem. \n\t2. Kiem che, hanh dong khong co phep tac goi la bat kiem 不檢. \n\t3. Tra xet, luc xet. Nhu kiem diem 檢點 xet net, kiem thu 檢收 xet nhan, v.v. \n\t4. Khuon phep.
檣=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Cai cot buom.
樯=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Cai cot buom.
檬=mong [meng2]\n\t1. Ninh mong 檸檬 mot loai cay nhu cay chanh, che ra nuoc uong mat goi la ninh mong thuy 檸檬水 nuoc chanh.
檮=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Dao ngot 檮杌 ten mot giong ac thu. Ngay xua dung tieng ay de goi cac ke hu ac. \n\t2. Ngu dot, ngo ngan.
檯=dai [tai2]\n\t1. Cai dang, thuong viet la 抬.
檳=tan [bin1|bing1]\n\t1. Tan lang 檳榔 cay cau.
槟=tan [bin1|bing1]\n\t1. Tan lang 檳榔 cay cau.
檸=ninh [ning2]\n\t1. Ninh mong 檸檬 mot loai cay nhu cay chanh, che ra nuoc uong mat goi la ninh mong thuy 檸檬水 nuoc chanh. Ninh dau 檸頭 dau ngoam, dau mong.
柠=ninh [ning2]\n\t1. Ninh mong 檸檬 mot loai cay nhu cay chanh, che ra nuoc uong mat goi la ninh mong thuy 檸檬水 nuoc chanh. Ninh dau 檸頭 dau ngoam, dau mong.
檻=ham [jian4|kan3]\n\t1. Van lap duoi cua so hay mai hien. \n\t2. cai cui, xe tu goi la ham xa 檻車.
槛=ham [jian4|kan3]\n\t1. Van lap duoi cua so hay mai hien. \n\t2. cai cui, xe tu goi la ham xa 檻車.
檿=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Cay dau nui.
櫂=trao, trac [zhuo1]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo dai. \n\t2. Tieng goi chung ve thuyen be. \n\t3. Mot am la trac. Moc thang, ta cai dang canh cay dam thang len.
櫃=quy [gui4|ju3]\n\t1. Cai hom.
柜=quy [gui4|ju3]\n\t1. Cai hom.
櫉=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Cai hom chua.
櫍=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai ke chan. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu 鑕.
櫓=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Cai moc lon. \n\t2. Cai mai cheo thuyen.
橹=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Cai moc lon. \n\t2. Cai mai cheo thuyen.
櫚=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Cay lu (cay go gu) go dung dong do.
榈=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Cay lu (cay go gu) go dung dong do.
櫛=trat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai luoc. \n\t2. Go, chai toc, go toc, trat phong moc vu 櫛風沐雨 dai gio dam mua.
栉=trat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai luoc. \n\t2. Go, chai toc, go toc, trat phong moc vu 櫛風沐雨 dai gio dam mua.
櫜=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Cai tui, cai tui dung dao ao day hay ten deu goi la cao ca. \n\t2. Cho vao tui cat di.
櫝=doc [du2]\n\t1. Cai hom. \n\t2. Mai doc hoan chau 買櫝還珠 y noi chi cham be ngoai khong xet den su thuc o trong. \n\t3. Cai ao quan. \n\t4. Giau, cat.
椟=doc [du2]\n\t1. Cai hom. \n\t2. Mai doc hoan chau 買櫝還珠 y noi chi cham be ngoai khong xet den su thuc o trong. \n\t3. Cai ao quan. \n\t4. Giau, cat.
櫞=duyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Cau duyen 枸櫞 qua cau duyen.
橼=duyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Cau duyen 枸櫞 qua cau duyen.
櫟=lich, lao [li4|yue4]\n\t1. Cay lich. \n\t2. Mot thu nhu lan can. \n\t3. Mot am la lao. Nao, cao son sot.
栎=lich, lao [li4|yue4]\n\t1. Cay lich. \n\t2. Mot thu nhu lan can. \n\t3. Mot am la lao. Nao, cao son sot.
櫨=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Cai dau ke cot doi. \n\t2. Hoang lo 黃櫨 cay hoang lo.
栌=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Cai dau ke cot doi. \n\t2. Hoang lo 黃櫨 cay hoang lo.
櫪=lich [li4]\n\t1. Chuong ngua.
枥=lich [li4]\n\t1. Chuong ngua.
櫫=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Cai coc buoc suc vat. \n\t2. Yet tru 揭櫫 cam neu.
橥=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Cai coc buoc suc vat. \n\t2. Yet tru 揭櫫 cam neu.
櫬=san [chen4]\n\t1. Cai ao quan.
榇=san [chen4]\n\t1. Cai ao quan.
櫱=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Mam cay, cay chat roi mam lai troi len goi la nghiet.
櫳=long [long2]\n\t1. Cua mach, cua so. \n\t2. Cai long, cai cui, nay thong dung chu lung 籠.
栊=long [long2]\n\t1. Cua mach, cua so. \n\t2. Cai long, cai cui, nay thong dung chu lung 籠.
櫸=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cay cu.
榉=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cay cu.
櫺=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Cai chan song. \n\t2. La tau (la tau o dau cot de don mai nha).
棂=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Cai chan song. \n\t2. La tau (la tau o dau cot de don mai nha).
櫻=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Cay anh, cay anh dao 櫻桃 hoa do dep nen moi do goi la anh than 櫻脣.
樱=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Cay anh, cay anh dao 櫻桃 hoa do dep nen moi do goi la anh than 櫻脣.
欃=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Cay sam, sam sanh 欃槍 sao choi.
欄=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu lan 闌 nghia la cai lan can. \n\t2. Cai chuong trau de. \n\t3. Mot thu cay thuoc loai que, dung de ho lua.
栏=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu lan 闌 nghia la cai lan can. \n\t2. Cai chuong trau de. \n\t3. Mot thu cay thuoc loai que, dung de ho lua.
權=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Qua can. \n\t2. Can luong. \n\t3. Quyen bien 權變. Trai dao thuong ma phai le goi la quyen 權, doi voi chu kinh 經. \n\t4. Quyen binh, quyen han, quyen the. \n\t5. Quyen nghi, su gi hay tam lam the goi la quyen tha nhu thu 權且如此 tam thay viec cua chuc quan nao cung goi la quyen. \n\t6. Xuong go ma.
权=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Qua can. \n\t2. Can luong. \n\t3. Quyen bien 權變. Trai dao thuong ma phai le goi la quyen 權, doi voi chu kinh 經. \n\t4. Quyen binh, quyen han, quyen the. \n\t5. Quyen nghi, su gi hay tam lam the goi la quyen tha nhu thu 權且如此 tam thay viec cua chuc quan nao cung goi la quyen. \n\t6. Xuong go ma.
欏=la [luo2]\n\t1. Sa la 桫欏 cay sa la, sinh o nuoc Luu Cau.
椤=la [luo2]\n\t1. Sa la 桫欏 cay sa la, sinh o nuoc Luu Cau.
欒=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Loan loan 欒欒 gay go, rum ro. \n\t2. Tron xoe. \n\t3. Cay loan. \n\t4. Hai goc mieng chuong.
栾=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Loan loan 欒欒 gay go, rum ro. \n\t2. Tron xoe. \n\t3. Cay loan. \n\t4. Hai goc mieng chuong.
欖=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Cam lam 橄欖 cay tram.
榄=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Cam lam 橄欖 cay tram.
欛=ba [ba4]\n\t1. Chuoi dao.
欝=uat [yu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu uat 鬱.
欠=khiem [qian4]\n\t1. Ngap. Nhu khiem than 欠伸 vuon vai ngap. \n\t2. Thieu. Nhu khiem khuyet 欠缺 thieu thon. \n\t3. No. Nhu khiem truong 欠帳 con no.
次=thu [ci4]\n\t1. Lan luot, duoi bac tren tro xuong bet deu goi la thu. \n\t2. Xep bay. \n\t3. Thu buc. Nhu ban thu 班次 ke hang den thu buc minh ngoi. \n\t4. Lan. Nhu nhat thu 一次 mot lan. \n\t5. Tro, dong quan di den dau do lai den hai dem goi la thu. Di duong ngu tro goi la lu thu 旅次. \n\t6. Cho, noi. Nhu sai thu 差次 cho phai sai toi, hung thu 胸次 cho nguc, v.v. \n\t7. Trien thu 躔次 do so cua sao do lai. \n\t8. Den. Nhu thu cot 次骨 den xuong. \n\t9. Thao thu 造次 voi vang. \n\t10. Loai, buc.
欣=han [xin1]\n\t1. Mung, hon ho.
欬=khai, ai [ke2]\n\t1. Ho. \n\t2. Khanh khai 謦欬 cuoi noi. Trong thu tu hay dung. Nhu nhu than khanh khai 如親謦欬 nhu duoc giap mat ma tro chuyen voi nhau vay. \n\t3. Mot am la ai, cung nghia voi chu 噫.
欲=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Tham muon. \n\t2. Tinh duc. \n\t3. Yeu muon. \n\t4. Muon mong. Nhu dom duc dai 膽欲大 mat muon mong cho to. \n\t5. Sap muon. Nhu thien duc vu 天欲雨 troi sap muon mua. \n\t6. Mem mai, ta cai ve nhun nhuong thuan thu.
欵=khoan [kuan3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khoan 款.
欷=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Hu hy 歔欷 sui sut. \n\t2. Hy hu 欷吁 tho than.
欸=ai, ai [ai3]\n\t1. Oi ! Chao oi ! \n\t2. Mot am la ai, ai nai 欸乃.
欹=y [qi1|yi1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu y 猗.
欺=khi [qi1]\n\t1. Doi lua, lua minh, tu lua doi minh goi la tu khi 自欺. \n\t2. Lan, bi nguoi ta lan goi la khi phu 欺負.
欽=kham [qin1]\n\t1. Kinh. Nhu kham nguong 欽仰 kinh trong. \n\t2. Menh cua vua sai goi la kham menh 欽命. Van tu cua vua lam goi la kham dinh 欽定, v.v. \n\t3. Cong.
钦=kham [qin1]\n\t1. Kinh. Nhu kham nguong 欽仰 kinh trong. \n\t2. Menh cua vua sai goi la kham menh 欽命. Van tu cua vua lam goi la kham dinh 欽定, v.v. \n\t3. Cong.
款=khoan [kuan3]\n\t1. Thanh thuc. Nhu khon khoan 悃款 khan khoan, ta cai chi thuan nhat, thanh thuc. Man ro xin quy phuc goi la nap khoan 納款. \n\t2. Go. Nhu khoan mon 款門 go cua. \n\t3. Luu, thet dai. Nhu khoan khach 款客. \n\t4. Khoan. Nhu liet khoan 列款 chia ranh ra tung khoan. \n\t5. Chu khac lum xuong loai kim hay da goi la khoan, nay goi cac thu tieu de hay viet ve la khoan ca. \n\t6. Cham tre, hoan lai. \n\t7. Khong, hao.
欿=kham [kan3]\n\t1. Cai ho. \n\t2. Kham nhien 欿然 thuong vay, ta cai dang khong tu cay minh (khong len mat).
歃=sap [sha4]\n\t1. Uong, nuot. Nhu sap huyet 歃血 uong mau an the.
歆=ham [xin1]\n\t1. Huong, quy than huong lay hoi goi la ham. \n\t2. Ham mo, rung dong. Nhu ham dong nhat thoi 歆動一時 lam rung dong ca mot doi.
歇=hiet [xie1]\n\t1. Nghi, thoi, tieu tan. Dang lam viec ma tam nghi mot chut goi la sao hiet 稍歇, lam xong goi la hiet thu 歇手. \n\t2. Het. \n\t3. Thao ra, tiet ra.
歈=du [yu2]\n\t1. Hat. Loi hat xu Ngo.
歉=khiem [qian4]\n\t1. Khong no, con doi, nam mat mua goi la khiem. \n\t2. Kem, thieu. Pham cai gi khong duoc thoa thich deu goi la khiem.
歌=ca [ge1]\n\t1. Ngoi hat. Nhu ca thi 歌詩 ngam tho. \n\t2. Khuc hat, khuc hat hop voi am nhac goi la ca. \n\t3. Bai ca.
歎=than [tan4]\n\t1. Than tho. \n\t2. Tam tac khen. \n\t3. Ngan dai giong ra.
歐=au, au [ou1]\n\t1. Chau Au. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu au 謳. \n\t3. Mot am la la au. Non mua. \n\t5. Danh.
欧=au, au [ou1]\n\t1. Chau Au. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu au 謳. \n\t3. Mot am la la au. Non mua. \n\t5. Danh.
歔=hu [xu1]\n\t1. Hu hy 歔欷 sui sut.
歕=phun [pen1]\n\t1. Ha hoi ra, phun ra.
歗=khieu [xiao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khieu 叫. 
歙=hap, thiep [she4|xi1]\n\t1. Hut vao, cung mot nghia voi chu hap 吸. \n\t2. Ten dat. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu hap 翕. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu 脅. \n\t5. Mot am la thiep. Ten dat.
歟=du [yu2]\n\t1. Vay vay ! vay u ! tieng noi cuoi cung cac cau con ngo. \n\t2. U tieng dem, hay dung vao cho no ngat loi. Nhu thuy du 誰歟 ai u ?
欤=du [yu2]\n\t1. Vay vay ! vay u ! tieng noi cuoi cung cac cau con ngo. \n\t2. U tieng dem, hay dung vao cho no ngat loi. Nhu thuy du 誰歟 ai u ?
歠=xuyet [chuo4]\n\t1. Uong, noc.
歡=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Vui mung. \n\t2. Trai gai yeu nhau, ben gai goi ben trai la hoan, cung nhu tieng chang cua ta.
欢=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Vui mung. \n\t2. Trai gai yeu nhau, ben gai goi ben trai la hoan, cung nhu tieng chang cua ta.
止=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Dung lai. Nhu chi bo 止步 dung buoc. \n\t2. Thoi. Nhu cam chi 禁止 cam thoi. \n\t3. O, o vao cho nao goi la chi. Nhu tai chi u chi thien 在止於至善 (Dai hoc 大學) dat minh vao cho rat phai, hanh chi vi dinh 行止夫定 di hay o chua dinh, v.v. \n\t4. Dang dap. Nhu cu chi 舉止 cu dong, di dung. Noi toan the ca nguoi. \n\t5. Tieng giup loi. Nhu ky viet quy chi, hat huu hoai chi 旣曰歸止曷又懷止 da noi rang ve roi sao lai nho vay. \n\t6. Chi the. Nhu chi huu thu so 止有此數 chi co so ay, nay thong dung chu chi 衹. Doi xua dung nhu chu chi 趾 va chu chi 址.
正=chanh, chinh [zheng1|zheng4]\n\t1. Phai, la chanh dang. Nhu chanh thuc 正式 khuon phep chanh dang, chanh ly 正理 le chanh dang, v.v. Cai gi sai ma bao sua lai cho phai cung goi la chanh. Nhu khuong chanh 匡正 giup do lam cho chanh dang. \n\t2. Ngay, o giua. Nhu chanh dien 正面 mat chanh, chanh toa 正坐 ngoi chinh giua, chanh thinh 正廳 toa ngoi chinh giua, v.v. \n\t3. Ngay thang. Nhu cong chanh 公正 cong bang ngay thang, cac bac hien triet doi truoc goi la tien chanh 先正 cung theo nghia ay. \n\t4. Thuan chanh. Nhu chanh bach 正白 trang nguyen, chanh xich 正赤 do nguyen, v.v. \n\t5. Buc lon nhat. Nhu nhac chanh 樂正 chuc quan dau coi am nhac, cong chanh 工正 chuc quan dau coi ve cong tac, v.v. \n\t6. Chuc chanh, buc chanh, chuc chu ve mot viec. Nhu chanh tong 正總, pho tong 副總 phu giup chanh tong, chanh that pham 正七品, tong that pham 從七品 kem pham chanh, v.v. \n\t7. Dung giua. Nhu ty chanh 子正 dung giua gio ty, ngo chanh 午正 dung giua gio ngo, v.v. \n\t8. Tieng giup loi, nghia la, tuc la. Nhu chanh duy de tu bat nang hoc da 正惟弟子不能 學也 tuc la vi con khong hay hoc vay. \n\t9. Vat de lam co. \n\t10. Du. \n\t11. Chat chinh. \n\t12. Ngay ngan. \n\t13. Mong hen. \n\t14. Phan chinh. Phan nhieu cung doc la chu chinh. \n\t15. Mot am la chinh. Thang dau nam goi la chinh nguyet 正月 thang gieng. Ngay xua cac nha vua ho nay thay ho khac len tri vi lai doi ten rieng mot ngay lam ngay dau nam, nha Thuong thi dung ngay suu lam ngay dau nam, v.v. goi la chinh soc 正朔. Ta quen doc la chu chinh. \n\t16. Cai dich tap ban. Nhu chinh hoc 正鵠 giua dich, vi the nen khuon phep cua mot su vat gi cung goi la chinh hoc.
此=thu [ci3]\n\t1. Ay, ben ay, doi lai voi chu bi 彼. \n\t2. The, loi noi chi dinh han hoi. Nhu ky tu nham di thien ha trong nhu thu 其自任以天下之重如此 thua ganh vac lay cong viec nang ne trong thien ha nhu the. \n\t3. Ay, ben. Nhu huu duc thu huu nhan 有德此有人 (Dai hoc 大學) co duc ay (ben) co nguoi.\n\t1. Di bo, hai lan cat chan di goi la bo. Giua khoang hai chan cach nhau goi la nhat bo 一步 mot buoc. Hau Han thu chep rang. Tho Lang du tu hoc di o Han Dan, chua bat chuoc duoc ti gi da mat ca dang dap cu, vi the nen sau moi goi nhung ke hoc khong thanh cong la han dan hoc bo 邯鄲學步. \n\t2. Trinh do, coi. Nhu tien bo 進步 tien len coi hon, thoai bo 退步 sut xuong coi kem. \n\t3. Loi di. Nhu cai ngoc cai bo 改玉改步 nghia la thien tu, chu hau deu co phep nhat dinh khong the thay doi duoc, vi the cac ngoi cua thien tu goi la ngoc bo 玉步. \n\t4. Bo, tieng dung trong phep do. Cu nam thuoc la mot bo. \n\t5. Bai ven nuoc. Nhu qua chau 瓜州 cung la qua bo 瓜步, thong dung nhu chu phu 埠. \n\t6. Van. Nhu quoc bo gian nan 國步艱難 van nuoc gian nan. \n\t7. Suy tinh. Nhu thoi bo 推步 suy tinh thien van. \n\t8. Theo. Nhu bo van 步韻 theo van.
武=vu, vo [wu3]\n\t1. Vo, doi lai voi van 文. Lay uy suc ma phuc nguoi goi la vu. \n\t2. Vet chan, noi got. Nhu bo vu 步武 noi lam cong nghiep cua nguoi truoc. \n\t3. Khuc nhac vu. \n\t4. Mu linh. Ta quen doc la chu vo.
歧=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Duong re, pham su vat gi phat sinh ra khong duoc chinh thang deu goi la ky ca. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu ky 跂.
歪=oai, oa [wai1]\n\t1. Meo lech. Ta quen doc la chu oa.
歬=tien [qian2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tien 前.
歰=sap [se4]\n\t1. Rit, khan. Cai gi khong duoc tron tru deu goi la sap. \n\t2. Dinh, chat, vi gi an khong ngot va kho nuot deu goi la sap.
歱=chung [zhong3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu chung 踵.
歲=tue [sui4]\n\t1. Nam. \n\t2. Sao Tue, tuc la sao Moc tinh, muoi hai nam quanh het mot vong mat troi, cung goi la sao Thai Tue 太歲. \n\t3. Tuoi. \n\t4. Mua mang.
岁=tue [sui4]\n\t1. Nam. \n\t2. Sao Tue, tuc la sao Moc tinh, muoi hai nam quanh het mot vong mat troi, cung goi la sao Thai Tue 太歲. \n\t3. Tuoi. \n\t4. Mua mang.
歷=lich [li4]\n\t1. Trai qua. Nhu kinh lich 經歷, trai qua, duyet lich 閱歷 tung trai, v.v. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu lich 曆. \n\t3. Thu toi, thu den. \n\t4. Het. \n\t5. Vuot qua. \n\t6. Khap, ro rang, ranh mach. \n\t7. Thua. Nhu lich xi 歷齒 rang thua.
历=lich [li4]\n\t1. Trai qua. Nhu kinh lich 經歷, trai qua, duyet lich 閱歷 tung trai, v.v. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu lich 曆. \n\t3. Thu toi, thu den. \n\t4. Het. \n\t5. Vuot qua. \n\t6. Khap, ro rang, ranh mach. \n\t7. Thua. Nhu lich xi 歷齒 rang thua.
歸=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Ve. Nhu quy quoc 歸國 ve nuoc. \n\t2. Gia (tra) nhu cuu gia bat quy 久假不歸 muon lau khong gia (tra). \n\t3. Dua ve. Nhu quy toi 歸罪 do toi cho nguoi, co toi tu thu goi la tu quy 自歸. \n\t4. Quy phu, quy phuc. \n\t5. Con gai ve nha chong goi la vu quy 于歸. \n\t6. Tinh tru goi la quy phap 歸法. \n\t7. Dua lam qua. \n\t8. Ket cuc, quy tuc. \n\t9. Then. \n\t10. Gop lai.
归=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Ve. Nhu quy quoc 歸國 ve nuoc. \n\t2. Gia (tra) nhu cuu gia bat quy 久假不歸 muon lau khong gia (tra). \n\t3. Dua ve. Nhu quy toi 歸罪 do toi cho nguoi, co toi tu thu goi la tu quy 自歸. \n\t4. Quy phu, quy phuc. \n\t5. Con gai ve nha chong goi la vu quy 于歸. \n\t6. Tinh tru goi la quy phap 歸法. \n\t7. Dua lam qua. \n\t8. Ket cuc, quy tuc. \n\t9. Then. \n\t10. Gop lai.
歹=ngat, dai [dai3]\n\t1. Xuong tan. \n\t2. Tuc doc la chu dai. Toi, xau.
死=tu [si3]\n\t1. Chet. \n\t2. Cai gi khong hoat dong deu goi la tu. \n\t3. Tat, vac. Nhu tu hoi phuc nhien 死灰復然 tro vac lai chay, su gi da tuyet vong roi goi la tu tam thap dia 死心塌地.
歾=mot [mei2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu mot 沒.
歿=mot [mo4]\n\t1. Mat roi, chet roi. \n\t2. Mai mot, vui lap, khong duoc to ro ra.
殁=mot [mo4]\n\t1. Mat roi, chet roi. \n\t2. Mai mot, vui lap, khong duoc to ro ra.
殀=yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Chet non, co khi viet yeu 夭. \n\t2. Giet.
殂=to [cu2]\n\t1. Chet, nguoi xua bao chet thi hon len phach xuong, cho nen goi ke chet la to lac 殂落.
殃=uong [yang1]\n\t1. Tai nan, va. \n\t2. Hai, lam hai.
殄=dien [tian3]\n\t1. Het, dut. Nhu bao dien thien vat 暴殄天物 tan hai het cua troi. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu dien 腆.
殆=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Nguy. Nhu ngap ngap ho dai tai 岌岌乎殆哉 cheo leo vay nguy thay ! \n\t2. Moi met. \n\t3. Ben, dung lam tieng giup loi. \n\t4. So. Nhu dai bat kha cap 殆不可及 so chang kha kip. \n\t5. Ngo. \n\t6. Gan, than gan. \n\t7. Chi the. \n\t8. Hau nhu.
殉=tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Chet theo, dung nguoi chon theo nguoi chet goi la tuan. \n\t2. Theo. Nhu tuan loi 殉利 dem than quay cuong theo loi, tuan danh 殉名 dem than quay cuong theo danh, v.v.
殊=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Dut, het tiet. Nhu sat nhi vi thu 殺而未殊 giet ma chua dut noc (chem chua dut co), thu tu 殊死 quyet chet (lieu chet), v.v. \n\t2. Khac. Nhu phong canh bat thu 風景不殊 phong canh chang khac. \n\t3. Rat, lam, chu lam tro tu. Nhu thu giai 殊佳 tot dep lam, thu di 殊異 la qua !
殍=bieu [piao3]\n\t1. Chet doi, thuong viet la 莩.
殖=thuc [shi5|zhi2]\n\t1. Sinh. Nhu phon thuc 蕃殖 sinh soi, nay no. \n\t2. Sinh loi, chan hung cong nghe de sinh ra tai loi goi la thuc. \n\t3. Dung. \n\t4. Nhieu, dong duc. \n\t5. Thuc dan 殖民 dem dan di den khai thac lam an o nuoc khac ma van phuc tong phap luat cua nuoc minh.
殘=tan [can2]\n\t1. Tan ac, tan hai. \n\t2. Tan, cai gi dung roi con thua lai goi la tan. Nhu tan boi 殘杯 chen ruou thua (tiec da tan), tan da 殘夜 dem tan, nghia la chi con mot chut nua thi sang. \n\t3. Thieu, nguoi khong du cac chi the goi la tan tat 殘疾. \n\t4. Giet.
残=tan [can2]\n\t1. Tan ac, tan hai. \n\t2. Tan, cai gi dung roi con thua lai goi la tan. Nhu tan boi 殘杯 chen ruou thua (tiec da tan), tan da 殘夜 dem tan, nghia la chi con mot chut nua thi sang. \n\t3. Thieu, nguoi khong du cac chi the goi la tan tat 殘疾. \n\t4. Giet.
殛=cuc [ji2]\n\t1. Giet troc, an xu tu.
殞=van [yun3]\n\t1. Mat. \n\t2. Rung, cung nhu chu van 隕.
殒=van [yun3]\n\t1. Mat. \n\t2. Rung, cung nhu chu van 隕.
殣=can [jin4]\n\t1. Chet doi. \n\t2. Chon.
殤=thuong [shang1]\n\t1. Chet non, tu 16 tuoi den 19 tuoi ma chet goi la truong thuong 長殤, tu 12   tuoi den 15 tuoi chet goi la trung thuong 中殤, tu 8 tuoi den 11 tuoi chet goi   la ha thuong 下殤, bay tuoi tro xuong goi la vo phuc chi thuong 無服之殤 cai thuong,   khong phai de tang.
殇=thuong [shang1]\n\t1. Chet non, tu 16 tuoi den 19 tuoi ma chet goi la truong thuong 長殤, tu 12   tuoi den 15 tuoi chet goi la trung thuong 中殤, tu 8 tuoi den 11 tuoi chet goi   la ha thuong 下殤, bay tuoi tro xuong goi la vo phuc chi thuong 無服之殤 cai thuong,   khong phai de tang.
殪=e [yi4]\n\t1. Chet. \n\t2. Giet.
殫=dan, dan [dan1]\n\t1. Het, lam het. Co khi doc la dan.
殚=dan, dan [dan1]\n\t1. Het, lam het. Co khi doc la dan.
殭=cuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Chet kho, chet cung, giong dong vat chet ma khong thoi goi la cuong.
殮=liem [lian4]\n\t1. Liem xac.
殓=liem [lian4]\n\t1. Liem xac.
殯=tan, than [bin4]\n\t1. Yen cuu (xac chet nhap quan chua chon). Dua ma di chon goi la xuat tan 出. \n\t2. Vui lap (mai mot). Ta quen doc la chu than.
殡=tan, than [bin4]\n\t1. Yen cuu (xac chet nhap quan chua chon). Dua ma di chon goi la xuat tan 出. \n\t2. Vui lap (mai mot). Ta quen doc la chu than.
殱=tiem [jian1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tiem 殲.
殲=tiem [jian1]\n\t1. Het, giet het.
歼=tiem [jian1]\n\t1. Het, giet het.
殳=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Cai thu, mot thu do binh dai mot truong hai thuoc, khong co mui nhon.
段=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Chia tung doan, vai lua dinh may thuoc cat lam mot, moi tam goi la doan. \n\t2. Pham vat gi tinh chia ra tung bo deu goi la doan. Nhu dia doan 地段 doan dat, thu doan 手段 phuong phap lam viec, v.v. deu la theo cai y tung thu doan lac ca. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu doan 毈.
殷=an, an, an [yan1|yin1]\n\t1. Thinh, day du. Nhu an phu 殷富 giau co thinh vuong. \n\t2. Bon dong. Nhu an kien 殷見 dong nguoi hop mat. \n\t3. Nha An, vua Ban Canh nha Thuong thien do sang dat An. \n\t4. An an 殷殷 lo dau dau. \n\t5. Chinh giua. \n\t6. To lon. \n\t6. Mot am la an. Do sam, mau do sam mat khong duoc tuoi. \n\t7. Mot am nua la an. Sam dong, u u.
殺=sat, sai, tat [sha1]\n\t1. Giet, minh tu giet minh goi la tu sat 自殺. \n\t2. Bat duoc. \n\t3. Lam cho den chet. \n\t4. Mot am la sai. Bot, suy, kem. \n\t5. Tieu sai 噍殺 tieng re re, hinh dung cai tieng da het hoi khong duoc manh me. \n\t6. Cai tui dung xac chet. \n\t7. Lai mot am nua la tat. Tan, lo to.
杀=sat, sai, tat [sha1]\n\t1. Giet, minh tu giet minh goi la tu sat 自殺. \n\t2. Bat duoc. \n\t3. Lam cho den chet. \n\t4. Mot am la sai. Bot, suy, kem. \n\t5. Tieu sai 噍殺 tieng re re, hinh dung cai tieng da het hoi khong duoc manh me. \n\t6. Cai tui dung xac chet. \n\t7. Lai mot am nua la tat. Tan, lo to.
殼=xac [ke2|qiao4]\n\t1. Vo. Nhu loa xac 螺殼 vo oc, duan xac 筍殼 be mang, v.v. Tuc quen viet la 壳.
壳=xac [ke2|qiao4]\n\t1. Vo. Nhu loa xac 螺殼 vo oc, duan xac 筍殼 be mang, v.v. Tuc quen viet la 壳.
殽=hao, hao [yao2]\n\t1. Lan lon. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu hao 肴 do an. \n\t3. Thit thai lan ca xuong. \n\t3. Mot am la hao. Cung nghia voi chu hieu 效.
殿=dien, dien [dian4]\n\t1. Cung den. Nha vua o goi la dien, cho tho than thanh cung goi la dien. Ta goi vua hay than thanh la dien ha 殿下 la boi nghia do. \n\t2. Mot am la dien. Tran dinh, yen tinh. \n\t3. Di sau quan cung goi la dien. \n\t4. Xet cong thua kem nguoi goi la dien.
毀=huy [hui3]\n\t1. Huy hoai, nat. \n\t2. Thuong. \n\t3. Che, dieu, mia mai. \n\t4. Cau cung tru va.
毁=huy [hui3]\n\t1. Huy hoai, nat. \n\t2. Thuong. \n\t3. Che, dieu, mia mai. \n\t4. Cau cung tru va.
毅=nghi [yi4]\n\t1. Qua quyet, cung coi, quyet chi khong ai lay dong duoc goi la nghi luc 毅力.
毆=au [ou1]\n\t1. Danh, lay gay danh dap goi la au.
殴=au [ou1]\n\t1. Danh, lay gay danh dap goi la au.
毈=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Trung ung, trung ap khong no goi la doan.
毋=vo, muu [wu2]\n\t1. Cho, dung. \n\t2. Cho, dung lam tieng giup loi. Nhu vo nai 毋乃 cho ben (cung nghia voi hoac gia 或者), tuong vo 將毋 hau cho, v.v. deu la loi hoi lay y minh doan ma chua dam quyet doan. \n\t3. Mot am la muu. Han. Muu doi 毋追 mot thu mu vai den.
母=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Me. \n\t2. Pham vat gi lam cot de sinh ra cac cai deu goi la mau. Nhu mau tai 母財 tien von. \n\t3. Tieng goi ton cac dan ba ton truong. Nhu co mau 姑母 ba co, cuu mau 舅母 ba mo. \n\t4. Giong cai. Nhu mau ke 母雞 ga mai, mau tre 母彘 lon se, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la mo. Men, me.
每=moi, moi [mei3]\n\t1. Thuong. Nhu moi moi nhu thu 每每如此 thuong thuong nhu the. \n\t2. Cac, moi. Nhu moi nhan 每人 moi nguoi, moi nhat 每日 moi ngay, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la moi. Nhu moi moi 每每 ruong ngon, ruot tot.
毒=doc, doc [du2]\n\t1. Ac. Nhu doc ke 毒計 ke ac. \n\t2. Lam hai. Nhu do doc sinh linh 荼毒生靈 lam hai giong sinh linh. \n\t3. Doc, vat gi lam hai duoc nguoi deu goi la doc. Nhu doc xa 毒蛇 ran doc, doc duoc 毒藥 thuoc doc, v.v. \n\t4. Cam gian. Nhu phan doc 憤毒 cam tuc lam. \n\t5. Tri, cai tri. \n\t6. Mot am la doc. Nhu quyen doc 身毒 nuoc Quyen Doc, tuc la nuoc Thien Truc 天竹 (nuoc An Do 印度 bay gio).
毓=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Sinh, nuoi, cung mot nghia voi chu duc 育.
比=bi, bi, bi, ti [bi3]\n\t1. So sanh, lay su gi cung mot loai ma so sanh nhau goi la bi. Ve so hoc dung hai so so sanh nhau de tim so khac goi la bi le 比例. Ve doi khoa cu goi ky thi huong la dai bi 大比. \n\t2. Le, su da lam roi goi la bi. Doi nha Nguy. Nha Tan dat mot bi bo 比部 coi viec phep luat, tuc nhu nha tu phap bay gio. \n\t3. Nuoc Bi, nuoc Bi-li-thi 比利時 (Belgium) o chau Au. \n\t4. Ken chon, ken chon cho hay ma theo goi la bi. \n\t5. Mot am la bi. Than, hua nhau. Nhu bang bi vi gian 朋比為奸 hua nhau lam gian. \n\t6. Gan. Nhu bi lai 比來 gan nay, bi lan 比鄰 lien lang gieng, v.v. \n\t7. Choi doi, doi nhau. Nhu trong loi van kinh nghia lay hai ve doi nhau lam mot bi. \n\t8. Kip. Nhu bi ki phan da 比其反也 kip thua trai lai vay. \n\t9. Luon. Nhu bi nien 比年 luon nam, bi bi 比比 luon luon. \n\t10. Lai mot am la bi. Cao bi 皋比 da ho, ong Truong Tai nha Tong, ngoi tren truong da ho giang kinh Dich, vi the doi sau goi nguoi giang hoc la toa ung cao bi 坐擁皋比. Ta quen doc la chu ti.
毖=bi [bi4]\n\t1. Can than, ghin. \n\t2. Nhoc. \n\t3. Chay, vot len.
毗=bi, ty [pi2]\n\t1. Giup. \n\t2. Gom, dat lien tiep nhau goi la bi lien 毗連. Co khi viet la 毘. \n\t3. Bi ny 毗尼 dich am tieng Pham, nghia la gioi luat. \n\t4. Bi Lu 毗盧 ten mot vi Phat. Ta quen doc la chu ty.
毘=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bi 毗.
毛=mao, mo [mao2]\n\t1. Long, giong thu co long kin ca minh nen goi la mao trung 毛蟲. \n\t2. Rau toc nguoi ta cung goi la mao. Nhu nhi mao nguoi da hai thu toc (tuoi tac). \n\t3. Loai cay co. Nhu bat mao chi dia 不毛之地 dat khong co cay co. \n\t4. Tuc goi do gi lam tho kech khong duoc tinh te goi la mao. Pham noi vat gi nho ma nhieu cung goi la mao. Nhu mao cu te co 毛舉細故 cu ca nhung phan nho mon. \n\t5. Nho long. Tuc dung thay chu hao 毫 noi ve hao ly. \n\t6. Mot am la mo. Khong.
毡=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu chien 氈.
毧=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Long nho, long muot.
毫=hao [hao2]\n\t1. Long dai ma nhon. Long den mua thu lai moc cai moi nen goi la thu hao 秋毫. \n\t2. Hao, trong phep can do goi muoi hao la mot ly, tuc la mot phan trong muon phan cua mot lang. \n\t3. But, but lam bang long nen goi la hao. \n\t4. Nho lam. Nhu hao ly 毫釐, hao mat 毫末, v.v. deu goi ve phan cuc nho be ca. Tuc noi tuyet khong co gi ca la hao vo 毫無. \n\t5. Cai but long.
毬=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Qua bong. \n\t2. Cai gi vo thanh hinh tron deu goi la cau.
毯=tham [tan3]\n\t1. Cai dem long.
毳=thue, thuy [cui4]\n\t1. Long nho cua giong thu. \n\t2. Long bung giong chim. \n\t3. Vat gi nho mem ma de nat deu goi la thue. \n\t4. Cung doc la chu thuy. Cung nghia nhu chu thuy 脃.
毷=mao [mao4]\n\t1. Mao tao 毷氉 buon buc. \n\t2. Vai long.
毹=du [shu1]\n\t1. Cu du 氍毹 dem det bang long (cai tham).
毽=kien [jian4]\n\t1. Kien tu 毽子 qua cau, do choi da bang chan.
毿=tam [san1]\n\t1. Long dai (thuon thuot).
毵=tam [san1]\n\t1. Long dai (thuon thuot).
氂=ly [li2]\n\t1. Duoi con trau ly. \n\t2. Long cung ma cong cung goi la ly. \n\t3. Cung mot nghia voi chu ly 釐. \n\t4. Duoi ngua. \n\t5. Long dai.
氄=nhung [rong3]\n\t1. Long nho, long to.
氅=suong [chang3]\n\t1. Chap long lam ao cuu.
氈=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Gia, ben long thanh tung manh. Nhu chien mao 氈帽 mu gia.
毡=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Gia, ben long thanh tung manh. Nhu chien mao 氈帽 mu gia.
氉=tao [sao4]\n\t1. Mao tao 毷氉 buon buc. Nha Duong goi cac hoc tro thi khong do ma chen say la da mao tao 打毷氉.
氍=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Cu du 氍毹 dem det bang long (cai tham).
氏=thi, chi [shi4|zhi1]\n\t1. Ho, nganh ho. \n\t2. Ten doi truoc deu dem chu thi o sau. Nhu vo hoai thi 無懷氏, cat thien thi 葛天氏, v.v. deu la ten cac trieu dai ngay xua ca. \n\t3. Ten quan, ngay xua ai chuyen hoc ve mon nao thi lai lay mon ay lam ho. Nhu chuc phuong thi 職方氏, thai su thi 太史氏, v.v. \n\t4. Dan ba tu xung minh cung goi la thi. \n\t5. Mot am la chi. Vo vua nuoc Hung no 匈奴 goi la Yen Chi 閼氏, o coi tay co nuoc dai nguyet chi 大月氏, tieu nguyet chi 小月氏, v.v.
氐=de, de [di1|di3]\n\t1. Nen, goc. \n\t2. Mot am la de. Ten mot bo lac giong ro o coi tay. \n\t2. Sao de 氐, mot sao trong nhi thap bat tu.
