民=dan [min2]\n\t1. Nguoi, dan, loai nguoi thuoc o duoi quyen chinh tri goi la dan. Nhu quoc dan 國民 dan nuoc.
氓=manh [mang2|meng2]\n\t1. Dan, dan khong nghe nghiep goi la luu manh 流氓.
气=khi, khat [qi4]\n\t1. Hoi, khi may. \n\t2. Mot am la khat. Xin, nguyen la chu khat 乞.
氛=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Khi. \n\t2. Hung khi (khi tuong xau).
氣=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Hoi tho. \n\t2. Cai gi khong co hinh chat ma cung cam ung voi nhau duoc goi la khi. Nhu khi van 氣運, khi tuong 氣象, khi vi 氣味, v.v. \n\t3. Khi hau. \n\t4. Khi, tuc hoi, phat tuc goi la dong khi 動氣. \n\t5. The hoi. \n\t6. Ngui. \n\t7. Cung nghia voi chu hi 餼.
气=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Hoi tho. \n\t2. Cai gi khong co hinh chat ma cung cam ung voi nhau duoc goi la khi. Nhu khi van 氣運, khi tuong 氣象, khi vi 氣味, v.v. \n\t3. Khi hau. \n\t4. Khi, tuc hoi, phat tuc goi la dong khi 動氣. \n\t5. The hoi. \n\t6. Ngui. \n\t7. Cung nghia voi chu hi 餼.
氤=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Nhan uan 氤氳 khi troi dat hoa hop.
氳=uan [yun1]\n\t1. Xem nhan uan 氤氳.
氲=uan [yun1]\n\t1. Xem nhan uan 氤氳.
水=thuy [shui3]\n\t1. Nuoc. \n\t2. Song, ngoi, khe, suoi, pham cai gi boi nuoc ma thanh ra deu goi la thuy. \n\t3. Sao Thuy, mot ngoi sao o gan mat troi nhat. \n\t3. Bac duc co thu tot thu kem, gia giam cho no deu goi la than thuy 申水, thiep thuy 貼水, v.v.
氷=bang [bing1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bang 冰.
永=vinh [yong3]\n\t1. Lau, dai, mai mai. Nhu vinh vien 永遠.
氾=phiem [fan4]\n\t1. Gian giua. \n\t2. Rong khap, lenh denh. \n\t3. Song Phiem.
汀=dinh [ting1]\n\t1. Bai thap, bai song. \n\t2. Song Dinh.
汁=trap, hiep [zhi1]\n\t1. Nuoc, nhua. Vat gi co nuoc long chay ra goi la trap. \n\t2. Vua mua vua sa tuyet. \n\t3. Mot am la hiep. Hoa, cung nghia voi chu hiep 協.
汆=thon, tu [cuan1]\n\t1. Xoi di, nuoc day vat gi di. \n\t2. Mot am la tu. Boi.
汊=xa [cha4]\n\t1. Dong nhanh, dong nuoc chay re ngang goi la xa.
汍=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Hoan lan 汍瀾 khoc sut sui.
汎=phiem [fan4]\n\t1. Phu phiem. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu phiem 氾. \n\t3. Boi thuyen. \n\t4. Rong.
汐=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Nuoc thuy trieu buoi toi.
汕=san [shan4]\n\t1. Cai do, cai lo. \n\t2. San dau 汕頭 ten dat, mot ben thong thuong o me tay nam tinh Quang Dong.
汗=han, han [han2|han4]\n\t1. Mo hoi. \n\t2. Tan lo, vi du nhu cai gi da ra khong tro lai duoc nua. Hieu lenh da ra, khong thu ve duoc nua goi la hoan han 渙汗. \n\t3. Mot am la han. Vua ro Dot Quyet goi la kha han 可汗.
汙=o, oa, o [wu1]\n\t1. Nuoc duc, do ban. Pham cai gi khong sach se deu goi la o ca. Nhu pham hanh khong tot goi la tham o 貪汙, ty o 卑汙, v.v. \n\t2. Vay ban. \n\t3. Thap kem. \n\t4. Mot am la oa. Dao dat. Cho dat thap trung goi la oa ha 汙下. \n\t5. Lai mot am la o. Rua sach, giat sach. \n\t6. Buoc long phai guong theo.
汛=tan [xun4]\n\t1. Nuoc tran. \n\t2. Cho chia don tran thu goi la tan dia 汛地. \n\t3. Vay nuoc.
汜=ty, di [si4]\n\t1. Dong nuoc da re ngang lai chay quanh ve cho cu goi la ty. \n\t2. Song Ty. Tuc quen doc la chu di.
汝=nhu [ru3]\n\t1. Song Nhu. \n\t2. May, co khi viet la 女.
江=giang [jiang1]\n\t1. Song Giang. \n\t2. Song lon, song cai.
池=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Thanh tri, cai song dao quanh thanh de giu thanh. \n\t2. Cai ao.
求=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Tim, pham muon duoc cai gi ma het long tim toi cho duoc deu goi la cau. Nhu suu cau 搜求 luc tim, nghien cau 研求 nghien tim, v.v. \n\t2. Trach. Nhu quan tu cau chu ky, tieu nhan cau chu nhan 君子求諸己，小人求諸人 nguoi quan tu trach o minh, ke tieu nhan trach o nguoi. \n\t3. Xin. \n\t4. Tham. Nhu bat ky bat cau 不忮不求 chang ghen ghet chang tham lam. \n\t5. Ngang buc, ngang nhau.
汞=hong, cong [gong3]\n\t1. Thuy ngan 水銀. Tuc doc la chu cong.
汨=mich, cot [mi4]\n\t1. Song Mich. Hai con song Mich La 汨羅 cung chay mot dong nen goi la song Mich La. \n\t2. Mot am la cot. Chim mat, chim lim.
汪=uong [wang1]\n\t1. Sau rong.
汭=nhue [rui4]\n\t1. Cho nuoc chay uon quanh, vong song, khuc song.
汰=thai, thai [tai4]\n\t1. Qua. Nhu xa thai 奢汰 xa xi qua. \n\t2. Thai di, dai bo, loc bo cai vo dung di goi la thai. Nhu sa thai 沙汰 dai bo, dao thai 淘汰 loc bo, v.v. Ta quen doc la chu thai.
汲=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Muc nuoc. \n\t2. Cap cap 汲汲 miet mai, lam sa sa. \n\t3. Cap dan 汲引 dat, keo len.
汴=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Song Bien. \n\t2. Ten dat.
汶=van, mon [wen4]\n\t1. Song Van. \n\t2. Mot am la mon. Mon mon 汶汶 nho nhuoc boi nho.
決=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Khoi, thao. \n\t2. Vo de. \n\t3. Xu chem (tram quyet). \n\t4. Quyet doan. \n\t5. Nhat quyet. Nhu quyet y 決意, quyet tam 決心, v.v. \n\t6. Can. \n\t7. Dut, quyet liet.
决=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Khoi, thao. \n\t2. Vo de. \n\t3. Xu chem (tram quyet). \n\t4. Quyet doan. \n\t5. Nhat quyet. Nhu quyet y 決意, quyet tam 決心, v.v. \n\t6. Can. \n\t7. Dut, quyet liet.
汽=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Hoi nuoc, nuoc soi boc hoi len goi la khi. Nhu khi ky 汽機 may hoi, khi thuyen 汽船 tau thuy, khi xa 汽車 xe hoa, v.v.
汾=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Song Phan.
沁=tham, sam [qin4]\n\t1. Song Tham. \n\t2. Mot am la sam. Nuoc tham vao.
沂=nghi, ngan [yi2]\n\t1. Song Nghi. \n\t2. Mot am la ngan. Ong sao lon.
沃=oc [wo4]\n\t1. Rot vao, bon tuoi, lay chat long dac nong beo rot vao goi la oc. \n\t2. Beo tot, tot mau. Nhu oc tho 沃土 dat tot. \n\t3. Khai oc 啟沃 bay toi kheo khuyen dieu phai khien vua tin nghe. \n\t4. Mem. \n\t5. Mau mo.
沅=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Song Nguyen.
沆=hang, hang [hang4]\n\t1. Hang doi 沆瀣 hoi moc (hoi suong moc), chi khi hai nguoi hop nhau goi la hang doi nhat khi 沆瀣一氣. \n\t2. Nuoc mong menh. \n\t3. Mot am la hang. Cho qua.
沇=duyen [yan3]\n\t1. Song Duyen. \n\t2. Chay ra.
沈=tram, tham, tram [chen2|shen3]\n\t1. Chim, bi chim dam sau khong ra ngay duoc goi la tram me 沈迷, tram nich 沈溺 chim dam. Cung viet la tram 沉. \n\t2. Tham tram. \n\t3. Do nang. \n\t4. Mot am la tham. Ten ho, ten nuoc, ten dat. \n\t5. Lai mot am la tram. Nem xuong nuoc.
沌=don [dun4]\n\t1. Hon don 混沌 mo mit, noi luc chua phan ro troi dat, noi bong cai y chua khai thong. Con viet 渾沌.
沐=moc [mu4]\n\t1. Goi dau, le ngay xua lam quan cu muoi ngay duoc nghi mot lan de tam goi, cho nen ngay le nghi bay gio cung goi la huu moc nhat 休沐日. \n\t2. Tham goi, duoc on nho nguoi ta cat nhac ma sang trong goi la moc an 沐恩. \n\t3. Nhuan nha. \n\t4. Sua lai, sua tri.
沒=mot [mei2|mo4]\n\t1. Chim dam, bi nuoc tran ngap goi la mot. \n\t2. Chet, mat roi, co khi viet la 歿. \n\t3. Het. Nhu mot the 沒世 het doi. \n\t4. Khong co, che nguoi khong biet chu goi la mot tu bi 沒字碑 y noi trong long khong co mot chu nao. \n\t5. Mat tich. Nhu mai mot 埋沒 vui mat, dan mot 泯沒 tan mat, v.v. \n\t6. Lay het, tich ky het co nghiep ve nha nuoc goi la tich mot 籍沒, nuot song het cua cai nguoi ta gui minh goi la can mot 乾沒, v.v. \n\t7. An mat, nup minh, chot thay chot mat. \n\t8. Qua, hon.
没=mot [mei2|mo4]\n\t1. Chim dam, bi nuoc tran ngap goi la mot. \n\t2. Chet, mat roi, co khi viet la 歿. \n\t3. Het. Nhu mot the 沒世 het doi. \n\t4. Khong co, che nguoi khong biet chu goi la mot tu bi 沒字碑 y noi trong long khong co mot chu nao. \n\t5. Mat tich. Nhu mai mot 埋沒 vui mat, dan mot 泯沒 tan mat, v.v. \n\t6. Lay het, tich ky het co nghiep ve nha nuoc goi la tich mot 籍沒, nuot song het cua cai nguoi ta gui minh goi la can mot 乾沒, v.v. \n\t7. An mat, nup minh, chot thay chot mat. \n\t8. Qua, hon.
沔=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Song Mien. \n\t2. Nuoc chay gian giua.
沖=trung, xung [chong1|chong4]\n\t1. Rong khong, trong long lang le rong khong, khong canh tranh gi goi la trung. Nhu khiem trung 謙沖 nhun nhuong, lang le. \n\t2. Vui hoa, sau xa. \n\t3. Bay vot len. Nhu nhat phi trung thien 一飛沖天 (Su ky 史記) bay mot cai vot len troi. \n\t4. Nho be, vua con nho tu xung la trung nhan 沖人. \n\t5. Xung dot. Tuc muon dung nhu chu xung 衝, pham cai gi da ki nhau ma lai gap nhau goi la xung. Nhu ti ngo tuong xung 子午相沖. \n\t6. Cho nuoc vao quay deu cung goi la xung. Ta quen doc la chu xung ca.
冲=trung, xung [chong1|chong4]\n\t1. Rong khong, trong long lang le rong khong, khong canh tranh gi goi la trung. Nhu khiem trung 謙沖 nhun nhuong, lang le. \n\t2. Vui hoa, sau xa. \n\t3. Bay vot len. Nhu nhat phi trung thien 一飛沖天 (Su ky 史記) bay mot cai vot len troi. \n\t4. Nho be, vua con nho tu xung la trung nhan 沖人. \n\t5. Xung dot. Tuc muon dung nhu chu xung 衝, pham cai gi da ki nhau ma lai gap nhau goi la xung. Nhu ti ngo tuong xung 子午相沖. \n\t6. Cho nuoc vao quay deu cung goi la xung. Ta quen doc la chu xung ca.
沙=sa, sa [sha1|sha4]\n\t1. Cat. \n\t2. Dat cat. \n\t3. Bai cat. \n\t4. Dai, thai, gan di. Nhu sa thai 沙汰 dai bo bot di. \n\t5. Sa mon 沙門 thay tu. Dich am tieng Pham, Tau dich nghia la can tuc, nghia la nguoi di tu cham tu phep thien dep het tinh ac. \n\t6. Sa di 沙彌 tieng nha Phat, dan ong di tu, thu du muoi dieu gioi cua nha Phat, dep het tinh ac, cham lam viec thien goi la sa di, ta goi la chu tieu, ve dan ba thi goi la sa di ny 沙彌尼. \n\t7. Qua chin qua hoen ra tung vet con cung goi la sa. \n\t8. Ten so nho, muoi hat bui la mot sa, vi the nen vi du vat gi nho cung goi la sa. \n\t9. Mot am la sa. Tieng re re, tieng khan.
沚=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Cai bai nho giua song.
沛=phai, bai [pei4]\n\t1. Bai co, cho vung nuoc moc co, dat bo hoang moc co goi la phai. \n\t2. Chay sam sam. Nhu phai nhien ha vu 沛然下雨 (Manh Tu 孟子) mua xuong sam sam. Pham noi cai gi khi the day ray manh me deu goi la phai hay sung phai 充沛. \n\t3. Dien bai, gap su hoan nan, vi hoan canh lam nghieng ngua goi la dien phai 顛沛. \n\t4. Nhanh chong. \n\t5. Lun, do, ta quen doc la chu bai.
沓=dap [da2|ta4]\n\t1. Chong chat. \n\t2. Nhieu, nguoi di lai nhieu goi la vang lai tap dap 往來雜沓. \n\t3. Tham. \n\t4. Hop. \n\t5. Dap dap 沓沓 tre nai, lam nham (nhieu loi).
沫=mat [mo4]\n\t1. Bot noi len tren mat nuoc. \n\t2. Nuoc bot.
沬=muoi, moi [mei4]\n\t1. Ten dat. \n\t2. Sang lo mo. \n\t3. Cung doc la chu moi.
沭=thuat [shu4]\n\t1. Song Thuat.
沮=tu, tro, thu [ju3|ju4]\n\t1. Tu nhu 沮洳 dat lay, dat trung. \n\t2. Mot am la tro. Ngan can. \n\t3. Bai hoai, tan nat. Nhu anh hoa tieu tro 英華消沮 anh hoa tan mat. \n\t4. Lai mot am la thu. Song Thu.
沱=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Song nhanh. \n\t2. Bang da 滂沱 mua gian giua, nuoc mat chan hoa. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Vu tu bang da van tu si 雨自滂沱雲自癡 mua roi tam ta, may than tho.
河=ha [he2]\n\t1. Song. Ha Han 河漢 la song Thien Ha o tren troi, cao xa vo cung, cho nen nhung ke noi khoac khong du tin goi la ha han.
沴=le, dien [li4]\n\t1. Nuoc chay bi, chay khong thong. \n\t2. Cai khi ac le. Nhu tai le 災沴 dich le truyen nhiem. \n\t3. Mot am la dien. Lang loan (lan lap khuay roi).
沸=phi, phat [fei4]\n\t1. Soi. Nhu phi thuy 沸水 nuoc soi. \n\t2. Mot am la phat. Vot ra.
油=du [you2]\n\t1. Dau, pham chat gi long ma co the dot chay duoc deu goi la du. Nhu hoa du 火油 dau hoa, dau du 豆油 dau dau, chi du 脂油 dau mo, v.v. \n\t2. Un un, ta cai ve nhieu manh. Nhu du nhien tac van 油然作雲 (Manh Tu 孟子) un un may noi. \n\t3. Tron.
治=tri, tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Sua. \n\t2. Trung tri. \n\t3. Mot am la tri. Sua tri. Nhu trang tri cuu an 長治久安 (Minh su 明史) tri yen lau dai. \n\t4. Cho quan chanh phu dia phuong dong goi la tri. Nhu tinh tri 省治, huyen tri 縣治, v.v. Dan doi voi quan goi la tri ha 治下 duoi quyen cai tri. \n\t5. So sanh.
沼=chieu [zhao3]\n\t1. Cai ao hinh cong.
沽=co, co [gu1]\n\t1. Song Co, cua be Dai Co 大沽. \n\t2. Ban. Nhu cau thien gia nhi co chu 求善賈而沽諸 (Luan Ngu 論語) cau gia dat ma ban chang. \n\t3. Mua. Nhu co tuu thi bo bat thuc 沽酒市脯不食 (Luan Ngu 論語) ruou mua nem mua khong an. \n\t4. Mot am la co. Nguoi ban ruou. Nhu do co 屠沽 bon tieu nhan ban thit ban ruou. \n\t5. Vat xau xi.
沾=triem, diep [zhan1]\n\t1. Dam tham. Nhu triem nhiem thi hieu 沾染嗜好 tam nhiem thoi ham thich. \n\t2. Triem khai 沾溉 tham khap, lam viec co ich den nguoi sau goi la triem khai hau nhan 沾溉後人. Co khi viet la triem 霑. \n\t3. Mot am la diep. Hi hung. Nhu diep diep tu hi 沾沾自喜 (Su ky 史記) hi hung tu mung, noi ke khi cuc nho hep duoc mot ti da mung. Tuc doc la thiem la sai.
沿=duyen [yan2]\n\t1. Ven. Nhu duyen thuy nhi ha 沿水而下 ven nuoc ma xuong, o ben bo ven nuoc cung goi la duyen. \n\t2. Noi. Nhu tuong duyen thanh le 相沿成例 cung noi thanh le.
況=huong [kuang4]\n\t1. So sanh, lay cai nay ma hinh dung cai kia goi la hinh huong 形況. \n\t2. Them, cang. Nhu huong tuy 況瘁 cang tieu tuy them. \n\t3. Canh huong. \n\t4. Toi tham. \n\t5. Cho, cung nghia voi chu 貺. \n\t6. Nuoc lanh. \n\t7. Vi. \n\t8. Phuong chi, huong ho, dung lam chu giup loi.
况=huong [kuang4]\n\t1. So sanh, lay cai nay ma hinh dung cai kia goi la hinh huong 形況. \n\t2. Them, cang. Nhu huong tuy 況瘁 cang tieu tuy them. \n\t3. Canh huong. \n\t4. Toi tham. \n\t5. Cho, cung nghia voi chu 貺. \n\t6. Nuoc lanh. \n\t7. Vi. \n\t8. Phuong chi, huong ho, dung lam chu giup loi.
泂=huynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Xa. \n\t2. Sau xa, tham tham, mong menh. \n\t3. Gia lanh.
泄=tiet, due [xie4]\n\t1. Tiet lo ra, phat tiet ra. \n\t2. Tap nhap. \n\t3. Nhon lao, nhan nho. \n\t4. Mot am la due. Due due 泄泄 tre trang. Nhu thien chi phuong que, vo nhien due due 天之方蹶，無然泄泄 (Thi Kinh 詩經) troi dang nhon nhao, dung co tre trang the.
泅=tu [qiu2]\n\t1. Boi, loi.
泆=dat [yi4]\n\t1. Day gian. \n\t2. Phong tung, nguoi khong biet giu gin, phong tung choi can goi la dam dat 淫泆.
泊=bac, phach [bo2|po1]\n\t1. Ghe vao, do thuyen ben bo. \n\t2. Pham do nghi vao dau deu goi la bac. Nhu phieu bac 漂泊 ngu het o cho no den cho kia. \n\t3. Dam bac, lang bat khong hanh dong gi. \n\t4. Mot am la phach. Cai ho, cai cham. \n\t5. Mong manh. Ta quen doc la chu bac ca.
泌=bi [bi4|mi4]\n\t1. Song Bi. \n\t2. Phoi ra, pham chat long vi ep ma do cac lo nho chay ra deu goi la bi. \n\t3. Suoi chay tuon tuon.
泐=lac [le4]\n\t1. Da nut ne ra. \n\t2. But chat, viet. Nhu thu lac 手泐 cai thu than tay viet.
泑=uu [you3]\n\t1. Men (men trang do su).
泒=co [gu1]\n\t1. Song Co.
泓=hoang [hong2]\n\t1. Sau tham tham. \n\t2. Trong suot (leo leo).
泔=cam, ham [gan1]\n\t1. Nuoc vo gao. \n\t2. Mot am la ham. Day gian.
法=phap [fa3]\n\t1. Phep, co khuon phep nhat dinh de cho nguoi tuan theo duoc goi la phap. Nhu phap dien 法典 bo luat phap, phap quy 法規 khuon phep, phap luat 法律 phep luat, v.v. \n\t2. Le phep. Nhu phi thanh vo phap 非聖無法 che thanh la vo phep. \n\t3. Hinh phap. Nhu chinh phap 正法 dem xu tu. \n\t4. Phep. Nhu van phap 文法 phep lam van, thu phap 書法 phep viet, v.v. \n\t5. Bat chuoc. Nhu su phap 師法 bat chuoc lam theo. \n\t6. Nha Phat goi dao la phap, cho nen giang dao goi la thuyet phap 說法, ton xung cac su giang dao la phap su 法師, v.v. \n\t7. Gioi mot mon gi co the de cho nguoi trong minh ma bat chuoc duoc deu goi la phap. Nhu phap thiep 法帖 cai thiep de cho nguoi tap. \n\t8. Nuoc Phap-lan-tay 法蘭西 France goi tat la nuoc Phap. \n\t9. Nha Phat noi het thay moi su moi vat o the gian deu la gia ca, deu do cai vong tam vong tao ra ca, nen goi la phap, la cai canh cua y can nuong theo do ma hanh dong, nen goi la phap tran 法塵.
泖=mao [mao3]\n\t1. Song Mao. \n\t2. Nuoc dong.
泗=tu [si4]\n\t1. Song Tu. \n\t2. Nuoc mui.
泚=thu [ci3]\n\t1. Nuoc lang trong. \n\t2. Mo hoi muot ra. \n\t3. Nham, tham. Nhu thu but 泚筆 nham but, dam but vao muc. \n\t4. Ruc ro.
泛=phiem [fan4]\n\t1. Noi long bong. \n\t2. Phu phiem (khong thiet thuc). \n\t3. Noi phiem, khong chuyen chi vao mot su gi goi la phiem luan 泛論 ban phiem.
泝=to [su4]\n\t1. Ngoi len, cung mot nghia voi chu to 溯 nguoc dong ngoi len.
泠=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Linh linh 泠泠 tieng nuoc chay ve ve. \n\t2. Linh nhien 泠然 tieng gio thoang qua (thoi veo). \n\t3. Cung mot nghia voi chu 伶.
泡=phao, bao [pao1|pao4]\n\t1. Bot nuoc. \n\t2. Ngam nuoc. Ta quen doc la chu bao.
波=ba [bo1]\n\t1. Song nho, song nho goi la ba 波, song lon goi la lan 瀾. Van bai gi co tung thu nay ra cung goi la ba lan 波瀾. \n\t2. Mot cai noi len mot cai im di cung goi la ba. Nhu am nhac phat ra tieng, thi nhung tieng con du lai goi la am ba 音波. Viet van viet chu thi cho tang nen go gap lai goi la ba chich 波磔. \n\t3. Dan den. Nhu ba cap 波及 truoc o ben ay, roi den ben kia, ba luy 波累 nhan nguoi khac ma luy den minh. \n\t4. Bon ba 奔波 bon tau vat va. \n\t5. Tia sang cua con mat.
泣=khap [qi4|xie4]\n\t1. Khoc, khoc khong ra tieng goi la khap.
泥=ne, ne, ne [ni2|ni4]\n\t1. Bun. \n\t2. Vat gi gia nho nat ngau cung goi la ne. \n\t3. Mem yeu. \n\t4. Boi, trat. \n\t5. Mot am la ne. Tram tre. \n\t6. Lai mot am la ne. Ne ne 泥泥 moc sa nhieu qua (mu mit).
注=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Rot, nuoc chay rot vao mot cho goi la chu. \n\t2. Chuyen chu. Nhu chu y 注意 de het y vao, chu muc 注目 de mat nhin ky, v.v. \n\t3. Chua, giai thich van tu goi la chu. Thong dung chu chu 註. \n\t4. Ghi chep. Nhu khoi cu chu 起居注, co kim chu 古今注 deu la sach ghi chep chuyen cu ca. \n\t5. Phu thuoc. Nhu phu chu 附注 chua phu vao duoi nguyen van chua them y minh vao. \n\t6. Co chu 孤注 danh lieu mot cai cho quyet duoc thua goi la co chu. Tuc goi mot ton la nhat chu 一注. \n\t7. Lap ten vao day cung.
泫=huyen, huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Huyen nhien 泫然 ua nuoc mat. \n\t2. Mot am la huyen. Nuoc mong menh.
泮=phan [pan4]\n\t1. Phan thuy 泮水 ten trang hoc doi xua. Doi xua ai duoc vao nha ay hoc goi la nhap phan 入泮. \n\t2. Tan lo. \n\t3. Bo, cung nghia chu 畔.
泯=man, dan, mien [min3]\n\t1. Het. Nhu man mot 泯沒 tieu diet het, cung doc la chu dan. \n\t2. Mot am la mien. Lan lon.
泰=thai [tai4]\n\t1. To lon, cung nghia voi chu thai 太. \n\t2. Hanh thong, thoi van tot goi la thai. \n\t3. Xa si rong ro. \n\t4. Khoan, rong rai, yen. Nhu quan tu thai nhi bat kieu 君子泰而不驕 nguoi quan tu rong rai ma khong kieu.
泱=uong, ang [yang1]\n\t1. Uong uong 泱泱 sau tham, mong menh. \n\t2. Ngun ngut, khi may un len. \n\t3. Mot am la ang. Bat ngat.
泳=vinh [yong3]\n\t1. Lan, di ngam duoi day nuoc.
泉=tuyen, toan [quan2]\n\t1. Suoi, nguon. \n\t2. Tien, ngay xua goi dong tien la tuyen, co khi doc la toan.
洄=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Nuoc chay. \n\t2. To hoi 溯洄 treo len dong nuoc nguoc. \n\t3. Tho To hoi la tho nho nguoi hien, cho nen trong thu tu noi nho ai cung goi la to hoi.
洊=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Lai lan nua.
洋=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Be lon. \n\t2. Duong duong 洋洋 menh mang. \n\t3. Tuc goi nguoi nuoc ngoai la duong nhan 洋人. Hang nuoc ngoai la duong hoa 洋貨, v.v. \n\t4. Tien tay, bac tay.
洌=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Nuoc trong leo leo, ruou trong cung goi la liet.
洎=kip [ji4]\n\t1. Kip den. \n\t2. Nuoc thit. \n\t3. Nhuan nha.
洑=phuc [fu2]\n\t1. Xoay nuoc, dong nuoc chay quanh.
洒=sai, tay, thoi [sa3]\n\t1. Vay nuoc rua. \n\t2. Mot am la tay. Goi rua. \n\t3. Tay nhien 洒然 so hoang, sung sot. \n\t4. Lai mot am la thoi. Chot vot.
洗=tay, tien [xi3|xian3]\n\t1. Giat, rua. \n\t2. Cai chau rua mat. \n\t3. Het nhan nhui. Nhu nang khong nhu tay 囊空如洗 tui nhan khong con gi, noi ke ngheo qua. \n\t4. Mot am la tien. Rua chan. \n\t5. Sach se.
洙=thu, chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Song Thu, la con song nhanh cua con song Tu. Duc Khong tu giang hoc o gan day, nen nay noi den dao ngai thuong noi la dong thu tu 洙泗. Cung doc la chu chu.
洚=giang, hong [jiang4]\n\t1. Nuoc chay tran, co khi doc la chu hong. nuoc lut.
洛=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Song Lac. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu lac 絡. 
洞=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Cai dong (hang sau). \n\t2. Lo hong, cai gi duc thung deu goi la dong. \n\t3. Suot. Nhu dong giam 洞鑒 soi suot.
洟=di, the [ti4]\n\t1. Nuoc mui. \n\t2. Mot am la the. Cung nghia nhu chu the 涕.
津=tan [jin1]\n\t1. Ben. Nhu quan tan 關津 cua ben, tan luong 津梁 bo ben, deu noi ve cho dat giao thong can cot ca, vi the ke cam quyen chinh o ngoi trong yeu deu goi la tan yeu 津要 ca. \n\t2. Tham nhuan, thay nguoi ta ngheo tung ma giup cua cai cho goi la tan thiep 津貼. \n\t3. Tan tan 津津 loi noi co y doi dao. \n\t4. Nuoc dai.
洧=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Song Vi.
洨=hao [xiao2]\n\t1. Song Hao.
洩=due, tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Thu suong. Nhu dung dung due due 融融洩洩 vui ve ha he (thu suong vui hoa), ta cai thu me con hop mat vui ve. Cung viet 溶溶洩洩. \n\t2. Mot am la tiet. Gio tham, tiet lau, ngay xua dung nhu chu tiet 泄. \n\t3. Ngot, yen. \n\t3. Giam bot.
洪=hong [hong2]\n\t1. Ca, lon. Nhu hong luong 洪量 luong ca, hong phuc 洪福 phuc lon. \n\t2. Hong thuy 洪水 nuoc lut, thuong goi tat la hong. \n\t3. Mach hong 脈洪 mach chay dun dun nhu nuoc len goi la mach hong.
洫=huc [xu4]\n\t1. Cau huc 溝洫 ngoi, ngoi nuoc trong canh dong. \n\t2. Thanh tri. \n\t3. Ke, cua chan nuoc. \n\t4. Voi. \n\t5. Lam.
洮=thao, dao [tao2]\n\t1. Song Thao. \n\t2. Mot am la dao. Rua.
洱=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Song Nhi.
洲=chau [zhou1]\n\t1. Bai cu lao, trong nuoc co cho o duoc goi la chau. \n\t2. Chau, dat lien lon goi la chau. Dia cau chia lam sau chau la chau A, Au, Phi, Uc, Nam My, Bac My.
洳=nhu [ru4]\n\t1. Tu nhu 沮洳 bun lay, dat trung.
洴=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Binh phich 洴澼 tieng giat soi tren mat nuoc.
洵=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Tin thuc. \n\t2. Xa. \n\t3. Xoay nuoc.
洶=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Hung dung 洶湧 nuoc chay am am, nuoc reo. Cung viet la 洶涌.
汹=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Hung dung 洶湧 nuoc chay am am, nuoc reo. Cung viet la 洶涌.
活=hoat, quat [huo2]\n\t1. Song, pham nhung su de nuoi song deu goi la sinh hoat 生活. \n\t2. Hoat bat (linh dong nhanh nhen). \n\t3. Su gi co bien dong khong nhat dinh chet o cho goi la hoat. Nhu hoat chi 活支 khoang tien tuy thoi chi dung khong nhat dinh. \n\t4. Mot am la quat. Quat quat 活活 tieng nuoc chay.
洽=hiep, hop [qia4]\n\t1. Hoa hiep. \n\t2. Tham. \n\t3. Mot am la hop. Song Hop.
派=phai [pa1|pai4]\n\t1. Dong nuoc. \n\t2. Su gi chia nganh rieng cung goi la phai. Nhu hoc phai 學派 phai hoc, dang phai 黨派, v.v. \n\t3. Phan phoi cac viec goi la phai. Nhu phai vien 派員 nguoi chinh phu sai di lam mot chuc su gi.
洿=o, ho [wu1]\n\t1. Nuoc dong, nuoc khong luu thong. \n\t2. Dao ao. \n\t3. Mot am la ho. Nho ban. \n\t4. Trat len, quet vao.
流=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Nuoc chay, nuoc chay tu nhien, cho nen cai gi no tu nhien dun di cung goi la luu hanh 流行. \n\t2. Dong nuoc, nuoc chay chia ra cac nganh goi la luu. \n\t3. Dong, rieng lam mot dong goi la luu. Nhu hoc thuat chia ra cuu luu 九流   (chin dong). (1) nha Nho, (2) nha Dao, (3) nha Am Duong, (4) nha hoc ve phap,   (5) nha hoc ve danh, (6) nha Mac, (7) nha tung hoanh, (8) nha tap hoc, (9) nha   nong. \n\t4. Phan biet tung loai cung goi la luu. Nhu thanh luu 清流 dong trong, troc luu 濁流 dong duc, thuong luu 上流 dong tren co hoc thuc duc hanh, ha luu 下流 dong duoi ngu si. Quan pham cung chia ra luu noi 流內 dong o trong, luu ngoai 流外 dong o ngoai. Chua duoc pham cap gi goi la vi nhap luu 未入流. \n\t5. Chuyen dong, cai gi tron tran chuyen van duoc khong co dong tac goi la luu. Nhu luu dong 流動, luu chuyen 流轉, luu loi 流利, v.v. Troi giat. Nhu phieu luu 飄流, luu lac 流落, dan chay loan lac di noi khac goi la luu dan 流民, giac co tran di cac noi goi la luu khau 流寇, an may o ngoai toi goi la luu cai 流丐, nha tro o ngoai toi goi la luu xuong 流倡, v.v. deu la noi nghia ay ca. \n\t7. Truyen doi. Nhu luu truyen 流傳, luu phuong 流芳 de tieng thom mai, luu doc 流毒 de cai doc ve sau mai, v.v. Loi noi khong co can cu vao dau goi la luu ngon 流言. \n\t8. Giat. Nhu luu dang vong phan 流蕩忘反 troi giat quen tro lai, luu lien hoang vong 流連荒亡 luu lien lu bu, noi ke choi boi phong tung khong con nghi gi. \n\t9. Troi di, bi thoi the xoay di. Nhu nuoc chay doc xuong, cho nen cai phong khi cua mot doi goi la luu phong 流風 hay luu tuc 流俗. \n\t10. Xoay quanh khong thoi. Nhu chu luu 周流, luan luu 輪流 , v.v. \n\t11. Van troi lam cung goi la luu. Nhu luu quang 流光, luu nien 流年, v.v. \n\t12. Toi day, day di phuong xa goi la phong luu 放流. \n\t13. Dat ngoai bien thuy, quan phai bo len vung man ro goi la luu quan 流官. Do nguoi tho truoc noi doi lam goi la tho tu 土司, doi phep bo luu quan thay tho tu goi la cai tho quy luu 改土歸司. \n\t14. Doi nha Han bac nang tam lang goi la luu. \n\t15. Pham gia nguoi, hang nguoi. \n\t16. Liec ngang, mat trong khong ngay ngan. 
浙=chiet [zhe4]\n\t1. Song Chiet Giang, tinh Chiet Giang.
浚=tuan [jun4|xun4]\n\t1. Sau. \n\t2. Dao sau. Nhu tuan tinh 浚井 dao gieng sau. \n\t3. Khoi, lay ra. \n\t4. Nen, phai.
浜=banh [bang1]\n\t1. Kenh cho tau be do.
浞=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Ten nguoi.
浡=bot [bo2]\n\t1. Lam them len, vut.
浣=hoan, can [huan4]\n\t1. Giat dia. \n\t2. Ngay xua cu muoi ngay cho nghi mot lan de tam giat, cho nen muoi ngay goi la hoan, mot thang ba ky goi la thuong hoan 上浣, trung hoan 中浣, ha hoan 下浣, cung nhu thuong tuan 上旬, trung tuan 中旬, ha tuan 下旬. Cung doc la chu can.
浥=ap [yi4]\n\t1. Uot at, ngam, tham.
浦=pho, pho [pu3]\n\t1. Ben song, ngach song do ra be. \n\t2. Ten dat. Ta quen doc la chu pho.
浩=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 浩浩 mong menh. Nhu hao hao thao thien 浩浩滔天 mong menh ca troi. \n\t2. Hao nhien 浩然 thang bang. Nhu ngo nhien hau hao nhien huu quy chi 吾然後浩然有歸志 (Manh Tu 孟子) roi ta thang bang co chi ve, y noi ve thang khong doai lai nua. \n\t3. Chinh dai. Nhu nga thien duong ngo hao nhien chi khi 我善養吾浩然之氣 (Manh Tu 孟子) ta kheo nuoi cai khi chinh dai cua ta. \n\t4. Nhieu. Nhu hao phon 浩繁 nhieu nhoi, be bon. \n\t5. Lon. Nhu hao kiep 浩劫 kiep lon. Tuc goi su tai va lon cua nhan gian la hao kiep.
浪=lang, lang [lang4]\n\t1. Song. \n\t2. Nguoc lang 謔浪 phong tung (dua bon vo le). \n\t3. Phong lang, ke chi choi boi leu long khong cham chi lam mot nghe chanh dang goi la lang tu 浪子. \n\t4. Manh lang 孟浪 can ro, noi can ro. \n\t5. Mot am la lang. Thuong lang 滄浪 song Thuong lang. \n\t6. Lang lang 浪浪 nuoc chay bang bang.
浬=li [li3]\n\t1. Dam be, moi dam be 6080 thuoc nuoc Anh.
浭=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Song Canh.
浮=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Noi, vat gi o tren mat nuoc khong co can cu goi la phu, loi noi khong co can cu goi la phu ngon 浮言. \n\t2. Hao. Nhu phu mo 浮慕 ham mo hao. \n\t3. Qua. Nhu nhan phu u su 人浮於事 nguoi nhieu qua viec. \n\t4. Mach phu, se de tay vao da thay mach chay goi la mach phu 脈浮. \n\t5. Thuan dong xuoi di. \n\t6. Phat uong ruou. \n\t7. Phu do 浮屠, do tieng Phat da 佛佗 dich am tranh ra. Phat giao la cua Phat da sang tao ra, vi the nen goi Phat giao do la phu do, doi sau goi thap cua Phat la phu do, cung viet la 浮圖.
浴=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Tam. \n\t2. Pham cai gi rua cho sach di deu goi la duc.
海=hai [hai3]\n\t1. Be, cai cho tram song deu do nuoc vao, gan dat thi goi la hai 海, xa dat thi goi la duong 洋. \n\t2. Ve phia tay bac ho cung goi nhung cham lon la hai. \n\t3. Vat gi hop lai nhieu cung goi la hai. Nhu van hai 文海 tap van lon. \n\t4. Tuc goi cai bat to la hai.
浸=tam [jin4]\n\t1. Tam, ngam. \n\t2. Ten goi chung cac cham lon. \n\t3. Dan dan. Nhu quoc the tam thinh 國勢浸盛 the nuoc dan thinh. \n\t4. Tam gia 浸假 vi roi ra, dung lam chu giup loi. \n\t5. Tam nhuan chi cham 浸潤之譖 loi dem pha ton hot, y noi loi dem lan lan no vao nhu nuoc ngam dan vay.
浹=tiep [jia1]\n\t1. Tham khap. \n\t2. Quanh khap mot vong quanh, 12 ngay goi la tiep thoi 浹辰, het 12 chi tu ty den hoi la het mot vong vay. \n\t3. Thau suot. \n\t4. Tiep hop 浹洽 hoa hop.
浃=tiep [jia1]\n\t1. Tham khap. \n\t2. Quanh khap mot vong quanh, 12 ngay goi la tiep thoi 浹辰, het 12 chi tu ty den hoi la het mot vong vay. \n\t3. Thau suot. \n\t4. Tiep hop 浹洽 hoa hop.
浼=moi, mien [mei3]\n\t1. Giay ban. \n\t2. Lam phien nguoi. \n\t3. Mot am la mien. Mien mien 浼浼 nuoc chay day long song (nuoc chay bang mat).
浿=phoi, phai, bai [pei4]\n\t1. Song Phoi. Cung doc la chu phai hay chu bai.
涂=do [tu2]\n\t1. Duong, cung nghia voi chu do 塗.
涅=niet [nie4]\n\t1. Nhuom tham. \n\t2. Niet ban 涅槃 dich am tieng Pham la Nirvana. nguoi tu da chung dao, khi bo xac pham vao noi khong sinh khong diet sach het moi duong phien nao, cung goi la vien tich.
涇=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Song Kinh, song Kinh duc, song Vi trong, vi the nen phan biet thanh troc goi la kinh vi 涇渭.
泾=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Song Kinh, song Kinh duc, song Vi trong, vi the nen phan biet thanh troc goi la kinh vi 涇渭.
消=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Mat di, het. \n\t2. Tan, ta ra. \n\t3. Mon dan het. Nhu tieu hoa 消化, tieu diet 消滅, v.v. \n\t4. Tieu tuc 消息 tieu la diet di, tuc la tang len, thoi van tuan hoan, len len xuong xuong goi la tieu tuc, cung co nghia la tin tuc.
涉=thiep [she4]\n\t1. Loi, loi qua song goi la thiep 涉, qua bai co goi la bat 跋, vi the di duong kho nhoc goi la bat thiep 跋涉 (lan loi). \n\t2. Su gi co quan he lien lac voi nhau goi la thiep. Nhu giao thiep 交涉, can thiep 干涉, v.v. \n\t3. Su gi khong quan thiep den goi la vo thiep 無涉.
涊=nien [nian3]\n\t1. Dien nien 淟涊 van duc, do day. \n\t2. Nien nhien 涊然 nhom nhop mo hoi ra.
涌=dung [chong1|yong3]\n\t1. Vot, nuoc suoi chay vot ra.
涎=tien, dien, duyen [xian2]\n\t1. Nuoc dai, nguoi ta thay thuc an ngon thi them chay dai ra, cho nen y thich cai gi cung goi la thuy tien 垂涎 (them nho dai). \n\t2. Mot am la dien. Di dien 迆涎 loanh quanh. \n\t3. Dien dien 涎涎 bong nhoang, ta quen doc la duyen ca.
涑=toc [su4]\n\t1. Song Toc, ong Tu Ma Quang 司馬光 o day nen nguoi ta goi la toc thuy tien sinh 涑水先生.
涓=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Dong nuoc nho. Nhu quyen trich 涓滴 giot nuoc ti teo, quyen ai 涓埃 hat bui ti teo, deu la noi vi su nho mon ca. \n\t2. Ken chon. Nhu quyen cat 涓吉 chon ngay tot lanh. \n\t3. Sach, hoan quan cung goi la trung quyen 中涓.
涔=sam [cen2]\n\t1. Nuoc dong tren duong. \n\t2. Sam sam 涔涔 mua sam sam. Cung co khi noi ve nuoc mat. Nhu lao le sam sam 老淚涔涔 nuoc mat gia luot muot. \n\t3. Vung nuoc tha ca.
涕=the [ti4]\n\t1. Nuoc mat. \n\t2. Nuoc mui.
涖=li [li4]\n\t1. Toi. Nhu bat trang di li chi, tac dan bat kinh 不莊以涖之則民不敬 toi chuc tri dan ma khong co duc trang kinh thi dan no khong kinh.
涘=si [si4]\n\t1. Dat ven nuoc, ve song.
涪=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Song Phu.
涯=nhai [ya2]\n\t1. Bo ben, cai gi vo cung vo tan goi la vo nhai 無涯.
液=dich [ye4]\n\t1. Nuoc dai, pham nhung chat long chay deu goi la dich the 液體. \n\t2. Ngam.
涵=ham [han2]\n\t1. Nuoc nuom. Nhu ham nhu 涵濡 nuom tham, cung dung de vi du voi su an trach. \n\t2. Ham dung, do luong lon lao goi la hai ham 海涵. Be trong tot dep ma khong lo ra ngoai goi la hon ham 渾涵 hay ham suc 涵蓄. \n\t3. Lay hoc van ma bien hoa khi chat goi la ham duong 涵養, lay giao duc ma chuyen di phong tuc goi la ham duc 涵育.
涸=hac [he2]\n\t1. Can, can het.
涼=luong, luong [liang2|liang4]\n\t1. Mong meo. Nhu luong duc 涼德 duc bac (it duc). \n\t2. Lanh. \n\t3. Chau Luong. \n\t4. Nuoc Luong. \n\t5. Hong gio. \n\t6. Chat uong. \n\t7. Mot am la luong. Tin. \n\t8. Giup.
凉=luong, luong [liang2|liang4]\n\t1. Mong meo. Nhu luong duc 涼德 duc bac (it duc). \n\t2. Lanh. \n\t3. Chau Luong. \n\t4. Nuoc Luong. \n\t5. Hong gio. \n\t6. Chat uong. \n\t7. Mot am la luong. Tin. \n\t8. Giup.
涿=trac [zhuo1]\n\t1. Song Trac, ten con song ngay xua o Truc Le.
淀=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Cho nuoc nong. Nhu ho ao, v.v. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu dien 甸.
淅=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Nuoc vo gao, sach Manh Tu co cau tiep tich nhi hanh 接淅而行 trut gao da vo ma di, noi duc Khong Tu bo nuoc Te di voi qua vay. Ta quen doc la chu ty.
淆=hao [xiao2]\n\t1. Lan lon, roi loan.
淇=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Song Ki.
淋=lam [lin2|lin4]\n\t1. Ngam nuoc. \n\t2. Lam li 淋漓 Lam li tham thia. \n\t3. Benh lam, cung nghia voi chu lam 痳. 
淌=thang [tang3]\n\t1. Song to. \n\t2. Nuoc chay xuoi.
淑=thuc [shu1]\n\t1. Trong treo, hien lanh. \n\t2. Tieng dung de khen con gai. Nhu hien thuc 賢淑, trinh thuc 貞淑 deu la tieng khen con gai co duc trinh tiet u nhan. Le nha Thanh chong lam quan toi tam pham thi vo duoc phong la thuc nhan 淑人.
淒=the, thien [qi1]\n\t1. Lanh leo, ret muot. \n\t2. Cung kho, cung kho hiu quanh goi la the luong 淒涼. \n\t3. Um thum, ta cai dang sap keo may do mua. \n\t4. Mot am la thien. Thien li 淒浰 nhanh, ta cai dang nhanh chong.
凄=the, thien [qi1]\n\t1. Lanh leo, ret muot. \n\t2. Cung kho, cung kho hiu quanh goi la the luong 淒涼. \n\t3. Um thum, ta cai dang sap keo may do mua. \n\t4. Mot am la thien. Thien li 淒浰 nhanh, ta cai dang nhanh chong.
淖=nao [nao4]\n\t1. Bun, cho duong sau khi mua roi lam lap kho di goi la ne nao 泥淖.
淘=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Vo gao. \n\t2. Dai gan. Nhu dao thai 淘汰 dai bo cai can ba di. Ken chon ke hien thai bo ke hu cung goi la dao thai. \n\t3. Dao. Nhu dao tinh 淘井 khoi gieng, dao gieng.
淙=tong [cong2]\n\t1. Tong tong 淙淙 tuon tuon, tieng nuoc chay nhu mua gio.
淚=le [lei4]\n\t1. Nuoc mat.
泪=le [lei4]\n\t1. Nuoc mat.
淛=chiet [zhe4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu chiet 浙.
淝=phi [fei2]\n\t1. Song Phi.
淞=tung [song1]\n\t1. Song Tung.
淟=dien [tian3]\n\t1. Dien nien 淟涊 van duc, do day.
淡=dam [dan4]\n\t1. Nhat, sac huong vi gi nhat nheo deu goi la dam, khong ham vinh hoa loi loc goi la dam bac 淡泊. \n\t2. Dam khi, chat dam, mot nguyen chat khong sac khong mui, lua vao tat ngay goi la dam khi. Giong dong vat vao trong cho thuan chat dam khi thi tac hoi ngay, nen cung goi la trat to 窒素.
淤=u [yu1]\n\t1. Ban dong. Nhu u tac 淤塞 dong lap (chat ban dong lap). \n\t2. U. Nhu huyet u 血淤 mau u, khong luu thong.
淥=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Nuoc trong. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu loc 漉.
渌=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Nuoc trong. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu loc 漉.
淦=cam [gan4]\n\t1. Song Cam.
淨=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Sach se, pham cai gi tinh nguyen khong co cai gi lam lan lon tap nhap deu goi la tinh, lang lang khong co gi cung goi la tinh. \n\t2. Dao Phat lay thanh tinh lam cot, cho nen dat Phat o goi la tinh do 淨土, cho tu hanh goi la tinh that 淨室, v.v. Nguoi tu cau duoc ve noi Phat o goi la vang sinh tinh do 往生淨土. Phep tu theo phep cau vang sinh lam muc dich goi la tong tinh do 宗淨土. \n\t3. Dong vai thang he.
净=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Sach se, pham cai gi tinh nguyen khong co cai gi lam lan lon tap nhap deu goi la tinh, lang lang khong co gi cung goi la tinh. \n\t2. Dao Phat lay thanh tinh lam cot, cho nen dat Phat o goi la tinh do 淨土, cho tu hanh goi la tinh that 淨室, v.v. Nguoi tu cau duoc ve noi Phat o goi la vang sinh tinh do 往生淨土. Phep tu theo phep cau vang sinh lam muc dich goi la tong tinh do 宗淨土. \n\t3. Dong vai thang he.
淩=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Trai qua, vuot qua. Nhu lang son 淩山 qua nui.
淪=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Lan song. \n\t2. Vuong vit, dat day. Nhu luan tu di pho 淪胥以鋪 ( Thi kinh 詩經) noi ke vo toi cung vuong vit toi va. \n\t3. Mat. Nhu co tai ma bi dim o cho hen kem mai goi la tram luan 沉淪 (chim dam), van tu sach vo ngay nat dan di goi la luan vong 淪亡 hay luan the 淪替, v.v. \n\t4. Hon luan 渾淪 dong dac. Nhu hon luan nguyen khi 渾淪元氣 nguyen khi con nguyen ven. \n\t5. Luan lac 淪落 luu lac.
沦=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Lan song. \n\t2. Vuong vit, dat day. Nhu luan tu di pho 淪胥以鋪 ( Thi kinh 詩經) noi ke vo toi cung vuong vit toi va. \n\t3. Mat. Nhu co tai ma bi dim o cho hen kem mai goi la tram luan 沉淪 (chim dam), van tu sach vo ngay nat dan di goi la luan vong 淪亡 hay luan the 淪替, v.v. \n\t4. Hon luan 渾淪 dong dac. Nhu hon luan nguyen khi 渾淪元氣 nguyen khi con nguyen ven. \n\t5. Luan lac 淪落 luu lac.
淫=dam [yin2]\n\t1. Qua, pham cai gi qua lam deu goi la dam. Nhu dam vu 淫雨 mua dam, dam hinh 淫刑 hinh phat ac qua, v.v. \n\t2. Dong, me hoac. Nhu phu quy bat nang dam 富貴不能淫 (Manh Tu 孟子) giau sang khong lam dong noi long. \n\t3. Ta. Nhu dam bang 淫朋 ban bat chinh, dam tu 淫祠 den tho dam than. \n\t4. Dam duc trai gai giao tiep vo le goi la dam. Nhu dam dang 淫蕩, dam loan 淫亂, v.v. \n\t5. Sao di lac loi thuong.
淬=thoi [cui4]\n\t1. Toi, ren do sat con dang do dem bo vao nuoc cho cung ngay goi la thoi. \n\t2. Nhuom. \n\t3. Pham.
淮=hoai [huai2]\n\t1. Song Hoai.
深=tham [shen1]\n\t1. Be sau. Nhu tham nhuoc can xich 深若干尺 sau ngan ay thuoc. \n\t2. Cach xa, tu ngoai vao trong hiem hoc kho di deu goi la tham. Nhu tham son 深山 nui tham, tham lam 深林 rung sau, tham cung 深宮 cung tham, v.v. \n\t3. Sau kin. Nhu tham tram 深沉 y tu kin dao kho luong, tham ao 深奧 nghia ly suc tich sau xa. \n\t4. Lau dai. Nhu xuan tham 春深 ngay xuan con dai, da tham 夜深 dem truong. Pham cai gi co cong phu suc tich lau deu goi tham. \n\t5. Tien thu. Nhu tham nhap 深入 vao coi da tham, tham thao 深造 toi coi tham thuy, v.v. Pham cai gi suy cho den ky cung deu goi la tham. \n\t6. Bat be nghiem ngat. Nhu tham van chu nap 深文周納 lay cai nghia phep luat sau sac ma buoc toi nguoi. \n\t7. Te lam, tham o 深惡 ghet lam, tham hieu 深好 thich lam, v.v.
淳=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Thuan, trong sach, moc mac. Nhu phong tuc tot goi la thuan phong 淳風, nguoi duc hanh goi la thuan tuy 淳粹, v.v. \n\t2. Mot cap xe binh. \n\t3. Tuoi, tham.
淵=uyen [yuan1]\n\t1. Cai vuc. \n\t2. Sau. Nhu hoc van sau rong goi la uyen tham 淵深 hay uyen bac 淵博, v.v.
渊=uyen [yuan1]\n\t1. Cai vuc. \n\t2. Sau. Nhu hoc van sau rong goi la uyen tham 淵深 hay uyen bac 淵博, v.v.
淶=lai [lai2]\n\t1. Song Lai.
涞=lai [lai2]\n\t1. Song Lai.
混=hon, con [hun2|hun4]\n\t1. Hon tap, lam gian doi khien cho nguoi kho phan biet duoc goi la te hon 弊混. \n\t2. Hon don 混沌 luc troi dat chua phan ranh mach goi la hon don. \n\t3. Mot am la con. Cuon cuon. Nhu nguyen toan con con 源泉混混 suoi chay cuon cuon.
淹=yem, yem [yan1]\n\t1. Ngam nuoc. \n\t2. De lau. Nhu yem luu 淹留 ngam mai, yem tre 淹滯 dong mai, v.v. \n\t3. Sau. Nhu yem thong 淹通 thong hieu sau xa. \n\t4. Mot am la yem. Mat.
淺=thien, tien [jian1|qian3]\n\t1. Nong. \n\t2. Cai gi khong duoc tinh tham deu goi la thien. Nhu thien can 淺近 nong gan, phu thien 膚淺 nong tro, deu noi ve su ly thap hep nong noica. \n\t3. Moi. Nhu giao thien ngon tham 交淺言深 moi choi da can khuyen loi tham thiet. \n\t4. Con it, con kem, con thien. Nhu hoc van tung trai da lau da tinh goi la tham 深, moi vao con non con kem goi la thien 淺 ca. \n\t5. Mot am nua tien. Tien tien 淺淺 nuoc chay ve ve.
浅=thien, tien [jian1|qian3]\n\t1. Nong. \n\t2. Cai gi khong duoc tinh tham deu goi la thien. Nhu thien can 淺近 nong gan, phu thien 膚淺 nong tro, deu noi ve su ly thap hep nong noica. \n\t3. Moi. Nhu giao thien ngon tham 交淺言深 moi choi da can khuyen loi tham thiet. \n\t4. Con it, con kem, con thien. Nhu hoc van tung trai da lau da tinh goi la tham 深, moi vao con non con kem goi la thien 淺 ca. \n\t5. Mot am nua tien. Tien tien 淺淺 nuoc chay ve ve.
添=thiem [tian1]\n\t1. Them, them len.
淼=mieu [miao3]\n\t1. Nuoc mong menh.
清=thanh [qing1]\n\t1. Trong, nuoc khong co chut can nao goi la thanh. \n\t2. Sach, khong them lam nhung su khong dang lam goi la thanh bach 清白, la thanh thao 清操, thanh tiet 清節, v.v. \n\t3. Sua sang ranh mach. Nhu thanh ly 清釐, thanh ly 清理, v.v. \n\t4. Gian luoc. Nhu chanh gian hinh thanh 政簡刑清 chanh tri hinh phep gian di. \n\t5. Khong hu. Nhu thai thanh 太清 cho troi khong, chon hu khong co mot vat gi. \n\t6. Ket lieu. Nhu thanh ngat 清 so sach tinh xong het. \n\t7. Nha Thanh. \n\t8. Lang. Nhu thanh da 清夜 dem lang. 
渙=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Tan, vo lo.
涣=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Tan, vo lo.
渚=chu [zhu3]\n\t1. Bai nho.
減=giam [jian3]\n\t1. Bot, it di, giam di, tru bot di.
减=giam [jian3]\n\t1. Bot, it di, giam di, tru bot di.
渝=du [yu2]\n\t1. Bien doi, khong bien doi goi la bat du 不渝. Thay doi loi the uoc goi la du minh 渝盟. \n\t2. Chau Du (ten dat).
渟=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Nuoc dung, nuoc dong.
渠=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Kenh, ngoi. \n\t2. Lon. Nhu cu khoi 渠魁 to lon. \n\t3. Han, minh goi nguoi khac goi la cu.
渡=do [du4]\n\t1. Qua, tu bo nay sang bo kia goi la do. \n\t2. Ben do. Cho ben do de cho nguoi qua song goi la do khau 渡口. \n\t3. Cuu vot cho nguoi qua con kho ach goi la te do 濟渡. \n\t4. Giao pho.
渣=tra [zha1]\n\t1. Can ba, pham chat gi long loc bo tren di con phan dong lai goi la tra.
渤=bot [bo2]\n\t1. Bot giai 渤澥 vung be, cho be chia nganh khac. Nhu vung be tinh Lieu Dong goi la bot hai 渤海.
渥=ac [wo4]\n\t1. Tham uot. Nhu ky uu ky ac 既優既渥 duoc chiu mua moc nhieu, noi bong la duoc chiu an trach nhieu. \n\t2. Phiet day, lay chat long dac phiet day len tren be mat goi la ac. Nhu ac dan 渥丹 phiet son day.
渦=qua, oa [guo1|wo1]\n\t1. Song Qua. \n\t2. Mot am la oa. Nuoc xoay.
涡=qua, oa [guo1|wo1]\n\t1. Song Qua. \n\t2. Mot am la oa. Nuoc xoay.
測=trac [ce4]\n\t1. Do chieu sau, noi rong ra pham su do luong deu goi la trac ca. Nhu bat trac 不測 khong luong duoc. \n\t2. Trong.
测=trac [ce4]\n\t1. Do chieu sau, noi rong ra pham su do luong deu goi la trac ca. Nhu bat trac 不測 khong luong duoc. \n\t2. Trong.
渭=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Song Vi.
渮=ca [ge1]\n\t1. Song Ca.
港=cang [gang3]\n\t1. Song nhanh, nganh song. Song lon co mot dong chay ngang ra ma di thuyen duoc, goi la cang. \n\t2. Huong cang 香港 (Hongkong) goi tat la cang.
渲=tuyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Dam muc. Nha ve co phep dam muc, lay muc dam xuong giay, quet di quet lai cho dam goi la tuyen.
渴=khat, kiet [ke3]\n\t1. Khat nuoc. \n\t2. Kip, nong sot nong nan. Nhu khat mo 渴慕 ham mo sot sang, co y muon duoc ngay khong doi lau duoc. \n\t3. Mot am la kiet. Can.
游=du [you2]\n\t1. Boi. \n\t2. Dong nuoc tren goi la thuong du 上游, dong nuoc duoi goi la ha du 下游. \n\t3. Khong co can cu ma hay doi doi goi la du. Nhu du dy 游移 y noi khong co y huong nhat dinh. \n\t4. Ngam xem cho thich tam tinh goi la du. Nhu du u nghe 游於藝 (Luan Ngu 論語) lay nghe lam mon tieu khien. \n\t5. Nhan tan, tan mat. Dan khong co nghe nghiep thuong goi la du dan 游民. \n\t6. Uu du 優游 nhan nha tu lay lam thich. Nay thong dung chu du 遊.
渺=mieu, dieu [miao3]\n\t1. Nuoc xa tit mu (man mac). Ta quen doc la chu dieu.
渾=hon [hun2]\n\t1. Duc van. \n\t2. Hon hau, co y kin dao khong lo. \n\t3. Noi ve phan dai khai goi la hon quat 渾括. \n\t4. Ven ven, dung lam tro tu. Nhu hon bat tu 渾不似 chang giong ti nao. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu hon 混. \n\t6. Deu, cung.
浑=hon [hun2]\n\t1. Duc van. \n\t2. Hon hau, co y kin dao khong lo. \n\t3. Noi ve phan dai khai goi la hon quat 渾括. \n\t4. Ven ven, dung lam tro tu. Nhu hon bat tu 渾不似 chang giong ti nao. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu hon 混. \n\t6. Deu, cung.
湃=phai [pai4]\n\t1. Banh phai 澎湃 nuoc mong menh.
湄=mi [mei2]\n\t1. Cho co nuoc ram rap, bo ven nuoc.
湅=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Chuoi to, cung nghia voi chu luyen 練.
湊=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Hop, cung nghia voi chu thau 輳. \n\t2. Tho da de, cung nghia voi chu thau 腠.
凑=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Hop, cung nghia voi chu thau 輳. \n\t2. Tho da de, cung nghia voi chu thau 腠.
湍=thoan [tuan1]\n\t1. Nuoc chay xiet.
湎=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Tram mien 沉湎 say dam, say sua khong biet tro lai.
湓=bon [pen2]\n\t1. Song Bon.
湔=tien [jian1]\n\t1. Song Tien. \n\t2. Got, rua. Nhu tien phat 湔祓 rua oan.
湖=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Cai ho.
湘=tuong, suong [xiang1]\n\t1. Song Tuong, ta quen doc la chu suong.
湛=tram, dam, tham, tiem [zhan4]\n\t1. Sau day, tram tram 湛湛 moc nhieu. Kinh Thi co tho tram lo 湛露 noi ve su thien tu thet dai chu hau tu te chung hau lam, vi the an trach nang ne goi la tram an 湛恩. \n\t2. Thanh, trong. Nhu than chi tram nhien 神志湛然 than chi thanh thu sang suot. \n\t3. Mot am la dam. Song Dam. \n\t4. Dam, vui. \n\t5. Lai mot am la tham. Chim. \n\t6. Sau. \n\t7. Mot am nua la tiem. Ngam.
湜=thuc [shi2]\n\t1. Nuoc trong suot day.
湣=man [min3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu man 閔.
湧=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Nuoc vot ra. \n\t2. Vot len. \n\t3. Gia hang cao vot len.
湩=chung [dong4]\n\t1. Nuoc sua. \n\t2. Thung thung, tieng trong danh.
湫=tuu, tieu, tieu [jiao3|qiu1]\n\t1. Cai ao. \n\t2. Mat ruoi. \n\t3. Mot am la tieu. Tieu ai 湫隘 dat trung ma hep. Co khi doc la chu tieu.
湯=thang, suong, thang [shang1|tang1]\n\t1. Nuoc nong. \n\t2. Vua Thang. \n\t3. Mot am la suong. Nuoc chay cuon cuon. \n\t3. Lai mot am nua la thang. Ngam nuoc nong, doi nuoc soi. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu dang 蕩.
汤=thang, suong, thang [shang1|tang1]\n\t1. Nuoc nong. \n\t2. Vua Thang. \n\t3. Mot am la suong. Nuoc chay cuon cuon. \n\t3. Lai mot am nua la thang. Ngam nuoc nong, doi nuoc soi. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu dang 蕩.
湲=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. San vien 潺湲 nuoc chay.
湽=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Song Truy.
溏=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Cai ao. \n\t2. Long, di rua long da goi la tien duong 便溏.
源=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Nguon nuoc. 2 Nguyen nguyen 源源 cuon cuon, lien tiep khong luc nao dut goi la nguyen nguyen.
準=chuan, chuyet [zhun3]\n\t1. Bang phang. \n\t2. Thuoc thang bang (danh thang bang). \n\t3. Phep mau muc. Nhu tieu chuan 標準 mau muc, muc thuoc. \n\t3. Mot am la chuyet. Mui, mui cao lon goi la long chuan 隆準 (mui doc dua).
溘=khap [ke4]\n\t1. Bong choc, nguoi chet mat goi la khap the 溘逝.
溝=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cai ngoi (ranh), ngoi nuoc qua cac canh dong. \n\t2. Cau thong 溝通 cung luu thong voi nhau. \n\t3. Cai hao.
沟=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cai ngoi (ranh), ngoi nuoc qua cac canh dong. \n\t2. Cau thong 溝通 cung luu thong voi nhau. \n\t3. Cai hao.
溟=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Be. Nhu Nam minh 南溟 be Nam. \n\t2. Mua nho. 
溢=dat [yi4]\n\t1. Day tran. Hieu Kinh co cau man nhi bat dat 滿而不溢 y noi giau ma khong kieu xa. \n\t2. Hai muoi bon lang goi la mot dat, mot voc tay cung goi la mot dat.
溥=pho [pu3]\n\t1. To lon. \n\t2. Khap.
溧=lat [li4]\n\t1. Song Lat.
溪=khe [xi1]\n\t1. Khe, dong nuoc trong nui khong thong ra dau goi la khe.
溫=on, uan [wen1]\n\t1. Am (vua phai, de chiu). \n\t2. Ham nong vat lanh ma lam cho nong nong goi la on. \n\t3. On lai (nhac lai su da qua). \n\t4. On hoa, lay loi noi ngot ngao ma yen ui nguoi goi la on ngu 溫語, cung hoi tham nhau goi la han on 寒溫. \n\t5. Benh on, benh sot lay ra nguoi khac goi la on. \n\t6. Mot am la uan. Cung nghia voi chu uan 蘊.
温=on, uan [wen1]\n\t1. Am (vua phai, de chiu). \n\t2. Ham nong vat lanh ma lam cho nong nong goi la on. \n\t3. On lai (nhac lai su da qua). \n\t4. On hoa, lay loi noi ngot ngao ma yen ui nguoi goi la on ngu 溫語, cung hoi tham nhau goi la han on 寒溫. \n\t5. Benh on, benh sot lay ra nguoi khac goi la on. \n\t6. Mot am la uan. Cung nghia voi chu uan 蘊.
溯=to [su4]\n\t1. Ngoi len. \n\t2. Nho lai su da qua goi la truy to 追溯 hay hoi to 回溯.
溱=tran [qin2|zhen1]\n\t1. Song Tran. \n\t2. Tran tran 溱溱 nhung nhuc, doi dao, nhieu.
溲=suu, suu [sou1]\n\t1. Ngao, lay nuoc ngao bot goi la suu. \n\t2. Mot am la suu. Di dai, di tieu.
溴=xu [xiu4]\n\t1. Hoi nuoc. \n\t2. Chat xu bromine, mot nguyen chat loai phi kim.
溶=dong [rong2]\n\t1. Dong dong 溶溶 nuoc mong menh. \n\t2. Tan, cho vat chat tan ra nuoc goi la dong giai 溶解.
溷=hon [hun4]\n\t1. Chuong tieu, chuong xi. \n\t2. Roi loan. \n\t3. Chuong nhot giong thu.
溺=nich, nieu [ni4|niao4]\n\t1. Chet duoi, chim mat. Bi chim o trong nuoc goi la nich. \n\t2. Chim dam, pham say me ve cai gi ma khong tinh lai deu goi la nich. \n\t3. Mot am la nieu. Di dai di tieu.
溼=thap [shi1]\n\t1. Dat uot. \n\t2. Uot tham.
溽=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Hoi nang xong, hoi nang boc hoi nuoc len goi la nhuc thu 溽暑. \n\t2. Uot. \n\t3. Nong dac (do an ngon).
滁=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Song Tru.
滂=bang [pang1]\n\t1. Bang da 滂沱 mua gian giua, mua chan hoa, khoc nuoc mat gian giua cung goi la bang da. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Vu tu bang da van tu si 雨自滂沱雲自癡 mua roi tam ta, may than tho.
滃=ong [weng3]\n\t1. Nuoc mong menh. \n\t2. Ong nhien 滃然 may dun.
滄=thuong [cang1]\n\t1. Thuong lang 滄浪 song Thuong Lang. \n\t2. Ret lanh. \n\t3. Be khoi, mong menh. Nhu thuong hai 滄海 be khoi. 
沧=thuong [cang1]\n\t1. Thuong lang 滄浪 song Thuong Lang. \n\t2. Ret lanh. \n\t3. Be khoi, mong menh. Nhu thuong hai 滄海 be khoi. 
滅=diet [mie4]\n\t1. Mat, tan mat. \n\t2. Tat. Nhu diet chuc 滅燭 tat nen. \n\t3. Het. Nhu tuyet diet 絕滅 het nhui. \n\t4. Lo mang diet liet 鹵莽滅裂 can do luom thuom, noi ke khong biet xet ky, cu co lam lieu den noi mat ca can ban. \n\t5. Diet do 滅度 diet het phien nao qua be sinh tu (chet).
灭=diet [mie4]\n\t1. Mat, tan mat. \n\t2. Tat. Nhu diet chuc 滅燭 tat nen. \n\t3. Het. Nhu tuyet diet 絕滅 het nhui. \n\t4. Lo mang diet liet 鹵莽滅裂 can do luom thuom, noi ke khong biet xet ky, cu co lam lieu den noi mat ca can ban. \n\t5. Diet do 滅度 diet het phien nao qua be sinh tu (chet).
滇=dien [dian1]\n\t1. Tinh Dien, tinh Van Nam goi la Tinh Dien.
滋=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Them, cang. \n\t2. Lon them. Nhu phat vinh tu truong 發榮滋長 cay co nay no tuoi tot them. \n\t3. Tu nhuan. Nhu vu lo tu boi 雨露滋培 mua moc vun nhuan. \n\t4. Chat dai. Nhu tu vi 滋味 do ngon nhieu chat bo. \n\t5. Nhieu, phon thinh. \n\t6. Den.
滌=dich [di2]\n\t1. Rua sach. \n\t2. Quet. \n\t3. Cai nha nuoi muong sinh.
涤=dich [di2]\n\t1. Rua sach. \n\t2. Quet. \n\t3. Cai nha nuoi muong sinh.
滎=huynh [xing2|ying2]\n\t1. Cham Huynh (ten mot cai cham ngay xua).
荥=huynh [xing2|ying2]\n\t1. Cham Huynh (ten mot cai cham ngay xua).
滏=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Song Phu.
滑=hoat, cot [hua2]\n\t1. Tron, nhan. \n\t2. Giao hoat (hoi hot be ngoai khong thuc). \n\t3. Mot am la cot. Cot ke 滑稽 noi khoi hai.
滓=chi [zi3]\n\t1. Can, duc.
滔=thao, dao [tao1]\n\t1. Thao thao 滔滔 mong menh, nuoc chay cuon cuon. \n\t2. Noi ban rang rang khong ngot goi la thao thao bat kiet 滔滔不竭. Thoi doi ngay kem goi la thao thao giai thi 滔滔皆是. Day day, tran ngap. Nhu hong thuy thao thien 洪水滔天 (Thu Kinh 書經) nuoc ca vuot troi, toi ac thao thien 罪惡滔天 toi ac day troi, v.v. \n\t3. Nhon, coi thuong cac chuc su. \n\t4. Mot am la dao. Hop.
滕=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Nuoc chay vot len. \n\t2. Nuoc Dang. \n\t3. Quai mom ra ma noi.
滙=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoi 匯.
滫=tuu [xiu1]\n\t1. Nuoc vo gao.
滬=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Ho doc 滬瀆 song Ho Doc, o vao dia hat tinh Giang To, nen bay gio goi xu Thuong Hai la dat Ho. \n\t2. Cai dang bat ca.
沪=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Ho doc 滬瀆 song Ho Doc, o vao dia hat tinh Giang To, nen bay gio goi xu Thuong Hai la dat Ho. \n\t2. Cai dang bat ca.
滯=tre [zhi4]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu hang ban khong chay goi la tre tieu 滯銷. \n\t2. Tri tre. \n\t3. Cai gi khong duoc tron tru deu goi la tre. \n\t4. Bo sot. \n\t5. Mac vuong.
滞=tre [zhi4]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu hang ban khong chay goi la tre tieu 滯銷. \n\t2. Tri tre. \n\t3. Cai gi khong duoc tron tru deu goi la tre. \n\t4. Bo sot. \n\t5. Mac vuong.
滲=sam [shen4]\n\t1. Chay, ri ra.
渗=sam [shen4]\n\t1. Chay, ri ra.
滴=tich, trich [di1]\n\t1. Giot nuoc. Nhu quyen tich 涓滴 nho giot. Ta quen doc la chu trich.
滷=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Dat man, ruong muoi. Nuoc muoi goi la diem lo 鹽滷. Nuoc bung dac cung goi la lo.
滸=hu [hu3|xu3]\n\t1. Ven nuoc, ve song.
浒=hu [hu3|xu3]\n\t1. Ven nuoc, ve song.
滹=ho [hu1]\n\t1. Ho da 滹沱 song Ho Da.
滾=con [gun3]\n\t1. Chay cuon cuon. \n\t2. Nuoc soi. \n\t3. Lan di.
滚=con [gun3]\n\t1. Chay cuon cuon. \n\t2. Nuoc soi. \n\t3. Lan di.
滿=man [man3]\n\t1. Day du, day tran, thua, nguoi nhieu coi re nhan mang goi la nhan man 人滿. Nguoi tu kieu cho minh la du cung goi la man (tu dac). \n\t2. Chau Man, giong Man.
满=man [man3]\n\t1. Day du, day tran, thua, nguoi nhieu coi re nhan mang goi la nhan man 人滿. Nguoi tu kieu cho minh la du cung goi la man (tu dac). \n\t2. Chau Man, giong Man.
漁=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Bat ca, danh ca. \n\t2. Lay bua. \n\t3. Ngu loi 漁利 lua gat lay loi.
渔=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Bat ca, danh ca. \n\t2. Lay bua. \n\t3. Ngu loi 漁利 lua gat lay loi.
漂=phieu, phieu [piao1|piao3|piao4]\n\t1. Noi. Nhu phieu luu 漂流 troi noi, phieu bac 漂泊 troi giat, v.v. \n\t2. Thoi, cung nghia voi chu phieu 飄. \n\t3. Dong. \n\t4. Mot am la phieu. Dap soi o trong nuoc (gia vai). \n\t5. Lay nuoc quay de loc lay cai nho bo cai to goi la phieu. \n\t6. Tay, dung cac chat thuoc tay cac thu vai lua cho trang goi la phieu bach 漂白.
漆=tat, the [qi1|xi1]\n\t1. Song Tat. \n\t2. Son. \n\t3. Cay son. \n\t4. Den. \n\t5. Mot am la the. The the 漆漆 cham chu.
漈=te [ji4]\n\t1. Ron be.
漉=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Loc. \n\t2. Het, lam kiet.
漏=lau [lou4]\n\t1. Tham ra, nho ra, ri. \n\t2. Tiet lau, de su bi mat cho ben ngoai biet goi la lau. \n\t3. Khac lau, ngay xua dung cai gao dui thung mot lo nho, do nuoc vao lau lau lai nho mot giot, nuoc day thi cai the khac gio noi len xem phan so nhieu it thi biet duoc thi gio som hay muon. \n\t4. Oc lau 屋漏 xo nha ve phia tay bac, xo nha la cho vang ve khong co ai, nen noi bong ve viec nguoi quan tu biet tu tinh can than tu luc o mot minh goi la bat quy oc lau 不愧屋漏 (Thi Kinh 詩經). \n\t5. Benh lau. Di dai ran mai moi ra tung giot ma hay di ra chat mu rot goi la benh lau. Benh gi co chat long ri ra deu goi la lau. \n\t6. Thoi.
漑=cai, khai [gai4]\n\t1. Tuoi, rot. \n\t2. Giat rua. Ta quen doc la chu khai.
漓=li [li2]\n\t1. Bac beo, cung nghia voi chu ly 醨. \n\t2. Lam li, tham khap.
演=dien [yan3]\n\t1. Dien ra, su gi nhan cai nay duoc cai kia, co the y theo cai le tu nhien ma   suy ra deu goi la dien. Nhu nhan tam que (bat quai 八卦) ma dien ra 64 que, goi   la dien dich 演易. \n\t2. Dien thuyet, dien giang, noi cho to ro het nghia ra. \n\t3. Thu dat, tam thu. Nhu thi dien 試演 thu dien, dien vu 演武 dien nghe vo. \n\t4. Mo phong theo viec. Nhu dong tuong goi la dien kich 演劇. \n\t5. Thien dien 天演 cuoc choi bay tu nhien. \n\t6. Tap truoc. Nhu dien le 演禮 tap le nghi truoc.
漕=tao [cao2]\n\t1. Van tai duong nuoc. Nhu van luong thuc di duong nuoc goi la tao me 演米.
漘=than [chun2]\n\t1. Ben nuoc, ben song.
漙=doan [tuan2]\n\t1. Moc sa mu mit.
漚=au, au [ou1|ou4]\n\t1. Ngam lau. \n\t2. Mot am la au. Bot nuoc.
沤=au, au [ou1|ou4]\n\t1. Ngam lau. \n\t2. Mot am la au. Bot nuoc.
漠=mac [mo4]\n\t1. Bai sa mac (be cat). \n\t2. Yen lang. Nhu dam mac 淡漠 nhat nheo, yen lang, khong the lay danh loi lam dong long duoc. \n\t3. Mac nhien 漠然 chenh mang, coi thuong. \n\t4. Mac mac 漠漠 may mu, may bua mo mit. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Mac mac tran ai man thai khong 漠漠塵埃滿太空 mit mu bui bam bay day bau troi.
漢=han [han4]\n\t1. Song Han. \n\t2. Song Thien Ha (song Thien Ha tren troi). \n\t3. Nha Han. Han Cao To 漢高祖 Luu Bang 劉邦 diet nha Tan len lam vua goi la nha   Tien Han 前漢 (206 truoc T.L.-8 sau T.L.) hay Tay Han 西漢, cach nhau chung 212   nam, vua Quang Vu 光武 Luu Tu 劉秀 trung hung goi la nha Hau Han 後漢 (25-220) hay   Dong Han 東漢. \n\t4. Nuoc Tau. Vi nha Han dem binh tran khap den lan nuoc ngoai nen cac nuoc ngoai goi nuoc Tau la nuoc Han. Ngay nguoi Tau cung tu xung la Han. Tuc goi con trai la han tu 漢子 la do y do. \n\t5. Giong Han, giong dan lam chu nuoc Tau tu doi vua Hoang De tro xuong goi la giong Han.
汉=han [han4]\n\t1. Song Han. \n\t2. Song Thien Ha (song Thien Ha tren troi). \n\t3. Nha Han. Han Cao To 漢高祖 Luu Bang 劉邦 diet nha Tan len lam vua goi la nha   Tien Han 前漢 (206 truoc T.L.-8 sau T.L.) hay Tay Han 西漢, cach nhau chung 212   nam, vua Quang Vu 光武 Luu Tu 劉秀 trung hung goi la nha Hau Han 後漢 (25-220) hay   Dong Han 東漢. \n\t4. Nuoc Tau. Vi nha Han dem binh tran khap den lan nuoc ngoai nen cac nuoc ngoai goi nuoc Tau la nuoc Han. Ngay nguoi Tau cung tu xung la Han. Tuc goi con trai la han tu 漢子 la do y do. \n\t5. Giong Han, giong dan lam chu nuoc Tau tu doi vua Hoang De tro xuong goi la giong Han.
漣=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lan tan, gio thoi tren mat nuoc lan tan goi la lien. \n\t2. Rom nuoc mat.
涟=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lan tan, gio thoi tren mat nuoc lan tan goi la lien. \n\t2. Rom nuoc mat.
漥=oa [wa1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu oa 窪.
漩=tuyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Nuoc xoay, suoi chay quanh.
漪=y [yi1]\n\t1. Song lan tan.
漫=man, man [man4]\n\t1. Day tran. \n\t2. Tan man, buong tuong, khong biet tu kiem che. \n\t3. Uot sung, nat nhau. \n\t4. Quang, hao. Nhu man thinh 漫聽 nghe quang, man ung 漫應 vang vo. \n\t5. Mot am la man. Man man 漫漫 nuoc chay phang lang, menh mang. \n\t6. Dai. Nhu man man truong da 漫漫長夜 dem dai dang dac. \n\t7. Khap. Nhu man son bien da 漫山遍野 day nui khap dong.
漬=ti [zi4]\n\t1. Ngam, tam tham.
渍=ti [zi4]\n\t1. Ngam, tam tham.

漸=tiem, tiem, tiem [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Song Tiem. \n\t2. Dan dan, vat gi bien doi dan dan goi la tiem. \n\t3. Mot am la tiem. Chay vao. \n\t4. Ngam, tam. \n\t5. Nhiem, tiem nhiem. \n\t6. Lai mot am la tiem. Cao voi voi. \n\t7. Hat thoc ruon ruot (ta cai dang lua tot).
渐=tiem, tiem, tiem [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Song Tiem. \n\t2. Dan dan, vat gi bien doi dan dan goi la tiem. \n\t3. Mot am la tiem. Chay vao. \n\t4. Ngam, tam. \n\t5. Nhiem, tiem nhiem. \n\t6. Lai mot am la tiem. Cao voi voi. \n\t7. Hat thoc ruon ruot (ta cai dang lua tot).

潁=toanh, dinh [ying3]\n\t1. Song Toanh. Ta quen doc la chu dinh.
潑=bat [po1]\n\t1. Nuoc vot ra, ban ra ngoai. \n\t2. Hoat bat 活潑 tu do hoat dong, nhanh nhau. \n\t3. Ngang nguoc, hung ton.
泼=bat [po1]\n\t1. Nuoc vot ra, ban ra ngoai. \n\t2. Hoat bat 活潑 tu do hoat dong, nhanh nhau. \n\t3. Ngang nguoc, hung ton.
潔=khiet [jie2]\n\t1. Thanh khiet. \n\t2. Giu minh thanh bach khong them lam cac su phi nghia goi la khiet. \n\t3. Sua tri.
洁=khiet [jie2]\n\t1. Thanh khiet. \n\t2. Giu minh thanh bach khong them lam cac su phi nghia goi la khiet. \n\t3. Sua tri.
潘=phan [pan1]\n\t1. Nuoc vo gao. \n\t2. Ho Phan.
潛=tiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cat kin, giau, giau o trong nuoc ngoai khong trong thay goi la tiem, vi the cai gi dau kin khong lo goi la tham tiem 深潛 hay la tram tiem 沉潛, dung tam vao toi coi tham goi la tiem tam 潛心. \n\t2. O an, khen cai duc hanh cua ke an si goi la tiem duc 潛德. \n\t3. Ngam, khong cho nguoi biet. \n\t4. Tiem long 潛龍 noi luc thien tu chua len ngoi. \n\t5. Song Tiem, dat Tiem. \n\t6. Cho ca nuong o.
潜=tiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cat kin, giau, giau o trong nuoc ngoai khong trong thay goi la tiem, vi the cai gi dau kin khong lo goi la tham tiem 深潛 hay la tram tiem 沉潛, dung tam vao toi coi tham goi la tiem tam 潛心. \n\t2. O an, khen cai duc hanh cua ke an si goi la tiem duc 潛德. \n\t3. Ngam, khong cho nguoi biet. \n\t4. Tiem long 潛龍 noi luc thien tu chua len ngoi. \n\t5. Song Tiem, dat Tiem. \n\t6. Cho ca nuong o.
潞=lo [lu4]\n\t1. Song Lo.
潟=tich [xi4]\n\t1. Dat man, dat co chat muoi.
潢=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Cai ao. \n\t2. Thien hoang 天潢 dong ho nha vua. \n\t3. Trang hoang 裝潢 nhuom giay, thiep son tren chu tren buc ve cung goi la trang hoang.
潤=nhuan [run4]\n\t1. Nhuan, tham, them. \n\t2. Nhuan, nhuan nha, pham cai gi khong kho rao deu goi la nhuan. \n\t3. Lay cua ma den cong cho nguoi goi la nhuan. Nhu nhuan but 潤筆 (xin van xin chu cua nguoi roi lay tien ma tang tra). \n\t4. Nhuan sac 潤色 to diem cho them van ve, sua lai van tu cung goi la nhuan sac.
润=nhuan [run4]\n\t1. Nhuan, tham, them. \n\t2. Nhuan, nhuan nha, pham cai gi khong kho rao deu goi la nhuan. \n\t3. Lay cua ma den cong cho nguoi goi la nhuan. Nhu nhuan but 潤筆 (xin van xin chu cua nguoi roi lay tien ma tang tra). \n\t4. Nhuan sac 潤色 to diem cho them van ve, sua lai van tu cung goi la nhuan sac.
潦=lao, lao [lao3|liao2]\n\t1. Mua ngap, ngap lut, mua qua goi la thuy lao 水潦. \n\t2. Hang lao vung nuoc dong tren duong. \n\t3. Mot am la lao. Lao dao 潦倒 vat va, khong hop thoi nghi. \n\t4. Lao thao 潦草 luom thuom. Ta quen doc la chu lao ca.
潭=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Cai dam, dam nuoc sau. \n\t2. Dam dam 潭潭 tham tham, ta cai ve cung dien sau tham tham.
潮=trieu [chao2]\n\t1. Nuoc thuy trieu. \n\t2. Uot at. \n\t3. Dung gio phat len goi la trieu. Nhu chung sot cu den trua noi con goi la trieu nhiet 潮熱.
潯=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Ben song. \n\t2. Song Tam. \n\t3. Ten dat, dat Cuu Giang 九江 goi la Tam.
浔=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Ben song. \n\t2. Song Tam. \n\t3. Ten dat, dat Cuu Giang 九江 goi la Tam.
潰=hoi [hui4|kui4]\n\t1. Vo ngang. Nuoc pha ngang bo chan ma chay toe vao goi la hoi. Nhu hoi de 潰隄 vo de. \n\t2. Tan lo, dan bo nguoi cai tri tron di goi la hoi. \n\t3. Vo lo, binh thua tran chay tan loan goi la hoi. \n\t4. Giot say vo mu cung goi la hoi. \n\t5. Gian.
溃=hoi [hui4|kui4]\n\t1. Vo ngang. Nuoc pha ngang bo chan ma chay toe vao goi la hoi. Nhu hoi de 潰隄 vo de. \n\t2. Tan lo, dan bo nguoi cai tri tron di goi la hoi. \n\t3. Vo lo, binh thua tran chay tan loan goi la hoi. \n\t4. Giot say vo mu cung goi la hoi. \n\t5. Gian.
潸=san [shan1]\n\t1. Sa nuoc mat, chay nuoc mat.
潺=san [chan2]\n\t1. San san 潺潺 nuoc chay ri ri (lu du).
潼=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Tu dong 梓潼 song Tu Dong.
澀=sap [se4]\n\t1. Rit, rap, cai gi khong duoc tron tru goi la sap. \n\t2. Chat sit. \n\t3. Van chuong kho doc cung goi la sap.
涩=sap [se4]\n\t1. Rit, rap, cai gi khong duoc tron tru goi la sap. \n\t2. Chat sit. \n\t3. Van chuong kho doc cung goi la sap.
澁=sap [se4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sap 澀.
澄=trung [cheng2|deng4]\n\t1. Lang trong. \n\t2. Gan.
澆=kieu, nghieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Bac. \n\t2. Tuoi. Co noi doc la nghieu.
浇=kieu, nghieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Bac. \n\t2. Tuoi. Co noi doc la nghieu.
澇=lao, lao, lao [lao4]\n\t1. Ngam. \n\t2. Mot am la lao. Song to. \n\t3. Lai mot am la lao. Song Lao.
涝=lao, lao, lao [lao4]\n\t1. Ngam. \n\t2. Mot am la lao. Song to. \n\t3. Lai mot am la lao. Song Lao.
澈=triet [che4]\n\t1. Nuoc lang trong, trong suot. \n\t2. Dong triet 洞澈 suot thau, hieu ranh mach khong con ngo vuc gi nua.
澌=ti, te [si1]\n\t1. Het. \n\t2. Mot am la te. Khan tieng.
澍=chu [shu4]\n\t1. Mua phai thoi. \n\t2. Tuoi mat, mua tham nhuan vat goi la chu, vi the nen co an trach den nguoi cung goi la chu.
澎=banh [peng1|peng2]\n\t1. Banh phai 澎湃 nuoc mong menh.
澗=gian [jian4]\n\t1. Khe, suoi, cho giua hai mien nui gan nuoc cung goi la gian.
涧=gian [jian4]\n\t1. Khe, suoi, cho giua hai mien nui gan nuoc cung goi la gian.
澣=can [wan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoan, can 浣.
澠=thang, man [mian3|sheng2]\n\t1. Song Thang. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Song Man.
渑=thang, man [mian3|sheng2]\n\t1. Song Thang. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Song Man.
澡=tao, thao [zao3]\n\t1. Tam, rua, co cho doc la thao.
澤=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai dam, cai cham, cho nuoc dong lon. \n\t2. Tham uot, cai gi nho de tuoi tam cho cay coi duoc deu goi la trach. Nhu vu trach 雨澤 mua tham. \n\t3. Nhan bong. \n\t4. An trach, lam su loi ich (an duc tham toi moi nguoi). \n\t5. Hoi thua. Nhu thu trach ton yen 手澤存焉 (Le ky 禮記) hoi tay con vay (nho nguoi truoc lam ra ma nguoi sau duoc huong. Nhu sach vo, v.v.) \n\t6. Loc. \n\t7. Man me. \n\t8. Cai phong khi cung viec hay cua nguoi truoc con luu lai goi la trach. \n\t9. Trach cung 澤宮 nha tap ban, trai ban. \n\t10. Ao lot minh. 
泽=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai dam, cai cham, cho nuoc dong lon. \n\t2. Tham uot, cai gi nho de tuoi tam cho cay coi duoc deu goi la trach. Nhu vu trach 雨澤 mua tham. \n\t3. Nhan bong. \n\t4. An trach, lam su loi ich (an duc tham toi moi nguoi). \n\t5. Hoi thua. Nhu thu trach ton yen 手澤存焉 (Le ky 禮記) hoi tay con vay (nho nguoi truoc lam ra ma nguoi sau duoc huong. Nhu sach vo, v.v.) \n\t6. Loc. \n\t7. Man me. \n\t8. Cai phong khi cung viec hay cua nguoi truoc con luu lai goi la trach. \n\t9. Trach cung 澤宮 nha tap ban, trai ban. \n\t10. Ao lot minh. 
澥=hai, giai [xie4]\n\t1. Bot giai 渤澥 vung be, cho be chia nganh khac. Nhu vung be tinh Lieu Dong goi la bot hai 渤海.
澧=le [li3]\n\t1. Song Le.
澨=phe [shi4]\n\t1. Song Phe. \n\t2. Ben song.
澮=quai [hui4|kuai4]\n\t1. Cai ngoi nho, cai ranh.
浍=quai [hui4|kuai4]\n\t1. Cai ngoi nho, cai ranh.
澱=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Can. \n\t2. Lay phan hoa vao nuoc cho no lang dong lai la dien phan 澱粉.
淀=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Can. \n\t2. Lay phan hoa vao nuoc cho no lang dong lai la dien phan 澱粉.
澳=uc, ao [ao4]\n\t1. Cho nuoc uon quanh. \n\t2. Mot am la ao. Pham ven be cho nao co the do thuyen be duoc deu goi la ao. \n\t3. Chau Ao, goi tat ten chau Ao Dai Loi A 澳大利亞 (Australia). \n\t4. Xu Ao-mon 澳門, cung goi tat la Ao.
澶=thien, dan [chan2]\n\t1. Song Thien. \n\t2. Mot am la dan. Dan man 澶漫 phong tung, xa.
澼=phich [pi4]\n\t1. Binh phich 洴澼 tieng giat soi tren mat nuoc.
激=kich [ji1]\n\t1. Xoi, can nuoc dang chay manh cho no vot len goi la kich. Nhu kich le 激厲, kich duong 激揚 deu chi ve su kheo dung nguoi khien cho nguoi ta phan phat chi khi len ca. \n\t3. Nhanh nhen (ta cai the manh va mau chong). \n\t4. Ban bac thang qua goi la kich thiet 激切. \n\t5. Cam dong, phan phat len goi la cam kich 感激. \n\t6. Cu tu y minh lam ra khac la khong theo nhu nguoi goi la kich.
濁=troc, trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Nuoc duc. \n\t2. Pham cai gi khong duoc trong sach deu goi la troc. Nhu troc the 濁世 doi loan, troc luu 濁流 lu hen ha. Chinh am la chu trac.
浊=troc, trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Nuoc duc. \n\t2. Pham cai gi khong duoc trong sach deu goi la troc. Nhu troc the 濁世 doi loan, troc luu 濁流 lu hen ha. Chinh am la chu trac.
濂=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Suoi Liem.
濃=nung [nong2]\n\t1. Nong, dac, trai lai voi chu dam 淡.
浓=nung [nong2]\n\t1. Nong, dac, trai lai voi chu dam 淡.
濆=phan, phan [fen2]\n\t1. Dong nhanh. \n\t2. Ben song. \n\t3. Mot am la phan. Phun ra, vut ra.
濊=ue, khoat [hui4]\n\t1. Nuoc duc. \n\t2. Do ban. \n\t3. Uong ue 汪濊 sau rong. \n\t4. Mot am la khoat. Khoat khoat 濊濊 soan soat, roc rach, tieng tha luoi xuong nuoc, tieng nuoc chay khong thong.
濕=thap, chap [shi1]\n\t1. Uot, am thap. \n\t2. Mot am la chap. Chap chap 濕濕 tai trau ve vay.
湿=thap, chap [shi1]\n\t1. Uot, am thap. \n\t2. Mot am la chap. Chap chap 濕濕 tai trau ve vay.
濘=ninh [ning4]\n\t1. Ne ninh 泥濘 bun lay.
泞=ninh [ning4]\n\t1. Ne ninh 泥濘 bun lay.
濛=mong [meng1]\n\t1. Mua day (mua nho).
濟=te, te [ji3|ji4]\n\t1. Song Te. \n\t2. Te te 濟濟 dong duc (ta cai ve dong ma thinh). \n\t3. Mot am la te. Qua sang. Nhu te do 濟渡 chu nha Phat, y noi Phat cuu vot nguoi khoi be kho. Nhu nguoi vot ke chet duoi cho sang ben kia song vay. \n\t4. Ben do, cho loi sang. \n\t5. Nen, xong. Nhu bat te su 不濟事 chang nen viec. \n\t6. Them. Nhu tiep te 接濟 giup thep. \n\t7. Cuu giup.
济=te, te [ji3|ji4]\n\t1. Song Te. \n\t2. Te te 濟濟 dong duc (ta cai ve dong ma thinh). \n\t3. Mot am la te. Qua sang. Nhu te do 濟渡 chu nha Phat, y noi Phat cuu vot nguoi khoi be kho. Nhu nguoi vot ke chet duoi cho sang ben kia song vay. \n\t4. Ben do, cho loi sang. \n\t5. Nen, xong. Nhu bat te su 不濟事 chang nen viec. \n\t6. Them. Nhu tiep te 接濟 giup thep. \n\t7. Cuu giup.
濠=hao [hao2]\n\t1. Cai hao.
濡=nhu, nhi [ru2]\n\t1. Song Nhu. \n\t2. Tham uot. \n\t3. Cham tre (doi lau). \n\t4. Tap quen. Nhu nhi nhu muc nhiem 耳濡目染 quen tai quen mat. \n\t5. Mot am la nhi. Cung nghia voi chu nhi 胹.
濤=dao [tao1]\n\t1. Song ca.
涛=dao [tao1]\n\t1. Song ca.
濫=lam, lam, cam [lan4]\n\t1. Gian giua. \n\t2. Nuoc tran ngap. \n\t3. Qua lam. Nhu lam hinh 濫刑 dung hinh qua phep, lam thuong 濫賞 thuong qua lam, v.v. \n\t4. Phong tung. Nhu tieu nhan cung tu lam hi 小人窮斯濫矣 (Luan Ngu 論語) ke tieu nhan cung quan lien phong tung ngay. Choi ban khong ken chon goi la lam giao 濫交. \n\t5. Loi vien vong. \n\t6. Lam trang 濫觴 cai moi nho gay nen su lon, cung nhu nuoc suoi moi chay ra chi nong ngap cai chen ma sau thanh song thanh be. \n\t7. Mot am la lam. Qua ngam, qua dam duong. \n\t8. Lai mot am la cam. Cai bon tam.
滥=lam, lam, cam [lan4]\n\t1. Gian giua. \n\t2. Nuoc tran ngap. \n\t3. Qua lam. Nhu lam hinh 濫刑 dung hinh qua phep, lam thuong 濫賞 thuong qua lam, v.v. \n\t4. Phong tung. Nhu tieu nhan cung tu lam hi 小人窮斯濫矣 (Luan Ngu 論語) ke tieu nhan cung quan lien phong tung ngay. Choi ban khong ken chon goi la lam giao 濫交. \n\t5. Loi vien vong. \n\t6. Lam trang 濫觴 cai moi nho gay nen su lon, cung nhu nuoc suoi moi chay ra chi nong ngap cai chen ma sau thanh song thanh be. \n\t7. Mot am la lam. Qua ngam, qua dam duong. \n\t8. Lai mot am la cam. Cai bon tam.
濬=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Khoi thong. \n\t2. Sau sac, nguoi nao tham tram co tri lu goi la tuan triet 濬哲.
濮=boc [pu2]\n\t1. Song Boc. \n\t2. Ho mot giong moi ro.
濯=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Rua, giat. \n\t2. Trac trac 濯濯 sang sua, beo map map, tro troi, nui troc khong co cay goi la trac trac.
濰=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Song Duy.
潍=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Song Duy.

滨=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Ben. \n\t2. Bai.
濺=tien, tien [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Tien tien 濺濺 nuoc chay ve ve. \n\t2. Mot am la tien. Vay uot.
溅=tien, tien [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Tien tien 濺濺 nuoc chay ve ve. \n\t2. Mot am la tien. Vay uot.
濼=lac, bac [luo4|po1]\n\t1. Song Lac. \n\t2. Mot am la bac. Cai ho, cai ao to.
泺=lac, bac [luo4|po1]\n\t1. Song Lac. \n\t2. Mot am la bac. Cai ho, cai ao to.

瀆=doc, dau [du2]\n\t1. Cai ngoi. \n\t2. Quay nhieu, quay ray. Xin di xin lai mai cho nguoi ta chan phien goi la doc. \n\t3. Nham, khinh nhon. \n\t4. Thay doi. \n\t5. Mot am la dau. Cung nghia voi chu dau 竇.
渎=doc, dau [du2]\n\t1. Cai ngoi. \n\t2. Quay nhieu, quay ray. Xin di xin lai mai cho nguoi ta chan phien goi la doc. \n\t3. Nham, khinh nhon. \n\t4. Thay doi. \n\t5. Mot am la dau. Cung nghia voi chu dau 竇.
瀉=ta [xie4]\n\t1. Doc xuong, chay nhu rot xuong. \n\t2. Benh ta (di rua).
泻=ta [xie4]\n\t1. Doc xuong, chay nhu rot xuong. \n\t2. Benh ta (di rua).
瀋=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Nuoc ep ra.
渖=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Nuoc ep ra.
瀍=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Song Trien.
瀏=luu, luu [liu2]\n\t1. Trong leo leo. \n\t2. Gio mat, cung doc la chu luu.
浏=luu, luu [liu2]\n\t1. Trong leo leo. \n\t2. Gio mat, cung doc la chu luu.
瀑=boc [bao4|pu4]\n\t1. Nuoc doc, suoi, nuoc chay tren ghenh xuong trong nhu tam vai goi la boc bo 瀑布.
瀕=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Ben. \n\t2. Gan, sap. Nhu tan hanh 瀕行 sap di. \n\t3. Dat gan nuoc.
濒=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Ben. \n\t2. Gan, sap. Nhu tan hanh 瀕行 sap di. \n\t3. Dat gan nuoc.
瀘=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Song Lo.
泸=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Song Lo.
瀚=han [han4]\n\t1. Han hai 瀚海 be cat. \n\t2. Hao han 浩瀚 mong menh, bat ngat.
瀛=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Be. \n\t2. Doanh hoan 瀛寰 thien ha, bon be muon nuoc. \n\t3. Doanh chau 瀛洲 ngay xua cho la cho tien o, nay ta goi cac gia quyen nha nguoi khac la doanh quyen 瀛眷 nghia la ca tung nhu dong doi nha tien vay.
瀝=lich [li4]\n\t1. Nho giot (nuoc chay tung giot xuong). \n\t2. Loc. \n\t3. Tich lich 滴瀝 ty tach (tieng mua tuyet). \n\t4. Giot ruou thua.
沥=lich [li4]\n\t1. Nho giot (nuoc chay tung giot xuong). \n\t2. Loc. \n\t3. Tich lich 滴瀝 ty tach (tieng mua tuyet). \n\t4. Giot ruou thua.
瀟=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Tieu tieu 瀟瀟 gio tap mua xa. \n\t2. Song Tieu.
潇=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Tieu tieu 瀟瀟 gio tap mua xa. \n\t2. Song Tieu.
瀡=tuy [sui3]\n\t1. Tron tuot.
瀣=doi [xie4]\n\t1. Hang doi 沆瀣 hoi moc (hoi suong moc), chi khi hai nguoi hop nhau goi la hang doi nhat khi 沆瀣一氣.
瀦=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Chua, nuoc dong.
潴=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Chua, nuoc dong.

瀲=liem [lian4]\n\t1. Xem chu liem 灩.

瀹=thuoc [yue4]\n\t1. Nau. Nhu thuoc minh 瀹茗 nau nuoc che. \n\t2. So thuoc 疏瀹 khoi dao (khoi song cho thong)
瀼=nhuong, nhuong [rang2]\n\t1. Nhuong nhuong 瀼瀼 moc sa dam dia. \n\t2. Mot am la nhuong. Nuoc u.
瀾=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Song ca. \n\t2. Nuoc gao.
澜=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Song ca. \n\t2. Nuoc gao.
灉=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Nuoc tu song chay ra. \n\t2. Song Ung.
灊=tiem [qian2]\n\t1. Ten dat.
灌=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Rot vao, tuoi. \n\t2. Cay moc tung bui la la. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu quan 祼 
灑=sai [sa3]\n\t1. Vay nuoc. \n\t2. Sai nhien 灑然 giat minh, ta cai dang kinh hoang. \n\t3. Tu nhien khong bo buoc. Nhu sai lac 灑落, sai thoat 灑脫 deu nghia la tieu dao tu tai, khong vuong vit vao cai gi.
灘=than [tan1]\n\t1. Dat ven nuoc. \n\t2. Cai thac.

灝=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 灝灝 rong mong menh.

灞=ba [ba4]\n\t1. Song Ba.
灣=loan [wan1]\n\t1. Vung be, cho nuoc hom vao.

灤=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Song Loan.

灨=cam, cong [gan4]\n\t1. Song Cam, cung doc la chu cong.
灩=liem [yan4]\n\t1. Liem liem 灩灩 nuoc dong (song sanh).
滟=liem [yan4]\n\t1. Liem liem 灩灩 nuoc dong (song sanh).
火=hoa [huo3]\n\t1. Lua. \n\t2. Chay, nha cua bi lua chay goi la hoa tai 火災. \n\t3. Phep binh ngay xua cu muoi nguoi goi la mot hoa. Nguoi trong mot hoa goi la hoa ban 火伴. \n\t4. Kip, khan cap, su gi can kip goi la hoa toc 火速. Pham gap su gi khan cap phai ra lenh mau goi la hoa bai 火牌 hay hoa phieu 火票, v.v. cung co nghia la khan cap ca. \n\t5. Gian tuc, tuc goi noi gian la dong hoa 動火. \n\t6. Sao hoa.
灯=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dang 燈.
灰=hoi, khoi [hui1]\n\t1. Tro, vat gi dot ra tro roi khong the chay duoc nua goi la tu hoi 死灰. Vi the nen su gi that y khong co hy vong nua goi la tam hoi 心灰. \n\t2. Da voi, goi du phai goi la thach hoi 石灰. \n\t3. Mau tro, mau den nho nho, thuong doc la khoi.
灳=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu linh 靈.
灵=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu linh 靈.
灸=cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Cuu, lay ngai cuu cham lua dot vao cac huyet de chua benh goi la cuu.
灼=chuoc [zhuo2]\n\t1. Dot, nuong. \n\t2. Sang to, to ro. \n\t3. Ro ro, cai ve hoa no tot tuoi.
災=tai [zai1]\n\t1. Chay nha. \n\t2. Tai va, nhung su troi dat bien la, nhung su khong may deu goi la tai ca.
灾=tai [zai1]\n\t1. Chay nha. \n\t2. Tai va, nhung su troi dat bien la, nhung su khong may deu goi la tai ca.
灾=tai [zai1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tai 災.
炁=khi [qi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khi 氣.
炊=xuy, xuy [chui1]\n\t1. Thoi nau, lay lua dun cho chin do an goi la xuy. \n\t2. Mot am la xuy. Xuy luy 炊累 bui bay loan xoan.
炎=viem, dam, diem [yan2]\n\t1. Boc chay, ngon lua. \n\t2. Nong, mua he goi la mua viem nhiet 炎熱. \n\t3. Phuong nam goi la viem phuong 炎方. \n\t4. Mot am la dam. Ruc ro. \n\t5. Lai mot am nua la diem. Cung nghia voi chu diem 燄.
炒=sao [chao3]\n\t1. Sao, rang. \n\t2. Cai va.
炕=khang [kang4]\n\t1. Kho rao, nuong, say. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu khang 匟, ve phuong bac khi hau ret lam, phai xay buc o tren, trong buc co dot lua cho am ma ngu goi la khang. \n\t3. He ra, mo ra.
炙=chich, cha [zhi4]\n\t1. Nuong, cho thit len tren lua cho chin goi la chich. \n\t2. Mot am la cha. Cha, thit nuong. \n\t3. Than gan, duoc gan ma tiem nhiem nhung tinh hay goi la than cha 親炙.
炧=da [duo4]\n\t1. Duoc tan, duoc chay con thua lai.
炫=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Ruc ro. \n\t2. Khoe khoang, tu khoe minh goi la tu huyen 自炫.
炬=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Bo duoc.
炭=than [tan4]\n\t1. Than. \n\t2. Chat than, chat doc tho o trong minh ra goi la than khi 炭氣, vat gi co chat ay goi la than to 炭素. \n\t3. Do than 塗炭 (cung viet la 荼炭) lam than, noi dan bi chanh tri tan ac kho so qua, vi the nen doi loan goi la sinh linh do than 生靈塗炭. \n\t4. Bang than 冰炭 than gia, noi nhung su vat tinh chat khac nhau khong the hop duoc. Nguoi khong hoa hop y nhau cung goi la bang than.
炮=phao, bao [bao1|pao2|pao4]\n\t1. Sung lon. Xem chu phao 礮. \n\t2. Mot am la bao. Nuong (boc lai ma nuong). \n\t3. Thuoc sao khong de cho chay mat nguyen tinh goi la bao che 炮製. Nhu bao khuong 炮薑 gung sao chay chua vac han.
炯=quynh, huynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Quynh quynh 炯炯 loe loe, sang choi loi, soi to. \n\t2. Cung doc la chu huynh.
炰=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Nau nuong.
炱=dai [tai2]\n\t1. Tro, muoi, mo hong. \n\t2. Sac den 
炳=binh, binh [bing3]\n\t1. To ro. Nhu binh nhien 炳然 ro vay, binh binh 炳炳 ro ro, ro ret. \n\t2. Van minh. Cung doc la chu binh.
炷=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Bac den. \n\t2. Ho nong. \n\t3. Dot. Nhu chu huong 炷香
炸=tac [zha2|zha4]\n\t1. Tuc no, thuoc dan no manh goi la tac dan 炸彈. \n\t2. Do an nau dau. Nhu tac nhuc 炸肉 thit nau dau.
点=diem [dian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu diem 點.
為=vi [wei2|wei4]\n\t1. Dung nhu chu vi 爲.
为=vi [wei2|wei4]\n\t1. Dung nhu chu vi 爲.
烈=liet [lie4]\n\t1. Chay du, lua manh. \n\t2. Cong nghiep. \n\t3. Cung coi, chinh dinh. Nhu liet si 烈士 ke si cung coi chet vi nuoc khong chiu khuat, liet nu 烈女 con cai cung coi chet vi tiet nghia khong chiu nhuc than, v.v. \n\t4. Ac. \n\t5. Dep, ro ret. \n\t6. Thua, rot lai. \n\t7. Liet liet 烈烈 lo sot ruot. \n\t8. Ret cam cam.
烊=duong [yang2|yang4]\n\t1. Nau chay ra, nau cho cac loai kim chay ra.
烏=o [wu1]\n\t1. Con qua, qua con biet mom qua gia cho nen su hieu duong cha me goi la o dieu chi tu 烏鳥之私. \n\t2. Sac den. Nhu ngua den goi la ngua o, ga den goi la ga o, v.v. \n\t3. O ho 烏乎 than oi ! \n\t4. O o 烏烏 o o, tieng hat phao ra. \n\t5. Sao, dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu o huu 烏有 sao co ?
乌=o [wu1]\n\t1. Con qua, qua con biet mom qua gia cho nen su hieu duong cha me goi la o dieu chi tu 烏鳥之私. \n\t2. Sac den. Nhu ngua den goi la ngua o, ga den goi la ga o, v.v. \n\t3. O ho 烏乎 than oi ! \n\t4. O o 烏烏 o o, tieng hat phao ra. \n\t5. Sao, dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu o huu 烏有 sao co ?
烖=tai [zai1]\n\t1. Nguy, nguyen la chu tai 災.
烘=hong [hong1]\n\t1. Dot. \n\t2. Say, ho lua.
烙=lac [lao4|luo4]\n\t1. Ap lua, la. Cai ban la goi la lac thiet 烙鐵.
烝=chung, chung [zheng1]\n\t1. Te chung, le te ve mua dong goi la chung. \n\t2. Nhieu, dong. Nhu chung dan 烝民 lu dan. \n\t3. Hoi boc len. \n\t4. Nau hoi, nau lay chat hoi. \n\t5. De. \n\t6. De muong sinh len tren cai tro. \n\t7. Hap. \n\t8. Loan dam voi nguoi tren. \n\t9. Mot am la chung. Nong.
烟=yen [yan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu yen 煙.
烤=khao [kao3]\n\t1. Say, nuong.
烹=phanh [peng1]\n\t1. Nau.
烽=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Dot lua lam hieu. Doi xua dong don, he thay giac den thi dot lua lam hieu goi la phong.
焉=yen, dien [yan1]\n\t1. Chim yen. \n\t2. Sao, dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu nhan yen suu tai 人焉廋哉 (Luan ngu 論語) nguoi sao dau duoc thay ! \n\t3. Yen ki 焉耆 ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t4. Mot am la dien. Dung lam tro tu, cung nghia voi chu nhien 然. Nhu duong duong dien 烊烊焉 nhon nhon vay. \n\t5. Vay, dung lam tieng noi dut loi. Nhu tuu huu dao nhi chinh dien 就有道而正焉 toi ke co dao ma chat chinh vay. Ta quen doc la chu yen ca.
焙=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Boi, say, ho lua.
焚=phan, phan [fen2]\n\t1. Dot. Nhu phan huong 焚香 dot huong. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. Cung nghia voi chu phan 僨.
焜=hon, con [kun1]\n\t1. Hon dieu 焜耀 ruc ro, choi loi. Cung viet la hon dieu 焜燿. Co khi doc la chu con.
焠=thoi [cui4]\n\t1. Dot. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu thoi 淬.
無=vo, mo [mo2|wu2]\n\t1. Khong. \n\t2. Vo minh 無明 chu nha Phat, nghia la ngu si khong co tri tue. \n\t3. Vo lau 無漏 chu nha Phat, phep tu dung tri tue chan that tru sach coi re phien nao la phep vo lau. \n\t4. Vo sinh 無生 chu nha Phat, nghia la tu chung toi bac nhan duoc khong co phap nao sinh ra nua. \n\t5. Mot am la mo. Nam mo 南無, nguyen tieng Pham la Namanab, nghia la quy y la cung kinh dinh le.
无=vo, mo [mo2|wu2]\n\t1. Khong. \n\t2. Vo minh 無明 chu nha Phat, nghia la ngu si khong co tri tue. \n\t3. Vo lau 無漏 chu nha Phat, phep tu dung tri tue chan that tru sach coi re phien nao la phep vo lau. \n\t4. Vo sinh 無生 chu nha Phat, nghia la tu chung toi bac nhan duoc khong co phap nao sinh ra nua. \n\t5. Mot am la mo. Nam mo 南無, nguyen tieng Pham la Namanab, nghia la quy y la cung kinh dinh le.
焦=tieu, tieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Chay bong, chay sem. \n\t2. Tam tieu 三焦 ba mang mo dinh lien voi cac tang phu. \n\t3. Doan tieu 團焦 cai leu tranh. \n\t4. Lo buon kho nao goi la tam tieu 心焦. \n\t5. Khet, mui lua. \n\t6. Mot am la chu tieu. Cung nghia voi chu tieu 憔. 
焮=han [xin4]\n\t1. Ho nong, nuong. \n\t2. Mung do len.
焰=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Ngon lua, anh lua.
焱=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Tia lua sang, lua toe hoa cai.
然=nhien [ran2]\n\t1. Dot chay. Nhu nhuoc hoa chi thuy nhien 若火之始然 (Manh Tu 孟子) nhu lua chung moi chay, nguyen la chu nhien 燃. \n\t2. Ung cho. Nhu nhien nac 然諾 u cho. \n\t3. Nhu the. Nhu khoi ki nhien ho 豈其然乎 ha thua nhu the u ! \n\t4. Loi dap lai (phai day). Nhu thi Lo Khong Khau chi do du ? Viet nhien 是魯孔丘之徒與 ? 曰然 ga ay co phai la do de ong Khong Khau o nuoc Lo khong ? Phai day. \n\t5. Dung lam loi tro ngu. Nhu du nhien tac van 油然而雲 un vay noi may. \n\t6. Loi thua tren tiep duoi. Nhu nhien hau 然後 vay sau, roi moi, nhien tac 然則 the thoi, nhien nhi 然而 nhung ma, v.v.
煅=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Nung, nuong, thuong dung chu doan 鍛.
煇=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu huy 輝.
煉=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Nung duc, ren duc, xem chu luyen 鍊.
炼=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Nung duc, ren duc, xem chu luyen 鍊.
煊=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu huyen 暄.
煌=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Sang sua, sang lang.
煎=tien, tien [jian1]\n\t1. Nau, sac, chat nuoc dem dun cho dac goi la tien. \n\t2. Mot am la tien. Ngam, dem cac thu qua ngam mat goi la mat tien 蜜煎.
煏=phuc [bi4]\n\t1. Ho lua, say.
煑=chu [zhu3]\n\t1. Nau, thoi.
煒=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Do lung.
炜=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Do lung.
煕=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Sang sua. \n\t2. Hi hi 煕煕 hon ho vui hoa. \n\t3. Rong.
煖=noan, huyen [nuan3]\n\t1. Am. \n\t2. Mot am la huyen. Ten nguoi.
煙=yen [yan1]\n\t1. Khoi. \n\t2. Chat hoi nhieu goi la yen. Nhu van yen 雲煙 may mo, yen vu 煙霧 mu mit, v.v. \n\t3. Thuoc hut. Nhu lao yen 牢煙 thuoc lao, nha phien yen 鴉片煙 thuoc phien, v.v. \n\t4. Nho noi, than muoi. Cung co khi viet la yen 烟.
烟=yen [yan1]\n\t1. Khoi. \n\t2. Chat hoi nhieu goi la yen. Nhu van yen 雲煙 may mo, yen vu 煙霧 mu mit, v.v. \n\t3. Thuoc hut. Nhu lao yen 牢煙 thuoc lao, nha phien yen 鴉片煙 thuoc phien, v.v. \n\t4. Nho noi, than muoi. Cung co khi viet la yen 烟.
煜=duc [yu4]\n\t1. Ruc ro. \n\t2. Ngon lua.
煞=sat [sha1|sha4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sat 殺. Cac hung than deu goi la sat. \n\t2. Lay ngay ke chet ma tinh xem den ngay nao hon ve goi la quy sat 歸煞. \n\t3. Thu sat 收煞 thu thuc lai. \n\t4. Rat. Nhu sat phi kinh doanh 煞費經營 kinh doanh rat kho nhoc.
煠=sap [ye4]\n\t1. Ninh, nau, cho dau hay nuoc truoc dun soi da roi moi cho do an vao nau goi la sap.
煢=quynh [qiong2]\n\t1. Coi cut, tro troi co mot minh khong nuong vao duoc goi la quynh. Kinh Thi viet la 惸. \n\t2. Quynh quynh 煢煢 lo lang.
茕=quynh [qiong2]\n\t1. Coi cut, tro troi co mot minh khong nuong vao duoc goi la quynh. Kinh Thi viet la 惸. \n\t2. Quynh quynh 煢煢 lo lang.
煤=moi [mei2]\n\t1. Than mo, than da. Cay coi do nat bi dat de len, lau ngay dong lai thanh ra than ran nhu da, suc lua rat manh goi la moi. \n\t2. Khoi boc len dong o tren mai nha goi la moi dai 煤炱 (mo hong).
煥=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Sang sua, ruc ro.
焕=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Sang sua, ruc ro.
煦=hu [xu4]\n\t1. Khi am, hoi am. \n\t2. Hu au 煦嫗 ap am, noi bong nghia la dai nguoi co on hue. \n\t3. Hu hu 煦煦 au yem von va.
照=chieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Soi sang. \n\t2. Tuc goi van bang hay cai giay chung chi la chap chieu 執照 hay chieu ho 照護. \n\t3. Bao khap. Nhu chieu hoi 照會, tri chieu 知照 deu nghia la bao khap cho moi nguoi deu biet ca. \n\t4. So sanh, cu noi. Nhu chieu le 照例 cu noi le cu. \n\t5. Doi xet, song nhau ma xet. Nhu doi chieu 對照. \n\t6. Ve truyen than. 
煨=oi [wei1]\n\t1. Nuong. \n\t2. Lua trong bon. \n\t3. Gio nong (tro nong).
煩=phien [fan2]\n\t1. Phien (khong duoc gian di). \n\t2. Nhoc, nho nguoi ra giup ho goi la phien. \n\t3. Phien nao, buon, viec nhieu khong chiu noi goi la phien muon 煩悶.
烦=phien [fan2]\n\t1. Phien (khong duoc gian di). \n\t2. Nhoc, nho nguoi ra giup ho goi la phien. \n\t3. Phien nao, buon, viec nhieu khong chiu noi goi la phien muon 煩悶.
煬=duong, duong [yang2]\n\t1. Nau chay. \n\t2. Mot am la duong. Che anh lua. Noi bong la lam cho vua toi tam. \n\t2. Lua chay, lua reo.
炀=duong, duong [yang2]\n\t1. Nau chay. \n\t2. Mot am la duong. Che anh lua. Noi bong la lam cho vua toi tam. \n\t2. Lua chay, lua reo.
煼=sao [chao3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu sao 炒.
煽=phien [shan1]\n\t1. Quat lua bung len, noi nghia bong thi giup nguoi la ac goi la co phien 鼓煽, khuyen nguoi lam ac goi la phien du 煽誘 hay phien hoac 煽惑, khuyen nguoi lam loan goi la phien loan 煽亂.
熄=tuc [xi1]\n\t1. Dap lua, tat lua. \n\t2. Tieu mon mat tich.
熇=hoc, khao [kao3]\n\t1. Lua nong. \n\t2. Mot am la khao. Ho lua.
熊=hung [xiong2]\n\t1. Con gau. \n\t2. Hung hung 熊熊 sang lang, ruc ro. \n\t3. Hung bi 熊羆 manh me, nguoi dung si. Vi the nen binh linh goi la hung bi. \n\t4. Ngay xua bao nam chiem bao thay con gau thi de con trai, cho nen chuc mung nguoi sinh con trai goi la mong hung huu trieu 夢熊有兆 (co diem mong gau).
