熏=huan [xun1|xun4]\n\t1. Hun (khoi lua boc len). \n\t2. Huan huan 熏熏 vui hoa, tuoi tinh. \n\t3. Boi xoa chat thom vao minh. Nhu cac hoanh phi o cac den mieu thuong de chu huan moc kinh thu 熏沐敬書 nghia la tam goi cho thom tho kinh can ma viet. \n\t4. Dot.
熒=huynh [ying2]\n\t1. Soi sang, sang sua. \n\t2. Huynh hoac 熒惑 sao huynh hoac tuc la sao Hoa tinh. \n\t3. Hoa mat, bi nguoi ta lam me hoac cung goi la huynh hoac 熒惑.
荧=huynh [ying2]\n\t1. Soi sang, sang sua. \n\t2. Huynh hoac 熒惑 sao huynh hoac tuc la sao Hoa tinh. \n\t3. Hoa mat, bi nguoi ta lam me hoac cung goi la huynh hoac 熒惑.
熔=dong [rong2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dong 鎔.
熟=thuc [shou2|shu2]\n\t1. Chin. \n\t2. Duoc mua. \n\t3. Ky cang, tinh tuong. Nhu thuan phuc 純熟, thuc tu 熟思 nghi ky, thuc thi 熟視 coi tinh tuong, v.v. \n\t4. Da quen, da thuoc nhu tuu thuc lo 就熟路 toi con duong quen.
熠=dap, tap [yi4]\n\t1. Sang lang, nhap nhanh. Ta quen doc la chu tap.
熨=uat, uy [yu4|yun4]\n\t1. La phang, lay ban la la cho vai lua phang goi la uat. \n\t2. Mot am la uy. Chuom, lay thuoc sao nong chuom vao minh.
熬=ngao [ao1|ao2]\n\t1. Rang kho. \n\t2. Co nhin. Nhu ngao hinh 熬刑 co chiu hinh.
熯=han, nhien [han4]\n\t1. Ho lua, say. \n\t2. Mot am la nhien. Kinh.
熱=nhiet [re4]\n\t1. Nong. \n\t2. Nong, sot. Nhu nhiet trung 熱中 nong sot cau danh loi, nhiet tam 熱心 sot sang, v.v.
热=nhiet [re4]\n\t1. Nong. \n\t2. Nong, sot. Nhu nhiet trung 熱中 nong sot cau danh loi, nhiet tam 熱心 sot sang, v.v.
熲=quynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Lua sang ruc ro, co khi viet la 耿.
熹=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Tang tang, mat troi moi he sang. \n\t2. Sang.
熾=si [chi4]\n\t1. Lua chay manh. \n\t2. Manh me, hang hai.
炽=si [chi4]\n\t1. Lua chay manh. \n\t2. Manh me, hang hai.
燁=diep [ye4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu diep 爗.
烨=diep [ye4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu diep 爗.
燃=nhien [ran2]\n\t1. Dot.
燄=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Lua chay leo, ngon lua. \n\t2. Khi the nong nan.
燈=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Cai den.
灯=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Cai den.
燉=don, don [dun4]\n\t1. Ten dat. \n\t2. Mot am la don. Nau cach thuy.
炖=don, don [dun4]\n\t1. Ten dat. \n\t2. Mot am la don. Nau cach thuy.
燎=lieu [liao2|liao3]\n\t1. Dinh lieu 庭燎 dot lua o san de soi sang cho moi nguoi lam le. \n\t2. Chay lan, su gi khi the manh qua khong dep thoi ngay duoc goi la lieu nguyen 燎原 (tha lua dot dong). \n\t3. Ho.
燐=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Lua ma choi. \n\t2. Chat lan (Phosphorus), mot thu nguyen chat lay o trong xuong trau de ra, co khong khi vao la chay ngay, nay hay dung lam diem.
燒=thieu, thieu [shao1]\n\t1. Dot. \n\t2. Mot am la thieu. Lua dong.
烧=thieu, thieu [shao1]\n\t1. Dot. \n\t2. Mot am la thieu. Lua dong.
燔=phan [fan2]\n\t1. Nuong, quay. \n\t2. Phan te.
燕=yen, yen [yan1|yan4]\n\t1. Chim yen. \n\t2. Yen nghi. Nhu yen tuc 燕息 nghi ngoi, yen cu 燕居 o yen, v.v. \n\t3. Uong ruou. Nhu yen am 燕飲 an uong, cung nghia voi chu yen 宴. \n\t4. Quen, nhon, vao yet kien rieng goi la yen kien 燕見. \n\t5. Mot am la yen. Nuoc Yen, dat Yen.
燖=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Ham lai.
燙=nang [tang4]\n\t1. Bong lua. \n\t2. Ham nong.
烫=nang [tang4]\n\t1. Bong lua. \n\t2. Ham nong.
燜=muon [men4]\n\t1. Ham, min kin cho lua nho dun mai.
焖=muon [men4]\n\t1. Ham, min kin cho lua nho dun mai.
營=doanh, dinh [ying2]\n\t1. Dinh quan, cu 500 quan goi la mot doanh. \n\t2. Muu lam. Nhu kinh doanh 經營. \n\t3. Doanh doanh 營營 luon di, luon lai. \n\t4. Ten dat. \n\t5. Phan khi cua nguoi, cung doc la chu dinh.
营=doanh, dinh [ying2]\n\t1. Dinh quan, cu 500 quan goi la mot doanh. \n\t2. Muu lam. Nhu kinh doanh 經營. \n\t3. Doanh doanh 營營 luon di, luon lai. \n\t4. Ten dat. \n\t5. Phan khi cua nguoi, cung doc la chu dinh.
燠=uc, u, oc [yu4]\n\t1. Am. \n\t2. Mot am la u. U hu 燠休 cung nghia voi chu 噢. Tieng to ra long nho qua. Nhu ta noi thon thuc vay. Cung doc la chu oc.
燥=tao [zao4]\n\t1. Kho, rao, hanh hao.
燦=xan [can4]\n\t1. Xan lan 燦爛 ruc ro.
灿=xan [can4]\n\t1. Xan lan 燦爛 ruc ro.
燧=toai [sui4]\n\t1. Do lay lua cua doi xua, cai dung de lay lua o mat troi goi la kim toai 金燧, cai dung lay lua o cay goi la moc toai 木燧. \n\t2. Co giac den thi dot lua tren doi bao hieu goi la phong toai 烽燧. \n\t3. Bo duoc.
燬=huy [hui3]\n\t1. Lua manh (chay ran rat), lay lua dot pha cung goi la huy.
燭=chuc [zhu2]\n\t1. Duoc, nen. \n\t2. Soi. Nhu dong chuc vo di 洞燭無遺 soi suot khong sot gi. \n\t3. Bon mua hoa binh goi la ngoc chuc 玉燭. \n\t4. Phong chuc 風燭 ngan ngui, noi tuoi gia nhu ngon duoc truoc gio khong biet chet luc nao.
烛=chuc [zhu2]\n\t1. Duoc, nen. \n\t2. Soi. Nhu dong chuc vo di 洞燭無遺 soi suot khong sot gi. \n\t3. Bon mua hoa binh goi la ngoc chuc 玉燭. \n\t4. Phong chuc 風燭 ngan ngui, noi tuoi gia nhu ngon duoc truoc gio khong biet chet luc nao.
燮=tiep [xie4]\n\t1. Hoa. Nhu tiep ly am duong 燮理陰陽 dieu hoa am duong, la cong viec quan Te tuong.
燴=quai [hui4]\n\t1. Nau, nau ho lon goi la tap quai 雜燴.
烩=quai [hui4]\n\t1. Nau, nau ho lon goi la tap quai 雜燴.
燹=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Lua lan, luc loan lac binh linh hon don, dot pha tan hoang goi la binh tien 兵燹.
燻=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huan 熏.
燼=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Lua tan. \n\t2. Tai nan binh hoa con sot lai goi la tan.
烬=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Lua tan. \n\t2. Tai nan binh hoa con sot lai goi la tan.
燾=dao [dao4|tao1]\n\t1. Che trum.
焘=dao [dao4|tao1]\n\t1. Che trum.
燿=dieu [yao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dieu 耀.
爆=bao, bac, boc [bao4]\n\t1. Tuc no nut ra vi lua. \n\t2. Bao truc 爆竹 phao tre (ong lenh), ngay xua chua biet lam phao cu dot ong tre ong nua cho no to de tru cac diem xau. \n\t3. Mot am la bac. Dot, ho nong. ta quen doc la chu boc.
爇=nhiet [re4]\n\t1. Dot.
爍=thuoc [shuo4]\n\t1. Chuoc thuoc 灼爍 sang ruc. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu thuoc 鑠.
烁=thuoc [shuo4]\n\t1. Chuoc thuoc 灼爍 sang ruc. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu thuoc 鑠.
爐=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Bep lo.
炉=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Bep lo.
爗=diep [ye4]\n\t1. Diep diep 爗爗 choi loi.
爚=duoc [yue4]\n\t1. Lua lan ra. \n\t2. Nong, choi loe.
爛=lan [lan4]\n\t1. Nat, chin qua. \n\t2. Thoi nat. \n\t3. Sang. Nhu xan lan 燦爛 ruc ro. \n\t4. Bong lua.
烂=lan [lan4]\n\t1. Nat, chin qua. \n\t2. Thoi nat. \n\t3. Sang. Nhu xan lan 燦爛 ruc ro. \n\t4. Bong lua.
爝=tuoc [jiao4|jue2]\n\t1. Bo duoc.
爨=thoan [cuan4]\n\t1. Thoi nau. \n\t2. Bep.
爪=trao [zhao3|zhua3]\n\t1. Mong chan, mong tay. \n\t2. Trao nha 爪牙 mong vuot, noi bong la cac ke ho ve. \n\t3. Chan cac giong dong vat. \n\t4. Ngon, cuoi cua mot do vat gi.
爬=ba [pa2]\n\t1. Gai. Tuc bao bo ca chan ca tay la ba.
爭=tranh, tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh gianh, cai co. Pham tranh hon nguoi hay co lay cua nguoi deu goi la tranh. \n\t2. The nao ? dung lam tro tu. \n\t3. Mot am la tranh. Can ngan.
争=tranh, tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh gianh, cai co. Pham tranh hon nguoi hay co lay cua nguoi deu goi la tranh. \n\t2. The nao ? dung lam tro tu. \n\t3. Mot am la tranh. Can ngan.
爰=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Chung ay, ben. Nhu vien cu 爰居 ben o. \n\t2. Vien thu 爰書 van thu xu kien, van an.
爮=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Vot, nao.
爲=vi, vi [wei2]\n\t1. Lam. Nhu hanh vi 行爲. \n\t2. Gay nen, lam nen. \n\t3. Tri. Nhu vi quoc 爲國 tri nuoc. \n\t4. Dung lam ngu tu. Nhu tuy da diec he di vi 雖多亦奚以爲 dau nhieu co lam gi. \n\t5. Mot am la vi. Nhu vi ky 爲已 vi minh, huu so vi nhi vi 有所爲而爲 co vi cai gi ma lam, v.v. \n\t6. Giup. Nhu Luan ngu noi. phu tu bat vi da 夫子不爲也 nha thay chang giup vay. Cung viet la vi 為.
爵=tuoc [jue2]\n\t1. Cai chen rot ruou. \n\t2. Ngoi tuoc, chuc tuoc. \n\t3. Chim se.
父=phu, phu [fu3|fu4]\n\t1. Cha, bo. \n\t2. Phu lao 父老 tieng goi ton cac nguoi gia. \n\t3. Mot am la phu. Cung nghia voi chu phu 甫. Tieng goi lich su cua dan ong. Nhu ong Thai Cong goi la thuong phu 尚父, duc Khong Tu goi la Ny phu 尼父, v.v. \n\t4. Nguoi gia. Nhu dien phu 田父 ong gia lam ruong, ngu phu 漁父 ong gia danh ca, v.v.
爹=da, da [die1]\n\t1. Cha. Cung doc la chu da.
爺=gia [ye2]\n\t1. Cha. \n\t2. Tieng goi ton cac nguoi gia. Nhu lao gia 老爺 ong gia, thai gia 太爺 cu co, v.v.
爷=gia [ye2]\n\t1. Cha. \n\t2. Tieng goi ton cac nguoi gia. Nhu lao gia 老爺 ong gia, thai gia 太爺 cu co, v.v.
爻=hao [yao2]\n\t1. Vach bat quai, moi que trong Kinh Dich chia ra sau hao. Hao nghia la giao nhau.
爽=sang [shuang3]\n\t1. Sang, troi sap sang goi la muoi sang 昧爽. \n\t2. Khoat dat khong cau ne goi la khai sang 開爽. \n\t3. Thanh sang (tinh tom). \n\t4. Chong vanh, nhanh nhen. Nhu sang khoai 爽快, sang loi 爽利, v.v. \n\t5. Lo. Nhu sang uoc 爽約 lo hen, loi hen. \n\t6. Sang nhien 爽然 ngan ra, tung hung. Ta cai dang that y. \n\t7. Sai, lam.
爾=nhi [er3]\n\t1. May, nguoi. \n\t2. Vay, tieng dut cau. \n\t3. Nhi nhi 爾爾 nhu the. Nhu vay.
尔=nhi [er3]\n\t1. May, nguoi. \n\t2. Vay, tieng dut cau. \n\t3. Nhi nhi 爾爾 nhu the. Nhu vay.
爿=tuong [pan2]\n\t1. Tam van, tam go xe ra, nua ben trai goi la "tuong".
牀=sang [chuang2]\n\t1. Cai giuong. Tuc dung nhu chu "sang" 床. \n\t2. Cai gia gac do. \n\t3. Cai san bac tren gieng de do cai con quay keo nuoc.
牁=ca [ge1]\n\t1. Ten dat.
牂=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Con de duc.
牆=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Tuong (tuong xay bang gach da).
墙=tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Tuong (tuong xay bang gach da).
片=phien [pian1|pian4]\n\t1. Manh, vat gi mong ma phang deu goi la phien. Nhu moc phien 木片 tam van, chi phien 紙片 manh giay. \n\t2. Nua. Luan Ngu 論語. Phien ngon kha di chiet nguc 片言可以折獄 (Nhan Uyen 顏淵) Nua loi co the xu xong vu kien. \n\t3. Tuc goi cai danh thiep la phien. \n\t4. Ngoai so tau ra lai kem them mot manh trinh bay viec khac goi la phu phien 附片.
版=ban [ban3]\n\t1. Van, cung nghia voi chu ban 板. \n\t2. Ban truc 版築 dap tuong. \n\t3. Thu ban 手版 ban khai ly lich trinh voi quan tren. \n\t4. Ban do 版圖 ban do ke khai so dan va dat dai. \n\t5. So sach. \n\t6. Cai hot. \n\t7. Tam thuoc goi la mot ban.
牋=tien [jian1]\n\t1. Neu, moc. \n\t2. Xem chu tien 箋.
牌=bai [pai2]\n\t1. Cai bang, dung manh van de chu lam dau hieu hay yet thi goi la chieu bai 招牌 hay bai thi 牌示. \n\t2. The bai, dung de lam tin. \n\t3. Co bai, cac thu bai danh bac. \n\t4. Bai vi 牌位 (viet ten hieu vao go hay giay de tho goi la bai vi).
牏=du [tou2]\n\t1. Tam van ngan de dap tuong. \n\t2. Ho, lo. Nhu xi du 廁牏 ho phan. Cai ho de thao cac cai ban di.
牐=sap [zha2]\n\t1. Van ngan.
牒=diep [die2]\n\t1. Diep, mot loi van thu cua nha quan. Tuc la cai trat hay to trinh bay gio. \n\t2. Pha diep, sach bien chep the he nha vua goi la ngoc diep 玉牒.
牓=bang [bang3]\n\t1. Cai bang. \n\t2. Yet thi.
牖=du, duu [you3]\n\t1. Cua so, khoet giua vach hay tuong xung quanh co khuon, trong co chan song dong cheo thanh hinh mui tram goi la du. \n\t2. Mo mang, dan bao, dan du. Cung doc la chu duu.
牘=doc [du2]\n\t1. The viet van thu, to boi goi la xich doc 尺牘. \n\t2. Mot thu am nhac.
牍=doc [du2]\n\t1. The viet van thu, to boi goi la xich doc 尺牘. \n\t2. Mot thu am nhac.
牕=song [chuang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu song 窗.
牙=nha [ya2]\n\t1. Rang to. \n\t2. Thu nha tuoc giac 鼠牙雀角 dat dieu gay su kien tung. \n\t3. Nga, nga voi dung lam do duoc, goi tat la nha. Nhu nha bai 牙牌 cai the nga. \n\t4. Cac tuong nho (ti tuong) goi la nha tuong 牙將. \n\t5. Nguoi gioi thieu su buon ban goi la nha quai 牙儈 (lai).
牚=sanh [cheng4]\n\t1. Chong do.
牛=nguu [niu2]\n\t1. Con trau. \n\t2. Sao Nguu.
牝=tan, ban [pin4]\n\t1. Con cai, giong chim muong cai deu goi la tan. \n\t2. Hu tan 虛牝 cai hang rong. Tho ong Han Du (韓愈) co cau. Huu tu hoang kim trich hu tan 有似黃金擲虛牝 y noi bo vao noi vo dung. Cung doc la chu ban.
牟=muu, mau [mou2|mu4]\n\t1. Cuop, lay. \n\t2. Lua mach to, cung nghia voi chu muu 麰. Ta quen doc la chu mau.
牡=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Con duc, giong duc. Cac chim muong thuoc ve giong duc deu goi la mau. \n\t2. Chot cua. \n\t3. Loi len, go len, go dong.
牢=lao [lao2]\n\t1. Cai chuong nuoi suc vat. \n\t2. Giong muong, co lam bang thit trau bo goi la thai lao 太牢, bang de goi la thieu lao 少牢. \n\t3. Ben chat. Nhu lao bat kha pha 牢不可破 ben chac khong the pha ra duoc. \n\t4. Bon chon, buon ba vo lieu goi la lao tao 牢騷. \n\t5. Nha tu.
牣=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Day. Nhu sung nhan 充牣 day nich.
牧=muc [mu4]\n\t1. Ke chan giong muong. \n\t2. Chan nuoi dat ngoai coi. \n\t3. Cho chan. \n\t4. Nuoi. Nhu ti di tu muc da 卑以自牧也 (Dich Kinh 易經) tu nhun minh ton nguoi de nuoi duc minh. \n\t5. Quan muc, quan coi dau mot chau goi la muc. \n\t6. Quan coi thuyen be. \n\t7. Dinh bo coi ruong. \n\t8. Con bo bung den.
物=vat [wu4]\n\t1. Cac loai sinh o trong troi dat deu goi la vat ca. Thong thuong chia ra ba   loai. (1) Dong vat 動物 giong dong vat, (2) Thuc vat 植物 giong thuc vat, (3)   Khoang vat 礦物 vat mo, v.v. \n\t2. Su vat. Nhu huu vat huu tac 有物有則 mot vat co mot phep rieng. \n\t3. Vat sac 物色 do la tim toi.
牮=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Ban nha lai cho ngay, lay dat da dap ngan nuoc cung goi la tien.
牯=co [gu3]\n\t1. Con bo duc.
牲=sinh [sheng1]\n\t1. Muong sinh. Con vat nuoi goi la suc 畜, dung de cung goi la sinh 牲.
牴=de [di3]\n\t1. Huc, cung ghi nhau (quan thao).
牸=tu [zi4]\n\t1. Con trau cai. \n\t2. Giong thu nuoi con.
特=dac [te4]\n\t1. Con trau duc. \n\t2. Mot muong sinh goi la dac. \n\t3. Rieng mot. Nhu dac lap doc hanh 特立獨行 di dung mot minh, y noi khong dua theo ai vay. \n\t4. Khac han, cai gi khac han moi nguoi deu goi la dac, dac sac 特色, dac biet 特別, v.v. \n\t5. Chuyen mot su gi ma dat cung goi la dac. Nhu dac thi 特示 bao rieng ve mot dieu gi. \n\t6. Nhung.
牼=khanh [keng1]\n\t1. Ten nguoi. \n\t2. Xuong duoi dau goi trau.
牽=khien, khan [qian1]\n\t1. Dat di, tien thoai khong duoc tu do cung goi la khien. Nhu khien ban 牽絆 vuong mac. \n\t2. Co keo. Nhu cau van khien nghia 拘文牽義 co keo cau van, nghia la van khong duoc chai chuot. \n\t3. Lien. \n\t4. Cau chap. \n\t5. Mot am la khan. Day keo thuyen.
牵=khien, khan [qian1]\n\t1. Dat di, tien thoai khong duoc tu do cung goi la khien. Nhu khien ban 牽絆 vuong mac. \n\t2. Co keo. Nhu cau van khien nghia 拘文牽義 co keo cau van, nghia la van khong duoc chai chuot. \n\t3. Lien. \n\t4. Cau chap. \n\t5. Mot am la khan. Day keo thuyen.
牾=ngo [wu3]\n\t1. Trai nguoc, cung nghia voi chu ngo 忤.
犁=le [li2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu le 犂.
犀=te [xi1]\n\t1. Con te giac. \n\t2. Te loi 犀利 ben sac (noi ve do binh). \n\t3. Hat bau xep hang nhu canh hoa.
犂=le, luu [li2]\n\t1. Cai cay. \n\t2. Con trau lang lo. \n\t3. Nguoi gia goi la le lao 犂老. \n\t4. Cay. \n\t5. Mot am la luu. Luu nhien 犂然 dich xac, chac chan. Cung viet la 犁.
犇=bon [ben1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bon 奔.
犍=kien [jian1|qian2]\n\t1. Ta cai the trau di khoe manh. \n\t2. Ten dat. \n\t3. Kien truy 犍椎 tieng Pham, cac thu nhu chuong, khanh, mo, moc ban danh lam hieu o trong chua deu goi la kien truy. \n\t4. Ten nguoi. Nhu Muc Kien Lien 目犍連 duc Muc Kien Lien, de tu Phat.
犎=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Trau rung.
犒=khao [kao4]\n\t1. Khao quan, thuong cong cho ke co cong kho nhoc cung goi la khao.
犖=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Trau co nhieu sac loang lo goi la bac lac 駁犖. \n\t2. Lac lac 犖犖 ranh rot. \n\t3. Trac lac 卓犖 sieu viet, sieu viet hon nguoi.
荦=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Trau co nhieu sac loang lo goi la bac lac 駁犖. \n\t2. Lac lac 犖犖 ranh rot. \n\t3. Trac lac 卓犖 sieu viet, sieu viet hon nguoi.
犛=mao, ly [li2]\n\t1. Mao nguu 犛牛 mot loai trau duoi rat dai, ngay xua dung lam ngu co. Cung doc la chu ly.
犢=doc [du2]\n\t1. Con trau nghe. \n\t2. Lao nguu de doc 老牛舐犢 (Hau Han thu 後漢書) trau gia liem con, noi vi nhu nguoi gia yeu con.
犊=doc [du2]\n\t1. Con trau nghe. \n\t2. Lao nguu de doc 老牛舐犢 (Hau Han thu 後漢書) trau gia liem con, noi vi nhu nguoi gia yeu con.
犧=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Con muong thuan sac dung de cung te goi la hy. \n\t2. Vua Thang cau mua, tu phuc truoc mieu thay lam con muong de le, vi the nguoi ta goi nhung nguoi bo ca doi minh de lam cho dat mot su gi la hy sinh 犧牲.
牺=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Con muong thuan sac dung de cung te goi la hy. \n\t2. Vua Thang cau mua, tu phuc truoc mieu thay lam con muong de le, vi the nguoi ta goi nhung nguoi bo ca doi minh de lam cho dat mot su gi la hy sinh 犧牲.
犬=khuyen [quan3]\n\t1. Con cho. \n\t2. Noi y hen ha. Ke duoi doi voi ke tren co chut cong lao tu noi nhun la khuyen ma chi lao 犬馬之勞 cai cong cho ngua.
犯=pham [fan4]\n\t1. Xam pham, cai cu khong nen xam vao ma cu xam vao goi la pham. Nhu can pham 干犯, mao pham 冒犯, v.v. \n\t2. Ke co toi. \n\t3. Ten khuc hat.
犴=ngan, ngan [an4|han1]\n\t1. Nha nguc. \n\t2. Mot am la ngan. Con cho rung.
犹=do [you2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu do 猶.
狀=trang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Hinh trang (dang). Tinh hinh. Nhu cong trang 功狀, toi trang 罪狀 (tinh hinh toi), v.v. \n\t2. Hinh dong ra. Nhu trang tu 狀詞 loi noi hinh dong to ro mot su gi. \n\t3. Bai trang, bai van giai bay su thuc de keu voi than thanh vua quan goi la trang. Cai don kien cung goi la trang.
状=trang [zhuang4]\n\t1. Hinh trang (dang). Tinh hinh. Nhu cong trang 功狀, toi trang 罪狀 (tinh hinh toi), v.v. \n\t2. Hinh dong ra. Nhu trang tu 狀詞 loi noi hinh dong to ro mot su gi. \n\t3. Bai trang, bai van giai bay su thuc de keu voi than thanh vua quan goi la trang. Cai don kien cung goi la trang.
狁=duan [yun3]\n\t1. Ten nuoc.
狂=cuong [kuang2]\n\t1. Benh hoa ro. Nhu cuong nhan 狂人 nguoi ro, cuong khuyen 狂犬 cho dai. \n\t2. Chi to noi ngong cung goi la cuong. \n\t3. Ngong cuong. Nhu cuong thu 狂且 ke trai gai vo hanh. \n\t4. Du doi. Nhu cuong phong 狂風 gio du.
狃=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Nhon, quen.
狄=dich, thich [di2]\n\t1. Ro Dich, mot giong ro o phuong bac. \n\t2. Mot chuc quan duoi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu dich 翟. \n\t4. Mot am la thich. Xa. \n\t5. Vun vut, ta cai di lai nhanh chong.
狉=phi [pi1]\n\t1. Con cho con. 2 Phi phi 狉狉 chom chom, ta cai dang thu du duong long lon.
狌=tinh, tinh [sheng1]\n\t1. Ly tinh 狸狌 con ly. \n\t2. Mot am la tinh. Cung nghia voi chu tinh 猩.
狎=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Quen, nhon. \n\t2. Chot nha, dua bon. \n\t3. Khinh thuong.
狐=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Con ho (con cao), da no lot may ao am goi la ho cuu 狐裘. Tinh cao da nghi, cho nen nguoi hay ngo vuc goi la ho nghi 狐疑. Tuc truyen rang giong cao tai cam do nguoi, cho nen goi nhung dan ba con gai lam cho nguoi say dam la ho mi 狐媚.
狒=phi [fei4]\n\t1. Phi phi 狒狒 mot giong khi o chau Phi, tinh rat du ton.
狓=phi [pi1]\n\t1. Phi xuong 狓猖 trom giac du ton.
狖=duu [you4]\n\t1. Mot giong khi.
狗=cau [gou3]\n\t1. Con cho, cho nuoi o trong nha.
狙=thu [ju1]\n\t1. Mot giong nhu con vuon, tinh rat giao quyet. \n\t2. Rinh danh trom.
狠=ngoan, ngan [hen3]\n\t1. Cho can nhau y oang. \n\t2. Mot am la ngan. Nhu ngan tam 狠心 long tan nhan, ngan hao 狠好 rat tot (tuc dung nhu chu ngan 很).
狡=giao [jiao3]\n\t1. Xo la, giao quyet, giao hoat. \n\t2. Dep, nguoi dep ma khong co tai duc goi la giao. \n\t3. Ngong cuong, ngang trai.
狥=tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuan 徇.
狨=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Con nhung, giong nhu con khi long dai ma mem dung lam chan dem tot. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu nhung 絨.
狩=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Le di san mua dong. \n\t2. Tuan thu 巡狩 vua thien tu di tuan xem cac dat nuoc chu hau.
独=doc [du2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu doc 獨.
狴=be [bi4]\n\t1. Be han 狴犴 mot giong thu, xua hay ve len canh cua nha tu, nen nha tu cung goi la be.
狷=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Co tinh cao khiet khong them lam viec nho danh. \n\t2. Tinh tinh hep nong nay cung goi la quyen.
狸=li [li2]\n\t1. Con li, mot loai nhu loai ho.
狹=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Hep (trai lai voi tieng rong).
狭=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Hep (trai lai voi tieng rong).
狺=ngan [yin2]\n\t1. Ngan ngan 狺狺 tieng cho gam ghe can nhau.
狻=toan [suan1]\n\t1. Toan nghe 狻猊 tuc la con su tu.
狼=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Con cho soi. Tinh tan ac nhu ho, cho nen goi cac ke tan bao la lang ho 狼虎. \n\t2. Lang ta 狼藉 bua bai. Cung viet la 狼籍. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Lang ta tan hong vo mich xu 狼籍殘紅無覓處 canh hong tan rung ngon ngang, biet tim dau ? \n\t3. Sao Lang. \n\t4. Giong lang.
狽=bai [bei4]\n\t1. Mot giong thu nhu cho soi. Ngay xua noi con lang con bai phai dua nhau di moi duoc, lia nhau thi nga, vi the cung nuong tua nhau goi la lang bai 狼狽. Nhu lang bai vi gian 狼狽為奸 cung dua nhau lam bay. \n\t2. Chat vat, khon kho cung goi la lang bai.
狈=bai [bei4]\n\t1. Mot giong thu nhu cho soi. Ngay xua noi con lang con bai phai dua nhau di moi duoc, lia nhau thi nga, vi the cung nuong tua nhau goi la lang bai 狼狽. Nhu lang bai vi gian 狼狽為奸 cung dua nhau lam bay. \n\t2. Chat vat, khon kho cung goi la lang bai.
猁=li [li4]\n\t1. Xa li ton 猞猁孫 ten mot giong thu giong nhu con meo ma to, da lam ao cuu rat quy.
猂=han [han4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu han 悍.
猊=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Toan nghe 狻猊 tuc la con su tu.
猖=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Doc du, can ro. Rong ro lam lieu goi la xuong cuong 猖狂.
猗=y, y, a [yi1]\n\t1. Loi khen nuc nom. Nhu y du 猗歟 tot dep thay ! \n\t2. Xanh tot um tum. Nhu luc truc y y 綠竹猗猗 (Thi Kinh 詩經) truc xanh ron ron. \n\t3. Dai. \n\t4. Vay, cung nghia voi chu he 兮. \n\t5. Mot am la y. Nuong. \n\t6. Gia them. \n\t7. Lai mot am la a. Thuot tha, canh cay mem la.
猘=che [zhi4]\n\t1. Con cho dai, giong thu du ton goi la manh che 猛猘.
猙=tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh nanh 猙獰 du ton (mat mui du ton).
狰=tranh [zheng1]\n\t1. Tranh nanh 猙獰 du ton (mat mui du ton).
猛=manh [meng3]\n\t1. Manh. Nhu manh tuong 猛將 tuong manh, manh thu 猛獸 thu manh, v.v. \n\t2. Nghiem ngat. \n\t3. Manh du. Nhu manh liet 猛烈 manh du qua, dang me hoac ma hot nhien tinh ngo goi la manh tinh 猛省. \n\t4. Ac. \n\t5. Cho manh.
猜=sai [cai1]\n\t1. Ngo, pham vao cai cho hiem nghi khien cho nguoi ta sinh ngo goi la sai. \n\t2. Doan phong.
猝=thot [cu4]\n\t1. Voi vang. Nhu thang thot 倉猝 luc boi roi voi vang.
猞=xa [she1]\n\t1. Xa li ton 猞猁孫 ten mot giong thu giong nhu con meo ma to, da lam ao cuu rat quy.
猪=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tru 豬.
猫=mieu [mao1|mao2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu mieu 貓.
猢=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Tuc goi con khi la ho ton 猢猻.
猥=oi [wei3]\n\t1. Hen, tap nhap. Nhu oi lau 猥陋, bi oi 鄙猥, deu la tieng khinh bi ca. \n\t2. Dung lam tro tu, nghia la ben. \n\t3. Nhieu. \n\t4. Chua.
猩=tinh [xing1]\n\t1. Tinh tinh 猩猩 con duoi uoi. \n\t2. Sac do.
猱=nhu [nao2]\n\t1. Mot loai thu nhu con vuon.
猴=hau [hou2]\n\t1. Con khi.
猶=do, duu [you2]\n\t1. Con do, giong nhu con khi, tinh hay ngo, nghe tieng nguoi leo ngay len cay, khong thay nguoi moi lai xuong, vi the moi goi nhung nguoi hay ngo, khong qua quyet la do du 猶豫. \n\t2. Giong. Nhu do tu 猶子 chau con chu bac, nghia la cung giong nhu con de. \n\t3. Cung nhu. \n\t4. Con. \n\t5. Ngo hau. \n\t6. Muu, cung nghia voi chu du 猷. \n\t7. Can bay, cung nghia voi chu 瘉. \n\t8. Boi, do, cung nghia voi chu do 由. \n\t9. Mot am la duu. Cho con.
犹=do, duu [you2]\n\t1. Con do, giong nhu con khi, tinh hay ngo, nghe tieng nguoi leo ngay len cay, khong thay nguoi moi lai xuong, vi the moi goi nhung nguoi hay ngo, khong qua quyet la do du 猶豫. \n\t2. Giong. Nhu do tu 猶子 chau con chu bac, nghia la cung giong nhu con de. \n\t3. Cung nhu. \n\t4. Con. \n\t5. Ngo hau. \n\t6. Muu, cung nghia voi chu du 猷. \n\t7. Can bay, cung nghia voi chu 瘉. \n\t8. Boi, do, cung nghia voi chu do 由. \n\t9. Mot am la duu. Cho con.
猷=du [you2]\n\t1. Muu ke. \n\t2. Dao. \n\t3. Ve. \n\t4. Dung lam tieng than tho.
猺=dao [yao2]\n\t1. Giong Dao, mot giong man o cac noi tham hiem khong chiu quyen quan cai tri, ke nao chiu lam viec cac chau, cac huyen goi la dao muc 猺目.
猻=ton [sun1]\n\t1. Tuc goi con khi la ho ton 猢猻.
狲=ton [sun1]\n\t1. Tuc goi con khi la ho ton 猢猻.
猾=hoat [hua2]\n\t1. Lam loan. \n\t2. Giao hoat.
猿=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Con vuon.
獀=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Le di san ve mua thu.
獃=ngai [dai1]\n\t1. Ngay ngo, ngo ngan.
獄=nguc [yu4]\n\t1. Nguc tu. \n\t2. An kien. Nhu chiet nguc 折獄 xu kien.
狱=nguc [yu4]\n\t1. Nguc tu. \n\t2. An kien. Nhu chiet nguc 折獄 xu kien.
獅=su [shi1]\n\t1. Con su tu.
狮=su [shi1]\n\t1. Con su tu.
獉=tran [zhen1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tran 榛.
獍=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Con Kinh. Ngay xua noi rang con Kinh sinh ra lai an thit me truoc, cho nen goi nhung ke bat hieu la kinh.
獎=tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Tuong le, khen ngoi de gang goi cho nguoi ta lam nen cong goi la tuong.
奖=tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Tuong le, khen ngoi de gang goi cho nguoi ta lam nen cong goi la tuong.
獐=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu chuong 麞.
獒=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Con cho ngao, giong cho cao lon toi bon thuoc goi la ngao.
獗=quyet, que [jue2]\n\t1. The giac tung hoanh goi la xuong quyet 猖獗. Tuc quen doc ma chu que.
獘=te [bi4]\n\t1. Nga uych, te nhao.
獞=dong [zhuang4]\n\t1. Giong Dong, mot giong man.
獠=lao, lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Mot giong ro o phia tay nam. Mot am la lieu. San dem.
獧=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Voi nhay, kip. Cung nghia voi chu quyen 狷.
獨=doc [du2]\n\t1. Con Doc, giong con vuon ma to. \n\t2. Mot, gia khong co con chau goi la doc. Pham cai gi le loi co mot deu goi la doc.
独=doc [du2]\n\t1. Con Doc, giong con vuon ma to. \n\t2. Mot, gia khong co con chau goi la doc. Pham cai gi le loi co mot deu goi la doc.
獪=quai [kuai4]\n\t1. Giao quai 狡獪 ke quy quyet.
狯=quai [kuai4]\n\t1. Giao quai 狡獪 ke quy quyet.
獫=hiem [xian3]\n\t1. Cho mom dai. \n\t2. Hiem duan 獫狁 mot giong ro.
猃=hiem [xian3]\n\t1. Cho mom dai. \n\t2. Hiem duan 獫狁 mot giong ro.
獬=giai, hai [xie4]\n\t1. Giai trai 獬豸 mot giong thu, ngay xua noi rang con giai trai tinh no ngay thang thay ai danh nhau thi no huc ke trai, nghe nguoi ban bac thi no can ben bat chinh, vi the cho nen cac quan ngu su dung long no lam ao, lay y rang hay sua tru bon gian ta vay. Cung doc la chu hai.
獮=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Le di san mua thu. \n\t2. Giet.
獯=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Mot giong ro o phia bac.
獰=nanh [ning2]\n\t1. Tranh nanh 猙獰 du ton (mat mui du ton).
狞=nanh [ning2]\n\t1. Tranh nanh 猙獰 du ton (mat mui du ton).
獲=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Duoc, bat duoc. \n\t2. Tang hoach 臧獲 day to gai, con doi.
获=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Duoc, bat duoc. \n\t2. Tang hoach 臧獲 day to gai, con doi.
獵=liep [lie4]\n\t1. Dien liep 田獵 san ban. \n\t2. Liep liep 獵獵 gio vu vu.
猎=liep [lie4]\n\t1. Dien liep 田獵 san ban. \n\t2. Liep liep 獵獵 gio vu vu.
獷=quanh [guang3]\n\t1. Hung ac. \n\t2. Ta cai net mat tuc tan hung ton.
犷=quanh [guang3]\n\t1. Hung ac. \n\t2. Ta cai net mat tuc tan hung ton.
獸=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Giong muong (giong co bon chan).
兽=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Giong muong (giong co bon chan).
獺=that [ta3]\n\t1. Con rai ca, giong o be long dai ma muot, dung lam ao ret rat quy, cung co giong o ao chuom. \n\t2. That te 獺祭 noi nha van si bay van bai day ca ban de tim lay tai lieu lam van nhu con rai ca no te ca vay.
獭=that [ta3]\n\t1. Con rai ca, giong o be long dai ma muot, dung lam ao ret rat quy, cung co giong o ao chuom. \n\t2. That te 獺祭 noi nha van si bay van bai day ca ban de tim lay tai lieu lam van nhu con rai ca no te ca vay.
獻=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Dang bieu. \n\t2. Nguoi hien. Nhu van hien 文獻 sach vo van chuong cua mot doi nao hay cua mot nguoi hien nao con lai de cho nguoi xem ma biet duoc chuyen cu.
献=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Dang bieu. \n\t2. Nguoi hien. Nhu van hien 文獻 sach vo van chuong cua mot doi nao hay cua mot nguoi hien nao con lai de cho nguoi xem ma biet duoc chuyen cu.
獼=mi, di [mi2]\n\t1. Mi hau 獼猴 con khi lon, con khi cai. ta quen doc la chu di.
猕=mi, di [mi2]\n\t1. Mi hau 獼猴 con khi lon, con khi cai. ta quen doc la chu di.
獾=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoan 貛.
玁=hiem [xian3]\n\t1. Hiem duan 玁狁 mot giong ro o phia bac.
玄=huyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Den, sac den ma khong co mau mo goi la huyen. \n\t2. Huyen dieu, huyen bi. Le sau xa lam goi la huyen. Nhu nguoi tu dao, doi goi la huyen hoc 玄學. Nha Phat goi cai cua do day tu vao la huyen quan 玄關. Chau sau doi goi la huyen ton 玄孫.
玅=dieu [miao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dieu 妙.
率=suat, suy, luat, soat [lu:4|shuai4]\n\t1. Noi theo. \n\t2. Linh, suat. Nhu suat tu ki ton 率子曁孫 suat con va chau. \n\t3. Dai suat 大率 cung nhu noi dai khai. \n\t4. Lam nen, lam dich. \n\t5. Hap tap, khinh suat. \n\t6. Tinh thang, khong ua loi van hoa phien phuc. \n\t7. Cai luoi bat chim. \n\t8. Dung. \n\t9. Mot am la suy. Cung nghia voi chu suy 帥. \n\t10. Lai mot am la luat. Luat nhat dinh. Nhu toan thuat chi huu dinh luat 算術之有定率 phep tinh co luat nhat dinh. \n\t11. Mot am nua la soat. Qua can sau lang. 
玈=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Sac den, cai cung den.
玉=ngoc, tuc [yu4]\n\t1. Ngoc, da bau. \n\t2. Dep. Nhu ngoc dien 玉面 mat dep nhu ngoc. \n\t3. Dung de noi cac bac ton quy. Nhu ngoc the 玉體 minh ngoc, ngoc chi 玉趾 got ngoc, v.v. \n\t4. Vo thanh. Nhu vuong duc ngoc nhu 王欲玉女 (Thi Kinh 詩經) vua muon gay dung cho may thanh tai. \n\t5. Mot am la tuc. Nguoi tho ngoc. \n\t6. Ho Tuc.
王=vuong, vuong [wang2|wang4]\n\t1. Vua. \n\t2. Tuoc vuong. \n\t3. Tieng goi cac to tien. Nhu goi ong la vuong phu 王父, ba la vuong mau 王母, v.v. \n\t4. Chu hau doi doi lai chau goi la vuong. \n\t5. To, lon. \n\t6. Mot am la vuong. Cai tri ca thien ha. Nhu di duc hanh nhan gia vuong 以德行仁者王 lay duc lam nhan ay duoc den ngoi tri ca thien ha. \n\t7. Thinh vuong.
玕=can [gan1]\n\t1. Lang can 琅玕 ngoc lang can.
玖=cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Thu da den giong ngoc. \n\t2. Chu cuu kep, nghia la so chin.
玞=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Vu phu 珷玞 thu da giong nhu ngoc.
玟=man [min2]\n\t1. Nhu chu man 珉.
玦=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Ngoc deo, nua vong ngoc deo goi la quyet. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu quyet 決.
玨=giac [jue2]\n\t1. Hai hon ngoc lien nhau goi la giac (hat ngoc kep).
珏=giac [jue2]\n\t1. Hai hon ngoc lien nhau goi la giac (hat ngoc kep).
玩=ngoan [wan2]\n\t1. Von, choi. Dua bon. Nhu ngoan nhan tang duc, ngoan vat tang chi 玩人喪德，玩物喪志 (Thu Kinh 書經) dua bon nguoi hong duc, von choi vat hong chi. Nhung do de ngam choi goi la ngoan cu 玩具, do choi quy goi la tran ngoan 珍玩. \n\t2. Nghien ngam mai. \n\t3. Quy bau.
玫=mai [mei2]\n\t1. Mai coi 玫瑰 mot thu ngoc mau do. \n\t2. Cay hoa hong, hoa hong.
玲=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Linh lung 玲瓏 tieng ngoc keu. \n\t2. Bong lon, do gi lam kheo leo goi la linh lung.
玳=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Dai moi 玳瑁 con doi moi.
玷=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Ngoc co vet. Pham cai gi con khuyet diem deu goi la diem. \n\t2. Diem nhuc.
玻=pha [bo1]\n\t1. Pha le 玻璃 ngoc pha le, thu thuy tinh loc trong cung goi la pha le.
珀=phach [po4]\n\t1. Ho phach 琥珀 ho phach.
珂=kha [ke1]\n\t1. Ngoc kha, thu da giong nhu ngoc, cung goi la bach ma nao 白瑪瑙. Nguoi xua dung de trang suc do ngua. Nhu minh kha 鳴珂 xe ngua cua ke sang (xe ngua nam ngoc kha), vi the moi goi que nguoi la kha huong 珂鄉, lang nguoi la kha ly 珂里, noi y la chon que huong phu quy vay.
珉=man, dan [min2]\n\t1. Mot thu da dep. Kinh Le co cau. quan tu quy ngoc nhi tien man 君子貴玉而賤珉 nguoi quan tu quy ngoc ma khinh da man, y noi hiem vi no lan lon voi ngoc vay. Cung doc la chu dan.
珊=san [shan1]\n\t1. San ho 珊瑚 mot thu dong vat nho o trong be ket lai, hinh nhu canh cay, dep nhu ngoc, dung lam chom mu rat quy. \n\t2. San san 珊珊 tieng ngoc leng keng. \n\t3. Lan san 闌珊 ra roi, tro trui.
珍=tran [zhen1]\n\t1. Bau, do quy bau. Nhung vat gi quy bau deu goi la tran ca. \n\t2. Coi quy bau. Nhu tran trong 珍重, tran tich 珍惜, v.v. \n\t3. Do an ngon. Nhu tran tu 珍羞 do an quy la.
珐=phap [fa4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phap 琺.
珞=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Anh lac 瓔珞 chuoi ngoc, lay ngoc chau xau tung chuoi deo vao co cho dep goi la anh lac.
珠=chau [zhu1]\n\t1. Ngoc chau, tuc ngoc trai. Ta thuong goi la tran chau 珍珠. \n\t2. Vat gi tron tran nhu tung qua tung hat deu goi la chau. Nhu niem chau 念珠 hat trang hat.
珥=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Vong deo tai. \n\t2. Cam cai gi o tren mu o ke tai cung goi la nhi. Nhu cac quan hau vua nha Han ben mu deu cam duoi con dieu de lam do trang suc goi la dieu nhi 貂珥. Cac quan ngu su thuong giat but vao mai tai de tien ghi chep goi la nhi but 珥筆, v.v.
珧=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Giang dieu 江珧 mot giong sinh o trong be, giong con trai, dai hon mot thuoc, trong vo den, giua co mot cai cuc thit tron, goi la giang dieu tru 江珧柱 la mot mon rat quy o trong be. \n\t2. Ngoc dieu. \n\t3. Cai cung nam bang ngoc trai.
珩=hanh [heng2]\n\t1. Hon ngoc deo tren, ngoc deo hon tren goi la hanh 珩, hon duoi goi la hoang 璜.
珪=khue [gui1]\n\t1. Chu khue 圭 ngay xua.
班=ban [ban1]\n\t1. Ban phat, chia cho. \n\t2. Bay, giai. Nhu ban kinh 班荊 giai chieu kinh ra dat de ngoi. \n\t3. Ngoi, thu, hang. Cho cong chung tu hoi, chia ra tung ban de phan biet tren duoi goi la ban. Cung hang voi nhau goi la dong ban 同班. \n\t4. Tro ve. Nhu ban su 班師 dem quan ve. \n\t5. Khap. \n\t6. Ban ma 班馬 tieng ngua biet nhau. \n\t7. Vuong vit khong tien len duoc. \n\t8. Lang lo.
珮=boi [pei4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu boi 佩.
現=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Hien hien, ro rang. \n\t2. Hien ngay bay gio. Nhu hien tai 現在 hien bay gio. \n\t3. Co thuc ngay day. \n\t4. Anh sang ngoc.
现=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Hien hien, ro rang. \n\t2. Hien ngay bay gio. Nhu hien tai 現在 hien bay gio. \n\t3. Co thuc ngay day. \n\t4. Anh sang ngoc.
球=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Cai khanh ngoc. \n\t2. Qua tron. Nhu dia cau 地球 qua dat, bi cau 皮球 qua bong, v.v. \n\t3. Ngoc cau, thu ngoc dep.
琅=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Lang can 琅玕 ngoc lang can. \n\t2. Lam lang 琳琅 tieng ngoc.
理=ly [li3]\n\t1. Sua ngoc, lam ngoc. \n\t2. Sua sang, tri. Nhu ly su 理事 lam viec, chinh ly 整理 sap dat, tu ly 修理 sua sang, v.v. \n\t3. Dieu ly 條理, pham cai gi co truoc co sau co goc co ngon khong loan thu tu deu goi la dieu ly. Dieu 條 la noi cai lon, ly 理 la noi cai nho. Nhu su ly 事理, van ly 文理 deu mot nghia ay ca. \n\t4. Dao ly 道理, noi ve su nen lam goi la dao 道, noi ve cai le sao ma phai lam goi la ly 理. Ly tuc la cai dao tu nhien vay. \n\t5. Tho. Nhu thau ly 腠理 mang tho da de. Xem chu thau 腠. \n\t6. Doi xua goi quan an la ly, cho nen toa an thuong tham bay gio goi la dai ly vien 大理院. \n\t7. On tap, dem cai nghe biet truoc ma dung nap voi cai moi hieu cho chinh te goi la ly. \n\t8. Cung ung dap khong tra loi lai, tuc goi la bat ly 不理, nghe tieng lot vao long thong hieu duoc goi la ly hoi 理會. \n\t9. Ly hoc, nghien cuu ve mon hoc than tam tinh menh goi la ly hoc 理學 hay dao hoc 道學. Mon triet hoc 哲學 bay gio cung goi la ly hoc 理學. \n\t10. Ly khoa 理科 mot khoa hoc nghien cuu ve tinh vat nhu vat ly hoc 物理學, hoa hoc 化學, v.v. \n\t11. Ly chuong 理障 chu nha Phat, khong ro le dung thuc, bi y thuc no chuong ngai.
琉=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Luu ly 琉璃 mot thu ngoc quy o Tay vuc.
琊=gia [ya2]\n\t1. Lang gia 琅琊 ten dat.
珷=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Vu phu 珷玞 thu da giong nhu ngoc.
琖=tran [zhan3]\n\t1. Cai chen ngoc.
琚=cu [ju1]\n\t1. Ngoc cu, thu ngoc de deo.
琛=sam [chen1]\n\t1. Do quy bau.
琢=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Sua ngoc, mai giua ngoc. \n\t2. Don trac 敦琢 ken chon.
琤=tranh [cheng1]\n\t1. Tieng ngoc deo loang soang.
琥=ho [hu3]\n\t1. Cham duc hon ngoc ra hinh con ho, ngay xua dung de cung te. \n\t2. Ho phach 琥珀 ho phach.
琦=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Ngoc dang quy. \n\t2. Khac pham, ky la.
琨=con [kun1]\n\t1. Ngoc con, thu ngoc dep.
琪=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Ngoc ky, cung dung de thi du cac vat quy bau.
琬=uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Ngoc khue chuot dau thanh hinh tron khong co gon gi. Ngay xua di giao hieu thi cam ngoc uyen khue 琬圭 de lam tin.
琮=tong [cong2]\n\t1. Thu ngoc duc tam canh giua tron.
琯=quan [guan3]\n\t1. Cung mot nghia voi chu quan 管. \n\t2. Sua cho vang ngoc bong len.
琰=diem [yan3]\n\t1. Ngoc khue lam tren nhon goi la diem khue 琰圭. Thien tu sai su di chu hau cho hon diem khue de ai hoi thi dua ra lam tin. \n\t2. Long lanh.
琲=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Nam tram hat chau goi la mot boi, muoi chuoi hat chau goi la mot boi.
琳=lam [lin2]\n\t1. Ngoc lam.
琴=cam [qin2]\n\t1. Cai dan cam, dan dai ba thuoc sau tac, cang bay day goi la dan cam. 
琵=ty [pi2]\n\t1. Ty ba 琵琶 cai ty ba co bon day.
琹=cam [qin2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cam 琴.
琺=phap [fa4]\n\t1. Phap lang 琺瑯 (Fnamel) men, mot thu nguyen lieu lay o mo ra, giong nhu pha le, dun chay ra de ma do cho dep va khoi ri.
珐=phap [fa4]\n\t1. Phap lang 琺瑯 (Fnamel) men, mot thu nguyen lieu lay o mo ra, giong nhu pha le, dun chay ra de ma do cho dep va khoi ri.
琿=hon [hui1|hun2]\n\t1. Mot thu ngoc dep. \n\t2. Hon Xuan 琿春 ten dat.
珲=hon [hui1|hun2]\n\t1. Mot thu ngoc dep. \n\t2. Hon Xuan 琿春 ten dat.
瑁=mao, moi [mao4]\n\t1. Ngoc mao, vua thien tu cam de hoi hop chu hau. \n\t2. Mot am la moi. Dai moi 玳瑁 con doi moi.
瑄=tuyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Ngoc bich to toi sau tac goi la tuyen.
瑇=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dai 玳.
瑉=man [mei2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu man 珉.
瑋=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Ngoc vi. \n\t2. Coi vi 瑰瑋 quy la, bau.
玮=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Ngoc vi. \n\t2. Coi vi 瑰瑋 quy la, bau.
瑑=trien [zhuan4]\n\t1. Ngoc giua phang mat tren tram cac hoa, vanh chung quanh chay trien goi la trien. Cac ban in khac chu deu de chua trien ca, vi the moi keu ten tu nguoi la trien 瑑 hay thai trien 台瑑.
瑕=ha [xia2]\n\t1. Vet ngoc, dieu lam loi cua nguoi ta goi la ha ty 瑕疵.
瑗=vien [yuan4]\n\t1. Ngoc vien, hon ngoc bich lo to.
瑙=nao [nao3]\n\t1. Ma nao 瑪瑙 mot chat bau lay o mo ra, dung lam do trang suc dep.
瑚=ho, ho [hu2]\n\t1. San ho 珊瑚 mot thu dong vat nho o trong be ket lai, hinh nhu canh cay, dep nhu ngoc, dung lam chom mu rat quy. \n\t2. Mot am la ho. Cai ho, mot thu bat dia dung xoi de cung te.
瑛=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Anh sang ngoc. \n\t2. Ngoc sang suot ben no sang ben kia.
瑜=du [yu2]\n\t1. Can du 瑾瑜 mot thu ngoc dep. \n\t2. Trong hon ngoc cho nao trong suot dep nhat goi la du, vi the nen su vat gi vua co tot vua co xau goi la ha du bat yem 瑕瑜不掩. \n\t3. Du gia 瑜伽 tieng Pham (yoga), nghia la ngoi yen lang nghi, chung duoc suc than bi mat de tru ma chung dao, cuu khap chung sinh. \n\t4. Du gia tang 瑜伽僧 su di cung dam.
瑞=thuy [rui4]\n\t1. Ten chung cua ngoc khue ngoc bich, doi xua dung lam dau hieu cho nen goi la thuy. \n\t2. Tuong thuy 祥瑞 diem tot lanh.
瑟=sat [se4]\n\t1. Cai dan sat. Thu dan co 25 day. \n\t2. Sat sat 瑟瑟 tieng gio san sat.
瑯=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lang 琅.
瑣=toa [suo3]\n\t1. Vun vat, mon may, lan lon. \n\t2. Bi oi, bi lau. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu toa 鎖. \n\t4. Tieng ngoc keu be. \n\t5. Cham long. \n\t6. So chep.
琐=toa [suo3]\n\t1. Vun vat, mon may, lan lon. \n\t2. Bi oi, bi lau. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu toa 鎖. \n\t4. Tieng ngoc keu be. \n\t5. Cham long. \n\t6. So chep.
瑤=dao [yao2]\n\t1. Ngoc dao. Mot thu ngoc dep, cung dung de ti du cac vat quy bau. Nhu khen van tu nguoi rang hay rang tot thi goi la dao chuong 瑤章. \n\t2. Sang sua tinh sach.
瑶=dao [yao2]\n\t1. Ngoc dao. Mot thu ngoc dep, cung dung de ti du cac vat quy bau. Nhu khen van tu nguoi rang hay rang tot thi goi la dao chuong 瑤章. \n\t2. Sang sua tinh sach.
瑩=oanh [ying2]\n\t1. Mot thu da dep nhu ngoc. \n\t2. Trong suot. \n\t3. Tam dia sang sua.
莹=oanh [ying2]\n\t1. Mot thu da dep nhu ngoc. \n\t2. Trong suot. \n\t3. Tam dia sang sua.
瑪=ma [ma3]\n\t1. Ma nao 瑪瑙 mot chat bau lay o mo ra, dung lam do trang suc dep.
玛=ma [ma3]\n\t1. Ma nao 瑪瑙 mot chat bau lay o mo ra, dung lam do trang suc dep.
瑰=coi, khoi [gui1]\n\t1. Mot thu da dep kem ngoc. \n\t2. Quy la. Nhu coi ky 瑰奇 hay coi vi 瑰瑋 deu nghia la quy bau la lung ca. \n\t3. Mai coi 玟瑰 mot thu ngoc do. Ta quen doc la chu khoi ca.
瑱=thien, chan [tian4]\n\t1. Dung ngoc trang suc tai. \n\t2. Mot am la chan. Ngoc chan.
瑲=thuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Tieng ngoc keu.
瑴=giac [jue2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giac 玨.
瑽=xung [cong1]\n\t1. Tranh xung 琤瑽 tieng deo ngoc lang xoang.
瑾=can [jin3]\n\t1. Mot thu ngoc dep.
璀=thoi [cui3]\n\t1. Thoi xan 璀璨 anh sang ngoc.
璃=ly [li2]\n\t1. Luu ly 琉璃 mot thu ngoc quy o Tay vuc.
璅=toa [suo3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu toa 瑣 hay 鎖.
璆=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Ngoc cau, mot thu ngoc dep dung de lam khanh. \n\t2. Tieng ngoc.
璇=tuyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Mot thu ngoc dep, co khi viet la 璿 hay la 琁.
璈=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Mot do am nhac ngay xua.
璉=lien [lian3]\n\t1. Cai bat dung xoi cung o ton mieu doi xua.
琏=lien [lian3]\n\t1. Cai bat dung xoi cung o ton mieu doi xua.
璋=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Hon ngoc deo phang goi la khue 圭, xe doi lay mot nua goi la chuong 璋. Kinh Thi co cau. Nai sinh nam tu, tai long chi chuong 乃生男子載弄之璋 ben de con trai, cho choi ngoc chuong. Vi the mung ai de con trai thi goi la long chuong chi hi 弄璋之喜.
璜=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Ngoc deo nhu nua hinh tron goi la hoang 璜 (nua ngoc bich).
璞=phac [pu2]\n\t1. Ngoc o trong da. \n\t2. Chan thuc.
璠=phan [fan2]\n\t1. Du phan 璵璠 mot thu ngoc bau o nuoc Lo.
璣=ki [ji1]\n\t1. Ngoc chau khong duoc tron goi la ki. \n\t2. Tuyen ki 璿璣 mot thu do de xem thien van.
玑=ki [ji1]\n\t1. Ngoc chau khong duoc tron goi la ki. \n\t2. Tuyen ki 璿璣 mot thu do de xem thien van.
璐=lo [lu4]\n\t1. Ngoc lo, thu ngoc dep.
璢=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu luu 琉.
璨=xan [can4]\n\t1. Thoi xan 璀璨 anh sang ngoc.
璩=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Cai vong.
璪=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Lay chi ngu sac xau ngoc lam do trang suc mu mien goi la tao.
璫=dang [dang1]\n\t1. Ngoc chau deo tai. \n\t2. Lang dang 琅璫 cai chuong rung. \n\t3. Dinh dang 丁璫 tieng ngoc deo keu xoang xoang. \n\t4. Tu nha Han ve sau, hoan quan deo ngoc vao ben huu mu, cho nen goi hoan quan la dang.
環=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Cai vong ngoc. \n\t2. Pham cai gi hinh vong tron deu goi la hoan. Nhu nhi hoan 耳環 vong tai, chi hoan 指環 vong ngon tay (cai nhan). \n\t3. Vay quanh. \n\t4. Khap. \n\t5. Rong lon ngang nhau.
环=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Cai vong ngoc. \n\t2. Pham cai gi hinh vong tron deu goi la hoan. Nhu nhi hoan 耳環 vong tai, chi hoan 指環 vong ngon tay (cai nhan). \n\t3. Vay quanh. \n\t4. Khap. \n\t5. Rong lon ngang nhau.
璵=du [yu2]\n\t1. Du phan 璵璠 mot thu ngoc bau o nuoc Lo.
璧=bich [bi4]\n\t1. Ngoc bich. \n\t2. Doi xua chia ra lam nam tuoc, moi tuoc duoc cam mot thu bich. Nhu tuoc tu thi cam coc bich 穀璧, tuoc nam cam bo bich 蒲璧, v.v. \n\t3. Tra lai. Nhu bich ta 璧謝, bich hoan 璧還 deu nghia la tra lai nguyen ven.
璿=tuyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Nghia la ngoc tuyen, thu ngoc dep. Cung nhu chu tuyen 璇.
瓀=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Thu da giong nhu ngoc.
瓈=le [li2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu le 璃.
璽=ti [xi3]\n\t1. Cai an cua thien tu.
玺=ti [xi3]\n\t1. Cai an cua thien tu.
瓊=quynh [qiong2]\n\t1. Ngoc quynh. \n\t2. Minh quynh 明瓊 mot thu tro choi ngay xua. \n\t3. Ten goi khac cua dao Hai Nam (海南島), Trung quoc.
琼=quynh [qiong2]\n\t1. Ngoc quynh. \n\t2. Minh quynh 明瓊 mot thu tro choi ngay xua. \n\t3. Ten goi khac cua dao Hai Nam (海南島), Trung quoc.
瓏=lung [long2]\n\t1. Linh lung 玲瓏 tieng ngoc keu. \n\t2. Bong lon, do gi lam kheo leo goi la linh lung.
珑=lung [long2]\n\t1. Linh lung 玲瓏 tieng ngoc keu. \n\t2. Bong lon, do gi lam kheo leo goi la linh lung.
瓔=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Anh lac 瓔珞 chuoi ngoc, lay ngoc chau xau tung chuoi deo vao co cho dep goi la anh lac.
璎=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Anh lac 瓔珞 chuoi ngoc, lay ngoc chau xau tung chuoi deo vao co cho dep goi la anh lac.
瓚=toan [zan4]\n\t1. Cai coc de rot ruou tuoi xuong dat lam phep te than.
瓒=toan [zan4]\n\t1. Cai coc de rot ruou tuoi xuong dat lam phep te than.
瓜=qua [gua1]\n\t1. Dua, cac thu dua co qua deu goi la qua. \n\t2. Qua ki 瓜期 doi thay chuc viec, hen nguoi nay den thay nguoi kia goi la qua ki. \n\t3. Con gai den muoi sau tuoi goi la pha qua 破瓜, vi chu qua 瓜 giong hinh hai chu bat 八, tuc muoi sau. \n\t4. Qua ly 瓜李 noi su hiem nghi, xo giay o ruong dua nguoi ta ngo la hai dua, doi lai mu o duoi cay man, nguoi ta ngo la hai man, dau ngay nguoi ta cung ngo rang gian. qua dien bat nap ly, ly ha bat chinh quan 瓜田不納履，李下不整冠. \n\t5. Qua cat 瓜葛 ke than thich. Hai ho khong co lien thuoc gi voi nhau ma vi cac nganh day dua voi nhau moi nen than thich goi la qua cat.
瓞=diet [die2]\n\t1. Thu dua nho. \n\t2. Dai dac, Kinh Thi co cau Mien mien qua diet 綿綿瓜瓞 con chau noi doi dai dac.
瓠=ho, hoach [hu4]\n\t1. Bau, mot giong day nhu dua co qua dai nhu qua bau, luc lon an het ruot, con vo dung lam cai lo dung nuoc duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la hoach. Hoach lac 瓠落 cung nhu khuech lac 廓落. Trang Tu (莊子). Phau chi di vi bieu, tac hoach lac vo so dung 剖之以為瓢，則瓠落無所容 bo no ra lam cai bau thi manh vo khong dung duoc vat gi.
瓢=bieu [piao2]\n\t1. Cai bau, lay vo qua bau che ra do dung ruou dung nuoc, goi la bieu. Xem chu ho 瓠.
瓣=bien [ban4]\n\t1. Nhung cho trong qua dua co nhieu hat no chau lai voi nhau goi la bien. \n\t2. Canh hoa. \n\t3. Mui qua. \n\t4. Bien huong 瓣香 kinh trong, kinh mo.
瓤=nhuong [rang2]\n\t1. Cui. \n\t2. Mui qua.
瓦=ngoa [wa3|wa4]\n\t1. Ngoi. \n\t2. Ngoa giai 瓦解 tan lo, vo lo.
瓴=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Ngoi mang, ngoi bo, nha lop long ngoi ngua len goi la linh. Cao oc kien linh 高屋建瓴 noi ve hinh the dong o cho cao co the chay xuong duoc. Nha binh thuong noi. kien linh chi the 建瓴之勢 nghia la dong binh o cho cao co the danh up quan giac duoc.
瓷=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Do su.
瓻=hi [chi1]\n\t1. Cai ve dung ruou.
瓿=bau, phau [bu4]\n\t1. Cai vo nho. Duong Hung nha Han (漢揚雄) lam sach Thai huyen phap ngon, Luu Ham (劉歆) gieu rang. Toi e nguoi sau ho se dung sach anh ma min vo tuong thoi, vi the bay gio moi goi nhung sach khong hop voi su ua thich cua doi la phu tuong bau 覆醬瓿. Cung doc la chu phau.
甁=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cai binh, cai lo, cai ong nho.
甃=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Cai thanh gieng. \n\t2. Cham tro, dung gach da xay nhu van hoa cung goi la truu.
甄=chan, chan [zhen1]\n\t1. Tho gom. Nhu chan dao 甄陶 nan duc, day do gay dung nen nhan tai, cung goi la chan dao. \n\t2. Soi xet, phan biet. Nhu chan bat 甄拔, chan biet 甄別 deu nghia la phan biet hon kem ma tien cu len vay. \n\t3. Neu to. \n\t4. Sang. \n\t5. Ten mot the tran. \n\t6. Mot am la chan. Tieng chuong de.
甆=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tu 瓷.
甌=au [ou1]\n\t1. Cai au, cai bon, cai chen. \n\t2. Ten dat.
瓯=au [ou1]\n\t1. Cai au, cai bon, cai chen. \n\t2. Ten dat.
甍=manh [meng2]\n\t1. Cai rui, dong tren mai nha de moc ngoi vao.
甎=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Gach da nung chin.
甑=tang [zeng4]\n\t1. Cai sieu sanh, cai noi dat.
甒=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Cai nam ruou.
甓=bich [pi4]\n\t1. Gach to.
甕=ung [weng4]\n\t1. Cai vo, cai hu.
甖=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu anh 罌.
甗=nghien [yan3]\n\t1. Cai cho lien ca noi day.
甘=cam [gan1]\n\t1. Ngot. \n\t2. Pham do an gi ngon deu goi la cam. \n\t3. Cam tam, cam chiu. Nhu cam vi nhan ha 甘為人下 cam tam lam duoi nguoi. \n\t4. Loi noi ngot, loi noi nghe thich tai. \n\t5. Thich. \n\t6. Ngu say.
甚=tham [shen2|shen4]\n\t1. Rat, lam. \n\t2. Nao. Nhu tham nhat quy lai 甚日歸來 ngay nao tro ve.
甜=diem [tian2]\n\t1. Vi ngot. \n\t2. Ngu say goi la diem thuy 甜睡.
生=sanh, sinh [sheng1]\n\t1. Song, doi lai voi tu 死. \n\t2. Con song. Nhu binh sanh 平生 luc ngay thuong con song, thu sanh 此生 doi nay, v.v. \n\t3. Nhung vat co song. Nhu chung sanh 眾生, quan sanh 群生 deu la noi cac loai co song ca. \n\t4. Sinh san, nay no. Nhu sanh tu 生子 de con, sinh loi 生利 sinh loi, v.v. \n\t5. Nuoi. Nhung do de nuoi song deu goi la sanh. Nhu sanh ke 生計 cac ke de nuoi song. \n\t6. Song, chua chin goi la sanh, lam viec khong co kinh nghiem goi la sanh thu 生手, khach khong quen thuoc goi la sanh khach 生客 (khach la), v.v. \n\t7. Hoc tro. Nhu tien sanh 先生 ong thay, nghia la nguoi hoc truoc minh, hau sanh 後生 hoc tro, nghia la nguoi sinh sau, v.v. Thay goi hoc tro la sanh, hoc tro cung tu xung minh la sanh. \n\t8. Dung nhu chu mat 末. \n\t9. Dung lam tieng dem. \n\t10. Tieng dung trong tan tuong. Ta quen doc la chu sinh.
甡=san [shen1]\n\t1. Lo nho, ta cai dang moi nguoi cung dung chen chuc.
產=san [chan3]\n\t1. Sinh de. \n\t2. Cho sinh ra. Nhu tho san 土產 vat ay chi dat ay moi co. \n\t3. Cua cai. Nhu ruong dat nha cua, do dac de cho nguoi ta nuong do ma song deu goi la san nghiep 產業. \n\t4. Dan ba de goi la san phu 產婦, sau khi de roi ma om goi la san hau 產後, v.v. \n\t5. Mot thu am nhac.
产=san [chan3]\n\t1. Sinh de. \n\t2. Cho sinh ra. Nhu tho san 土產 vat ay chi dat ay moi co. \n\t3. Cua cai. Nhu ruong dat nha cua, do dac de cho nguoi ta nuong do ma song deu goi la san nghiep 產業. \n\t4. Dan ba de goi la san phu 產婦, sau khi de roi ma om goi la san hau 產後, v.v. \n\t5. Mot thu am nhac.
甥=sanh [sheng1]\n\t1. Chau ngoai, chau goi bang cau cung goi la sanh. \n\t2. Chang re.
甦=to [su1]\n\t1. Song lai.
用=dung [yong4]\n\t1. Cong dung, doi lai voi chu the 體. Ve phan ban nang cua su vat goi la the 體, dem thi hanh ra su nghiep goi la dung 用. Nhu cong dung 功用 cong dung, tac dung 作用 lam dung. \n\t2. Dung, sai khien. Nhu dung nhan hanh chanh 用人行政 dung nguoi lam chanh. \n\t3. Cua dung, tai chanh cua nha nuoc goi la quoc dung 國用. \n\t4. Do dung. \n\t5. Nho vao cai gi de dong tac lam lung goi la dung. Nhu dung tam 用心, dung luc 用力, dong dung 動用, v.v. \n\t6. Dung lam tro tu, nghia la lay, la ben, la chung ay. 
甫=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Tieng goi ton quy cua dan ong. Nhu duc Khong Tu goi la Ny phu 尼甫. \n\t2. Ten chu bieu hieu, cho nen hoi ten tu nguoi ta thi noi la thai phu 台甫. \n\t3. Cha, minh noi den cha nguoi khac thi keu la ton phu 尊甫. \n\t4. Vua moi. \n\t5. Lon.
甬=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Dung dao 甬道 loi giua, ngay xua quan di, dap duong cao hon hai ben goi la dung dao. \n\t2. Ten dat.
甯=ninh, ninh [ning2]\n\t1. So nguyen, nguyen the, tha rang. \n\t2. Mot am la ninh. Yen, cung nhu chu ninh 寧.
田=dien [tian2]\n\t1. Ruong dat cay cay duoc goi la dien. \n\t2. Di san. \n\t3. Trong lon.
由=do [you2]\n\t1. Boi, tu. \n\t2. Noi theo. \n\t3. Nguyen do, nguyen nhan cua mot su gi goi la do. Nhu tinh do 情由, ly do 理由, v.v. Nop thue co giay bien lai goi la do don 由單. Trich lay cac phan dai khai o trong van thu goi la trich do 摘由. \n\t4. Chung. \n\t5. Dung. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu do 猶.
甲=giap [jia3]\n\t1. Can Giap, mot can dau trong muoi can. Ngay xua lay muoi can ke lan luot, cho nen cai gi hon het ca deu goi la giap. Nhu phu giap nhat huong 富甲一鄉 giau nhat mot lang. \n\t2. Dung lam chu noi thay ngoi (dai tu). Nhu anh giap, anh at, phan giap, phan at. Pham khong biet ro la ai thi muon chu ay lam cai ten ma goi thay cho co cho ma so sanh. \n\t3. Doi khoa cu, thi tien si lay nhat giap 一甲, nhi giap 二甲, tam giap 三甲 de chia hon kem. Cho nen bang tien si goi la giap bang 甲榜. Nhat giap chi co ba   buc. (1) Trang nguyen 狀元, (2) Bang nhan 榜眼, Tham hoa 探花 goi la dinh giap 鼎甲. \n\t4. Ao giap (ao day). \n\t5. Mai. Nhu quy giap 龜甲 mai rua. \n\t6. Bao giap 保甲 ke tra cac nha cac nhan xuat de cho cung do xet nhau ma phong bi cac quan gian phi an nup. Muoi nha goi la mot giap.
申=than [shen1]\n\t1. Chi than, mot chi trong muoi hai chi. Tu 3 gio chieu den nam gio chieu goi la gio than. \n\t2. Lai. Nhu than thuyet 申說 noi lai. \n\t3. Den. Nhu phung than phi kinh 奉申菲敬 kinh dang le mon. \n\t4. Duoi, cung nghia voi chu than 伸. \n\t5. Hang dau cac van thu nha quan goi la than. \n\t6. Bac kem phan phai chiu tien pha them cho dung so bac goi la than thuy 申水. \n\t7. Ten dat. \n\t8. Bay to. Nhu than ly 申理 nguoi bi oan uc bay to ly do de keu oan.
男=nam [nan2]\n\t1. Con trai. \n\t2. Con trai doi voi cha me thi tu xung minh la nam. \n\t3. Tuoc Nam.
甸=dien, dien [dian4]\n\t1. Khu, coi. Vung quanh thanh cua nha vua cach 500 dam goi la dien. \n\t2. Thue dien, mot thu thue ruong ngay xua. \n\t3. Tri (治). \n\t4. Ten chuc quan coi ve viec ruong nuong. \n\t5. Mot am la dien. San ban.
町=dinh [ding1|ting3]\n\t1. Moc ruong, bo coi ruong. Phep tinh dat 36 thuoc vuong goi la mot binh, 30   binh la mot mau, 100 mau goi la mot dinh.
畀=ty [bi4]\n\t1. Ban cho, cho.
画=hoach [hua4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoach 畫. 
畂=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Lam ruong. \n\t2. San ban.
畆=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu mau 畝.
畊=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu canh 耕. 
界=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Coi, moc. Quyen han duoc giu dat den dau trong cot lam moc den day goi la gioi. \n\t2. Canh coi, doi voi mot dia vi khac ma noi. Nhu chanh gioi 政界 coi chinh tri, thuong gioi 商界 trong coi buon, v.v. \n\t3. The gioi 世界 coi doi, nha Phat noi nguoi cung o trong khoang troi dat chi co cai doi minh la khac, con thi khong phan re day day gi ca, goi la the gioi. Vi the nen chu nghia binh dang bac ai cung goi la the gioi chu nghia 世界主義. \n\t4. Canh ngo, nha Phat chia nhung phan con phai chiu trong vong luan hoi lam   ba coi. (1) Coi duc, (2) Coi sac, (3) Coi khong co sac. Moi coi canh ngo mot   khac. \n\t5. Gioi han. \n\t6. Ngan cach. \n\t7. Lam ly gian.
畎=quyen [quan3]\n\t1. Ve phan sau rong trong khoang mau ruong goi la quyen. \n\t2. Khoi thong. \n\t3. Cai ngoi dan nuoc vao ruong. Cho hang nui thong voi nuoc.
畏=uy [wei4]\n\t1. So, su gi chua xay ra cung tuong tuong cung dang so goi la cu 懼, su da xay den phai nhan la dang so goi la uy 畏. \n\t2. Tam phuc. \n\t3. Trong long co moi lo phai ran giu goi la uy. \n\t4. Pham toi chet trong nguc.
畔=ban [pan4]\n\t1. Bo ruong. \n\t2. Ven nuoc. \n\t3. Ben. Nhu cham ban 枕畔 ben goi. \n\t4. Trai, phan ban. Quan tu bac hoc u van, uoc chi di le diec kha di phat ban hy phu 君子博學於文，約之以禮，亦可以弗畔矣夫 (Luan Ngu, 論語) nguoi quan tu truoc hoc van, sau hoc le, nho vay khoi trai dao. \n\t5. Lia.
留=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Luu lai, muon di ma tam o lai goi la luu. \n\t2. Luu giu, giu lai khong cho di. \n\t3. Dang di ma khong di goi la luu. Nhu luu nham 留任 lai o lam viec quan. \n\t4. Dinh tre. Nhu an vo luu doc 案無留牘 van thu nhanh nhen khong dong cai nao. \n\t5. Con lai. \n\t6. Lau. \n\t7. Doi dip.
畚=bon [ben3]\n\t1. Cai son, cai ky hot dat.
畛=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Bo ruong. \n\t2. Gioi han. \n\t3. Den keu bao. Nhu chan u quy than 畛於鬼神 (Le Ky, 禮記) khan bao quy than.
畜=suc, huc [chu4|xu4]\n\t1. Giong muong nuoi trong nha. Nhu ngua, trau, de, ga, cho, lon goi la luc suc 六畜. \n\t2. Suc tich, chua. Mot am la huc. \n\t3. Nuoi. \n\t4. Bao dong. \n\t5. Luu lai. \n\t6. Thuan. \n\t7. Giu, vuc day.
畝=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Mau, muoi sao la mot mau (3600 thuoc vuong tay la mot mau). \n\t2. Khu ruong, phan ruong.
亩=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Mau, muoi sao la mot mau (3600 thuoc vuong tay la mot mau). \n\t2. Khu ruong, phan ruong.
畞=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu mau 畝.
畢=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Xong, het. Hoc het han hoc goi la tat nghiep 畢業. \n\t2. Du het. Nhu quan hien tat tap 群賢畢至 moi nguoi hien deu hop du het. \n\t3. Cai luoi hinh ba goc de bat chim. \n\t4. Sao Tat, mot sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Cai to, cai thu. Nhu thu tat 手畢 cai to tay viet. \n\t6. Cai go de xau muong sinh dem len te. \n\t7. Kin. \n\t8. Nhanh nhen.
毕=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Xong, het. Hoc het han hoc goi la tat nghiep 畢業. \n\t2. Du het. Nhu quan hien tat tap 群賢畢至 moi nguoi hien deu hop du het. \n\t3. Cai luoi hinh ba goc de bat chim. \n\t4. Sao Tat, mot sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Cai to, cai thu. Nhu thu tat 手畢 cai to tay viet. \n\t6. Cai go de xau muong sinh dem len te. \n\t7. Kin. \n\t8. Nhanh nhen.
畣=dap [da1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dap 答.
略=luoc [lue:4]\n\t1. Muu luoc, phan nhieu chi ve viec binh. Nhu thao luoc 韜略 co tai thao vat. Nguoi nao dam dang co tai cung goi la thao luoc. Phuong luoc 方略 sach chep ve vo cong. \n\t2. Coi. Nhu kinh luoc 經略 kinh doanh sua tri mot coi nao. Tu nha Duong tro ve sau, muon khai thac phuong dat nao deu dat mot chuc Kinh luoc. Tu nha Minh ve sau thi quyen quan Kinh luoc lai trong lam, hon ca cac chuc Tong doc. \n\t3. Lay, khong hao ton binh tuong ma lay duoc dat nguoi goi la luoc. \n\t4. Cuop, cung mot nghia voi chu luoc 掠. \n\t5. Gian luoc qua, chi cu ve phan dai doan goi la luoc. Nhu tiet luoc 節略 nhat qua tung doan. \n\t6. Dung lam tro tu. Nhu luoc dong 略同 hoi giong, luoc tu 略似 hao hao tua. \n\t7. Dao. \n\t8. Duong. \n\t9. Sac, tot.
畦=hue [qi2]\n\t1. Thua ruong, nam muoi mau goi la mot hue. Mot khu cung goi la mot hue. \n\t2. Luong rau.
畨=phien [fan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu phien 番.
番=phien, phan, ba, ba [fan1|pan1]\n\t1. Lan luot. Nhu canh phien 更番 doi phien (thay doi nhau). \n\t2. Giong Phien, doi sau goi cac nuoc ngoai la phien ca. Nhu phien bo 番布 vai tay, phien bac 番舶 tau tay, v.v. \n\t3. Cac nguoi Tho o Dai Loan cung goi la phien. \n\t3. Mot am la phan. Ten huyen. \n\t4. Lai mot am la ba. Ba ba 番番 khoe manh. \n\t5. Mot am nua la ba. Gia, lu khu.
畫=hoa, hoach [hua4]\n\t1. Vach, ve. Buc tranh ve cung goi la hoa. \n\t2. Mot am la hoach. Vach, vach cho biet den dau la mot khu mot coi goi la hoach. Nhu phan cuong hoach gioi 分疆畫界 vach chia bo coi. \n\t3. Ngan tro. Nhu hoach dia tu han 畫地自限 vach dat tu ngan, y noi hoc van khong cau tien bo hon, duoc chut dinh da cho la day du. \n\t4. Muu ke. Nhu muu hoach 謀畫, ke hoach 計畫, v.v. \n\t5. Net, net ngang cua chu goi la hoach. 
画=hoa, hoach [hua4]\n\t1. Vach, ve. Buc tranh ve cung goi la hoa. \n\t2. Mot am la hoach. Vach, vach cho biet den dau la mot khu mot coi goi la hoach. Nhu phan cuong hoach gioi 分疆畫界 vach chia bo coi. \n\t3. Ngan tro. Nhu hoach dia tu han 畫地自限 vach dat tu ngan, y noi hoc van khong cau tien bo hon, duoc chut dinh da cho la day du. \n\t4. Muu ke. Nhu muu hoach 謀畫, ke hoach 計畫, v.v. \n\t5. Net, net ngang cua chu goi la hoach. 
畬=du [she1]\n\t1. Ruong ngon, ruong khai khan toi hai nam roi goi la du.
畲=du [she1]\n\t1. Ruong ngon, ruong khai khan toi hai nam roi goi la du.
畮=mau [mu3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu mau |畝.
畯=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Dien tuan 田畯 quan dien tuan, giu viec khuyen dan lam ruong. \n\t2. Nguoi que mua.
異=di [yi4]\n\t1. Khac, trai lai voi tieng cung. Nhu di vat 異物 vat khac, di toc 異族 ho khac, v.v. \n\t2. Khac la. Nhu di so 異數 so duoc huong an dac biet, di thai 異彩 ve la, v.v. \n\t3. Quai la. Nhu ky di 奇異, hai di 駭異, v.v. \n\t4. Chia lia. Nhu phan di anh em chia nhau o rieng, ly di 離異 vo chong bo nhau, v.v. \n\t5. Khac. Nhu di nhat 異日 ngay khac, di huong 異鄉 lang khac, v.v. \n\t6. Duong rieng. Nhu lay khoa cu ken nguoi, ai do ma ra lam quan goi la chanh do 正途, khong do dat gi ma ra goi la di do 異途.
异=di [yi4]\n\t1. Khac, trai lai voi tieng cung. Nhu di vat 異物 vat khac, di toc 異族 ho khac, v.v. \n\t2. Khac la. Nhu di so 異數 so duoc huong an dac biet, di thai 異彩 ve la, v.v. \n\t3. Quai la. Nhu ky di 奇異, hai di 駭異, v.v. \n\t4. Chia lia. Nhu phan di anh em chia nhau o rieng, ly di 離異 vo chong bo nhau, v.v. \n\t5. Khac. Nhu di nhat 異日 ngay khac, di huong 異鄉 lang khac, v.v. \n\t6. Duong rieng. Nhu lay khoa cu ken nguoi, ai do ma ra lam quan goi la chanh do 正途, khong do dat gi ma ra goi la di do 異途.
畱=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Dung nhu chu luu 留.
當=duong, dang [dang1|dang4]\n\t1. Dang, duong thoi 當時 dang bay gio, duong dai 當代 duong doi bay gio. \n\t2. Ganh lay, nhan lay. Nhu dam duong 擔當 dam dang, thua duong 承當 nhan lay cong viec, v.v. \n\t3. Chu nhiem, chiu ganh. Nhu duong gia 當家 chiu ganh vac ca viec nha, duong quoc 當國 chiu ganh vac ca viec nuoc, v.v. \n\t4. Duong duong 當當 thien tu dung ngoanh mat ve phuong nam de hieu lenh chu hau. \n\t5. Duong dao 當道, duong lo 當路 cac nha cam quyen. \n\t6. Hop, xung doi, duong doi. Nhu tuong duong 相當 cung xung nhau, ung duong 應當 nen phai, v.v. \n\t7. Chong giu. Nhu nhat phu duong quan, van phu mac khai 一夫當關，萬夫莫開 (Ly Bach 李白) mot nguoi chong giu cua o, muon nguoi chang pha noi. \n\t8. Hau. Nhu duong tich 當夕 vo ca vo le lan luot ngu hau. \n\t9. Ngan che. \n\t10. Mot am la dang. Dich dang, phai the. \n\t11. Cam, do, de do lam tin ma lay tien tieu goi la dang. \n\t12. Cau dang 句當 nguoi den vai phai lieu bien cong viec cong. Cung viet la 勾當. Ta quen goi la nguoi cau duong.
当=duong, dang [dang1|dang4]\n\t1. Dang, duong thoi 當時 dang bay gio, duong dai 當代 duong doi bay gio. \n\t2. Ganh lay, nhan lay. Nhu dam duong 擔當 dam dang, thua duong 承當 nhan lay cong viec, v.v. \n\t3. Chu nhiem, chiu ganh. Nhu duong gia 當家 chiu ganh vac ca viec nha, duong quoc 當國 chiu ganh vac ca viec nuoc, v.v. \n\t4. Duong duong 當當 thien tu dung ngoanh mat ve phuong nam de hieu lenh chu hau. \n\t5. Duong dao 當道, duong lo 當路 cac nha cam quyen. \n\t6. Hop, xung doi, duong doi. Nhu tuong duong 相當 cung xung nhau, ung duong 應當 nen phai, v.v. \n\t7. Chong giu. Nhu nhat phu duong quan, van phu mac khai 一夫當關，萬夫莫開 (Ly Bach 李白) mot nguoi chong giu cua o, muon nguoi chang pha noi. \n\t8. Hau. Nhu duong tich 當夕 vo ca vo le lan luot ngu hau. \n\t9. Ngan che. \n\t10. Mot am la dang. Dich dang, phai the. \n\t11. Cam, do, de do lam tin ma lay tien tieu goi la dang. \n\t12. Cau dang 句當 nguoi den vai phai lieu bien cong viec cong. Cung viet la 勾當. Ta quen goi la nguoi cau duong.
畸=ki [ji1]\n\t1. So le. \n\t2. Ki nhan 畸人 nguoi an dat.
畹=uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Ruong hai mau goi la uyen. \n\t2. Thich uyen 戚畹 ho ngoai nha vua.
畽=thoan [tuan3]\n\t1. Dinh thoan 町畽 cho dat bo khong o ben canh nha.
畿=ki [ji1]\n\t1. Kinh ky 京畿 chon kinh ki, cho vua thien tu dong. \n\t2. Trong cua. \n\t3. Cai buc cua.
疄=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Thung ruong cao.
疆=cuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Coi, khong co han co ngan nao goi la vo cuong 無疆 (khong cung, khong ngan). \n\t2. Vach coi, dinh ro bo coi.
疇=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Ruong cay lua. \n\t2. Noi su da qua goi la tru tich 疇昔 tuc nhu ta noi ngay nao vay. \n\t3. Doi doi giu cai nghiep nha truyen lai goi la tru. Ngay xua giao cac viec xem thien van va tinh toan cho cac quan thai su doi doi giu chuc, cho nen goi cac nha hoc tinh la tru nhan 疇人. \n\t4. Loai, ong Co Tu bao vua Vu Vuong nhung phep lon cua troi dat co chia lam chin loai, goi la hong pham cuu tru 洪範九疇, lai goi la co tru 箕疇. \n\t5. Coi ruong, cho luong nay cach luong kia. \n\t6. Ai. \n\t7. Xua. \n\t8. Doi, hai nguoi la that 匹, bon nguoi la tru 疇.
畴=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Ruong cay lua. \n\t2. Noi su da qua goi la tru tich 疇昔 tuc nhu ta noi ngay nao vay. \n\t3. Doi doi giu cai nghiep nha truyen lai goi la tru. Ngay xua giao cac viec xem thien van va tinh toan cho cac quan thai su doi doi giu chuc, cho nen goi cac nha hoc tinh la tru nhan 疇人. \n\t4. Loai, ong Co Tu bao vua Vu Vuong nhung phep lon cua troi dat co chia lam chin loai, goi la hong pham cuu tru 洪範九疇, lai goi la co tru 箕疇. \n\t5. Coi ruong, cho luong nay cach luong kia. \n\t6. Ai. \n\t7. Xua. \n\t8. Doi, hai nguoi la that 匹, bon nguoi la tru 疇.
疊=diep [die2]\n\t1. Trung diep, chong chat. Mot trung goi la diep 疊, nghin trung goi la thien diep 千疊. \n\t2. So. \n\t3. Thu thap, thu xep. Nhu da diep 打疊, tap diep 摺疊, v.v. deu nghia la thu nhat ca.
叠=diep [die2]\n\t1. Trung diep, chong chat. Mot trung goi la diep 疊, nghin trung goi la thien diep 千疊. \n\t2. So. \n\t3. Thu thap, thu xep. Nhu da diep 打疊, tap diep 摺疊, v.v. deu nghia la thu nhat ca.
疋=so, nha, that [pi3|ya3]\n\t1. Du, chan. \n\t2. Mot am la nha. Chinh, ngay xua dung nhu chu nha 雅. \n\t3. Lai mot am la that. Nep, xep, vai lua gap lai, moi nep goi la nhat that 一疋.
疎=so [shu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu so 疏.
疏=so, so [shu1]\n\t1. Thong suot, su thuc dung le phai goi la so thong tri vien 疏通致遠. Hai ben cung thau to nhau cung goi la so thong. \n\t2. Chia khoi. \n\t3. Thua, it. \n\t4. Bay. \n\t5. Giup. \n\t6. Xa, ho gan la than 親, ho xa la so 疏. Thuong tiep nhau luon la than, cach nhau xa lau la so. \n\t7. So suat, xao nhang. Muu tinh bo tri khong duoc chu dao goi la tho so 粗疏 hay so hot 疏忽. \n\t8. Duc cham. Nhu so linh 疏櫺 duc khoet va cham tro chan song cua so cho thau anh sang vao. \n\t9. Mot am la so. Tau bay. \n\t10. Giai nghia van. Nhu chu so 注疏 chua am va giai ro nghia van.
疐=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Vuong chan. \n\t2. Nga. \n\t3. Ngan tro.
疑=nghi [yi2]\n\t1. Ngo, long chua tin dich goi la nghi. \n\t2. Giong tua. Nhu hiem nghi 嫌疑 hiem rang no giong nhu (ngo ngo). \n\t3. La, lay lam la. \n\t4. So. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu nghi 擬. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu ngung 凝.
疒=nach [chuang2]\n\t1. Tat benh.
疓=dinh [nai3]\n\t1. Cai dinh, mot thu nhot luc moi moc mot cai mun con nong va rat ngua, sau roi dam ran chac dau du goi la dinh.
疘=giang [gang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giang 肛.
疙=ngat [ge1]\n\t1. Dau danh nhot moc o tren dau, ngoai da noi cuc su si goi la ngat dap 疙瘩.
疚=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Benh lau. \n\t2. Dau long, luc de tang goi la tai cuu 在疚.
疝=san [shan4]\n\t1. Chung san, pham nhan vat gi tro ngai, lam cho gan thit co rut luon luon roi phat ra dau don du deu goi la san. Chung sa di cung goi la san.
疢=san [chen4]\n\t1. Om, benh. \n\t2. San tat 疢疾 tai va.
疣=vuu [you2]\n\t1. Cai buou, thit thua moc o ngoai da goi la chue vuu 贅疣.
疤=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Cai seo, len mun len nhot khoi roi thanh seo goi la ba.
疥=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Ghe lo. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu giai 痎 sot ret cach nhat.
疫=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Benh on dich, benh nao co the lay ra moi nguoi duoc goi la dich.
疰=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Tre con den mua he hay om goi la chu ha 疰夏.
疲=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Moi met.
疳=cam [gan1]\n\t1. Benh cam, mot thu benh ve mau rai. Nhu vi mau trang kem ma ti ran lai goi la ti cam 脾疳, tre con an bay sinh benh gay com goi la cam tich 疳積, chan rang thoi nat goi la nha cam 牙疳 cam rang hay cam tau ma. \n\t2. Ha cam 下疳, mot thu benh tinh bo dai sung loet ra.
疴=a, kha [ke1]\n\t1. Om, om nang goi la tram a 沉疴 hay 沈疴. Cung doc la kha.
疵=ty [ci1]\n\t1. Benh. \n\t2. Lam loi, co y khac trach qua goi la xuy mao cau ty 吹毛求疵 boi long tim vet.
疸=dan [da5|dan3]\n\t1. Hoang dan 黃疸 benh vang, mat mat deu vang ung, di dai vang dai tien be, moi met hay nam la benh vang, an roi lai doi ngay la chung vi dan 胃疸. Tat ca co nam chung dan.
疹=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Benh len soi.
疼=dong [teng2]\n\t1. Dau don. \n\t2. Thuong yeu lam.
疽=thu [ju1]\n\t1. Ung thu 癰疽 nhot, nhot sung do la ung 癰, khong sung do la thu 疽.
疾=tat [ji2]\n\t1. Om, tat benh, minh may khong duoc de chiu goi la tat 疾, nang hon nua goi la benh 病. \n\t2. Quay kho, nghiet ac lam kho dan goi la dan tat 民疾. \n\t3. Gian. Nhu phu kiem tat thi 撫劍疾視 (Manh Tu 孟子) tuot guom tron mat nhin. \n\t4. Ghet gian. \n\t5. Voi vang. \n\t6. Nhanh nhen. \n\t7. Bao nguoc. \n\t8. Cai chan truoc don xe. \n\t9. Tat, vet.
疿=phi [fei4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phi 痱.
痀=cau, cu [qu2]\n\t1. Cau lu 痀瘻 cong lung (gu). Co khi doc la cu.
痁=thiem [dian4]\n\t1. Sot ret lau ngay.
痂=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Vay, nhung cho nhot dong vay goi la gia.
痃=hien, huyen [xuan2]\n\t1. Hach o ben. Cung doc la huyen.
痄=cha [zha4]\n\t1. Cha tai 痄腮 sung ma (quai bi).
病=benh [bing4]\n\t1. Om. \n\t2. Tuc gian. Nhu benh chi 病之 lay lam gian. \n\t3. Lam hai. Nhu phuong hien benh quoc 妨賢病國 lam tro ngai nguoi hien va hai nuoc. \n\t4. Cau benh 姤病 ho nguoi. \n\t5. Mac benh. \n\t6. Lo. \n\t7. Lam khon kho. \n\t8. Nhuc. \n\t9. Cho kem.
症=chung [zheng1|zheng4]\n\t1. Chung benh (chung nghiem cua benh, goc benh).
痊=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Khoi, benh khoi roi goi la thuyen.
痌=thong, dong [tong1]\n\t1. Dau. Ta quen doc la chu dong.
痍=di [yi2]\n\t1. Bi dau. Nhu sang di 瘡痍 dau loet, ngoai da nhan bi thuong ma vo loet ra goi la sang di.
痎=giai [kai1]\n\t1. Sot ret cach nhat.
痏=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Nhot, seo.
痒=duong [yang3]\n\t1. Om. \n\t2. Ngua.
痔=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Benh tri, mot thu nhot loet o trong ngoai lo dit.
痕=ngan [hen2]\n\t1. Seo, vet. Pham vat gi co dau vet deu goi la ngan. Nhu mac ngan 墨痕 vet muc.
痗=moi [mei4]\n\t1. Benh, dau.
痘=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Len dau, len mua, cung goi la thien hoa 天花. Lay giong dau o trau trong vao tay nguoi cho khoi len dau goi la chung dau 種痘 trong dau. Cung goi la chung hoa 種花.
痙=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Benh co gan, xuong song cung thang, minh may uon cong nhu benh phai gio goi la kinh.
痉=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Benh co gan, xuong song cung thang, minh may uon cong nhu benh phai gio goi la kinh.
痛=thong [tong4]\n\t1. Dau don. \n\t2. Dau xot. \n\t3. Qua lam. Nhu thong am 痛飲 uong qua.
痞=bi [pi3]\n\t1. Bi tac, la lach sung ran hinh nhu trong bung co cuc, goi la bi khoi 痞塊, sot ret lau ngay thuong sinh ra cuc goi la nguoc mau 瘧母. \n\t2. Ke ac. Nhu dia bi 地痞, bi con 痞棍, v.v. (Cung nhu ta goi la du con vay).
痠=toan [suan1]\n\t1. E. Nhu toan thong 痠痛 dau e.
痢=li [li4]\n\t1. Benh li, quan dau bung lai di ra ngoai, ran mai moi ra it phan mau hay it mui la li.
痣=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Hat com, ngoai da noi len cac not den hay do goi la chi.
痧=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Benh sa, mot thu benh nhu benh hoac loan, nguyen do an uong ban thiu thanh ra tho ta, chan tay lanh gia goi la benh sa, co the truyen nhiem duoc. \n\t2. Tuc goi len soi la sa tu 痧子. Xem chu lam 痳.
痰=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Dom.
痱=phi, phi [fei4]\n\t1. Mot thu benh trung gio. \n\t2. Mot am la phi. Nhot nong.
痲=ma [ma2]\n\t1. Ma chan 痲疹 chung soi. \n\t2. Ma phong 痲風 chung hui. Cung viet 痲瘋. \n\t3. Ma ty 痲痺 te buot. \n\t4. Tuc goi len dau roi ro mat la ma tu 痲子. Thuong dung nhu chu lam 麻.
痳=lam [lin2]\n\t1. Benh lam, cuong dai sung loet, di dai ra lan mu ma buot goi la lam, rat hay lay. Co khi ket thanh da o bong bong goi la thach lam 石痳, di dai ra mau goi la huyet lam 血痳, v.v.
痴=si [chi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu si 癡.
痹=ty [bi4]\n\t1. Benh te liet. Cung viet la 痺.
痺=ty [bi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ty 痹.
痹=ty [bi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ty 痹.
痼=co [gu4]\n\t1. Benh co tat (benh lau khong chua khoi).
痿=nuy [wei3]\n\t1. Liet, gan thit mem nhun khong cu dong duoc goi la nuy.
瘀=u [yu1]\n\t1. Mau dong, mau u.
瘁=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Om, nhoc met.
瘃=chuc [zhu2]\n\t1. Chan tay moc nhot lanh goi la chuc. Tuc goi la dong sang 凍瘡 nut tay.
痾=a [e1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu a 疴.
瘈=khe [ji4]\n\t1. Ro dai.
瘊=hau [hou2]\n\t1. Cai buou nho.
瘋=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Benh dau phong. \n\t2. Dien ro (benh than kinh nang).
疯=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Benh dau phong. \n\t2. Dien ro (benh than kinh nang).
瘌=lat [la4]\n\t1. Ghe lo. Tuc goi dau moc nhot toc khong moc duoc la lat 瘌 (hoi).
瘍=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Pham cac benh nhot say deu goi la duong, nen thay thuoc ngoai khoa goi la duong y 瘍醫.
疡=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Pham cac benh nhot say deu goi la duong, nen thay thuoc ngoai khoa goi la duong y 瘍醫.
瘏=do [tu2]\n\t1. Om, dau.
瘐=du [yu3]\n\t1. Nguoi hien that chi mang benh lo sau (au sau). \n\t2. Heo hat, nhan doi ret ma chet goi la du tu 瘐死.
瘓=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Than hoan 癱瘓 chan tay te dai bat nhan (不仁, te liet).
痪=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Than hoan 癱瘓 chan tay te dai bat nhan (不仁, te liet).
瘕=ha, gia [jia3]\n\t1. Benh hon, trong bung tich hon ran chac o mot cho goi la trung 癥, tan tu khong duoc goi la ha 瘕. Cung doc la chu gia.
瘖=am [yin1]\n\t1. Cam.
瘗=e [yi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu e 瘞.
瘝=quan [guan1]\n\t1. Dau om. \n\t2. Bo thieu.
瘛=xiet, khiet [chi4]\n\t1. Co quap, gan mach co rut lai goi la xiet. \n\t2. Xiet tung 瘛瘲 benh sai tre con. Cung viet la xiet 瘈. Tuc doc la khiet.
瘞=e [yi4]\n\t1. Chon, giau.
瘗=e [yi4]\n\t1. Chon, giau.
瘟=on [wen1]\n\t1. Benh on dich, benh truyen nhiem goi la on.
瘠=tich [ji2]\n\t1. Gay. \n\t2. Dat xau. \n\t3. Hai.
瘡=sang [chuang1]\n\t1. Benh nhot. \n\t2. Bi thuong, bi cac loai kim dam vao goi la kim sang 金瘡.
疮=sang [chuang1]\n\t1. Benh nhot. \n\t2. Bi thuong, bi cac loai kim dam vao goi la kim sang 金瘡.
瘢=ban [ban1]\n\t1. Seo.
瘤=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu luu 癅.
瘥=ta, sai [chai4|cuo2]\n\t1. Om. \n\t2. Mot am la sai. Om khoi (benh khoi).
瘦=sau [shou4]\n\t1. Gay, mon. \n\t2. Nho. \n\t3. Xau, it mau.
瘧=nguoc [nue:4|yao4]\n\t1. Sot ret, het ret lai nong, cu dung gio phat goi la nguoc. Vi the muoi dem vi trung doc truyen vao trong minh, phat benh truoc ret sau nong, moi ngay mot con cu dung gio phat, co khi cach mot ngay mot con, co khi hai ba ngay mot con goi la gian hiet nhiet 間歇熱 sot cach nhat.
疟=nguoc [nue:4|yao4]\n\t1. Sot ret, het ret lai nong, cu dung gio phat goi la nguoc. Vi the muoi dem vi trung doc truyen vao trong minh, phat benh truoc ret sau nong, moi ngay mot con cu dung gio phat, co khi cach mot ngay mot con, co khi hai ba ngay mot con goi la gian hiet nhiet 間歇熱 sot cach nhat.
瘩=dap [da2|da5]\n\t1. Dau danh nhot moc o tren dau, ngoai da noi cuc su si goi la ngat dap 疙瘩.
瘭=tieu, tieu [biao1]\n\t1. Tieu thu 瘭疽 ha mong chan mong tay, nhot loet dau ngon chan ngon tay. Cung doc la chu tieu.
瘰=loi, loa [luo3]\n\t1. Loi lich 瘰癧 chung trang nhac, co co tung chum nhot nhu mot trang nhac ngua, co khi no an lan ca xuong nguc xuong nach nen cung goi la lich quan 癧串. Ta quen doc la chu loa.
瘲=tung [zong4]\n\t1. Gan mach thuon ra, thong ra. \n\t2. Xiet tung 瘛瘲 benh sai tre con.
瘳=suu [chou1]\n\t1. Om khoi. \n\t2. Hai.
瘴=chuong [zhang4]\n\t1. Khi doc (khi doc o rung nui).
瘵=sai [zhai4]\n\t1. Benh. \n\t2. Lao sai 癆瘵 benh lao sai.
瘸=qua [que2]\n\t1. Benh khoeo, ke di khap khenh goi la qua tu 瘸子.
瘻=lu [lou4]\n\t1. Nhot nho, nhot chay nuoc vang mai lhong khoi goi la lu quan 瘻管. Mot am la lu. Cau lu 痀瘻 cong lung (gu).
瘼=mac [mo4]\n\t1. Benh, nhung su tai nan khon kho cua dan goi la dan mac 民瘼.
療=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Chua benh.
疗=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Chua benh.
癃=lung [long2]\n\t1. Gu, benh gia khong chua duoc nua. \n\t2. Benh lung be 癃閉, khong di giai duoc.
癅=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Noi cuc (mau tu thanh cuc noi len). Cung viet la 瘤.
癆=lao [lao2]\n\t1. Benh lao, mot thu vi trung doc no lam to o phoi, thanh benh ho ra mau, goi la phe lao 肺癆, ket hach o ruot goi la trang lao 腸癆, cu qua trua ghe ret sot nong, dau bung di li, an uong khong ngon, da thit gay mon goi la hu lao 虛癆.
痨=lao [lao2]\n\t1. Benh lao, mot thu vi trung doc no lam to o phoi, thanh benh ho ra mau, goi la phe lao 肺癆, ket hach o ruot goi la trang lao 腸癆, cu qua trua ghe ret sot nong, dau bung di li, an uong khong ngon, da thit gay mon goi la hu lao 虛癆.
癉=dan, dan [dan1|dan4]\n\t1. Dau don. \n\t2. Ghet. \n\t3. Benh dan. \n\t4. Mot am la dan. Benh don, tre con bi chung da de do lung, phai ban tung mang goi la hoa dan 火癉.
瘅=dan, dan [dan1|dan4]\n\t1. Dau don. \n\t2. Ghet. \n\t3. Benh dan. \n\t4. Mot am la dan. Benh don, tre con bi chung da de do lung, phai ban tung mang goi la hoa dan 火癉.
癌=nham [ai2]\n\t1. Mot thu nhot moc o trong tang phu va o ngoai, loi lom khong deu, ran chac ma dau, o da day goi la vi nham 胃癌, o vu goi la nhu nham 乳癌.
癎=gian [xian2]\n\t1. Benh dong kinh.
癒=du [yu4]\n\t1. Om khoi. Cung viet la 愈 hay 瘉.
癖=phich, tich [pi3]\n\t1. Benh hon trong bung. \n\t2. Nghien tich thanh khoi (ghien, thanh tap tinh 習性). Nhu tuu phich 酒癖 khoi nghien ruou. Ta quen doc la chu tich.
癗=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Ngoai da hoi sung goi la luy (mun).
癘=le [li4]\n\t1. Hui, benh lo ac. \n\t2. Dich le.
疠=le [li4]\n\t1. Hui, benh lo ac. \n\t2. Dich le.
癜=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Chung dien. Benh o ngoai da moc not nho, lau thanh tung mang, trang thi goi la bach dien 白癜, tia thi goi la tu dien 紫癜.
癤=tiet [jie1]\n\t1. Rom say.
疖=tiet [jie1]\n\t1. Rom say.
癟=biet, tat [bie1|bie3]\n\t1. Khang kheo. Tuc doc la chu tat.
瘪=biet, tat [bie1|bie3]\n\t1. Khang kheo. Tuc doc la chu tat.
癡=si [chi1]\n\t1. Ngu si. \n\t2. Tuc goi nguoi dien la si.
癢=duong, dang [yang3]\n\t1. Ngua. Ta quen doc la chu dang.
癥=trung [zheng1]\n\t1. Benh hon, trong bung tich hon ran chac o mot cho goi la trung 癥, tan tu khong duoc goi la ha 瘕.
癧=lich [li4]\n\t1. Loi lich 瘰癧 chung trang nhac, co co tung chum nhot nhu mot trang nhac ngua, co khi no an lan ca xuong nguc xuong nach nen cung goi la lich quan 癧串.
癩=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Benh hui, long toc rung trui cung goi la lai (hoi).
癞=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Benh hui, long toc rung trui cung goi la lai (hoi).
癬=tien [xuan3]\n\t1. Ghe lo (hac lao).
癣=tien [xuan3]\n\t1. Ghe lo (hac lao).
癭=anh [ying3]\n\t1. Cai buou o co. \n\t2. Ung go, tren cay go co cho go len goi la anh.
瘿=anh [ying3]\n\t1. Cai buou o co. \n\t2. Ung go, tren cay go co cho go len goi la anh.
癮=an [yin3]\n\t1. Mac nghien, nghien mot thu gi thanh quen khong khong the bo duoc goi la an.
瘾=an [yin3]\n\t1. Mac nghien, nghien mot thu gi thanh quen khong khong the bo duoc goi la an.
癯=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Gay.
癰=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Ung thu 癰疽 nhot, nhot sung do la ung 癰, khong sung do la thu 疽.
痈=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Ung thu 癰疽 nhot, nhot sung do la ung 癰, khong sung do la thu 疽.
癱=than [tan1]\n\t1. Co quap, te liet.
瘫=than [tan1]\n\t1. Co quap, te liet.
癲=dien [dian1]\n\t1. Dien, mung gian bat thuong dien dao hon don goi la dien.

癶=bat [bo1]\n\t1. Gat ra, dap.
癸=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Can Quy, mot can sau chot trong muoi can. \n\t2. Kinh nguyet dan ba goi la thien quy 天癸.
登=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Len. Nhu dang lau 登樓 len lau. \n\t2. Chep len. Nhu dang tai 登載 ghi chep len so. \n\t3. Ket qua, chin. Nhu ngu coc bat dang 五穀不登 (Manh Tu 孟子) nam giong thoc khong chin (noi y mat mua). \n\t4. Ngay. Nhu dang thi 登時 tuc thi, ngay bay gio. \n\t5. Xin linh nhan cua nguoi ta cho cung goi la dang la co y ton kinh. 
發=phat [fa1|fa4]\n\t1. Ban ra. Nhu bach phat bach trung 百發百中 ban tram phat tin ca tram. Luc moi o trong ma phat ra ngoai cung goi la phat, pham nhan co cai gi lam ra may phat dong ma phat ra ngay deu goi la phat. \n\t2. Hung khoi, hung thinh. Nhu phat tai 發射, phat phuc 發福, v.v. \n\t3. Tot len, lon len. Nhu phat duc 發育 lon them, phat dat 發達 nay no them, v.v. \n\t4. Mo ra. Nhu phat minh 發明 tu tim duoc cai gi moi chua ai biet, cao phat 告發 phat giac, cao mach, v.v. \n\t5. Bat dau di. Nhu trieu phat tich chi 朝發夕至 som di chieu den. \n\t6. Chi phat ra. Nhu phat huong 發餉 phat luong. \n\t7. Phat huy ra, no ra. Nhu phat hoa 發花 no hoa. \n\t8. Phan bo ra ngoai, phan phat. \n\t9. Phan phat len, tinh dong o trong phat bat ra ngoai khong the ham duoc goi   la phat. Nhu phat phan 發憤 phat tuc. 10. Dao len, boi ra. \n\t11. Khien. \n\t12. Di mung khanh thanh nha moi.
发=phat [fa1|fa4]\n\t1. Ban ra. Nhu bach phat bach trung 百發百中 ban tram phat tin ca tram. Luc moi o trong ma phat ra ngoai cung goi la phat, pham nhan co cai gi lam ra may phat dong ma phat ra ngay deu goi la phat. \n\t2. Hung khoi, hung thinh. Nhu phat tai 發射, phat phuc 發福, v.v. \n\t3. Tot len, lon len. Nhu phat duc 發育 lon them, phat dat 發達 nay no them, v.v. \n\t4. Mo ra. Nhu phat minh 發明 tu tim duoc cai gi moi chua ai biet, cao phat 告發 phat giac, cao mach, v.v. \n\t5. Bat dau di. Nhu trieu phat tich chi 朝發夕至 som di chieu den. \n\t6. Chi phat ra. Nhu phat huong 發餉 phat luong. \n\t7. Phat huy ra, no ra. Nhu phat hoa 發花 no hoa. \n\t8. Phan bo ra ngoai, phan phat. \n\t9. Phan phat len, tinh dong o trong phat bat ra ngoai khong the ham duoc goi   la phat. Nhu phat phan 發憤 phat tuc. 10. Dao len, boi ra. \n\t11. Khien. \n\t12. Di mung khanh thanh nha moi.
白=bach [bai2]\n\t1. Sac trang. \n\t2. Sach. Nhu thanh bach 清白 trong sach. \n\t3. Sang. Nhu dong phuong ki bach 東方既白 troi da rang dong. \n\t4. Da minh bach. Nhu ky oan di bach 其冤已白 noi oan da to. \n\t5. Trinh bay, ke duoi thua voi nguoi tren goi la bach. \n\t6. Chen ruou. Nhu phu nhat dai bach 浮一大白 uong can mot chen lon. \n\t7. Trang khong, sach khong co chu goi la bach quyen 白卷. \n\t8. Noi don so. Nhu bach thoai 白話 loi van noi don so de hieu.
百=bach, ba, mach [bai3]\n\t1. Tram. \n\t2. Nhieu. Nhu bach tinh 百姓 tram ho. \n\t3. Gap tram lan. Co khi doc la chu ba. \n\t4. Mot am la mach. Co gang. Nhu cu duoc tam mach 距躍三百 gang nhay ba ban. 
皁=tao [zao4]\n\t1. Tao le 皁隸 hang nguoi hen. Nhu tuan phu linh le vay. \n\t2. Muoi hai con ngua goi la tao. \n\t3. Sac den. Nhu tao y 皁衣 ao den. \n\t4. Phi tao 肥皁 sa phong. Tuc quen viet la 皂. \n\t5. Hat thoc con sua.
的=dich, de [de5|di2|di4]\n\t1. Thay ro, lo ra ngoai. Nhu tieu nhan chi dao, dich nhien nhi nhat vong 小人之道，的然而日亡 (Le Ky 禮記) dao ke tieu nhan be ngoai ro vay ma ngay mat dan di. \n\t2. Dich thuc, dich xac. \n\t3. Cai dich de tap ban, ban phai co dich de ngam, nguoi phai co chi huong ve mot cai gi roi moi co duong ma tien, nen goi cai cho chi minh muon toi la muc dich 目的. \n\t4. Day, dung lam tro tu. Nhu hao dich 好的 tot day (dung lam tro tu doc la chu de).
皆=giai [jie1]\n\t1. Deu, cung, loi noi tom ca moi cai moi su. \n\t2. Khap.
皇=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. To lon, tieng goi ton kinh. Nhu hoang to 皇祖 ong, hoang khao 皇考 cha, v.v. \n\t2. Vua, tu nha Tan tro ve sau deu goi vua la Hoang de 皇帝. \n\t3. Hoang hoang 皇皇 ruc ro, ngo ngac, so hai. Nhu Khong Tu tam nguyet vo quan tac hoang hoang nhu da 孔子三月無君，則皇皇如也 (Manh Tu 孟子) duc Khong Tu ba thang khong giup duoc vua thi ngo ngac ca nguoi, nhan tam hoang hoang 人心皇皇 long nguoi so hai nao nao. \n\t4. Duong hoang chinh dai cao minh. \n\t5. Nha khong co bon vach. \n\t6. Cuu chinh, giup cho vua vao duong chinh. \n\t7. Cai mu tren ve long canh chim. \n\t8. Cho hong truoc cai ma xay de dut ao quan vao. \n\t9. Cho truoc cua buong ngu.
皈=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Quy phuc, doc long tin theo goi la quy y 皈依. Nha Phat co ba phep quy y.   (1) Quy y Phat, (2) Quy y Phap, (3) Quy y Tang. Quy y la bo noi toi tam ma dem   ca than tam quay ve noi sang to vay.
皋=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cao 皐.
皎=kieu, hieu [jiao3]\n\t1. Trang, sach, sang sua. Ta quen doc la chu hieu.
皐=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Khan. \n\t2. Ham giong. \n\t3. Dat ben cham. Nhung dat o ve ho ve cham deu goi la cao. \n\t4. Cho nuoc chay uon cong. Co khi viet la 皋. \n\t5. Ho Cao.
皓=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Trang, sang.
皖=hoan, hoan [wan3]\n\t1. Ten dat, cung doc la chu hoan.
皙=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Nguoi trang (mau da).
皚=ngai [ai2]\n\t1. Ngai ngai 皚皚 trang bong, sac suong tuyet trang (trang phau phau).
皑=ngai [ai2]\n\t1. Ngai ngai 皚皚 trang bong, sac suong tuyet trang (trang phau phau).
皜=hao, cao [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 皜皜 trang tinh, cung doc la chu cao.
皞=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hao 皡.
皡=hao [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 皡皡 rong rai, nghenh ngang, long long. Ta cai dang nguoi rong rai tu dac. Cung nhu chu hao 皞.
皤=ba [po2]\n\t1. Trang, bac. \n\t2. Bung be be, bung to.
皦=kieu [jiao3]\n\t1. Sang, to ro.
皭=tuoc [jiao4]\n\t1. Sach, trang. \n\t2. Tuoc nhien 皭然 sach lau lau.
皮=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Da. \n\t2. Da giong thu con co long goi la bi 皮, khong co long goi la cach 革. \n\t3. Be ngoai. Nhu bi tuong 皮相 chi co be ngoai. \n\t4. Cai dich tap ban.
皰=phao [pao4]\n\t1. Phong da, chan tay hot nhien mang len tung not day nhung nuoc goi la phao.
皴=thuan [cun1]\n\t1. Da nut ne. Do Phu 杜甫. Trung nguyen vo thu qui bat dac, Thu cuoc dong thuan bi nhuc tu 中原無書歸不得，手腳凍皴皮肉死 khong duoc thu bao tin noi Trung nguyen, tay chan lanh nut ne, da thit chet. \n\t2. Ve het nhu da nui loi lom goi la thuan.
皸=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Chan tay bi ret nut ne ra.
皲=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Chan tay bi ret nut ne ra.
皺=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Mat nhan, nhan nho. Vat gi co nep nhan cung goi la truu. \n\t2. Cau. Nhu truu my 皺眉 cau may.
皱=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Mat nhan, nhan nho. Vat gi co nep nhan cung goi la truu. \n\t2. Cau. Nhu truu my 皺眉 cau may.
皻=cha [zha1]\n\t1. Mui do, mui noi nhung not do.
皼=co [gu3]\n\t1. Cai trong. Tuc dung nhu chu co 鼓.
皿=manh [min3]\n\t1. Do, cac do bat dia deu goi la manh. \n\t2. Cac do dung de dung do vat gi.
盂=vu [yu2]\n\t1. Cai chen.
盃=boi [bei1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu boi 杯.
盅=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Cai do khong (bo khong chua dung gi). \n\t2. Cai chen nho.
盆=bon [pen2]\n\t1. Cai bon, cai chau sanh. Trang Tu co bon ca 莊子鼓盆歌 Trang Tu danh vao cai bon ma hat.
盇=hap [he2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu hap 盍.
