算=toan [suan4]\n\t1. So vat. Nhu vo toan 無算 rat nhieu khong tinh xiet. \n\t2. Tinh, tinh so xem nhieu it goi la toan. Phep tinh goi la toan thuat 算術 hay toan hoc 算學. \n\t3. Muu toan. Nhu toan ke 算計 toan tinh.
箚=trap [zha2]\n\t1. Tap so, trap tau. Doi xua cac bay toi dung de tau vua goi la trap tu 箚子. \n\t2. To trap, van thu quan tren viet cho quan duoi quyen minh goi la trat 札, viet cho quan lai khong thuoc duoi quyen minh goi la trap 箚. \n\t3. Chep, the chep rieng ra mot manh de de nho goi la trap ky 箚記.
箜=khong [kong1]\n\t1. Khong hau 箜篌 mot thu am nhac ngay xua, giong nhu cai dan sat ma nho.
箝=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cai giam. \n\t2. Kiem che 箝制 kiem che, kem cap.
箠=chuy [chui2]\n\t1. Cai roi danh ngua. \n\t2. Hinh danh truong.
管=quan [guan3]\n\t1. Cai sao nho. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Quan huyen nhat bien tap tan thanh 管絃一變雜新聲 dan sao mot loat thay doi, chen vao nhung thanh dieu moi. \n\t2. Pham vat gi tron rong giua deu goi la quan. Nhu huyet quan 血管 mach mau, di quan khuy thien 以管窺天 lay ong nhom troi, y noi che ke kien thuc hep hoi. Bay gio ai tu bay y kien minh cung tu xung la quan kien 管見 la vi co do. \n\t3. Cai can but, Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau Dy nga dong quan 貽我彤管 de lai cho ta can but do, y noi ve su ky dan ba, nay ta xung tung cai duc tinh hay su hoc thuc cua dan ba la dong quan 彤管 la vi co do. Tuc goi cam but la ac quan 握管. \n\t4. Cai quan, duoc toan quyen coi soc cong viec gi goi la quan. Nhu chuong quan 掌管, quan hat 管轄 deu la mot y ay ca. Tuc noi can thiep den la quan 管, khong can thiep den la bat quan 不管. \n\t5. Cai khoa, cai then khoa. \n\t6. Quan thuc, coi soc bo buoc khong cho vuot ra ngoai khuon phep da dinh goi la quan thuc 管束.
箬=nhuoc [ruo4]\n\t1. Mot thu tre la to (la co), dung de lop non, dat So goi cat tre la nhuoc.
箭=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Cai ten. \n\t2. Lau tien 漏箭 cai dung trong cai ho de tinh thoi khac cua doi xua.
箯=tien [bian1]\n\t1. Tien du 箯輿 cai xe dan bang tre.
箱=tuong, suong [xiang1]\n\t1. Cai hom xe, trong xe dong mot cai ngan de chua do goi la xa tuong 車箱. \n\t2. Cai kho. Nhu thien thuong van tuong 千倉萬箱 ngan vua muon kho, y noi thoc nhieu lam. \n\t3. Cai hom. Ta quen doc la chu suong.
箲=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Tien truu 箲帚 cai choi de rua noi rua cho. Co khi viet la 筅.
箴=cham [zhen1]\n\t1. Cai kim khau, cung nghia voi chu cham 針. \n\t2. Khuyen ran. \n\t3. Bai cham, viet chu vao giay hay khac vao go treo chung quanh cho o de trong lam guong goi la bai cham 箴. \n\t4. Tinh long canh chim cu muoi cai goi la mot cham.
箸=tru, tro [zhu4]\n\t1. Cai dua, cung nghia voi chu khoai 筷. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu tru 著. Ta quen doc la chu tro. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Man trac tran tru duong, Truong quan bat ha tro 滿棹陳豬羊，長官不下箸 Day ban thit heo, thit de, Quan lon khong dung dua.
節=tiet, tiet [jie1|jie2]\n\t1. Dot tre, dot cay. \n\t2. Dot xuong. Nhu cot tiet 骨節 dot xuong, chi tiet 指節 dot ngon tay, vi the nen vo tay goi la kich tiet 擊節. \n\t3. Pham su gi co doan co mach deu goi la tiet. Nhu mot dau moi su gi goi la nhat tiet 一節, dau moi roi beng goi la chi tiet 枝節, van chuong co phan ra tung chuong tung doan cung goi la chuong tiet 章節. \n\t4. Trat tu. Nhu cu dong phai co le tiet, hop le phep goi la trung tiet 中節. \n\t5. Hat, mua, am nhac luc mau luc khoan co dip goi la ung tiet 節 hay tiet tau 節奏. Cai dip de ham cac am nhac cung goi la tiet. \n\t6. Thoi tiet, mot nam chia ra 24 tiet. Nhu xuan phan 春分, lap xuan 立春, v.v. de chi ro khi hau no bien doi nhu the nao. \n\t7. De dan, kiem che khong cho qua do goi la tiet. Nhu tiet lao 節勞 bot lam su nhoc qua, tiet ai 節哀 bot noi thuong di, v.v. \n\t8. Giam bot di. \n\t9. Tri tiet, nguoi biet tu uc che minh cho hop le nghia goi la nguoi co tiet thao 節操. Nhu danh tiet 名節, phong tiet 風節 deu mot nghia ay ca. Tuc goi dan ba goa khong di lay chong la tiet phu 節婦. \n\t10. Phu tiet 符節 ngay xua di su cam cai an tin cua vua minh di de lam tin goi la phu tiet, vi the nen sau nguoi ta goi su gia la su tiet 使節. \n\t11. Ngay tho cua vua goi la tiet. \n\t12. Thu buc. \n\t13. Ngay tet. \n\t14. Mot am la tiet. Long lay, cao ngat.
节=tiet, tiet [jie1|jie2]\n\t1. Dot tre, dot cay. \n\t2. Dot xuong. Nhu cot tiet 骨節 dot xuong, chi tiet 指節 dot ngon tay, vi the nen vo tay goi la kich tiet 擊節. \n\t3. Pham su gi co doan co mach deu goi la tiet. Nhu mot dau moi su gi goi la nhat tiet 一節, dau moi roi beng goi la chi tiet 枝節, van chuong co phan ra tung chuong tung doan cung goi la chuong tiet 章節. \n\t4. Trat tu. Nhu cu dong phai co le tiet, hop le phep goi la trung tiet 中節. \n\t5. Hat, mua, am nhac luc mau luc khoan co dip goi la ung tiet 節 hay tiet tau 節奏. Cai dip de ham cac am nhac cung goi la tiet. \n\t6. Thoi tiet, mot nam chia ra 24 tiet. Nhu xuan phan 春分, lap xuan 立春, v.v. de chi ro khi hau no bien doi nhu the nao. \n\t7. De dan, kiem che khong cho qua do goi la tiet. Nhu tiet lao 節勞 bot lam su nhoc qua, tiet ai 節哀 bot noi thuong di, v.v. \n\t8. Giam bot di. \n\t9. Tri tiet, nguoi biet tu uc che minh cho hop le nghia goi la nguoi co tiet thao 節操. Nhu danh tiet 名節, phong tiet 風節 deu mot nghia ay ca. Tuc goi dan ba goa khong di lay chong la tiet phu 節婦. \n\t10. Phu tiet 符節 ngay xua di su cam cai an tin cua vua minh di de lam tin goi la phu tiet, vi the nen sau nguoi ta goi su gia la su tiet 使節. \n\t11. Ngay tho cua vua goi la tiet. \n\t12. Thu buc. \n\t13. Ngay tet. \n\t14. Mot am la tiet. Long lay, cao ngat.
篁=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Bui tre, cay tre.
範=pham [fan4]\n\t1. Phep, khuon mau. Dan ba co duc hanh trinh thuc goi la khue pham 閨範. \n\t2. Cai gioi han cua su vat gi goi la pham vi 範圍.
篆=trien [zhuan4]\n\t1. Chu trien. \n\t2. Bay gio de cac tranh sach in hay dung chu trien cho nen cung goi danh tu nguoi la trien. Quan vien tiep nhan lay an goi la tiep trien 接篆 cung mot nghia ay.
篇=thien [pian1]\n\t1. Thien. Pham mot bai van doan sach nao ma co dau co duoi deu goi la thien. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 co hai muoi thien. Mot bai tho cung goi la mot thien.
篋=khiep [qie4]\n\t1. Cai trap, cai hom nho.
箧=khiep [qie4]\n\t1. Cai trap, cai hom nho.
篌=hau [hou2]\n\t1. Khong hau 箜篌 mot thu am nhac ngay xua, giong nhu cai dan sat ma nho.
築=truc [zhu2]\n\t1. Dap dat, len dat. Xay dap cai gi cung phai len cai nen cho tot da, cho nen cac viec xay dap nha cua deu goi la kien truc 建築. \n\t2. Nha o.
篔=van [yun2]\n\t1. Van duong 篔簹 mot giong tre rat to rat dai. Ta goi la tre loc ngoc.
篙=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Cai sao cho thuyen.
篚=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Cai thung tron co nap.
篛=nhuoc [ruo4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhuoc 箬.
篝=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cai long.
篠=tieu [xiao3]\n\t1. Thu truc nho. Xem chu tieu 筱.
篡=soan [cuan4]\n\t1. Cuop lay, giet vua de len lam vua goi la soan vi 篡位 cuop ngoi.
篤=doc [du3]\n\t1. Hau, thuan nhat khong co cai gi xen vao goi la doc. Nhu doc tin 篤信 doc mot long tin, don doc 敦篤 doc mot long cham chi trung hau, v.v. Luan ngu. Doc tin hieu hoc, thu tu thien dao 篤信好學，守死善道 vung tin ham hoc, giu dao toi chet. \n\t2. Om nang.
笃=doc [du3]\n\t1. Hau, thuan nhat khong co cai gi xen vao goi la doc. Nhu doc tin 篤信 doc mot long tin, don doc 敦篤 doc mot long cham chi trung hau, v.v. Luan ngu. Doc tin hieu hoc, thu tu thien dao 篤信好學，守死善道 vung tin ham hoc, giu dao toi chet. \n\t2. Om nang.
篥=lat [li4]\n\t1. Tat lat 觱篥 cai coi, cai ken loa. Dung de lam hieu trong quan.
篦=be [bi4]\n\t1. Cai luoc bi.
篨=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Cu tru 籧篨 cai chieu truc. \n\t2. Benh ong bung.
篩=si [shai1]\n\t1. Cai dan, cai sang. \n\t2. Ray cho nho.
筛=si [shai1]\n\t1. Cai dan, cai sang. \n\t2. Ray cho nho.
篪=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Cai sao tam lo. Kinh Thi co cau Ba thi xuy huan, trong thi xuy tri 伯氏吹壎，仲氏吹篪 anh thoi coi, em thoi sao. Vi the nen anh em hoa muc goi la huan tri 壎篪.
篲=tue [hui4]\n\t1. Cai choi.
篳=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Nan tre, cac loai tre nua canh cay dung dan do duoc deu goi la tat. Nhu tat mon 篳門 cua phen, tat lo 篳路 xe dan bang tre.
筚=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Nan tre, cac loai tre nua canh cay dung dan do duoc deu goi la tat. Nhu tat mon 篳門 cua phen, tat lo 篳路 xe dan bang tre.
篴=dich [di2]\n\t1. Ngay xua dung nhu chu dich 笛.
篷=bong [peng2]\n\t1. Mai giat la. Dan phen giat la de che mui thuyen goi la bong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Y bong thien ly vong 倚篷千里望 dua mui thuyen trong ra xa nghin dam. Tuc goi bong la cai buom thuyen. Nhu truong bong 張篷 duong buom, lac bong 落篷 cuon buom, v.v.
篼=dau [dou1]\n\t1. Cai xe bang tre, tuc goi dang son la dau tu 篼子.
篾=miet [mie4]\n\t1. Cat tre. \n\t2. Lay cat tre dan lam canh phen de boc do cung goi la miet.
簀=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai chieu, ong Tang Tu 曾子 luc sap chet, goi cac ke hau vao thay chieu, vi the nen nguoi ta goi cac ke om nguy la dich trach 易簀.
箦=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Cai chieu, ong Tang Tu 曾子 luc sap chet, goi cac ke hau vao thay chieu, vi the nen nguoi ta goi cac ke om nguy la dich trach 易簀.
簇=thoc, thau [cu4]\n\t1. Sum hop, sum xit. Nhu nhat thoc 一簇 mot bui. \n\t2. Mui ten, tuc cai gi rat moi la thoc tan 簇新. \n\t3. Mot am la thau. Thai thau 太簇 ten luat nhac.
簉=suu [zao4]\n\t1. Chuc phu, vo le goi la suu that 簉室.
簋=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Phu quy 簠簋 cai binh dung xoi cung. \n\t2. Tuc cung goi cai bat dung do an.
簍=lau, lu [lou3]\n\t1. Cai sot, co khi doc la chu lu.
篓=lau, lu [lou3]\n\t1. Cai sot, co khi doc la chu lu.
簏=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Cai sot cao, cai be tre.
簑=thoa [suo1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thoa 蓑.
簒=soan [cuan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu soan 篡.
簞=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Cai gio, cai thung tre.
箪=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Cai gio, cai thung tre.
簟=diem [dian4]\n\t1. Cai chieu dan.
簠=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Phu quy 簠簋 cai binh dung xoi xung. Tuc cung goi cai bat dung do an.
簡=gian [jian3]\n\t1. Cai the tre. Doi xua chua co giay viet vao the tre goi la gian trat 簡札, vi the nen goi sach vo la gian. Nhu doan gian tan bien 斷簡殘編 sach vo dut nat. Bay gio goi phong tho la thu gian 手簡 la vi le do. \n\t2. Menh vua sai di goi la gian thu 簡書 vi the nen phong quan goi la dac gian 特簡 hay gian thu 簡授. \n\t3. Ken chon, phan biet. Nhu gian luyen 簡練 ken chon, gian duyet 簡閱 chon loc, v.v. \n\t4. Gian di, qua loa. Dai nguoi nhat nheo vo le goi la gian man 簡慢. \n\t5. Xem, duyet xem. \n\t6. To, lon. \n\t7. Can. \n\t8. Thuc.
简=gian [jian3]\n\t1. Cai the tre. Doi xua chua co giay viet vao the tre goi la gian trat 簡札, vi the nen goi sach vo la gian. Nhu doan gian tan bien 斷簡殘編 sach vo dut nat. Bay gio goi phong tho la thu gian 手簡 la vi le do. \n\t2. Menh vua sai di goi la gian thu 簡書 vi the nen phong quan goi la dac gian 特簡 hay gian thu 簡授. \n\t3. Ken chon, phan biet. Nhu gian luyen 簡練 ken chon, gian duyet 簡閱 chon loc, v.v. \n\t4. Gian di, qua loa. Dai nguoi nhat nheo vo le goi la gian man 簡慢. \n\t5. Xem, duyet xem. \n\t6. To, lon. \n\t7. Can. \n\t8. Thuc.
簦=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Cai du, lam nhu cai o, tren lop bang la, de che mua nang.
簧=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Cai ve dong, lay dong mong dat lam mang, de trong lo tieu hay sao de thoi cho keu goi la hoang. \n\t2. Tieng nhac, pham tieng gi co ve em diu de lot tai goi la hoang. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau sao ngon nhu hoang 巧言如簧 noi kheo nhu rot, lay loi duong mat ma lam cho nguoi ta me hoac, goi la hoang co 簧鼓 cung noi y ay. Trang Tu 莊子. Su thien ha hoang co di phung bat cap chi phap 使天下簧鼓以奉不及之法 (Bien mau 駢拇) khien nguoi ta me hoac ve tieng dong tieng phach de ton sung cai phep khong toi. \n\t3. May moc co suc gang manh goi la hoang (lo xo).
簨=tuan [sun3]\n\t1. Cai xa ngang de treo chuong khanh.
簪=tram [zan1]\n\t1. Cai tram cai dau. \n\t2. Bo quan ve goi la truu tram 抽簪. \n\t3. Nhanh, mau, voi. Nhu vat nghi bang hap tram 勿疑朋盍簪 (Dich Kinh 易經) khong ngo thi ban be mau lai hop. \n\t4. Cai, cam.
簮=tram [zan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tram 簪.
簫=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Cai tieu, tuc la cai sao thoi doc. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tieu co dong dong so xuat mon 簫鼓鼕鼕初出門 tieng tieu, tieng trong am i luc moi ra den cua (song). \n\t2. Cai doc cung.
箫=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Cai tieu, tuc la cai sao thoi doc. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tieu co dong dong so xuat mon 簫鼓鼕鼕初出門 tieng tieu, tieng trong am i luc moi ra den cua (song). \n\t2. Cai doc cung.
簴=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Cai xa ngang de treo chuong treo khanh.
簷=diem [yan2]\n\t1. Mai nha. \n\t2. Cai diem, vanh. Nhu mao diem 帽簷 diem mu, vanh mu.
簸=ba [bo3|bo4]\n\t1. De, de gao cho sach cam, goi la ba. Cai nia de de goi la ba ky 簸箕.
簹=duong [dang1]\n\t1. Van duong 篔簹 mot giong tre rat to rat dai. Ta goi la tre loc ngoc.
簽=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu thiem 籤, nghia la viet chu len cai the tre lam dau hieu. \n\t2. De ten, ky ten. Nhu thiem danh 簽名 de ten, ky ten vao.
签=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu thiem 籤, nghia la viet chu len cai the tre lam dau hieu. \n\t2. De ten, ky ten. Nhu thiem danh 簽名 de ten, ky ten vao.
簾=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Buc rem, cai manh manh. Ngay xua vua con be thi me vua thi me vua buong manh su viec trieu chinh goi la thuy liem 垂簾, vua lon len, giao tra lai viec trieu chinh goi la triet liem 撤簾. \n\t2. Cac quan dong khao thi huong thi hoi goi la liem quan 簾官, chuc giu viec cham van goi la noi liem 內簾, chuc giu viec thu giu quyen thi goi la ngoai liem 外簾.
簿=bo, bac [bu4]\n\t1. So sach, pham nhung sach vo dat ra de tuy thoi ghi chep cac su vat deu goi la bo. \n\t2. Lo bo 鹵簿 cac nghi ve hau ha. \n\t3. Cai hot. \n\t4. Mot am la bac. Cai liep, cai ne. Nhu tam bac 蠶簿 cai ne tam, cung nhu chu bac 箔.
籃=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Cai gio sach tay de dung cac do mua ban cho tien (cai thung co quai, cai lan).
篮=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Cai gio sach tay de dung cac do mua ban cho tien (cai thung co quai, cai lan).
籌=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Cai the dem (cai do de tinh so). Danh co danh bac hon nhau mot nuoc goi la luoc thang nhat tru 略勝一籌, cai dung de ghi so chen ruou da uong goi la tuu tru 酒籌. Sach Thai binh ngu lam 太平御覽 co chep truyen ba ong gia gap nhau, hoi tuoi nhau, mot ong gia noi. Hai thuy bien tang dien, ngo triep ha nhat tru, kim man thap tru hi 海水變桑田，吾輒下一籌，今滿十籌矣 nghia la nuoc be bien ra ruong dau, toi bo mot cai the, nay vua day muoi cai the roi, tuc la dung mot tram tuoi. Vi the chuc nguoi tho goi la hai oc thiem tru 海屋添籌. \n\t2. Tru tinh, toan tinh. Bo tay khong co mot ke gi nua goi la nhat tru mac trien 一籌莫展.
筹=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Cai the dem (cai do de tinh so). Danh co danh bac hon nhau mot nuoc goi la luoc thang nhat tru 略勝一籌, cai dung de ghi so chen ruou da uong goi la tuu tru 酒籌. Sach Thai binh ngu lam 太平御覽 co chep truyen ba ong gia gap nhau, hoi tuoi nhau, mot ong gia noi. Hai thuy bien tang dien, ngo triep ha nhat tru, kim man thap tru hi 海水變桑田，吾輒下一籌，今滿十籌矣 nghia la nuoc be bien ra ruong dau, toi bo mot cai the, nay vua day muoi cai the roi, tuc la dung mot tram tuoi. Vi the chuc nguoi tho goi la hai oc thiem tru 海屋添籌. \n\t2. Tru tinh, toan tinh. Bo tay khong co mot ke gi nua goi la nhat tru mac trien 一籌莫展.
籍=tich, ta [ji2]\n\t1. Sach vo, so sach. Sach de ghi chep moi su cung goi la tich. \n\t2. Que o, doi doi lam dan o mot cho goi la dan tich 民籍, vi di buon ma lam nha o mot noi khac goi la thuong tich 商籍. So chep so dan goi la ho tich 戶籍. \n\t3. Dam, xeo. Thua ruong nao vua than chinh xeo xuong cay goi la tich dien 籍田. \n\t4. Tich tich 籍籍 tieng noi ram ram, nguoi nao co tieng trong doi goi la tich tham duong thoi 籍甚當時. \n\t5. Tich ki, nghia la bao nhieu cua cai deu bien vao so quan sung cong ca. \n\t6. Bua bai. Nhu lang tich 狼籍. Ta quen doc la lang ta. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Lang ta tan hong vo mich xu 狼籍殘紅無覓處 canh hong tan rung ngon ngang, biet tim dau ?
籐=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dang 藤.
籑=soan [zhuan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu soan 僎 hay 撰.
籒=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Doc sach, dien giai nghia sach. \n\t2. Su truu 史籒 ten quan thai su doi Chu Tuyen Vuong 周宣王, lam ra loi chu trien lon 大篆, vi the co loi chu truu 籒. Cung viet la 籕.
籖=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thiem 籤.
籙=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Do luc 圖籙 sach menh cua thien than cho. Vua duoc lam chu ca thien ha goi la ung do thu luc 膺圖受籙. Cung viet la 應圖受籙.
籛=tien [jian1]\n\t1. Tien khanh 籛鏗 tuc ong Lao Banh (Banh to 彭祖).
籜=thac [tuo4]\n\t1. Cat tre, mo nang (be mang).
箨=thac [tuo4]\n\t1. Cat tre, mo nang (be mang).
籟=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Cai tieu. \n\t2. Pham nhung cho hu khong phat ra tieng deu goi la lai. Nhu thien lai 天籟 tieng troi, dia lai 地籟 tieng dat, v.v.
籁=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Cai tieu. \n\t2. Pham nhung cho hu khong phat ra tieng deu goi la lai. Nhu thien lai 天籟 tieng troi, dia lai 地籟 tieng dat, v.v.
籠=lung, long [long2|long3]\n\t1. Cai long dan bang tre de dung do hay day do. \n\t2. Cai bu, de nhot chim ga. Bat nguoi giam lai goi la tu lung 囚籠. \n\t3. Mot am la long. Cai hom dan bang tre.
笼=lung, long [long2|long3]\n\t1. Cai long dan bang tre de dung do hay day do. \n\t2. Cai bu, de nhot chim ga. Bat nguoi giam lai goi la tu lung 囚籠. \n\t3. Mot am la long. Cai hom dan bang tre.
籤=thiem [qian1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu thiem 簽 nghia la viet chu len tren cai the tre de lam dau hieu. \n\t2. Nhon, xau. Lay kim xau suot vat gi goi la thiem. \n\t3. Nhat Ban goi su so so la phu thiem 富籤 nghia la rut so de phan duoc thua vay. Cuoi doi nha Thanh cho quan duoc xo so de lay loi goi la thiem quyen 籤捐. \n\t4. Cai the, cac dinh chua dung de cho nguoi xoc ma xem xau tot.
籥=thuoc [yue4]\n\t1. Cai thuoc, giong cai sao ma ngan. \n\t2. Then khoa.
籧=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Cu tru 籧篨 cai chieu truc.
籩=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Cai bien, ngay xua dung de bay hoa qua va xoi de cung te.
笾=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Cai bien, ngay xua dung de bay hoa qua va xoi de cung te.
籪=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Cai lo, cai do. Cai do dan bang tre de bat ca.
簖=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Cai lo, cai do. Cai do dan bang tre de bat ca.
籬=li [li2]\n\t1. Bo rao, bo giau, dan tre chan luy xung quanh goi la li. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Thai cuc dong li ha, du nhien kien nam son 採菊東籬下，悠然見南山 hai cuc duoi bo rao dong. Nhan nha nhin nui nam.
篱=li [li2]\n\t1. Bo rao, bo giau, dan tre chan luy xung quanh goi la li. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Thai cuc dong li ha, du nhien kien nam son 採菊東籬下，悠然見南山 hai cuc duoi bo rao dong. Nhan nha nhin nui nam.
籮=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai ra vo gao (do dan bang tre duoi vuong tren tron).
箩=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai ra vo gao (do dan bang tre duoi vuong tren tron).
籯=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Cai hom dong bang tre. Hoang kim man doanh, bat nhu nhat kinh 黃金滿籯，不如一經 vang day ruong khong bang mot cuon kinh sach.
籰=duoc [yue4]\n\t1. Cai guong quay to.
籲=du [yu4]\n\t1. Keu, goi, thinh cau. Nhu ho du vo mon 呼籲無門 khong cho keu cau.
米=me [mi3]\n\t1. Gao. \n\t2. Me dot thuoc tay (metre), goi tat la me. \n\t3. Nhat Ban goi chau My la chau Me 洲米, nuoc My la nuoc Me.
籼=tien [xian1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tien 秈.
籽=tu [zi3]\n\t1. Hat giong.
粃=chuy [bi3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bi 秕.
粇=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu canh 秔.
粉=phan [fen3]\n\t1. Bot gao, phan gao. Pham vat gi tan nho deu goi la phan ca. \n\t2. Tan nho. Nhu phan cot 粉骨 tan xuong. \n\t3. Phan xoa, dan ba dung de trang suc. \n\t4. Phan suc, lam su gi khong can su thuc ma chi vu ve be ngoai goi la phan suc 粉飾.
粒=lap [li4]\n\t1. Hat gao, hat lua, vat gi nho ma roi tung hat deu goi la lap. \n\t2. An gao.
粕=phach [po4]\n\t1. Tao phach 糟粕 can ruou, ba gia. Pham cai gi khong co tinh tuy deu goi la tao phach.
粗=tho [cu1]\n\t1. Vang to. Nhu tho te 粗細 vang to nho, dung de noi ve chu vi to hay nho. \n\t2. Tho, khong duoc nhan nhui tinh te. \n\t3. Tho suat, tho thien, so suat, que kech. 
粘=niem [nian2|zhan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu niem 黏.
粛=tuc [-]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuc 肅.
粞=te [xi1]\n\t1. Tam gao.
粟=tuc [su4]\n\t1. Thoc lua, lua te goi la tuc.
粢=tu, te [zi1]\n\t1. Thoc nep, xoi dung tren dia cung goi la tu thinh 粢盛. \n\t2. Mot am la te. Te de 粢醍 ruou do.
粥=chuc, duc [yu4|zhou1]\n\t1. Chao. \n\t2. Chuc chuc 粥粥 nhut nhat, rut re, ta cai dang hen yeu. \n\t3. Mot am la duc. Ban, cung nghia voi chu duc 鬻.
粧=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Trang suc, cac thu de cho dan ba to diem them ve dep deu goi la trang. Co khi viet la 妝.
粮=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu luong 糧.
粰=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phu 稃.
粱=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Lua mach moi moc goi la mieu 苗, co cuong da roi goi la hoa 禾, co hot goi la tuc 粟, gao no goi la luong 粱.
粲=san [can4]\n\t1. Thu gao gia ky, gao trang tinh. Hinh phep nha Han co thu goi la quy tan 鬼薪 va bach san 白粲. Quy tan la phai di kiem cui de cap cho nha ton mieu. Bach san la bat ngoi chon lay hat gao trang gao lanh, cung nhu hinh phat kho sai bay gio. \n\t2. Tuoi, ruc ro, dep. \n\t3. Cuoi nhon, phi cuoi. Nhu vi chi san nhien 爲之粲然 lam cho phi cuoi ca.
粳=canh, canh, nganh [jing1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu canh 秔. Ta quen doc la canh hay nganh.
粵=viet (13 n) [yue4]\n\t1. Ben. Tieng mo dau (phat ngu). Nhu viet huu 粵有 ben co. \n\t2. Nuoc Viet, dat Viet, cung nghia nhu chu viet 越. Tinh Quang Dong 廣東, Quang Tay 廣西 nguyen truoc la dat cua Bach Viet 百粵, nen Tau ho goi hai tinh ay la tinh Viet.
粤=viet (13 n) [yue4]\n\t1. Ben. Tieng mo dau (phat ngu). Nhu viet huu 粵有 ben co. \n\t2. Nuoc Viet, dat Viet, cung nghia nhu chu viet 越. Tinh Quang Dong 廣東, Quang Tay 廣西 nguyen truoc la dat cua Bach Viet 百粵, nen Tau ho goi hai tinh ay la tinh Viet.
粹=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Chin chan, thuan tuy, tinh tuy, chuyen nhat khong tap nhap goi la tuy.
粺=bai [bai4]\n\t1. Gao ngon.
粽=tong [zong4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 糉.
精=tinh [jing1]\n\t1. Gia gao cho trang tinh (gao ngon). \n\t2. Pham dem vat ngoai tru di cho no sach het cung goi la tinh. Nhu tinh quang 精光 sach bong. \n\t3. Vat gi da loc bo het chat xau roi deu goi la tinh. \n\t4. Tinh te, long nghi chu dao ky luong goi la tinh. Nhu tinh minh 精明. \n\t5. Biet den noi. Nhu to tinh thu phap 素精書法 von tinh nghe viet. Hoc van do chuyen nhat ma mau tien goi la tinh tien 精進. \n\t6. Tinh than 精神, tinh luc 精力 deu noi ve phan tam than ca. \n\t7. Tinh. Nhu son tinh 山精 giong tinh o nui. \n\t8. Tinh tuy, mot chat mau tot duc nen thanh ra mot nguyen chat sinh de cua cac loai dong vat. Nhu di tinh 遺精 benh cu tu nhien tinh cung thoat bat ra.
糅=nhuu [rou2]\n\t1. Lan lon.
糇=hau [hou2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hau 餱.
糈=tu [xu3]\n\t1. Luong, tu luong. \n\t2. Gao ngon.
糉=tong [zong4]\n\t1. Banh nep.
糊=ho [hu1|hu2|hu4]\n\t1. Ho dinh, ho de dan. \n\t2. Mo ho 摸糊 lo mo, khong ro. \n\t3. Ho do 糊塗 khong co tri phan doan ranh rot goi la ho do.
糐=doan [tuan2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu doan 糰.
糒=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Com kho.
糕=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Banh bot loc.
糖=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Duong, ngay xua dung lua che ra duong tuc la keo ma. Den doi Duong moi hoc duoc cach cam mia lam duong, ben Au chau dung cu cai lam duong.
糗=khuu [qiu3]\n\t1. Luong kho.
糙=thao [cao1]\n\t1. Gao xay. \n\t2. Vat gi chua duoc lam ky goi la tho thao 粗糙.
糜=mi [mei2|mi2]\n\t1. Chao nhu. \n\t2. Nat van.
糝=tam [san3|shen1]\n\t1. Hat gao. \n\t2. Com hoa voi canh.
糁=tam [san3|shen1]\n\t1. Hat gao. \n\t2. Com hoa voi canh.
糞=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Phan (cut). Vat gi dang khinh goi la phan tho 糞土. Tuc ngu co cau phat dau truoc phan 佛頭著糞 bo phan o dau tuong Phat, y noi cai tot bi cai xau lam nho mat. \n\t2. Bon. Nhu phan dien 糞田 bon ruong. \n\t3. Bo di. Nhu phan tru 糞除 tru bo di, quet don.
粪=phan [fen4]\n\t1. Phan (cut). Vat gi dang khinh goi la phan tho 糞土. Tuc ngu co cau phat dau truoc phan 佛頭著糞 bo phan o dau tuong Phat, y noi cai tot bi cai xau lam nho mat. \n\t2. Bon. Nhu phan dien 糞田 bon ruong. \n\t3. Bo di. Nhu phan tru 糞除 tru bo di, quet don.
糟=tao [zao1]\n\t1. Can ruou. Cau noi khong co tinh than gi goi la tao phach 糟粕. \n\t2. Vo. Tong Hoang 朱權 co cau Tao khang chi the bat kha ha duong 糟糠之妻不可下堂 nguoi vo cung chiu canh ngheo hen voi minh khong the bo duoc, vi the nen vo ca goi la tao khang chi the. \n\t3. Ngam ruou. Nhu tao ngu 糟魚 lay ruou ngam ca. \n\t4. Bai hoai, hong, tan nat.
糠=khang [kang1]\n\t1. Trau (vo hat thoc). Xem tao khang 糟糠.
糧=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Thuc an, luong an. Thuc an luc di duong goi la luong 糧, luc o ngay nha goi la thuc 食. Nay goi cac vat dung trong quan la luong. \n\t2. Thue ruong, tuc viet la 粮.
粮=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Thuc an, luong an. Thuc an luc di duong goi la luong 糧, luc o ngay nha goi la thuc 食. Nay goi cac vat dung trong quan la luong. \n\t2. Thue ruong, tuc viet la 粮.
糯=nhu [nuo4]\n\t1. Gao nep dung cat ruou.
糰=doan [tuan2]\n\t1. Bot an, banh bot.
糲=le [li4]\n\t1. Gao gia doi (gao to).
糱=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghich 糵.
糴=dich [di2]\n\t1. Mua thoc, dong thoc ngoai mang ve xu minh goi la dich (nhap cang).
籴=dich [di2]\n\t1. Mua thoc, dong thoc ngoai mang ve xu minh goi la dich (nhap cang).
糵=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Men, mam ma dung lam men ruou, vi the nen goi ruou la khuc nghiet 麴糵. Dung ke lam hai nguoi goi la moi nghiet 媒糵. Chu nghiet cung viet la 糱.
糶=thieu [tiao4]\n\t1. Ban thoc ra (xuat cang), dem ban ha gia ra dde ganh lay loi goi la binh thieu 平糶.
糸=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Soi to nho. So to cua mot con tam nha ra goi la hot 忽, nam hot la mich 糸, muoi hot la ti 絲. \n\t2. Bay gio dung thay chu ti de viet cho tien.
系=he [ji4|xi4]\n\t1. Buoc, treo. Nhu he niem 系念 nho luon, de viec vao moi nghi luon. Cung viet la 繫念. \n\t2. Moi, lien noi. Nhu het doi no den doi kia goi la the he 世系. Ve hoc thuat chia rieng tung khoa cung goi la phan he 分系. \n\t3. Ten rieng trong khoa hoc tinh, do theo cai ly nhat dinh o cho nay ma suy ra tim duoc cai ly nhat dinh o cho kia goi la he.
糾=cu, kieu [jiu1]\n\t1. Day chap ba lan, vi the cai gi do moi cai ket hop lai ma thanh deu goi la cu. Nhu cu chung 糾眾 nhom hop moi nguoi. \n\t2. Doc trach. Nhu cu sat 糾察 coi xet. Pham kieu chinh lai su lam loi cung deu goi la cu. Nhu thang khien cu mau 繩愆糾謬 kieu chinh cho lam lac, vi the hac be loi nguoi cung goi la cu cu 糾舉. \n\t3. Thu lai, hop lai. \n\t4. Voi, gap. \n\t5. Mot am la kieu. Yeu kieu 窈糾 ta cai ve thu thai.
纠=cu, kieu [jiu1]\n\t1. Day chap ba lan, vi the cai gi do moi cai ket hop lai ma thanh deu goi la cu. Nhu cu chung 糾眾 nhom hop moi nguoi. \n\t2. Doc trach. Nhu cu sat 糾察 coi xet. Pham kieu chinh lai su lam loi cung deu goi la cu. Nhu thang khien cu mau 繩愆糾謬 kieu chinh cho lam lac, vi the hac be loi nguoi cung goi la cu cu 糾舉. \n\t3. Thu lai, hop lai. \n\t4. Voi, gap. \n\t5. Mot am la kieu. Yeu kieu 窈糾 ta cai ve thu thai.
紀=ki [ji3|ji4]\n\t1. Go soi to, go moi to roi, vi the nen lieu ly xong cong viec goi la kinh ki 經紀. \n\t2. Ki cuong boc 紀綱僕 chuc coi tat ca moi viec ve dien chuong phap do. Tuc goi day to la ki cuong 紀綱, co khi goi tat la ki 紀. \n\t3. Giuong moi. Nhu cuong ki 綱紀 cai day lon ngoai mep luoi goi la cuong 綱, cai day be goi la ki 紀, vi the nen cai gi quan he den le phep deu goi la ki. Nhu ki luat 紀律, luan ki 倫紀, y noi co co dau co nganh nhu giuong luoi mat luoi vay. \n\t4. Muoi hai nam goi la nhat ki 一紀. Bay gio goi nam tuoi la nien ki 年紀. \n\t5. Ghi chep. Nhu ki nien 紀年 ghi chep chuyen hang nam. Nhu su chep chuyen cu y thu tu ma chep goi la loi ki nien. \n\t6. Hoi hop. \n\t7. Dao. \n\t8. Nuoc Ki.
纪=ki [ji3|ji4]\n\t1. Go soi to, go moi to roi, vi the nen lieu ly xong cong viec goi la kinh ki 經紀. \n\t2. Ki cuong boc 紀綱僕 chuc coi tat ca moi viec ve dien chuong phap do. Tuc goi day to la ki cuong 紀綱, co khi goi tat la ki 紀. \n\t3. Giuong moi. Nhu cuong ki 綱紀 cai day lon ngoai mep luoi goi la cuong 綱, cai day be goi la ki 紀, vi the nen cai gi quan he den le phep deu goi la ki. Nhu ki luat 紀律, luan ki 倫紀, y noi co co dau co nganh nhu giuong luoi mat luoi vay. \n\t4. Muoi hai nam goi la nhat ki 一紀. Bay gio goi nam tuoi la nien ki 年紀. \n\t5. Ghi chep. Nhu ki nien 紀年 ghi chep chuyen hang nam. Nhu su chep chuyen cu y thu tu ma chep goi la loi ki nien. \n\t6. Hoi hop. \n\t7. Dao. \n\t8. Nuoc Ki.
紂=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Chu dung de dat ten hem, ke nao tan nhan bat nghia thi goi la tru. Vua De Tan 帝辛 nha An 殷 dot chet ke trung luong, mo dan ba chua, cho nen thien ha goi la vua Tru 紂王. \n\t2. Day cau duoi ngua.
纣=tru [zhou4]\n\t1. Chu dung de dat ten hem, ke nao tan nhan bat nghia thi goi la tru. Vua De Tan 帝辛 nha An 殷 dot chet ke trung luong, mo dan ba chua, cho nen thien ha goi la vua Tru 紂王. \n\t2. Day cau duoi ngua.
紃=xuyen [xun2]\n\t1. Day to, day danh mong ma to (bet) goi la to 組, tron ma nho goi la xuyen 紃.
約=uoc [yao1|yue1]\n\t1. That, bo. Nhu uoc phat 約髮 bui toc, uoc tuc 約足 bo chan. \n\t2. Han che. Nhu uoc thuc 約束 that buoc, kiem uoc 檢約 rang buoc, y noi lay le phep lam khuon ma bat phai theo de cho khong vuot ra ngoai duoc. \n\t3. Dieu uoc, hai ben lay quyen loi nghia vu cung uoc hen voi nhau goi la uoc. Nhu nguoi nuoc nay vao trong nuoc kia buon ban, phai ky ket moi dieu voi nhau de cung noi giu goi la dieu uoc 條約. \n\t4. Uoc hen, hen nhau ngay nao gio nao den goi la uoc. Nhu tien uoc 踐約 y hen, that uoc 失約 sai hen, v.v. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Tha nien Nhi Khe uoc, doan lap ha xuan su 他年淽溪約，短笠荷春鋤 nam nao hen ve Nhi Khe (que huong cua Nguyen Trai), doi non la, vac cuoc di lam vu xuan. \n\t5. Gian uoc, tu xu mot cach so sai goi la kiem uoc 儉約, o canh ngheo kho goi la khon uoc 困約. \n\t6. Uoc luoc. Nhu dai uoc 大約 cung nhu ta noi dai khai, dai suat 大率, v.v. Noi khong duoc tuong tan goi la an uoc 隱約, su vat gi khong biet duoc dich so goi la uoc. Nhu ta noi uoc chung, phong chung, v.v. \n\t7. Luc cung tung.
约=uoc [yao1|yue1]\n\t1. That, bo. Nhu uoc phat 約髮 bui toc, uoc tuc 約足 bo chan. \n\t2. Han che. Nhu uoc thuc 約束 that buoc, kiem uoc 檢約 rang buoc, y noi lay le phep lam khuon ma bat phai theo de cho khong vuot ra ngoai duoc. \n\t3. Dieu uoc, hai ben lay quyen loi nghia vu cung uoc hen voi nhau goi la uoc. Nhu nguoi nuoc nay vao trong nuoc kia buon ban, phai ky ket moi dieu voi nhau de cung noi giu goi la dieu uoc 條約. \n\t4. Uoc hen, hen nhau ngay nao gio nao den goi la uoc. Nhu tien uoc 踐約 y hen, that uoc 失約 sai hen, v.v. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Tha nien Nhi Khe uoc, doan lap ha xuan su 他年淽溪約，短笠荷春鋤 nam nao hen ve Nhi Khe (que huong cua Nguyen Trai), doi non la, vac cuoc di lam vu xuan. \n\t5. Gian uoc, tu xu mot cach so sai goi la kiem uoc 儉約, o canh ngheo kho goi la khon uoc 困約. \n\t6. Uoc luoc. Nhu dai uoc 大約 cung nhu ta noi dai khai, dai suat 大率, v.v. Noi khong duoc tuong tan goi la an uoc 隱約, su vat gi khong biet duoc dich so goi la uoc. Nhu ta noi uoc chung, phong chung, v.v. \n\t7. Luc cung tung.
紅=hong [gong1|hong2]\n\t1. Do hong (sac hong nhat). \n\t2. Sac hong la mau do tuoi hon cac sac do khac, cho nen goi cac ke duoc yeu dau ve vang la hong. \n\t3. Dep de, don dip. Nhu hong tran 紅塵 chon bui hong (noi cac noi do hoi), hong nhan 紅顏 dan ba dep, v.v. \n\t4. Giong cay phan nhieu hoa do, nen hoa rung cung goi la lac hong 落紅. \n\t5. Doi xua dung nhu chu 工 hay 功.
红=hong [gong1|hong2]\n\t1. Do hong (sac hong nhat). \n\t2. Sac hong la mau do tuoi hon cac sac do khac, cho nen goi cac ke duoc yeu dau ve vang la hong. \n\t3. Dep de, don dip. Nhu hong tran 紅塵 chon bui hong (noi cac noi do hoi), hong nhan 紅顏 dan ba dep, v.v. \n\t4. Giong cay phan nhieu hoa do, nen hoa rung cung goi la lac hong 落紅. \n\t5. Doi xua dung nhu chu 工 hay 功.
紆=hu, u [yu1]\n\t1. Quanh co. \n\t2. Trong long uat ket cung goi la hu. Cung doc la chu u.
纡=hu, u [yu1]\n\t1. Quanh co. \n\t2. Trong long uat ket cung goi la hu. Cung doc la chu u.
紇=hot [ge1|he2]\n\t1. Ten nguoi, Thuc Luong Hot 叔梁紇 ong than sinh ra duc Khong Tu 孔子. \n\t2. Hoi hot 回紇 giong Hoi Hot. \n\t3. Soi to ru xuong.
纥=hot [ge1|he2]\n\t1. Ten nguoi, Thuc Luong Hot 叔梁紇 ong than sinh ra duc Khong Tu 孔子. \n\t2. Hoi hot 回紇 giong Hoi Hot. \n\t3. Soi to ru xuong.
紈=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Lua non, cung co khi dung lam quat, cho nen goi quat tron la hoan phien 紈扇.
纨=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Lua non, cung co khi dung lam quat, cho nen goi quat tron la hoan phien 紈扇.
紉=nhan, nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Xo chi, soi phai xe lai roi moi xo vao kim ma khau duoc, cho nen may ao goi la phung nhan 縫紉. \n\t2. Tam phuc. Nhu cam nhan thinh tinh 感紉盛情 cam phuc tinh hau. \n\t3. Xe soi. \n\t4. Ta quen doc la chu nhan.
纫=nhan, nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Xo chi, soi phai xe lai roi moi xo vao kim ma khau duoc, cho nen may ao goi la phung nhan 縫紉. \n\t2. Tam phuc. Nhu cam nhan thinh tinh 感紉盛情 cam phuc tinh hau. \n\t3. Xe soi. \n\t4. Ta quen doc la chu nhan.
紊=van [wen3]\n\t1. Roi. Nhu huu dieu bat van 有條不紊 co nganh tho khong roi.
紋=van [wen2|wen4]\n\t1. Van, van gam voc. Vat gi co van co ngan cung goi la van. Nhu ba van 波紋 van song. \n\t2. Van ngan 紋銀 bac nen, bac duc thanh thoi tren co hoa van goi la van ngan, goi tat la van.
纹=van [wen2|wen4]\n\t1. Van, van gam voc. Vat gi co van co ngan cung goi la van. Nhu ba van 波紋 van song. \n\t2. Van ngan 紋銀 bac nen, bac duc thanh thoi tren co hoa van goi la van ngan, goi tat la van.
納=nap [na4]\n\t1. Vao. Nhu xuat nap 出納 so ra vao. Noi rong ra pham cai gi lam cho den gan minh deu goi la nap. Nhu duyen nap 延納, tiep nap 接納 deu nghia la moi vao choi ca, bay gio goi su lay vo la nap phu 納婦 cung la do nghia ay. \n\t2. Dang nop. Nhu nap thue 納稅 nop thue, nap khoan 納欵 dang nop khoan gi lam le xin hang phuc, v.v. \n\t3. Thu nhan. Nhu tieu nap 笑納 vui long nhan cho.
纳=nap [na4]\n\t1. Vao. Nhu xuat nap 出納 so ra vao. Noi rong ra pham cai gi lam cho den gan minh deu goi la nap. Nhu duyen nap 延納, tiep nap 接納 deu nghia la moi vao choi ca, bay gio goi su lay vo la nap phu 納婦 cung la do nghia ay. \n\t2. Dang nop. Nhu nap thue 納稅 nop thue, nap khoan 納欵 dang nop khoan gi lam le xin hang phuc, v.v. \n\t3. Thu nhan. Nhu tieu nap 笑納 vui long nhan cho.
紐=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Cai quat, cai num. \n\t2. Buoc, that. Tuc goi cai cuc ao la nuu khau 紐扣.
纽=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Cai quat, cai num. \n\t2. Buoc, that. Tuc goi cai cuc ao la nuu khau 紐扣.
紓=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Hoan. \n\t2. Giai, go. Nhu huy gia thu nan 毀家紓難 pha nha go nan.
纾=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Hoan. \n\t2. Giai, go. Nhu huy gia thu nan 毀家紓難 pha nha go nan.
純=thuan, chuan, don, truy [chun2]\n\t1. Thanh thuc. Nhu thuan hieu 純孝 nguoi hieu thuc. \n\t2. Thuan, khong lan lon gi. Nhu thuan tuy 純粹. \n\t3. Toan. Nhu thuan bach 純白 trang tuyen. \n\t4. Deu. \n\t5. Lon. \n\t6. Mot am la chuan. Ven, ve, mep ao day vien mau khac de cho dep deu goi la chuan. \n\t7. Lai mot am la don. Bo, buoc, mot xep vai hay lua cung goi la don. \n\t8. Lai mot am la nua la truy. Cung nghia voi chu truy 緇.
纯=thuan, chuan, don, truy [chun2]\n\t1. Thanh thuc. Nhu thuan hieu 純孝 nguoi hieu thuc. \n\t2. Thuan, khong lan lon gi. Nhu thuan tuy 純粹. \n\t3. Toan. Nhu thuan bach 純白 trang tuyen. \n\t4. Deu. \n\t5. Lon. \n\t6. Mot am la chuan. Ven, ve, mep ao day vien mau khac de cho dep deu goi la chuan. \n\t7. Lai mot am la don. Bo, buoc, mot xep vai hay lua cung goi la don. \n\t8. Lai mot am la nua la truy. Cung nghia voi chu truy 緇.
紕=bi, phi [pi1]\n\t1. Trang suc. \n\t2. Vien mep. \n\t3. Mot am la phi. Phi mau 紕繆 lam lan.
纰=bi, phi [pi1]\n\t1. Trang suc. \n\t2. Vien mep. \n\t3. Mot am la phi. Phi mau 紕繆 lam lan.
紗=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Sa, lua mong. Mot thu det bang to mong ma thua de lam mu hay ao mac mat goi la sa. Nhu ta noi sa Tau, sa Tay vay. Vuong Duy 王維. Thuy lien Viet nu nhan nhu ngoc, Ban tien giang dau tu hoan sa 誰憐越女顏如玉，貧賤江頭自浣紗 ai thuong cho co gai Viet mat dep nhu ngoc, lai ngheo hen tu minh giat lua o dau song ? \n\t2. Soi vai.
纱=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Sa, lua mong. Mot thu det bang to mong ma thua de lam mu hay ao mac mat goi la sa. Nhu ta noi sa Tau, sa Tay vay. Vuong Duy 王維. Thuy lien Viet nu nhan nhu ngoc, Ban tien giang dau tu hoan sa 誰憐越女顏如玉，貧賤江頭自浣紗 ai thuong cho co gai Viet mat dep nhu ngoc, lai ngheo hen tu minh giat lua o dau song ? \n\t2. Soi vai.
紘=hoanh [hong2]\n\t1. Tua leo mu, that o duoi cam, co tua chi hat bot ru xuong. \n\t2. Moi giuong. \n\t3. Rong lon.
紙=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Giay. Sai Luan 蔡倫 nha Han sang tao ra phep lam giay truoc nhat.
纸=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Giay. Sai Luan 蔡倫 nha Han sang tao ra phep lam giay truoc nhat.
級=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Bac, moi mot bac them goi la mot cap, vi the len them goi la thap cap 拾級. Pham su gi co thu bac cung goi la cap ca. Nhu lam quan len mot bac goi la nhat cap 一級. \n\t2. Phep nha Tan cu chem duoc mot dau giac duoc thang mot cap, nen goi cai dau la thu cap 首級. 
级=cap [ji2]\n\t1. Bac, moi mot bac them goi la mot cap, vi the len them goi la thap cap 拾級. Pham su gi co thu bac cung goi la cap ca. Nhu lam quan len mot bac goi la nhat cap 一級. \n\t2. Phep nha Tan cu chem duoc mot dau giac duoc thang mot cap, nen goi cai dau la thu cap 首級. 
紛=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Roi rit. \n\t2. Nhieu nhoi. Nhu phan phien 紛煩, phan van 紛紜 deu nghia la ngon ngang nhieu viec, boi roi.
纷=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Roi rit. \n\t2. Nhieu nhoi. Nhu phan phien 紛煩, phan van 紛紜 deu nghia la ngon ngang nhieu viec, boi roi.
紜=van [yun2]\n\t1. Phan van 紛紜 boi roi. \n\t2. Nhung nhuc, bon ron.
纭=van [yun2]\n\t1. Phan van 紛紜 boi roi. \n\t2. Nhung nhuc, bon ron.
紝=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Det, det lua.
素=to [su4]\n\t1. To trang. \n\t2. Trang non. Nhu to thu 素手 tay trang non. Nguoi co pham hanh cao khiet cung goi la to. Nhu to tam 素心 long trong sach. Noi rong ra pham cai gi nhan sac moc mac cung goi la to ca. Nhu phac to 朴素 moc mac, de tang mac ao vai trang to goi la xuyen to 穿素. Do gi khong co cham ve cung goi la to. Nhu to doan 素緞 doan tron. \n\t3. Khong, khong lam gi ma huong loc goi la to son 素餐. Tan Do Du goi duc Khong Tu 孔子 la to vuong 素王 nghia la khong co chuc tuoc gi ma the luc nhu vua vay. Khong co tuoc vi gi ma giau goi la to phong 素封 cung la do nghia ay. \n\t4. Chat, nha hoa hoc goi nguyen chat la nguyen to 元素. Ban tinh nguoi goi la tinh to 情素. \n\t5. Cho quen cu. Nhu du mo huu to 與某有素 cung mo la cho biet nhau da lau, to giao 素交 nguoi ban van choi voi nhau tu truoc, binh to 平素 von xua, v.v. \n\t6. Von thuong. Nhu Trung Dong noi to phu quy 素富貴 von giau sang, to ban tien 素貧賤 von ngheo hen, deu la noi khong doi cai dia vi ngay thuong vay. \n\t7. Tuc goi rau dua la to, cho nen an chay goi la nhu to 茹素.
紡=phuong [fang3]\n\t1. Cac thu det bang to dong dac mem nhun tuc goi la phuong tru 紡綢. \n\t2. Xe soi, danh soi.
纺=phuong [fang3]\n\t1. Cac thu det bang to dong dac mem nhun tuc goi la phuong tru 紡綢. \n\t2. Xe soi, danh soi.
索=tac, sach [suo3]\n\t1. Day to. \n\t2. Huyen tac 弦索 do am nhac bang day. \n\t3. Phep do. \n\t4. Tan tac. Nhu hung vi tac nhien 興味索然 hung thu tan tac, li quan tac cu 離群索居 lia dan o mot minh, v.v. \n\t5. Het. Nhu tat tac te phu 悉索敝賦 nhat nhanh het ca cua so huu. \n\t6. Mot am la sach. Luc loi, doi, cau. ta quen doc la chu sach ca.
紥=trat [za1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu trat 紮.
紫=tu [zi3]\n\t1. Sac tia, sac tim. \n\t2. Day thao, doi xua co chuc kim tu quang loc dai phu 金紫光祿大夫 nghia la chuc quan duoc dung an vang day thao tim, vi the nen goi nhung nguoi bong dung ma phu quy la thu thanh tu nhu thap gioi 取青紫如拾芥.
紬=truu [chou2]\n\t1. Truu, mot thu det bang to to. \n\t2. Quan soi, xe soi. \n\t3. Keo ra. Nhu truu dich 紬繹 go keo dau moi ra. \n\t4. Chap nhat.
紮=trat [za1]\n\t1. Chet, bo, mot goi do cung goi la nhat trat . \n\t2. Dong quan. Nhu trat doanh 紮營 dong dinh.
累=luy, luy, luy [lei2|lei3|lei4]\n\t1. Troi. \n\t2. Mot am la luy. Them. Nhu tich luy 積累 tich them mai, luy thu 累次 nhieu lan, lan ay, lan khac. \n\t3. Lai mot am la luy. Lien luy, chiu luy. Nhu thu luy bat thien 受累不淺 chiu luy khong it, tuc luy 俗累 thoi tuc lam luy minh, gia luy 家累 vi gia dinh lam luy minh, v.v. Pham su gi phien den than deu goi la luy ca. Mang no cung goi la khuy luy 虧累.
細=te [xi4]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu te co 細故 co nho, te ngu 細語 noi nho. \n\t2. Tinh te, te mat, trai lai voi tho suat goi la te.
细=te [xi4]\n\t1. Nho. Nhu te co 細故 co nho, te ngu 細語 noi nho. \n\t2. Tinh te, te mat, trai lai voi tho suat goi la te.
紱=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Day thao deo an.
绂=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Day thao deo an.
紲=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tiet 絏.
绁=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tiet 絏.
紳=than [shen1]\n\t1. Cai dai ao to. \n\t2. Cai dai ao chau. Thuong goi cac nha quan la tan than 縉紳. Vi the nen khi quan ve huu goi la than si 紳士 hay than kham 紳衿, goi tat la than 紳.
绅=than [shen1]\n\t1. Cai dai ao to. \n\t2. Cai dai ao chau. Thuong goi cac nha quan la tan than 縉紳. Vi the nen khi quan ve huu goi la than si 紳士 hay than kham 紳衿, goi tat la than 紳.
紵=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Soi gai, vai mac mua he thuong goi la tru.
紹=thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Noi, con em noi duoc nghiep cua ong cha, goi la khac thieu co cuu 克紹箕裘. \n\t2. Noi lien, lam cho hai ben duoc biet nhau goi la thieu gioi 紹介. Cung nhu gioi thieu 介紹.
绍=thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Noi, con em noi duoc nghiep cua ong cha, goi la khac thieu co cuu 克紹箕裘. \n\t2. Noi lien, lam cho hai ben duoc biet nhau goi la thieu gioi 紹介. Cung nhu gioi thieu 介紹.
紺=cam [gan4]\n\t1. Xanh biec, tuc goi la mau thien thanh, mui xanh sam anh do.
绀=cam [gan4]\n\t1. Xanh biec, tuc goi la mau thien thanh, mui xanh sam anh do.
紼=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Day tam co, day de buoc quan tai. \n\t2. Day giong quan, vi the nen dua ma goi la chap phat 執紼.
绋=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Day tam co, day de buoc quan tai. \n\t2. Day giong quan, vi the nen dua ma goi la chap phat 執紼.
紾=chan, dien [zhen3]\n\t1. Chuyen, day xoan lai. \n\t2. Van. Nhu chan ki huynh chi ti nhi doat chi thuc 紾兄之臂而奪之食 (Manh Tu 孟子) van tay anh ma cuop lay an. \n\t3. Mot am la dien. Lop xop, khong nhan.
紿=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Lua doi.
絀=truat, chuyet [chu4]\n\t1. Khiu, may. \n\t2. Thieu, khong du. Nhu doanh truat 嬴絀 thua thieu. Cung doc la chuyet, tuong hinh kien chuyet 相形見絀 cung so thay vung, thieu.
绌=truat, chuyet [chu4]\n\t1. Khiu, may. \n\t2. Thieu, khong du. Nhu doanh truat 嬴絀 thua thieu. Cung doc la chuyet, tuong hinh kien chuyet 相形見絀 cung so thay vung, thieu.
終=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Het. Nhu chung nhat bat thuc 終日不食 het ngay chang an. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. chung tieu thinh vu thanh 終宵聽雨聲 suot dem nghe tieng mua. \n\t2. Sau. Nhu thuy chung 始終 truoc sau. \n\t3. Tron. Nhu chung chi bai vong 終至敗亡 tron den hong mat. \n\t4. Chet. Nhu tho chung 壽終 chet lanh, duoc het tuoi troi. \n\t5. Ket cuc. Nhu het mot khuc nhac goi la nhat chung 一終. \n\t6. Mot nam cung goi la chung. \n\t7. Da. \n\t8. Dat vuong nghin dam goi la chung.
终=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Het. Nhu chung nhat bat thuc 終日不食 het ngay chang an. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. chung tieu thinh vu thanh 終宵聽雨聲 suot dem nghe tieng mua. \n\t2. Sau. Nhu thuy chung 始終 truoc sau. \n\t3. Tron. Nhu chung chi bai vong 終至敗亡 tron den hong mat. \n\t4. Chet. Nhu tho chung 壽終 chet lanh, duoc het tuoi troi. \n\t5. Ket cuc. Nhu het mot khuc nhac goi la nhat chung 一終. \n\t6. Mot nam cung goi la chung. \n\t7. Da. \n\t8. Dat vuong nghin dam goi la chung.
絃=huyen [xian2]\n\t1. Day dan. \n\t2. Xe to song xat keo vao de lam day dan goi la huyen. \n\t3. Doi xua vi vo chong nhu dan sat dan cam, cho nen vo chet goi la doan huyen 斷絃, lai lay vo nua goi la tuc huyen 續絃. \n\t4. Co khi viet la huyen 弦.
組=to [zu3]\n\t1. Day thao, doi xua dung day thao de deo an, cho nen goi nguoi bo chuc quan ve la giai to 解組. \n\t2. Lien lac. Nhu to chuc 組織 lien lac nhau lai lam mot su gi, mot bo do cung goi la nhat to 一組.
组=to [zu3]\n\t1. Day thao, doi xua dung day thao de deo an, cho nen goi nguoi bo chuc quan ve la giai to 解組. \n\t2. Lien lac. Nhu to chuc 組織 lien lac nhau lai lam mot su gi, mot bo do cung goi la nhat to 一組.
絅=quynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Mac long. Nhu y cam thuong quynh 衣錦尚絅 ao gam chuong mac long, nghia la mac ao gam trong ngoai mac phu mot cai ao don nua.
絆=ban [ban4]\n\t1. Cum ngua. \n\t2. Buoc chan, lam mat tu do, ngan tro nguoi ta khong lam duoc gi goi la ban tru 絆住.
绊=ban [ban4]\n\t1. Cum ngua. \n\t2. Buoc chan, lam mat tu do, ngan tro nguoi ta khong lam duoc gi goi la ban tru 絆住.
絍=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nham 紝.
絏=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Cuong ngua, nguyen la chu tiet 紲, co khi viet la 緤. \n\t2. Luy tiet 縲絏 day troi ke co toi, xieng xich.
結=ket [jie1|jie2]\n\t1. That nut day. Doi xua chua co chu, cu moi viec that mot nut day de lam ghi goi la ket thang chi the 結繩 hay ket thang ki su 結繩記事. Tet day thao do lai de lam do trang suc cung goi la ket. \n\t2. Cung ket lien voi nhau. Nhu ket giao 結交 ket ban voi nhau, ket hon 結婚 ket lam vo chong, v.v. \n\t3. Co ket. Nhu ket oan 結怨, ket han 結恨 deu nghia la co ket su oan han ca. Nha Phat cung goi nhung moi oan thu kiep truoc la ket. \n\t4. Dong lai, dong lai. Nhu ket bang 結冰 nuoc dong lai thanh bang, ket hach 結核 khi huyet dong lai thanh cai hach, v.v. \n\t5. Ket thanh qua, cac loai thuc vat ra hoa thanh qua goi la ket qua 結果. \n\t6. That gon. Nhu tong ket 總結 tom tat lai, that gon lai bang mot cau, cam ket 甘結 lam to cam doan de cho quan xu cho xong an, v.v.
结=ket [jie1|jie2]\n\t1. That nut day. Doi xua chua co chu, cu moi viec that mot nut day de lam ghi goi la ket thang chi the 結繩 hay ket thang ki su 結繩記事. Tet day thao do lai de lam do trang suc cung goi la ket. \n\t2. Cung ket lien voi nhau. Nhu ket giao 結交 ket ban voi nhau, ket hon 結婚 ket lam vo chong, v.v. \n\t3. Co ket. Nhu ket oan 結怨, ket han 結恨 deu nghia la co ket su oan han ca. Nha Phat cung goi nhung moi oan thu kiep truoc la ket. \n\t4. Dong lai, dong lai. Nhu ket bang 結冰 nuoc dong lai thanh bang, ket hach 結核 khi huyet dong lai thanh cai hach, v.v. \n\t5. Ket thanh qua, cac loai thuc vat ra hoa thanh qua goi la ket qua 結果. \n\t6. That gon. Nhu tong ket 總結 tom tat lai, that gon lai bang mot cau, cam ket 甘結 lam to cam doan de cho quan xu cho xong an, v.v.
絕=tuyet [jue2]\n\t1. Dut, pham cai gi san dut ngang deu goi la tuyet. Nhu tuyet luu nhi do 絕流而渡 re ngang dong nuoc ma sang. \n\t2. Dut, het. Nhu tuyet menh 絕命 chet mat, tuyet tu 絕嗣 khong co con chau gi, v.v. \n\t3. Tuyet vo. Nhu tuyet doi tan thanh 絕對贊成 het suc tan thanh, y noi tan thanh den ky cung. \n\t4. Co mot khong hai. Nhu tuyet sac 絕色 dep la. \n\t5. Cach tuyet khong thong. Nhu tuyet dia 絕地 noi cach tuyet khong thong ra dau ca. \n\t6. Cu tuyet, tuyet han khong choi voi nua la tuyet giao 絕交. \n\t7. Rat, tieng tro tu. Nhu tuyet trong ky nhan 絕重其人 rat trong nguoi ay. \n\t8. Tuyet cu 絕句, loi tho co bon cau, cung goi la tu tuyet 四絕. Cau co bay chu goi la that tuyet 七絕. Cau co nam chu goi la ngu tuyet 五絕.
绝=tuyet [jue2]\n\t1. Dut, pham cai gi san dut ngang deu goi la tuyet. Nhu tuyet luu nhi do 絕流而渡 re ngang dong nuoc ma sang. \n\t2. Dut, het. Nhu tuyet menh 絕命 chet mat, tuyet tu 絕嗣 khong co con chau gi, v.v. \n\t3. Tuyet vo. Nhu tuyet doi tan thanh 絕對贊成 het suc tan thanh, y noi tan thanh den ky cung. \n\t4. Co mot khong hai. Nhu tuyet sac 絕色 dep la. \n\t5. Cach tuyet khong thong. Nhu tuyet dia 絕地 noi cach tuyet khong thong ra dau ca. \n\t6. Cu tuyet, tuyet han khong choi voi nua la tuyet giao 絕交. \n\t7. Rat, tieng tro tu. Nhu tuyet trong ky nhan 絕重其人 rat trong nguoi ay. \n\t8. Tuyet cu 絕句, loi tho co bon cau, cung goi la tu tuyet 四絕. Cau co bay chu goi la that tuyet 七絕. Cau co nam chu goi la ngu tuyet 五絕.
絖=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Soi bong, cung nghia voi chu 纊.
絚=cang [geng1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cang 緪.
絛=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Day danh bang to. \n\t2. Thao trung 絛蟲 giun, san. Mot thu sau dai ma giep song nho o trong than the giong dong vat 
绦=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Day danh bang to. \n\t2. Thao trung 絛蟲 giun, san. Mot thu sau dai ma giep song nho o trong than the giong dong vat 
絜=kiet, hiet, khiet [xie2]\n\t1. Sach se. \n\t2. Mot am la hiet. Do, do. Sach Dai Hoc 大學 co cau thi di quan tu huu hiet cu chi dao 是以君子有絜矩之道 vi the nen nguoi quan tu co cai dao do vuong. Ta quen doc la khiet.
絞=giao, hao [jiao3]\n\t1. Vat, that chat. Nhu giao thu can 絞毛巾 vat khan tay. \n\t2. Hinh giao, hinh that co cho chet goi la giao. \n\t3. So sang. \n\t4. Mot am la hao. Mui xanh vang. \n\t5. Cai dai liem xac.
绞=giao, hao [jiao3]\n\t1. Vat, that chat. Nhu giao thu can 絞毛巾 vat khan tay. \n\t2. Hinh giao, hinh that co cho chet goi la giao. \n\t3. So sang. \n\t4. Mot am la hao. Mui xanh vang. \n\t5. Cai dai liem xac.
絡=lac [lao4|luo4]\n\t1. Quan quanh, xe, quay. Nhu lac ty 絡絲 quay to, nghia la quan to vao cai vong quay to, vi the nen cai gi co y rang buoc deu goi la lac. Nhu lung lac 籠絡, lien lac 連絡, lac dich 絡繹 deu noi ve y nghia rang buoc ca. \n\t2. Dan luoi, mang. Lay day mui dan ra giuong moi de dung do hay trum vao minh deu goi la lac. Nhu vong lac 網絡, anh lac 纓絡 tuc nhu chan chi hat bot bay gio. \n\t3. Cai dam ngua. \n\t4. Khuon vay. Nhu thien duy dia lac 天維地絡 noi dia the lien lac nhu luoi chang vay. \n\t5. Bao la. Nhu vong lac co kim 網絡古今 bao la ca xua nay. \n\t6. Cac than kinh va mach mau ngang o than the nguoi goi la lac. Nhu kinh lac 經絡, mach lac 脈絡, v.v. \n\t7. Tho qua, trong qua cay cung co chat rang rit nhu luoi, nen cung goi la lac. Nhu quat lac 橘絡 tho qua quit.
络=lac [lao4|luo4]\n\t1. Quan quanh, xe, quay. Nhu lac ty 絡絲 quay to, nghia la quan to vao cai vong quay to, vi the nen cai gi co y rang buoc deu goi la lac. Nhu lung lac 籠絡, lien lac 連絡, lac dich 絡繹 deu noi ve y nghia rang buoc ca. \n\t2. Dan luoi, mang. Lay day mui dan ra giuong moi de dung do hay trum vao minh deu goi la lac. Nhu vong lac 網絡, anh lac 纓絡 tuc nhu chan chi hat bot bay gio. \n\t3. Cai dam ngua. \n\t4. Khuon vay. Nhu thien duy dia lac 天維地絡 noi dia the lien lac nhu luoi chang vay. \n\t5. Bao la. Nhu vong lac co kim 網絡古今 bao la ca xua nay. \n\t6. Cac than kinh va mach mau ngang o than the nguoi goi la lac. Nhu kinh lac 經絡, mach lac 脈絡, v.v. \n\t7. Tho qua, trong qua cay cung co chat rang rit nhu luoi, nen cung goi la lac. Nhu quat lac 橘絡 tho qua quit.
絢=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Van suc, trang suc sac so.
绚=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Van suc, trang suc sac so.
給=cap [gei3|ji3]\n\t1. Du dung. Nhu gia cap nhan tuc 家給人足 nha no nguoi du. \n\t2. Du, cap giup, giup them cho. Chuc quan chuc san cho khi sai khien goi la cap su 給事, ve sau dung nhu chuc ngu su la cap gian 給諫. \n\t3. Beo leo, lem mep. Nhu ngu nhan di khau cap 禦人以口給 (Luan ngu 論語) lay loi beo leo ma chong nguoi. \n\t4. Cung cap.
给=cap [gei3|ji3]\n\t1. Du dung. Nhu gia cap nhan tuc 家給人足 nha no nguoi du. \n\t2. Du, cap giup, giup them cho. Chuc quan chuc san cho khi sai khien goi la cap su 給事, ve sau dung nhu chuc ngu su la cap gian 給諫. \n\t3. Beo leo, lem mep. Nhu ngu nhan di khau cap 禦人以口給 (Luan ngu 論語) lay loi beo leo ma chong nguoi. \n\t4. Cung cap.
絨=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Nhung, mot thu det bang long giong thu vua day vua am goi la nhung. \n\t2. Soi to bong goi la nhung tuyen 絨線.
绒=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Nhung, mot thu det bang long giong thu vua day vua am goi la nhung. \n\t2. Soi to bong goi la nhung tuyen 絨線.
絪=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Nhan uan 絪縕 nguyen khi un duc day day. Dich Kinh 易經. Thien dia nhan uan, van vat hoa thuan 天地絪縕，萬物化醇 troi dat un duc giao cam ma van vat hoa thuan.
絫=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu luy 累.
絮=nhu [xu4]\n\t1. Cho ken vao nuoc soi roi go ra cho nao san dep goi la mien 綿, cho nao su si goi la nhu 絮. \n\t2. Soi bong. \n\t3. Thu hoa nao chat mem nhe bay boc ra duoc deu goi la nhu. Nhu lieu nhu 柳絮 bong lieu, lu nhu 蘆絮 bong lau, v.v. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nhu phi hoa lac vo nhan quan, Nhat da tuy luu dao Quang Dong 絮飛花落無人管，一夜隨流到廣東 to bay, hoa rung khong ai de y, mot dem chay theo dong den Quang Dong. \n\t4. Nhai nhai. Nhu nhu ngu 絮語 noi nhai nhai.
絰=diet [die2]\n\t1. Thu gai de lam do tang. \n\t2. Mu gai, that lung gai deu goi la diet.
統=thong [tong3]\n\t1. Moi to. Su gi co manh moi co the tim ra duoc goi la thong he 統系. Doi doi noi doi khong dut cung goi la thong. Nhu ngoi vua truyen noi nhau goi la hoang thong 皇統, thanh hien noi nhau goi la dao thong 道統, v.v. \n\t2. Tom tri. Nhu thong linh 統領 tom linh ca. Chuc quan cam dau mot nuoc dan chu goi la tong thong 總統. \n\t3. Hop lai. Nhu thong nhat 統一 hop ca lam mot. \n\t4. Dau goc.
统=thong [tong3]\n\t1. Moi to. Su gi co manh moi co the tim ra duoc goi la thong he 統系. Doi doi noi doi khong dut cung goi la thong. Nhu ngoi vua truyen noi nhau goi la hoang thong 皇統, thanh hien noi nhau goi la dao thong 道統, v.v. \n\t2. Tom tri. Nhu thong linh 統領 tom linh ca. Chuc quan cam dau mot nuoc dan chu goi la tong thong 總統. \n\t3. Hop lai. Nhu thong nhat 統一 hop ca lam mot. \n\t4. Dau goc.
絲=ti [si1]\n\t1. To tam. \n\t2. Pham thu gi nho ma hinh nhu dan soi deu goi la ti. Nhu thu ti 蛛絲 mang nhen, vu ti 雨絲 mua day, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng ti. Nhu dan nhi phai dung day to moi gay moi keo ra tieng duoc nen goi la tieng ti. \n\t4. Ti, mot phan trong muoi van phan goi la mot ti 絲. Muoi ti 絲 la mot hao 毫.
丝=ti [si1]\n\t1. To tam. \n\t2. Pham thu gi nho ma hinh nhu dan soi deu goi la ti. Nhu thu ti 蛛絲 mang nhen, vu ti 雨絲 mua day, v.v. \n\t3. Tieng ti. Nhu dan nhi phai dung day to moi gay moi keo ra tieng duoc nen goi la tieng ti. \n\t4. Ti, mot phan trong muoi van phan goi la mot ti 絲. Muoi ti 絲 la mot hao 毫.
絳=giang [jiang4]\n\t1. Sac do.
绛=giang [jiang4]\n\t1. Sac do.
絹=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Lua song, lua moc. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu quyen 罥.
绢=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Lua song, lua moc. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu quyen 罥.
絺=hi [chi1]\n\t1. Vai nho.
綁=bang [bang3]\n\t1. Troi chat canh khi, troi quat ra dang sau.
绑=bang [bang3]\n\t1. Troi chat canh khi, troi quat ra dang sau.
綃=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Lua song, thu lua det bang to song. \n\t2. Cai xa treo canh buom.
绡=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Lua song, thu lua det bang to song. \n\t2. Cai xa treo canh buom.
綆=canh [geng3]\n\t1. Day keo nuoc, day dong gao xuong gieng muc nuoc.
绠=canh [geng3]\n\t1. Day keo nuoc, day dong gao xuong gieng muc nuoc.
綈=de [ti2|ti4]\n\t1. Vai day, dui. De bao tuong tang 綈袍相贈 tang cho ao dui day. Luc Pham Tuy bi nan, co nguoi ban tang cho cao ao dui day, vi the goi cai nghia be ban la de bao 綈袍.
绨=de [ti2|ti4]\n\t1. Vai day, dui. De bao tuong tang 綈袍相贈 tang cho ao dui day. Luc Pham Tuy bi nan, co nguoi ban tang cho cao ao dui day, vi the goi cai nghia be ban la de bao 綈袍.
綉=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tu 繡.
綌=khich [xi4]\n\t1. Vai to.
綍=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Cai day lon, cung nghia voi chu phat 紼. \n\t2. Chieu thu cua vua goi la luan phat 綸綍.
綏=tuy, thoa [sui2]\n\t1. Day chang xe de biu (niu) len cho tien. \n\t2. yen. Nhu tuy phu 綏撫, tuy phuc 綏服 deu nghia la vo ve nguoi ta quy phuc ca. \n\t3. Lui quan. \n\t4. Co tinh. \n\t5. Mot am la thoa. Cung nghia voi chu thoa 妥.
绥=tuy, thoa [sui2]\n\t1. Day chang xe de biu (niu) len cho tien. \n\t2. yen. Nhu tuy phu 綏撫, tuy phuc 綏服 deu nghia la vo ve nguoi ta quy phuc ca. \n\t3. Lui quan. \n\t4. Co tinh. \n\t5. Mot am la thoa. Cung nghia voi chu thoa 妥.
經=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Thuong, dao duc phap luat da dinh khong the doi duoc goi la kinh. Nhu thien kinh dia nghia 天經地義 noi cai dao thuong nhu troi dat khong the di dich duoc. \n\t2. Kinh sach. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經, Kinh Thu 書經, Hieu Kinh 孝經, v.v. Sach cua cac ton giao cung goi la kinh. Nhu kinh Phat co cac kinh. Lang Nghiem 楞嚴經, Lang Gia 楞伽經, Bat Nha 般若經, v.v. Cac sach ve cac khoa lat vat cung goi la kinh. Nhu nguu kinh 牛經 sach xem tuong trau va chua trau, ma kinh 馬經 sach xem tuong ngua va chua ngua, v.v. \n\t3. Duong doc, soi thang. \n\t4. Sua. Nhu kinh ly 經理 sua tri, kinh doanh 經營 sua sang, v.v. \n\t5. Qua, kinh lich 經歷 trai qua, kinh thu 經手 qua tay, v.v. \n\t6. That co. Nhu tu kinh 自經 tu tu, tu that co chet. \n\t7. Kinh nguyet 經月, dan ba moi thang mau gian ra mot ky, dung ky khong sai nen goi la kinh. \n\t9. Chia vach dia gioi. \n\t10. Kinh mach, sach thuoc chia 12 kinh phan phoi voi cac tang phu. \n\t11. Ve duong sa thi phia nam bac goi la kinh 經, phia dong tay goi la vi 緯. \n\t12. Ve khoang troi khong va qua dat thi lay con duong nam bac cuc chinh giao voi xich dao la kinh. Nhu kinh tuyen 經線 theo huong nam bac, vi tuyen 緯線 theo huong dong tay.
经=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Thuong, dao duc phap luat da dinh khong the doi duoc goi la kinh. Nhu thien kinh dia nghia 天經地義 noi cai dao thuong nhu troi dat khong the di dich duoc. \n\t2. Kinh sach. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經, Kinh Thu 書經, Hieu Kinh 孝經, v.v. Sach cua cac ton giao cung goi la kinh. Nhu kinh Phat co cac kinh. Lang Nghiem 楞嚴經, Lang Gia 楞伽經, Bat Nha 般若經, v.v. Cac sach ve cac khoa lat vat cung goi la kinh. Nhu nguu kinh 牛經 sach xem tuong trau va chua trau, ma kinh 馬經 sach xem tuong ngua va chua ngua, v.v. \n\t3. Duong doc, soi thang. \n\t4. Sua. Nhu kinh ly 經理 sua tri, kinh doanh 經營 sua sang, v.v. \n\t5. Qua, kinh lich 經歷 trai qua, kinh thu 經手 qua tay, v.v. \n\t6. That co. Nhu tu kinh 自經 tu tu, tu that co chet. \n\t7. Kinh nguyet 經月, dan ba moi thang mau gian ra mot ky, dung ky khong sai nen goi la kinh. \n\t9. Chia vach dia gioi. \n\t10. Kinh mach, sach thuoc chia 12 kinh phan phoi voi cac tang phu. \n\t11. Ve duong sa thi phia nam bac goi la kinh 經, phia dong tay goi la vi 緯. \n\t12. Ve khoang troi khong va qua dat thi lay con duong nam bac cuc chinh giao voi xich dao la kinh. Nhu kinh tuyen 經線 theo huong nam bac, vi tuyen 緯線 theo huong dong tay.
緐=phon [fan2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu phon 繁.
綜=tong, tong [zeng4|zong1]\n\t1. Dem det soi no voi soi kia goi la tong, vi the su gi lan lon voi nhau goi la thac tong 錯綜. \n\t2. Hop ca lai. Nhu tong ly 綜理, cung nhu 總理. Ta quen doc la chu tong.
综=tong, tong [zeng4|zong1]\n\t1. Dem det soi no voi soi kia goi la tong, vi the su gi lan lon voi nhau goi la thac tong 錯綜. \n\t2. Hop ca lai. Nhu tong ly 綜理, cung nhu 總理. Ta quen doc la chu tong.
綠=luc [lu4|lu:4]\n\t1. Sac xanh biec, xanh ma lai lan ca sac vang goi la luc. \n\t2. Mot nguyen chat nha hoa hoc tim thay o loai phi kim chlorine, thanh mot chat hoi xanh vang, mui rat hang rat doc, hit vao co the hoc mau ra.
绿=luc [lu4|lu:4]\n\t1. Sac xanh biec, xanh ma lai lan ca sac vang goi la luc. \n\t2. Mot nguyen chat nha hoa hoc tim thay o loai phi kim chlorine, thanh mot chat hoi xanh vang, mui rat hang rat doc, hit vao co the hoc mau ra.
綢=tru, thao [chou2]\n\t1. Dong dac. \n\t2. Tru mau 綢繆 rang buoc. \n\t3. Cac thu det bang to. \n\t4. Mot am la thao. cat, chua.
绸=tru, thao [chou2]\n\t1. Dong dac. \n\t2. Tru mau 綢繆 rang buoc. \n\t3. Cac thu det bang to. \n\t4. Mot am la thao. cat, chua.
綣=quyen [quan3]\n\t1. Khien quyen 繾綣 quyen luyen khong roi nhau. Nguyen Chan 元稹. Luu lien thoi huu han, khien quyen y nan chung 留連時有限，繾綣意難終 ben nhau thoi ngan ngui, quyen luyen y khon cung.
绻=quyen [quan3]\n\t1. Khien quyen 繾綣 quyen luyen khong roi nhau. Nguyen Chan 元稹. Luu lien thoi huu han, khien quyen y nan chung 留連時有限，繾綣意難終 ben nhau thoi ngan ngui, quyen luyen y khon cung.
綦=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Xanh nhot, thu lua mau xanh nhot. \n\t2. Vien da hay cac vai mau vao mep giay cung goi la ki. \n\t3. Rat. Nhu ki trong 綦重 rat nang. \n\t4. Cung doc la chu ki.
綫=tuyen [xian4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tuyen 線.
綬=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Day thao do.
绶=thu [shou4]\n\t1. Day thao do.
維=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Buoc. Nhu duy he 維縶, duy tri 維持 rang buoc giu gin cho khoi do hong. \n\t2. Mep luoi, bon giuong luoi goi la duy, vi the bon phuong cung goi la tu duy 四維. Ben bo coi nuoc cung goi la duy. Nhu thien duy 天維 ben troi, khon duy 坤維 ben dat, v.v. \n\t3. Pham vat gi nho ma dai deu goi la duy. Nhu cai loai dong vat thuc vat co chat nhu soi nho va dai nhu xo muop, xo thit, v.v. goi la tiem duy chat 纖維質. \n\t4. Bui, tieng dem. Cung nhu chu duy 惟 hay 唯.
维=duy [wei2]\n\t1. Buoc. Nhu duy he 維縶, duy tri 維持 rang buoc giu gin cho khoi do hong. \n\t2. Mep luoi, bon giuong luoi goi la duy, vi the bon phuong cung goi la tu duy 四維. Ben bo coi nuoc cung goi la duy. Nhu thien duy 天維 ben troi, khon duy 坤維 ben dat, v.v. \n\t3. Pham vat gi nho ma dai deu goi la duy. Nhu cai loai dong vat thuc vat co chat nhu soi nho va dai nhu xo muop, xo thit, v.v. goi la tiem duy chat 纖維質. \n\t4. Bui, tieng dem. Cung nhu chu duy 惟 hay 唯.
綮=khe, khinh [qi3|qing3]\n\t1. Cai bao dung kich, khe kich 綮戟. \n\t2. Mot am la khinh. Khang khinh 肯綮 dau gan, noi ach yeu cua su gi le gi cung goi la khang khinh.
綯=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Danh day, xe soi.
綰=oan [wan3]\n\t1. Bo buoc. \n\t2. Mac vao, xau vao.
绾=oan [wan3]\n\t1. Bo buoc. \n\t2. Mac vao, xau vao.
綱=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Giuong luoi. Luoi co giuong moi keo duoc cac mat, cho nen cai gi ma co thong he khong the roi duoc deu goi la cuong. Cuong thuong 綱常 dao thuong cua nguoi gom. tam cuong 三綱 la quan than, phu tu, phu phu 君臣、父子、夫婦, ngu thuong 五常 la nhan, le, nghia, tri, tin 仁、義、禮、智、信 ."Cuong ky 綱紀 giuong moi, v.v. \n\t2. Pham su gi lay mot cai lam cot roi chia ra cac nganh deu goi la cuong. Nhu su cuong muc 史綱目 nghia la loi chep su theo cach nay. \n\t3. Van tai hang hoa ket tung bon di cung goi la cuong. Nhu tra cuong 茶綱 tui buon che (tra).
纲=cuong [gang1]\n\t1. Giuong luoi. Luoi co giuong moi keo duoc cac mat, cho nen cai gi ma co thong he khong the roi duoc deu goi la cuong. Cuong thuong 綱常 dao thuong cua nguoi gom. tam cuong 三綱 la quan than, phu tu, phu phu 君臣、父子、夫婦, ngu thuong 五常 la nhan, le, nghia, tri, tin 仁、義、禮、智、信 ."Cuong ky 綱紀 giuong moi, v.v. \n\t2. Pham su gi lay mot cai lam cot roi chia ra cac nganh deu goi la cuong. Nhu su cuong muc 史綱目 nghia la loi chep su theo cach nay. \n\t3. Van tai hang hoa ket tung bon di cung goi la cuong. Nhu tra cuong 茶綱 tui buon che (tra).
網=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Cai luoi, cai chai. \n\t2. Pham cai gi ket thanh tung mat deu goi la vong. Nhu thu vong 蛛網 mang nhen. \n\t3. Cai de rang buoc nguoi va vat. Nhu tran vong 塵網 luoi tran, y noi su doi no rang buoc nguoi nhu the phai bi mac vao luoi vay, vi the nen goi phap luat la van vong 文網.
网=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Cai luoi, cai chai. \n\t2. Pham cai gi ket thanh tung mat deu goi la vong. Nhu thu vong 蛛網 mang nhen. \n\t3. Cai de rang buoc nguoi va vat. Nhu tran vong 塵網 luoi tran, y noi su doi no rang buoc nguoi nhu the phai bi mac vao luoi vay, vi the nen goi phap luat la van vong 文網.
綳=banh [beng1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu banh 繃.
綴=chue, chuyet, xuyet [zhui4]\n\t1. Noi lien, khiu lien, khau lai. \n\t2. Mot am la chuyet. Ngan cam. \n\t3. Bo buoc. Ta quen doc la chu xuyet.
缀=chue, chuyet, xuyet [zhui4]\n\t1. Noi lien, khiu lien, khau lai. \n\t2. Mot am la chuyet. Ngan cam. \n\t3. Bo buoc. Ta quen doc la chu xuyet.
綵=thai [cai3]\n\t1. To mui, tua mui, tuc goi hang to la ngu sac la thai.
綷=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Tuy sai 綷縩 xoan xoat, tieng ao dong nhau.
綸=luan [guan1|lun2]\n\t1. Day thao xanh. \n\t2. Luan can 綸巾 thu khan xep bang day thao xanh. \n\t3. Muoi soi to danh lai mot soi goi la luan. Kinh Le ky 禮記 co cau. Vuong ngon nhu ti, ki xuat nhu luan 王言如絲，其出如綸 loi vua noi nhu to, anh huong ra nhu soi lon, y noi do nho ma hoa ra lon vay. Ngay xua goi to chieu vua la luan am 綸音, ti luan 絲綸 la do le ay. \n\t4. Chang buoc, quan cuon. Vi the nen to chuc lam viec goi la di luan 彌綸 hay kinh luan 經綸. \n\t5. Su vat gi phien phuc lan lon goi la phan luan 紛綸. \n\t6. Day cau. Nhu thuy luan 垂綸 cau ca, thu luan 收綸 nghi cau, v.v.
纶=luan [guan1|lun2]\n\t1. Day thao xanh. \n\t2. Luan can 綸巾 thu khan xep bang day thao xanh. \n\t3. Muoi soi to danh lai mot soi goi la luan. Kinh Le ky 禮記 co cau. Vuong ngon nhu ti, ki xuat nhu luan 王言如絲，其出如綸 loi vua noi nhu to, anh huong ra nhu soi lon, y noi do nho ma hoa ra lon vay. Ngay xua goi to chieu vua la luan am 綸音, ti luan 絲綸 la do le ay. \n\t4. Chang buoc, quan cuon. Vi the nen to chuc lam viec goi la di luan 彌綸 hay kinh luan 經綸. \n\t5. Su vat gi phien phuc lan lon goi la phan luan 紛綸. \n\t6. Day cau. Nhu thuy luan 垂綸 cau ca, thu luan 收綸 nghi cau, v.v.
綹=luu [liu3]\n\t1. Hai muoi soi to goi la luu. \n\t2. Pham cac thu day danh bang soi deu goi la luu. Tuc cung goi la day buoc do. Nhu ke cap cat day lay do goi la tien luu 剪綹. \n\t3. Chom. Nhu ngu luu truong nhiem 五綹長髥 nam chom rau dai.
绺=luu [liu3]\n\t1. Hai muoi soi to goi la luu. \n\t2. Pham cac thu day danh bang soi deu goi la luu. Tuc cung goi la day buoc do. Nhu ke cap cat day lay do goi la tien luu 剪綹. \n\t3. Chom. Nhu ngu luu truong nhiem 五綹長髥 nam chom rau dai.
綺=khi, y [qi3]\n\t1. Cac thu the lua co hoa bong chang chit khong dung soi thang, deu goi la khi. \n\t2. Xien xeo, lam lan. Nhu khi dao 綺道, khi mach 綺陌 noi duong loi ngoat ngoeo ra nhu van to xien xeo vay. \n\t3. Tuoi dep. Nhu khi tinh 綺情 cai tinh nau na, khi ngu 綺語 loi noi theu det, v.v. Ta quen doc la chu y.
绮=khi, y [qi3]\n\t1. Cac thu the lua co hoa bong chang chit khong dung soi thang, deu goi la khi. \n\t2. Xien xeo, lam lan. Nhu khi dao 綺道, khi mach 綺陌 noi duong loi ngoat ngoeo ra nhu van to xien xeo vay. \n\t3. Tuoi dep. Nhu khi tinh 綺情 cai tinh nau na, khi ngu 綺語 loi noi theu det, v.v. Ta quen doc la chu y.
綻=tran [zhan4]\n\t1. Duong khau ao. Nhu thoat tran 脫綻 ao sut chi. \n\t2. Day. Nhu bao tran 飽綻 no phich.
绽=tran [zhan4]\n\t1. Duong khau ao. Nhu thoat tran 脫綻 ao sut chi. \n\t2. Day. Nhu bao tran 飽綻 no phich.
綽=xuoc [chao1|chuo4]\n\t1. Thong tha. \n\t2. Xuoc uoc 綽約 eo la. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Mau kien ky xuoc uoc kha ai, thuy cam du ngon 母見其綽約可愛，始敢與言 ba me thay nguoi xinh dep eo la de thuong, moi dam noi chuyen. \n\t3. Rong rai thua thai. Nhu xuoc huu du dia 綽有餘地 rong rai thua thai.
绰=xuoc [chao1|chuo4]\n\t1. Thong tha. \n\t2. Xuoc uoc 綽約 eo la. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Mau kien ky xuoc uoc kha ai, thuy cam du ngon 母見其綽約可愛，始敢與言 ba me thay nguoi xinh dep eo la de thuong, moi dam noi chuyen. \n\t3. Rong rai thua thai. Nhu xuoc huu du dia 綽有餘地 rong rai thua thai.
綾=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Lua mong, lua mong co hoa.
绫=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Lua mong, lua mong co hoa.
綿=mien [mian2]\n\t1. Bong moi. Cho ken vao nuoc soi roi go ra cho nao san dep goi la mien 綿, cho nao su si goi la nhu 絮. \n\t2. Dai dac. Nhu mien duyen 綿延 dai dac, mien vien 綿遠 dai xa, v.v. \n\t3. Rang rit. Nhu trien mien 纏綿. \n\t4. Mien man 綿蠻 liu lo, riu rit (tieng chim). \n\t5. Mem yeu.
绵=mien [mian2]\n\t1. Bong moi. Cho ken vao nuoc soi roi go ra cho nao san dep goi la mien 綿, cho nao su si goi la nhu 絮. \n\t2. Dai dac. Nhu mien duyen 綿延 dai dac, mien vien 綿遠 dai xa, v.v. \n\t3. Rang rit. Nhu trien mien 纏綿. \n\t4. Mien man 綿蠻 liu lo, riu rit (tieng chim). \n\t5. Mem yeu.
緅=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Sac do tham. \n\t2. Lua mui dieu nhat.
緇=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Lua tham. \n\t2. Nha chua hay mac ao den nen goi cac su la truy luu 緇流, cat toc di tu goi la phi truy 披緇.
缁=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Lua tham. \n\t2. Nha chua hay mac ao den nen goi cac su la truy luu 緇流, cat toc di tu goi la phi truy 披緇.
緉=luong [liang3]\n\t1. Mot doi giay.
緊=khan [jin3]\n\t1. Troi chat, cang, danh soi soan mau. Vi the nen su gi can kip lam deu goi la khan. Nhu khan yeu 緊要, khan cap 緊急 deu nghia la su can kip ca.
紧=khan [jin3]\n\t1. Troi chat, cang, danh soi soan mau. Vi the nen su gi can kip lam deu goi la khan. Nhu khan yeu 緊要, khan cap 緊急 deu nghia la su can kip ca.
緋=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Lua dao.
绯=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Lua dao.
緌=nhuy, tuy [rui2]\n\t1. Cai leo mu, day vin. Tuc doc la chu tuy, cung nghia voi chu tuy 綏.
総=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 總.
緒=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Dau moi soi to. Go to phai go tu dau moi, vi the nen su gi da xong han goi la tuu tu 就緒 ra moi. Su gi boi roi ngon ngang lam goi la thien dau van tu 千頭萬緒 muon dau nghin moi. \n\t2. Su gi cu noi doi mai ma co manh moi tim thay duoc deu goi la tu. Nhu cong tu 功緒 cong nghiep, tong tu 宗緒 doi noi, dong doi, v.v. \n\t3. Moi nghi. Nhu y tu 思緒 y nghi, cang nghi cang ra nhu the keo soi vay, tinh tu 情緒 moi tinh, sau tu 愁緒 moi sau, v.v. \n\t4. Thua. Nhu tu du 緒餘 cai da tan rot lai. \n\t5. Bay. Nhu tu ngon 緒言 loi noi mo dau.
绪=tu [xu4]\n\t1. Dau moi soi to. Go to phai go tu dau moi, vi the nen su gi da xong han goi la tuu tu 就緒 ra moi. Su gi boi roi ngon ngang lam goi la thien dau van tu 千頭萬緒 muon dau nghin moi. \n\t2. Su gi cu noi doi mai ma co manh moi tim thay duoc deu goi la tu. Nhu cong tu 功緒 cong nghiep, tong tu 宗緒 doi noi, dong doi, v.v. \n\t3. Moi nghi. Nhu y tu 思緒 y nghi, cang nghi cang ra nhu the keo soi vay, tinh tu 情緒 moi tinh, sau tu 愁緒 moi sau, v.v. \n\t4. Thua. Nhu tu du 緒餘 cai da tan rot lai. \n\t5. Bay. Nhu tu ngon 緒言 loi noi mo dau.
緗=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Lua vang phon phot, ngay xua hay dung de viet, nen goi sach vo la phieu tuong 縹緗 hay kiem tuong 縑緗.
缃=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Lua vang phon phot, ngay xua hay dung de viet, nen goi sach vo la phieu tuong 縹緗 hay kiem tuong 縑緗.
緘=giam [jian1]\n\t1. Phong, bit, ngam. Nhu giam khau bat ngon 緘口不言 ngam mieng khong noi. Phong tho, phong bi cung goi la giam.
缄=giam [jian1]\n\t1. Phong, bit, ngam. Nhu giam khau bat ngon 緘口不言 ngam mieng khong noi. Phong tho, phong bi cung goi la giam.
線=tuyen [xian4]\n\t1. Chi khau. \n\t2. Chieu dai, phep tinh do chieu dai goi la tuyen. Nhu truc tuyen 直線 chieu thang, khuc tuyen 曲線 chieu cong. Pham con duong tu cho nay den cho no tat phai qua moi toi duoc deu goi la tuyen. Nhu lo tuyen 路線 duong bo, hang tuyen 航線 duong be, v.v. \n\t4. Suy cau cai manh khoe cua su bi mat goi la tuyen sach, co khi goi la tat la tuyen. Lung xet tung tich trom cuop goi la nhan tuyen 眼線.
线=tuyen [xian4]\n\t1. Chi khau. \n\t2. Chieu dai, phep tinh do chieu dai goi la tuyen. Nhu truc tuyen 直線 chieu thang, khuc tuyen 曲線 chieu cong. Pham con duong tu cho nay den cho no tat phai qua moi toi duoc deu goi la tuyen. Nhu lo tuyen 路線 duong bo, hang tuyen 航線 duong be, v.v. \n\t4. Suy cau cai manh khoe cua su bi mat goi la tuyen sach, co khi goi la tat la tuyen. Lung xet tung tich trom cuop goi la nhan tuyen 眼線.
緝=tap [ji1|qi1]\n\t1. Chap soi, danh thung. \n\t2. Vien mep, vien gau. \n\t3. Chap noi. Nhu bien tap 編緝 bien chep. Sach da rach nat bien chep chap noi lai goi la bien tap. Bay gio thuong dung chu tap 輯 nghia la bien tap tai lieu cac sach lai cho thanh mot tap cho gon gang. \n\t4. Lung bat. Nhu tap dao 緝盜 bat cuop.
缉=tap [ji1|qi1]\n\t1. Chap soi, danh thung. \n\t2. Vien mep, vien gau. \n\t3. Chap noi. Nhu bien tap 編緝 bien chep. Sach da rach nat bien chep chap noi lai goi la bien tap. Bay gio thuong dung chu tap 輯 nghia la bien tap tai lieu cac sach lai cho thanh mot tap cho gon gang. \n\t4. Lung bat. Nhu tap dao 緝盜 bat cuop.
緞=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Doan. Co thu doan hoa, co thu doan tron.
缎=doan [duan4]\n\t1. Doan. Co thu doan hoa, co thu doan tron.
締=de [di4]\n\t1. Rang buoc. Nhu de giao 締交 ket ban, de nhan 締姻 ket dau gia.
缔=de [di4]\n\t1. Rang buoc. Nhu de giao 締交 ket ban, de nhan 締姻 ket dau gia.
緡=man [min2]\n\t1. Day cau. \n\t2. Quan tien.
缗=man [min2]\n\t1. Day cau. \n\t2. Quan tien.
緣=duyen, duyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Duong vien ao. \n\t2. Mot am la duyen. Nhan, cai nhan ket thanh cai gi goi la duyen. Nhu duyen co 緣故 duyen co. Nha Phat cho vi nhan ma duoc qua la duyen. Nhu nhan duyen, duyen phan 緣分, v.v. \n\t2. Leo. Nhu duyen moc cau ngu 緣木求魚 leo cay tim ca. \n\t3. Di duyen 夤緣 nuong cay, lien lac. Cau than voi nha quyen quy cung goi la di duyen.
缘=duyen, duyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Duong vien ao. \n\t2. Mot am la duyen. Nhan, cai nhan ket thanh cai gi goi la duyen. Nhu duyen co 緣故 duyen co. Nha Phat cho vi nhan ma duoc qua la duyen. Nhu nhan duyen, duyen phan 緣分, v.v. \n\t2. Leo. Nhu duyen moc cau ngu 緣木求魚 leo cay tim ca. \n\t3. Di duyen 夤緣 nuong cay, lien lac. Cau than voi nha quyen quy cung goi la di duyen.
緤=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Thung, de dat cac giong muong nhu trau, de, v.v.
緥=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Ao choang, ta ap.
緦=ti [si1]\n\t1. Vai gai nho, dung lam do de tro (de tang) cac hang than vua vua.
缌=ti [si1]\n\t1. Vai gai nho, dung lam do de tro (de tang) cac hang than vua vua.
編=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Cai le sach. Nhu Khong Tu doc Dich, vi bien tam tuyet 孔子讀易，韋編三絕 (Han thu 漢書) duc Khong Tu doc Kinh Dich ba lan dut le sach. Bay gio cung goi sach vo la bien. \n\t2. Cu thuan thu tu deu goi la bien. Nhu bien liet 編列 xep bay. \n\t3. Dan, ken. Nhu bien truc 編竹 ken tre, bien bo 編蒲 ken co bo.
编=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Cai le sach. Nhu Khong Tu doc Dich, vi bien tam tuyet 孔子讀易，韋編三絕 (Han thu 漢書) duc Khong Tu doc Kinh Dich ba lan dut le sach. Bay gio cung goi sach vo la bien. \n\t2. Cu thuan thu tu deu goi la bien. Nhu bien liet 編列 xep bay. \n\t3. Dan, ken. Nhu bien truc 編竹 ken tre, bien bo 編蒲 ken co bo.
緩=hoan [huan3]\n\t1. Thong tha. Nhu hoan bo 緩步 buoc thong tha. \n\t2. Chanh tri khong nghiet goi la khoan hoan 寬緩.
缓=hoan [huan3]\n\t1. Thong tha. Nhu hoan bo 緩步 buoc thong tha. \n\t2. Chanh tri khong nghiet goi la khoan hoan 寬緩.
緪=cang [geng1]\n\t1. Cai day lon. \n\t2. Voi, kip.
緬=mien, dien [mian3]\n\t1. Xa tit. \n\t2. Nghi trien mien. Nhu mien hoai 緬懷, mien tuong 緬想 deu la tuong nghi trien mien ca. \n\t3. Mien dien 緬甸 ten nuoc, con goi la Mien dien lien bang 緬甸聯邦 (Union of Myanmar). Ta quen goi la chu dien.
缅=mien, dien [mian3]\n\t1. Xa tit. \n\t2. Nghi trien mien. Nhu mien hoai 緬懷, mien tuong 緬想 deu la tuong nghi trien mien ca. \n\t3. Mien dien 緬甸 ten nuoc, con goi la Mien dien lien bang 緬甸聯邦 (Union of Myanmar). Ta quen goi la chu dien.
緯=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Soi ngang. Pham thuoc ve duong ngang deu goi la vi. Xem chu kinh 經. \n\t2. Ten sach, sau kinh deu co vi. Nhu dich vi 易緯, thi vi 詩緯, v.v. Tuong truyen la chi luu cua kinh, cung do tay duc Khong Tu 孔子 lam ca. Nguoi sau thay trong sach co nhieu cau noi ve am duong ngu hanh nen moi goi su chiem nghiem xau tot la do vi 圖緯 hay sam vi 讖緯.
纬=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Soi ngang. Pham thuoc ve duong ngang deu goi la vi. Xem chu kinh 經. \n\t2. Ten sach, sau kinh deu co vi. Nhu dich vi 易緯, thi vi 詩緯, v.v. Tuong truyen la chi luu cua kinh, cung do tay duc Khong Tu 孔子 lam ca. Nguoi sau thay trong sach co nhieu cau noi ve am duong ngu hanh nen moi goi su chiem nghiem xau tot la do vi 圖緯 hay sam vi 讖緯.
緲=mieu, dieu [miao3]\n\t1. Phieu mieu 飄緲 tham tham, xa tit mu. Ta quen doc la chu dieu.
缈=mieu, dieu [miao3]\n\t1. Phieu mieu 飄緲 tham tham, xa tit mu. Ta quen doc la chu dieu.
練=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Lua chuoi trang non. \n\t2. Duyet lich. Nhu lich luyen 歷練 luyen tap da nhieu, tung quen. \n\t3. Luyen tap. Nhu huan luyen 訓練 luyen tap. \n\t4. Luyen, hoc tap hay lam gi ma da tinh tuong lam deu goi la luyen. Nhu am luyen 諳練 da quen, da tinh lam. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. Te tieu tuong goi la luyen.
练=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Lua chuoi trang non. \n\t2. Duyet lich. Nhu lich luyen 歷練 luyen tap da nhieu, tung quen. \n\t3. Luyen tap. Nhu huan luyen 訓練 luyen tap. \n\t4. Luyen, hoc tap hay lam gi ma da tinh tuong lam deu goi la luyen. Nhu am luyen 諳練 da quen, da tinh lam. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. Te tieu tuong goi la luyen.
緶=bien [bian4|pian2]\n\t1. Danh day, ben. Nay goi cai that lung dui hep la bien tu 緶子.
缏=bien [bian4|pian2]\n\t1. Danh day, ben. Nay goi cai that lung dui hep la bien tu 緶子.
緹=de [ti2]\n\t1. Lua do, lua mui phon phot. Cac vo si ngay xua quang khan do nen goi la de ki 緹騎.
缇=de [ti2]\n\t1. Lua do, lua mui phon phot. Cac vo si ngay xua quang khan do nen goi la de ki 緹騎.
緻=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Ti mi, kin, ki. Nhu cong tri 工緻 kheo ma ki, tinh tri 精緻 tot ben, tri mat 緻密 dong dac, lien sit.
縈=oanh [ying2]\n\t1. Quay quanh, vong quanh. Nhu oanh hoi 縈回 vong quanh lai. Cung viet la 縈迴.
萦=oanh [ying2]\n\t1. Quay quanh, vong quanh. Nhu oanh hoi 縈回 vong quanh lai. Cung viet la 縈迴.
縉=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Lua dao. \n\t2. Tan than 縉紳 nguoi cam hot ma xoa tay ao do, quan vien hoac nguoi thuong luu. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Quang Dong huu tan than Pho thi, nien luc thap du 廣東有縉紳傅氏，年六十餘. O Quang Dong co Pho ong von dong the phiet, tuoi ngoai sau muoi. Tan than 縉紳 co khi viet la 搢紳.
缙=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Lua dao. \n\t2. Tan than 縉紳 nguoi cam hot ma xoa tay ao do, quan vien hoac nguoi thuong luu. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Quang Dong huu tan than Pho thi, nien luc thap du 廣東有縉紳傅氏，年六十餘. O Quang Dong co Pho ong von dong the phiet, tuoi ngoai sau muoi. Tan than 縉紳 co khi viet la 搢紳.

缢=ai [yi4]\n\t1. That co. Tu ai 自縊 tu that co chet.

缒=truy [zhui4]\n\t1. Lay day thong tu tren cao xuong (buong day).
縐=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Vai nho, cac hang det thu nao co van trun lai deu goi la truu. Nhu truu sa 縐紗 sa trun, truu bo 縐布 vai trun, v.v.
绉=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Vai nho, cac hang det thu nao co van trun lai deu goi la truu. Nhu truu sa 縐紗 sa trun, truu bo 縐布 vai trun, v.v.
縑=kiem [jian1]\n\t1. Lua nhun, ngay xua dung de viet nen goi sach vo la kiem tuong 縑緗 hay kiem to 縑素.
缣=kiem [jian1]\n\t1. Lua nhun, ngay xua dung de viet nen goi sach vo la kiem tuong 縑緗 hay kiem to 縑素.
縕=on, uan, uan [yun4]\n\t1. Sac do hoe, vua do vua vang. \n\t2. Mot am la uan. Nhan uan 絪縕 nguyen khi dam am day day. Phan uan 紛縕 day day, lan lon, roi beng. \n\t3. Lai mot am la uan. Gai, bong. Nhu y te uan bao 衣敝縕袍 (Luan ngu 論語) mac ao vai gai rach, mac ao bong rach.
縚=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thao 絛.
縛=phuoc, phoc [fu4]\n\t1. Troi buoc. Nhu tuu phuoc 就縛 bat troi, chiu troi. \n\t2. Bo buoc. Nhu tran phuoc 塵縛 bi su doi bo buoc, danh phuoc 名縛 bi cai danh bo buoc. Ta quen doc la chu phoc.
缚=phuoc, phoc [fu4]\n\t1. Troi buoc. Nhu tuu phuoc 就縛 bat troi, chiu troi. \n\t2. Bo buoc. Nhu tran phuoc 塵縛 bi su doi bo buoc, danh phuoc 名縛 bi cai danh bo buoc. Ta quen doc la chu phoc.
縝=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Kin dao, ben bi. Nhu chan mat 縝密 kin dao can than. \n\t2. Lua mong ma mau.
缜=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Kin dao, ben bi. Nhu chan mat 縝密 kin dao can than. \n\t2. Lua mong ma mau.
縞=cao [gao3]\n\t1. The moc mong, don so.
缟=cao [gao3]\n\t1. The moc mong, don so.
縟=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Do lua nhieu mui, sac so. Vi the nen le van chu mat, loi van chai chuot goi la phon nhuc 繁縟 hay cam nhuc 錦縟.
缛=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Do lua nhieu mui, sac so. Vi the nen le van chu mat, loi van chai chuot goi la phon nhuc 繁縟 hay cam nhuc 錦縟.
縠=hoc [hu2]\n\t1. Sa trun. Nghia nhu truu sa 縐紗.
縢=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Ghim lai, niem phong lai. Kim dang 金縢 mot thien trong Kinh Thu 書經, vua Vu Vuong 武王 om, ong Chu Cong 周公 viet cac loi vua Vu dan lai cho vao trong hom, lay vang gan lai, khong cho ai biet nen goi la kim dang. \n\t2. Bo buoc, quan xa cap.
縣=huyen, huyen [xian4]\n\t1. Treo, cung nghia voi chu huyen 懸. \n\t2. Mot am la huyen. Huyen. Tan Thuy Hoang 秦始皇 bo phep phong kien ma chia nuoc ra tung quan tung huyen, vi the nen doi sau cung theo do ma chia moi tinh ra may huyen.
县=huyen, huyen [xian4]\n\t1. Treo, cung nghia voi chu huyen 懸. \n\t2. Mot am la huyen. Huyen. Tan Thuy Hoang 秦始皇 bo phep phong kien ma chia nuoc ra tung quan tung huyen, vi the nen doi sau cung theo do ma chia moi tinh ra may huyen.
縦=si [-]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu si 纚.
縩=sai [cai4]\n\t1. Tuy sai 綷縩 xoan xoat, tieng ao dong nhau.
縫=phung, phung [feng2|feng4]\n\t1. May ao. \n\t2. Chap va. \n\t3. Mot am la phung. Duong khau. Manh Giao 孟郊. Tu mau thu trung tuyen, Du tu than thuong y. Lam hanh mat mat phung, Y khung tri tri quy. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, Bao dac tam xuan huy ? 慈母手中線，遊子身上衣，臨行密密縫，意恐遲遲歸，誰言寸草心，報得三春輝 (Du tu ngam 遊子吟) Soi chi trong long ban tay nguoi me hien gio day o tren ao nguoi con di choi xa. Do la soi day tinh mat thiet rang buoc buoc chan nguoi du tu, khien du di xa muon dam, cung khong quen lang gia dinh. Luc nguoi con len duong, ba me khau soi chi ay ky cang len tren vat ao, y e ngai rang con vi vui thu noi xa ma tre duong ve. Long me hien thuong men con moi rong lam rai lam sao ! Ai dam noi rang long con nho hep lai co the bao den duoc tam long bat ngat kia ! Cung nhu ai noi rang long cua mot tac co ngan ngui, hep hoi lai co the bao dap duoc anh nang ba mua xuan chan hoa dam am. Cau Lieu dem tac co quyet den ba xuan cua Nguyen Du 阮攸 muon y hai cau cuoi cung trong bai tho nay.
缝=phung, phung [feng2|feng4]\n\t1. May ao. \n\t2. Chap va. \n\t3. Mot am la phung. Duong khau. Manh Giao 孟郊. Tu mau thu trung tuyen, Du tu than thuong y. Lam hanh mat mat phung, Y khung tri tri quy. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, Bao dac tam xuan huy ? 慈母手中線，遊子身上衣，臨行密密縫，意恐遲遲歸，誰言寸草心，報得三春輝 (Du tu ngam 遊子吟) Soi chi trong long ban tay nguoi me hien gio day o tren ao nguoi con di choi xa. Do la soi day tinh mat thiet rang buoc buoc chan nguoi du tu, khien du di xa muon dam, cung khong quen lang gia dinh. Luc nguoi con len duong, ba me khau soi chi ay ky cang len tren vat ao, y e ngai rang con vi vui thu noi xa ma tre duong ve. Long me hien thuong men con moi rong lam rai lam sao ! Ai dam noi rang long con nho hep lai co the bao den duoc tam long bat ngat kia ! Cung nhu ai noi rang long cua mot tac co ngan ngui, hep hoi lai co the bao dap duoc anh nang ba mua xuan chan hoa dam am. Cau Lieu dem tac co quyet den ba xuan cua Nguyen Du 阮攸 muon y hai cau cuoi cung trong bai tho nay.
縭=li [li2]\n\t1. Day lung, khan giat. \n\t2. Cai khan tan nhan. Luc con gai ve nha chong dung cai khan do phu kin mat goi la ket li 結縭. \n\t3. Buoc. \n\t4. Ke.
缡=li [li2]\n\t1. Day lung, khan giat. \n\t2. Cai khan tan nhan. Luc con gai ve nha chong dung cai khan do phu kin mat goi la ket li 結縭. \n\t3. Buoc. \n\t4. Ke.
縮=suc [su4|suo1]\n\t1. Thang. Nhu tu phan nhi suc 自反而縮 tu xet lai minh ma thang. \n\t2. Ruou loc. \n\t3. Thieu. Nhu doanh suc 贏縮 thua thieu. \n\t4. Lui lai. Nhu thoai suc 退縮 sut sui. \n\t5. Rut. Nhu suc tieu 縮小 rut nho lai, co lai.
缩=suc [su4|suo1]\n\t1. Thang. Nhu tu phan nhi suc 自反而縮 tu xet lai minh ma thang. \n\t2. Ruou loc. \n\t3. Thieu. Nhu doanh suc 贏縮 thua thieu. \n\t4. Lui lai. Nhu thoai suc 退縮 sut sui. \n\t5. Rut. Nhu suc tieu 縮小 rut nho lai, co lai.
縱=tung, tong, tung [zong4]\n\t1. Buong tha, tha ra. Nhu tung tu 縱囚 tha tu ra, thao tung 操縱 buong tha. \n\t2. Tung tu. \n\t3. Phiem. Nhu tung dam 縱談 ban phiem. \n\t4. Tung su, dung lam tieng tro ngu. \n\t5. Ten ban ra. \n\t6. Mot am la tong. Voi va, hap tap. \n\t7. Lai mot am la tung. Duong doc, be doc tu nam den bac. \n\t8. Doi Chien quoc 戰國 (403-221 truoc T.L.) co mot phai hoc ve loi tung hoanh. Hop cac nuoc o phia nam phia bac lai goi la tung 縱, ket lien cac nuoc dong tay lai goi la hoanh 橫. Tung hoanh co khi viet la 從衡.
纵=tung, tong, tung [zong4]\n\t1. Buong tha, tha ra. Nhu tung tu 縱囚 tha tu ra, thao tung 操縱 buong tha. \n\t2. Tung tu. \n\t3. Phiem. Nhu tung dam 縱談 ban phiem. \n\t4. Tung su, dung lam tieng tro ngu. \n\t5. Ten ban ra. \n\t6. Mot am la tong. Voi va, hap tap. \n\t7. Lai mot am la tung. Duong doc, be doc tu nam den bac. \n\t8.
