Doi Chien quoc 戰國 (403-221 truoc T.L.) co mot phai hoc ve loi tung hoanh. Hop cac nuoc o phia nam phia bac lai goi la tung 縱, ket lien cac nuoc dong tay lai goi la hoanh 橫. Tung hoanh co khi viet la 從衡.
縲=luy [lei2]\n\t1. Cai day den, de troi nhung ke co toi. Vi the goi ke dang bi tu la tai luy tiet chi trung 在縲絏之中 (Luan ngu 論語).
缧=luy [lei2]\n\t1. Cai day den, de troi nhung ke co toi. Vi the goi ke dang bi tu la tai luy tiet chi trung 在縲絏之中 (Luan ngu 論語).
縴=khien [qian4]\n\t1. Cai day keo thuyen.
縵=man, man [man4]\n\t1. Cac do to lua khong co van bong (hoa va n 花紋) deu goi la man. Cai gi khong co van suc cung goi la man ca. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Tram giai, lan rong.
缦=man, man [man4]\n\t1. Cac do to lua khong co van bong (hoa va n 花紋) deu goi la man. Cai gi khong co van suc cung goi la man ca. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Tram giai, lan rong.
縶=trap [zhi2]\n\t1. Buoc, troi. \n\t2. Cum, bat giam lai goi la bi trap 被縶.
絷=trap [zhi2]\n\t1. Buoc, troi. \n\t2. Cum, bat giam lai goi la bi trap 被縶.
縷=lu, lau [lu:3]\n\t1. Soi to, soi gai. \n\t2. Mot am lau. Lam lau 藍縷 rach ruoi ban thiu. Ta quen doc la chu lu ca.
缕=lu, lau [lu:3]\n\t1. Soi to, soi gai. \n\t2. Mot am lau. Lam lau 藍縷 rach ruoi ban thiu. Ta quen doc la chu lu ca.
縹=phieu, phieu [piao1|piao3]\n\t1. Lua mui ho thuy, mui vua xanh vua trang. Ngay xua dung may tui de dung sach vo, nen goi sach vo la tuong phieu 緗縹. \n\t2. Mot am la phieu. Phieu mieu 縹緲 xa tit tham tham. Cung viet la 縹渺.
缥=phieu, phieu [piao1|piao3]\n\t1. Lua mui ho thuy, mui vua xanh vua trang. Ngay xua dung may tui de dung sach vo, nen goi sach vo la tuong phieu 緗縹. \n\t2. Mot am la phieu. Phieu mieu 縹緲 xa tit tham tham. Cung viet la 縹渺.
縻=mi [mi2]\n\t1. Rang buoc. Nhu co mi 羈縻 lay an y ma rang buoc long nguoi. \n\t2. Vong co, cai vong co chan.
總=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Gop, hop, tom. Nhu tong luan 總論 ban tom lai. \n\t2. Tet. Nhu tong giac 總角 tet trai dao, luc con be ket toc lam trai dao, nen luc be goi la tong giac. \n\t3. Dung dau, cam dau. Nhu tong thong 總統 chuc tong thong cam dau ca viec nuoc. \n\t4. Tong, hop may lang lai lam mot tong. \n\t5. Bo da. \n\t6. Het deu. \n\t7. Cai trang suc xe, ngua.
总=tong [zong3]\n\t1. Gop, hop, tom. Nhu tong luan 總論 ban tom lai. \n\t2. Tet. Nhu tong giac 總角 tet trai dao, luc con be ket toc lam trai dao, nen luc be goi la tong giac. \n\t3. Dung dau, cam dau. Nhu tong thong 總統 chuc tong thong cam dau ca viec nuoc. \n\t4. Tong, hop may lang lai lam mot tong. \n\t5. Bo da. \n\t6. Het deu. \n\t7. Cai trang suc xe, ngua.
績=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Danh soi, xe soi. \n\t2. Cong nghiep, su gi tich luy mai den thanh hieu cung goi la tich. Nhu cong tich 功績 cong can, lao tich 勞績 cong lao. Xet cong cac quan lai de thang thuong goi la khao tich 考績.
绩=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Danh soi, xe soi. \n\t2. Cong nghiep, su gi tich luy mai den thanh hieu cung goi la tich. Nhu cong tich 功績 cong can, lao tich 勞績 cong lao. Xet cong cac quan lai de thang thuong goi la khao tich 考績.
縿=sam [shan1]\n\t1. Truc co, kho vai thang o tren co de dinh leo vao goi la sam.
繁=phon, ban [fan2|po2]\n\t1. Nhieu. Nhu phon thinh 繁盛 nhieu nhoi dong duc, phon dien 繁衍 nhung nhuc, day dan, day lu. \n\t2. Mot am la ban. cai day thang dai ngua.
繃=banh, bang [beng1|beng3]\n\t1. Buoc, thay thuoc dung vai mem buoc cac vet thuong goi la banh. Ta quen doc la chu bang.
绷=banh, bang [beng1|beng3]\n\t1. Buoc, thay thuoc dung vai mem buoc cac vet thuong goi la banh. Ta quen doc la chu bang.
繄=e [yi1]\n\t1. Ay, dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu nhi huu mau di, e nga doc vo 爾有母遺，繄我獨無 (Ta truyen 左傳) nguoi co me con, ay ta mot khong. \n\t2. Mot am la e. Tieng than tho.
繅=sao, tao [sao1]\n\t1. Uom to. Keo to o cai ken ra goi la sao. \n\t2. Mot am la tao. Mui sac so lang lo, cung nghia voi chu tao 藻 chi ngu sac.
缫=sao, tao [sao1]\n\t1. Uom to. Keo to o cai ken ra goi la sao. \n\t2. Mot am la tao. Mui sac so lang lo, cung nghia voi chu tao 藻 chi ngu sac.
繆=mau, cu, mau, muc [miao4|miu4|mou2]\n\t1. Tru mau 綢繆 rang buoc. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. Van. \n\t3. Lai mot am la mau. Lam loi. \n\t4. Gia doi. \n\t5. Mot am nua la muc. Cung nghia voi chu muc 穆. Cung cung am nghia nhu chu 繚.
缪=mau, cu, mau, muc [miao4|miu4|mou2]\n\t1. Tru mau 綢繆 rang buoc. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. Van. \n\t3. Lai mot am la mau. Lam loi. \n\t4. Gia doi. \n\t5. Mot am nua la muc. Cung nghia voi chu muc 穆. Cung cung am nghia nhu chu 繚.
繇=dieu, do, chuu, luu [yao2|you2]\n\t1. Tot tuoi. \n\t2. Ngay xua dung nhu chu 謠 hay chu 徭. \n\t3. Mot am la do. Cung nghia voi chu do 由. \n\t4. Lai mot am la chuu. Loi xem trong que boi. Ta quen doc la chu luu.
繈=cuong [qiang3]\n\t1. Quan tien. \n\t2. Cai diu, buoc o sau lung de deo tre con.
繒=tang [zeng1|zeng4]\n\t1. Lua day.
缯=tang [zeng1|zeng4]\n\t1. Lua day.
繐=hue [sui4]\n\t1. Vai thua.
織=chuc, chi, xi [zhi1]\n\t1. Det, det to det vai deu goi la chuc. \n\t2. Pham su gi dung tai suc ket hop lai ma gay nen deu goi la chuc. Nhu to chuc 組織, la chuc 羅織, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la chi. Lua det bang to mui. \n\t4. Lai mot am la xi. Cung nghia voi chu xi 幟.
织=chuc, chi, xi [zhi1]\n\t1. Det, det to det vai deu goi la chuc. \n\t2. Pham su gi dung tai suc ket hop lai ma gay nen deu goi la chuc. Nhu to chuc 組織, la chuc 羅織, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la chi. Lua det bang to mui. \n\t4. Lai mot am la xi. Cung nghia voi chu xi 幟.
繕=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Sua, chua. Nhu tu thien 修繕 sua sang. Sua sang do binh goi la chinh thien 征繕 hay chinh thien 整繕. \n\t2. Thien ta 繕寫 viet ro rang, tinh ta.
缮=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Sua, chua. Nhu tu thien 修繕 sua sang. Sua sang do binh goi la chinh thien 征繕 hay chinh thien 整繕. \n\t2. Thien ta 繕寫 viet ro rang, tinh ta.
繖=tan [san3]\n\t1. Cang vai lam du che, cai du.
繙=phien [fan1]\n\t1. Phap phoi. \n\t2. Phien dich, dich chu nuoc nay ra chu nuoc kia goi la phien.
繚=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Quan, vong.
缭=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Quan, vong.
繞=nhieu [rao5]\n\t1. Vong quanh, quan.
绕=nhieu [rao5]\n\t1. Vong quanh, quan.
繡=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Du ca nam mui. \n\t2. Lay to theu thanh nam mui.
绣=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Du ca nam mui. \n\t2. Lay to theu thanh nam mui.
繢=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Ve thuoc, ve mui. Cung nghia voi chu hoi 繪. \n\t2. Lua theu, tua lua.
缋=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Ve thuoc, ve mui. Cung nghia voi chu hoi 繪. \n\t2. Lua theu, tua lua.
繩=thang [sheng2]\n\t1. Day, dung gai hay to danh thanh day goi la thang. \n\t2. Thang, tho moc dung day de lay muc thang. Nhu thang mac 繩墨 muc thuoc. \n\t3. Sua lai, sua chua lai dieu loi cho nguoi cung goi la thang. Nhu thang khien cu mau 繩愆糾謬 chua dieu loi lam lai. \n\t4. Noi.
绳=thang [sheng2]\n\t1. Day, dung gai hay to danh thanh day goi la thang. \n\t2. Thang, tho moc dung day de lay muc thang. Nhu thang mac 繩墨 muc thuoc. \n\t3. Sua lai, sua chua lai dieu loi cho nguoi cung goi la thang. Nhu thang khien cu mau 繩愆糾謬 chua dieu loi lam lai. \n\t4. Noi.
繪=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Theu nam mui. \n\t2. Ve thuoc. \n\t3. Ve. Nhu hoi do 繪圖 ve tranh.
绘=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Theu nam mui. \n\t2. Ve thuoc. \n\t3. Ve. Nhu hoi do 繪圖 ve tranh.
繫=he [xi4]\n\t1. Troi buoc. Nhu bi he 被繫 bi bat giam. \n\t2. He niem 繫念 nho nghi luon. \n\t3. Lien lac, su gi co can thiep ca hai ben goi la quan he 關繫, de cho vat nay thuoc voi vat kia cung goi la he. Nhu Kinh Dich co he tu 繫詞 nghia la nhung loi giai o duoi cac que trong kinh vay. \n\t4. Treo. Luan ngu 論語. Ngo khoi bao qua da tai, yen nang he nhi bat thuc ? 吾豈匏瓜也哉？焉能繫而不食 ta dau phai la trai bau kho nguoi ta treo ma khong an duoc u ? (y noi co tai ma khong duoc dung).
繭=kien [jian3]\n\t1. Cai ken tam, tuc la cai to cua con tam no tu nha to ra de che minh no. \n\t2. Nhung mang cua cac loai sau bo de bao ho minh no cung goi la kien. \n\t3. Phong da chan. Nhu trung kien 重繭 phong mong len.
茧=kien [jian3]\n\t1. Cai ken tam, tuc la cai to cua con tam no tu nha to ra de che minh no. \n\t2. Nhung mang cua cac loai sau bo de bao ho minh no cung goi la kien. \n\t3. Phong da chan. Nhu trung kien 重繭 phong mong len.
繮=cuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Cuong ngua. \n\t2. Bo buoc. Nhu danh cuong loi toa 名繵利鎖 loi danh rang buoc. Tuc viet la 韁.
繯=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Buoc thong long, that co chet goi la hoan thu 繯首.
缳=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Buoc thong long, that co chet goi la hoan thu 繯首.
繰=sao [qiao1|sao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu sao 繅.
缲=sao [qiao1|sao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu sao 繅.
繳=chuoc, kieu [jiao3|zhuo2]\n\t1. Ten buoc soi, buoc ten vao day keo ra ma ban goi la chuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu. Nop. Nhu kieu thue 繳稅 nop thue. \n\t2. Mang tra. Dem do tra lai chu cu goi la kieu.
缴=chuoc, kieu [jiao3|zhuo2]\n\t1. Ten buoc soi, buoc ten vao day keo ra ma ban goi la chuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la kieu. Nop. Nhu kieu thue 繳稅 nop thue. \n\t2. Mang tra. Dem do tra lai chu cu goi la kieu.
繹=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Go moi to, tim cho het manh moi cung goi la dich. Nhu dien dich 演繹 suy dien su ly cho cung le. \n\t2. Lien. Nhu lac dich bat tuyet 絡繹不絕 lien noi khong dut. \n\t3. Bay dai. \n\t4. Te dich. 
绎=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Go moi to, tim cho het manh moi cung goi la dich. Nhu dien dich 演繹 suy dien su ly cho cung le. \n\t2. Lien. Nhu lac dich bat tuyet 絡繹不絕 lien noi khong dut. \n\t3. Bay dai. \n\t4. Te dich. 
繻=nhu [xu1]\n\t1. Lua mau. \n\t2. Dau hieu, phep nha binh doi xua lay lua viet dau hieu rieng roi xe lam hai manh, sai ai di dau thi giao cho mot nua de lam tin goi la quan nhu 軍繻. 
繼=ke [ji4]\n\t1. Noi theo, noi doi. Nhu ke vi 繼位, ke thua 繼承. \n\t2. Tiep sau, tiep theo. Nhu ke nhi huu su menh 繼而有師命 (Manh Tu 孟子) tiep sau ben co viec quan.
继=ke [ji4]\n\t1. Noi theo, noi doi. Nhu ke vi 繼位, ke thua 繼承. \n\t2. Tiep sau, tiep theo. Nhu ke nhi huu su menh 繼而有師命 (Manh Tu 孟子) tiep sau ben co viec quan.
繽=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Tan phan 繽紛 ruc ro, roi loan. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Phuong thao tien my, lac anh tan phan 芳草鮮美，落英繽紛 co thom tuoi dep, hoa rung ruc ro.
缤=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Tan phan 繽紛 ruc ro, roi loan. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Phuong thao tien my, lac anh tan phan 芳草鮮美，落英繽紛 co thom tuoi dep, hoa rung ruc ro.
繾=khien [qian3]\n\t1. Khien quyen 繾綣 quyen luyen khong roi nhau. Nguyen Chan 元稹. Luu lien thoi huu han, khien quyen y nan chung 留連時有限，繾綣意難終 ben nhau thoi ngan ngui, quyen luyen y khon cung.
缱=khien [qian3]\n\t1. Khien quyen 繾綣 quyen luyen khong roi nhau. Nguyen Chan 元稹. Luu lien thoi huu han, khien quyen y nan chung 留連時有限，繾綣意難終 ben nhau thoi ngan ngui, quyen luyen y khon cung.
纁=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Sac hoe hoe do. \n\t2. Thu lua do phon phot cung goi la huan.
纂=toan [zuan3]\n\t1. Day lua do, mot thu hang det nhu day thao ma do. \n\t2. Bien tap sach vo.
纆=mac [mo4]\n\t1. Thu day chap ba lan.
纇=loi [lei4]\n\t1. Mau to. Vat gi co vet cung goi la ty loi 疵纇.
纊=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Bong to.
纩=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Bong to.
續=tuc [xu4]\n\t1. Lien noi, dut roi lai noi lien goi la tuc. Nhu lien tuc 連續, tiep tuc 接續. Nay goi lay vo ke la giao tuc 膠續 hay tuc huyen 續絃, noi y nhu dan dut lai cang day khac vay. \n\t2. Noi doi. Nhu tu tuc 似續 con chau. \n\t3. Nguoi noi len sau goi la tuc.
续=tuc [xu4]\n\t1. Lien noi, dut roi lai noi lien goi la tuc. Nhu lien tuc 連續, tiep tuc 接續. Nay goi lay vo ke la giao tuc 膠續 hay tuc huyen 續絃, noi y nhu dan dut lai cang day khac vay. \n\t2. Noi doi. Nhu tu tuc 似續 con chau. \n\t3. Nguoi noi len sau goi la tuc.
纍=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Xau lien, lay day xau tung cai lai hay xep cho lien noi nhau goi la luy. Nhu luy noan 纍卵 xep trung chong len. \n\t2. Day to. \n\t3. Bat giam. \n\t4. Cai do dung ao day. \n\t5. Khong den noi vi toi ma chet. \n\t6. Quan quanh. Nhu cat luy luy chi 葛藟纍之 day san quan vao. \n\t7. Mot am la luy. Luy den.
纏=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Rang rit, quan quanh, vay boc. Nhu trien nhieu 纏繞 chen chan. \n\t2. Nguoi theo dao Hoi lay vai chang chit vao dau goi la trien hoi 纏回.
缠=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Rang rit, quan quanh, vay boc. Nhu trien nhieu 纏繞 chen chan. \n\t2. Nguoi theo dao Hoi lay vai chang chit vao dau goi la trien hoi 纏回.
繿=lam [-]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lam 纜.
纎=tiem [xian1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tiem 纖.
纑=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Soi vai. \n\t2. Gai gia roi.
纒=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trien 纏.
纓=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Leo mu, giai mu. Nha nao noi doi duoc chiu chuc tuoc goi la tram anh 簪纓. \n\t2. Ngay xua con gai muoi lam tuoi thi ga chong, duoc that day lung bang to mui goi la huong anh 香纓. \n\t3. Han Chung Quan 漢終軍 tau xin vua Han mang day to dai sang troi vua Nam Viet dem ve tri toi, vi the sau nay goi su di tong quan la thinh anh 請纓. \n\t4. Cai dam o co ngua.
缨=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Leo mu, giai mu. Nha nao noi doi duoc chiu chuc tuoc goi la tram anh 簪纓. \n\t2. Ngay xua con gai muoi lam tuoi thi ga chong, duoc that day lung bang to mui goi la huong anh 香纓. \n\t3. Han Chung Quan 漢終軍 tau xin vua Han mang day to dai sang troi vua Nam Viet dem ve tri toi, vi the sau nay goi su di tong quan la thinh anh 請纓. \n\t4. Cai dam o co ngua.
纔=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Vua, chi. Nhu phuong tai 方纔 vua roi. Tai kien benh tien thi duoc 纔見病便是葯 vua thay benh la biet cach chua ngay.
纖=tiem [qian4|xian1]\n\t1. Nho, thu lua nho mat goi la tiem, vi the nen vat gi nho mon deu goi la tiem. Vuong Bot 王勃. Sang lai phat nhi thanh phong sinh, tiem ca ngung nhi bach van at 爽籟發而清風生，纖歌凝而白雲遏 tieng vui phat sinh, gio mat noi day, ca nhe lang chim, may trang luu lai. \n\t2. Hang det duong doc den duong ngang trang goi la tiem. \n\t3. Ha tien, sen. \n\t4. Dam, xien.
纤=tiem [qian4|xian1]\n\t1. Nho, thu lua nho mat goi la tiem, vi the nen vat gi nho mon deu goi la tiem. Vuong Bot 王勃. Sang lai phat nhi thanh phong sinh, tiem ca ngung nhi bach van at 爽籟發而清風生，纖歌凝而白雲遏 tieng vui phat sinh, gio mat noi day, ca nhe lang chim, may trang luu lai. \n\t2. Hang det duong doc den duong ngang trang goi la tiem. \n\t3. Ha tien, sen. \n\t4. Dam, xien.
纛=dao [dao4]\n\t1. Co tiet mao. Vua di cam mot cai co o ben ta xe goi la ta dao 左纛. \n\t2. Cai co cai, keo o trung quan cung goi la dao. Cung doc la doc.
纘=toan [zuan3]\n\t1. Noi, noi theo theo lam cac viec nguoi truoc chua lam xong goi la toan. Nghia nhu ke thua 繼承.
缵=toan [zuan3]\n\t1. Noi, noi theo theo lam cac viec nguoi truoc chua lam xong goi la toan. Nghia nhu ke thua 繼承.
纚=si, suy, ly [li2]\n\t1. Cai luoi bit toc. \n\t2. Thu sa mat vuong. \n\t3. Mot am la suy. Tap suy 颯纚 dai thuon thuot, long thong. \n\t4. Lai mot am la ly. Keo nhang mai ra, quan quit lien noi nhau.
纜=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Day neo thuyen.
缆=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Day neo thuyen.
缶=phuu, phau, phu [fou3]\n\t1. Do sanh. Nhu cai vo cai chum, v.v. \n\t2. Tuc nuoc Tau ngay xua dung lam mot thu am nha de lam nhip hat, goi la kich phuu . \n\t3. Mot thu de dong luong ngay xua, bang bon hoc gio. Con doc la phu. Ta quen doc la chu phau.
缸=hang, cang [gang1]\n\t1. Cai ang, cai chum to. Cung doc la chu cang.
缺=khuyet [que1]\n\t1. Do sut me, pham cai gi khong duoc toan ven deu goi la khuyet. Nhu nguyet huu vien khuyet 月有圓缺 trang co tron co khuyet. Nha nuoc toan thinh goi la kim au vo khuyet 金甌無缺. \n\t2. Su vat gi khong duoc tot dep hoan toan goi la khuyet diem 缺點. \n\t3. Chuc quan con bo khong. Nhu bo khuyet 補缺 chuc se bo vao chan nao khuyet.
缽=bat [bo1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bat 鉢.
钵=bat [bo1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bat 鉢.
缾=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cai binh muc nuoc.
罃=oanh [ying1]\n\t1. Cai lo dai co.
罄=khanh [qing4]\n\t1. Cai do trong rong. \n\t2. Het nhan. Nhu ta noi khanh tan 罄盡. Het cua goi la cao khanh 告罄.
罅=ha [xia4]\n\t1. Cho nut, do sanh co cho nut ne goi la ha. \n\t2. Su gi co cho ho de xen vao duoc cung goi la ha.
罇=ton [zun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ton 樽 nghia la cai chen.
罋=ung [weng4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu ung 甕 nghia la cai vo, cai hu.
罌=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Cai binh phinh giua, mieng nho bung to.
罂=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Cai binh phinh giua, mieng nho bung to.
罍=loi [lei2]\n\t1. Cai chen uong ruou. Chen ngoai co ve hinh may sam (van loi 雲雷) nen goi la loi 罍.
罎=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dam 壜 nghia la cai vo ruou.
罐=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Cai lo nho. Nhu tra anh 茶罐 lo dung che (tra).
网=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Ngay xua dung nhu chu vong 網.
罔=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh chim danh ca. Ngay xua viet la 网, bay gio hay viet la 網. \n\t2. Giang vong 降罔 giang toi, mac vao luoi toi. \n\t3. Vu khong, lua. \n\t4. Khong, dung lam tro tu. Nhu vong hoang vu du 罔荒于遊 cho co choi boi hoang dang. \n\t5. Khong thang.
罕=han [han3]\n\t1. It. Nhu han huu 罕有 it co. Vat gi hiem co goi la tran han 珍罕 hay han di 罕異. \n\t2. Luoi danh chim. \n\t3. Co Han.
罘=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Cai luoi san tho. \n\t2. Phu ty 罘罳 cai chan song, cai binh phong, nay thuong viet la 浮思. Cung viet la 罦罳.
罝=ta [ju1]\n\t1. Cai luoi san tho.
罟=co [gu3]\n\t1. Cai luoi. \n\t2. Hinh phep. Nhu uy thu toi co 畏此罪罟 so cai luoi toi ay. Y noi hinh phep nghiet nga, theu det toi nguoi nhu vay luoi lai vay.
罛=co [gu1]\n\t1. Cai luoi to.
罡=cuong, cang [gang1]\n\t1. Thien cuong 天罡 sao Thien Cuong. Nha dao si goi sao bac dau 北斗 la sao Thien Cuong. Chinh am la cang.
罣=quai, khue [gua4]\n\t1. Ngai, lam tro ngai. Nay goi cac quan dang tai chuc bi trach phat la quai ngo 罣誤. Co khi doc la chu khue. Tam vo quai ngai 心無罣礙 tam khong vuong ngai (Bat nha ba la mat da tam kinh 般若波羅密多心經).
罥=quyen [juan4]\n\t1. Ngan tro, gang quai. Tuc goi cac loai sau bo no giang luoi de bat sau khac la quyen (nhu mang nhen).
罨=yem, ap [yan3]\n\t1. Quang luoi danh ca. \n\t2. Rit, thay thuoc chua benh lay nuoc da hay nuoc soi tam vao mieng bong hay mieng gie dap vao cho dau goi la yem. Co khi doc la chu ap.
罩=trao [zhao4]\n\t1. Cai lo bat ca. \n\t2. Day, lay cai long ban hay cai gi dday do cho kin goi la trao. Ao co lan boc ngoai goi la trao bao 罩袍.
罪=toi [zui4]\n\t1. Toi loi. Lam pham phep luat phai phat goi la toi. \n\t2. Lam quan tu noi nhun minh la dai toi 待罪, nghia la tu noi nhun minh la tai khong xung ngoi vay. \n\t3. Loi lam. \n\t4. Lam lam, lam bay khien cho nguoi ta gian goi la dac toi 得罪, tu nhan loi minh goi la ta toi 謝罪. \n\t4. Nguoi ta lam loi minh tu cho la vi minh khong biet ran bao cung goi la toi. Cac vua ngay xua ban chieu tu nhan la co loi voi dan goi la toi ky chieu 罪己詔.
罫=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Tro ngai. \n\t2. Trong ban co bac ke tung o vuong goi la phuong quai 方罫. Pham cai gi vach tung o vuong deu goi la phuong quai ca.
罭=vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh ca.
置=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. De, cam do gi de yen vao dau deu goi la tri. \n\t2. Vut bo. Nhu phe tri 廢置 bo di, cac tri 擱置 gac bo. \n\t3. Yen de. Nhu tho tri 措置 dat de, vi tri 位置 ngoi o, nghia la dat de ngoi nao vao cho ay. \n\t4. Dat dung. Nhu tri huyen 置縣 dat ra tung huyen, tri quan 置官 dat quan, v.v. \n\t5. Nha tram. Nhu Duc chi luu hanh, toc u tri buu nhi truyen menh 德之流行，速於置郵而傳命 (Manh Tu 孟子) su luu hanh cua duc, con chong hon dat tram ma truyen tin tuc.
署=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Dat. Nhu bo thu 部署 dat ra tung bo. \n\t2. Neu to ra, de mot vat gi lam dau hieu goi la thu, vi the nen goi cac so quan la thu, nghia la neu ro cai noi lam viec. Nhu quan thu 官署, cong thu 公署. \n\t3. Ghi chu. Nhu thu danh 署名 ky ten. \n\t4. Tam nhan chuc viec. Nhu thu ly 署理 tam tri, tam coi soc cong viec, v.v. Cung nhu thu su 署事, thu nham 署任.
罰=phat [fa2]\n\t1. Hinh phat, pham vao phep luat goi la toi. Phep de tri toi goi la hinh 刑, co toi lay hinh phap ma tri goi la phat 罰. \n\t2. Bo tien ra chuoc toi goi la phat. Nhu phat khoan 罰欵 khoan tien phat. \n\t3. Danh dap.
罚=phat [fa2]\n\t1. Hinh phat, pham vao phep luat goi la toi. Phep de tri toi goi la hinh 刑, co toi lay hinh phap ma tri goi la phat 罰. \n\t2. Bo tien ra chuoc toi goi la phat. Nhu phat khoan 罰欵 khoan tien phat. \n\t3. Danh dap.
罱=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Cai dang bat ca. \n\t2. Lay nuoc co bon ruong goi la lam ha ne 罱河泥.
罳=ty [si1]\n\t1. Phu ty 罘罳 cai chan song, cai binh phong, nay thuong viet la 浮思. Cung viet la 罦罳.
罵=ma [ma4]\n\t1. Mang chui. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tac cot thien nien ma bat tri 賊骨天年罵不知 nam xuong giac (chi Tao Thao) nghin nam bi chui rua ma khong biet.
骂=ma [ma4]\n\t1. Mang chui. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tac cot thien nien ma bat tri 賊骨天年罵不知 nam xuong giac (chi Tao Thao) nghin nam bi chui rua ma khong biet.
罷=bai, bi [ba4|ba5]\n\t1. Nghi, thoi. Nhu bai cong 罷工 thoi khong lam viec nua, bai thi 罷市 bo khong hop cho nua. \n\t2. Xong roi. Nhu chien bai 戰罷 danh xong, trang bai 粧罷 trang suc xong, bai quan 罷官 bi thai ve khong cho lam quan nua. \n\t3. Thoi ! dung lam tieng cuoi cau. \n\t4. Mot am la bi. Moi met. Cung nghia voi chu bi 疲.
罢=bai, bi [ba4|ba5]\n\t1. Nghi, thoi. Nhu bai cong 罷工 thoi khong lam viec nua, bai thi 罷市 bo khong hop cho nua. \n\t2. Xong roi. Nhu chien bai 戰罷 danh xong, trang bai 粧罷 trang suc xong, bai quan 罷官 bi thai ve khong cho lam quan nua. \n\t3. Thoi ! dung lam tieng cuoi cau. \n\t4. Mot am la bi. Moi met. Cung nghia voi chu bi 疲.
罹=li [li2]\n\t1. Lo. \n\t2. Gap, mac, nguoi bi mac hoan nan goi la li. Ta quen doc la chu duy.
罽=ke [ji4]\n\t1. Len, da, hang det bong.
罾=tang [zeng1]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh ca.
罿=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh chim.
羀=luu [liu3]\n\t1. Cai dang, cai xam, ngoai dan bang tre dich ken bang to de cho ca tom vao khong ra duoc nua.
羃=mac [mi4]\n\t1. Cai man cang o tren, cai bat.
羅=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh chim. \n\t2. La, mot thu set bang to mong de mac mat. \n\t3. Bay vung. Nhu la liet 羅列 bay vong quanh day ca. La bai 羅拜 xum lai ma lay. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Binh sinh than huu, la bai cuu tien 平生親友，羅拜柩前 ban be luc con song, xum lay truoc linh cuu. \n\t4. Quay luoi de bat chim. Vi the nen chieu tap duoc nhieu nguoi tai den voi minh goi la la tri 羅致. \n\t5. La la 羅羅 thoang, khong dac rit goi la la la.
罗=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai luoi danh chim. \n\t2. La, mot thu set bang to mong de mac mat. \n\t3. Bay vung. Nhu la liet 羅列 bay vong quanh day ca. La bai 羅拜 xum lai ma lay. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Binh sinh than huu, la bai cuu tien 平生親友，羅拜柩前 ban be luc con song, xum lay truoc linh cuu. \n\t4. Quay luoi de bat chim. Vi the nen chieu tap duoc nhieu nguoi tai den voi minh goi la la tri 羅致. \n\t5. La la 羅羅 thoang, khong dac rit goi la la la.
羆=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Con bi, to hon con gau, long vang phot, co dai, chan cao, dung thang duoc nhu nguoi.
罴=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Con bi, to hon con gau, long vang phot, co dai, chan cao, dung thang duoc nhu nguoi.
羇=ki [ji1]\n\t1. O nho, gui, nguoi di duong ngu nho ngu tro goi la ki lu 羇旅.
羈=ky [ji1]\n\t1. Rang giu, buong tha. Duy tri de cho khong den noi tuyet han goi la ky mi 羈縻. \n\t2. Kiem che. Nhu bat ky 不羈 khong kiem che duoc. \n\t3. Cai dam dau ngua. \n\t4. Bui toc. \n\t5. Giat.
羁=ky [ji1]\n\t1. Rang giu, buong tha. Duy tri de cho khong den noi tuyet han goi la ky mi 羈縻. \n\t2. Kiem che. Nhu bat ky 不羈 khong kiem che duoc. \n\t3. Cai dam dau ngua. \n\t4. Bui toc. \n\t5. Giat.
羊=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Con de. \n\t2. Mot am la tuong, ngay xua dung nhu chu 祥.
羌=khuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Ro Khuong (o phia tay).
羋=mi [mi3]\n\t1. Be be, tieng de keu. \n\t2. Ben, dung lam ngu tu.
芈=mi [mi3]\n\t1. Be be, tieng de keu. \n\t2. Ben, dung lam ngu tu.
美=my [mei3]\n\t1. Dep, cai gi co ve dep khien cho minh thay lay lam thich deu goi la my. Nhu my thuat 美術. \n\t2. Khen ngoi. Nhu my Trieu Ba 美召伯 khen ong Trieu Ba. \n\t3. Nuoc My (My Loi Kien Hop Chung Quoc 美利堅合眾國 United States of America). \n\t4. Chau My (My Loi Gia 美利加 America).
羐=du [you3]\n\t1. Xem chu du 羑.
羑=du, duu [you3]\n\t1. Gang goi lam thien dat dan. \n\t2. Ten dat, Du Ly 羑里. Mot nghia la nguc Du Ly, ngay xua nguoi Tru giam vua Van Vuong 文王 o nguc Du Ly. Ta quen doc la chu duu. Cung viet la 羐.
羓=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Thit uop. Chua Lieu la Gia Luat Duc Quang chet, nguoi nuoc mo bung cho muoi vao uop dem ve, nguoi nha Tan goi la de ba 帝羓.
羔=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Con de con. Da ao cuu mong goi la cao bi 羔皮.
羖=co [gu3]\n\t1. Con de den.
羚=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Linh duong 羚羊 con linh duong, mot giong de o rung, sung dung lam thuoc.
羜=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Con chien, con de non moi nam thang.
羝=de [di1]\n\t1. Con de duc.
羞=tu [xiu1]\n\t1. Dang do an. \n\t2. Do an ngon, do an gi ngon cung goi la tu. Nhu tran tu 珍羞. \n\t3. Xau ho, then thung. Nhu ham tu 含羞 co ve then thung.
羢=nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Nhung, mot thu det bang long de nho rat am, cung nghia voi chu 絨.
羣=quan [qun2]\n\t1. Be ban. Nhu li quan tac cu 離羣索居 lia xa anh em ban. Tai hoc hon ca cac ban hoc goi la trac lac bat quan 卓犖不羣. \n\t2. Dan, bay, lay tinh hoa hao ma o voi nhau goi la quan. Nhu hop quan 合羣 hop dan. Chim muong xum xit voi nhau tu ba con tro len cung goi la quan. Nhu dieu quan 鳥羣 dan chim.
群=quan [qun2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quan 羣.
羨=tien [xian4]\n\t1. Tham muon, long ham thich cai gi goi la tien. \n\t2. Thua. Nhu di tien bo bat tuc 以羨補不足 lay cho thua bu cho thieu. So tien thua ngach cu goi la tien du 羨餘.
羡=tien [xian4]\n\t1. Tham muon, long ham thich cai gi goi la tien. \n\t2. Thua. Nhu di tien bo bat tuc 以羨補不足 lay cho thua bu cho thieu. So tien thua ngach cu goi la tien du 羨餘.
義=nghia [yi4]\n\t1. Su phai chang, le phai chang, nen. Dinh lieu su vat hop voi le phai goi la nghia. \n\t2. Y nghia. Nhu van nghia 文義 nghia van, nghi nghia 疑義 nghia ngo. \n\t3. Vi nghia, lam viec khong co y rieng ve minh goi la nghia. Nhu nghia su 義師 quan di vi nghia, khong phai vi loi ma sat phat. \n\t4. Cung chung. Nhu nghia thuong 義倉 cai kho chung, nghia hoc 義學 nha hoc chung, v.v. \n\t5. Lam viec vi nguoi la nghia. Nhu nghia hiep 義俠, nghia si 義士, v.v. \n\t6. Lay an co ket voi nhau la nghia. Nhu ket nghia 結義 anh em ket nghia, nghia tu 義子 con nuoi, v.v. Vi the nen cai gi phu them o tren cung goi la nghia. Nhu nghia ke 義髻 bui toc muon. \n\t7. Nuoc Nghia, tuc nuoc Nghia Dai Loi 義大利 nuoc Y (Italy).
义=nghia [yi4]\n\t1. Su phai chang, le phai chang, nen. Dinh lieu su vat hop voi le phai goi la nghia. \n\t2. Y nghia. Nhu van nghia 文義 nghia van, nghi nghia 疑義 nghia ngo. \n\t3. Vi nghia, lam viec khong co y rieng ve minh goi la nghia. Nhu nghia su 義師 quan di vi nghia, khong phai vi loi ma sat phat. \n\t4. Cung chung. Nhu nghia thuong 義倉 cai kho chung, nghia hoc 義學 nha hoc chung, v.v. \n\t5. Lam viec vi nguoi la nghia. Nhu nghia hiep 義俠, nghia si 義士, v.v. \n\t6. Lay an co ket voi nhau la nghia. Nhu ket nghia 結義 anh em ket nghia, nghia tu 義子 con nuoi, v.v. Vi the nen cai gi phu them o tren cung goi la nghia. Nhu nghia ke 義髻 bui toc muon. \n\t7. Nuoc Nghia, tuc nuoc Nghia Dai Loi 義大利 nuoc Y (Italy).
羯=yet [jie2]\n\t1. Con de da thien roi. \n\t2. Giong Yet. Mot chi ro Hung No 匈奴 vao o xu Yet That, vi the goi la giong Yet.
羲=hy [xi1]\n\t1. Phuc Hy 伏羲 vua Phuc Hy doi thuong co, co khi goi la vua Bao Hy 庖羲. \n\t2. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Bac song cao ngoa nhu Hy Hoang thuong nhan 北窗高臥如羲皇上人 nam dai truoc cua so nhu nguoi o tren doi vua Hy Hoang, y noi o canh thai binh thanh tu tich mich nhu doi thuong co vay.
羵=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Phan duong 羵羊 con tinh dat.
羶=thien [shan1]\n\t1. Mui tanh hoi cua giong de.
羸=luy, nuy [lei2]\n\t1. Gay. \n\t2. Yeu duoi. \n\t3. Giang co. \n\t4. Giat do. Ta quen doc la chu nuy.
羹=canh, lang [geng1]\n\t1. Canh. \n\t2. Mot am la lang. Bat lang 不羹 ten dat nuoc So 楚.
羼=san [chan4]\n\t1. San tap 羼雜 lan lon.
羽=vu [yu3]\n\t1. Long chim. \n\t2. Cai vay ten, ten cam vao sau goi la mot vu 沒羽 hay am vu 飲羽. \n\t3. Tieng vu, mot tieng trong ngu am. \n\t4. Cai vu, mot thu lam bang duoi con tri de cam luc hat mua goi la can vu 干羽. \n\t5. Loai chim. \n\t6. Canh sau.
羿=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi (nguoi Nghe). Hau Nghe xa nhat 后羿射日 Hau Nghe ban mat troi.
翁=ong [weng1]\n\t1. Cha, minh goi cha nguoi khac, goi la ton ong 尊翁. \n\t2. Ong gia. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Dong du hiep thieu tan thanh ong 同遊俠少盡成翁 ban be hao hiep luc nho deu thanh ong gia. \n\t3. Tieng goi ton quy. Nhu nang dau goi bo chong la ong, con re goi bo vo cung xung la ong. Ban be ton nhau cung xung la ong. \n\t4. Ong trong 翁仲 ong phong da. Tac da lam hinh nguoi dung chau truoc lang mo goi la ong trong. Doi Nguy Minh De 魏明帝 duc hai nguoi de ngoai cua tu ma 司馬 goi la ong trong, vi the doi sau moi goi cac ong phong da la ong trong. \n\t5. Long co chim.
翅=si [chi4]\n\t1. Canh, canh cua cac loai chim loai sau deu goi la si. \n\t2. Vay ca, ngu si 魚翅. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu thi 啻. Nhu he si thuc trong 奚翅食重 sao nhung lay an lam trong.
翊=duc [yi4]\n\t1. Kinh trong, giup do. \n\t2. Bay.
翌=duc [yi4]\n\t1. Ngay mai, ky toi. Duc nhat 翌日 ngay mai, duc nien 翌年 nam toi.
翎=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Long canh chim. \n\t2. Cai vay ten. \n\t3. Hoa linh 花翎, lam linh 藍翎 mot thu mu trang suc cua nha Thanh 清, de thuong cho cac nguoi co cong.
習=tap [xi2]\n\t1. Hoc di hoc lai. Nhu giang tap 講習, hoc tap 學習, v.v. \n\t2. Quen, thao. Nhu tap kien 習見 thay quen, tap van 習聞 nghe quen. \n\t3. Tap quen, pham cai gi vi tap quen khong doi di duoc deu goi la tap. Nhu tap nhiem 習染. \n\t4. Chim bay vi vut. \n\t5. Chong, hai lan.
习=tap [xi2]\n\t1. Hoc di hoc lai. Nhu giang tap 講習, hoc tap 學習, v.v. \n\t2. Quen, thao. Nhu tap kien 習見 thay quen, tap van 習聞 nghe quen. \n\t3. Tap quen, pham cai gi vi tap quen khong doi di duoc deu goi la tap. Nhu tap nhiem 習染. \n\t4. Chim bay vi vut. \n\t5. Chong, hai lan.
翔=tuong [xiang2]\n\t1. Lieng quanh. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Duong the ha bat nam du tuong 當世何不南遊翔 thoi ay sao khong bay luon sang Nam choi ? \n\t2. Cao tuong 翺翔 ngao du dua bon. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu tuong 詳. \n\t4. Di vung tay.
翕=hap [xi1]\n\t1. Hop. Nhu du luan hap nhien 輿論翕然 du luan hop nhau. \n\t2. Thu liem, dong lai. Nhu tich hap 闢翕 mo dong. \n\t3. Dan, keo.
翛=tieu, duu [shu4]\n\t1. Tieu tieu 翛翛 ap canh, long che kin. \n\t2. Mot am la duu. Voi va, ta cai dang voi vang.
翟=dich, trach [di2|zhai2]\n\t1. Long tri, duoi con tri o nui dai va dep. Trong khi nhac mua dung cam cho dep. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu dich 狄 giong ro Dich. \n\t3. Mot am la trach. Ho Trach.
翠=thuy [cui4]\n\t1. Phi thuy 翡翠 con tra, long no rat dep, dung lam do trang suc o tren dau goi la diem thuy 點翠. \n\t2. Mot thu da dep san xuat o Dien Dien 緬甸 goi la ngoc thuy 玉翠. \n\t3. Mau xanh biec.
翡=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Phi thuy 翡翠 con tra, long no rat dep, dung lam do trang suc o tren dau goi la diem thuy 點翠.
翣=sap [sha4]\n\t1. Cai quat va. \n\t2. Mot thu trang suc o ngoai ao quan, lam hinh nhu cai quat, tren ve may tan hay cac van ve roi ap hai ben quan tai cho dep.
翥=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Bay len.
翦=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Cai keo, tuc quen viet la 剪. \n\t2. Xen, cat. \n\t3. Phat sach. Nhu tien diet 翦滅 tru cho tiet het. \n\t4. Nong, nhat, sac nhat.
翩=phien [pian1]\n\t1. Phien phien 翩翩 bay vun vut. Pham noi hinh dung ve su nhanh nhen deu goi la phien phien. \n\t2. Hon ho tu mung. \n\t3. Bong bay, ta cai ve phong luu van nha. \n\t4. Lien phien 聯翩 lien noi, san sat.
翫=ngoan [wan4]\n\t1. Quen thuong, cung tap quen nhau khong de y den goi la ngoan. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu ngoan 玩.
翬=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Bay tit. \n\t2. Con tri long nam mui.
翮=cach [he2]\n\t1. Long canh chim, cuong long canh chim.
翰=han [han4]\n\t1. Long canh chim, long canh chim dai ma cung goi la han, vi the nen bay cao cung goi la han. \n\t2. Giup rap, thien tu phong cac cong than lam chu hau de che cho nha vua goi la binh han 屏翰 hay phan han 藩翰 noi y nhu cai canh chim de che cho than chim vay. \n\t3. Ngay xua dung long chim lam but viet, cho nen goi han la cai but. Tho tu chinh tay viet ra goi la thu han 手翰. Cung nhu thu thu 手書. \n\t4. Quan han lam coi ve viec van thu. \n\t5. Coi goc. \n\t6. Ga troi. \n\t7. Ngua trang.
翳=e [yi4]\n\t1. Cai long, cai quat long, luc mua cam de che minh. \n\t2. Che lap. Nhu thu moc an e 樹木隱翳 cay coi che lap. \n\t3. Mang mat, dau mat co mang goi la e.
翶=cao [ao2]\n\t1. Cao tuong 翺翔 rong choi, ngao du, dua bon.
翹=kieu [qiao2|qiao4]\n\t1. Long ma duoi. Cai long dai nhat o duoi chim goi la kieu. \n\t2. Cat len. Nhu kieu tuc nhi dai 翹足而待 kieng chan ma doi. \n\t3. Cai gi troi hon ca goi la kieu. Nhu kieu tu 翹秀 tot dep hon ca. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Hoa dien uy dia vo nhan thau, Thuy kieu kim tuoc ngoc tao dau 花鈿委地無人收，翠翹金雀玉搔頭 hoa trang suc tren dau, thoa bang vang ngoc hinh chim thuy chim tuoc rot xuong dat khong ai nhat. Tan Da dich tho la. Ai nguoi nhat hoa roi bo dat, Oi ! Thuy kieu ngoc nat vang phai. \n\t4. Kieu kieu 翹翹 cao ngat ngheu. \n\t5. Ngang dau len.
翘=kieu [qiao2|qiao4]\n\t1. Long ma duoi. Cai long dai nhat o duoi chim goi la kieu. \n\t2. Cat len. Nhu kieu tuc nhi dai 翹足而待 kieng chan ma doi. \n\t3. Cai gi troi hon ca goi la kieu. Nhu kieu tu 翹秀 tot dep hon ca. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Hoa dien uy dia vo nhan thau, Thuy kieu kim tuoc ngoc tao dau 花鈿委地無人收，翠翹金雀玉搔頭 hoa trang suc tren dau, thoa bang vang ngoc hinh chim thuy chim tuoc rot xuong dat khong ai nhat. Tan Da dich tho la. Ai nguoi nhat hoa roi bo dat, Oi ! Thuy kieu ngoc nat vang phai. \n\t4. Kieu kieu 翹翹 cao ngat ngheu. \n\t5. Ngang dau len.
翻=phien [fan1]\n\t1. Phien phien 翻翻 bay vun vut, bay. \n\t2. Lat lai. Nhu phien cung 翻供 lat loi cung lai.
翼=duc [yi4]\n\t1. Canh chim, cho canh moc long ra de bay goi la duc. Canh cua cac loai sau cung goi la duc. \n\t2. Giup, o ben ma giup do goi la duc. Nhu phu duc 輔翼 giup rap, duc dai 翼帶 pho ta, v.v. Phep quan ngay xua chia lam ba canh, hai canh ben goi la ta duc 左翼 va huu duc 右翼. \n\t3. Che cho, nen, loai chim ap con goi la duc. Nhu yen duc 燕翼 chim yen ap con. Vi the nen nguoi ta muu tinh cho dan sau goi la yen duc di muu 燕翼詒謀. Nuoi nang che cho cho nen nguoi goi la noan duc 卵翼, v.v. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu duc 翌. \n\t5. Sao Duc. \n\t6. Vay ca. \n\t7. Thuyen. \n\t8. Kinh.
翽=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Hoi hoi 翽翽 bay vu vu. Thi Kinh 詩經. Phuong hoang vu phi, hoi hoi ky vu 鳳皇于飛，翽翽其羽 chim phuong hoang bay di, vu vu long canh.
翾=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Bay la la. \n\t2. Voi vang, hap tap.
翿=dao [dao4]\n\t1. Cai dao, mot thu lam bang long cam de mua.
耀=dieu [yao4]\n\t1. Roi sang, sang soi, sang o cho nay soi toi cho kia goi la dieu. \n\t2. Ve vang, ruc ro, cai gi cua minh duoc huong ma nguoi khac lay lam ham mo them thuong la dieu.
老=lao [lao3]\n\t1. Nguoi gia bay muoi tuoi. Pham nguoi nao co tuoi tac deu goi la lao. \n\t2. Tuoc vi ton trong cung goi la lao. Nhu nguyen lao 元老 vi trong than cua nha nuoc, truong lao 長老 su cu. Nay be ban choi voi nhau, trong luc tro chuyen goi nhau la mo lao 某老 cung noi nghia ay ca. Co khi dung de noi dua nhau. Nhu lao mo 老某 cung nhu ta noi thang cha ay. \n\t3. Suy yeu. Nhu cao lao 告老 cao rang gia yeu xin thoi viec quan ve nha nghi. \n\t4. Lau. Nhu lao u ki su 老於其事 lam viec da lau. \n\t5. Cung ran, tuc goi vat ran chac la lao. Van viet danh thep goi la lao luyen 老煉 hay lao duong 老當. Vuong Bot 王勃. Lao duong ich trang, ninh tri bach thu chi tam 老當益壯，寧知白首之心 tuoi gia cang phai manh hon, nen hieu long ong dau bac. \n\t6. Ong Ly Nhi 李耳 nha Chu 周 goi la Lao tu 老子, viet Dao Duc Kinh 道德經, la to Dao giao, nen goi Dao giao la dao Lao. \n\t7. Binh dong o ngoai da lau.
考=khao [kao3]\n\t1. Tho khao, gia nua. \n\t2. Bo da chet roi goi la khao. Cac tien nhan ve ben dan ong deu dung chu khao ca. Nhu to khao 祖考 ong. \n\t3. Khao xet. \n\t4. Thi. Nhu khao thi 考試 thi khao. Lay cac bai van hoc de chon lay hoc tro xem ai hon ai kem goi la khao. \n\t5. Xong, khanh thanh nha. \n\t6. Danh, khua. \n\t7. Tron, ket cuc. \n\t8. Vet.
耄=mao [mao4]\n\t1. Gia tam chin muoi goi la mao.
者=gia [zhe3]\n\t1. Loi phan biet, trong cau van co chu gia la de phan biet cho cach nhau. Nhu nhan gia nhan da, nghia gia nghi da 仁者人也，義者宜也 nhan ay la dao lam nguoi, nghia ay la su lam phai vay. \n\t2. Loi noi chuyen chi ve mot cai gi. Nhu huu ki si chi nhan gia 友其士仁者 choi ban phai choi voi ke si co nhan. \n\t3. Ay. Nhu gia ca 者箇 cai ay, gia phien 者番 phen ay, v.v.
耆=ki, chi, thi [qi2]\n\t1. Gia sau muoi goi la ki. \n\t2. Nguoi nao tuoi cao lich duyet nhieu cung goi la ki. Nhu ki nho 耆儒 nguoi hoc lao luyen. \n\t3. Mot am la chi. Den. \n\t4. Lai cung am nghia voi chu thi 嗜.
耇=cau, cu [gou3]\n\t1. Gia ca. Ta quen doc la chu cu.
耈=cau [gou3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cau 耇.
耊=diet [die4]\n\t1. Gia tam muoi goi la diet.
耋=diet [die2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu diet 耊.
而=nhi [er2]\n\t1. May. Nhu nhi ong 而翁 cha may. \n\t2. Ma, vay, dung lam tro ngu. Nhu nhi kim an tai 而今安在 ma nay con dau, di nhi 已而 da ma. \n\t3. Ben, loi noi chuyen xuong. Nhu nhi muu dong can qua u bang noi 而謀動干戈於邦內 ben muu khoi su danh nhau o trong nuoc. \n\t4. Long ma.
耍=sai, soa [shua3]\n\t1. Dua bon. Do cua tre con choi goi la sai hoa 耍貨. Ta quen doc la chu soa.
耎=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Mem. Cung nhu chu nhuyen 軟.
耐=nai [nai4]\n\t1. Chiu nhin. Nhu nai co 耐飢 chiu nhin duoc doi, nai kho 耐苦 chiu nhin duoc kho. \n\t2. Rau mep. \n\t3. Mot am la nang. Ngay xua dung nhu chu nang 能.
耑=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Chuyen. Cung nhu chu chuyen 專.
耒=loi [lei3]\n\t1. Cai cay.
耔=ty, ti [zi3]\n\t1. Vun goc lua. Cung doc la chu ti.
耕=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Cay ruong. \n\t2. Pham dung suc lam mot viec gi kho nhoc moi duoc mieng an deu goi la canh. Nhu thiet canh 舌耕 cay bang luoi (tuc day hoc), but canh 筆耕 viet thue, v.v. \n\t3. Gang suc lam khong moi cung goi la canh.
耗=hao, mao, mao [hao4]\n\t1. Hao sut. Nhu hao phi ngan tien 耗費銀錢 hao phi tien bac. \n\t2. Tin tuc. Nhu am hao 音耗 tam hoi. \n\t3. Mot am la mao. Dan don. \n\t4. Lai mot am la mao. Khong, het.
耘=van [yun2]\n\t1. Lam co.
耙=ba [ba4|pa2]\n\t1. Cai cao dat, cai bua.
耜=ty, cu [si4]\n\t1. Cai luoi cay. Tuc doc la chu cu.
耞=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Lien gia 連枷 cai neo dap lua.
耡=su, su [chu2]\n\t1. Bua dat. Cung viet la su 鋤. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Doan lap ha xuan su 短笠荷春鋤 doi non la, vac cuoc di lam vu xuan. \n\t2. Mot am la su. Giup do.
耦=ngau [ou3]\n\t1. Hai nguoi cung cay, vi the nen hai nguoi goi la ngau. Vo chong goi la phoi ngau 配耦 cung la theo cai nghia hai nguoi cung nhau lam lung ca. \n\t3. Doi, cau doi goi la ngau ngu 耦語. \n\t4. Doi, so le goi la co 奇, so chan goi la ngau 耦. \n\t5. Luoi cay rong nam tac goi la phat 伐, hai phat goi la ngau 耦.
耨=nau [nou4]\n\t1. Cai dam, dung de dao dat xao co. \n\t2. Lam co.
耰=uu [you1]\n\t1. Bua phu, gieo hat giong roi lai bua phu mot luot dat nua len goi la uu. \n\t2. Cai dam, dung de dap cac hon dat to cho phang.
耳=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Tai, dung de nghe. \n\t2. Nghe. Nhu cuu nhi dai danh 久耳大名 nghe tieng ca da lau, nhi thuc 耳食 nghe lom. \n\t3. Hang chat cua chat minh la nhi ton 耳孫 tuc la chau xa tam doi. \n\t4. Pham cai gi co quai co vau o hai ben nhu hai tai nguoi deu goi la nhi. Nhu dinh nhi 鼎耳 cai quai vac. \n\t5. Nhi mon 耳門 cua nach. \n\t6. Thoi vay, vay. Tieng noi dut loi.
耶=da [ye1|ye2]\n\t1. Vay vay, vay ru ! Dung lam tro tu, noi su con ngo. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu gia 爺. \n\t3. Da-to giao 耶穌教 co khi goi tat la Da giao 耶教 la goi dao Thien Chua, giao chu la ngai Jesus Christ, nguoi nuoc Do Thai 猶太.
耻=si [chi3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu si 恥.
耼=dam, tham [dan1]\n\t1. Tai vet, tai vet khong co vanh tai la dam. \n\t2. Ten nguoi. Cung doc la chu tham.
耽=dam [dan1]\n\t1. Vui, qua vui goi la dam. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu dam 眈. \n\t3. Tai to va dai tai thong xuong.
耿=canh [geng3]\n\t1. Sang. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Tri tri chung co so truong da, Canh canh tinh ha duc thu thien 遲遲鐘鼓初長夜，耿耿星河欲曙天 tieng chuong, trong diem thong tha bao hieu moi dem dai, nhung ngoi sao tren song ngan (tinh ha) sang lap lanh nhu muon la rang dong. Tan Da dich tho. Tieng canh toi tung tung diem trong, Nam canh dai chang giong dem xua, Song Ngan lap lanh sao thua, Troi nhu muon sang, sao chua sang troi ? \n\t2. Thac mac. Nhu tam trung canh canh 心中耿耿 trong long thac mac khong yen. \n\t3. Canh gioi 耿介 chinh truc, co chi tiet khong a dua voi nguoi (thanh canh).
聃=dam [dan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dam 耽. \n\t2. Lao Dam 老聃 tuc Lao Tu 老子.
聆=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Nghe, nghe roi, linh duoc y goi la linh.
聊=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Hay, cung. Nhu lieu phuc nhi nhi 聊復爾爾 hay lai nhu the nhu the. \n\t2. Nho. Nhu dan bat lieu sinh 民不聊生 dan khong biet nho vao dau ma song duoc. \n\t3. Tinh y buon ba goi la vo lieu 無聊. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. U thi chi vo lieu thoi, nu triep nhat chi 於是至無聊時，女輒一至 tu do cu luc quanh hiu buon ba, nang lai den luon. \n\t4. Tai u.
聒=quat [guo1]\n\t1. Om som, noi rat tai, nguoi ta khong muon nghe ma minh cu nhai nhai mai cung goi la quat. Tuc thuong noi la quat sao 聒吵. \n\t2. Quat quat 聒聒 ngay ngo.
聖=thanh [sheng4]\n\t1. Thanh, tu duong nhan cach toi coi cung cuc goi la thanh. Nhu sieu pham nhap thanh 超凡入聖 vuot khoi cai tinh pham tran ma vao coi thanh. Pham cai gi ma toi tot buc deu goi la thanh. Nhu thi thanh 詩聖 thanh tho. \n\t3. Loi noi ton kinh nhat. Nhu loi du cua vua goi la thanh du 聖諭, thanh huan 聖訓, v.v. \n\t4. Sang suot, cai gi cung biet to.
圣=thanh [sheng4]\n\t1. Thanh, tu duong nhan cach toi coi cung cuc goi la thanh. Nhu sieu pham nhap thanh 超凡入聖 vuot khoi cai tinh pham tran ma vao coi thanh. Pham cai gi ma toi tot buc deu goi la thanh. Nhu thi thanh 詩聖 thanh tho. \n\t3. Loi noi ton kinh nhat. Nhu loi du cua vua goi la thanh du 聖諭, thanh huan 聖訓, v.v. \n\t4. Sang suot, cai gi cung biet to.
聘=sinh [pin4]\n\t1. Tim hoi, moi don. Nghe biet ai co tai co duc sinh long kinh le, lay cac do qui bau den tang de cau than hay cau giup minh goi la sinh. \n\t2. Hoi tham, cac nuoc sai su di thong hieu voi nhau goi la sinh. \n\t3. Le cuoi, do nguoi mai moi dem le vat den giam hoi cung goi la sinh.
聚=tu [ju4]\n\t1. Hop. Nhu tu hoi 聚會 tu hop. \n\t2. Suc tich, tich it thanh nhieu goi la tu. \n\t3. Lang, xom.
聞=van, van, van [wen2]\n\t1. Nghe thay. Nhu phong van 風聞 mang nghe, truyen van 傳聞 nghe don, v.v. Than toi tan noi de nghe goi la du van 預聞. \n\t2. Tri thuc. Pham hoc thuc duyet lich deu nho tai mat moi biet, cho nen goi nguoi nghe nhieu hoc rong la bac hoc da van 博學多聞. Goi nguoi nghe rong nho dai la bac van cuong chi 博聞強識. Goi nguoi hep hoi nghe it la co lau qua van 孤陋寡聞. \n\t3. Truyen dat. Nhu phung van 奉聞 kinh bao cho biet, dac van 特聞 dac cach bao cho hay. \n\t4. Ngui thay. \n\t5. Mot am la van. Tieng dong toi. Nhu thanh van vu thien 聲聞于天 tieng dong den troi. \n\t6. Danh du. Nhu lenh van 令聞 tieng khen tot. Ta quen doc la van.
闻=van, van, van [wen2]\n\t1. Nghe thay. Nhu phong van 風聞 mang nghe, truyen van 傳聞 nghe don, v.v. Than toi tan noi de nghe goi la du van 預聞. \n\t2. Tri thuc. Pham hoc thuc duyet lich deu nho tai mat moi biet, cho nen goi nguoi nghe nhieu hoc rong la bac hoc da van 博學多聞. Goi nguoi nghe rong nho dai la bac van cuong chi 博聞強識. Goi nguoi hep hoi nghe it la co lau qua van 孤陋寡聞. \n\t3. Truyen dat. Nhu phung van 奉聞 kinh bao cho biet, dac van 特聞 dac cach bao cho hay. \n\t4. Ngui thay. \n\t5. Mot am la van. Tieng dong toi. Nhu thanh van vu thien 聲聞于天 tieng dong den troi. \n\t6. Danh du. Nhu lenh van 令聞 tieng khen tot. Ta quen doc la van.
聡=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thong 聰.
聫=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu lien 聯.
聯=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lien noi. \n\t2. Hop, hop cac nuoc nho hay cac khu vuc nho lai thanh mot nuoc lon goi la lien bang che do 聯邦制度 nhu nuoc My hay nuoc Duc vay. \n\t3. Cau doi. Nhu doanh lien 楹聯 cau doi dan cot. Van tho hai cau doi nhau goi la nhat lien 一聯. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Xuan lien dai tue tru 春聯待歲除 cau doi xuan cho het nam cu.
联=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lien noi. \n\t2. Hop, hop cac nuoc nho hay cac khu vuc nho lai thanh mot nuoc lon goi la lien bang che do 聯邦制度 nhu nuoc My hay nuoc Duc vay. \n\t3. Cau doi. Nhu doanh lien 楹聯 cau doi dan cot. Van tho hai cau doi nhau goi la nhat lien 一聯. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Xuan lien dai tue tru 春聯待歲除 cau doi xuan cho het nam cu.
聰=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Sang, tai nghe sang suot goi la thong. Nhu thong minh 聰明 sang suot, vi co tai mat cam giac nhanh nhen thi moi nghe thay duoc nhieu ma nay ra tri tue vay.
聪=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Sang, tai nghe sang suot goi la thong. Nhu thong minh 聰明 sang suot, vi co tai mat cam giac nhanh nhen thi moi nghe thay duoc nhieu ma nay ra tri tue vay.
聲=thanh [sheng1]\n\t1. Tieng. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Chung tieu thinh vu thanh 終宵聽雨聲 suot dem nghe tieng mua. \n\t2. Doi xua chia ra nam thu tieng la cung, thuong, gioc, chuy, vu 宮、商、角、徵、羽. Am nhac cu noi day lam mau muc. Con tieng nguoi thi chia ra bon thu tieng la binh, thuong, khu, nhap 平、上、去、入 am chu cu noi day lam mau muc. \n\t3. Am nhac. Nhu thanh dong 聲容 tieng tam dang dap, thanh sac 聲色 tieng hay sac dep. \n\t4. Loi noi. Nhu tri thanh 致聲 gui loi den. \n\t5. Tieng khen. \n\t6. Ke. Nhu thanh toi tri thao 聲罪致討 ke toi ma danh. \n\t7. Neu ro. Nhu thanh minh 聲明 neu ro viec lam ra.
声=thanh [sheng1]\n\t1. Tieng. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Chung tieu thinh vu thanh 終宵聽雨聲 suot dem nghe tieng mua. \n\t2. Doi xua chia ra nam thu tieng la cung, thuong, gioc, chuy, vu 宮、商、角、徵、羽. Am nhac cu noi day lam mau muc. Con tieng nguoi thi chia ra bon thu tieng la binh, thuong, khu, nhap 平、上、去、入 am chu cu noi day lam mau muc. \n\t3. Am nhac. Nhu thanh dong 聲容 tieng tam dang dap, thanh sac 聲色 tieng hay sac dep. \n\t4. Loi noi. Nhu tri thanh 致聲 gui loi den. \n\t5. Tieng khen. \n\t6. Ke. Nhu thanh toi tri thao 聲罪致討 ke toi ma danh. \n\t7. Neu ro. Nhu thanh minh 聲明 neu ro viec lam ra.
聳=tung [song3]\n\t1. Cao vot. \n\t2. Rung dong. Nhu tung cu 聳懼 nhuc so. Cung viet la 悚懼.
耸=tung [song3]\n\t1. Cao vot. \n\t2. Rung dong. Nhu tung cu 聳懼 nhuc so. Cung viet la 悚懼.
聴=thinh [ting1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thinh 聽.
聵=hoi [kui4]\n\t1. Diec, sinh ra da diec roi goi la hoi. \n\t2. U me.
聩=hoi [kui4]\n\t1. Diec, sinh ra da diec roi goi la hoi. \n\t2. U me.
聶=niep, nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Noi tham. \n\t2. Ho Niep. \n\t3. Thit thai mong. Ta quen doc la chu nhiep.
聂=niep, nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Noi tham. \n\t2. Ho Niep. \n\t3. Thit thai mong. Ta quen doc la chu nhiep.
職=chuc [zhi2]\n\t1. Chuc, pham cac viec quan deu goi la chuc. Nhu xung chuc 稱職 xung dang voi cai chuc cua minh. Vi the nen ngoi quan cung goi la chuc. Nhu van chuc 文職 chuc van, vu chuc 武職 chuc vo, v.v. Ngay xua chu hau vao chau thien tu xung la thuat chuc 述職 nghia la bay ke cong viec cua minh lam. Doi sau cac quan ngoai vao chau vua cung xung la thuat chuc la vi do. \n\t2. Chuc phan, cac viec ma bon phan minh phai lam goi la chuc. Nhu tu chuc 子職 chuc phan lam con, phu chuc 婦職 chuc phan lam vo, chuc vu 職務, chuc nghiep 職業, v.v. \n\t3. Bui, chi, dung lam tro tu. Nhu chuc thi chi co 職是之故 chi vi co ay. \n\t4. Chuyen chu.
职=chuc [zhi2]\n\t1. Chuc, pham cac viec quan deu goi la chuc. Nhu xung chuc 稱職 xung dang voi cai chuc cua minh. Vi the nen ngoi quan cung goi la chuc. Nhu van chuc 文職 chuc van, vu chuc 武職 chuc vo, v.v. Ngay xua chu hau vao chau thien tu xung la thuat chuc 述職 nghia la bay ke cong viec cua minh lam. Doi sau cac quan ngoai vao chau vua cung xung la thuat chuc la vi do. \n\t2. Chuc phan, cac viec ma bon phan minh phai lam goi la chuc. Nhu tu chuc 子職 chuc phan lam con, phu chuc 婦職 chuc phan lam vo, chuc vu 職務, chuc nghiep 職業, v.v. \n\t3. Bui, chi, dung lam tro tu. Nhu chuc thi chi co 職是之故 chi vi co ay. \n\t4. Chuyen chu.
聽=thinh [ting1]\n\t1. Nghe, dung tai de nghe goi la chu thinh. Nhu thinh thu 聽書 nghe sach, tham thinh 探聽 do la. \n\t2. Thuan theo. Nhu thinh giao 聽 vang nghe loi day bao. \n\t3. Xu doan. Nhu thinh tung 聽 xu kien. \n\t4. Mac, mac ke. Nhu thinh ki so chi 聽其所之 mac ke di dau thi di. \n\t5. Doi cho. \n\t6. Mot am la thinh. Toa giua goi la thinh su 聽事 tuc la noi toa xet xu viec kien cao vay.
听=thinh [ting1]\n\t1. Nghe, dung tai de nghe goi la chu thinh. Nhu thinh thu 聽書 nghe sach, tham thinh 探聽 do la. \n\t2. Thuan theo. Nhu thinh giao 聽 vang nghe loi day bao. \n\t3. Xu doan. Nhu thinh tung 聽 xu kien. \n\t4. Mac, mac ke. Nhu thinh ki so chi 聽其所之 mac ke di dau thi di. \n\t5. Doi cho. \n\t6. Mot am la thinh. Toa giua goi la thinh su 聽事 tuc la noi toa xet xu viec kien cao vay.
聾=lung [long2]\n\t1. Diec.
聋=lung [long2]\n\t1. Diec.
聿=duat [yu4]\n\t1. Ben, bui, chu dung lam tieng phat ngu. \n\t2. Cai but.
肄=di [yi4]\n\t1. Tap. Nhu di nghiep 肄業 tap hoc, cau hoc. \n\t2. Du, thua. \n\t3. Nhoc. \n\t4. Canh non.
肅=tuc [su4]\n\t1. Cung kinh, ngay ngan nghiem nghi, khong co cai dang tre nai goi la tuc. \n\t2. Ran, bao, thi hanh menh lenh nghiem ngat cho nguoi so khong dam lam bay goi la tuc thanh 肅清, tuc tinh 肅靜, v.v. Lay rap dau xuong goi la tuc bai 肅拜, goi tat la tuc. Nhu trong loi viet thu hay dung nhung chu kinh tuc 敬肅, tuc thu 肅此 cung la noi nghia ay ca (kinh viet thu nay). \n\t3. Gap, kip. \n\t4. Tien vao, moi vao. \n\t5. Thu liem lai, rut lai.
肃=tuc [su4]\n\t1. Cung kinh, ngay ngan nghiem nghi, khong co cai dang tre nai goi la tuc. \n\t2. Ran, bao, thi hanh menh lenh nghiem ngat cho nguoi so khong dam lam bay goi la tuc thanh 肅清, tuc tinh 肅靜, v.v. Lay rap dau xuong goi la tuc bai 肅拜, goi tat la tuc. Nhu trong loi viet thu hay dung nhung chu kinh tuc 敬肅, tuc thu 肅此 cung la noi nghia ay ca (kinh viet thu nay). \n\t3. Gap, kip. \n\t4. Tien vao, moi vao. \n\t5. Thu liem lai, rut lai.
肆=tu [si4]\n\t1. Cung cuc, rat, phong tung, y muon the nao cu lam thich the goi la tu. Nhu tung tu 縱肆, phong tu 放肆, v.v. \n\t2. Phoi bay, beu. Luan ngu 論語 co cau ngo luc do nang tu chu thi trieu 吾力猶能肆諸市朝 suc ta co the lam (cho phai toi) chet ma beu thay o cho hoac trieu dinh. Vi the nen cac noi bay hang hoa cung goi la tu. Nhu tra tu 茶肆 hang nuoc, tuu tu 酒肆 hang ruou, v.v. \n\t3. Bon, tuc muon dung thay chu tu 四 goi la chu tu kep, dung de viet giay ma ve tien tai cho khong thay doi duoc. \n\t4. Ben, dung lam loi dua day. \n\t5. Cho nen, loi noi thay sang dau de khac. \n\t6. Cam. \n\t7. Thang. \n\t8. Duoi ra, mo rong ra. \n\t9. Hoan, thong tha. 10. Dai. \n\t11. Cham, sieng nang. \n\t12. Thu qua. \n\t13. Chuong khanh bay du ca. \n\t14. Mot am la thich. Pha thit. Cung nghia voi chu di 肄.
肇=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Bat dau, gay moi, phat sinh. Nhu trieu hoa 肇禍 gay va. Co khi viet la 肈. \n\t2. Chinh, sua cho ngay. \n\t3. Muu loan.
肈=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu trieu 肇.
肉=nhuc, nhu, nau [rou4]\n\t1. Thit. La do chat nhu long trang trung ga cau tao nen, la chat mem chon de bao boc gan xuong cho cac giong dong vat. Nay ta goi trong ho than la cot nhuc 骨肉 nghia la cung mot ong cha sinh de san se ra vay. \n\t2. Phan xac thit. Nhu nhuc duc 肉慾 cai ham muon ve xac thit. Nhu ruou che trai gai, v.v. Cung viet la 肉欲. Nhuc hinh 肉刑 hinh phat den da thit. Nhu kim kep xeo danh, v.v. deu noi ve ngoai xac thit ca. Nhung ke vo hoc vo tri goi la hanh thi tau nhuc 行尸走肉 thit chay thay di, noi ke chi co phan xac ma khong co tinh than vay. \n\t3. Thit an. Cac thu thit giong vat co the an duoc deu goi la nhuc. Nguoi giau sang goi la nhuc thuc 肉食. Lay the luc ma an hiep nguoi goi la ngu nhuc 魚肉. Nhu ngu nhuc huong ly 魚肉鄉里 ha hiep lang mac. \n\t4. Cui, cui cac thu qua. \n\t5. Mot am la nhu. Bap thit no nang, map map. \n\t6. Cung doc la chu nau.
肊=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu uc 臆.
肋=lac [le1|lei4]\n\t1. Xuong suon. Moi suon co 6 cai xuong, hai ben co 12 cai xuong, hai cai duoi cung mem nhun khong dinh voi xuong nguc goi la phu lac cot 浮肋骨 xuong suon cut. \n\t2. Su gi khong co y vi gi sau xa goi la ke lac 雞肋 gan ga. Cung viet la 鷄肋. Ke   lac cong danh 雞肋工名 chu cua Tao Thao 曹操 (155-220) ra lenh khi danh Han Trung   khong duoc.
肌=co [ji1]\n\t1. Da. \n\t2. Thit trong da.
肎=khang [ken3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu khang 肯.
肓=hoang [huang1]\n\t1. Cho duoi tim tren hoanh cach mo goi la hoang. Benh nang goi la benh nhap cao hoang 病入膏肓.
肖=tieu, tieu [xiao1|xiao4]\n\t1. Giong. \n\t2. Con khong duoc nhu cha goi la bat tieu 不肖, nguoi hu cung goi la bat tieu. \n\t3. Mot am la tieu. Suy vi. \n\t4. Mat mat, that tan.
肘=truu [zhou3]\n\t1. Khuyu tay. Lam viec ma co nguoi ngan tro khong duoc thang tay lam goi la xe truu 掣肘 bo canh.
肚=do [du3|du4]\n\t1. Bung, tam long. Nhu dien ket khau dau giao, do ly sinh kinh cuc 面結口頭交，肚裏生荊棘 choi la mat dau luoi, trong long sinh gai goc. \n\t2. Da day.
肛=giang, khang, xoang [gang1]\n\t1. Lo dit, mieng ruot thang. \n\t2. Mot am la khang. beo, lon. Ta quen doc la chu xoang ca.
肝=can [gan1]\n\t1. Gan, mot co quan sinh ra nuoc mat, o me tay phai ben bung, sac do lo lo, co bon la. \n\t2. Can dam, gan goc.
股=co [gu3]\n\t1. Dui ve. \n\t2. Dui ve la mot bo phan trong than the, cho nen mot bo phan cua mot su gi goi la co. Nhu mot canh quan goi la nhat co binh 一股兵, may nguoi gop von buon chung goi la hop co 合股. \n\t3. Cau co 勾股 trong hinh tam giac vuong, be ngang ngan goi la cau 勾, be doc dai goi la co 股, canh dai nhat doi dien voi goc vuong goi la huyen 弦.
肢=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Chan tay nguoi, chan giong thu, chan canh giong chim deu goi la chi. \n\t2. Song lung.
肥=phi [fei2]\n\t1. Beo, pham cac giong dong vat thuc vat ma co nhieu chat beo goi la phi. Nhu phi mi 肥美 beo ngay, ngay ngon. \n\t2. Day du, thua thai. Nhu phan phi 分肥 chia cua. \n\t3. Bon ruong, cac thu dung de bon ruong deu goi la phi. Nhu lieu phi 料肥 do bon tot.
肧=phoi [pei1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu phoi 胚.
肩=kien [jian1]\n\t1. Vai. \n\t2. Ganh vac, trut duoc het trach nhiem goi la tuc kien 息肩. \n\t3. Dung. \n\t4. Giong muong ba tuoi.
肪=phuong [fang2]\n\t1. Chi phuong 脂肪 mo la, chat bo cua loai cay co cung goi la chi phuong.
肫=truan, thuan [zhun1]\n\t1. Truan truan 肫肫 cham chi, cham cham. \n\t2. Tuc goi me chim, me ga, me vit la truan. \n\t3. Mot am la thuan. Thit kho con nguyen.
肭=nap [na4]\n\t1. Ot nap 膃肭 con cho be, mot thu hai san dau nhu cho, cai hot dai no goi la ot nap te 膃肭臍 dung lam thuoc duoc, con goi la hai cau than 海狗腎. 
肯=khang, khai [ken3]\n\t1. Kha, u duoc. Bang long cho goi la khang. \n\t2. Mot am la khai. Thit than, thit ap xuong. Cho can cot cua su ly gi cung goi la khai khinh 肯綮.
肱=quang [gong1]\n\t1. Canh tay (tu khuyu tay den ban tay). \n\t2. Bay toi chan tay goi la co quang 股肱. Thu Kinh 書經 co cau luong y tam chiet quang 良醫三折肱 y noi thay thuoc trai nhieu benh kho roi moi gioi, noi vi nhu nguoi co tung trai nhieu su bien roi moi loi vay.
育=duc [yo1|yu4]\n\t1. Nuoi, nuoi cho khon lon goi la duc. \n\t2. Sinh. Nhu duc lan 育麟 sinh con trai. \n\t3. Tho be.
肴=hao [yao2]\n\t1. Do nham, cac thu thit ca dem lam chin an goi la hao. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hanh nhan bao thuc tien khi du,Tan hao lanh phan tram giang de 行人飽食便棄餘，殘肴冷飯沉江底 Nguoi di (thuyen) an no, thua vut bo, Com nguoi, thuc an do chim xuong day song.
肸=hat [xi4]\n\t1. Vang day. \n\t2. Hat huong 肸蠁 loai muoi nhang, vi no bay hop tung dan rat dong, nen noi ve su gi hung thinh cung goi la hat huong.
肺=phe [fei4]\n\t1. Phoi, o hai ben nguc, ben ta hai la, ben huu ba la. Nay goi tam long la phe phu 肺腑.
胃=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Da day, dung de dung va tieu hoa do an. Vi the nen tuc goi su muon an la vi khau 胃口. \n\t2. Sao Vi, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu.
胆=dam [dan3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dam 膽.
背=boi, boi [bei1|bei4]\n\t1. Vai, hai ben sau lung ngang voi nguc goi la boi. Vai o dang sau nguoi, nen cai gi o dang sau cung goi la boi. Nhu oc boi 屋背 sau nha. \n\t2. Vai lung suc vat deu o tren, cho nen cai gi o tren cung goi la boi. Nhu kieu boi 橋背 song cau, lung cau, bong boi 蓬背 mui thuyen, v.v. \n\t3. Mat trai. Nhu chi boi 紙背 mat trai giay. \n\t4. Mot am la boi. Trai. Nhu boi minh 背盟 trai loi the. \n\t5. Bo di. Nhu kien boi 見背 chet di. \n\t6. Doc thuoc long. Nhu boi tung 背誦 gap sach lai ma doc.
胎=thai [tai1]\n\t1. Co mang ba thang goi la thai. Luc con con o trong bung deu goi la thai. Nhu thai giao 胎教 day tu luc con trong bung. \n\t2. Cai khuon, cai cot che nen do.
胏=chi [zi3]\n\t1. Nem co lan xuong.
胚=phoi [pei1]\n\t1. Chua, co mang moi duoc mot thang goi la phoi. \n\t2. Do chua xong han goi la phoi, nghia la moi co hinh. Phoi thai 胚胎 cai gi moi o buoc dau, cai mam moi sinh ra. Co khi viet la phoi 肧.
胖=ban, phan [pan2|pang4]\n\t1. Lon, map. \n\t2. Thu thai. \n\t3. Mot am la phan. Mot nua minh muong sinh. \n\t4. Thit ben xuong suon.
胙=tac, to [zuo4]\n\t1. Thit phan, thit te roi dem chia phan goi la tac. \n\t2. Bao dap. \n\t3. Phuc, cung doc la chu to.
胛=giap [jia3]\n\t1. Ben ba vai, cho giua hai vai lien nhau goi la kien giap 肩胛.
胝=chi, de [zhi1]\n\t1. Bien chi 胼胝 da day, chai. Nhu thu tuc bien chi 手足胼胝 chan tay chai cop, nghia la lam an vat va da chan da tay thanh chai ra. Ta quen doc la chu de.
胞=bao [bao1]\n\t1. Bao thai 胞胎, luc con con o trong bung me, ngoai co cai mang bao boc goi la bao (nhau). \n\t2. Pham vat gi hinh tron ngoai co mang boc deu goi la bao. Nhu te bao 細胞 mot chat nho ket cau thanh cac sinh vat. \n\t3. Boc, anh em cung mot cha me goi la dong bao 同胞 anh em ruot. Noi rong ra, anh bo goi la bao ba 胞伯 bac ruot, em bo goi la bao thuc 胞叔 chu ruot. Nguoi trong mot nuoc cung goi la dong bao, nghia la cung la con chau mot ong to sinh ra vay. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu bao 庖.
胠=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Mo. Nhu khu khiep 胠篋 mo trap, cung co nghia la an cap. Trang Tu 莊子. Tuong vi khu khiep tham nang quy nhi dao 將為胠篋探囊發匱之盜 de phong nhung ke an trom mo trap, moi day, cay ruong. \n\t2. Suon, nach. \n\t3. Di. \n\t4. Canh quan ben huu.
胡=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Yem co, duoi co co mang thit sa xuong goi la ho. Rau moc o day goi la ho tu 胡鬚. Tuc viet la 鬍. \n\t2. Co hong, noi nang khong duoc ranh mach goi la ham ho 含胡. Cung viet la 含糊. Noi quang goi la ho thuyet 胡說, lam can goi la ho vi 胡爲 hay ho nao 胡鬧 deu noi cai y ay ca. \n\t3. Sao vay ? dung lam tro tu. Nhu ho bat 胡不 sao chang ?, ho kha 胡可 sao kha ?, sao duoc ?, v.v. \n\t4. Ro Ho. \n\t5. Bat ho, mot do dung ve viec le. \n\t6. Mot thu do binh hinh cong co luoi dam ngang. \n\t7. Xa xoi.
胤=dan [yin4]\n\t1. Noi doi, con chau doi doi noi doi goi la dan. Nhu huyet dan 血胤 dong doi mau mu.
胥=tu [xu1]\n\t1. Deu. Nhu tu kha 胥可 deu kha. \n\t2. Doi. Nhu thieu tu 少胥 doi mot chut, tu menh 胥命 doi menh lenh, v.v. \n\t3. Cung coi, do xet. Nhu vu tu tu nguyen 于胥斯原 (Thi Kinh 詩經) cung coi canh dong de dinh cho cho dan o. \n\t4. Thu nhan lam quan goi la tu. Doi sau goi tho lai la tu lai 胥吏 la boi do (tuc ta goi la nha to). \n\t5. Giup. \n\t6. So, xa.
胔=ti [zi4]\n\t1. Thit thiu thoi.
胭=yen [yan1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu yet 咽. \n\t2. Yen chi Yen chi 燕脂 phan, dan ba dung de lam dang. Nguyen viet la 燕支. Co khi viet la 胭脂 hay 臙脂. Tuc goi tat la chi 脂. Nhu chi phan 脂粉 phan sap.
胯=kho, khoa [kua4]\n\t1. Duoi ben, hang. Nhu kho ha 胯下 duoi hang. Cung doc la chu khoa.
胰=di [yi2]\n\t1. Thit than. \n\t2. Tuc goi sa phong la di tu 胰子.
胱=quang [guang1]\n\t1. Bang quang 膀胱 cai bong bong, bong dai.
胴=dong [dong4]\n\t1. Cai than nguoi, tu co xuong den ben, tru chan tay ra, goi la dong. \n\t2. Ruot gia.
胸=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Nguc. \n\t2. Tam long. Nhu hung kham 胸襟, hung thu 胸次, v.v. deu noi ve phan mang chua trong long ca. Trang Tu 莊子. Hy no ai lac, bat nhap u hung thu 喜怒哀樂，不入於胸次 mung gian thuong vui khong vao toi trong long.
能=nang, nai, nai [neng2]\n\t1. Tai nang. Nhu nang vien 能員 chuc quan co tai. \n\t2. Hay, suc lam noi goi la nang. Nhu thi bat vi da, phi bat nang da 是不爲也，非不能也 ay la khong lam, chu khong phai la khong lam noi vay. \n\t3. Thuan theo. Nhu nhu vien nang nhi 柔遠能邇 (Thi Kinh 詩經) khien cho ke xa quy phuc ve gan. \n\t4. Con nang, mot loai nhu con gau. \n\t5. Mot am la nai. Con ba ba co ba chan. \n\t6. Lai mot am nua la nai. Cung nghia voi chu nai 耐. \n\t7. Vat ly goi cai gi tao ra cong suc la nang. Nhu dien nang 電能.
胾=chi [zi4]\n\t1. Thai, thit da thai.
脂=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Mo tang, mo dot lai tung mang. \n\t2. Yen chi 燕脂 phan, dan ba dung de lam dang. Nguyen viet la 燕支. Co khi viet la 胭脂 hay 臙脂. Tuc goi tat la chi 脂. Nhu chi phan 脂粉 phan sap.
脃=thuy [cui4]\n\t1. Gion, yeu. Nhu tung thuy 鬆脃 gion xop, de bop vo. \n\t2. Thanh thuy, tieng trong treo ma di xa goi la thanh thuy 清脃. \n\t3. Khinh bac. Nhu phong tuc thuy bac 風俗脃薄 phong tuc khinh bac.
脅=hiep [xie2]\n\t1. Suon, o hai ben nguc. Nhu Tan cong tu Trung Nhi bien hiep 晉共公重耳駢脅 cong tu Trung Nhi xuong suon lien thanh mot mang. \n\t2. An hiep. Nhu hiep che 脅制 bat hiep nguoi, bat ep phai lam xang goi la hiep tong 脅從. \n\t3. Trach moc.
胁=hiep [xie2]\n\t1. Suon, o hai ben nguc. Nhu Tan cong tu Trung Nhi bien hiep 晉共公重耳駢脅 cong tu Trung Nhi xuong suon lien thanh mot mang. \n\t2. An hiep. Nhu hiep che 脅制 bat hiep nguoi, bat ep phai lam xang goi la hiep tong 脅從. \n\t3. Trach moc.
脆=thuy [cui4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thuy 脃.
脈=mach [mai4|mo4]\n\t1. Mach mau, mach mau do goi la dong mach 動脈, mach mau den goi la tinh mach 靜脈. Ngay xua viet la 衇. Tuc viet la 脉. \n\t2. Pham vat gi co nganh tho ma lien voi nhau deu goi la mach. Nhu son mach 山脈 mach nui, toan mach 泉脈 mach nuoc, v.v. \n\t3. Mach thay thuoc xem mach dong o ve co tay de phan biet chung benh. \n\t4. Xuong la, cac duong gan tren la cay goi la diep mach 葉脈. \n\t5. Mach mach 脈脈 trong nhau dam dam.
脉=mach [mai4|mo4]\n\t1. Mach mau, mach mau do goi la dong mach 動脈, mach mau den goi la tinh mach 靜脈. Ngay xua viet la 衇. Tuc viet la 脉. \n\t2. Pham vat gi co nganh tho ma lien voi nhau deu goi la mach. Nhu son mach 山脈 mach nui, toan mach 泉脈 mach nuoc, v.v. \n\t3. Mach thay thuoc xem mach dong o ve co tay de phan biet chung benh. \n\t4. Xuong la, cac duong gan tren la cay goi la diep mach 葉脈. \n\t5. Mach mach 脈脈 trong nhau dam dam.
脉=mach [mai4|mo4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu mach 脈.
脊=tich [ji3]\n\t1. Xuong song, co 24 dot. \n\t2. Pham cai gi cao ma o giua deu goi la tich. Nhu oc tich 屋脊 cai noc nha. \n\t3. Le.
脗=van [wen3]\n\t1. Khoe moi, hop lien. Tuc dung nhu chu van 吻.
脘=quan, oan [wan3]\n\t1 Lan trong cua da day, tren ron nam tac goi la thuong quan 上脘, tren ron bon tac chinh giua da day goi la trung quan 中脘, tren ron hai tac goi la ha quan 下脘. Ta quen doc la chu oan.
脚=cuoc [jiao3|jue2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cuoc 腳.
脛=hinh [jing4]\n\t1. Cang chan, tu dau goi den chan goi la hinh. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tinh thanh hac hinh ha dung doan 性成鶴脛何容斷 chan hac tanh von dai, cat ngan lam sao duoc.
胫=hinh [jing4]\n\t1. Cang chan, tu dau goi den chan goi la hinh. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tinh thanh hac hinh ha dung doan 性成鶴脛何容斷 chan hac tanh von dai, cat ngan lam sao duoc.
脝=hanh [heng1]\n\t1. Banh hanh 膨脝 truong phenh. Vi the nen su gi ngay mot mo rong hon len goi la banh truong 膨漲. Cung viet la 膨脹.
脞=thoa, toa [cuo3]\n\t1. Tung thoa 叢脞 tun mun, khong co chi to lon. Ta quen doc la chu toa.
脡=dinh [ting3]\n\t1. Nem thai khuc dai. \n\t2. Thang cung.
脣=than [chun2]\n\t1. Moi. Than vong xi han 脣亡齒寒 moi ho rang lanh, y noi cac nuoc lang gieng voi nhau phai dua lan nhau moi du chong voi nuoc khac, neu tu chia re nhau thi tat bi ke manh tan pha.
脧=tuyen, thoi [juan1]\n\t1. Giam bot, rut bot. \n\t2. Mot am la thoi. Dai tre con.
脩=tu [xiu1]\n\t1. Nem, thit thai bop thinh cho kho goi la tu. Ngay xua den choi dau mang mot goi nem de lam qua. Hoc tro den xin hoc cung mang theo bo nem ("thuc tu 束脩) lam le. Vi the nen doi sau goi nhung bong loc cua thay giao la thuc tu, co khi goi tat la tu. Luan ngu 論語. Tu hanh thuc tu di thuong, ngo vi thuong vo hoi yen 自行束脩以上，吾未嘗無誨焉 ai dang le de xin hoc thi tu mot bo nem tro len, ta chua tung (che la it) ma khong day. \n\t2. Sua, dai. Cung nghia voi chu tu 修. \n\t3. Kho khao.
脫=thoat, doai [tuo1]\n\t1. Roc, loc, boc tuot. Thit da lang xuong di roi goi la thoat. Vat gi roi ra deu goi la thoat. Nhu thoat ly quan he 脫離關係 da lia han moi quan he, thoat quan 脫冠 cat mu. \n\t2. So luoc. Nguoi nao khong cau chap le tuc goi la sai thoat 灑脫 hay sieu thoat 超脫. \n\t3. Roi mat. Nhu thoat lac 脫落 lot roi di mat. \n\t4. Khoi, thoat khoi. \n\t5. Hoac gia the chang. \n\t6. Mot am la doai. Doai doai 脫脫 thu thai, thong tha.
脱=thoat, doai [tuo1]\n\t1. Roc, loc, boc tuot. Thit da lang xuong di roi goi la thoat. Vat gi roi ra deu goi la thoat. Nhu thoat ly quan he 脫離關係 da lia han moi quan he, thoat quan 脫冠 cat mu. \n\t2. So luoc. Nguoi nao khong cau chap le tuc goi la sai thoat 灑脫 hay sieu thoat 超脫. \n\t3. Roi mat. Nhu thoat lac 脫落 lot roi di mat. \n\t4. Khoi, thoat khoi. \n\t5. Hoac gia the chang. \n\t6. Mot am la doai. Doai doai 脫脫 thu thai, thong tha.
脬=phao [pao1]\n\t1. Bong dai, cai bong bong.
脯=bo [fu3|pu2]\n\t1. Nem, thit luoc chin roi phoi kho goi la bo. \n\t2. Cac thu qua kho cung goi la bo. Nhu dao bo 桃脯 dao phoi kho.
脰=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Co, cho co duoi cam goi la dau.
脖=bot [bo2]\n\t1. Tuc goi cai co la bot hang 脖項 hay bot tu 脖子.
脹=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Truong. Bung day ran len goi la phuc truong 腹脹. Ne sung goi la thung truong 腫脹.
胀=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. Truong. Bung day ran len goi la phuc truong 腹脹. Ne sung goi la thung truong 腫脹.
脾=ti [pi2]\n\t1. La lach. \n\t2. Tuc goi tinh tinh nguoi la ti khi 脾氣.
腁=bien [pian2]\n\t1. Chai dop. Lam an kho nhoc chan tay chai ra goi la bien de 胼胝.
腆=thien, dien [tian3]\n\t1. Hau, day dan. Vat gi khong duoc day du la bat thien 不腆. \n\t2. Kheo, hay. \n\t3. Chu, cung nhu chu chu 主. Ta quen doc chu dien.
腊=tich [la4|xi1]\n\t1. Thit kho.
腋=dich [ye4]\n\t1. Nach. Nach lien ngay voi canh tay, vi the su gi thiet can goi la truu dich 肘腋. \n\t2. Da nach con ho. Nhu tap dich thanh cuu 集腋成裘 hop da ho thanh ao cuu. Vi the su gi linh tinh ma thu xep lai cho te chinh cung goi la tap dich 集腋.
腌=yem [a1|yan1]\n\t1. Uop, lay muoi uop cac thu thit ca cho khoi thiu thoi goi la yem. \n\t2. Tuc goi mui hoi thoi khong sach la yem cham 腌臢.
腎=than [shen4]\n\t1. Bo duc, qua cat. \n\t2. Ngoai than 外腎 hat dai. Mot ten la cao hoan 睾丸.
肾=than [shen4]\n\t1. Bo duc, qua cat. \n\t2. Ngoai than 外腎 hat dai. Mot ten la cao hoan 睾丸.
腐=hu [fu3]\n\t1. Thoi nat. \n\t2. Cu rich, khong thong dat. Nhu hu nho 腐儒 nguoi hoc tro hu lau. \n\t3. Hu hinh 腐刑 hinh thien dai . Tu Ma Thien 司馬遷 da chiu kho hinh nay. \n\t4. Dau hu 豆腐 dau phu.
腑=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Da day, mat, ruot gia, ruot non, bong bong, ba mang mo. trung y thuong chi vi, dam, dai trang, tieu trang, bang quang, tam tieu 中醫上指胃、膽、大腸、小腸、膀胱、三焦 goi la luc phu 六腑. Xem ngu tang 五臟. \n\t2. Tuc goi tam long la phe phu 肺腑.
腓=phi [fei2]\n\t1. Bong chan, bap chan. \n\t2. Dau, om. \n\t3. Lanh.
腔=khang, xoang [qiang1]\n\t1. Xuong rong, cac loai dong vat nhu sau bo, san ho goi la khang trang dong vat 腔腸動物 loai dong vat ruot rong. \n\t2. Cho rong khong o trong nguc cung goi la khang. \n\t3. Dieu hat. Ta quen doc la chu xoang.
腕=oan [wan4]\n\t1. Co tay. Nguoi ta toi luc that y thuong chong tay tho dai, nen toan tinh khong ra goi la ach oan 扼腕.
腠=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Tho da, cho da ngoai da trong giap nhau goi la thau ly 腠理.
腥=tinh [xing1]\n\t1. Thit song. Luan ngu 論語. Quan tu tinh, tat thuc nhi tien chi 君賜腥，必熟而薦之 vua ban thit tuoi thi cho nau chin, cung to tien roi moi an. \n\t2. Tanh.
腦=nao [nao3]\n\t1. Oc. Phan o khap ca bo dau goi la oc lon. dai nao 大腦, chu ve viec tri giac van dong, phan o sau oc lon hinh nhu qua bong nho tieu nao. 小腦, chuyen chu ve van dong, o duoi day oc lon goi la oc giua trung nao. 中腦, duoi lien voi tuy xuong song, goi la duyen tuy 延髓, deu chu su tho hut. Do oc giua xuong tuy chia ra cac day nho di suot ca minh goi la nao khi can 腦氣筋 day gan oc, hay la nao than kinh 腦神經.
脑=nao [nao3]\n\t1. Oc. Phan o khap ca bo dau goi la oc lon. dai nao 大腦, chu ve viec tri giac van dong, phan o sau oc lon hinh nhu qua bong nho tieu nao. 小腦, chuyen chu ve van dong, o duoi day oc lon goi la oc giua trung nao. 中腦, duoi lien voi tuy xuong song, goi la duyen tuy 延髓, deu chu su tho hut. Do oc giua xuong tuy chia ra cac day nho di suot ca minh goi la nao khi can 腦氣筋 day gan oc, hay la nao than kinh 腦神經.
腩=nam [nan3]\n\t1. Nem, thit trau non.
腫=thung, trung [zhong3]\n\t1. Sung, ne. Vat gi nang ne bung sung lam cung goi la ung thung 擁腫. Trang Tu 莊子. Ngo huu dai thu, nhan vi chi Vu, ky dai ban ung thung nhi bat trung thang mac 吾有大樹，人謂之樗，其大本擁腫，而不中繩墨 toi co mot cay lon, nguoi ta goi no la cay cay xu, goc lon no loi lom, khong dung day muc. \n\t2. Nhot. Cung doc la chu trung.
肿=thung, trung [zhong3]\n\t1. Sung, ne. Vat gi nang ne bung sung lam cung goi la ung thung 擁腫. Trang Tu 莊子. Ngo huu dai thu, nhan vi chi Vu, ky dai ban ung thung nhi bat trung thang mac 吾有大樹，人謂之樗，其大本擁腫，而不中繩墨 toi co mot cay lon, nguoi ta goi no la cay cay xu, goc lon no loi lom, khong dung day muc. \n\t2. Nhot. Cung doc la chu trung.
腮=tai [sai1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tai 顋.
腯=dot [tu2]\n\t1. Beo, map. Phi ban 肥胖 beo map.
腰=yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Lung. Tuc goi qua cat la yeu tu 腰子. \n\t2. Eo. Cho dat nao hai dau phinh giua that lai goi la yeu. Nhu hai yeu 海腰 eo be.
腱=kien, kien [jian4]\n\t1. Dau gan. Nhu cho dau gan cac giong vat nau lam do an ngon, ta goi la sun. Cung doc la chu kien.
腳=cuoc [jiao3|jue2]\n\t1. Cang chan. \n\t2. Chan de di, vi the nen so tien tang de an duong goi la thuy cuoc 水腳. \n\t3. Duoi. Nhu son cuoc 山腳 chan nui. \n\t4. Pham cai gi bam o sau deu goi la cuoc. Nhu trong mot cau van hay mot doan sach co chua them may chu nho o ben goi la chu cuoc 注腳 hay thiet cuoc 切腳.
脚=cuoc [jiao3|jue2]\n\t1. Cang chan. \n\t2. Chan de di, vi the nen so tien tang de an duong goi la thuy cuoc 水腳. \n\t3. Duoi. Nhu son cuoc 山腳 chan nui. \n\t4. Pham cai gi bam o sau deu goi la cuoc. Nhu trong mot cau van hay mot doan sach co chua them may chu nho o ben goi la chu cuoc 注腳 hay thiet cuoc 切腳.
腴=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cho se bung, cho thit beo nhun deu goi la du. \n\t2. Day dep, beo tot. Nhu dat ruong tot goi la cao du 膏腴. \n\t3. Ruot lon, ruot cho.
腷=phuc [bi4]\n\t1. Phuc uc 腷臆 nin hoi khong tho.
腸=trang, truong [chang2]\n\t1. Ruot. Phan nho lien voi da day goi la tieu trang 小腸 ruot non, phan to lien voi lo dit goi la dai trang 大腸 ruot gia. Con doc la truong. \n\t2. Doan trang 斷腸 rat dau long. Ly Bach 李白. Nhat chi hong diem lo ngung huong, Van vu Vu son uong doan truong 一枝紅艷露凝香，雲雨巫山枉斷腸 Nang (Duong Qui Phi 楊貴妃) nhu mot canh hong dep phu moc dong huong, (khien cho) than nu may mua o Vu son cung phai dut ruot.
肠=trang, truong [chang2]\n\t1. Ruot. Phan nho lien voi da day goi la tieu trang 小腸 ruot non, phan to lien voi lo dit goi la dai trang 大腸 ruot gia. Con doc la truong. \n\t2. Doan trang 斷腸 rat dau long. Ly Bach 李白. Nhat chi hong diem lo ngung huong, Van vu Vu son uong doan truong 一枝紅艷露凝香，雲雨巫山枉斷腸 Nang (Duong Qui Phi 楊貴妃) nhu mot canh hong dep phu moc dong huong, (khien cho) than nu may mua o Vu son cung phai dut ruot.
腹=phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Bung, duoi nguc la bung. Bung o dang truoc minh nguoi ta, nen cai gi o dang truoc cung goi la phuc. Nhu phuc boi thu dich 腹背受敵 truoc sau bi giac vay ca. \n\t2. Tam long. Nhu cam bo phuc tam 敢布腹心 (Ta truyen 左傳) dam bay dai tam long. \n\t3. Dum boc.
腺=tuyen [xian4]\n\t1. Trong the xac cac dong vat cho nao bat chat nuoc ra goi la tuyen. Nhu nhu tuyen 乳腺 hach sua, han tuyen 汗腺 hach mo hoi.
腿=thoi [tui3]\n\t1. Dui. Dui ve goi la dai thoi 大腿, bap chan goi la tieu thoi 小腿. Nguyen viet la thoi 骽.
膀=bang [bang3|pang1|pang2]\n\t1. Bang quang 膀胱 bong bong, bong dai. \n\t2. Tuc goi bap vai la kien bang 肩膀.
膂=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Xuong song. Xuong song la cai tru cot ca minh nguoi, nen goi suc voc la lu luc 膂力.
膃=ot [wa4]\n\t1. Ot nap 膃肭 con cho be, mot thu hai san dau nhu cho, cai hot dai no goi la ot nap te 膃肭臍 dung lam thuoc duoc, con goi la hai cau than 海狗腎. 
腽=ot [wa4]\n\t1. Ot nap 膃肭 con cho be, mot thu hai san dau nhu cho, cai hot dai no goi la ot nap te 膃肭臍 dung lam thuoc duoc, con goi la hai cau than 海狗腎. 
膆=to [su4]\n\t1. Co hong an, cai dieu cac giong thu. Cung nhu chu to 嗉.
膈=cach [ge2]\n\t1. Mang nguc, tuc la cai hoanh cach mo 橫膈膜 o duoi nguc tren bung, de phan gioi han nguc va bung.
膊=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Bap tay, phan tay gan vai goi la thuong bac 上膊, phan tay o duoi goi la ha bac 下膊. \n\t2. Nem. \n\t3. Phanh thay xe xac.
膋=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Mang mo o ruot.
膏=cao, cao [gao1|gao4]\n\t1. Mo. Mo mieng goi la chi 脂, mo nuoc goi la cao 膏. Nhu lan cao 蘭膏 dau thom, cao moc 膏沐 sap boi, v.v. \n\t2. Do an beo ngay goi la cao. Nhu cao luong 膏粱 thit beo gao trang, y noi la ke an ngon mac suong. Cho dat tot mau goi la cao du chi dia 膏腴之地. \n\t3. Cho duoi qua tim goi la cao. Nhu cao hoang chi tat 膏肓之疾 benh vao cho nguy hiem, benh nang. \n\t4. Nhuan tham. Nhu cao lo 膏露 moc ngot, suong moc mat me. Ngay xua lay mua moc vi voi an trach, cho nen goi an trach la cao. Nhu cao trach ha u dan 膏澤下於民 (Manh Tu 孟子) an trach tham toi dan. \n\t5. Thuoc cao, thuoc dun cho co dac de lau khong thiu goi la cao. Cac thuc an co dong dac cho tien de danh cung goi la cao. \n\t6. Mot am la cao. Tham. Nhu am vu cao chi 陰雨膏之 (Thi Kinh 詩經) mua dam tham cho.
膓=trang [chang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trang 腸.
膘=phieu [biao1]\n\t1. Beo, ngua beo goi la phieu.
膚=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Da ngoai. Su tai hai den than goi la thiet phu chi thong 切膚之痛 dau nhu cat da. \n\t2. O ngoai vao. Nhu phu thu chi to 膚受之愬 su cao mach o ngoai, khong phai trong co toi thuc. Luan ngu 論語. Tam nhuan chi tram, phu phu chi to, bat hanh yen, kha vi minh da di hy 浸潤之譖，膚受之愬，不行焉，可謂明也已矣 nhung loi giem pha tham nhuan, nhung loi vu cao nhu dam vao da thit, (nhung loi do) neu khong tac dong gi den ta, thi co the goi la sang suot. Hoc thuat khong tinh goi la mat hoc phu thu 末學膚受 y noi chi biet lo mo, hieu khong duoc tham. Van chuong nong noi goi la phu thien 膚淺 hay phu phiem 膚泛, v.v. \n\t3. Lon. Nhu phu cong 膚功 cong lon. \n\t4. Voc bon ngon tay lai goi la phu. Mot cach dong luong cua doi xua, cung nhu ta xuc vao tay khum bon ngon tay lai goi la mot le. Nen noi ve be mat hep nho thi goi la phu thon 膚寸. \n\t5. Thit lon. \n\t6. Thit thai.
肤=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Da ngoai. Su tai hai den than goi la thiet phu chi thong 切膚之痛 dau nhu cat da. \n\t2. O ngoai vao. Nhu phu thu chi to 膚受之愬 su cao mach o ngoai, khong phai trong co toi thuc. Luan ngu 論語. Tam nhuan chi tram, phu phu chi to, bat hanh yen, kha vi minh da di hy 浸潤之譖，膚受之愬，不行焉，可謂明也已矣 nhung loi giem pha tham nhuan, nhung loi vu cao nhu dam vao da thit, (nhung loi do) neu khong tac dong gi den ta, thi co the goi la sang suot. Hoc thuat khong tinh goi la mat hoc phu thu 末學膚受 y noi chi biet lo mo, hieu khong duoc tham. Van chuong nong noi goi la phu thien 膚淺 hay phu phiem 膚泛, v.v. \n\t3. Lon. Nhu phu cong 膚功 cong lon. \n\t4. Voc bon ngon tay lai goi la phu. Mot cach dong luong cua doi xua, cung nhu ta xuc vao tay khum bon ngon tay lai goi la mot le. Nen noi ve be mat hep nho thi goi la phu thon 膚寸. \n\t5. Thit lon. \n\t6. Thit thai.
膛=thang [tang2]\n\t1. Noi trong khong o trong minh nguoi. Nhu hung thang 胸膛 trong nguc. \n\t2. Pham vat gi trong long rong deu goi la thang. Nhu tien thang 前膛 long sung truoc, hau thang 後膛 long sung sau, v.v.
膜=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Mang, mot thu mang mong de rang rit tang phu va cac co quan trong minh. Nhu nhan mo 眼膜 mang mat, nhi mo 耳膜 mang tai, v.v. Noi rong ra nhu mang mong o trong cac thu qua cay cung goi la mo ca. \n\t2. Mo bai 膜拜 quy dai ma lay.
膝=tat [xi1]\n\t1. Dau goi. Dau goi co khop co lai duoi ra duoc, cho nen goi quy la khuat tat 屈膝 uon goi. Ninh not de cau canh nguoi cung goi la khuat tat. Doi voi cha me goi la tat ha thua hoan 膝下承歡 nuong vui duoi goi.
膞=thuan, thuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Xuong dui. \n\t2. Cai chot quay cua cua tho gom. Cung doc la chu thuyen.
膠=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Keo. Lay da cac loai dong vat nau thanh cao goi la giao. \n\t2. Goa vo lai lay vo khac goi la giao tuc 膠續. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Cong dai uu, cap vi giao tuc di giai, nhi cong tu bat lac 公大憂，急為膠續以解之，而公子不樂 ong lo lam, gap tim vo khac giai muon cho con. Nhung cong tu khong vui. \n\t3. Pham vat gi dinh cung goi la giao. Nhu thu giao 樹膠 nhua cay. \n\t4. Gan lien. Nhu giao tru co sat 膠柱鼓瑟 de chat phim gay dan, y noi ke cau ne khong biet bien thong. \n\t5. Ben chat. Nhu giao tat 膠漆 keo son, y noi be ban choi voi nhau than thiet nhu keo son khong roi. \n\t6. Thuyen mac can. \n\t7. Ten trang hoc ngay xua.
胶=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Keo. Lay da cac loai dong vat nau thanh cao goi la giao. \n\t2. Goa vo lai lay vo khac goi la giao tuc 膠續. Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異. Cong dai uu, cap vi giao tuc di giai, nhi cong tu bat lac 公大憂，急為膠續以解之，而公子不樂 ong lo lam, gap tim vo khac giai muon cho con. Nhung cong tu khong vui. \n\t3. Pham vat gi dinh cung goi la giao. Nhu thu giao 樹膠 nhua cay. \n\t4. Gan lien. Nhu giao tru co sat 膠柱鼓瑟 de chat phim gay dan, y noi ke cau ne khong biet bien thong. \n\t5. Ben chat. Nhu giao tat 膠漆 keo son, y noi be ban choi voi nhau than thiet nhu keo son khong roi. \n\t6. Thuyen mac can. \n\t7. Ten trang hoc ngay xua.
膨=banh [peng2]\n\t1. Banh hanh 膨脝 truong phenh. Vi the nen su gi ngay mot mo rong hon len goi la banh truong 膨漲. Cung viet la 膨脹.
膩=ni, nhi [ni4]\n\t1. Beo, do an co chat beo ngay goi la ni. \n\t2. Tron nhan. Nhu co ly te ni 肌理細膩 da de non na, so thay nhan nhui. \n\t3. Cau ban. Ta quen doc la chu nhi.
腻=ni, nhi [ni4]\n\t1. Beo, do an co chat beo ngay goi la ni. \n\t2. Tron nhan. Nhu co ly te ni 肌理細膩 da de non na, so thay nhan nhui. \n\t3. Cau ban. Ta quen doc la chu nhi.
膰=phien, phan [fan2]\n\t1. Thit phan te, thit luoc chin dem te roi chia phan goi la phien nhuc 膰肉. Ta quen doc la chu phan.
膳=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Co an. \n\t2. Chuc quan coi viec nau nuong cho vua an goi la thien te 膳宰. \n\t3. Tuc goi an com la dung thien 用膳.
膴=ho, vu [hu1]\n\t1. Mieng thit lon. \n\t2. To lon, day du. Nhu dan tuy mi ho 民雖靡膴 dan du chang du (Thi Kinh 詩經). \n\t3. Mot am la vu. Nhu vu vu 膴膴 tot mau, tot tuoi.
膵=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Cho mo vang bam lien vao la lach de sinh ra nuoc ngot tham vao da day de giup suc tieu hoa cac do an. Cung viet la 脺.
膺=ung [ying1]\n\t1. Nguc. Kham phuc ai nhu om vao long goi la phuc ung 服膺. \n\t2. Chiu, duong lay. Nhu mau ung tuoc vi 謬膺爵位 lam duong lay ngoi tuoc, loi noi tu nhun minh dam duong lay ngoi tuoc nay la vua lam cho, chu thuc ra thi tai minh khong dang. \n\t3. Danh. Nhu nhung dich thi ung 戎狄是膺 ro moi phai danh, y noi ro moi phai danh duoi di khong cho xam lan vao trong nuoc. \n\t4. Cuong ngua, dai ngua.
膽=dam [dan3]\n\t1. Mat, o nep trong la gan thuong ri nuoc dang ra de tieu chat mo. \n\t2. Ngay xua bao nguoi ta co gan goc la vi cai mat, cho nen nguoi khong e so gi goi la dai dam 大膽, nguoi co long sot sang vi nghia quen minh goi la can dam 肝膽. \n\t3. Noi long. Nhu phi can lich dam 披肝瀝膽 phoi gan rach mat, y noi to het noi long cho nguoi biet. \n\t4. Long trong cua cai do gi. Nhu cai cua ga o trong dan, sao, cai nong lot o trong am pha che, tuc deu goi la dam ca. \n\t5. Lau sach di, chui di.
胆=dam [dan3]\n\t1. Mat, o nep trong la gan thuong ri nuoc dang ra de tieu chat mo. \n\t2. Ngay xua bao nguoi ta co gan goc la vi cai mat, cho nen nguoi khong e so gi goi la dai dam 大膽, nguoi co long sot sang vi nghia quen minh goi la can dam 肝膽. \n\t3. Noi long. Nhu phi can lich dam 披肝瀝膽 phoi gan rach mat, y noi to het noi long cho nguoi biet. \n\t4. Long trong cua cai do gi. Nhu cai cua ga o trong dan, sao, cai nong lot o trong am pha che, tuc deu goi la dam ca. \n\t5. Lau sach di, chui di.
膾=quai, khoai [kuai4]\n\t1. Nem, thit thai nho. Tuc doc la khoai. Luan ngu 論語. Tu bat yem tinh, khoai bat yem te 食不厭精，膾不厭細 com cang trang tinh cang thich, goi thai cang nho cang tot.
脍=quai, khoai [kuai4]\n\t1. Nem, thit thai nho. Tuc doc la khoai. Luan ngu 論語. Tu bat yem tinh, khoai bat yem te 食不厭精，膾不厭細 com cang trang tinh cang thich, goi thai cang nho cang tot.
膿=nung [nong2]\n\t1. Mu.
脓=nung [nong2]\n\t1. Mu.
臀=don [tun2]\n\t1. Hong, cho lien voi lung goi la don. \n\t2. Tron, day, duoi tron duoi day cai do gi deu goi la don.
臂=ty [bei5|bi4]\n\t1. Canh tay tren. Noi bong ve su cung nhau di an goi la ba ty nhap lam 把臂入林 khoac tay vao rung. Hai ben trai nhau goi la that chi giao ty 失之交臂 khong khoac tay nua. \n\t2. Cai ao tran thu goi la ban ty 半臂 cai ao coc tay. \n\t3. Giong gi co tay nhu canh tay nguoi deu goi la ty. Nhu duong ty duong xa 螳臂當車 canh tay bo ngua chong xe, y noi khong biet luong suc vay.
臄=cuoc [jue2]\n\t1. Ham ech, cho ham tren mieng.
臆=uc [yi4]\n\t1. Nguc. Noi bong nghia la tam long. Nhu tu uc 私臆 noi rieng. \n\t2. Lay y rieng doan. Nhu uc dac 臆度 doan phong, uc thuyet 臆說 noi phong, v.v.
臈=lap [la4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lap 臘.
臉=kiem, thiem [lian3]\n\t1. Ma, cho ma giap voi mat. \n\t2. Sac mat, ve mat, doc la chu liem. Ta quen doc la chu thiem. 
脸=kiem, thiem [lian3]\n\t1. Ma, cho ma giap voi mat. \n\t2. Sac mat, ve mat, doc la chu liem. Ta quen doc la chu thiem. 
臊=tao, tao [sao1|sao4]\n\t1. Mui thit tanh hoi. \n\t2. Then do mat. Ta quen doc la chu tao.
臋=don [tun2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu don 臀.
臍=te [qi2]\n\t1. Ron, luc dua tre moi sinh con co cuong nhau dinh vao trong bung goi la te dai 臍帶 cuong ron. \n\t2. Vat gi lum xuong deu goi la te. Nhu qua te 瓜臍 num dua. \n\t3. Yem cua.
脐=te [qi2]\n\t1. Ron, luc dua tre moi sinh con co cuong nhau dinh vao trong bung goi la te dai 臍帶 cuong ron. \n\t2. Vat gi lum xuong deu goi la te. Nhu qua te 瓜臍 num dua. \n\t3. Yem cua.
臏=tan, ban [bin4]\n\t1. Xuong banh choe, xuong mat dau goi. Vi the nen ai bi hinh phat chat mat xuong dau goi di goi la tan. Cung doc la chu ban.
膑=tan, ban [bin4]\n\t1. Xuong banh choe, xuong mat dau goi. Vi the nen ai bi hinh phat chat mat xuong dau goi di goi la tan. Cung doc la chu ban.
臑=nao, nhu [er2]\n\t1. Canh tay tren, chan tren cua cac giong suc goi la mao. \n\t2. Mot am la nhu. Mem, mem sun.
臕=phieu [biao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phieu 膘.
臘=lap [la4|xi1]\n\t1. Te chap. Le nha Chu, cu cuoi nam te tat nien goi la dai lap 大臘, vi the nen   thang 12 cuoi nam goi la lap nguyet 臘月 thang chap. \n\t2. Thit ca uop. \n\t3. Tuoi su. Phat phap cu di ha duoc mot nam ke la mot tuoi, goi la lap hay ha lap, chu khong ke tuoi doi. \n\t4. Mui nhon.
腊=lap [la4|xi1]\n\t1. Te chap. Le nha Chu, cu cuoi nam te tat nien goi la dai lap 大臘, vi the nen   thang 12 cuoi nam goi la lap nguyet 臘月 thang chap. \n\t2. Thit ca uop. \n\t3. Tuoi su. Phat phap cu di ha duoc mot nam ke la mot tuoi, goi la lap hay ha lap, chu khong ke tuoi doi. \n\t4. Mui nhon.
臙=yen [yan1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu yen 胭.
臚=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Bay, xep bay goi la lu liet 臚列. \n\t2. Truyen, tren truyen bao duoi goi la lu. Phep doi khoa cu thi dinh xong, sang som xuong danh cac nguoi do goi la truyen lu 傳臚. \n\t3. Bung truoc.
