胪=lu [lu2]\n\t1. Bay, xep bay goi la lu liet 臚列. \n\t2. Truyen, tren truyen bao duoi goi la lu. Phep doi khoa cu thi dinh xong, sang som xuong danh cac nguoi do goi la truyen lu 傳臚. \n\t3. Bung truoc.
臛=hoac [huo4]\n\t1. Canh thit. \n\t2. Hun, nung.
臝=loa [luo3]\n\t1. Tran truong. Cung nhu chu loa 裸. \n\t2. Giong thu it long.
臞=cu [gu2]\n\t1. Gay go.
臟=tang [zang1|zang4]\n\t1. Tang, mot danh tu de goi tom cac khi quan o trong bung. Tim, gan, la lach, phoi, bau duc. tam, can, ti, phe, than 心、肝、脾、肺、腎, goi la ngu tang 五臟. Xem luc phu 六腑.
脏=tang [zang1|zang4]\n\t1. Tang, mot danh tu de goi tom cac khi quan o trong bung. Tim, gan, la lach, phoi, bau duc. tam, can, ti, phe, than 心、肝、脾、肺、腎, goi la ngu tang 五臟. Xem luc phu 六腑.
臠=luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Thit thai tung mieng. Nhu cam luyen 禁臠 thit cam. Truyen doi Tan Nguyen de 晉元帝, y noi thit ay chi de vua an, khong ai duoc an vay. Sau vua Hieu Vu ken re cho Tan Lang cong chua, de y den Ta Con luon. Chua bao lau, Vien Tung cung muon ga con gai cho Ta Con, nen Vien Tuan moi bao Vien Tung rang. Anh dung co mo vao mieng thit cam ay. Vi the nen su vat gi dang quy goi la cam luyen 禁臠 va goi re la cam luyen khach 禁臠客 deu vi co do.
脔=luyen [luan2]\n\t1. Thit thai tung mieng. Nhu cam luyen 禁臠 thit cam. Truyen doi Tan Nguyen de 晉元帝, y noi thit ay chi de vua an, khong ai duoc an vay. Sau vua Hieu Vu ken re cho Tan Lang cong chua, de y den Ta Con luon. Chua bao lau, Vien Tung cung muon ga con gai cho Ta Con, nen Vien Tuan moi bao Vien Tung rang. Anh dung co mo vao mieng thit cam ay. Vi the nen su vat gi dang quy goi la cam luyen 禁臠 va goi re la cam luyen khach 禁臠客 deu vi co do.
臡=ne [ni2]\n\t1. Thu giam ngam ca xuong.
臢=cham [za1]\n\t1. Yen cham 腌臢 ban thiu.
臣=than [chen2]\n\t1. Bay toi. Quan o trong nuoc co vua goi la than. \n\t2. Ke chiu thong thuoc duoi quyen nguoi cung goi la than. Nhu than boc 臣僕 toi to, than thiep 臣妾 nang hau, v.v. Ngay xua goi nhung ke lam quan hai ho la nhi than 貳臣. \n\t3. Co nhan noi chuyen voi ban cung hay xung la than 臣, cung nhu bay gio xung la boc 僕.
臥=ngoa [wo4]\n\t1. Nam. Vuong Han 王翰. Tuy ngoa sa truong quan mac tieu, Co lai chinh chien ky nhan hoi 醉臥沙場君莫笑，古來征戰幾人回 Say nam o sa truong xin ban dung cuoi, xua nay chinh chien may nguoi ve. \n\t2. Nghi ngoi. \n\t3. Dep het, thoi. Nhu ngoa danh loi gia ta sinh nguy 臥名利者寫生危 dep het cai long danh loi thi khong bi cai luy hiem nguy. \n\t4. Ngam nghia, doi Luc trieu goi su doc sach la ngoa du 臥遊 y noi khong phai di dau ma duoc ngam nghia cac thang canh vay. \n\t5. Pham vat gi de ngang cung goi la ngoa ca.
卧=ngoa [wo4]\n\t1. Nam. Vuong Han 王翰. Tuy ngoa sa truong quan mac tieu, Co lai chinh chien ky nhan hoi 醉臥沙場君莫笑，古來征戰幾人回 Say nam o sa truong xin ban dung cuoi, xua nay chinh chien may nguoi ve. \n\t2. Nghi ngoi. \n\t3. Dep het, thoi. Nhu ngoa danh loi gia ta sinh nguy 臥名利者寫生危 dep het cai long danh loi thi khong bi cai luy hiem nguy. \n\t4. Ngam nghia, doi Luc trieu goi su doc sach la ngoa du 臥遊 y noi khong phai di dau ma duoc ngam nghia cac thang canh vay. \n\t5. Pham vat gi de ngang cung goi la ngoa ca.
臧=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Hay, tot. \n\t2. Tang hoach 臧獲 toi to. Tu Ma Thien 司馬遷. Tha phu tang hoach ti thiep, do nang dan quyet, huong boc chi bat dac di ho 且夫臧獲婢妾，由能引決，況僕之不得已乎！ bon toi to ti thiep con biet giu tiet, tu quyet duoc, huong ho ke hen nay lai khong hieu cai le co khi bat dac di phai chet sao ?
臨=lam, lam [lin2]\n\t1. O tren soi xuong. Nhu giam lam 監臨 soi xet, dang lam 登臨 ngam nghia. Do Phu 杜甫. Hoa can cao lau thuong khach tam, Van phuong da nan thu dang lam 花近高樓傷客心，萬方多難此登臨 Hoa o gan lau cao lam dau long khach, (Trong khi) o muon phuong nhieu nan, ta len lau nay ngam ra xa. \n\t2. Toi, loi noi kinh nguoi doai den minh. Nhu quang lam 光臨 ngai doai den nha toi them rang ro. \n\t3. Kip. Nhu lam hanh 臨行 kip luc di. Manh Giao 孟郊. Lam hanh mat mat phung, Y khung tri tri quy 臨行密密縫，意恐遲遲歸 Luc (nguoi con) len duong, (ba me) khau soi chi ay ky cang len tren vat ao, y e ngai rang con (vi vui thu noi xa ma) tre duong ve. \n\t4. Mot am la lam. Moi nguoi cung khoc.
临=lam, lam [lin2]\n\t1. O tren soi xuong. Nhu giam lam 監臨 soi xet, dang lam 登臨 ngam nghia. Do Phu 杜甫. Hoa can cao lau thuong khach tam, Van phuong da nan thu dang lam 花近高樓傷客心，萬方多難此登臨 Hoa o gan lau cao lam dau long khach, (Trong khi) o muon phuong nhieu nan, ta len lau nay ngam ra xa. \n\t2. Toi, loi noi kinh nguoi doai den minh. Nhu quang lam 光臨 ngai doai den nha toi them rang ro. \n\t3. Kip. Nhu lam hanh 臨行 kip luc di. Manh Giao 孟郊. Lam hanh mat mat phung, Y khung tri tri quy 臨行密密縫，意恐遲遲歸 Luc (nguoi con) len duong, (ba me) khau soi chi ay ky cang len tren vat ao, y e ngai rang con (vi vui thu noi xa ma) tre duong ve. \n\t4. Mot am la lam. Moi nguoi cung khoc.
自=tu [zi4]\n\t1. Boi, tu. Nhu sinh huu tu lai 生有自來 sinh co tu dau ma sinh ra. \n\t2. Minh, chinh minh. Nhu tu tu 自修 tu sua lay minh. \n\t3. Tu nhien, khong phai mien cuong.
臬=nghiet, niet [nie4]\n\t1. Cai nguong cua. \n\t2. Phep. Nhu khue nghiet 圭臬 cai do luong bong mat troi de biet cao thap. Vi the nen khuon phep de noi ma lam viec goi la khue nghiet. Ve ben toa an goi la nghiet ti 臬司 cung la noi nghia ay ca. Ta quen doc la chu niet.
臭=xu, khuu [xiu4]\n\t1. Mui. Nhu ki xu nhu lan 其臭如蘭 (Dich Kinh 易經, He Tu thuong 繫辭上) mui no nhu hoa lan. Bay gio thi thong dung de chi ve mui hoi thoi. \n\t2. Tieng xau. Nhu di xu van nien 遺臭萬年 de tieng xau muon nam. \n\t3. Mot am la khuu. Cung nghia voi chu khuu 嗅.
臯=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cao 皐.
至=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Den. Nhu tan chi nhu quy 賓至如歸 khach den nhu ve cho. \n\t2. Kip. Nhu tu thien tu di chi u thu nhan 自天子以至於庶人 tu vua den dan thuong. \n\t3. Rat, cung cuc. Nhu chi thanh 至聖 rat thanh, buc thanh nhat, chi ton 至尊 rat ton, buc ton trong nhat, v.v. \n\t4. Dong chi 冬至 ngay dong chi, ha chi 夏至 ngay ha chi. So di goi la chi vi bay gio vong mat troi da xoay den nam cuc bac cuc vay.
致=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Suy cung. Nhu cach tri 格致 suy cung le vat. Nghien cuu cho biet het thay cac vat co hinh, vo hinh trong khoang troi dat, no sinh, no diet, no hop, no ly the nao goi la cach tri 格致. \n\t2. Het, het bon phan minh voi nguoi, voi vat goi la tri. Nhu tri luc 致力 het suc, tri than 致身 dem ca than cho nguoi, v.v. Do Phu 杜甫. Truong An khanh tuong da thieu nien, Phu quy ung tu tri than tao 長安卿相多少年，富貴應須致身早 Tai Truong An, cac khanh tuong phan nhieu it tuoi, Can phai som duoc giau sang, som duoc doc long phung su. \n\t3. Dung ke lua cho nguoi den cho chet goi la tri chi tu dia 致之死地 lua vao cho chet. Dung phep luat co buoc nguoi vao toi goi la van chi 文致. \n\t4. Trao, dua. Nhu tri thu 致書 dua thu. \n\t5. Tra lai cung goi la tri. Nhu tri chanh 致政 trao tra chanh quyen ve huu. \n\t6. Lay y minh dat cho nguoi biet cung goi la tri. Nhu tri y 致思 gui y. Vi gian tiep moi dat toi goi la truyen tri 傳致 hay chuyen tri 轉致, v.v. \n\t7. Dat de. Nhu tri quan Nghieu Thuan 致君堯舜 lam cho vua toi buc gioi nhu vua Nghieu vua Thuan, tri than thanh van 致身青雲 lam cho minh toi bac cao xa. Cu theo mot cai muc dich minh da dinh ma lam cho duoc deu goi la tri. \n\t8. Pham lam cai gi, hoac vi truc tiep hoac vi gian tiep, ma chiu duoc cai anh huong cua no deu goi la tri. Nhu di thuong tri phu 以商致富 lay nghe buon ma den giau, truc ngon tri hoa 直言致禍 vi noi thang ma mac hoa. Khong kho nhoc gi ma duoc huong quyen loi goi la toa tri 坐致. Trong choc lat ma lieu bien duoc du ngay goi la lap tri 立致. \n\t9. Voi lai, voi cho den voi minh goi la tri. Nhu la tri 羅致 vet toi, san toi, chieu tri 招致 voi toi. Chieu tri nhan tai 招致人才 nghia la voi nguoi hien tai den. \n\t10. Vat ngoai no thua co ma xam vao cung goi la tri. Nhu nhan phong han tri benh 因風寒致病 nhan gio ret thua hu no vao ma den om benh. Vi the nen bi ngoai vat no buc bach khong the khong theo the duoc cung goi la tri. Nhu tinh tri 情致 cho tinh no den, hung tri 興致 cho hung den, v.v. \n\t11. Thai do. Nhu nha nhan tham tri 雅人深致 nguoi co thai do nha la. Ta cai tinh trang vat goi la canh tri 景致, moc mac goi la chuyet tri 拙致, khac voi moi nguoi goi la biet tri 別致, v.v. deu la noi cai nghia ay ca. \n\t12. Duong loi. Nhu ngon van nhat tri 言文一致 loi noi loi van cung mot loi, noi dai khai goi la dai tri 大致 cung do mot nghia ay ca. \n\t13. Cung nghia voi chu chi 至. \n\t14. Cung nghia voi chu tri 緻.
臺=dai [tai2]\n\t1. Cai dai. Xay nha cho cao de ngam bon ben goi la dai. Pham chiem mot cho hoi cao de cho nguoi de nhan biet cung goi la dai. Nhu giang dai 講臺 toa giang, vu dai 舞臺 san khau, v.v. \n\t2. Ten so quan. Ngay xua goi quan thuong thu la trung dai 中臺, cac quan noi cac la dai tinh 臺省 hay dai cac 臺閣, nha Han co ngu su dai 御史臺. Vi the nen doi sau goi quan ngu su la dai quan 臺官 hay gian dai 諫臺. \n\t3. Chu dung de ton xung buc tren. Nhu cac quan duoi goi quan tren la hien dai 憲臺, be ban goi nhau la huynh dai 兄臺, v.v. \n\t4. Viec hen ha.
臻=tran [zhen1]\n\t1. Den, kip. Nhu lao canh nhat tran 老境日臻 canh gia ngay den.
臼=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cai coi, lam bang go hay bang da de gia cac thu. Thach cuu 石臼 coi da.
臾=du, dung [yu2]\n\t1. Tu du 須臾 choc lat, giay lat. \n\t2. Mot am la dung. Cung nghia voi chu dung 慂.
臿=trap [cha1]\n\t1. Cai chay de dap tuong. \n\t2. Cai mai, cai thuong. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu trap 插.
舀=yeu [yao3]\n\t1. Muc nuoc ben nay rot sang ben kia.
舁=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cong kenh, khieng.
舂=thung [chong1]\n\t1. Dam, gia. Nhu thung me 舂米 gia gao. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu xung 衝.
舃=tich [xi4]\n\t1. Giay hai lan de, giay cua vua di goi la xich tich 赤舃. Cung viet la 舄. \n\t2. Phu tich 鳧舃 mot tich truyen Vuong Kieu 王喬 tri huyen Diep doi nha Han. Vi the ve sau goi quan huyen la phu tich.
舄=tich [xi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tich 舃.
舅=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cau, anh em voi me goi la cuu. \n\t2. Bo chong. \n\t3. Chong goi bo vo la ngoai cuu 外舅. Cac anh em vo cung goi la cuu ca, nhu ta noi cac cau.
與=du, du [yu2|yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Kip, cung. Nhu phu du quy 富與貴 giau cung sang. \n\t2. Deu. Nhu kha du ngon thien 可與言善 kha deu noi viec thien. \n\t3. Choi than. Nhu tuong du 相與 cung choi, du quoc 與國 nuoc dong minh, dang du 黨與 cung dang, v.v. \n\t4. Hua cho, giup cho. Nhu bat vi thoi luan so du 不爲時論所與 khong duoc du luan nguoi doi bang long. \n\t5. Cap cho. Nhu pho du 付與 giao cho, thi du 施與 giup cho, v.v. \n\t6. Du ki 與其 vi thu, dung lam ngu tu. Nhu le, du ki xa da, ninh kiem 禮，與其奢也，寧儉 (Luan ngu 論語) vi thu le ma xa xi, tha tan tien con hon. \n\t7. Dong du 容與 nhan nha. \n\t8. Mot am la du. Tham du vao. Nhu du van ky su 與聞其事 du nghe viec do, noi trong khi xay ra su viec ay, minh cung nghe thay, cung du vao day. \n\t9. Lai mot am la ru. Dung lam ngu tu, nghia la vay vay ! Lai dung lam loi noi con ngo, nghia la vay ru ? the ru ? Nay thong dung chu du 歟.
与=du, du [yu2|yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Kip, cung. Nhu phu du quy 富與貴 giau cung sang. \n\t2. Deu. Nhu kha du ngon thien 可與言善 kha deu noi viec thien. \n\t3. Choi than. Nhu tuong du 相與 cung choi, du quoc 與國 nuoc dong minh, dang du 黨與 cung dang, v.v. \n\t4. Hua cho, giup cho. Nhu bat vi thoi luan so du 不爲時論所與 khong duoc du luan nguoi doi bang long. \n\t5. Cap cho. Nhu pho du 付與 giao cho, thi du 施與 giup cho, v.v. \n\t6. Du ki 與其 vi thu, dung lam ngu tu. Nhu le, du ki xa da, ninh kiem 禮，與其奢也，寧儉 (Luan ngu 論語) vi thu le ma xa xi, tha tan tien con hon. \n\t7. Dong du 容與 nhan nha. \n\t8. Mot am la du. Tham du vao. Nhu du van ky su 與聞其事 du nghe viec do, noi trong khi xay ra su viec ay, minh cung nghe thay, cung du vao day. \n\t9. Lai mot am la ru. Dung lam ngu tu, nghia la vay vay ! Lai dung lam loi noi con ngo, nghia la vay ru ? the ru ? Nay thong dung chu du 歟.
興=hung, hung [xing1|xing4]\n\t1. Day. Nhu tuc hung da mi 夙興夜寐 thuc khuya day som. \n\t2. Thinh. Nhu trung hung 中興 giua quang lai thinh, mot nha hay mot nuoc trai qua mot hoi suy lai co mot hoi thinh nua goi la trung hung. Hung vuong 興旺 thinh vuong. \n\t3. Noi len, lam len. Nhu dai hung tho moc 大興土木 noi lam nhieu viec xay dap, lam nhieu nha cua. \n\t4. Day len. Nhu dao trac phon hung 謠諑繁興 loi dem pha day len mai. \n\t5. Cat len. \n\t6. Mot am la hung. Hung, nhan nhin canh vat cam den tinh tinh ma phat ra goi la hung. Nhu thay canh nay ra loi tho goi la thi hung 詩興. \n\t7. Vui thich, y tu phat dong sinh ra vui thich goi la hung. Nhu hung tri 興致 hung thu thanh nhan, hung hoi 興會 y hung khoan khoai, cao hung 高興 hung thu bat len, du hung 餘興 hung thu con roi rot lai, v.v.
兴=hung, hung [xing1|xing4]\n\t1. Day. Nhu tuc hung da mi 夙興夜寐 thuc khuya day som. \n\t2. Thinh. Nhu trung hung 中興 giua quang lai thinh, mot nha hay mot nuoc trai qua mot hoi suy lai co mot hoi thinh nua goi la trung hung. Hung vuong 興旺 thinh vuong. \n\t3. Noi len, lam len. Nhu dai hung tho moc 大興土木 noi lam nhieu viec xay dap, lam nhieu nha cua. \n\t4. Day len. Nhu dao trac phon hung 謠諑繁興 loi dem pha day len mai. \n\t5. Cat len. \n\t6. Mot am la hung. Hung, nhan nhin canh vat cam den tinh tinh ma phat ra goi la hung. Nhu thay canh nay ra loi tho goi la thi hung 詩興. \n\t7. Vui thich, y tu phat dong sinh ra vui thich goi la hung. Nhu hung tri 興致 hung thu thanh nhan, hung hoi 興會 y hung khoan khoai, cao hung 高興 hung thu bat len, du hung 餘興 hung thu con roi rot lai, v.v.
舉=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cat len, gio len, cat noi. Nhu cu thu 舉手 cat tay, cu tuc 舉足 gio chan, cu boi 舉杯 cat chen, v.v. \n\t2. Cu dong. Nhu cu su 舉事 noi len lam viec, cung nhu ta noi khoi su 起事. The cho nen co hanh dong gi deu goi la cu ca. Nhu cu dong 舉動, cu chi 舉止, v.v. Su khong can lam nua ma cu boi ve ra goi la da thu nhat cu 多此一舉. \n\t3. Tien cu. Nhu suy cu 推舉 suy ton tien cu len, bao cu 保舉 bao linh tien cu len, v.v. Le thi huong ngay xua ai trung cach (do) goi la cu nhan 舉人. \n\t4. Pham khen ngoi hay ghi chep ai cung goi la cu, nhu xung cu 稱舉 de cu len ma khen, dieu cu 條舉 ghi tuong tung dieu de tieu bieu len. \n\t5. Sinh de, de con goi goi la cu 舉, khong sinh de goi la bat cu 不舉. \n\t6. Lay duoc, danh lay duoc thanh goi la cu. \n\t7. Bay cao, ke si tron doi goi la cao cu 高舉. Doi sau goi nhung nguoi co ke co tai hon nguoi la hien hien ha cu 軒軒霞舉 cung noi nghia ay. \n\t8. Deu ca. Nhu cu quoc 舉國 ca nuoc. \n\t9. Deu. \n\t10. Hop.
举=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cat len, gio len, cat noi. Nhu cu thu 舉手 cat tay, cu tuc 舉足 gio chan, cu boi 舉杯 cat chen, v.v. \n\t2. Cu dong. Nhu cu su 舉事 noi len lam viec, cung nhu ta noi khoi su 起事. The cho nen co hanh dong gi deu goi la cu ca. Nhu cu dong 舉動, cu chi 舉止, v.v. Su khong can lam nua ma cu boi ve ra goi la da thu nhat cu 多此一舉. \n\t3. Tien cu. Nhu suy cu 推舉 suy ton tien cu len, bao cu 保舉 bao linh tien cu len, v.v. Le thi huong ngay xua ai trung cach (do) goi la cu nhan 舉人. \n\t4. Pham khen ngoi hay ghi chep ai cung goi la cu, nhu xung cu 稱舉 de cu len ma khen, dieu cu 條舉 ghi tuong tung dieu de tieu bieu len. \n\t5. Sinh de, de con goi goi la cu 舉, khong sinh de goi la bat cu 不舉. \n\t6. Lay duoc, danh lay duoc thanh goi la cu. \n\t7. Bay cao, ke si tron doi goi la cao cu 高舉. Doi sau goi nhung nguoi co ke co tai hon nguoi la hien hien ha cu 軒軒霞舉 cung noi nghia ay. \n\t8. Deu ca. Nhu cu quoc 舉國 ca nuoc. \n\t9. Deu. \n\t10. Hop.
舊=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cu. Nhu cuu hoc 舊學 loi hoc cu. \n\t2. Ban cu. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thanh trung co cuu nhu tuong van, Vi dao thien nhai nham chuyen bong 城中故舊如相問，爲道天涯任轉蓬 Ban cu trong thanh neu nhu co hoi tham, Noi ho rang (toi nay) nhu co bong xoay chuyen o tan phuong troi. \n\t3. Lau.
旧=cuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Cu. Nhu cuu hoc 舊學 loi hoc cu. \n\t2. Ban cu. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thanh trung co cuu nhu tuong van, Vi dao thien nhai nham chuyen bong 城中故舊如相問，爲道天涯任轉蓬 Ban cu trong thanh neu nhu co hoi tham, Noi ho rang (toi nay) nhu co bong xoay chuyen o tan phuong troi. \n\t3. Lau.
舌=thiet [she2]\n\t1. Luoi. \n\t2. Luoi dung de noi, nen nguoi nao noi nhieu goi la nhieu thiet 饒舌, nguoi dien dich sach goi la thiet nhan 舌人.
舍=xa, xa [she3|she4]\n\t1. Quan tro. Nha o cung goi la xa. Nhu mao xa 茅舍 nha tranh. \n\t2. Tieng de goi cac nguoi than hang duoi minh. Nhu xa de 舍弟 em no, xa diet 舍姪 chau no, v.v. \n\t3. Nghi. Nhu Xa u mo dia 舍於某地 nghi tro o dat mo. \n\t4. Quan di mot dem goi la xa, tuc la mot quang duong xa 30 dam. \n\t5. Mot am la xa. Bo. Tuc bao tha ra la nhieu xa 饒舍, lay cua gi cua nguoi cho la thi xa 施舍. \n\t6. Thoi ngung.
舐=thi, de [shi4]\n\t1. Liem, lay luoi liem vat gi goi la thi. Ta quen doc la chu de. Trang Tu 莊子. Tan vuong huu benh trieu y, pha ung toa gia dac xa nhat thang, thi tri gia dac xa ngu thang 秦王有病召醫，破癰痤者得車一乘，舐痔者得車五乘 vua Tan bi benh, voi thay thuoc lai, ke mo vo nhot lon, duoc xe mot co, ke liem tri duoc xe nam co.
舒=thu [shu1]\n\t1. Thu thai, thu suong. \n\t2. Thu tha. \n\t3. Duoi ra, mo ra.
舔=thiem [tian3]\n\t1. Liem, the luoi ra liem.
舖=pho [pu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu pho 鋪.
舘=quan [guan3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu quan 館.
舚=thiem [tan1]\n\t1. The luoi ra, trat luoi ra.
舛=suyen [chuan3]\n\t1. Ngang trai. Vuong Bot 王勃. Ta ho ! Thoi van bat te, menh do da suyen 嗟乎！時運不齊，命途多舛 Than oi ! Thoi van chang binh thuong, duong doi nhieu ngang trai. \n\t2. Lan lon.
舜=thuan [shun4]\n\t1. Vua Thuan doi nha Ngu 虞舜.
舝=hat [xia2]\n\t1. Cai oc lap o dau truc xe.
舞=vu [wu3]\n\t1. Mua, cam cai quat hay cai nhip mua theo am nhac goi la vu. \n\t2. Cam do binh dien cac mon vo nghe cung goi la vu. Nhu vu kiem 舞劍 mua guom. \n\t3. Hung khoi. Nhan cai gi no cam xuc den minh ma sinh ra long phan khoi goi la co vu 鼓舞 khua mua. Thu vu tuc dao 手舞足蹈 mua tay dam chan, v.v. \n\t4. Bay lieng. Nhu long tuong phuong vu 龍翔鳳舞 rong bay phuong mua. Khi tuong hon ho goi la phi vu 飛舞, nhu mi phi sac vu 眉飛色舞 mat may hon ho. \n\t5. Bien doi, lat long, lam cho dien dao thi phi, khien cho nguoi khong can van vao dau duoc goi la vu. Nhu vu van 舞文 dung van chuong hiem hoc ma dien dao thi phi.
舟=chu [zhou1]\n\t1. Thuyen. Cac cai nhu thuyen, be dung qua song qua nuoc deu goi la chu. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thien dia thien chu phu tu diep, Van chuong tan tuc nhuoc nhu ti 天地扁舟浮以葉, 文章殘息弱如絲 (Chu hanh tuc su 舟行即事) Chiec thuyen con nhu chiec la noi giua dat troi, Hoi tan van chuong yeu ot nhu to. Bui Giang dich tho. Thuyen con chiec la giua troi, tho van tieng tho nhu loi to than. \n\t2. Cai dai dung chen. \n\t3. Deo.
舡=hang [chuan2]\n\t1. Cai thuyen.
舢=san [shan1]\n\t1. San ban 舢板 cai thuyen con. Cung viet la 舢舨 hay la 三板.
舩=thuyen [chuan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thuyen 船.
航=hang [hang2]\n\t1. Thuyen, hai chiec thuyen cung sang goi la hang. \n\t2. Vuot qua. Nhu hang hai 航海 vuot be, hang lo 航路 duong nuoc, v.v. \n\t3. Ken thuyen lam cau noi sang song.
舫=phang, phang [fang3]\n\t1. Cai thuyen, thuyen banh, hai thuyen cung ap man nhau. Co khi doc la chu phang.
般=ban, ban, bat [ban1]\n\t1. Quanh co. Nhu ban du 般遊 choi quanh mai, ban hoan 般桓 quan quit khong no roi. \n\t2. Tai di. Nhu ban van 般運 van tai. \n\t3. Mot am la ban. Ve. Nhu ban su 般師 dem quan ve. \n\t4. Buc. Nhu nhat ban 一般 mot buc nhu nhau, gia ban 這般 buc ay, v.v. \n\t5. Lai mot am la bat. Bat nha 般若 dich am chu Phan, nghia la tri tue, tri tue thanh tinh.
舲=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Cai thuyen nho co cua so ben mui.
舳=truc [zhu2]\n\t1. Dang duoi thuyen goi la truc 舳, dang dau thuyen goi la lo 艫. Nhu truc lo thien ly 舳艫千里 dau cuoi cung lien noi voi nhau, ta su nhieu thuyen san sat voi nhau.
舴=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Trach manh 舴艋 cai thuyen nho.
舵=da [duo4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu da 柁, cai banh lai thuyen.
舶=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Tau buom, thuyen lon di be. \n\t2. Hang hoa o xu khac cho den xu minh goi la bac lai pham 舶來品.
舷=huyen [xian2]\n\t1. Man thuyen.
舸=kha [ge3]\n\t1. Thuyen manh, thuyen to. Vuong Bot 王勃. Kha ham me tan, thanh tuoc hoang long chi truc 舸艦迷津，青雀黃龍之舳 Thuyen be chat ben song, duoi thuyen ve chim se xanh, rong vang.
船=thuyen [chuan2]\n\t1. Cai thuyen, chu de goi chung cac thuyen. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Co son tac da trien thanh mong, Nguyet man Binh Than tuu man thuyen 故山昨夜纏清夢，月滿平灘酒滿船 (Man hung 漫興) Nui cu dem qua vuong van mong, Trang ngap day song (Binh Than), ruou ngap thuyen.
艁=tao [zao4]\n\t1. Chu tao 造 ngay xua.
艄=sao [shao1]\n\t1. Duoi thuyen. Tuc goi lai thuyen la sao cong 艄公.
艇=dinh [ting3]\n\t1. Cai thoi, thu thuyen nho ma dai. \n\t2. Tiem thuy dinh 潛水艇 tau ngam.
艋=manh [meng3]\n\t1. Trach manh 舴艋 cai thuyen nho.
艘=tao, suu [sou1]\n\t1. Chiec thuyen. Ta quen doc la chu suu.
艟=dong [chong1]\n\t1. Mong dong 艨艟 thuyen tran, tau chien.
艣=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Cai mai cheo.
艤=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Thuyen ghe vao bo, dau thuyen.
舣=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Thuyen ghe vao bo, dau thuyen.
艦=ham [jian4]\n\t1. Tau tran. Nay goi quan danh tren mat be la ham doi 艦隊, tau tran goi la quan ham 軍艦.
舰=ham [jian4]\n\t1. Tau tran. Nay goi quan danh tren mat be la ham doi 艦隊, tau tran goi la quan ham 軍艦.
艨=mong [meng2]\n\t1. Mong dong 艨艟 thuyen tran, tau chien.
艫=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Dang duoi thuyen goi la truc 舳, dang dau thuyen goi la lo 艫. Nhu truc lo thien ly 舳艫千里 dau cuoi cung lien noi voi nhau, ta su nhieu thuyen san sat voi nhau.
舻=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Dang duoi thuyen goi la truc 舳, dang dau thuyen goi la lo 艫. Nhu truc lo thien ly 舳艫千里 dau cuoi cung lien noi voi nhau, ta su nhieu thuyen san sat voi nhau.
艮=can [gen3|gen4]\n\t1. Que can 艮. Mot que trong tam que, bat quai 八卦, nghia la thoi, ngan lai. \n\t2. Ben.
良=luong [liang2]\n\t1. Lanh, tinh chat thuan tot ben giu khong doi goi la luong. Nhu trung luong 忠良, hien luong 賢良, v.v. Cai tam thuat cua nguoi goi la thien luong 天良, tuc goi la luong tam 良心. Tuc goi con nha thanh bach, khong co tieng tam gi xau la luong gia tu de 良家子弟 con em nha luong thien. Co dau nha tho giu so ve lam an luong thien goi la tong luong 從良. \n\t2. Tot, vat gi hoan toan tot dep goi la luong. \n\t3. Sau, tham. Nhu huyen he luong tham 懸系良深 mong nho tham thiet. Su gi hoi lau goi la luong cuu 良久 hoi lau. \n\t4. Dung lam tro ngu, nghia la tin. Nhu luong huu di da 良有以也 tin rang co vay.
艱=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Kho khan, su gi bi ngan tro kho lam cho duoc goi la gian 艱, lam viec thay kho long troi chay goi la nan 難. \n\t2. Lo. Luc co tang cha me goi la dinh uu 丁憂 hay dinh gian 丁艱. \n\t3. Hiem.
艰=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Kho khan, su gi bi ngan tro kho lam cho duoc goi la gian 艱, lam viec thay kho long troi chay goi la nan 難. \n\t2. Lo. Luc co tang cha me goi la dinh uu 丁憂 hay dinh gian 丁艱. \n\t3. Hiem.
色=sac [se4|shai3]\n\t1. Sac, mau. La cai hien tuong cua bong sang no chieu vao hinh the vat, ta goi xanh, vang, do, trang, den la ngu sac 五色 nam sac. \n\t2. Bong dang. Nhu than thua sac tieu 親承色笑 duoc than thay bong dang. Vi so hai hay gian du ma doi net mat goi la tac sac 作色. Lay be ngoai ma tim nguoi tim vat goi la vat sac 物色 xem xet. \n\t3. Sac dep, gai dep. Nhu hieu sac 好色 thich gai dep. \n\t4. Canh tuong. Nhu hanh sac thong thong 行色匆匆 canh tuong voi vang. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hanh sac thong thong tue van mo, Bat cam bang thuc than Qui Du 行色匆匆歲雲暮，不禁憑式歎歸與 Cuoc hanh trinh voi va, nam da muon, Bat giac nuong noi van chac truoc xe ma than Ve thoi. \n\t5. Tuc goi mot thu la nhat sac 一色. \n\t6. Sac tuong. Nha Phat cho biet het thay cai gi co hinh co tuong deu goi la sac. Nhu sac gioi 色界 coi doi chi co hinh sac, khong co tinh duc. Sac uan 色蘊 sac no tich gop che mat chan tinh. Sac tran 色塵 la cai canh doi lai voi mat.
艴=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Bung bung, ham ham, sac mat gian.
艶=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Sac nguoi dep, tuoi sang. Cung nghia voi chu diem 豔.
艷=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu diem 艶 hay 豔.
艳=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu diem 艶 hay 豔.
艸=thao [cao3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu thao 草.
艽=giao, cuu, bong [jiao1]\n\t1. O cua giong thu. \n\t2. Co giao, dung de lam thuoc. Vi no sinh ra o vung Thiem Tay nen goi la tan giao 秦艽. \n\t3. Mot am la cuu. Xa xoi, hoang dang. Tuc doc la chu bong.
艾=ngai, nghe [ai4|yi4]\n\t1. Cay ngai cuu. Dung la ngai kho quan thanh cai moi cham lua chay roi dot vao cho dau cho ke om goi la cuu 灸. \n\t2. Xinh dep. Nhu tri hieu sac tac mo thieu ngai 知好色則慕少艾 biet hieu sac thi men gai to. \n\t3. Thoi. Su gi chua xong goi la vi ngai 未艾. \n\t4. Gia. \n\t5. Nuoi. \n\t6. Het. \n\t7. Bao dap. \n\t8. Mot am la nghe. Cat co. \n\t9. Tri yen.
芃=bong [peng2]\n\t1. Bong bong 芃芃 tot um, tot tuoi. \n\t2. Duoi dai thuon thuot.
芄=hoan [wan2]\n\t1. Hoan lan 芄蘭 co hoan lan (metaplexis japonica).
芊=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Thien thien 芊芊 co tot um.
芋=du, hu [yu4]\n\t1. Khoai nuoc. Ta quen doc la chu vu. \n\t2. Mot am la hu. To lon.
芍=thuoc [shao2]\n\t1. Thuoc duoc 芍葯 cay thuoc duoc, hoa dep, cu lam thuoc. Thu trang goi la bach thuoc 白芍, thu do goi la xich thuoc 赤芍.
芎=khung [xiong1]\n\t1. Khung cung 芎藭 co khung cung, sinh o dat Thuc goi la xuyen khung 川芎, cu dung lam thuoc.
芑=khi [qi3]\n\t1. Lua khi (ke trang). \n\t2. Rau diep. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu ky 杞.
芒=mang [mang2]\n\t1. Co gai, la nho dai ma ran sac, dam vao nguoi nhu mui dao nhon, cai be no dung lam giay di goi la mang hai 芒鞋. \n\t2. Ngon co, tuc la cho no nhu dau nhon len. Vi the nhung rua hat thoc goi la dao mang 稻芒. Noi rong ra thi vat gi co mui nhon deu goi la mang. Nhu quang mang 光芒 tia sang nhoang, phong mang 鋒芒 mui nhon. \n\t3. Nhoc pho, pho phac. Nhu mang mang nhien quy 芒芒然歸 nhoc pho ra ve. \n\t4. Rong lon. \n\t5. Xa tham tham. \n\t6. Ngo ngan.
芘=ti [pi2]\n\t1. Co khi muon dung nhu chu ti 庇.
芙=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Phu dong 芙蓉 cay hoa phu dong.
芝=chi [zhi1]\n\t1. Mot loai co nhu nam, moc o cac cay da chet, hinh nhu cai nam, cung nhan nhui, co sau sac xanh, do, vang, trang, den, tia. Nguoi xua cho do la co bao diem tot lanh, nen goi la linh chi 靈芝.
芟=sam [shan1]\n\t1. Cat co. \n\t2. Cai liem phat.
芡=khiem [qian4]\n\t1. Cu sung (Euryale ferox). Tuc goi la ke dau tu 雞頭子.
芣=phu [fou2]\n\t1. Phu di 芣苢 co phu di. Ngay xua bao tuc la cay bong ma de. Con goi la cay xa tien 車前.
芥=gioi [gai4|jie4]\n\t1. Rau cai. \n\t2. Hat cai. Hat cai nho lam, nen cai gi nho mon goi la tiem gioi 纖芥. \n\t3. Phan hen ha goi la thao gioi 草芥 co rac.
芧=tru, tu [zhu4]\n\t1. Cay tru. Bach tru 白芧 co tranh trang. Co khi doc la chu tu.
芨=cap [ji1]\n\t1. Bach cap 白芨 cay bach cap, dung lam thuoc ho trat.
芩=cam [qin2]\n\t1. Co cam, moc o cac cho thap uot (Phragmites japonica). \n\t2. Hoang cam 黄芩 mot thu co, re dung lam thuoc duoc. Thu nao de lau, trong long rong, ngoai vang, trong den goi la phien cam 片芩. Thu moi dao, trong dac goi la dieu cam 條芩.
芪=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Hoang ki 黄芪 thu co, re dung lam thuoc. Thu nao sinh o Mien Thuong thi tot, cho nen goi la mien ki 緜芪, con viet la 綿芪. Chu ki 芪 co khi viet la 蓍.
芫=nguyen [yan2|yuan2]\n\t1. Cay nguyen hoa 芫花, la doc, nguoi danh ca cu gia no ra nem xuong song, ca chet noi len, vi the lai goi la ngu doc 魚毒.
芬=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Mui co thom. Cac do an co mui thom cung goi la phan phuong 芬芳. \n\t2. Noi len, lum lum. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu phan 紛.
芭=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Co ba, mot thu co thom. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu ba 葩.
芮=nhue [rui4]\n\t1. Nho xiu. \n\t2. Ben song. \n\t3. Ten mot nuoc doi xua.
芯=tam [xin1|xin4]\n\t1. Bac den. Ruot mot thu co dung de thap den goi la dang tam 燈芯.
芰=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Mot thu cu au co bon canh. Cu co hai canh goi la lang 菱.
花=hoa [hua1]\n\t1. Hoa, hoa cua cay co. \n\t2. Tuc goi cac vat lang lo sac so nhu ve voi thue thua la hoa. \n\t3. Danh sac phien phuc cung goi la hoa. Nhu hoa danh 花名 mot bo co nhieu ten. \n\t4. Not dau. Tre con trong dau goi la chung hoa 種花, len dau mua goi la thien hoa 天花. \n\t5. Hao phi. Nhu hoa phi 花費 tieu phi nhieu. \n\t6. Nha tro, con hat. \n\t7. Nam dong tien goi la mot hoa.
芳=phuong [fang1]\n\t1. Co thom. Nhu phuong thao 芳草 co thom. Noi rong ra thi vat gi mui thom deu goi la phuong. Nhu phuong danh 芳名 tieng thom. \n\t2. Duc hanh danh du luu truyen lai cung goi la phuong. Nhu luu phuong bach the 流芳百世 de tieng thom tram doi.
芷=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Mot thu co thom, re lam thuoc goi la bach chi 白芷. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thu dia do van lan chi huong 此地猶聞蘭芷香 dat nay con nghe mui huong cua co lan co chi.
芸=van [yun2]\n\t1. Mot thu co thom (man tuoi), thuong goi la co van huong 芸香, lay la hoa no gap vao sach thi khoi mot. Vi the nen goi quyen sach la van bien 芸編. \n\t2. Lam co lua.
芹=can [qin2]\n\t1. Rau can. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau. Tu nhao Phan thuy, bac thai ki can 思樂泮水，薄采其芹 nghi thich song Phan, chut hai rau can, la bai tho khen vua Hy Cong co cong sua lai nha hoc phan cung. Vi the doi sau noi hoc tro duoc vao trang hoc nha vua la thai can 采芹 hay nhap phan 入泮 vay.
芻=so [chu2]\n\t1. Cat co, nguoi cat co. \n\t2. Loai vat an co goi la so. \n\t3. Rom, co kho. Nhu so cau 芻狗 con cho rut bang rom bang co, y noi la vat bo di. Lao Tu 老子. Thien dia bat nhan, di van vat vi so cau 天地不仁、以萬物爲芻狗 troi dat bat nhan, coi van vat nhu cho rom. Tu Nhu vieng me Quach Lam chi dua co mot nhum co kho, vi the tuc goi le phung la sinh so 生芻.
刍=so [chu2]\n\t1. Cat co, nguoi cat co. \n\t2. Loai vat an co goi la so. \n\t3. Rom, co kho. Nhu so cau 芻狗 con cho rut bang rom bang co, y noi la vat bo di. Lao Tu 老子. Thien dia bat nhan, di van vat vi so cau 天地不仁、以萬物爲芻狗 troi dat bat nhan, coi van vat nhu cho rom. Tu Nhu vieng me Quach Lam chi dua co mot nhum co kho, vi the tuc goi le phung la sinh so 生芻.
芼=mao, mao [mao4]\n\t1. Lua, lay lay. \n\t2. Rau mao. \n\t3. Mot am la mao. Co mao.
芽=nha [ya2]\n\t1. Mam. Nhu dau nha 荳芽 mam dau. \n\t2. Su vat gi moi phat ra cung goi la nha. \n\t3. Quang mo.
芾=phat [fei4|fu2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu te 蔽. \n\t2. Te phat 蔽芾 mau thinh.
苐=de [di4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu de 第.
苑=uyen, uat, uan [yuan4]\n\t1. Vuon nuoi giong thu. \n\t2. Pham cho nao tich gop nhieu thu deu goi la uyen. Nhu van uyen 文苑 rung van, nghe uyen 藝苑, noi cho co nhieu van hay co nhieu nghe kheo. \n\t3. Cung dien. Nhu noi uyen 内苑 cung trong. \n\t4. Mot am la uat. Bi uc, chat chua. Co khi doc la chu uan.
苒=nhiem [ran3]\n\t1. Co tot um.
苓=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Phuc linh 茯苓 mot loai thuc vat nhu loai nam, dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Tru linh 豬苓 cung la mot loai nam, moc o cay phong, tung hon den den nhu phan lon, nen goi la tru linh, dung lam thuoc.
苔=dai [tai1|tai2]\n\t1. Reu. \n\t2. Cung la mot loai thuc vat no hoa ngam, moc o cac cay co thu, cac cho dat uot hay tren tang da, co thu xanh nhat, co thu xanh ngat, re la rat nho khong phan biet duoc, trong o ngoai nhu cay reu. Bai tho Quach Phac 郭璞 tang On Kieu 溫嶠 co cau rang. Cap nhi xu vi, di dai dong sam 及爾臭味，異苔同岑 xet den mui me reu khac ma cung nui. Vi the hai nguoi khac ho, ket lam anh em, goi la dai sam 苔岑. \n\t3. Ban. Nhu thiet dai 舌苔 ban luoi. Sot thi luoi ban, thay thuoc nho do xem biet duoc benh.
苕=dieu, thieu [shao2|tiao2]\n\t1. Hoa lau, canh nut no ra hoa, khong co bau co canh. Nay ta goi tre con thong minh xinh dep la dieu tu 苕秀 y noi nhu hoa lau mot ngon da nut ra hoa vay. Nguoi ta lai dung nhung canh no lam choi goi la dieu truu 苕帚 choi lau. Ta quen doc la chu thieu.
苖=mieu [miao2]\n\t1. Lua non, lua moi cay chua tot. \n\t2. Mam. Nhu dau mieu 豆苖 mam dau. \n\t3. Mam mong. Nhu mieu due 苖裔 noi giong, tuc chi ve con chau vay. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Bach man khe dong luu mieu due 百蠻谿峒留苖裔 trong cac khe dong dat Man con de lai con chau (cua Han Tin). \n\t4. Giong Mieu, mot giong man moi. \n\t5. Le sau mua he.
苗=mieu [miao2]\n\t1 :(Danh) Lua non, lua moi cay chua ra hoa. ◎Nhu: hoa mieu 禾 苗 lua non, mach mieu 麥 苗 mach non, dao mieu 稻 苗 ma non. \n\t2 :(Danh) Mam. ◎Nhu: dau mieu 豆 苗 mam dau, thu mieu 樹 苗 mam cay, hoa mieu 花 苗 mam hoa. \n\t3 :(Danh) Dong vat moi sinh. ◎Nhu: ngu mieu 魚 苗 ca giong, tru mieu 豬 苗 heo con moi sinh. \n\t4 :(Danh) Khoang san lo tren mat dat. ◎Nhu: ngoc mieu 玉 苗 , quang mieu 礦 苗 . \n\t5 :(Danh) Noi giong. ◎Nhu: mieu due 苗 裔 noi giong, tuc chi ve con chau vay. ◇Nguyen Du 阮 攸. Bach man khe dong luu mieu due 百 蠻 谿 峒 留 苗 裔 (Do Hoai huu cam Hoai Am Hau 渡 淮 有 感 淮 陰 侯 ) Trong cac khe dong dat Man con de lai con chau (cua Han Tin). \n\t6 :(Danh) Mam mong. ◎Nhu: hoa mieu 禍 苗 mam mong tai hoa. \n\t7 :(Danh) Thuoc chung ngua benh (vaccin). ◎Nhu: nguu dau mieu 牛 痘 苗 thuoc chung benh dau mua, tap gioi mieu 卡 介 苗 thuoc chung benh lao B.C.G. (Danh) Giong Mieu, dan thieu so o Quy Chau 貴 州 , Ho Nam 湖 南 , Van Nam 雲 南 . \n\t8 :(Danh) Le sau mua he. \n\t9 :(Danh) Ho Mieu. 
苙=lap [li4]\n\t1. Chuong lon. \n\t2. Co lap, tuc co bach nhi.
苛=ha [ke1]\n\t1. Nghiet ac. . Lam viec xet net nghiem ngat qua deu goi la ha. Chanh lenh tan ac goi la ha chanh 苛政. Le ky 禮記. Ha chanh manh u ho da 苛政猛於虎也 chinh sach ha khac con tan bao hon cop \n\t2. Ghen ghet. \n\t3. Phien toai. \n\t4. Trach phat. \n\t5. Quay nhieu.
苜=muc [mu4]\n\t1. Muc tuc 苜蓿 mot thu rau trong de an. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thap tai doc thu ban dao cot, Ban vo muc tuc toa vo chien 十載讀書貧到骨，盤無苜蓿坐無氈 Muoi nam doc sach ngheo den tan xuong, Mam an khong rau dau, ngoi khong nem.
苞=bao [bao1]\n\t1. Co bao, ro no ran chac, dung de dan dep va det chieu. \n\t2. Dai hoa, cai la do duoi canh hoa goi la bao. \n\t3. Cay co moc tung bui goi la bao. Noi rong ra cay co moc ram rap tot tuoi deu goi la bao. Nhu truc bao tung mau 竹苞松茂 tung truc tot tuoi. \n\t4. Boc.
苟=cau [gou3]\n\t1. Cau tha. Nhu viet duoc tot dep khong hong mot chu nao goi la nhat but bat cau 一筆不苟 mot net khong cau tha. \n\t2. Tam. Nhu cau an dan tich 苟安旦夕 tam yen som toi, cau toan tinh menh 苟全性命 tam cau cho con tinh mang. Pham su gi khong co y lo toi cho lau dai deu goi la cau. Nhu lay vo lay chong khong co du le chinh dang goi la cau hop 苟合. \n\t3. Vi thuc, dung lam tro tu. Luan ngu 論語. Cau chi u nhan hi, vo ac da 苟志於仁矣，無惡也 (Ly nhan 里仁) neu quyet chi thuc hanh duc nhan thi khong lam dieu ac.
苡=di [yi3]\n\t1. Phau di 芣苡 co phau di (Coix lacryma-jobi). Cung viet la 芣苢. \n\t2. Y di 薏苡 mot thu co co qua, trong co nhan trang, tuc goi la y me 薏米, dung nau chao an va lam thuoc duoc.
苣=cu [ju4|qu3]\n\t1. Oa cu 萵苣 rau diep.
若=nhuoc [re3|ruo4]\n\t1. Thuan. Nhu vu duong thoi nhuoc 雨暘時若 mua nang thuan thoi tiet. \n\t2. May, nguoi. Nhu nhuoc thuoc 若屬 lu may. Trang Tu 莊子. Nhien tac nga du nhuoc du nhan cau bat nang tuong tri da 然則我與若與人俱不能相知也 (Te vat luan 齊物論) Vay thi, ta cung nguoi, cung nguoi do, khong the biet duoc nhau. \n\t3. Nhu, tu nhien, giong. Nhu than sac tu nhuoc 神色自若 than sac van y nhu (tu nhien), tuong nhuoc 相若 cung giong, bat nhuoc 不若 chang bang. \n\t4. Bang, dung lam ngu tu, noi su chua quyet dinh. Nhu nhuoc su nhu thu 若使如此 bang khien nhu the. So dem chua nhat dinh la nhuoc can 若干 ngan ay. \n\t5. Kip, hoac. \n\t6. Thuan. \n\t7. Than Nhuoc, than be.
苦=kho [ku3]\n\t1. Dang. Nhu kho qua 苦瓜 muop dang.\n\t2. Khon kho, tan kho. Pham nhung gi kho nhin duoc deu goi la kho. Nhu kho canh 苦境 canh kho, kho huong 苦况 noi kho, nguoi it tung trai goi la bat tri cam kho 不知甘苦 khong biet ngot dang. Nguyen Du 阮攸: Tao han di giac vo y kho 早寒已覺無衣苦 Lanh so da kho phan khong ao. \n\t3. Lo qua, vi canh ngoai bach den lam cho kho chiu goi la kho, nhu kho han 苦寒 ret kho, kho nhiet 苦熱 nong kho. \n\t4. Chiu kho. Nhu khac kho 刻苦, kho tam co nghe 苦心孤詣 kho long mot minh toi. \n\t5. Rat, mai. Nhu kho khau 苦口 noi mai, kho cau 苦求 cau mai. \n\t6. Lo, mac. \n\t7. Mot am la co. Xau xi.
苧=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Tru ma 苧麻 co gai, vo dung danh soi de det.
苎=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Tru ma 苧麻 co gai, vo dung danh soi de det.
苫=thiem [shan1|shan4]\n\t1. Mot loai nhu co tranh. Vi the ken co tranh lop nha goi la thiem. Co tang phai nam chieu co, nen tang cha me trong tram ngay goi la tai thiem 在苫.
英=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Hoa cac loai cay co. Vi the nen vat gi tot dep khac thuong deu goi la anh. Nhu van tu hay goi la ham anh tro hoa 含英咀華. \n\t2. Tai nang hon nguoi. Nhu anh hung 英雄, anh hao 英豪, anh kiet 英傑. \n\t3. Nuoc Anh. \n\t4. Chat tinh tuy cua vat. \n\t5. Nui hai trung. \n\t6. Dung long trang suc tren cai giao.
苴=tu [ju1]\n\t1. Thu gai co hat. \n\t2. Boc, goi. Dua do le cho nguoi goi la bao tu 苞苴. \n\t3. Cai me co lot trong giay dep. \n\t4. Mot am la tra. Tho tra 土苴 co nhao voi phan. \n\t5. Lai mot am nua la tra. Thu co noi tren mat nuoc.
苶=niet [nie2]\n\t1. Niet nhien 苶 nhoc thu, met moi.
苹=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Co binh, mot loai thanh hao trang. \n\t2. Mot am la bien. Xe bien.
苻=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Co phu, cung goi la co mat quy. \n\t2. Hoan Phu 萑苻 ten rieng cua Trinh Trach doi Xuan Thu, vi Trach danh giac o Hoan Phu giet sach. Doi sau goi trom giac la hoan phu la vi do. Co khi viet la hoan bo 萑蒲.
苽=co [gu1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu co 菰.
苾=bat [bi4]\n\t1. Thom tho.
茀=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Co tot buop, co moc um tum. Vi the nen duong xa nghen mac goi la phat. Don co cung goi la phat. \n\t2. Che, cai mui che o dang sau xe. \n\t3. Phuc, su may man.
茁=truat [zhuo2]\n\t1. Nay mam, co moi moc mam lu nhu. \n\t2. Giong vat sinh truong cung goi la truat. \n\t3. Truat trang 茁壯 khoe, manh, chac nich.
茂=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Tot, cay co tot tuoi. Nhu truc bao tung mau 竹苞松茂 tung truc tot tuoi. \n\t2. Su nghiep duoc thinh vuong cung goi la mau. \n\t3. Tot dep. Nhu mau tai 茂才 tai gioi.
范=pham [fan4]\n\t1. Con ong, con ong tren dau co mu. \n\t2. Ho Pham. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu pham 範.
茄=gia [jia1|qie2]\n\t1. Cay ca. Nhu ba gia 番茄 ca chua, con goi la tay hong thi 西紅柿. \n\t2. Cuong sen, gio sen.
茅=mao [mao2]\n\t1. Co tranh, la dung lop nha, re dung lam thuoc va danh day. \n\t2. Rom rac. Noi vi canh nha que. Nhu thao mao ha si 草茅下士 ke si hen o nha que. \n\t3. Nui Mao 茅山. Doi nha Han co Mao Doanh 茅盈 va hai em la Chung, Co toi o nui Cu Khuc 句曲山 goi la tam mao quan 三茅君, vi the moi goi la nui Mao.
茆=luu, mao [mao2]\n\t1. Rau luu (Brasenia schreberi). Cung doc la chu mao, cung mot nghia voi chu mao 茅.
茇=bat, bat, bai [ba2]\n\t1. Cai leu tranh. \n\t2. Re co. \n\t3. Mot am la bat. Tat bat 蓽茇 cay la lot. \n\t4. Lai mot am la bai. Hoa lang tieu 凌霄花.
茉=mat [mo4]\n\t1 Mat li 茉莉 cay mat li, hoa thom dung uop che (tra) duoc, tuc la hoa nhai (Jasmin). Mat li hoa tra 茉莉花茶 tra hoa nhai.
茌=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Tri binh 茌平 huyen Tri Binh.
茗=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Non che, mam che. \n\t2. Thu che hai muon cung goi la minh. \n\t3. Che, tra. Nhu huong minh 香茗 tra thom, tra huong.
茘=le [li4]\n\t1. Co le. Le chi 茘枝 cay vai.
茜=thien [qian4|xi1]\n\t1. Co thien, re dung nhuom do, nen sa do goi la thien sa 茜紗. \n\t2. Sac do.
茝=chi [chai3]\n\t1. Ki chi 蘄茝 mot thu co thom.
茨=ty [ci2]\n\t1. Lop co tranh. \n\t2. Co tat le, thu co co gai. \n\t3. Ty co 茨菰 cay ty co. Co khi viet la 茨孤. Cung goi la tu co 慈姑. \n\t4. Chat chua.
茫=mang [mang2]\n\t1. Thuong mang 滄茫 menh mong. \n\t2. Mang mang 茫茫 man mac. \n\t3. Ngay ngo, mo mit. Ta cai dang khong biet gi. Nhu mang nhien 茫然 mo mit vay.
茭=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Rau giao. \n\t2. Co kho. \n\t3. Day tre.
茯=phuc [fu2]\n\t1. Phuc linh 茯苓 mot giong nam song nho o goc re cay thong, hinh nhu qua bong, da den thit trang goi la bach linh 白苓, thu do goi la xich linh 赤苓 dung de lam thuoc.
茱=thu [zhu1]\n\t1. Thu du 茱萸 cay thu du. Co ba thu, mot thu goi la ngo thu du 吳茱萸 dung lam thuoc, mot thu goi la thuc thu du 食茱萸 dung pha do an, mot thu goi la son thu du 山茱萸.
茲=tu, tu [ci2|zi1]\n\t1. Ich, them. Thong dung nhu chu tu 滋. \n\t2. Ay. Nhu tu su the dai 茲事體大 su ay lon. \n\t3. Chieu. \n\t4. Nam, mua. \n\t5. Mot am la tu. Quy Tu 龜茲 nuoc Quy Tu o Tay Vuc 西域.
兹=tu, tu [ci2|zi1]\n\t1. Ich, them. Thong dung nhu chu tu 滋. \n\t2. Ay. Nhu tu su the dai 茲事體大 su ay lon. \n\t3. Chieu. \n\t4. Nam, mua. \n\t5. Mot am la tu. Quy Tu 龜茲 nuoc Quy Tu o Tay Vuc 西域.
茴=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Hoi huong 茴香 cay hoi huong hoa co tam canh, mui thom la, hoac dung ep dau de xoa, hoac dung lam thuoc, hoac nau do an.
茵=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Dem, chieu kep, dem xe. \n\t2. Nhan tran 茵陳 mot thu co dung lam thuoc.
茶=tra [cha2]\n\t1. Cay che (tra), la dung che ra cac thu che uong. \n\t2. Son tra 山茶 mot thu cay la thuong xanh, hoa trang, co thu do, dung lam canh choi.
茸=nhung, nhung [rong2]\n\t1. Mam non, la non. \n\t2. Thu det bang long giong thu co long tuyet lun phun cung goi la nhung. \n\t3. Loc nhung 鹿茸 nhung huou, sung huou moi nhu con mong nhu thoi thit va mau goi la nhung, rat bo va quy. Sam nhung tuu 參茸酒 ruou sam nhung. \n\t4. Tan loan, roi ren. \n\t5. Mot am la nhung. Lan, thu.
茹=nhu, nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Re quan, re cay quan nhau goi la nhu. Vi the quan chuc nay tien cu quan chuc khac goi la bat mao lien nhu 拔茅連茹. \n\t2. Mot am la nhu. An. Nhu nhu to 茹素 an chay. Cung nhu noi ngat to 吃素 hay thuc trai 食齋. \n\t3. Thoi nat.
茺=sung [chong1]\n\t1. Sung uy 茺蔚 cay ich mau, tuc ich mau thao 益母草.
茼=dong [tong2]\n\t1. Dong hao 茼蒿 rau dong hao. Tuc goi la rau bong hao 蓬蒿.
荀=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc doi xua. \n\t2. Ho Tuan. \n\t3. Co tuan.
荃=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Co thom. \n\t2. Cai nom, cung nghia voi chu thuyen 筌. \n\t3. Vai nho.
荄=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Re co.
荅=dap [da1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dap 答.
荆=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu kinh 荊.
荇=hanh [xing4]\n\t1. Rau hanh, thu rau moc o duoi nuoc.
荈=suyen [chuan3]\n\t1. Thu che (tra) hai muon.
草=thao [cao3]\n\t1. Co, chu de goi tom cac loai co, doi xua viet la 艸. \n\t2. Qua loa. Nhu thao suat 草率, thao sang 草創 deu nghia la moi co qua loa, chua duoc hoan toan vay. \n\t3. O nha que. Nhu thao mang 草莽, thao trach 草澤 deu la chi ve nguoi nha que ca. Dan lanh di lam giac goi la lac thao 落草. \n\t4. Bo phi. Nhu thao gian nhan menh 草菅人命 coi menh nguoi nhu co rac. \n\t5. Thao, moi viet qua chua dinh han goi la ban thao. Nhu thao hich 草檄 thao bai hich, thao bieu 草表 thao bai bieu, v.v. \n\t6. Chu thao, mot loi chu truoc tu nha Han, de viet cho nhanh. \n\t7. Cat co.
荊=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Cay kinh, mot loai cay moc tung bui, cao bon nam thuoc, la nhu cai ban tay, hoa nho, sac tim hoi vang, canh goc cung ran, moc rai rac o dong ang lam lap ca loi di. Cho nen duong di hiem tro goi la kinh tran 荊榛, kinh cuc 荊棘, v.v. So Thanh Tu 楚聲子 gap Ngu Cu 伍舉 o duong, lay canh cay kinh dan ra ngoi noi chuyen goi la ban kinh dao co 班荊道故 trai canh kinh noi chuyen cu. O nha que hay dung cay kinh de dan phen, vi the nen canh cua phen goi la sai kinh 柴荊. Nuoc So 楚 co nhieu cay kinh nen goi la Kinh 荊 hay Kinh So 荊楚. \n\t2. Cay roi. Ngay xua dung cay kinh de danh ke co toi. Thay hoc cung dung de danh hoc tro, goi la gia so 夏楚. Liem Pha 廉頗 mang bo kinh den nha ong Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如 ta toi cung la theo y do. \n\t3. Tu kinh 紫荊 cung mot loai cay moc tung bui, sinh lien canh nhau. Xua ba anh em Dien Chan 田真 luc o chung hoa hop voi nhau thi cay kinh truoc nha tuoi tot, luc chia nhau ra o rieng thi cay kinh heo ua. Vi the doi sau moi dem hai chu tu kinh ma vi voi nhung nha anh em hoa muc. Tho Quach Tan co bai Nho em dung dien tich nay. Thiem thiep long mong doi, Vung nghe chim tich linh, Voi vang xo goi day, Day them hoa tu kinh (Mong Ngan Son). \n\t4. Vo Luong Hong nha Han la ba Manh Quang lay canh kinh lam hoa deo, vi the doi sau goi vo la kinh. Nhu chuyet kinh 拙荊 y noi nguoi vo vung dai cua toi, kinh that 荊室 nha toi (vo), v.v. deu vi tich nay. \n\t5. Chau Kinh 荊州, nay thuoc vao vung Ho Nam, Ho Bac, Quang Tay, Quy Chau. Han Chieu Ton lam quan Truong Su Kinh Chau, Ly Bach 李白 viet thu sang tham co cau. Sinh bat dung phong van ho hau, dan nguyen nhat thuc Han Kinh Chau 生不用封萬戶侯，但願一識韓荊州 nghia la khong can duoc phong van ho hau, chi mong duoc biet Han Kinh Chau. Vi the ban be moi biet nhau goi la thuc kinh 識荊.
荆=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Cay kinh, mot loai cay moc tung bui, cao bon nam thuoc, la nhu cai ban tay, hoa nho, sac tim hoi vang, canh goc cung ran, moc rai rac o dong ang lam lap ca loi di. Cho nen duong di hiem tro goi la kinh tran 荊榛, kinh cuc 荊棘, v.v. So Thanh Tu 楚聲子 gap Ngu Cu 伍舉 o duong, lay canh cay kinh dan ra ngoi noi chuyen goi la ban kinh dao co 班荊道故 trai canh kinh noi chuyen cu. O nha que hay dung cay kinh de dan phen, vi the nen canh cua phen goi la sai kinh 柴荊. Nuoc So 楚 co nhieu cay kinh nen goi la Kinh 荊 hay Kinh So 荊楚. \n\t2. Cay roi. Ngay xua dung cay kinh de danh ke co toi. Thay hoc cung dung de danh hoc tro, goi la gia so 夏楚. Liem Pha 廉頗 mang bo kinh den nha ong Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如 ta toi cung la theo y do. \n\t3. Tu kinh 紫荊 cung mot loai cay moc tung bui, sinh lien canh nhau. Xua ba anh em Dien Chan 田真 luc o chung hoa hop voi nhau thi cay kinh truoc nha tuoi tot, luc chia nhau ra o rieng thi cay kinh heo ua. Vi the doi sau moi dem hai chu tu kinh ma vi voi nhung nha anh em hoa muc. Tho Quach Tan co bai Nho em dung dien tich nay. Thiem thiep long mong doi, Vung nghe chim tich linh, Voi vang xo goi day, Day them hoa tu kinh (Mong Ngan Son). \n\t4. Vo Luong Hong nha Han la ba Manh Quang lay canh kinh lam hoa deo, vi the doi sau goi vo la kinh. Nhu chuyet kinh 拙荊 y noi nguoi vo vung dai cua toi, kinh that 荊室 nha toi (vo), v.v. deu vi tich nay. \n\t5. Chau Kinh 荊州, nay thuoc vao vung Ho Nam, Ho Bac, Quang Tay, Quy Chau. Han Chieu Ton lam quan Truong Su Kinh Chau, Ly Bach 李白 viet thu sang tham co cau. Sinh bat dung phong van ho hau, dan nguyen nhat thuc Han Kinh Chau 生不用封萬戶侯，但願一識韓荊州 nghia la khong can duoc phong van ho hau, chi mong duoc biet Han Kinh Chau. Vi the ban be moi biet nhau goi la thuc kinh 識荊.
荏=nham [ren3]\n\t1. Thu dau to. \n\t2. Nhu mi, nhu nhuoc, mem. Luan ngu 論語. Sac le nhi noi nham, thi chu tieu nhan, ky do xuyen du chi dao da du 色厲而內荏，譬諸小人，其猶穿窬之盜也與 (Duong hoa 陽貨) nhung ke ngoai mat oai le ma trong long nhu nhuoc, thi ta coi la hang tieu nhan, ho co khac nao bon trom treo tuong khoet vach dau ? \n\t3. Nham nhiem 荏苒 tham thoat.
荐=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Hai lan. Doi luon hai ba nam goi la tien co 荐饑. \n\t2. Tien cu. Cung nghia voi chu tien 薦.
荑=de, di [ti2|yi2]\n\t1. Mam co tranh. Cay co moi nhu mam deu goi la de. \n\t2. Mot am la di. Cat co. \n\t4. Co di.
荒=hoang [huang1]\n\t1. Bo hoang, dat day nhung co goi la hoang. Nen ruong chua vo co, chua cay cay duoc goi la hoang dien 荒田 ruong hoang. Khai hoang 開荒, khan hoang 墾荒 deu nghia la khai khan ruong bo hoang ca. Ruong van cay duoc, ma vi tai bien lua khong chin duoc, cung goi la hoang. Nhu thuy hoang 水荒 bi lut, han hoang 旱荒 dai han. \n\t2. Viec gi dang lam nua chung ma bo goi la hoang. Nhu hoang khoa 荒課 bo do khoa hoc. \n\t3. Phong tung, khong biet giu gin goi la hoang. Nhu hoang duong 荒唐, hoang mau 荒謬. \n\t4. Coi dat xa xoi. Nhu bat hoang 八荒 tam coi xa xoi, cho dat vang ve it nguoi o goi la hoang luong 荒涼. \n\t5. Bo. \n\t6. To lon. \n\t7. Hu khong. \n\t8. Che lap. \n\t9. Me man khong tu xet lai.
荳=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Cay dau. Cung nghia voi chu dau 豆. \n\t2. Dau khau 荳蔻 cay dau khau.
荷=ha [he2|he4]\n\t1. Hoa sen. \n\t2. Bac ha 薄荷 cay bac ha, dung cat dau lam thuoc. \n\t3. Mot am la ha. Ganh vac. \n\t4. Nho on. \n\t5. Tu dam dang lay.
荸=bot [bi2]\n\t1. Bot te 荸薺 tuc goi la cay ma de 馬蹄 hay la cay dia lat 地栗, an duoc.
荻=dich [di2]\n\t1. Co dich, mot loai co lau. Ong Au Duong Tu 歐陽修 nha Tong 宋 thua be mo coi bo, nha lai ngheo qua, ba me day hoc cu lay co lau vach chu xuong dat cho hoc. Vi the khen nguoi me hien cung hay dung chu hoach dich 畫荻.
荼=do, gia [tu2]\n\t1. Rau do, mot loai rau dang. \n\t2. Mot loai co co hoa trang nhu bong lau, tua xum xit nhau ma bay phap phoi. Nay ta thay dam quan di ron rip ruc ro thi khen la nhu hoa nhu do 如火如荼 la muong cai dang no tung bay ruc ro vay. \n\t3. Hai. Nhu do doc sinh linh 荼毒生靈 lam hai giong sinh linh. \n\t4. Mot am la gia. Gia Lang 荼陵 ten dat.
荽=tuy [sui1]\n\t1. Ho tuy 胡荽 mot thu rau, la non dung nau do an thom ngon.
莅=li [li4]\n\t1. Toi, tri, thong tri. Cung nhu chu li 涖. Lao Tu 老子. di dao li thien ha 以道涖天下 dung dao de tri thien ha.
莆=phu, bo [pu2]\n\t1. Tiep phu 萐莆 mot thu co bao diem lanh doi vua Nghieu. \n\t2. Mot am la bo. Bo Dien 莆田 huyen Bo Dien.
莉=li [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu li 涖.
莊=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Nghiem trang, sac mat kinh can chinh dinh goi la trang. \n\t2. Nga sau, con duong thong sau mat goi la trang. \n\t3. Trang trai, cho nha cua co nguoi o trong lang goi la trang. Vi the nen ruong nuong cua cai cung goi la trang. \n\t4. Nha chua hang. Nhu y trang 衣莊 cua hang ban ao. \n\t5. Cho chua cac hang hoa de gui di cac noi goi la trang. Nhu duong trang 洋莊 cua hang ban buon cac hang tay. Nha doi tien cung goi la trang. \n\t6. Lap rieng co so o ngoai thanh thi cung goi la trang. \n\t7. Cho nha lam ruong lon cung goi la trang.
莎=toa, sa [sha1|suo1]\n\t1. Co gau. Cu no goi la huong phu tu 香附子 cu gau, dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la sa. Sa ke 莎雞 con giot sanh.
莒=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Co cu.
莓=moi [mei2]\n\t1. Reu. \n\t2. Moi moi 莓莓 ruong ngon, thua ruong bang phang. \n\t3. Thao moi 草莓 qua dau tay, cay dau tay.
莖=hanh [jing1]\n\t1. Cai ro cay co, than cay co. \n\t2. Cai chuoi. Mot soi toc goi la nhat hanh phat 一莖髮.
茎=hanh [jing1]\n\t1. Cai ro cay co, than cay co. \n\t2. Cai chuoi. Mot soi toc goi la nhat hanh phat 一莖髮.
莘=san, tan [shen1|xin1]\n\t1. San san 莘莘 dong duc, tung dan tung lu. \n\t2. Mot am la tan. Te tan 細莘 mot thu co thom, re dung lam thuoc. Thuong viet la 細辛.
莙=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Day quan, co la xum xit nhau.
莛=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Ro co, soi co.
莝=toa [cuo4]\n\t1. Rom co bam ngan cho ngua an.
莞=hoan, hoan [guan1|wan3]\n\t1. Co coi, dung det chieu. 2. Mot am la hoan. Hoan nhi 莞爾 mim cuoi. Khuat Nguyen 屈原. Ngu phu hoan nhi nhi tieu 漁父莞爾而笑 (So tu 楚辭) ong chai mim cuoi.
莠=duu, tu [you3]\n\t1. Co vuc, hay moc trong ruong lua lam hai lua. Cho nen cai gi ac hai cung goi la duu. Tuc dan tot goi la luong 良, tuc dan xau goi la duu 莠. Ta quen doc la chu tu.
莢=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Qua cua cac loai dau. Pham cay co giong nhu qua dau deu goi la giap. Nhu tao giap 皂莢 qua bo ket.
荚=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Qua cua cac loai dau. Pham cay co giong nhu qua dau deu goi la giap. Nhu tao giap 皂莢 qua bo ket.
莧=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Rau den.
苋=hien [xian4]\n\t1. Rau den.
莨=lang [lang4]\n\t1. Lang dang 莨菪 mot thu co de lam thuoc. Tuc goi la thien tien tu 天仙子. \n\t2. Thu lang 薯莨 mot thu co co nhieu nhua dung de nhuom day gai, day day cho ben, co khi dung de nhuom vai nua.
莩=phu [fu2|piao3]\n\t1. Cai mang bao ngoai cai mam cac giong thuc vat moi no. \n\t2. Gia phu 葭莩 cai mang mong trong than cay lau, nguoi ta thuong boc ra de lam mang sao. Vi no mong ma lai o trong than cay, nen doi sau goi ho xa la gia phu. \n\t3. Mot am la bieu. Cung nghia voi chu bieu 殍 chet doi.
莪=nga [e2]\n\t1. Co nga.
莫=mac, mo, mach, ba [mo4]\n\t1. Tuyet khong, chang ai khong. Nhu mac bat chan cu 莫不震懼 chang ai la chang so run. \n\t2. Cho, loi cam chi. Nhu quan mac vu 君莫舞 anh cho co mua. Ly Bach. Nhan sinh dac y tu tan hoan, Mac su kim ton khong doi nguyet 人生得意須盡歡，莫使金樽空對月 Nguoi ta o doi khi dac y, hay tan vui huong, Cho de chen vang trong khong truoc vang trang. \n\t3. Quang mac 廣莫 bat ngat. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu mac 羃. \n\t5. Yen dinh. \n\t6. Vot. \n\t7. To lon. \n\t8. Cung nghia voi chu mac 瘼. \n\t9. Mot am la mo. Cung nhu chu mo 暮. \n\t10. Lai mot am la mach. Ki diep mach mach 其葉莫莫 la no ram rap. \n\t11. Mot am nua la ba. Lang. Quan phu ba ba 君婦莫莫 vo anh tinh yen lang. \n\t12. Ho Mac.
莾=mang [mang3]\n\t1. Co. \n\t2. Mang mang 莽莽 ram rap, co tot buop. Nguoi o nha que tu xung la thao mang chi than 草莽之臣 y noi thoi khong lam quan nua. \n\t3. Mang thao 莽草 mot thu cay moc tung bui, mui hang ma doc, dung danh ba chuot. \n\t4. Tho lo. Nhu lo mang 鹵莽 nguoi tho lo, ba dau noi day, ba gi lam nay.
菀=uyen [wan3]\n\t1. Tot tuoi. \n\t2. Uat. \n\t3. Tu uyen 紫菀 cay tu uyen, re dung lam thuoc.
菁=tinh [jing1]\n\t1. Vu tinh 蕪菁 rau cai thia. \n\t2. Tinh tinh 菁菁 hoa co ram rap tot tuoi. Vi the phan tinh tuy cua vat goi la tinh hoa 菁華.
菅=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Co gian, co may. Coi re tinh mang nguoi cu giet bua di goi la thao gian nhan menh 草菅人命.
菇=co [gu1]\n\t1. Nam. Nhu huong co 香菇 nam huong.
菉=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Co luc. \n\t2. Luc dau 菉豆 dau xanh. Cung viet la 綠豆.
菊=cuc [ju2]\n\t1. Hoa cuc. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Tam kinh tuu hoang, tung cuc do ton 三 徑 就 荒，松 菊 猶 存 ra loi nho den vuon hoang, hang tung hang cuc hay con day.
菌=khuan [jun1|jun4]\n\t1. Cay nam, co thu an ngon, co thu doc la. \n\t2. Mot giong dong vat rat nho, song nho o trong cac loai vat oi thoi goi la vi khuan 微菌, song nho o trong than the nguoi hay giong vat goi la te khuan 細菌 sinh ra lam benh la.
菓=qua [guo3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu qua 果.
菔=bac [fu2]\n\t1. Lo bac 蘆菔 rau cai. Co khi goi la la bac 蘿菔 hay 蘿蔔.
菖=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Xuong bo 菖蒲 co xuong bo, moc o ve song ve suoi, mui thom sac, dung lam thuoc duoc. Tuc cu mung nam thang nam lay la xuong bo cat nhu luoi guom treo o cua de tru ta goi la bo kiem 蒲劍.
菘=tung [song1]\n\t1. Rau tung.
菜=thai [cai4]\n\t1. Rau. Thu rau co nao an duoc deu goi la thai. Nguoi doi phai an rau tru bua nen goi la thai sac 菜色. \n\t2. Tuc goi cac do an com la thai.
菟=tho, tho, do [tu2|tu4]\n\t1. Tho ti 菟絲 co tho ti, la mot giong tam gui, song nho o cac cay khac, hat no dung lam thuoc, goi la tho ti tu 菟絲子 tuc day to hong (Cuscuta chinensis). Cung doc la chu tho. \n\t2. Mot am la do. Nguoi nuoc So 楚 goi con ho la u do 於菟.
菠=ba [bo1]\n\t1. Ba lang 菠薐 mot thu rau thuong an (nhu la don).
菡=ham [han4]\n\t1. Ham dam 菡萏 hoa sen. Ten khac cua ha hoa 荷花.
菩=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Bo de 梵 dich am chu Pham bodhi, nghia la to biet le chan chinh. Tau dich la chinh giac 正覺. \n\t2. Trong loai thuc vat co thu hat tron dung lam trang hat, cho nen goi la bo de tu 菩提子 tuc hat bo hon. \n\t3. Ben An Do co cay Tat-bat-la. Vi Phat tu dac dao o duoi goc cay ay nen goi la bo de thu 菩提樹 cay bo de. \n\t4. Bo tat 菩薩 dich am tieng Pham bodhisattva, noi du la Bo-de-tat-doa 菩提薩埵 nghia la da tu giac ngo lai giac ngo cho chung sinh.
菪=dang [dang4]\n\t1. Lang dang 莨菪. Xem chu lang 莨.
菫=can [jin3]\n\t1. Rau can can.
華=hoa, hoa [hua1|hua2|hua4]\n\t1. Nuoc Tau. Nuoc Tau tu goi la Trung Hoa 中華, nguoi Tau la Hoa nhan 華人. \n\t2. Mau mo, ruc ro. Pham su gi hien ro ra deu goi la hoa. Nhu quang hoa 光華, vinh hoa 榮華, v.v. \n\t3. Van suc, cai de trang suc be ngoai cung goi la hoa. Nhu hoa le 華麗, hoa my 華美, v.v. Xa phi cung goi la xa hoa 奢華 , son phan mau mo goi la duyen hoa 鉛華, nha cua son do goi la hoa oc 華屋, v.v. Chi vu be ngoai khong chuong su thuc goi la phu hoa 浮華, phon hoa 繁華, v.v. deu la cai nghia trang suc be ngoai ca. \n\t4. Tinh hoa. Van tu hay goi la ham anh tro hoa 含英咀華 bao ham chat tinh hoa, v.v. \n\t5. Co tai noi tieng. Nhu tai hoa 才華, thanh hoa 聲華, v.v. \n\t6. Ruc ro. Nhu thieu hoa 韶華 bong mat troi mua xuan, canh sac bon mua goi la vat hoa 物華 hay tue hoa 歲華, v.v. Khen cai tuoi tre cua nguoi goi la nien hoa 年華, cho do hoi nhiet nao goi la kinh hoa 京華, v.v. \n\t7. Toc bac goi la hoa phat 華髮. \n\t8. Cung nghia voi chu hoa 花. \n\t9. Mot am la hoa. Nui Hoa son 華山.
华=hoa, hoa [hua1|hua2|hua4]\n\t1. Nuoc Tau. Nuoc Tau tu goi la Trung Hoa 中華, nguoi Tau la Hoa nhan 華人. \n\t2. Mau mo, ruc ro. Pham su gi hien ro ra deu goi la hoa. Nhu quang hoa 光華, vinh hoa 榮華, v.v. \n\t3. Van suc, cai de trang suc be ngoai cung goi la hoa. Nhu hoa le 華麗, hoa my 華美, v.v. Xa phi cung goi la xa hoa 奢華 , son phan mau mo goi la duyen hoa 鉛華, nha cua son do goi la hoa oc 華屋, v.v. Chi vu be ngoai khong chuong su thuc goi la phu hoa 浮華, phon hoa 繁華, v.v. deu la cai nghia trang suc be ngoai ca. \n\t4. Tinh hoa. Van tu hay goi la ham anh tro hoa 含英咀華 bao ham chat tinh hoa, v.v. \n\t5. Co tai noi tieng. Nhu tai hoa 才華, thanh hoa 聲華, v.v. \n\t6. Ruc ro. Nhu thieu hoa 韶華 bong mat troi mua xuan, canh sac bon mua goi la vat hoa 物華 hay tue hoa 歲華, v.v. Khen cai tuoi tre cua nguoi goi la nien hoa 年華, cho do hoi nhiet nao goi la kinh hoa 京華, v.v. \n\t7. Toc bac goi la hoa phat 華髮. \n\t8. Cung nghia voi chu hoa 花. \n\t9. Mot am la hoa. Nui Hoa son 華山.
菰=co [gu1]\n\t1. Rau co, lua co. \n\t2. Nam.
菱=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Cu au.
菲=phi, phi [fei1|fei3]\n\t1. Rau phi, cu cai. \n\t2. It, mon, so sai. Nhu phi am thuc 菲飲食 an uong so sai. Tang do gi cho nguoi noi nhun la phi kinh 菲敬 kinh dang le mon. \n\t3. Mot am la phi. Nhu phuong phi thoi tiet 芳菲時節 thoi tiet thom tho, noi vi du mua xuan hoa co tuoi tot vay.
菴=am [an1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu am 庵.
菸=u, yen [yan1]\n\t1. Heo, ua. \n\t2. Mot am la yen. Cay thuoc la.
菹=tru, thu [zu1]\n\t1. Dua muoi. Dua muoi de ca cay goi la tru 菹, thai nho ra goi la te 齏. \n\t2. Cho cham co moc um tum goi la tru. Cung doc la thu. \n\t3. Bam xuong thit (mot hinh phat tan khoc thoi xua).
菼=tham [tan3]\n\t1. Co dich, lau.
菽=thuc [shu1]\n\t1. Dau, ten goi ca cac giong dau. Le ky 禮記 co cau xuyet thuc am thuy tan ky hoan, tu chi vi hieu 啜菽飲水盡其歡，斯之謂孝 an dau uong nuoc het tinh vui, the goi la hieu. Nay ta noi tho kinh cha me la thuc thuy thua hoan 菽水承歡.
菾=diem [tian2]\n\t1. Co diem, tuc goi la quan dat thai 莙薘菜 cu cai do.
萁=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Day dau. Tao Thuc 曹植 (192-232) co cau tho rang. chu dau nhien dau ky 煮豆燃萁 nau dau dun bang day dau, la vi bi anh la Tao Phi uc hiep ma noi the. Nay ta noi anh em tan hai lan nhau la dau ky 豆萁 la vi the. \n\t2. Co ky.
萃=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Hop. \n\t2. Dan. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu tuy 悴. \n\t4. Sac co.
萄=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Bo dao 葡萄 cay nho, qua an ngon va lam ruou vang. Vuong Han 王翰. Bo dao my tuu da quang boi 葡萄美酒夜光杯 (Luong Chau tu 涼州詞) ruou ngon bo dao dung chen da quang.
萆=ti [bi4]\n\t1. Ti giai 萆薢 co ti giai, cu dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la ti. Ao toi, ao di mua.
萇=truong [chang2]\n\t1. Truong so 萇楚 cay truong so, moc tung bui, qua giong qua dao ma dang, nen cung goi la cay duong dao 楊桃. Ta quen doc la chu tranh.
苌=truong [chang2]\n\t1. Truong so 萇楚 cay truong so, moc tung bui, qua giong qua dao ma dang, nen cung goi la cay duong dao 楊桃. Ta quen doc la chu tranh.
萊=lai [lai2]\n\t1. Co lai. Co moc o trong ruong lua goi la thao lai 草萊. \n\t2. Lai bac 萊菔 tuc la ba lac 蘿蔔. Xem chu bac 蔔.
莱=lai [lai2]\n\t1. Co lai. Co moc o trong ruong lua goi la thao lai 草萊. \n\t2. Lai bac 萊菔 tuc la ba lac 蘿蔔. Xem chu bac 蔔.
萋=the [qi1]\n\t1. Kinh can. \n\t2. The the 萋萋 tot um. Thoi Hieu 崔顥. Phuong thao the the Anh Vu chau 芳草萋萋鸚鵡洲 co thom moc tot tuoi o tren bai Anh Vu. Tan Da dich tho. Bai xa Anh Vu xanh day co non.
萌=manh [meng2]\n\t1. Mam co, cay co moi moc deu goi la manh nay mam. \n\t2. Noi su gi moi co diem ra cung goi la manh. Nhu nhi hoa vi manh 弭禍未萌 ngan hoa tu luc chua xay ra. \n\t3. Bua co. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu manh 氓.
萍=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Beo. Vi no noi o tren mat nuoc nen goi la phu binh 浮萍. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Phu binh nhieu nhieu canh kham ai 浮萍擾擾更堪哀 (Luu Linh mo 劉伶墓) canh beo troi giat dang thuong thay.
萎=nuy [wei3]\n\t1. Heo, cay co heo. \n\t2. Om chet. Nhu triet nhan ky nuy ho 哲人其萎乎 ( Le ky 禮記) nguoi hien triet om chet mat u. \n\t3. Nuy nhuy 萎蕤 hoa nuy nhuy, co khi goi la uy nhuy 葳蕤, dung de lam thuoc. Mot ten goi la ngoc truc 玉竹.
萏=dam [dan4]\n\t1. Ham dam 菡萏 hoa sen. Con goi la ha hoa 荷花.
萑=hoan, chuy [huan2]\n\t1. Co hoan, co lau. \n\t2. Mot am la chuy. Co buop, co moc nhieu. \n\t3. Co ich mau.
萬=van [mo4|wan4]\n\t1. Muon, muoi nghin la mot van. \n\t2. Loi noi qua lam. Nhu van nan 萬難, kho qua lam, van van bat kha 萬萬不可 khong nen lam lam, that la khong the. \n\t3. Noi vi du ve so nhieu. Nhu van nang 萬能 nhieu tai lam. \n\t4. Ten dieu mua. \n\t5. Ho Van.
万=van [mo4|wan4]\n\t1. Muon, muoi nghin la mot van. \n\t2. Loi noi qua lam. Nhu van nan 萬難, kho qua lam, van van bat kha 萬萬不可 khong nen lam lam, that la khong the. \n\t3. Noi vi du ve so nhieu. Nhu van nang 萬能 nhieu tai lam. \n\t4. Ten dieu mua. \n\t5. Ho Van.
萱=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Co huyen. Mot ten la vong uu 忘憂, lai goi la nghi nam 宜男 hoa la deu an duoc ca. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau yen dac huyen thao, ngon thu chi boi 焉得萱草，言樹之背 sao duoc co huyen, o sau nha phia bac, tuc la hoa nay vay. Nha phia bac la cho dan ba o, vi the goi me la huyen duong 萱堂.
萲=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huyen 萱.
萵=oa [wo1|zhua1]\n\t1. Oa cu 萵苣 mot thu rau an, rau diep.
莴=oa [wo1|zhua1]\n\t1. Oa cu 萵苣 mot thu rau an, rau diep.
萸=du [yu2]\n\t1. Thu du 茱萸 cay thu du. Co ba thu, mot thu goi la ngo thu du 吳茱萸 dung lam thuoc, mot thu goi la thuc thu du 食茱萸 dung pha do an, mot thu goi la son thu du 山茱萸.
萹=phien [pian1]\n\t1. Phien suc 萹蓄 mot thu co de lam thuoc. \n\t2. Phien dau 萹豆 mot thu dau de lam thuoc. Ta goi la bien dau.
萼=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Dai hoa, cai bau de bao ho canh hoa. Nay ta lay hai chu hoa ngac 花萼 de noi ve tinh anh em, cung la lay cai y dai voi hoa cung bao ho nhau vay.
落=lac [la4|lao4|luo4]\n\t1. Rung. La rung, hoa rung goi la lac. Nhu ngo dong nhat diep lac, thien ha cong tri thu 梧桐一葉落，天下共知秋 mot la ngo dong rung, moi nguoi deu biet la mua thu (den). \n\t2. Cung dung de ta cai canh huong cua nguoi. Nhu lanh lac 冷落 lanh lung te ngat, luan lac 淪落 chim noi, luu lac 流落, doa lac 墮落, v.v. deu chi ve cai canh suy doi khon kho ca. \n\t3. Roi xuong. Nhu lac vu 落雨 mua xuong, lac tuyet 落雪 tuyet sa, v.v. \n\t4. Ruong bo, khong dung cung goi la lac. Nhu lac de 落第 thi hong, lac chuc 落職 bi cach chuc. \n\t5. Sot, mat. Nhu lac ki tu 落幾字 bo sot mat may chu, san lac phu tu 刊落浮詞 xoa bo loi nham nhi di. \n\t6. Thua thot. Nhu lieu lac than tinh 寥落晨星 lo tho sao buoi sang. \n\t7. Rong rai. Nhu khoat lac 闊落. \n\t8. Cho o, cho nguoi ta o tu voi nhau goi la lac. Nhu bo lac 部落 chom trai, thon lac 村落 chom xom. Vi the nen bo rao bo giau cung goi la phan lac 藩落, nen nha goi la toa lac 坐落, v.v. \n\t9. Moi. Moi lam nha xong lam tiec an mung goi la lac thanh 落成. \n\t10. Lac lac 落落 loi lac, khong co theo tuc. \n\t11. Ve. \n\t12. Bo hong. \n\t13. Nuoc giot gianh.
葅=thu [ju1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 菹.
葆=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Co cay moc tung bui, um tum. Nhu dau nhu bong bao 頭如蓬葆 toc roi nhu bong bong. \n\t2. Giau ky, cat ky. Giu gin cho tinh khi vung ben o trong khong tiet ra ngoai goi la bao. \n\t3. Rong lon. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi nhung chu bao sau day. 保, 褓, 堡, 寶.
葉=diep [xie2|ye4]\n\t1. La, la cay co, canh hoa. Nhu truc diep 竹葉 la tre, thien diep lien 千葉蓮 hoa sen nghin canh. \n\t2. To, thep. Mot to giay goi la nhat diep 一葉, vang nen mong ra tung manh goi la diep kim 葉金 vang thep. \n\t3. Doi. Nhu mat diep 末葉 doi cuoi, doi doi noi doi goi la dich diep 奕葉. \n\t4. Nganh ho, ho nha vua goi la kim chi ngoc diep 金枝玉葉 canh vang la ngoc. \n\t5. Ten dat.
叶=diep [xie2|ye4]\n\t1. La, la cay co, canh hoa. Nhu truc diep 竹葉 la tre, thien diep lien 千葉蓮 hoa sen nghin canh. \n\t2. To, thep. Mot to giay goi la nhat diep 一葉, vang nen mong ra tung manh goi la diep kim 葉金 vang thep. \n\t3. Doi. Nhu mat diep 末葉 doi cuoi, doi doi noi doi goi la dich diep 奕葉. \n\t4. Nganh ho, ho nha vua goi la kim chi ngoc diep 金枝玉葉 canh vang la ngoc. \n\t5. Ten dat.
葑=phong, phung [feng1|feng4]\n\t1. Rau phong. \n\t2. Mot am la phung. Nam moc tung chum ma re quan quyt nhau goi la phung.
葖=dot [tu1]\n\t1. Cot dot 蓇葖.
著=tru [zhu4|zhuo2]\n\t1. Sang, ro ret. Nhu tru danh 著名 noi tieng. \n\t2. Soan thuat sach vo. Nhu tru thu lap thuyet 著書立說 lam ra sach vo. \n\t3. Neu len. Nhu vinh tru vi lenh 永著爲令 cu neu the lam phep mai mai. \n\t4. Mot am la truoc. Mac. Nhu truoc y 着衣 mac ao. \n\t5. Danh nuoc co. Vi the nen su gi tinh lam lo viec goi la that truoc 失著 tinh lam. \n\t6. Bam. Nguoi o mot cho khong roi di dau goi la tho truoc 土著. Cay co hoa goi la truoc hoa 著花. Vuong Duy 王維. Lai nhat y song tien, Han mai truoc hoa vi 來日綺窗前，寒梅著花未 (Tap thi 雜詩) Ngay ban den day, truoc cua so dep, Cay mai lanh da no hoa chua ? \n\t7. Di den dau goi la truoc xu 著處. \n\t8. Duoc. Dung lam tro tu. Nhu kien truoc 見著 thay duoc, phung truoc 逢著 gap duoc. \n\t9. Loi menh lenh. Nhu truoc chieu so thinh 著照所請 cu xet dieu da xin. \n\t10. Su gi co quy thuc goi la truoc. Nhu truoc thuc 著實 dung thuc, truoc lac 著落 dung cho. Tuc hay viet la 着. \n\t11. Mot am nua la tru. Cho khoang cua cach binh phong. \n\t12. Ngoi thu. \n\t13. Tich chua.
葘=truy, tai [zi1]\n\t1. Ruong vo cay da duoc mot nam. \n\t2. Mot am la tai. Cung nghia voi chu tai 災.
葚=tham [ren4|shen4]\n\t1. Qua dau. Co khi doc la chu tham.
葛=cat [ge2|ge3]\n\t1. Day san. Re dung lam thuoc goi la cat can 葛根, vo dung det vai goi la cat bo 葛布. Ngay xua mua he hay mac ao vai san, nen mac ao mua he thuong goi la cat. Day san moc quan quyt nhau, nen su gi boi roi kho go goi la cu cat 糾葛 hay giao cat 膠葛.
葡=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Bo dao 葡萄. Xem chu dao 萄. \n\t2. Bo Dao Nha 葡萄牙 ten nuoc (Portugal).
董=dong [dong3]\n\t1. Doc trach. Nhu dong su 董事 giu quyen doc trach cong viec. \n\t2. Cot dong 骨董 tap nhap lao nhao. Do co goi la co dong 古董 hay cot dong 骨董. \n\t3. Ho Dong.
葦=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Co lau.
苇=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Co lau.
葩=ba [pa1]\n\t1. Hoa. \n\t2. Tinh hoa.
葫=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Toi tay. \n\t2. Ho lo 葫蘆 qua bau.
葬=tang [zang4]\n\t1. Chon, nguoi chet bo vao ao quan dem chon goi la tang. Nhu mai tang 埋葬 chon cat. Bat cu dung cach gi chu y de cho tieu cai xac chet deu goi la tang. Nhu hoa tang 火葬 lay lua thieu xac, tang than ngu phuc 葬身魚腹 chet duoi (vui than bung ca), v.v. \n\t2. Vui lap. Tang tong 葬送 buoc nguoi vao toi, ham hai.
葭=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Co lau. Nguy Minh De 魏明帝 cho em vo la Mao Tang 毛曾 va Ha Hau Huyen 夏侯玄 cung ngoi, nguoi bay gio goi la kiem gia y ngoc thu 蒹葭倚玉樹 co kiem co gai tua cay ngoc. \n\t2. Gia phu 葭莩. Xem chu phu 莩.
葯=uoc, duoc, dieu [yao4]\n\t1. Dau nhuy duc cua hoa, tuc la hung nhuy 雄蕊. \n\t2. Cay bach chi 白芷. \n\t3. Mot am la duoc. Cung nghia voi chu 藥. \n\t4. Mot am nua la dieu. Buoc.
葱=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Hanh. Cho top trang goi la thong bach 葱白.
葳=uy [wei1]\n\t1. Uy nhuy 葳萎. Xem chu nhuy 萎.
葵=quy [kui2]\n\t1. Rau quy. \n\t2. Huong nhat quy 向日葵 mot giong quy mot ro (nhanh) moc thang, vao khoang cuoi thu dau ha no hoa vang. Tinh no thuong cu trieu huong ve mat troi, nen goi la huong nhat quy. Nguoi ta thuong dung lam tieng de to long ke duoi huong mo nguoi tren. \n\t3. Thuc quy 蜀葵 hoa nhieu mau, thu hoa nho goi la cam quy 錦葵. \n\t4. Thu quy 秋葵 thu quy no ve mua he, hoa vang phot co nam canh, giua tim. \n\t5. Bo quy 蒲葵 mot thu cay lon thuong xanh, la giong nhu la moc la co, dung lam quat goi la quy phien 葵扇.
葶=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Dinh lich 葶藶 rau day, la de an, hat dung lam thuoc.
葷=huan [hun1]\n\t1. Thuc cay, rau hang, nhu hanh, he, toi deu goi la huan. \n\t2. Tuc goi an man la huan 葷, an chay la to 素.
荤=huan [hun1]\n\t1. Thuc cay, rau hang, nhu hanh, he, toi deu goi la huan. \n\t2. Tuc goi an man la huan 葷, an chay la to 素.
葸=ti [xi3]\n\t1. So hai. Nhu uy ti bat tien 畏葸不前 so hai khong dam tien len.
葹=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Quyen thi 菤葹 co quyen thi.
葺=tap [qi4]\n\t1. Tu bo lai. Lay co lay la gioi lai mai nha goi la tap. Sua sang lai nha cua cung goi la tap. \n\t2. Chong chat, hop lai.
蒂=de [di4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu de 蔕.
韮=phi [jiu3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 韭. (Ton nghi. Unicode xep chu phi 韮 vao bo 179 cuu 韭)
蒐=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Gop lai. Nhu suu tap 蒐輯 gop lai. Con viet la 蒐集. \n\t2. Le di san mua xuan, xuan suu 春蒐. \n\t3. An, giau. \n\t4. Cay thien thao 茜草.
蒔=thi, thi [shi2|shi4]\n\t1. Thi la 蒔蘿 tuc la tieu hoi huong 小茴香 dung de pha vao do an cho thom. \n\t2. Mot am la thi. Dung, cay lai. Nhu thi uong 蒔秧 cay lua lai.
莳=thi, thi [shi2|shi4]\n\t1. Thi la 蒔蘿 tuc la tieu hoi huong 小茴香 dung de pha vao do an cho thom. \n\t2. Mot am la thi. Dung, cay lai. Nhu thi uong 蒔秧 cay lua lai.
蒙=mong [meng1|meng2|meng3]\n\t1. Toi. Cho mat troi lan goi la dai mong 大蒙. \n\t2. Ngu dot, toi tam khong biet gi goi la mong muoi 蒙昧. \n\t3. Tre con. Nhu huan mong 訓蒙 day tre con hoc. \n\t4. Bi, che lap. Nhu mong nan 蒙難 bi nan, mong tran 蒙塵 bi long dong, mong dau 蒙頭 che, trum dau. \n\t5. Chiu. Nhu mong an 蒙恩 chiu on. \n\t6. Minh tu noi nhun minh la mong, noi minh la ke ngu dot. \n\t7. Mong Co 蒙古 giong Mong Co thuoc nuoc Tau.
蒜=toan [suan4]\n\t1. Toi (loai rau thom).
蒞=li [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu li 涖, chu li 莅.
莅=li [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu li 涖, chu li 莅.
蒟=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cu nhuoc 蒟蒻 mot thu co, re rat mem, vut vo di, cho nuoc tro vao dun soi nam sau luot, rot tung mang nhu mo, dung lam do an. \n\t2. Cu tuong 蒟醬 cay trau khong.
蒡=bang [bang4]\n\t1. Nguu bang 牛蒡 co nguu bang, hat dung lam thuoc.
蒨=thien [qian4]\n\t1. Tuoi tot. \n\t2. Sac do. \n\t3. Thien thao 茜草 co thien thao.
蒯=khoai [kuai3]\n\t1. Co khoai dung de det va danh day. \n\t2. Ho Khoai.
蒱=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Su bo 摴蒱 mot tro danh bac doi xua, cung nhu tro danh suc sac bay gio. Nay thi thong dung lam chu chi ve co bac.
蒲=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Co bo. La non an duoc, la gia dung lam chieu lam quat hay lam cai bao boc do, tuc goi la bo bao 蒲包. \n\t2. Bach xuong bo 白菖蒲 cay bach xuong bo. Goi tat la bo. tet doan ngo dung la no cat nhu hinh cai guom de tru ta goi la bo kiem 蒲劍. Vi the nen thang nam goi la bo nguyet 蒲月. \n\t3. Bo lieu 蒲柳 cay lieu duong, mot thu lieu moc o ven nuoc, canh la eo la, sap thu da tan, nen hay dung de goi ve the suc con gai va nguoi yeu duoi. \n\t4. Ho Bo.
蒴=soc [shuo4]\n\t1. Thu qua nao do may o hat lien nhau thanh qua, chin nut vo ngoai goi la soc, nhu bach hop 百合, anh tuc 罌粟, khien nguu 牽牛, v.v.
蒸=chung [zheng1]\n\t1. Lu, bon. Nhu chung dan 蒸民. \n\t2. Hoi nong boc len. Nhu uat chung 鬱蒸 nung nau, viem chung 炎蒸 nong ngun ngut, v.v. \n\t3. Huong len, dun dun. Nhu chung chung nhat thuong 蒸蒸日上 dun dun ngay tien len, y noi la cham chi tu tien len hon vay. \n\t4. Cay gai roc vo. \n\t5. Duoc. \n\t6. Cui nho. \n\t7. Te ve mua dong, goi la te chung.
蒹=kiem [jian1]\n\t1. Co kiem, hoi giong nhu co gia. Xem chu gia 葭.
蒺=tat [ji2]\n\t1. Tat le 蒺藜 co tat le, hoa vang, qua co gai, dung lam thuoc. Tat le sa thuong da hoa khai 蒺藜沙上野花開 y noi anh tai mai mot.
蒻=nhuoc [rou4]\n\t1. Co nhuoc, co huong bo con non goi la nhuoc. \n\t2. Cu nhuoc 蒟蒻. Xem chu cu 蒟.
蒼=thuong, thuong [cang1]\n\t1. Sac co xanh. Pham cai gi xanh sam deu goi la thuong. Nhu thuong giang 蒼江 song biec, thuong hai 蒼海 be xanh, thuong thuong 蒼蒼 troi xanh, v.v. \n\t2. Vat gi da gia cung goi la thuong thuong. Nhu kiem gia thuong thuong 蒹葭蒼蒼 co kiem co gia gia ua. Day to gia goi la thuong dau 蒼頭 vi day to bit dau bang vai xanh. \n\t3. Troi. Nhu bi thuong 彼蒼 ong xanh kia, troi kia, khung thuong 穹蒼, hao thuong 昊蒼 deu nghia la troi ca. \n\t4. Thuong sinh 蒼生 tram ho, chung sinh, dan. \n\t5. Mot am la thuong. Mang thuong 莽蒼 dat gan dong, gan nha que.
苍=thuong, thuong [cang1]\n\t1. Sac co xanh. Pham cai gi xanh sam deu goi la thuong. Nhu thuong giang 蒼江 song biec, thuong hai 蒼海 be xanh, thuong thuong 蒼蒼 troi xanh, v.v. \n\t2. Vat gi da gia cung goi la thuong thuong. Nhu kiem gia thuong thuong 蒹葭蒼蒼 co kiem co gia gia ua. Day to gia goi la thuong dau 蒼頭 vi day to bit dau bang vai xanh. \n\t3. Troi. Nhu bi thuong 彼蒼 ong xanh kia, troi kia, khung thuong 穹蒼, hao thuong 昊蒼 deu nghia la troi ca. \n\t4. Thuong sinh 蒼生 tram ho, chung sinh, dan. \n\t5. Mot am la thuong. Mang thuong 莽蒼 dat gan dong, gan nha que.
蒿=hao [hao1]\n\t1. Cay choi, mot thu co ngai. Co nhieu thu nhu. thanh hao 青蒿, mau hao 牡蒿, bach hao 白蒿, nhan tran hao 茵陳蒿, v.v. may thu nay deu dung lam thuoc ca. \n\t2. Trong xa. Nhu hao muc 蒿目 trong xa ma lo truoc, hao di the tran 蒿易棲塵 y noi nhu nguoi vao doi cuu doi thay bui tran mo mit ca mat. \n\t3. Tieu tan. \n\t4. Hoi len nghi ngut.
蓀=ton [sun1]\n\t1. Mot thu co thom. Mot ten la khe ton 溪蓀. Xem thach xuong bo 石昌蒲.
荪=ton [sun1]\n\t1. Mot thu co thom. Mot ten la khe ton 溪蓀. Xem thach xuong bo 石昌蒲.
蓁=tran [zhen1]\n\t1. Co tot um.
蓂=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Minh giap 蓂莢 mot thu co moc ra la co diem tot.
蓄=suc [xu4]\n\t1. Danh chua. \n\t2. Dung chua duoc. \n\t3. De cho moc (rau, toc). Nhu suc tu 蓄鬚 de rau. \n\t4. Suc chi 蓄志 ap u, nuoi chi, dinh bung.
蓆=tich [xi2]\n\t1. Lon, nay muon dung nhu chu tien 薦.
蓇=cot [gu1]\n\t1. Giong cay co nao qua nhu qua co be chin thi mot ben nut ra goi la cot dot 蓇葖.
蓉=dong [rong2]\n\t1. Phu dong 芙蓉. Xem chu phu 芙. 
蓊=ong, ong [weng3]\n\t1. Ong uat 蓊鬱 um tum. Con viet la ong uat 蓊蔚 hay uat ong 鬱蓊. \n\t2. Mot am la ong. Thu co moc tung ro, ro dam hoa, la lan tan, goi la ong dai 蓊臺.
蓋=cai [gai4|ge3]\n\t1. Che, trum. \n\t2. Day, cai vung. \n\t3. Cai mui xe, cai o, cai du. \n\t4. Tuong, dung lam ngu tu. Nhu vi thien cai cao, vi dia cai hau 謂天蓋高，謂地蓋厚 bao troi troi tuong cao, bao dat dat tuong day. \n\t5. Hai. Nhu vo cai 無蓋 vo hai. \n\t6. Chuong, hon. \n\t7. Sieu viet, troi hon, at han. Nhu luc bat son he, khi cai cai the 力拔山兮氣蓋世 (Cai Ha ca 垓下歌) suc nho nui chu, hung khi trum doi.
盖=cai [gai4|ge3]\n\t1. Che, trum. \n\t2. Day, cai vung. \n\t3. Cai mui xe, cai o, cai du. \n\t4. Tuong, dung lam ngu tu. Nhu vi thien cai cao, vi dia cai hau 謂天蓋高，謂地蓋厚 bao troi troi tuong cao, bao dat dat tuong day. \n\t5. Hai. Nhu vo cai 無蓋 vo hai. \n\t6. Chuong, hon. \n\t7. Sieu viet, troi hon, at han. Nhu luc bat son he, khi cai cai the 力拔山兮氣蓋世 (Cai Ha ca 垓下歌) suc nho nui chu, hung khi trum doi.
蓍=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Co thi, la nho dai lai co tung ke, hoa trang hay do phot, hoi giong nhu hoa cuc, moi goc dam ra nhieu ro. Ngay xua dung ro no de xem boi goi la boi thi.
蓏=loa [luo3]\n\t1. Qua cua loai cay goi la qua 果, qua cua loai co goi la loa 蓏.
蓐=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Co lai moc um tum. \n\t2. Cai dem co. Dan ba toi luc de goi la toa nhuc 坐蓐. Cung nhu noi lam bon 臨盆. Co khi viet la nhuc 褥.
蓑=thoa, toa, tuy [suo1]\n\t1. Ao toi. Cung doc la toa. Lieu Tong Nguyen 柳宗元. Co chu thoa lap ong, Doc dieu han giang tuyet 孤舟蓑笠翁，獨釣寒江雪 (Giang tuyet 江雪). \n\t2. Che phu. \n\t3. Mot am la tuy. Tuy tuy 蓑蓑 hoa la ru xuong.
蓓=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Boi loi 蓓蕾 hoa moi chum chim sap no, hoa con trong nu.
蓧=dieu [diao4]\n\t1. Cai bo cao, cai cao co.
蓬=bong [peng2]\n\t1. Co bong. Mua thu thi chet kho, gio thoi bay tung goi la phi bong 飛蓬. \n\t2. Roi bong. Nhu bong dau cau dien 蓬頭垢面 dau bu mat bua. \n\t3. Leu tranh. Nhu tat mon bong ho 篳門蓬戶 leu tranh cua co, noi cai nha cua ke ngheo o. \n\t4. Bong lai tuong truyen trong be dong co mot qua nui co cac tien o goi la bong lai 蓬萊 hay bong doanh 蓬瀛, bong dao 蓬島.
蓮=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Hoa sen. Con gai bo chan thon thon nen goi la kim lien 金蓮. Dong Hon Hau 東昏侯 chieu vo, xay vang lam hoa sen o san cho Phan Phi 潘妃 di len roi noi rang moi buoc nay mot doa hoa sen. Vi the nen goi chan dan ba la kim lien 金蓮. \n\t2. Lien ton 蓮宗 mon tu Tinh Do 淨土 cua Phat giao, lay cho niem Phat sau khi chet duoc Phat tiep dan ve Tay phuong, o trong hoa sen bau sinh ra lam ton chi nen goi ton Tinh Do la Lien Ton, cac nha tu theo mon Tinh Do hop nhau niem Phat cau vang sinh goi la lien xa 蓮社.
莲=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Hoa sen. Con gai bo chan thon thon nen goi la kim lien 金蓮. Dong Hon Hau 東昏侯 chieu vo, xay vang lam hoa sen o san cho Phan Phi 潘妃 di len roi noi rang moi buoc nay mot doa hoa sen. Vi the nen goi chan dan ba la kim lien 金蓮. \n\t2. Lien ton 蓮宗 mon tu Tinh Do 淨土 cua Phat giao, lay cho niem Phat sau khi chet duoc Phat tiep dan ve Tay phuong, o trong hoa sen bau sinh ra lam ton chi nen goi ton Tinh Do la Lien Ton, cac nha tu theo mon Tinh Do hop nhau niem Phat cau vang sinh goi la lien xa 蓮社.
蓯=thung [cong1]\n\t1. Co thung. \n\t2. Nhuc thung dong 肉蓯蓉 mot giong thuc vat moc nho o cay khac, ro mem nhun, dung lam thuoc.
苁=thung [cong1]\n\t1. Co thung. \n\t2. Nhuc thung dong 肉蓯蓉 mot giong thuc vat moc nho o cay khac, ro mem nhun, dung lam thuoc.
蓰=ti [xi3]\n\t1. Nhieu gap nam goi la ti. Nhu boi ti 倍蓰 gap nam.
蓱=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu binh 苹.
蓴=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Rau nhut.
蓷=thoi [tui1]\n\t1. Co thoi, tuc co ich mau 益母.
蓺=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghe 藝.
蓼=lieu [liao3]\n\t1. Rau dang, dung de lam do gia vi. \n\t2. Mot am la luc. Cao lon, tot um. Kinh Thi 詩經 co bai Luc nga 蓼莪 co nga cao lon. Ong Vuong Bieu nha Tan doc bai tho ay toi cau ai ai phu mau, sinh nga cu lao 哀哀父母，生我劬勞 lien chay nuoc mat, hoc tro thay the, bo tho Luc nga khong hoc nua. Vi the nen thuong dung tho nay de chi nguoi co long hieu nho den cha me.
蓽=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Cay tat, cay moc thanh tung bui, tuc la cay kinh 荊. Dung co kinh dan lam canh cua goi la tat mon 蓽門 chi nha ngheo. Cung viet la 篳門.
荜=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Cay tat, cay moc thanh tung bui, tuc la cay kinh 荊. Dung co kinh dan lam canh cua goi la tat mon 蓽門 chi nha ngheo. Cung viet la 篳門.
蓿=tuc [xu5]\n\t1. Muc tuc 苜蓿. Xem chu muc 苜.
蔆=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu lang 菱.
蔑=miet [mie4]\n\t1. Khong. Nhu miet di gia thu 蔑以加此 khong gi hon the nua. \n\t2. Khinh thuong. Nhu miet thi 蔑視 coi re, khinh miet. \n\t3. Doi lua. Nhu vu miet 侮蔑 khinh nhon lua gat. \n\t4. Nho. \n\t5. Tinh vi. \n\t6. Bo.
蔓=man [man2|man4|wan4]\n\t1. Cac loai thuc vat ro bo dai duoi dat goi la man. \n\t2. Su gi o mot noi roi lan den cac noi la man duyen 蔓延, lam vuong vit lien can den moi nguoi goi la qua man sao 瓜蔓抄.
蔔=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu bac 菔.
蔕=de [di4]\n\t1. Num qua. \n\t2. Noi den coi nguon cua su gi goi la can de 根蔕. Nhu can tham de co 根深蔕固 re sau num chat. \n\t3. Vuong. Hai ben y kien chua thiet hop nhau goi la de gioi 蔕芥. Tuc viet la 蒂. Cung viet la 慸.
蔗=gia [zhe4]\n\t1. Cay mia, tuc goi la cam gia 甘蔗. \n\t2. Ngon ngot. Ong Co Khai Chi moi khi an mia thi an tu ngon toi goc va noi rang "dan dan vao canh thu" (tiem chi giai canh 漸至佳境). Vi the nen su gi boi kho ma den suong goi la gia canh 蔗境.
蔚=uy, uat [wei4|yu4]\n\t1. Co uy. Xem sung uy 茺蔚. \n\t2. Xanh tot, cay co xanh tot. \n\t3. Hung thinh. Nhu van phong uy khoi 文風蔚起 van phong hung thinh. \n\t4. Sac sam. Van tham mat goi la uy tao 蔚藻 hay ban uy 彬蔚. \n\t5. Mot am la uat. Ten dat.
蔞=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Co lau, mam an duoc. \n\t2. Lau hao 蔞蒿 loai co song nhieu nam, hoa co mau hoi vang, cong an duoc, ca cay dung lam thuoc.
蒌=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Co lau, mam an duoc. \n\t2. Lau hao 蔞蒿 loai co song nhieu nam, hoa co mau hoi vang, cong an duoc, ca cay dung lam thuoc.
蔟=thoc [cu4]\n\t1. Cai ne tam. \n\t2. Mot am la thau. Thai thau 太蔟 khuc nhac thai thau.
蔡=thai, sai, tat [cai4]\n\t1. Con rua lon. \n\t2. Nuoc Thai 蔡, chu hau thoi nha Chu 周. Ta quen doc la chu sai. \n\t3. Mot am la tat. Duoi xa.
蔣=tuong, tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Mot loai nam. \n\t2. Mot am la tuong. Nuoc Tuong. Ho Tuong.
蒋=tuong, tuong [jiang3]\n\t1. Mot loai nam. \n\t2. Mot am la tuong. Nuoc Tuong. Ho Tuong.
蔥=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Hanh, cung nghia voi chu thong 葱. \n\t2. Mau xanh. \n\t3. Tot tuoi.
葱=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Hanh, cung nghia voi chu thong 葱. \n\t2. Mau xanh. \n\t3. Tot tuoi.
蔦=dieu [niao3]\n\t1. Mot thu cay moc tung bui, tuc la cay tho ti tu 菟絲子. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau dieu du nu la thi u tung bach 蔦與女蘿施於松栢 cay dieu cung cay nu la bam vao cay tung cay bach. Bay gio hay dung chu dieu la 蔦蘿 de goi cac nguoi than thuoc, y noi nhu day dieu day la duoc bam vao cay tung cay bach, cung nhu cac nguoi ho hen duoc nho vao cho cao mon vay.
茑=dieu [niao3]\n\t1. Mot thu cay moc tung bui, tuc la cay tho ti tu 菟絲子. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau dieu du nu la thi u tung bach 蔦與女蘿施於松栢 cay dieu cung cay nu la bam vao cay tung cay bach. Bay gio hay dung chu dieu la 蔦蘿 de goi cac nguoi than thuoc, y noi nhu day dieu day la duoc bam vao cay tung cay bach, cung nhu cac nguoi ho hen duoc nho vao cho cao mon vay.
蔬=so [shu1]\n\t1. Rau, cac thu rau co dung de an duoc deu goi la so.
蔭=am [yin1|yin4]\n\t1. Bong cay, bong rop. \n\t2. Pham duoc nho on cua nguoi khac deu goi la am. Nhu to am 祖蔭 nho phuc trach cua to tien de lai. Phep ngay xua cu ong cha lam quan to, con chau duoc tap am ra lam quan, goi la am sinh 蔭生, am tu 蔭子, am ton 蔭孫, v.v. Tuc thuong viet la 廕.
荫=am [yin1|yin4]\n\t1. Bong cay, bong rop. \n\t2. Pham duoc nho on cua nguoi khac deu goi la am. Nhu to am 祖蔭 nho phuc trach cua to tien de lai. Phep ngay xua cu ong cha lam quan to, con chau duoc tap am ra lam quan, goi la am sinh 蔭生, am tu 蔭子, am ton 蔭孫, v.v. Tuc thuong viet la 廕.
蔴=ma [ma2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ma 麻.
蔻=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Dau khau 豆蔻 cay dau khau, moc o xu nong, qua nhu qua nhan, thu trang goi la bach dau khau 白豆蔻, thu do goi la hong dau khau 紅豆蔻 deu dung de lam thuoc ca. \n\t2. Dau khau 豆蔻 thieu nu xinh xan muoi ba, muoi bon tuoi.
蔽=te, phat [bi4]\n\t1. Che. Nhu y phuc chi so di te the 衣服之所以蔽體 quan ao de che than. \n\t2. Lap, che day, duong duoc. Nhu nhat ngon di te chi 一言以蔽之 mot loi bao trum het duoc, bat tuc di te ki co 不足以蔽其辜 khong du che lap duoc toi, v.v. \n\t3. Che lap. Nhu tac thong te minh 塞聰蔽明 che lap mat khieu sang. \n\t4. Xu quyet. Nhu te toi 蔽罪 xu quyet toi tinh. \n\t5. Mot am la phat. Buc rem che ben xe thoi co. 
蔾=le [li2]\n\t1. Tat le 蒺藜. Xem chu tat 蒺.
蕁=tam [xun2]\n\t1. Tam ma 蕁麻 co gai. \n\t2. Lua boc len. Nhu hoa thuong tam, thuy ha luu 火上蕁，水下流 lua boc len, nuoc chay xuong.
蕃=phien [fan1|fan2]\n\t1. Co tot. Boi the nen su gi nhieu nhoi deu goi la phien. Nhu phien thinh 蕃盛, phien thu 蕃庶 deu nghia la dong duc ca. \n\t2. Cung dung nhu chu phien 番. \n\t3. Ngot, nghi.
蕆=sien [chan3]\n\t1. Du, xong roi. Su gi da xong roi goi la sien su 蕆事.
蒇=sien [chan3]\n\t1. Du, xong roi. Su gi da xong roi goi la sien su 蕆事.
蕈=khuan [xun4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khuan 菌.
蕉=tieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Gai song. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu tieu 顦. \n\t3. Ba tieu 芭蕉 cay chuoi. Co khi goi la cam tieu 甘蕉 hay huong tieu 香蕉.
蕊=nhi [rui3]\n\t1. Cai nhi trong hoa. \n\t2. Hoa chua no han goi la nhi. \n\t3. Cay co bum tum.
蕋=nhi [rui3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nhi 蕊.
蕎=kieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Kieu mach 蕎麥 lua tam den.
荞=kieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Kieu mach 蕎麥 lua tam den.
蕑=gian [jian1]\n\t1. Co gian, cung nhu co lan.
蕓=van [yun2]\n\t1. Van dai 蕓薹 rau van dai, la non de an, hat de ep dau.
蕕=du [you2]\n\t1. Co du, la nhu rang cua, mui rat hoi, cho nen hay dung de vi voi ke tieu nhan. Nhu huan du bat dong khi 薰蕕不同器 co huan co du khong de cung mot do chua, y noi quan tu tieu nhan khong cung o voi nhau duoc.
莸=du [you2]\n\t1. Co du, la nhu rang cua, mui rat hoi, cho nen hay dung de vi voi ke tieu nhan. Nhu huan du bat dong khi 薰蕕不同器 co huan co du khong de cung mot do chua, y noi quan tu tieu nhan khong cung o voi nhau duoc.
蕖=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Phu cu 芙蕖 ten rieng cua hoa sen. Con goi la ha hoa 荷花.
