蕘=nhieu, nghieu [rao2]\n\t1. Cui rac. \n\t2. Ke kiem cui goi la nhieu. \n\t3. Cay nhieu, vo dung lam giay. Ta quen doc la chu nghieu.
荛=nhieu, nghieu [rao2]\n\t1. Cui rac. \n\t2. Ke kiem cui goi la nhieu. \n\t3. Cay nhieu, vo dung lam giay. Ta quen doc la chu nghieu.
蕙=hue [hui4]\n\t1. Cay hoa hue. \n\t2. Cao nha, thanh khiet. Nhu hue chat lan tam 蕙質蘭心 chat hue long lan, chi nguoi cao nha, thanh khiet.
蕝=toat [jue2]\n\t1. Mao toat 茅蕝 bo co gianh lai tung cho de neu ro ngoi thu, le doi xua khi hop trieu dinh.
蕞=toi, tui [zui4]\n\t1. Nho ti. Nhu toi nhi quoc 蕞爾國 nuoc be ti. Co khi doc la tui.
蕡=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Qua sai nuc niu. \n\t2. Hat gai.
蕢=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Cai sot dung dat.
蒉=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Cai sot dung dat.
蕤=nhuy [rui2]\n\t1. Hoa no thinh ru xuong. \n\t2. Nuy nhuy 萎蕤. Xem chu nuy 萎.
蕨=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Mot loai thuc vat no hoa ngam, la non an duoc.
蕩=dang, dang [dang4]\n\t1. Mong menh, bat ngat. \n\t2. Binh di, than than, thanh thoi. Luan ngu 論語. Quan tu than dang dang, tieu nhan truong thich thich 君子坦蕩蕩，小人長戚戚 (Thuat nhi 述而) nguoi quan tu thi than nhien thu thai, ke tieu nhan thi thuong lo lang u sau. \n\t3. Quay dong. Nhu dang tuong 蕩槳 quay mai cheo, tam dang 心蕩 dong long. \n\t4. Phong dang, phong tung, khong biet giu gin goi la dang. Nhu ke khong co nghe gi, chi choi lu bu goi la dang tu 蕩子, dan ba dam dat bat chinh goi la dang phu 蕩婦. \n\t5. Quet sach, rua sach, dep yen giac gia goi la tao dang 掃蕩 quet sach hay dang binh 蕩平 dep yen. \n\t6. Hong het. Nhu ky cuong dang nhien 紀綱蕩然 giuong moi hong het. Kinh Thi 詩經 co hai thien ban dang 板蕩 la tho cam than nha Chu 周 suy doi ma lam. Cho nen nay goi goi doi loan la trung nguyen ban dang 中原板蕩. \n\t7. Cham nuoc, ho ao nao co loi ca nuoc deu goi la dang. \n\t8. Mot am la dang. Khoi, thao.
荡=dang, dang [dang4]\n\t1. Mong menh, bat ngat. \n\t2. Binh di, than than, thanh thoi. Luan ngu 論語. Quan tu than dang dang, tieu nhan truong thich thich 君子坦蕩蕩，小人長戚戚 (Thuat nhi 述而) nguoi quan tu thi than nhien thu thai, ke tieu nhan thi thuong lo lang u sau. \n\t3. Quay dong. Nhu dang tuong 蕩槳 quay mai cheo, tam dang 心蕩 dong long. \n\t4. Phong dang, phong tung, khong biet giu gin goi la dang. Nhu ke khong co nghe gi, chi choi lu bu goi la dang tu 蕩子, dan ba dam dat bat chinh goi la dang phu 蕩婦. \n\t5. Quet sach, rua sach, dep yen giac gia goi la tao dang 掃蕩 quet sach hay dang binh 蕩平 dep yen. \n\t6. Hong het. Nhu ky cuong dang nhien 紀綱蕩然 giuong moi hong het. Kinh Thi 詩經 co hai thien ban dang 板蕩 la tho cam than nha Chu 周 suy doi ma lam. Cho nen nay goi goi doi loan la trung nguyen ban dang 中原板蕩. \n\t7. Cham nuoc, ho ao nao co loi ca nuoc deu goi la dang. \n\t8. Mot am la dang. Khoi, thao.
蕪=vu [wu2]\n\t1. Bo hoang, co rac bua bai goi la vu. Nhu vu thanh 蕪城 thanh bo hoang. \n\t2. Tap nhap, loi van lon xon goi la van tu vu tap 文詞蕪雜. \n\t3. Vu tinh 蕪菁. Xem chu tinh 菁.
芜=vu [wu2]\n\t1. Bo hoang, co rac bua bai goi la vu. Nhu vu thanh 蕪城 thanh bo hoang. \n\t2. Tap nhap, loi van lon xon goi la van tu vu tap 文詞蕪雜. \n\t3. Vu tinh 蕪菁. Xem chu tinh 菁.
蕭=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Co tieu, co hao. \n\t2. Cho kin, cho ben trong. Vi the loan o trong goi la tieu tuong chi uu 蕭牆之憂. \n\t3. Tieu tieu 蕭蕭. (1) Ngua thet the the. Do Phu 杜甫. Xa lan lan, ma tieu tieu, Hanh nhan cung tien cac tai yeu 車轔轔，馬蕭蕭，行人弓箭各在腰 (Binh xa hanh 兵車行) Tieng   xe am am, tieng ngua hi vang, Nguoi ra di san sang cung ten ben lung. (2) Gio   thoi vu vu. Tu Ma Thien 司馬遷. Phong tieu tieu he Dich thuy han, Trang si nhat   khu he bat phuc hoan 風蕭蕭兮易水寒，壯士一 去兮不復還 (Kinh Kha truyen 荊軻傳) Gio vi vut chu   song Dich lanh te, Trang si mot di chu khong tro ve. (3) Tieng la rung. Do Phu   杜甫. Vo bien lac diep tieu tieu ha, Bat tan Truong giang con con lai   無邊落木蕭蕭下，不盡長江 袞袞來 (Dang cao 登高) La cay rung ao ao duong nhu khong bao gio het,   Song Truong giang cuon chay khong ngung. \n\t4. Buon ba, tham tram. Nhu tieu sat 蕭瑟 tieng buon ba, rau ri, tieu dieu 蕭條 phong canh buon tenh. \n\t5. Ve buon ba, rau ri.
萧=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Co tieu, co hao. \n\t2. Cho kin, cho ben trong. Vi the loan o trong goi la tieu tuong chi uu 蕭牆之憂. \n\t3. Tieu tieu 蕭蕭. (1) Ngua thet the the. Do Phu 杜甫. Xa lan lan, ma tieu tieu, Hanh nhan cung tien cac tai yeu 車轔轔，馬蕭蕭，行人弓箭各在腰 (Binh xa hanh 兵車行) Tieng   xe am am, tieng ngua hi vang, Nguoi ra di san sang cung ten ben lung. (2) Gio   thoi vu vu. Tu Ma Thien 司馬遷. Phong tieu tieu he Dich thuy han, Trang si nhat   khu he bat phuc hoan 風蕭蕭兮易水寒，壯士一 去兮不復還 (Kinh Kha truyen 荊軻傳) Gio vi vut chu   song Dich lanh te, Trang si mot di chu khong tro ve. (3) Tieng la rung. Do Phu   杜甫. Vo bien lac diep tieu tieu ha, Bat tan Truong giang con con lai   無邊落木蕭蕭下，不盡長江 袞袞來 (Dang cao 登高) La cay rung ao ao duong nhu khong bao gio het,   Song Truong giang cuon chay khong ngung. \n\t4. Buon ba, tham tram. Nhu tieu sat 蕭瑟 tieng buon ba, rau ri, tieu dieu 蕭條 phong canh buon tenh. \n\t5. Ve buon ba, rau ri.
蕷=du [yu4]\n\t1. Thu du 薯蕷. Xem chu thu 薯.
蓣=du [yu4]\n\t1. Thu du 薯蕷. Xem chu thu 薯.
蕹=ung [weng4]\n\t1. Hop. \n\t2. Rau ung, ruot no rong nen goi la khong tam thai 空心菜.
蕻=hong [hong2|hong4]\n\t1. Tuoi tot. \n\t2. Tuyet ly hong 雪裡蕻 mot thu rau, tuyet xuong van xanh nen goi la tuyet ly hong.
蕾=loi [lei3]\n\t1. Boi loi 蓓蕾. Xem chu boi 蓓.
薀=on, uan [wen1]\n\t1. Co on, mot thu co moc o trong nuoc, dung de nuoi ca vang. \n\t2. Mot am la uan. Tich, chua.
薄=bac, bac [bao2|bo2|bo4]\n\t1. Co moc tung bui goi la bac. Nhu lam bac 林薄 rung ram. \n\t2. Cai diem, cai rem. Quan lai khong tri duoc nha, de ue loan dam dat, goi la duy bac bat tu 帷薄不修. \n\t3. Cai ne tam. \n\t4. Mong, vat gi mong manh deu goi la bac. Nhu bac bang 薄冰 vang mong, vang dat mong goi la kim bac 金薄. \n\t5. Nhat. Nhu bac vi 薄味 vi nhat, mac so sai goi la bac trang 薄粧. \n\t6. Mong manh. Nhu bac menh 薄命 menh bac, bac phuc 薄福 phuc bac, bac le 薄禮 le bac. Long nguoi xau xa goi la khinh bac 輕薄, khac bac 刻薄. Phong tuc xau goi la bac tuc 薄俗. \n\t7. Coi khinh. Nhu bac thi 薄視, bac dai 薄待. \n\t8. Xam vao. Nhu bac mo 薄暮 sap toi, xam vao luc toi. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ngo thanh bac mo thuong phi phi 梧城薄暮尙霏霏 (Thuong Ngo mo vu 蒼梧暮雨) (den) thanh Ngo, troi sap toi, van mua lat phat. \n\t9. Hay, tam. Dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu bac o nga ty (tu), bac can nga y 薄污我私，薄澣我衣 hay tam got ao lot minh cua ta, hay tam giat ao ngoai cua ta. \n\t10. Dat xau. \n\t11. Che lap. \n\t12. Hop, gop. \n\t13. Dinh bam. \n\t14. Trang suc. \n\t15. Bot di. \n\t16. Hiem vi. \n\t17. Mot am la bac. Buc bach. \n\t18. Ke gan.
薇=vi [wei1]\n\t1. Rau vi. \n\t2. Tu vi 紫薇 cay hoa tu vi. tuc goi la hoa bach nhat hong 百日紅. Ve nha Duong 唐 trong o tinh Trung Thu. Sau goi tinh Trung Thu la Tu Vi tinh 紫薇省. Nha Minh 明 doi lam ty Bo Chinh, cho nen goi Bo Chinh ty 布政司 la Vi vien 薇垣. \n\t3. Tuong vi 薔薇. Xem chu tuong 薔.
薈=oai, hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cay co um tum. Xuan thien nhat lai, bach hoa thinh khai, thao moc oai tuy 春天一來，百花盛開，草木薈萃 mua xuan den, tram hoa thinh no, co cay moc um tum. \n\t2. Nhan vat dong duc cung goi la oai. Nhu nhan van oai tuy 人文薈萃 nhan vat xum xit, nhan vat va van chuong tu hoi. \n\t3. Nhu oai he uy he 薈兮蔚兮 may un ngun ngut. \n\t4. Ngan che. Ta quen doc la chu hoi.
荟=oai, hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cay co um tum. Xuan thien nhat lai, bach hoa thinh khai, thao moc oai tuy 春天一來，百花盛開，草木薈萃 mua xuan den, tram hoa thinh no, co cay moc um tum. \n\t2. Nhan vat dong duc cung goi la oai. Nhu nhan van oai tuy 人文薈萃 nhan vat xum xit, nhan vat va van chuong tu hoi. \n\t3. Nhu oai he uy he 薈兮蔚兮 may un ngun ngut. \n\t4. Ngan che. Ta quen doc la chu hoi.
薊=ke [ji4]\n\t1. Co ke. Thu to goi la dai ke 大薊, thu nho goi la tieu ke 小薊. Dung lam thuoc.
蓟=ke [ji4]\n\t1. Co ke. Thu to goi la dai ke 大薊, thu nho goi la tieu ke 小薊. Dung lam thuoc.
薌=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Hoi com, hoi lua, mui thom cua thoc gao. \n\t2. Thom.
芗=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Hoi com, hoi lua, mui thom cua thoc gao. \n\t2. Thom.
薏=y [yi4]\n\t1. Y di 薏苡. Xem chu di 苡.
薐=lang [leng2]\n\t1. Ba lang 菠薐. Xem chu ba 菠.
薑=khuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Cay gung. \n\t2. Ho Khuong.
薓=sam [shen1]\n\t1. Co sam, la nhu cai ban tay, hoa nho ma trang, dung lam thuoc. Cung viet la 參 hoac 蔘. Hinh no nhu hinh nguoi, nen goi la nhan sam 人薓. O nhung noi nhu Thinh Kinh, Cat Lam, Cao Ly 高麗 deu co ca. Thu nao moc o dong ang lai cang tot, nen goi la da son sam 野山薓. Thu moc o Thuong Dang goi la dang sam 黨薓.
薔=sac, tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Co sac. \n\t2. Mot am la tuong. Tuong vi 薔薇 mot thu cay moc ven tuong, xum xit tung bui, hoa cai do, cai trang, cai vang. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ke trinh tai tam nguyet, Do cap tuong vi hoa 計程在三月，猶及薔薇花 (Hoang Mai dao trung 黃梅道中) Tinh duong di, thang ba ve toi, Con kip thay hoa tuong vi.
蔷=sac, tuong [qiang2]\n\t1. Co sac. \n\t2. Mot am la tuong. Tuong vi 薔薇 mot thu cay moc ven tuong, xum xit tung bui, hoa cai do, cai trang, cai vang. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ke trinh tai tam nguyet, Do cap tuong vi hoa 計程在三月，猶及薔薇花 (Hoang Mai dao trung 黃梅道中) Tinh duong di, thang ba ve toi, Con kip thay hoa tuong vi.
薘=dat [da2]\n\t1. Quan dat thai 莙薘菜. Xem chu diem 菾.
薙=the, tri [ti4]\n\t1. Phat co. \n\t2. Cat toc. Nhu the phat 薙髮 cat toc.Tuc doc la chu tri.
薛=tiet [xue1]\n\t1. Co tiet. \n\t2. Nuoc Tiet 薛, mot nuoc nho ngay xua, nay thuoc dia phan tinh Son Dong 山東. \n\t3. Ho Tiet. Nhu Tiet Nhan Quy 薛仁貴.
薜=be [bi4]\n\t1. Be le 薜荔 mot thu cay moc tung bui, thuong xanh, la dung lam phan rom. Con goi la moc lien 木蓮. \n\t2. Mot loai quy doi. Cung nhu nga quy 餓鬼. \n\t4. Tuc la cay duong quy.
薝=dam, chiem [zhan2]\n\t1. Dam bac 薝蔔 hoa dam bac, co khi doc la chu chiem.
薟=hiem [xian1]\n\t1. Hy hiem 豨薟 co hy hiem, dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Mot am la liem. Cay bach liem 白蘞.
薢=giai [jie1]\n\t1. Ti giai 萆薢. Xem chu ti 萆.
薤=gioi [xie4]\n\t1. Rau kieu. Doc rong nhu doc he, mua he no hoa nho ma tim, cu nho nhu cu toi goi la gioi bach 薤白. \n\t2. Gioi lo 薤露 ten bai ca vieng, noi doi nguoi chong het nhu giot suong tren la kieu. Vi the thuong dung de noi nguoi chet. \n\t3. Mot loi chu la gioi diep thu 薤葉書.
薦=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Co, rom cho suc vat an goi la tien. \n\t2. Chieu coi cung goi la tien. \n\t3. Dang. Nhu tien tan 薦新 dang cung cua moi. \n\t4. Tien cu. Nhu tien hien 薦賢 tien cu nguoi hien tai. \n\t4. Gioi thieu cho nguoi biet cung goi la tien.
荐=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Co, rom cho suc vat an goi la tien. \n\t2. Chieu coi cung goi la tien. \n\t3. Dang. Nhu tien tan 薦新 dang cung cua moi. \n\t4. Tien cu. Nhu tien hien 薦賢 tien cu nguoi hien tai. \n\t4. Gioi thieu cho nguoi biet cung goi la tien.
薧=hao, khao [kao3]\n\t1. Hao ly 薧里 que nguoi chet. \n\t2. Mot am la khao. Ca kho. Vat gi kho cung goi la khao.
薨=hoang [hong1]\n\t1. Chet, cac vua chu hau hay dai than chet goi la hoang. \n\t2. Hoang hoang 薨薨 bay vu vu. Nhu trung phi hoang hoang 蟲飛薨薨 con trung bay vu vu. \n\t3. Nhanh.
薩=tat [sa4]\n\t1. Bo tat 菩薩. Xem chu bo 菩.
萨=tat [sa4]\n\t1. Bo tat 菩薩. Xem chu bo 菩.
薪=tan [xin1]\n\t1. Cui. Nhu me chau tan que 米珠薪桂 gao chau cui que. \n\t2. Co. \n\t3. Bong cap, luong thang.
薯=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Thu du 薯蕷 tuc la hoai son 懷山 cu mai, dung nau an va lam thuoc. \n\t2. Huong thu 香薯 mot thu khoai nui, song cung an duoc ma nau chin an lai cang ngon.
薰=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Co thom. Ngay xua deo de tru khi doc, tuc goi la co boi lan 佩蘭. Thu moc o huyen Linh Lang 零陵 lai cang tot lam, cho nen lai goi la linh lang huong 零陵香. \n\t2. Dam am, vui hoa. \n\t3. Hun. Nhu the loi huan tam 勢利薰心 the loi hun long, y noi cai long loi loc no boc len nong nhu lua hun vay. \n\t4. Hoi thom.
薶=mai [mai2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu mai 埋.
薷=nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Huong nhu 香薷 cay huong nhu, dung lam thuoc.
薸=phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Beo van.
薹=dai [tai2]\n\t1. Co dai, cay lach, la kho dung lam non. \n\t2. Van dai 蕓薹 rau van dai. Con co ten la du thai 油菜. \n\t3. Cuong hoa cua cac thu rau.
薻=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tao 藻.
藁=cao [gao3]\n\t1. Cay kho. \n\t2. Rom ra. \n\t3. Van moi thao ra goi la cao. Cung nghia voi chu cao 槀.
藂=tung [cong2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tung 叢.
藉=ta, tich [ji2|jie4]\n\t1. Cai chieu. \n\t2. Chieu de nam, nen co khi dung chu ta co nghia la nam. \n\t3. Nho. Than co cho nho cay goi la bang ta 憑藉 nho cay, loi dung. \n\t4. Muon. Nhu ta khau 藉口 muon co lot mieng, ta su sinh doan 藉事生端 muon viec sinh co. \n\t5. Khoan dong. Nhu uan ta 醞藉 bao dong, uy ta 慰藉 yen ui. \n\t6. Vi the. Dung lam tro tu. \n\t7. Muon, nho. \n\t8. Mot am la tich. Giam, xeo. \n\t9. Cung nghia voi chu tich 籍. \n\t10. Ho Ta.
藊=bien [bian3]\n\t1. Dau van, bien dau 藊豆. Cung viet la 萹豆. Con goi la hoang de dau 皇帝豆.
藍=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Cay cham. \n\t2. Sac xanh, xanh mau lam. \n\t3. Soi, lam guong. \n\t4. Gia lam 伽藍 phien am chu Phan "samgharama", goi tat la lam tuc la noi tho Phat.
蓝=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Cay cham. \n\t2. Sac xanh, xanh mau lam. \n\t3. Soi, lam guong. \n\t4. Gia lam 伽藍 phien am chu Phan "samgharama", goi tat la lam tuc la noi tho Phat.
藎=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Co tan. Canh la no dung de nhuom vang, nen lai goi la hoang thao 黄草. \n\t2. Tien len. Bay toi hien goi la tan than 藎臣 y noi tam long trung nghia cang ngay cang tien vay. \n\t3. Cui chay con thua.
荩=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Co tan. Canh la no dung de nhuom vang, nen lai goi la hoang thao 黄草. \n\t2. Tien len. Bay toi hien goi la tan than 藎臣 y noi tam long trung nghia cang ngay cang tien vay. \n\t3. Cui chay con thua.
藏=tang, tang [cang2|zang4]\n\t1. Giau. Nhu tang dau lo vi 藏頭露尾 giau dau ho duoi. Luc ra lam viec, luc nau mot cho goi la hanh tang 行藏. \n\t2. Danh chua. Nhu thu tang 收藏 nhat chua, tran tang 珍藏 cat ky, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la tang. Kho tang, cho de chua do. \n\t4. Tay Tang 西藏 xu Tay Tang, giap gioi voi An Do 印度. \n\t5. Kinh Phat. Co ba kho la Kinh Tang 經藏, Luat Tang 律藏 va Luan Tang 論藏.
藐=mieu, mac [miao3]\n\t1. Mon mon, nho. Nhu mieu chu co 藐諸孤 lu tre con. \n\t2. Coi thuong. Nhu mieu thi 藐視 coi re, coi khinh. \n\t3. Mot am la mac. Man mac. Nhu du mac 悠藐 xa lang lac. Cung nghia voi chu mac 邈. \n\t4. Mac mac 藐藐 thenh thang, dep de.
藕=ngau [ou3]\n\t1. Ngo sen. Manh Giao 孟郊. Thiep tam ngau trung ti, tuy doan do khien lien 妾心藕中絲，雖斷猶牽蓮 (Khu phu 去婦) Long thiep to trong ngo sen, du dut con vuong hoa.
藜=le [li2]\n\t1. Co le, rau le. La non an duoc, than lam gay chong. Mot ten la co lai 萊.
藝=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Nghe, tai nang, hoc van, ky thuat deu goi la nghe. Doi xua cho le 禮, nhac 樂, xa 射 ban, ngu 御 cam cuong cuoi ngua, thu 書 viet, so 數 hoc ve toan. la luc nghe 六藝 sau nghe. \n\t2. Van. Nhu cac sach vo goi la nghe van chi 藝文志. \n\t3. Truoc. Nhu nghe to 藝祖, cung nhu ta noi thuy to 始祖. \n\t4. Trong. Nhu thu nghe ngu coc 樹藝五穀 trong tia nam giong thoc. \n\t5. Cung cuc. \n\t6. Chuan dich. \n\t7. Phan biet.
艺=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Nghe, tai nang, hoc van, ky thuat deu goi la nghe. Doi xua cho le 禮, nhac 樂, xa 射 ban, ngu 御 cam cuong cuoi ngua, thu 書 viet, so 數 hoc ve toan. la luc nghe 六藝 sau nghe. \n\t2. Van. Nhu cac sach vo goi la nghe van chi 藝文志. \n\t3. Truoc. Nhu nghe to 藝祖, cung nhu ta noi thuy to 始祖. \n\t4. Trong. Nhu thu nghe ngu coc 樹藝五穀 trong tia nam giong thoc. \n\t5. Cung cuc. \n\t6. Chuan dich. \n\t7. Phan biet.
藟=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Quan quit. \n\t2. Cat luy 葛藟 san day.
藤=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Bui cay quan quit, loai thuc vat than cay moc tung bui. \n\t3. Tua day, cac giong thuc vat moc chang chit ma co tua xoan lai deu goi la dang. Nhu qua dang 瓜藤 tua dua. \n\t3. Tu dang 紫藤 hoa tu dang. Thu hoa trang goi la ngan dang 銀藤.
藥=duoc [yao4]\n\t1. Thuoc, cac thu dung de lam thuoc deu goi la duoc. Bi thuoc doc ma chet goi la duoc tu 藥死. \n\t2. Pham thu gi tan nho nhu phan cung goi la duoc. Nhu tac duoc 炸藥 thuoc no. \n\t3. Chua. Nhu bat kha cuu duoc 不可救藥 khong the cuu chua duoc. Loi no ngay thang goi la duoc thach 藥石 y noi loi can bao trung truc cuu lai dieu lam loi nhu thuoc chua benh vay. \n\t4. Bo giau. Dung lan can vay xung quanh vuon goi la duoc lan 藥欄. \n\t5. Thuoc duoc 芍藥 hoa thuoc duoc. Xem chu thuoc 芍.
药=duoc [yao4]\n\t1. Thuoc, cac thu dung de lam thuoc deu goi la duoc. Bi thuoc doc ma chet goi la duoc tu 藥死. \n\t2. Pham thu gi tan nho nhu phan cung goi la duoc. Nhu tac duoc 炸藥 thuoc no. \n\t3. Chua. Nhu bat kha cuu duoc 不可救藥 khong the cuu chua duoc. Loi no ngay thang goi la duoc thach 藥石 y noi loi can bao trung truc cuu lai dieu lam loi nhu thuoc chua benh vay. \n\t4. Bo giau. Dung lan can vay xung quanh vuon goi la duoc lan 藥欄. \n\t5. Thuoc duoc 芍藥 hoa thuoc duoc. Xem chu thuoc 芍.
藩=phien, phan [fan1]\n\t1. Bo rao. \n\t2. Phen che, bao ho. Vua phong cac bay toi, cac con chau ra tran cac noi de lam phen che cho nha vua goi la phan phien 分藩, quan bo chanh la phien ty 藩司. Ta quen doc la chu phan.
藪=tau [sou3]\n\t1. Cham lon, cai dam. Cham can cung goi la tau. \n\t2. Cho nhan vat tu dong cung goi la tau. Nhu nhan tai uyen tau 人才淵藪 noi tap trung nhan tai. \n\t3. Chon thao da, huong da.
薮=tau [sou3]\n\t1. Cham lon, cai dam. Cham can cung goi la tau. \n\t2. Cho nhan vat tu dong cung goi la tau. Nhu nhan tai uyen tau 人才淵藪 noi tap trung nhan tai. \n\t3. Chon thao da, huong da.
藭=cung [giong2]\n\t1. Khung cung 芎藭. Xem chu khung 芎.
藳=cao [gao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cao 稿.
藶=lich [li4]\n\t1. Dinh lich 葶藶. Xem chu dinh 葶.
苈=lich [li4]\n\t1. Dinh lich 葶藶. Xem chu dinh 葶.
藷=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thu 薯.
孽=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Ngay xua dung nhu chu 孹. (Ton nghi. Unicode xep hai chu nay vao bo 39 tu 子)
藹=ai [ai3]\n\t1. Cay coi ram rap. \n\t2. Ai ai 藹藹 day ray, dong duc het suc. \n\t3. Hoa nha. Nhu ai nhien kha than 藹然可親 co ve vui ve dang than yeu.
蔼=ai [ai3]\n\t1. Cay coi ram rap. \n\t2. Ai ai 藹藹 day ray, dong duc het suc. \n\t3. Hoa nha. Nhu ai nhien kha than 藹然可親 co ve vui ve dang than yeu.
藺=lan [lin4]\n\t1. Co lan, tuc la co coi, dung de det chieu. \n\t2. Ho Lan. Thoi Chien quoc 戰國 co Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如.
蔺=lan [lin4]\n\t1. Co lan, tuc la co coi, dung de det chieu. \n\t2. Ho Lan. Thoi Chien quoc 戰國 co Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如.
藻=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Rong, rau be, ten goi tat ca cac thu co moc o duoi nuoc. \n\t2. rong la mot thu co moc duoi nuoc co van ve dep, co nhan dung de trang suc mu ao cho dep, cho nen cai gi dung lam van suc deu goi la tao. Nhu tu tao 詞藻 loi dep, cung viet la 辭藻. Lay loi tot dep ma khen lao nguoi goi la tao suc 藻飾. Binh luan nhan vat goi la pham tao 品藻 hay tao giam 藻鑑.
藼=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huyen 萱.
藿=hoac [huo4]\n\t1. La dau. Vi the nen an rau an dua so sai goi la hoac. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Khuong trung ha so thinh ? Le hoac tap ti khang 筐中何所盛，藜藿雜枇糠 (So kien hanh 所見行) Trong gio dung gi lam the ? Rau le, hoac lan cam. \n\t2. Hoac huong 藿香 cay hoac huong (Agastache rugosa), la rat thom, dung lam thuoc.
蘀=thac [tuo4]\n\t1. Be cay, mo nang.
蘂=nhi [rui3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nhi 蕊.
蘄=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Ki chi 蔪茝. Xem chu chi 茝. \n\t2. Cau. \n\t3. Ham thiet ngua.
蕲=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Ki chi 蔪茝. Xem chu chi 茝. \n\t2. Cau. \n\t3. Ham thiet ngua.
蘅=hanh [heng2]\n\t1. Do hanh 杜蘅 mot thu co thom, re dung lam thuoc.
蘆=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Co lau, dung che manh manh va lop nha. \n\t2. Bo lo mot thu rau an. \n\t3. Mot am la la. Nhu la bac 蘿菔. Xem chu bac 菔.
芦=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Co lau, dung che manh manh va lop nha. \n\t2. Bo lo mot thu rau an. \n\t3. Mot am la la. Nhu la bac 蘿菔. Xem chu bac 菔.
蘇=to [su1]\n\t1. Tu to 紫蘇 cay tia to. \n\t2. Song lai, da chet roi lai hoi lai goi la to. Tuc goi dang ngu thuc day la to tinh 蘇醒. Dang bi khon kho ma duoc de chiu deu goi la to, nhu hau lai ki to 后來其蘇 (Thu Kinh 書經) sau lai se duoc de chiu. \n\t3. Kiem co. \n\t4. Ten dat.
苏=to [su1]\n\t1. Tu to 紫蘇 cay tia to. \n\t2. Song lai, da chet roi lai hoi lai goi la to. Tuc goi dang ngu thuc day la to tinh 蘇醒. Dang bi khon kho ma duoc de chiu deu goi la to, nhu hau lai ki to 后來其蘇 (Thu Kinh 書經) sau lai se duoc de chiu. \n\t3. Kiem co. \n\t4. Ten dat.
蘊=uan, uan [yun4]\n\t1. Tich chua, gop. \n\t2. Uan ao, sau xa. Nhu tinh uan 精蘊. Tinh than uan ao. \n\t3. Giau, cat. \n\t4. Uat nong. \n\t5. Chat co, de dot lua. \n\t6. Nha Phat 佛 cho nam mon sac, thu, tuong, hanh, thuc 色受想行識 la ngu uan 五蘊, nghia la nam mon ay no tich gop lai che lap mat ca chan tinh cua nguoi ta. \n\t7. Mot am la uan. Cung nghia voi chu uan 醞.
蕴=uan, uan [yun4]\n\t1. Tich chua, gop. \n\t2. Uan ao, sau xa. Nhu tinh uan 精蘊. Tinh than uan ao. \n\t3. Giau, cat. \n\t4. Uat nong. \n\t5. Chat co, de dot lua. \n\t6. Nha Phat 佛 cho nam mon sac, thu, tuong, hanh, thuc 色受想行識 la ngu uan 五蘊, nghia la nam mon ay no tich gop lai che lap mat ca chan tinh cua nguoi ta. \n\t7. Mot am la uan. Cung nghia voi chu uan 醞.
蘋=tan [ping2]\n\t1. Co tan. La no bon cai chap lam mot hinh nhu chu dien 田 nen lai goi la dien tu thao 田字草. Con co ten la tu diep thai 四葉菜. \n\t2. Qua tan ba 蘋婆. Con viet la 頻婆. Cung co ten khac la phuong nhan qua 鳳眼果.
苹=tan [ping2]\n\t1. Co tan. La no bon cai chap lam mot hinh nhu chu dien 田 nen lai goi la dien tu thao 田字草. Con co ten la tu diep thai 四葉菜. \n\t2. Qua tan ba 蘋婆. Con viet la 頻婆. Cung co ten khac la phuong nhan qua 鳳眼果.
蘐=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huyen 萱.
蘑=ma [mo2]\n\t1. Ma co 蘑菰 mot thu nam. Con viet la 磨菇 hay 摩姑.
蘖=nghiet [nie4]\n\t1. Choi cay, cay chat roi lai nay choi ra. Cung nghia voi chu 蘗.
蘗=bach [nie4]\n\t1. Cay hoang ba 黃蘗, dung lam thuoc. Tuc goi la hoang ba 黃柏.
蘘=nhuong [rang1]\n\t1. Nhuong ha 蘘荷 mot thu rau an duoc.
蘚=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Cay reu. Mot giong thuc vat no hoa ngam, moc o cho am thap va cay co thu tren hang da, ro la phan minh, coi hinh nhu chon oc.
藓=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Cay reu. Mot giong thuc vat no hoa ngam, moc o cho am thap va cay co thu tren hang da, ro la phan minh, coi hinh nhu chon oc.
蘝=liem, liem [lian2]\n\t1. O liem mau 烏蘝母 mot thu co bo lan, dung lam thuoc duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la liem. Mot thu co moc tung khom. Thu trang goi la bach liem 白蘝, thu do goi la xich liem 赤蘝. Vo dung lam thuoc. \n\t3. Co cho viet la 蘞.
蘞=liem [lian3]\n\t1. Xem chu liem 蘝.
蔹=liem [lian3]\n\t1. Xem chu liem 蘝.
蘤=hoa [hua1]\n\t1. Ngay xua dung nhu chu hoa 花.
蘧=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Cu mach 蘧麥 mot thu co, co hat nhu hat thoc, dung lam thuoc. \n\t2. Cu cu 蘧蘧 nhon nhon tu dac, kinh dong, ngac nhien. Trang Tu 莊子. Tich gia Trang Chu mong vi ho diep, hu hu nhien ho diep da. Tu du thich chi du ! bat tri Chu da. Nga nhien giac, tac cu cu nhien Chu da. Bat tri Chu chi mong vi ho diep du, ho diep chi mong vi Chu du ? Chu du ho diep, tac tat huu phan hi. Thu chi vi Vat hoa. 昔者莊周夢爲胡蝶，栩栩然胡蝶也。自喻適志與！不知周也。俄然覺，則蘧蘧然 周也。不知周之夢爲胡蝶與，胡蝶之夢爲周與？周與胡蝶，則必有分矣。此之謂物化 (Te Vat luan 齊物論) Xua Trang Chu chiem bao lam buom, phap phoi la buom that. Tu thay thich chang, chang biet den Chu nua. Thoat ma thuc day, thi thu lu la Chu. Khong biet Chu chiem bao lam buom chang, buom chiem bao lam Chu chang ? Chu cung buom thi co phan biet roi. Ay the goi la Vat hoa. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu cu 瞿.
蘩=phien [fan2]\n\t1. Co phien. La nhu la ngai cuu nho, tuc goi la bach hao 白蒿.
蘭=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Cay hoa lan. Co nhieu thu, la giong hoa rat quy. Hoa lan thom lam, nen dau thom cung goi la lan du 蘭油. Co thu goi la trach lan 澤蘭 tuc cay man tuoi tru duoc mot sach, cho nen nha chua sach goi la lan tinh van cac 蘭省芸客, dai ngu su goi la lan dai 蘭臺, v.v. \n\t2. Mui lan suc nuc nen lai dung de vi du cai co tinh y hop nhau. Nhu lan giao 蘭交 noi tinh ban choi voi nhau rat quy men, lan ngoc 蘭玉 dung de khen ngoi cac con em nha ban. \n\t3. Moc lan 木蘭 cay moc lan, vo cung thom, co nhan dung de lam nha.
兰=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Cay hoa lan. Co nhieu thu, la giong hoa rat quy. Hoa lan thom lam, nen dau thom cung goi la lan du 蘭油. Co thu goi la trach lan 澤蘭 tuc cay man tuoi tru duoc mot sach, cho nen nha chua sach goi la lan tinh van cac 蘭省芸客, dai ngu su goi la lan dai 蘭臺, v.v. \n\t2. Mui lan suc nuc nen lai dung de vi du cai co tinh y hop nhau. Nhu lan giao 蘭交 noi tinh ban choi voi nhau rat quy men, lan ngoc 蘭玉 dung de khen ngoi cac con em nha ban. \n\t3. Moc lan 木蘭 cay moc lan, vo cung thom, co nhan dung de lam nha.
蘸=tram, tieu [zhan4]\n\t1. Cham, tham nuoc, cho vat gi vao nuoc tham cho uot goi la tram. Ta quen doc la chu tieu.
蘺=li [li2]\n\t1. Giang li 江蘺 mot thu co. \n\t2. Co khi dung nhu chu li 籬 bo rao.
蓠=li [li2]\n\t1. Giang li 江蘺 mot thu co. \n\t2. Co khi dung nhu chu li 籬 bo rao.
蘼=mi [mi2]\n\t1. Mi vu 蘼蕪 mot thu co co hoa thom. Mot ten la ki chi 蘄茝.
蘿=la [luo2]\n\t1. Nu la 女蘿 mot loai nam. \n\t2. La bac 蘿菔. Xem chu bac 菔.
萝=la [luo2]\n\t1. Nu la 女蘿 mot loai nam. \n\t2. La bac 蘿菔. Xem chu bac 菔.
虀=te [ji1]\n\t1. Dua muoi, rau cat nho ra muoi voi muoi goi la te.
虆=luy [lei2]\n\t1. Bo dai, bo lan. \n\t2. Cai long dung dat, cai sot.
虍=ho [hu1]\n\t1. Van con ho, van con ven.
虎=ho [hu3]\n\t1. Con ho. \n\t2. Dung de ti du cai suc oai manh. Nhu ho bon 虎賁 ke dung si, ho truong 虎帳 truong hum, cho quan vo ngoi. \n\t3. Vat gi hinh nhu cai mom hech ve mot ben deu goi la ho. Nhu cho khe ngon tay cai voi ngon tay tro goi la ho khau 虎口. Vi the nen bam dot tay tinh so goi la nhat ho 一虎. Loi danh co ba quan dung ba goc cung goi la ho.
虐=nguoc [nue:4]\n\t1. Ac, tai nguoc, nghiet. Nhu nguoc dai 虐待 doi dai nghiet ac, nguoc chanh 虐政 chanh tri ac. \n\t2. Tai va.
虒=ty [si1]\n\t1. Ty ki 虒祁 cung ty ki. \n\t2. Uy ty 委虒 ho co sung.
虓=hao [xiao1]\n\t1. Tieng ho gam. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu xao 敲.
虔=kien [qian2]\n\t1. Ben chat. Kinh Thu 書經 co cau doat nhuong kieu kien 奪攘矯虔 lay duoc cua nguoi giu chat nhu cua minh. \n\t2. Kinh. Nhu kien boc 虔卜. Ta truyen 左傳. Kien boc u tien quan da 虔卜於先君也 kinh boi o vua truoc vay. \n\t3. Hang dan ba hen ha goi la kien phu 虔婦. \n\t4. Dang ho di. \n\t5. Giet. \n\t6. Lay hiep.
處=xu, xu [chu3|chu4]\n\t1. O. Nhu cuu xu 乆處 o lau, cung moi nguoi o duoc vui hoa goi la tuong xu 相處. \n\t2. Trai lai voi chu xuat 出 ra. Nhu xuat xu 出處 ra o (ra doi hay o an), xu si 處士 ke si chua ra lam quan, xu tu 處子, xu nu 處女 con gai chua chong. \n\t3. Phan biet duoc su ly cho duoc phai chang. Nhu xu tri 處置, khu xu 區處, v.v. \n\t4. Do dan de cau cho yen. Nhu xu tam tich lu 處心積慮 ban long lo nghi de cho xung dang. \n\t5. Xu hinh an cung goi la xu. Nhu xu tram 處斬 xu an chem, xu giao 處絞 xu an that co. \n\t6. Vi tri, dat de. \n\t7. Ve. \n\t8. Thuong. \n\t9. Mot am la xu. Noi, cho. Nhu than thu di xu 身首異處 than mot noi, dau mot noi. Lai nhu trong dinh quan co cho tham muu goi la tham muu xu 參謀處. \n\t10. Noi nao do. Nhu dao xu 到處 den noi nao do, xu xu 處處 chon chon, noi noi.
处=xu, xu [chu3|chu4]\n\t1. O. Nhu cuu xu 乆處 o lau, cung moi nguoi o duoc vui hoa goi la tuong xu 相處. \n\t2. Trai lai voi chu xuat 出 ra. Nhu xuat xu 出處 ra o (ra doi hay o an), xu si 處士 ke si chua ra lam quan, xu tu 處子, xu nu 處女 con gai chua chong. \n\t3. Phan biet duoc su ly cho duoc phai chang. Nhu xu tri 處置, khu xu 區處, v.v. \n\t4. Do dan de cau cho yen. Nhu xu tam tich lu 處心積慮 ban long lo nghi de cho xung dang. \n\t5. Xu hinh an cung goi la xu. Nhu xu tram 處斬 xu an chem, xu giao 處絞 xu an that co. \n\t6. Vi tri, dat de. \n\t7. Ve. \n\t8. Thuong. \n\t9. Mot am la xu. Noi, cho. Nhu than thu di xu 身首異處 than mot noi, dau mot noi. Lai nhu trong dinh quan co cho tham muu goi la tham muu xu 參謀處. \n\t10. Noi nao do. Nhu dao xu 到處 den noi nao do, xu xu 處處 chon chon, noi noi.
虖=ho [hu1]\n\t1. O ho 虖呼 than oi ! Co khi viet la 嗚呼. 
虙=mat [mi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu mat 宓 hay chu phuc 伏.
虛=hu, khu [xu1]\n\t1. Trong rong, voi, hu hao. Trai lai voi chu that 實. Nhu hu tinh 虛情 tinh hao, hu tu 虛字 chu khong chi ve nghia dich thuc. Vi the vat gi trong rong khong cung goi la hu. \n\t2. De trong. Nhu hu ta di dai 虛左以待 van de trong ben trai de cho (nguoi hien tai). \n\t3. Voi, thieu. Nhu doanh hu 盈虛 day voi, thua thieu. Nguoi nao khi huyet hu goi la hu ton 虛損. \n\t4. Khiem hu, khong co y tu cho la du, con can phai hoc phai hoi goi la hu tam 虛心 hay khiem hu 謙虛. Trang Tu 莊子. Vo so dac van chi giao, cam bat hu tam 無所得聞至教，敢不虛心 chua duoc nghe loi chi giao, dam dau chang trong long (de hoc them). \n\t5. Trang suc hao. Nhu hu truong thanh the 虛張聲勢 pho truong thanh the hao. \n\t6. Khong co thuc dung. Nhu hu van 虛文 van suc hao huyen, khong co thuc dung. Khong co ket qua cung goi la hu. Nhu thu nguyen canh hu 此願竟虛 dieu nguyen ay lai hao ca, thu hanh bat hu 此行不虛 chuyen di nay khong phai la khong co ket qua. \n\t7. Noi ve phan tinh than khong chi ra duoc. Nhu net ve vo tinh ma co than la hu than 虛神. Van diem mot cau khong vao dau ma hay goi la hu but 虛筆. \n\t8. Khoang troi khong. Nhu lang hu 淩虛 vuot len tren khong. \n\t9. Pham su gi khong co noi thiet thuc deu goi la hu. Nhu bo hu 步虛 theo duoi su hao huyen, huyen hu 玄虛 huyen hoac hu hao. \n\t10. Sao hu, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t11. Hoc, lo hong. \n\t12. Mot am la khu. Cai go lon. \n\t13. Cho o.
虚=hu, khu [xu1]\n\t1. Trong rong, voi, hu hao. Trai lai voi chu that 實. Nhu hu tinh 虛情 tinh hao, hu tu 虛字 chu khong chi ve nghia dich thuc. Vi the vat gi trong rong khong cung goi la hu. \n\t2. De trong. Nhu hu ta di dai 虛左以待 van de trong ben trai de cho (nguoi hien tai). \n\t3. Voi, thieu. Nhu doanh hu 盈虛 day voi, thua thieu. Nguoi nao khi huyet hu goi la hu ton 虛損. \n\t4. Khiem hu, khong co y tu cho la du, con can phai hoc phai hoi goi la hu tam 虛心 hay khiem hu 謙虛. Trang Tu 莊子. Vo so dac van chi giao, cam bat hu tam 無所得聞至教，敢不虛心 chua duoc nghe loi chi giao, dam dau chang trong long (de hoc them). \n\t5. Trang suc hao. Nhu hu truong thanh the 虛張聲勢 pho truong thanh the hao. \n\t6. Khong co thuc dung. Nhu hu van 虛文 van suc hao huyen, khong co thuc dung. Khong co ket qua cung goi la hu. Nhu thu nguyen canh hu 此願竟虛 dieu nguyen ay lai hao ca, thu hanh bat hu 此行不虛 chuyen di nay khong phai la khong co ket qua. \n\t7. Noi ve phan tinh than khong chi ra duoc. Nhu net ve vo tinh ma co than la hu than 虛神. Van diem mot cau khong vao dau ma hay goi la hu but 虛筆. \n\t8. Khoang troi khong. Nhu lang hu 淩虛 vuot len tren khong. \n\t9. Pham su gi khong co noi thiet thuc deu goi la hu. Nhu bo hu 步虛 theo duoi su hao huyen, huyen hu 玄虛 huyen hoac hu hao. \n\t10. Sao hu, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t11. Hoc, lo hong. \n\t12. Mot am la khu. Cai go lon. \n\t13. Cho o.
虜=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Tu binh. Bat song duoc quan dich goi la lo虜, chem dau duoc quan giac goi la hoach 獲. Cung dung lam tieng mang nhiec. Nhu ta noi quan moi ro, do no le, v.v.
虏=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Tu binh. Bat song duoc quan dich goi la lo虜, chem dau duoc quan giac goi la hoach 獲. Cung dung lam tieng mang nhiec. Nhu ta noi quan moi ro, do no le, v.v.
虞=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Do dan, du lieu. \n\t2. Su lo. Nhu tai tai kha ngu 在在可虞 dau dau cung deu dang lo ca. \n\t3. Yen vui. \n\t4. Nha Ngu 虞 (trong khoang 2697-2033 truoc Tay lich). Vua Thuan 舜 duoc vua Nghieu 堯 trao ngoi vua goi la nha Ngu. \n\t5. Nuoc Ngu, cho con chau vua Thuan o. \n\t6. Ho Ngu. \n\t7. Te Ngu, te yen vi. \n\t8. Lam. \n\t9. Quan lai coi viec nui cham.
號=hao [hao2|hao4]\n\t1. Keu gao, gao khoc. \n\t2. Mot am la hieu. Ten hieu, danh hieu, nien hieu. \n\t3. Hieu lenh. \n\t3. Dau hieu. \n\t4. Ra hieu lenh.
号=hao [hao2|hao4]\n\t1. Keu gao, gao khoc. \n\t2. Mot am la hieu. Ten hieu, danh hieu, nien hieu. \n\t3. Hieu lenh. \n\t3. Dau hieu. \n\t4. Ra hieu lenh.
虡=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Cai gia treo chuong treo khanh, khac loai manh thu o tren. \n\t2. Ghe cao.
虢=quac, quach [guo2]\n\t1. Nuoc Quac. Cung doc la chu quach.
虧=khuy [kui1]\n\t1. Thieu. Nhu nguyet khuy 月虧 mat trang khuyet. Nguyet huu doanh khuy 月有盈虧 trang co khi day khi khuyet. Tinh co cho khong thuc goi la khuy tam 虧心. \n\t2. Giam bot.
亏=khuy [kui1]\n\t1. Thieu. Nhu nguyet khuy 月虧 mat trang khuyet. Nguyet huu doanh khuy 月有盈虧 trang co khi day khi khuyet. Tinh co cho khong thuc goi la khuy tam 虧心. \n\t2. Giam bot.
虫=trung [chong2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu 虺, ngay xua tuc muon thay chu 蟲. loai sau bo.
虬=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cau 虯.
虯=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Con rong co sung goi la cau long 虯龍.
虬=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Con rong co sung goi la cau long 虯龍.
虱=sat [shi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sat 蝨.
虹=hong [hong2|jiang4]\n\t1. Cai cau vong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Bach hong quan nhat thien man man 白虹貫日天漫漫 (Kinh Kha co ly 荊軻故里) cau vong trang vat ngang mat troi, bau troi menh mang.
虺=huy [hui1|hui3]\n\t1. Con ran ho mang. \n\t2. Con ran con. \n\t3. Mot am la hoi. Hoi doi 虺隤 om, moi met.
蚊=van [wen2]\n\t1. Con muoi. Co mot thu muoi vang dot nguoi hay lay benh sot ret goi la nguoc moi van 瘧媒蚊 muoi noc sot ret. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hu truong tu van thanh 虛帳聚蚊聲 (Que Lam cong quan 桂林公館) man thua tieng muoi vo ve.
蚋=nhue [rui4]\n\t1. Con ve, giong nhu con ong, sac den, canh mong, hay dot nguoi.
蚌=bang [bang4|beng4]\n\t1. Con trai, trong thit trai co chat nhot dinh tich mai thanh ra ngoc trai.
蚍=ti [pi2]\n\t1. Ti phu 蚍蜉 con kien cang.
蚑=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Sau bo, cai dang con sau bo ngoan ngoeo.
蚓=dan [yin3]\n\t1. Khuu dan 蚯蚓 con giun dat.
蚕=tam [can2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tam 蠶, nguyen la chu dien la giong giun.
蚘=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hoi 蛔.
蚜=nha [ya2]\n\t1. Con sau an la cay.
蚣=cong [gong1]\n\t1. Xem chu ngo 蜈.
蚤=tao [zao3]\n\t1. Bo chet, con rep. \n\t2. Som, cung nghia voi chu tao 早.
蚦=nhiem [ran2]\n\t1. Con tran.
蚧=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Cap gioi 蛤蚧 con cac ke (tac ke), dung lam thuoc.
蚨=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Thanh phu 青蚨 mot thu sau o duoi nuoc. Sach Suu Than Ky 搜神記 noi rang he bat con no thi me no tu nhien bay lai, dem bat me no giet chet xat vao dong tien, giet con trat vao day xau tien, thi vut tien di tu nhien tien lai ve, vi the tuc goi tien la thanh phu.
蚩=xi [chi1]\n\t1. Ngay ngo, ta cai dang vo tri thuc. \n\t2. Xi Vuu 蚩尤 vua nuoc Cuu Le ngay xua sinh viec binh qua, che ra giao mac cung no quay roi chu hau, bi vua Hoang De 黃帝 danh chet.
蚪=dau [dou3]\n\t1. Khoa dau 蝌蚪 con nong noc. \n\t2. Loi chu ngay xua giong con nong noc nen goi la khoa dau van 蝌蚪文. Con viet la 科斗文.
蚯=khau [qiu1]\n\t1. Xem chu dan 蚓.
蚰=du [you2]\n\t1. Du dien 蚰蜒 mot thu sau bo dau co sung, chan dai.
蚱=trach [zha4]\n\t1. Trach manh 蚱蜢 con chau chau can hai la lua.
蚳=chi [chi2]\n\t1. Trung kien, ngay xua dung lam mon an.
蚶=ham [han1]\n\t1. Con so. Tuc goi la ngoa lang tu 瓦楞子.
蚺=nhiem [ran2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhiem 蚦.
蚿=huyen [xian2]\n\t1. Ma huyen 馬蚿 mot thu sau dai co hon mot tac, minh nhu cai ong tron, co tung dot, moi dot co hai chan, dong den dau thi co lai nhu con oc co mui nhu dau thom, nen tuc goi la huong du trung 香油虫.
蛀=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Con mot khoet. \n\t2. Vat gi bi sau mot can cung goi la chu.
蛄=co [gu1]\n\t1. Lau co 螻蛄 con de, mot thu sau o lo giong nhu con de men rat lam hai lua va nho. \n\t2. Hue co 蟪蛄 mot loai ve sau nho.
蛆=thu [qu1]\n\t1. Con gioi, do trung ruoi nhang no ra. \n\t2. Vang ruou.
蛇=xa, di [she2|yi2]\n\t1. Con ran. Mot nam lot xac mot lan goi la xa thoai 蛇退. \n\t2. Dung de ty du ke doc ngam. Nhu Phat khau xa tam 佛口蛇心 mieng Phat tam xa, ke hung ac goi la phong thi truong xa 封豕長蛇 lon lon ran dai. \n\t3. Mot am la di. Uy di 委蛇 uy khuc ma van tu dac, thong dong.
蛉=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tinh linh 蜻蛉 mot giong nhu con chuon chuon nhung khong bay xa duoc.
蛋=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Mot giong man o phuong nam. Xem chu 蜑. \n\t2. Tuc dung nhu chu noan 卵 trung cac loai chim.
蛑=mau [mou2]\n\t1. Tuu mau 蝤蛑 cua gai, mot loai cua be.
蛔=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Con giun o trong bung cac giong dong vat. Co khi viet la 蚘.
蛕=hoi [hui2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu hoi 蛔.
蛘=dang [yang2]\n\t1. Mot thu sau lam hai lua. Nguoi Viet goi la me nguu 米牛, nguoi Thieu goi la me tuong 米象, nguoi To goi la dang tu 蛘子, nguyen la chu 蝆.
蛙=oa [wa1]\n\t1. Mot giong dong vat co xuong song, o duoc ca nuoc ca can. Con ech tuc goi la kim tuyen oa 金線蛙, la dien ke 田雞, la thuy ke tu 水雞子. Con chau goi la thanh oa 青蛙, lai goi la vu oa 雨蛙. Con coc goi la thiem thu 蟾蜍. Enh uong goi la ha mo 蝦蟆. Giong ech, giong chau hay keu hay gian cho nen tieng nhac dam goi la oa thanh 蛙聲, phat cau goi la oa no 蛙怒.
蛛=chu, thu [zhu1]\n\t1. Tri chu 蜘蛛 con nhen. Ta goi la chu thu.
蛞=khoat [kuo4]\n\t1. Khoat du 蛞蝓 con sen.
蛟=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Con thuong luong.
蛤=cap [ge2|ha2]\n\t1. Con hau nho. Tuc goi la cap li 蛤蜊. \n\t2. Van cap 文蛤 con ngheu, vo no tan ra goi la cap phan 蛤粉 dung lam thuoc. \n\t3. Cap gioi 蛤蚧 con cac ke.
蛩=cung [qiong2]\n\t1. Con sau lua. \n\t2. Ten rieng con de men. \n\t3. Con chau chau. \n\t4. Cung cung 蛩蛩 mot giong thu nhu con ngua o Bac Hai. \n\t5. Lo lang am tham.
蛭=diet [zhi4]\n\t1. Con dia. Co khi goi la thuy diet 水蛭. Thu lon goi la ma diet 馬蛭, tuc goi la ma hoang 馬蝗.
蛸=sao [shao1|xiao1]\n\t1. Tieu sao 蠨蛸 giong nhen cao cang.
蛹=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Con dong (nhong). Thu sau nao bien tuong nhu loai tam thi luc con o trong ken deu goi la dung ca.
蛺=kiep, hiep [jia2]\n\t1. Kiep diep 蛺蝶. Xem chu diep 蝶. Cung doc la chu hiep.
蛱=kiep, hiep [jia2]\n\t1. Kiep diep 蛺蝶. Xem chu diep 蝶. Cung doc la chu hiep.
蛼=xa [che1]\n\t1. Xa ngao 蛼螯. Xem chu ngao 螯.
蛾=nga, nghi [e2]\n\t1. Con ngai, thu sau nao giong nhu con ngai deu goi la nga. \n\t2. Dan ba con gai long may nho goi la nga mi 蛾眉 may ngai. Co khi goi tat la nga. Nhu song nga 雙蛾 hai hang long may. Mot am la nghi.
蜀=thuc [shu3]\n\t1. Luc con ngai, con buom con nhu con sau nho goi la thuc. \n\t2. Dat Thuc 蜀, nuoc Thuc 蜀 (221-264), thuoc tinh Tu Xuyen 四川 bay gio. \n\t3. Co doc. \n\t4. Do tho.
蜂=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Con ong. \n\t2. Tuong mao hung ac. Nhu phong muc sai thanh 蜂目豺聲 mat ong tieng cho soi, hinh dung ke doc ac. \n\t3. Dong. Nhieu. Nhu dao tac phong khoi 盜賊蜂起 trom giac noi nhu ong.
蜃=than [shen4]\n\t1. Mot tieng goi tom ca cac loai so hen. Vo so nung thanh voi goi la than khoi 蜃灰. \n\t2. Than khi 蜃氣 anh gia, ao tuong. Anh sang soi be gioi len tren khong thanh ra muon hinh ngan trang, ngay xua cho la vi con so than no hoa ra va goi la than lau hai thi 蜃樓海市. \n\t3. Do te.
蜆=hien [xian3]\n\t1. Con hen. \n\t2. Con sau ken.
蚬=hien [xian3]\n\t1. Con hen. \n\t2. Con sau ken.
蜇=triet [zhe1|zhe2]\n\t1. Con sua. \n\t2. Dot, can (noi ve con trung co noc doc)
蜈=ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Ngo cong 蜈蚣 con ret.
蜉=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Phu du 蜉蝣 con nhen nuoc, con vo sang sinh chieu chet. Vi the nguoi ta moi vi cai doi nguoi ngan ngui la kiep phu du 蜉蝣.
蜊=li [li2]\n\t1. Xem chu cap 蛤.
蜋=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Duong lang 螳螂. Xem chu duong 螳. \n\t2. Khuong lang 蜣蜋. Xem chu khuong 蜣.
蜍=thu [chu2]\n\t1. Xem chu thiem 蟾.
蜎=quyen [yuan1]\n\t1. Con bo gay. \n\t2. Quyen quyen ngo nguay. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu quyen 娟.
蜑=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Dan nhan 蜑人 mot giong man o phuong nam, sinh nhai bang nghe chai luoi.
蜒=dien [yan2]\n\t1. Dien du 蜒蚰 mot giong nhu con sen.
蜓=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Tinh dinh 蜻蜓. Xem chu tinh 蜻.
蜕=thue [tui4]\n\t1. Xac cac loai sau lot ra. Nhu thien thue 蟬蛻 xac ve.
蜘=tri [zhi1]\n\t1. Tri chu 蜘蛛. Xem chu chu 蛛.
蜚=phi, phi [fei1|fei3]\n\t1. Mot thu sau an lua. \n\t2. Phi liem 蜚蠊 con gian, mot thu sau bay hay o bep, cham den thi toa hoi thoi ra tuc goi la chuong lang 蟑螂. \n\t3. Mot am la phi. Cung nghia voi chu phi 飛.
蜜=mat [mi4]\n\t1. Mat ong. \n\t2. Lay duong ngam do an cung goi la mat. Nhu qua ngam nuoc duong goi la mat tien 蜜餞. \n\t3. Ngot, lay loi noi kheo ma an ui nguoi, ma ru re nguoi goi la diem ngon mat ngu 甜言蜜語.
蜞=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Con vat, con dia. Mot loai trung, co hai thu, thu xanh va thu vang, thu xanh o tren la cay trong rung ram, hay dot mau nguoi, thu vang o duoi dat hut mau nhu loai dia. \n\t2. Banh ki 蟛蜞 con cay, con cong cong.
蜡=tra [la4|zha4]\n\t1. Ngay le tat nien nha Chu 周 goi la tra. Nha Tan 秦 goi la lap 臘.
蜢=manh [meng3]\n\t1. Trach manh 蚱蜢. Xem chu manh 蚱.
蜣=khuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Khuong lang 蜣蜋 con bo hung.
蜥=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Tich dich 蜥蜴 con than lan.
蜨=diep [die2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu diep 蝶.
蜩=dieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Con ve sau.
蜮=vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Con vuc. Ngay xua bao no la mot loai bo nho, ngam cat phun vao nguoi lam cho nguoi phat om. Co khi goi la sa cong 射工. Vi the nen ke nao am hiem goi la quy vuc 鬼蜮. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Long xa qui vuc bien nhan gian 龍蛇鬼蜮遍人間 (Ngu nguyet quan canh do 五月觀競渡) ran rong qui quai tran ngap coi nguoi ta. \n\t2. Con sau an mam lua.
蜰=phi [fei2]\n\t1. Tuc goi con rep la phi.
蜴=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Tich dich 蜥蜴. Xem chu tich 蜥.
蜷=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Van veo, oan oeo, sau bo cong queo goi la quyen. Vat gi hinh dang cong queo goi la quyen khuc 蜷曲.
蜹=nhue [rui4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhue 蚋.
蜺=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghe 霓.
蜻=tinh [qing1]\n\t1. Tinh dinh 蜻蜓 con chuon chuon.
蜼=vi, duu [wei4]\n\t1. Loai khi duoi dai, cung doc la chu duu.
蜾=qua [guo3]\n\t1. Qua loa 蜾蠃 con to vo.
蜿=uyen [wan1]\n\t1. Uyen duyen 蜿蜒 ran bo ngong ngoeo. \n\t2. Cho nao dia the quanh co cung goi la uyen duyen 蜿蜒.
蝀=dong [dong1]\n\t1. De dong 螮蝀 cai cau vong.
蝃=de [di4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu de 螮.
蝌=khoa [ke1]\n\t1. Khoa dau 蝌蚪. Xem chu dau 蚪.
蝎=hat, hiet [xie1]\n\t1. Con mot go. \n\t2. Mot am la hiet, cung nghia voi chu hiet 蠍.
蝓=du [yu2]\n\t1. Khoat du 蛞蝓 con sen.
蝕=thuc [shi2]\n\t1. Mat troi mat trang bi an. \n\t2. Pham vat gi bi sau mot can khoet sut lo deu goi la thuc. 
蚀=thuc [shi2]\n\t1. Mat troi mat trang bi an. \n\t2. Pham vat gi bi sau mot can khoet sut lo deu goi la thuc. 
蝗=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Mot loai sau bay an hai lua.
蝘=yen [yan3]\n\t1. Yen dinh 蝘蜓 con ran than lan, tuc goi la con thu cung 守宮 hay bich ho 壁虎.
蝙=bien, bien [bian1]\n\t1. Bien buc 蝙蝠 con doi. Doi co hai canh nhu loai chim, bon chan nhu loai thu, xep vao loai nao cung duoc, vi the ke nao don can hai dau, cu be nao manh thi theo goi la phai bien buc. Ta quen doc la chu bien.
蝟=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Con dim (nhim). \n\t2. Xum xit, be bon lon xon. Nhu su nhu vi tap 事如蝟集 viec don nhieu qua nhu long nhim xum xit.
蝠=buc [fu2]\n\t1. Bien buc 蝙蝠. Xem chu bien 蝙.
蝡=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Loai sau ngo nguay.
蝣=du [you2]\n\t1. Phu du 蜉蝣. Xem chu phu 蜉.
蝤=tu, tuu, du [qiu2|you2]\n\t1. Tu te 蝤蠐 con sau go, sac no trang non, cho nen dem vi voi co dan ba. \n\t2. Mot am la tuu. Tuu mau 蝤蛑. Xem chu 蛑. \n\t3. Mot am la du. Cung nghia voi chu du 蝣.
蝥=mau [mao2]\n\t1. Loai xen toc. Mot thu sau can goc lua, no lam hai rat du, cho nen cung dung de vi ke tieu nhan lam hai. Tuc viet la 蟊. \n\t2. Mot am la mao. Ban mao 班蝥 sau ban mieu.
蝦=ha [ha2|xia1]\n\t1. Con tom. Nguyen la chu 鰕. \n\t2. Ha mo 蝦蟆. Xem chu mo 蟆, oa 蛙.
虾=ha [ha2|xia1]\n\t1. Con tom. Nguyen la chu 鰕. \n\t2. Ha mo 蝦蟆. Xem chu mo 蟆, oa 蛙.
蝨=sat [shi1]\n\t1. Con chay, con ran.
蝮=phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Mot thu ran doc. Phuc xa 蝮蛇 ran ho mang.
蝯=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu vien 猿.
蝱=manh [meng2]\n\t1. Con nhang.
蝴=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Ho diep 蝴蝶 con buom buom. Ly Thuong An 李商隱. Trang Sinh hieu mong me ho diep 莊生曉夢迷蝴蝶 (Cam sat 錦瑟) Trang Sinh mo thay hoa lam con buom buom trong giac mong buoi sang.
蝶=diep [die2]\n\t1. Con buom.
蝸=oa [wo1]\n\t1. Oa nguu 蝸牛 con sen, mot ten la khoat du 蛞蝓. Trang Tu 莊子 co cau. Man Xuc nhi thi, quoc u oa chi giac nhi tranh 蠻觸二氏國於蝸之角而爭 nghia la hai ho Man Xuc chiem tung goc ma tranh nhau, y noi khi cuc nho be lam. Nhu noi oa giac vi danh 蝸角微名 cho danh nho xiu, oa cu 蝸居 cho o hep hoi, oa lu 蝸廬 cai leu con con, v.v.
蜗=oa [wo1]\n\t1. Oa nguu 蝸牛 con sen, mot ten la khoat du 蛞蝓. Trang Tu 莊子 co cau. Man Xuc nhi thi, quoc u oa chi giac nhi tranh 蠻觸二氏國於蝸之角而爭 nghia la hai ho Man Xuc chiem tung goc ma tranh nhau, y noi khi cuc nho be lam. Nhu noi oa giac vi danh 蝸角微名 cho danh nho xiu, oa cu 蝸居 cho o hep hoi, oa lu 蝸廬 cai leu con con, v.v.
蝻=nam [nan3]\n\t1. Loai sau moi no chua biet bay. Nam tu 蝻子 chau chau non.
螂=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lang 蜋.
螃=bang [pang2]\n\t1. Bang ki 螃蜞 con cay. \n\t2. Bang giai 螃蟹 con cua.
螄=si, tu, su [si1]\n\t1. Loa su 螺螄. Xem chu loa 螺. Cung doc la si hay tu.
蛳=si, tu, su [si1]\n\t1. Loa su 螺螄. Xem chu loa 螺. Cung doc la si hay tu.
螈=nguyen [yuan2]\n\t1. Vinh nguyen 蠑螈. Xem chu vinh 蠑.
螋=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Quac suu 蠼螋. Xem chu quac 蠼.
融=dung, dong [rong2]\n\t1. Sang ruc, khi lua lan boc len tren troi goi la dung. Vi the nen ngay xua goi than lua la chuc dung thi 祝融氏. \n\t2. Tan tac. Nhu tuyet dung 雪融 tuyet tan, tieu dung y kien 消融意見 tieu tan y kien, noi hai ben khong co hiem khich gi nhau nua. \n\t3. Hoa hoa. Nhu ki nhac dung dung 其樂融融 nhac vui hoa hoa. \n\t4. Hoa deu, dung thong, luu thong, hai vat khac nhau ma hoa tan voi nhau lam mot deu goi la dung . Nhu thuy nhu giao dung 水乳交融 nuoc voi sua hoa lan voi nhau. Hai ben cung thau to thong nhau goi la thong dung 通融. Nguoi khong cau ne, chap truoc goi la vien dung 圓融. Nay goi gia ca cac cua cai la kim dung 金融 cung la noi theo cai nghia luu thong ca. Cung doc la chu dong. 
螓=tan, tran [qin2]\n\t1. Con co co, vi tran no rong ma vuong, cho nen nguoi nao dau tran dep goi la tan thu 螓首. Ta quen doc la chu tran.
螗=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Duong dieu 螗蜩 mot giong ve sau sac xanh, tieng trong treo.
螘=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu nghi 蟻.
螙=do [du4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu do 蠹.
螞=ma [ma1|ma3|ma4]\n\t1. Mot thu dia lon, tuc goi la ma hoang 螞蟥. \n\t2. Ma nghi 螞蟻 con kien cang.
蚂=ma [ma1|ma3|ma4]\n\t1. Mot thu dia lon, tuc goi la ma hoang 螞蟥. \n\t2. Ma nghi 螞蟻 con kien cang.
螟=minh [ming2]\n\t1. Mot thu sau nam o trong than lua, hut het nhua lua roi lua kho heo. \n\t2. Minh linh 螟蛉 mot thu sau an hai rau. Nhung con to vo thuong bat de o trong to de lam luong an cho con, tuc lam cho no nuoi de lam con no, vi the nen nguoi sau goi con nuoi la minh linh.
螡=van [wen2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu van 蚊.
螢=huynh [ying2]\n\t1. Con dom dom.
萤=huynh [ying2]\n\t1. Con dom dom.
螣=dang, dac [teng2]\n\t1. Dang xa 螣蛇 ran bay, con ran than. \n\t2. Mot am la dac. Mot thu sau hay an non lua, lai nha to chang ca ngon lam cho lua khong nay bong tot duoc.
螫=thich [shi4|zhe1]\n\t1. Noc doc, noc cua cac loai ran ret, loai ong hoac o rang hoac o duoi dot vao nguoi dau buot deu goi la thich.
螬=tao [cao2]\n\t1. Te tao 蠐螬 mot loai sau nhu con kim quy nho, sinh o trong vuon, dai hon mot tac, dau do duoi den, di bang lung lai nhanh hon chan, hay duc khoet cay coi hoa qua.
螭=li [chi1]\n\t1. Con li, ngay xua noi no giong con rong, sac vang, khong co sung. Nay cac dau cot nha hay cham con ly goi la ly dau 螭頭. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu si 魑.
螮=de [di4]\n\t1. De dong 螮蝀 cau vong.
螯=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Con ngao, con cua kenh. \n\t2. Xa ngao 蛼螯 con ngheu.
螳=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Duong lang 螳螂 con bo ngua.
螵=phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Phieu sao 螵蛸 trung con bo ngua hay lam to o ben cay dau, nen goi la tang phieu sao 桑螵蛸. \n\t2. Hai phieu sao 海螵蛸 thai ca muc.
螺=loa [luo2]\n\t1. Con oc, co thu oc trong vo nhong nhanh, tho son hay dung de dat vao chu vao do cho dep goi la loa dien 螺鈿 kham oc. \n\t2. Bui toc. Nhu loa ke 螺髻 tre con roc toc quan quanh nhu xoay tron oc, vi the cho nen ngon nui cung goi la loa ke, bui toc dan ba cung goi la loa ke. 
螻=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Hoi thoi. \n\t2. Lau co 螻蛄. Xem chu co 蛄. \n\t3. Lau quac 螻蟈 mot ten rieng con ech, con chau.
蝼=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Hoi thoi. \n\t2. Lau co 螻蛄. Xem chu co 蛄. \n\t3. Lau quac 螻蟈 mot ten rieng con ech, con chau.
螽=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Mot loai sau, mot thu goi la phu chung 阜螽, mot thu goi la thao chung 草螽. \n\t2. Chung tu 螽斯 con giot sanh.
螿=tuong [jiang1]\n\t1. Han tuong 寒螿 tuc la mot thu ve sau nho den mua ret moi keu.
蟀=xuat [shuai4]\n\t1. Tat xuat 蟋蟀 con de men.
蟁=van [wen2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu van 蚊.
蟄=chap [zhe2]\n\t1. Mot loai sau nep o duoi dat. \n\t2. Pham cai gi tiem tang khong trong thay deu goi la chap. Nhu nguoi chet goi la vinh chap 永蟄.
蛰=chap [zhe2]\n\t1. Mot loai sau nep o duoi dat. \n\t2. Pham cai gi tiem tang khong trong thay deu goi la chap. Nhu nguoi chet goi la vinh chap 永蟄.
蟆=mo [ma2]\n\t1. Xem chu oa 蛙.
蟈=quac [guo1]\n\t1. Xem chu lau 螻.
蝈=quac [guo1]\n\t1. Xem chu lau 螻.
蟊=mau [mao2]\n\t1. Tuc muon dung nhu chu mau 蝥.
蟋=tat [xi1]\n\t1. Xem chu xuat 蟀.
蟒=mang [mang3]\n\t1. Con tran. \n\t2. Mang phuc 蟒服 mot thu pham phuc nha Thanh 清, theu nhu con rong ma co bon chan, kem rong mot cai vuot.
蟕=chuy [zui3]\n\t1. Chuy hue 蟕蠵 mot giong rua be dai nam sau thuoc, bon chan nhu vay ca, co   mong co 15 cai mai, mau gach, thuong dung thay doi moi.
蟛=banh [peng2]\n\t1. Banh ki 蟛蜞 con cay.
蟠=ban, phien [pan2]\n\t1. Cuon khuc, co lai ma nup. Nhu ban long 蟠龍 rong cuon khuc. \n\t2. Chiem cu mot noi goi la ban cu 蟠踞. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu ban 盤, vat gi tron ma det goi la ban. Nhu ban dao 蟠桃 qua dao. \n\t4. Mot am la phien. Mot thu sau o day chum vai.
蟢=hi [xi3]\n\t1. Hi tu 蟢子, mot ten la tieu sao蠨蛸. Xem chu 蛸. \n\t2. Bich hi 壁蟢 con nhen cang, no om mot cai trung o bung nhu hinh dong tien, nen cung goi la bich tien 壁錢.
蟣=ki, ki [ji3]\n\t1. Con ran con. \n\t2. Mot am la ki. Con dia.
虮=ki, ki [ji3]\n\t1. Con ran con. \n\t2. Mot am la ki. Con dia.
蟥=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Dia co.
蟪=hue [hui4]\n\t1. Hue co 蟪蛄. Xem chu co 蛄.
蟫=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Con sau, con roi ca. \n\t2. Mot am la tam. Tam tam 蟫蟫. Con sau ngo nguay.
蟬=thien [chan2]\n\t1. Con ve sau. Nguyen Du. Han thien chung nhat tao cao chi 寒蟬終日噪高枝 (So thu cam hung 初秋感興) ve sau lanh suot ngay keu tren canh cao. \n\t2. Lien noi, lien noi khong dut goi la thien lien 蟬聯. \n\t3. Thien quyen 蟬蜎 tuoi dep.
蝉=thien [chan2]\n\t1. Con ve sau. Nguyen Du. Han thien chung nhat tao cao chi 寒蟬終日噪高枝 (So thu cam hung 初秋感興) ve sau lanh suot ngay keu tren canh cao. \n\t2. Lien noi, lien noi khong dut goi la thien lien 蟬聯. \n\t3. Thien quyen 蟬蜎 tuoi dep.
蟮=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thien 蟺.
蟯=nhieu [nao2]\n\t1. Mot thu giun nho o trong ruot.
蛲=nhieu [nao2]\n\t1. Mot thu giun nho o trong ruot.
蟲=trung [chong2]\n\t1. Giong sau co chan goi la trung, ngay xua dung de goi tat ca cac loai dong vat. Nhu vu trung 羽蟲 loai chim, mao trung 毛蟲 loai thu.
蟶=sanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Con trung truc, con hau nho.
蛏=sanh [cheng1]\n\t1. Con trung truc, con hau nho.
蟹=giai [xie4]\n\t1. Con cua.
蟺=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Con luon. Co khi viet 蟮.
蟻=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Con kien. \n\t2. Bach nghi 白蟻 con moi trang hay an do go. \n\t3. Can ruou. Nhu phu nghi 浮蟻 tam ruou. \n\t4. Noi y nho mon. Nhu nghi menh 蟻命 y noi xin thuong tinh menh nhu mang kien vay. \n\t5. Nghi phong 蟻封 nui dat go ghe.
蚁=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Con kien. \n\t2. Bach nghi 白蟻 con moi trang hay an do go. \n\t3. Can ruou. Nhu phu nghi 浮蟻 tam ruou. \n\t4. Noi y nho mon. Nhu nghi menh 蟻命 y noi xin thuong tinh menh nhu mang kien vay. \n\t5. Nghi phong 蟻封 nui dat go ghe.
蟾=thiem [chan2]\n\t1. Thiem thu 蟾蜍 con coc. \n\t2. Tuc noi nhung vet den den tren mat trang la con coc, nen goi mat trang la thiem cung 蟾宮 hay ngan thiem 銀蟾, minh thiem 明蟾, v.v.
蠁=huong [xiang4]\n\t1. Hat huong 肸蠁 cac loai sau sinh o cho am thap nhu con nhang, con muoi, v.v. Vi cac loai ay rat nhieu ma lai hay xum vao cho toi, cho nen noi ve su hung thinh cung goi la hat huong, trong chon u minh phang phat nhu co tieng cung goi la hat huong.
蠃=loa, loa [luo3]\n\t1. Qua loa con to vo. \n\t2. Mot am la loa cung nghia voi chu loa 螺.
蠅=dang [ying2]\n\t1. Con ruoi. \n\t2. Thuong dang 蒼蠅 con nhang. \n\t2. Dung de noi cac cai nho be. Nhu dang dau te tu 蠅頭細字 chu nho nhu dau ruoi, noi chu nho lam.
蝇=dang [ying2]\n\t1. Con ruoi. \n\t2. Thuong dang 蒼蠅 con nhang. \n\t2. Dung de noi cac cai nho be. Nhu dang dau te tu 蠅頭細字 chu nho nhu dau ruoi, noi chu nho lam.
蠆=sai, mai [chai4]\n\t1. Con bo cap, mot loai sau nhu giong ret. \n\t2. Thuy sai 水蠆 loai sau nho o trong nuoc. \n\t3. Ta quen doc la chu mai.
虿=sai, mai [chai4]\n\t1. Con bo cap, mot loai sau nhu giong ret. \n\t2. Thuy sai 水蠆 loai sau nho o trong nuoc. \n\t3. Ta quen doc la chu mai.
蠉=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Sau bo quan queo. \n\t2. Con bo gay.
蠊=liem [lian2]\n\t1. Phi liem 蜚鐮. Xem chu phi 蜚.
蠋=truc, thuc [zhu2]\n\t1. Mot loai sau nho an hai la cay. Cung doc la chu thuc.
蠍=hiet [xie1]\n\t1. Con hiet, con bo cap.
蝎=hiet [xie1]\n\t1. Con hiet, con bo cap.
蠐=te [qi2]\n\t1. Te tao 蠐螬. Xem chu tao 螬.
蛴=te [qi2]\n\t1. Te tao 蠐螬. Xem chu tao 螬.
蠑=vinh [rong2]\n\t1. Vinh nguyen 蠑螈 con sam, mot loai dong vat con duc con cai o chung khong roi.
蝾=vinh [rong2]\n\t1. Vinh nguyen 蠑螈 con sam, mot loai dong vat con duc con cai o chung khong roi.
蠓=mong [meng3]\n\t1. Con moi dat, mot loai sau dau co long nhu nhung, khi tanh mua thi bay lu luot ra, cung goi la miet mong 蠛蠓.
蠔=hao [hao2]\n\t1. Con hau. Xem chu le 蠣.
蠕=nhuyen [ru2]\n\t1. Nhuyen nhuyen 蠕蠕 mot nuoc ro ngay xua, tuc la dat Ngoai Mong bay gio. \n\t2. Mot am la nhu ngo nguay, cac giong chat mem nhun nhu con giun, con dia goi la nhu hinh dong vat 蠕形動物.
蠖=oach, hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Xich oach 尺蠖 mot loai sau nho hay an la dau, la mo. \n\t2. Oach khuat 蠖屈 tam phai chiu lun, tam chiu thua kem. Cung doc la chu hoach.
蠘=tiet [jie2]\n\t1. Mot loai nhu con cua ma to, cang co rang.
蠙=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Mot ten rieng cua con trai.
蠛=miet [mie4]\n\t1. Miet mong 蠛蠓. Xem chu mong 蠓.
蠜=phan [fan2]\n\t1. Khi phan 氣蠜 mot loai sau dai hon tam phan, sac vang, gap su nguy cap thi phun hoi vang ra rat hang, di rat nhanh. Mot ten la hanh da 行夜.
蠟=lap [la4|zha4]\n\t1. Sap ong. Thu vang goi la hoang lap 黃蠟, thu trang goi la bach lap 白蠟. \n\t2. Nen. \n\t3. Boi sap.
蜡=lap [la4|zha4]\n\t1. Sap ong. Thu vang goi la hoang lap 黃蠟, thu trang goi la bach lap 白蠟. \n\t2. Nen. \n\t3. Boi sap.
蠡=le, le, lai, loa [li2|li3]\n\t1. Con mot go, do dac dung lau sut lo cung goi la le. \n\t2. Mot am khac la le. Qua bau lo. Nhu quan khuy le trac 管窺蠡測 nhom trong ong, ngam trong bau, y noi ke nghe thay hep hoi. Ta quen doc la chu lai. \n\t3. Ten nguoi. Nhu Pham Lai 笵蠡 nguoi thoi Xuan Thu 春秋. \n\t4. Lai mot am la loa. Thoc loa 瘯蠡 benh ghe cua cac loai vat.
蠢=xuan [chun3]\n\t1. Con sau ngo nguay. Vi the nen nguoi hay vat khong yen tinh goi la xuan dong 蠢動, ke ngu si khong biet gi cung goi la xuan.
蠣=le [li4]\n\t1. Mau le 牡蠣 con hau, vo no goi la le phong 蠣房, thit goi la le hoang 蠣黃, nguoi phuong nam lai goi la hao 蠔. Tuc goi la hao son 蠔山, vo nung voi goi la le phan 蠣粉.
蛎=le [li4]\n\t1. Mau le 牡蠣 con hau, vo no goi la le phong 蠣房, thit goi la le hoang 蠣黃, nguoi phuong nam lai goi la hao 蠔. Tuc goi la hao son 蠔山, vo nung voi goi la le phan 蠣粉.
蠧=do [du4]\n\t1. Tuc muon dung nhu chu do 蠹.
蠨=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Tieu sao 蠨蛸. Xem chu sao 蛸.
蠭=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu 蜂.
蠱=co [gu3]\n\t1. Mot vat doc lam hai nguoi. Tuong truyen nhung noi man moi no hay cho vat ay vao trong do an uong, nguoi nao an phai thi sinh ra ro dai me man. \n\t2. Dung muu khien cho nguoi me hoac goi la co hoac 蠱惑. \n\t3. Viec. Kinh Dich 易經 co cau can phu chi co 幹父之蠱 lam lai duoc cai viec nguoi truoc da lam hong, vi the nen cha co toi loi ma con hien tai cung goi la can co 幹蠱. \n\t4. Chau. \n\t5. Benh co.
蛊=co [gu3]\n\t1. Mot vat doc lam hai nguoi. Tuong truyen nhung noi man moi no hay cho vat ay vao trong do an uong, nguoi nao an phai thi sinh ra ro dai me man. \n\t2. Dung muu khien cho nguoi me hoac goi la co hoac 蠱惑. \n\t3. Viec. Kinh Dich 易經 co cau can phu chi co 幹父之蠱 lam lai duoc cai viec nguoi truoc da lam hong, vi the nen cha co toi loi ma con hien tai cung goi la can co 幹蠱. \n\t4. Chau. \n\t5. Benh co.
蠲=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Sach. Nhu quyen cat 蠲吉 trai gioi sach se chon ngay tot lanh. \n\t2. Tru di. Nhu quyen mien 蠲免 tru khoi phai di lam viec hay thue ma. \n\t3. Sang sua. \n\t4. Mot loai sau nho nhieu chan.
蠵=hue [xi1]\n\t1. Chuy hue 蟕蠵. Xem chu chuy 蟕.
蠶=tam [can2]\n\t1. Con tam. Tam tu luc be lon len, tat hai ba lan lot xac, moi lan lot xac thi nam yen hai ba ngay, khong an khong cua goi la tam mien 蠶眠 tam ngu, ngu ba bon luot moi ne keo ken. Khi keo xong ken thi hoa ra con nhong 蛹, it lau sau lai hoa ra hinh nhu con buom, can thung ken bay ra, goi la con ngai 蛾. Muon lay to tot thi thua luc con ngai chua biet can ken phai lay ngay, neu de qua thi no can dut, to khong thanh soi nua. \n\t2. Dan da. Nhu tam thuc chu hau 蠶食諸侯 xam lan dan dat cua cac nuoc chu hau. \n\t3. Tam that 蠶室 nha nguc thien nguoi. Vi ke bi thien phai o buong kin nhu buong tam nen goi la tam that. \n\t4. Chan tam.
蚕=tam [can2]\n\t1. Con tam. Tam tu luc be lon len, tat hai ba lan lot xac, moi lan lot xac thi nam yen hai ba ngay, khong an khong cua goi la tam mien 蠶眠 tam ngu, ngu ba bon luot moi ne keo ken. Khi keo xong ken thi hoa ra con nhong 蛹, it lau sau lai hoa ra hinh nhu con buom, can thung ken bay ra, goi la con ngai 蛾. Muon lay to tot thi thua luc con ngai chua biet can ken phai lay ngay, neu de qua thi no can dut, to khong thanh soi nua. \n\t2. Dan da. Nhu tam thuc chu hau 蠶食諸侯 xam lan dan dat cua cac nuoc chu hau. \n\t3. Tam that 蠶室 nha nguc thien nguoi. Vi ke bi thien phai o buong kin nhu buong tam nen goi la tam that. \n\t4. Chan tam.
蠹=do [du4]\n\t1. Con mot. \n\t2. Lay hao tien cua. Nhu quoc do 國蠹 ke an hai cua nha nuoc, mot nuoc. \n\t2. Phoi sach.
蠺=tam [can2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tam 蠶.
蠻=man [man2]\n\t1. Man, giong man o phuong nam. Vuong Bot 王勃. Kham tam giang nhi doi ngu ho, khong Man Kinh nhi dan Au Viet 襟三江而帶五湖，控蠻荊而引甌越 (Dang Vuong cac tu 滕王閣序) nhu co ao cua ba song, vong dai cua nam ho, khuat phuc dat Man Kinh, tiep dan mien Au Viet. \n\t2. Chi cay manh lam can goi la man, la da man 野蠻, la man hoanh 蠻橫.
蛮=man [man2]\n\t1. Man, giong man o phuong nam. Vuong Bot 王勃. Kham tam giang nhi doi ngu ho, khong Man Kinh nhi dan Au Viet 襟三江而帶五湖，控蠻荊而引甌越 (Dang Vuong cac tu 滕王閣序) nhu co ao cua ba song, vong dai cua nam ho, khuat phuc dat Man Kinh, tiep dan mien Au Viet. \n\t2. Chi cay manh lam can goi la man, la da man 野蠻, la man hoanh 蠻橫.
蠼=quac [qu2]\n\t1. Quac suu 蠼螋 mot thu sau o noi am thap, minh den chan vang chay rat nhanh, sau chan, dau duoi te ra, thay nguoi den gan thi phun dai doc ra de bao ho minh. \n\t2. Con khi cai.
血=huyet [xie3|xue4]\n\t1. Mau. \n\t2. Giet muong de cung te. Nhu huyet thuc 血食 duoc huong cung te bang muong sinh. \n\t3. Mau la mot chat rat cot yeu cho minh nguoi, cho nen ho cung mot chi goi la huyet toc 血族, con chau goi la huyet dan 血胤. \n\t4. Mau mat. Khoc vai mau mat ra goi la khap huyet 泣血. \n\t5. Het long het suc ma lam. Nhu huyet chien 泣戰 het suc danh. Dai nguoi nong nan goi la huyet tam 泣心. Tai san kiem kho moi duoc nen goi la huyet ban 泣本.
衁=hoang [huang1]\n\t1. Mau.
衂=nuc [nu:4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nuc 衄.
衄=nuc [nu:4]\n\t1. Do mau cam. Giap hoa khe mui do mau. \n\t2. Bi thua.
衅=han [xin4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu han 釁.
衊=miet [mie4]\n\t1. Mau bun. Dung loi noi beu xau nguoi goi la o miet 汚衊.
衋=huc [xi4]\n\t1. Dau xot, dau don.
行=hanh, hanh, hang, hang [hang2|xing2]\n\t1. Buoc di, buoc chan di. \n\t2. Lam ra, thi hanh ra. \n\t3. Di, nhu tong hanh 送行 dua di, tu hanh 辭行 tu di v.v. Vua chet goi la dai hanh 大行. \n\t4. Khong dinh han, tam thi. Nhu hanh thu 行署 dinh quan dong tam. \n\t5. Cai de dung, cua dung. Nhu ngay xua goi vang, go, nuoc, lua, dat la ngu hanh 金木水火土為五行 y noi la nam thu ay la cai nguoi ta can dung hang ngay vay. \n\t6. Trai qua. Nhu nhat hanh tac lai 一行作吏 lam quan qua mot lan. \n\t7. Sap toi, dan den. Nhu hanh nien ngu thap 行年五十 tuoi gan den nam muoi, hanh tuong tuu moc 行將就木 sap chet. \n\t8. Bai hat. Nhu trang ca hanh 長歌行 bai hat dai. \n\t9. Loi chu hanh, loi chu hoi da thao goi la hanh. 10. Duong sa. \n\t11. Bien doi luon khong ngung. Nha Phat goi cai y thuc luon luon troi di la hanh uan 行蘊. \n\t12. Mot am la hanh. Duc hanh, net na, con o tam la duc 德, thi hanh ra la hanh 行. Nhu doc hanh 獨行 duc hanh hon nguoi. Vi the nha Phat noi sua minh trong sach de tho Phat goi la tu hanh 修行. \n\t13. Lai mot am la hang. Hang loi. Phep binh ngay xua cu 25 nguoi la nhat hang 一行 mot hang, vi the goi binh linh la hang ngu 行伍. Mot dong chu cung goi la mot hang 一行. \n\t14. Cua hang. Mot cho chua cac do hang de van tai, buon ban cho tien goi la hang san 行棧 hay hang gia 行家. \n\t15. Nghe nghiep cua tram nghe. Nguoi dong nghiep goi la dong hang 同行, lam viec khong kheo goi la ngoai hang 外行. \n\t16. Mot am nua la hang. Hang thu. Nhu hang nhat 行一, hang nhi 行二, v.v. \n\t17. Hang lu. Goi cac nguoi ton truong cua ban minh la truong nhan hang 仗人行. \n\t18. Hang hang 行行 cung coi.
衍=dien, dien [yan3]\n\t1. Nuoc chay gian giua. Vi the nen su gi day day chan chua goi la dien, vat gi tuoi tot phon thinh cung goi la phon dien 繁衍, choi boi qua do goi la du dien 遊衍. \n\t2. The dat rong phang ma thap goi la dien. Nhu cham cat goi la sa dien 沙衍, dat cao thap gap ghenh goi la phan dien 墳衍. \n\t3. Bo dai, lan rong, nhu man dien 蔓衍 bo dai, tu dien 滋衍 nhung nhuc, sinh soi nay no. Lam viec khong thiet thuc, chi boi xoa be ngoai goi la phu dien 敷衍. \n\t4. Dien so tinh ra, Kinh dich noi so dai dien 大衍 co nam muoi so, vi the nay moi thong dung chu dai dien la so nam muoi. \n\t5. Tot, ngon. \n\t6. Dat tot mau. \n\t7. Suon nui. \n\t8. Mot am la dien. Te dien. 
衎=khan [kan4]\n\t1. Vui vay.
衒=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Tu khoe minh, ke lam tro tu khoe tai minh o noi duong xa goi la huyen. 
術=thuat [shu4|zhu2]\n\t1. Nghe thuat, ke co nghe rieng di cac noi kiem tien goi la thuat si 術士. \n\t2. Phuong phep do do ma suy ra, nhu bat hoc vo thuat 不學無術 khong hoc khong co phuong phap de lam. \n\t3. Duong di trong ap. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu thuat 述.
术=thuat [shu4|zhu2]\n\t1. Nghe thuat, ke co nghe rieng di cac noi kiem tien goi la thuat si 術士. \n\t2. Phuong phep do do ma suy ra, nhu bat hoc vo thuat 不學無術 khong hoc khong co phuong phap de lam. \n\t3. Duong di trong ap. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu thuat 述.
衕=dong [tong4]\n\t1. Day pho thang suot. Ve mien bac goi trong ngo pho la ho dong 衚衕.
衖=hang [long4]\n\t1. Duong di o trong lang. Xem them chu long 弄.
街=nhai [jie1]\n\t1. Nga tu, con duong thong ca bon mat, nhung duong cai trong thanh pho deu goi la nhai.
衙=nha [ya2]\n\t1. So quan, ta goi la quan nha 官衙 hay la nha mon 衙門 vi ngay xua truoc quan truong deu cam la co co tua nhu cai rang lon, nen goi la nha mon.
衚=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Ve mien bac goi trong ngo pho la ho dong 衚衕.
衛=ve [wei4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 衞.
卫=ve [wei4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 衞.
衝=xung [chong1]\n\t1. Con duong cai thong hanh. Vi the nen noi nao la cho giao thong tap nap goi la xung yeu 衝要. \n\t2. Xong ra, cu san thang len ma di, khong doai gi nguy hiem dong duc goi la xung. Nhu xung phong 衝鋒 cu xong thang vao dam guom giao ma di, xung dot 衝突 xong dot, v.v. \n\t3. Xe binh.
衞=ve [wei4]\n\t1. Phong giu. Nhu ve sinh 衞生 giu gin cho duoc song ma khoe, ve than 衞身 giu minh. \n\t2. Ke giu ve viec phong bi giu gin cung goi la ve. Nhu tuc ve 宿衞, thi ve 侍衞 deu la chuc quan ho ve nha vua ca. Vua Minh Thai To 明太祖 cu tinh nhung cho hiem yeu trong thien ha, mot quan thi dat mot so, may quan lien nhau thi dat mot   ve, moi ve dong 3600 ten linh de phong giac cuop, nhung noi co so binh ay dong   thi goi la ve, nhu uy hai ve 威海衞. \n\t3. Nuoc Ve. \n\t4. Tuc goi ve la con lua vi o dat Ve co nhieu lua. Nen thuong goi lua la kien ve 蹇衞 hay song ve 雙衞, v.v. \n\t5. Phan ve. Mau thuoc ve phan vinh 榮 khi thuoc ve phan ve 衞. \n\t6. Cai vay ten.
衡=hanh, hoanh [heng2]\n\t1. Cai can. \n\t2. Can nhac, can do xem duoc bao can lang goi la hanh. Vi the nen lam viec ma biet can nhac goi la quyen hanh 權衡. \n\t3. Cai don ngang xe. \n\t4. Tren my mat. Nhu hu hanh nhi ngu 盱衡而語 trung mat ma noi. \n\t5. Cai do de xem thien van. \n\t6. Cot ben lau, \n\t7. Ngoi sao giua vi sao bac dau. \n\t8. Mot am la hoanh cung nghia voi chu hoanh 橫.
衢=cu [qu2]\n\t1. Con duong thong bon nga, nga tu. Con duong lam quan goi la van cu 雲衢 duong may. 
衣=y, y [yi1|yi4]\n\t1. Ao. \n\t2. Vo cua cac qua cay, cai gi dung de che phu cac do cung goi la y. \n\t3. Mot am la y. Mac ao. \n\t4. Mac ao cho nguoi khac. \n\t5. Phuc ma lam theo.
表=bieu [biao3]\n\t1. O ngoai, nhu hai bieu 海表 ngoai be. \n\t2. To ro, tuyen bo y kien minh cho nguoi khac biet goi la bieu. Nhu dai bieu 代表 nguoi thay mat cua ai de to ho y cua nguoi ay ra. Trong mot dam dong, cu mot nguoi thay mat di hoi hop mot hoi nao co quan he den ca mot dam dong ay goi la dai bieu. \n\t3. Dau hieu, dat rieng mot cai dau hieu de cho nguoi ta de biet goi la bieu, nguoi nao co dang dap hon nguoi goi la di bieu 異表 hay bieu bieu 表表. \n\t4. Tieu bieu, neu to. Nhu tinh bieu tiet nghia 旌表節義 tieu bieu cai tiet nghia ra cho ve vang. Cai bia dung o mo goi la mo bieu 墓表, deu la theo cai y neu to, khien cho moi nguoi deu biet ma nho mai khong quen ca. \n\t5. Loi van bieu, la mot the van bay to tam long ke duoi voi nguoi tren, nhu van tau voi vua, voi than thanh deu goi la bieu ca. \n\t6. Ghi chep su vat gi chia ra tung loai, tung hang xep thanh hang loi de luc tra cho tien cung goi la bieu. Nhu thong ke bieu 統計表 cai bieu tinh gop tat ca. \n\t7. Ho ngoai. Nhu con co con cau goi la bieu huynh de 表兄弟.
衩=xai [cha3|cha4]\n\t1. Ta ao. Cho hai ta ao giap nhau goi la xai khau 衩口.
衫=sam [shan1]\n\t1. Ao don, ao lot minh.
衭=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Vat ca ao 
衮=con [gun3]\n\t1. Ao con, ao le phuc cua vua. \n\t2. Con con 衮衮 lu luot, nhieu.
衰=suy, suy, thoi [cui1]\n\t1. Suy kem, trai lai voi nghia chu thinh 盛. \n\t2. Mot am la suy. Lan tung buc xuong, nhu dang suy 等衰 hang buc. \n\t3. Lai them mot am thoi. Ao tang, may bang gai song ma khong co gau goi la tram thoi 斬衰, may bang gai nho co gau goi la tu thoi 齊衰.
衲=nap [na4]\n\t1. Bo nap 補衲 va khiu. \n\t2. Ao cua su mac chap tung manh lai nen cung goi la nap. \n\t3. Lai la mot tieng su tu xung minh.
衵=nat [ni4]\n\t1. Ao lot minh cua dan ba.
衷=trung, trung [zhong1]\n\t1. Tot, lanh. \n\t2. Trung, giua. \n\t3. Thanh thuc, \n\t4. Trong long, thuc, nhu ngu trung 愚衷 tam long ngay thuc cua toi. \n\t5. Mot am la trung. Vua phai, nhu chiet trung 折衷 phan quyet phai trai cho dung phai. Ta quen doc la chiet trung.
衺=ta [xie2]\n\t1. Bat chanh, queo. Cung nhu chu ta 邪. 
衽=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Vat ao. \n\t2. Liem nham 斂衽 lay (dung ve ben dan ba). \n\t3. Cai chieu.
衾=kham [qin1]\n\t1. Cai chan. \n\t2. Do kham liem.
衿=cam [jin1]\n\t1. Ao khep co. Kinh thi 詩經 co cau. Thanh thanh tu cam 青青子衿 co ao chang xanh xanh, la noi cai ao cua hoc tro xanh xanh, vi the nen sau goi cac ong do tu tai la thanh cam 青衿. Co khi goi tat la cam 衿. \n\t2. Vat ao 
袁=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Ho Vien. \n\t2. Ao dai le the.
袂=me, due [mei4]\n\t1. Tay ao. Biet nhau goi la phan me 分袂. Ta quen doc la chu due.
袄=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ao 襖.
袈=ca [jia1]\n\t1. Ca sa 袈裟 cai ao ca sa.
袋=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Cai day.
袌=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu bao 抱.
袍=bao [pao2]\n\t1. Ao dai cham got. \n\t2. Vat ca ao.
袒=dan [tan3]\n\t1. Coi tran, tray vai ao tay trai. Le tang ngay xua mac ao de tray vai ben trai. Le nha chua mac ao ca sa cung de trong ben trai goi la thien dan 偏袒. \n\t2. Benh vuc cho nguoi. Nguyen o cau truyen Chu Bot nha Han, ben huu benh vuc ho La 呂氏右袒 (La thi huu dan), ben ta benh vuc ho Luu 劉氏左袒 (Luu thi ta dan), nen doi sau moi thong dung de noi ve su benh vuc nguoi.
袖=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Tay ao. Dong Hien 董賢 duoc vua yeu, nam goi vao tay ao vua Han Ai de 漢哀帝 ma ngu, khi vua day truoc, moi dut tay ao ma day, vi the bon dan ong duoc vua yeu goi la doan tu 斷袖. \n\t2. Xu tay, nhu tu thu bang quan 袖手旁觀 xu tay dung xem. \n\t3. Linh tu 領袖 cam dau, xuong suat. Xoc ao tat phai de y den cai co cai tay, cho nen nguoi dung dau mot doan the goi la linh tu. 
袗=chan, chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Ao don. \n\t2. Mot am la chan. Ao den.
袜=mat [wa4]\n\t1. Cai ao lot da cua dan ba. Ngay xua dung that ra ngoai ao lam do trang suc.
袞=con [gun3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu con 衮.
衮=con [gun3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu con 衮.
袟=dat [zhi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trat 秩.
袠=trat, dat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai bao sach, cung nghia voi chu trat 帙. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu trat 秩, muoi nam la mot trat, nhu that trat 七袠 bay muoi tuoi, bat trat 八袠 tam muoi tuoi. Ta quen doc la chu dat.
袤=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Rong suot. Chieu rong ve phuong dong phuong tay la quang 廣, ve phuong nam phuong bac la mau 袤.
袪=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Tay ao. \n\t2. Tuc goi dan ba le la khu 袪 nghia la ven tay ao ma vai vay.
被=bi, bi [bei4]\n\t1. Ao ngu. \n\t2. Dap trum. Nhu quang bi tu bieu 光被四表 sang khap ca bon coi. \n\t3. Bi, chiu. Nhu bi cao 被告 ke bi cao mach. Pham su gi o ngoai ma lien luy den deu goi la bi. Nhu bi luy 被累 bi lien luy. \n\t4. Mat ngoai, be ngoai. \n\t5. Do trang suc tren dau. \n\t6. Bo do. \n\t7. Mot am la bi. Kip den. \n\t8. Doi, vac.
袱=phuc [fu2]\n\t1. Cai khan goi.
袴=kho [ku4]\n\t1. Cai kho, quan dui. Tuc dung nhu chu kho 褲.
袵=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nham 衽.
袷=giap, kiep, khiep [jia2|qia1]\n\t1. Ao kep. Cung doc la chu kiep. \n\t2. Mot am la khiep. Co ao cong, trang vat.
袺=ket [jie2]\n\t1. Xan vat ao len, vat vat ao len.
袽=nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Ao rach.
袿=khue [gui1]\n\t1. Ao canh dai, ao choang cua dan ba.
裀=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Ao lot minh. \n\t2. Chieu kep, cai dem.
裁=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Cat ao. Nhu tai phung 裁縫 cat may. Pham cu theo cai khuon kho nhat dinh ma roc ra deu goi la tai. Nhu chi tai 紙裁 roc giay. \n\t2. De bot, nhu tai giam 裁減 xen bot. \n\t3. Xet lua. Nhu tong tai 總裁 xet ky va phan biet hon kem. Nguoi dung xet cac tro choi nhu da bong, danh quan xem ben nao duoc ben nao thua goi la tong tai. \n\t4. The che, loi van. Nhu the tai 體裁 lua ra tung loi. \n\t5. Quyet doan. Nhu tai phan 裁判 xu doan phan phan phai trai, \n\t6. Lo luong.
裂=liet [lie3|lie4]\n\t1. Xe ra. Su gi pha hoai goi la quyet liet 決裂. \n\t2. Rach.
裊=nieu [niao3]\n\t1. Xoay vung. Nhu khoi boc xoay di xoay lai goi la “nieu”. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu nieu 嫋.
袅=nieu [niao3]\n\t1. Xoay vung. Nhu khoi boc xoay di xoay lai goi la “nieu”. \n\t2. Cung mot nghia voi chu nieu 嫋.
裋=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Ao vai xau.
裎=trinh [cheng2]\n\t1. Coi tran, tran truong. \n\t2. Day lung, giat o lung. \n\t3. Ao don.
裏=ly [li3]\n\t1. Lan lot ao. \n\t2. Trong, cai gi o trong deu goi la “ly”.
裒=bau [pou2]\n\t1. Tu hop, nhieu. \n\t2. Bot. Nhu bau da ich qua 裒多益寡 bot ben nhieu them cho ben it.
裔=due [yi4]\n\t1. Dat ngoai bien thuy. \n\t2. Dong doi. Nhu hau due 後裔 con chau lau doi, con chau xa. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Bach man khe dong luu mieu due 百蠻谿峒留苖裔 trong cac khe dong dat Man con de lai con chau (cua Han Tin). \n\t3. Ve gau ao. \n\t4. Ten goi chung cac giong moi ro.
裕=du [yu4]\n\t1. Lam ao nhieu do. Vi the nen giau co thua thai goi la du. \n\t2. Rong rai, khong den noi kiet que. \n\t3. Du. \n\t4. Thong tha.
裘=cuu [qiu2]\n\t1. Ao long cuu. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Te tan dieu cuu bat phuc te, Trieu dai chi chuong tho hong nghe 敝盡貂裘不復西，趙臺抵掌吐虹霓 Rach het ao cuu den, khong tro lai phia Tay (nha Tan), Noi trieu duong nuoc Trieu, dap tay tho ra cau vong (ra tai hung bien). \n\t2. Co cuu 箕裘 noi duoc nghiep truoc.
裙=quan [qun2]\n\t1. Cai quan, cai niem. \n\t2. Ben mep mai ba ba goi la miet quan 鼈裙.
裛=ap [yi4]\n\t1. Cai ao kep lot hoa. \n\t2. Buoc, that. \n\t3. Tham.
補=bo [bu3]\n\t1. Va ao. \n\t2. Bu, pham cai gi no thieu ma bu cho du deu goi la bo. Thieu mau uong thuoc bu mau goi la thuoc bo huyet 補血. Do Phu 杜甫. Thi ty mai chau hoi, Khien la bo mao oc 侍婢賣珠迴，牽蘿補茅屋 thi ty di ban ngoc trai tro ve, keo day leo sua kin nha co. \n\t3. Giup. Nhu xuan tinh canh nhi bo bat tuc 春省耕而補不足 mua xuan xem xet su cay bua ma giup cho cac cai thieu thon. \n\t4. Ich loi, nhu bat vo tieu bo 不無小補 khong phai la khong co ich loi chut dinh.
补=bo [bu3]\n\t1. Va ao. \n\t2. Bu, pham cai gi no thieu ma bu cho du deu goi la bo. Thieu mau uong thuoc bu mau goi la thuoc bo huyet 補血. Do Phu 杜甫. Thi ty mai chau hoi, Khien la bo mao oc 侍婢賣珠迴，牽蘿補茅屋 thi ty di ban ngoc trai tro ve, keo day leo sua kin nha co. \n\t3. Giup. Nhu xuan tinh canh nhi bo bat tuc 春省耕而補不足 mua xuan xem xet su cay bua ma giup cho cac cai thieu thon. \n\t4. Ich loi, nhu bat vo tieu bo 不無小補 khong phai la khong co ich loi chut dinh.
裝=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Trang thuc, bo dang. Nhu cai trang 改裝 doi bo dang, thay quan ao khac. \n\t2. Bia ra, gia cach. Nhu trang si 裝癡 gia cach ngu si, trang benh 裝病 gia cach om, v.v. \n\t3. Dum boc. Nhu hanh trang 行裝 cac do an duong, y trang 倚裝 sap di, v.v. \n\t4. Dung chua. Nhu trang hoa 裝貨 dong do hang. \n\t5. Trang suc, trang hoang. Dung cac vat to diem cho dep them goi la trang.
装=trang [zhuang1]\n\t1. Trang thuc, bo dang. Nhu cai trang 改裝 doi bo dang, thay quan ao khac. \n\t2. Bia ra, gia cach. Nhu trang si 裝癡 gia cach ngu si, trang benh 裝病 gia cach om, v.v. \n\t3. Dum boc. Nhu hanh trang 行裝 cac do an duong, y trang 倚裝 sap di, v.v. \n\t4. Dung chua. Nhu trang hoa 裝貨 dong do hang. \n\t5. Trang suc, trang hoang. Dung cac vat to diem cho dep them goi la trang.
裟=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Ca sa 袈裟 cai ao ca sa.
裠=quan [qun2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu quan 裙.
裡=ly [li3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ly 裏.
里=ly [li3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ly 裏.
裨=bi, ti [bi4|pi2]\n\t1. Bo ich. \n\t2. Giup. Cac tuong ta goi la thien bi 偏裨. \n\t3. Nho, cung nghia voi chu bai 稗. Nhu be nho goi la bi hai 裨海. Ta quen doc la chu ti.
裯=chu [chou2]\n\t1. Chan don, man.
裰=chuyet, xuyet [duo1]\n\t1. Khiu va. Tuc goi cai ao dai la truc chuyet 直裰. Ta quen doc la chu xuyet.
裱=phieu [biao3]\n\t1. Trang hoang tranh sach.
裳=thuong [chang2|shang5]\n\t1. Cai xiem 
裴=bui [pei2]\n\t1. Ho Bui. \n\t2. Co khi dung nhu chu boi 徘 boi hoi.
裸=loa, khoa [luo3]\n\t1. Tran truong. Ta quen doc khoa.
裹=khoa [guo3]\n\t1. Boc, goi. Nhu ma cach khoa thi 馬革裹屍 (Han thu 漢書) da ngua boc thay, noi chet o noi chien tran. \n\t2. Cai bao, nhu duoc khoa 藥裹 cai bao thuoc. \n\t3. Vo vet het, nhu khoa hiep 裹脅 lay cai the dong ma bat hiep phai theo het.
裼=tich, the [ti4|xi1]\n\t1. Coi tran, xan tay ao. \n\t2. Mot am la the. Cai diu, cai ta cua tre con.
製=che [zhi4]\n\t1. Cat thanh ao mac. Khong hoc ma lam quan goi la hoc che mi cam 學製美錦. \n\t2. Che tao, che tao nen cac do dung. Sao tam cac vi thuoc goi la bao che 泡製. \n\t3. Lam ra van chuong. Ngay xua goi cac van chuong cua vua lam ra la ngu che thi van 御製詩文. \n\t4. Khuon phep, nhu the che 體製 mau muc cu the ma lam.
裾=cu, cu [ju1]\n\t1. Vat ao. \n\t2. Mot am la cu. Cung nghia voi chu cu 倨.
褂=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Ao mac ngoai. Phep nha Thanh 清, ao le phuc mac o ngoai ao dai goi la ngoai quai 外褂, thu ngan thi goi la ma quai 馬褂.
褚=tru [chu3]\n\t1. Bong. Lay bong long lam ao cung goi la tru. \n\t2. Chua. \n\t3. Cai ta quan. \n\t4. Cai tui.
複=phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Ao kep. \n\t2. Pham su vat gi ma hai ba lan chong chat deu goi la phuc. Nhu trung phuc 重複 chong chap.
褊=bien [bian3]\n\t1. Nho, hep. \n\t2. Nong nay. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau duy thi bien tam 維是褊心 chi la long nong nay, bon chon, hap tap.
褌=con [hui1]\n\t1. Cai quan dui.
褎=tu, huu [xiu4]\n\t1. Tay ao. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hong tu tang van ca uyen chuyen 紅褎曾聞歌宛轉 tung nghe giong ca uyen chuyen khi mac ao hong. Nay thong dung chu tu 袖. \n\t2. Mot am la huu. Quan ao bong choang. \n\t2. Vui cuoi. \n\t3. Ve lua tot (nuc niu).
褏=tu [xiu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tu 袖.
褐=hat, cat [he4]\n\t1. Ao vai to. \n\t2. Nguoi ngheo hen mac ao vai to, cho nen nguoi ngheo hen cung goi la hat. \n\t3. Sac vang sam ma khong co mau mo goi la hat sac 褐色 sac kenh kech. Ta quen doc la chu cat.
褒=bao [bao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bao 襃.
褓=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Cuong bao 襁褓 cai diu, ta ap tre con.
褘=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Dep. \n\t2. Ao te cua hoang hau. \n\t3. Cai che dau goi. \n\t4. Cai khan vat (tui thom).
褙=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Boi tam 褙心 ao lot nguc.
褞=on [yun3]\n\t1. Ao vai to.
褡=dap [da1]\n\t1. Ao tran thu (coc tay).
褥=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Cai dem.
褦=nai [nai4]\n\t1. Nai dai 褦襶 duong mua nang nuc mac dien sang xin vao yet kien la khong hieu su. Vi the nen nguoi khong hieu su ma cu noi lai nhai mai khien cho nguoi ta kho chiu goi la nai dai.
褧=quynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Ao don.
褪=thon [tui4|tun4]\n\t1. Coi ao ra. \n\t2. Hoa tan. Su gi dan dan suy kem di cung goi la thon. \n\t3. Di giat lui.
褫=si [chi3]\n\t1. Lot ao, coi ao ra. \n\t2. Cach chuc. Hoc tro bi cach, lot mat ao le di goi la si cach 褫革, quan bi cach chuc goi la si chuc 褫職 nghia la bi boc bi lot mat pham phuc vay. \n\t3. Cuop, mat ca than tri goi la si khi 褫氣 hay la si phach 褫魄, v.v.
褰=khien [qian1]\n\t1. Ven ao, ven quan. \n\t2. Cai kho. \n\t3. Rut lai.
褱=hoai [huai2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu hoai 懷.
褲=kho [ku4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu kho 袴.
裤=kho [ku4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu kho 袴.
褵=li [li2]\n\t1. Co khi dung nhu chu li 縭.
褶=diep, triep, tap [zhe3]\n\t1. Ao kep. \n\t2. Mot am la triep. Gap nep. May quan phai xep tung buc lai ma khau goi la da triep 打褶 (xep nep). \n\t3. Mot am nua la tap. Quan cuoi ngua.
褸=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Lam lu 襤褸 lam lu, quan ao rach ruoi ban thiu.
褛=lu [lu:3]\n\t1. Lam lu 襤褸 lam lu, quan ao rach ruoi ban thiu.
褻=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Ao lot minh. \n\t2. Ban thiu. \n\t3. Nham nhon, khong co y kinh can. \n\t4. Vao luon, yet kien luon.
亵=tiet [xie4]\n\t1. Ao lot minh. \n\t2. Ban thiu. \n\t3. Nham nhon, khong co y kinh can. \n\t4. Vao luon, yet kien luon.
襁=cuong [qiang3]\n\t1. Cai diu con tre o sau lung.
襃=bao, bau [bao1]\n\t1. Khen, dem cai hay cai tot cua nguoi pho bay ra goi la bao. \n\t2. Ao rong. \n\t3. Mot am la bau. Tu lai, cung nghia voi bau 裒.
襄=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Sua tri giup. Nhu tan tuong 贊襄 giup giap. \n\t2. Tuong su 襄事 nen viec, xong viec. \n\t3. Ngua keo xe. Nhu thuong tuong 上襄 con ngua rat tot. \n\t4. Cao. \n\t5. Thu suong. \n\t6. Tru di. \n\t7. Sao doi ngoi.
襆=boc [pu2]\n\t1. Xiem may giam bot buc di. \n\t2. Boc bi 襆被 gap chan lai.
襇=can, gian [jian3]\n\t1. Buc quan, nep quan. Cung doc la chu gian.
襌=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Ao don.
襍=tap [za2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tap 雜.
襏=bat [bo2]\n\t1. Bat thich 襏襫 ao vai day, thu vai may ao cho nguoi lao dong mac. \n\t2. Ao di mua.
襖=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Ao ngan. \n\t2. Ao bong.
袄=ao [ao3]\n\t1. Ao ngan. \n\t2. Ao bong.
襚=tuy [sui4]\n\t1. Cai ao tang cho nguoi chet.
襜=xiem [chan1]\n\t1. Cai ao choang truoc nguc. \n\t2. Cai man xe. \n\t3. Chung chac, ngay ngan. \n\t4. Nach ao.
襞=bich [bi4]\n\t1. Gap ao. Bich tich 襞襀 chang vai lua cho thang ra roi gap lai tung nep.
襟=kham [jin1]\n\t1. Vat ao, co ao. \n\t2. Anh em re goi la lien kham 連襟. \n\t3. Om ap, om mot moi tinh hay chi gi o trong long goi la kham. \n\t4. Phia nam nha o.
襠=dang [dang1]\n\t1. Tron quan, nga ba kho.
裆=dang [dang1]\n\t1. Tron quan, nga ba kho.
襢=dan [tan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dan 袒.
襤=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Ao khong vien. \n\t2. Lam lu 襤褸 lam lu, quan ao rach ruoi ban thiu.
褴=lam [lan2]\n\t1. Ao khong vien. \n\t2. Lam lu 襤褸 lam lu, quan ao rach ruoi ban thiu.
襦=nhu [ru2]\n\t1. Ao canh, ao lot minh goi la han nhu 汗襦. \n\t2. La luot dac (nho ma khit). \n\t3. Cai yem dai.
襪=miet, vat [wa4]\n\t1. Cai bi tat. Cung doc la chu vat.
袜=miet, vat [wa4]\n\t1. Cai bi tat. Cung doc la chu vat.
襫=thich [shi4]\n\t1. Bat thich 襏襫 ao vai day, thu vai may ao cho nguoi lao dong mac.
襬=bi, bai [bai3]\n\t1. Xiem, day ao. Cung doc la chu bai.
襭=hiet [xie2]\n\t1. Dum, lay vat ao dum vat gi goi la hiet.
襮=boc [bo2]\n\t1. Co ao. \n\t2. Boc bach ra, neu to.
襯=san [chen4]\n\t1. Ao trong. \n\t2. Y dong o trong ma lam cho lo ra ngoai goi la san. nhu san thac 襯托 muon cach bay to y ra. \n\t3. Cho giup. Nhu bang san 幫襯 giup do. Bo thi cho su, cho dao cung goi la san, nhu trai san 齋襯 cung trai cho su.
衬=san [chen4]\n\t1. Ao trong. \n\t2. Y dong o trong ma lam cho lo ra ngoai goi la san. nhu san thac 襯托 muon cach bay to y ra. \n\t3. Cho giup. Nhu bang san 幫襯 giup do. Bo thi cho su, cho dao cung goi la san, nhu trai san 齋襯 cung trai cho su.
襲=tap [xi2]\n\t1. Ao lot, mot bo quan ao goi la nhat tap 一襲. \n\t2. Noi theo, nhu duyen tap 沿襲 noi cai nep cu ma theo. Doi noi chuc tuoc goi la the tap 世襲. \n\t3. Danh len, danh up, lam van di an cap cua nguoi goi la sao tap 抄襲. \n\t4. Ao liem nguoi chet. \n\t5. Mac ao. \n\t6. Chiu nhan, \n\t7. Hop lai.
袭=tap [xi2]\n\t1. Ao lot, mot bo quan ao goi la nhat tap 一襲. \n\t2. Noi theo, nhu duyen tap 沿襲 noi cai nep cu ma theo. Doi noi chuc tuoc goi la the tap 世襲. \n\t3. Danh len, danh up, lam van di an cap cua nguoi goi la sao tap 抄襲. \n\t4. Ao liem nguoi chet. \n\t5. Mac ao. \n\t6. Chiu nhan, \n\t7. Hop lai.
襶=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Nai dai 褦襶 duong mua nang nuc mac dien sang xin vao yet kien la khong hieu su. Vi the nen nguoi khong hieu su ma cu noi lai nhai mai khien cho nguoi ta kho chiu goi la nai dai.
襻=phan [pan4]\n\t1. Cai khuyet ao, dai ao.
襼=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Tay ao. Cung nhu chu me, due 袂.
襾=a [ya4]\n\t1. Che trum, cai day. 
西=tay, te [xi1]\n\t1. Phuong tay. \n\t2. Thai tay 泰西 chi ve chau Au, chau My. Nhu tay su 西史 su tay, tay lich 西歷 lich tay. Vi cac nuoc ay o ve phia tay nuoc Tau nen goi la nuoc Tay. \n\t3. Phat giao tu An Do truyen vao nuoc Tau, cho nen goi phuong Tay la dat Phat. \n\t4. Ton Tinh do 淨土 trong Phat giao noi nguoi niem Phat luc chet se duoc duc Di-da tiep dan ve nuoc Cuc Lac o phia tay xu ta o, tay phuong cuc lac the gioi 西方極樂世界. Vi the nen tuc moi goi nguoi chet la quy tay 歸西. Cung doc la te.
要=yeu, yeu [yao1|yao4]\n\t1. Thiet yeu, dung su ly goi la yeu. Nhu yeu nghia 要義 nghia thiet yeu, de yeu 提要 nhac cai cho thiet yeu len. \n\t2. Rut lai, dung lam tro tu. \n\t3. Muon, cau. \n\t4. Mot am la yeu. Yeu cau. \n\t5. Doi. Nhu yeu vat 要物 doi lay vat gi. \n\t6. Uoc mong. Nhu cuu yeu bat vong binh sinh chi ngon 久要不忘平生之言 (Luan ngu 論語) uoc ao rang lau ma van khong quen loi noi luc binh sinh. \n\t7. Xet. \n\t8. Don bat.
覃=dam, diem [qin2|tan2]\n\t1. Kip, lan toi, on lay. Phep ngay xua nha vua co viec gi mung thi phong tang cho to tien cac quan goi la dam an 覃恩. \n\t2. Sau rong, nhu dam phu 覃府 phu sau rong, noi ton quy dinh phu nha nguoi khac la sau va rong. \n\t3. Mot am la diem. Sac.
覆=phuc, phu [fu4]\n\t1. Lat lai, ke nao hay gio giao goi la ke phan phuc vo thuong 反覆無常. \n\t2. Nghieng do. Nhu tien xa chi phuc, hau xa chi giam 前車之覆後車之鑒 cai vet xe truoc do, la cai guong cho xe sau coi. \n\t3. Thua. Nhu toan quan phuc mot 全軍覆沒 ca canh quan thua chet het. \n\t4. Xet ky.
