Nhu phuc thi 覆試 xet thi lai cho tuong, phuc tra 覆查 tra xet lai cho ki. \n\t5. Lai. Nhu phuc tin 覆信 viet thu tra loi lai. Cung nhu chu phuc 復. \n\t6. Mot am la phu. Che trum, ap. Nhu thien phu dia tai 天覆地載 troi che dat cho, dieu phu duc chi 鳥覆翼之 chim xoa canh ap. \n\t7. Phuc binh.
覈=hach [he2]\n\t1. Nghiem xet, xet su gi duoc thuc dich goi la hach thuc 覈實. \n\t2. Nghiet nga.
覉=ki, ky [ji1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ki 羇.
覊=ki, ky [ji1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu ky 羈.
見=kien, hien [jian4|xian4]\n\t1. Thay, mat trong thay. \n\t2. Y biet. Nhu kien dia 見地 cho biet toi, kien giai 見解 cho hieu biet, v.v. \n\t3. Yet kien. Nhu tham kien 參見 vao hau. \n\t4. Bi. Nhu kien nghi 見疑 bi ngo, kien hai 見害 bi hai, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la hien. To ro, hien ra. Nhu thien ha huu dao tac hien 天下有道則見 thien ha co dao thi ra lam quan ma lam ve vang o doi. \n\t6. Tien cu. \n\t7. Cai trang suc ngoai ao quan.
见=kien, hien [jian4|xian4]\n\t1. Thay, mat trong thay. \n\t2. Y biet. Nhu kien dia 見地 cho biet toi, kien giai 見解 cho hieu biet, v.v. \n\t3. Yet kien. Nhu tham kien 參見 vao hau. \n\t4. Bi. Nhu kien nghi 見疑 bi ngo, kien hai 見害 bi hai, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la hien. To ro, hien ra. Nhu thien ha huu dao tac hien 天下有道則見 thien ha co dao thi ra lam quan ma lam ve vang o doi. \n\t6. Tien cu. \n\t7. Cai trang suc ngoai ao quan.
規=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Cai khuon tron. \n\t2. Khuon phep. Nhu quy tac 規則 khuon phep. \n\t3. Khuon xu, lay phep khuon xu cho nguoi khoi sai lac goi la quy. Nhu quy gian 規諫 khuyen can. \n\t4. Muu toan. Nhu quy hoach 規畫 ve muu vach ke. \n\t5. Cai le da thanh roi. Nhu lau quy 陋規 cai le hu lau. \n\t6. Chia vach bo coi.
规=quy [gui1]\n\t1. Cai khuon tron. \n\t2. Khuon phep. Nhu quy tac 規則 khuon phep. \n\t3. Khuon xu, lay phep khuon xu cho nguoi khoi sai lac goi la quy. Nhu quy gian 規諫 khuyen can. \n\t4. Muu toan. Nhu quy hoach 規畫 ve muu vach ke. \n\t5. Cai le da thanh roi. Nhu lau quy 陋規 cai le hu lau. \n\t6. Chia vach bo coi.
覓=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Tim. Tuc viet la 覔. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Lang ta tan hong vo mich xu 狼籍殘紅無覓處 canh hong tan rung ngon ngang, biet tim dau ?
觅=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Tim. Tuc viet la 覔. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Lang ta tan hong vo mich xu 狼籍殘紅無覓處 canh hong tan rung ngon ngang, biet tim dau ?
視=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Nhin ki, coi ki, trong ki. Nhu thi hoc 視學 coi hoc, thi su 視事 trong coi cong viec, v.v. \n\t2. Coi nhau, dai nhau. Nhu quan chi thi than nhu thu tuc tac than thi quan nhu phuc tam 君之視臣如手足，則臣視君如腹心 (Manh Tu 孟子) vua dai bay toi nhu chan tay thi bay toi het long doi voi vua. \n\t3. So sanh. Nhu thi thu vi giai 視此為佳 cai nay coi tot hon cai ay. \n\t4. Bat chuoc. \n\t5. Song. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu chi 指.
视=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Nhin ki, coi ki, trong ki. Nhu thi hoc 視學 coi hoc, thi su 視事 trong coi cong viec, v.v. \n\t2. Coi nhau, dai nhau. Nhu quan chi thi than nhu thu tuc tac than thi quan nhu phuc tam 君之視臣如手足，則臣視君如腹心 (Manh Tu 孟子) vua dai bay toi nhu chan tay thi bay toi het long doi voi vua. \n\t3. So sanh. Nhu thi thu vi giai 視此為佳 cai nay coi tot hon cai ay. \n\t4. Bat chuoc. \n\t5. Song. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu chi 指.
覘=siem, chiem [chan1]\n\t1. Do xet, dom. Ta quen doc la chiem.
觇=siem, chiem [chan1]\n\t1. Do xet, dom. Ta quen doc la chiem.
覜=thieu [tiao4]\n\t1. Le chu hau di sinh hop mat voi nhau. \n\t2. Ngam xa, cung nghia voi chu thieu 眺.
覡=hich [xi2]\n\t1. Thay cung, ong dong.
觋=hich [xi2]\n\t1. Thay cung, ong dong.
覥=dien [mian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu dien 靦.
覦=du [yu2]\n\t1. Muon duoc. Nhu ki du 覬覦 dom do.
觎=du [yu2]\n\t1. Muon duoc. Nhu ki du 覬覦 dom do.
覧=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu lam 覽.
覩=do [du3]\n\t1. Thay, mat trong thay.
親=than, than [qin1|qing4]\n\t1. Toi luon, quen. Nhu than ai 親愛 than yeu. Vi the nen duoc tiep kien nguoi cung goi la than. Nhu nhat than phuong trach 一親芳澤 duoc gan hoi thom, noi duoc tiep kien mot lan lay lam thich thu lam. \n\t2. Than gan, ho gan goi la ho than, ho xa goi la ho so. \n\t3. Ban bac viec gi ma thiet dang den ban chi goi la than thiet huu vi 親切有味. \n\t4. Nguoi than. Nhu cha me goi la song than 雙親, cha me anh em vo chong goi la luc than 六親. \n\t5. Tu minh. Nhu su tat than cung 事必親躬 su ay tat tu minh phai lam. \n\t6. Dang, giup. \n\t7. Yeu. \n\t8. Gan, than gan. \n\t9. Mot am la than. Cho dau gia, ta quen goi la than gia 親家.
亲=than, than [qin1|qing4]\n\t1. Toi luon, quen. Nhu than ai 親愛 than yeu. Vi the nen duoc tiep kien nguoi cung goi la than. Nhu nhat than phuong trach 一親芳澤 duoc gan hoi thom, noi duoc tiep kien mot lan lay lam thich thu lam. \n\t2. Than gan, ho gan goi la ho than, ho xa goi la ho so. \n\t3. Ban bac viec gi ma thiet dang den ban chi goi la than thiet huu vi 親切有味. \n\t4. Nguoi than. Nhu cha me goi la song than 雙親, cha me anh em vo chong goi la luc than 六親. \n\t5. Tu minh. Nhu su tat than cung 事必親躬 su ay tat tu minh phai lam. \n\t6. Dang, giup. \n\t7. Yeu. \n\t8. Gan, than gan. \n\t9. Mot am la than. Cho dau gia, ta quen goi la than gia 親家.
覬=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Mong moi. Pham mong moi nhung su khong phai phan minh dang co goi la ki du 覬覦.
觊=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Mong moi. Pham mong moi nhung su khong phai phan minh dang co goi la ki du 覬覦.
覯=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Gap go, khong co y hen ho ma gap nhau goi la cau. Cung nghia voi chu cau 遘.
觏=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Gap go, khong co y hen ho ma gap nhau goi la cau. Cung nghia voi chu cau 遘.
覰=thu [qu4]\n\t1. Rinh mo, trong trom. Tuc goi su coi thuong nguoi ta la tieu thu 小覰.
覲=can [jin4]\n\t1. Hau, ke duoi den hau nguoi tren.
觐=can [jin4]\n\t1. Hau, ke duoi den hau nguoi tren.
覶=la [luo2]\n\t1. Nguyen chu la la 覼.
覷=thu [qu1|qu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 覰.
觑=thu [qu1|qu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 覰.
覸=gian [jian4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu gian 瞷. 
覺=giac, giao [jiao4|jue2]\n\t1. Hieu biet, hieu nhung dieu khong biet den goi la giac. Dao Phat cot nhat phai giac ngo chan tinh to ro het moi le, cho nen goi Phat la Giac vuong 覺王. Nguoi hoc Phat duoc chung toi qua Phat goi la chanh giac 正覺. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Giac lai van su tong thanh hu 覺來萬事總成虛 tinh ra muon su thanh khong ca. \n\t2. Pham co cai gi cam xuc den ma phan biet ra ngay goi la cam giac 感覺 hay tri giac 知覺. \n\t3. Cao mach, phat giac ra. \n\t4. Bao. \n\t5. Nguoi hien tri. \n\t6. Cao lon. \n\t7. Thang. \n\t8. Mot am la giao. Thuc, dang ngu thuc day goi la giao.
觉=giac, giao [jiao4|jue2]\n\t1. Hieu biet, hieu nhung dieu khong biet den goi la giac. Dao Phat cot nhat phai giac ngo chan tinh to ro het moi le, cho nen goi Phat la Giac vuong 覺王. Nguoi hoc Phat duoc chung toi qua Phat goi la chanh giac 正覺. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Giac lai van su tong thanh hu 覺來萬事總成虛 tinh ra muon su thanh khong ca. \n\t2. Pham co cai gi cam xuc den ma phan biet ra ngay goi la cam giac 感覺 hay tri giac 知覺. \n\t3. Cao mach, phat giac ra. \n\t4. Bao. \n\t5. Nguoi hien tri. \n\t6. Cao lon. \n\t7. Thang. \n\t8. Mot am la giao. Thuc, dang ngu thuc day goi la giao.
覻=thu [qu4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 覰.
覼=la [luo2]\n\t1. Uy khuc. Su gi uy khuc khong the ke tuong tan duoc goi la la lu bat tan 覼褸不盡.
覽=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Xem. Nhu bac lam 博覽 xem rong, len cao coi khap bon phia goi la nhat lam vo du 一覽無餘 xem ro het thay. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Lam huy nghi hoc minh duong phuong 覽輝擬學鳴陽鳳 nhin anh sang muon hoc chim phuong gay vung dong. \n\t2. Chiu nhan.
览=lam [lan3]\n\t1. Xem. Nhu bac lam 博覽 xem rong, len cao coi khap bon phia goi la nhat lam vo du 一覽無餘 xem ro het thay. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Lam huy nghi hoc minh duong phuong 覽輝擬學鳴陽鳳 nhin anh sang muon hoc chim phuong gay vung dong. \n\t2. Chiu nhan.
覿=dich [di2]\n\t1. Di tham, dem do le vao choi goi la dich. Dich dien 覿面 gap mat.
觌=dich [di2]\n\t1. Di tham, dem do le vao choi goi la dich. Dich dien 覿面 gap mat.
觀=quan, quan [guan1|guan4]\n\t1. Xem, xem xet, xem o cho rong lon goi la quan. Nhu quan hai 觀海 xem be, xem xet thien van goi la quan tuong 觀象, xem xet dan tuc goi la quan phong 觀風, ngan ngu khong quyet goi la quan vong 觀望. \n\t2. Cai hinh tuong da xem, nhu trang quan 壯觀 xem ra long lay lam, mi quan 美觀 xem ra xinh dep lam. \n\t3. To ra cho nguoi ta biet cung goi la quan. Nhu dung quan 容觀 dang dieu cua minh da to ra. \n\t4. Y thuc. Gap su thuong vui khong dong den tam goi la dat quan 達觀, nay ta noi lac quan 樂觀 coi la vui, bi quan 悲觀 coi la thuong, chu quan 主觀 coi la cot, khach quan 客觀 coi la phu, deu theo mot y ay ca. \n\t5. So sanh. \n\t6. Soi lam guong. \n\t7. Choi. \n\t8. Mot am la quan. Xet thau, nghi ki thau toi dao chinh goi la quan. Nhu nhat tam tam quan 一新三觀 mot tam ma ma xet thau ca ba phep, chi quan 止觀 yen dinh roi xet thau chan tam, nhu Dich Kinh 易經 noi quan nga sinh vo cuu 觀我生無咎 xet thau cai nghia vu cua doi ta moi khong mac vao toi loi. Dao Phat co phep tu dung tai ma xem xet coi long, tru tiet cai mam ac tro nen bac Vo thuong, nen goi la phep quan 觀. Nhu Quan am bo tat 觀音菩薩, vi ngai tu bang phep nay, sau can dung lan voi nhau duoc, mat co the nghe duoc, nen goi la Quan the am 觀世音. \n\t9. Lam nha tren cai dai goi la quan. Nhu tren nui Thai son co cai nha de xem mat troi goi la nhat quan 日觀, trong nha vua, trong vuon hoa lam cai nha cao de choi cung goi la quan. \n\t10. Cac nha tho cua dao si cung goi la quan.
观=quan, quan [guan1|guan4]\n\t1. Xem, xem xet, xem o cho rong lon goi la quan. Nhu quan hai 觀海 xem be, xem xet thien van goi la quan tuong 觀象, xem xet dan tuc goi la quan phong 觀風, ngan ngu khong quyet goi la quan vong 觀望. \n\t2. Cai hinh tuong da xem, nhu trang quan 壯觀 xem ra long lay lam, mi quan 美觀 xem ra xinh dep lam. \n\t3. To ra cho nguoi ta biet cung goi la quan. Nhu dung quan 容觀 dang dieu cua minh da to ra. \n\t4. Y thuc. Gap su thuong vui khong dong den tam goi la dat quan 達觀, nay ta noi lac quan 樂觀 coi la vui, bi quan 悲觀 coi la thuong, chu quan 主觀 coi la cot, khach quan 客觀 coi la phu, deu theo mot y ay ca. \n\t5. So sanh. \n\t6. Soi lam guong. \n\t7. Choi. \n\t8. Mot am la quan. Xet thau, nghi ki thau toi dao chinh goi la quan. Nhu nhat tam tam quan 一新三觀 mot tam ma ma xet thau ca ba phep, chi quan 止觀 yen dinh roi xet thau chan tam, nhu Dich Kinh 易經 noi quan nga sinh vo cuu 觀我生無咎 xet thau cai nghia vu cua doi ta moi khong mac vao toi loi. Dao Phat co phep tu dung tai ma xem xet coi long, tru tiet cai mam ac tro nen bac Vo thuong, nen goi la phep quan 觀. Nhu Quan am bo tat 觀音菩薩, vi ngai tu bang phep nay, sau can dung lan voi nhau duoc, mat co the nghe duoc, nen goi la Quan the am 觀世音. \n\t9. Lam nha tren cai dai goi la quan. Nhu tren nui Thai son co cai nha de xem mat troi goi la nhat quan 日觀, trong nha vua, trong vuon hoa lam cai nha cao de choi cung goi la quan. \n\t10. Cac nha tho cua dao si cung goi la quan.
角=giac, gioc [jiao3|jue2]\n\t1. Cai sung, cai sung cua cac giong thu. \n\t2. Cai xuong tran. Nguoi nao co tuong la goi la long chuan nhat giac 龍準日角 nghia la xuong tran go len nhu hinh chu nhat vay. \n\t3. Trai dao, con trai con gai be de hai trai dao goi la giac. Vi the goi luc tre con la tong giac 總角. \n\t4. Tieng giac, mot tieng trong nam tieng. cung, thuong, giac, chuy, vu 宮、商、角、徵、羽. \n\t5. Cai tu va. \n\t6. Ganh. Pham so sanh nhau de phan duoc thua deu goi la giac. Nhu giac luc 角力 vat nhau, dau suc, giac khau 角口 cai nhau. \n\t7. Giac sac 角色 cung nhu ta noi cuoc sac 腳色. Tuc goi con hat (nha nghe) co tieng la giac sac. \n\t8. Chia dong moi cho mot canh quan de khien che quan giac goi la ki giac 椅角. \n\t9. Goc. Nhu tam giac hinh 三角形 hinh ba goc. \n\t10. Mot hao goi la nhat giac 一角. \n\t11. Mot kien cong van cung goi la nhat giac 一角. \n\t12. Sao giac, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t13. Cai do dung ruou. Co khi doc la chu gioc.
觔=can [jin1]\n\t1. Nguyen cung nghia voi chu can 筋. Tuc muon dung nhu chu can 斤.
觖=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Khong duoc thoa thich. Pham su gi khong duoc nhu nguyen ma sinh long oan vong goi la quyet vong 觖望.
觚=co [gu1]\n\t1. Cai binh dung ruou co canh. \n\t2. Goc. Nhu luc co 六觚 sau goc. \n\t3. Vuong. Nhu pha co vi vien 破觚為圓 doi vuong lam tron, y noi khong co chap vay. \n\t4. Cai the tre, ngay xua dung de viet chu. Vi the nen nguoi nao khinh suat viet lach (viet bay khong nghi) goi la suat nhi thao co 率爾操觚. \n\t5. Chuoi guom.
觜=tuy, tuy [zi1|zui3]\n\t1. Sao tuy, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t2. Long mo cu vo. \n\t3. Mot am la tuy. Mo chim.
觝=de [di3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu de 牴 huc, cham. \n\t2. Giac de 角觝 mot tro choi doi nha Han.
解=giai, gioi, giai [jie3|jie4|xie4]\n\t1. Bua ra, mo ra. Dung cua xe go ra goi la giai moc 解木. Mo xe nguoi de chua benh goi la giai phau 解剖. \n\t2. Coi ra. Nhu co ket bat giai 固結不解 quan chat khong coi ra duoc. Tieu tan moi thu oan cung goi la giai. Nhu khuyen giai 勸解 khuyen giai, hoa giai 和解 giai hoa, v.v. \n\t3. Tan. Long nguoi lia tan goi la giai the 解體. Co khi goi la tho bang ngoa giai 土崩瓦解 dat lo ngoi tan, noi vi du su nhan tam ly tan nhu nha do vay. \n\t4. Phan tach cho ro le ro su. Nhu tuong giai 詳解 giai nghia tuong tan, dieu giai 條解 phan tach ra tung dieu v.v. \n\t5. Hieu biet. Nhan ro duoc y cung goi la giai. Vi the y thuc goi la kien giai 見解. \n\t6. Het mot khuc nhac goi la nhat giai 一解. \n\t7. Nha lam thuoc cho thuoc ra mo hoi khoi benh goi la han giai 汗解. Tuc goi di ia la dai giai 大解, di dai la tieu giai 小解. \n\t8. Coi ra, lot ra. Nhu giai y 解衣 coi ao, loc giac giai 鹿角解 huou trut sung. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thoi thuc giai y nan boi duc 推食解衣難背徳 Cai duc nhuong com se ao, kho ma lam phan duoc. \n\t9. Thong suot. \n\t10. Thoi, ngung. \n\t11. Cat dat. \n\t12. Mot am la gioi. Gioi trai 解廌 mot con thu giong nhu con huou ma co mot sung, co khi viet la 獬豸. \n\t13. Lai mot am la giai. Dieu di. Nhu giai pham 解犯 giai tu di, giai huong 解餉 dem luong di, v.v. \n\t14. Thi huong trung cach (do) goi la phat giai 發解, do dau khoa huong goi la giai nguyen 解元. Ta quen doc la chu giai ca.
觥=quang [gong1]\n\t1. Cai chen uong ruou bang sung trau. \n\t2. Quang quang 觥觥 cung coi.
觫=toc [su4]\n\t1. Sung moi nhu. \n\t2. Hoc toc 觳觫 so run lap cap.
觱=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Tat lat 觱篥 cai ken.
觳=hoc, hac, giac [hu2]\n\t1. Hoc toc 觳觫 so run lap cap. \n\t2. Cai hoc, mot thu do de dong. \n\t3. Mot am la hac. Het the, con the. \n\t4. Got chan. \n\t5. Mot am nua la giac. Cung nghia voi chu giai 解 hay chu tich 瘠.
觴=thuong, trang [shang1]\n\t1. Cai chen uong ruou. \n\t2. Cai chen da rot ruou. Nhu phung thuong thuong tho 奉觴上壽 dang chen ruou chuc tho. \n\t3. Lam thuong 濫觴, xem chu 濫 o bo thuy 水. lam trang 濫觴 cai moi nho gay nen su lon, cung nhu nuoc suoi moi chay ra chi nong ngap cai chen ma sau thanh song thanh be. Ta quen doc la chu trang.
觞=thuong, trang [shang1]\n\t1. Cai chen uong ruou. \n\t2. Cai chen da rot ruou. Nhu phung thuong thuong tho 奉觴上壽 dang chen ruou chuc tho. \n\t3. Lam thuong 濫觴, xem chu 濫 o bo thuy 水. lam trang 濫觴 cai moi nho gay nen su lon, cung nhu nuoc suoi moi chay ra chi nong ngap cai chen ma sau thanh song thanh be. Ta quen doc la chu trang.
觵=quang [gong1]\n\t1. Cung dung nhu chu quang 觥.
觶=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai vo dung ruou lam bang go.
觯=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai vo dung ruou lam bang go.
觸=xuc [chu4]\n\t1. Huc, dam. \n\t2. Tiep xuc, cham biet. Pham su vat gi cham sat nhau deu goi la xuc. Nhu tiep xuc u nhi muc 接觸於耳目 tai nghe thay, mat trong thay. \n\t3. Lai su vat gi nhieu lam deu goi la xuc. Nhu xuc xu giai thi 觸處皆是 dau dau cung the. \n\t4. Cam xuc. Nhan co do ma dong den tam minh deu goi la xuc. Nhu xuc phat 觸發 cam xuc phat ra. \n\t5. Can pham. Nhu xuc huy 觸諱 xuc pham cho kieng, noi voi lam trai nhau deu goi la de xuc 抵觸.
触=xuc [chu4]\n\t1. Huc, dam. \n\t2. Tiep xuc, cham biet. Pham su vat gi cham sat nhau deu goi la xuc. Nhu tiep xuc u nhi muc 接觸於耳目 tai nghe thay, mat trong thay. \n\t3. Lai su vat gi nhieu lam deu goi la xuc. Nhu xuc xu giai thi 觸處皆是 dau dau cung the. \n\t4. Cam xuc. Nhan co do ma dong den tam minh deu goi la xuc. Nhu xuc phat 觸發 cam xuc phat ra. \n\t5. Can pham. Nhu xuc huy 觸諱 xuc pham cho kieng, noi voi lam trai nhau deu goi la de xuc 抵觸.
觿=hue [xi1]\n\t1. Cai re lam bang nga voi de re toc.
言=ngon, ngan [yan2]\n\t1. Noi, tu minh noi ra goi la ngon 言. Dap hay thuat ra goi la ngu 語. \n\t2. Mot cau van cung goi la nhat ngon 一言. Nhu nhat ngon di te chi viet tu vo ta 一言以蔽之曰思無邪 mot cau tom tat het nghia la khong nghi xang. \n\t3. Mot chu cung goi la ngon. Nhu ngu ngon thi 五言詩 tho nam chu, that ngon thi 七言詩 tho bay chu, v.v. \n\t4. Menh lenh. \n\t5. Ban bac. \n\t6. Toi, dung lam tieng phat thanh. Nhu ngon cao su thi 言告師氏 toi bao voi thay. \n\t7. Mot am la ngan. Ngan ngan 言言 cao ngat, do so.
訂=dinh [ding4]\n\t1. Hai ben ban bac voi nhau cho ki roi moi thoa thuan goi la dinh. Nhu dinh giao 訂交 dinh ket lam ban, dinh uoc 訂約. Dinh chinh lai sach vo cho dung goi la hieu dinh 校訂.
订=dinh [ding4]\n\t1. Hai ben ban bac voi nhau cho ki roi moi thoa thuan goi la dinh. Nhu dinh giao 訂交 dinh ket lam ban, dinh uoc 訂約. Dinh chinh lai sach vo cho dung goi la hieu dinh 校訂.
訃=pho [fu4]\n\t1. Bao tin co tang. Ta goi la cao pho 告訃.
讣=pho [fu4]\n\t1. Bao tin co tang. Ta goi la cao pho 告訃.
訇=hoanh [hong1]\n\t1. Tieng dong lon, tieng to.
計=ke, ke [ji4]\n\t1. Tinh. Pham tinh gop cac mon lai de xem so nhieu hay it deu goi la ke. Nhu thong ke 統計 tinh gop ca, hoi ke 會計 cung tinh ca, v.v. Vi the nen so sach cung goi la ke. Nha Han ken quan lai cho vao cung lam viec voi cac quan tinh toan so sach de tap viec. Nen ve doi khoa cu goi thi hoi la ke giai 計偕 la boi do. \n\t2. Xet cac quan lai. Nhu dai ke 大計 xet suot ca cac quan lai trong thien ha. \n\t3. Muu ke, muu tinh. Nhu dac ke 得計 dac sach (muu hay). \n\t4. Ta thuong doc la ke ca.
计=ke, ke [ji4]\n\t1. Tinh. Pham tinh gop cac mon lai de xem so nhieu hay it deu goi la ke. Nhu thong ke 統計 tinh gop ca, hoi ke 會計 cung tinh ca, v.v. Vi the nen so sach cung goi la ke. Nha Han ken quan lai cho vao cung lam viec voi cac quan tinh toan so sach de tap viec. Nen ve doi khoa cu goi thi hoi la ke giai 計偕 la boi do. \n\t2. Xet cac quan lai. Nhu dai ke 大計 xet suot ca cac quan lai trong thien ha. \n\t3. Muu ke, muu tinh. Nhu dac ke 得計 dac sach (muu hay). \n\t4. Ta thuong doc la ke ca.
訊=tan [xun4]\n\t1. Hoi. Ke tren hoi ke duoi la tan. \n\t2. Thu hoi tham, nhu am tan 音訊 tam hoi. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Co tu vo danh nan van tan 古寺無名難問訊 chua co khong ten kho hoi tham. \n\t3. Tieu tuc. Nhu hoa tan 花訊 tin hoa no. \n\t4. Tra tan. Nhu tan cuc 訊鞫 tra xet lay khau cung. \n\t5. Can. \n\t6. Nhuong. \n\t7. Mach bao. \n\t8. Muu. \n\t9. Nhanh chong.
讯=tan [xun4]\n\t1. Hoi. Ke tren hoi ke duoi la tan. \n\t2. Thu hoi tham, nhu am tan 音訊 tam hoi. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Co tu vo danh nan van tan 古寺無名難問訊 chua co khong ten kho hoi tham. \n\t3. Tieu tuc. Nhu hoa tan 花訊 tin hoa no. \n\t4. Tra tan. Nhu tan cuc 訊鞫 tra xet lay khau cung. \n\t5. Can. \n\t6. Nhuong. \n\t7. Mach bao. \n\t8. Muu. \n\t9. Nhanh chong.
訋=hong [diao4]\n\t1. Tan lo. Cung tranh danh lan nhau goi la noi hong 內訌.
討=thao [tao3]\n\t1. Danh, danh giet ke co toi goi la thao. \n\t2. Tim xet, do xet. \n\t3. Doi, tuc goi su doi lay cua cai gi cua nguoi la thao. \n\t4. Bo di.
讨=thao [tao3]\n\t1. Danh, danh giet ke co toi goi la thao. \n\t2. Tim xet, do xet. \n\t3. Doi, tuc goi su doi lay cua cai gi cua nguoi la thao. \n\t4. Bo di.
訏=hu, hu [xu1]\n\t1. Khoe khoang. \n\t2. Lon, to. \n\t3. Mot am la hu. Hu hu 訏訏 mong menh.
訐=kiet, yet [jie2]\n\t1. Boi moc, boi moc viec rieng cua nguoi ra. Cung doc la chu yet.
讦=kiet, yet [jie2]\n\t1. Boi moc, boi moc viec rieng cua nguoi ra. Cung doc la chu yet.
訑=di, tha, nan [yi2]\n\t1. Di di 訑訑 nhon nhon tu dac. \n\t2. Mot am la tha. Lua doi. \n\t3. Lai mot am la nan. Phong tung.
訒=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Noi y tu, loi noi than trong nhu kho khan moi noi nen loi.
訓=huan [xun4]\n\t1. Day do. \n\t2. Noi giai nghia cho ro ra. Vi the nen chua nghia sach cung goi la huan. \n\t3. Loi noi co the lam phep duoc goi la huan. Nhu co huan 古訓 loi nguoi xua day. \n\t4. Thuan theo.
训=huan [xun4]\n\t1. Day do. \n\t2. Noi giai nghia cho ro ra. Vi the nen chua nghia sach cung goi la huan. \n\t3. Loi noi co the lam phep duoc goi la huan. Nhu co huan 古訓 loi nguoi xua day. \n\t4. Thuan theo.
訕=san, san [shan4]\n\t1. Che, quo trach, ke duoi che nguoi tren goi la san. Nhu san tieu 訕笑 che cuoi. Co khi doc la san.
讪=san, san [shan4]\n\t1. Che, quo trach, ke duoi che nguoi tren goi la san. Nhu san tieu 訕笑 che cuoi. Co khi doc la san.
訖=cat, ngat [qi4]\n\t1. Thoi han, lam xong, sau cung. So sach tinh toan xong goi la thanh cat 清訖. Ta quen doc la chu ngat.
讫=cat, ngat [qi4]\n\t1. Thoi han, lam xong, sau cung. So sach tinh toan xong goi la thanh cat 清訖. Ta quen doc la chu ngat.
託=thac [tuo1]\n\t1. Nho, gui hinh tich minh o ben ngoai goi la thac tuc 託足. \n\t2. Thinh cau, pho thac, nghia la nho nguoi khac trong nom ho, la uy thac cho nguoi khac lam ho. \n\t3. Thac ra, muon co. Nhu gia thac 假託 muon co ma tu choi, thac phung 託諷 lay cai khac ma noi gieu nguoi.
記=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Nho, nho ki cho khoi quen. Nhu ki tung 記誦 hoc thuoc cho nho. \n\t2. Ghi chep. Nhu ki qua 記過 ghi chep loi lam da lam ra. Pham cuon sach nao ghi chep cac su vat deu goi la ki. Nhu le ki 禮記 sach chep cac le phep, du ki 遊記 sach chep cac su da nghe da thay trong khi di choi, v.v . \n\t3. To boi. Nguoi giu ve viec giay ma so sach goi la thu ki 書記. \n\t4. Pham giay ma gi ma nhung nguoi co quan he vao day deu phai viet ten minh vao de lam ghi deu goi la ki. \n\t5. Dau hieu.
记=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Nho, nho ki cho khoi quen. Nhu ki tung 記誦 hoc thuoc cho nho. \n\t2. Ghi chep. Nhu ki qua 記過 ghi chep loi lam da lam ra. Pham cuon sach nao ghi chep cac su vat deu goi la ki. Nhu le ki 禮記 sach chep cac le phep, du ki 遊記 sach chep cac su da nghe da thay trong khi di choi, v.v . \n\t3. To boi. Nguoi giu ve viec giay ma so sach goi la thu ki 書記. \n\t4. Pham giay ma gi ma nhung nguoi co quan he vao day deu phai viet ten minh vao de lam ghi deu goi la ki. \n\t5. Dau hieu.
訛=ngoa [e2]\n\t1. Lam bay. Nhu ngoa ngon 訛言 loi noi bay, ngoa tu 訛字 chu sai, v.v. \n\t2. Tai co gi ma hach doi tien cua cung goi la ngoa. Nhu ngoa tra 訛詐 lua gat. \n\t3. Hoa. \n\t4. Dong. 
讹=ngoa [e2]\n\t1. Lam bay. Nhu ngoa ngon 訛言 loi noi bay, ngoa tu 訛字 chu sai, v.v. \n\t2. Tai co gi ma hach doi tien cua cung goi la ngoa. Nhu ngoa tra 訛詐 lua gat. \n\t3. Hoa. \n\t4. Dong. 
訝=nha [ya4]\n\t1. Ngo la. Nhu tham nha ki su 深訝其事 su ay lay lam ky la qua.
讶=nha [ya4]\n\t1. Ngo la. Nhu tham nha ki su 深訝其事 su ay lay lam ky la qua.
訟=tung [song4]\n\t1. Kien tung, dem nhau len quan ma tranh bien phai trai goi la tung. \n\t2. Cai le, cai nhau de tranh lay cai phai cung goi la tung. \n\t3. Dang tho tuyet oan cho nguoi. \n\t4. Trach phat. \n\t5. Khen ngoi.
讼=tung [song4]\n\t1. Kien tung, dem nhau len quan ma tranh bien phai trai goi la tung. \n\t2. Cai le, cai nhau de tranh lay cai phai cung goi la tung. \n\t3. Dang tho tuyet oan cho nguoi. \n\t4. Trach phat. \n\t5. Khen ngoi.
訢=han, hy [xin1]\n\t1. Vui, cung nghia voi chu han 欣. \n\t2. Nau, hap. \n\t3. Mot am la hy. Hy hop 訢合 hoa khi giao cam.
訣=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Quyet biet, sap di xa lau ma tang bang loi goi la quyet. Loi noi cua ke chet troi lai goi la loi vinh quyet 永訣. \n\t2. Phep bi truyen. Nhu truong sinh quyet 長生訣 cai phep bi truyen lam cho song lau.
诀=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Quyet biet, sap di xa lau ma tang bang loi goi la quyet. Loi noi cua ke chet troi lai goi la loi vinh quyet 永訣. \n\t2. Phep bi truyen. Nhu truong sinh quyet 長生訣 cai phep bi truyen lam cho song lau.
訥=not [ne4]\n\t1. Noi cham chap, noi y tu. Noi nang khong duoc nhanh nhen goi la not sap 訥譅.
讷=not [ne4]\n\t1. Noi cham chap, noi y tu. Noi nang khong duoc nhanh nhen goi la not sap 訥譅.
訩=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Loan. \n\t2. Noi ram ram. Cung nghia voi chu hung 洶 hay chu hung 恟.
訪=phong, phong [fang3]\n\t1. Toi tan noi ma hoi. Nhu thai phong dan tuc 採訪民俗 xet hoi tuc dan. \n\t2. Do xet. Di do nhung ke co toi ma chua co ai phat giac goi la phong na 訪拿 do bat, nha bao moi noi dat mot nguoi thong tin tuc goi la nguoi phong su 訪事. \n\t3. Tim luc. Nhu phong bi 訪碑 tim luc cac bia cu, phong co 訪古 tim toi co tich. \n\t4. Di tham hoi, nhu tuong phong 相訪 cung den tham nhau. Con doc la phong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tha nhat Nam qui tuong hoi phong, Luc Dau giang thuong huu tieu ngu 他日南歸相會訪，六頭江上有樵漁 Mai nay ve Nam, gap go hoi tham nhau, Thi tren song Luc Dau da co nguoi don cui, nguoi danh ca.
访=phong, phong [fang3]\n\t1. Toi tan noi ma hoi. Nhu thai phong dan tuc 採訪民俗 xet hoi tuc dan. \n\t2. Do xet. Di do nhung ke co toi ma chua co ai phat giac goi la phong na 訪拿 do bat, nha bao moi noi dat mot nguoi thong tin tuc goi la nguoi phong su 訪事. \n\t3. Tim luc. Nhu phong bi 訪碑 tim luc cac bia cu, phong co 訪古 tim toi co tich. \n\t4. Di tham hoi, nhu tuong phong 相訪 cung den tham nhau. Con doc la phong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tha nhat Nam qui tuong hoi phong, Luc Dau giang thuong huu tieu ngu 他日南歸相會訪，六頭江上有樵漁 Mai nay ve Nam, gap go hoi tham nhau, Thi tren song Luc Dau da co nguoi don cui, nguoi danh ca.
設=thiet [she4]\n\t1. Sap bay, dat bay. Nhu tran thiet 陳設 bay dat. Nha ve to mui thuoc goi la thiet sac 設色. \n\t2. Dat. Nhu thiet lap 設立 dat nen, dung nen, thiet quan 設官 dat quan, v.v. \n\t3. Vi thu. Nhu thiet su 設使 vi khien. \n\t4. Co ban. \n\t5. To, lon.
设=thiet [she4]\n\t1. Sap bay, dat bay. Nhu tran thiet 陳設 bay dat. Nha ve to mui thuoc goi la thiet sac 設色. \n\t2. Dat. Nhu thiet lap 設立 dat nen, dung nen, thiet quan 設官 dat quan, v.v. \n\t3. Vi thu. Nhu thiet su 設使 vi khien. \n\t4. Co ban. \n\t5. To, lon.
許=hua, hu, ho [xu3]\n\t1. Nghe theo, u cho. Nhu hua kha 許可 u cho la duoc. \n\t2. Hen duoc. Nhu hua than tac tiet 許身稷契 tu hen minh lam duoc nhu cac bac danh than nhu ong Tac ong Tiet. \n\t3. Nuoc Hua. \n\t4. Mot am la hu. Dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu ki hu 幾許 bao nhieu the, nhu hu 如許 nhu the, chung the, v.v. \n\t5. Noi, chon. \n\t6. Mot am nua la ho. Ho ho 許許 ram ram, tieng moi nguoi cung gang suc.
许=hua, hu, ho [xu3]\n\t1. Nghe theo, u cho. Nhu hua kha 許可 u cho la duoc. \n\t2. Hen duoc. Nhu hua than tac tiet 許身稷契 tu hen minh lam duoc nhu cac bac danh than nhu ong Tac ong Tiet. \n\t3. Nuoc Hua. \n\t4. Mot am la hu. Dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu ki hu 幾許 bao nhieu the, nhu hu 如許 nhu the, chung the, v.v. \n\t5. Noi, chon. \n\t6. Mot am nua la ho. Ho ho 許許 ram ram, tieng moi nguoi cung gang suc.
訴=to [su4]\n\t1. Cao mach. Nhu to oan 訴冤 keu oan. \n\t2. Giem che.
诉=to [su4]\n\t1. Cao mach. Nhu to oan 訴冤 keu oan. \n\t2. Giem che.
訶=ha [he1]\n\t1. Quat mang.
诃=ha [he1]\n\t1. Quat mang.
診=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Xem xet. Nhu chan benh 診病 xem benh, chan mach 診脈 xem mach, v.v.
诊=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Xem xet. Nhu chan benh 診病 xem benh, chan mach 診脈 xem mach, v.v.
註=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Giai thich cho ro nghia. \n\t2. Chua vao, chep mot dieu gi vao sach goi la chu sach 註冊.
証=chung [zheng4]\n\t1. Can gian. Tuc muon dung nhu chu chung 證 nghia la chung co.
证=chung [zheng4]\n\t1. Can gian. Tuc muon dung nhu chu chung 證 nghia la chung co.
詁=co, ho [gu3]\n\t1. Lay loi bay gio ma giai thich loi noi ngay xua goi la co. Nhu co huan 詁訓 chu giai nghia van. Ta quen doc la chu ho.
诂=co, ho [gu3]\n\t1. Lay loi bay gio ma giai thich loi noi ngay xua goi la co. Nhu co huan 詁訓 chu giai nghia van. Ta quen doc la chu ho.
詆=de [di3]\n\t1. Mang, noi te. \n\t2. Vu, vu cao.
诋=de [di3]\n\t1. Mang, noi te. \n\t2. Vu, vu cao.
詈=li [li4]\n\t1. Mang. Mang thang vao mat goi la ma 罵. Noi tranh, noi mat, mang xeo goi la li 詈.
詎=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Ha. Nhu cu kha 詎可 ha nen, cu khang 詎肯 ha chiu, deu dung lam loi noi doan truoc chua biet ve sau ra the nao ca. \n\t2. Neu. Quoc ngu 國語. Cu phi thanh nhan, bat huu ngoai hoan, tat huu noi uu 詎非聖人，不有外患，必有内憂 neu chang phai thanh nhan thi khong co lo ngoai at co lo trong.
讵=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Ha. Nhu cu kha 詎可 ha nen, cu khang 詎肯 ha chiu, deu dung lam loi noi doan truoc chua biet ve sau ra the nao ca. \n\t2. Neu. Quoc ngu 國語. Cu phi thanh nhan, bat huu ngoai hoan, tat huu noi uu 詎非聖人，不有外患，必有内憂 neu chang phai thanh nhan thi khong co lo ngoai at co lo trong.
詐=tra [zha4]\n\t1. Gia doi. \n\t2. Tuc goi ke ta co gi lay cua cai cua nguoi la tra (lua).
诈=tra [zha4]\n\t1. Gia doi. \n\t2. Tuc goi ke ta co gi lay cua cai cua nguoi la tra (lua).
詒=di [yi2]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu di thu 詒書 dua tho cho. \n\t2. Di truyen, de lai. Cung nghia voi chu di 貽.
诒=di [yi2]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu di thu 詒書 dua tho cho. \n\t2. Di truyen, de lai. Cung nghia voi chu di 貽.
詔=chieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Ban bao, dan bao. Ngay xua nguoi tren bao ke duoi la chieu, tu nha Tan nha Han tro xuong thi chi vua duoc dung thoi, nhu chieu thu 詔書 to chieu, an chieu 恩詔 xuong chieu ra on cho, v. v.
诏=chieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Ban bao, dan bao. Ngay xua nguoi tren bao ke duoi la chieu, tu nha Tan nha Han tro xuong thi chi vua duoc dung thoi, nhu chieu thu 詔書 to chieu, an chieu 恩詔 xuong chieu ra on cho, v. v.
評=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Phe binh, binh pham, nghia la dem viec gi da lam hay van chuong sach vo da lam ra ma ban dinh phai trai hay do vay. Hua Thieu nha Hau Han hay ban bac cac nhan vat trong lang mac, moi thang lai doi mot pham de khac, goi la nguyet dan binh 月旦評.
评=binh [ping2]\n\t1. Phe binh, binh pham, nghia la dem viec gi da lam hay van chuong sach vo da lam ra ma ban dinh phai trai hay do vay. Hua Thieu nha Hau Han hay ban bac cac nhan vat trong lang mac, moi thang lai doi mot pham de khac, goi la nguyet dan binh 月旦評.
詖=bi [bi4]\n\t1. Veo, lech, khong duoc ngay ngan. Nhu bi tu tri ki so te 詖辭知其所蔽 nghe loi noi bat chinh biet la co cho che lap, gian doi. \n\t2. Bien luan. \n\t3. Ninh. \n\t4. Sang suot.
詗=huynh [xiong4]\n\t1. Do xet vao cho thiet yeu, do la.
詘=truat [chu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu truat 黜.
詛=tro [zu3]\n\t1. Nguyen rua. Tro chu 詛咒 rua, chui rua.
诅=tro [zu3]\n\t1. Nguyen rua. Tro chu 詛咒 rua, chui rua.
詞=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Loi van. \n\t2. Mot loi van de hat. Nhu tu khuc 詞曲. \n\t3. Cac chu dung de giup loi van deu goi la tu. Nhu nhung chu he, ta, chi, tu 兮, 些, 只, 斯, v.v. \n\t4. Bao, noi.
词=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Loi van. \n\t2. Mot loi van de hat. Nhu tu khuc 詞曲. \n\t3. Cac chu dung de giup loi van deu goi la tu. Nhu nhung chu he, ta, chi, tu 兮, 些, 只, 斯, v.v. \n\t4. Bao, noi.
詠=vinh [yong3]\n\t1. Ngam vinh, doc van tho den cho co am dieu phai keo dai giong doc ra goi la vinh. Co khi viet la vinh 咏.
咏=vinh [yong3]\n\t1. Ngam vinh, doc van tho den cho co am dieu phai keo dai giong doc ra goi la vinh. Co khi viet la vinh 咏.
訾=ti, ti [zi1|zi3]\n\t1. Ria roi, chi trich cai loi cua nguoi ra ma che trach goi la ti. \n\t2. Luong, can nhac. \n\t3. Han. \n\t4. Nghi. \n\t5. Benh, cai benh, \n\t6. Xau, khong tot. \n\t7. Mang nhiec. Cung doc la ti.
詡=hu [xu3]\n\t1. Khoe khoang. Nhu tu hu 自詡 tu khoe minh. \n\t2. Hoa, khap het. \n\t3. Nhanh nhen.
诩=hu [xu3]\n\t1. Khoe khoang. Nhu tu hu 自詡 tu khoe minh. \n\t2. Hoa, khap het. \n\t3. Nhanh nhen.
詢=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Hoi han, hoi nhieu nguoi de quyet nen chang goi la tuan. \n\t2. Tin. \n\t3. Deu.
询=tuan [xun2]\n\t1. Hoi han, hoi nhieu nguoi de quyet nen chang goi la tuan. \n\t2. Tin. \n\t3. Deu.
詣=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Den, den thang tan noi goi la nghe. Nhu xu nghe 趨詣 den tham tan noi. \n\t2. Cai coi da toi. Nhu hoc thuat thao nghe 學術造詣 cho da hoc hieu toi, trinh do hoc thuat.
诣=nghe [yi4]\n\t1. Den, den thang tan noi goi la nghe. Nhu xu nghe 趨詣 den tham tan noi. \n\t2. Cai coi da toi. Nhu hoc thuat thao nghe 學術造詣 cho da hoc hieu toi, trinh do hoc thuat.
試=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Thu. Nhu thi dung 試用 thu dung. \n\t2. Thi, so sanh tai nghe de xem hon kem goi la thi. Nhu khao thi 考試 thi khao. \n\t3. Dung, \n\t4. Nem. \n\t5. Do thu.
试=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Thu. Nhu thi dung 試用 thu dung. \n\t2. Thi, so sanh tai nghe de xem hon kem goi la thi. Nhu khao thi 考試 thi khao. \n\t3. Dung, \n\t4. Nem. \n\t5. Do thu.
詧=sat [cha2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu sat 察.
詩=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Tho, van co van goi la tho. Ngay xua hay dat moi cau bon chu, ve sau hay dung loi dat nam chu hay bay chu goi la tho ngu ngon, tho that ngon. \n\t2. Kinh thi. \n\t3. Nang, cam.
诗=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Tho, van co van goi la tho. Ngay xua hay dat moi cau bon chu, ve sau hay dung loi dat nam chu hay bay chu goi la tho ngu ngon, tho that ngon. \n\t2. Kinh thi. \n\t3. Nang, cam.
詫=sa [cha4]\n\t1. Khoe. \n\t2. La lung. Nhu sa di 詫異 lay lam la lung. \n\t3. Lua doi.
诧=sa [cha4]\n\t1. Khoe. \n\t2. La lung. Nhu sa di 詫異 lay lam la lung. \n\t3. Lua doi.
詬=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Mang, \n\t2. Nhuc.
诟=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Mang, \n\t2. Nhuc.
詭=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Doi tra, quy quyet. \n\t2. La lung, nhu thu hinh quy che 殊形詭制 che ra nhung hinh thu la lung. \n\t3. Trai. \n\t4. Trach, trach nhiem.
诡=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Doi tra, quy quyet. \n\t2. La lung, nhu thu hinh quy che 殊形詭制 che ra nhung hinh thu la lung. \n\t3. Trai. \n\t4. Trach, trach nhiem.
詮=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Du, giai thich ky cang, noi du ca su le goi la thuyen. Nhu thuyen giai 詮解 giai ro nghia ly, lai nhu phan tich nhung le kho khan ma tim toi nghia nhat dinh goi la chan thuyen 真詮 chan ly cua moi su, su that.
诠=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Du, giai thich ky cang, noi du ca su le goi la thuyen. Nhu thuyen giai 詮解 giai ro nghia ly, lai nhu phan tich nhung le kho khan ma tim toi nghia nhat dinh goi la chan thuyen 真詮 chan ly cua moi su, su that.
詰=cat [ji2|jie2]\n\t1. Hoi van. Nhu cung cat 窮詰 van cho cung tan, dien cat 面詰 van hoi tan mat, v.v. \n\t2. Cat trieu 詰朝 sang som mai. \n\t3. Tri. \n\t4. Cam. \n\t5. Khuat khuc.
诘=cat [ji2|jie2]\n\t1. Hoi van. Nhu cung cat 窮詰 van cho cung tan, dien cat 面詰 van hoi tan mat, v.v. \n\t2. Cat trieu 詰朝 sang som mai. \n\t3. Tri. \n\t4. Cam. \n\t5. Khuat khuc.
話=thoai [hua4]\n\t1. Loi noi, pham cac loi noi tam thuong deu goi la thoai. Nhu bach thoai 白話 loi noi thong thuong de hieu. Mot loi van viet cho nhung nguoi hoc it xem de hieu. Nhu nhan thoai 閒話 cau chuyen thuong. \n\t2. Bao. \n\t3. Tot, hay.
话=thoai [hua4]\n\t1. Loi noi, pham cac loi noi tam thuong deu goi la thoai. Nhu bach thoai 白話 loi noi thong thuong de hieu. Mot loi van viet cho nhung nguoi hoc it xem de hieu. Nhu nhan thoai 閒話 cau chuyen thuong. \n\t2. Bao. \n\t3. Tot, hay.
該=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Cai quat du, nghia la bao quat het thay. Nhu tuong cai 詳該 tuong tan. \n\t2. Dang nen. Nhu su cai nhu thu 事該如此 viec nen phai nhu the. \n\t3. Dung lam loi chi ro vao cai gi. Nhu cai xu 該處 cho do, cai an 該案 an do. \n\t4. Tuc goi thu gi con thieu la cai. Nhu cac ton cac cai 各存各該 noi trong cua hang, cai ay con cai ay thieu.
该=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Cai quat du, nghia la bao quat het thay. Nhu tuong cai 詳該 tuong tan. \n\t2. Dang nen. Nhu su cai nhu thu 事該如此 viec nen phai nhu the. \n\t3. Dung lam loi chi ro vao cai gi. Nhu cai xu 該處 cho do, cai an 該案 an do. \n\t4. Tuc goi thu gi con thieu la cai. Nhu cac ton cac cai 各存各該 noi trong cua hang, cai ay con cai ay thieu.
詳=tuong [xiang2]\n\t1. Ro rang, tuong tat, tuong tan, noi du moi su khong thieu ti gi. \n\t2. Mot loi van trong hang quan lai. Loi cua quan duoi bao cao voi cac quan tren goi la tuong van 詳文. \n\t3. Het. \n\t4. Lanh. Cung nhu chu tuong 祥.
详=tuong [xiang2]\n\t1. Ro rang, tuong tat, tuong tan, noi du moi su khong thieu ti gi. \n\t2. Mot loi van trong hang quan lai. Loi cua quan duoi bao cao voi cac quan tren goi la tuong van 詳文. \n\t3. Het. \n\t4. Lanh. Cung nhu chu tuong 祥.
詹=chiem, dam [zhan1]\n\t1. Xet, cap giup. Phep quan ngay xua co mot chuc la chiem su phu 詹事府 la mot chuc quan cung cap moi viec cho Thai tu. \n\t2. Noi nhieu. \n\t3. Den. \n\t4. Mot am la dam. Du.
詼=khoi [hui1]\n\t1. Dua bon. Noi pha tro cho nguoi ta nghe phai bat cuoi goi la khoi hai 詼諧.
诙=khoi [hui1]\n\t1. Dua bon. Noi pha tro cho nguoi ta nghe phai bat cuoi goi la khoi hai 詼諧.
詾=hung [xiong1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hung 訩.
詿=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Lam, lua doi. Quan lai nhan su gi ma bi trach phat goi la quai ngo 詿誤. Nay thong dung nhu chu quai 罣. 
诖=quai [gua4]\n\t1. Lam, lua doi. Quan lai nhan su gi ma bi trach phat goi la quai ngo 詿誤. Nay thong dung nhu chu quai 罣. 
誄=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Loi vieng. Thuong ke chet ma lam loi thuat hanh trang cua ke chet ra goi la luy. \n\t2. Cau cung.
诔=luy [lei3]\n\t1. Loi vieng. Thuong ke chet ma lam loi thuat hanh trang cua ke chet ra goi la luy. \n\t2. Cau cung.
誅=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Giet, ke ro toi loi ra ma giet di goi la tru. \n\t2. Giet ca ke no ke kia khong nhung mot nguoi cung goi la tru. \n\t3. Trach, phat. Nhu tru cau vo yem 誅求無厭 nao khoet khong chan, lay than the ep nguoi phai dut cua. \n\t4. Cat co, phat co. Nhu tru mao 誅茅 phat co tranh. \n\t5. Bi thuong.
诛=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Giet, ke ro toi loi ra ma giet di goi la tru. \n\t2. Giet ca ke no ke kia khong nhung mot nguoi cung goi la tru. \n\t3. Trach, phat. Nhu tru cau vo yem 誅求無厭 nao khoet khong chan, lay than the ep nguoi phai dut cua. \n\t4. Cat co, phat co. Nhu tru mao 誅茅 phat co tranh. \n\t5. Bi thuong.
誆=cuong [kuang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cuong 誑.
诓=cuong [kuang1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cuong 誑.
誇=khoa [kua1]\n\t1. Khoe khoang. 2. Noi khoac. 3. To lon.
誌=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Ghi nho, nhu chi chi bat vong 誌之不忘 ghi nho chang quen. \n\t2. Mot loi van ki su. Nhu bi chi 碑誌 bai van bia, mo chi 墓誌 van mo chi, v.v. \n\t3. Pha chep cac su vat gi. Nhu dia chi 地誌 sach chep mot xu nao, danh son chi 名山誌 sach chep qua nui co tieng. \n\t4. Neu, moc.
認=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Bien ro, nhan biet. Nhu nhan minh 認明 nhan ro rang. \n\t2. U cho, bang long cho. Nhu thua nhan 承認 vang cho la duoc, cong nhan 公認 moi nguoi deu cho la duoc.
认=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Bien ro, nhan biet. Nhu nhan minh 認明 nhan ro rang. \n\t2. U cho, bang long cho. Nhu thua nhan 承認 vang cho la duoc, cong nhan 公認 moi nguoi deu cho la duoc.
誑=cuong [kuang2]\n\t1. Noi doi, lua doi.
诳=cuong [kuang2]\n\t1. Noi doi, lua doi.
誓=the [shi4]\n\t1. Ran bao. Hop cac tuong si lai ma ran bao cho biet ki luat goi la the su 誓師. \n\t2. The, doi truoc cua than thanh noi ro viec ra de lam tin goi la the. Nhu chiet tien vi the 折箭爲誓 be ten lam phep the. \n\t3. Menh lenh. \n\t4. Kinh can.
誕=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Noi lao, noi toang. Nhu hoang dan bat kinh 荒誕不經 lao hao khong dung su. \n\t2. Ngong lao, nguoi khong biet su xet net minh cu ngong nghenh, xang goi la phong dan 放誕. \n\t3. Nuoi. Nay goi ngay sinh nhat la dan nhat 誕日. \n\t4. Rong. \n\t5. Ca, lon. \n\t6. Dung lam tieng dem dau cau.
诞=dan [dan4]\n\t1. Noi lao, noi toang. Nhu hoang dan bat kinh 荒誕不經 lao hao khong dung su. \n\t2. Ngong lao, nguoi khong biet su xet net minh cu ngong nghenh, xang goi la phong dan 放誕. \n\t3. Nuoi. Nay goi ngay sinh nhat la dan nhat 誕日. \n\t4. Rong. \n\t5. Ca, lon. \n\t6. Dung lam tieng dem dau cau.
誖=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu boi 悖.
誘=du [you4]\n\t1. Do danh, dung loi noi kheo khuyen nguoi ta nghe theo minh goi la du, lay dao nghia khuyen dan nguoi ta lam thien cung goi la du. Nhu tuan tuan thien du 循循善誘 dan dan kheo dan du, noi nguoi kheo day. \n\t2. Lay muu gian ma dan nguoi ta vao loi ac cung goi la du. Nhu dan du luong gia tu de 引誘良家子弟 quyen do con em nha luong thien.
诱=du [you4]\n\t1. Do danh, dung loi noi kheo khuyen nguoi ta nghe theo minh goi la du, lay dao nghia khuyen dan nguoi ta lam thien cung goi la du. Nhu tuan tuan thien du 循循善誘 dan dan kheo dan du, noi nguoi kheo day. \n\t2. Lay muu gian ma dan nguoi ta vao loi ac cung goi la du. Nhu dan du luong gia tu de 引誘良家子弟 quyen do con em nha luong thien.
誚=tieu [qiao4]\n\t1. Noi mat. Nhu co tieu 譏誚 che trach qua loa.
诮=tieu [qiao4]\n\t1. Noi mat. Nhu co tieu 譏誚 che trach qua loa.
語=ngu, ngu [yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Noi, noi nho. Nhu ngau ngu 偶語 cau noi ngau nhien, tu ngu 私語 noi rieng. \n\t2. Cau noi co du y nghia tinh vi cung goi la ngu. Nhu thanh ngu 成語 cau noi da dung, ai cung dung duoc, loi ngan ma co du y nghia, ngu luc 語錄 ban chep cac loi noi hay. Nhu cac hoc tro chep cac loi duc Khong Tu da noi lai goi la bo Luan ngu 論語. \n\t3. Ra hieu, nhu thu ngu 手語 lay tay ra hieu. \n\t4. Mot am la ngu. Bao. Nhu cu ngo ngu nhu 居吾語汝 ngoi day ta bao may.
语=ngu, ngu [yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Noi, noi nho. Nhu ngau ngu 偶語 cau noi ngau nhien, tu ngu 私語 noi rieng. \n\t2. Cau noi co du y nghia tinh vi cung goi la ngu. Nhu thanh ngu 成語 cau noi da dung, ai cung dung duoc, loi ngan ma co du y nghia, ngu luc 語錄 ban chep cac loi noi hay. Nhu cac hoc tro chep cac loi duc Khong Tu da noi lai goi la bo Luan ngu 論語. \n\t3. Ra hieu, nhu thu ngu 手語 lay tay ra hieu. \n\t4. Mot am la ngu. Bao. Nhu cu ngo ngu nhu 居吾語汝 ngoi day ta bao may.
誠=thanh [cheng2]\n\t1. Thanh thuc, chan thuc. \n\t2. Tin, nhu thanh nhien 誠然 tin thuc the.
诚=thanh [cheng2]\n\t1. Thanh thuc, chan thuc. \n\t2. Tin, nhu thanh nhien 誠然 tin thuc the.
誡=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Bai van ran bao. Nhu gioi tu thu 誡子書 tho ran bao con. \n\t2. Trung gioi, dung hinh phat nhe cho biet so. \n\t3. Sai, bao.
诫=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Bai van ran bao. Nhu gioi tu thu 誡子書 tho ran bao con. \n\t2. Trung gioi, dung hinh phat nhe cho biet so. \n\t3. Sai, bao.
誣=vu [wu1]\n\t1. Lua doi, khong ma bao la co goi la vu. Nhu vu cao 誣告 cao lao, nhu nguoi ta noi vu oan, vu khong deu la nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Xang bay.
诬=vu [wu1]\n\t1. Lua doi, khong ma bao la co goi la vu. Nhu vu cao 誣告 cao lao, nhu nguoi ta noi vu oan, vu khong deu la nghia ay ca. \n\t2. Xang bay.
誤=ngo [wu4]\n\t1. Lam. Nhu thac ngo 錯誤 lam lan. \n\t2. Lam me hoac. \n\t3. Bi su gi no lam luy.
误=ngo [wu4]\n\t1. Lam. Nhu thac ngo 錯誤 lam lan. \n\t2. Lam me hoac. \n\t3. Bi su gi no lam luy.
誥=cao [gao4]\n\t1. Bao, tren bao duoi la cao. \n\t2. Loi sai cac quan, nhu cao menh 誥命 sac vua ban cho quan. \n\t3. Kinh can. \n\t4. Bai van ran bao.
诰=cao [gao4]\n\t1. Bao, tren bao duoi la cao. \n\t2. Loi sai cac quan, nhu cao menh 誥命 sac vua ban cho quan. \n\t3. Kinh can. \n\t4. Bai van ran bao.
誦=tung [song4]\n\t1. Tung ranh rot, doc sach len giong cho ranh rot goi la tung. \n\t2. Khen ngoi, nhu xung tung 稱誦 \n\t3. Bai tung, nhu bai tho. \n\t4. Oan trach.
诵=tung [song4]\n\t1. Tung ranh rot, doc sach len giong cho ranh rot goi la tung. \n\t2. Khen ngoi, nhu xung tung 稱誦 \n\t3. Bai tung, nhu bai tho. \n\t4. Oan trach.
誨=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Day bao, lay loi ma day goi la hoi. Nhu giao hoi 教誨 day bao khuyen ran. \n\t2. Loi day.
诲=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Day bao, lay loi ma day goi la hoi. Nhu giao hoi 教誨 day bao khuyen ran. \n\t2. Loi day.
說=thuyet, duyet, thue [shui4|shuo1|yue4]\n\t1. Noi, lay loi noi giai thich ro su vat gi ra goi la thuyet. Nhu dien thuyet 演說, thuyet minh 說明. \n\t2. Ngon luan. \n\t3. Mot am la duyet. Cung nghia voi chu 悅. Vui long, dep long. Luan ngu 論語. Hoc nhi thoi tap chi, bat diec duyet ho 學而時習之，不亦說乎 (Hoc nhi 學而) hoc ma thuong on tap, cung chang thich u ? \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la thue. Lay loi noi do cho nguoi ta theo minh goi la thue. Nhu du thue 遊說 di cac noi noi du nguoi. Ta quen doc thuyet ca. Cung co nghia nhu chu thoat 脫.
说=thuyet, duyet, thue [shui4|shuo1|yue4]\n\t1. Noi, lay loi noi giai thich ro su vat gi ra goi la thuyet. Nhu dien thuyet 演說, thuyet minh 說明. \n\t2. Ngon luan. \n\t3. Mot am la duyet. Cung nghia voi chu 悅. Vui long, dep long. Luan ngu 論語. Hoc nhi thoi tap chi, bat diec duyet ho 學而時習之，不亦說乎 (Hoc nhi 學而) hoc ma thuong on tap, cung chang thich u ? \n\t4. Lai mot am nua la thue. Lay loi noi do cho nguoi ta theo minh goi la thue. Nhu du thue 遊說 di cac noi noi du nguoi. Ta quen doc thuyet ca. Cung co nghia nhu chu thoat 脫.
誰=thuy [shei2|shui2]\n\t1. Gi, la tieng noi khong biet ro ten ma hoi. Nhu tinh tham danh thuy 姓甚名誰 ten ho la gi ? \n\t2. Ai. Nhu ki thuy tri chi 其誰知之 ai nguoi biet duoc ? thuy ha 誰何 ai the ? Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nhat thien xuan hung thuy gia lac 一天春興誰家落 mot troi xuan hung khong biet roi vao nha ai ?
谁=thuy [shei2|shui2]\n\t1. Gi, la tieng noi khong biet ro ten ma hoi. Nhu tinh tham danh thuy 姓甚名誰 ten ho la gi ? \n\t2. Ai. Nhu ki thuy tri chi 其誰知之 ai nguoi biet duoc ? thuy ha 誰何 ai the ? Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nhat thien xuan hung thuy gia lac 一天春興誰家落 mot troi xuan hung khong biet roi vao nha ai ?
課=khoa [ke4]\n\t1. Thi, tinh. Pham dinh ra khuon phep ma thi nghiem tra xet deu goi la khoa. Nhu khao khoa 考課 khoa thi, cong khoa 工課 khoa hoc, v.v. \n\t2. Thue ma. Nhu diem khoa 鹽課 thue muoi. \n\t3. Que boi. Nhu luc nham khoa 六壬課 phep boi luc nham.
课=khoa [ke4]\n\t1. Thi, tinh. Pham dinh ra khuon phep ma thi nghiem tra xet deu goi la khoa. Nhu khao khoa 考課 khoa thi, cong khoa 工課 khoa hoc, v.v. \n\t2. Thue ma. Nhu diem khoa 鹽課 thue muoi. \n\t3. Que boi. Nhu luc nham khoa 六壬課 phep boi luc nham.
誶=toi [sui4]\n\t1. Mang nhiec. \n\t2. Hoi. \n\t3. Bao, cao mach. \n\t4. Can, can gian. Khuat Nguyen 屈原. Trieu toi nhi tich the 朝誶而夕替 som can gian thi chieu bi phe truat.
谇=toi [sui4]\n\t1. Mang nhiec. \n\t2. Hoi. \n\t3. Bao, cao mach. \n\t4. Can, can gian. Khuat Nguyen 屈原. Trieu toi nhi tich the 朝誶而夕替 som can gian thi chieu bi phe truat.
誹=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Che, thay nguoi ta lam trai ma minh che bai goi la phi. Nhu phi bang 誹謗 noi xau, beu rieu.
诽=phi [fei3]\n\t1. Che, thay nguoi ta lam trai ma minh che bai goi la phi. Nhu phi bang 誹謗 noi xau, beu rieu.
誼=nghi [yi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghia 義. \n\t2. Tinh be ban choi voi nhau. Nhu the nghi 世誼 tinh nghia doi doi choi voi nhau.
谊=nghi [yi4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghia 義. \n\t2. Tinh be ban choi voi nhau. Nhu the nghi 世誼 tinh nghia doi doi choi voi nhau.
誾=ngan [yin2]\n\t1. Ngan ngan 誾誾 re rang hoa hoan ma can ma tranh bien. \n\t2. Mui thom suc nuc.
調=dieu, dieu [diao4|tiao2]\n\t1. Dieu hoa. Nhu dieu quan 調勻 hoa deu nhau. \n\t2. Thu xep cho viec no xong xuoi cung goi la dieu. Nhu dieu dinh 調停. \n\t3. Cuoi cot. Nhu dieu hi 調戲 dua bon, dieu tieu 調笑 cuoi cot, v.v. \n\t4. Mot am la dieu. Sai phai di. Nhu dieu binh 調兵 phai linh di. \n\t5. Doi ngoi thu di cung goi la dieu. Nhu dieu nham 調任 doi quan di cho khac. \n\t6. Luong tinh . Nhu dieu tra 調查 tra xet tinh toan lai xem. \n\t7. Thue ho, mot thu thue nha Duong, tuc la loi danh thue lay hang to hang vai doi xua vay. (Trong ba nghia nay ta quen dung la chu dieu ca). \n\t8. Dieu dan dieu hat. Dieu co y nghia la khi voi van an nhau ma nen dip hay. Cho nen tai can cua nguoi cung goi la tai dieu 才調. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ky trung tu huu thanh thuong dieu, Bat thi sau nhan bat hua tri 其中自有清商調，不是愁人不許知 Trong tieng keu co dieu thanh thuong, Khong phai nguoi buon thi khong biet duoc.
调=dieu, dieu [diao4|tiao2]\n\t1. Dieu hoa. Nhu dieu quan 調勻 hoa deu nhau. \n\t2. Thu xep cho viec no xong xuoi cung goi la dieu. Nhu dieu dinh 調停. \n\t3. Cuoi cot. Nhu dieu hi 調戲 dua bon, dieu tieu 調笑 cuoi cot, v.v. \n\t4. Mot am la dieu. Sai phai di. Nhu dieu binh 調兵 phai linh di. \n\t5. Doi ngoi thu di cung goi la dieu. Nhu dieu nham 調任 doi quan di cho khac. \n\t6. Luong tinh . Nhu dieu tra 調查 tra xet tinh toan lai xem. \n\t7. Thue ho, mot thu thue nha Duong, tuc la loi danh thue lay hang to hang vai doi xua vay. (Trong ba nghia nay ta quen dung la chu dieu ca). \n\t8. Dieu dan dieu hat. Dieu co y nghia la khi voi van an nhau ma nen dip hay. Cho nen tai can cua nguoi cung goi la tai dieu 才調. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ky trung tu huu thanh thuong dieu, Bat thi sau nhan bat hua tri 其中自有清商調，不是愁人不許知 Trong tieng keu co dieu thanh thuong, Khong phai nguoi buon thi khong biet duoc.
諂=siem [chan3]\n\t1. Ninh not, ton hot.
谄=siem [chan3]\n\t1. Ninh not, ton hot.
諄=truan [zhun1]\n\t1. Cham day. \n\t2. Giup. \n\t3. Truan truan 諄諄 dan di dan lai. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu doi 憝.
谆=truan [zhun1]\n\t1. Cham day. \n\t2. Giup. \n\t3. Truan truan 諄諄 dan di dan lai. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu doi 憝.
談=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Ban bac, hai ben cung nhau ban bac su vat lung tung deu goi la dam. Nhu thanh dam 清談 ban suong.
谈=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Ban bac, hai ben cung nhau ban bac su vat lung tung deu goi la dam. Nhu thanh dam 清談 ban suong.
諉=uy, duy [wei3]\n\t1. Tu choi, dat loi gia thac ma tu di khong nhan goi la uy. \n\t2. Lam luy. Cung doc la chu duy.
诿=uy, duy [wei3]\n\t1. Tu choi, dat loi gia thac ma tu di khong nhan goi la uy. \n\t2. Lam luy. Cung doc la chu duy.
請=thinh, tinh [qing3]\n\t1. Tham hau. Nhu thinh an 請安 hoi tham xem co duoc binh yen khong. \n\t2. Hoi, ke duoi hoi nguoi tren thi dung chu thinh. Nhu thinh giao 請教 xin day bao cho, thinh thi 請示 xin chi bao cho, v.v. \n\t3. Xin. Nhu thinh tuong 請獎 xin ban khen cho. \n\t4. Ta toi cung goi la thinh. Nhu thinh toi 請罪 xin ta toi. \n\t5. Bao. \n\t6. Mot am la tinh. Moi. Nhu tinh khach 請客 moi khach.
请=thinh, tinh [qing3]\n\t1. Tham hau. Nhu thinh an 請安 hoi tham xem co duoc binh yen khong. \n\t2. Hoi, ke duoi hoi nguoi tren thi dung chu thinh. Nhu thinh giao 請教 xin day bao cho, thinh thi 請示 xin chi bao cho, v.v. \n\t3. Xin. Nhu thinh tuong 請獎 xin ban khen cho. \n\t4. Ta toi cung goi la thinh. Nhu thinh toi 請罪 xin ta toi. \n\t5. Bao. \n\t6. Mot am la tinh. Moi. Nhu tinh khach 請客 moi khach.
諍=tranh [zheng4]\n\t1. Can, ngan, lay loi noi ma ngan nguoi khoi lam dieu lam loi. \n\t2. Kien, cai.
诤=tranh [zheng4]\n\t1. Can, ngan, lay loi noi ma ngan nguoi khoi lam dieu lam loi. \n\t2. Kien, cai.
諏=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Muu, hoi, chon ngay tot goi la tuu cat 諏吉.
诹=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Muu, hoi, chon ngay tot goi la tuu cat 諏吉.
諑=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Loi giem pha, cao mach.
诼=trac [zhuo2]\n\t1. Loi giem pha, cao mach.
諒=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Tin, thuc. \n\t2. Luong, xet. Nhu luong nang 諒能 may hay lam duoc day, luong kha 諒可 may co the day. Dung lam chu suy nguyen den tinh, tham do toi y. \n\t3. Luong thu, tha thu. Nhu kien luong 見諒 se thay luong thu cho. \n\t4. Tin cho. \n\t5. Co chap, giu dieu tin nho.
谅=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Tin, thuc. \n\t2. Luong, xet. Nhu luong nang 諒能 may hay lam duoc day, luong kha 諒可 may co the day. Dung lam chu suy nguyen den tinh, tham do toi y. \n\t3. Luong thu, tha thu. Nhu kien luong 見諒 se thay luong thu cho. \n\t4. Tin cho. \n\t5. Co chap, giu dieu tin nho.
論=luan, luan [lun2|lun4]\n\t1. Ban bac, xem xet su vat, roi noi cho ro phai trai goi la luan. Nhu cong luan 公論 loi ban chung cua so dong nguoi ban, du luan 輿論 loi ban cua xa hoi cong chung. \n\t2. Loi van luan, dem mot van de ra ma thao luan cho ro loi hai nen chang goi la bai luan. \n\t3. Xu an. \n\t4. Nghi. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. So sanh. Cung doc la chu luan.
论=luan, luan [lun2|lun4]\n\t1. Ban bac, xem xet su vat, roi noi cho ro phai trai goi la luan. Nhu cong luan 公論 loi ban chung cua so dong nguoi ban, du luan 輿論 loi ban cua xa hoi cong chung. \n\t2. Loi van luan, dem mot van de ra ma thao luan cho ro loi hai nen chang goi la bai luan. \n\t3. Xu an. \n\t4. Nghi. \n\t5. Ken chon. \n\t6. So sanh. Cung doc la chu luan.
諗=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Nghi, xet. Tuc dung nhu chu niem 念, chu tham 審.
谂=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Nghi, xet. Tuc dung nhu chu niem 念, chu tham 審.
諩=pho [pu3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu pho 譜.
諛=du [yu2]\n\t1. Ninh hot.
谀=du [yu2]\n\t1. Ninh hot.
諜=diep [die2]\n\t1. Do xet, nguoi di do tham quan linh ben giac goi la diep, tuc goi la te tac 細作. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu diep 喋 nhieu loi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu diep 牒.
谍=diep [die2]\n\t1. Do xet, nguoi di do tham quan linh ben giac goi la diep, tuc goi la te tac 細作. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu diep 喋 nhieu loi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu diep 牒.
諞=bien [pian3]\n\t1. Noi kheo, luong gat. \n\t2. Khoe khoang.
谝=bien [pian3]\n\t1. Noi kheo, luong gat. \n\t2. Khoe khoang.
諟=thi [shi4]\n\t1. Dung, phai, cung nghia voi chu thi 是. \n\t2. Xet ro.
諠=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu huyen 諼 quen. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu huyen 喧. Nhu huyen hoa 諠譁 ram ri.
諡=thuy [shi4]\n\t1. Ten hem, luc nguoi sap chet nguoi khac dem tinh hanh cua nguoi sap chet ay so sanh roi dat cho mot ten khac de khi cung gio khan den goi la thuy. Ta goi la ten cung com.
諢=ngon [hun4]\n\t1. Noi dua, noi pha tro, trong cac bai van du hy chem them cho vui goi la ngon. Tuc goi la da ngon 打諢.
诨=ngon [hun4]\n\t1. Noi dua, noi pha tro, trong cac bai van du hy chem them cho vui goi la ngon. Tuc goi la da ngon 打諢.
諤=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Loi noi ngay thang. Thien nhan nac nac, bat nhu nhat si chi ngac 千人之諾諾，不如一士之諤 nghin nguoi vang da, khong bang mot nguoi noi thang.
谔=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Loi noi ngay thang. Thien nhan nac nac, bat nhu nhat si chi ngac 千人之諾諾，不如一士之諤 nghin nguoi vang da, khong bang mot nguoi noi thang.
諦=de, de [di4]\n\t1. Xet ky, ro. Nhu de thi 諦視 coi ky cang. \n\t2. Chu nha Phat dung nhu nghia chu chan ngon 真言. Nhu tham thau le thien goi la dac dieu de 得妙諦 duoc phep rat mau. Nha Phat noi doi nguoi la kho, dung la kho, the la kho de 苦諦. So di phai kho la vi truoc da lam nhieu nhan xau nhu tham lam, gian du, ngu si no gom gop lai thanh cac noi kho, the la tap de 集諦. Muon cho khoi kho, can phai toi coi Niet ban tich diet, khong con mot ti gi la kho, the la diet de 滅諦. Muon duoc toi coi Niet ban, can phai tu dao, the la dao de 道諦, bon dieu nay dung thuc khong sai, nen goi la tu de 四諦. \n\t3. Mot am la de. Khoc loc.
谛=de, de [di4]\n\t1. Xet ky, ro. Nhu de thi 諦視 coi ky cang. \n\t2. Chu nha Phat dung nhu nghia chu chan ngon 真言. Nhu tham thau le thien goi la dac dieu de 得妙諦 duoc phep rat mau. Nha Phat noi doi nguoi la kho, dung la kho, the la kho de 苦諦. So di phai kho la vi truoc da lam nhieu nhan xau nhu tham lam, gian du, ngu si no gom gop lai thanh cac noi kho, the la tap de 集諦. Muon cho khoi kho, can phai toi coi Niet ban tich diet, khong con mot ti gi la kho, the la diet de 滅諦. Muon duoc toi coi Niet ban, can phai tu dao, the la dao de 道諦, bon dieu nay dung thuc khong sai, nen goi la tu de 四諦. \n\t3. Mot am la de. Khoc loc.
諧=hai [xie2]\n\t1. Hoa hop. Nhu am dieu an nhip nhau goi la hai thanh 諧聲, mua hang nga gia roi goi la hai gia 諧價. \n\t2. Su da xong cung goi la hai. \n\t3. Hai huoc. Nhu khoi hai 詼諧 hai huoc.
谐=hai [xie2]\n\t1. Hoa hop. Nhu am dieu an nhip nhau goi la hai thanh 諧聲, mua hang nga gia roi goi la hai gia 諧價. \n\t2. Su da xong cung goi la hai. \n\t3. Hai huoc. Nhu khoi hai 詼諧 hai huoc.
諫=gian [jian4]\n\t1. Can, ngan, can gian.
谏=gian [jian4]\n\t1. Can, ngan, can gian.
諭=du [yu4]\n\t1. Bao, nguoi tren bao nguoi duoi goi la du. Nhu thuong du 上諭 du cua vua. \n\t2. Hieu du, to ro y nghia. \n\t3. To. \n\t4. Thi du.
谕=du [yu4]\n\t1. Bao, nguoi tren bao nguoi duoi goi la du. Nhu thuong du 上諭 du cua vua. \n\t2. Hieu du, to ro y nghia. \n\t3. To. \n\t4. Thi du.
諮=ti, tu [zi1]\n\t1. Muu, hoi. Ta quen doc la chu tu. Tu tuan dan y 諮詢民意 trung cau dan y.
谘=ti, tu [zi1]\n\t1. Muu, hoi. Ta quen doc la chu tu. Tu tuan dan y 諮詢民意 trung cau dan y.
諱=huy [hui4]\n\t1. Kieng, huy ki, co dieu kieng so ma phai giau di goi la huy. \n\t2. Chet, cung goi la bat huy 不諱. Tieng chet la tieng nguoi ta kieng nen goi ke chet la bat huy. \n\t3. Ten nguoi song goi la danh, ten nguoi chet goi la huy. Nhu nguoi ta noi kieng ten huy, khong dam goi dung ten ma goi chanh di vay.
讳=huy [hui4]\n\t1. Kieng, huy ki, co dieu kieng so ma phai giau di goi la huy. \n\t2. Chet, cung goi la bat huy 不諱. Tieng chet la tieng nguoi ta kieng nen goi ke chet la bat huy. \n\t3. Ten nguoi song goi la danh, ten nguoi chet goi la huy. Nhu nguoi ta noi kieng ten huy, khong dam goi dung ten ma goi chanh di vay.
諳=am [an1]\n\t1. Quen, am tuong, nghe da ky ma hieu da thau goi la am. Nhu am luyen 諳練 thanh thuoc, lao luyen. \n\t2. Noi mat.
谙=am [an1]\n\t1. Quen, am tuong, nghe da ky ma hieu da thau goi la am. Nhu am luyen 諳練 thanh thuoc, lao luyen. \n\t2. Noi mat.
諶=kham [chen2]\n\t1. Tin. Nhu thien nan kham, menh mi thuong 天難諶命靡常 troi kho tin, menh chang thuong. \n\t2. Thuc.
谌=kham [chen2]\n\t1. Tin. Nhu thien nan kham, menh mi thuong 天難諶命靡常 troi kho tin, menh chang thuong. \n\t2. Thuc.
諷=phung [feng3]\n\t1. Doc sach, doc len cao giong goi la phung. Nhu phung tung 諷誦 doc tung ngam nga. \n\t2. Noi mat, noi thac mot chuyen khac ma khien cho nguoi tinh biet doi loi di goi la phung. Nhu trao phung 嘲諷 rieu cot, trao phung.
讽=phung [feng3]\n\t1. Doc sach, doc len cao giong goi la phung. Nhu phung tung 諷誦 doc tung ngam nga. \n\t2. Noi mat, noi thac mot chuyen khac ma khien cho nguoi tinh biet doi loi di goi la phung. Nhu trao phung 嘲諷 rieu cot, trao phung.
諸=chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Chung, co y nghia noi chuyen ve mot cho. Nhu quan tu cau chu ki 君子求諸己 (Luan ngu 論語) nguoi quan tu chi cau o minh. \n\t2. Chang, ngo ma hoi. Nhu huu chu 有諸 co chang ? \n\t3. Moi, noi tom cac viec khong chi rieng mot viec nao. Nhu chu su 諸事 moi viec, chu quan 諸君 cac ong, v.v. \n\t4. Dung lam tieng giup loi. Nhu nhat cu nguyet chu 日居月諸 mat troi di, mat trang di. Doi sau nhan do dung chu cu chu nhu chu nhat nguyet, nhu vi nhi tich cu chu 爲爾惜居諸 vi may tiec ngay thang.
诸=chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Chung, co y nghia noi chuyen ve mot cho. Nhu quan tu cau chu ki 君子求諸己 (Luan ngu 論語) nguoi quan tu chi cau o minh. \n\t2. Chang, ngo ma hoi. Nhu huu chu 有諸 co chang ? \n\t3. Moi, noi tom cac viec khong chi rieng mot viec nao. Nhu chu su 諸事 moi viec, chu quan 諸君 cac ong, v.v. \n\t4. Dung lam tieng giup loi. Nhu nhat cu nguyet chu 日居月諸 mat troi di, mat trang di. Doi sau nhan do dung chu cu chu nhu chu nhat nguyet, nhu vi nhi tich cu chu 爲爾惜居諸 vi may tiec ngay thang.
諺=ngan [yan4]\n\t1. Loi tuc ngu. \n\t2. Vieng tham. \n\t3. Tho tuc.
谚=ngan [yan4]\n\t1. Loi tuc ngu. \n\t2. Vieng tham. \n\t3. Tho tuc.
諼=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Quen, cung nhu chu huyen 諠. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu huyen 萱, nhu yen dac huyen thao, ngon thu chi boi 焉得諼草言樹之背 (Thi Kinh 詩經) sao duoc co huyen, trong o sau nha. \n\t3. Lua doi.
谖=huyen [xuan1]\n\t1. Quen, cung nhu chu huyen 諠. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu huyen 萱, nhu yen dac huyen thao, ngon thu chi boi 焉得諼草言樹之背 (Thi Kinh 詩經) sao duoc co huyen, trong o sau nha. \n\t3. Lua doi.
諾=nac [nuo4]\n\t1. Da. Da nhanh goi la duy 唯, da thong tha goi la nac 諾. Thien nhan nac nac, bat nhu nhat si chi ngac 千人之諾諾，不如一士之諤 nghin nguoi vang da, khong bang mot nguoi noi thang. \n\t2. Vang, u, ung cho. Nhu bat khinh nhien nac 不輕然諾 khong dam vang xang. Tuc ngu nuoc So co cau dac hoang kim bach can, bat nhu dac Quy Bo nhat nac 得黃金百斤不如得季布一諾 duoc tram can vang, khong bang duoc mot loi vang cua ong Quy Bo. Bay gio goi loi vang, loi hua la kim nac 金諾 la vi do. \n\t3. Van thu co chu ky rieng lam dau hieu goi la nac. Nhu hoach nac 畫諾 ky ten kem lam hieu.
诺=nac [nuo4]\n\t1. Da. Da nhanh goi la duy 唯, da thong tha goi la nac 諾. Thien nhan nac nac, bat nhu nhat si chi ngac 千人之諾諾，不如一士之諤 nghin nguoi vang da, khong bang mot nguoi noi thang. \n\t2. Vang, u, ung cho. Nhu bat khinh nhien nac 不輕然諾 khong dam vang xang. Tuc ngu nuoc So co cau dac hoang kim bach can, bat nhu dac Quy Bo nhat nac 得黃金百斤不如得季布一諾 duoc tram can vang, khong bang duoc mot loi vang cua ong Quy Bo. Bay gio goi loi vang, loi hua la kim nac 金諾 la vi do. \n\t3. Van thu co chu ky rieng lam dau hieu goi la nac. Nhu hoach nac 畫諾 ky ten kem lam hieu.
謀=muu [mou2]\n\t1. Toan tinh, toan tinh truoc roi moi lam goi la muu. Nhu tham muu 參謀 cung du vao viec muu toan ay, muu sinh 謀生 toan muu su sinh nhai, nay goi su gap mat nhau la muu dien 謀面 nghia la muu toan cho duoc gap mat nhau mot lan vay. \n\t2. Muu ke. \n\t3. Muu cau.
谋=muu [mou2]\n\t1. Toan tinh, toan tinh truoc roi moi lam goi la muu. Nhu tham muu 參謀 cung du vao viec muu toan ay, muu sinh 謀生 toan muu su sinh nhai, nay goi su gap mat nhau la muu dien 謀面 nghia la muu toan cho duoc gap mat nhau mot lan vay. \n\t2. Muu ke. \n\t3. Muu cau.
謁=yet [ye4]\n\t1. Yet kien, vao hau chuyen, nguoi hen mon muon xin vao hau buc ton quy, de bam bach su gi goi la yet. \n\t2. Bao, cao. \n\t3. Danh thiep. \n\t4. Ke canh cua.
谒=yet [ye4]\n\t1. Yet kien, vao hau chuyen, nguoi hen mon muon xin vao hau buc ton quy, de bam bach su gi goi la yet. \n\t2. Bao, cao. \n\t3. Danh thiep. \n\t4. Ke canh cua.
謂=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Bao, lay loi ma bao la vi. \n\t2. Binh luan. Nhu Luan ngu noi Tu vi Nam Dung 子謂南容 duc thanh Khong binh luan tu cach ong Nam Dung. \n\t3. Goi la. Nhu thu chi vi dai truong phu 此之謂大丈夫 the moi goi la bac dai truong phu. \n\t4. Rang, dung lam tieng phat ngu. \n\t5. Noi. \n\t6. Cham, sieng. \n\t7. Cung. \n\t8. Cung nghia voi chu nhu 如.
谓=vi [wei4]\n\t1. Bao, lay loi ma bao la vi. \n\t2. Binh luan. Nhu Luan ngu noi Tu vi Nam Dung 子謂南容 duc thanh Khong binh luan tu cach ong Nam Dung. \n\t3. Goi la. Nhu thu chi vi dai truong phu 此之謂大丈夫 the moi goi la bac dai truong phu. \n\t4. Rang, dung lam tieng phat ngu. \n\t5. Noi. \n\t6. Cham, sieng. \n\t7. Cung. \n\t8. Cung nghia voi chu nhu 如.
謄=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Sao, chep, trong ban kia sao ra ban khac cho ro rang. Nhu dang hoang 騰黃 lay giay vang viet to chieu cho ro rang. 
誊=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Sao, chep, trong ban kia sao ra ban khac cho ro rang. Nhu dang hoang 騰黃 lay giay vang viet to chieu cho ro rang. 
謅=suu, sao [zhou1]\n\t1. Bao nho, bo nho. \n\t2. Mot am la sao. Noi dua.
诌=suu, sao [zhou1]\n\t1. Bao nho, bo nho. \n\t2. Mot am la sao. Noi dua.
謆=phien [shan4]\n\t1. Ru re. Lay loi noi lam cho nguoi nghe ma me hoac goi la phien hoac 謆惑 hay phien dong 謆動.
謇=kien [jian3]\n\t1. Kho noi. Nhu ngu ngon kien sap 語言謇澀 noi nang nguong nghiu nhu the kho khan moi noi ra duoc mot tieng vay. \n\t2. Loi noi thang. Nhu dai than huu kien ngac chi tiet 大臣有謇諤之節 bay toi lon co cai khi tiet noi thang can vua. \n\t3. Dung lam tieng phat ngu.
謊=hoang [huang3]\n\t1. Noi doi.
谎=hoang [huang3]\n\t1. Noi doi.
謌=ca [ge1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ca 歌.
謎=me [mei4|mi2]\n\t1. Cau do.
谜=me [mei4|mi2]\n\t1. Cau do.
謏=tieu, tau [xiao3]\n\t1. Nho be. \n\t2. Mot am la tau. Loi ru re do danh.
謐=mat, mich [mi4]\n\t1. Yen lang. Cung doc la mich. Nhu tinh mich 靜謐.
谧=mat, mich [mi4]\n\t1. Yen lang. Cung doc la mich. Nhu tinh mich 靜謐.
謔=huoc [xue4]\n\t1. Noi dua, noi bon.
谑=huoc [xue4]\n\t1. Noi dua, noi bon.
謖=tac [su4]\n\t1. Noi len, troi len, khoi len. \n\t2. Tac tac 謖謖 cung coi. Ly Nguyen Le tac tac nhu kinh tung ha phong 李元禮謖謖如勁松下風 ong Ly Nguyen Le co dang cung coi nhu gio thoi duoi cay thong to vay. \n\t3. Khep nep.
谡=tac [su4]\n\t1. Noi len, troi len, khoi len. \n\t2. Tac tac 謖謖 cung coi. Ly Nguyen Le tac tac nhu kinh tung ha phong 李元禮謖謖如勁松下風 ong Ly Nguyen Le co dang cung coi nhu gio thoi duoi cay thong to vay. \n\t3. Khep nep.
謗=bang [bang4]\n\t1. Che bai, bang bo, thay nguoi lam viec trai ma moi nguoi cung xum lai che bai mai mia goi la bang.
谤=bang [bang4]\n\t1. Che bai, bang bo, thay nguoi lam viec trai ma moi nguoi cung xum lai che bai mai mia goi la bang.
謙=khiem, khiem [qian1]\n\t1. Nhun nhuong, tu nhun nhuong khong dam khoe goi la khiem. \n\t2. Mot am la khiem. Thoa thue.
谦=khiem, khiem [qian1]\n\t1. Nhun nhuong, tu nhun nhuong khong dam khoe goi la khiem. \n\t2. Mot am la khiem. Thoa thue.
講=giang [jiang3]\n\t1 Hoa giai, lay loi noi bao cho hai ben hieu y tu nhau ma hoa voi nhau khong tranh gianh nhau nua goi la giang. Nhu giang hoa 講和. \n\t2. Giang giai, lay loi noi ma noi cho nguoi ta hieu ro nghia goi la giang. Nhu giang thu 講書 giang sach, giang kinh 講經, v.v. \n\t3. Ban noi. \n\t4. Tap, xet. \n\t5. Muu toan.
讲=giang [jiang3]\n\t1 Hoa giai, lay loi noi bao cho hai ben hieu y tu nhau ma hoa voi nhau khong tranh gianh nhau nua goi la giang. Nhu giang hoa 講和. \n\t2. Giang giai, lay loi noi ma noi cho nguoi ta hieu ro nghia goi la giang. Nhu giang thu 講書 giang sach, giang kinh 講經, v.v. \n\t3. Ban noi. \n\t4. Tap, xet. \n\t5. Muu toan.
謝=ta [xie4]\n\t1. Tu ta. Nhu ta khach 謝客 tu khong tiep khach, xin thoi khong lam quan nua ma ve goi la ta chanh 謝政. \n\t2. Lui, nhu xuan thu dai ta 春秋代謝 mua kia lui di mua no thay den, hoa rung cung goi la hoa ta 花謝. \n\t3. Ta. Nhu ta toi, ta loi, ta on.
谢=ta [xie4]\n\t1. Tu ta. Nhu ta khach 謝客 tu khong tiep khach, xin thoi khong lam quan nua ma ve goi la ta chanh 謝政. \n\t2. Lui, nhu xuan thu dai ta 春秋代謝 mua kia lui di mua no thay den, hoa rung cung goi la hoa ta 花謝. \n\t3. Ta. Nhu ta toi, ta loi, ta on.
謡=dao [yao2]\n\t1. Cau ve, bai hat co chuong co khuc goi la ca 歌, khong co chuong co khuc goi la dao 謡. Nhu phong dao, ca dao, v.v. \n\t2. Loi bia dat, nhu dao ngon 謡言 loi noi bia dat.
謦=khanh [qing3]\n\t1. Khanh khai 謦欬 tieng cuoi noi. Tieng noi nhe nhang goi la khanh, tieng noi nang manh goi la khai.
謨=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Muu da dinh han roi goi la mo. Nhu vien mo 遠謨 muu dinh sau xa. \n\t2. Muu lam.
谟=mo [mo2]\n\t1. Muu da dinh han roi goi la mo. Nhu vien mo 遠謨 muu dinh sau xa. \n\t2. Muu lam.
謫=trich [zhe2]\n\t1. Khien trach, trach phat. Quan pham toi phai day ra ngoai bien thuy goi la trich thu 謫戍 hay trich giang 謫降. \n\t2. Loi lam. \n\t3. Bien khi.
谪=trich [zhe2]\n\t1. Khien trach, trach phat. Quan pham toi phai day ra ngoai bien thuy goi la trich thu 謫戍 hay trich giang 謫降. \n\t2. Loi lam. \n\t3. Bien khi.
謬=mau [miu4]\n\t1. Noi xang, noi bay. \n\t2. Sai lam. Sai chi hao li, mau di thien li 差之毫厘，謬以千里 sai mot li, di mot dam.
谬=mau [miu4]\n\t1. Noi xang, noi bay. \n\t2. Sai lam. Sai chi hao li, mau di thien li 差之毫厘，謬以千里 sai mot li, di mot dam.
謯=tro [zu3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu tro 詛.
謳=au [ou1]\n\t1. Cat tieng cung hat, ngoi hat. Au ca tien liet anh hung su tich 謳歌先烈英雄事跡 ca ngoi su tich anh hung cua cac bac tien liet. \n\t2. Tieng tre con.
讴=au [ou1]\n\t1. Cat tieng cung hat, ngoi hat. Au ca tien liet anh hung su tich 謳歌先烈英雄事跡 ca ngoi su tich anh hung cua cac bac tien liet. \n\t2. Tieng tre con.
謷=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Mia mai, che. Moi nguoi cung than tho goi la ngao ngao 謷謷. \n\t2. Rong lon, mong menh.
謹=can [jin3]\n\t1. Can than, can trong, nghia la lam viec de y ky luong khong dam coi thuong. \n\t2. Kinh. Nhu can bach 謹白 kinh bach.
谨=can [jin3]\n\t1. Can than, can trong, nghia la lam viec de y ky luong khong dam coi thuong. \n\t2. Kinh. Nhu can bach 謹白 kinh bach.
謻=di [yi2]\n\t1. Cai nha hay cai dai lam biet ra han mot cho.
謼=ho [hu1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu ho 呼.
謾=man, man [man2|man4]\n\t1. Lua doi, lay loi noi bip nguoi goi la man. \n\t2. Tre nai. \n\t3. Man mac. Cung doc la chu man.
谩=man, man [man2|man4]\n\t1. Lua doi, lay loi noi bip nguoi goi la man. \n\t2. Tre nai. \n\t3. Man mac. Cung doc la chu man.
譁=hoa [hua1]\n\t1. Ram ri. Nhu huyen hoa 諠譁.
譆=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Oi chao ! tieng so hai. \n\t2. Nong.
譈=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Oan trach, ghet.
證=chung [zheng4]\n\t1. Chung co, nghia la cu lay cai da nghe da thay de xet nghiem thuc tinh vay. nhu kien chung 見證, chung cu 證據, v.v. \n\t2. Chung benh.
譍=ung [ying1]\n\t1. Tra loi lai. Nay thong dung nhu chu ung 應.
譎=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Lua loc, quy quyet, bien tra tram khoanh nghin cach khien cho nguoi khong xet duoc goi la quyet. Nhu quyet quy 譎詭. Vi the nen su vat gi boi roi khuc chiet cung goi la quyet. \n\t2. Quyen thuat. \n\t3. Noi canh.
谲=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Lua loc, quy quyet, bien tra tram khoanh nghin cach khien cho nguoi khong xet duoc goi la quyet. Nhu quyet quy 譎詭. Vi the nen su vat gi boi roi khuc chiet cung goi la quyet. \n\t2. Quyen thuat. \n\t3. Noi canh.
譏=ky [ji1]\n\t1. Quo trach, che, thay nguoi lam loi ma hoi lo y che goi la ky. \n\t2. Hoi van, kiem tra, xem xet. Sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi quan ky nhi bat chinh 關譏而不征 cac cua o chi xet hoi ma khong danh thue.
讥=ky [ji1]\n\t1. Quo trach, che, thay nguoi lam loi ma hoi lo y che goi la ky. \n\t2. Hoi van, kiem tra, xem xet. Sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi quan ky nhi bat chinh 關譏而不征 cac cua o chi xet hoi ma khong danh thue.
譔=soan [zhuan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu soan 撰.
譖=tram, tiem [zen4]\n\t1. Cao mach, vu va. \n\t2. Noi giem. \n\t3. Mot am la tiem. Cung nghia voi chu tiem 僭.
谮=tram, tiem [zen4]\n\t1. Cao mach, vu va. \n\t2. Noi giem. \n\t3. Mot am la tiem. Cung nghia voi chu tiem 僭.
識=thuc, chi [shi2|zhi4]\n\t1. Biet, phan biet, thay ma nhan biet duoc. \n\t2. Hieu biet. Nhu tri thuc 知識, kien thuc 見識, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la chi. Cung nghia voi chu chi 誌 ghi nho. \n\t4. Khoan chi 欵識 nhung chu duc vao chuong, dinh. Chu duc loi ra ngoai goi la khoan 欵, chu duc lom vao goi la chi 識.
识=thuc, chi [shi2|zhi4]\n\t1. Biet, phan biet, thay ma nhan biet duoc. \n\t2. Hieu biet. Nhu tri thuc 知識, kien thuc 見識, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la chi. Cung nghia voi chu chi 誌 ghi nho. \n\t4. Khoan chi 欵識 nhung chu duc vao chuong, dinh. Chu duc loi ra ngoai goi la khoan 欵, chu duc lom vao goi la chi 識.
譙=tieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Mang qua, trach mang qua loa. \n\t2. Mot am la tieu. Cai choi cao o tren thanh goi la tieu lau 譙樓.
谯=tieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Mang qua, trach mang qua loa. \n\t2. Mot am la tieu. Cai choi cao o tren thanh goi la tieu lau 譙樓.
譚=dam [tan2]\n\t1. To lon. \n\t2. Ban bac. Cung nhu chu dam 談. \n\t3. Tre trang. \n\t4. Ho Dam.
谭=dam [tan2]\n\t1. To lon. \n\t2. Ban bac. Cung nhu chu dam 談. \n\t3. Tre trang. \n\t4. Ho Dam.
譛=tram [zen4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tram 譖.
譜=pho, pha [pu3]\n\t1. Pha, so chep ve nhan vat va chia ranh thu tu. Nhu gia pho 家譜 pha chep the thu trong nha ho. \n\t2. Nien pho 年譜 pha chep cac nguoi cung tuoi hay cung do mot khoa. Nguoi cung ho goi la dong pho 同普. Vi the nen anh em ket nghia cung goi la pho huynh de 譜兄弟. \n\t3. Cac khuc am nhac phai che ra pha de lam dau hieu. Vi the nen khuc hat goi la pho. Ta quen doc la pha.
谱=pho, pha [pu3]\n\t1. Pha, so chep ve nhan vat va chia ranh thu tu. Nhu gia pho 家譜 pha chep the thu trong nha ho. \n\t2. Nien pho 年譜 pha chep cac nguoi cung tuoi hay cung do mot khoa. Nguoi cung ho goi la dong pho 同普. Vi the nen anh em ket nghia cung goi la pho huynh de 譜兄弟. \n\t3. Cac khuc am nhac phai che ra pha de lam dau hieu. Vi the nen khuc hat goi la pho. Ta quen doc la pha.
譟=tao [zao4]\n\t1. Reo ram ram, nhieu tieng reo ho goi la tao. \n\t2. Che trach.
警=canh [jing3]\n\t1. Ran bao, lay loi noi ghe gom khien cho nguoi phai chu y nghe goi la canh. Nhu canh chung 警眾 ran bao moi nguoi. Vi the nen bao cao nhung tin nguy bien ngoai bien thuy goi la canh. \n\t2. Phong bi truoc. Ngay xua vua di ra deu cam khong cho ai di lai de phong su phi thuong goi la canh tat 警蹕. Nay cac noi dat tuan phu hay doi xep de phong bi su xay ra cung goi la canh ca. Nhu tuan canh 巡警, canh sat 警察, v.v. \n\t3. Danh thuc. \n\t4. Nhanh nhen. \n\t5. Kinh hai.
譫=chiem, thiem [zhan1]\n\t1. Noi me, noi sang. Ta quen doc la thiem.
谵=chiem, thiem [zhan1]\n\t1. Noi me, noi sang. Ta quen doc la thiem.
譬=thi [pi4]\n\t1. Vi du. \n\t2. Hieu ro. \n\t3. Vi nhu.
譯=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Dich ra, dich tieng nuoc nay sang tieng nuoc khac goi la dich. \n\t2. Dien dich nghia kinh.
译=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Dich ra, dich tieng nuoc nay sang tieng nuoc khac goi la dich. \n\t2. Dien dich nghia kinh.
議=nghi [yi4]\n\t1. Ban, ban ve su ly de phan biet phai trai goi la luan 論, ban ve su ly de dinh viec nen hay khong goi la nghi 議. Nhu hoi nghi 會議 hop ban, quyet nghi 決議 ban cho quyet xong de thi hanh. \n\t2. Mot loi van, nhu tau nghi 奏議 so tau vua va ban cac chanh sach hay do the nao. \n\t3. Che. Nhu thien ha huu dao, tac thu nhan bat nghi 天下有道則庶人不議 thien ha co dao thi ke thu nhan khong che. \n\t4. Ken chon.
议=nghi [yi4]\n\t1. Ban, ban ve su ly de phan biet phai trai goi la luan 論, ban ve su ly de dinh viec nen hay khong goi la nghi 議. Nhu hoi nghi 會議 hop ban, quyet nghi 決議 ban cho quyet xong de thi hanh. \n\t2. Mot loi van, nhu tau nghi 奏議 so tau vua va ban cac chanh sach hay do the nao. \n\t3. Che. Nhu thien ha huu dao, tac thu nhan bat nghi 天下有道則庶人不議 thien ha co dao thi ke thu nhan khong che. \n\t4. Ken chon.
譱=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu thien 善.
譅=sap [se4]\n\t1. Cham chap, ap ung. Noi nang khong duoc nhanh nhen goi la not sap 訥譅.
譴=khien [qian3]\n\t1. Trach phat (co toi bi trach phat). Nhu khien trach 譴責 len an, phe phan. \n\t2. Toi.
谴=khien [qian3]\n\t1. Trach phat (co toi bi trach phat). Nhu khien trach 譴責 len an, phe phan. \n\t2. Toi.
護=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Giup do. Nhu ho ve 護衛, bao ho 保護, v.v. \n\t2. Che cho. Nhu dan ho 袒護 benh vuc che cho cho. To boi phong kin cung goi la ho. Nhu ho phong 護封.
护=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Giup do. Nhu ho ve 護衛, bao ho 保護, v.v. \n\t2. Che cho. Nhu dan ho 袒護 benh vuc che cho cho. To boi phong kin cung goi la ho. Nhu ho phong 護封.
譸=tru [zhou1]\n\t1. Dan do. \n\t2. Tru truong 譸張 lua doi.
譽=du [yu4]\n\t1. Khen, khen nhung cai hay cua nguoi goi la du. \n\t2. Tieng khen. Nhu danh du 名譽. \n\t3. Yen vui.
誉=du [yu4]\n\t1. Khen, khen nhung cai hay cua nguoi goi la du. \n\t2. Tieng khen. Nhu danh du 名譽. \n\t3. Yen vui.
讁=trich [zhe2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trich 謫.
譾=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Nong noi, hep hoi. Nhu tien lau 譾陋 nghe thay hep hoi.
谫=tien [jian3]\n\t1. Nong noi, hep hoi. Nhu tien lau 譾陋 nghe thay hep hoi.
讀=doc, dau [dou4|du2]\n\t1. Doc, doc cho ranh rot tung cau tung chu goi la doc. Nhu thuc doc 熟讀 doc ky. \n\t2. Mot am la dau. Mot cau dau. Trong bai van cu den cho dut mach goi la cu 句, nua cau goi la dau 讀. Nghia la den cho ay tam dung mot ti, chua phai la dut mach han, cung nhu dau phay vay.
读=doc, dau [dou4|du2]\n\t1. Doc, doc cho ranh rot tung cau tung chu goi la doc. Nhu thuc doc 熟讀 doc ky. \n\t2. Mot am la dau. Mot cau dau. Trong bai van cu den cho dut mach goi la cu 句, nua cau goi la dau 讀. Nghia la den cho ay tam dung mot ti, chua phai la dut mach han, cung nhu dau phay vay.
讅=tham [shen3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu tham 審.
變=bien, bien [bian4]\n\t1. Bien doi. Nhu bien phap 變法 bien doi phep khac. Su vat gi thay cu ra moi goi la bien hoa 變化. \n\t2. Sai thuong, su tinh gi xay ra khac han loi thuong goi la bien. Vi the nen nhung diem tai va la lung, nhung su tang toc loan lac deu goi la bien. Nhu bien co 變故 co su hoan nan, bien doan 變端 manh moi nguy hiem, v.v. \n\t3. Quyen bien, dung muu ky chuoc la de ung pho nhung su phi thuong deu goi la bien. Nhu co bien 機變, quyen bien 權變, v.v. \n\t4. Dong. \n\t5. Mot am la bien. Chinh dang.
变=bien, bien [bian4]\n\t1. Bien doi. Nhu bien phap 變法 bien doi phep khac. Su vat gi thay cu ra moi goi la bien hoa 變化. \n\t2. Sai thuong, su tinh gi xay ra khac han loi thuong goi la bien. Vi the nen nhung diem tai va la lung, nhung su tang toc loan lac deu goi la bien. Nhu bien co 變故 co su hoan nan, bien doan 變端 manh moi nguy hiem, v.v. \n\t3. Quyen bien, dung muu ky chuoc la de ung pho nhung su phi thuong deu goi la bien. Nhu co bien 機變, quyen bien 權變, v.v. \n\t4. Dong. \n\t5. Mot am la bien. Chinh dang.
讋=triep [zhe2]\n\t1. So, mat khi.
讌=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Sum hop yen am. Co khi dung nhu chu yen 宴.
讎=thu [chou2]\n\t1. Dap lai, tuy cau hoi ma tra loi lai tung cau tung moi goi la thu. \n\t2. Den tra ngang cai gia do cua nguoi goi la thu. Nhu thu tri 讎直 tra du nhu so. \n\t3. Ngang nhau. \n\t4. Dang. \n\t5. Ung nghiem. \n\t6. Cuu thu, thu han. \n\t7. So sanh, nhu dem bai ban sach ra so sanh voi nhau xem co sai lam khong goi thu hieu thu 校讎.
雠=thu [chou2]\n\t1. Dap lai, tuy cau hoi ma tra loi lai tung cau tung moi goi la thu. \n\t2. Den tra ngang cai gia do cua nguoi goi la thu. Nhu thu tri 讎直 tra du nhu so. \n\t3. Ngang nhau. \n\t4. Dang. \n\t5. Ung nghiem. \n\t6. Cuu thu, thu han. \n\t7. So sanh, nhu dem bai ban sach ra so sanh voi nhau xem co sai lam khong goi thu hieu thu 校讎.
讒=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Giem pha, theu det cac loi noi bay lam cho mat cai hay cai phai cua nguoi di goi la sam.
谗=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Giem pha, theu det cac loi noi bay lam cho mat cai hay cai phai cua nguoi di goi la sam.
讓=nhuong [rang4]\n\t1. Trach, lay nghia lon trach nguoi goi la nhuong. \n\t2. Nhuong nhin, nhun nhuong, nhuong cho. \n\t3. Tu bo.
让=nhuong [rang4]\n\t1. Trach, lay nghia lon trach nguoi goi la nhuong. \n\t2. Nhuong nhin, nhun nhuong, nhuong cho. \n\t3. Tu bo.
讕=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Noi vu khong cho nguoi, noi man.
谰=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Noi vu khong cho nguoi, noi man.
讖=sam [chen4]\n\t1. Loi sam ky, su chua xay ra ma da biet truoc va noi bang cach bi an khong cho nguoi biet dich ngay, cho khi su xay ra roi moi biet the la sam. Nhu ta noi sam ong Trang Trinh vay.
谶=sam [chen4]\n\t1. Loi sam ky, su chua xay ra ma da biet truoc va noi bang cach bi an khong cho nguoi biet dich ngay, cho khi su xay ra roi moi biet the la sam. Nhu ta noi sam ong Trang Trinh vay.
讙=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. No dua ram ri. \n\t2. Vui mung.
讚=tan [zan4]\n\t1. Khen ngoi, tan than. \n\t2. Van tan, mot loi van tan duong cong duc nguoi va vat. \n\t3. Giup.
讜=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Noi thang. Nhu dang ngon 讜言 loi noi thang than.
谠=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Noi thang. Nhu dang ngon 讜言 loi noi thang than.
讞=nghien [yan4]\n\t1. Nghi toi, luan toi, chuyen an len toa tren, ket thanh an roi goi la dinh nghien 定讞.
谳=nghien [yan4]\n\t1. Nghi toi, luan toi, chuyen an len toa tren, ket thanh an roi goi la dinh nghien 定讞.
讟=doc [du2]\n\t1. Phi bang, loi oan thong nhap cot tuy.
谷=coc, loc, duc [gu3|yu4]\n\t1. Lung, suoi, hai ben nui giua co mot loi nuoc chay goi la coc. \n\t2. Hang, nui co cho thung hom vao goi la coc. \n\t3. Cung duong. Nhu Kinh Thi noi tien thoai duy coc 進退維谷 tien thoai deu cung duong. \n\t4. Mot am la loc. Loc lai 谷蠡 mot danh hieu phong sac cho cac chu hau Hung no. \n\t5. Lai mot am la duc. Nuoc Dot Duc Hon 吐谷渾.
谿=khe [xi1]\n\t1. Lach, khe nuoc trong nui. Cung viet la khe 溪.
豀=he [xi1]\n\t1. Bot he 勃豀 chong cai, ngang trai. Cung viet la 勃谿.
豁=khoat [huo1|huo4]\n\t1. Hang thong suot ca hai dau. Vi the nen cho dat nao phang phan sang sua goi la hien khoat 軒豁, nguoi gia goi la dau dong xi khoat 頭同齒豁 dau troc rang long. \n\t2. Thong suot, tam y rong rai khoan thai goi la khoat. Nhu khoat nhien quan thong 豁然貫通 vo vac thong suot. \n\t3. Khai phong, tha bong. Nhu tien luong chi khoat mien 錢糧之豁免 tha khong bat nop tien luong nua , hinh nguc chi sieu khoat 刑獄之超豁 khong bat chiu hinh nguc nua.
豆=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Bat dau, cai bat tien bang go de dung pham vat cung hoac cac thuc dua, giam v.v. Tu thien dung ngoa dau 祀天用瓦豆 te troi dung bat bang dat nung. \n\t2. Do, dau, mot loai thuc vat de an. Nhu dau tuong, dau xanh, v.v.
豇=giang [jiang1]\n\t1. Giong dau lang lo.
豈=khoi, khai [qi3]\n\t1. Ha, sao. Dung lam loi noi trai lai. Nhu khoi cam 豈敢 ha dam, khoi kha 豈可 ha nen. \n\t2. Thua, cung nhu chu ky 其. \n\t3. Mot am la khai, cung nghia voi chu 愷.
岂=khoi, khai [qi3]\n\t1. Ha, sao. Dung lam loi noi trai lai. Nhu khoi cam 豈敢 ha dam, khoi kha 豈可 ha nen. \n\t2. Thua, cung nhu chu ky 其. \n\t3. Mot am la khai, cung nghia voi chu 愷.
豉=thi [chi3]\n\t1. Dau thi, dau muoi voi muoi goi la ham thi 鹹豉 (tuong tau), nhat khong co muoi goi la dam thi 淡豉. Ta quen goi la dau xi 豆豉.
豋=dang [deng1]\n\t1. Cai bat bang sanh dung pham vat cung.
豌=oan [wan1]\n\t1. Mot thu dau. Oan dau 豌豆, cung goi la ho dau 胡豆.
豎=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Dung dung, thu ky can 豎棋杆 dung cot co. \n\t2. Chieu doc, net ngang cua chu goi la hoach 畫, net doc goi la thu 豎. \n\t3. Thang nho, tre hau trai chua den tuoi doi mu goi la thu. Nhu muc thu 牧豎 thang be chan trau, cung goi la muc dong 牧童. Vua Tan Canh Cong om, nam me thay hai thang be con nup o duoi mang mo, vi the bay gio moi goi bi benh la vi nhi thu so khon 為二豎所困. \n\t4. Chuc bay toi nho o trong cung. Nhu noi thu 內豎 quan hau trong, be thu 嬖豎 quan hau than duoc vua yeu. \n\t5. Hen mon. Nhu thu nho 豎儒 ke hoc tro hen mon.
竖=thu [shu4]\n\t1. Dung dung, thu ky can 豎棋杆 dung cot co. \n\t2. Chieu doc, net ngang cua chu goi la hoach 畫, net doc goi la thu 豎. \n\t3. Thang nho, tre hau trai chua den tuoi doi mu goi la thu. Nhu muc thu 牧豎 thang be chan trau, cung goi la muc dong 牧童. Vua Tan Canh Cong om, nam me thay hai thang be con nup o duoi mang mo, vi the bay gio moi goi bi benh la vi nhi thu so khon 為二豎所困. \n\t4. Chuc bay toi nho o trong cung. Nhu noi thu 內豎 quan hau trong, be thu 嬖豎 quan hau than duoc vua yeu. \n\t5. Hen mon. Nhu thu nho 豎儒 ke hoc tro hen mon.
豐=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Hat dau nay, vi the nen cai gi thinh vuong to lon deu goi la phong. Nhu phong thinh 豐盛, phong phu 豐富. \n\t2. Hau hi, su vat gi gia them cho nhieu goi la tong phong 從豐. \n\t3. Tot tuoi. Nhu phong thao 豐草 co tot. \n\t4. Duoc mua. Nhu phong nien 豐年 nam duoc mua. Thi Kinh 詩經. Phong nien, thu dong bao da 豐年，秋冬報也 nam duoc mua, mua thu mua dong bao tin cho. \n\t5. Cai phong, nho kem cai dau.
丰=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Hat dau nay, vi the nen cai gi thinh vuong to lon deu goi la phong. Nhu phong thinh 豐盛, phong phu 豐富. \n\t2. Hau hi, su vat gi gia them cho nhieu goi la tong phong 從豐. \n\t3. Tot tuoi. Nhu phong thao 豐草 co tot. \n\t4. Duoc mua. Nhu phong nien 豐年 nam duoc mua. Thi Kinh 詩經. Phong nien, thu dong bao da 豐年，秋冬報也 nam duoc mua, mua thu mua dong bao tin cho. \n\t5. Cai phong, nho kem cai dau.
豒=trat [zhi4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu trat 秩.
豔=diem [yan4]\n\t1. Tuoi dep, dang mat day dan tuoi dep goi la diem. Nhu kieu diem 嬌豔 tuoi dep ong a, van tu hoa my goi la diem the 豔體, ai tinh nong nan goi la diem tinh 豔情, v.v. \n\t2. Ham chuong. Nhu ham diem 歆豔 ham mo ham thich. \n\t3. Con gai dep. \n\t4. Mau mo, ruc ro. \n\t5. Khuc hat nuoc So.
豕=thi [shi3]\n\t1. Con lon.
豗=hoi [hui1]\n\t1. Danh nhau. Nhu huyen hoi 喧豗 tieng danh chui nhau ram ri.
豚=don, don [tun2]\n\t1. Con lon con. \n\t2. Mot am la don. Di keo le got chan.
豝=ba [ba1]\n\t1. Con lon cai, lon hai nam cung goi la ba. \n\t2. Thit kho. Cung nghia voi chu ba 羓.
象=tuong [xiang4]\n\t1. Con voi. \n\t2. Nga voi. Nhu tuong hot 象笏 cai hot bang nga voi. \n\t3. Hinh trang, hinh tuong. Nhu. do tuong 圖象 tranh tuong, nay thong dung chu 像. \n\t4. Tuong giao 象教 nha Phat cho dao Phat sau khi Phat to tich roi mot nghin nam la thoi ky tuong giao, nghia la chi con co hinh tuong Phat chu khong thay chan than Phat nua. \n\t5. Khi tuong, co cai hinh tuong lo ra ngoai. \n\t6. Lam phep, guong mau. \n\t7. Do dung ruou. \n\t8. Dieu mua.
豢=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Nuoi bang thoc lua. Nhu nuoi trau ngua goi la so 芻 (cho an co), nuoi cho lon goi la hoan 豢 (cho an lua). \n\t2. Lay loi nhu nguoi.
豨=hi [xi1]\n\t1. Con lon. \n\t2. Hi hi 豨豨 tieng lon chay.
