豪=hao [hao2]\n\t1. Con hao, mot loai thu nhu loai lon. \n\t2. Sang suot, tri tue hon tram nguoi goi la hao. Nhu hao kiet 豪傑. \n\t3. Lam mot nguoi chua trum trong mot bon cung goi la hao. Nhu huong hao 鄉豪 nguoi trum trong mot lang. \n\t4. Hao hiep, y khi phi thuong cung goi la hao. Nhu hao cu 豪舉 lam nen viec phi thuong, hao am 豪飲 uong ruou khoe hon nguoi, thi hao 詩豪 bac lam tho gioi hon nguoi. \n\t6. Hao, cung nghia voi chu 毫.
豫=du, ta [yu4]\n\t1. Yen vui. Nhu ha du 暇豫 roi nhan. \n\t2. Som. Nhu pham su du tac lap 凡事豫則立 pham su gi lieu som di thi nen. \n\t3. Chau Du, nay thuoc vao coi dat phia tay tinh Ha Nam, tinh Son Dong, va phia bac Ho Bac nuoc Tau, vi the nen moi goi tinh Ha Nam la tinh Du. \n\t4. Do du 猶豫 ten hai con thu, tinh da nghi, vi the nen nguoi nao lam viec khong qua quyet cung goi la do du. \n\t5. Tham du. \n\t6. Mot am la ta, cung nghia voi chu ta 榭.
豬=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Con lon, chu thong dung de goi loai lon. \n\t2. Chua nuoc, cung nghia voi chu tru 瀦.
猪=tru [zhu1]\n\t1. Con lon, chu thong dung de goi loai lon. \n\t2. Chua nuoc, cung nghia voi chu tru 瀦.
豳=ban [bin1]\n\t1. Nuoc Ban, thuoc tinh Thiem Tay nuoc Tau bay gio.
豷=e [yi4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi. \n\t2. Lon tho, lon nghi.
豸=tri, trai [zhi4]\n\t1. Loai bo sat, loai sau khong co chan goi la tri 豸, sau co chan goi la trung 虫. \n\t2. Giai duoc. Nhu Ta truyen 左傳 noi su Khuoc tu sinh ky chi, thu huu tri ho 使郤子逞其志，庶有豸乎 de cho Khuoc tu no thich chi, ngo hau moi giai duoc moi hoa chang. \n\t3. Mot am la trai. Giai trai 獬豸 con de than.
豹=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Con bao (con beo), thu bao co van nhu dong tien vang goi la kim tien bao 金錢豹.
豺=sai [chai2]\n\t1. Cho soi, long dai ram, chan nhu chan cho, tinh rat tan ac.
豻=ngan [an4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu ngan 犴.
貂=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Mot loai chuot to nhu con rai ca, duoi to long ram dai hon mot tac, sac vang va den, sinh o xu ret, da no lam ao mac rat am, nen rat quy bau. Loi phuc suc nha Han, mu cua quan Thi-trung thuong-thi deu cam duoi con dieu, duc con ve vang deo vao cho dep, vi the goi cac ke quyen quy la nhi dieu 珥貂, hoan quan goi la dieu dang 貂璫.
貃=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Giong moi o phuong bac.
貅=huu [xiu1]\n\t1. Ti huu 貔貅 con gau trang (bach hung), mot giong thu rat manh, cho nen doi xua cac dung si goi la ti huu.
貉=hac, mach [hao2|he2]\n\t1. Mot giong thu giong nhu con cay dau mui nhon, tinh hay ngu, ngay ngu dem ra an cac loai sau, long loang lo, ram ma muot am, dung may ao am. \n\t2. Mot am la mach. Cung nghia voi chu mach 貃 mot giong moi o phuong bac.
貌=mao, moc [mao4]\n\t1. Dang mat nhu tuyet phu hoa mao 雪膚花貌 da nhu tuyet, mat nhu hoa. \n\t2. Be ngoai nhu mao vi cung kinh 貌為恭敬 be ngoai lam ra bo cung kinh. \n\t3. Le mao 禮貌 dang cung kinh. \n\t4. Sac mat. \n\t5. Mot am la moc. Ve hinh nguoi hay vat.
貍=li, uat [li2]\n\t1. Con cay, con cao, con nao duoi co chin duong van goi la cuu tiet ly 九節貍, con nao co huong lay lam xa dung goi la huong ly 香貍 con cay huong, cung co ten la linh mieu 靈貓. \n\t2. Mot am la uat. Mui hoi thoi.
貓=mieu [mao1|mao2]\n\t1. Con meo.
猫=mieu [mao1|mao2]\n\t1. Con meo.
貔=ti [pi2]\n\t1. Ti huu 貔貅 con gau trang (bach hung), mot giong thu rat manh, cho nen doi xua cac dung si goi la ti huu.
貛=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Mot giong da thu hinh xac nho ma beo, mom nhon, chan ngan, duoi ngan, o hang, thuong hay dao thung de dieu. Thu giong lon long vang suom goi la tru hoan 猪貛, thu giong cho nhuom nhuom goi la cau hoan 狗貛, lot da thuoc dung lam dem duoc.
貝=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Con so, ngay xua dung vo so lam tien tieu, cho nen nhung chu noi ve cua cai phan nhieu co chu 貝 o ben. Nhung do quy bau goi la bao boi 寶貝. \n\t2. Cac do de Phat lay la cay boi da viet kinh goi la boi diep kinh 貝葉經. \n\t3. Trang suc.
贝=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Con so, ngay xua dung vo so lam tien tieu, cho nen nhung chu noi ve cua cai phan nhieu co chu 貝 o ben. Nhung do quy bau goi la bao boi 寶貝. \n\t2. Cac do de Phat lay la cay boi da viet kinh goi la boi diep kinh 貝葉經. \n\t3. Trang suc.
貞=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Trinh, chinh dinh, giu duoc tam long chinh dinh thuy chung khong ai lam lay dong duoc goi la trinh. Nhu trung trinh 忠貞, kien trinh 堅貞, v.v... Dan ba khong that tiet (khong yeu ai, chi yeu mot chong) goi la trinh phu 貞婦. Con gai chinh dinh (khong theo trai) goi la trinh nu 貞女. \n\t2. Boi xem, boi hoi su chinh dinh goi la trinh. Nhu trinh cat 貞吉 chinh dinh tot. \n\t3. Tinh thanh.
贞=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Trinh, chinh dinh, giu duoc tam long chinh dinh thuy chung khong ai lam lay dong duoc goi la trinh. Nhu trung trinh 忠貞, kien trinh 堅貞, v.v... Dan ba khong that tiet (khong yeu ai, chi yeu mot chong) goi la trinh phu 貞婦. Con gai chinh dinh (khong theo trai) goi la trinh nu 貞女. \n\t2. Boi xem, boi hoi su chinh dinh goi la trinh. Nhu trinh cat 貞吉 chinh dinh tot. \n\t3. Tinh thanh.
貟=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu vien 員.
負=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Cay, cay co cho tua khong so goi la phu. Nhu phu ngung chi the 負嵎之勢 cay co cai the dang sau co cho tua chac, cay tai khinh nguoi goi la tu phu bat pham 自負不凡. \n\t2. Vac, cong. Nhu phu kiem 負劍 vac guom, phu me 負米 vac gao, v.v. \n\t3. Vo. Nhu phu trai 負債 vo no, phu an 負恩 phu on (vo on), phu tam 負心 phu long. Tu tui khong lay gi ma doi voi nguoi duoc goi la phu phu vo kha ngon 負負無可言 ben len khong biet noi sao. \n\t4. Thua. Nhu thang phu 勝負 duoc thua. \n\t5. Lo. \n\t6. Tieng goi ba gia.
负=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Cay, cay co cho tua khong so goi la phu. Nhu phu ngung chi the 負嵎之勢 cay co cai the dang sau co cho tua chac, cay tai khinh nguoi goi la tu phu bat pham 自負不凡. \n\t2. Vac, cong. Nhu phu kiem 負劍 vac guom, phu me 負米 vac gao, v.v. \n\t3. Vo. Nhu phu trai 負債 vo no, phu an 負恩 phu on (vo on), phu tam 負心 phu long. Tu tui khong lay gi ma doi voi nguoi duoc goi la phu phu vo kha ngon 負負無可言 ben len khong biet noi sao. \n\t4. Thua. Nhu thang phu 勝負 duoc thua. \n\t5. Lo. \n\t6. Tieng goi ba gia.
財=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Cua, la mot tieng goi tat ca cac thu cua cai nhu tien nong do dac nha cua ruong dat, he co gia tri deu goi la tai san 財產, cac do dac trong cua hang buon deu goi la sinh tai 生財.
财=tai [cai2]\n\t1. Cua, la mot tieng goi tat ca cac thu cua cai nhu tien nong do dac nha cua ruong dat, he co gia tri deu goi la tai san 財產, cac do dac trong cua hang buon deu goi la sinh tai 生財.
貢=cong [gong4]\n\t1. Cong, dang. Nhu tien cong 進貢 dang cac vat tho san. \n\t2. Thue cong, thu thue ruong. \n\t3. Cho. \n\t4. Cao, bao. \n\t5. Tien cu. Nhu cong si 貢士 ke si duoc tien cu len, di thi do cung goi la cong. Nhu huong cong 鄉貢 do cu nhan. \n\t6. Tay Cong 西貢 Sai-gon.
贡=cong [gong4]\n\t1. Cong, dang. Nhu tien cong 進貢 dang cac vat tho san. \n\t2. Thue cong, thu thue ruong. \n\t3. Cho. \n\t4. Cao, bao. \n\t5. Tien cu. Nhu cong si 貢士 ke si duoc tien cu len, di thi do cung goi la cong. Nhu huong cong 鄉貢 do cu nhan. \n\t6. Tay Cong 西貢 Sai-gon.
貤=di, di [yi2]\n\t1. Di dich 貤易 ban doi. \n\t2. Mot am la di. Doi. Nhu nguoi nay dang duoc phong ma lai xin doi doi phong cho nguoi khac goi la di phong 貤封 hay di tang 貤贈, v.v...
貧=ban [pin2]\n\t1. Ngheo. Nhu ban si 貧士 hoc tro ngheo. \n\t2. Thieu. Nhu ban huyet benh 貧血病 benh thieu mau. \n\t3. Loi noi nhun minh. Nhu ban tang 貧僧 ke tu hanh hen dot nay.
贫=ban [pin2]\n\t1. Ngheo. Nhu ban si 貧士 hoc tro ngheo. \n\t2. Thieu. Nhu ban huyet benh 貧血病 benh thieu mau. \n\t3. Loi noi nhun minh. Nhu ban tang 貧僧 ke tu hanh hen dot nay.
貨=hoa [huo4]\n\t1. Cua. Nhu hoa te 貨幣 cua cai. Pham vat gi co the doi lay tien duoc deu goi la hoa. \n\t2. Ban. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi vo xu nhi quy chi, thi hoa chi da 無處而餽之，是貨之也 khong co co gi ma dua cho, the la ban day vay. \n\t3. Dut cua.
货=hoa [huo4]\n\t1. Cua. Nhu hoa te 貨幣 cua cai. Pham vat gi co the doi lay tien duoc deu goi la hoa. \n\t2. Ban. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi vo xu nhi quy chi, thi hoa chi da 無處而餽之，是貨之也 khong co co gi ma dua cho, the la ban day vay. \n\t3. Dut cua.
販=phien, phan [fan4]\n\t1. Mua re ban dat, buon ban. \n\t2. Cung doc la phan.
贩=phien, phan [fan4]\n\t1. Mua re ban dat, buon ban. \n\t2. Cung doc la phan.
貪=tham [tan1]\n\t1. An cua dut. Nhu tham tang uong phap 貪贓枉法 an dut lam loan phep. \n\t2. Tham, pham mong cau khong biet chan deu goi la tham.
贪=tham [tan1]\n\t1. An cua dut. Nhu tham tang uong phap 貪贓枉法 an dut lam loan phep. \n\t2. Tham, pham mong cau khong biet chan deu goi la tham.
貫=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Cai day xau tien, cho nen goi mot xau nghin dong tien la nhat quan 一貫 (mot quan). Nhu van quan gia tu 萬貫家私 nha giau co den van quan. Tinh so tham tang trom cap, tich chua duoc du so bao nhieu do goi la man quan 滿貫 nghia la nhu xau tien da du quan, cho den het cu vay, vi the nen toi ac den cung cuc goi la ac quan man doanh 惡貫滿盈. \n\t2. Suot thong, xau qua. Nhu quan chau 貫珠 xau hat chau. Pham di dau ma khong co gi ngan tro duoc deu goi la quan. Nhu trung quan nhat nguyet 忠貫日月 long trung suot qua mat troi mat trang, nghia quan kim thach 義貫金石 nghia suot qua ca vang da, v.v. Thong hieu van nghia goi la yem quan 淹貫 hay dieu quan 條貫 v.v. \n\t3. Lien suot. Nhu ngu quan nhi tien 魚貫而進 cu lan luot lien noi ma tien len. \n\t4. Que quan. Nhu huong quan 鄉貫. \n\t5. Quen. Nhu nga bat quan du tieu nhan thang 我不貫與小人乘 (Manh Tu 孟子) toi khong quen cung ke tieu nhan cung cuoi xe. \n\t6. Hieu thong suot. \n\t7. Tin, trung. \n\t8. Su. Nhu Nhung cuu quan. Nhu chi ha ? Ha tat cai tac 仍舊貫，如之何？何必改作 (Luan ngu 論語) van su cu, chang duoc sao ? can gi phai sua doi.
贯=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Cai day xau tien, cho nen goi mot xau nghin dong tien la nhat quan 一貫 (mot quan). Nhu van quan gia tu 萬貫家私 nha giau co den van quan. Tinh so tham tang trom cap, tich chua duoc du so bao nhieu do goi la man quan 滿貫 nghia la nhu xau tien da du quan, cho den het cu vay, vi the nen toi ac den cung cuc goi la ac quan man doanh 惡貫滿盈. \n\t2. Suot thong, xau qua. Nhu quan chau 貫珠 xau hat chau. Pham di dau ma khong co gi ngan tro duoc deu goi la quan. Nhu trung quan nhat nguyet 忠貫日月 long trung suot qua mat troi mat trang, nghia quan kim thach 義貫金石 nghia suot qua ca vang da, v.v. Thong hieu van nghia goi la yem quan 淹貫 hay dieu quan 條貫 v.v. \n\t3. Lien suot. Nhu ngu quan nhi tien 魚貫而進 cu lan luot lien noi ma tien len. \n\t4. Que quan. Nhu huong quan 鄉貫. \n\t5. Quen. Nhu nga bat quan du tieu nhan thang 我不貫與小人乘 (Manh Tu 孟子) toi khong quen cung ke tieu nhan cung cuoi xe. \n\t6. Hieu thong suot. \n\t7. Tin, trung. \n\t8. Su. Nhu Nhung cuu quan. Nhu chi ha ? Ha tat cai tac 仍舊貫，如之何？何必改作 (Luan ngu 論語) van su cu, chang duoc sao ? can gi phai sua doi.
責=trach, trai [ze2]\n\t1. Mong cau, phan su phai lam ma cau cho tat phai lam cho tron goi la trach. Nhu trach nham 責任, trach vong 責望, dam nhan cong viec goi la phu trach 負責. \n\t2. Trach mang. \n\t3. Danh don. Nhu truong trach 杖責 danh bang gay, di trach 笞責 danh bang roi. \n\t4. Hoi van. \n\t5. Mot am la trai, cung nghia voi chu trai 債 (no).
责=trach, trai [ze2]\n\t1. Mong cau, phan su phai lam ma cau cho tat phai lam cho tron goi la trach. Nhu trach nham 責任, trach vong 責望, dam nhan cong viec goi la phu trach 負責. \n\t2. Trach mang. \n\t3. Danh don. Nhu truong trach 杖責 danh bang gay, di trach 笞責 danh bang roi. \n\t4. Hoi van. \n\t5. Mot am la trai, cung nghia voi chu trai 債 (no).
貭=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu chat 質.
貯=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Tich chua. Nhu tru ton 貯存.
贮=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Tich chua. Nhu tru ton 貯存.
貰=the [shi4]\n\t1. Vay, cho thue do cung goi la the. \n\t2. Tha thu, xa toi cho.
贳=the [shi4]\n\t1. Vay, cho thue do cung goi la the. \n\t2. Tha thu, xa toi cho.
貲=ti [zi1]\n\t1. Phat tien, nay thong dung chu ti tai 貲財 thay chu tai hoa 財貨 (cua cai). \n\t2. Luong. Nhu bat ti 不貲 khong biet dau ma tinh cho xiet. Nhu so phi bat ti 所費不貲 tieu phi qua do.
赀=ti [zi1]\n\t1. Phat tien, nay thong dung chu ti tai 貲財 thay chu tai hoa 財貨 (cua cai). \n\t2. Luong. Nhu bat ti 不貲 khong biet dau ma tinh cho xiet. Nhu so phi bat ti 所費不貲 tieu phi qua do.
貳=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Chuc pho. Nhu ke thua ta goi la pho nhi 副貳, thai tu goi la tru nhi 儲貳 v.v. \n\t2. Hai, cung nhu chu nhi 二, dung de viet cac giay ma quan he cho khong chua gian duoc nua. \n\t3. Ngo. Nhu nham hien vat nhi 任賢勿貳 (Thu Kinh 書經) dung nguoi hien cho co ngo. Long khong trung thanh ve mot noi, mot ben nao goi la nhi tam 貳心. \n\t4. Sai lam.
贰=nhi [er4]\n\t1. Chuc pho. Nhu ke thua ta goi la pho nhi 副貳, thai tu goi la tru nhi 儲貳 v.v. \n\t2. Hai, cung nhu chu nhi 二, dung de viet cac giay ma quan he cho khong chua gian duoc nua. \n\t3. Ngo. Nhu nham hien vat nhi 任賢勿貳 (Thu Kinh 書經) dung nguoi hien cho co ngo. Long khong trung thanh ve mot noi, mot ben nao goi la nhi tam 貳心. \n\t4. Sai lam.
貴=quy [gui4]\n\t1. Sang, quy hien. \n\t2. Dat. Nhu ngang quy 昂貴 gia dat. \n\t3. Quy trong. \n\t4. Muon.
贵=quy [gui4]\n\t1. Sang, quy hien. \n\t2. Dat. Nhu ngang quy 昂貴 gia dat. \n\t3. Quy trong. \n\t4. Muon.
貶=biem [bian3]\n\t1. Biem xuong, giam bot, de nen xuong, tra dim gia xuong. Quan bi giang chuc goi la biem. \n\t2. Che. Nhu bao biem 褒貶 khen che.
贬=biem [bian3]\n\t1. Biem xuong, giam bot, de nen xuong, tra dim gia xuong. Quan bi giang chuc goi la biem. \n\t2. Che. Nhu bao biem 褒貶 khen che.
買=mai [mai3]\n\t1. Mua, lay tien doi lay do la mai. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Thuong nhan trong loi khinh biet ly, Tien nguyet Phu Luong mai tra khu 商人重利輕別離，前月浮梁買茶去 (Ty ba hanh 琵琶行) nguoi lai buon trong loi coi thuong ly biet, thang truoc di mua tra tai Phu Luong. Phan Huy Vinh 潘輝泳 dich tho. Khach trong loi, khinh duong ly cach, Mai buon che som tech nguon khoi.
买=mai [mai3]\n\t1. Mua, lay tien doi lay do la mai. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Thuong nhan trong loi khinh biet ly, Tien nguyet Phu Luong mai tra khu 商人重利輕別離，前月浮梁買茶去 (Ty ba hanh 琵琶行) nguoi lai buon trong loi coi thuong ly biet, thang truoc di mua tra tai Phu Luong. Phan Huy Vinh 潘輝泳 dich tho. Khach trong loi, khinh duong ly cach, Mai buon che som tech nguon khoi.
貸=thai, thac [dai4]\n\t1. Vay, cho vay. \n\t2. Rong tha cho. Nhu nghiem cuu bat thai 嚴究不貸 xet ngat khong tha. \n\t3. Mot am la thac, cung nhu chu thac 忒.
贷=thai, thac [dai4]\n\t1. Vay, cho vay. \n\t2. Rong tha cho. Nhu nghiem cuu bat thai 嚴究不貸 xet ngat khong tha. \n\t3. Mot am la thac, cung nhu chu thac 忒.
貺=huong [kuang4]\n\t1. Ban cho. Nhu hau huong 厚貺 cho nhieu. \n\t2. Loi kinh ta nguoi ta da cho minh. Nhu huong lam 貺臨 ngai lai toi den voi toi the cung nhu cho toi ve vang vay.
贶=huong [kuang4]\n\t1. Ban cho. Nhu hau huong 厚貺 cho nhieu. \n\t2. Loi kinh ta nguoi ta da cho minh. Nhu huong lam 貺臨 ngai lai toi den voi toi the cung nhu cho toi ve vang vay.
費=phi, bi [fei4]\n\t1. Tieu phi. \n\t2. Kinh phi 經費 mon tieu dung. \n\t3. Phien phi, tieu dung qua do goi la phi. \n\t4. Hao ton. Nhu phi luc 費力 hao suc. \n\t5. Mot am la bi, ten mot ap cua nuoc Lo ve doi Xuan Thu.
费=phi, bi [fei4]\n\t1. Tieu phi. \n\t2. Kinh phi 經費 mon tieu dung. \n\t3. Phien phi, tieu dung qua do goi la phi. \n\t4. Hao ton. Nhu phi luc 費力 hao suc. \n\t5. Mot am la bi, ten mot ap cua nuoc Lo ve doi Xuan Thu.
貼=thiep [tie1]\n\t1. Phu them bu them vao cho thieu goi la thiep. Nhu tan thiep 津貼 tham them, giup them. \n\t2. Dan, de do. Nhu yet thiep 揭貼 dan cai giay yet thi. \n\t3. Thu xep cho yen on. Nhu thoa thiep 妥貼 yen on thoa dang. \n\t4. Ben sat. Nhu su gi cung lien khit voi nhau goi la thiep thiet 貼切. \n\t5. Cam, do, doi nha Duong co tuc xin vao lam toi to nguoi ta de lay tien goi la dien thiep 典貼 cam nguoi. \n\t6. Ten phu tro, ngoai mot vai dong tro chinh ra lai them mot nguoi khac phu vao goi la thiep, tieng dung trong cac tan tuong. 
贴=thiep [tie1]\n\t1. Phu them bu them vao cho thieu goi la thiep. Nhu tan thiep 津貼 tham them, giup them. \n\t2. Dan, de do. Nhu yet thiep 揭貼 dan cai giay yet thi. \n\t3. Thu xep cho yen on. Nhu thoa thiep 妥貼 yen on thoa dang. \n\t4. Ben sat. Nhu su gi cung lien khit voi nhau goi la thiep thiet 貼切. \n\t5. Cam, do, doi nha Duong co tuc xin vao lam toi to nguoi ta de lay tien goi la dien thiep 典貼 cam nguoi. \n\t6. Ten phu tro, ngoai mot vai dong tro chinh ra lai them mot nguoi khac phu vao goi la thiep, tieng dung trong cac tan tuong. 
貽=di [yi2]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu quy di 餽貽 dua lam qua. Trang Tu 莊子. Nguy vuong di nga dai ho, nga chung thu chi thanh nhi that ngu thach 魏王貽我大瓠之種，我樹之成而實五石 (Tieu dao du 逍遙遊) vua Nguy cho toi giong bau lon, toi trong no thanh cay ra qua nang nam thach. \n\t2. De lai. Nhu di huan 貽訓 de lam guong lai day cho con chau.
贻=di [yi2]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu quy di 餽貽 dua lam qua. Trang Tu 莊子. Nguy vuong di nga dai ho, nga chung thu chi thanh nhi that ngu thach 魏王貽我大瓠之種，我樹之成而實五石 (Tieu dao du 逍遙遊) vua Nguy cho toi giong bau lon, toi trong no thanh cay ra qua nang nam thach. \n\t2. De lai. Nhu di huan 貽訓 de lam guong lai day cho con chau.
貿=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Doi lan cho nhau. Nhu mau dich 貿易 mua ban. \n\t2. Lan lon. \n\t3. Mau mau 貿貿 lem nhem, mat coi lo mo.
贸=mau [mao4]\n\t1. Doi lan cho nhau. Nhu mau dich 貿易 mua ban. \n\t2. Lan lon. \n\t3. Mau mau 貿貿 lem nhem, mat coi lo mo.
賀=ha [he4]\n\t1. Dua do mung. Nhu ha le 賀禮 do le mung. \n\t2. Chuc tung, den chuc mung goi la xung ha 稱賀 hay dao ha 道賀. \n\t3. Gia them. \n\t4. Vac.
贺=ha [he4]\n\t1. Dua do mung. Nhu ha le 賀禮 do le mung. \n\t2. Chuc tung, den chuc mung goi la xung ha 稱賀 hay dao ha 道賀. \n\t3. Gia them. \n\t4. Vac.
賁=bi, phan, bon [ben1|bi4]\n\t1. Ruc ro, sang sua. Nhu trong tho tu thuong dung chu bi lam 賁臨 nghia la ngai ha co toi nha toi thi nha toi duoc rang ro them. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. To lon. Nhu dung hoanh tu phan 用宏茲賁 dung cang rong lon. \n\t3. Lai mot am la bon. Dung si. Nhu ho bon 虎賁 dao quan hung trang cua vua.
贲=bi, phan, bon [ben1|bi4]\n\t1. Ruc ro, sang sua. Nhu trong tho tu thuong dung chu bi lam 賁臨 nghia la ngai ha co toi nha toi thi nha toi duoc rang ro them. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. To lon. Nhu dung hoanh tu phan 用宏茲賁 dung cang rong lon. \n\t3. Lai mot am la bon. Dung si. Nhu ho bon 虎賁 dao quan hung trang cua vua.
賂=lo [lu4]\n\t1. Dem cua dut lot goi la lo. \n\t2. Cua cai.
赂=lo [lu4]\n\t1. Dem cua dut lot goi la lo. \n\t2. Cua cai.
賃=nham [lin4]\n\t1. Lam thue. \n\t2. Thue muon.
赁=nham [lin4]\n\t1. Lam thue. \n\t2. Thue muon.
賄=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cua. Nhu hoa hoi 貨賄 cua cai, vang ngoc goi la hoa, vai lua goi la hoi. \n\t2. Dut cua. Nhu tu hoi 私貨 dut ngam. \n\t3. Tang tien cua.
贿=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cua. Nhu hoa hoi 貨賄 cua cai, vang ngoc goi la hoa, vai lua goi la hoi. \n\t2. Dut cua. Nhu tu hoi 私貨 dut ngam. \n\t3. Tang tien cua.
賅=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Du, gom ca, van tu doi dao, goi la dien cai 典賅.
赅=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Du, gom ca, van tu doi dao, goi la dien cai 典賅.
資=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Cua cai, von lieng. Nhu tu ban 資本 cua von, gia tu 家資 von lieng nha. Cua tieu dung cung goi la tu. Nhu quan tu 軍資 cua tieu ve viec quan, cua dung hang ngay goi la tu phu 資斧 cung nhu ta goi cui nuoc vay. \n\t2. Nho. Nhu tham tu ty tro 深資臂助 nho tay ngai giup nhieu lam. \n\t3. Tu cap. \n\t4. Tu bam, tu chat, cai tinh chat cua troi bam cho deu goi la tu. \n\t5. Cho nuong nho, nghia la cai dia vi nho tich luy dan ma cao dan mai len. Nhu tu cach 資格 (nho co cong tu hoc ma nhan cach cao quy).
资=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Cua cai, von lieng. Nhu tu ban 資本 cua von, gia tu 家資 von lieng nha. Cua tieu dung cung goi la tu. Nhu quan tu 軍資 cua tieu ve viec quan, cua dung hang ngay goi la tu phu 資斧 cung nhu ta goi cui nuoc vay. \n\t2. Nho. Nhu tham tu ty tro 深資臂助 nho tay ngai giup nhieu lam. \n\t3. Tu cap. \n\t4. Tu bam, tu chat, cai tinh chat cua troi bam cho deu goi la tu. \n\t5. Cho nuong nho, nghia la cai dia vi nho tich luy dan ma cao dan mai len. Nhu tu cach 資格 (nho co cong tu hoc ma nhan cach cao quy).
賈=co, gia, gia [gu3|jia3]\n\t1. Cua hang, tich hang trong nha cho khach den mua goi la co. Nhu thuong co 商賈 buon ban, dem hang di ban goi la thuong 商, ban ngay o nha goi la co 賈. \n\t2. Mua, chuoc lay. \n\t3. Mot am la gia. Cung nghia voi chu gia 價 nghia la gia ban, gia hang. \n\t4. Lai mot am la gia. Ho Gia.
贾=co, gia, gia [gu3|jia3]\n\t1. Cua hang, tich hang trong nha cho khach den mua goi la co. Nhu thuong co 商賈 buon ban, dem hang di ban goi la thuong 商, ban ngay o nha goi la co 賈. \n\t2. Mua, chuoc lay. \n\t3. Mot am la gia. Cung nghia voi chu gia 價 nghia la gia ban, gia hang. \n\t4. Lai mot am la gia. Ho Gia.
賊=tac [zei2]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu tuong tac 戕賊 giet hai, ke lam hai dan goi la dan tac 民賊, ke lam hai nuoc goi la quoc tac 國賊. \n\t2. Giac. Nhu dao tac 盜賊 trom giac. \n\t3. Loai sau can hai lua. Nhu mau tac 蟊賊 con sau can lua. \n\t4. Lam bai hoai.
贼=tac [zei2]\n\t1. Hai. Nhu tuong tac 戕賊 giet hai, ke lam hai dan goi la dan tac 民賊, ke lam hai nuoc goi la quoc tac 國賊. \n\t2. Giac. Nhu dao tac 盜賊 trom giac. \n\t3. Loai sau can hai lua. Nhu mau tac 蟊賊 con sau can lua. \n\t4. Lam bai hoai.
賍=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tang 贓.
賑=chan [zhen4]\n\t1. Giau. \n\t2. Cap giup, phat chan.
赈=chan [zhen4]\n\t1. Giau. \n\t2. Cap giup, phat chan.
賒=xa [she1]\n\t1. Mua chiu tra dan. \n\t2. Xa xoi. \n\t3. Lau dai. Trai qua mot hoi da lau da xa, goi la xa. \n\t4. Xa xi.
赊=xa [she1]\n\t1. Mua chiu tra dan. \n\t2. Xa xoi. \n\t3. Lau dai. Trai qua mot hoi da lau da xa, goi la xa. \n\t4. Xa xi.
賓=tan, than [bin1]\n\t1. Khach, nguoi o ngoai den goi la khach 客, kinh moi ngoi tren goi la tan 賓. Nhu tuong kinh nhu tan 相敬如賓 cung kinh nhau nhu khach quy. Ngay xua dat ra nam le, trong do co mot le goi la tan le 賓禮, tuc la le phep khach khua di lai thu tac voi nhau. \n\t2. Phuc. \n\t3. Mot am la than. Khuoc di.
宾=tan, than [bin1]\n\t1. Khach, nguoi o ngoai den goi la khach 客, kinh moi ngoi tren goi la tan 賓. Nhu tuong kinh nhu tan 相敬如賓 cung kinh nhau nhu khach quy. Ngay xua dat ra nam le, trong do co mot le goi la tan le 賓禮, tuc la le phep khach khua di lai thu tac voi nhau. \n\t2. Phuc. \n\t3. Mot am la than. Khuoc di.
賕=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. An cua dut, lay cua lam sai phep luat goi la cau.
赇=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. An cua dut, lay cua lam sai phep luat goi la cau.
賙=chu [zhou1]\n\t1. Cap giup, chu cap.
賚=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Ban cho.
赉=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Ban cho.
賛=tan [zan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tan 贊.
賜=tu [ci4]\n\t1. Cho, tren cho duoi goi la tu. \n\t2. On. Nhu dan dao vu kim thu ki tu 民到于今受其賜 (Luan ngu 論語) dan den bay gio van con duoc chiu on. \n\t3. Het. Nhu cuoi buc thu noi duc ngon bat tu 欲言不賜 muon noi chang het loi.
赐=tu [ci4]\n\t1. Cho, tren cho duoi goi la tu. \n\t2. On. Nhu dan dao vu kim thu ki tu 民到于今受其賜 (Luan ngu 論語) dan den bay gio van con duoc chiu on. \n\t3. Het. Nhu cuoi buc thu noi duc ngon bat tu 欲言不賜 muon noi chang het loi.
賝=sam [chen1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu sam 琛.
賟=thuong [shang3]\n\t1. Thuong, thuong cho ke co cong. \n\t2. Khen, thuong thuc cho la hay la dep ma khen lao, ma ngam nghia goi la thuong.
賠=boi [pei2]\n\t1. Den tra. Nhu boi thuong ton that 賠償損失 den bu cho thiet hai. \n\t2. Sut kem. Nhu boi bon 賠本 sut von, lo von.
赔=boi [pei2]\n\t1. Den tra. Nhu boi thuong ton that 賠償損失 den bu cho thiet hai. \n\t2. Sut kem. Nhu boi bon 賠本 sut von, lo von.
賡=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Noi theo. Nhu canh ca 賡歌 hat noi, vi the nen hoa tho goi la canh tuc 賡續. \n\t2. Den bu.
赓=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Noi theo. Nhu canh ca 賡歌 hat noi, vi the nen hoa tho goi la canh tuc 賡續. \n\t2. Den bu.
賢=hien [xian2]\n\t1. Hien, duc hanh tai nang hon nguoi goi la hien. \n\t2. Than yeu. Nhu hien hien dich sac 賢賢易色 (Luan ngu 論語) doi long yeu sac dep ma than yeu nguoi hien. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu bi hien u ngo vien hi 彼賢於吾遠矣 ho hien hon ta nhieu lam vay. \n\t4. Tot hon. \n\t5. Nhoc nhan.
贤=hien [xian2]\n\t1. Hien, duc hanh tai nang hon nguoi goi la hien. \n\t2. Than yeu. Nhu hien hien dich sac 賢賢易色 (Luan ngu 論語) doi long yeu sac dep ma than yeu nguoi hien. \n\t3. Hon. Nhu bi hien u ngo vien hi 彼賢於吾遠矣 ho hien hon ta nhieu lam vay. \n\t4. Tot hon. \n\t5. Nhoc nhan.
賣=mai [mai4]\n\t1. Ban, lay do doi lay tien goi la mai. Nhu doan mai 斷賣 ban dut. \n\t2. Lam hai nguoi de loi minh goi la mai. Nhu mai quoc 賣國 lam hai nuoc, mai huu 賣友 lam hai ban.
卖=mai [mai4]\n\t1. Ban, lay do doi lay tien goi la mai. Nhu doan mai 斷賣 ban dut. \n\t2. Lam hai nguoi de loi minh goi la mai. Nhu mai quoc 賣國 lam hai nuoc, mai huu 賣友 lam hai ban.
賤=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Hen. \n\t2. Khinh re. \n\t3. Loi noi nhun minh. Nhu tien danh 賤名 cai ten hen mon cua toi.
贱=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Hen. \n\t2. Khinh re. \n\t3. Loi noi nhun minh. Nhu tien danh 賤名 cai ten hen mon cua toi.
賦=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Thu thue, thu lay nhung hoa loi ruong nuong cua dan de chi viec nuoc goi la phu thue 賦稅. Ngay xua thu thue de nuoi linh cung goi la phu. \n\t2. Cap cho, phu cho, bam phu 稟賦 bam tinh troi cho. \n\t3. Dai bay, dai bay su tinh vao trong cau tho goi la the phu. Lam tho cung goi la phu thi 賦詩, mot loi van doi nhau co van goi la phu.
赋=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Thu thue, thu lay nhung hoa loi ruong nuong cua dan de chi viec nuoc goi la phu thue 賦稅. Ngay xua thu thue de nuoi linh cung goi la phu. \n\t2. Cap cho, phu cho, bam phu 稟賦 bam tinh troi cho. \n\t3. Dai bay, dai bay su tinh vao trong cau tho goi la the phu. Lam tho cung goi la phu thi 賦詩, mot loi van doi nhau co van goi la phu.
賨=tung [cong2]\n\t1. Ro Ba, loi tho phu cua giong man phuong nam.
質=chat, chi [zhi4]\n\t1. The chat, cai ban the cua cac vat deu goi la chat. Nhu khi chat 氣質 chat hoi, luu chat 流質 chat long, chia re vat the ra tung bo phan rat nho goi la chat diem 質點, cai chat diem thuan mot chat khong lan cai gi goi la nguyen chat 原質. \n\t2. Tu chat 私質 noi ve cai bam tinh cua con nguoi. \n\t3. Chat phac, moc mac. \n\t4. Chat chinh, toi nguoi biet hon ma dinh phai trai nen chang goi la chat nghi 質疑. \n\t5. Chu coi goc. \n\t6. Loi van tu mua ban. \n\t7. Tin. \n\t8. That, chan that. \n\t9. Loi the uoc. \n\t10. Cai dich tap ban. \n\t11. Mot am la chi. Cam do, de mot vat gi lam tin. Ngay xua hai nuoc hoa hieu voi nhau, so sau phan trac, moi cat nguoi than nuoc nay sang o nuoc kia de lam cho tin goi la chi. Dem do dac hay nha ruong ma cam lam tin de lay tien cung goi la chi.
质=chat, chi [zhi4]\n\t1. The chat, cai ban the cua cac vat deu goi la chat. Nhu khi chat 氣質 chat hoi, luu chat 流質 chat long, chia re vat the ra tung bo phan rat nho goi la chat diem 質點, cai chat diem thuan mot chat khong lan cai gi goi la nguyen chat 原質. \n\t2. Tu chat 私質 noi ve cai bam tinh cua con nguoi. \n\t3. Chat phac, moc mac. \n\t4. Chat chinh, toi nguoi biet hon ma dinh phai trai nen chang goi la chat nghi 質疑. \n\t5. Chu coi goc. \n\t6. Loi van tu mua ban. \n\t7. Tin. \n\t8. That, chan that. \n\t9. Loi the uoc. \n\t10. Cai dich tap ban. \n\t11. Mot am la chi. Cam do, de mot vat gi lam tin. Ngay xua hai nuoc hoa hieu voi nhau, so sau phan trac, moi cat nguoi than nuoc nay sang o nuoc kia de lam cho tin goi la chi. Dem do dac hay nha ruong ma cam lam tin de lay tien cung goi la chi.
賬=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. So sach, nguyen dung chu truong 帳, nay tuc thuong dung chu truong 賬 nay.
账=truong [zhang4]\n\t1. So sach, nguyen dung chu truong 帳, nay tuc thuong dung chu truong 賬 nay.
賭=do [du3]\n\t1. Danh bac, (co bac). Tuc cho minh tu the la do chu 賭咒, tuc khi goi la do khi 賭氣.
赌=do [du3]\n\t1. Danh bac, (co bac). Tuc cho minh tu the la do chu 賭咒, tuc khi goi la do khi 賭氣.
賮=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Do cong. Nhung vat quy bau cua man ro ngoai dem den cong goi la sam tan 琛賮. \n\t2. Do tang tien ke len duong, nay thong dung chu tan 贐.
賴=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Cay nho. Nhu y lai 倚賴 nuong tua nho va. \n\t2. Loi. Nhu vo lai 無賴 khong co ich loi gi cho nha. Nhung ke doi tra giao hoat goi la ke vo lai. \n\t3. Tuc cho rang khong nhan viec ay la co la lai, co y lan lua cung la lai. Nhu de lai 抵賴 choi cai. \n\t4. Lanh. Nhu Manh tu noi. phu tue tu de da lai 富歲子弟多賴 nam duoc mua con em phan nhieu hien lanh, y noi no thi khong cuop boc. \n\t5. Lay.
赖=lai [lai4]\n\t1. Cay nho. Nhu y lai 倚賴 nuong tua nho va. \n\t2. Loi. Nhu vo lai 無賴 khong co ich loi gi cho nha. Nhung ke doi tra giao hoat goi la ke vo lai. \n\t3. Tuc cho rang khong nhan viec ay la co la lai, co y lan lua cung la lai. Nhu de lai 抵賴 choi cai. \n\t4. Lanh. Nhu Manh tu noi. phu tue tu de da lai 富歲子弟多賴 nam duoc mua con em phan nhieu hien lanh, y noi no thi khong cuop boc. \n\t5. Lay.
賵=phung [feng4]\n\t1. Do phung, do tang nguoi chet, tang cho xe ngua goi la phung 賵, tang cho tien cua goi la phu 賻.
賸=thung, thang [sheng4]\n\t1. Tang them. \n\t2. Thua, tuc dung nhu chu thang 剩, cung doc la chu thang.
賺=tram [zhuan4|zuan4]\n\t1. Ban do gia doi. \n\t2. Loi, buon ban co loi thua. \n\t3. Luong gat. Nhu bi tram 被賺 bi nguoi ta lua.
赚=tram [zhuan4|zuan4]\n\t1. Ban do gia doi. \n\t2. Loi, buon ban co loi thua. \n\t3. Luong gat. Nhu bi tram 被賺 bi nguoi ta lua.
賻=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Do phung nguoi chet, cua giup them vao dam ma, dam chay. Nhu hau phu 厚賻 do phung hau.
赙=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Do phung nguoi chet, cua giup them vao dam ma, dam chay. Nhu hau phu 厚賻 do phung hau.
購=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Mua sam. Nhu cau vat 購物 mua sam do. \n\t2. Muu ban.
购=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Mua sam. Nhu cau vat 購物 mua sam do. \n\t2. Muu ban.
賽=tai, trai [sai4]\n\t1. Bao den, gia on, tai than 賽神 bao on than. \n\t2. Thi, so sanh hon kem. Nhu tai ma 賽馬 thi ngua. \n\t3. Cung doc la trai.
赛=tai, trai [sai4]\n\t1. Bao den, gia on, tai than 賽神 bao on than. \n\t2. Thi, so sanh hon kem. Nhu tai ma 賽馬 thi ngua. \n\t3. Cung doc la trai.
賾=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Tham u (sau xa uan ao). Nhu tham trach sach an 探賾索隱 nghien cuu nghia ly sau xa.
赜=trach [ze2]\n\t1. Tham u (sau xa uan ao). Nhu tham trach sach an 探賾索隱 nghien cuu nghia ly sau xa.
贄=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Do le tuong kien, ngay xua den choi voi nhau tat dua le vat vao truoc goi la chi tuc goi la le kien dien 見面禮. Ham chap chi di ha, tranh bai thuc chi 咸執贄以賀，爭拜識之 (Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異) moi nguoi dem le vat den mung, tranh nhau chao lam quen.
贽=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Do le tuong kien, ngay xua den choi voi nhau tat dua le vat vao truoc goi la chi tuc goi la le kien dien 見面禮. Ham chap chi di ha, tranh bai thuc chi 咸執贄以賀，爭拜識之 (Lieu trai chi di 聊齋志異) moi nguoi dem le vat den mung, tranh nhau chao lam quen.
贅=chue [zhui4]\n\t1. Khiu lai, bam vao. Nhu chue vuu 贅肬 cai buou moc o ngoai da, vi the nen vat gi thua, vo dung cung goi la chue. \n\t2. Noi phien, noi ruom. Nhu duoi cac thu tu thuong viet chu bat chue 不贅 nghia la khong noi phien nua, khong ke ruom nua. \n\t3. Ngay xua goi cac con trai di gui re la chue te 贅婿 nay thuong noi con trai lam le thanh hon o nha vo la nhap chue 入贅 vao gui re.
赘=chue [zhui4]\n\t1. Khiu lai, bam vao. Nhu chue vuu 贅肬 cai buou moc o ngoai da, vi the nen vat gi thua, vo dung cung goi la chue. \n\t2. Noi phien, noi ruom. Nhu duoi cac thu tu thuong viet chu bat chue 不贅 nghia la khong noi phien nua, khong ke ruom nua. \n\t3. Ngay xua goi cac con trai di gui re la chue te 贅婿 nay thuong noi con trai lam le thanh hon o nha vo la nhap chue 入贅 vao gui re.
贈=tang [zeng4]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu di tang 遺贈 dua tang do quy, tang thi 贈詩 tang tho v.v. Do Phu 杜甫. Ung cong oan hon ngu, dau thi tang Mich La 應共冤魂語，投詩贈汨羅 hay nen noi chuyen cung hon oan, va gieo tho tang song Mich La (chi Khuat Nguyen 屈原). \n\t2. Phong tang, lay ham quan cua minh ma truy phong cho cac tien nhan goi la cao tang 誥贈. \n\t3. Tien, xua duoi.
赠=tang [zeng4]\n\t1. Dua tang. Nhu di tang 遺贈 dua tang do quy, tang thi 贈詩 tang tho v.v. Do Phu 杜甫. Ung cong oan hon ngu, dau thi tang Mich La 應共冤魂語，投詩贈汨羅 hay nen noi chuyen cung hon oan, va gieo tho tang song Mich La (chi Khuat Nguyen 屈原). \n\t2. Phong tang, lay ham quan cua minh ma truy phong cho cac tien nhan goi la cao tang 誥贈. \n\t3. Tien, xua duoi.
贉=dam [tan3]\n\t1. Dat truoc, tra tien truoc roi moi lay do goi la dam. \n\t2. Cai bao sach.
贊=tan [zan4]\n\t1. Giup, co xuy len, phu hoa vao cho viec chong thanh goi la tan thanh 贊成 hay tham tan 參贊. \n\t2. Chi dan. Nhu tan le 贊禮 chi dan cho nguoi khac lam le. \n\t3. Khen ngoi, mot loi van ca tung cong duc goi la van tan 贊, nay thong dung chu 讚. \n\t4. Bao. \n\t5. Sang to.
赞=tan [zan4]\n\t1. Giup, co xuy len, phu hoa vao cho viec chong thanh goi la tan thanh 贊成 hay tham tan 參贊. \n\t2. Chi dan. Nhu tan le 贊禮 chi dan cho nguoi khac lam le. \n\t3. Khen ngoi, mot loi van ca tung cong duc goi la van tan 贊, nay thong dung chu 讚. \n\t4. Bao. \n\t5. Sang to.
贋=nhan [yan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhan 贗.
贍=thiem [shan4]\n\t1. Cap giup. \n\t2. Phong phu, van tu co ve doi dao, dien le goi la thiem phu 贍富 hay phu cai 富該. \n\t3. Du.
赡=thiem [shan4]\n\t1. Cap giup. \n\t2. Phong phu, van tu co ve doi dao, dien le goi la thiem phu 贍富 hay phu cai 富該. \n\t3. Du.
贏=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Thua thai, kiem duoc loi nhieu goi la doanh. \n\t2. Duoc, danh bac duoc goi la doanh 贏, thua goi la thau 輸. Doanh dac qui dau man nang khau 贏得鬼頭滿囊口 (Nguyen Du 阮攸) kiem duoc tien nhet day tui. \n\t3. Cham tre. \n\t4. Qua. \n\t5. Sang to.
赢=doanh [ying2]\n\t1. Thua thai, kiem duoc loi nhieu goi la doanh. \n\t2. Duoc, danh bac duoc goi la doanh 贏, thua goi la thau 輸. Doanh dac qui dau man nang khau 贏得鬼頭滿囊口 (Nguyen Du 阮攸) kiem duoc tien nhet day tui. \n\t3. Cham tre. \n\t4. Qua. \n\t5. Sang to.
贐=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Do tien nguoi di len duong.
赆=tan [jin4]\n\t1. Do tien nguoi di len duong.
贑=cong [gan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cong 贛.
贒=hien [xian2]\n\t1. Chu hien 賢 co.
贓=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Quan lai an cua dut. Nhu tham tang uong phap 貪贓枉法 tham cua dut lam sai phep. \n\t2. Tang vat. Nhung do trom cuop da lay duoc deu goi la tang. Nhu nhan tang tinh hoach 人贓並獲 bat duoc ca nguoi va do da lay.
赃=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Quan lai an cua dut. Nhu tham tang uong phap 貪贓枉法 tham cua dut lam sai phep. \n\t2. Tang vat. Nhung do trom cuop da lay duoc deu goi la tang. Nhu nhan tang tinh hoach 人贓並獲 bat duoc ca nguoi va do da lay.
贔=bi [bi4]\n\t1. Bi si 贔屭 gang suc lam lung. \n\t2. Mot loai giong nhu con rua nguoi ta hay khac o duoi bia.
贖=thuc [shu2]\n\t1. Chuoc, dem tien de chuoc toi goi la thuc. \n\t2. Dem tien chuoc lai cai da cam da ban cung goi la thuc. \n\t3. Bo.
赎=thuc [shu2]\n\t1. Chuoc, dem tien de chuoc toi goi la thuc. \n\t2. Dem tien chuoc lai cai da cam da ban cung goi la thuc. \n\t3. Bo.
贗=nhan [yan4]\n\t1. Do gia, vat gia khong thuc.
赝=nhan [yan4]\n\t1. Do gia, vat gia khong thuc.
贛=cong, cam [gan4]\n\t1. Thong dung nhu chu cong 貢. \n\t2. Mot am la cam. Huyen Cam, tinh Cam, vi co hai dong song Chuong 章 va cong 貢 hop lai thanh song nen nhan do ma goi la Cam 贛, tuc la tinh Giang Tay 江西 ben Tau bay gio.
赣=cong, cam [gan4]\n\t1. Thong dung nhu chu cong 貢. \n\t2. Mot am la cam. Huyen Cam, tinh Cam, vi co hai dong song Chuong 章 va cong 貢 hop lai thanh song nen nhan do ma goi la Cam 贛, tuc la tinh Giang Tay 江西 ben Tau bay gio.
赤=xich, thich [chi4]\n\t1. Sac do, sac do la sac ruc ro nhat, cho nen goi tam long trung la xich thanh 赤誠 hay xich tam 赤心. \n\t2. Cot yeu nhat, dau ca. Nhu nuoc Tau ngay xua goi la than chau xich huyen 神州赤縣 y noi nuoc Tau la nuoc dung dau ca thien ha va la cho cot yeu nhat trong thien ha vay. \n\t3. Het sach. Nhu nam mat mua qua goi la xich dia thien ly 赤地千里, ngheo khong co mot cai gi goi la xich ban 赤貧, tay khong goi la xich thu 赤手 v.v. \n\t4. Tran truong. Nhu xich the 赤體 minh tran truong, con tre moi de goi la xich tu 赤子 (con do). \n\t5. Noi vi du nhung noi mau chay. Nhu xich toc 赤族 bi giet het ca ho. Lay loi xau xa ma mia mai nguoi goi la xich khau 赤口 hay xich thiet 赤舌. Cung nhu tuc thuong noi ham huyet phun nhan 含血噴人 ngam mau phun nguoi. \n\t6. Phuong nam. \n\t7. Mot am la thich. Tru bo.
赦=xa [she4]\n\t1. Tha, tha cho ke co toi goi la xa. Nhu dai xa thien ha 大赦天下 ca tha cho thien ha. Moi khi vua len ngoi hay co viec mung lon cua nha vua thi tha toi cho cac tu pham va thue ma goi la dai xa thien ha.
赧=noan [nan3]\n\t1. Then do mat.
赩=hach [xi4]\n\t1. Do qua, do khe, nui troc khong co cay coi goi la hach.
赫=hach [he4]\n\t1. Do ung. \n\t2. Noi gian. Nhu hach nhien dai no 赫然大怒 dung dung noi gian. \n\t3. Thinh. \n\t4. Ro ret, hien hach. Nhu uy quyen hap hach 威權翕赫 oai quyen hach dich.
赬=xanh, trinh [cheng1]\n\t1. Sac do. Ta quen doc la chu trinh.
赭=gia [zhe3]\n\t1. Thu dat do tuc la da gia thach 赭石 mot thu da do nhu son cua ta thuong dung vay. \n\t2. Sac do nhu gia y 赭衣 ao do nho nho, mot thu ao cua tu ngay xua mac.
赯=duong [tang2]\n\t1. Do tia, sac mat do tia goi la duong.
走=tau [zou3]\n\t1. Chay, cat chan di lai deu goi la tau. Vi the cho nen lo viec ca hai ben goi la bon tau 奔走. \n\t2. Tron. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi khi giap due binh nhi tau 棄甲曳兵而走 bo ao giap keo do binh ma tron. \n\t3. Tieng noi khiem, cung nhu nghia chu boc 僕. \n\t4. Vat the di dong cung goi la tau. Nhu tau but 走筆 nguay but. \n\t5. Mat hinh dang cu, sai kieu, mat loi thuong truoc cung goi la tau. Nhu tau ban 走版 ban khac khong phai ban cu.
赳=cu [jiu1]\n\t1. Cu cu 赳赳 hung dung, ta cai dang vu dung.
赴=pho [fu4]\n\t1. Chay toi, toi cho da dinh toi goi la pho. Nhu bon pho 奔赴 chay toi. \n\t2. Loi cao pho, loi cao cho nguoi biet nha minh co tang goi la pho, nay thong dung chu pho 訃.
赶=can [gan3]\n\t1. Duoi theo. \n\t2. Cong duoi chay.
起=khoi [qi3]\n\t1. Day, cat minh len, troi day. Nhu khoi lap 起立 dung day, ke minh nhi khoi 雞鳴而起 ga gay ma day. \n\t2. Dung len, cai gi da xieu do ma lai dung len goi la khoi. Nhu phu khoi 扶起 nang day, thu khoi 豎起 dung len, vi the nen xay dap nha cua goi la khoi tao 起造. \n\t3. Noi len, phat ra. Nhu khoi phong 起風 noi gio, khoi benh 起病 noi benh, v.v. Su gi moi bat dau mo ra deu goi la khoi. Nhu khoi su 起事 bat dau lam viec, mot lan cung goi la nhat khoi 一起. \n\t4. Loi len. \n\t5. Ra. \n\t6. Phan phat.
趁=san [chen4]\n\t1. Duoi theo. \n\t2. Nhan the loi thua dip tien goi la san. Nhu san thuyen 趁船 nhan tien ghe thuyen di.
趄=thu [ju1|qie4]\n\t1. Tu thu 趑趄 chat vat, di khong len. Ta cai dang le me kho di.
超=sieu [chao1]\n\t1. Vuot qua. Nhay qua. \n\t2. Sieu viet, pham co tai tri hon nguoi deu goi la sieu. Nhu sieu quan 超群 hon ca dan, sieu dang 超等 hon ca cac buc. \n\t3. Khong chiu dat minh vao cai khuon mau thuong goi la sieu. Nhu sieu thoat 超脫, sieu dat 超逸, v.v. \n\t4. Xa.
越=viet, hoat [yue4]\n\t1. Qua, vuot qua. Nhu do luong tuong viet 度量相越 do luong cung khac nhau. Su gi qua lam cung goi la viet. \n\t2. Roi do. Nhu van viet 隕越 xo do, noi viec hong mat. \n\t3. Tan, phat duong ra. Nhu tinh than phong viet 精神放越 tinh than phat duong ra, thanh am thanh viet 聲音清越 tieng tam trong ma tan ra. Tuc goi la co phap phoi, bong sang lap loe la viet ca. \n\t4. Nuoc Viet, dat Viet. \n\t5. Giong Viet, ngay xua cac vung Giang, Chiet, Man, Viet deu la noi cua giong Viet o goi la Bach Viet 百越. Nhu giong Au Viet 甌越 thi o Chiet Giang 浙江, Man Viet 閩越 thi o Phuc Kien 福建, Duong Viet 陽越 thi o Giang Tay 江西, Nam Viet 南越 thi o Quang Dong 廣東, Lac Viet 駱越 thi o nuoc ta, deu la Bach Viet ca, co khi viet la 粵. \n\t6. Mot am la hoat cai lo duoi dan sat. 
趋=xu [qu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu xu 趨.
趍=xu [qu1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tri 遲, tuc muon lam chu xu 趨.
趑=tu [zi1]\n\t1. Tu thu 趑趄. Xem chu thu 趄.
趕=can [gan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu can 赶.
赶=can [gan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu can 赶.
趙=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Nuoc Trieu. \n\t2. Ho Trieu. \n\t3. Tra lai. Nhu phung trieu 奉趙 kinh tra lai cac do vat hau ngai (do tich truyen Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如 dem ngoc bich ve Trieu ngay xua). \n\t4. Chay vun vut.
赵=trieu [zhao4]\n\t1. Nuoc Trieu. \n\t2. Ho Trieu. \n\t3. Tra lai. Nhu phung trieu 奉趙 kinh tra lai cac do vat hau ngai (do tich truyen Lan Tuong Nhu 藺相如 dem ngoc bich ve Trieu ngay xua). \n\t4. Chay vun vut.
趟=tranh, thang [tang1|tang4]\n\t1. Nhay choi choi. \n\t2. Mot am la thang. Chay mot phen, chay mot luot.
趣=thu, xuc [qu4]\n\t1. Rao toi, di mau toi cho da dinh. Nhu thu loi 趣利 nhanh chan kiem loi. \n\t2. Y vi. Nhu y thu 意趣, hung thu 興趣, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la xuc. Thuc duc.
趦=tu [ci1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tu 趑.
趨=xu, xuc [qu1]\n\t1. Di rao buoc, di dan duong truoc goi la tien xu 前趨. \n\t2. Mot am la xuc. Cung nghia voi xuc 促.
趋=xu, xuc [qu1]\n\t1. Di rao buoc, di dan duong truoc goi la tien xu 前趨. \n\t2. Mot am la xuc. Cung nghia voi xuc 促.
趯=dich [ti4]\n\t1. Nhay nhot. \n\t2. Net moc, phep viet chu, net moc len goi la dich.
趲=toan [zan3]\n\t1. Chay. Nhu toan lo 趲路 di duong.
趱=toan [zan3]\n\t1. Chay. Nhu toan lo 趲路 di duong.
足=tuc [zu2]\n\t1. Chan, chan nguoi va cac giong vat deu goi la tuc ca. \n\t2. Cai chan cac do dac cung goi la tuc. Nhu dinh tuc 鼎足 chan vac. \n\t3. Buoc. Nhu tiep tuc tien dac 捷足先得 nhanh buoc duoc truoc. Con em nha the gia goi la cao tuc 高足. \n\t4. Du. Nhu tuc so 足數 du so. \n\t5. Cung du. Nhu tuc di tu hao 足以自豪 cung du tu thich. \n\t6. Mot am la tu. Thai qua. Nhu tu cung 足恭 kinh qua.
趵=bac [bao4]\n\t1. Giam chan banh bach. \n\t2. Mot am la bao. Nhay nhot.
趹=quyet, que [jue2]\n\t1. Dang ngua di, ngua phi. \n\t2. Mot am la que. Dam, xeo, lay chan dam nat co goi la que.
趺=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Cai mu ban chan. Nha su ngoi bat hai chan len dui nhap dinh goi la gia phu 跏趺.
趼=nghien [jian3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nghien 跰.
趾=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Chan. Nhu cu chi 舉趾 cat chan len, nay thuong goi chi la ngon chan. \n\t2. Nen, cung nghia voi chu chi 址. \n\t3. Dau vet.
跁=ba [pa2]\n\t1. Ngoi xom. \n\t2. Bo di.
跂=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Ngon chan thua. \n\t2. Mot am la khi. Kieng chan. Nhu khi vong 跂望 dung nhon chan len ma trong xa.
跅=thac [tuo4]\n\t1. Thac thi 跅弛 lu bu, phong tung, khong biet tu giu gin minh.
跋=bat [ba2]\n\t1. Bat thiep 跋涉 lan loi. Di tren co goi la bat 跋, di tren nuoc goi la thiep 涉. Noi su di kho khan. \n\t2. Di lai luon luon goi la bat lai bao vang 跋來報往. \n\t3. Hung ton. Nhu bat ho 跋扈 nguoi cung dau cung co khong chiu ai kiem che. \n\t4. Got chan. Cho nen bai van viet o cuoi sach goi la bai bat van 跋文. \n\t5. Nhay vot.
跌=diet, trat [die1]\n\t1. Nga. Nhu diet thuong 跌傷 nga dau, diet dao 跌倒 nga nhao, te nhao. \n\t2. Diet dang 跌蕩 sac lac, khong giu phep tac. \n\t3. Trong bai van, doan nao co y de nen di goi la diet. \n\t4. Sai lam. \n\t5. Di mau. Ta quen doc la chu trat.
跎=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Tha da 蹉跎 lan lua, lo thoi. Nhu tha da tue nguyet 蹉跎歲月 lan lua nam thang, noi ke khong co gang, cu lan lua ngay qua thang lai khong lam duoc viec gi vay.
跏=gia [jia1]\n\t1. Gia phu 跏趺. Xem chu phu 趺.
跑=bao [pao2|pao3]\n\t1. Chay bon chan. Nhay cang.
跖=chich [zhi2]\n\t1. Ban chan. \n\t2. Ten mot ke trom dai bom ngay xua, Dao Chich 盜跖. Co khi viet la chich 蹠.
跗=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Mu ban chan. \n\t2. O hat cac loai cay co.
跚=san [shan1]\n\t1. Ban san 蹣跚. Xem chu ban 蹣.
跛=ba [bo3]\n\t1. Que, mot chan kho det khong di duoc. \n\t2. Chan co tat, di khap khieng.
距=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Cua ga. \n\t2. Khoang cach nhau. Nhu tuong cu tam thon 相距三寸 cho cung cach nhau ba tac. \n\t3. Chong cu, cung nghia voi chu 拒. \n\t4. Lon. \n\t5. Den.
跟=can, ngan [gen1]\n\t1. Got chan. \n\t2. Di theo chan. \n\t3. Ta quen doc la chu ngan.
跡=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Vet chan. Nhu tung tich 蹤跡 dau vet.
迹=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Vet chan. Nhu tung tich 蹤跡 dau vet.
跣=tien [xian3]\n\t1. Di chan khong.
跦=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu tru 蹰.
跧=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Nep, nam phuc. \n\t2. Da hat.
跨=khoa [kua4]\n\t1. Vuot qua. Nhay qua. Tuc goi con hon cha la khoa tao 跨竈. \n\t2. Cuoi. Nhu khoa ma 跨馬 cuoi ngua, ngay xua goi ke khai vao so gian de thi ca hai cho la khoa khao 跨考, giu chan noi hiem yeu de chen ca cac noi goi la khoa che 跨制. \n\t3. Ben, hang, cho hai dui giap mong. \n\t4. Gac qua.
跪=quy [gui4]\n\t1. Quy, quy goi. \n\t2. Chan cua.
跫=cung [qiong2]\n\t1. Tieng chan giam xuong dat, chan giam banh bach.
跬=khue [kui3]\n\t1. Nua buoc, buoc mot chan goi la khue 跬 (3 thuoc), buoc hai chan goi la bo 步   (6 thuoc). Vi the nen thi gio rat ngan, rat ngat goi la khue bo 跬步.
路=lo [lu4]\n\t1. Duong cai, duong di lai. Nhu hang lo 航路 duong di be. \n\t2. Dia vi. Nhu Manh tu 孟子 co cau phu tu duong lo u te 夫子當路於齊 nha thay o vao cai dia vi trong yeu o nuoc Te. \n\t3. Phuong dien. Nhu o giua doi voi bon phuong thi chia lam dong lo 東路 mat dong, tay lo 西路 mat tay, nam lo 南路 mat nam, bac lo 北路 mat bac. \n\t4. Pham cai gi cu phai noi the ma lam deu goi la lo. Nhu le mon nghia lo 禮門義路 cua le duong nghia, y noi le nhu cai cua, nghia nhu con duong, khong cua khong ra vao, khong duong khong cho di lai vay. \n\t5. Nganh tho nhu lam van co tu lo 思路 loi nghi, phep gui y tu vao, but lo 筆路 loi but, phep but. \n\t6. To lon, vua o cho nao lay su to lon lam hieu, nen cua nha vua goi la lo mon 路門, cho vua ngu goi la lo tam 路寢, v.v. \n\t7. Cai xe, ngay xua cac thien tu co nam thu xe di la ngoc lo 玉路, kim lo 金路, tuong lo 象路, cach lo 革路, moc lo 木路 goi la ngu lo 五路.
跰=nghien, kien [jian3]\n\t1. Mong chan giong thu ngay va phang. \n\t2. Mot am la kien. Da giop len, da chai.
跲=cap [jia2]\n\t1. Vap nga, vap vap.
跳=khieu [tiao4]\n\t1. Nhay.
跴=thai [cai3]\n\t1. Giam chan len.
跼=cuc [ju2]\n\t1. Cong, bi cai dia vi bo buoc khong cua ra duoc, chat hep goi la cuc. Nhu cuc xuc 跼促 co quap, loanh quanh. Nho len, sut lai, khong tien len duoc. Cung viet la 局促 hay 侷促.
跽=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Quy dai, quy lau.
踁=hinh [jing4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu hinh 脛.
踉=luong [liang2|liang4]\n\t1. Khieu luong 跳踉 chan di lang quang. \n\t2. Mot am la luong. Luong thuong 踉蹡 di tap tenh, di that theu.
踊=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Nhay. Nhu dung duoc 踊躍 nhay nhot. Hang hai lam viec cung goi la dung duoc. Gia hang cao len goi la dung quy 踊貴 cao vot len.
踏=dap [ta1|ta4]\n\t1. Chan sat xuong dat. Lam viec vung chai khong mao hiem goi la cuoc dap thuc dia 腳踏實地. \n\t2. Xeo, lay chan xeo vao vat gi. \n\t3. Buoc di.
踐=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Xeo, giam vao. \n\t2. De chan toi, vua len ngoi goi la tien to 踐祚. \n\t3. Theo, noi. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi bat tien tich 不踐跡 chang theo cai loi cu. \n\t4. Xung, dung y. Nhu tien uoc 踐約 lam duoc y loi uoc, tien ngon 踐言 dung nhu loi noi. \n\t5. Hang loi. \n\t6. Thuc hanh.
践=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Xeo, giam vao. \n\t2. De chan toi, vua len ngoi goi la tien to 踐祚. \n\t3. Theo, noi. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi bat tien tich 不踐跡 chang theo cai loi cu. \n\t4. Xung, dung y. Nhu tien uoc 踐約 lam duoc y loi uoc, tien ngon 踐言 dung nhu loi noi. \n\t5. Hang loi. \n\t6. Thuc hanh.
踖=tich [ji2]\n\t1. Vuot qua. \n\t2. Tuc tich 踧踖 lat dat, ta cai dang cung kinh khong yen.
踘=cuc [ju1]\n\t1. Co khi dung nhu chu cuc 鞠.
踝=hoa, khoa [huai2]\n\t1. Cai mat ca chan. \n\t2. Got chan. Ta quen doc la chu khoa.
踞=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Ngoi dai the, nguoi xua ngoi o chieu xoac chan ra, ngoi xoac chan chu bat.
踟=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Tri tru 踟躕 lan lua, dung dang, chan chu khong buoc di duoc.
踡=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Co quap. Nhu quyen ngoa 踡臥 nam co.
踢=thich [ti1]\n\t1. Da. Nhu quyen da cuoc thich 拳打腳踢 tay dam chan da.
踣=phau, bac [bo2]\n\t1. Nga, te. Nhu Phau dia bat khoi 踣地不起 te xuong dat khong day. \n\t2. Nga chet giua duong goi la phau. Cung doc la chu bac.
踥=thiep [qie4]\n\t1. Thiep diep 踥蹀 buoc rao, dang di voi va.
踧=dich, tuc [cu4]\n\t1. Dich dich 踧踧 re rang, bang phang rong rai, thenh thang. \n\t2. Mot am la tuc. Tuc tich 踧踖. Xem chu tich 踖.
踩=thai [cai3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thai 跴.
踪=tung [zong1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu 蹤.
踰=du [yu2]\n\t1. Leo qua, treo qua, vuot qua. Do Phu 杜甫. Lao ong du tuong tau 老翁踰墻走 (Thach Hao lai 石壕吏) ong lao treo tuong tron. \n\t2. Xa.
踱=dac [duo2]\n\t1. Di thong tha.
踴=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 踊.
踊=dung [yong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 踊.
踵=chung [zhong3]\n\t1. Got chan. \n\t2. Den. Nhu chung ta 踵謝 den tan noi cam ta. \n\t3. Noi got, di theo chan nguoi truoc goi la tiep chung nhi chi 接踵而至 noi got ma den. \n\t4. Nhan, noi theo.
踶=de, de [di4]\n\t1. Xeo, di. \n\t2. Mot am la de. Chan giong thu.
踹=doan, suy [chuai4]\n\t1. Doi got chan xuong dat. \n\t2. Mot am la suy. Xeo nat.
踽=cu [ju3]\n\t1. Cu cu 踽踽 di vo vo mot minh, lui thui mot minh.
蹀=diep [die2]\n\t1. Giam, xeo. \n\t2. Niep diep 躡蹀 buoc gan.
蹁=bien [pian2]\n\t1. Bien tien 蹁躚 di quanh queo, quanh co.
蹂=nhuu, nhu [rou2]\n\t1. Giam xeo. \n\t2. Mot am la nhu. Vo lua, dap lua.
蹄=de [ti2]\n\t1. Mong chan giong thu. Nhu ma de 馬蹄 vo ngua. \n\t2. Cai luoi danh tho. \n\t3. Hai chan sat vao nhau.
蹇=kien [jian3]\n\t1. Khieng, chan di tap tenh, vi the nen nhung noi khon ach cham chap deu goi la kien. Nhu kien tac 蹇塞 van bi, cai gi tung ngat khong go ra duoc goi la kien. Nhu tho Manh Giao 孟郊 co cau sach kien pho tien trinh 策蹇赴前程 quat ngua hen tien len duong. \n\t2. Lao leu, doi voi nguoi kieu ngao vo le goi la yen kien 偃蹇 hay kieu kien 驕蹇. \n\t3. Dung lam tieng phat ngu.
蹈=dao [dao3]\n\t1. Giam, xeo. Nhu bach nhan kha dao da 白刃可蹈也 mui nhon co the xeo len duoc. \n\t2. Noi ve su hanh chi cua nguoi o an goi la cao dao 高蹈 vet cao. \n\t3. Giam chan. \n\t4. Thuc hanh.
蹉=tha, sa [cuo1]\n\t1. Sai lam. \n\t2. Tha da 蹉跎 lan lua. Xem lai chu da 跎. \n\t3. Tha diet 蹉跌 vap nga. Ta quen doc la chu sa.
蹊=he [qi1|xi1]\n\t1. Loi nguoi di, loi di. \n\t2. Di tat qua.
蹋=dap [ta4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu dap 踏.
蹌=thuong [qiang1|qiang4]\n\t1. Dong, dang di. Nhu thuong thuong te te 蹌蹌濟濟 uy nghi chung chac.
跄=thuong [qiang1|qiang4]\n\t1. Dong, dang di. Nhu thuong thuong te te 蹌蹌濟濟 uy nghi chung chac.
蹍=nien, chien [nian3]\n\t1. Xeo, giam.
蹏=de [ti2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu de 蹄.
蹐=tich [ji2]\n\t1. Buoc ngan. \n\t2. Keo le chan moi di duoc mot buoc ngan goi la tich. Xem chu cuc 跼.
蹕=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Cam duong, con duong vua di cam khong cho ai di goi la tat lo 蹕路. \n\t2. Dung mot chan.
跸=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Cam duong, con duong vua di cam khong cho ai di goi la tat lo 蹕路. \n\t2. Dung mot chan.
蹙=tuc, xuc [cu4]\n\t1. Cung cap, buc bach, bi ngoai vat de ep goi la tuc. \n\t2. Buon rau. Nhu tan tuc 嚬蹙 buon ruoi ruoi, siu mat. \n\t3. Kinh can, ve kinh can. \n\t4. Mot am la xuc. Da. \n\t5. Theo duoi.
蹜=suc [suo1]\n\t1. Buoc di rut re, lan tung buoc.
蹝=si [xi3]\n\t1. Cai dep co, dep dua.
蹞=khue [kui3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu khue 跬.
蹟=tich [ji1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu tich 跡.
蹠=chich [zhi2]\n\t1. Xeo, giam chan. \n\t2. Vua gap. \n\t3. Cung nhu chu 跖.
蹡=thuong [qiang1]\n\t1. Luong thuong 踉蹡. Xem chu luong 踉.
蹢=trich, dich [zhi2]\n\t1. Trich truc 蹢躅 di luan quan, quanh co, do du, khong buoc len duoc. \n\t2. Mot am la dich. Mong chan giong vat.
蹣=ban, man [pan2]\n\t1. Vuot qua. \n\t2. Ban san 蹣跚 di tap tenh, cung doc la chu man.
蹒=ban, man [pan2]\n\t1. Vuot qua. \n\t2. Ban san 蹣跚 di tap tenh, cung doc la chu man.
蹤=tung [zong1]\n\t1. Vet chan. Nhu truy tung 追蹤 theo hut, theo vet chan ma duoi. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu 縱.
踪=tung [zong1]\n\t1. Vet chan. Nhu truy tung 追蹤 theo hut, theo vet chan ma duoi. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu 縱.
蹩=biet [bie2]\n\t1. Khieng chan.
蹬=dang [deng1|deng4]\n\t1. Thang dang 蹭蹬 ngo ngac, ta cai dang that the. Nay goi nguoi than the khong duoc gap go gi goi la thang dang.
蹭=thang [ceng4]\n\t1. Thang dang 蹭蹬. Xem chu dang 蹬.
蹯=phien [fan2]\n\t1. Chan giong thu. Nhu hung phien 熊蹯 ban chan con gau.
蹲=ton, ton [cun2|dun1]\n\t1. Ngoi xoac dui, ngoi chom hom. Chim muong ngoi lu khu mot minh cung goi la ton. \n\t2. Mot am la ton. Tu lai.
蹴=xuc [cu4]\n\t1. Buoc xeo got, rao buoc theo sau goi la xuc. \n\t2. Da lat di. \n\t3. Ve kinh can.
蹵=xuc [cu4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu xuc 蹴. \n\t2. Xuc nhien 蹵然 buc tuc, ham huc khong yen.
蹶=quyet, que [jue2|jue3]\n\t1. Dap, lay chan dap vao nay no goi la quyet truong 蹶張. \n\t2. Nga, te nhao. \n\t3. Kiet quyet 竭蹶 nghieng ngua, gang suc chong do cung goi la kiet quyet. \n\t4. Mot am la que. Di voi. \n\t5. Que nhien 蹶然 dung sung nguoi len, choang day. \n\t6. Dong. Ta quen doc la chu que ca.
蹺=khieu [qiao1]\n\t1. Cat chan, gio chan len. Cung doc la nghieu.
跷=khieu [qiao1]\n\t1. Cat chan, gio chan len. Cung doc la nghieu.
蹻=kieu, cuoc [qiao1]\n\t1. Cat cao chan, nay thong dung chu 蹺. \n\t2. Mot am la cuoc. Cai guoc go. \n\t3. Di vun vut. \n\t4. Duoi mat ca chan, phia ngoai goi la duong cuoc 陽蹻, phia trong goi la am cuoc 陰蹻.
蹼=boc, phoc [pu3]\n\t1. Mang ngon chan, mang ban chan cac giong chim o nuoc. Cung doc la phoc.
躁=tao [zao4]\n\t1. Voi tien, xao dong, tinh nong nay goi la tao. Nhu phu tao 浮躁, tao bao 躁暴, gioi kieu gioi tao 戒驕戒躁 cho kieu cang nong nay.
躃=tich [bi4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu tich 躄.
躄=tich [bi4]\n\t1. Khoeo ca hai chan goi la tich 躄, khoeo mot chan goi la ba 跛 (co cho doc la bi).
躅=truc [zhu2]\n\t1. Trich truc 蹢躅 luan quan, quan chan khong di len duoc. \n\t2. Dau vet. Nhu cao truc 高躅 vet cao, phuong truc 芳躅 vet thom, deu la tieng goi cac hanh vi, dau vet cua nguoi an dat ca.
躇=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Tru tru 躊躇 do du, rut re. Lam viec toan tinh hai ba lan ma duoc ket qua tot goi la tru tru man chi 躊躇滿志. Trang Tu 莊子. De dao nhi lap, vi chi tu co, vi chi tru tru man chi, thien dao nhi tang chi 提刀而立，爲之四顧，爲之躊躇滿志，善刀而藏之 (Duong sinh chu 養生主) cam dao dung do, vi no nhin quanh, thoa long vi duoc dao tot, dem cat no di. \n\t2. Mot am la suoc. Vuot qua.
躉=don [dun3]\n\t1. Hang so chinh te. \n\t2. Tuc goi cam cai thuyen lon ben bo de cho cac thuyen khac di lai xep hang hoa len goi la don thuyen 躉船.
趸=don [dun3]\n\t1. Hang so chinh te. \n\t2. Tuc goi cam cai thuyen lon ben bo de cho cac thuyen khac di lai xep hang hoa len goi la don thuyen 躉船.
躊=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Tru tru 躊躇. Xem chu tru 躇.
踌=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Tru tru 躊躇. Xem chu tru 躇.
躋=te, te [ji1]\n\t1. Len, leo len. Cung doc la chu te.
跻=te, te [ji1]\n\t1. Len, leo len. Cung doc la chu te.
躍=duoc [yue4]\n\t1. Nhay len. Mung nhay nguoi len goi la tuoc duoc 雀躍. \n\t2. Xun xoe. Nhu duoc duoc duc thi 躍躍慾試 xun xoe muon thu. \n\t3. Kich dong.
跃=duoc [yue4]\n\t1. Nhay len. Mung nhay nguoi len goi la tuoc duoc 雀躍. \n\t2. Xun xoe. Nhu duoc duoc duc thi 躍躍慾試 xun xoe muon thu. \n\t3. Kich dong.
躐=liep [lie4]\n\t1. Xeo, giam. \n\t2. Vuot qua. Nhu liep dang 躐等 vuot buc. \n\t3. Cam, giu.
躑=trich [zhi2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu trich 蹢.
踯=trich [zhi2]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu trich 蹢.
躒=lich [li4|luo4]\n\t1. Cua, cu dong. \n\t2. Mot am la lac. Trac lac 卓躒 sieu viet hon nguoi.
跞=lich [li4|luo4]\n\t1. Cua, cu dong. \n\t2. Mot am la lac. Trac lac 卓躒 sieu viet hon nguoi.
躓=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Vap vap. \n\t2. Tro ngai.
踬=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Vap vap. \n\t2. Tro ngai.
躔=trien [chan2]\n\t1. Xeo, giam. \n\t2. Cho, vong cua sao di goi la trien.
躕=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Tri tru 踟躕. Xem chu tri 踟.
蹰=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Tri tru 踟躕. Xem chu tri 踟.
躗=ve [wei4]\n\t1. Qua dang. Nhu ve ngon 躗言 loi noi qua dang, noi khoac.
躚=tien [xian1]\n\t1. Bien tien 蹁躚. Xem chu bien 蹁.
跹=tien [xian1]\n\t1. Bien tien 蹁躚. Xem chu bien 蹁.
躞=tiep [xie4]\n\t1. Cai truc xe. \n\t2. Diep tiep 蹀躞 lung thung (dang di).
躡=niep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhe buoc theo sau, duoi theo sau nguoi ma nhe buoc khong cho nguoi biet goi la niep. \n\t2. Theo duoi, truy tuy. \n\t3. Xen buoc, xen vao.
蹑=niep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhe buoc theo sau, duoi theo sau nguoi ma nhe buoc khong cho nguoi biet goi la niep. \n\t2. Theo duoi, truy tuy. \n\t3. Xen buoc, xen vao.
躧=si [xi3]\n\t1. Giay rom, cai dep dan bang co. \n\t2. Mua chan, kieng chan. Nhu si ly tuong nghenh 躧履相迎 mua chan ra don. \n\t3. Giay mua, thu giay dung khi mua.
躩=khuoc, quac [jue2]\n\t1. Di rut re to dang kinh can. \n\t2. Di nhanh, di voi. \n\t3. Nhay. Ta quen doc la chu quac.
躪=lan [lin4]\n\t1. Xe chet. \n\t2. Nhuu lan 蹂躪 giay xeo, tan hai, xeo nat.
躏=lan [lin4]\n\t1. Xe chet. \n\t2. Nhuu lan 蹂躪 giay xeo, tan hai, xeo nat.
身=than, quyen [shen1]\n\t1. Minh, tu co den ben goi la than. \n\t2. Than nay, ta. Nhu chi than thanh van 致身青雲 than nay han lam cho den ngoi cao. \n\t3. Co mang, dan ba chua goi la huu than 有身. \n\t4. Cai the dung chua. Nhu ha than 河身 long song, thuyen than 船身 than thuyen, v.v. \n\t5. Doi. Nhu tien than 前身 doi truoc. \n\t6. Tuoi. \n\t7. Goc cay. Mot am la quyen. Quyen Doc 身毒 ten mot nuoc ngay xua, tuc la nuoc Thien Truc 天竺 va la nuoc An Do 印度 bay gio.
躬=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Than minh, cui minh xuong vai goi la cuc cung 鞠躬. \n\t2. Than lam.
躭=dam [dan1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 耽.
躰=the [ti3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu the 體.
躱=doa [duo3]\n\t1. Lanh minh, an nau. \n\t2. Than.
躳=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu cung 躬.
躺=thang [tang3]\n\t1. Nam thang cang.
軀=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Than the, hinh voc. Nhu vi khu 微軀 cai than nho mon nay.
躯=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Than the, hinh voc. Nhu vi khu 微軀 cai than nho mon nay.
車=xa [che1|ju1]\n\t1. Cai xe. \n\t2. Ham rang. Nhu phu xa tuong y 輔車相依 ma va ham rang cung nuong tua nhau. \n\t3. Pham cai gi dung suc xoay van cho do suc nguoi deu goi la xa. Nhu thuy xa 水車 xe nuoc, phuong xa 紡車 cai guong xe soi, v.v. \n\t4. Ho Xa.
车=xa [che1|ju1]\n\t1. Cai xe. \n\t2. Ham rang. Nhu phu xa tuong y 輔車相依 ma va ham rang cung nuong tua nhau. \n\t3. Pham cai gi dung suc xoay van cho do suc nguoi deu goi la xa. Nhu thuy xa 水車 xe nuoc, phuong xa 紡車 cai guong xe soi, v.v. \n\t4. Ho Xa.
軋=yet, loat [ga2|ya4|zha2]\n\t1. Nghien, pham cai gi da qua mot vong truc tron no lan qua deu goi la yet. Nhu go bong co cai yet hoa khi 軋花器 tuc la cai guong bat bong vay. \n\t2. Gat do, de bep. Lay the luc ma danh do nguoi khac goi la khuynh yet 傾軋. \n\t3. Mot thu hinh phap ngay xua, dung ban ep kep mat ca chan. \n\t4. Tieng banh xe quay cham vao nhau. \n\t5. Ta quen doc la chu loat.
轧=yet, loat [ga2|ya4|zha2]\n\t1. Nghien, pham cai gi da qua mot vong truc tron no lan qua deu goi la yet. Nhu go bong co cai yet hoa khi 軋花器 tuc la cai guong bat bong vay. \n\t2. Gat do, de bep. Lay the luc ma danh do nguoi khac goi la khuynh yet 傾軋. \n\t3. Mot thu hinh phap ngay xua, dung ban ep kep mat ca chan. \n\t4. Tieng banh xe quay cham vao nhau. \n\t5. Ta quen doc la chu loat.
軌=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Cai vet banh xe cho truc hai banh xe cach nhau. Duong sat xe hoa, xe dien chay goi la thiet quy 鐵軌 hay quy dao 軌道. \n\t2. Con duong, cac sao hanh tinh di xung quanh mat troi goi la quy dao 軌道. \n\t3. Phep tac. Khong tuan theo phep tac goi la bat quy 不軌. Ke muu lam loan goi la muu vi bat quy 謀為不軌. 
轨=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Cai vet banh xe cho truc hai banh xe cach nhau. Duong sat xe hoa, xe dien chay goi la thiet quy 鐵軌 hay quy dao 軌道. \n\t2. Con duong, cac sao hanh tinh di xung quanh mat troi goi la quy dao 軌道. \n\t3. Phep tac. Khong tuan theo phep tac goi la bat quy 不軌. Ke muu lam loan goi la muu vi bat quy 謀為不軌. 
軍=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Quan linh. Nhu luc quan 陸軍 quan bo, hai quan 海軍 quan thuy, ngay xua vua co   sau canh quan, moi canh quan co 125 000 quan. Phep binh bay gio thi hai su   doan goi la mot canh quan. \n\t2. Mot tieng thong thuong goi ve viec binh. Nhu tong quan 從軍 ra linh, hanh quan 行軍 dem quan di, v.v. \n\t3. Cho dong binh cung goi la quan. \n\t4. Toi day di xa. \n\t5. Mot ten goi ve su chia dat dai cung nhu huyen, tong, xa vay. 
军=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Quan linh. Nhu luc quan 陸軍 quan bo, hai quan 海軍 quan thuy, ngay xua vua co   sau canh quan, moi canh quan co 125 000 quan. Phep binh bay gio thi hai su   doan goi la mot canh quan. \n\t2. Mot tieng thong thuong goi ve viec binh. Nhu tong quan 從軍 ra linh, hanh quan 行軍 dem quan di, v.v. \n\t3. Cho dong binh cung goi la quan. \n\t4. Toi day di xa. \n\t5. Mot ten goi ve su chia dat dai cung nhu huyen, tong, xa vay. 
軏=nguyet, ngot [yue4]\n\t1. Cai don ganh xe nho, nhip xe. Tuc doc la ngot.
軒=hien [xuan1]\n\t1. Cai xe uon hinh cong ma hai ben co man che. Le ngay xua tu quan dai phu tro len moi duoc di xe ay cho nen moi goi nguoi sang la hien mien 軒冕. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thanh trung hien mien tong tran sa 城中軒冕總塵沙 (Hoa huu nhan yen ha ngu hung 和友人煙霞寓興) ngua xe, mu ao trong thanh thay la cat bui. \n\t2. Xe dang truoc cao goi la hien 軒, dang sau thap goi la chi 輊. Cho nen nghi luan co cho tang boc, de nen goi la hien chi 軒輊 . \n\t3. Mai hien tren bang phang. Vua khong ngu o chinh dien ma ra ngu o nha ngoai goi la lam hien 臨軒. Cai chai nha de hoc cung goi la hien. \n\t4. Mai hien cao mai khong co cai gi che lap, cho nen nha cua lam duoc sang sua goi la hien xuong 軒敞. \n\t5. Hien hien 軒軒 voi voi. Nhu hien hien ha cu 軒軒霞舉 cao voi voi nhu rang moc buoi sang, y noi nguoi thanh cao sang suot. \n\t6. Mim cuoi. Nhu hien cu 軒渠 cuoi cuoi noi noi. \n\t7. Ho Hien.
轩=hien [xuan1]\n\t1. Cai xe uon hinh cong ma hai ben co man che. Le ngay xua tu quan dai phu tro len moi duoc di xe ay cho nen moi goi nguoi sang la hien mien 軒冕. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Thanh trung hien mien tong tran sa 城中軒冕總塵沙 (Hoa huu nhan yen ha ngu hung 和友人煙霞寓興) ngua xe, mu ao trong thanh thay la cat bui. \n\t2. Xe dang truoc cao goi la hien 軒, dang sau thap goi la chi 輊. Cho nen nghi luan co cho tang boc, de nen goi la hien chi 軒輊 . \n\t3. Mai hien tren bang phang. Vua khong ngu o chinh dien ma ra ngu o nha ngoai goi la lam hien 臨軒. Cai chai nha de hoc cung goi la hien. \n\t4. Mai hien cao mai khong co cai gi che lap, cho nen nha cua lam duoc sang sua goi la hien xuong 軒敞. \n\t5. Hien hien 軒軒 voi voi. Nhu hien hien ha cu 軒軒霞舉 cao voi voi nhu rang moc buoi sang, y noi nguoi thanh cao sang suot. \n\t6. Mim cuoi. Nhu hien cu 軒渠 cuoi cuoi noi noi. \n\t7. Ho Hien.
軔=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Lay go chen banh xe cho no khong lan di duoc goi la nhan. Vi the nen xe moi bat dau di goi la phat nhan 發軔 bo cai chen xe, su gi moi bat dau lam cung goi la phat nhan. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu nhan 仞. \n\t3. Ngan tro. \n\t4. Ben chac. \n\t5. Mem mai. \n\t6. Luoi bieng.
轫=nhan [ren4]\n\t1. Lay go chen banh xe cho no khong lan di duoc goi la nhan. Vi the nen xe moi bat dau di goi la phat nhan 發軔 bo cai chen xe, su gi moi bat dau lam cung goi la phat nhan. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu nhan 仞. \n\t3. Ngan tro. \n\t4. Ben chac. \n\t5. Mem mai. \n\t6. Luoi bieng.
軛=ach [e4]\n\t1. Cai vai xe, hai dau don xe khoet thung nhu hinh ban nguyet de bac vao co ngua goi la ach. Nguyen viet la chu 軶. Xem chu chu 輈.
轭=ach [e4]\n\t1. Cai vai xe, hai dau don xe khoet thung nhu hinh ban nguyet de bac vao co ngua goi la ach. Nguyen viet la chu 軶. Xem chu chu 輈.
軟=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Mem. Nguyen la chu nhuyen 輭.
软=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Mem. Nguyen la chu nhuyen 輭.
軡=linh [fan3]\n\t1. Cai khuon vuong trong hom xe, lam nhu chan song cua so vay. \n\t2. Banh xe. 
軫=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Cai go bac ngang o sau xe, cai khung xe. \n\t2. Xot thuong, dau xot, quan thuong. Nhu chan hoai 軫懷 long nho quanh co. \n\t3. Cai van day o duoi dan. \n\t4. Sao Chan, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Dong nghin nghit.
轸=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Cai go bac ngang o sau xe, cai khung xe. \n\t2. Xot thuong, dau xot, quan thuong. Nhu chan hoai 軫懷 long nho quanh co. \n\t3. Cai van day o duoi dan. \n\t4. Sao Chan, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu. \n\t5. Dong nghin nghit.
軶=ach [e4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu ach 軛.
軸=truc [zhou2|zhou4]\n\t1. Cai truc xe. \n\t2. Cai truc cuon. Lam cai truc tron de cuon do deu goi la truc. Sach vo ngay xua viet bang lua deu dung truc cuon nen goi sach vo la quyen truc 卷軸, cuon tranh ve goi la hoa truc 畫軸, v.v. \n\t3. Pham vat gi quay vong duoc thi cai chot giua deu goi la truc. Nhu qua dat o vao giua nam bac cuc goi la dia truc 地軸. Khung cui cung co cai thoi cai truc, thoi de det duong ngang, truc de det duong doc. \n\t4. O cai dia vi cot yeu cung goi la truc. Vi the nen nguoi cam quyen chinh nuoc goi la duong truc 當軸. \n\t5. Benh khong di duoc.
轴=truc [zhou2|zhou4]\n\t1. Cai truc xe. \n\t2. Cai truc cuon. Lam cai truc tron de cuon do deu goi la truc. Sach vo ngay xua viet bang lua deu dung truc cuon nen goi sach vo la quyen truc 卷軸, cuon tranh ve goi la hoa truc 畫軸, v.v. \n\t3. Pham vat gi quay vong duoc thi cai chot giua deu goi la truc. Nhu qua dat o vao giua nam bac cuc goi la dia truc 地軸. Khung cui cung co cai thoi cai truc, thoi de det duong ngang, truc de det duong doc. \n\t4. O cai dia vi cot yeu cung goi la truc. Vi the nen nguoi cam quyen chinh nuoc goi la duong truc 當軸. \n\t5. Benh khong di duoc.
軹=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Dau truc xe, cai ong dau truc xe. \n\t2. Duong re. \n\t3. Dung lam ngu tu, dua day cau noi. Trang Tu 莊子. Nhi he lai vi chi ? 而奚來爲軹 (Dai Tong su 大宗師) mi lai day lam gi nua ?
轵=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Dau truc xe, cai ong dau truc xe. \n\t2. Duong re. \n\t3. Dung lam ngu tu, dua day cau noi. Trang Tu 莊子. Nhi he lai vi chi ? 而奚來爲軹 (Dai Tong su 大宗師) mi lai day lam gi nua ?
軺=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Cai xe nho va nhe. \n\t2. Xe ngua.
轺=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Cai xe nho va nhe. \n\t2. Xe ngua.
軻=kha [ke1]\n\t1. Cai truc xe. \n\t2. Xe di khong duoc yen on goi la kham kha 轗軻. Vi the nen nguoi gap lam su trac tro, khong duoc thoa chi cung goi la kham kha 轗軻 trac tro. 
轲=kha [ke1]\n\t1. Cai truc xe. \n\t2. Xe di khong duoc yen on goi la kham kha 轗軻. Vi the nen nguoi gap lam su trac tro, khong duoc thoa chi cung goi la kham kha 轗軻 trac tro. 
軼=dat, diet [yi4]\n\t1. Xe chay vuot qua. Vi the nen o sau ma vuot hon truoc cung goi la dat. Nhu dao dat bach vuong 道軼百王 dao cao vuot ca tram vua truoc. \n\t2. Xung dot. Lay suc binh ma xung dot vao goi la xam dat 侵軼. \n\t3. That lac. Cung nghia voi chu dat 佚 hay 逸. Nhu dat su 軼事 nghia la su that lac, sach khong thay chep, chi nghe thay di truyen lai. Cung doc la chu diet.
轶=dat, diet [yi4]\n\t1. Xe chay vuot qua. Vi the nen o sau ma vuot hon truoc cung goi la dat. Nhu dao dat bach vuong 道軼百王 dao cao vuot ca tram vua truoc. \n\t2. Xung dot. Lay suc binh ma xung dot vao goi la xam dat 侵軼. \n\t3. That lac. Cung nghia voi chu dat 佚 hay 逸. Nhu dat su 軼事 nghia la su that lac, sach khong thay chep, chi nghe thay di truyen lai. Cung doc la chu diet.
軾=thuc [shi4]\n\t1. Cai don ngang truoc xe, khi dang di gap ai dang kinh thi tua vao don ma cui minh xuong. Nay thong dung chu thuc 式. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hanh sac thong thong tue van mo, Bat cam bang thuc than Qui Du 行色匆匆歲雲暮，不禁憑軾歎歸與 (Dong Lo 東路) Cuoc hanh trinh voi va, nam da muon, Bat giac nuong noi van chac truoc xe ma than "Ve thoi". Nguyen Du lam bai nay khi di ngang que huong Khong Tu 孔子. Qui du cung la hai chu cua Khong Tu. 
轼=thuc [shi4]\n\t1. Cai don ngang truoc xe, khi dang di gap ai dang kinh thi tua vao don ma cui minh xuong. Nay thong dung chu thuc 式. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hanh sac thong thong tue van mo, Bat cam bang thuc than Qui Du 行色匆匆歲雲暮，不禁憑軾歎歸與 (Dong Lo 東路) Cuoc hanh trinh voi va, nam da muon, Bat giac nuong noi van chac truoc xe ma than "Ve thoi". Nguyen Du lam bai nay khi di ngang que huong Khong Tu 孔子. Qui du cung la hai chu cua Khong Tu. 
輀=nhi [er2]\n\t1. Cai xe tang, xe dam ma.
較=giac, gieu, giao [jiao4]\n\t1. Cai tay xe. Hai ben cho tua xe co cai go dat ngang bat khum ve dang truoc goi la giac. \n\t2. Ganh dua, cung nghia voi chu 角. Nhu lo nhan liep giac 魯人獵較 nguoi nuoc Lo san ban thi. \n\t3. Mot am la gieu. Co cho doc la giao. So sanh, cung nghia voi chu hieu 校. \n\t4. Qua loa. Nhu dai giao 大較 cung nhu ta noi dai luoc 大略. \n\t5. Ro ret.
较=giac, gieu, giao [jiao4]\n\t1. Cai tay xe. Hai ben cho tua xe co cai go dat ngang bat khum ve dang truoc goi la giac. \n\t2. Ganh dua, cung nghia voi chu 角. Nhu lo nhan liep giac 魯人獵較 nguoi nuoc Lo san ban thi. \n\t3. Mot am la gieu. Co cho doc la giao. So sanh, cung nghia voi chu hieu 校. \n\t4. Qua loa. Nhu dai giao 大較 cung nhu ta noi dai luoc 大略. \n\t5. Ro ret.
輅=lo, nha [lu4]\n\t1. Keo. \n\t2. Cai xe to. \n\t3. Mot am la nha. Don ruoc.
辂=lo, nha [lu4]\n\t1. Keo. \n\t2. Cai xe to. \n\t3. Mot am la nha. Don ruoc.
輇=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Cai xe banh dac. Nhu banh xe cut kit cua ca khoanh go lam banh khong co tai hoa goi la thuyen. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu thuyen 銓 nghia la can nhac. \n\t3. Cung co nghia la nho, nhu thuyen tai 銓才 tai nho mon.
辁=thuyen [quan2]\n\t1. Cai xe banh dac. Nhu banh xe cut kit cua ca khoanh go lam banh khong co tai hoa goi la thuyen. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu thuyen 銓 nghia la can nhac. \n\t3. Cung co nghia la nho, nhu thuyen tai 銓才 tai nho mon.
輈=chu [zhou1]\n\t1. Cai don xe. Don xe lon goi la vien 轅, don xe binh xe di choi goi la chu 輈. Xem chu vien 轅.
載=tai, tai, tai [zai3|zai4]\n\t1. Cho. Noi ve nguoi thi goi la thua 乘, noi ve xe thi goi la tai 載. Nhu tai di hau xa 載以後車 lay xe sau cho ve. Pham dung thuyen hay xe de cho do deu goi la tai ca. Nhu man tai nhi quy 滿載而歸 xep day thuyen cho ve. \n\t2. Nang. Suc nang noi do goi la tai. Nhu thien phu dia tai 天覆地載 troi che dat cho (nang), nguoi nao co ve trong hau goi la tai duc chi khi 載德之器. \n\t3. Day ray. Nhu oan thanh tai dao 怨聲載道 tieng oan than day duong. \n\t4. Truoc. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Thang thuy chinh, tu cat tai 湯始征自葛載 vua Thang bat dau chinh phat tu nuoc Cat truoc. \n\t5. Thanh, nen. Nhu nai canh tai ca 乃賡載歌 ben noi thanh bai hat. \n\t6. Ghi chep, chep ca cac viec cac vat vao ca mot cuon nhu xe cho du cac do. Nhu ki tai 記載 ghi chep. \n\t7. Thoi, dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu tai tap can qua 載戢干戈 thoi thu moc mac. \n\t8. Mot am la tai. Cac do xe thuyen cho toi. Tuc thong dung chu tai 儎. \n\t9. Lai mot am la tai. Nam. Nha Ha 夏 goi la tue 歲. Nha Thuong 商 goi la tu 祀. Nha Chu 周 goi la nien 年. Nha Duong 唐, nha Ngo 吳 goi la tai 載.
载=tai, tai, tai [zai3|zai4]\n\t1. Cho. Noi ve nguoi thi goi la thua 乘, noi ve xe thi goi la tai 載. Nhu tai di hau xa 載以後車 lay xe sau cho ve. Pham dung thuyen hay xe de cho do deu goi la tai ca. Nhu man tai nhi quy 滿載而歸 xep day thuyen cho ve. \n\t2. Nang. Suc nang noi do goi la tai. Nhu thien phu dia tai 天覆地載 troi che dat cho (nang), nguoi nao co ve trong hau goi la tai duc chi khi 載德之器. \n\t3. Day ray. Nhu oan thanh tai dao 怨聲載道 tieng oan than day duong. \n\t4. Truoc. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Thang thuy chinh, tu cat tai 湯始征自葛載 vua Thang bat dau chinh phat tu nuoc Cat truoc. \n\t5. Thanh, nen. Nhu nai canh tai ca 乃賡載歌 ben noi thanh bai hat. \n\t6. Ghi chep, chep ca cac viec cac vat vao ca mot cuon nhu xe cho du cac do. Nhu ki tai 記載 ghi chep. \n\t7. Thoi, dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu tai tap can qua 載戢干戈 thoi thu moc mac. \n\t8. Mot am la tai. Cac do xe thuyen cho toi. Tuc thong dung chu tai 儎. \n\t9. Lai mot am la tai. Nam. Nha Ha 夏 goi la tue 歲. Nha Thuong 商 goi la tu 祀. Nha Chu 周 goi la nien 年. Nha Duong 唐, nha Ngo 吳 goi la tai 載.
輊=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Hien chi 軒輊. Xem chu hien 軒.
轾=chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Hien chi 軒輊. Xem chu hien 軒.
輒=triep [zhe2]\n\t1. Lien. Cu lay y minh tu chuyen quyet doan goi la triep. Nhu triep di vi bat kha 輒以爲不可 lien cho la khong duoc. \n\t2. Thuong thuong, luon. Nhu triep phuc nhu thi 輒復如是 thuong tai the luon. \n\t3. Tuc thi, ngay. \n\t4. Thoi.
辄=triep [zhe2]\n\t1. Lien. Cu lay y minh tu chuyen quyet doan goi la triep. Nhu triep di vi bat kha 輒以爲不可 lien cho la khong duoc. \n\t2. Thuong thuong, luon. Nhu triep phuc nhu thi 輒復如是 thuong tai the luon. \n\t3. Tuc thi, ngay. \n\t4. Thoi.
輓=van [wan3]\n\t1. Keo, keo xe di. \n\t2. Van ca 輓歌 tieng hoa lai cua ke cam phat di theo xe tang, vi the nen doi sau goi vieng nguoi chet la van.
輔=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Xuong ma cua nguoi ta. \n\t2. Hai ben xe, hai ben don kem xe, vi the nen cung gan gan cung giup lan nhau, nuong tua lan nhau goi la phu xa tuong y 輔車相依. \n\t3. Giup. Nhu phu bat 輔弼 giup dan. \n\t3. Ten quan. Quan su 師 , quan bao 保, quan nghi 疑, quan thua 丞 goi la tu phu 四輔. Nghia la cac quan giup do o hai ben minh vua vay. \n\t4. Cho dat giap nhau cung goi la phu. Nhu tinh Truc Le truoc goi la ky phu 畿輔 nghia la no giap gan kinh ky vay.
辅=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Xuong ma cua nguoi ta. \n\t2. Hai ben xe, hai ben don kem xe, vi the nen cung gan gan cung giup lan nhau, nuong tua lan nhau goi la phu xa tuong y 輔車相依. \n\t3. Giup. Nhu phu bat 輔弼 giup dan. \n\t3. Ten quan. Quan su 師 , quan bao 保, quan nghi 疑, quan thua 丞 goi la tu phu 四輔. Nghia la cac quan giup do o hai ben minh vua vay. \n\t4. Cho dat giap nhau cung goi la phu. Nhu tinh Truc Le truoc goi la ky phu 畿輔 nghia la no giap gan kinh ky vay.
輕=khinh, khanh [qing1]\n\t1. Nhe. \n\t2. Khinh re, ke khong biet tu trong goi la khinh bac 輕薄 hay khinh dieu 輕佻. \n\t3. Hoi, pham cai gi chua den noi qua lam deu goi la khinh. Nhu khinh han 輕寒 hoi ret, ret vua, khinh benh 輕病 benh nhe, v.v. \n\t4. Gian di. Nhu khinh xa giam tung 輕車簡從 di ra gian tien chi co cai xe khong va it nguoi hau. \n\t5. Chat khinh, mot nguyen chat ve the hoi, cung duong khi hoa hop thanh nuoc, cung goi la thuy to 水素. Chat no nhe, cho nen thuong boc len, cac khinh khi cau deu dung chat ay de bay len, ta goi la khinh khi. \n\t6. Khinh bi. \n\t7. Re rung. \n\t8. Mot am la khanh. Lanh chanh, ta cai dang khong can than. 
轻=khinh, khanh [qing1]\n\t1. Nhe. \n\t2. Khinh re, ke khong biet tu trong goi la khinh bac 輕薄 hay khinh dieu 輕佻. \n\t3. Hoi, pham cai gi chua den noi qua lam deu goi la khinh. Nhu khinh han 輕寒 hoi ret, ret vua, khinh benh 輕病 benh nhe, v.v. \n\t4. Gian di. Nhu khinh xa giam tung 輕車簡從 di ra gian tien chi co cai xe khong va it nguoi hau. \n\t5. Chat khinh, mot nguyen chat ve the hoi, cung duong khi hoa hop thanh nuoc, cung goi la thuy to 水素. Chat no nhe, cho nen thuong boc len, cac khinh khi cau deu dung chat ay de bay len, ta goi la khinh khi. \n\t6. Khinh bi. \n\t7. Re rung. \n\t8. Mot am la khanh. Lanh chanh, ta cai dang khong can than. 
輗=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Cai don xe to, tuc la cai don dong vao hai dau cang xe vay.
輘=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Xe nghien qua. \n\t2. Tieng xe dong.
輙=triep [zhe2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu triep 輒
輛=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Co xe, so xe. Mot co xe goi la nhat luong 一輛.
辆=luong [liang4]\n\t1. Co xe, so xe. Mot co xe goi la nhat luong 一輛.
輜=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 輺.
辎=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu 輺.
輝=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Sang sua, ruc ro. Lam nen ve vang goi la quang huy 光輝. Manh Giao 孟郊. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, Bao dac tam xuan huy 誰言寸草心，報得三春輝 (Du tu ngam 遊子吟) ai noi rang long cua mot tac co ngan ngui, hep hoi lai co the bao dap duoc anh nang ba mua xuan chan hoa dam am. Cau Lieu dem tac co quyet den ba xuan cua Nguyen Du 阮攸 muon y hai cau tho nay.
辉=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Sang sua, ruc ro. Lam nen ve vang goi la quang huy 光輝. Manh Giao 孟郊. Thuy ngon thon thao tam, Bao dac tam xuan huy 誰言寸草心，報得三春輝 (Du tu ngam 遊子吟) ai noi rang long cua mot tac co ngan ngui, hep hoi lai co the bao dap duoc anh nang ba mua xuan chan hoa dam am. Cau Lieu dem tac co quyet den ba xuan cua Nguyen Du 阮攸 muon y hai cau tho nay.
輞=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Cai vanh banh xe.
辋=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Cai vanh banh xe.
輟=xuyet, chuyet [chuo4]\n\t1. Thoi, nghi. Lam viec nua chung bo do goi la trung xuyet 中輟. Chinh am la chuyet. 
辍=xuyet, chuyet [chuo4]\n\t1. Thoi, nghi. Lam viec nua chung bo do goi la trung xuyet 中輟. Chinh am la chuyet. 
輠=qua [guo3]\n\t1. Cai bau dau, cai bau dung dau mo de cho vao truc cho di duoc tron. Vi the nen nguoi ngon luan khong cung goi la chich qua 炙輠.
輦=lien [nian3]\n\t1. Tay cai xe nguoi keo. \n\t2. Xe cua vua di goi la lien, nen chon kinh su goi la lien ha 輦下, duong loi trong cung goi la lien dao 輦道. \n\t3. Keo. \n\t4. Cho, tai di.
辇=lien [nian3]\n\t1. Tay cai xe nguoi keo. \n\t2. Xe cua vua di goi la lien, nen chon kinh su goi la lien ha 輦下, duong loi trong cung goi la lien dao 輦道. \n\t3. Keo. \n\t4. Cho, tai di.
輧=binh [pian2]\n\t1. Man xe, ao toi canh ga xe, xe cua dan ba di, xung quanh co man che.
輩=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Buc, lu, bon. Nhu tien boi 前輩 buc truoc, hau boi 後輩 bon sau, nga boi 我輩 lu chung ta, nhuoc boi 若輩 lu chung bay, v.v. \n\t2. Hang xe, rang xe. \n\t3. Vi, so sanh.
辈=boi [bei4]\n\t1. Buc, lu, bon. Nhu tien boi 前輩 buc truoc, hau boi 後輩 bon sau, nga boi 我輩 lu chung ta, nhuoc boi 若輩 lu chung bay, v.v. \n\t2. Hang xe, rang xe. \n\t3. Vi, so sanh.
輪=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Cai banh xe. \n\t2. Vong, vang, pham cai gi hinh tron ma phang deu goi la luan. Nhu nhat luan 日輪 vang mat troi, nguyet luan 月輪 vang trang, v.v. \n\t3. Vong xoay van, mot thu do giup suc ve trong hoc, van chuyen that nhanh de co day cac phan may khac. \n\t4. To lon. Nhu nha cua cao lon long lay goi la luan hoan 輪奐. \n\t5. Thay doi, lan luot thay doi nhau ma lam goi la luan luu 輪流 hay luan tri 輪值, v.v. \n\t6. Quang luan 廣輪 chieu ngang chieu doc cua qua dat, ve phia dong tay la quang, phia nam bac la luan.
轮=luan [lun2]\n\t1. Cai banh xe. \n\t2. Vong, vang, pham cai gi hinh tron ma phang deu goi la luan. Nhu nhat luan 日輪 vang mat troi, nguyet luan 月輪 vang trang, v.v. \n\t3. Vong xoay van, mot thu do giup suc ve trong hoc, van chuyen that nhanh de co day cac phan may khac. \n\t4. To lon. Nhu nha cua cao lon long lay goi la luan hoan 輪奐. \n\t5. Thay doi, lan luot thay doi nhau ma lam goi la luan luu 輪流 hay luan tri 輪值, v.v. \n\t6. Quang luan 廣輪 chieu ngang chieu doc cua qua dat, ve phia dong tay la quang, phia nam bac la luan.
輭=nhuyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Mem, tuc thong dung nhu chu nhuyen 軟. \n\t2. Nguoi yeu luot. \n\t3. Hen nhat, vo dung.
輮=nhu [rou2]\n\t1. Vanh banh xe. \n\t2. Uon nan, cung nghia voi chu nhu 揉. Nan cong ra thang goi la kieu 矯, uon thang ra cong goi la nhu 輮.
輯=tap [ji2]\n\t1. Ghep go dong xe, deu an khop vao nhau goi la tap. Vi the cho nen chi huong moi nguoi cung hoa hop nhau goi la tap muc 輯睦, khien cho duoc chon an chon o yen on goi la an tap 安輯. \n\t2. Thu gop lai. Nhat nhanh cac doan van lai, gop thanh quyen sach goi la bien tap 編輯. \n\t3. Ven, thu lai.
辑=tap [ji2]\n\t1. Ghep go dong xe, deu an khop vao nhau goi la tap. Vi the cho nen chi huong moi nguoi cung hoa hop nhau goi la tap muc 輯睦, khien cho duoc chon an chon o yen on goi la an tap 安輯. \n\t2. Thu gop lai. Nhat nhanh cac doan van lai, gop thanh quyen sach goi la bien tap 編輯. \n\t3. Ven, thu lai.
輳=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Bau xe, cho cac tai hoa xe xum xit chau dau ca vao goi la thau. Vi the nen cho nao nhan dan tu hop dong duc goi la tu phuong phuc thau 四方輻輳.
辏=thau [cou4]\n\t1. Bau xe, cho cac tai hoa xe xum xit chau dau ca vao goi la thau. Vi the nen cho nao nhan dan tu hop dong duc goi la tu phuong phuc thau 四方輻輳.
輶=du [you2]\n\t1. Cai xe nhe. \n\t2. Nhe.
輸=thau, thu [shu1]\n\t1. Chuyen van, lay xe van tai do di. Nhu thau tong 輸送 van tai dua di, thau xuat 輸出 van tai ra, v.v. \n\t2. Nop, dua do gi cho ai goi la thau. Lay y thanh thuc doi voi nguoi cung goi la thau. Nhu thau trung 輸忠 doc het long thuc. \n\t3. Thua. Nhu thau doanh 輸贏 duoc thua. Mot am la thu. Cai do dua cho nguoi.
输=thau, thu [shu1]\n\t1. Chuyen van, lay xe van tai do di. Nhu thau tong 輸送 van tai dua di, thau xuat 輸出 van tai ra, v.v. \n\t2. Nop, dua do gi cho ai goi la thau. Lay y thanh thuc doi voi nguoi cung goi la thau. Nhu thau trung 輸忠 doc het long thuc. \n\t3. Thua. Nhu thau doanh 輸贏 duoc thua. Mot am la thu. Cai do dua cho nguoi.
輹=phuc [fu4]\n\t1. Cai nhip xe, cai go ngang duoi xe de bat lien truc xe voi than xe.
輺=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Cai xe cho do, cac do dung trong quan deu goi la truy trong 輺重 ca. Phep binh bay gio co mot canh quan chuyen viec van tai binh luong goi la truy trong binh 輺重兵 linh tai.
輻=phuc, buc [fu2]\n\t1. Cai tay hoa xe. Xem lai chu thau 輳. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu phuc 輹. Kinh Dich 易經 co cau du thoat phuc, phu the phan muc 輿脫輻夫妻反目 nghia la xe trut nhip vo chong tro mat voi nhau, vi the nen vo chong ly di nhau goi la thoat phuc 脫輻. Ta quen doc la chu buc.
辐=phuc, buc [fu2]\n\t1. Cai tay hoa xe. Xem lai chu thau 輳. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu phuc 輹. Kinh Dich 易經 co cau du thoat phuc, phu the phan muc 輿脫輻夫妻反目 nghia la xe trut nhip vo chong tro mat voi nhau, vi the nen vo chong ly di nhau goi la thoat phuc 脫輻. Ta quen doc la chu buc.
輾=trien, nien [zhan3]\n\t1. Quay nghieng, quay nua vanh. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau trien chuyen phan trac 輾轉反側 tran troc tro minh. Vi the nen su gi phan phuc bat dinh cung goi la trien chuyen. \n\t2. Mot am la nien. Nghien nho, dung vong sat quay cho nho cac vat gi ra goi la nien. Co khi viet la nien 碾.
辗=trien, nien [zhan3]\n\t1. Quay nghieng, quay nua vanh. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau trien chuyen phan trac 輾轉反側 tran troc tro minh. Vi the nen su gi phan phuc bat dinh cung goi la trien chuyen. \n\t2. Mot am la nien. Nghien nho, dung vong sat quay cho nho cac vat gi ra goi la nien. Co khi viet la nien 碾.
輿=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cai xe tai do, cai kieu khieng bang don goi la kien du 肩輿. \n\t2. Dat rong ma cho ca muon vat, nen goi dat la dia du 地輿. Troi dat goi la kham du 堪輿 kham la noi ve dao troi, du la noi ve dao dat, vi the ke xem dat (thay dia ly) cung goi la kham du. \n\t3. So dong, loi ban luan cua so dong nguoi goi la du luan 輿論.
舆=du [yu2]\n\t1. Cai xe tai do, cai kieu khieng bang don goi la kien du 肩輿. \n\t2. Dat rong ma cho ca muon vat, nen goi dat la dia du 地輿. Troi dat goi la kham du 堪輿 kham la noi ve dao troi, du la noi ve dao dat, vi the ke xem dat (thay dia ly) cung goi la kham du. \n\t3. So dong, loi ban luan cua so dong nguoi goi la du luan 輿論.
轂=coc [gu1|gu3]\n\t1. Cai bau giua banh xe. Cai bau ay quay thi xe di, vi the nen diu dat cho nguoi tien len goi la thoi coc 推轂. \n\t2. Tom, tu hop. 
毂=coc [gu1|gu3]\n\t1. Cai bau giua banh xe. Cai bau ay quay thi xe di, vi the nen diu dat cho nguoi tien len goi la thoi coc 推轂. \n\t2. Tom, tu hop. 
轄=hat [xia2]\n\t1. Cai dinh chot xe, cai chot cam ngoai dau truc cho banh xe khong trut ra duoc. \n\t2. Cai quan. Nhu tong hat 總轄 cai quan tat ca moi viec. \n\t3. Tieng xe di. 
辖=hat [xia2]\n\t1. Cai dinh chot xe, cai chot cam ngoai dau truc cho banh xe khong trut ra duoc. \n\t2. Cai quan. Nhu tong hat 總轄 cai quan tat ca moi viec. \n\t3. Tieng xe di. 
轅=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Cai cang xe, tay xe. Loi xe ngay xua cac xe to dung hai cang thang goi la vien 轅, xe nho dung mot don cong goi la chu 輈. \n\t2. Vien mon 轅門 ngay xua vua di tuan o ngoai, den cho nao nghi thi xep xe vong xung quanh lam hang rao, ma de mot cho ra vao, hai ben de xe doc xuong cang xe ngong len de lam dau hieu, cho nen goi la vien mon, ve sau cung goi ngoai cua cac dinh cac so la vien mon, co khi cung goi cac dinh cac so quan la vien nua. Cac nha tram khi cac quan di qua nghi chan goi la hanh vien 行轅.
