辕=vien [yuan2]\n\t1. Cai cang xe, tay xe. Loi xe ngay xua cac xe to dung hai cang thang goi la vien 轅, xe nho dung mot don cong goi la chu 輈. \n\t2. Vien mon 轅門 ngay xua vua di tuan o ngoai, den cho nao nghi thi xep xe vong xung quanh lam hang rao, ma de mot cho ra vao, hai ben de xe doc xuong cang xe ngong len de lam dau hieu, cho nen goi la vien mon, ve sau cung goi ngoai cua cac dinh cac so la vien mon, co khi cung goi cac dinh cac so quan la vien nua. Cac nha tram khi cac quan di qua nghi chan goi la hanh vien 行轅. 
轆=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Loc lo 轆轤 con lan, cai rong roc dung de keo cac do nang cho no nhe.
辘=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Loc lo 轆轤 con lan, cai rong roc dung de keo cac do nang cho no nhe.
轇=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Giao cat 轇葛 de lon xon, chang chit, xa tham. Nguyen viet la 膠轕.
轉=chuyen, chuyen [zhuai3|zhuan3|zhuan4]\n\t1. Quay vong, di vong quanh, vat gi hinh tron ma quay di quay lai duoc goi la chuyen. Nhu dia cau cong chuyen 地球公轉 qua dat quay chung, dia cau tu chuyen 地球自轉 qua dat tu quay, v.v. \n\t2. Chuyen van. Nhu chuyen thau 轉輸 chuyen van di, tai di. \n\t3. Quay chieu khac, doi doi. Nhu chuyen loan 轉彎 quay di, vong ra, chuyen co 轉機 quay lai xe lai. \n\t4. Su gi khong duoc thang toi ngay goi la chuyen. Nhu chuyen chi 轉致 nho nguoi den noi to y ho, chuyen thac 轉託 lai nho nguoi khac noi ho, hoi ho, v.v. \n\t5. Uyen chuyen. \n\t6. Mot am la chuyen lay suc ma chuyen do. Duoc thang len ngoi quan cao hon goi la thien chuyen 遷轉. Pham vat gi no tu quay thi goi la chuyen, ma lay suc nguoi hay suc may moc ma quay dong thi goi la chuyen.
转=chuyen, chuyen [zhuai3|zhuan3|zhuan4]\n\t1. Quay vong, di vong quanh, vat gi hinh tron ma quay di quay lai duoc goi la chuyen. Nhu dia cau cong chuyen 地球公轉 qua dat quay chung, dia cau tu chuyen 地球自轉 qua dat tu quay, v.v. \n\t2. Chuyen van. Nhu chuyen thau 轉輸 chuyen van di, tai di. \n\t3. Quay chieu khac, doi doi. Nhu chuyen loan 轉彎 quay di, vong ra, chuyen co 轉機 quay lai xe lai. \n\t4. Su gi khong duoc thang toi ngay goi la chuyen. Nhu chuyen chi 轉致 nho nguoi den noi to y ho, chuyen thac 轉託 lai nho nguoi khac noi ho, hoi ho, v.v. \n\t5. Uyen chuyen. \n\t6. Mot am la chuyen lay suc ma chuyen do. Duoc thang len ngoi quan cao hon goi la thien chuyen 遷轉. Pham vat gi no tu quay thi goi la chuyen, ma lay suc nguoi hay suc may moc ma quay dong thi goi la chuyen.
轊=due [wei4]\n\t1. Cai dau truc xe.
轍=triet [zhe2]\n\t1. Cai vet banh xe di qua, vet.
辙=triet [zhe2]\n\t1. Cai vet banh xe di qua, vet.
轎=kieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Cai xe nho. \n\t2. Cai kieu lam bang tre.
轿=kieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Cai xe nho. \n\t2. Cai kieu lam bang tre.
轔=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Cai buc cua. \n\t2. Lan lan 轔轔 xinh xich, tieng xe di.
辚=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Cai buc cua. \n\t2. Lan lan 轔轔 xinh xich, tieng xe di.
轕=cat [ge2]\n\t1. Giao cat 轇轕. Xem chu giao 轇.
轖=sac [se4]\n\t1. Hom xe. Ghep go lai thanh hom chac chan goi la ket sac 結轖, cung goi la ket linh 結軨.
轗=kham [kan3]\n\t1. Kham kha 轗軻. Xem chu kha 軻.
轘=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Lay xe buoc nguoi nao vao day, roi quay moi cai di mot nga de xe tung nguoi ra goi la hoan, la mot hinh phat phanh thay xe xac doi xua.
轞=ham [xian4]\n\t1. Xinh xich, tieng xe di. \n\t2. Ham xa 轞車 cai xe tu.
轟=oanh, hoanh [hong1]\n\t1. Sam sam, xinh xich, tieng mot doan xe di. \n\t2. Ram ri. \n\t3. Vang lung. Nhu oanh oanh liet liet 轟轟烈烈 vang lung ruc ro. \n\t4. Dot thuoc no. Chinh am doc la hoanh.
轰=oanh, hoanh [hong1]\n\t1. Sam sam, xinh xich, tieng mot doan xe di. \n\t2. Ram ri. \n\t3. Vang lung. Nhu oanh oanh liet liet 轟轟烈烈 vang lung ruc ro. \n\t4. Dot thuoc no. Chinh am doc la hoanh.
轡=bi [pei4]\n\t1. Day cuong ngua.
辔=bi [pei4]\n\t1. Day cuong ngua.
轢=lich [li4]\n\t1. Chet, nghien, banh xe no nghien qua. \n\t2. Lay cai moi vet noi cho.
轹=lich [li4]\n\t1. Chet, nghien, banh xe no nghien qua. \n\t2. Lay cai moi vet noi cho.
轤=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Loc lo 轆轤. Xem chu loc 轆.
轳=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Loc lo 轆轤. Xem chu loc 轆.
辛=tan [xin1]\n\t1. Can tan, can thu tam trong muoi can. \n\t2. Mui cay. \n\t3. Cay dang nhoc nhan. \n\t4. Thuong xot. Nhu bi tan 悲辛, tan toan 辛酸, v.v.
辜=co [gu1]\n\t1. Toi. Nhu vo co 無辜 khong toi. \n\t2. Co phu 辜負 phu long. \n\t3. Mo phanh muon sinh. \n\t4. Ngan, can. \n\t5. At phai. \n\t6. Ho Co.
辞=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tu 辭.
辟=tich, tich, phich, be, thi [bi4|pi4]\n\t1. Vua. Nhu duy tich tac phuc 惟辟作福 chi vua lam duoc phuc. \n\t2. Doi, voi. Nhu tam chung that tich 三徵七辟 ba lan doi bay lan voi. \n\t3. Phep. \n\t4. Sang, to. \n\t5. Mot am la tich. Hinh phap. Nhu toi xu tu goi la dai tich 大辟. \n\t6. Tru bo di. \n\t7. Lanh ra, lanh di. \n\t8. Danh soi. \n\t9. Lai mot am la phich. Cong queo. 10. Kheo gia bo. \n\t11. Vo nguc. \n\t12. Que, khap khieng. \n\t13. Mot am la nua la be. Lanh. \n\t14. Lai mot am nua la thi. Cung nghia voi chu thi 譬.
辠=toi [zui4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu toi 罪.
辢=lat [la4]\n\t1. Cay qua. \n\t2. Lam viec manh bao qua goi la lat thu 辢手. \n\t3. Nham hiem, doc ac. Nhu khau diem tam lat 口甜心辣 mieng thon thot da ot boi. \n\t4. Cung co khi viet la lat 辣.
辤=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Nguyen dung ve nghia tu nhuong, nay dung nhu chu tu 辭.
辥=tiet [xue1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tiet 薛.
辦=ban, bien [ban4]\n\t1. Du. Nhu dot ta lap ban 咄嗟立辦 giay lat du ca. \n\t2. Lam viec. Nhu ban su 辦事 lam viec, tru ban 籌辦 lo toan lieu lam, v.v. \n\t3. Buoc toi. Ta quen doc la chu bien ca.
办=ban, bien [ban4]\n\t1. Du. Nhu dot ta lap ban 咄嗟立辦 giay lat du ca. \n\t2. Lam viec. Nhu ban su 辦事 lam viec, tru ban 籌辦 lo toan lieu lam, v.v. \n\t3. Buoc toi. Ta quen doc la chu bien ca.
辨=bien, bien [bian4]\n\t1. Phan tich, bien xet. Xet cac su vat roi chia ranh ra xau tot phai chang goi la bien. Ke ngu goi la bat bien thuc mach 不辨菽麥 khong phan biet lua do. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu bien 辯 nghia la tranh bien, bien bac. \n\t3. Mot loi van tranh bien ve su ly cung goi la bien. \n\t4. Mot am la bien. Khap.
辭=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Noi ra thanh van goi la tu. Nhu tu chuong 辭章. Cung co khi dung chu tu 詞. \n\t2. Loi cung cua ke bi kien cung ra. Nhung loi cua dan trinh bay cao to voi quan cung goi la tu. Nhu trinh tu 呈辭 loi trinh, to tu 訴辭 loi cao to. \n\t3. Tu gia. Nhu tu hanh 辭行 tu gia ra di. \n\t4. Tu. Khuoc di khong nhan. Nhu suy tu 推辭 tu choi khong nhan, tu nhuong 辭讓 tu nhuong. Nguyen viet la 辤, nay hai chu deu thong dung ca. \n\t5. Thinh, xin. \n\t6. Trach, moc. \n\t7. Sai di, khien di.
辞=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Noi ra thanh van goi la tu. Nhu tu chuong 辭章. Cung co khi dung chu tu 詞. \n\t2. Loi cung cua ke bi kien cung ra. Nhung loi cua dan trinh bay cao to voi quan cung goi la tu. Nhu trinh tu 呈辭 loi trinh, to tu 訴辭 loi cao to. \n\t3. Tu gia. Nhu tu hanh 辭行 tu gia ra di. \n\t4. Tu. Khuoc di khong nhan. Nhu suy tu 推辭 tu choi khong nhan, tu nhuong 辭讓 tu nhuong. Nguyen viet la 辤, nay hai chu deu thong dung ca. \n\t5. Thinh, xin. \n\t6. Trach, moc. \n\t7. Sai di, khien di.
辮=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Ben, dan. Tet toc bo ru xuong goi la bien tu 辮子 duoi sam.
辫=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Ben, dan. Tet toc bo ru xuong goi la bien tu 辮子 duoi sam.
辯=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Bien bac, tranh bien. Nhu cao dam hung bien 高談雄辯 bien bac hung dung. \n\t2. Tri, lam.
辩=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Bien bac, tranh bien. Nhu cao dam hung bien 高談雄辯 bien bac hung dung. \n\t2. Tri, lam.
辰=than, thin [chen2]\n\t1. Chi than (ta doc la thin), chi thu nam trong 12 chi. Tu bay gio sang cho den chin gio sang goi la gio thin. \n\t2. Mot tieng goi gop ca 12 chi. Ngay xua lay 12 chi ghi ngay, het mot hoi tu ngay ti cho den ngay hoi goi la thiep than 浹辰, vi the nen ngay va gio deu goi la than. \n\t3. Tieng goi chung ca mat troi, mat trang va sao. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu than 晨.
辱=nhuc [ru3]\n\t1. Nhuc nhan, ho nhuoc. Than phai chiu dung cac su dang lay lam nhuc. Nhu nhan nhuc 忍辱 nhin nhuc. \n\t2. Chiu khuat. Dung lam loi yen ui. Ta truyen 左傳. Su ngo tu nhuc tai ne do cuu hi 使吾子辱在泥塗久矣 khien cho ngai bi khuat o noi thap hen lau lam roi. \n\t3. Dung lam loi noi khiem. Nhu nhuc lam 辱臨 nhuc toi, y noi minh hen ha khong dang duoc nguoi ha co ma nguoi van ha co toi that la nhuc cho nguoi.
農=nong [nong2]\n\t1. Nghe lam ruong. \n\t2. Ke lam ruong. \n\t3. Ngay xua cho si 士 hoc tro, nong 農 lam ruong, cong 工 lam tho, thuong 商 di buon la tu dan 四民. \n\t4. Quan coi ve viec ruong nuong. \n\t5. Ho Nong.
农=nong [nong2]\n\t1. Nghe lam ruong. \n\t2. Ke lam ruong. \n\t3. Ngay xua cho si 士 hoc tro, nong 農 lam ruong, cong 工 lam tho, thuong 商 di buon la tu dan 四民. \n\t4. Quan coi ve viec ruong nuong. \n\t5. Ho Nong.
辵=suoc [chuo4]\n\t1. Chot di chot dung lai 
迂=vu [yu1]\n\t1. Xa. Con duong khong duoc thang suot goi la vu. Vi the nen lam viec khong dung le phai goi la vu khoat 迂闊 hay vu vien 迂遠, v.v. \n\t2. Duong xa. \n\t3. Vu cuu 迂乆 hoi lau, luc lau.
迄=hat [qi4]\n\t1. Den. Nhu hat kim 迄今 den nay (ke tu truoc den nay). \n\t2. Ben.
迅=tan [xun4]\n\t1. Nhanh chong. Di lai vun vut, nguoi khong luong duoc goi la tan. Nhu tan loi bat cap yem nhi 迅雷不及掩耳 set danh khong kip bung tai.
过=qua [guo1|guo4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu qua 過.
迍=truan [zhun1]\n\t1. Truan chien 迍邅 vuong vit chat vat khong buoc len duoc. \n\t2. Su doi gap khuc khong duoc thanh thoi cung goi la truan chien 迍邅.
迎=nghenh, nghinh [ying2]\n\t1. Don. Cho vat ngoai no toi ma ngua mat ra don lay goi la nghenh. Nhu tong nghenh 送迎 dua don. Hoan nghenh 歡迎 vui don. Nghenh phong 迎風 hong gio, v.v. \n\t2. Don truoc, suy xet cai moi mung gian cua nguoi khac ma don truoc chieu y goi la nghenh hop 迎合 hay phung nghenh 逢迎. \n\t3. Mot am la nghinh. Di don ve. Nhu than nghinh 親迎 le di don dau. Pham cai gi no toi ma minh don lay thi goi la nghenh, no chua lai ma minh toi don truoc goi la nghinh.
近=can, can, ky [jin4]\n\t1. Gan, duong dat cach nhau gan goi la can, thoi gian cach nhau con it goi la can. Nhu can dai 近代 doi gan day. \n\t2. Thien can, cai gi thuong thay luon ma de biet goi la can. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi ngon can nhi chi vien gia thien ngon da 言近而旨遠者善言也 noi gan ma y tu xa ay la loi noi hay vay. \n\t3. Gan giong nhu, tua tua. Nhu but y can co 筆意進古 y van viet gan giong nhu loi co. \n\t4. Thiet dung, can dung. \n\t5. Mot am la can. Than gan. \n\t6. Lai mot am la ky. Da, roi.
迓=nha [ya4]\n\t1. Don ruoc, di moi. Cung dung nhu chu nha 訝.
返=phan [fan3]\n\t1. Tra lai. \n\t2. Tro lai. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Than vat tai phan linh nhan xi 愼勿再返令人嗤 (Khuat Nguyen) dung tro lai day nua de nguoi ta mai mia.
迕=ngo [wu3]\n\t1. Gap. Hai ben, ben di ben lai, ma vua gap nhau goi la ngo. Vi the nen su gi keo den be bon ma hop ca vao mot luc goi la thac ngo 錯迕.
还=hoan [hai2|huan2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hoan 還.
迢=dieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Dieu de 迢遰 xa xoi khong biet tin tuc nhau. Co khi viet la 迢遞.
迤=di [yi2|yi3]\n\t1. Di le 迤邐 quanh co men theo ben ve. \n\t2. The dat di xien ma dai goi la di.
迥=huynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Xa lac, xa xoi vang ve. \n\t2. The dat dot nhien noi len goi la huynh. Nhu thap the co huynh 塔勢孤迥 the thap chot vot dung mot minh. \n\t3. Khac han, thoi vat gi khac han moi thoi vat goi la huynh nhien bat dong 迥然不同 khac han khong cung.
迦=gia, ca [jia1]\n\t1. Thich Gia 釋迦 duc Thich Gia la vi to sang lap ra Phat giao. Cung doc la chu ca. \n\t2. Gia Lam 迦藍 chua, nha cua su o.
迨=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Kip, cung nghia voi chu dai 逮.
迩=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhi 邇.
迪=dich [di2]\n\t1. Toi den, giam. Nhu dich cat 迪吉 su tot lanh toi, phuc toi. \n\t2. Dat dan. Nhu khai dich 啟迪 mo bao, dat dan len, diu dat. \n\t3. Dao phai. \n\t4. Lam, tao tac. \n\t5. Lay dung. \n\t6. Den.
迫=bach [pai3|po4]\n\t1. Gan sat. Thoi gian hay dia the ke sat tan noi roi khong con mot khe nao nua goi la bach. Vi the nen su can kip lam goi la quan bach 窘迫. \n\t2. Buc bach, de ep. Lay oai the de ep nguoi phai theo goi la hiep bach 脅迫. \n\t3. Thuc giuc. \n\t4. Chat hep. \n\t5. Voi va.
迭=diet [die2]\n\t1. Dap doi, thay doi phien, lan luot. \n\t2. Xam lan. \n\t3. Song ra.
述=thuat [shu4]\n\t1. Bay ra, thuat ra. Chep cac dieu da nghe tu truoc ra goi la thuat. \n\t2. Noi theo. Nhu Trung Dung 中庸 Phu tac chi, tu thuat chi 父作之子述之 cha lam ra, con noi theo. Le ky 禮記. Trong Ni to thuat Nghieu Thuan 仲尼祖述堯舜 Trong Ni noi theo Nghieu, Thuan. \n\t3. Pham lam cho tron cong viec cua nguoi da gay ra hay bien chep duoc nhung loi cua nguoi da noi ra deu goi la thuat. Luan Ngu 論語. Thuat nhi bat tac 述而不作 (Thuat nhi 述而) ta truyen thuat (dao co nhan) ma khong sang tac. \n\t4. Bay to. Bay to truoc sau manh tho cua mot viec gi goi la thuat. Nhu truyen thuat 傳述 dung van tu chep ro de truyen cho nguoi xem, khau thuat 口述 ke mieng, v.v.
迷=me [mi2]\n\t1. Lac. Nhu me lo 迷路 lac duong. \n\t2. Lam me. Dung thuoc hay dung thuat lam cho nguoi ta me man goi la me. Nhu me duoc 迷藥 thuoc me. \n\t3. Lo mo. Tinh than lo mo khong duoc thanh sang goi la me. \n\t4. Me tin. Tam say me ve mot su gi goi la me. Nhu me tin 迷信 tin nham, tram me 沈迷 me mai, v.v.
迹=tich [ji4]\n\t1. Dau vet. Nhu tuc tich 足迹 vet chan. \n\t2. Theo dau, pham su vat gi da qua roi ma con co dau vet de lai cho nguoi noi do ma tim kiem deu goi la tich. Nhu tran tich 陳迹 dau cu, co khi viet la 蹟 hay la 跡. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ha xu than tien kinh ky thi, Do luu tien tich thu giang mi 何處神仙經幾時，猶留仙迹此江湄 Than tien o noi nao den da trai qua bao thoi, Con de lai dau tien o bo song nay.
迺=nai [nai3]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu nai 乃.
追=truy, doi [zhui1]\n\t1. Duoi theo. \n\t2. Kip. Nhu Luan Ngu 論語 noi Lai gia do kha truy 來者猶可追 sau day con co the theo kip. \n\t3. Doai lai su da qua. Nhu truy niem 追念 nho lai su truoc, truy dieu 追悼 nho lai loi cu ma xot xa. \n\t4. Tien theo. \n\t5. Mot am la doi. Cai num chuong (chung nuu 鐘紐).
退=thoi, thoai [tui4]\n\t1. Lui. Nhu thoi binh 退兵 lui binh. \n\t2. Nhun nhuong. Nhu thoi nhuong 退讓 lui nhuong. Vi the nen tu quan ve nha cung goi la thoi. \n\t3. Tru sach. Nhu benh thoi 病退 benh khoi. \n\t4. Tai suc suy kem deu goi la thoi. Nhu hoc nghiep thoi bo 學業退步 viec hoc kem sut. \n\t5. Gat bo. \n\t6. Mem mai. Ta quen doc la chu thoai.
送=tong [song4]\n\t1. Dua di. Nhu van tong 運送 van tai di. \n\t2. Tien di. Nhu tong khach 送客 tien khach ra. \n\t3. Dua lam qua. Nhu phung tong 奉送 kinh dua tang. \n\t4. Van tai di, ap tai.
适=quat [kuo4|shi4]\n\t1. Ten nguoi. \n\t2. Nhanh.
逃=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Tron. Nhu dao nan 逃難 tron nan, lanh nan. Dao trai 逃債 tron no v.v. \n\t2. Bo. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Dao Mac tat quy u Duong 逃墨必歸於楊 bo ho Mac tat ve ho Duong. \n\t3. Lanh.
逄=bang [pang2]\n\t1. Ho Bang.
逅=cau [hou4]\n\t1. Giai cau 邂逅 gap go, khong hen ma gap. Cung nghia voi chu cau 遘.
逆=nghich, nghinh [ni4]\n\t1. Trai. Trai lai voi chu thuan 順. Pham cai gi khong thuan deu goi la nghich ca. \n\t2. Can pham, ke duoi ma phan doi nguoi tren cung goi la nghich. Nhu ngo nghich 忤逆 ngang trai. ban nghich 叛逆 boi ban. \n\t3. Roi loan. \n\t4. Don. Ben kia lai ma ben nay nhan lay goi la nghich. Nhu nghich lu 逆旅 khach tro. \n\t5. Toan luong, tinh truoc luc viec chua xay ra. Nhu nghich lieu 逆料 lieu truoc. \n\t6. To tau vua. Tu nghia 4 tro xuong ta quen doc la chu nghinh.
逈=huynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huynh 迥.
逋=bo [bu1]\n\t1. Tron mat. Co toi di tron goi la bo. Cho cac ke co toi an nup goi la bo dao tau 逋逃藪. \n\t2. Con no cua nha nuoc ma tron khong tra cung goi la bo. Nhu quyen bo 蠲逋 tha cho khong doi nhung thue no con mac. Tra duoc sach mon no goi la nhat thanh tuc bo 一清宿逋.
逍=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Tieu dao 逍遙 tieu dao tu tai, song mot cach ung dung rong rai khong ai bo buoc duoc. Nhu Tieu dao du 逍遙遊 la nhan de mot chuong sach cua Trang Tu 莊子, chu truong tieu dao tu tai.
透=thau [tou4]\n\t1. Suot qua. Nhu thau minh 透明 anh sang suot qua. Vi the nen nguoi nao to ro su ly goi la thau triet 透徹. \n\t2. Tiet lo ra. Nhu thau lau tieu tuc 透漏消息 tiet lo tin tuc. \n\t3. Nhay. \n\t4. So. \n\t5. Qua, rat.
逐=truc [zhu2]\n\t1. Duoi, duoi theo. \n\t2. Duoi di. Nhu xich truc 斥逐 ruong duoi, truc khach 逐客 duoi khach di. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tong quoc tam nien bi phong truc 宗國三年悲放逐 ba nam buon rau canh bi day xa to quoc. \n\t3. Tranh gianh. Nhu truc loi 逐利 tranh gianh moi loi, chen choi. \n\t4. Cung theo. Nhu truc doi nhi hanh 逐隊而行 theo doi ngu ma di. \n\t5. Cu lan luot ke den. Nhu truc nhat 逐一 dem tu so mot di, truc tiem 逐漸 lan lan.
逑=cau [qiu2]\n\t1. Lua doi. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau quan tu hao cau 君子好逑 doi tot cua nguoi quan tu, vo hien cua nguoi quan tu. \n\t2. Tich gop, vo vet.
途=do [tu2]\n\t1. Duong loi. Nhu quy do 歸途 duong ve, si do 仕途 con duong lam quan. Nguyen la chu do 涂, thong dung chu do 塗. Cao Ba Quat 高伯适. Co lai danh loi nhan, Bon tau lo do trung 古來名利人，奔走路塗中 Xua nay hang nguoi danh loi, Van tat ta ngoai duong sa.
逕=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Loi hep. Con duong hep. \n\t2. Thang tap. Nhu kinh giao 逕交 giao thang ngay cho.
迳=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Loi hep. Con duong hep. \n\t2. Thang tap. Nhu kinh giao 逕交 giao thang ngay cho.
逖=dich [ti4]\n\t1. Xa. \n\t2. Xa di.
逗=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Tam luu lai. Dung dung lai khong tien len nua goi la dau luu 逗遛. \n\t2. Di vong. \n\t3. Vat cung hoa hop nhau. 
這=gia, nghien [zhe4|zhei4]\n\t1. Ay. Nhu gia su 這事 su ay. \n\t2. Mot am la nghien. Don.
这=gia, nghien [zhe4|zhei4]\n\t1. Ay. Nhu gia su 這事 su ay. \n\t2. Mot am la nghien. Don.
通=thong [tong1|tong4]\n\t1. Thong suot. Tu day den kia khong co cai gi mac miu goi la thong. Nhu thong qua 通過 suot qua. Nguoi hoc van rong cung goi la thong. \n\t2. Hien dat. Nhu hanh thong 亨通 thanh than, troi chay, lam gi cung may man de dang. Cung thong 窮通 luc cung quan, luc ve vang. \n\t3. Chuyen khap. Nhu thong cao 通告 bao cho khap ca moi noi biet. \n\t4. Hai ben cung hoa hop voi nhau goi la thong. Nhu thong luc hop tac 通力合作 chung suc cung lam. Cung ket giao di lai voi nhau goi la thong gia 通家. Trai gai di lai vung trom voi nhau goi la tu thong 私通. \n\t5. Tom tat. Nhu thong ke 通計 tinh suot ca. \n\t6. Khap. Nhu thong xung 通稱 tieng khap ca moi noi deu goi the. Thong le 通禮 cai le khap ca moi nguoi deu theo, v.v. \n\t7. Van tu du tu dau chi cuoi goi la thong, cho nen xem het luot sach goi la   nhat thong 一通. Danh trong du 332 dui goi la nhat thong. \n\t8. Nuoc tieu. Nhu ma thong 馬通 nuoc dai ngua.
逛=cuong [guang4]\n\t1. Thung thinh ta cai dang di. Tuc goi su di ra ngoai choi la cuong.
逝=the [shi4]\n\t1. Di khong tro lai nua. Vi the nen goi nguoi chet la truong the 長逝 hay the the 逝世. \n\t2. Dung lam tieng phat ngu.
逞=sinh [cheng3]\n\t1. Suong , thich y. \n\t2. Buong tuong. Nhu sinh nhan sac 逞顏色 net mat buong tuong ra ve lam bo. Sinh ac 逞惡 mac suc lam ac.
速=toc [su4]\n\t1. Nhanh chong. \n\t2. Moi. Nhu bat toc chi khach 不速之客 nguoi khach khong moi ma den. Nay trong danh thiep thuong viet thu toc 恕速 xin thu dung de moi lan nua. \n\t3. Toc do. Nhu quang toc 光速 toc do anh sang. \n\t4. Vet chan huou. 
造=tao, thao (11 n) [zao4]\n\t1. Gay nen, lam nen. Nhu tao phuc nhat phuong 造福一方 lam nen phuc cho ca mot phuong. Tao nghiet vo cung 造孽無窮 gay nen mam va vo cung, v.v. \n\t2. Xay dap, sang tao ra. Nhu tu tao 修造 sua sang, xay dap lai. Pham nguoi nao sang che ra mot cai gi truoc cung goi la tao. Nhu Mong Diem tao but 蒙恬造筆 ong Mong Diem che tao ra but truoc. Sai luan tao chi 蔡倫造紙 ong Sai Luan che tao ra giay truoc nhat, v.v. \n\t3. Bia dat. Nhu tao dao sinh su 造謠生事 bia dat ra loi noi phao de sinh su. \n\t4. Truoc, moi. \n\t5. Mot am la thao. Den. Nhu dang mon thao that 登門造室 len cua toi nha. Hoc toi noi nao cung goi la thao. Nhu tham thao 深造 toi coi tham thuy. \n\t6. Nguoi hai phe goi la thao. Nhu ben nguyen cao va ben bi cao cung toi toa an goi la luong thao 兩造. Nha lay so goi so dan ong la kien thao 乾造, so dan ba goi la khon thao 坤造 cung theo mot nghia ay ca. \n\t7. Thoi dai. Nhu mat thao 末造 doi cuoi, mat the. \n\t8. Thot nhien. Nhu thao thu 造次 voi vang, hap tap, thang thot. \n\t9. Te cau phuc. \n\t10. Ghep lien.
逡=thuan [qun1]\n\t1. Lui lai, rut lai. Di khong nhich len duoc goi la thuan tuan 逡巡 xun xoe. \n\t2. Nhanh, cung nghia voi tuan 駿.
逢=phung [feng2]\n\t1. Gap. Hai ben gap nhau goi la phung. \n\t2. Don ruoc. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Phung quan chi ac ki toi dai 逢君之惡其最大 don ruoc y vua lam cho them hu, toi rat lon. Nhu phung dich chi y 逢掖之衣 cai ao rong kich. \n\t3. Mot am la bong. Bong bong 逢逢 tieng trong thung thung.
連=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lien. Hai ben lien tiep nhau goi la lien. \n\t2. Lien noi. Nhu lien hoan 連環 cai vong lien noi nhau. Phep quan bay gio cu ba bai goi la mot lien, tuc la mot doi ngay xua. \n\t3. Hop lai. \n\t4. Bon dam la mot lien. \n\t5. Kho khan. \n\t6. Chi chua nau chua loc. \n\t7. Luu lien 留連 quyen luyen. 
连=lien [lian2]\n\t1. Lien. Hai ben lien tiep nhau goi la lien. \n\t2. Lien noi. Nhu lien hoan 連環 cai vong lien noi nhau. Phep quan bay gio cu ba bai goi la mot lien, tuc la mot doi ngay xua. \n\t3. Hop lai. \n\t4. Bon dam la mot lien. \n\t5. Kho khan. \n\t6. Chi chua nau chua loc. \n\t7. Luu lien 留連 quyen luyen. 
逬=binh [beng4]\n\t1. Chay tan loan, tron lung tung. Nhu cam ly thu binh 禽離獸逬 chim tan bay, thu tan loan. \n\t2. The nuoc vot manh, bot giat bon ben cung goi la binh. Nhu binh luu 逬流 dong nuoc vot tung, binh le 逬淚 nuoc mat tuon roi. \n\t3. Ruong duoi. Cung nghia voi chu binh 屛.
逭=hoan [huan4]\n\t1. Tron tranh. Nhu hoan thu 逭暑 tranh nang.
逮=dai, de [dai3|dai4]\n\t1. Kip. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 noi Si cung chi bat dai 恥躬之不逮 ho minh khong theo kip. \n\t2. Duoi. Nhu dai he 逮繫 duoi bat giam lai. \n\t3. Mot am la de. De de 逮逮 vui ve, diu dang.
週=chu [zhou1]\n\t1. Vong khap. Cung nghia voi chu chu 周. \n\t2. Mot tuan le goi la nhat chu 一週.
進=tien [jin4]\n\t1. Tien len. Trai lai voi chu thoai 退. \n\t2. Dat dan len. \n\t3. Dang. Nhu tien cong 進貢 dang do cong. Tien bieu 進表 dang bieu, v.v. Vi the nen khoan thu vao cung goi la tien hang 進項. Lieu danh bac goi la bac tien 博進. \n\t4. Bon, lu. Nhu tien tien 先進 bon truoc. Cung nhu ta noi tien boi 前輩 vay. \n\t5. Tuc goi cho chia gioi han nha trong nha ngoai la tien.
进=tien [jin4]\n\t1. Tien len. Trai lai voi chu thoai 退. \n\t2. Dat dan len. \n\t3. Dang. Nhu tien cong 進貢 dang do cong. Tien bieu 進表 dang bieu, v.v. Vi the nen khoan thu vao cung goi la tien hang 進項. Lieu danh bac goi la bac tien 博進. \n\t4. Bon, lu. Nhu tien tien 先進 bon truoc. Cung nhu ta noi tien boi 前輩 vay. \n\t5. Tuc goi cho chia gioi han nha trong nha ngoai la tien.
逴=trac, suoc [chuo4]\n\t1. Xa. Trac lich 逴躒 sieu viet hon nguoi, cao sieu, kiet xuat. Cung doc la chu suoc.
逵=quy [kui2]\n\t1. Con duong cai thong ca bon phuong tam nga.
逶=uy [wei1]\n\t1. Uy di 逶迤 di luon, di xien.
逸=dat [yi4]\n\t1. Lam loi. Nhu dam dat 淫逸 dam duc qua do. \n\t2. Song ra. Nhu ma dat bat nang chi 馬逸不能止 ngua song chang hay ham lai. \n\t3. An dat. Nhu cu dat dan 舉逸民 cat nhung nguoi an dat len. Pham cai gi khong cau ne tuc doi deu goi la dat. Nhu dat pham 逸品 pham cach khac doi. Dat hung 逸興 hung thu khac doi. \n\t4. Roi nhan. Nhu dat cu nhi vo giao 逸居而無教 (Manh Tu 孟子) roi nhan ma khong duoc day do. \n\t5. Buong tha.
逼=buc [bi1]\n\t1. Buc bach. O vao cho hai ben no de ep khong cua duoc nua goi la buc. Nhu that buc xu thu 實逼處此 o day that la buc bach. \n\t2. Buc hiep, an hiep. Nhu cuong buc 強逼 co hiep. Uy buc 威逼 lay oai quyen ma de ep.
逾=du [yu2]\n\t1. Vuot qua. Nhu du ha 逾河 vuot qua song. \n\t2. Hon. \n\t3. Cang.
遁=don, tuan [dun4]\n\t1. Tron, an. Tron khong cho nguoi biet goi la don. Nhu cac ke thuat si tuong truyen co phep don tho 遁土 tron vao trong dat, don thuy 遁水 tron vao trong nuoc, v.v. \n\t2. Tron doi. Nhu an don 隱遁 an mot noi sau kin khong cho nguoi biet minh. \n\t3. Lanh. \n\t4. Mot am la tuan. Cung nghia voi chu tuan 巡. Nhu thuan tuan 逡巡 rut re khong buoc len duoc. 
遂=toai [sui2|sui4]\n\t1. Thoa thich. Nhu toai chi 遂志 thich chi. Bat toai so nguyen 不遂所願 khong duoc thoa nguyen. \n\t2. Viec gi sap thanh ma chua thanh han goi la toai 遂 do dang. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 co cau toai su bat gian 遂事不諫 viec do dang khong can nua. \n\t3. Nhan, ben. Hai viec nhan nhau ma den goi la toai. Nhu toai bat phuc kien 遂不復見 ben chang lai thay. \n\t4. Het. \n\t5. Nhan tuan, lan lua. \n\t6. Thoa thue. \n\t7. Cai ngoi nho. \n\t8. Tien len, suot. \n\t9. Khu dat cach kinh do tram dam.
遄=thuyen [chuan2]\n\t1. Nhanh, di lai mau chong luon luon.
遅=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tri 遲.
遇=ngo [yu4]\n\t1. Gap. Gap nhau giua duong goi la ngo. Su gi thot nhien gap phai cung goi la ngo. Nhu ngo vu 遇雨 gap mua, ngo nan 遇難 gap nan, v.v. \n\t2. Hop. Nhu thu ngo 殊遇 su hop la lung, y noi gap ke hop minh ma duoc hien dat vay. Vi the cho nen hoc tro luc con ngheo hen goi la vi ngo 未遇. \n\t3. Thet dai. Nhu quoc si ngo nga 國士遇我 dai ta vao hang quoc si. \n\t4. Doi dich, duong.
遉=trinh [zhen1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu trinh 偵.
遊=du [you2]\n\t1. Choi, toi cho canh dep ngam nghia cho thich goi la du. Nhu du son 遊山 choi nui. Du vien 遊園 choi vuon, v.v. Di xa cung goi la du. Nhu du hoc 遊學 di hoc xa. \n\t2. Choi boi, di lai choi boi voi nhau goi la du. Nhu giao du tham quang 交遊甚廣 choi ban rat rong. \n\t3. Dat ra nhung loi dang mung dang so de noi cho nguoi de xieu long nghe minh goi la du thuyet 遊說. \n\t4. Co khi dung lam nhu chu du 游. Xem lai chu du 游. \n\t5. Vui. 
運=van [yun4]\n\t1. Xoay van, vat gi cu noi mot loi quay di, het vong lai toi, khong ra khong vao, khong luc nao dung goi la van. Nhu nhat nguyet van hanh 日月運行 mat troi mat trang xoay van, van hoa 運化 su xoay van bien hoa trong than the, van dong 運動 cat nhac luon luon. \n\t2. Pham vat gi quanh vong chuyen dong deu goi la van. Nhu van but 運筆 nguay but, cam but viet, van bich 運甓 van gach vuong, van tru 運籌 van toan, van tam tri ra ma toan tinh. \n\t3. Van so. Nhu ta noi van tot van xau vay. Ke xem boi xem so tinh van thanh than, van bi tac cua nguoi goi la van khi 運氣. \n\t4. Phia nam bac qua dat. \n\t5. Ho Van.
运=van [yun4]\n\t1. Xoay van, vat gi cu noi mot loi quay di, het vong lai toi, khong ra khong vao, khong luc nao dung goi la van. Nhu nhat nguyet van hanh 日月運行 mat troi mat trang xoay van, van hoa 運化 su xoay van bien hoa trong than the, van dong 運動 cat nhac luon luon. \n\t2. Pham vat gi quanh vong chuyen dong deu goi la van. Nhu van but 運筆 nguay but, cam but viet, van bich 運甓 van gach vuong, van tru 運籌 van toan, van tam tri ra ma toan tinh. \n\t3. Van so. Nhu ta noi van tot van xau vay. Ke xem boi xem so tinh van thanh than, van bi tac cua nguoi goi la van khi 運氣. \n\t4. Phia nam bac qua dat. \n\t5. Ho Van.
遌=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Bong gap, khong dinh bung gap ma lai gap goi la ngac.
遍=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Khap. Cung nghia voi chu bien 徧. Nhu doc thu bach bien 讀書百遍 doc sach tram luot. Doc suot tu dau chi cuoi goi la nhat bien 一遍. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Khu bien dong nam lo 去遍東南路 di khap duong dong nam.
過=qua, qua [guo1|guo4]\n\t1. Vuot. Hon. Nhu qua do 過度 qua cai do thuong. \n\t2. Loi, lam viec trai le goi la qua. Nhu cai qua 改過 doi loi. Van qua 文過 co loi lai con noi che lap di ma cai rang phai. \n\t3. Da qua. Nhu qua khu 過去 su da qua, doi da qua. \n\t4. Trach. \n\t5. Mot am la qua. Tung qua. Nhu qua mon bat nhap 過門不入 tung di qua cua ma khong vao.
过=qua, qua [guo1|guo4]\n\t1. Vuot. Hon. Nhu qua do 過度 qua cai do thuong. \n\t2. Loi, lam viec trai le goi la qua. Nhu cai qua 改過 doi loi. Van qua 文過 co loi lai con noi che lap di ma cai rang phai. \n\t3. Da qua. Nhu qua khu 過去 su da qua, doi da qua. \n\t4. Trach. \n\t5. Mot am la qua. Tung qua. Nhu qua mon bat nhap 過門不入 tung di qua cua ma khong vao.
遏=at [e4]\n\t1. Ngan cam. Nhu cam at loan manh 禁遏亂萌 cam tiet mam loan.
遐=ha [xia2]\n\t1. Xa. Nhu ha phuong 遐方 phuong xa, ha nhi 遐邇 xa gan, v.v. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu ha 何 sao.
遑=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Kip, gap. Nhu hoang bach 遑迫 voi vang. \n\t2. Roi nhan, thu nhan. Nhu mac cam hoac hoang 莫敢或遑 (Thi Kinh 詩經) chang ai dam roi nhan mot chut nao.
遒=tu [qiu2]\n\t1. Cap bach. \n\t2. Sap het. Nhu tue tu 歲遒 nam sap het. \n\t3. Hop, gop lai. \n\t4. Cung manh. \n\t5. Ben chac.
道=dao, dao [dao4]\n\t1. Duong cai thang. \n\t2. Dao ly, la mot cai le nhat dinh ai cung phai noi day ma theo. Nhu nhan dao chu nghia 人道主義 cai chu nghia ve dao nguoi , vuong dao 王道 dao ly cua vuong gia, ba dao 霸道 dao ly cua ba gia (nhan nghia gia), cac nha ton giao dem cac le hay trong ton giao minh noi cho nguoi biet ma theo goi la truyen dao 傳道. \n\t3. Dao nhan 道眼 thay to dao mau. \n\t4. Dao trang 道場 noi tu dao, noi tu dac dao, noi lam le cau cung. \n\t5. Dao giao. Ton giao tho ong Lao Tu 老子 lam tien su goi la dao giao 道教. \n\t6. Dao, mot ten rieng de chia khu vuc trong nuoc, nha Duong 唐 chia thien ha lam muoi dao, cung nhu bay gio chia ra tung tinh vay. \n\t7. Chi dan, cung nghia nhu chu 導. \n\t8. Mot am la dao. Noi, noi ro nguyen uy su gi goi la dao. Nhu tong thuc dao lai 從實道來 cu thuc ke ra. Nghe loi noi ma hieu thau het goi la tri dao 知道.
達=dat [da2]\n\t1. Suot. Nhu tu thong bat dat 四通八達 thong ca bon mat suot ca tam phia. Pham tu cho nay toi cho kia ma duoc thong suot khong ngan tro gi deu goi la dat. Nhu truc dat 直達 thang suot. \n\t2. Hien dat. Nhu dat quan quy nhan 達官貴人 quan sang nguoi quy. \n\t3. Suot le, nguoi thong hieu ly su goi la nguoi dat, nguoi khong cau ne tuc doi cung goi la dat. \n\t4. Tien dat len. \n\t5. Deu. \n\t6. Nen. \n\t7. Den. \n\t8. Con de con. \n\t9. Ho Dat.
达=dat [da2]\n\t1. Suot. Nhu tu thong bat dat 四通八達 thong ca bon mat suot ca tam phia. Pham tu cho nay toi cho kia ma duoc thong suot khong ngan tro gi deu goi la dat. Nhu truc dat 直達 thang suot. \n\t2. Hien dat. Nhu dat quan quy nhan 達官貴人 quan sang nguoi quy. \n\t3. Suot le, nguoi thong hieu ly su goi la nguoi dat, nguoi khong cau ne tuc doi cung goi la dat. \n\t4. Tien dat len. \n\t5. Deu. \n\t6. Nen. \n\t7. Den. \n\t8. Con de con. \n\t9. Ho Dat.
違=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Lia. Nhu cuu vi 久違 ly biet da lau. \n\t2. Trai. Nhu vi menh 違命 trai menh, vi phap 違法 trai phep. Nguoi hay du di khong qua quyet goi la y vi 依違. \n\t3. Lanh. \n\t4. Lam loi.
违=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Lia. Nhu cuu vi 久違 ly biet da lau. \n\t2. Trai. Nhu vi menh 違命 trai menh, vi phap 違法 trai phep. Nguoi hay du di khong qua quyet goi la y vi 依違. \n\t3. Lanh. \n\t4. Lam loi.
遘=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Gap.
遜=ton [xun4]\n\t1. Tron, lan. \n\t2. Tu lanh di. \n\t3. Nhun thuan. \n\t4. Kem.
逊=ton [xun4]\n\t1. Tron, lan. \n\t2. Tu lanh di. \n\t3. Nhun thuan. \n\t4. Kem.
遝=dap [ta4]\n\t1. Lan lon. \n\t2. Kip.
遞=de, dai [di4]\n\t1. Thay doi, lan luot. \n\t2. Mot am la dai. Xum quanh.
递=de, dai [di4]\n\t1. Thay doi, lan luot. \n\t2. Mot am la dai. Xum quanh.
遠=vien, vien [yuan3]\n\t1. Xa, trai lai voi chu can 近. \n\t2. Sau xa. \n\t3. Dai dac. \n\t4. Ho Vien. \n\t5. Mot am la vien. Xa lia. \n\t6. Xa di, coi so. \n\t7. Bo di.
远=vien, vien [yuan3]\n\t1. Xa, trai lai voi chu can 近. \n\t2. Sau xa. \n\t3. Dai dac. \n\t4. Ho Vien. \n\t5. Mot am la vien. Xa lia. \n\t6. Xa di, coi so. \n\t7. Bo di.
遡=to [su4]\n\t1. Ngoi len. Nguoc dong boi len goi la to hoi 遡回. Thuan dong boi xuong goi la to du 遡游. \n\t2. Tim toi, suy tim nguyen uy cua mot su gi goi la to. Nhu hoi to duong nien 回遡當年 suy tim lai su nam do. \n\t3. Mach bao, to cao.
遢=thap [ta1]\n\t1. Dang di. Lap thap 邋遢 lam viec khong can than, lam bo lao. Tuc goi su khong duoc sach se la lap thap.
遣=khien, khan [qian3]\n\t1. Phan phat di. Nhu khien tan 遣散 phan phat di het. \n\t2. Sai khien. \n\t3. Mot am la khan. Cai xe cho muong sinh trong dam ma.
遥=dieu, dao [yao2]\n\t1. Xa. Cung doc la dao.
遨=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Di choi ung dung khong cau thuc gi. Nhu ngao du 遨遊 rong choi.
適=thich, dich [kuo4|shi4]\n\t1. Di den. Nhu thich Te 適齊 den nuoc Te. \n\t2. Theo. Con gai ve nha chong goi la thich nhan 適人. \n\t3. Ua thich. Nhu thich y 適意 vua y, thich nguyen 適願 thich nhu nguyen. Khong duoc de chiu goi la bat thich 不適 dau yeu kho chiu. \n\t4. Vua. Nhu thich kha nhi chi 適可而止 vua phai ma thoi. \n\t5. Chinh the. Dung lam tro tu. Nhu thich tuc tu hai 適足自害 chinh la chi du tu hai minh ma thoi. \n\t6. Chi. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Tac khau phuc khoi thich vi xich thon chi phu tai 則口腹豈適爲尺寸之膚哉 thi mieng bung chi la vi tac thuoc da sao ! \n\t7. Vua gap. Nhu thich nhien 適然 vua may, thich ngo 適遇 vua gap, v.v. \n\t8. Mot am la dich. Chuyen chu. Nhu vo so dich tong 無所適從 khong chuyen chu theo vao dau. \n\t9. Cung nghia voi chu dich 嫡. Ngoi thai tu goi la dich tu 嫡子. Cho ngu chinh goi la dich that 適室, v.v. Cung cung nghia voi nhung chu sau. dich 敵, trich 謫, thich 惕. 
适=thich, dich [kuo4|shi4]\n\t1. Di den. Nhu thich Te 適齊 den nuoc Te. \n\t2. Theo. Con gai ve nha chong goi la thich nhan 適人. \n\t3. Ua thich. Nhu thich y 適意 vua y, thich nguyen 適願 thich nhu nguyen. Khong duoc de chiu goi la bat thich 不適 dau yeu kho chiu. \n\t4. Vua. Nhu thich kha nhi chi 適可而止 vua phai ma thoi. \n\t5. Chinh the. Dung lam tro tu. Nhu thich tuc tu hai 適足自害 chinh la chi du tu hai minh ma thoi. \n\t6. Chi. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi Tac khau phuc khoi thich vi xich thon chi phu tai 則口腹豈適爲尺寸之膚哉 thi mieng bung chi la vi tac thuoc da sao ! \n\t7. Vua gap. Nhu thich nhien 適然 vua may, thich ngo 適遇 vua gap, v.v. \n\t8. Mot am la dich. Chuyen chu. Nhu vo so dich tong 無所適從 khong chuyen chu theo vao dau. \n\t9. Cung nghia voi chu dich 嫡. Ngoi thai tu goi la dich tu 嫡子. Cho ngu chinh goi la dich that 適室, v.v. Cung cung nghia voi nhung chu sau. dich 敵, trich 謫, thich 惕. 
遭=tao [zao1]\n\t1. Gap, vo y ma gap nhau goi la tao. Nhu tao phung y ngoai 遭逢意外 gap go y khong ngo toi. \n\t2. Vong. Nhu chu tao 周遭 khap vong. \n\t3. Luot. Nhu ky tao 幾遭 may luot (lan) roi ?
遮=gia [zhe1]\n\t1. Chan. Nhu gia kich 遮擊 danh chan hau, danh up. \n\t2. Che. Nhu gia cai 遮蓋 che trum, gia ho 遮護 che cho, v.v.
遯=don [dun4]\n\t1. Tron. Cung nghia voi chu don 遁. \n\t2. Lua doi.
遰=de [di4]\n\t1. Dieu de 迢遰 xa xoi khong biet tin tuc nhau. Co khi viet la 迢遞.
遲=tri, tri [chi2]\n\t1. Cham chap. \n\t2. Di thong tha, lau, cham. \n\t3. Tri trong. \n\t4. Mot am la tri. Doi. Nhu tri quan vi chi 遲君未至 doi anh chua den, tri minh 遲明 doi mot ti nua thi sang.
迟=tri, tri [chi2]\n\t1. Cham chap. \n\t2. Di thong tha, lau, cham. \n\t3. Tri trong. \n\t4. Mot am la tri. Doi. Nhu tri quan vi chi 遲君未至 doi anh chua den, tri minh 遲明 doi mot ti nua thi sang.
遛=luu [liu2|liu4]\n\t1. Dung dung lai khong tien len nua goi la dau luu 逗遛. 
遴=lan, lan [lin2]\n\t1. Kho. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu lan 吝. \n\t3. Mot am la lan. Lua chon. Nhu lan tuyen 遴選 lua chon lay nguoi tai.
遵=tuan [zun1]\n\t1. Lan theo. \n\t2. Noi, tuan theo. Cu noi theo le phai cung phap luat ma lam goi la tuan. Nhu tuan ki 遵紀 tuan theo ki luat.
遶=nhieu [rao4]\n\t1. Vong quanh, cung nghia chu nhieu 繞.
遷=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Doi. Doi nha di o cho khac goi la kieu thien 喬遷. Doi kinh do di cho khac goi la thien do 遷都. \n\t2. Doi quan, quan bi giang chuc xuong goi la ta thien 左遷. \n\t3. Bien doi. Nhu kien di tu thien 見異思遷 thay la nghi doi khac. Doi loi sua lai net hay goi la thien thien 遷善.
迁=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Doi. Doi nha di o cho khac goi la kieu thien 喬遷. Doi kinh do di cho khac goi la thien do 遷都. \n\t2. Doi quan, quan bi giang chuc xuong goi la ta thien 左遷. \n\t3. Bien doi. Nhu kien di tu thien 見異思遷 thay la nghi doi khac. Doi loi sua lai net hay goi la thien thien 遷善.
選=tuyen, tuyen [xuan3]\n\t1. Chon. Toi trong so nhieu ma ken chon lay mot so tot dep goi la tuyen. Nhu tinh tuyen 精選 chon ky. Nguoi hay vat gi da ken chon roi cung goi la tuyen. \n\t2. Loc chon cac bai van cua co nhan dong thanh tung quyen cung goi la tuyen. Nhu Luong Chieu Minh 良昭明 thai tu Tieu Thong 蕭統 co don mot bo van tuyen 文選 ba muoi quyen, ve sau cu bat chuoc loi ay ma lua chon van tho, tuc goi la tuyen the 選體. \n\t3. Thieu tuyen 少選 choc lat (thi nua). \n\t4. Mot am la tuyen. Chuc quan do bo chon roi cu len goi la tuyen.
选=tuyen, tuyen [xuan3]\n\t1. Chon. Toi trong so nhieu ma ken chon lay mot so tot dep goi la tuyen. Nhu tinh tuyen 精選 chon ky. Nguoi hay vat gi da ken chon roi cung goi la tuyen. \n\t2. Loc chon cac bai van cua co nhan dong thanh tung quyen cung goi la tuyen. Nhu Luong Chieu Minh 良昭明 thai tu Tieu Thong 蕭統 co don mot bo van tuyen 文選 ba muoi quyen, ve sau cu bat chuoc loi ay ma lua chon van tho, tuc goi la tuyen the 選體. \n\t3. Thieu tuyen 少選 choc lat (thi nua). \n\t4. Mot am la tuyen. Chuc quan do bo chon roi cu len goi la tuyen.
遹=duat [yu4]\n\t1. Noi, noi. \n\t2. Dung lam chu phat ngu, nghia la ben, la thua. \n\t3. Cong queo.
遺=di, di [wei4|yi2]\n\t1. Bo sot, mat. Vo y bo mat di goi la di. Nhu thap di 拾遺 nhat nhanh cac cai bo sot, bo di 補遺 bu cac cai bo sot. \n\t2. Rot lai. Su gi da qua ma chua tieu tan mat han goi la di. Nhu di han 遺恨 con an han lai. \n\t3. De lai. Nhu di chuc 遺囑 dan lai, di truyen 遺傳 truyen lai, v.v. \n\t4. Dai vai, ia vai. Nhu di nieu 遺尿 vai dai, di xi 遺屎 vai cut, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la di. Dua lam qua.
遗=di, di [wei4|yi2]\n\t1. Bo sot, mat. Vo y bo mat di goi la di. Nhu thap di 拾遺 nhat nhanh cac cai bo sot, bo di 補遺 bu cac cai bo sot. \n\t2. Rot lai. Su gi da qua ma chua tieu tan mat han goi la di. Nhu di han 遺恨 con an han lai. \n\t3. De lai. Nhu di chuc 遺囑 dan lai, di truyen 遺傳 truyen lai, v.v. \n\t4. Dai vai, ia vai. Nhu di nieu 遺尿 vai dai, di xi 遺屎 vai cut, v.v. \n\t5. Mot am la di. Dua lam qua.
遼=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Xa tham, cho dat cach nhau rat xa goi la lieu. Nhu lieu vien 遼遠 xa xoi, lieu khoat 遼闊 bat ngat. \n\t2. Nha Lieu 遼, truoc la giong Khiet Dan 契丹, o xu Nhiet Ha. To truoc la Gia Luat Bao Co 耶律保機, nhan luc cuoi doi nha Tong 宋 suy yeu moi noi loan, sau lay duoc cac xu Dong tam tinh, Mong Co va phia bac tinh Truc Le, tinh Son Tay, goi la nuoc Lieu. Cung voi nha Tong 宋 choi nhau, su goi la Bac trieu 北朝, lam vua   duoc chin doi dai 219 nam, sau bi nha Kim 金 diet mat. Trong ho co Gia Luat Dai   Thach 耶律大石, chiem giu xu Tam Tu Can, xung vuong xung de, cai tri suot ca mot   mien dong tay xu Thong Linh, su goi la nha Tay Lieu 西遼, sau bi nha Nguyen 元   diet mat. \n\t3. Song Lieu.
辽=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Xa tham, cho dat cach nhau rat xa goi la lieu. Nhu lieu vien 遼遠 xa xoi, lieu khoat 遼闊 bat ngat. \n\t2. Nha Lieu 遼, truoc la giong Khiet Dan 契丹, o xu Nhiet Ha. To truoc la Gia Luat Bao Co 耶律保機, nhan luc cuoi doi nha Tong 宋 suy yeu moi noi loan, sau lay duoc cac xu Dong tam tinh, Mong Co va phia bac tinh Truc Le, tinh Son Tay, goi la nuoc Lieu. Cung voi nha Tong 宋 choi nhau, su goi la Bac trieu 北朝, lam vua   duoc chin doi dai 219 nam, sau bi nha Kim 金 diet mat. Trong ho co Gia Luat Dai   Thach 耶律大石, chiem giu xu Tam Tu Can, xung vuong xung de, cai tri suot ca mot   mien dong tay xu Thong Linh, su goi la nha Tay Lieu 西遼, sau bi nha Nguyen 元   diet mat. \n\t3. Song Lieu.
遽=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Voi vang. Nhu cap cu 急遽 voi vang, su gi thot nhien don den goi la cu nhi nhu thu 遽爾如此. \n\t2. So hai. Nhu hoang cu 遑遽 kinh hoang. \n\t3. Chay tram dua, dung xe ma dua tin goi la truyen 傳, dung ngua ma dua tin goi la cu 遽. \n\t4. Ben, dung lam tro tu.
避=ti [bi4]\n\t1. Lanh, lanh xa khong cho gap goi la ti. Nhu hoi ti 迴避 quay lanh ra cho khac. \n\t2. Kieng. Nhu ti huy 避諱 kieng ten huy.
邀=yeu [yao1]\n\t1. Moi, don. Nhu yeu thinh 邀請 don moi, yeu khach 邀客 moi khach. \n\t2. Don cau, cau may. Nhu yeu thuong 邀賞 don cau phan thuong.
邁=mai [mai4]\n\t1. Di xa. \n\t2. Qua hon. Nhu dang tam mai ngu 登三邁五 hon ca nam doi Ngu de truoc. \n\t3. Gia. Nhu lao mai 老邁 gia ca.
迈=mai [mai4]\n\t1. Di xa. \n\t2. Qua hon. Nhu dang tam mai ngu 登三邁五 hon ca nam doi Ngu de truoc. \n\t3. Gia. Nhu lao mai 老邁 gia ca.
邂=giai [xie4]\n\t1. Giai cau 邂逅 gap go, khong hen ma gap.
邃=thuy [sui4]\n\t1. Sau xa, hoc van tinh tham goi la tham thuy 深邃 hay thuy mat 邃密.
還=hoan, toan [hai2|huan2]\n\t1. Tro lai, ve. Da di roi tro lai goi la hoan. Nhu hoan gia 還家 tro ve nha. \n\t2. Tra. Nhu hoan trai 還債 tra no. \n\t3. Doai. \n\t4. Mot am la toan. Quanh, cung nghia chu toan 旋. \n\t5. Nhanh nhen. \n\t6. Chong.
还=hoan, toan [hai2|huan2]\n\t1. Tro lai, ve. Da di roi tro lai goi la hoan. Nhu hoan gia 還家 tro ve nha. \n\t2. Tra. Nhu hoan trai 還債 tra no. \n\t3. Doai. \n\t4. Mot am la toan. Quanh, cung nghia chu toan 旋. \n\t5. Nhanh nhen. \n\t6. Chong.
邅=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Truan chien 迍邅 vuong vit chat vat khong buoc len duoc. \n\t2. Su doi gap khuc khong duoc thanh thoi cung goi la truan chien 迍邅.
邇=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Gan. Nhu mat nhi 密邇 gan sat. Ha nhi 遐邇 xa gan. \n\t2. Toi gan.
迩=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Gan. Nhu mat nhi 密邇 gan sat. Ha nhi 遐邇 xa gan. \n\t2. Toi gan.
邈=mac [miao3]\n\t1. Xa tit. Xa khong the toi duoc goi la mac. Nhu mac nhien 邈然 xa tit vay. \n\t2. Coi khinh.
邊=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Ven bo. Nhu giang bien 江邊 ven bo song. \n\t2. Ben coi, cho dia phan nuoc nay giap nuoc kia. Nhu bien phong 邊防 su phong bi ngoai bien. \n\t3. Ben. Nhu luong bien 兩邊 hai ben. Mot mat goi la nhat bien 一邊. \n\t4. Duong vien, dinh vao ben mep ao cho dep.
边=bien [bian1]\n\t1. Ven bo. Nhu giang bien 江邊 ven bo song. \n\t2. Ben coi, cho dia phan nuoc nay giap nuoc kia. Nhu bien phong 邊防 su phong bi ngoai bien. \n\t3. Ben. Nhu luong bien 兩邊 hai ben. Mot mat goi la nhat bien 一邊. \n\t4. Duong vien, dinh vao ben mep ao cho dep.
邋=lap [la1]\n\t1. Lap thap 邋遢 lam viec khong can than, lam bo lao. Tuc goi su khong duoc sach se la lap thap.
邏=la [luo2]\n\t1. Tuan canh. Linh di tuan canh goi la la tot 邏卒. \n\t2. Ngan che. Sac nui quanh vong goi la la.
逻=la [luo2]\n\t1. Tuan canh. Linh di tuan canh goi la la tot 邏卒. \n\t2. Ngan che. Sac nui quanh vong goi la la.
邐=le [li3]\n\t1. Di le 迤邐 quanh co men theo ben ve.
逦=le [li3]\n\t1. Di le 迤邐 quanh co men theo ben ve.
邑=ap [yi4]\n\t1. Mot ten rieng de goi mot khu dat. Ngay xua tu xung nuoc minh la te ap 敝邑, nguoi cung mot huyen goi la dong ap 同邑. Mot minh dung len chieu tap mot so nguoi cung o mot chom de khai khan ruong nuong cung goi la ap. \n\t2. U ap 於邑 nghen hoi. Hoi boc nguoc len chen chat co hong khong xuoi xuong duoc goi la u ap.
邕=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Song chay xung quanh ap dung nhu ao rua goi la ung. \n\t2. Chau Ung, thuoc tinh Quang Tay. Ngay xua dung nhu chu ung 雍, chu ung 壅.
邘=vu [yu2]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua.
邙=mang [mang2]\n\t1. Nui Mang.
邛=cung [qiong2]\n\t1. Ten dat. Doi nha Tran co mot giong ro o phia tay nam goi la Cung do quoc 邛都國, bay gio thuoc vao phia tay nam tinh Tu Xuyen o do co qua nui goi la Cung Lai 邛崍, co sinh san mot thu truc dung lam gay cho nguoi gia goi la cung truong 邛杖.
邠=ban [bin1]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua, cho to tien nha Chu 周 o. Cung co khi viet la ban 豳.
邡=phuong [fang1]\n\t1. Thap phuong 什邡 ten huyen.
邢=hinh [xing2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hinh 郉.
那=na, na [na1|na4|nei4]\n\t1. Nhieu. Nhu kinh Thi co cau thu phuc bat na 受福不那 chiu phuc chang nhieu. \n\t2. An nhan. Nhu huu na ki cu 有那其居 cho o an nhan. \n\t3. Nao, gi. \n\t4. A na 阿那 xinh xan mem mai. \n\t5. Tieng Phan, Chi na 支那 nuoc Tau, duy na 維那 ke giu phep trong chua, dan na 檀那 ke bo thi, cung goi la dan viet 檀越, sat na 剎那 mot loang, noi cai thoi gian rat ngan. \n\t6. Mot am la na. Nao. Nhu na xu 那處 cho nao, na kham 那堪 sao chiu duoc. Cung co khi doc la na.
邦=bang [bang1]\n\t1. Nuoc, nuoc lon goi la bang 邦, nuoc nho goi la quoc 國. Nuoc lang gieng goi la huu bang 友邦.
邨=thon [cun1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu thon 村.
邪=ta, da [xie2|ye2]\n\t1. Lech, cong. Con nguoi bat chinh goi la gian ta 姦邪, loi noi bat chinh goi la ta thuyet 邪說. Pham cai gi bat chinh deu goi la ta het. \n\t2. Yeu ta, ta ma, nhu ta bat thang chanh 邪不勝正 ta khong hon chanh duoc. \n\t3. Nha lam thuoc goi benh khi la ta. Nhu phong ta 風邪 ta gio lam benh, thap ta 濕邪 khi am thap lam benh. Mot am la da. Lang da 琅邪 ten mot ap cua nuoc Te. \n\t2. Dung lam tro tu. Cung dung lam chu noi su con ngo. Tuc dung nhu chu da 耶.
邯=ham [han2]\n\t1. Ham Dan 邯鄲 ten mot ap ngay xua. Trong truyen truyen ky co truyen ham dan mong 邯鄲夢 chep chuyen Lu Sinh gap La Ong o trong duong Ham Dan. Tuc la giac hoang luong mong 黃梁夢. \n\t2. Chuong Ham 章邯 ten nguoi. 
邰=thai [tai2]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua.
邱=khau [qiu1]\n\t1. Ten dat. Nay muon dung nhu chu khau 丘 (go) de tranh ten huy duc Khong Tu 孔子.
邲=bat [bi4]\n\t1. Ten dat nuoc Trinh ngay xua. Nay thuoc dia phan tinh Ha nam.
邳=bi [pi1]\n\t1. Ten mot huyen ngay xua, thuoc tinh Giang To.
邵=thieu [shao4]\n\t1. Ten dat. \n\t2. Dung nhu chu 召, ho Thieu.
邶=boi, bac [bei4]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. Nay thuoc dia phan tinh Ha nam. Ta quen doc chu bac.
邸=de [di3]\n\t1. Cai nha cho cac nuoc chu hau den chau o. Tuc goi cac dinh cac phu cua cac vuong hau la de. Cho nen noi den mot tuoc mo thi goi la mo de 某邸. Pham nha cua to lon deu goi la de de 邸第. \n\t2. Cai binh phong.
邾=chu [zhu1]\n\t1. Ten nuoc. \n\t2. Tieu chu 小邾 ten nuoc.
郁=uc [yu4]\n\t1. Uc uc 郁郁 ro ro, ta cai ve van chuong rang ro. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu uat 鬱. \n\t3. Hoi thom ngao ngat goi la uc liet 郁烈 hay phan uc 芬郁.
郃=cap [he2]\n\t1. Cap Duong 郃陽 ten huyen. 
郅=chat, chi [zhi4]\n\t1. Uc Chat 郁郅 ten mot huyen nha Han. \n\t2. Den, rat muc. Nhu chat tri 郅治 rat binh tri, thinh tri. Ta quen doc la chu chi. \n\t3. Ho Chat.
郇=tuan [huan2|xun2]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Vi Thiep doi nha Duong 唐 duoc noi chuc cha, phong la Tuan Quoc Cong 郇國公. Nguoi bay gio noi rang nha ong ay phong phu, trong bep do an ngao ngat, khong an cung da no roi. Vi the nen tu ta nguoi moi an tiec noi la bao oc tuan tru 飽飫郇廚. Trong loi viet thu hay dung toi.
郈=hau [hou4]\n\t1. Ten mot ap ngay xua.
郉=hinh [xing2]\n\t1. Ten dat ngay xua.
郊=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Cho cach xa nuoc mot tram dam. Nay thuong goi ngoai thanh la can giao 近郊 coi gan thanh. \n\t2. Te giao. Ngay dong chi te troi o coi phia nam ngoai thanh goi la te nam giao 南郊 hay giao thien 郊天.
郛=phu [fu2]\n\t1. Cai thanh ngoai, quach, khu ngoai o.
郜=cao [gao4]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Ten dat. \n\t3. Ho Cao.
郝=hac [hao3]\n\t1. Ten mot lang doi Han. \n\t2. Ho Hac. Doi nha Tan co vo Vuong Hon la Chung Thi, vo Vuong Tram la Hac Thi, hai chi em dau an o voi nhau rat la net na hoa thuan, vi the nen khen dan ba co duc hanh goi la chung hac 鍾郝.
郞=lang [lang2]\n\t1. Chuc quan. Ve doi nha Tan, nha Han thi cac quan ve hang lang deu la sung vao quan tuc ve. Ve doi sau moi dung de goi cac quan ngoai, nhu thuong thu lang 尚書郎, thi lang 侍郎, v.v. O ben ta thi cac quan cai tri tho man deu goi deu goi la quan lang. \n\t2. Chang, mot tieng goi ve phia ben con trai, la cai danh hieu tot dep. \n\t3. Anh chang. Vo goi chong goi la lang. \n\t4. Ho Lang.
郟=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Giap nhuc 郟鄏 ten mot ap cua nha Chu 周. \n\t2. Ten huyen.
郏=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Giap nhuc 郟鄏 ten mot ap cua nha Chu 周. \n\t2. Ten huyen.
郡=quan [jun4]\n\t1. Quan. Mot ten rieng de goi khu dat da chia gioi han. Nhu nuoc ta ngay xua   chia lam 12 quan.
郢=dinh [ying3]\n\t1. Kinh do nuoc So 楚 ngay xua, nay thuoc ve dia phan tinh Ho Bac. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Yen, Dinh thanh trung lai ha vi ? 鄢郢城中來何爲 (Khuat Nguyen) con tro ve thanh Yen, thanh Dinh lam gi ?
郤=khich [xi4]\n\t1. Ho Khich. \n\t2. Ten dat. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu khich 隙, nghia la khoang. Nhu khich dia 郤地 cho dat giap gioi voi nhau. Hai ben khong hoa hop voi nhau goi la huu khich 有郤. \n\t4. Cho xuong thit giap nhau.\n\t1. Tom. Nhu bo ha 部下 nhung nguoi duoi quyen minh cai quan. \n\t2. Xep bay. Nhu bo thu 部署 bo tri, xep dat. \n\t3. Dinh so quan. \n\t4. Bo. Bo sach nao dau duoi hoan toan goi la nhat bo 一部, co khi so quyen nhieu ma cung la mot sach cung goi la mot bo. \n\t5. Co quan hanh chinh. Ngay xua dat ra sau bo nhu bo Le, bo Binh, v.v.
郫=bi [pi2]\n\t1. Bi thieu 郫邵 xem chu thieu 邵.
郭=quach [guo1]\n\t1. Cai thanh ngoai. \n\t2. Ten nuoc. \n\t3. Ho Quach. \n\t4. Bo phan ngoai cua vat gi cung goi la quach.
郯=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua.
郰=chau [zou1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu chau 鄹.
郴=sam [chen1]\n\t1. Sam huyen 郴縣 ten mot huyen ngay xua. Hang Vo doi vua Nghia De ra dong do o day, nay thuoc vao vung Ha nam. \n\t2. Ho Sam.
郵=buu [you2]\n\t1. Nha tram. Dung ngua truyen tin goi la tri 置, chay bo truyen tin goi la buu 郵. Cac nha day thep dung de thong tin tuc chay tho tu khap cac noi bay gio goi la buu chinh cuc 郵政局. \n\t2. Cai nha lam ben dong. Cai nha lam ben dong cho cac quan chuc coi ve viec canh nong doc xuat dan gian cay cay goi la buu dinh 郵亭. \n\t3. Rat, cang. \n\t4. Ngay xua co mot chuc quan goi la doc buu 督郵 chuyen viec xet cac toi loi cua cac quan chau huyen duoi quyen minh.
邮=buu [you2]\n\t1. Nha tram. Dung ngua truyen tin goi la tri 置, chay bo truyen tin goi la buu 郵. Cac nha day thep dung de thong tin tuc chay tho tu khap cac noi bay gio goi la buu chinh cuc 郵政局. \n\t2. Cai nha lam ben dong. Cai nha lam ben dong cho cac quan chuc coi ve viec canh nong doc xuat dan gian cay cay goi la buu dinh 郵亭. \n\t3. Rat, cang. \n\t4. Ngay xua co mot chuc quan goi la doc buu 督郵 chuyen viec xet cac toi loi cua cac quan chau huyen duoi quyen minh.
都=do [dou1|du1]\n\t1. Kinh do, ke cho. Nhu do hoi 都會 cho tu hop dong duc lon. Cho vua dong do goi la do. Nhu kien do 建都 xay dung kinh do, thien do 遷都 doi kinh do ra dong cho khac. \n\t2. Choang dep. Nhu y phuc le do 衣服麗都 quan ao choang dep. \n\t3. Loi khen goi tan than. \n\t4. Tom. Nhu dai do 大都 dai khai tat ca, do thi 都是 deu the, v.v.
郿=mi [mei2]\n\t1. Ten dat.
鄀=nhuoc [ruo4]\n\t1. Ten dat, thuoc tinh Ho Bac bay gio.
鄂=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Ten mot ap cua nuoc So 楚 ngay xua, thuoc huyen Vu Xuong tinh Ho Bac. \n\t2. Ngoai coi, ven coi. Nhu ngan ngac 垠鄂 cho hai coi dat cach nhau. \n\t3. Ngac nhien, thay o be ngoai. \n\t4. Ho Ngac.
鄆=van [yun4]\n\t1. Ten mot ap cua nuoc Lo 魯 doi xua, thuoc dia phan tinh Son Dong bay gio. \n\t2. Ho Van.
郓=van [yun4]\n\t1. Ten mot ap cua nuoc Lo 魯 doi xua, thuoc dia phan tinh Son Dong bay gio. \n\t2. Ho Van.
鄉=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huong 鄕.
乡=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huong 鄕.
鄊=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu huong 鄕.
鄏=nhuc [ru4]\n\t1. Giap nhuc 郟鄏 ten mot ap cua nha Chu 周.
鄒=trau [zou1]\n\t1. Nuoc Trau, doi Xuan Thu 春秋 goi la 邾, doi Chien Quoc 戰國 doi la 鄒. Thuoc tinh Son Dong bay gio. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ha xu thanh hien tung bach ha ? Biet thanh huyen tung Lo Trau du 何處聖賢松柏下，別城絃誦魯鄒餘 Duoi cay tung cay ba, thanh hien o noi nao ? Trong thanh nuoc Lo nuoc Trau, tieng dan tieng doc sach van con lua.
邹=trau [zou1]\n\t1. Nuoc Trau, doi Xuan Thu 春秋 goi la 邾, doi Chien Quoc 戰國 doi la 鄒. Thuoc tinh Son Dong bay gio. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ha xu thanh hien tung bach ha ? Biet thanh huyen tung Lo Trau du 何處聖賢松柏下，別城絃誦魯鄒餘 Duoi cay tung cay ba, thanh hien o noi nao ? Trong thanh nuoc Lo nuoc Trau, tieng dan tieng doc sach van con lua.
鄔=o [wu1]\n\t1. Ten dat ngay xua.
邬=o [wu1]\n\t1. Ten dat ngay xua.
鄕=huong, huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Lang. Ngay xua goi mot khu 12 500 nha la huong. \n\t2. Mot tieng goi tom ca mot khu vuc. Nguoi cung tinh cung huyen deu goi la dong huong 同鄉, ly huong 離鄉 lia que di ra ngoai, hoan huong 還鄉 ve que. \n\t3. Nha que. \n\t4. Mot am la huong. Cung nghia voi huong 向. Nhu nam huong 南鄉 huong nam, ngoanh ve phuong nam. \n\t5. Xua, truoc. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi. Huong da ngo kien u phu tu nhi van chi 鄉也吾見於夫子而問之 truoc kia toi duoc thay nha thay toi hoi nen biet.
鄖=van [yun2]\n\t1. Ten huyen. \n\t2. Ten nuoc.
郧=van [yun2]\n\t1. Ten huyen. \n\t2. Ten nuoc.
鄘=dong [yong1]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua.
鄙=bi [bi3]\n\t1. Ap ngoai ven bien thuy, coi. Nhu tu bi 四鄙 bon coi. \n\t2. Hep hoi, hen mon. Nhu bi phu 鄙夫 ke tho bi, hep hoi, dot nat. Ke keo kiet tien cua goi la bi lan 鄙吝. \n\t3. Khinh bi. \n\t4. Dung lam loi noi khiem. Nhu bi y 鄙意 y hep hoi cua toi, bi nhan 鄙人 ke hen dot nay.
鄜=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Ten dat.
鄞=ngan [yin2]\n\t1. Ten mot huyen ngay xua.
鄠=ho [hu4]\n\t1. Ten mot huyen ngay xua.
鄢=yen, yen [yan1]\n\t1. Ten dat nuoc Trinh ngay xua. Co khi doc la yen. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Yen, Dinh thanh trung lai ha vi ? 鄢郢城中來何爲 (Khuat Nguyen) con tro ve thanh Yen, thanh Dinh lam gi ?
鄦=hua [xu3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hua 許 nuoc Hua.
鄧=dang [deng4]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Ho Dang. \n\t3. Ten huyen.
邓=dang [deng4]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Ho Dang. \n\t3. Ten huyen.
鄭=trinh [zheng4]\n\t1. Nuoc Trinh thuoc tinh Ha Nam bay gio. \n\t2. Ho Trinh. \n\t3. Trinh trong 鄭重 trinh trong, co y an can.
郑=trinh [zheng4]\n\t1. Nuoc Trinh thuoc tinh Ha Nam bay gio. \n\t2. Ho Trinh. \n\t3. Trinh trong 鄭重 trinh trong, co y an can.
鄯=thien [shan4]\n\t1. Thien Thien 鄯善 ten mot nuoc coi tay nha Han 漢.
鄰=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Lang gieng. Ngay xua cu nam nha o mot khu goi la lan, cac nha o gan nha minh deu goi la lan. Nhu trach lan 擇鄰 chon lang gieng, nuoc o gan voi nuoc minh goi la lan quoc 鄰國 nuoc lang gieng. \n\t2. Gan ke, toi. Nhu nguoi sap chet goi la du quy vi lan 與鬼爲鄰 gan ke voi ma. \n\t3. Ke giup do hai ben ta huu.
邻=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Lang gieng. Ngay xua cu nam nha o mot khu goi la lan, cac nha o gan nha minh deu goi la lan. Nhu trach lan 擇鄰 chon lang gieng, nuoc o gan voi nuoc minh goi la lan quoc 鄰國 nuoc lang gieng. \n\t2. Gan ke, toi. Nhu nguoi sap chet goi la du quy vi lan 與鬼爲鄰 gan ke voi ma. \n\t3. Ke giup do hai ben ta huu.
鄱=ba [po2]\n\t1. Ba Duong 鄱陽 ho Ba Duong.
鄲=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Ham Dan 邯鄲 ten huyen. Xem chu"ham 邯.
郸=dan [dan1]\n\t1. Ham Dan 邯鄲 ten huyen. Xem chu"ham 邯.
鄴=nghiep [ye4]\n\t1. Ten mot huyen ngay xua. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nghiep Thanh thanh ngoai da phong xuy 鄴城城外野風吹 ben ngoai thanh Nghiep gio dong thoi.
邺=nghiep [ye4]\n\t1. Ten mot huyen ngay xua. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nghiep Thanh thanh ngoai da phong xuy 鄴城城外野風吹 ben ngoai thanh Nghiep gio dong thoi.
鄹=chau [zou1]\n\t1. Ten mot ap nuoc Lo 魯 ngay xua, tuc la lang duc Khong Tu, thuoc huyen Khuc Phu tinh Son Dong bay gio.
鄺=quang [kuang4]\n\t1. Ho Quang.
邝=quang [kuang4]\n\t1. Ho Quang.
酆=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Ten dat, cho vua Van vuong 文王 dong do ngay xua, thuoc tinh Thiem Tay 陝西, Trung Quoc, bay gio. O Tu Xuyen co huyen Phong Do, o day co den Phong Do, la cho Am Trang sinh doi Han tu dac dao, do do tuc moi tin lam goi coi am ty la phong do thanh 酆都城.
酇=toan, tan [zan4]\n\t1. Hop, tu lai. \n\t2. Mot am la tan. Ten mot huyen doi Han.
酈=li, lich [li4]\n\t1. Ten dat nuoc Lo 魯. \n\t2. Mot am la lich. Ten ho.
郦=li, lich [li4]\n\t1. Ten dat nuoc Lo 魯. \n\t2. Mot am la lich. Ten ho.
酉=dau [you3]\n\t1. Chi Dau, chi thu muoi trong muoi hai chi. \n\t2. Gio dau, tu 5 den 7 gio chieu. \n\t3. Ga.
酊=dinh [ding1|ding3]\n\t1. Minh dinh 酩酊 say ruou, say mem. Cao Ba Quat 高伯适. Minh dinh quy lai bat dung phu 酩酊歸來不用扶 chuenh choang say ve khong doi dat.
酋=tu [qiu2]\n\t1. Mot chuc quan dau coi ve viec ruou. Vi the nen nguoi dung dau mot doan the goi la tu truong 酋長. \n\t2. Chon. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau tu tien cong tu hi 似先公酋矣 chon lam nen duoc cai cong cua tien quan. \n\t3. Ruou ngau. \n\t4. Ong tuong. 
酌=chuoc [zhuo2]\n\t1. Rot ruou, nay thong dung la uong ruou. Nhu tieu chuoc 小酌 uong xoang, doc chuoc 獨酌 uong mot minh. \n\t2. Lieu lam, dan do lay cai hay ma lam goi la chuoc, cung nhu rot ruou phai lieu cho day voi vua van. Nhu thuong chuoc 商酌 ban lieu.
配=phoi [pei4]\n\t1. Doi lua. Vo chong goi la phoi ngau 配耦 (cung viet la 配偶), vo ca goi la nguyen phoi 元配, vo ke goi la ke phoi 繼配, goi vo nguoi khac thi goi la duc phoi 德配, v.v.. \n\t2. Phoi huong, dem nguoi khac ma cung phu voi nguoi van tho cung goi la phoi huong 配享. \n\t3. Xung dang, xu tri su vat khien cho dau ra day goi la phoi. Nhu cat phu lam viec goi la khoa phoi 科配, bi toi di day goi la thich phoi 刺配 deu la theo cai y cham chuoc nang nhe de phan phoi di ca. Vi the nen tuc noi su khong xung dang la bat phoi 不配. \n\t4. Bu va cho thieu rach cung goi la phoi.
酎=truu [zhou4]\n\t1. Ruou ngon, ruou nang.
酒=tuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Ruou, pham cac thu dung de uong ma co chat say deu goi la tuu. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. nhat ho bach tuu tieu tran lu 一壺白酒消塵慮 mot bau ruou trang tieu tan noi lo tran tuc.
酖=dam, cham [dan1]\n\t1. Me ruou. \n\t2. Mot am la cham. Cung nghia voi chu 鴆 nghia la ruou pha thuoc doc.
酗=hu, hung [xu4]\n\t1. Say ruou lam can, nat ruou. Ta quen doc la chu hung.
酡=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Say ruou do mat. Da nhien 酡然 mat do gay.
酢=tac [cu4|zuo4]\n\t1. Khach rot ruou cho chu, pham da nhan cai gi cua nguoi ma lai lay vat khac tra lai deu goi la tac. Hai ben cung dua lan cho nhau goi la thu tac 酬酢.
酣=ham [han1]\n\t1. Vui chen, uong ruou vui thich. \n\t2. Vui mai, miet mai. Nhu ham thuy 酣睡 ngu say, ham chien 酣戰 danh ham.
酤=co [gu1]\n\t1. Ban ruou. \n\t2. Ruou de cach dem. \n\t3. Ruou mua, cung doc la chu co.
酥=to [su1]\n\t1. Vang sua. Lay sua bo sua de che lam do an goi la lac, tren mon lac co mot tung sua dong dong lai goi la to. Tren phan to co chat nhu dau goi la de ho 醍醐. \n\t2. Tuc goi mon an nhao dau voi bot la to. Do an thuc nao xop ma chong nhu cung goi la to. \n\t3. Do to 酴酥 ten mot thu ruou, tuc goi la do to 屠酥.
酧=thu [chou2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thu 酬.
酩=minh [ming3]\n\t1. Minh dinh 酩酊 say ruou, say mem. Cao Ba Quat 高伯适. Minh dinh quy lai bat dung phu 酩酊歸來不用扶 chuenh choang say ve khong doi dat.
酪=lac [lao4]\n\t1. Cao sua, cach lam dung nua gao sua cho vao noi dun qua cho hoi sem sem, roi lai cho sua khac vao, dun soi dan dan ma quay luon thay dac roi thi bac ra, cho nguoi roi vot lay vang mong o tren goi la to 酥 con lai cho mot it dau sua cu vao, lay giay min kin, thanh ra lac 酪. Vi the nen dan mien bac deu goi sua bo sua ngua la lac. \n\t2. Cac thu dem dun cho nhu nhu tuong cung goi la lac. Nhu hanh lac 杏酪 cao hanh, quat lac 橘酪 cao quyt, v.v.
酬=thu [chou2]\n\t1. Moi ruou. Chu moi khach uong goi la thu 酬, khach rot lai chu goi la tac 酢. Vi the nen o doi phai di lai voi nhau de to tinh than deu goi la thu tac 酬酢. \n\t2. Bao tra. Nhu thu dap 酬答 bao dap tra.
酲=trinh [cheng2]\n\t1. Benh ruou. Con say ruou. Nhu tuc trinh vi tinh 宿酲未醒 con say cu chua tinh.
酴=do [tu2]\n\t1. Men ruou. \n\t2. Do mi 酴醾 ruou do mi, ruou co lai, ruou cat lai.
酵=dieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Men, meo moc la chat chay ham co chat duong, vi tac dung hoa hoc sinh ra vi trung noi bot meo len thanh ra chat chua, goi la phat dieu 發酵 len men. Nhu u ruou gay giam bien ra mui chua deu la vi the, cho ruou vao bot cho no boc bong len cung goi la phat dieu.
酷=khoc [ku4]\n\t1. Tan ac. Nhu khoc lai 酷吏 quan lai tan ac. \n\t2. Qua, lam. Nhu khoc tu 酷似 giong qua, khoc nhiet 酷熱 nong qua, v.v. \n\t3. Thom sac. \n\t4. Ruou nong. \n\t5. An nan qua, an han qua.
酸=toan [suan1]\n\t1. Chua. \n\t2. Mot danh tu ve mon hoa hoc de goi cac chat ham co vi chua. Nhu diem toan 鹽酸 chat chua lay o muoi ra, luu toan 硫酸 chat chua lay o luu hoang ra, v.v. \n\t3. Dau e. Nhu yeu toan 腰酸 lung e. \n\t4. Dau xot. Nhu toan ty 酸鼻 buot mui, tam toan 心酸 mui long, v.v. \n\t5. Hoc tro ngheo goi la han toan 寒酸.
酹=loi [lei4]\n\t1. Lay ruou rot xuong dat de te.
酺=bo [pu2]\n\t1. Hoi hop uong ruou.
醁=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Linh luc 醽醁 mot thu ruou ngon mau luc doi xua.
醃=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Uop muoi, dung muoi ma uop cac vat goi la yem. Nhu yem nhuc 醃肉 thit muoi.
醅=phoi [pei1]\n\t1. Ruou chua loc.
醆=tran [zhan3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tran 盞.
醇=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Ruou ngon, ruou nang. \n\t2. Thuan hau, thuan can. \n\t3. Khong lan lon.
醉=tuy [zui4]\n\t1. Say ruou.Vuong Han 王翰. Tuy ngoa sa truong quan mac tieu, Co lai chinh chien ky nhan hoi 醉臥沙場君莫笑，古來征戰幾人回 Say nam o sa truong xin ban dung cuoi, xua nay chinh chien may nguoi ve. \n\t2. Say dam. Nhu tuy tam au hoa 醉心歐化 long say me phong hoa chau Au. \n\t3. Ngam ruou.
醊=chuyet [chuo4]\n\t1. Lay ruou rot xuong dat de te. \n\t2. Te lien, bay cac toa than lien nhau ma te.
醋=tho [cu4]\n\t1. Giam. \n\t2. Tuc goi cac su ganh ghet la huu tho y 有醋意. Sach Tuc Van Hien Thong Khao noi con su tu moi ngay an het mot binh giam, noi vi nhu dan ba ghen, vi the doi sau moi goi dan ba ghen la su tu.
醍=the, de [ti2]\n\t1. Ruou trong ma sac hong hong, ruou do. \n\t2. Mot am la de. de ho 醍醐 mot thu mo sua dong dac nhat (xem chu lac 酪) vi no rat nong rat dac, cho nen duoc nghe cac dao thiet yeu goi la quan dinh de ho 灌頂醍醐 (chu kinh Phat). Cung dung de vi du voi chinh phap cua Phat, tinh hoa cua dao Phat.
醐=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Xem chu ho 醍.
醑=tu [xu3]\n\t1. Ruou ngon. Cung nghia voi chu tu 湑 ruou da loc.
醒=tinh [xing3]\n\t1. Tinh, tinh con say. \n\t2. Chiem bao thuc day cung goi la tinh. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ngo mong tinh lai van 午夢醒來晚 tinh mong trua, troi da muon. \n\t3. Het thay su ly gi dang me ma ngo ra deu goi la tinh. Nhu tinh ngo 醒悟, de tinh 提醒.
醕=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thuan 醇.
醜=xu [chou3]\n\t1. Xau. Tuc dung lam mot tieng de mang nhiec nguoi. \n\t2. Xau ho. Pham su gi bi nguoi ta ghet hay de ho cho nguoi deu goi la xu, nhu xuat xu 出醜 de xau, bay cai xau ra. \n\t3. Xau xa, nhu xu tuong 醜相 hinh tuong xau xa. \n\t4. Giong, nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi Kim thien ha xu duc te 今天下醜德齊 trong thien ha bay gio duc giong nhu nhau, duc ngang nhu nhau. \n\t5. Tu binh.
醝=ta [cuo2]\n\t1. Ruou trang goi la ta 醝. Ruou do goi la the 醍, ruou xanh goi la linh 醽.
醞=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Gay ruou, u ruou. Nguoi nao hoc van ham xuc goi la uan tich 醞藉.
酝=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Gay ruou, u ruou. Nguoi nao hoc van ham xuc goi la uan tich 醞藉.
醢=hai [hai3]\n\t1. Thit uop, mam thit. \n\t2. Pham nguoi hay vat da bi xe cat ra deu goi la hai. \n\t3. Bam thit toi nhan (mot hinh phat thoi xua o Trung Quoc).
醨=li, ly [li2]\n\t1. Ruou nhat. \n\t2. Thong dung nhu chu li 漓.
醪=lao, dao [lao2]\n\t1. Ruou duc. Nhu thuan lao 醇醪 ruou nong. Ta quen doc dao. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Du nhien van su vong tinh hau, Dieu ly chan kham pho troc lao 悠然萬事忘情後，妙理真堪付濁醪 muon viec doi dang dac sau khi quen het, (thay) le huyen dieu that dang pho cho chen ruou duc.
醫=y [yi1]\n\t1. Chua benh. Nhu tuu y 就醫 toi chua benh. \n\t2. Thay thuoc. \n\t3. U xoi lam ruou nep.
医=y [yi1]\n\t1. Chua benh. Nhu tuu y 就醫 toi chua benh. \n\t2. Thay thuoc. \n\t3. U xoi lam ruou nep.
醬=tuong [jiang4]\n\t1. Dung cac thu dau, ngo, gao, ngam u nau gan, cho muoi vao de cham cho man goi la tuong. \n\t2. Cac mon do an dam nat.
酱=tuong [jiang4]\n\t1. Dung cac thu dau, ngo, gao, ngam u nau gan, cho muoi vao de cham cho man goi la tuong. \n\t2. Cac mon do an dam nat.
醭=phoc [bu2]\n\t1. Moc, meo, vang. Pham vat gi thoi nat dam meo trang len goi la phoc.
醮=tieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Uong ruou, khong phai thu tac voi ai goi la tieu. Le cuoi va le doi mu ngay xua deu dung le ay, nen dan ba tai gia goi la tai tieu 再醮. \n\t2. Te, su hay dao si lap dan cau cung goi la tieu.
醯=e [xi1]\n\t1. Giam.
醰=dam [tan2]\n\t1. Ruou dang. \n\t2. Dam dam 醰醰 ngay, vi an nong dac beo ngay.
醱=bat, phat [po4]\n\t1. Ruou nau lai, co lai. \n\t2. Mot am la phat. Phat dieu 醱酵 len men, meo len.
醲=nung [nong2]\n\t1. Ruou dac. Co khi dung nhu chu nung 濃.
醴=le [li3]\n\t1. Ruou nep, ruou ngot. \n\t2. Le toan 醴泉 suoi nuoc ngot. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu le 禮.
醵=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Gop tien lam tiec tien. Vi the nen thu nhan tien qua cua moi nguoi cung goi la cu. Nhu cu kim vi tho 醵金爲壽 gop tien lam le tho.
醺=huan [xun1]\n\t1. Say ruou. Hoi say goi la ban huan 半醺. \n\t2. Huan huan 醺醺 net mat vui ve, hon ho. 
醻=tru [chou2]\n\t1. Chu lai rot ruou cho khach goi la tru. \n\t2. Den, bao. Cung dung nhu chu thu 酬.
醼=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu yen 宴.
醽=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Linh luc 醽醁 mot thu ruou ngon mau luc doi xua.
醾=mi [mi2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu mi 釄.
釀=nhuong [niang4]\n\t1. Gay, cat. Nhu nhuong tuu 釀酒 gay ruou, cat ruou. \n\t2. Gay len. Nhu nhuong hoa 釀禍 gay len va. \n\t3. Thai lan.
酿=nhuong [niang4]\n\t1. Gay, cat. Nhu nhuong tuu 釀酒 gay ruou, cat ruou. \n\t2. Gay len. Nhu nhuong hoa 釀禍 gay len va. \n\t3. Thai lan.
釁=han [xin4]\n\t1. Lay mau muong sinh boi vao do tho nhu chuong trong, v.v. \n\t2. Lay phan sap thom xoa vao minh may. \n\t3. Hia, khe, ke. Nhu vo han kha thua 無釁可乘 khong co hia (khe, ke) gi co the thua co vao duoc. \n\t4. Dong.
釂=tieu [jiao4]\n\t1. Uong can ruou.
釃=si [shai1|shi1]\n\t1. Lay cai ray loc ruou.
酾=si [shai1|shi1]\n\t1. Lay cai ray loc ruou.
釄=mi [mi2]\n\t1. Do mi 酴釄 ruou do mi, ruou co lai, ruou cat lai. Cung viet la 酴醾.
釅=nghiem [yan4]\n\t1. Tuong chua. \n\t2. Ruou dac, giam dac. \n\t3. Pham chat long nao dac deu goi la nghiem. Nhu nghiem tra 釅茶 che dac.
酽=nghiem [yan4]\n\t1. Tuong chua. \n\t2. Ruou dac, giam dac. \n\t3. Pham chat long nao dac deu goi la nghiem. Nhu nghiem tra 釅茶 che dac.
釆=bien [bian4]\n\t1. Phan biet ro, bien biet. Nguyen la chu bien 辨.
采=thai, thai [cai3|cai4]\n\t1. Hai, ngat. \n\t2. Lua chon. Nay thong dung chu thai 採. \n\t3. Van suc. Nam sac xen nhau goi la tap thai 雜采, dang dap nguoi goi la phong thai 風采. Ngay xua quan duoc an loc rieng mot ap goi la thai ap 采邑. Ta quen doc la chu thai.
釉=duu [you4]\n\t1. Men su. Nhu thanh duu tu binh 青釉瓷瓶 binh su men xanh.
釋=thich, dich [shi4]\n\t1. Coi ra, noi ra. \n\t2. Giai thich ra. Giai ro nghia sach goi la thich ho 釋詁 hay thich huan 釋訓. \n\t3. Buong. Nhu kien tri bat thich 堅持不釋 giu vung khong buong, khai thich vo co 開釋無辜 buong tha cho ke khong toi, v.v. \n\t4. Tieu tan. Nhu tam trung vi chi thich nhien 心中爲之釋然 trong long da duoc tieu tan, khong con vuong vit an han gi nua. \n\t5. Thich Gia 釋迦 danh hieu vi sang lap ra Phat giao. Cho nen cac su goi la Thich tu 釋子, Phat giao goi la Thich giao 釋教, v.v. \n\t6. Bo. \n\t7. Nhuan tham. \n\t8. Ngam gao, vo gao. \n\t9. Mot am la dich. Vui long.
释=thich, dich [shi4]\n\t1. Coi ra, noi ra. \n\t2. Giai thich ra. Giai ro nghia sach goi la thich ho 釋詁 hay thich huan 釋訓. \n\t3. Buong. Nhu kien tri bat thich 堅持不釋 giu vung khong buong, khai thich vo co 開釋無辜 buong tha cho ke khong toi, v.v. \n\t4. Tieu tan. Nhu tam trung vi chi thich nhien 心中爲之釋然 trong long da duoc tieu tan, khong con vuong vit an han gi nua. \n\t5. Thich Gia 釋迦 danh hieu vi sang lap ra Phat giao. Cho nen cac su goi la Thich tu 釋子, Phat giao goi la Thich giao 釋教, v.v. \n\t6. Bo. \n\t7. Nhuan tham. \n\t8. Ngam gao, vo gao. \n\t9. Mot am la dich. Vui long.
里=ly [li3]\n\t1. Lang. Cho dan o 25 nha goi la ly. \n\t2. Dam, 360 buoc la mot dam.
重=trong, trung [chong2|zhong4]\n\t1. Nang. Dem hai vat so sanh voi nhau goi la khinh trong 輕重 nang nhe. Dung suc nhieu cung goi la trong, vi the nen tieng to cung goi la trong. \n\t2. Tinh cai suc chong choi cua vat nay voi vat kia goi la trong luong 重量, khoa hoc nghien cuu ve cai le cua suc, dinh suc, dong suc giup goi la trong hoc 重學 hay luc hoc 力學, v.v. \n\t3. Coi trong, khong dam khinh thuong. Nhu trinh trong 鄭重, nghiem trong 嚴重, v.v. \n\t4. Ton trong. Nhu quan tu tu trong 君子自重 nguoi quan tu ton trong lay minh. \n\t5. Chuong. Nhu trong nong 重農 chuong nghe lam ruong. \n\t6. Qua. Thu trong benh 重病 benh nang qua, trong toi 重罪 toi nang qua, v.v. \n\t7. Mot am la trung. Gap, kep. Nhu trung tu 重四 gap tu. \n\t8. Lai. Nhu trung to 重做 lam lai. Phuc bat trung lai 福不重來 phuc chang den hai lan. \n\t9. Trong vat gi cach nhau mot tung goi la nhat trung 一重.
野=da [ye3]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu khoang da 曠野 dong ruong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nghiep Thanh thanh ngoai da phong xuy 鄴城城外野風吹 ben ngoai thanh Nghiep gio dong thoi. \n\t2. Coi, nguoi ngay xua chia vach bo coi, theo dung cac vi sao, nen goi la phan da 分野. \n\t3. Dan que. Nhu trieu da 朝野 noi trieu dinh, chon dan que. \n\t4. Que mua. \n\t5. Khong thuan. Nhu da tam bot bot 野心勃勃 long phan nghich len dun dun. \n\t6. Van tu lam khong dung khuon phep cung goi la da.
量=luong, luong [liang2|liang4]\n\t1. Do dong. Cac cai nhu cai dau, cai hoc dung de dong deu goi la luong ca. \n\t2. Bao dung, tam long rong rai bao dung duoc goi la luong . Nhu do luong 度量, cuc luong 局量, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la luong. Can nhac, can xem nang hay nhe do xem dai hay ngan deu goi la luong. Vi the nen cham chuoc su khinh hay trong goi la thuong luong 商量 toan luong. \n\t4. Lieu luong. Nhu luong luc nhi hanh 量力而行 lieu suc ma lam. Co khi doc la luong. 
釐=ly, hy [li2]\n\t1. Sua sang. Nhu ly chanh van the 釐正文體 sua sang the van cho dung. \n\t2. Li, lai. Don vi ti le lai, lai hang nam 1 li (lai) la 1%. Muoi lai la mot phan. \n\t3. Cai tri. \n\t4. Cho. \n\t5. Ly kim 釐金 mot thu thue nha buon. Cu tram phan lay nam phan goi la ly kim, thuong dung tat mot chu ly. \n\t6. Mot am la hy. Phuc. Cung nghia voi chu hi 禧.
金=kim [jin1]\n\t1. Loai kim. Pham cac vat lay o cac mo ma co the nau chay ra va bien hoa duoc hinh chat di deu goi la kim. Nhu vang, bac, dong, sat, thiec, ngay xua goi la ngu kim 五金 nam loai kim. Do la ke cac thu thuong dung do thoi, chu loai kim thi nhieu thu lam. \n\t2. Vang. Vang la mot loai quy nhat trong loai kim, nen goi vang la kim. \n\t3. Tien. Ngay xua cho tien vang la co gia tri nhat, nen tien te deu goi la kim. Tuc goi mot lang bac la nhat kim 一金. \n\t4. Tieng kim, mot thu tieng trong bat am. Nhu tieng cai kieng, cai thanh la goi la tieng kim. Ngay xua thu quan thi khoa chieng, nen goi la minh kim thu quan 鳴金收軍. \n\t5. Do binh. Nhu cai giao cai mac deu goi la kim. \n\t6. Sac vang, pham cac loai dong vat thuc vat ma goi la kim deu la vi sac no vang ca. \n\t7. Ben. Nhu kim thanh 金城 thanh ben nhu vang. \n\t8. Dung de noi cac bac ton quy. Nhu kim khau 金口 mieng vang. Noi ve Phat ve than ve vua chua deu dung chu kim. Nhu kim ngon 金言 loi vang, loi cua cac bac thanh hien noi. \n\t9. Nha Kim 金 (1115-1234), mot giong ro diet nha Bac Tong 北宋, lay duoc vung   Dong tam tinh Mong Co va phia bac nuoc Tau, truyen muoi doi vua, noi doi 120   nam, sau bi nha Nguyen 元 lay mat. \n\t10. Sao Kim, mot ngoi sao trong tam vi sao hanh tinh lon. 
釘=dinh [ding1|ding4]\n\t1. Cai dinh. \n\t2. Mot am la dinh. Dong dinh.
钉=dinh [ding1|ding4]\n\t1. Cai dinh. \n\t2. Mot am la dinh. Dong dinh.
釜=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Cai noi, cai chao, cai cho. \n\t2. Mot do dong cua doi xua, dung duoc sau dau bon thang.
針=cham [zhen1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cham 鍼.
针=cham [zhen1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu cham 鍼.
釣=dieu [diao4]\n\t1. Cau ca. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ban thi canh nhan dieu tich nhan 本是耕閒釣寂人 ta von la ke cay nhan, cau tich. \n\t2. Pham cai gi dung cach quy quyet ma do lay duoc deu goi la dieu. Nhu co danh dieu du 沽名釣譽 mua danh chuoc tieng khen.
钓=dieu [diao4]\n\t1. Cau ca. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ban thi canh nhan dieu tich nhan 本是耕閒釣寂人 ta von la ke cay nhan, cau tich. \n\t2. Pham cai gi dung cach quy quyet ma do lay duoc deu goi la dieu. Nhu co danh dieu du 沽名釣譽 mua danh chuoc tieng khen.
釦=khau [kou4]\n\t1. Bit vang, lay vang nam mieng do. Tuc goi cai khuy ao la khau.
釧=xuyen [chuan4]\n\t1. Cai xuyen, vong tay, do trang suc cua dan ba.
钏=xuyen [chuan4]\n\t1. Cai xuyen, vong tay, do trang suc cua dan ba.
釬=han [han4]\n\t1. Thuoc han. \n\t2. Han cac kim loai cho lien voi nhau cung goi la han. \n\t3. Ma giap tren canh tay. \n\t4. Voi, kip.
釭=cong, cang [gang1]\n\t1. Cai ong gang trong banh xe. \n\t2. Mot am la cang. Cai doi den. \n\t3. Mui ten.
釵=sai, thoa [chai1]\n\t1. Cai thoa cai dau cua dan ba, cai tram. Ta quen doc la chu thoa. Nhu kim thoa 金釵 tram vang.
钗=sai, thoa [chai1]\n\t1. Cai thoa cai dau cua dan ba, cai tram. Ta quen doc la chu thoa. Nhu kim thoa 金釵 tram vang.
鈀=ba [ba3|pa2]\n\t1. Cai bo cao, cai bua.
钯=ba [ba3|pa2]\n\t1. Cai bo cao, cai bua.
鈇=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Con dao rua phat. Do hinh ngay xua dung de chat ngang lung goi la phu viet 鈇鉞.
鈉=not [na4]\n\t1. Chat not (Natrium, cung goi la Sodium, Na), mot nguyen chat trong hoa hoc, truoc dich la to dat 蘇達 hay tao dat 曹達 sac trang bong nhu bac, mem nhu sap, cho nuoc vao thi phat sinh ra khinh khi, hop voi luc khi thi thanh ra muoi an. 
钠=not [na4]\n\t1. Chat not (Natrium, cung goi la Sodium, Na), mot nguyen chat trong hoa hoc, truoc dich la to dat 蘇達 hay tao dat 曹達 sac trang bong nhu bac, mem nhu sap, cho nuoc vao thi phat sinh ra khinh khi, hop voi luc khi thi thanh ra muoi an. 

鈍=don [dun4]\n\t1. Nhut, doi lai voi nhue 銳 sac. \n\t2. Pham cai gi khong duoc luu loi, khong troi chay deu goi la don. \n\t3. Cham chap, ngu don, tri khon khong nhanh nhen. Nhu tri don 遲鈍 dan don.
钝=don [dun4]\n\t1. Nhut, doi lai voi nhue 銳 sac. \n\t2. Pham cai gi khong duoc luu loi, khong troi chay deu goi la don. \n\t3. Cham chap, ngu don, tri khon khong nhanh nhen. Nhu tri don 遲鈍 dan don.
鈎=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cau 鉤.
鈐=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cai khoa. \n\t2. Kiem ki 鈐記 mot thu an tin cua nha quan. \n\t3. Dong dau goi la kiem an 鈐印. \n\t4. Cai can giao.
钤=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cai khoa. \n\t2. Kiem ki 鈐記 mot thu an tin cua nha quan. \n\t3. Dong dau goi la kiem an 鈐印. \n\t4. Cai can giao.
鈔=sao, sao [chao1]\n\t1. Danh up, dang khi danh nhau chia quan len ra sau tran ma danh up quan giac goi la bao sao 包鈔. \n\t2. Cuop boc. Nhu khau sao 寇鈔 cuop lay. \n\t3. Tich ky, quan lai pham toi an cua dut phai tich ky het co nghiep sung cong goi la sao. \n\t4. Viet tinh ta ra. Nhu sao tu 鈔胥 ke giu ve viec sao lai cac van an. \n\t5. Chep ra, sao luc. Nhu thi sao 詩鈔 tho sao lai. \n\t6. Mot am la sao. Bac giay. Lay thue cac cua o goi la sao quan 鈔關.
钞=sao, sao [chao1]\n\t1. Danh up, dang khi danh nhau chia quan len ra sau tran ma danh up quan giac goi la bao sao 包鈔. \n\t2. Cuop boc. Nhu khau sao 寇鈔 cuop lay. \n\t3. Tich ky, quan lai pham toi an cua dut phai tich ky het co nghiep sung cong goi la sao. \n\t4. Viet tinh ta ra. Nhu sao tu 鈔胥 ke giu ve viec sao lai cac van an. \n\t5. Chep ra, sao luc. Nhu thi sao 詩鈔 tho sao lai. \n\t6. Mot am la sao. Bac giay. Lay thue cac cua o goi la sao quan 鈔關.
鈕=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Cai cho de cot day. \n\t2. Cai cuc ao. Pham vat gi nhan moc lai moi chat deu goi la nuu.
钮=nuu [niu3]\n\t1. Cai cho de cot day. \n\t2. Cai cuc ao. Pham vat gi nhan moc lai moi chat deu goi la nuu.
鈞=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Mot thu tinh ve can ngay xua, cu ba muoi can goi la mot quan. \n\t2. Cai compas tho nan nan cac do tron, dung cai vong quay cho tron goi la quan, la cai do che tao rat kheo cua doi xua, cho nen goi troi la dai quan 大鈞 y noi troi duc nen muon vat cung nhu tho nan dung cai quan. Hun duc nen nguoi tai cung goi la quan dao 鈞陶. \n\t3. Mot tieng xung ho ton quy nhu quan giam 鈞鑒 xin ngai soi xet. \n\t4. Deu. Cung nghia voi chu quan 均.
钧=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Mot thu tinh ve can ngay xua, cu ba muoi can goi la mot quan. \n\t2. Cai compas tho nan nan cac do tron, dung cai vong quay cho tron goi la quan, la cai do che tao rat kheo cua doi xua, cho nen goi troi la dai quan 大鈞 y noi troi duc nen muon vat cung nhu tho nan dung cai quan. Hun duc nen nguoi tai cung goi la quan dao 鈞陶. \n\t3. Mot tieng xung ho ton quy nhu quan giam 鈞鑒 xin ngai soi xet. \n\t4. Deu. Cung nghia voi chu quan 均.
鈣=cai [gai4]\n\t1. Chat cai (Calcium, Ca) la mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc.
钙=cai [gai4]\n\t1. Chat cai (Calcium, Ca) la mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc.
鈴=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Cai chuong rung, cai chuong nho cam tay lac.
铃=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Cai chuong rung, cai chuong nho cam tay lac.
鈸=bat [bo2]\n\t1. Cai nao bat (nhac).
钹=bat [bo2]\n\t1. Cai nao bat (nhac).
鈹=phi [pi1]\n\t1. Cai guom vo hinh nhu con dao. \n\t2. Cai kim to.
铍=phi [pi1]\n\t1. Cai guom vo hinh nhu con dao. \n\t2. Cai kim to.
鈺=ngoc [yu4]\n\t1. Loai kim rat ran.
钰=ngoc [yu4]\n\t1. Loai kim rat ran.
鈿=dien [dian4|tian2]\n\t1. Cai bong beo. Mot thu lam bang vang, tren cam long con cha, dung lam do trang suc dau cua dan ba. Do son kham chai hay xa cu goi la loa dien 螺鈿.
钿=dien [dian4|tian2]\n\t1. Cai bong beo. Mot thu lam bang vang, tren cam long con cha, dung lam do trang suc dau cua dan ba. Do son kham chai hay xa cu goi la loa dien 螺鈿.
鉀=giap [jia3]\n\t1. Mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc tim o cac loai kim ra, sac trang nhu bac, chat mem nhu sap, de tan de nau, dung lam nguyen lieu de duc kinh va lam xa phong (Potassium, Kalium, Ka).
钾=giap [jia3]\n\t1. Mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc tim o cac loai kim ra, sac trang nhu bac, chat mem nhu sap, de tan de nau, dung lam nguyen lieu de duc kinh va lam xa phong (Potassium, Kalium, Ka).
鉄=thiet [tie3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thiet 鐵.
鉅=cu [ju4]\n\t1. To lon. Cung nghia voi chu cu 巨. \n\t2. Sat cung. \n\t3. Cai moc. \n\t4. Sao, lam sao, ha. Cung nghia voi chu cu 詎.
钜=cu [ju4]\n\t1. To lon. Cung nghia voi chu cu 巨. \n\t2. Sat cung. \n\t3. Cai moc. \n\t4. Sao, lam sao, ha. Cung nghia voi chu cu 詎.
鉉=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Cai tai dinh. Tai dinh nam ngoc goi la ngoc huyen 玉鉉, nam vang goi la kim huyen 金鉉.
铉=huyen [xuan4]\n\t1. Cai tai dinh. Tai dinh nam ngoc goi la ngoc huyen 玉鉉, nam vang goi la kim huyen 金鉉.
鉋=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Cai bao de bao go cho nhan.
鉏=su, tro, tu [chu2]\n\t1. Cai bua. Xem chu su 鋤 o duoi. \n\t2. Mot am la tro. Tro ngu 鉏鋙 vuong mac. Hai ben y kien khong hop nhau goi la tro ngu. Co khi viet la 齟齬. \n\t3. Lai mot am la tu. Ten nuoc, ten ho ngay xua.
鉑=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Kim bac 金鉑 vang la, vang nen ra tung la mong dung de thep do. \n\t2. Mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc (Platinum, Pt). Mot ten la bach kim 白金 sinh san rat it, gia rat dat, rat ben rat ran, khong co chat gi lam tan duoc no, nguoi ta hay dung bit dau cai thu loi tien hay ngoi but may cho khoi mon.
铂=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Kim bac 金鉑 vang la, vang nen ra tung la mong dung de thep do. \n\t2. Mot nguyen chat ve hoa hoc (Platinum, Pt). Mot ten la bach kim 白金 sinh san rat it, gia rat dat, rat ben rat ran, khong co chat gi lam tan duoc no, nguoi ta hay dung bit dau cai thu loi tien hay ngoi but may cho khoi mon.
鉗=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cai kim gap. \n\t2. Mot thu hinh phep ngay xua, lay sat kep vao co. Co khi viet la 鉆 hay 箝.
钳=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Cai kim gap. \n\t2. Mot thu hinh phep ngay xua, lay sat kep vao co. Co khi viet la 鉆 hay 箝.
鉛=duyen [qian1|yan2]\n\t1. Chi, mot loai kim giong nhu thiec ma mem (Plumbum, Pb). Cho giam vao nau, co the che ra phan. Cac nha tu dao ngay xua dung de luyen thuoc. \n\t2. Phan danh mat lam bang chi cung goi tat la duyen. \n\t3. Duyen but 鉛筆 but chi che bang mot chat than troi sinh rat thuan tuy.

鉤=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cai moc. \n\t2. Cai khoa that lung. \n\t3. Ngay xua goi cai liem la ngai cau 刈鉤. \n\t4. Cai luoi cau. \n\t5. Pham cai gi hinh nhu cai moc deu goi la cau. \n\t6. Moc moi, moc moi lay nhung cai kho khan goi la cau. Nhu Kinh Dich 易經 noi cau tham tri vien 鉤深致遠 tim xet toi le rat sau xa. \n\t7. Dat dan, dat dan nguoi vao dang voi minh goi la cau dang 鉤黨. \n\t8. Luu lai.

錄=luc [lu4]\n\t1. Sao chep. Nhu bien chep sach vo, chuyen cong viec sao chep goi la dang luc 謄錄. \n\t2. Ghi chep. Nhu kinh Xuan Thu 春秋 noi luc noi nhi luoc ngoai 錄內而略外 chi ghi chep viec trong nuoc ma luoc cac viec nuoc ngoai. \n\t3. Mot ten de goi sach vo. Nhu ngu luc 語錄 quyen sach chep cac loi noi hay, ngon hanh luc 言行錄 quyen sach chep cac loi hay net tot cua nguoi nao, v.v. So vo cung goi la luc. Nhu de danh luc 題名錄 quyen vo de cac ten nguoi. \n\t4. Lay, chon nguoi chon viec co the lay duoc thi ghi chep lay goi la luc. Nhu phien truong tuc luc 片長足錄 co chut so truong du lay, luong tai luc dung 量才錄用 can nhac tai ma lay dung, v.v. \n\t5. Coi tat ca, phep quan ngay xua co chuc luc thuong thu su 錄尚書事 la chuc quan dung dau cac quan thuong thu, cung nhu chuc tong ly quoc vu 總理國務 bay gio. \n\t6. Thu bac. \n\t7. Bo buoc. \n\t8. Sac loai kim.

锡=tich [xi1]\n\t1. Thiec (Stannum, St), sac trang nhu bac, chat mem chong chay, vi the nen nguoi ta hay dung de trang mat do dong do sat cho dep. \n\t2. Cho, pham cac cai cua trieu dinh ban cho thuong cho deu goi la tich. \n\t3. Vai nho. \n\t4. Gay tam xich cua nha chua dung.
錮=co [gu4]\n\t1. Han, dung cac thu dong thu sat han bit cac lo cac khieu deu goi la co. \n\t2. Cam co 禁錮 giam cam, cac trieu than co toi phai cam chi su tu do hanh dong, vinh vien khong duoc dung nua goi la cam co, vi be dang ma bi toi goi la dang co 黨錮. \n\t3. Ben chac.
锢=co [gu4]\n\t1. Han, dung cac thu dong thu sat han bit cac lo cac khieu deu goi la co. \n\t2. Cam co 禁錮 giam cam, cac trieu than co toi phai cam chi su tu do hanh dong, vinh vien khong duoc dung nua goi la cam co, vi be dang ma bi toi goi la dang co 黨錮. \n\t3. Ben chac.
錯=thac [cuo4]\n\t1. Hon da rap, da mai. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau tha son chi thach, kha di vi thac 他山之石可以爲錯 da o nui khac co the lay lam da mai, y noi be ban hay khuyen ngan cuu chinh lai loi lam cho minh. \n\t2. Thac dao 錯刀 cai giua. \n\t3. Giao thac 交錯 lan luot cung dap doi. \n\t4. Lan lon. Cac do hai vi no co nhieu thu lan lon nhu nhau nen goi la hai thac 海錯. \n\t5. Lam lan. La Thieu Uy doi Ngu dai noi. Hop luc chau tu thap tam huyen thiet bat nang chu thu thac 合六洲四十三縣鐵不能鑄此錯 dem ca sat trong sau chau bon muoi ba huyen khong hay duc het loi lam ay. Y noi lam to lam. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu tho 措. Nhu tho tri 措置 xep dat. Co khi viet la 錯置.
错=thac [cuo4]\n\t1. Hon da rap, da mai. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau tha son chi thach, kha di vi thac 他山之石可以爲錯 da o nui khac co the lay lam da mai, y noi be ban hay khuyen ngan cuu chinh lai loi lam cho minh. \n\t2. Thac dao 錯刀 cai giua. \n\t3. Giao thac 交錯 lan luot cung dap doi. \n\t4. Lan lon. Cac do hai vi no co nhieu thu lan lon nhu nhau nen goi la hai thac 海錯. \n\t5. Lam lan. La Thieu Uy doi Ngu dai noi. Hop luc chau tu thap tam huyen thiet bat nang chu thu thac 合六洲四十三縣鐵不能鑄此錯 dem ca sat trong sau chau bon muoi ba huyen khong hay duc het loi lam ay. Y noi lam to lam. \n\t6. Cung nghia voi chu tho 措. Nhu tho tri 措置 xep dat. Co khi viet la 錯置.
錳=manh [meng3]\n\t1. Mot nguyen chat loai kim thuoc ve hoa hoc, dung lam men duc pha le va do su (Manganese, Mn).
锰=manh [meng3]\n\t1. Mot nguyen chat loai kim thuoc ve hoa hoc, dung lam men duc pha le va do su (Manganese, Mn).
鍊=luyen [lian4]\n\t1. Ren duc. Ren duc cac loai kim cho den tot goi la luyen. \n\t2. Dieu luyen. Pham cai gi den coi tinh deu goi la luyen. Nhu luyen tu 鍊字 chu dung luyen lam.
鍋=oa [guo1]\n\t1. Cai bau dau (trong xe co cai bau dau dung dau mo cho truc no chay tron). \n\t2. Cai noi hong, noi, xanh, chao, xoong. Nhu dong oa 銅鍋 noi dong.
锅=oa [guo1]\n\t1. Cai bau dau (trong xe co cai bau dau dung dau mo cho truc no chay tron). \n\t2. Cai noi hong, noi, xanh, chao, xoong. Nhu dong oa 銅鍋 noi dong.
