鍰=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Phep can doi xua, cu sau lang goi la mot hoan. Nop tien chuoc toi, cu tinh so hoan. Cho nen so tien chuoc toi goi la phat hoan 罰鍰.

鍾=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Cai chen, cai coc uong ruou. \n\t2. Hop, un duc. Nhu chung linh duc tu 鍾靈毓秀 cho khi linh tu no tu vao ca day. \n\t3. Mot thu de dong ngay xua, sau hoc bon dau goi la mot chung. Vi the cho nen goi bong loc hau la van chung 萬鍾. \n\t4. Ho Chung.
锺=chung [zhong1]\n\t1. Cai chen, cai coc uong ruou. \n\t2. Hop, un duc. Nhu chung linh duc tu 鍾靈毓秀 cho khi linh tu no tu vao ca day. \n\t3. Mot thu de dong ngay xua, sau hoc bon dau goi la mot chung. Vi the cho nen goi bong loc hau la van chung 萬鍾. \n\t4. Ho Chung.
鍿=truy [zi1]\n\t1. Mot cach can ngay xua. Hoac bao sau lang la mot truy, hoac bao tam lang la mot truy, chua co gi lam chac han. \n\t2. Truy thu 鍿銖 noi cai so rat nhe rat xoang khong du so ke vay.

鎖=toa [suo3]\n\t1. Cai vong. Lay vong moc lien nhau goi la toa. Vi the nhung vong xuc xich deo lam do trang suc goi la lien toa 連鎖, lay vong moc lien nhau lam ao day goi la toa tu giap 鎖子甲. \n\t2. Cai khoa. \n\t3. Phong kin, che lap. Nhu van phong vu toa 雲封霧鎖 may mu phu kin. \n\t4. Xieng xich.

鎭=tran [zhen4]\n\t1. De. Cai de giay goi la cai tran chi 鎮紙. \n\t2. Yen. Nhu tran phu 鎮撫 vo yen. \n\t3. Het. Nhu tran nhat 鎮日 het ngay. \n\t4. Tran. Mot cho cho chien dong duc goi la tran. Mot khu dat du nam van nguoi tro len goi la tran. \n\t5. Nha Thanh goi quan Tong binh la tran. Mot canh quan co du ki quan bo, linh tho, linh tai do, cong mot van nam tram sau muoi hai nguoi goi la mot tran,   hop hai tran goi la mot quan, bay gio goi la su (21124 nguoi). \n\t6. Nui lon.

鏡=kinh [jing4]\n\t1. Cai guong soi, ngay xua lam bang dong, bay gio lam bang pha le. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tha huong nhan trang tan khai kinh, Khach lo tran ai ban doc thu 他鄉顏狀頻開鏡，客路塵埃半讀書 (Dong lo 東路) Noi que nguoi thuong mo guong soi dung nhan, Tren duong gio bui noi dat khach, nua thi gio dung de doc sach. Quach Tan dich tho. Duong he quyen vang khuay gio bui, Tram lau guong sang ngam may rau. \n\t2. Soi.

鐳=loi [lei2]\n\t1. Loi dinh 鐳錠 mot loai kim, mot nguyen chat hoa hoc (Radium, Ra) co tia sang manh, thau qua duoc cac the hoi, the long, the dac, suc manh hay giet duoc cac giong vi trung ve benh truyen nhiem, lay tay so vao thay nong rat nhu lua, sinh san rat it, ma dung thi nhieu cho nen rat quy rat dat. \n\t2. Vai, lo, binh.
镭=loi [lei2]\n\t1. Loi dinh 鐳錠 mot loai kim, mot nguyen chat hoa hoc (Radium, Ra) co tia sang manh, thau qua duoc cac the hoi, the long, the dac, suc manh hay giet duoc cac giong vi trung ve benh truyen nhiem, lay tay so vao thay nong rat nhu lua, sinh san rat it, ma dung thi nhieu cho nen rat quy rat dat. \n\t2. Vai, lo, binh.
鐵=thiet [tie3]\n\t1. Sat, mot loai kim dung nhieu nhat. \n\t2. Cung coi, khong chiu khuat ai. Nhu thiet han 鐵漢 anh chang cung nhu sat, thiet dien 鐵面 mat sat, v.v. \n\t3. Khong the mai mat di duoc. Nhu thiet an nan phien 鐵案難翻 an da thanh du chung co nhu sat roi khong the nao go ra lat lai duoc nua. \n\t4. Den.
铁=thiet [tie3]\n\t1. Sat, mot loai kim dung nhieu nhat. \n\t2. Cung coi, khong chiu khuat ai. Nhu thiet han 鐵漢 anh chang cung nhu sat, thiet dien 鐵面 mat sat, v.v. \n\t3. Khong the mai mat di duoc. Nhu thiet an nan phien 鐵案難翻 an da thanh du chung co nhu sat roi khong the nao go ra lat lai duoc nua. \n\t4. Den.
鐶=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Cai vong. Pham cai gi tron ma trong co lo co the xau ma cam ma treo duoc deu goi la hoan. Nhu kim hoan 金鐶 vong vang.
鐸=dac [duo2]\n\t1. Cai chuong lac. Ngay xua khi nao ra tuyen menh lenh thi lac chuong. Thu luoi bang go goi la moc dac 木鐸 cai mo. Ngay xua dung cai dac de tuyen loi day, cho nen goi nhung nguoi chu tri ve viec giao hoa la tu dac 司鐸.
铎=dac [duo2]\n\t1. Cai chuong lac. Ngay xua khi nao ra tuyen menh lenh thi lac chuong. Thu luoi bang go goi la moc dac 木鐸 cai mo. Ngay xua dung cai dac de tuyen loi day, cho nen goi nhung nguoi chu tri ve viec giao hoa la tu dac 司鐸.
鐺=dang, sanh [cheng1|dang1]\n\t1. Lang dang 瑯鐺 cai khoa. \n\t2. Mot am la sanh. Cai cho co chan.
铛=dang, sanh [cheng1|dang1]\n\t1. Lang dang 瑯鐺 cai khoa. \n\t2. Mot am la sanh. Cai cho co chan.
鑄=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Duc, duc loai kim ra cac do dung. Nhu chu dong 鑄銅 duc dong.
铸=chu [zhu4]\n\t1. Duc, duc loai kim ra cac do dung. Nhu chu dong 鑄銅 duc dong.
鑊=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Cai vac, cai chao. \n\t2. Cai vac to dung de hanh hinh thoi xua. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Dai bong cu hoach phanh trung than 大棒巨鑊烹忠臣 (Ky lan mo 麒麟墓) trung than dem gay lon danh, nau trong vac. \n\t3. Nau.
镬=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Cai vac, cai chao. \n\t2. Cai vac to dung de hanh hinh thoi xua. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Dai bong cu hoach phanh trung than 大棒巨鑊烹忠臣 (Ky lan mo 麒麟墓) trung than dem gay lon danh, nau trong vac. \n\t3. Nau.
鑌=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Thep gia, thep tinh luyen.
镔=tan [bin1]\n\t1. Thep gia, thep tinh luyen.
鑑=giam [jian4]\n\t1. Cai guong soi. Ngay xua dung dong lam guong soi goi la giam. Dem cac viec hong truoc chep vao sach de lam guong soi cung goi la giam. Nhu ong Tu Ma Quang 司馬光 lam bo Tu tri thong giam 資治通鑑 nghia la pho su de soi vao day ma giup them cac cach tri dan. 
鑒=giam [jian4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giam 鑑.
鉴=giam [jian4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu giam 鑑.
鑕=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Cai ban sat. \n\t2. Phu chat 斧鑕 hinh cu de chem nguoi.
鑛=khoang [kuang4]\n\t1. Mo, cac loai kim chua thuoc goi la khoang. Tuc hay dung chu khoang 礦.
鑞=lap [la4]\n\t1. Bach lap 白鑞 mot thu pha chi lan voi thiec de han do.
鑠=thuoc [shuo4]\n\t1. Nung. \n\t2. Dep. \n\t3. Quac thuoc 矍鑠 manh me, nguoi gia ma tinh than con manh cung goi la quac thuoc.
铄=thuoc [shuo4]\n\t1. Nung. \n\t2. Dep. \n\t3. Quac thuoc 矍鑠 manh me, nguoi gia ma tinh than con manh cung goi la quac thuoc.
鑢=lu [lu:4]\n\t1. Cai giua. \n\t2. Mai giua. \n\t3. Tu tinh.
鑣=tieu [biao1]\n\t1. Cai ham thiet ngua. \n\t2. Cai tieu, mot thu do binh dung de lao nguoi, nhung ke bao ho khach qua duong thuong dung tieu nen goi la tieu khach 鑣客. Nay thong dung nhu chu tieu 標 hay chu tieu 鏢.
镳=tieu [biao1]\n\t1. Cai ham thiet ngua. \n\t2. Cai tieu, mot thu do binh dung de lao nguoi, nhung ke bao ho khach qua duong thuong dung tieu nen goi la tieu khach 鑣客. Nay thong dung nhu chu tieu 標 hay chu tieu 鏢.
鑤=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bao 鉋.
鑪=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Cai hoa lo, bep lo. Co khi viet la lo 爐.
鑫=ham [xin1]\n\t1. Giau, thinh vuong (thuong dung de dat ten nguoi hay hieu buon). 
鑰=thuoc [yao4|yue4]\n\t1. Cai chia khoa. \n\t2. Cai khoa. \n\t3. Khoa. \n\t4. Vao.
钥=thuoc [yao4|yue4]\n\t1. Cai chia khoa. \n\t2. Cai khoa. \n\t3. Khoa. \n\t4. Vao.
鑱=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Cai dam, cai lem, luoi cay. \n\t2. Duc, khoet.
鑲=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Cac vat hoa hop voi nhau. \n\t2. Va, nam, tram. Nhu tuong nha 鑲牙 tram rang.
镶=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Cac vat hoa hop voi nhau. \n\t2. Va, nam, tram. Nhu tuong nha 鑲牙 tram rang.
鑴=hue [xie2]\n\t1. Mot thu nhu cai dinh. \n\t2. Vung hoi, anh khi toa ra ben mat troi.
鑵=quan [guan4]\n\t1. Cai gao muc nuoc. Cung nhu chu quan 罐.
鑷=nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhiep tu 鑷子 cai nhip. \n\t2. Cai cap toc.
镊=nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhiep tu 鑷子 cai nhip. \n\t2. Cai cap toc.
鑼=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai thanh la. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Triet da la thanh bat tam dinh 徹夜鑼聲不暫停 suot dem tieng thanh la khong tam ngot.
锣=la [luo2]\n\t1. Cai thanh la. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Triet da la thanh bat tam dinh 徹夜鑼聲不暫停 suot dem tieng thanh la khong tam ngot.
鑽=toan, toan [zuan1|zuan4]\n\t1. Cai khoan, cai dui. \n\t2. Mot am la toan. Dam, dui, duc. Luan ngu 論語. Nguong chi di cao, toan chi di kien, chiem chi tai tien, hot yen tai hau 仰之彌高，鑽之彌堅，瞻之在前，忽焉在後 (Tu Han 子罕) Dao (cua Khong Tu) cang ngung len trong cang thay cao, cang duc cang thay cung, moi thay o truoc mat, bong hien o sau lung. \n\t3. Xuyen qua, di lach qua cung goi la toan. \n\t4. Toan thach 鑽石 mot thu da rat quy, rat ran dung de cham khac ngoc va thuy tinh, nen cung goi la kim cuong toan 金剛鑽. \n\t5. Xet cung nghia ly, tham nhap.
钻=toan, toan [zuan1|zuan4]\n\t1. Cai khoan, cai dui. \n\t2. Mot am la toan. Dam, dui, duc. Luan ngu 論語. Nguong chi di cao, toan chi di kien, chiem chi tai tien, hot yen tai hau 仰之彌高，鑽之彌堅，瞻之在前，忽焉在後 (Tu Han 子罕) Dao (cua Khong Tu) cang ngung len trong cang thay cao, cang duc cang thay cung, moi thay o truoc mat, bong hien o sau lung. \n\t3. Xuyen qua, di lach qua cung goi la toan. \n\t4. Toan thach 鑽石 mot thu da rat quy, rat ran dung de cham khac ngoc va thuy tinh, nen cung goi la kim cuong toan 金剛鑽. \n\t5. Xet cung nghia ly, tham nhap.
鑾=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Loan linh 鑾駖 truoc xe vua di co tro mot con chim loan ngam cai chuong, vi the nen xa gia cua vua goi la loan. Nhu tuy loan 隨鑾 theo xe vua.
銮=loan [luan2]\n\t1. Loan linh 鑾駖 truoc xe vua di co tro mot con chim loan ngam cai chuong, vi the nen xa gia cua vua goi la loan. Nhu tuy loan 隨鑾 theo xe vua.
鑿=tac [zao2]\n\t1. Cai duc. Tuc goi la tac tu 鑿子. \n\t2. Dao. Nhu tac tinh nhi am 鑿井而飲 dao gieng ma uong. \n\t3. Cai lo dau cot. Nhu nhue tac 枘鑿 lo tron, xa vuong, khong tra vao duoc. Vi the nen hai ben y kien khac nhau, khong the dung hop duoc cung goi la nhue tac. \n\t4. Xuyen tac. Le khong the thong duoc ma cu co noi cho thong goi la xuyen tac 穿鑿. \n\t5. Ranh rot. Nhu ngon chi tac tac 言之鑿鑿 noi ra ranh rot. \n\t6. Gia gao cho that trang.
凿=tac [zao2]\n\t1. Cai duc. Tuc goi la tac tu 鑿子. \n\t2. Dao. Nhu tac tinh nhi am 鑿井而飲 dao gieng ma uong. \n\t3. Cai lo dau cot. Nhu nhue tac 枘鑿 lo tron, xa vuong, khong tra vao duoc. Vi the nen hai ben y kien khac nhau, khong the dung hop duoc cung goi la nhue tac. \n\t4. Xuyen tac. Le khong the thong duoc ma cu co noi cho thong goi la xuyen tac 穿鑿. \n\t5. Ranh rot. Nhu ngon chi tac tac 言之鑿鑿 noi ra ranh rot. \n\t6. Gia gao cho that trang.
長=truong, truong, truong [chang2|zhang3]\n\t1. Dai, so hai dau voi nhau, ben nao thua hon goi la truong. \n\t2. Lau dai. Nhu truong tho 長壽 song lau. \n\t3. Xa. Nhu truong do 長途 duong xa. \n\t4. Thuong. Nhu mon tuy thiet nhi truong quan 門雖設而長關 tuy co cua ma thuong dong mai. \n\t5. Hay, tai. Nhu nhat truong kha thu 一長可取 co mot cai hay kha lay. \n\t6. Mot am la truong. Lon, nguoi da den tuoi truong thanh goi la truong. \n\t7. Tuoi cao hon, co tuoi hon. \n\t8. Nhung bac tren minh ma co tuoi goi la truong lao 長老. \n\t9. Hang thu nhat. Nhu truong tu 長子 con truong, truong ton 長孫 chau truong,   v.v. 10. Dung dau. Chuc dung dau cac bo deu goi la bo truong 部長, luc quan   truong 陸軍長 chuc dung dau cac quan bo. \n\t11. Lon len, trai lai voi tieng tieu mon. Nhu cau dac ky duong, vo vat bat truong 苟得其養無物不長 neu nuoi hop cach, khong vat nao khong lon. \n\t12. Lai mot am la truong. Chieu dai, nhieu, thua. Nhu truong nhat than huu ban 長一身有半 do chieu dai hon mot than ruoi.
长=truong, truong, truong [chang2|zhang3]\n\t1. Dai, so hai dau voi nhau, ben nao thua hon goi la truong. \n\t2. Lau dai. Nhu truong tho 長壽 song lau. \n\t3. Xa. Nhu truong do 長途 duong xa. \n\t4. Thuong. Nhu mon tuy thiet nhi truong quan 門雖設而長關 tuy co cua ma thuong dong mai. \n\t5. Hay, tai. Nhu nhat truong kha thu 一長可取 co mot cai hay kha lay. \n\t6. Mot am la truong. Lon, nguoi da den tuoi truong thanh goi la truong. \n\t7. Tuoi cao hon, co tuoi hon. \n\t8. Nhung bac tren minh ma co tuoi goi la truong lao 長老. \n\t9. Hang thu nhat. Nhu truong tu 長子 con truong, truong ton 長孫 chau truong,   v.v. 10. Dung dau. Chuc dung dau cac bo deu goi la bo truong 部長, luc quan   truong 陸軍長 chuc dung dau cac quan bo. \n\t11. Lon len, trai lai voi tieng tieu mon. Nhu cau dac ky duong, vo vat bat truong 苟得其養無物不長 neu nuoi hop cach, khong vat nao khong lon. \n\t12. Lai mot am la truong. Chieu dai, nhieu, thua. Nhu truong nhat than huu ban 長一身有半 do chieu dai hon mot than ruoi.
門=mon [men2]\n\t1. Cua. Cua co mot canh goi la ho 户, hai canh goi la mon 門. \n\t2. Cua mo o nha goi la ho, o cac khu vuc goi la mon. Nhu ly mon 里門 cong lang, thanh mon 城門 cong thanh, v.v. Pham nhung cho then chot deu goi la mon. Nhu dao nghia chi mon 道義之門 cai cua dao nghia (cai then chot dao nghia), chung dieu chi mon 眾妙之門 (Lao Tu 老子) cai then chot cua moi dieu mau nhiem. \n\t4. Nha ho (gia toc) nha ho nao van thuong co tieng tam lung lay goi la danh mon 名門 hay mon vong 門望. \n\t5. Do dang. Nhu do dang cua duc Khong Tu 孔子 goi la Khong mon 孔門, do dang cua Phat goi la goi la phat mon 佛門. Lay quyen the ma chieu tap do dang goi la quyen mon 權門 hay hao mon 豪門, v.v. \n\t6. Loai, thu. Nhu phan mon 分門 chia ra tung loai. Chuyen nghien cuu ve mot thu hoc van goi la chuyen mon 專門. \n\t7. Mot co sung trai pha. 
门=mon [men2]\n\t1. Cua. Cua co mot canh goi la ho 户, hai canh goi la mon 門. \n\t2. Cua mo o nha goi la ho, o cac khu vuc goi la mon. Nhu ly mon 里門 cong lang, thanh mon 城門 cong thanh, v.v. Pham nhung cho then chot deu goi la mon. Nhu dao nghia chi mon 道義之門 cai cua dao nghia (cai then chot dao nghia), chung dieu chi mon 眾妙之門 (Lao Tu 老子) cai then chot cua moi dieu mau nhiem. \n\t4. Nha ho (gia toc) nha ho nao van thuong co tieng tam lung lay goi la danh mon 名門 hay mon vong 門望. \n\t5. Do dang. Nhu do dang cua duc Khong Tu 孔子 goi la Khong mon 孔門, do dang cua Phat goi la goi la phat mon 佛門. Lay quyen the ma chieu tap do dang goi la quyen mon 權門 hay hao mon 豪門, v.v. \n\t6. Loai, thu. Nhu phan mon 分門 chia ra tung loai. Chuyen nghien cuu ve mot thu hoc van goi la chuyen mon 專門. \n\t7. Mot co sung trai pha. 
閂=soan [shuan1]\n\t1. Cai doi cua, cai then cua.
闩=soan [shuan1]\n\t1. Cai doi cua, cai then cua.
閃=thiem [shan3]\n\t1. Lanh ra, nghieng minh lanh qua goi la thiem. \n\t2. Thay mot loang. Nhu dien quang thiem thiem 電光閃閃 chop sang loe loe. \n\t3. Ho Thiem.
闪=thiem [shan3]\n\t1. Lanh ra, nghieng minh lanh qua goi la thiem. \n\t2. Thay mot loang. Nhu dien quang thiem thiem 電光閃閃 chop sang loe loe. \n\t3. Ho Thiem.
閈=han [han4]\n\t1. Cai cong lang. \n\t2. Tuong.
閉=be [bi4]\n\t1. Dong cua. Trai lai voi chu khai 開 mo thong. Nhu khong duoc khai thong goi la be tac 閉塞, khong mo mang ra goi la be tang 閉藏, khong di lai gi voi ai goi la be quan tu thu 閉關自守. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Nhan trung tan nhat be thu trai 閑中盡日閉書齋 (Mo xuan tuc su 暮春即事) trong luc nhan roi suot ngay dong cua phong van. \n\t2. Cua ngach, cac cua nho ben then cua lon. \n\t3. Che day. \n\t4. Lap. \n\t5. Ngay lap thu, lap dong goi la be. \n\t6. Ho Be.
闭=be [bi4]\n\t1. Dong cua. Trai lai voi chu khai 開 mo thong. Nhu khong duoc khai thong goi la be tac 閉塞, khong mo mang ra goi la be tang 閉藏, khong di lai gi voi ai goi la be quan tu thu 閉關自守. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Nhan trung tan nhat be thu trai 閑中盡日閉書齋 (Mo xuan tuc su 暮春即事) trong luc nhan roi suot ngay dong cua phong van. \n\t2. Cua ngach, cac cua nho ben then cua lon. \n\t3. Che day. \n\t4. Lap. \n\t5. Ngay lap thu, lap dong goi la be. \n\t6. Ho Be.
開=khai [kai1]\n\t1. Mo. Trai lai voi chu be 閉. \n\t2. No ra. Nhu hoa khai 花開 hoa no. \n\t3. Dao ra, boi ra. Nhu khai ha 開河 khai song, khai khoang 開礦 khai mo, v.v. \n\t4. Moi, truoc nhat. Nhu khai sang 開創 mo mang gay dung ra truoc, khai doan 開端 mo moi, v.v. \n\t5. Phan tach ra. Nhu phach khai 孹開 bua ra, phanh ra, v.v. \n\t6. Bay, dat. Nhu khai duyen 開筵 mo tiec, bay tiec an. \n\t7. Mo rong ra. Nhu tho Do Phu 杜甫 co cau khai bien uc ha da 開邊抑何多 mo mang bien coi sao nhieu vay. \n\t8. Khoat dat. Nhu khai lang 開朗 sang sua. \n\t9. Rong tha. Nhu khai thich 開釋 noi tha, khai phong 開放 buong tha ra cho duoc tu do, v.v. \n\t10. Xep bay. Ke cac ten cac khoan cho thu nao vao hang ay goi la khai. Nhu khai don 開單 don khai, cai don khai cac do hang hay cac khoan gi. \n\t11. Bat dau di. Nhu khai chu 開舟 nho neo thuyen bat dau di. \n\t12. So chia. Mot phan tu goi la tu khai 四開, mot phan tam goi la bat khai 八開. Mot trang giay cung goi la nhat khai 一開. \n\t13. Tru bo di. Nhu khai khuyet 開缺 tru bo cho thieu di. \n\t14. Soi. Nuoc soi goi la khai thuy 開水.
开=khai [kai1]\n\t1. Mo. Trai lai voi chu be 閉. \n\t2. No ra. Nhu hoa khai 花開 hoa no. \n\t3. Dao ra, boi ra. Nhu khai ha 開河 khai song, khai khoang 開礦 khai mo, v.v. \n\t4. Moi, truoc nhat. Nhu khai sang 開創 mo mang gay dung ra truoc, khai doan 開端 mo moi, v.v. \n\t5. Phan tach ra. Nhu phach khai 孹開 bua ra, phanh ra, v.v. \n\t6. Bay, dat. Nhu khai duyen 開筵 mo tiec, bay tiec an. \n\t7. Mo rong ra. Nhu tho Do Phu 杜甫 co cau khai bien uc ha da 開邊抑何多 mo mang bien coi sao nhieu vay. \n\t8. Khoat dat. Nhu khai lang 開朗 sang sua. \n\t9. Rong tha. Nhu khai thich 開釋 noi tha, khai phong 開放 buong tha ra cho duoc tu do, v.v. \n\t10. Xep bay. Ke cac ten cac khoan cho thu nao vao hang ay goi la khai. Nhu khai don 開單 don khai, cai don khai cac do hang hay cac khoan gi. \n\t11. Bat dau di. Nhu khai chu 開舟 nho neo thuyen bat dau di. \n\t12. So chia. Mot phan tu goi la tu khai 四開, mot phan tam goi la bat khai 八開. Mot trang giay cung goi la nhat khai 一開. \n\t13. Tru bo di. Nhu khai khuyet 開缺 tru bo cho thieu di. \n\t14. Soi. Nuoc soi goi la khai thuy 開水.
閎=hoanh [hong2]\n\t1. Cong xom. \n\t2. Bung phenh, do nao mieng nho bung to goi la hoanh, vi the nen do luong rong rai cung goi la hoanh. \n\t3. Cai ham cua. \n\t4. Ho Hoang.
闳=hoanh [hong2]\n\t1. Cong xom. \n\t2. Bung phenh, do nao mieng nho bung to goi la hoanh, vi the nen do luong rong rai cung goi la hoanh. \n\t3. Cai ham cua. \n\t4. Ho Hoang.
閏=nhuan [run4]\n\t1. Thua. Lich Tau theo vong qua dat xoay chung quanh mat troi ma tinh nam, theo vong mat trang xoay chung quanh qua dat ma tinh thang, theo vong qua dat tu xoay ma tinh ngay, cu het moi mot vong qua dat xoay chung quanh mat troi thi mat trang da xoay chung quanh qua dat duoc muoi hai vong va mot phan ba vong nua, cho nen moi nam lai thua ra hon muoi ngay, tinh so thua ay lai thi hai nam ruoi lai thua ra mot thang, thang thua ay goi la nhuan nguyet 閏月 thang thua. Lich tay theo mat troi tinh nam, cu het mot vong qua dat xoay chung   quanh mat troi thi qua dat no tu xoay minh no duoc 365 vong va le mot phan tu,   cho nen tich bon nam thi lai thua mot ngay goi la nhuan nhat 閏日 ngay thua. Nam   nao co ngay nhuan thi cho vao thang hai la 29 ngay.
闰=nhuan [run4]\n\t1. Thua. Lich Tau theo vong qua dat xoay chung quanh mat troi ma tinh nam, theo vong mat trang xoay chung quanh qua dat ma tinh thang, theo vong qua dat tu xoay ma tinh ngay, cu het moi mot vong qua dat xoay chung quanh mat troi thi mat trang da xoay chung quanh qua dat duoc muoi hai vong va mot phan ba vong nua, cho nen moi nam lai thua ra hon muoi ngay, tinh so thua ay lai thi hai nam ruoi lai thua ra mot thang, thang thua ay goi la nhuan nguyet 閏月 thang thua. Lich tay theo mat troi tinh nam, cu het mot vong qua dat xoay chung   quanh mat troi thi qua dat no tu xoay minh no duoc 365 vong va le mot phan tu,   cho nen tich bon nam thi lai thua mot ngay goi la nhuan nhat 閏日 ngay thua. Nam   nao co ngay nhuan thi cho vao thang hai la 29 ngay.
閑=nhan [xian2]\n\t1. Bao lon, cai ngan de han che loi ra vao, vi the cho nen han che khong cho phong tung goi la phong nhan 防閑, chuong ngua ngan ra tung o goi la ma nhan 馬閑. \n\t2. Tap quen, an nhan. \n\t3. Nhan ha, cung nghia voi chu nhan 閒. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ban thi canh nhan dieu tich nhan 本是耕閒釣寂人 ta von la ke cay nhan, cau tich.
闲=nhan [xian2]\n\t1. Bao lon, cai ngan de han che loi ra vao, vi the cho nen han che khong cho phong tung goi la phong nhan 防閑, chuong ngua ngan ra tung o goi la ma nhan 馬閑. \n\t2. Tap quen, an nhan. \n\t3. Nhan ha, cung nghia voi chu nhan 閒. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ban thi canh nhan dieu tich nhan 本是耕閒釣寂人 ta von la ke cay nhan, cau tich.
閒=gian, nhan, gian [jian1]\n\t1. Khoang giua. \n\t2. Mot gian nha hay mot cai buong goi la nhat gian 一閒. \n\t3. Mot thu thuoc do cua nuoc Nhat Ban, dai sau thuoc. \n\t4. Khoang. Nhu dien gian 田閒 khoang ruong. \n\t5. Dong duoc. \n\t6. Mot am la nhan. Nhan roi vo su. \n\t7. An nhan, yen on thu thai khong co y khoe khoang goi la nhan. Nhu nhan nha 閒雅. \n\t8. Mot am la gian. He, co lo hong. Nhu doc thu dac gian 讀書得閒 doc sach co cho he co the hieu duoc. \n\t9. Lam chia re, dung loi giem pha lam cho hai ben ghet nhau, ngo nhau goi la ly gian 離閒, la phan gian 反閒. \n\t10. Gian diep 閒諜 ke do tham quan tinh, cung goi la te tac 細作. \n\t11. Xen lan. Nhu so bat gian than 疏不閒親 ke xa khong xen lan voi nguoi than duoc. Cac sac lan lon goi la gian sac 閒色. \n\t12. Ngan cach. Nhu gian bich 閒壁 cach vach, nha lang gieng ben canh chi cach mot buc vach. \n\t13. Phan biet, khac han khong cung giong nhau goi la huu gian 有閒. \n\t14. Nhat gian 一閒 chi cach nhau mot thi, vi the nen hoi khac nhau goi la nhat gian nhi 一閒耳. Con chua hop mot thi goi la vi dat nhat gian 未達一閒. \n\t15. Benh hoi bot goi la benh gian 病閒. \n\t16. Tru chu nhan 閒 nghia la nhan ha 閒暇 ra, ta hay viet la gian 間.
間=gian [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Chu gian 閒 nghia la khoang thi thuong viet la 間. 
间=gian [jian1|jian4]\n\t1. Chu gian 閒 nghia la khoang thi thuong viet la 間. 
閔=man [min3]\n\t1. Lo lang, cac su om dau chet choc deu goi la man. \n\t2. Thuong nho, cung nghia voi chu man 憫. \n\t3. Gang goi. \n\t4. Ho Man.
闵=man [min3]\n\t1. Lo lang, cac su om dau chet choc deu goi la man. \n\t2. Thuong nho, cung nghia voi chu man 憫. \n\t3. Gang goi. \n\t4. Ho Man.
閘=ap, sap [zha2]\n\t1. Trong song lam canh cua ngan nuoc, luc nao thuyen be di qua thi lai mo ra, chi vua mot chiec thuyen di cu noi duoi nhau ma qua goi la ap. Tuc doc la sap. \n\t2. Cong, dap. Nhu thuy ap 水閘 dap nuoc.
闸=ap, sap [zha2]\n\t1. Trong song lam canh cua ngan nuoc, luc nao thuyen be di qua thi lai mo ra, chi vua mot chiec thuyen di cu noi duoi nhau ma qua goi la ap. Tuc doc la sap. \n\t2. Cong, dap. Nhu thuy ap 水閘 dap nuoc.
閙=nao [nao4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nao 鬧.
閟=bi [bi4]\n\t1. Giau kin. Nhu bi cung 閟宮. \n\t2. Dong cua. \n\t3. Can than. \n\t4. Sau xa.
閡=ngai [he2]\n\t1. Tro ngai. Nhu cach ngai 隔閡 tinh khong thong hieu nhau, tinh y hai ben khong thong voi nhau. \n\t2. Ngan chan. \n\t3. Vui lap.
阂=ngai [he2]\n\t1. Tro ngai. Nhu cach ngai 隔閡 tinh khong thong hieu nhau, tinh y hai ben khong thong voi nhau. \n\t2. Ngan chan. \n\t3. Vui lap.
閣=cac [ge2]\n\t1. Gac, tung gac de chua do. Nhu khue cac 閨閣 cho phu nu o. \n\t2. Ten bo quan, Noi cac 內閣 goi tat la cac. Cac than 閣臣 bay toi trong toa Noi cac. O nuoc quan chu thi giu chuc tham du cac chinh su, o nuoc lap hien thi la co quan trung uong hanh chanh cao nhat. \n\t3. Van gac, ngay xua dat van o lung tuong lung vach de cac do an goi la cac. \n\t4. Duong lat van. Dung go bat san di tren duong o trong vuon goi la cac dao 閣道, bac o cho nui khe hiem hoc goi la san dao 棧道. \n\t5. Cai chong cua. \n\t6. Ngan. \n\t7. Ho Cac.
阁=cac [ge2]\n\t1. Gac, tung gac de chua do. Nhu khue cac 閨閣 cho phu nu o. \n\t2. Ten bo quan, Noi cac 內閣 goi tat la cac. Cac than 閣臣 bay toi trong toa Noi cac. O nuoc quan chu thi giu chuc tham du cac chinh su, o nuoc lap hien thi la co quan trung uong hanh chanh cao nhat. \n\t3. Van gac, ngay xua dat van o lung tuong lung vach de cac do an goi la cac. \n\t4. Duong lat van. Dung go bat san di tren duong o trong vuon goi la cac dao 閣道, bac o cho nui khe hiem hoc goi la san dao 棧道. \n\t5. Cai chong cua. \n\t6. Ngan. \n\t7. Ho Cac.
閤=cap [ge2]\n\t1. Cai cua nach. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu cac dung ve khue cac 閨閣, dai cac 臺閣. Khi Cong Ton Hoang 公孫弘 doi nha Han 漢 lam quan Thua Tuong, lien xay dong cap 東閤 de don nhung nguoi hien o, vi the doi sau moi dung chu dong cap la noi quan tuong moi don cac hien si.
閥=phiet [fa2]\n\t1. Phiet duyet 閥閱 viet cong trang vao giay hay tam van roi neu ra ngoai cua, cua ben trai goi la phiet, cua ben phai goi la duyet. Sach Su Ky 史記 noi. Neu ro thu buc goi la phiet, tich so ngay lai goi la duyet. Vi the nen goi cac nha the gia la phiet duyet 閥閱 hay the duyet 世閱.
阀=phiet [fa2]\n\t1. Phiet duyet 閥閱 viet cong trang vao giay hay tam van roi neu ra ngoai cua, cua ben trai goi la phiet, cua ben phai goi la duyet. Sach Su Ky 史記 noi. Neu ro thu buc goi la phiet, tich so ngay lai goi la duyet. Vi the nen goi cac nha the gia la phiet duyet 閥閱 hay the duyet 世閱.
閧=hong [hong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu hong 鬨.
閨=khue [gui1]\n\t1. Cai cua to vo, cai cua dung mot minh tren tron duoi vuong. Ta truyen 左傳 co cau Tat mon khue dau 蓽門閨竇 cua phen ngo hom, y noi nguoi ngheo hen. \n\t2. Cai cua nach trong cung. Ngay xua goi la kim khue 金閨 trong cua ay la cho cac th i than o. \n\t3. Cho con gai o goi la khue. Vi the nen goi con gai la khue cac 閨閣.
闺=khue [gui1]\n\t1. Cai cua to vo, cai cua dung mot minh tren tron duoi vuong. Ta truyen 左傳 co cau Tat mon khue dau 蓽門閨竇 cua phen ngo hom, y noi nguoi ngheo hen. \n\t2. Cai cua nach trong cung. Ngay xua goi la kim khue 金閨 trong cua ay la cho cac th i than o. \n\t3. Cho con gai o goi la khue. Vi the nen goi con gai la khue cac 閨閣.
閩=man [min3]\n\t1. Ho Man. \n\t2. Tinh Phuc Kien 福建 goi la tinh Man.
闽=man [min3]\n\t1. Ho Man. \n\t2. Tinh Phuc Kien 福建 goi la tinh Man.
閫=khon [kun3]\n\t1. Cai then cua. \n\t2. Cong thanh ngoai. Su ky 史記 co cau khon di noi qua nhan che chi, khon di ngoai tuong quan che chi 閫以內寡人制之、閫以外將軍制之 tu cong thanh ngoai tro vao thi qua nhan soi xet, tu cong thanh ngoai tro ra thi tuong quan soi xet. Nay goi ke thong linh viec quan la chuyen khon 專閫 la vi do. \n\t3. Dan ba o trong, cho nen nhung loi goi ve dan ba deu dung chu khon. Nhu khon an 閫安 tham ba ay duoc binh yen, khon pham 閫範 khuon mau dan ba, v.v.
阃=khon [kun3]\n\t1. Cai then cua. \n\t2. Cong thanh ngoai. Su ky 史記 co cau khon di noi qua nhan che chi, khon di ngoai tuong quan che chi 閫以內寡人制之、閫以外將軍制之 tu cong thanh ngoai tro vao thi qua nhan soi xet, tu cong thanh ngoai tro ra thi tuong quan soi xet. Nay goi ke thong linh viec quan la chuyen khon 專閫 la vi do. \n\t3. Dan ba o trong, cho nen nhung loi goi ve dan ba deu dung chu khon. Nhu khon an 閫安 tham ba ay duoc binh yen, khon pham 閫範 khuon mau dan ba, v.v.
閬=lang, lang [lang2|lang4]\n\t1. Bat ngat. \n\t2. Lang Trung 閬中 ten huyen, thuoc tinh Tu Xuyen 四川. \n\t3. Mot am la lang. Lang lang 閬閬 do so, ta cai dang cao lon.
阆=lang, lang [lang2|lang4]\n\t1. Bat ngat. \n\t2. Lang Trung 閬中 ten huyen, thuoc tinh Tu Xuyen 四川. \n\t3. Mot am la lang. Lang lang 閬閬 do so, ta cai dang cao lon.
閭=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Cong lang. \n\t2. Le nha Chu 周 dat cu nam nha goi mot ty 比, nam ty goi la mot lu 閭, vi the nen goi lang mac la lu li 閭里. \n\t3. Hop. \n\t4. Ten mot tran phap. \n\t5. O. \n\t6. Con lu, nhu con lua ma co mot sung.
闾=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Cong lang. \n\t2. Le nha Chu 周 dat cu nam nha goi mot ty 比, nam ty goi la mot lu 閭, vi the nen goi lang mac la lu li 閭里. \n\t3. Hop. \n\t4. Ten mot tran phap. \n\t5. O. \n\t6. Con lu, nhu con lua ma co mot sung.
閱=duyet [yue4]\n\t1. Xem xet. Nhu duyet binh 閱兵 xem xet binh linh tap luyen the nao, duyet quyen 閱卷 xem xet quyen bai, v.v. \n\t2. Tung trai. Nhu duyet nhan da hi 閱人多矣 tung trai xem nguoi nhieu roi. \n\t3. Phiet duyet 閥閱 (Xem chu phiet 閥). \n\t4. Dong. \n\t5. Bam thu. \n\t6. Tom.
阅=duyet [yue4]\n\t1. Xem xet. Nhu duyet binh 閱兵 xem xet binh linh tap luyen the nao, duyet quyen 閱卷 xem xet quyen bai, v.v. \n\t2. Tung trai. Nhu duyet nhan da hi 閱人多矣 tung trai xem nguoi nhieu roi. \n\t3. Phiet duyet 閥閱 (Xem chu phiet 閥). \n\t4. Dong. \n\t5. Bam thu. \n\t6. Tom.
閶=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Xuong hap 閶闔 cua troi, cua chinh trong cung. \n\t2. Gio thu. Nhu Xuong hap tay nam lai 閶闔西南來 gio thu tu huong tay nam lai.
阊=xuong [chang1]\n\t1. Xuong hap 閶闔 cua troi, cua chinh trong cung. \n\t2. Gio thu. Nhu Xuong hap tay nam lai 閶闔西南來 gio thu tu huong tay nam lai.
閹=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Hoan, giong duc, con trai thien mat dai di goi la yem. Nhu yem ke 閹雞 ga thien. \n\t2. Khi duong thinh.
阉=yem [yan1]\n\t1. Hoan, giong duc, con trai thien mat dai di goi la yem. Nhu yem ke 閹雞 ga thien. \n\t2. Khi duong thinh.
閼=at, yen [e4|yan1]\n\t1. Chen, lap. \n\t2. Mot am la yen. Yen chi 閼氏 ten hieu vo chinh vua ro Hung No 匈奴, thoi Han 漢.
阏=at, yen [e4|yan1]\n\t1. Chen, lap. \n\t2. Mot am la yen. Yen chi 閼氏 ten hieu vo chinh vua ro Hung No 匈奴, thoi Han 漢.
閽=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Ten linh canh cua. \n\t2. Cua cung dien.
阍=hon [hun1]\n\t1. Ten linh canh cua. \n\t2. Cua cung dien.
閾=quac, vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Cai bo cua, nguong cua. \n\t2. Ngan cach. \n\t3. Co cho doc la vuc.
阈=quac, vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Cai bo cua, nguong cua. \n\t2. Ngan cach. \n\t3. Co cho doc la vuc.
閿=van [wen2]\n\t1. Van huong 閿鄉 ten huyen, nay thuoc tinh Ha Nam 河南. Nguyen viet la 閺.
阌=van [wen2]\n\t1. Van huong 閿鄉 ten huyen, nay thuoc tinh Ha Nam 河南. Nguyen viet la 閺.
闃=khuych [qu4]\n\t1. Vang teo, khong co nguoi nao. Khuych nhien vo thanh 闃然無聲 vang ve tinh mich.
阒=khuych [qu4]\n\t1. Vang teo, khong co nguoi nao. Khuych nhien vo thanh 闃然無聲 vang ve tinh mich.
闇=am [an4]\n\t1. Mo toi. Nhu hon am 昏闇 toi tam u me. \n\t2. Lo mo. Nhu Trung Dong 中庸 noi. Quan tu chi dao, am nhien nhi nhat chuong 君子之道，闇然而日章 dao nguoi quan tu lo mo ma ngay ro ret. \n\t3. Dong cua. \n\t4. Buoi toi. \n\t5. Nhat thuc, nguyet thuc. Mat troi, mat trang phai an.
闈=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Cai cua nach trong cung. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi cai nha de thi khao la vi, vi the nen thi hoi goi la xuan vi 春闈, thi huong goi la thu vi 秋闈. \n\t3. Cai nha trong.
闱=vi [wei2]\n\t1. Cai cua nach trong cung. \n\t2. Ngay xua goi cai nha de thi khao la vi, vi the nen thi hoi goi la xuan vi 春闈, thi huong goi la thu vi 秋闈. \n\t3. Cai nha trong.
闉=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Nhan do 闉闍 cong thanh. \n\t2. Lap. \n\t3. O trong thanh. \n\t4. Khuat khuc, cong queo. Trang Tu 莊子. Nhan ky chi ly vo than thuyet Ve Linh Cong, Ve Linh Cong duyet chi, nhi thi toan nhan, ky dau kien kien 闉跂支離無脤說衛靈公，靈公說之；而視全人，其脰肩肩 (Duc sung phu 德充符) Nhan Ky Chi Ly Vo Than (nguoi cong queo, chan queo, chia lia, khong co moi) lai thuyet vua Ve Linh Cong. Ve Linh Cong thich han, nhin den nguoi toan ven thay co ho khang kheo.
闊=khoat [kuo4]\n\t1. Rong rai. \n\t2. Xa vang. Nhu khoat biet 闊別 cach biet da lau. \n\t3. So suat. Nhu so khoat 疏闊 so suat khong can than. \n\t4. Can kho, lam an lao kho.
阔=khoat [kuo4]\n\t1. Rong rai. \n\t2. Xa vang. Nhu khoat biet 闊別 cach biet da lau. \n\t3. So suat. Nhu so khoat 疏闊 so suat khong can than. \n\t4. Can kho, lam an lao kho.
闋=khuyet [que4]\n\t1. Het. Nhu phuc khuyet 服闋 het tro, doan tang. \n\t2. Tron het. Het mot khuc nhac goi la nhac khuyet 樂闋, mot bai tu mot khuc ca cung goi la nhat khuyet 一闋. \n\t3. Rong, khong.
阕=khuyet [que4]\n\t1. Het. Nhu phuc khuyet 服闋 het tro, doan tang. \n\t2. Tron het. Het mot khuc nhac goi la nhac khuyet 樂闋, mot bai tu mot khuc ca cung goi la nhat khuyet 一闋. \n\t3. Rong, khong.
闌=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Toi het, hau het. Nhu tue lan 歲闌 nam sap het, cuoi nam, da lan 夜闌 dem khuya, tuu lan 酒闌 cuoc ruou gan tan, het hung thu goi la y hung lan san 意興闌姍. \n\t2. Len ra. Cua o co lenh cam, ai co phep rieng moi duoc phep ra, neu khong co phep ma len ra duoc goi la lan xuat 闌出. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu lan 欄 hay chu lan 攔. \n\t4. Lan can 闌干 ngang doc, bua bai. Cac noi san nha, ken go ngang doc lam hang rao goi la lan can. Vanh con mat cung goi la lan can.
阑=lan [lan2]\n\t1. Toi het, hau het. Nhu tue lan 歲闌 nam sap het, cuoi nam, da lan 夜闌 dem khuya, tuu lan 酒闌 cuoc ruou gan tan, het hung thu goi la y hung lan san 意興闌姍. \n\t2. Len ra. Cua o co lenh cam, ai co phep rieng moi duoc phep ra, neu khong co phep ma len ra duoc goi la lan xuat 闌出. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu lan 欄 hay chu lan 攔. \n\t4. Lan can 闌干 ngang doc, bua bai. Cac noi san nha, ken go ngang doc lam hang rao goi la lan can. Vanh con mat cung goi la lan can.
闍=do, xa [du1]\n\t1. Nhan do 闉闍 cong thanh. \n\t2. Mot am la xa. Xa le 闍黎 tieng Phan, thay tang, ong thay coi hoc tro, xa duy 闍維 tieng Phan nghia la dot xac, hoa tang.
闐=dien [tian2]\n\t1. Day nich. Nhu tan khach dien mon 賓客闐門 khach khua day cua.
阗=dien [tian2]\n\t1. Day nich. Nhu tan khach dien mon 賓客闐門 khach khua day cua.
闑=niet [nie4]\n\t1. Cai do giua cua, cai doi cua.
闒=thap [ta4]\n\t1. Thap nhung 闒茸 hen ha.
闓=khai, khai [kai3]\n\t1. Mo, mo mang. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu khai 凱. \n\t3. Mot am la khai. Sang. \n\t4. Cai do dung de ban cung.
闔=hap [he2]\n\t1. Lap, dong. Nhu hap ho 闔戶 dong cua. \n\t2. Dong nghia voi chu hap 合, dung lam loi tom tat nhu hap de quang lam 闔第光臨 tat ca nha deu co long yeu ma toi.
阖=hap [he2]\n\t1. Lap, dong. Nhu hap ho 闔戶 dong cua. \n\t2. Dong nghia voi chu hap 合, dung lam loi tom tat nhu hap de quang lam 闔第光臨 tat ca nha deu co long yeu ma toi.
闕=khuyet [que1|que4]\n\t1. Cai cong hai tung. Lam hai cai dai ngoai cua, tren lam cai lau, o giua bo trong de lam loi di goi la khuyet, cho nen goi cua to la khuyet. Cung co khi goi la tuong nguy 象魏. Ngay xua hay lam so ban bo phap lenh o ngoai cua cung, cho nen goi cua cung la khuyet. Nhu phuc khuyet thuong thu 伏闕上書 sup o ngoai cua cung ma dang thu. \n\t2. Lam loi. Nha Duong 唐 co dat ra hai chuc quan ta thap di 左拾遺 va huu bo khuyet 右補闕 chuyen ve viec khuyen can cac dieu lam loi cua vua. \n\t3. Con thieu, con trong. Cung nghia voi chu khuyet 缺. Pham cai gi chua duoc hoan toan con phai bu them moi du thi deu goi la khuyet. Nhu khuyet van 闕文 van con thieu mat, con sot chua du.
阙=khuyet [que1|que4]\n\t1. Cai cong hai tung. Lam hai cai dai ngoai cua, tren lam cai lau, o giua bo trong de lam loi di goi la khuyet, cho nen goi cua to la khuyet. Cung co khi goi la tuong nguy 象魏. Ngay xua hay lam so ban bo phap lenh o ngoai cua cung, cho nen goi cua cung la khuyet. Nhu phuc khuyet thuong thu 伏闕上書 sup o ngoai cua cung ma dang thu. \n\t2. Lam loi. Nha Duong 唐 co dat ra hai chuc quan ta thap di 左拾遺 va huu bo khuyet 右補闕 chuyen ve viec khuyen can cac dieu lam loi cua vua. \n\t3. Con thieu, con trong. Cung nghia voi chu khuyet 缺. Pham cai gi chua duoc hoan toan con phai bu them moi du thi deu goi la khuyet. Nhu khuyet van 闕文 van con thieu mat, con sot chua du.
闖=sam [chuang3]\n\t1. Lo dau ra. \n\t2. Tuc goi su xong vao la sam. Nhu sam tich 闖席 xong vao mam ngoi an.
闯=sam [chuang3]\n\t1. Lo dau ra. \n\t2. Tuc goi su xong vao la sam. Nhu sam tich 闖席 xong vao mam ngoi an.
闘=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dau 鬬.
闚=khuy [kui1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu khuy 窺.
關=quan, loan [guan1]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu mon tuy thiet nhi thuong quan 門雖設而常關 (Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明) tuy co lam cua day nhung van dong luon. \n\t2. Cai doi cua, dung mot cai truc go cai ngang cua lai goi la quan. Cho nen then chot tren cua goi la quan kien 關鍵. Noi rong ra thi cac may moc trong cac do deu goi la co quan 機關. Pham cac cai cot yeu cua su vat gi hay cho tong cuc phan phat di deu goi la quan kien hay la co quan. Nhu ta noi co quan truyen ba, co quan phat hanh, v.v. \n\t3. Cua ai. Nhu bien quan 邊關 cua ai ngoai bien, cho nuoc nay giap voi nuoc khac. \n\t4. Cua o. Dat o cac noi ach yeu de tra xet hanh khach va hang hoa goi la quan. Ngay xua dat cua o chi de tra xet hanh khach, doi sau moi danh thue. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi quan co nhi bat chinh 關譏而不征 cua o chi de tra xet hanh khach ma khong danh thue. \n\t5. Gioi han. Nhu thanh vuc hien quan 聖域賢關 coi thanh buc hien. Nay goi cuoi nam la nien quan tai nhi 年關在邇 cung boi nghia do (cai han nam no da gan het cu sang moi). \n\t6. Quan he. Hai ben cung co lien thuoc voi nhau goi la quan. Nay goi su de long thac mac nho luon la quan tam 關心 hay quan hoai 關懷 cung boi nghia do. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Quan tam nhat da kho vo thuy 關心一夜苦無睡 (Thang Long 升龍) nghi ngoi thau dem kho tam khong ngu duoc. \n\t7. Cach buc. Nhu quan thuyet 關說 loi noi cach buc, do mot nguoi khac nhac lai, chu khong phai loi noi truoc mat. \n\t8. Cac van bang de di lanh luong goi la quan huong 關餉. Hai ben cung dinh uoc voi nhau goi la quan thu 關書. \n\t9. Quan quan 關關 tieng con chim thu cuu keu. \n\t10. Mach quan. Nha lam thuoc chia ba bo mach, cu noi co tay, lay cai xuong choi dang sau lam cu, giua goi la mach quan. \n\t11. Ten dat. \n\t12. Mot am la loan. Giuong. Nhu Viet nhan loan cung nhi xa chi 越人關弓而射之 nguoi Viet giuong cung ma ban day.
关=quan, loan [guan1]\n\t1. Dong. Nhu mon tuy thiet nhi thuong quan 門雖設而常關 (Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明) tuy co lam cua day nhung van dong luon. \n\t2. Cai doi cua, dung mot cai truc go cai ngang cua lai goi la quan. Cho nen then chot tren cua goi la quan kien 關鍵. Noi rong ra thi cac may moc trong cac do deu goi la co quan 機關. Pham cac cai cot yeu cua su vat gi hay cho tong cuc phan phat di deu goi la quan kien hay la co quan. Nhu ta noi co quan truyen ba, co quan phat hanh, v.v. \n\t3. Cua ai. Nhu bien quan 邊關 cua ai ngoai bien, cho nuoc nay giap voi nuoc khac. \n\t4. Cua o. Dat o cac noi ach yeu de tra xet hanh khach va hang hoa goi la quan. Ngay xua dat cua o chi de tra xet hanh khach, doi sau moi danh thue. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi quan co nhi bat chinh 關譏而不征 cua o chi de tra xet hanh khach ma khong danh thue. \n\t5. Gioi han. Nhu thanh vuc hien quan 聖域賢關 coi thanh buc hien. Nay goi cuoi nam la nien quan tai nhi 年關在邇 cung boi nghia do (cai han nam no da gan het cu sang moi). \n\t6. Quan he. Hai ben cung co lien thuoc voi nhau goi la quan. Nay goi su de long thac mac nho luon la quan tam 關心 hay quan hoai 關懷 cung boi nghia do. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Quan tam nhat da kho vo thuy 關心一夜苦無睡 (Thang Long 升龍) nghi ngoi thau dem kho tam khong ngu duoc. \n\t7. Cach buc. Nhu quan thuyet 關說 loi noi cach buc, do mot nguoi khac nhac lai, chu khong phai loi noi truoc mat. \n\t8. Cac van bang de di lanh luong goi la quan huong 關餉. Hai ben cung dinh uoc voi nhau goi la quan thu 關書. \n\t9. Quan quan 關關 tieng con chim thu cuu keu. \n\t10. Mach quan. Nha lam thuoc chia ba bo mach, cu noi co tay, lay cai xuong choi dang sau lam cu, giua goi la mach quan. \n\t11. Ten dat. \n\t12. Mot am la loan. Giuong. Nhu Viet nhan loan cung nhi xa chi 越人關弓而射之 nguoi Viet giuong cung ma ban day.
闞=ham, giam [han3|kan4]\n\t1. Dom ngo. \n\t2. Mot am la giam. Tieng ho gam.
阚=ham, giam [han3|kan4]\n\t1. Dom ngo. \n\t2. Mot am la giam. Tieng ho gam.
闠=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Cua ngoai cho. Vi the nen thuong goi noi cho trien la hoan hoi 闤闠.
闡=xien [chan3]\n\t1. Mo, mo ra. Nhu suy xien 推闡 nghia ly kho hieu phai suy dien ra cho to ro.
阐=xien [chan3]\n\t1. Mo, mo ra. Nhu suy xien 推闡 nghia ly kho hieu phai suy dien ra cho to ro.
闢=tich [pi4]\n\t1. Mo, mo cua. \n\t2. Mo mang. Nhu nhat tich quoc bach ly 日闢國百里 ngay mo rong dat nuoc tram dam. \n\t3. Khai khan, dat hoang vo ra lam ruong cay goi la tich. \n\t4. Bai bac.
闤=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Tuong cho. Nhu hoan hoi 闤闠 cho trien.
闥=that [ta4]\n\t1. Cai cua nach o trong cung. \n\t2. Cai cua. \n\t3. Veo, ta cai ve nhanh.
闼=that [ta4]\n\t1. Cai cua nach o trong cung. \n\t2. Cai cua. \n\t3. Veo, ta cai ve nhanh.
阜=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Nui dat, dong dat, go dat. \n\t2. To lon. Nhieu nhoi, thinh vuong. Nhu an phu 殷阜 giau co dong duc. \n\t3. Beo.
阡=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Thien mach 阡陌 bo ruong, bo ruong ve mat phia dong phia tay goi la mach, ve mat phia nam phia bac goi la thien. \n\t2. Duong loi trong bai tha ma. Nhu tan thien 新阡 ma moi.
阨=ach [e4]\n\t1. Dat hiem. \n\t2. Canh ngo khon nan, van ach. Cung nghia voi chu ach 厄, chu ach 阸.
阪=phan [ban3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu phan 坂.
阬=khanh [keng1]\n\t1. Cai ham. Ham ho nho goi la kham 坎, lon goi la khanh 阬. \n\t2. Vui, chon lap, chon song. Nhu khanh nho 阬儒 chon song hoc tro. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Han thuong sinh u nguoc diem, ham xich tu u hoa khanh 焮蒼生於虐焰，陷赤子於禍坑 nuong dan den tren ngon lua hung tan, vui con do xuong duoi ham tai va (Binh Ngo dai cao 平呉大誥). Co khi viet khanh 坑.
阮=nguyen [ruan3]\n\t1. Nuoc Nguyen 阮, ten mot nuoc ngay xua, nay thuoc tinh Cam Tuc 甘肅. \n\t2. Ho Nguyen. \n\t3. Tuc goi chau la nguyen, vi Nguyen Tich 阮籍, Nguyen Ham 阮咸 hai chu chau deu co tieng gioi o doi nha Tan 晉, cho nen muon dung nhu chu diet 姪. \n\t4. Dan nguyen.
阯=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu chi 址.
阱=tinh [jing3]\n\t1. Cai ho. Ngay xua san giong muong thuong dao ho, lua no nga xuong roi bat goi la tinh. Nhu ham tinh 陷阱 cam bay. Co khi viet la 穽.
防=phong [fang2]\n\t1. Cai de. \n\t2. Phong bi, cung nhu ta noi de phong vay. \n\t3. Canh phong. Nhu hai phong 海防 noi dong quan canh phong ngoai be, bien phong 邊防 cho dong quan de canh phong ngoai bien, v.v. \n\t4. Cam ki. \n\t5. Sanh voi, duong duoc.
阸=ach [e4]\n\t1. Khon cung, van ach.
阻=tro [zu3]\n\t1. Hiem tro. Cho nui hiem hoc goi la hiem 險, cho nuoc nguy hiem goi la tro 阻. \n\t2. Ngan tro. Cung nghia voi chu tro 沮. Nhu vi chi khi tro 爲之氣阻 lam cho cai khi dang hang tat ngang lai. Lai can tro khong cho lam cung goi la tro. \n\t3. Gian nan. \n\t4. Cay.
阼=to [zuo4]\n\t1. Ben them chu nhan dung. Ngay xua chu khach tiep nhau, khach o them ben phia tay, chu o them ben phia dong, vi chu dap ta lai khach, cho nen goi la to. \n\t2. Cai ngoi cua thien tu. Nhu tien to 踐阼 len ngoi vua.
阽=diem, diem [dian4|yan2]\n\t1. Nguy. Cung quen doc la chu diem.
阿=a, a [a1|e1]\n\t1. Cai dong lon, cai go to. \n\t2. Tua. Ngay xua dung dat ten quan lay y rang cai nguoi ay co the nuong tua duoc. Nhu a hanh 阿衡, a bao 阿保, v.v. \n\t3. A dua. Nhu a tu so hieu 阿私所好 dua theo cai minh thich rieng. \n\t4. Bo ben nuoc. \n\t5. Cai cot. \n\t6. Dai ma dep. \n\t7. Mot am la a. Dung lam loi giao dau. Nhu ta noi a, a.
陀=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Cho dat gap ghenh. Co khi viet la 阤.
陂=pha, bi, bi [bei1|pi2|po1]\n\t1. Pha da 陂陀 chieu dat chenh chenh xuong. \n\t2. Mot am la bi. Bi tri 陂池 vung chua nuoc, ao ho. \n\t3. Lai mot am la bi. Nghieng lech.
附=phu [fu4]\n\t1. Bam, nuong cay, cai nho bam vao cai lon moi con duoc goi la phu. Nhu y phu 依附 nuong tua, nuoc nho phuc tung nuoc lon goi la quy phu 歸附. \n\t2. Phu them. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi Quy thi phu vu Chu Cong nhi Cau da vi chi tu liem nhi phu ich chi 季氏富于周公而求也爲之聚斂而附益之 (Tien tien 先進) ho Quy giau hon ong Chu Cong, ma anh Cau lai vi no thu gop ma phu them vao. \n\t3. Gui. Nhu phu thu 附書 gui thu.
陋=lau [lou4]\n\t1. Hep. Nhu lau hang 陋巷 ngo hep, lau that 陋室 nha hep, v.v. Pham cai gi ma quy mo khi tuong deu u dot xau xi khong co gi dang thich deu goi la lau. Nhu bi lau 鄙陋, thien lau 淺陋 hep hoi, v.v. \n\t2. Xau xi. Nhu mao lau 貌陋 mat mui xau xi. \n\t3. Con so sai chua duoc hoan toan.
陌=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Thien mach 阡陌 bo ruong, bo ruong ve mat phia dong phia tay goi la mach, ve mat phia nam phia bac goi la thien. \n\t2. Con duong. Vuong Xuong Linh 王昌齡. Hot kien mach dau duong lieu sac, Hoi giao phu te mich phong hau 忽見陌頭楊柳色，悔教夫婿覓封侯 (Khue oan 閨怨) Chot thay sac cay duong lieu o dau duong, Hoi tiec da khuyen chong ra di cau mong duoc phong tuoc hau . \n\t3. Muon dung lam chu bach 百. Nhu bay muoi dong tien hay sau muoi dong tien goi la mot bach. Tuc dat Ngo goi la luc than 六申 tien an sau muoi, that than 七申 tien an bay muoi.
降=hang, giang [jiang4|xiang2]\n\t1. Rung xuong. Nhu suong hang 霜降 suong xuong. \n\t2. Phuc, hang phuc. \n\t3. Mot am la giang. Xuong, o buc tren danh xuong buc duoi goi la giang. Nhu giang quan 降官 quan phai giang xuong chuc duoi cai chuc dang lam. \n\t4. Nen. Nhu giang tam tuong tung 降心相從 nen long cung theo. \n\t5. Xet chu 降 nay ngay xua hoc la chu hang ca. Ve sau moi chia ra chu hang dung ve nghia hang phuc, ma noi ve thang giang 升降 len xuong, ha giang 下降 giang xuong, thi doc la giang ca.
限=han [xian4]\n\t1. Gioi han, coi, co cai pham vi nhat dinh khong the vuot qua duoc goi la han. Nhu han che 限制 noi ve dia vi da chi dinh, han ky 限期 hen ky, noi ve thi gio da chi dinh. \n\t2. Cai buc cua.
陔=cai [gai1]\n\t1. Them nha, bac len. \n\t2. Ran bao. Kinh Thi 詩經 co khuc Nam cai 南陔 noi nguoi con hieu cung ran bao nhau ma phung duong cha me. \n\t3. Tren chin tung troi goi la cuu cai 九陔. \n\t4. Cai duyen 陔埏 noi rat xa xoi.
陛=be [bi4]\n\t1. Them nha vua. \n\t2. Be ha 陛下 vua, thien tu.
陜=xiem, thiem [shan3]\n\t1. Ten dat, tinh Xiem Tay 陝西 goi tat la tinh Xiem. Ta quen doc la chu Thiem.
陞=thang [sheng1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu thang 升.
陟=trac [zhi4]\n\t1. Treo len. Nhu trac bi nam son 陟彼南山 treo len nui nam kia. \n\t2. Cat len, tien len dung goi la trac 陟, phai cach tuot goi la truat 黜. Nhu truat trac 黜陟 cach chuc va thang quan. \n\t3. Cao. \n\t4. Duoc.
陡=dau [dou3]\n\t1. Cao chot vot. \n\t2. Bong troi len. Nhu thien khi dau bien 天氣陡變 dot nhien tro troi.
院=vien [yuan4]\n\t1. Tuong bao chung quanh. Nha o co tuong thap bao chung quanh goi la vien. \n\t2. Chai nha, noi cho. Nhu thu vien 書院 cho doc sach. \n\t3. Toa quan. Nhu dai ly vien 大里院 toa dai ly, tham nghi vien 參議院 toa tham nghi.
陣=tran [zhen4]\n\t1. Hang tran, hang loi quan linh. Cho nen chia bay doi quan goi la tran. Noi rong ra thi ta cai khi the cua can but viet cung goi la but tran 筆陣. Pham cai gi ma khi the no don dap den noi duoi nhau thi moi mot lan no don den goi la tran. Nhu ta noi tran gio, tran mua, v.v. Danh nhau mot ban goi la tran.
阵=tran [zhen4]\n\t1. Hang tran, hang loi quan linh. Cho nen chia bay doi quan goi la tran. Noi rong ra thi ta cai khi the cua can but viet cung goi la but tran 筆陣. Pham cai gi ma khi the no don dap den noi duoi nhau thi moi mot lan no don den goi la tran. Nhu ta noi tran gio, tran mua, v.v. Danh nhau mot ban goi la tran.
除=tru [chu2]\n\t1. Them. Nhu dinh tru 庭除 them truoc san. \n\t2. Tru bo di. Nhu tien tru 剪除 cat sach di, tao tru 掃除 quet sach di, v.v. \n\t3. Phong quan. Nhu tru thu 除授 bo chuc quan cu ma phong chuc quan moi. \n\t4. Ngay het nam goi la tru nhat 除日, y noi la cai ngay tru het cai cu ma thay cai moi vay, tru tich 除夕 dem giao thua. \n\t5. Phep tinh chia, lay mot so nguyen chia ra tung phan goi la tru.
陧=niet [nie4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu niet 隉.
陪=boi [pei2]\n\t1. Ban, tiep giup. Nhu phung boi 奉陪 kinh tiep, boi khach 陪客 tiep khach, v.v. \n\t2. Chuc phu, pham chuc su gi co chanh co pho thi chuc pho goi la boi, nghia la chuc phu them, khi nao chuc chanh khuyet thi bo vao vay. \n\t3. Hai lan, bay toi vua chu hau doi voi Thien tu tu xung la boi than 陪臣, nghia la bay toi cua ke bay toi. \n\t4. Den tra. Nhu boi thuong 賠償. Co khi viet 賠. \n\t5. Tang them.
陬=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Goc, xo. Nhu ha tuu 遐陬 noi xa tham, heo lanh mot xo.
陰=am [yin1]\n\t1. So am, phan am, trai lai voi chu duong 陽. Pham su vat gi co the doi dai lai, nguoi xua thuong dung hai chu am duong 陰陽 ma chia ra. Nhu troi dat, mat troi mat trang, ret nong, ngay dem, trai gai, trong ngoai, cung mem, dong tinh, v.v. deu chia phan nay la duong, phan kia la am. Vi cac phan do no cung them bot thay doi nhau, cho nen lai dung de xem tot xau nua. Tu doi nha Han 漢 tro len thi nhung nha xem thuat so deu goi la am duong gia 陰陽家. \n\t2. Dam dia. Nhu am vu 陰雨 mua dam. \n\t3. Mat nui ve phia bac goi la am. Nhu son am 山陰 phia bac qua nui. \n\t4. Chieu song phia nam goi la am. Nhu giang am 江陰 chieu song phia nam, hoai am 淮陰 phia nam song Hoai, v.v. \n\t5. Bong mat troi. Nhu ong Dao Khan 陶侃 thuong noi Dai Vu tich thon am, ngo boi duong tich phan am 大禹惜寸陰，吾輩 當惜分陰 vua Dai Vu tiec tung tac bong mat troi, chung ta nen tiec tung phan bong mat troi. \n\t6. Cho rop, cho nao khong co bong mat troi soi toi goi la am. Nhu tuong am 牆陰 cho tuong rop. \n\t7. Mat trai, mat sau. Nhu bi am 碑陰 mat sau bia. \n\t8. Ngam, pham lam su gi bi mat khong cho nguoi biet deu goi la am. Nhu am muu 陰謀 muu ngam, am duc 陰德 cai phuc duc ngam khong ai biet toi. \n\t9. Noi u minh. Nhu am khien 陰譴 su trach phat duoi am ty (phat ngam). Vi the nen mo ma goi la am trach 陰宅.
阴=am [yin1]\n\t1. So am, phan am, trai lai voi chu duong 陽. Pham su vat gi co the doi dai lai, nguoi xua thuong dung hai chu am duong 陰陽 ma chia ra. Nhu troi dat, mat troi mat trang, ret nong, ngay dem, trai gai, trong ngoai, cung mem, dong tinh, v.v. deu chia phan nay la duong, phan kia la am. Vi cac phan do no cung them bot thay doi nhau, cho nen lai dung de xem tot xau nua. Tu doi nha Han 漢 tro len thi nhung nha xem thuat so deu goi la am duong gia 陰陽家. \n\t2. Dam dia. Nhu am vu 陰雨 mua dam. \n\t3. Mat nui ve phia bac goi la am. Nhu son am 山陰 phia bac qua nui. \n\t4. Chieu song phia nam goi la am. Nhu giang am 江陰 chieu song phia nam, hoai am 淮陰 phia nam song Hoai, v.v. \n\t5. Bong mat troi. Nhu ong Dao Khan 陶侃 thuong noi Dai Vu tich thon am, ngo boi duong tich phan am 大禹惜寸陰，吾輩 當惜分陰 vua Dai Vu tiec tung tac bong mat troi, chung ta nen tiec tung phan bong mat troi. \n\t6. Cho rop, cho nao khong co bong mat troi soi toi goi la am. Nhu tuong am 牆陰 cho tuong rop. \n\t7. Mat trai, mat sau. Nhu bi am 碑陰 mat sau bia. \n\t8. Ngam, pham lam su gi bi mat khong cho nguoi biet deu goi la am. Nhu am muu 陰謀 muu ngam, am duc 陰德 cai phuc duc ngam khong ai biet toi. \n\t9. Noi u minh. Nhu am khien 陰譴 su trach phat duoi am ty (phat ngam). Vi the nen mo ma goi la am trach 陰宅.
陲=thuy [chui2]\n\t1. Ven coi. Nhu bien thuy 邊陲 ngoai coi giap gioi voi nuoc khac.
陳=tran, tran [chen2]\n\t1. Bay. Nhu tran thiet 陳設 bay dat. \n\t2. Cu, trai lai voi chu tan 新 moi. Nhu tran bi 陳皮 thu vo quyt da cu. \n\t3. Nuoc Tran. \n\t4. Nha Tran 陳 (557-589). \n\t5. Ho Tran. \n\t6. Chau Tran 朱陳 hai ho noi doi ket dau gia voi nhau. \n\t7. Mot am la tran. Cung nghia voi chu tran 陣.
陈=tran, tran [chen2]\n\t1. Bay. Nhu tran thiet 陳設 bay dat. \n\t2. Cu, trai lai voi chu tan 新 moi. Nhu tran bi 陳皮 thu vo quyt da cu. \n\t3. Nuoc Tran. \n\t4. Nha Tran 陳 (557-589). \n\t5. Ho Tran. \n\t6. Chau Tran 朱陳 hai ho noi doi ket dau gia voi nhau. \n\t7. Mot am la tran. Cung nghia voi chu tran 陣.
陴=bi, bai [pi2]\n\t1. Cai tuong thap tren mat thanh. Co khi doc la chu bai. \n\t2. Chan.
陵=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Dong dat to, cai go. \n\t2. Ma vua. Nha Tan 秦 goi ma vua la son 山. Nha Han 漢 goi la lang 陵. \n\t3. Lan hiep. Nhu sach Trung dung 中庸 noi Tai thuong vi bat lang ha 在上位不陵下 o ngoi tren chang lan hiep ke duoi. \n\t4. Vuot qua. Nhu lang tiet 陵節 vuot buc. \n\t5. Bo nat. Nhu lang di 陵夷 tan nat, lang tri 陵遲 toi xeo thit ra tung manh. \n\t6. Len. \n\t7. Toi do sat.
陶=dao, giao [tao2|yao2]\n\t1. Do sanh. Do gom. \n\t2. Tho nan, tho gom. Noi nghia bong thi chi ve su giao hoa. Nhu chan dao 甄陶 hun duc, dao dong 陶鎔 nung duc. \n\t3. Mung ro. Nhu dao dao nhien 陶陶然 hon ho vay. \n\t4. Nho nhung. Nhu uat dao 鬱陶 thuong nho. \n\t5. Mot am la giao. Cao Giao 皐陶 mot vi bay toi hien doi vua Thuan 舜.
陷=ham [xian4]\n\t1. Vui lap mat. Bi vui lap vao trong dat goi la ham. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Han thuong sinh u nguoc diem, ham xich tu u hoa khanh 焮蒼生於虐焰，陷赤子於禍坑 nuong dan den tren ngon lua hung tan, vui con do xuong duoi ham tai va (Binh Ngo dai cao 平呉大誥). \n\t2. Ham tinh 陷穽 cam ho. Nguoi di san dao ho lua cac giong thu sa xuong day   khong len duoc nua, roi bi bat song lay goi la ham tinh. 3 Ham hai. Nhu dan du   cho nguoi pham toi goi la cau ham 構陷. Dat loi buoc cho nguoi mac toi goi la vu   ham 誣陷. \n\t4. Pha hoai. Nhu thanh thi bi tan pha goi la thanh ham 城陷, tran bi pha tan goi la tran ham 陣陷. \n\t5. It, thieu.
陸=luc [liu4|lu4]\n\t1. Dong bang cao rao, dat lien. Vi noi phan biet voi be nen nam chau goi la dai luc 大陸 coi dat lien lon. \n\t2. Duong bo. Dang di duong thuy ma len bo goi la dang luc 登陸 do bo, len can, luc hanh 陸行 di bo. \n\t3. Luc tuc 陸續 lien noi khong dut. \n\t4. Luc ly 陸離 sac so, ruc ro. \n\t5. Luc luong 陸梁 nguyen la tieng chi ve cai dieu bo chom nhay cua giong manh thu, vi the nen trom giac cung goi la luc luong. \n\t6. Luc tram 陸沈 chim noi, noi su tu nhien ma bi chim dam tan lo. Sach Trang Tu 莊子 noi nguoi hien dau ho dau ten de tron doi goi la luc tram. Bay gio thuong muon dung de noi su mat nuoc. \n\t7. Sau, cung nhu chu luc 六 dung de viet giay ma quan he cho khoi chua duoc, ta goi la chu luc kep. \n\t8. Sao Luc.
陆=luc [liu4|lu4]\n\t1. Dong bang cao rao, dat lien. Vi noi phan biet voi be nen nam chau goi la dai luc 大陸 coi dat lien lon. \n\t2. Duong bo. Dang di duong thuy ma len bo goi la dang luc 登陸 do bo, len can, luc hanh 陸行 di bo. \n\t3. Luc tuc 陸續 lien noi khong dut. \n\t4. Luc ly 陸離 sac so, ruc ro. \n\t5. Luc luong 陸梁 nguyen la tieng chi ve cai dieu bo chom nhay cua giong manh thu, vi the nen trom giac cung goi la luc luong. \n\t6. Luc tram 陸沈 chim noi, noi su tu nhien ma bi chim dam tan lo. Sach Trang Tu 莊子 noi nguoi hien dau ho dau ten de tron doi goi la luc tram. Bay gio thuong muon dung de noi su mat nuoc. \n\t7. Sau, cung nhu chu luc 六 dung de viet giay ma quan he cho khoi chua duoc, ta goi la chu luc kep. \n\t8. Sao Luc.
陻=nhan [yin1]\n\t1. Vui lap.
陽=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Phan duong, khi duong. Trai lai voi chu am 陰. Xem lai chu am 陰. \n\t2. Mat troi. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi Thu duong di boc chi 秋陽以暴之 mat troi mua thu roi xuong cho. \n\t3. Huong nam. Nhu thien tu duong duong 天子當陽 vua ngoi xoay ve huong nam. \n\t4. Chieu nuoc ve phia bac cung goi la duong. Nhu Han duong 漢陽 phia bac song Han. \n\t5. Mat nui phia nam cung goi la duong nhu Hanh duong 衡陽 phia nam nui Hanh. \n\t6. To ra. Nhu duong vi ton kinh 陽爲尊敬 ngoai mat to ra dang ton kinh. \n\t7. Mau tuoi, do tuoi. \n\t8. Coi duong, coi doi dang song. \n\t9. Dai dan ong.
阳=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Phan duong, khi duong. Trai lai voi chu am 陰. Xem lai chu am 陰. \n\t2. Mat troi. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi Thu duong di boc chi 秋陽以暴之 mat troi mua thu roi xuong cho. \n\t3. Huong nam. Nhu thien tu duong duong 天子當陽 vua ngoi xoay ve huong nam. \n\t4. Chieu nuoc ve phia bac cung goi la duong. Nhu Han duong 漢陽 phia bac song Han. \n\t5. Mat nui phia nam cung goi la duong nhu Hanh duong 衡陽 phia nam nui Hanh. \n\t6. To ra. Nhu duong vi ton kinh 陽爲尊敬 ngoai mat to ra dang ton kinh. \n\t7. Mau tuoi, do tuoi. \n\t8. Coi duong, coi doi dang song. \n\t9. Dai dan ong.
陿=hiep [xia2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hiep 狹.
隁=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu yen 堰.
隂=am [yin1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu am 陰.
隃=du [yu2]\n\t1. Ten dat.
隄=de [di1]\n\t1. Bo de, dap de phong nuoc tran vao. Tuc viet la 堤. 
隅=ngung [yu2]\n\t1. Dat ngoai ven. Nhu hai ngung 海隅 ngoai goc be. \n\t2. Canh vuong, pham vat gi vuong cung deu co bon canh. Sach Luan ngu noi Cu nhat ngung bat di tam ngung phan 舉一隅不以三隅反 (Thuat nhi 述而) cat mot goc khong biet xet den ba goc kia, y noi cho biet cai nay ma khong hay tim hieu toi cai kia vay. \n\t3. Quy vuong, mot cach lay vuong trong phep tinh. \n\t4. Canh goc, nguoi biet phan biet nen chang khong co lay can goi la liem ngung 廉隅. \n\t5. Khong cung moi nguoi cung chiu on trach goi la huong ngung 向隅.
隆=long [long1|long2]\n\t1. Day un, day tu u, day dan lai lon lao. Vi the nen cai gi loi len troi len goi la long khoi 隆起. \n\t2. Thinh, day. Nhu duc long vong trong 德隆望重 duc thinh gia trong. \n\t3. Hau. Nhu chi nghi long tinh 摯誼隆情 nghia thiet tinh hau. \n\t4. Long long 隆隆 u u, tieng sam dong. \n\t5. Ton quy, cao nhat. \n\t6. Lon.
隈=oi [wei1]\n\t1. Cho nui, nuoc uong cong. Nhu son oi 山隈 khuyu nui. \n\t2. Cho cong trong cai cung. \n\t3. Cho dui ve. \n\t4. Goc.
隉=niet [nie4]\n\t1. Ngot niet 杌隉 nguy ngap. Co khi viet la 卼臲.
陧=niet [nie4]\n\t1. Ngot niet 杌隉 nguy ngap. Co khi viet la 卼臲.
隊=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Doi quan, phep nha binh quan bo va quan phao thu thi cu 126 nguoi goi la   mot doi, quan ki ma thi 56 nguoi la mot doi. \n\t2. Pham xep bay thanh hang, thanh dan deu goi la doi. Nhu tram doi 站隊 dung vao hang.
队=doi [dui4]\n\t1. Doi quan, phep nha binh quan bo va quan phao thu thi cu 126 nguoi goi la   mot doi, quan ki ma thi 56 nguoi la mot doi. \n\t2. Pham xep bay thanh hang, thanh dan deu goi la doi. Nhu tram doi 站隊 dung vao hang.
隋=tuy, doa [sui2]\n\t1. Nha Tuy 隋 (581-618), vua Tuy Van De 隋文帝 la Duong Kien 楊堅, truoc duoc phong o ap Tuy, sau duoc nha Bac Chu 北周 trao ngoi cho len ngoi vua, sau lai diet not nha Tran 陳, nhat thong ca thien ha, vi cho chu 隨 ghep theo bo 辶 co y chay vay   khong yen, cho nen moi bo 辶 di ma dat la 隋 truyen noi duoc bon doi, dai 39   nam, sau trao ngoi cho nha Duong 唐. \n\t2. Mot am la doa. Thit xe. \n\t3. Tet Doa.
隍=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Cai ao can trong thanh, cai hao, co nuoc goi la tri 池, khong co nuoc goi la hoang 隍.
階=giai [jie1]\n\t1. Buc them, them cao hon san, phai xay buc len goi la giai. \n\t2. Bac thang. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 noi Do thien chi bat kha giai nhi thang da 猶天之不可階而升也 (Tu Truong 子張) cung nhu troi khong the bac thang ma len duoc vay. \n\t3. Ngoi, buc, ngoi thu trong quan che goi la giai. Vi the nen goi ngoi quan la quan giai 官階. \n\t4. Loi len, cai loi dat dan len. Nhu boi co gi do ma sinh ra loan goi la hoa giai 禍階 hay loan giai 亂階. \n\t5. Nuong tua. Nhu vo xich thon chi giai 無尺寸之階 khong con co cho nuong tua duoc.
阶=giai [jie1]\n\t1. Buc them, them cao hon san, phai xay buc len goi la giai. \n\t2. Bac thang. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 noi Do thien chi bat kha giai nhi thang da 猶天之不可階而升也 (Tu Truong 子張) cung nhu troi khong the bac thang ma len duoc vay. \n\t3. Ngoi, buc, ngoi thu trong quan che goi la giai. Vi the nen goi ngoi quan la quan giai 官階. \n\t4. Loi len, cai loi dat dan len. Nhu boi co gi do ma sinh ra loan goi la hoa giai 禍階 hay loan giai 亂階. \n\t5. Nuong tua. Nhu vo xich thon chi giai 無尺寸之階 khong con co cho nuong tua duoc.
随=tuy [sui2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuy 隨.
隐=an [yin3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu an 隱.
隔=cach [ge2]\n\t1. Ngan cach, giua khoang hai cai gi ma lai co mot cai ngan cach o giua khien cho khong thong voi nhau duoc goi la cach. \n\t2. Xa lia. Nhu khue cach 暌隔 cach biet xa xoi.
隕=van, vien [yun3]\n\t1. Roi xuong, tu tren cao roi xuong. \n\t2. Mot am la vien. Buc vien coi, dat. Buc (xem phan phu luc Chu Han co, dang soan thao) la noi ve chieu rong, vien 隕 la noi ve duong vong quanh.
陨=van, vien [yun3]\n\t1. Roi xuong, tu tren cao roi xuong. \n\t2. Mot am la vien. Buc vien coi, dat. Buc (xem phan phu luc Chu Han co, dang soan thao) la noi ve chieu rong, vien 隕 la noi ve duong vong quanh.
隖=o [wu4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu o 塢. Trong lang xom xay lo cot da de phong giac cuop goi la o. \n\t2. Nui trong nuoc. \n\t3. Dinh xay thanh xung quanh.
隘=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Noi hiem tro, cho dia the hiem hoc, giu thi de ma danh vao thi kho goi la hiem ai 險隘. \n\t2. Hep hoi. Nhu ong Manh Tu 孟子 noi Ba Di ai 伯夷隘 ong Ba di hep hoi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu ach 阨.
隙=khich [xi4]\n\t1. Cai lo hong tren tuong tren vach. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi toan huyet khich tuong khuy 鑽穴隙相窺 choc lo tuong cung nhom. \n\t2. Luc nhan ha. Nhu luc cong viec lam ruong duoc roi goi la nong khich 農隙. \n\t3. Oan. Nhu hiem khich 嫌隙 co dieu oan han hiem thu.
際=te [ji4]\n\t1. Giao tiep, nguoi ta cung di lai choi boi voi nhau goi la giao te 交際. \n\t2. Dia vi, cai dia vi ma phan minh phai o goi la phan te 分際, duoc cai dia vi chan thuc goi la chan te 眞際 hay thuc te 實際. \n\t3. Ngoai bien. Nhu bien te 邊際 coi ngoai bien, dau mai nha cung goi la thiem te 簷際, noi rung ru goi la lam te 林際. \n\t4. Trong khoang giao nhau. Nhu luc cuoi thu dau dong goi la thu dong chi te 秋冬之際. \n\t5. Vua gap. Nhu hanh te thua binh 幸際承平 may gap luc thai binh. Luc thoi van vua toi cung goi la te ngo 際遇 hay te hoi 際會.
际=te [ji4]\n\t1. Giao tiep, nguoi ta cung di lai choi boi voi nhau goi la giao te 交際. \n\t2. Dia vi, cai dia vi ma phan minh phai o goi la phan te 分際, duoc cai dia vi chan thuc goi la chan te 眞際 hay thuc te 實際. \n\t3. Ngoai bien. Nhu bien te 邊際 coi ngoai bien, dau mai nha cung goi la thiem te 簷際, noi rung ru goi la lam te 林際. \n\t4. Trong khoang giao nhau. Nhu luc cuoi thu dau dong goi la thu dong chi te 秋冬之際. \n\t5. Vua gap. Nhu hanh te thua binh 幸際承平 may gap luc thai binh. Luc thoi van vua toi cung goi la te ngo 際遇 hay te hoi 際會.
障=chuong [zhang4]\n\t1. Che, ngan. Co vat gi no lam ngan cach goi la chuong ngai 障礙. \n\t2. Che lap. Bi vat duc no che lap mat chan tri goi la tran chuong 塵障, bi phan tri kien no che lap mat chan tri goi la ly chuong 理障 deu la noi ve su lam mat cai sang lang cua ban the chan tam vay. \n\t3. Cai buc che cua. Cac nha quy phai di ra ngoai co tam binh che truoc mat goi la bo chuong 步障 hay hanh chuong 行障 deu la thu dung de che ma dep vay. \n\t4. Cac cai xay dap dung de che cho phong giu phan nhieu deu goi la chuong. Nhu cai bo de goi la de chuong 堤障, cai u thanh goi la bao chuong 保障, cac noi phong giu ngoai bien dap tuong dat de ngan ngua tran, xay choi de trong duoc xa goi la dinh chuong 亭障. Co khi viet la 鄣.
隤=doi [tui2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu"doi 頹.
隧=toai [sui4]\n\t1. Duong ham. Le tang vua ngay xua dao ham ruoc cuu (hom) xuong huyet goi la toai. Nay cac con duong xe hoa nao mac nui ma phai dao ham di qua cung goi la toai dao 隧道.
隨=tuy [sui2]\n\t1. Theo sau. Cu di theo sau chan nguoi, di nghi chong chay deu tuy nguoi goi la tuy. \n\t2. Xuong tuy 倡隨 dao vo chong, giong len truoc la xuong, thuan theo sau la tuy. Phu xuong phu tuy 夫倡婦隨, loi ong Quan Duan Tu 關尹子 noi, y noi chong hay lay y doc suat nguoi, vo hay thuan theo loi chong chi bao vay. \n\t3. Thuan. Nhu tuy khau 隨口 thuan mieng, tuy thu 隨手 thuan tay, v.v. \n\t4. Tuy co ma ung ngay. Nhu tuy thoi 隨時 tuy thoi ma xu, tuy xu 隨處 tuy noi ma dinh, v.v. \n\t5. Ngon chan. \n\t6. Tuy hi 隨喜 tieng nha Phat, noi nghia hep la tuy y minh thich ma lam nhu bo thi, cung dang, v.v. Noi nghia rong thi di tham canh chua cung goi la tuy hi, nguoi ta lam viec thien minh khong lam chi them vao cung goi la tuy hi, khong ung theo nguoi hanh dong gi cung goi la tuy hi. 
随=tuy [sui2]\n\t1. Theo sau. Cu di theo sau chan nguoi, di nghi chong chay deu tuy nguoi goi la tuy. \n\t2. Xuong tuy 倡隨 dao vo chong, giong len truoc la xuong, thuan theo sau la tuy. Phu xuong phu tuy 夫倡婦隨, loi ong Quan Duan Tu 關尹子 noi, y noi chong hay lay y doc suat nguoi, vo hay thuan theo loi chong chi bao vay. \n\t3. Thuan. Nhu tuy khau 隨口 thuan mieng, tuy thu 隨手 thuan tay, v.v. \n\t4. Tuy co ma ung ngay. Nhu tuy thoi 隨時 tuy thoi ma xu, tuy xu 隨處 tuy noi ma dinh, v.v. \n\t5. Ngon chan. \n\t6. Tuy hi 隨喜 tieng nha Phat, noi nghia hep la tuy y minh thich ma lam nhu bo thi, cung dang, v.v. Noi nghia rong thi di tham canh chua cung goi la tuy hi, nguoi ta lam viec thien minh khong lam chi them vao cung goi la tuy hi, khong ung theo nguoi hanh dong gi cung goi la tuy hi. 
隩=ao, uc [ao4]\n\t1. Cho nuoc hom vao trong bo. \n\t2. Gian. \n\t3. Mot am la uc. Bon phuong dat co the o duoc. \n\t4. Am ap.
險=hiem [xian3]\n\t1. Hiem tro. Noi co nhieu su ngan tro kho di lai goi la hiem. Nhu hiem ai 險隘, hiem yeu 險要 deu noi cho hinh the hiem tro de giu ma kho pha vao duoc. \n\t2. Su gi yen hay nguy, thanh hay hong chua the biet truoc duoc deu goi la hiem. Nhu mao hiem 冒險 khong so gi nguy hiem cu viec tien hanh. \n\t3. Hiem hoc, gian hiem, noi ke tieu nhan dat cach lam hai nguoi vay. \n\t4. Khong de dang khong nhu thuong goi la hiem. Nhu van chuong ky quai khong theo phep thuong khien cho nguoi xem phai ghe long son toc goi la hiem kinh 險勁 hay hiem tieu 險峭, v.v.
险=hiem [xian3]\n\t1. Hiem tro. Noi co nhieu su ngan tro kho di lai goi la hiem. Nhu hiem ai 險隘, hiem yeu 險要 deu noi cho hinh the hiem tro de giu ma kho pha vao duoc. \n\t2. Su gi yen hay nguy, thanh hay hong chua the biet truoc duoc deu goi la hiem. Nhu mao hiem 冒險 khong so gi nguy hiem cu viec tien hanh. \n\t3. Hiem hoc, gian hiem, noi ke tieu nhan dat cach lam hai nguoi vay. \n\t4. Khong de dang khong nhu thuong goi la hiem. Nhu van chuong ky quai khong theo phep thuong khien cho nguoi xem phai ghe long son toc goi la hiem kinh 險勁 hay hiem tieu 險峭, v.v.
隰=thap [xi2]\n\t1. Cho trung, noi dat thap uot. \n\t2. Ruong moi vo.
隱=an, an [yin3]\n\t1. An nap, khong hien ro ra. Nhu co va loan con an nap chua phat ra goi la an hoan 隱患, moi tinh khong the boc bach cho ai nay deu biet duoc goi la an tinh 隱情, v.v. \n\t2. An tron. Hoc tro khong can ra lam quan ma lanh doi o an mot cho goi la an luan 隱淪 hay an dat 隱逸. \n\t2. An nap. Dung cai do gi che kin minh khien cho nguoi khong trong thay duoc goi la an. Nhu an u binh hau 隱於屏後 nap o sau binh phong. \n\t3. Giau. Su gi biet ro ma giau kin khong noi cho ai biet goi la an. Nhu tu vi phu an 子爲父隱 con giau cho cha. \n\t4. Giau giem, biet ma khong noi, noi khong het y goi la an. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi Nhi tam tu di nga vi an ho, ngo vo an ho nhi 二三子以我爲隱乎，吾無隱乎爾 (Thuat nhi 述而) hai ba anh cho ta la giau giem gi chang, ta khong co giau giem gi ca. \n\t5. Khon kho. Nhung dieu dan lay lam lo lam kho goi la dan an 民隱. \n\t6. Xot, nghi. Nhu Manh tu 孟子 noi Vuong nhuoc an ki vo toi nhi tuu tu dia 王若隱其無罪而就死地 nha vua neu xot nghi den ke khong co toi ma toi cho chet. \n\t7. Su gi chua ro rang ma da hoi co y lo ra goi la an. Nhu an an 隱隱 lo mo, an nhien 隱然 hoi ro ro vay, an uoc 隱約 lap lo, v.v. \n\t8. Loi noi do. \n\t9. Tuong thap. 10. Mot am la an. Tua. Nhu an ky nhi ngoa 隱几而臥 tua ghe ma nam, an nang 隱囊 tua goi. Tuc viet la 隠.
隐=an, an [yin3]\n\t1. An nap, khong hien ro ra. Nhu co va loan con an nap chua phat ra goi la an hoan 隱患, moi tinh khong the boc bach cho ai nay deu biet duoc goi la an tinh 隱情, v.v. \n\t2. An tron. Hoc tro khong can ra lam quan ma lanh doi o an mot cho goi la an luan 隱淪 hay an dat 隱逸. \n\t2. An nap. Dung cai do gi che kin minh khien cho nguoi khong trong thay duoc goi la an. Nhu an u binh hau 隱於屏後 nap o sau binh phong. \n\t3. Giau. Su gi biet ro ma giau kin khong noi cho ai biet goi la an. Nhu tu vi phu an 子爲父隱 con giau cho cha. \n\t4. Giau giem, biet ma khong noi, noi khong het y goi la an. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi Nhi tam tu di nga vi an ho, ngo vo an ho nhi 二三子以我爲隱乎，吾無隱乎爾 (Thuat nhi 述而) hai ba anh cho ta la giau giem gi chang, ta khong co giau giem gi ca. \n\t5. Khon kho. Nhung dieu dan lay lam lo lam kho goi la dan an 民隱. \n\t6. Xot, nghi. Nhu Manh tu 孟子 noi Vuong nhuoc an ki vo toi nhi tuu tu dia 王若隱其無罪而就死地 nha vua neu xot nghi den ke khong co toi ma toi cho chet. \n\t7. Su gi chua ro rang ma da hoi co y lo ra goi la an. Nhu an an 隱隱 lo mo, an nhien 隱然 hoi ro ro vay, an uoc 隱約 lap lo, v.v. \n\t8. Loi noi do. \n\t9. Tuong thap. 10. Mot am la an. Tua. Nhu an ky nhi ngoa 隱几而臥 tua ghe ma nam, an nang 隱囊 tua goi. Tuc viet la 隠.
隲=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu chat 騭.
隳=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Huy nat.
隴=lung [long3]\n\t1. Ten dat. Cung nghia voi chu lung 壟.
陇=lung [long3]\n\t1. Ten dat. Cung nghia voi chu lung 壟.
隶=dai [li4]\n\t1. Kip, cung nghia voi chu dai 逮.
隷=le [li4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu le 隸.
隸=le [li4]\n\t1. Thuoc. Nhu chia ra tung bo tung loai, thuoc vao bo mo thi goi la le mo bo 隸某部. \n\t2. Toi to, ke dung de sai bao goi la le. Nhu boc le 僕隸, le dich 隸役, v.v. \n\t3. Le thu 隸書 loi chu le. Tan Trinh Mac 秦程邈 dat ra. Tu nha Han 漢 ve sau cac sach vo cung so bieu cho toi cong van, tu van deu dung loi chu ay. Vi do la cong viec cua ke sai bao cho nen goi la chu le.
隶=le [li4]\n\t1. Thuoc. Nhu chia ra tung bo tung loai, thuoc vao bo mo thi goi la le mo bo 隸某部. \n\t2. Toi to, ke dung de sai bao goi la le. Nhu boc le 僕隸, le dich 隸役, v.v. \n\t3. Le thu 隸書 loi chu le. Tan Trinh Mac 秦程邈 dat ra. Tu nha Han 漢 ve sau cac sach vo cung so bieu cho toi cong van, tu van deu dung loi chu ay. Vi do la cong viec cua ke sai bao cho nen goi la chu le.
隹=chuy [zhui1]\n\t1. Mot cai ten chung de goi giong chim duoi ngan.
隻=chich [zhi1|zhi3]\n\t1. Chiec, cai gi chi co mot minh deu goi la chich. Nhu hinh dan anh chich 形單影隻 chiec bong don hinh. \n\t2. Mot tieng dung de dem xem so do co bao nhieu. Nhu nhat chich 一隻 mot cai, mot chiec, luong chich 兩隻 hai cai, hai chiec, v.v.
只=chich [zhi1|zhi3]\n\t1. Chiec, cai gi chi co mot minh deu goi la chich. Nhu hinh dan anh chich 形單影隻 chiec bong don hinh. \n\t2. Mot tieng dung de dem xem so do co bao nhieu. Nhu nhat chich 一隻 mot cai, mot chiec, luong chich 兩隻 hai cai, hai chiec, v.v.
隼=chuan [sun3]\n\t1. Mot loai chim cat nho, sac long y nhu con cat, chi khac rang bung va nguc trang phot va hoi do kenh kech thoi.
雀=tuoc [qiao1|qiao3|que4]\n\t1. Con chim se. \n\t2. Tinh chim se no hay nhay nhot, cho nen nguoi mung ro nhay nhot goi la tuoc duoc 雀躍.
雁=nhan [yan4]\n\t1. Chim nhan. Chim nhan, mua thu lai, mua xuan di, cho nen goi la hau dieu 候鳥 chim mua. Chim nhan bay co thu tu, nen anh em goi la nhan tu 雁序. Co khi viet la nhan 雁. Ta goi la con chim mong. Nguyen Trai 阮廌. Co quoc tam quy lac nhan bien 故國心歸落雁邊 (Than Phu hai khau 神苻海口) Long mong ve que cu theo canh nhan sa.
雄=hung [xiong2]\n\t1. Con duc, cac loai co long thuoc ve giong duc goi la hung, giong thu duc cung goi la hung. \n\t2. Manh. Nhu hung trang 雄壯 manh khoe.
雅=nha [ya1|ya3]\n\t1. Chinh, mot loi tho ca dung vao nhac ngay xua. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co dai nha 大雅, tieu nha 小雅 y noi nhung khuc ay moi la khuc hat chinh dinh vay. \n\t2. Thuong. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi tu so nha ngon 子所雅言 cau duc thanh thuong noi. \n\t3. Ten sach, sach nhi nha 爾雅 thuong goi tat la nha. Cac sach huan ho doi sau bat chuoc nhu the van Nhi nha cung phan nhieu goi la nha. Nhu dat nha 逸雅, quang nha 廣雅, v.v. \n\t4. Nhan nha 嫻雅 dang dap diu dang. \n\t5. Nha, trai lai voi tieng tuc, co phep tac, co mau muc, khong theo loi tuc goi la nha . \n\t6. Von thuong. Nhu nhat nhat chi nha 一日之雅 von thuong co mot ngay cung than gan nhau, nha thien cam thi 雅善琴詩 von gioi dan va tho. \n\t7. Rat, lam, dung lam tro tu (trong co van co khi dung toi). \n\t8. Mot thu am nhac.
集=tap [ji2]\n\t1. Dau, dan chim dau o tren cay goi la tap, chim dang bay do xuong cung goi la tap. \n\t2. Hop. Nhu tap hoi 集會 hop hoi. \n\t3. Moi nguoi deu den. Nhu thieu truong ham tap 少長咸集 lon be deu hop du mat. \n\t4. Nen, xong. Su da lam nen goi la tap su 集事. \n\t5. Gop lai, gop cac so vun vat lai thanh mot so lon goi la tap. Nhu tap khoan 集款 khoan gop lai, tap co 集股 cac co phan gop lai, v.v. \n\t6. Cho trien, cho buon ban hop tap dong duc. \n\t7. Sach da lam tron bo goi la tap. Nhu thi tap 詩集 tho da don thanh bo, van tap 文集 van da don thanh bo. \n\t8. Deu. \n\t9. Tap de 集諦 chu nha Phat, mot de trong Tu de, nghia la gop cac nhan duyen phien nao lai thanh ra qua kho.
雇=co [gu4]\n\t1. Ten mot giong chim. Lai cung nghia voi chu co 僱.
雉=tri [zhi4]\n\t1. Con tri (con de) hay an hai thoc lua rau co. Vi mu La hau 呂后 nha Han 漢 ten la Tri 雉, nen nguoi ta kieng ma goi con tri la da ke 野雞. \n\t2. Mot cach do ve viec kien truc ngay xua, vuong mot truong goi la do 堵, ba do goi la tri. Vi the nen nhung buc tuong thap tren mat thanh goi la tri diep 雉堞.
雊=cau [gou4]\n\t1. Tieng con tri keu.
雋=tuyen, tuan [juan4|jun4]\n\t1. Thit beo map. Tuyen vinh 雋永 loi ban ngot ngao ma sau xa. \n\t2. Mot am la tuan. Cung nghia voi chu tuan 儁 hay 俊.
隽=tuyen, tuan [juan4|jun4]\n\t1. Thit beo map. Tuyen vinh 雋永 loi ban ngot ngao ma sau xa. \n\t2. Mot am la tuan. Cung nghia voi chu tuan 儁 hay 俊.
雌=thu [ci2]\n\t1. Con mai, loai co long canh thuoc ve tinh am (giong cai) goi la thu, con thu cai cung goi la thu. \n\t2. Yeu luot. Nhu thu thu 守雌 giu loi mem nhun.
雍=ung, ung [yong1]\n\t1. Hoa, nguyen la chu 雝. \n\t2. Mot am la ung. Ung chau 雍州 mot chau trong chin chau nuoc Tau ngay xua, tuc la vung Thiem Tay 陝西, Cam Tuc 甘肅, Thanh Hai 青海 bay gio (ta quen doc la ung ca).
雎=su, thu [ju1]\n\t1. Su cuu 雎鳩 con chim su cuu, tinh no du ton ma co phan biet, nen ho Thieu Hieu moi lay cac loai chim ma dat ten quan, quan Tu Ma chu ve viec che ra hinh phep, goi la su cuu thi 雎鳩氏. Giong chim su cuu, con mai con trong thuong di theo nhau ma khong co dua bon nhau, cho nen tho quan quan su cuu 關關雎鳩 vi nhu nguoi quan tu ket doi vo chong. Ta quen doc la chu thu. Nhu thu ngac 雎鶚 chim ung bien.
雒=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Song Lac. Chu y lac 伊雒 trong thien Vu Cong nguyen la chu lac 洛. Co nha noi vi nha Han 漢 vuong ve hoa duc, kieng nuoc thich lua, nen moi doi chu lac 洛 ra lac 雒 (xem lai chu 洛). \n\t2. Quan, cung nhu chu lac 絡 (chu Trang Tu).
雕=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Con dieu hau, co khi viet la 鵰. \n\t2. Cham khac ngoc, noi rong ra thi cac loi cham tro goi la dieu ca. Luan ngu 論語. Hu moc bat kha dieu da, phan tho chi tuong bat kha o da 朽木不可雕也，糞土之牆不可杇 也 (Cong Da Trang 公冶長) go muc khong the cham khac duoc, vach bang dat do khong the trat duoc.
雖=tuy [sui1]\n\t1. Dau, du. Dung lam loi suy xet tuong tuong. Nhu tuy nhien 雖然 dau the, song le, tuy nhien, v.v. \n\t2. Con tuy, mot giong thu nhu con lon, mui hech len, duoi dai re lam doi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu thoi 推 hay duy 惟.
虽=tuy [sui1]\n\t1. Dau, du. Dung lam loi suy xet tuong tuong. Nhu tuy nhien 雖然 dau the, song le, tuy nhien, v.v. \n\t2. Con tuy, mot giong thu nhu con lon, mui hech len, duoi dai re lam doi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu thoi 推 hay duy 惟.
雘=hoach [huo4]\n\t1. Mot thu da do nhu xich thach chi 赤石脂, dung de pha son cho do.
雙=song [shuang1]\n\t1. Doi, (so chan).
双=song [shuang1]\n\t1. Doi, (so chan).
雛=so [chu2]\n\t1. Non, chim non goi la so, ga con cung goi la so, tre con cung goi la so. \n\t2. Uyen so 鵷雛 mot loai chim nhu chim phuong.
雏=so [chu2]\n\t1. Non, chim non goi la so, ga con cung goi la so, tre con cung goi la so. \n\t2. Uyen so 鵷雛 mot loai chim nhu chim phuong.
雜=tap [za2]\n\t1. Lan lon. Cac loai khac nhau hop lan o mot noi goi la tap. Nhu cho nguoi trong nuoc va nguoi nuoc ngoai o lan voi nhau goi la tap cu dia 雜居地. \n\t2. Tap nhap. Khong the dung phan biet han ra mot loai goi la tap. Nhu trong cac mon hoc co mon hoc ca cac mon tap nham goi la tap gia 雜家. Trong cac do hang co do lat vat goi la tap hoa 雜貨, v.v. \n\t3. Tru hang chinh ngach ra, ngoai ra deu goi la tap ca. Nhu trong quan lai, cac chuc ta chuc pho deu goi la tap chuc 雜職. Trong cac giong thoc lua tru lua te lua nep ra, ngoai ra deu goi la tap luong 雜糧, v.v.
杂=tap [za2]\n\t1. Lan lon. Cac loai khac nhau hop lan o mot noi goi la tap. Nhu cho nguoi trong nuoc va nguoi nuoc ngoai o lan voi nhau goi la tap cu dia 雜居地. \n\t2. Tap nhap. Khong the dung phan biet han ra mot loai goi la tap. Nhu trong cac mon hoc co mon hoc ca cac mon tap nham goi la tap gia 雜家. Trong cac do hang co do lat vat goi la tap hoa 雜貨, v.v. \n\t3. Tru hang chinh ngach ra, ngoai ra deu goi la tap ca. Nhu trong quan lai, cac chuc ta chuc pho deu goi la tap chuc 雜職. Trong cac giong thoc lua tru lua te lua nep ra, ngoai ra deu goi la tap luong 雜糧, v.v.
雝=ung [yong1]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu ung 雍.
雞=ke [ji1]\n\t1. Con ga. \n\t2. Dam hiep dan ong goi la ke gian 雞姦. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tham do mat toan thang phu quan, Ung thi than ke de nhat nhan 深圖密算勝夫君，應是晨雞第一人 (Vuong Thi tuong 王氏像) muu tinh tham hiem hon chong, dung la ga mai gay sang bac nhat.
鸡=ke [ji1]\n\t1. Con ga. \n\t2. Dam hiep dan ong goi la ke gian 雞姦. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tham do mat toan thang phu quan, Ung thi than ke de nhat nhan 深圖密算勝夫君，應是晨雞第一人 (Vuong Thi tuong 王氏像) muu tinh tham hiem hon chong, dung la ga mai gay sang bac nhat.
雟=hue, tuy [xi1]\n\t1. Khuon tron. \n\t2. Mot am la tuy. Viet Tuy 越雟 ten mot quan nha Han.
離=ly [li2]\n\t1. Lia tan. Lia nhau o gan goi la ly 離, xa goi la biet 別. \n\t2. Dinh bam. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi bat ly vu ly 不離于裏 chang dinh bam voi lan trong. \n\t2. Ly ly 離離 tua tua. \n\t3. Chim vang anh. \n\t4. Chia re. \n\t5. Hai nguoi song deu nhau. \n\t6. Bay, xep. \n\t7. Gap, bi. \n\t8. Sang, mat troi. \n\t9. Que ly, trong bon phuong thuoc ve phuong nam.
离=ly [li2]\n\t1. Lia tan. Lia nhau o gan goi la ly 離, xa goi la biet 別. \n\t2. Dinh bam. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi bat ly vu ly 不離于裏 chang dinh bam voi lan trong. \n\t2. Ly ly 離離 tua tua. \n\t3. Chim vang anh. \n\t4. Chia re. \n\t5. Hai nguoi song deu nhau. \n\t6. Bay, xep. \n\t7. Gap, bi. \n\t8. Sang, mat troi. \n\t9. Que ly, trong bon phuong thuoc ve phuong nam.
難=nan, nan [nan2|nan4]\n\t1. Kho. Trai lai voi tieng de. \n\t2. Mot am la nan. Tai nan. Su lo so nguy hiem goi la nan. Nhu lac nan 落難 mac phai tai nan, ti nan 避難 lanh nan, v.v. \n\t3. Can van. Nhu van nan 問難 hoi van le kho khan, vach to su ly gi khong dung khien cho ke hoi duoc ro rang goi la phat nan 發難.
难=nan, nan [nan2|nan4]\n\t1. Kho. Trai lai voi tieng de. \n\t2. Mot am la nan. Tai nan. Su lo so nguy hiem goi la nan. Nhu lac nan 落難 mac phai tai nan, ti nan 避難 lanh nan, v.v. \n\t3. Can van. Nhu van nan 問難 hoi van le kho khan, vach to su ly gi khong dung khien cho ke hoi duoc ro rang goi la phat nan 發難.
雨=vu, vu [yu3|yu4]\n\t1. Mua. \n\t2. Mot am la vu. Do mua xuong. Nhu vu bac 雨雹 do mua da, vu tuyet 雨雪 mua tuyet, v.v.
雩=vu [yu2]\n\t1. Te dao vu, te cau mua.
雪=tuyet [xue3]\n\t1. Tuyet. Mua gap luc ret qua roi lai tung mang goi la tuyet. Khi tuyet sa xuong no toa ra nhu bong hoa, cho nen goi la tuyet hoa 雪花. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nhat thien phong tuyet do Hoang Ha 一天風雪渡黃河 mot troi gio tuyet, qua song Hoang Ha. \n\t2. Rua. Nhu tuyet si 雪恥 rua ho, rua nhuc. Vach to noi oan ra goi la chieu tuyet 昭雪. \n\t3. Lau.
雯=van [wen2]\n\t1. Dam may co hinh hoa van.
雰=phan [fen1]\n\t1. Khi suong mu. \n\t2. Phan phan 雰雰 suong tuyet sa la ta. 
雲=van [yun2]\n\t1. May. Hoi nuoc duoi dat boc len tren cao, gap khi lanh rot thanh tung dam, hat nuoc nho nho, noi quanh trong khong goi la van 雲. Sa mu o gan mat dat thi goi la vu 霧. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Vu tu bang da van tu si 雨自滂沱雲自癡 mua roi tam ta, may than tho.
云=van [yun2]\n\t1. May. Hoi nuoc duoi dat boc len tren cao, gap khi lanh rot thanh tung dam, hat nuoc nho nho, noi quanh trong khong goi la van 雲. Sa mu o gan mat dat thi goi la vu 霧. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Vu tu bang da van tu si 雨自滂沱雲自癡 mua roi tam ta, may than tho.
零=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Mua lac dac, mua ray. \n\t2. Roi xuong. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi linh vu ki linh 靈雨既零 mua lanh da xuong, tran mua ung diem lanh do xuong. \n\t3. Le. Chua du so da dinh goi la linh, thi du nhu tinh so tram ma chua du tram thi so ay goi la so linh. Cai ngoi khong cua so dem cung goi la linh. Nhu nhat linh nhi 一零二 mot tram le hai, nghia la khong du so muoi.
雷=loi [lei2]\n\t1. Sam. Nhu loi dien 雷電 sam set. \n\t2. Dung thuoc no nhoi vao trong cai ong sat to dung de pha thanh pha luy hay pha tau chien goi la loi. Chon o duoi dat goi la dia loi 地雷, tha o mat nuoc goi la thuy loi 水雷. \n\t3. Ho Loi.
雹=bac [bao2]\n\t1. Mua da.
電=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Chop, dien. La mot cai suc cam ung cua muon vat deu co. Cai suc cam ung do no san co hai tinh doi dai nhau, khac tinh thi hut lay nhau, cung tinh thi lai cu nhau, cho nen moi chia ra am dien 陰電 va duong dien 陽電 hay goi la chinh dien 正電 va phu dien 負電. Dang luc vat the no yen lang, thi khong thay suc dien o dau, den luc no quen no sat vao vat khac, mat cai tinh trung hoa di, bay gio no tat loi thu dien khac tinh no de sang deu voi no. Cai suc loi keo cua no rat manh va rat nhanh, toe ra nhung anh sang rat manh rat sang. Nhu chop va set ta thuong trong thay, ay la thu dien thien nhien. Bay gio nguoi ta loi dung no de chay may thay suc nguoi goi la dien nhan tao. Cach lam ra dien co hai cach. dung banh xe may sat nhau ma sinh ra dien. Nhu xe dien, den dien thuong dung do, dung vat chat hoa hop ma sinh ra dien. Nhu dien danh day thep va dien ma thuong dung do. \n\t2. Soi to. Nhu dem trinh cho nguoi xet goi la trinh dien 呈電. \n\t3. Nhanh chong. Nhu phong tri dien xe 風馳電掣 nhanh nhu gio thoi chop loe. \n\t4. Dien bao, thuong goi tat la dien.
电=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Chop, dien. La mot cai suc cam ung cua muon vat deu co. Cai suc cam ung do no san co hai tinh doi dai nhau, khac tinh thi hut lay nhau, cung tinh thi lai cu nhau, cho nen moi chia ra am dien 陰電 va duong dien 陽電 hay goi la chinh dien 正電 va phu dien 負電. Dang luc vat the no yen lang, thi khong thay suc dien o dau, den luc no quen no sat vao vat khac, mat cai tinh trung hoa di, bay gio no tat loi thu dien khac tinh no de sang deu voi no. Cai suc loi keo cua no rat manh va rat nhanh, toe ra nhung anh sang rat manh rat sang. Nhu chop va set ta thuong trong thay, ay la thu dien thien nhien. Bay gio nguoi ta loi dung no de chay may thay suc nguoi goi la dien nhan tao. Cach lam ra dien co hai cach. dung banh xe may sat nhau ma sinh ra dien. Nhu xe dien, den dien thuong dung do, dung vat chat hoa hop ma sinh ra dien. Nhu dien danh day thep va dien ma thuong dung do. \n\t2. Soi to. Nhu dem trinh cho nguoi xet goi la trinh dien 呈電. \n\t3. Nhanh chong. Nhu phong tri dien xe 風馳電掣 nhanh nhu gio thoi chop loe. \n\t4. Dien bao, thuong goi tat la dien.
需=nhu [xu1]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu tuong nhu 相需 cung doi. \n\t2. Dung. Nhu quan nhu 軍需 do dung trong quan. \n\t3. Lan lua. Nhu sach Ta truyen 左傳 noi nhu su chi tac gia 需事之賊也 lan lua la cai hai cho cong viec vay.
霂=moc [mu4]\n\t1. Mua phun.
霄=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Khoang troi khong. Nhu Cao nhap van tieu 高入雲霄 cao den tan troi. \n\t2. Khi ben mat troi. \n\t3. Cung nghia voi chu tieu 消. \n\t4. Dem. Nhu chu tieu 宵.
霆=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Tieng set du. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi nhu dinh nhu loi 如霆如雷 nhu set nhu sam.
震=chan [zhen4]\n\t1. Set danh. \n\t2. Rung dong. Nhu dia chan 地震 dong dat, nguyen nhan vi nui lua phun lua manh qua, vi vung dat no thut hay vi vo qua dat no rut lai. \n\t3. So hai. Nhu chan kinh 震驚 so khiep. \n\t4. Que Chan, trong bon phuong thuoc ve phuong dong.
霈=bai [pei4]\n\t1. Bang bai 霶霈 mua rao. Mua phai thoi goi lam cam bai 甘霈. \n\t2. An trach.
霉=moi [mei2]\n\t1. Meo moc. Nhu phat moi 發霉 len moc.
霍=hoac [huo4]\n\t1. Tan mau. Van tuyen 文選. Nien nhien han xuat, hoac nhien benh di 涊然汗出，霍然病已 nhom nhop ra mo hoi, benh khoi bang ngay. Nay ta goi nhung su tieu phi tien cua la huy hoac 揮霍 cung la do nghia ay. \n\t2. Hoac hoac 霍霍 soen soet, ta cai tieng no di nhanh chong. Nhu ma dao hoac hoac 磨刀霍霍 mai dao soen soet. \n\t3. Phuong nam goi la hoac. Ngay xua goi nui Nam Nhac Hanh Son 南嶽衡山 la Hoac son 霍山. Nui lon bao quanh nui nho cung goi la hoac.
霎=siep, sap [sha4]\n\t1. Nhat siep thoi 一霎時 cai thoi gian rat ngan, mot loang. \n\t2. Mua nho. Cung doc la sap.
霏=phi [fei1]\n\t1. La ta. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi vu tuyet ki phi 雨雪其霏 mua tuyet la ta. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ngo thanh bac mo thuong phi phi 梧城簿暮尙霏霏 (den) thanh Ngo, troi sap toi, van mua lat phat.
