霑=triem [zhan1]\n\t1. Tham, ngam. Cung nhu chu triem 沾. Ly Bach 李白. Bi quan lao biet le triem can 悲君老別淚沾巾 thuong anh tuoi gia (con phai) li biet, le tham uot khan.
霓=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Cai cau vong.
霖=lam [lin2]\n\t1. Mua dam.
霙=anh [ying1]\n\t1. Mua lan ca tuyet. \n\t2. Bong tuyet 雪花 cung goi la anh.
霛=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu linh 靈.
霜=suong [shuang1]\n\t1. Suong (vi hoi nuoc boc len gap lanh dot lai tung hat nho thanh thot roi xuong goi la suong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thu man phong lam suong diep hong 秋滿楓林霜葉紅 (Tu Chau dao trung 徐州道中) thu ngap rung phong, suong nhuom do la. \n\t2. Hang nam, nam. Ly Bach 李白. Bach cot hoanh thien suong 白骨橫千霜 xuong trang vat ngang ngan nam. \n\t3. Thuoc nghien thay nho trang ra goi la suong.
霞=ha [xia2]\n\t1. Rang, trong khoang troi khong tham thap co khi mu, lai co bong mat troi xien ngang thanh cac mau ruc ro, thuong thay o luc mat troi moi moc hay moi lan goi la rang. Vuong Bot 王勃. Lac ha du co vu te phi, thu thuy cong truong thien nhat sac 落霞與孤鶩齊飛，秋水共長天一色 rang chieu voi canh vit troi don chiec cung bay, nuoc thu tron lan bau troi dai mot sac.
霡=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Mach moc 霡霂 mua ray, mua nho.
霢=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu mach 霡.
霤=luu [liu4]\n\t1. Nuoc giot ranh, nuoc nho giot tu mai nha. \n\t2. Trung Luu 中霤 ten than, mot vi than trong nam vi than ngay xua tho.
霧=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Suong mu, nguyen nhan cung nhu may, xa dat la van 雲 may, gan dat la vu 霧 mu.
雾=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Suong mu, nguyen nhan cung nhu may, xa dat la van 雲 may, gan dat la vu 霧 mu.
霰=tan [xian4]\n\t1. Hat tuyet, luc giot mua dang roi xuong, gap khong khi lanh xuong duoi do bang, dong thanh tung vien toa xuong goi la tan.
霱=duat [yu4]\n\t1. Dam may ba sac, may lanh.
露=lo [lou4|lu4]\n\t1. Moc, hoi nuoc gan mat dat, dem bam vao cay co, gap khi lanh dot lai tung giot goi la lo. \n\t2. Lo ra ngoai. Nhu hien lo 顯露 lo ro, thau lo 透露 to lo, v.v. \n\t3. O ngoai dong. Nhu lo tuc 露宿 ngu ngoai dong. \n\t4. Gay. \n\t5. Ho Lo.
霸=phach, ba [ba4]\n\t1. Cho cham den trong mat trang, bay gio dung chu phach 魄. \n\t2. Mot am la ba. Lam trum truong ca cac nuoc chu hau goi la ba. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Luu thuy phu van that ba do 流水浮雲失霸圖 (So vong 楚望) nuoc troi may noi, sach het muu do lam ba lam vua. \n\t3. Tuc goi cac ke cuong hao la ba. Nhu ba chiem 霸佔 an hiep, lay hiep, an hiep nguoi chiem rieng lam phan minh. Ke cuong hao an hiep dan goi la ac ba 惡霸.
霹=phich, tich [pi1]\n\t1. Set danh thinh linh goi la phich lich 霹靂. Ta quen doc la chu tich.
霽=te [ji4]\n\t1. Mua tanh. \n\t2. Tan het con gian goi la te uy 霽威.
霁=te [ji4]\n\t1. Mua tanh. \n\t2. Tan het con gian goi la te uy 霽威.
霾=mai [mai2]\n\t1. Gio thoi bui mu, bui mu.
靁=loi [lei2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu loi 雷.
靂=lich [li4]\n\t1. Set danh thinh linh goi la phich lich 霹靂.
雳=lich [li4]\n\t1. Set danh thinh linh goi la phich lich 霹靂.
靄=ai [ai3]\n\t1. Khi may. Nhu yen ai 煙靄 khi may mu nhu khoi. \n\t2. Ngun ngut.
霭=ai [ai3]\n\t1. Khi may. Nhu yen ai 煙靄 khi may mu nhu khoi. \n\t2. Ngun ngut.
靆=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Ai dai 靉靆 may keo den kit, mu mit.
靈=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Than linh. Khi tinh anh cua khi duong goi la than 神, khi tinh anh cua khi am goi la linh 靈, y noi vat gi duoc khi tinh anh duc lai hon ca trong cac vat cung loai voi no vay. Nhu nguoi la giong linh hon ca muon vat, con ky lan, con phuong hoang, con rua, con rong goi la tu linh 四靈 bon giong linh trong loai vat. \n\t2. Than. Nhu bach than 百神 goi la bach linh 百靈, than nui goi la son linh 山靈, v.v. \n\t3. Nguoi chet goi la linh, y noi hinh chat tuy nat, tinh than thuong con vay. Dat bai vi tho ke chet goi la thiet linh 設靈. \n\t4. Uy phuc khong hien ro goi la linh. Nhu thanh linh 聲靈 cam den la ta thay thau ngay, hinh nhu co cai gi soi xet benh vuc cho khong can phai dung den thuc luc vay. \n\t5. Ung nghiem. Nhu boi toan thuoc thang ma thay hieu nghiem ngay deu goi la linh. \n\t6. Linh hoat, lanh le, khong ngu ngoc xuan tre.
灵=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Than linh. Khi tinh anh cua khi duong goi la than 神, khi tinh anh cua khi am goi la linh 靈, y noi vat gi duoc khi tinh anh duc lai hon ca trong cac vat cung loai voi no vay. Nhu nguoi la giong linh hon ca muon vat, con ky lan, con phuong hoang, con rua, con rong goi la tu linh 四靈 bon giong linh trong loai vat. \n\t2. Than. Nhu bach than 百神 goi la bach linh 百靈, than nui goi la son linh 山靈, v.v. \n\t3. Nguoi chet goi la linh, y noi hinh chat tuy nat, tinh than thuong con vay. Dat bai vi tho ke chet goi la thiet linh 設靈. \n\t4. Uy phuc khong hien ro goi la linh. Nhu thanh linh 聲靈 cam den la ta thay thau ngay, hinh nhu co cai gi soi xet benh vuc cho khong can phai dung den thuc luc vay. \n\t5. Ung nghiem. Nhu boi toan thuoc thang ma thay hieu nghiem ngay deu goi la linh. \n\t6. Linh hoat, lanh le, khong ngu ngoc xuan tre.
靉=ai [ai4]\n\t1. Ai dai 靉靆 may keo den kit, mu mit. \n\t2. Ten rieng cai kinh deo.
青=thanh [qing1]\n\t1. Mau xanh, mot trong nam mau, hoa voi mau do thi thanh ra mau tia, hoa voi mau vang thi hoa mau luc. \n\t2. Nguoi doi xua cho xanh la cai sac phuong dong, thai tu o cung phia dong, nen cung goi thai tu la thanh cung 青宮. \n\t3. Nguoi xua lay cai the bang tre de viet chu goi la sat thanh 殺青, co khi dung lua ho qua, cho tre no tham het nuoc, de khac cho de goi la han thanh 汗青. Xanh la cai mau cat tre, cac quan thai su ngay xua dung cat tre de ghi chep cac viec, cho nen su sach goi la thanh su 青史 su xanh. \n\t4. Thanh nien 青年 tuoi tre, cung goi la thanh xuan 青春. \n\t5. Thanh nhan 青眼 coi trong, Nguyen Tich 阮籍 nha Tan 晉 tiep nguoi nao coi la trong thi con mat xanh, nguoi nao coi khinh thi con mat trang, vi the nen trong loi to boi hay dung chu thuy thanh 垂青 hay thanh lam 青覽 deu la noi cai y ay ca, cung nhu ta noi, xin de mat xanh ma soi xet cho vay. \n\t6. Chau Thanh, thuoc vung Son Dong Giac dong dao va Phung Thien, Lieu Duong bay gio.
靖=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Yen. Nhu an tinh 安靖 yen lang, binh tinh 平靖, v.v. \n\t2. Muu. \n\t3. Tri. \n\t4. Nghi. \n\t5. Cung nghia voi chu tinh 靜.
靚=tinh [jing4|liang4]\n\t1. Son phan trang suc.
靓=tinh [jing4|liang4]\n\t1. Son phan trang suc.
靛=dien [dian4]\n\t1. Thuoc nhuom xanh, nguyen lieu lay o nuoc la cham, hoa voi nuoc va voi, lay nhung can no lang o duoi, thanh ra pham xanh, con phan noi o tren goi la dien hoa 靛花, dung lam thuoc goi la thanh dai 青黛, dung de ve goi la hoa thanh 花青 ("thanh dai ta goi la bot cham).
靜=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Tinh 靜, trai lai voi dong 動. Pham vat gi khong hien han cai cong tac dung cua no ra deu goi la tinh. Nha Phat co mon tham thien, cu ngoi yen lang, thu nhiep ca tinh than lai khong tu lu gi de xet to chan ly goi la tinh. Tong nho cung co mot phai dung phep tu nay goi la phep chu tinh 主靜. \n\t2. Yen tinh, khong co tieng dong. \n\t3. Yen on, khong co giac gia khuay roi. \n\t4. Muu. \n\t5. Trinh tinh. \n\t6. Thanh sach. \n\t7. Noi suc ra, noi van suc. 
静=tinh [jing4]\n\t1. Tinh 靜, trai lai voi dong 動. Pham vat gi khong hien han cai cong tac dung cua no ra deu goi la tinh. Nha Phat co mon tham thien, cu ngoi yen lang, thu nhiep ca tinh than lai khong tu lu gi de xet to chan ly goi la tinh. Tong nho cung co mot phai dung phep tu nay goi la phep chu tinh 主靜. \n\t2. 靝=thien [tian1]\n\t1. Troi. Nha tu dao si dung nhu chu thien 天.
非=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Trai, khong phai, su vat gi co nghia nhat dinh, neu khong dung het deu goi la phi. \n\t2. Lam loi. Nhu van qua suc phi 文過飾非. Co loi ranh ranh lai con kiem ly boi   xoa che lap. 3 . Che, huy bang. Nhu phi thanh vu phap 非聖誣法 che thanh, vu miet   chanh phap. \n\t4. Chang phai, dung lam tieng lap lai. Nhu thanh phi bat cao da 城非不高也 thanh chang phai la chang cao. \n\t5. Chau Phi 非洲, mot tieng goi tat chau A-phi-loi-gia 阿非利加 Africa. \n\t6. Khong, cung nghia voi vo 無.
靠=khao, khoc [kao4]\n\t1. Nuong tua. Nuong tua vat khac cho vung goi la khao, nuong tua nguoi khac goi la y khao 依靠. Ta quen doc la chu khoc. \n\t2. Sat lai, nhich gan. Nhu thuyen khao ngan 船靠岸 thuyen cap ben.
靡=mi, mi [mi2|mi3]\n\t1. Luot theo. Nhan the no di ma luot theo. Nhu tung phong nhi mi 從風而靡 theo gio ma luot, phong mi nhat thoi 風靡一時 nhu gio tran luot ca mot thoi (noi nghia bong la phong trao no di, thay deu luot theo). \n\t2. Xa xi. Nhu xa mi 奢靡 , phu mi 浮靡, v.v. 3. Khong. Nhu Thi Kinh 詩經 noi mi that mi gia 靡室靡家 khong cua khong nha. \n\t4. Tot dep. \n\t5. Mi mi 靡靡 di lung thung. Phong tuc bai hoai cung goi la mi mi. \n\t6. Mot am la mi. Chia. \n\t7. Diet, tan nat. \n\t8. Ton hai.
面=dien [mian4]\n\t1. Mat, la cai bo phan gom ca tai, mat, mieng, mui. \n\t2. Ngoai mat. Nhu chanh dien 正面 mat giua, trac dien 側面 mat ben. \n\t3. Be mat, chi tinh dai rong lon be, khong ke den day mong goi la be mat. \n\t4. Ngoanh ve. Nhu nam dien 南面 ngoanh ve huong nam. Tuc viet la 靣.
靣=dien [mian4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dien 面.
靦=dien [mian3]\n\t1. Ben len, ta cai dang mat then thung. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi huu dien dien muc 有靦面目 co ve then thung.

革=cach, cuc [ge2|ji2]\n\t1. Da, da giong thu thuoc bo sach long di goi la cach. \n\t2. Doi, doi chinh the khac goi la cach menh 革命. \n\t3. Cach bo di. Nhu cach chuc 革職 cach mat chuc vi dang lam. \n\t4. Tieng cach, mot tieng trong bat am. Nhu tieng trong tieng boc goi la tieng cach. \n\t5. Long canh loai chim. \n\t6. Ao day mu tru. \n\t7. 靮=dich [di2]\n\t1. Day cuong ngua.
靳=can [jin4]\n\t1. Ngay xua dong xe bon ngua, hai con o trong goi la phuc ma 服馬 hay goi la can 靳, hai con o ngoai goi la tham ma 驂馬. Ngua tham phai theo ngua phuc ma di, cho nen cung theo duoi nhau khong roi goi la tham can 驂靳. \n\t2. Keo lan, tru tru khong dam cho ngay goi la can. \n\t3. Treu, quay, dua lam cho xau ho. \n\t4. 韆=thien [qian1]\n\t1. Thu thien 鞦韆 cay du, la mot tro choi danh du cua Han Vu De 漢武帝. Nguyen ten goi la thien thu 千秋 la loi chuc tho cua vua, va noi treo di moi goi la 秋千. Doi sau lai goi lam la 鞦韆.

韓=han [han2]\n\t1. Ten nuoc ngay xua. La mot nuoc nha Chu 周 phong cho nguoi cung ho, sau bi nuoc Tan 晉 lay mat, nay thuoc vao vung tinh Thiem Tay 陝西. \n\t2. Doi Chien quoc 戰國 (475-221 truoc Tay lich) co quan dai phu nuoc Tan 晉 la ho Han 韓, cung voi ho Trieu 趙 ho Nguy 魏 chia nhau lay nuoc Tan 晉 goi la nuoc Han 韓 thuoc vung Son Tay 山西 bay gio, sau bi nha Tan 秦 lay mat. \n\t3. Dai dat phia nam nuoc Trieu Tien 朝鮮, ngay xua goi la Tam Han 三韓, den doi vua Ly Hy gan day doi ten nuoc la nuoc Han 韓, vi the moi goi nguoi Trieu Tien la nguoi Han 韓.
韩=han [han2]\n\t1. Ten nuoc ngay xua. La mot nuoc nha Chu 周 phong cho nguoi cung ho, sau bi nuoc Tan 晉 lay mat, nay thuoc vao vung tinh Thiem Tay 陝西. \n\t2. 韪=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Phai. Su gi trai voi le nghia goi la bat vi 不韙.
韛=bi [bei4]\n\t1. Cai tui da de thoi lua. \n\t2. Ong be.
韜=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Cai tui dung guom, dung cung. \n\t2. Giau kin, pham su gi giau kin khong lo ra deu goi la thao. Nhu thao hoi 韜晦 co tai co tri ma giu kin dao khong cho nguoi ta biet minh. \n\t3. Phep binh, phep binh cua ong Thai Cong 太公 goi la luc thao 六韜. Nguoi co tai thao vat gioi goi la thao luoc 韜畧, co tai lam tuong dung binh gioi cung goi la thao luoc. Cung co khi viet thao 弢.
韬=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Cai tui dung guom, dung cung. \n\t2. Giau kin, pham su gi giau kin khong lo ra deu goi la thao. Nhu thao hoi 韜晦 co tai co tri ma giu kin dao khong cho nguoi ta biet minh. \n\t3. Phep binh, phep binh cua ong Thai Cong 太公 goi la luc thao 六韜. Nguoi co tai thao vat gioi goi la thao luoc 韜畧, co tai lam tuong dung binh gioi cung goi la thao luoc. Cung co khi viet thao 弢.
韝=cau [gou1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu cau 鞲.
韞=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Giau. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 (Thai Ba 泰伯) noi uan doc nhi tang chu 韞匱而藏諸 giau vao hom ma cat di chang.
韫=uan [yun4]\n\t1. Giau. Nhu Luan ngu 論語 (Thai Ba 泰伯) noi uan doc nhi tang chu 韞匱而藏諸 giau vao hom ma cat di chang.
韠=tat [bi4]\n\t1. Cai bit dau goi, co khi viet la tat 鞸.
韡=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Vi vi 韡韡 hoa no ro ro, ta cai dang hoa no nhieu.
韤=vat [wa4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu vat 襪.
韭=cuu [jiu3]\n\t1. Rau he, la mot thu rau thom ma cay, la nho ma dep.
音=am [yin1]\n\t1. Tieng, tieng phat lo ra co dieu trong duc cao thap goi la am. Tieng phat ra thanh van cung goi la am.
韵=van [yun4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu van 韻.
韶=thieu [shao2]\n\t1. Ten mot khuc nhac cua vua Thuan nha Ngu 虞舜. \n\t2. Tot dep. Nhu thieu hoa 韶華, thieu quang 韶光 deu nghia la quang canh tot dep ca. Canh sac mua xuan, bong mat troi mua xuan cung goi la thieu quang.
韻=van [yun4]\n\t1. Van, tieng gi doc len ma co van voi tieng khac deu goi la van. Nhu cong 公 voi khong 空 la co van voi nhau, cuong 鋼 voi khang 康 la co van voi nhau. Dem cac chu no co van voi nhau chia ra tung muc goi la van thu 韻書 sach van. Cuoi cau tho hay cau ca thuong dung nhung chu cung van voi nhau, luat lam tho thi cach mot cau moi dung mot van, cho nen hai cau tho goi la nhat van 一韻 mot van. Loi tho co co khi moi cau mot van, co khi chi dat luon hai ba van roi doi sang van khac goi la chuyen van 轉韻 chuyen van khac. \n\t2. Phong nha. Nguoi co cot cach phong nha goi la van nhan 韻人. Su gi do phuc lanh moi duoc goi la van su 韻事.
韵=van [yun4]\n\t1. Van, tieng gi doc len ma co van voi tieng khac deu goi la van. Nhu cong 公 voi khong 空 la co van voi nhau, cuong 鋼 voi khang 康 la co van voi nhau. Dem cac chu no co van voi nhau chia ra tung muc goi la van thu 韻書 sach van. Cuoi cau tho hay cau ca thuong dung nhung chu cung van voi nhau, luat lam tho thi cach mot cau moi dung mot van, cho nen hai cau tho goi la nhat van 一韻 mot van. Loi tho co co khi moi cau mot van, co khi chi dat luon hai ba van roi doi sang van khac goi la chuyen van 轉韻 chuyen van khac. \n\t2. Phong nha. Nguoi co cot cach phong nha goi la van nhan 韻人. Su gi do phuc lanh moi duoc goi la van su 韻事.
響=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tieng. \n\t2. Vang. Tieng dong gio vang ung lai goi la huong. Co hinh thi co anh 影 bong, co tieng thi co vang, cho nen su gi cam ung ro ret goi la anh huong 影響.
响=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tieng. \n\t2. Vang. Tieng dong gio vang ung lai goi la huong. Co hinh thi co anh 影 bong, co tieng thi co vang, cho nen su gi cam ung ro ret goi la anh huong 影響.
頁=hiet [ye4]\n\t1. Dau. \n\t2. Mot to giay goi la nhat hiet 一頁.
页=hiet [ye4]\n\t1. Dau. \n\t2. Mot to giay goi la nhat hiet 一頁.
頂=dinh [ding3]\n\t1. Dinh dau. Pham cho nao rat cao deu goi la dinh. Nhu son dinh 山頂 dinh nui, oc dinh 屋頂 noc nha, v.v. \n\t2. Binh pham su vat gi ma cho la hon het cung goi la dinh. Nhu dinh thuong 頂上 nhat hang, tot buc. \n\t3. Doi nha Thanh 清, cai ngu mu dinh o tren chop mu, cho nen goi cai mu la dinh dai 頂戴. \n\t4. Doi. Nhu dinh thien lap dia 頂天立地 doi troi dap dat. \n\t5. Xong len. Nhu cheo thuyen nguoc gio goi la dinh phong 頂風. \n\t6. Dam thoc, kheu choc. Dung loi noi ma cham choc goi la xuat ngon dinh chang 出言頂撞. \n\t7. The thay. Nhu mao danh dinh the 冒名頂替 mao ten the thay.
顶=dinh [ding3]\n\t1. Dinh dau. Pham cho nao rat cao deu goi la dinh. Nhu son dinh 山頂 dinh nui, oc dinh 屋頂 noc nha, v.v. \n\t2. Binh pham su vat gi ma cho la hon het cung goi la dinh. Nhu dinh thuong 頂上 nhat hang, tot buc. \n\t3. Doi nha Thanh 清, cai ngu mu dinh o tren chop mu, cho nen goi cai mu la dinh dai 頂戴. \n\t4. Doi. Nhu dinh thien lap dia 頂天立地 doi troi dap dat. \n\t5. Xong len. Nhu cheo thuyen nguoc gio goi la dinh phong 頂風. \n\t6. Dam thoc, kheu choc. Dung loi noi ma cham choc goi la xuat ngon dinh chang 出言頂撞. \n\t7. The thay. Nhu mao danh dinh the 冒名頂替 mao ten the thay.
頃=khoanh, khuynh, khue [qing3]\n\t1. Thua ruong tram mau. \n\t2. Vut choc. Nhu nga khoanh 俄頃 vut choc, khoanh khac 頃刻 giay lat, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la khuynh. Nghieng lech, cung nghia voi chu khuynh 傾. \n\t4. Lai mot am la khue. Nua buoc.
顷=khoanh, khuynh, khue [qing3]\n\t1. Thua ruong tram mau. \n\t2. Vut choc. Nhu nga khoanh 俄頃 vut choc, khoanh khac 頃刻 giay lat, v.v. \n\t3. Mot am la khuynh. Nghieng lech, cung nghia voi chu khuynh 傾. \n\t4. Lai mot am la khue. Nua buoc.
項=hang [xiang4]\n\t1. Co sau. Khong chiu cui dau nhun long theo voi nguoi khac goi la cuong hang 強項 cung co. \n\t2. Hang, thu. Nhu ta noi hang tot, hang xau, hang nhat, hang nhi, v.v. \n\t3. To, lon.
项=hang [xiang4]\n\t1. Co sau. Khong chiu cui dau nhun long theo voi nguoi khac goi la cuong hang 強項 cung co. \n\t2. Hang, thu. Nhu ta noi hang tot, hang xau, hang nhat, hang nhi, v.v. \n\t3. To, lon.
順=thuan [shun4]\n\t1. Theo. Be nghe lon chi bao khong dam trai mot ti gi goi la thuan. \n\t2. Thuan, noi theo le phai goi la thuan. Nhu vua nghia toi trung, cha lanh con hieu, anh yeu em kinh goi la luc thuan 六順. \n\t3. Yen vui. Nhu sach Trung Dung 中庸 noi phu mau ki thuan hi ho 父母其順矣呼 cha me duoc yen vui lam thay. \n\t4. Hang phuc. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi tu quoc thuan chi 四國順之 cac nuoc bon phuong deu hang phuc ca. \n\t5. Doi, pham su gi duoc thong dong tien loi deu goi la thuan. Nhu thuan loi 順利, thuan tien 順便, v.v.
顺=thuan [shun4]\n\t1. Theo. Be nghe lon chi bao khong dam trai mot ti gi goi la thuan. \n\t2. Thuan, noi theo le phai goi la thuan. Nhu vua nghia toi trung, cha lanh con hieu, anh yeu em kinh goi la luc thuan 六順. \n\t3. Yen vui. Nhu sach Trung Dung 中庸 noi phu mau ki thuan hi ho 父母其順矣呼 cha me duoc yen vui lam thay. \n\t4. Hang phuc. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi tu quoc thuan chi 四國順之 cac nuoc bon phuong deu hang phuc ca. \n\t5. Doi, pham su gi duoc thong dong tien loi deu goi la thuan. Nhu thuan loi 順利, thuan tien 順便, v.v.
頇=han [han1]\n\t1. Man han 顢頇 map mo, lam lan. Khong bien ro su ly ma xep dat lam lan goi la man han.
顸=han [han1]\n\t1. Man han 顢頇 map mo, lam lan. Khong bien ro su ly ma xep dat lam lan goi la man han.
須=tu [xu1]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu tuong tu tham an 相須甚殷 cung doi rat gap. \n\t2. Nen. Pham cai gi nho do de ma lam khong the thieu duoc deu goi la tu. Vi the nen su gi can phai co ngay goi la thiet tu 切須, cap tu 急須 kip nen, v.v. Su gi khong phai can den goi la vo tu 無須 khong can. Dung nhu chu nhu 需. \n\t3. Tu tu 斯須, tu du 須臾 deu nghia la vut choc, la choc lat. Nhu kinh Le ky 禮記 noi le nhac bat kha tu tu khu than 禮樂不可斯須去身 minh khong the roi le nhac duoc choc lat. Sach Trung Dung 中庸 noi dao da gia bat kha tu du ly gia 道也者不可須臾離也 dao ay la cai khong the roi ra duoc phut choc vay. \n\t4. Cham tre.
须=tu [xu1]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu tuong tu tham an 相須甚殷 cung doi rat gap. \n\t2. Nen. Pham cai gi nho do de ma lam khong the thieu duoc deu goi la tu. Vi the nen su gi can phai co ngay goi la thiet tu 切須, cap tu 急須 kip nen, v.v. Su gi khong phai can den goi la vo tu 無須 khong can. Dung nhu chu nhu 需. \n\t3. Tu tu 斯須, tu du 須臾 deu nghia la vut choc, la choc lat. Nhu kinh Le ky 禮記 noi le nhac bat kha tu tu khu than 禮樂不可斯須去身 minh khong the roi le nhac duoc choc lat. Sach Trung Dung 中庸 noi dao da gia bat kha tu du ly gia 道也者不可須臾離也 dao ay la cai khong the roi ra duoc phut choc vay. \n\t4. Cham tre.
頊=huc [xu1]\n\t1. Chuyen Huc 顓頊 ten hieu mot vi vua thuoc ho Cao Duong 高陽 ngay xua.
顼=huc [xu1]\n\t1. Chuyen Huc 顓頊 ten hieu mot vi vua thuoc ho Cao Duong 高陽 ngay xua.
頌=tung [song4]\n\t1. Khen, ca tung. Nhu ca cong tung duc 歌功頌德. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co nhung thien Chu tung 周頌, Lo tung 魯頌 deu la tho ca tung cong duc ca. Nhung bai van ca ngoi cong duc cung goi la tung. Loi van ke cua nha Phat, Tau cung dich la tung.
颂=tung [song4]\n\t1. Khen, ca tung. Nhu ca cong tung duc 歌功頌德. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co nhung thien Chu tung 周頌, Lo tung 魯頌 deu la tho ca tung cong duc ca. Nhung bai van ca ngoi cong duc cung goi la tung. Loi van ke cua nha Phat, Tau cung dich la tung.
頎=ki, khan [qi2]\n\t1. Dai thuon thuot. Ta cai dang nguoi dai. \n\t2. Mot am la khan. Xot thuong, ai ngai.
颀=ki, khan [qi2]\n\t1. Dai thuon thuot. Ta cai dang nguoi dai. \n\t2. Mot am la khan. Xot thuong, ai ngai.
頏=hang, khang [hang2]\n\t1. Hiet hang 頡頏 bay lieng, bay bong len goi la hiet 頡, bay la la xuong goi la hang 頏. \n\t2. Mot am la khang. Co hong.
颃=hang, khang [hang2]\n\t1. Hiet hang 頡頏 bay lieng, bay bong len goi la hiet 頡, bay la la xuong goi la hang 頏. \n\t2. Mot am la khang. Co hong.
預=du [yu4]\n\t1. San, cung nghia voi chu du 豫. Nhu du bi 預備 phong bi san. \n\t2. Du vao. Nhu can du 干預 cung du vao, can thiep vao, tham du 參預 xen du vao, v.v.
预=du [yu4]\n\t1. San, cung nghia voi chu du 豫. Nhu du bi 預備 phong bi san. \n\t2. Du vao. Nhu can du 干預 cung du vao, can thiep vao, tham du 參預 xen du vao, v.v.
頑=ngoan [wan2]\n\t1. Ngu, uong, khong biet gi ma lai lam can goi la ngoan. \n\t2. Tham. Nhu ngoan phu liem 頑夫廉 ke tham hoa liem. \n\t3. Choi dua.
顽=ngoan [wan2]\n\t1. Ngu, uong, khong biet gi ma lai lam can goi la ngoan. \n\t2. Tham. Nhu ngoan phu liem 頑夫廉 ke tham hoa liem. \n\t3. Choi dua.
頒=ban, phan [ban1]\n\t1. Ban bo ra, nguoi tren ban phat hay chi bao ke duoi goi la ban. \n\t2. Ban bach 頒白 hoa ram, toc nua bac nua den goi la ban bach. \n\t3. Chia. \n\t4. Mot am la phan. Lu lu, ta cai dang dau ca to.
颁=ban, phan [ban1]\n\t1. Ban bo ra, nguoi tren ban phat hay chi bao ke duoi goi la ban. \n\t2. Ban bach 頒白 hoa ram, toc nua bac nua den goi la ban bach. \n\t3. Chia. \n\t4. Mot am la phan. Lu lu, ta cai dang dau ca to.
頓=don [du2|dun4]\n\t1. Don thu 頓首 lay dap dau sat dat. \n\t2. Dung, dinh don, dung lai mot chut goi la don. \n\t3. Quan tro, an mot bua cung goi la nhat don 一頓. \n\t4. Voi, noi ve su no bien dong mau chong, y khong luong toi, phan nhieu dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu don linh 頓令 lien khien. \n\t5. Dinh tre, bi khon kho mai khong tien len duoc goi la khon don 困頓. \n\t6. Chinh don 整頓 su gi cai gi da tan loan lau roi ma lai sua sang lai cho duoc nhu cu goi la chinh don. \n\t7. Don giao 頓教 chu trong Kinh Phat, dung mot phuong phep tuyet mau khien cho minh theo do ma tu duoc toi dao ngay.
顿=don [du2|dun4]\n\t1. Don thu 頓首 lay dap dau sat dat. \n\t2. Dung, dinh don, dung lai mot chut goi la don. \n\t3. Quan tro, an mot bua cung goi la nhat don 一頓. \n\t4. Voi, noi ve su no bien dong mau chong, y khong luong toi, phan nhieu dung lam tieng tro ngu. Nhu don linh 頓令 lien khien. \n\t5. Dinh tre, bi khon kho mai khong tien len duoc goi la khon don 困頓. \n\t6. Chinh don 整頓 su gi cai gi da tan loan lau roi ma lai sua sang lai cho duoc nhu cu goi la chinh don. \n\t7. Don giao 頓教 chu trong Kinh Phat, dung mot phuong phep tuyet mau khien cho minh theo do ma tu duoc toi dao ngay.
頖=phan [pan4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu 泮 dung trong hai chu phan cung 泮宮.
頗=pha, pha [po1]\n\t1. Lech, khong bang, khong duoc bang phang. \n\t2. Mot am la pha, dung lam tro tu. Va, hoi. Nhu pha da 頗多 hoi nhieu, pha thieu 頗少 hoi it. Dem hai mat so sanh nhau, cai cho hon kem nhau mot chut do goi la pha. \n\t3. Het, deu. \n\t4. Rat, lam.
颇=pha, pha [po1]\n\t1. Lech, khong bang, khong duoc bang phang. \n\t2. Mot am la pha, dung lam tro tu. Va, hoi. Nhu pha da 頗多 hoi nhieu, pha thieu 頗少 hoi it. Dem hai mat so sanh nhau, cai cho hon kem nhau mot chut do goi la pha. \n\t3. Het, deu. \n\t4. Rat, lam.
領=linh [ling3]\n\t1. Cai co. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi tac thien ha chi dan, giai dan linh nhi vong chi hi 則天下之民皆引領而望之矣 thi dan trong thien ha deu nghen co ma trong mong vay. \n\t2. Cai co ao, mot cai ao cung goi la nhat linh 一領. Xoc ao thi phai cam co cam tay thi ao moi song, vi the nen nguoi nao quan ly mot bo phan, mot nhom goi la linh tu 領袖 dau so. \n\t3. Doc xuat het thay, nguoi nao giu cai chuc doc xuat tat ca cong viec mot khu deu goi la linh. Nhu linh su 領事 nguoi giu chuc doc xuat tat ca moi viec o nuoc ngoai. Ta thuong goi la lanh su. \n\t4. Nhan lay. Nhu linh huong 領餉 linh luong, linh bang 領憑, v.v. \n\t5. Ly hoi, hieu biet. Nhu linh luoc 領略 ly hoi qua duoc dai y, nghe ro duoc loi nguoi ta ban luan goi la linh giao 領教.
领=linh [ling3]\n\t1. Cai co. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi tac thien ha chi dan, giai dan linh nhi vong chi hi 則天下之民皆引領而望之矣 thi dan trong thien ha deu nghen co ma trong mong vay. \n\t2. Cai co ao, mot cai ao cung goi la nhat linh 一領. Xoc ao thi phai cam co cam tay thi ao moi song, vi the nen nguoi nao quan ly mot bo phan, mot nhom goi la linh tu 領袖 dau so. \n\t3. Doc xuat het thay, nguoi nao giu cai chuc doc xuat tat ca cong viec mot khu deu goi la linh. Nhu linh su 領事 nguoi giu chuc doc xuat tat ca moi viec o nuoc ngoai. Ta thuong goi la lanh su. \n\t4. Nhan lay. Nhu linh huong 領餉 linh luong, linh bang 領憑, v.v. \n\t5. Ly hoi, hieu biet. Nhu linh luoc 領略 ly hoi qua duoc dai y, nghe ro duoc loi nguoi ta ban luan goi la linh giao 領教.
頞=at [e4]\n\t1. Cho song mui. Nhu Manh Tu 孟子 noi tat thu xuc at 疾首蹙頞 lac dau nhan mui, ta cai dang chan ghet.
頡=hiet [jie2|xie2]\n\t1. Hiet hang 頡頏. Xem chu hang 頏.
颉=hiet [jie2|xie2]\n\t1. Hiet hang 頡頏. Xem chu hang 頏.
頣=di [yi2]\n\t1. Ma, cho ma ben mep. Nhu di chi khi su 頤指氣使 nhach mep truyen hoi, ta cai dang ke quyen quy kieu ngao sai khien ai chi nhach mep truyen hoi thoi khong them cat mieng noi. \n\t2. Nuoi.
頦=hai (15 n) [ke1]\n\t1. Duoi cam.
颏=hai (15 n) [ke1]\n\t1. Duoi cam.
頫=phu, thieu [fu3]\n\t1. Cui dau, nguyen la chu phu 俯. \n\t2. Mot am la thieu. Cai le tuong kien trong khi di sinh cac nuoc lan bang. Nhieu quan dai phu lai goi la thieu, it goi la sinh.
頭=dau [tou2]\n\t1. Bo dau, dau lau. \n\t2. Pham cai gi o vao bo vi cao nhat deu goi la dau. Nhu son dau 山頭 dau nui. \n\t3. Buc nao hang nao hon het ca deu goi la dau. Nhu dau dang 頭等 hang dau, dau hieu 頭號 so dau, v.v. \n\t4. Ngoai dau vat gi cung goi la dau. Nhu luong dau 兩頭 hai dau. \n\t5. Nguoi trum so, dau so. Nhu dau muc 頭目 nguoi lam trum ca mot tui. \n\t6. Tieng dung de dem cac con vat. Nhu nguu nhat dau 牛一頭 mot con trau. \n\t7. Ngay xua goi mot nguoi la nhat dau 一頭. Nhu ghi su tich cua chin anh em ho Nhan Hoang goi la cuu dau ky 九頭紀. \n\t8. Dau da 頭陀 tieng Phan, mot phep tu kho hanh. Nhu di xin an, ngoi ngu goc cay, nhap dinh ben ma de tru sach phien nao, v.v.
头=dau [tou2]\n\t1. Bo dau, dau lau. \n\t2. Pham cai gi o vao bo vi cao nhat deu goi la dau. Nhu son dau 山頭 dau nui. \n\t3. Buc nao hang nao hon het ca deu goi la dau. Nhu dau dang 頭等 hang dau, dau hieu 頭號 so dau, v.v. \n\t4. Ngoai dau vat gi cung goi la dau. Nhu luong dau 兩頭 hai dau. \n\t5. Nguoi trum so, dau so. Nhu dau muc 頭目 nguoi lam trum ca mot tui. \n\t6. Tieng dung de dem cac con vat. Nhu nguu nhat dau 牛一頭 mot con trau. \n\t7. Ngay xua goi mot nguoi la nhat dau 一頭. Nhu ghi su tich cua chin anh em ho Nhan Hoang goi la cuu dau ky 九頭紀. \n\t8. Dau da 頭陀 tieng Phan, mot phep tu kho hanh. Nhu di xin an, ngoi ngu goc cay, nhap dinh ben ma de tru sach phien nao, v.v.
頮=hoi [hui4]\n\t1. Rua mat. Co khi viet la hoi 靧.
頰=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Ma. Hai ma ben mat goi la giap. Nhu luong giap phi hong 兩頰緋紅 hai go ma ung hong.
颊=giap [jia2]\n\t1. Ma. Hai ma ben mat goi la giap. Nhu luong giap phi hong 兩頰緋紅 hai go ma ung hong.
頷=ham [han4]\n\t1. Cam. Cho cam no nang day dan goi la yen ham 燕頷 cam yen, ho dau yen ham 虎頭燕頷 dau ho cam yen, co nhan cho la cai tuong phong hau. \n\t2. Ham chi 頷之 gat dau, se gat dau dap le lai nguoi goi la ham chi, loi chao cua ke quyen quy. 
颔=ham [han4]\n\t1. Cam. Cho cam no nang day dan goi la yen ham 燕頷 cam yen, ho dau yen ham 虎頭燕頷 dau ho cam yen, co nhan cho la cai tuong phong hau. \n\t2. Ham chi 頷之 gat dau, se gat dau dap le lai nguoi goi la ham chi, loi chao cua ke quyen quy. 
頸=canh [geng3|jing3]\n\t1. Cai co. Dang truoc goi la canh 頸, dang sau goi la hang 項, co cac do dac cung goi la canh.
颈=canh [geng3|jing3]\n\t1. Cai co. Dang truoc goi la canh 頸, dang sau goi la hang 項, co cac do dac cung goi la canh.
頹=doi [tui2]\n\t1. Sut lo. Kinh Le ky 禮記 co cau Thai Son ki doi ho 泰山其頹呼 nui Thai Son sut lo mat u ? Nguyen la cau noi luc duc Khong Tu 孔子 sap mat. Nui Thai Son la cho nguoi ta deu trong ngong ham mo, noi nui Thai Son lo la noi vi nhu luc hien nhan quan tu sap mat vay. \n\t2. Suy doi, ta cai dang luc gia yeu khong duoc thich y. Nhu doi duong 頹唐, doi tang 頹喪 deu chi ve phan tinh than no suy tan khong phan chan len duoc nua. \n\t3. Gio du. \n\t4. Thuan. \n\t5. Nuoc chay doc.
颓=doi [tui2]\n\t1. Sut lo. Kinh Le ky 禮記 co cau Thai Son ki doi ho 泰山其頹呼 nui Thai Son sut lo mat u ? Nguyen la cau noi luc duc Khong Tu 孔子 sap mat. Nui Thai Son la cho nguoi ta deu trong ngong ham mo, noi nui Thai Son lo la noi vi nhu luc hien nhan quan tu sap mat vay. \n\t2. Suy doi, ta cai dang luc gia yeu khong duoc thich y. Nhu doi duong 頹唐, doi tang 頹喪 deu chi ve phan tinh than no suy tan khong phan chan len duoc nua. \n\t3. Gio du. \n\t4. Thuan. \n\t5. Nuoc chay doc.
頻=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Luon. Phan nhieu dung lam tro tu. Nhu tan tan 頻頻 luon luon. \n\t2. Kip, gap. \n\t3. Gom, deu.
频=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Luon. Phan nhieu dung lam tro tu. Nhu tan tan 頻頻 luon luon. \n\t2. Kip, gap. \n\t3. Gom, deu.
顆=khoa [ke1]\n\t1. Hot, vien. Mot cai do gi tron cung goi la nhat khoa 一顆. Pham dem vat gi tron deu dung chu khoa.
颗=khoa [ke1]\n\t1. Hot, vien. Mot cai do gi tron cung goi la nhat khoa 一顆. Pham dem vat gi tron deu dung chu khoa.
顇=tuy [cui4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tuy 悴 trong hai chu tieu tuy 憔悴.
顋=tai [sai1]\n\t1. Ma, hai ben mat goi la tai. Co khi viet la 腮.
題=de [ti2]\n\t1. Cai tran. Tuc man mien nam ngay xua hay cham tro vao tran roi boi thuoc do thuoc xanh vao goi la dieu de 雕題. \n\t2. Tien de len, viet chu len tren khien cho nguoi trong thay la biet ngay goi la de. Nhu viet vao cai the goi la de tiem 題籤, viet buc bien ngang goi la de ngach 題額. Nhu noi de thi 題詩 de tho, de tu 題辭 de loi van, v.v. \n\t3. De muc, dau de, dau bai. Dau bai van hay bai tho, neu cai y chi len de lam mau muc cho ca mot bai goi la de muc 題目, co khi goi tat la de. Nhu doan dau van giai thich ca dai y trong bai goi la pha de 破題 mo dau. Doan cuoi ket lai cho du y nghia la ket de 結題 dong bai. \n\t4. Pham de 品題. Cung nhu nghia chu binh pham 評品 hay pham binh 品評 vay.
题=de [ti2]\n\t1. Cai tran. Tuc man mien nam ngay xua hay cham tro vao tran roi boi thuoc do thuoc xanh vao goi la dieu de 雕題. \n\t2. Tien de len, viet chu len tren khien cho nguoi trong thay la biet ngay goi la de. Nhu viet vao cai the goi la de tiem 題籤, viet buc bien ngang goi la de ngach 題額. Nhu noi de thi 題詩 de tho, de tu 題辭 de loi van, v.v. \n\t3. De muc, dau de, dau bai. Dau bai van hay bai tho, neu cai y chi len de lam mau muc cho ca mot bai goi la de muc 題目, co khi goi tat la de. Nhu doan dau van giai thich ca dai y trong bai goi la pha de 破題 mo dau. Doan cuoi ket lai cho du y nghia la ket de 結題 dong bai. \n\t4. Pham de 品題. Cung nhu nghia chu binh pham 評品 hay pham binh 品評 vay.
額=ngach [e2]\n\t1. Bo tran, tren cho long may duoi mai toc goi la ngach. \n\t2. Cai so che ra nhat dinh. Nhu so binh da che nhat dinh goi la binh ngach 兵額. So luong da che nhat dinh goi la ngach huong 額餉. \n\t3. Cai hoanh phi. Cai hoanh phi treo o tren cua tren mai. Nhu cai tran cua nguoi nen goi la bien ngach 匾額.
额=ngach [e2]\n\t1. Bo tran, tren cho long may duoi mai toc goi la ngach. \n\t2. Cai so che ra nhat dinh. Nhu so binh da che nhat dinh goi la binh ngach 兵額. So luong da che nhat dinh goi la ngach huong 額餉. \n\t3. Cai hoanh phi. Cai hoanh phi treo o tren cua tren mai. Nhu cai tran cua nguoi nen goi la bien ngach 匾額.
顎=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Cai xuong go ma, (quyen) xuong quai ham goi la ha ngac 下顎.
颚=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Cai xuong go ma, (quyen) xuong quai ham goi la ha ngac 下顎.
顏=nhan [yan2]\n\t1. Dang mat. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi nhan nhu ac dan 顏如渥丹 dang mat do nhu thoa son. \n\t2. Sac mui. Nhu nhan sac 顏色 sac mui, sac mat, nhan lieu 顏料 chat dung de ho mau, de ve ngoai mat, v.v. \n\t3. Chu de o tren bien hay hoanh phi cung goi la nhan.
颜=nhan [yan2]\n\t1. Dang mat. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi nhan nhu ac dan 顏如渥丹 dang mat do nhu thoa son. \n\t2. Sac mui. Nhu nhan sac 顏色 sac mui, sac mat, nhan lieu 顏料 chat dung de ho mau, de ve ngoai mat, v.v. \n\t3. Chu de o tren bien hay hoanh phi cung goi la nhan.
顒=ngung [yong2]\n\t1. Nghiem chinh, ta cai dang mat nghiem nghi, chinh dinh. \n\t2. To kech xu.
顓=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Chuyen Huc 顓頊 ten mot vi vua ho Cao Duong 高陽 ngay xua. \n\t2. Chuyen, cung nghia voi chu chuyen 專. Nhu chuyen ngu 顓愚 da ngu lai lam xang, khong ban khong hoi ai.
颛=chuyen [zhuan1]\n\t1. Chuyen Huc 顓頊 ten mot vi vua ho Cao Duong 高陽 ngay xua. \n\t2. Chuyen, cung nghia voi chu chuyen 專. Nhu chuyen ngu 顓愚 da ngu lai lam xang, khong ban khong hoi ai.
願=nguyen [yuan4]\n\t1. Muon. Long mong cau goi la tam nguyen 心願. Dem cai quyen loi minh muon duoc huong ma yeu cau phap luat dinh cho goi la thinh nguyen 請願. \n\t2. Nguyen, dung lam tro tu, y noi long muon nhu the. Nhu ong Manh Tu 孟子 noi Bat cam thinh nhi co so nguyen da 不敢請耳固所願也 chang dam xin vay, von van muon the vay. Nhu ta noi tinh nguyen 情願 thuc tinh muon the, phat nguyen 發願 mo long muon the, the nguyen 誓願 the xin muon duoc nhu the, deu mot y ay ca. \n\t3. Khen ngoi, ham mo.
愿=nguyen [yuan4]\n\t1. Muon. Long mong cau goi la tam nguyen 心願. Dem cai quyen loi minh muon duoc huong ma yeu cau phap luat dinh cho goi la thinh nguyen 請願. \n\t2. Nguyen, dung lam tro tu, y noi long muon nhu the. Nhu ong Manh Tu 孟子 noi Bat cam thinh nhi co so nguyen da 不敢請耳固所願也 chang dam xin vay, von van muon the vay. Nhu ta noi tinh nguyen 情願 thuc tinh muon the, phat nguyen 發願 mo long muon the, the nguyen 誓願 the xin muon duoc nhu the, deu mot y ay ca. \n\t3. Khen ngoi, ham mo.
顙=tang [sang3]\n\t1. Cai tran. Le lay cua nguoi co tang goi la khe tang 稽顙, cung nhu chu khe thu 稽首.
颡=tang [sang3]\n\t1. Cai tran. Le lay cua nguoi co tang goi la khe tang 稽顙, cung nhu chu khe thu 稽首.
顚=dien [dian1]\n\t1. Dinh dau. \n\t2. Goc. Nhu dien mat 顛末 goc ngon, noi ve su truoc va sau. \n\t3. Nga nghieng. \n\t4. Cung nghia voi chu dien 癲.
類=loai [lei4]\n\t1. Loai giong. Nhu phan mon biet loai 分門別類 chia tung mon ghe tung loai. \n\t2. Giong. Khong duoc giong goi la bat loai 不類. \n\t3. Dung lam tro ngu tu. Nhu dai loai 大類 cung nhu ta noi dai loai, dai khai vay. \n\t4. Lanh, tot. \n\t5. Tuy theo. \n\t6. Te loai, le te troi khong phai thoi. \n\t7. Mot loai rua. 
类=loai [lei4]\n\t1. Loai giong. Nhu phan mon biet loai 分門別類 chia tung mon ghe tung loai. \n\t2. Giong. Khong duoc giong goi la bat loai 不類. \n\t3. Dung lam tro ngu tu. Nhu dai loai 大類 cung nhu ta noi dai loai, dai khai vay. \n\t4. Lanh, tot. \n\t5. Tuy theo. \n\t6. Te loai, le te troi khong phai thoi. \n\t7. Mot loai rua. 
顢=man [man1]\n\t1. Man han 顢頇. Xem chu han 頇.
颟=man [man1]\n\t1. Man han 顢頇. Xem chu han 頇.
顣=tuc, xuc [cu4]\n\t1. Tan tuc 頻顣 cau may, ta cai dang lo buon. Ta quen doc la chu xuc. Cung nhu chu tuc 蹙.
顥=hao, hieu [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 顥顥 sang quang, sang trang xoa. Co khi ta doc la chu hieu.
颢=hao, hieu [hao4]\n\t1. Hao hao 顥顥 sang quang, sang trang xoa. Co khi ta doc la chu hieu.
顦=tieu [qiao2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu tieu 憔 trong hai chu tieu tuy 憔悴.
顧=co [gu4]\n\t1. Trong lai, doai, chi ve moi tinh nho nhung khong sao quen duoc. Nhu di khu nhi phuc co 已去而復顧 da di ma lai trong lai, cha me yeu con goi la co phuc 顧復, loi di chieu cua vua goi la co menh 顧命 cung la mot nghia ay ca. Quen han di ma khong phai vi co y goi la bat co 不顧 chang doai hoai. \n\t2. Ngam nghia khap ca. Nhu tu co 四顧 ngam ki ca bon mat, kiem co 兼顧 gom xet ca cac noi khac, su khac, v.v. \n\t3. Toi tham, khach qua tham minh goi la co. Nhu hue co 惠顧 ra on den tham, uong co 枉顧 khuat minh den tham, deu la tieng noi nhun trong su giao te ca. Trong nha buon ban goi khach mua la chu co 主顧 cung la noi nghia ay. \n\t4. Dung lam tieng chuyen cau, nghia la nhung, song.
顾=co [gu4]\n\t1. Trong lai, doai, chi ve moi tinh nho nhung khong sao quen duoc. Nhu di khu nhi phuc co 已去而復顧 da di ma lai trong lai, cha me yeu con goi la co phuc 顧復, loi di chieu cua vua goi la co menh 顧命 cung la mot nghia ay ca. Quen han di ma khong phai vi co y goi la bat co 不顧 chang doai hoai. \n\t2. Ngam nghia khap ca. Nhu tu co 四顧 ngam ki ca bon mat, kiem co 兼顧 gom xet ca cac noi khac, su khac, v.v. \n\t3. Toi tham, khach qua tham minh goi la co. Nhu hue co 惠顧 ra on den tham, uong co 枉顧 khuat minh den tham, deu la tieng noi nhun trong su giao te ca. Trong nha buon ban goi khach mua la chu co 主顧 cung la noi nghia ay. \n\t4. Dung lam tieng chuyen cau, nghia la nhung, song.
顫=chien, dan [chan4|zhan4]\n\t1. Ret run. Nhan ret ma chan tay run lap cap goi la han chien 寒顫. \n\t2. Cai gi no rung dong, di lai nhanh chong goi la chien dong 顫動. \n\t3. Nhung tieng so hai, xot xa goi la chien thanh 顫聲. \n\t4. Ta quen doc la chu dan. 
颤=chien, dan [chan4|zhan4]\n\t1. Ret run. Nhan ret ma chan tay run lap cap goi la han chien 寒顫. \n\t2. Cai gi no rung dong, di lai nhanh chong goi la chien dong 顫動. \n\t3. Nhung tieng so hai, xot xa goi la chien thanh 顫聲. \n\t4. Ta quen doc la chu dan. 
顬=nhu (23 n) [ru2]\n\t1. Nhiep nhu 顳顬 cai xuong vanh tai.
顯=hien [xian3]\n\t1. Ro ret. Nhu hien nhi di kien 顯而易見 ro ret de thay. \n\t2. Ve vang. Nhu hien quy 顯貴, hien dat 顯達 deu nghia la sang trong ve vang ca. Vi the nen ke phu quy cung goi la hien gia 顯者. \n\t3. Con chau goi to tien cung xung la hien. Nhu bo da chet goi la hien khao 顯考, me da chet goi la hien ty 顯妣.
显=hien [xian3]\n\t1. Ro ret. Nhu hien nhi di kien 顯而易見 ro ret de thay. \n\t2. Ve vang. Nhu hien quy 顯貴, hien dat 顯達 deu nghia la sang trong ve vang ca. Vi the nen ke phu quy cung goi la hien gia 顯者. \n\t3. Con chau goi to tien cung xung la hien. Nhu bo da chet goi la hien khao 顯考, me da chet goi la hien ty 顯妣.
顰=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Nhan may. Ta cai ve con gai dep goi la tan tieu 顰笑.
颦=tan [pin2]\n\t1. Nhan may. Ta cai ve con gai dep goi la tan tieu 顰笑.
顱=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Cai so, cai dau goi la dau lo 頭顱 dau lau.
颅=lo [lu2]\n\t1. Cai so, cai dau goi la dau lo 頭顱 dau lau.
顳=nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhiep nhu 顳顬. Xem chu nhu 顬.
颞=nhiep [nie4]\n\t1. Nhiep nhu 顳顬. Xem chu nhu 顬.
顴=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Cai xuong go ma.
颧=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Cai xuong go ma.
風=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Gio, khong khi dong manh thanh ra gio. \n\t2. Cai ma tuc dang chuong. Nhu the phong 世風 thoi doi, quoc phong 國風 thoi nuoc, gia phong 家風 thoi nha, v.v. y noi su gi ke kia xuong len nguoi nay noi theo dan dan thanh tuc quen. Nhu vat theo gio, van cam theo do ma khong tu biet vay. \n\t3. Ngoi hat. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co quoc phong nghia la nhan nhung cau ngoi hat cua cac nuoc ma xet duoc phong tuc cua cac nuoc, vi the nen goi tho ay la phong, cung voi tho tieu nha 小雅, tho dai nha 大雅 deu goi la phong ca. Noi rong ra nguoi nao co ve thi thu cung goi la phong nha 風雅. \n\t4. Thoi, cai thoi quen cua mot nguoi ma duoc moi nguoi cung ham mo bat chuoc cung goi la phong. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi van Ba Di chi phong gia 聞伯夷之風者 nghe cai thoi quen cua ong Ba Di ay. Lai nhu noi ve dao duc thi goi la phong tiet 風節, phong nghia 風義, noi ve quy mo khi tuong thi goi la phong tieu 風標, phong cach 風格, noi ve dang dap thi thi goi la phong tu 風姿, phong thai 風采, noi ve cai y thu cua loi noi thi goi la phong vi 風味, phong thu 風趣, v.v. \n\t5. Pham su gi noi len hay tieu diet di khong co manh moi gi de xet, bien hoa khong the luong duoc cung goi la phong. Nhu phong van 風雲, phong trao 風潮, v.v. noi no bien hien bat thuong nhu gio may nhu nuoc thuy trieu vay. \n\t6. Benh phong. Chung cam gio goi la trung phong 中風. Pham cac benh ma ta goi la phong, thay thuoc tay goi la benh than kinh het. \n\t7. Thoi, quat. \n\t8. Canh tuong. \n\t9. Phong tung, giong duc giong cai dan du nhau, gun ghe nhau. 10. Cung nghia voi chu phung 諷.
风=phong [feng1]\n\t1. Gio, khong khi dong manh thanh ra gio. \n\t2. Cai ma tuc dang chuong. Nhu the phong 世風 thoi doi, quoc phong 國風 thoi nuoc, gia phong 家風 thoi nha, v.v. y noi su gi ke kia xuong len nguoi nay noi theo dan dan thanh tuc quen. Nhu vat theo gio, van cam theo do ma khong tu biet vay. \n\t3. Ngoi hat. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 co quoc phong nghia la nhan nhung cau ngoi hat cua cac nuoc ma xet duoc phong tuc cua cac nuoc, vi the nen goi tho ay la phong, cung voi tho tieu nha 小雅, tho dai nha 大雅 deu goi la phong ca. Noi rong ra nguoi nao co ve thi thu cung goi la phong nha 風雅. \n\t4. Thoi, cai thoi quen cua mot nguoi ma duoc moi nguoi cung ham mo bat chuoc cung goi la phong. Nhu sach Manh Tu 孟子 noi van Ba Di chi phong gia 聞伯夷之風者 nghe cai thoi quen cua ong Ba Di ay. Lai nhu noi ve dao duc thi goi la phong tiet 風節, phong nghia 風義, noi ve quy mo khi tuong thi goi la phong tieu 風標, phong cach 風格, noi ve dang dap thi thi goi la phong tu 風姿, phong thai 風采, noi ve cai y thu cua loi noi thi goi la phong vi 風味, phong thu 風趣, v.v. \n\t5. Pham su gi noi len hay tieu diet di khong co manh moi gi de xet, bien hoa khong the luong duoc cung goi la phong. Nhu phong van 風雲, phong trao 風潮, v.v. noi no bien hien bat thuong nhu gio may nhu nuoc thuy trieu vay. \n\t6. Benh phong. Chung cam gio goi la trung phong 中風. Pham cac benh ma ta goi la phong, thay thuoc tay goi la benh than kinh het. \n\t7. Thoi, quat. \n\t8. Canh tuong. \n\t9. Phong tung, giong duc giong cai dan du nhau, gun ghe nhau. 10. Cung nghia voi chu phung 諷.
颭=trien [zhan3]\n\t1. Gio dong vao vat gi hay vat gi bi gio lay dong deu goi la trien.
颯=tap [sa4]\n\t1. Tieng gio thoi veo veo. \n\t2. Suy. Cay co tan rung goi la tieu tap 蕭颯.
飒=tap [sa4]\n\t1. Tieng gio thoi veo veo. \n\t2. Suy. Cay co tan rung goi la tieu tap 蕭颯.
颶=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Gio bao. \n\t2. Giong be (gio loc) thuong cu thang bay thang tam thi trong be hay noi gio lon, luong gio xoay tron ma thoi di, co phuong huong nhat dinh, tau be gap phai rat la nguy hiem. Nhung vi no di co phuong huong nhat dinh nen cac nha thien van tinh biet truoc duoc de bao cho cac tau be biet phuong no di ma lanh truoc.
飓=cu [ju4]\n\t1. Gio bao. \n\t2. Giong be (gio loc) thuong cu thang bay thang tam thi trong be hay noi gio lon, luong gio xoay tron ma thoi di, co phuong huong nhat dinh, tau be gap phai rat la nguy hiem. Nhung vi no di co phuong huong nhat dinh nen cac nha thien van tinh biet truoc duoc de bao cho cac tau be biet phuong no di ma lanh truoc.
颸=ti [si1]\n\t1. Gio mat.
颺=duong [yang2]\n\t1. Gio toc len, lat len. \n\t2. Bay di. Ke pham toi tron thoat goi la vien duong 遠颺. \n\t3. Noi to ma nhanh goi la duong ngon 颺言. \n\t4. Bat duong 不颺 trang mao xau xa.
颻=dieu [yao2]\n\t1. Phieu dieu 飄颻 phap phoi, ta cai hinh dang gio dong vao vat gi.
颼=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Suu suu 颼颼 tieng gio vu vu.
飕=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Suu suu 颼颼 tieng gio vu vu.
飂=lieu [liao2]\n\t1. Vi veo, ta cai hinh dang gio thoi tren cao.
飄=phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Thoi. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi phong ki phieu nhu 風其飄汝 gio thoi may di. \n\t2. Nhe nhang. Nhu phieu phieu duc tien 飄飄欲仙 nhe nhang muon len tien.
飘=phieu [piao1]\n\t1. Thoi. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi phong ki phieu nhu 風其飄汝 gio thoi may di. \n\t2. Nhe nhang. Nhu phieu phieu duc tien 飄飄欲仙 nhe nhang muon len tien.
飅=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Suu luu 颼飅 tieng gio thoi vu vu.
飆=tien [biao1]\n\t1. Gio du, gio tap, gio giat. Nhu cuong tien 狂飆 giong to, bao tap.
飙=tien [biao1]\n\t1. Gio du, gio tap, gio giat. Nhu cuong tien 狂飆 giong to, bao tap.
飛=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Bay. Loai chim va loai sau cat canh bay cao goi la phi. \n\t2. Nhanh nhu bay. Nhu phi bao 飛報 bao nhanh nhu bay, kip bao. \n\t3. Loi noi khong co can cu. Nhu cai tho giau khong ky ten goi la phi thu 飛書, loi noi phi bang goi la phi ngu 飛語, v.v. \n\t4. Tieng bong. \n\t5. Cao, noi vi du nhu su cao. \n\t6. Phi, phep che thuoc hoac dung lua dot hoac dung nuoc gan cho sach goi la phi.
飞=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Bay. Loai chim va loai sau cat canh bay cao goi la phi. \n\t2. Nhanh nhu bay. Nhu phi bao 飛報 bao nhanh nhu bay, kip bao. \n\t3. Loi noi khong co can cu. Nhu cai tho giau khong ky ten goi la phi thu 飛書, loi noi phi bang goi la phi ngu 飛語, v.v. \n\t4. Tieng bong. \n\t5. Cao, noi vi du nhu su cao. \n\t6. Phi, phep che thuoc hoac dung lua dot hoac dung nuoc gan cho sach goi la phi.
飜=phien [pian1]\n\t1. Lat len. Tuc dung nhu chu 翻.
食=thuc, tu [shi2|si4]\n\t1. Do de an. Cac loai thoc gao de an cho song nguoi goi la thuc. Noi rong ra thi het thay cac cai co the an cho no bung duoc deu goi la thuc. \n\t2. An. Nhu thuc phan 吃飯 an com. \n\t3. Loc. Nhu sach Luan ngu 論語 noi quan tu muu dao bat muu thuc 君子謀道不謀食 (Ve Linh Cong 衛靈公) nguoi quan tu muu dao khong muu an loc. \n\t4. Mon, khuyet, cung nghia voi chu thuc 蝕. Nhu nhat thuc 日蝕 mat troi phai an, nguyet thuc 月蝕 mat trang phai an, v.v. \n\t5. Thuc ngon 食言 an loi, da noi ra ma lai lat lai goi la thuc ngon. \n\t6. Thuc chi 食指 ngon tay tro, co khi dung de dem so nguoi an. Nhu thuc chi phon da 食指繁多 so nguoi doi minh kiem an nhieu. \n\t7. Mot am la tu, cung nghia voi chu tu 飼 cho an. Nhu am chi tu chi 飲之食之 cho uong cho an. Co nghia la chan nuoi. Nhu tu nguu 食牛 chan trau.
飢=co [ji1]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu co bao 飢飽 doi no. Co khi dung nhu chu ki 饑.
饥=co [ji1]\n\t1. Doi. Nhu co bao 飢飽 doi no. Co khi dung nhu chu ki 饑.
飣=dinh [ding4]\n\t1. Mam ngu qua. Bay xep cac thu qua de choi khong an goi la dinh. Vi the nen van tu chap nhat ma thanh bai goi la dau dinh 餖飣.
飥=thac [tuo1]\n\t1. Bac thac 餺飥 mot thu banh bot.
飧=son, ton, san [sun1]\n\t1. An chin. Bua com sang goi la ung 饔, bua com chieu goi la son 飧. \n\t2. Nuoc voi com lan voi nhau goi la son. Cung doc la chu ton, chu san.
飩=don [tun2]\n\t1. Banh bao. Tuc goi la hon don 餛飩.
饨=don [tun2]\n\t1. Banh bao. Tuc goi la hon don 餛飩.
飪=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Nau nuong. Do nau an chin qua goi la that nham 失飪. 
饪=nham [ren4]\n\t1. Nau nuong. Do nau an chin qua goi la that nham 失飪. 
飫=u, oc [yu4]\n\t1. No ne, an uong chan thich. Ta quen doc la chu oc. \n\t2. Dung ma an uong. \n\t3. An uong rieng. \n\t4. Cho.
饫=u, oc [yu4]\n\t1. No ne, an uong chan thich. Ta quen doc la chu oc. \n\t2. Dung ma an uong. \n\t3. An uong rieng. \n\t4. Cho.
飭=suc [chi4]\n\t1. Trang suc, ta cai dang sap sua nghiem can. Nhu chinh suc 整飭 sap dat nghiem trang, trang suc 裝飭 sam sua le bo cho gon ghe dep de, v.v. \n\t2. Menh lenh. Lenh cua quan truyen xuong cho dan biet goi la suc. Sai day to dua trinh thu tu noi la suc trinh 飭呈 hay suc tong 飭送. \n\t3. Chinh bi. \n\t4. Sua tri.
饬=suc [chi4]\n\t1. Trang suc, ta cai dang sap sua nghiem can. Nhu chinh suc 整飭 sap dat nghiem trang, trang suc 裝飭 sam sua le bo cho gon ghe dep de, v.v. \n\t2. Menh lenh. Lenh cua quan truyen xuong cho dan biet goi la suc. Sai day to dua trinh thu tu noi la suc trinh 飭呈 hay suc tong 飭送. \n\t3. Chinh bi. \n\t4. Sua tri.
飮=am, am [yin3]\n\t1. Do uong. Nhu ruou, tuong goi la am. \n\t2. Uong. Nhu am tuu 飲酒 uong ruou, am thuy 飲水 uong nuoc, v.v. \n\t3. Ngam nuot. Nhu am han 飲恨 nuot gian, nghia la mang moi han am tham o trong khong lo ra ngoai. \n\t4. Mot am la am. Cho uong. Nhu am chi di tuu 飲之以酒 cho uong ruou.
飯=phan, phan [fan4]\n\t1. Com. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. An com. \n\t3. Cho giong suc an. \n\t4. Ngam.
饭=phan, phan [fan4]\n\t1. Com. \n\t2. Mot am la phan. An com. \n\t3. Cho giong suc an. \n\t4. Ngam.
飱=san [sun1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu san 飧.
飴=di, tu [yi2]\n\t1. Keo mach nha, keo mam. \n\t2. Mot am la tu. Ngot qua. \n\t3. Dua do an cho nguoi an.
饴=di, tu [yi2]\n\t1. Keo mach nha, keo mam. \n\t2. Mot am la tu. Ngot qua. \n\t3. Dua do an cho nguoi an.
飼=tu [si4]\n\t1. Cho an, chan nuoi.
饲=tu [si4]\n\t1. Cho an, chan nuoi.
飽=bao [bao3]\n\t1. No, an no. Noi rong ra pham su gi duoc thoa thich deu goi la bao. Nhu bao duc 飽德 duoc doi on duc nhieu.
饱=bao [bao3]\n\t1. No, an no. Noi rong ra pham su gi duoc thoa thich deu goi la bao. Nhu bao duc 飽德 duoc doi on duc nhieu.
飾=suc [shi4]\n\t1. Van suc. Vat gi da lam, song lai trang suc them. Nhu son, nhu ve, nhu theu, nhu khac cho dep them deu goi la suc. Nhu phuc suc 服飾 quan ao dep, thu suc 首飾 do trang suc tren dau, v.v. \n\t2. Che day, phan suc ben ngoai, chi co be ngoai, trong khong co gi thuc goi la suc. Nhu phan suc thai binh 粉飾太平 chinh tri da roi bet ma van lam ra dang thai binh yen tinh. \n\t3. Gia thac, gia bo. Nhu suc tu 飾詞 loi gia thac, suc mao 飾貌 net mat gia dang. \n\t4. Sua sang cho sach se.
饰=suc [shi4]\n\t1. Van suc. Vat gi da lam, song lai trang suc them. Nhu son, nhu ve, nhu theu, nhu khac cho dep them deu goi la suc. Nhu phuc suc 服飾 quan ao dep, thu suc 首飾 do trang suc tren dau, v.v. \n\t2. Che day, phan suc ben ngoai, chi co be ngoai, trong khong co gi thuc goi la suc. Nhu phan suc thai binh 粉飾太平 chinh tri da roi bet ma van lam ra dang thai binh yen tinh. \n\t3. Gia thac, gia bo. Nhu suc tu 飾詞 loi gia thac, suc mao 飾貌 net mat gia dang. \n\t4. Sua sang cho sach se.
餂=thiem [tian3]\n\t1. Cau lay, nhu lay.
餃=giao [jiao3]\n\t1. Phan bot.
饺=giao [jiao3]\n\t1. Phan bot.
餅=binh [bing3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu binh 餠.
饼=binh [bing3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu binh 餠.
餈=tu [ci2]\n\t1. Banh day. Gao thoi chin roi dem gia nhuyen goi la tu.
餉=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tang cho, thet dai. \n\t2. Tien luong dung ve viec quan.
饷=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tang cho, thet dai. \n\t2. Tien luong dung ve viec quan.
養=duong, duong [yang3]\n\t1. Nuoi lon. Nhu ong Manh Tu 孟子 noi cau dac ky duong vo vat bat truong 苟得其養無物不長 neu duoc nuoi tot khong vat gi khong lon. \n\t2. Boi bep, day to cung goi la tu duong 廝養. \n\t3. Sinh con. \n\t4. Duong khi, chat duong. Mot nguyen chat trong hoa hoc (oxygene, O2), la mot chat hoi khong sac khong mui, nguoi ta nho co no moi song, lua co no moi chay, la mot phan ket thanh ba loai dong vat, thuc vat, khoang vat rat can co vay. \n\t5. Mot am la duong. Duoi dang bieu nguoi tren. Nhu phung duong 奉養 (ta noi la phung duong), cung duong 供養 cung dang, v.v.
养=duong, duong [yang3]\n\t1. Nuoi lon. Nhu ong Manh Tu 孟子 noi cau dac ky duong vo vat bat truong 苟得其養無物不長 neu duoc nuoi tot khong vat gi khong lon. \n\t2. Boi bep, day to cung goi la tu duong 廝養. \n\t3. Sinh con. \n\t4. Duong khi, chat duong. Mot nguyen chat trong hoa hoc (oxygene, O2), la mot chat hoi khong sac khong mui, nguoi ta nho co no moi song, lua co no moi chay, la mot phan ket thanh ba loai dong vat, thuc vat, khoang vat rat can co vay. \n\t5. Mot am la duong. Duoi dang bieu nguoi tren. Nhu phung duong 奉養 (ta noi la phung duong), cung duong 供養 cung dang, v.v.
餌=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Banh bot, cac chat bo cho nguoi om an goi la duoc nhi 葯餌. \n\t2. Moi cau cau ca. Noi rong ra pham lay loi ma du nguoi cung goi la nhi nhu moi, cau. Nhu nhi dich 餌敵 nhu quan dich. \n\t3. An. \n\t4. Gan lon cua giong suc sinh.
饵=nhi [er3]\n\t1. Banh bot, cac chat bo cho nguoi om an goi la duoc nhi 葯餌. \n\t2. Moi cau cau ca. Noi rong ra pham lay loi ma du nguoi cung goi la nhi nhu moi, cau. Nhu nhi dich 餌敵 nhu quan dich. \n\t3. An. \n\t4. Gan lon cua giong suc sinh.
餐=xan [can1]\n\t1. An, khong co cong ma an loc goi la to xan 素餐. \n\t2. Ban, chuyen. An mot bua com goi la nhat xan 一餐.
餑=bot [bo1]\n\t1. Banh bot, nguoi phuong bac goi banh la bot bot 餑餑. \n\t2. Bot nuoc che (tra).
饽=bot [bo1]\n\t1. Banh bot, nguoi phuong bac goi banh la bot bot 餑餑. \n\t2. Bot nuoc che (tra).
餒=noi [nei3]\n\t1. Doi, doi ret goi la dong noi 凍餒. \n\t2. Duoi. Nhu khi noi 氣餒 duoi hoi, kem suc. \n\t3. Uon, thoi. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi ngu noi nhi nhuc bai bat thuc 魚餒而肉敗不食 (Huong dang 鄉黨) ca uon, thit thoi chang an.
馁=noi [nei3]\n\t1. Doi, doi ret goi la dong noi 凍餒. \n\t2. Duoi. Nhu khi noi 氣餒 duoi hoi, kem suc. \n\t3. Uon, thoi. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi ngu noi nhi nhuc bai bat thuc 魚餒而肉敗不食 (Huong dang 鄉黨) ca uon, thit thoi chang an.
餓=nga [e4]\n\t1. Doi qua.
饿=nga [e4]\n\t1. Doi qua.
餔=bo [bu1]\n\t1. Bua com qua trua, an vao khoang mot hai gio chieu goi la bo. \n\t2. Nhat bo 日餔 xe chieu. \n\t3. An, an uong tham lam goi la bo xuyet 餔啜.
餕=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Do an thua. Nhu sach Le ky 禮記 noi tuan du bat te 餕餘不祭 do an thua khong te nua. \n\t2. An thua.
餖=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Xem chu dinh 飣.
餗=toc [su4]\n\t1. Do an com, do dung trong cai vac. Kinh Dich 易經 co cau dinh chiet tuc, phuc cong toc 鼎折足，覆公餗 vac gay chan, do do chua cua nha vua. Vi the nen ke nao khong lam noi viec de den hong viec goi la phuc toc 覆餗.
餘=du [yu2]\n\t1. Thua, phan cung nhieu hon phan cau, thi cai phan thua ay goi la du. Nhu nong huu du tuc 農有餘粟 nha lam ruong co thoc thua. \n\t2. Ngoai ra, thua ra, la mot loi noi vo qua, chi noi phan quan trong, chi noi qua thoi. \n\t3. Roi nhan. Nhu cong du 公餘 luc viec quan xong con thua thi gio roi nhan. \n\t4. So le ra. \n\t5. Ho Du.
馀=du [yu2]\n\t1. Thua, phan cung nhieu hon phan cau, thi cai phan thua ay goi la du. Nhu nong huu du tuc 農有餘粟 nha lam ruong co thoc thua. \n\t2. Ngoai ra, thua ra, la mot loi noi vo qua, chi noi phan quan trong, chi noi qua thoi. \n\t3. Roi nhan. Nhu cong du 公餘 luc viec quan xong con thua thi gio roi nhan. \n\t4. So le ra. \n\t5. Ho Du.
餙=suc [chi4]\n\t1. Co khi dung nhu chu suc 飾.
餚=hao [yao2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hao 肴.
餛=hon [hun2]\n\t1. Xem chu don 飩 o tren.
馄=hon [hun2]\n\t1. Xem chu don 飩 o tren.
餞=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Ruou tien, lam tiec de tien chan nguoi di xa goi la tien. Nhu tien biet 餞別 tien dua. \n\t2. Lay duong ngam cac thu qua goi la mat tien 蜜餞 mut.
饯=tien [jian4]\n\t1. Ruou tien, lam tiec de tien chan nguoi di xa goi la tien. Nhu tien biet 餞別 tien dua. \n\t2. Lay duong ngam cac thu qua goi la mat tien 蜜餞 mut.
餠=binh [bing3]\n\t1. Banh. Nhao bot voi duong nan tron tron, cho vao lua say chin de an goi la binh. Nguoi lam banh goi la binh su 餅師, bot nau goi la thang binh 湯餅. Ngay xua nha nao de con, phan nhieu lam banh de thet khach goi la thang binh hoi 湯餅會.
餡=ham [xian4]\n\t1. Nhan banh. Nhu dau sa ham 豆沙餡 nhan dau xanh.
馅=ham [xian4]\n\t1. Nhan banh. Nhu dau sa ham 豆沙餡 nhan dau xanh.
餧=uy, noi [wei4]\n\t1. Chan nuoi. Cho giong muong an goi la uy. Mot am la noi. Doi.
館=quan [guan3]\n\t1. Quan tro. \n\t2. Cho o, de o. \n\t3. Ten cac so quan. Nhu nha Duong 唐 co Hoang Van quan 弘文館. Nha Tong 宋 co Chieu Van quan 昭文館. Ban Han lam vien nha Thanh 清 co Thu Thuong quan 庶常館. Vi the nen chuc quan trong vien goi la luu quan 留館, bo ra cac bo hay phu huyen goi la tan quan 散館. \n\t4. Nha quan o goi la cong quan 公館. \n\t5. Nha hoc. Nhu thon quan 村館 nha hoc trong lang. \n\t6. Pham nha van si lam viec ma duoc mieng an cua nguoi cung don deu goi la quan.
馆=quan [guan3]\n\t1. Quan tro. \n\t2. Cho o, de o. \n\t3. Ten cac so quan. Nhu nha Duong 唐 co Hoang Van quan 弘文館. Nha Tong 宋 co Chieu Van quan 昭文館. Ban Han lam vien nha Thanh 清 co Thu Thuong quan 庶常館. Vi the nen chuc quan trong vien goi la luu quan 留館, bo ra cac bo hay phu huyen goi la tan quan 散館. \n\t4. Nha quan o goi la cong quan 公館. \n\t5. Nha hoc. Nhu thon quan 村館 nha hoc trong lang. \n\t6. Pham nha van si lam viec ma duoc mieng an cua nguoi cung don deu goi la quan.
餬=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Chao nhu. \n\t2. Ho. Lay bot hoa voi nuoc dun chin de dan goi la ho. \n\t3. Ho khau 餬口 lot mieng, y noi an khong cau gi thich mieng, chi mien la du song thoi. Vi the nen di xa kiem an goi la ho khau tu phuong 餬口四方.
餮=thiet [tie4]\n\t1. Xem chu thao 饕.
餱=hau [hou2]\n\t1. Luong kho.
餲=e, ai, at [ai4]\n\t1. Bien mui. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi tu y nhi e bat thuc 食饐而餲不食 (Huong dang 鄉黨) com nat ma thiu chang an. Cung doc la chu ai, chu at.
餳=duong [tang2|xing2]\n\t1. Keo mam, keo mach nha.
饧=duong [tang2|xing2]\n\t1. Keo mam, keo mach nha.
餵=uy [wei4]\n\t1. Chan nuoi. Tuc dung nhu chu uy 餧.
餺=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Xem chu thac 飥.
餻=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Banh ngot. Luc dau cao 綠豆餻 banh dau xanh.
餼=hi, hi, khai [xi4]\n\t1. Tang luong an. \n\t2. Cap luong. Phep nha Minh 明, nha Thanh 清 he hoc tro nao duoc vao hang tot thi nha nuoc cap luong cho an thi goi la lam sinh 廩生, duoc bo vao hang lam sinh goi la thuc hi 食餼. \n\t3. Con muong song. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi Tu Cong duc khu coc (cao) soc chi hi duong 子貢欲去告朔之餼羊 (Bat dat 八佾) Thay Tu Cong muon bo viec dang de song trong le Cao soc (ngay mong mot) di. Vi luc bay gio cai le Coc soc da bo roi ma van con chieu le dung de song nen noi the. Cung doc la chu hi. Con doc la khai.
饩=hi, hi, khai [xi4]\n\t1. Tang luong an. \n\t2. Cap luong. Phep nha Minh 明, nha Thanh 清 he hoc tro nao duoc vao hang tot thi nha nuoc cap luong cho an thi goi la lam sinh 廩生, duoc bo vao hang lam sinh goi la thuc hi 食餼. \n\t3. Con muong song. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi Tu Cong duc khu coc (cao) soc chi hi duong 子貢欲去告朔之餼羊 (Bat dat 八佾) Thay Tu Cong muon bo viec dang de song trong le Cao soc (ngay mong mot) di. Vi luc bay gio cai le Coc soc da bo roi ma van con chieu le dung de song nen noi the. Cung doc la chu hi. Con doc la khai.
餽=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Dua tang, dua lam qua. Cung nghia voi chu quy 饋.
餾=luu [liu2|liu4]\n\t1. Hoi com boc len, com da chin goi la luu.
馏=luu [liu2|liu4]\n\t1. Hoi com boc len, com da chin goi la luu.
餿=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Meo chua, oi, thiu. Do an de lau sinh ra meo chua goi la suu.
馊=suu [sou1]\n\t1. Meo chua, oi, thiu. Do an de lau sinh ra meo chua goi la suu.
饁=diep, ap [ye4]\n\t1. Dem com ra dong cho nguoi lam ruong an (ta goi la dua com). Cung doc la chu ap.
饅=man [man2]\n\t1. Bot u cho len bot roi dem hap an goi la man dau 饅頭 banh bo chen, banh bot hap.
馒=man [man2]\n\t1. Bot u cho len bot roi dem hap an goi la man dau 饅頭 banh bo chen, banh bot hap.
饇=oc [yu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu oc 飫.
饈=tu [xiu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tu 羞.
馐=tu [xiu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu tu 羞.
饉=can [jin3]\n\t1. Doi rau. Nam mat mua goi la co can 饑饉.
馑=can [jin3]\n\t1. Doi rau. Nam mat mua goi la co can 饑饉.
饊=tan [san3]\n\t1. Banh ran, banh re. Ngay xua goi la han cu 寒具, bay gio goi la tan tu 饊子.
饋=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Bieu, dem cac mon an dang bieu nguoi tren goi la quy. \n\t2. Dua tang, lam qua.
馈=quy [kui4]\n\t1. Bieu, dem cac mon an dang bieu nguoi tren goi la quy. \n\t2. Dua tang, lam qua.
饌=soan [zhuan4]\n\t1. Co. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi huu thinh soan tat bien sac nhi tac 有盛饌必變色而作 (Huong dang 鄉黨) co thet co to at bien sac mat ma dung day (to y cam kich). \n\t2. An uong.
馔=soan [zhuan4]\n\t1. Co. Nhu sach Luan Ngu 論語 noi huu thinh soan tat bien sac nhi tac 有盛饌必變色而作 (Huong dang 鄉黨) co thet co to at bien sac mat ma dung day (to y cam kich). \n\t2. An uong.
饐=y [yi4]\n\t1. Com nat, com thiu. Xem them chu e 餲.
饑=co, ky [ji1]\n\t1. Nam mat mua, doi com, mat mua lua goi la co. \n\t2. Doi, cung nghia voi chu co 飢. Co khi doc la chu ky.
饒=nhieu [rao2]\n\t1. Nhieu, day du. Nhu phu nhieu 富饒 giau co day du. \n\t2. Khoan dung, tha, tha loi cho nguoi goi la nhieu. \n\t3. Ho Nhieu.
饶=nhieu [rao2]\n\t1. Nhieu, day du. Nhu phu nhieu 富饒 giau co day du. \n\t2. Khoan dung, tha, tha loi cho nguoi goi la nhieu. \n\t3. Ho Nhieu.
饔=ung [yong1]\n\t1. An chin. \n\t2. Bua com sang.
饕=thao [tao1]\n\t1. Thao thiet 饕餮 ten mot giong ac thu. \n\t2. Ngay xua dung lam cai tieng rieng de goi nhung ke hung ac, tham an tham uong.
饗=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Thet. Le thet khach trong the nhat goi la huong 饗, thu nua goi la yen 宴. \n\t2. Te hop dong, te chung ca lam mot goi la huong. \n\t3. Huong thu, cung nghia voi chu huong 享.
飨=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Thet. Le thet khach trong the nhat goi la huong 饗, thu nua goi la yen 宴. \n\t2. Te hop dong, te chung ca lam mot goi la huong. \n\t3. Huong thu, cung nghia voi chu huong 享.
饘=chien [zhan1]\n\t1. Chao dac. Chao dac goi la chien 饘, chao loang goi la chuc 粥.
饜=yem [yan4]\n\t1. No chan. Nhu yem tuc 饜足 no du, thoa man.
餍=yem [yan4]\n\t1. No chan. Nhu yem tuc 饜足 no du, thoa man.
饝=ma [mo2]\n\t1. Nguoi phuong bac goi thu banh bot to la ma ma 饝饝.
饞=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Tham an, tham cua.
馋=sam [chan2]\n\t1. Tham an, tham cua.
饟=huong [xiang3]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu huong 餉.
首=thu, thu [shou3]\n\t1. Dau. Nhu khe thu 稽首 lay dap dau. Dan goi la kiem thu 黔首 noi nhung ke trai tre toc den co the ganh vac moi viec cho nha nuoc vay. \n\t2. Chua, chuc tong thong hay vua cai tri ca nuoc goi la nguyen thu 元首. \n\t3. Ke trum truong, ke linh tu mot phai nao goi la thu linh 首領. \n\t4. Nguoi dung buc nhat cung goi la thu. Nhu nguoi co cong thu nhat goi la thu cong 首功, giau co nhat goi la thu phu 首富, v.v. \n\t5. Truoc nhat. Nhu chon kinh su goi la thu thien chi khu 首善之區 mot noi phong khi mo mang truoc nhat. \n\t6. Thien, bai, mot bai tho hay mot bai van goi la nhat thu 一首. \n\t7. Mot am la thu. Tu ra thu toi goi la xuat thu 出首 hay tu thu 自首.
馘=quac [guo2]\n\t1. Tai da cat ra, giet duoc giac ma dem cai tai ben tay trai ve trinh goi la quac.
香=huong [xiang1]\n\t1. Hoi thom. \n\t2. Pham thu cay co nao co chat thom deu goi la huong. Nhu dan huong 檀香 cay dan thom, ta goi la tram bach. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Nhat chu dan huong tieu tue nghiep 一炷檀香消慧業 (Vong Quan Am mieu 望觀音廟) dot nen huong dan de tieu tan nghiep chuong do tri tue gay ra. \n\t3. Loi khen lao.
馥=phuc, phoc [fu4]\n\t1. Hoi thom. Thom ngat ngao. Cung doc la chu phoc.
馨=hinh [xin1]\n\t1. Thom lung. Mui thom xa goi la hinh. Lam duoc su gi tot tieng thom truyen mai mai cung goi la hinh. \n\t2. Mot am la han. Ngay xua dung lam loi tro tu. Nhu ninh han nhi 寧馨兒 dua be ay.
馬=ma [ma3]\n\t1. Con ngua. Xem tuong ngua phai xem rang truoc, vi the nen noi nhun so tuoi cua minh cung keu la ma xi 馬齒. \n\t2. Cai the ghi so dem. \n\t3. Ho Ma.
马=ma [ma3]\n\t1. Con ngua. Xem tuong ngua phai xem rang truoc, vi the nen noi nhun so tuoi cua minh cung keu la ma xi 馬齒. \n\t2. Cai the ghi so dem. \n\t3. Ho Ma.
馭=ngu [yu4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu ngu 御. \n\t2. Tiet che ke duoi. Nhu ngu ha 馭下 tiet che ke duoi cho khoi lam sang.
驭=ngu [yu4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu ngu 御. \n\t2. Tiet che ke duoi. Nhu ngu ha 馭下 tiet che ke duoi cho khoi lam sang.
馮=phung, bang [feng2]\n\t1. Ho Phung. \n\t2. Mot am la bang. Tua. Cung nhu chu bang 憑. \n\t3. Bang ha 馮河 loi song tay khong, y noi huu dung vo muu. Luan ngu 論語. Bao ho bang ha, tu nhi vo hoi gia, ngo bat du da 暴虎馮河，死而無悔者，吾不與也 (Thuat nhi 述而) tay khong ma bat cop, khong thuyen ma loi qua song, chet khong tiec than, ke ay ta khong cho theo giup ta. \n\t4. Ngua di nhanh. \n\t5. Day ua. \n\t6. Noi gian dung dung. \n\t7. Lan hiep. \n\t8. Giup. \n\t9. Nho cay.
冯=phung, bang [feng2]\n\t1. Ho Phung. \n\t2. Mot am la bang. Tua. Cung nhu chu bang 憑. \n\t3. Bang ha 馮河 loi song tay khong, y noi huu dung vo muu. Luan ngu 論語. Bao ho bang ha, tu nhi vo hoi gia, ngo bat du da 暴虎馮河，死而無悔者，吾不與也 (Thuat nhi 述而) tay khong ma bat cop, khong thuyen ma loi qua song, chet khong tiec than, ke ay ta khong cho theo giup ta. \n\t4. Ngua di nhanh. \n\t5. Day ua. \n\t6. Noi gian dung dung. \n\t7. Lan hiep. \n\t8. Giup. \n\t9. Nho cay.
馱=da, da [duo4|tuo2]\n\t1. Ngua cong (do xep tren lung ngua), ngua tho. Noi rong ra pham dung suc ma cong ma vac deu goi la da. \n\t2. Mot am la da. Cai do de vac.
驮=da, da [duo4|tuo2]\n\t1. Ngua cong (do xep tren lung ngua), ngua tho. Noi rong ra pham dung suc ma cong ma vac deu goi la da. \n\t2. Mot am la da. Cai do de vac.
馳=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Dong ruoi, ta cai dang xe ngua chay nhanh. \n\t2. Theo duoi. Nhu than tri 神馳 than theo duoi ve cai gi. Tha ly khai gia huong di cuu, thuong tai mong trung than tri to quoc ha son 他離開家鄉已久，常在夢中神馳祖國河山 anh ay cach xa que huong da lau, trong mong thuong de than tri doi ve to quoc giang son. \n\t3. Tri danh 馳名 nuc tieng, y noi cai tieng hay no tran khap ca cac noi vay. \n\t4. Duoi.
驰=tri [chi2]\n\t1. Dong ruoi, ta cai dang xe ngua chay nhanh. \n\t2. Theo duoi. Nhu than tri 神馳 than theo duoi ve cai gi. Tha ly khai gia huong di cuu, thuong tai mong trung than tri to quoc ha son 他離開家鄉已久，常在夢中神馳祖國河山 anh ay cach xa que huong da lau, trong mong thuong de than tri doi ve to quoc giang son. \n\t3. Tri danh 馳名 nuc tieng, y noi cai tieng hay no tran khap ca cac noi vay. \n\t4. Duoi.
馴=tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Quen, lanh. Ngua tap da thuan theo nhu y nguoi goi la tuan. Noi rong ra pham vat gi du ton ma ren tap cho deu theo nhu y minh deu goi la tuan. \n\t2. Hay. Van chuong hay goi la nha tuan 雅馴. \n\t3. Dan dan, su gi no dan dan den goi la tuan chi 馴至.
驯=tuan [xun4]\n\t1. Quen, lanh. Ngua tap da thuan theo nhu y nguoi goi la tuan. Noi rong ra pham vat gi du ton ma ren tap cho deu theo nhu y minh deu goi la tuan. \n\t2. Hay. Van chuong hay goi la nha tuan 雅馴. \n\t3. Dan dan, su gi no dan dan den goi la tuan chi 馴至.
馹=nhat [ri4]\n\t1. Chay ngua tram. Dung ngua de truyen tin tuc goi la nhat 馹, dung xe goi la truyen 傳.
駁=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Loang lo. Co nhieu mau sac khac nhau goi la bac. Nguyen la noi ve ngua, ve sau cung dung de noi ve do. \n\t2. Lan lon. Su vat gi lan lon khong co thu tu goi la bac tap 駁雜. \n\t3. Bac di, phan doi loi ban bac cua nguoi ta va chi trich cho sai lam ra goi la bac. Co khi viet la 駮. \n\t4. Tuc goi su khuan xep do hang la bac. Nhu bac thuyen 駁船 xep hang xuong thuyen, bac ngan 駁岸 xep hang len bo.
驳=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Loang lo. Co nhieu mau sac khac nhau goi la bac. Nguyen la noi ve ngua, ve sau cung dung de noi ve do. \n\t2. Lan lon. Su vat gi lan lon khong co thu tu goi la bac tap 駁雜. \n\t3. Bac di, phan doi loi ban bac cua nguoi ta va chi trich cho sai lam ra goi la bac. Co khi viet la 駮. \n\t4. Tuc goi su khuan xep do hang la bac. Nhu bac thuyen 駁船 xep hang xuong thuyen, bac ngan 駁岸 xep hang len bo.
駈=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khu 驅.
駉=quynh [jiong3]\n\t1. Quynh quynh 駉駉 luc luong, ta cai dang ngua luc luong khoe manh.
駐=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Dong. Xe ngua do lai nghi goi la tru. Luu o lai cho nao cung goi la tru. Nhu dong o cho mo lam viec goi la tru trat mo xu 駐紮某處. Di su dong o nuoc ngoai cung goi la tru. Nhu dong o nuoc Anh goi la tru Anh 駐英, dong o nuoc Phap goi la tru Phap 駐法.
驻=tru [zhu4]\n\t1. Dong. Xe ngua do lai nghi goi la tru. Luu o lai cho nao cung goi la tru. Nhu dong o cho mo lam viec goi la tru trat mo xu 駐紮某處. Di su dong o nuoc ngoai cung goi la tru. Nhu dong o nuoc Anh goi la tru Anh 駐英, dong o nuoc Phap goi la tru Phap 駐法.
駑=no [nu2]\n\t1. Ngua hen nhat. \n\t2. Pham tai nang kem hen cung goi la no. Phan nhieu dung lam chu noi tu nhun minh. Nhu no tai 駑才 tai hen kem.
驽=no [nu2]\n\t1. Ngua hen nhat. \n\t2. Pham tai nang kem hen cung goi la no. Phan nhieu dung lam chu noi tu nhun minh. Nhu no tai 駑才 tai hen kem.
駒=cau [ju1]\n\t1. Ngua hai tuoi goi la cau. Pham ngua con non con khoe deu goi la cau ca. Vi the khen cac con em co tai khi hon nguoi goi la thien ly cau 千里駒.
驹=cau [ju1]\n\t1. Ngua hai tuoi goi la cau. Pham ngua con non con khoe deu goi la cau ca. Vi the khen cac con em co tai khi hon nguoi goi la thien ly cau 千里駒.
駔=tang, to [zang3]\n\t1. Ngua khoe. Ke lai cho giao hoat goi la tang quai 駔儈. \n\t2. Mot am la to. Cung nghia voi chu to 組.
驵=tang, to [zang3]\n\t1. Ngua khoe. Ke lai cho giao hoat goi la tang quai 駔儈. \n\t2. Mot am la to. Cung nghia voi chu to 組.
駕=gia [jia4]\n\t1. Dong xe ngua (dong ngua vao xe). \n\t2. Gia ngu. Nhu trang gia vien ngu 長駕遠馭 tiet che duoc ca phuong xa. \n\t3. Xe co. Nhu vua xuat hanh co chia ra dai gia 大駕 va phap gia 法駕. Dai gia la noi ve chuyen di co nhieu xe theo hau, phap gia la noi ve chuyen di co it xe theo hau. Song deu goi tat la gia. Vi the nen goi su vua xuat hanh la gia. \n\t4. Mot tieng dung de xung ho ton trong nguoi khac. Nhu ta on nguoi ta den tham minh goi la lao gia 勞駕, uoc hen don nguoi ta den choi goi la tuc gia 夙駕. \n\t5. Tien hanh. Nhu trinh do trinh do tien ngang nhau goi la tinh gia te khu 並駕齊驅. Cung co khi goi la phuong gia te khu 方駕齊驅. \n\t6. Biet gia 別駕 mot chuc quan giup viec quan thu su, cung nhu chuc thong phan bay gio.
驾=gia [jia4]\n\t1. Dong xe ngua (dong ngua vao xe). \n\t2. Gia ngu. Nhu trang gia vien ngu 長駕遠馭 tiet che duoc ca phuong xa. \n\t3. Xe co. Nhu vua xuat hanh co chia ra dai gia 大駕 va phap gia 法駕. Dai gia la noi ve chuyen di co nhieu xe theo hau, phap gia la noi ve chuyen di co it xe theo hau. Song deu goi tat la gia. Vi the nen goi su vua xuat hanh la gia. \n\t4. Mot tieng dung de xung ho ton trong nguoi khac. Nhu ta on nguoi ta den tham minh goi la lao gia 勞駕, uoc hen don nguoi ta den choi goi la tuc gia 夙駕. \n\t5. Tien hanh. Nhu trinh do trinh do tien ngang nhau goi la tinh gia te khu 並駕齊驅. Cung co khi goi la phuong gia te khu 方駕齊驅. \n\t6. Biet gia 別駕 mot chuc quan giup viec quan thu su, cung nhu chuc thong phan bay gio.
駘=dai, thai, dai [dai4|tai2]\n\t1. Con ngua hen. Nguoi hen dot cung goi la no dai 駕駘. Co khi doc la thai. \n\t2. Mot am la dai. Dai dang 駘蕩 quang dang bao la.
骀=dai, thai, dai [dai4|tai2]\n\t1. Con ngua hen. Nguoi hen dot cung goi la no dai 駕駘. Co khi doc la thai. \n\t2. Mot am la dai. Dai dang 駘蕩 quang dang bao la.
駙=phu, pho [fu4]\n\t1. Con ngua dong kem ben xe. \n\t2. Phu ma do uy 駙馬都尉 mot quan chuc doi nha Han 漢. Tu doi nha Tan 晉 tro ve sau, ai lay cong chua tat duoc phong vao chuc ay, vi the nen chang re cua vua goi la phu ma 駙馬. Cung doc la pho. \n\t3. Nhanh chong.
驸=phu, pho [fu4]\n\t1. Con ngua dong kem ben xe. \n\t2. Phu ma do uy 駙馬都尉 mot quan chuc doi nha Han 漢. Tu doi nha Tan 晉 tro ve sau, ai lay cong chua tat duoc phong vao chuc ay, vi the nen chang re cua vua goi la phu ma 駙馬. Cung doc la pho. \n\t3. Nhanh chong.
駛=su [shi3]\n\t1. Ngua chay nhanh. \n\t2. Di nhanh. \n\t3. Cho thuyen di.
驶=su [shi3]\n\t1. Ngua chay nhanh. \n\t2. Di nhanh. \n\t3. Cho thuyen di.
駝=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Lac da 駱駝 mot giong thu o chau Phi, tren lung co buou, rat tien xep do, trong bung co tui chua nuoc, dung de di qua cac be cat (sa mac). Co nhan cho la mot mon an quy trong tam mon an quy, bat tran 八珍.
驼=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Lac da 駱駝 mot giong thu o chau Phi, tren lung co buou, rat tien xep do, trong bung co tui chua nuoc, dung de di qua cac be cat (sa mac). Co nhan cho la mot mon an quy trong tam mon an quy, bat tran 八珍.
駟=tu [si4]\n\t1. Co xe bon ngua. Nhat ngon ky xuat, tu ma nan truy 一言既出，駟馬難追 mot loi noi ra, xe bon ngua cung kho duoi kip.
驷=tu [si4]\n\t1. Co xe bon ngua. Nhat ngon ky xuat, tu ma nan truy 一言既出，駟馬難追 mot loi noi ra, xe bon ngua cung kho duoi kip.
駢=bien [pian2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bien 騈.
骈=bien [pian2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu bien 騈.
駭=hai [hai4]\n\t1. Giat minh, ta cai dang giat nay minh. Nhu kinh hai 驚駭. \n\t2. Ngua so. \n\t3. Quay nhieu. \n\t4. Lay lam la lung. Nhu hai di 駭異. \n\t5. Tan di.
骇=hai [hai4]\n\t1. Giat minh, ta cai dang giat nay minh. Nhu kinh hai 驚駭. \n\t2. Ngua so. \n\t3. Quay nhieu. \n\t4. Lay lam la lung. Nhu hai di 駭異. \n\t5. Tan di.
駮=bac [bo2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu bac 駁.
駱=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Lac da 駱駝 mot giong thu o chau Phi, tren lung co buou, rat tien xep do, trong bung co tui chua nuoc, dung de di qua cac be cat (sa mac). Co nhan cho la mot mon an quy trong tam mon an quy, bat tran 八珍.
骆=lac [luo4]\n\t1. Lac da 駱駝 mot giong thu o chau Phi, tren lung co buou, rat tien xep do, trong bung co tui chua nuoc, dung de di qua cac be cat (sa mac). Co nhan cho la mot mon an quy trong tam mon an quy, bat tran 八珍.
駸=xam [qin1]\n\t1. Xam xam, vun vut, ta dang ngua di nhanh.
駿=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Con ngua tot. Nhu tuan ma 駿馬. Pham su gi cao lon nhanh nhen deu goi la goi la tuan ca. Nhu than thai tuan phat 神采駿發 tinh than sung man, ve mat tuoi sang. \n\t2. Nghiem chinh. \n\t3. Tai gioi.
骏=tuan [jun4]\n\t1. Con ngua tot. Nhu tuan ma 駿馬. Pham su gi cao lon nhanh nhen deu goi la goi la tuan ca. Nhu than thai tuan phat 神采駿發 tinh than sung man, ve mat tuoi sang. \n\t2. Nghiem chinh. \n\t3. Tai gioi.
騁=sinh [cheng3]\n\t1. Thang dong, chay thang miet mot mach, phi, phong. Nhu ma sinh 馬騁 ngua phi. \n\t2. Y tu van tu troi chay cung goi la sinh.
骋=sinh [cheng3]\n\t1. Thang dong, chay thang miet mot mach, phi, phong. Nhu ma sinh 馬騁 ngua phi. \n\t2. Y tu van tu troi chay cung goi la sinh.
騂=tuynh, tinh [xing1]\n\t1. Muong sinh sac do. Luan ngu 論語. Le nguu chi tu tuynh tha giac, tuy duc vat dung, son xuyen ky xa chu 犁牛之子騂且角，雖欲勿用，山川其舍諸 (Ung da 雍也) Con cua con bo lang long do ma sung ngay ngan, du nguoi ta khong muon dung (de cung te, vi che no la bo lang), nhung than nui than song dau co bo no. \n\t2. Ngua long do, ngua nhuom nhuom. \n\t3. Mat do lung. \n\t4. Cung doc la tinh.
騃=ngai, ngai [dai1]\n\t1. Lan than, ngu ngoc. Co khi doc la chu ngai.
騈=bien [pian2]\n\t1. Hai con ngua cung dong kem nhau. \n\t2. Pham vat gi lien kem voi nhau deu goi la bien. Nhu bien hiep 騈脅 xuong suon lien nhau. The van hai ve doi nhau goi la bien van 騈文.
騌=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 騣.
騎=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Cuoi ngua. \n\t2. Pham cuoi len cai gi ma buong hai chan xuong deu goi la ki. Nhu ki tuong 騎牆 xoac chan tren tuong. \n\t3. Ngua da dong yen cuong roi goi la ki. \n\t4. Quan cuoi ngua goi la ki binh 騎兵.
骑=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Cuoi ngua. \n\t2. Pham cuoi len cai gi ma buong hai chan xuong deu goi la ki. Nhu ki tuong 騎牆 xoac chan tren tuong. \n\t3. Ngua da dong yen cuong roi goi la ki. \n\t4. Quan cuoi ngua goi la ki binh 騎兵.
騏=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Ngua xam. \n\t2. Ngua tot.
骐=ky [qi2]\n\t1. Ngua xam. \n\t2. Ngua tot.
騐=nghiem [yan4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nghiem 驗.
騑=phi [fei1]\n\t1. Con ngua dong kem hai ben. Xe tu ma hai con trong goi la phuc, hai con ngoai goi la phi 騑.
騖=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Chay long. Nhu bang vu 旁騖, phiem vu 泛騖 deu nghia la dam quang, noi ke khong noi duong chinh ma di. \n\t2. Nhanh chong. \n\t3. Phong tung.
骛=vu [wu4]\n\t1. Chay long. Nhu bang vu 旁騖, phiem vu 泛騖 deu nghia la dam quang, noi ke khong noi duong chinh ma di. \n\t2. Nhanh chong. \n\t3. Phong tung.
騙=phien [pian4]\n\t1. Lua dao. Nhu phien tien 騙錢 lua dao tien bac. \n\t2. Nhay tot len lung ngua.
骗=phien [pian4]\n\t1. Lua dao. Nhu phien tien 騙錢 lua dao tien bac. \n\t2. Nhay tot len lung ngua.
騣=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Long bom ngua.
騧=qua, quai [gua1]\n\t1. Con ngua minh vang mom den. Co khi doc la chu quai.
騫=khien, kien [qian1]\n\t1. Thieu, sut me. \n\t2. Hat len, nghen dau len. \n\t3. Giat lay. \n\t4. Toi loi. \n\t5. Mot am la kien. Ngua hen.
骞=khien, kien [qian1]\n\t1. Thieu, sut me. \n\t2. Hat len, nghen dau len. \n\t3. Giat lay. \n\t4. Toi loi. \n\t5. Mot am la kien. Ngua hen.
騭=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Dinh. Nhu am chat 陰騭 tot xau hoa phuc deu boi troi dinh, nguoi khong the biet duoc. \n\t2. Phan bien, phan dinh. Nhu binh chat thi phi 評騭是非 phan xet phai trai. \n\t3. Ngua cai. \n\t4. Len, cuoi ngua len nui.
骘=chat [zhi4]\n\t1. Dinh. Nhu am chat 陰騭 tot xau hoa phuc deu boi troi dinh, nguoi khong the biet duoc. \n\t2. Phan bien, phan dinh. Nhu binh chat thi phi 評騭是非 phan xet phai trai. \n\t3. Ngua cai. \n\t4. Len, cuoi ngua len nui.
騰=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Ngua nhay chom. \n\t2. Boc len. Pham cai gi no boc len deu goi la dang. Nhu hoa khi thuong dang 化氣上騰 hoa hoi boc len. Gia do vat gi bong dat vot len goi la dang quy 騰貴. \n\t3. Nhay. \n\t4. Cuoi.
腾=dang [teng2]\n\t1. Ngua nhay chom. \n\t2. Boc len. Pham cai gi no boc len deu goi la dang. Nhu hoa khi thuong dang 化氣上騰 hoa hoi boc len. Gia do vat gi bong dat vot len goi la dang quy 騰貴. \n\t3. Nhay. \n\t4. Cuoi.
騶=so [zou1]\n\t1. Khi nguoi quan quy di ra, truoc co ke dep duong, sau co ke ho ve deu goi la so. Vi the nen goi ke di hau cua mot nguoi nao la tien so 前騶 hay so tung 騶從. \n\t2. Chuc quan coi ve viec xe ngua.
驺=so [zou1]\n\t1. Khi nguoi quan quy di ra, truoc co ke dep duong, sau co ke ho ve deu goi la so. Vi the nen goi ke di hau cua mot nguoi nao la tien so 前騶 hay so tung 騶從. \n\t2. Chuc quan coi ve viec xe ngua.
騷=tao [sao1]\n\t1. Quay nhieu. Nhu bat phu thu thue lam cho dan lo so khong yen goi la tao nhieu 騷擾. \n\t2. Doi Chien quoc 戰國 co ong Khuat Nguyen 屈原 lam ra tho Ly tao 離騷, noi gap su lo lang vay. Nguoi bat dac chi goi la lao tao 牢騷 bon chon, cung la noi cai y ay. Lai su phong nha cung goi la phong tao 風騷. Vi the goi cac lang tho la tao nhan 騷人.
骚=tao [sao1]\n\t1. Quay nhieu. Nhu bat phu thu thue lam cho dan lo so khong yen goi la tao nhieu 騷擾. \n\t2. Doi Chien quoc 戰國 co ong Khuat Nguyen 屈原 lam ra tho Ly tao 離騷, noi gap su lo lang vay. Nguoi bat dac chi goi la lao tao 牢騷 bon chon, cung la noi cai y ay. Lai su phong nha cung goi la phong tao 風騷. Vi the goi cac lang tho la tao nhan 騷人.
騸=phien [shan4]\n\t1. Con ngua duc thien. \n\t2. Tiep cay. \n\t3. Thien (hoan) trau, ngua.
骟=phien [shan4]\n\t1. Con ngua duc thien. \n\t2. Tiep cay. \n\t3. Thien (hoan) trau, ngua.
騾=loa [luo2]\n\t1. Con loa. Lua ngua giao hop nhau sinh ra con goi la loa.
骡=loa [luo2]\n\t1. Con loa. Lua ngua giao hop nhau sinh ra con goi la loa.
驀=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Mach nhien 驀然 bong nhung, cung nhu ta noi hot nhien, y noi suc thay ma giat minh. \n\t2. Len ngua. \n\t3. Sieu viet.
蓦=mach [mo4]\n\t1. Mach nhien 驀然 bong nhung, cung nhu ta noi hot nhien, y noi suc thay ma giat minh. \n\t2. Len ngua. \n\t3. Sieu viet.
驁=ngao, ngao [ao4]\n\t1. Ngua bat kham. \n\t2. Pham nguoi hay vat gi ma xac lac khong thuan deu goi la ngao. Co khi doc la ngao.
骜=ngao, ngao [ao4]\n\t1. Ngua bat kham. \n\t2. Pham nguoi hay vat gi ma xac lac khong thuan deu goi la ngao. Co khi doc la ngao.
驂=tham [can1]\n\t1. Con ngua dong kem ben xe. \n\t2. Dong xe ba ngua. \n\t3. Ke ngoi ben xe goi la tham thua 驂乘.
骖=tham [can1]\n\t1. Con ngua dong kem ben xe. \n\t2. Dong xe ba ngua. \n\t3. Ke ngoi ben xe goi la tham thua 驂乘.
驃=phieu [biao1|piao4]\n\t1. Con ngua vang lang trang. \n\t2. Khoe manh. Nha Han 漢 co chuc quan vo goi la phieu ki tuong quan 驃騎將軍. \n\t3. Dang ngua chay nhanh.
骠=phieu [biao1|piao4]\n\t1. Con ngua vang lang trang. \n\t2. Khoe manh. Nha Han 漢 co chuc quan vo goi la phieu ki tuong quan 驃騎將軍. \n\t3. Dang ngua chay nhanh.
驄=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Ngua trang xam.
骢=thong [cong1]\n\t1. Ngua trang xam.
驅=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Ruoi ngua, danh ngua cho chay nhanh. \n\t2. Duoi. Nhu la khu tru 驅除 xua duoi. \n\t3. Gia ngu. Nhu khu sach 驅策 dung cam noc cho ke duoi cu tuan lenh ma lam. \n\t4. Chay vay, bon tau. Gang suc vi nguoi goi la nguyen hieu tri khu 願效馳驅.
驱=khu [qu1]\n\t1. Ruoi ngua, danh ngua cho chay nhanh. \n\t2. Duoi. Nhu la khu tru 驅除 xua duoi. \n\t3. Gia ngu. Nhu khu sach 驅策 dung cam noc cho ke duoi cu tuan lenh ma lam. \n\t4. Chay vay, bon tau. Gang suc vi nguoi goi la nguyen hieu tri khu 願效馳驅.
驊=hoa [hua2]\n\t1. Hoa luu 驊驑 ten mot con ngua tot trong so tam con ngua tot cua ong Chu Muc Vuong 周穆王. Co khi dung nghia bong la nguoi co tai duc tot. Cung viet la hoa luu 驊騮.
骅=hoa [hua2]\n\t1. Hoa luu 驊驑 ten mot con ngua tot trong so tam con ngua tot cua ong Chu Muc Vuong 周穆王. Co khi dung nghia bong la nguoi co tai duc tot. Cung viet la hoa luu 驊騮.
驍=kieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Manh khoe nhanh nhen. Tuong manh goi la kieu tuong 驍將.
骁=kieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Manh khoe nhanh nhen. Tuong manh goi la kieu tuong 驍將.
驑=luu [liu2]\n\t1. Hoa luu 驊驑 ten mot con ngua tot trong so tam con ngua tot cua ong Chu Muc Vuong 周穆王. Co khi dung nghia bong la nguoi co tai duc tot. Cung viet la hoa luu 驊騮.
驕=kieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Ngua long, ngua cat. \n\t2. Kieu cang, len mat kieu ngao. Nhu kieu binh tat bai 驕兵必敗 quan kieu tat thua. \n\t3. Vam vo, luc luong.
骄=kieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Ngua long, ngua cat. \n\t2. Kieu cang, len mat kieu ngao. Nhu kieu binh tat bai 驕兵必敗 quan kieu tat thua. \n\t3. Vam vo, luc luong.
驗=nghiem [yan4]\n\t1. Chung nghiem. \n\t2. Nghiem xem. Nhu thi nghiem 試驗 thu nghiem. \n\t3. Hieu nghiem. Pham su gi ket qua tot khong ra ngoai cho y minh doan deu goi la nghiem. Su gi co thanh hieu cung goi la nghiem.
验=nghiem [yan4]\n\t1. Chung nghiem. \n\t2. Nghiem xem. Nhu thi nghiem 試驗 thu nghiem. \n\t3. Hieu nghiem. Pham su gi ket qua tot khong ra ngoai cho y minh doan deu goi la nghiem. Su gi co thanh hieu cung goi la nghiem.
驘=loa [luo2]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu loa 騾.
驚=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Ngua so hai. \n\t2. So. Pham cai gi lay lam so deu goi la kinh. \n\t3. Chung sai. Tre con phai chung sai so giat minh may, co chan co tay tron mat uon lung deu goi la kinh.
惊=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Ngua so hai. \n\t2. So. Pham cai gi lay lam so deu goi la kinh. \n\t3. Chung sai. Tre con phai chung sai so giat minh may, co chan co tay tron mat uon lung deu goi la kinh.
驛=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Ngua tram, dung ngua dua thu. Ngay xua dat cac tram de truyen dua van thu, moi tram co mot chuc quan coi giu, goi la dich thua 驛丞. \n\t2. Lac dich 絡驛 lien noi khong dut. Cung viet la 駱驛.
驿=dich [yi4]\n\t1. Ngua tram, dung ngua dua thu. Ngay xua dat cac tram de truyen dua van thu, moi tram co mot chuc quan coi giu, goi la dich thua 驛丞. \n\t2. Lac dich 絡驛 lien noi khong dut. Cung viet la 駱驛.
驝=thac [tuo2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thac 橐.
驟=sau [zhou4]\n\t1. Chot, thot nhien xay den khong kip phong bi goi la sau.
骤=sau [zhou4]\n\t1. Chot, thot nhien xay den khong kip phong bi goi la sau.
驢=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Con lua.
驴=lu [lu:2]\n\t1. Con lua.
驤=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Ngua chay nhanh ma cat dau cao goi la tuong. Nhu ngua nhay vot len goi la dang tuong 騰驤.
骧=tuong [xiang1]\n\t1. Ngua chay nhanh ma cat dau cao goi la tuong. Nhu ngua nhay vot len goi la dang tuong 騰驤.
驥=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Con ngua ki, ngay di nghin dam ma lai thuan. \n\t2. Nguoi tai gioi. \n\t3. Ki vi 驥尾 theo duoc nguoi gioi. Nguoi xua khen ong Nhan Tu 顏子 phuc tong duc Khong Tu 孔子 la phu ki vi nhi hanh ich hien 附驥尾而行益顯 theo sau ngua ki ma cong hanh cang ro ret. Bay gio noi danh ban voi nguoi la phu ki 附驥 la noi y ay.
骥=ki [ji4]\n\t1. Con ngua ki, ngay di nghin dam ma lai thuan. \n\t2. Nguoi tai gioi. \n\t3. Ki vi 驥尾 theo duoc nguoi gioi. Nguoi xua khen ong Nhan Tu 顏子 phuc tong duc Khong Tu 孔子 la phu ki vi nhi hanh ich hien 附驥尾而行益顯 theo sau ngua ki ma cong hanh cang ro ret. Bay gio noi danh ban voi nguoi la phu ki 附驥 la noi y ay.
驩=hoan [huan1]\n\t1. Nguyen la ten mot con ngua. Cung co khi dung nhu chu hoan 歡.
驪=ly [li2]\n\t1. Con ngua o. \n\t2. Ly cau 驪駒 mot bai tho tien biet ngay xua. Vi the van tu tang ke di xa goi la ly ca 驪歌. \n\t3. Ly chau 驪珠 hon ngoc chau o duoi co con ly long 驪龍. Tuc goi nhung cau van lot duoc het cho yeu uoc la tham ly dac chau 探驪得珠.
