骊=ly [li2]\n\t1. Con ngua o. \n\t2. Ly cau 驪駒 mot bai tho tien biet ngay xua. Vi the van tu tang ke di xa goi la ly ca 驪歌. \n\t3. Ly chau 驪珠 hon ngoc chau o duoi co con ly long 驪龍. Tuc goi nhung cau van lot duoc het cho yeu uoc la tham ly dac chau 探驪得珠.
骨=cot [gu1|gu3]\n\t1. Xuong, la mot phan cot yeu trong than the nguoi va vat. \n\t2. Cai cot, dung de lam cai mau de duc nan cac hinh dung deu goi la cot. \n\t3. Thu cot 次骨 khac sau vao. Gian nguoi khong quen goi la ham chi thu cot 銜之次骨. \n\t4. Cung coi. Nhu ke cu dung thang ma can, khong a dua ninh hot goi la cot nganh 骨鯁 (xuong ca). \n\t5. Nguoi chet.
骫=uy [wei3]\n\t1. Cong. Lam quan toa ma vi tinh rieng lam mo toi phap luat goi la uy phap 骫法. \n\t2. Chung duc.
骭=can [gan4]\n\t1. Xuong dui.
骯=khang [ang1]\n\t1. Khang tang 骯髒 minh may beo map. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tieng goi su do ban.
肮=khang [ang1]\n\t1. Khang tang 骯髒 minh may beo map. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tieng goi su do ban.
骰=dau [tou2]\n\t1. Dau tu 骰子 con xuc xac.
骱=gioi [jie4]\n\t1. Khop xuong. Nga gay xuong, loi khop xuong ra goi la thoat gioi 脫骱.
骳=bi [bi4]\n\t1. Uy bi 骫骳 cong queo, quanh co.
骷=kho [ku1]\n\t1. Kho lau 骷髏 cai dau lau nguoi chet, xac nguoi chet. Con goi la doc lau 髑髏.
骸=hai [hai2]\n\t1. Xuong dui. \n\t2. Hinh hai, tieng goi tom ca hinh the. Nguoi nao phong khoang goi la phong lang hinh hai 放浪形骸. \n\t3. Xuong chan. \n\t4. Xuong kho.
骼=cach [ge2]\n\t1. Xuong kho. \n\t2. Xuong cam thu. \n\t3. Bo xuong. \n\t4. Danh.
骽=thoi [tui3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu thoi 腿.
骾=nganh [geng3]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nganh 鯁.
髀=be [bi4]\n\t1. Dui ve. \n\t2. Xuong mat dau goi. \n\t3. Cay neu.
髁=khoa [ke1]\n\t1. Xuong dui.
髏=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Doc lau 髑髏 cai dau lau nguoi chet.
髅=lau [lou2]\n\t1. Doc lau 髑髏 cai dau lau nguoi chet.
髑=doc [du2]\n\t1. Doc lau 髑髏 cai dau lau nguoi chet.
髒=tang [zang1]\n\t1. Khang tang 骯髒 minh may beo map. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tieng goi su do ban.
髓=tuy [sui3]\n\t1. Tuy, chat mo o trong xuong. \n\t2. Che xuong cho tuy chay ra. \n\t3. Vat gi o trong co chat dong nhu mo deu goi la tuy. \n\t4. Tinh tuy, phan tinh hoa cua su vat.
體=the [ti1|ti3]\n\t1. Than the. Noi tat ca mot bo phan goi la toan the 全體. Noi rieng ve mot bo phan goi la nhat the 一體. Bon chan tay goi la tu the 四體. \n\t2. Hinh the. vat gi du cac chieu dai chieu rong chieu cao goi la the. \n\t3. Su gi co quy mo cach thuc nhat dinh deu goi la the. Nhu van the 文體 the van, tu the 字體 the chu, chinh the 政體, quoc the 國體, v.v. Lai noi nhu the che 體制 cach thuc van tu, the tai 體裁 the cach van tu, deu do nghia ay ca. \n\t4. Dat minh vao day. Nhu the sat 體察 dat minh vao day ma xet, the tuat 體恤 dat minh vao day ma xot thuong, v.v.\n\t5. Cung mot buc. Nhu nhat khai, nhat the 一體 suot luot the ca. \n\t6. Mot tieng trai lai voi chu dung 用 dung. Pham le hay phep gi da lam ra goi la dung 用. Con cai nguyen ly no bao ham o trong thi goi la the 體. Nhu noi ve le, thi su kinh la the, ma su hoa la dung vay.
体=the [ti1|ti3]\n\t1. Than the. Noi tat ca mot bo phan goi la toan the 全體. Noi rieng ve mot bo phan goi la nhat the 一體. Bon chan tay goi la tu the 四體. \n\t2. Hinh the. vat gi du cac chieu dai chieu rong chieu cao goi la the. \n\t3. Su gi co quy mo cach thuc nhat dinh deu goi la the. Nhu van the 文體 the van, tu the 字體 the chu, chinh the 政體, quoc the 國體, v.v. Lai noi nhu the che 體制 cach thuc van tu, the tai 體裁 the cach van tu, deu do nghia ay ca. \n\t4. Dat minh vao day. Nhu the sat 體察 dat minh vao day ma xet, the tuat 體恤 dat minh vao day ma xot thuong, v.v.\n\t5. Cung mot buc. Nhu nhat khai, nhat the 一體 suot luot the ca. \n\t6. Mot tieng trai lai voi chu dung 用 dung. Pham le hay phep gi da lam ra goi la dung 用. Con cai nguyen ly no bao ham o trong thi goi la the 體. Nhu noi ve le, thi su kinh la the, ma su hoa la dung vay.
髕=ban, tan [bin4]\n\t1. Cai xuong cot dau goi, cai xuong che ca dau goi. Co khi doc la chu tan. Thong dung nhu chu tan 臏.
髌=ban, tan [bin4]\n\t1. Cai xuong cot dau goi, cai xuong che ca dau goi. Co khi doc la chu tan. Thong dung nhu chu tan 臏.
高=cao [gao1]\n\t1. Cao. Trai lai voi thap. Nhu son cao thuy tham山高水深 nui cao song sau. \n\t2. Kieu, dat. Nhu noi gia kieu gia ha vay. \n\t3. Khong the voi toi duoc goi la cao. Nhu dao cao 道高. \n\t4. Cao thuong, khac han thoi tuc. Nhu cao nhan 高人 nguoi cao thuong. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Thach an cao nhan oc 石隱高人屋 (Dao Hoa dich dao trung 桃化驛道中) da che khuat nha bac cao nhan. \n\t5. Giong tieng len cao. Nhu cao ca 高歌 hat to, hat len giong. \n\t6. Quy, kinh. \n\t7. Nhieu, lon hon. Nhu cao nien 高年 bac lao nien, nhieu tuoi.
髟=tieu, buu [biao1]\n\t1. Toc dai luot thuot. Cung doc la chu buu.
髠=khon [kun1]\n\t1. Cat toc. Ngay xua co mot hinh phat cat toc, nha Han 漢 goi la khon kiem 髠鉗. Nha su cat toc nen cung goi la khon. \n\t2. Cay trui canh la cung goi la khon, nghia la xen het canh la. \n\t3. Cung viet la khon 髡.
髢=the [ti4]\n\t1. Toc muon, toc gia.
髣=phang [fang3]\n\t1. Phang phat 髣髴 lo mo. Hinh nhu co ma chua thay dich thuc goi la phang phat. Co khi viet la 彷佛.
髤=huu [xiu1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu huu 髹.
髥=nhiem [ran2]\n\t1. Rau mep, ria. \n\t2. Tuc goi nguoi nhieu rau la nhiem.
髦=mao [mao2]\n\t1. Cai cut. Tre con de mai toc cham long may goi la mao. Vi the nen hoc tro tre co tai goi la mao si 髦士, cung goi la thoi mao 時髦 nghia la dang thi tuoi tre vay. \n\t2. Bom ngua. \n\t3. Ken chon. \n\t4. Tai gioi.
髩=tan [bin4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tan 鬢.
髫=thieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Trai dao. Tre con de hai trai toc hai ben dau goi la thieu. Vi the nen goi luc con be la thuy thieu chi nien 垂髫之年 tuoi con de trai dao. Xem them chu phat 髮.
髭=ti [zi1]\n\t1. Rau tren mom. Rau moc chung quanh tren mom tren goi la ti.
髮=phat [fa4]\n\t1. Toc. Le doi xua luc nho deu bo xoa toc, luc lon len thi bui toc. Nhu noi thuc phat thu thu 束髮受書 bui toc di hoc, ket phat tong nhung 結髮從戎 bui toc ra linh, deu noi ve thi trai tre ca. Den luc gia goi la hoang phat 黃髮. Dao Uyen Minh 陶淵明. Nam nu y truoc, tat nhu ngoai nhan, hoang phat thuy thieu, tinh di nhien tu lac 男女衣著，悉如外人，黃髮垂髫，並怡然自樂 (Dao hoa nguyen ki 桃花源記) dan ong dan ba an ban deu giong nguoi ben ngoai, tu nhung nguoi gia toc bac toi nhung tre de trai dao, deu hon ho vui ve. \n\t2. Mot phan nghin cua mot tac goi la mot phat.
髯=nhiem [ran2]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu nhiem 髥.
髹=huu [xiu1]\n\t1. Son. \n\t2. Son cac do dac cung goi la huu.
髻=ke, ket [ji4]\n\t1. Cai bui toc. Cung doc la chu ket. \n\t2. Mot am la cat. Than bep, than tao.
鬁=li [li4]\n\t1. Thich li 鬁鬎 seo dau trui toc, cho nhot moc thanh seo toc khong moc duoc.
鬂=tan [-]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tan 鬢.
鬃=tong [zong1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tong 鬉.
鬄=the [ti4]\n\t1. Cat toc.
鬆=tong [song1]\n\t1. Toc roi bu, tuc goi la bong tong 蓬鬆. \n\t2. Long leo, khong duoc chac chan ben sac goi la phong tong 放鬆.
松=tong [song1]\n\t1. Toc roi bu, tuc goi la bong tong 蓬鬆. \n\t2. Long leo, khong duoc chac chan ben sac goi la phong tong 放鬆.
鬈=quyen [quan2]\n\t1. Toc tot dep. \n\t2. Toc chia ra tung mui, bui ra nhieu bui toc con. Nhu quyen phat 鬈髮 toc quan.
鬉=tong [song1]\n\t1. Bom, long tren co cac giong thu goi la tong. Co khi viet la 鬃. \n\t2. Toc roi.
鬋=tien [jian1]\n\t1. Toc mai cua dan ba buong thong xuong, toc mai long thong.
鬌=doa [duo3]\n\t1. Cai chom. Tre con cao dau con bot it toc lai goi la doa.
鬍=ho [hu2]\n\t1. Tuc goi chom rau la ho tu 鬍子.
鬎=thich [la4]\n\t1. Thich li 鬎鬁 seo dau trui toc, cho nhot moc thanh seo toc khong moc duoc.
鬐=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Bom ngua. \n\t2. Vay tren lung ca.
鬒=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Toc muot dep. Thi Kinh 詩經. Chan phat nhu van 鬒髮如雲 toc muot nhu may.
鬙=man [seng1]\n\t1. Toc muot.
鬚=tu [xu1]\n\t1. Rau cam. Vat gi co tua lua tua ra cung goi la tu. Nhu lien tu 蓮鬚 tua bong sen.
鬝=gian [qian1]\n\t1. Trui toc, hoi.
鬟=hoan [huan2]\n\t1. Quan toc lam dang. \n\t2. Con o. Tuc goi con doi la nha hoan 丫鬟.
鬢=tan, man [bin4]\n\t1. Toc mai, toc ben mai tai. Ta quen doc la chu man. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Van man hoa nhan kim bo dao, Phu dung truong noan do xuan tieu 雲鬢花顏金步搖，芙蓉帳暖度春霄 (Truong han ca 長恨歌) Mat nang dep nhu hoa, toc muot nhu may, cai chiec bo dao bang vang, trai qua dem xuan trong truong Phu Dung. Tan Da dich tho. Vang nhe buoc lung lay toc mai, Man phu dung em ai dem xuan.
鬓=tan, man [bin4]\n\t1. Toc mai, toc ben mai tai. Ta quen doc la chu man. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Van man hoa nhan kim bo dao, Phu dung truong noan do xuan tieu 雲鬢花顏金步搖，芙蓉帳暖度春霄 (Truong han ca 長恨歌) Mat nang dep nhu hoa, toc muot nhu may, cai chiec bo dao bang vang, trai qua dem xuan trong truong Phu Dung. Tan Da dich tho. Vang nhe buoc lung lay toc mai, Man phu dung em ai dem xuan.
鬣=liep [lie4]\n\t1. Rau. Nguoi rau dai goi la truong liep 長鬣. \n\t2. Long co (bom) cac giong thu cung goi la liep. Bom con lon goi la cuong liep 剛鬣. \n\t3. Cai vay ben mang ca.
鬥=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu dau 鬬 giong nhu hinh ke chien si doi nhau ma do binh de dang sau.
鬧=nhao, nao [nao4]\n\t1. Huyen nao, ram ri khong yen tinh goi la nhao. Cho nguoi tu hop chen chuc ram ri goi la nhiet nhao 熱鬧. Ta quen doc la nao.
闹=nhao, nao [nao4]\n\t1. Huyen nao, ram ri khong yen tinh goi la nhao. Cho nguoi tu hop chen chuc ram ri goi la nhiet nhao 熱鬧. Ta quen doc la nao.
鬨=hong [hong1]\n\t1. Tieng nguoi ram ri. \n\t2. Tieng danh nhau.
鬩=huych [xi4]\n\t1. Cai nhau, danh nhau. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau huynh de huych vu tuong, ngoai ngu ki vu 兄弟鬩于牆，外禦其務 anh em danh nhau o trong nha, co nguoi ngoai den an hiep, lai cung chong lai. Y noi anh em dau hiem oan nhau, nhung gap co ke ngoai lan ap, lai dong tam chong lai. Vi the nen anh em bat hoa cung goi la huych tuong 鬩牆.
鬪=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu dau 鬬.
鬫=ham [han3]\n\t1. Ham ham, gian du. \n\t2. Giong thu phat khung gam thet cung goi la ham.
鬬=dau [dou4]\n\t1. Chien tranh, danh nhau, dung suc ma tranh hon nhau goi la dau. \n\t2. Ganh thi. Pham nhung su tranh hon nhau deu goi la dau ca. Nhu dau tri 鬬智, dau phap 鬬法 nghia la dung tri dung phep ma tranh hon nhau. Tuc viet la 鬪.
鬮=cuu [jiu1]\n\t1. Gion lay, gap lay. Pham lam mot su gi ma muon mot vat khac de boi xem nen hay khong goi la tham cuu 探鬮 rut the. Tuc goi su mo sach khan boi de quyet nen chang la niem cuu 拈鬮.
阄=cuu [jiu1]\n\t1. Gion lay, gap lay. Pham lam mot su gi ma muon mot vat khac de boi xem nen hay khong goi la tham cuu 探鬮 rut the. Tuc goi su mo sach khan boi de quyet nen chang la niem cuu 拈鬮.
鬯=suong [chang4]\n\t1. Ruou nep. Dung nghe uop gao nep gay thanh ruou goi la suong. Dung de cung te quy than goi la ruou cu suong 秬鬯. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu suong 暢.
鬱=uat [yu4]\n\t1. Uat ket, uat tuc, khi no tu khong tan ra, ho ra goi la uat. Nhu uat ket 鬱結 uat uc, uat muon 鬱悶 bam buc, v.v. \n\t2. Hoi thoi. \n\t3. Hoi xong len, hoi nong hun len. \n\t4. Uat kim 鬱金 nghe.
鬲=cach, lich [ge2|li4]\n\t1. Ten mot nuoc ngay xua. \n\t2. Mot am la lich. Mot thu do ngay xua giong nhu cai dinh.
鬴=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Cai phu, mot thu de dong ngay xua, dung het sau dau bon thung.
鬵=tam [qian2]\n\t1. Cai cho lon, cai vac.
鬻=chuc, duc [yu4]\n\t1. Nguyen la chu chuc 粥 chao. \n\t2. Mot am la duc. Ban. Nhu duc van vi sinh 鬻文爲生 ban chu de song, viet van lam ke sinh nhai. \n\t3. Sinh duong. \n\t4. Non, tre tho. \n\t5. Nuoc chay trong khe.
鬼=quy [gui3]\n\t1. Ma, nguoi chet goi la quy. \n\t2. Quy quai. Nguoi tinh am hiem goi la quy vuc 鬼蜮. \n\t3. Sao Quy, mot ngoi sao trong nhi thap bat tu.
魁=khoi [kui2]\n\t1. Dau so, ke lam dau so ca mot dang goi la khoi. \n\t2. Do dau doi khoa cu lay nam kinh thi cac hoc tro, moi kinh loc lay mot nguoi dau goi la khoi, cho nen goi la ngu khoi 五魁 hay la kinh khoi 經魁. Do trang nguyen goi la dai khoi 大魁. \n\t3. Cao lon. Nhu nguoi trang mao vam vo phuong phi goi la khoi ngo 魁梧. \n\t4. Sao Khoi, sao Bac dau 北斗 tu ngoi thu nhat den ngoi thu tu goi la khoi. Tuc goi sao Khue 奎 la khoi tinh 魁星. Doi khoa cu cho ngoi sao ay lam chu ve van hoc nen thuong tho sao ay. \n\t5. Cai moi, cai moi muc canh goi la canh khoi 羹魁. \n\t6. Cac loai o duoi nuoc co mai nhu cai gao nhu con cua, con so, v.v. cung goi la khoi. \n\t7. Cu, cac loai thuc vat dau re moc ra cu goi la khoi.
魂=hon [hun2]\n\t1. Phan hon, la cai lam chua te ca phan tinh than. Nguoi ta luc song thi hon phach cung quan voi nhau, den luc chet thi hon phach lia nhau. Vi the moi bao than voi quy deu la hon hoa ra ca, vi no la mot vat rat thieng, thieng hon ca muon vat, cho nen lai goi la linh hon 靈魂. \n\t2. Ta ve cai canh cua y thuc. Nhu tieu hon 消魂 thich me, doan hon 斷魂 mat hon.
魃=bat [ba2]\n\t1. Than dai han, than nang.
魄=phach, thac, bac [bo2|po4|tuo4]\n\t1. Via. Pham vat gi tinh khi het kiet, chi con hinh chat lai goi la phach. \n\t2. Cho khong co anh sang. Vi the mat trang ngay mong mot goi la tu phach 死魄, mat trang ngay ram goi la sinh phach 生魄. \n\t3. Mot am la thac. Lac thac 落魄 bo vo, nguoi that nghiep khong noi nuong tua vay. \n\t4. Mot am la bac. Bang bac 旁魄 rong mong menh.
魅=mi [mei4]\n\t1. Si mi 魑魅 loai yeu quai o go da hoa ra.
魈=tieu [xiao1]\n\t1. Son tieu 山魈 mot vat yeu quai dem hay ra nat nguoi.
魊=vuc [yu4]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu vuc 蜮 dung voi chu quy vuc 鬼蜮. Mot con vat theo truyen thuyet co the ngam cat de ban vao nguoi.
魋=doi [tui2]\n\t1. Mot giong thu o rung.
魍=vong [wang3]\n\t1. Vong luong 魍魎 giong yeu quai o go da. Co khi viet la 罔兩. Con viet la 罔閬.
魎=luong [liang3]\n\t1. Vong luong 魍魎 giong yeu quai o go da. Co khi viet la 罔兩. Con viet la 罔閬.
魉=luong [liang3]\n\t1. Vong luong 魍魎 giong yeu quai o go da. Co khi viet la 罔兩. Con viet la 罔閬.
魏=nguy [wei4]\n\t1. Cao. Nguyen la chu nguy 巍. \n\t2. Nuoc Nguy 魏 (220—265), nay thuoc vao nam tinh Ha Nam 河南 va phia tay tinh Son Tay 山西. \n\t3. Nha Nguy 魏 (220-265). Tao Phi 曹丕 cuop ngoi nha Han 漢 len lam vua goi la nha Nguy. Sau mat ve nha Tan 晉. Den doi Dong Tan 東晉 lai co Dong Nguy 東魏   (534-550) va Tay Nguy 西魏 (534-556).
魑=si [chi1]\n\t1. Si mi 魑魅 loai yeu quai o go da hoa ra.
魔=ma [mo2]\n\t1. Ma quy. Cac cai lam cho nguoi ta me muoi, lam mat long dao deu goi la ma ca. \n\t2. Ham thich cai gi da thanh ra nghien cung goi la ma. \n\t3. Ma chuong. Cac thu lam chuong ngai duong tu. Nhu ma do tam sinh 魔由心生 ma chuong tu tam ma ra.
魕=ki [ji3]\n\t1. Diem go, ma quy.
魘=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Bong de, nam mo thay ma de, giat minh tinh day. Yem mi 魘魅 dung phep phu chu yem cau cho nguoi ta chet.
魇=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Bong de, nam mo thay ma de, giat minh tinh day. Yem mi 魘魅 dung phep phu chu yem cau cho nguoi ta chet.
魚=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Con ca. Co rat nhieu thu, ma thuong dung de lam do an, vi the nen goi su ha hiep nguoi khac la ngu nhuc 魚肉. Nhu the hao ngu nhuc huong ly 勢豪魚肉鄉里 ke cuong hao ha hiep dan trong lang xom.
鱼=ngu [yu2]\n\t1. Con ca. Co rat nhieu thu, ma thuong dung de lam do an, vi the nen goi su ha hiep nguoi khac la ngu nhuc 魚肉. Nhu the hao ngu nhuc huong ly 勢豪魚肉鄉里 ke cuong hao ha hiep dan trong lang xom.
魨=don [tun2]\n\t1. Ca lon be. Con co ten la ha don 河豚. Mot thu ca to hon mot thuoc, mieng be bung lon, khong co vay, lung xanh den ma co hoa lang lo, bung trang, he co vat gi cham den no thi no phong to nhu qua bong, noi len mat nuoc, thit rat ngon, nhung co cho doc la, thuong thuong an roi chet ngay.
魯=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Dan don. Tu chat khong duoc sang suot lanh loi goi la lo. \n\t2. Nuoc Lo 魯, thuoc vung Son Dong 山東 bay gio. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ha xu thanh hien tung bach ha ? Biet thanh huyen tung Lo Trau du 何處聖賢松柏下，別城絃誦魯鄒餘 Duoi cay tung cay ba, thanh hien o noi nao ? Trong thanh nuoc Lo nuoc Trau, tieng dan tieng doc sach van con lua.
鲁=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Dan don. Tu chat khong duoc sang suot lanh loi goi la lo. \n\t2. Nuoc Lo 魯, thuoc vung Son Dong 山東 bay gio. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ha xu thanh hien tung bach ha ? 鲂=phuong [fang2]\n\t1. Con ca phuong, ca me.
鮀=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Con ca nho hay chum mieng thoi cat. Tuc ca man 鰵 ca su.
鮆=te [ji4]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu te 鱭 con ca dao.
鮎=niem [nian2]\n\t1. Ca niem, ca mang. Minh tron ma dai, dau to duoi det, khong co vay, nhieu chat dinh, mom cong ma rong, hai ben ham moc rang nanh nho, co rau, lung xanh den, bung trang, co con lon dai den hai thuoc (Parasilurus asotus).
鮑=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Ca uop, mui tanh lai thoi. Vi the nhung noi do day xau xa goi la bao ngu chi tu 鮑魚之肆. \n\t2. Mot thu ca co mai, ta goi la bao ngu 鮑魚.
鲍=bao [bao4]\n\t1. Ca uop, mui tanh lai thoi. Vi the nhung noi do day xau xa goi la bao ngu chi tu 鮑魚之肆. \n\t2. Mot thu ca co mai, ta goi la bao ngu 鮑魚.

鮓=tra [zha3]\n\t1. Ca hop, ca muoi dong hop de danh an dan goi la tra.
鮝=tuong [xiang3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tuong 鯗.
鮠=ngoi, nguy [wei2]\n\t1. Ca ngoi, giong nhu ca niem ma to (Leiocassis longirostris). Cung doc la nguy.

鲔=vi [wei3]\n\t1. Ca vi, ca tam.
鮫=giao [jiao1]\n\t1. Ca giao, vay no an rat ngon. Co khi goi la sa ngu 沙魚.

鮭=khue, hai [gui1]\n\t1. Mot ten rieng cua con lon be, ca hoi. \n\t2. Mot am la hai. Nguoi dat Ngo goi dau ca la hai.
鮮=tien, tien [xian1|xian3]\n\t1. Ca tuoi. Ngay xua goi cac thu ca ba ba la tien thuc 鮮食. \n\t2. Tuoi, ca thit moi lam, rau qua moi hai deu goi la tien. Nhu tien hoa 鮮花 hoa tuoi. \n\t3. Tuc goi mui ngon la tien. \n\t4. Tot dep. Nhu tien minh 鮮明 tuoi dep, ruc ro, tien nghien 鮮妍 tuoi dep. \n\t5. Mot am la tien. It.
鲜=tien, tien [xian1|xian3]\n\t1. Ca tuoi. Ngay xua goi cac thu ca ba ba la tien thuc 鮮食. \n\t2. Tuoi, ca thit moi lam, rau qua moi hai deu goi la tien. Nhu tien hoa 鮮花 hoa tuoi. \n\t3. Tuc goi mui ngon la tien. \n\t4. Tot dep. Nhu tien minh 鮮明 tuoi dep, ruc ro, tien nghien 鮮妍 tuoi dep. \n\t5. Mot am la tien. It.
鮰=nguy [wei2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu nguy 鮠.

鲠=nganh [geng3]\n\t1. Xuong ca. \n\t2. Hoc xuong ca. \n\t3. Nguoi trung truc khong a dua ninh not ai goi la nganh 鯁 hay cot nganh 骨鯁.
鯈=du [chou2]\n\t1. Ca du. Trang Tu 莊子. Du ngu xuat du thung dung, thi ngu chi lac da 鯈魚出遊從容，是魚之樂也 ca du ra choi thong tha, do la niem vui cua ca. Nhuong Tong dich thoat. Kia dan ca luon lo boi choi, dan ca moi suong chu.
鯉=ly [li3]\n\t1. Ca chep. \n\t2. To boi. Nguoi nha Duong 唐 gui thu, thuong dung thuoc lua moc, xich to 尺素, tet thanh hinh nhu hai con ca chep, vi the nen goi thu tu la ly.
鲤=ly [li3]\n\t1. Ca chep. \n\t2. To boi. Nguoi nha Duong 唐 gui thu, thuong dung thuoc lua moc, xich to 尺素, tet thanh hinh nhu hai con ca chep, vi the nen goi thu tu la ly.
鯊=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Ca sa. Xem chu giao 鮫.
鲨=sa [sha1]\n\t1. Ca sa. Xem chu giao 鮫.
鯖=chinh, thinh [qing1]\n\t1. Cach nau nuong. Ca nau lan voi thit goi la chinh. Lau ho nha Han 漢 tung dem cac mon an quy cua Ngu Hau Vuong Thi tang nau lam do an, doi goi la ngu hau chinh 五侯鯖. Cung doc la thinh.
鲭=chinh, thinh [qing1]\n\t1. Cach nau nuong. Ca nau lan voi thit goi la chinh. Lau ho nha Han 漢 tung dem cac mon an quy cua Ngu Hau Vuong Thi tang nau lam do an, doi goi la ngu hau chinh 五侯鯖. Cung doc la thinh.

鯠=lai [lai2]\n\t1. Ca lai. Cung goi la thi ngu 鰣魚. \n\t2. Nguoi Quang Dong goi ca chay la tam lai ngu 三鯠魚.
鯢=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Con ca kinh (voi) cai goi la nghe.

鯨=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Ca kinh (voi). Hinh tuy giong ca ma thuc ra thuoc ve loai thu. Co con to dai den tam chin muoi thuoc. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ngao phu xuat son, son huu dong, Kinh du tac hai, hai vi tri 鰲負出山，山有洞，鯨遊塞海，海爲池 (Long Dai Nham, 龍袋岩) Con ba ba doi nui noi len, nui co dong, Ca kinh boi lap bien, bien thanh ao.
鲸=kinh [jing1]\n\t1. Ca kinh (voi). Hinh tuy giong ca ma thuc ra thuoc ve loai thu. Co con to dai den tam chin muoi thuoc. Nguyen Trai 阮薦. Ngao phu xuat son, son huu dong, Kinh du tac hai, hai vi tri 鰲負出山，山有洞，鯨遊塞海，海爲池 (Long Dai Nham, 龍袋岩) Con ba ba doi nui noi len, nui co dong, Ca kinh boi lap bien, bien thanh ao.
鯪=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Ca lang, ca dac. 2 Lang ly 鯪鯉 tuc la con xuyen son giap 穿山甲, con te te. Con viet la long ly 龍鯉.
鲮=lang [ling2]\n\t1. Ca lang, ca dac. 2 Lang ly 鯪鯉 tuc la con xuyen son giap 穿山甲, con te te. Con viet la long ly 龍鯉.
鯫=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Ca tep. \n\t2. Mot am la tau. Ta cai dang mat ke tieu nhan. Nguoi bay gio thuong tu noi nhun minh la tau sinh y noi minh la ke hen mon.
鲰=tuu [zou1]\n\t1. Ca tep. \n\t2. Mot am la tau. Ta cai dang mat ke tieu nhan. Nguoi bay gio thuong tu noi nhun minh la tau sinh y noi minh la ke hen mon.

鰂=tac [ze2]\n\t1. O tac 烏鰂 ca muc, co khi goi la mac ngu 墨魚. Mot ten la hai tieu sao 海鰾鮹.
鰈=diep [die2]\n\t1. Ca diep, ca bon, thu ca mat dinh lien nhau lech ve ben huu. Mot ten la vuong du ngu 王餘魚. Cung co ten la ti muc ngu 比目魚.
鲽=diep [die2]\n\t1. Ca diep, ca bon, thu ca mat dinh lien nhau lech ve ben huu. Mot ten la vuong du ngu 王餘魚. Cung co ten la ti muc ngu 比目魚.
鰉=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Ca hoang dai toi hai truong, lung co xuong boc nhu ao giap, mui dai, mo vang nhu sap ong, cu mot tung thit lai co mot tung mo, xuong song ma mui deu mem sun, dung nau an duoc. Mot ten la tam ngu cot 鱘魚骨.
鳇=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Ca hoang dai toi hai truong, lung co xuong boc nhu ao giap, mui dai, mo vang nhu sap ong, cu mot tung thit lai co mot tung mo, xuong song ma mui deu mem sun, dung nau an duoc. Mot ten la tam ngu cot 鱘魚骨.

鰭=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Vay ca, ca co vay moi boi di duoc. Vay o tren lung goi la tich ki 脊鰭, vay o nguc goi la hung ki 胸鰭, vay o bung goi la phuc ki 腹鰭, vay o gan duoi la vi ki 尾鰭.

鳩=cuu [jiu1]\n\t1. Con tu hu. Tinh no vung khong biet lam to, nen hay dung de noi vi nhung ke khong biet kinh doanh viec nha. No lai la mot loai chim an khong mac nghen bao gio, cho nen nhung gay cua nguoi gia chong hay khac hinh con cuu vao. Nhu cuu truong 鳩杖 gay khac hinh chim cuu. \n\t2. Hop. Nhu cuu cong phi tai 鳩工庀材 hop tho sam go de lam nha. \n\t3. Cuu hinh hoc dien 鳩形鵠面 hinh dung doi khat (nhu chim cuu), mat may vang vo (nhu con hoc). Cung nhu noi hinh dung kho cao 形容枯槁.
鸠=cuu [jiu1]\n\t1. Con tu hu. Tinh no vung khong biet lam to, nen hay dung de noi vi nhung ke khong biet kinh doanh viec nha. No lai la mot loai chim an khong mac nghen bao gio, cho nen nhung gay cua nguoi gia chong hay khac hinh con cuu vao. Nhu cuu truong 鳩杖 gay khac hinh chim cuu. \n\t2. Hop. 鳲=thi [shi1]\n\t1. Thi cuu 鳲鳩 con chim bo coc, chim cu, chim gay. Qua tiet coc vu roi no moi keu, qua tiet ha chi roi moi thoi. Tieng no nhu the giuc nguoi cay lua, cho nen goi la chim bo coc 布穀. Lai goi la chim quach cong 郭公.

鴇=bao [bao3]\n\t1. Chim bao, giong nhu con mong ma lang lo, chan khong co ngon sau. Ngay xua bao no la giong rat dam, cho nen goi di nha tho la bao nhi 鴇兒, me giau, tu ba la bao mau 鴇母.

鴒=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tich linh 鶺鴒 con chim chia voi. Kinh Thi 詩經 co cau tich linh tai nguyen, huynh de cap nan 鶺鴒在原，兄弟急難 con chim chia voi o dong, anh em hoan nan voi vang cuu vot nhau. Vi the noi ve anh em hay dung hai chu linh nguyen 鴒原.

鴛=uyen [yuan1]\n\t1. Uyen uong 鴛鴦 mot giong chim o nuoc hinh nhu con vit ma be (con le). Con duc thi tren co co long ma trang va dai, canh to ma dep, con cai thi khong co long ma, canh cung xau, thuong o trong song trong ho. Con duc goi la uyen, con cai goi la uong, di dau cung co doi khong roi nhau, vi the nen nguoi xua noi vi su vo chong hoa muc Cung viet la 鵷鷺.
鸳=uyen [yuan1]\n\t1. Uyen uong 鴛鴦 mot giong chim o nuoc hinh nhu con vit ma be (con le). 鴿=cap [ge1]\n\t1. Con chim bo cau. Co hai giong, giong da cap 野鴿 o rung hay an hai lua, giong gia cap 家鴿 la do da cap bien giong ra, bay rat cao, tri nho tot, cho dem di that xa moi tha cung biet bay ve, vi the nen ngay xua hay dung no de dua thu tu ve viec quan. Tuc goi la bot cap 鵓鴿.
鸽=cap [ge1]\n\t1. Con chim bo cau. Co hai giong, giong da cap 野鴿 o rung hay an hai lua, giong gia cap 家鴿 la do da cap bien giong ra, bay rat cao, tri nho tot, cho dem di that xa moi tha cung biet bay ve, vi the nen ngay xua hay dung no de dua thu tu ve viec quan. Tuc goi la bot cap 鵓鴿.

鵑=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Do quyen 杜鵑 con quoc. Co cho goi la tu quy 子規. Con goi la do vu 杜宇. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ai trung xuc xu minh kim thach, Oan huyet qui thoi hoa do quyen 哀衷觸處鳴金石，怨血歸時化杜鵑 (Do Hoai huu cam Van Thua Tuong 渡淮有感文丞相) Noi thuong cam thot ra cho nao deu reo tieng vang tieng da, Mau oan han luc tro ve hoa thanh chim cuoc. Quach Tan dich tho. Long thom cham tro loi kim thach, Mau han trao soi kiep tu quy. \n\t2. Hoa do quyen. Co khi goi tat la hoa quyen.
鹃=quyen [juan1]\n\t1. Do quyen 杜鵑 con quoc. Co cho goi la tu quy 子規. Con goi la do vu 杜宇. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Ai trung xuc xu minh kim thach, Oan huyet qui thoi hoa do quyen 哀衷觸處鳴金石，怨血歸時化杜鵑 (Do Hoai huu cam Van Thua Tuong 渡淮有感文丞相) Noi thuong cam thot ra cho nao deu reo tieng vang tieng da, Mau oan han luc tro ve hoa thanh chim cuoc. Quach Tan dich tho. Long thom cham tro loi kim thach, Mau han trao soi kiep tu quy. \n\t2. Hoa do quyen. Co khi goi tat la hoa quyen.

鵙=quyet [jue2]\n\t1. Con chim bach thiet. Co khi goi la con bach lao 百勞 no keu duoc tram thu tieng.
鵜=de [ti2]\n\t1. De ho 鵜鶘 mot thu chim o nuoc, long mau do, dau nho, mo dai, duoi ham co cai tui, bat duoc ca thi dung o cai tui ay. Tuc goi la dao ha 淘河 co le la con bo nong. Cung viet la dao nga 淘鵝. Con viet la gia lam dieu 伽藍鳥.
鹈=de [ti2]\n\t1. De ho 鵜鶘 mot thu chim o nuoc, long mau do, dau nho, mo dai, duoi ham co cai tui, bat duoc ca thi dung o cai tui ay. Tuc goi la dao ha 淘河 co le la con bo nong. Cung viet la dao nga 淘鵝. Con viet la gia lam dieu 伽藍鳥.
鵝=nga [e2]\n\t1. Con ngan, con ngong. Giong den goi la thuong nga 蒼鵝.
鹅=nga [e2]\n\t1. Con ngan, con ngong. Giong den goi la thuong nga 蒼鵝.
鵠=hoc, coc [gu3]\n\t1. Chim hoc, con ngong troi. \n\t2. Mot am la coc. Cai dia de tap ban. Trong cai bia ve mot cai vong, ban vao giua vong la trung, nguoi xua goi la chanh 正 hay la coc 鵠. Vi the cho nen lam cai gi kha di lam neu lam moc cho viec lam cung goi la chanh coc 正鵠.
鹄=hoc, coc [gu3]\n\t1. Chim hoc, con ngong troi. \n\t2. Mot am la coc. Cai dia de tap ban. Trong cai bia ve mot cai vong, ban vao giua vong la trung, nguoi xua goi la chanh 正 hay la coc 鵠. Vi the cho nen lam cai gi kha di lam neu lam moc cho viec lam cung goi la chanh coc 正鵠.

鶉=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Am thuan 鵪鶉 mot giong chim hinh nhu con ga con, dau nho duoi coc, tinh nhanh nhau, hay nhay nhot, nuoi quen cho choi nhau choi duoc.
鹑=thuan [chun2]\n\t1. Am thuan 鵪鶉 mot giong chim hinh nhu con ga con, dau nho duoi coc, tinh nhanh nhau, hay nhay nhot, nuoi quen cho choi nhau choi duoc.
鶊=canh [geng1]\n\t1. Thuong canh 鶬鶊 tuc la con chim vang anh, hoang oanh 黃鶯.
鶚=ngac [e4]\n\t1. Chim ngac, mo ngan, chan co mang, song o mat nuoc, bat tom ca. Ngay xua goi la chim thu cuu 睢鳩.

鶻=cot, hot [gu3|hu2]\n\t1. Cot cuu 鶻鳩 chim cot cuu, tuc goi la ban cuu 斑鳩. \n\t2. Mot loai chim cat, tinh hung ac. \n\t3. Hoi Cot 回鶻 ten mot nuoc ngay xua, thuoc vung ngoai Mong Co bay gio. Cung viet la Hoi Hot 回紇. Mot am la hoat.
鹘=cot, hot [gu3|hu2]\n\t1. Cot cuu 鶻鳩 chim cot cuu, tuc goi la ban cuu 斑鳩. \n\t2. Mot loai chim cat, tinh hung ac. \n\t3. Hoi Cot 回鶻 ten mot nuoc ngay xua, thuoc vung ngoai Mong Co bay gio. Cung viet la Hoi Hot 回紇. Mot am la hoat.

鷀=tu [si1]\n\t1. Lo tu 鸕鷀 mot giong chim o nuoc, long den mo dai, hoi khum khum, tai lan xuong nuoc mo ca an. Cung viet la lo tu 鸕鷥. Mot ten la o quy 烏鬼. Tuc goi la thuy lao nha 水老鴉.
鷁=nghich [ni4]\n\t1. Mot giong chim o nuoc, giong nhu con lo tu ma long trang, tai lieng khong so gio, nguoi ta thuong ve hinh no o dau thuyen cho nen goi cai thuyen la nghich thu 鷁首. Co khi viet la dat thu 艗首.
鷂=dieu [yao4]\n\t1. Dieu muop, dieu hau, mot giong chim hung ac, giong nhu con cat nhu be kem con cat.

鷃=yen [yan4]\n\t1. Chim nho, chim sau, chim cun cut.
鷇=cau [kou4]\n\t1. Chim non. Chim con phai nho me mom moi cho goi la cau.
鷓=cha, gia [zhe4]\n\t1. Cha co 鷓鴣 chim cha co, chim ngoi, ga go. Ngay xua bao no bao gio bay cung bay ve huong nam, cho nen cac loi tho ca bi thien bi day ve phuong bac hay muon no ma vi du ma khoi hung. Tuc ta quen doc la chu gia.
鹧=cha, gia [zhe4]\n\t1. Cha co 鷓鴣 chim cha co, chim ngoi, ga go. Ngay xua bao no bao gio bay cung bay ve huong nam, cho nen cac loi tho ca bi thien bi day ve phuong bac hay muon no ma vi du ma khoi hung. Tuc ta quen doc la chu gia.

鹪=tieu [jiao1]\n\t1. Tieu lieu 鷦鷯 con chim ri, chim hong tuoc, quanh quach. Trang Tu 莊子. Tieu lieu sao u tham lam bat qua nhat chi 鷦鷯巢於深林不過一枝 (Tieu dao du 逍遙遊) quanh quach lam to o rung sau chang qua mot canh.

鷲=thuu [jiu4]\n\t1. Ken ken, mot giong chim hung ton. \n\t2. Linh Thuu son 靈鷲山 nui Linh Thuu. Mot nui nho gan Vuong Xa 王舍, noi duc Phat Thich Ca hay dung chan. Theo truyen thuyet, duc Phat giang Dieu Phap Lien Hoa kinh tai day. Ten nui Ken Ken xuat phat tu tich noi rang, Ma Vuong da tim cach quay pha thien dinh cua A-nan-da bang cach hien hinh voi dang cua mot con chim ken ken. Co sach cho rang, cac tang da o nui nay co hinh chim ken ken.

鷸=duat [yu4]\n\t1. Chim de giun, mot giong chim mo dai, ngoai dau mo thi ran, trong co da mong bao boc, lung sac nhu tro, co hoa trang, nguc va bung trang toat, hay o ngoai dong an sau, ca nho.
鹬=duat [yu4]\n\t1. Chim de giun, mot giong chim mo dai, ngoai dau mo thi ran, trong co da mong bao boc, lung sac nhu tro, co hoa trang, nguc va bung trang toat, hay o ngoai dong an sau, ca nho.

鹵=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Dat man. Dat ham co chat man khong cay cay duoc goi la lo. \n\t2. Mo muoi. Muoi boi troi sinh ra tu nhien goi la lo 鹵, boi nguoi lam ra goi la diem 鹽. \n\t3. Lo mang 鹵莽 cau tha khinh xuat. Cung viet la 魯莽. \n\t4. Nghi ve cua thien tu goi la lo ba 鹵簿 noi so do binh ao giap deu ghi vao so sach vay.
卤=lo [lu3]\n\t1. Dat man. Dat ham co chat man khong cay cay duoc goi la lo. \n\t2. Mo muoi. Muoi boi troi sinh ra tu nhien goi la lo 鹵, boi nguoi lam ra goi la diem 鹽. \n\t3. 鹼=dam, kiem, thiem [jian3]\n\t1. Chat dam. Mot chat lan o trong dat, tinh tron ma vi man, co the dung de giat quan ao, la mot nguyen lieu lam sa phong la thach dam 石鹼. Ta quen doc la thiem. Co cho doc la kiem.
碱=dam, kiem, thiem [jian3]\n\t1. Chat dam. Mot chat lan o trong dat, tinh tron ma vi man, co the dung de giat quan ao, la mot nguyen lieu lam sa phong la thach dam 石鹼. Ta quen doc la thiem. Co cho doc la kiem.

鹿=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Con huou. Con duc co sung moi nam thay mot lan, goi la loc nhung 鹿茸 rat bo. Con cai khong co sung. Giong huou sac long lo do, nen tuc goi la mai hoa loc 梅花鹿. \n\t2. Ho Loc.
麀=uu [you1]\n\t1. Con huou cai. \n\t2. Tu uu 聚麀 cha con loan dam. 
麂=ki [ji3]\n\t1. Con hoang, con ki. Mot loai thu giong nhu con nai, con duc co sung ngan, chan ngan ma khoe, tai nhay, da mem nhun, phan nhieu thuoc dung lam vi, co khi dung de may ao.
麃=tieu, bao [biao1]\n\t1. Tieu tieu 麃麃 luc luong, ta cai ve oai vo. \n\t2. Lam co lua. \n\t3. Mot am la bao. Con nai.
麄=tho [cu1]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu tho 麤.
麅=bao [biao1]\n\t1. Con bao. Mot giong thu thuoc ve giong nai. Tuc goi la bao tu 麅子 da no chi dung lam mui xe, thit an ngon.
麇=quan, quan, khuan [jun1|qun2]\n\t1. Ten rieng cua con chuong. \n\t2. Mot am la quan. Hop tung dan tung lu. Tu hop nhau lai ma keo den goi la quan chi 麇至. Co khi viet la 麕. Ta quen doc la chu khuan.
麈=chu [zhu3]\n\t1. Mot giong thu thuoc ve giong nai, giong nhu con huou ma to, luc di dan huou theo sau, duoi no phay sach bui, nen ngay xua thuong dung lam cai phat tran. Vi the nen co khi goi cai phat tran la chu vi 麈尾.
麋=mi [mi2]\n\t1. Con nai, moi nam cung thay sung mot lan, chi khac la sung huou thi cuoi xuan moi thay ma nai thi sang mua dong moi thay.
麌=ngu [wu2]\n\t1. Con khuan cai. \n\t2. Ngu ngu 麌麌 xum xit. Ta cai hinh trang tu dong duc.
麑=nghe [ni2]\n\t1. Con huou con. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu nghe 猊. Toan nghe 狻麑 la con su su.
麒=ki [qi2]\n\t1. Ki lan 麒麟 ngay xua goi la giong thu nhan duc. Con duc goi la ki, con cai goi la lan. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Hu ta, nhan thu he, ky lan 吁嗟，仁獸兮麒麟 (Ki lan mo 麒麟墓) than oi, lan la loai thu nhan tu.
麓=loc [lu4]\n\t1. Chan nui. Nhu Thai Son chi loc 泰山之麓 chan nui Thai Son \n\t2. Chuc quan coi cong vien.
麕=quan [jun1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu quan 麇.
麗=le, ly [li2|li4]\n\t1. Dep. Nhu diem le 豔麗 tuoi dep, dep long lay. \n\t2. Dinh bam. Nhu nhat nguyet le ho thien 日月麗乎天 (Dich Kinh 易經, que Ly 離卦) mat troi mat trang dinh bam vao troi. \n\t3. Mot am la ly. Nhu Cao Ly 高麗 nuoc Cao Ly, tuc la nuoc Trieu Tien 朝鮮.
丽=le, ly [li2|li4]\n\t1. Dep. Nhu diem le 豔麗 tuoi dep, dep long lay. \n\t2. Dinh bam. Nhu nhat nguyet le ho thien 日月麗乎天 (Dich Kinh 易經, que Ly 離卦) mat troi mat trang dinh bam vao troi. \n\t3. Mot am la ly. Nhu Cao Ly 高麗 nuoc Cao Ly, tuc la nuoc Trieu Tien 朝鮮.
麝=xa [she4]\n\t1. Con xa, con huou xa. Mot giong thu giong nhu con huou ma be, khong co sung, long den, bung co mot cai bong da to bang cai trung ga, goi la xa huong 麝香 dung de lam thuoc, gia rat dat.
麞=chuong [zhang1]\n\t1. Con chuong. Giong nhu con huou ma nho, khong co sung, long hoi vang vang, nui rung nao cung co.
麟=lan [lin2]\n\t1. Con lan. Ngay xua noi he co dang vuong gia chi nhan ra doi thi co con lan hien ra. Nay o ben chau Phi co mot giong huou cao co, hinh thu giong nhu con lan ngay xua da noi, nen cung goi la ki lan 麒麟. \n\t2. Ruc ro. Nhu binh binh lan lan 炳炳麟麟 choi loi ruc ro.
麤=tho [cu1]\n\t1. Tho so. Khong duoc tinh te goi la tho. Cung nghia voi chu tho 粗. \n\t2. To lon. \n\t3. Luoc qua. \n\t4. Gao gia doi.
麥=mach [mai4]\n\t1. Lua te.Thong thuong chia ra hai thu (1) tieu mach 小麥 hot khong co tua,   nhieu phan, hot dung de lam mien, lam banh, lam tuong, (2) dai mach 大麥 hot co   tua dai, chuyen de thoi com an, than no dung de dan mu.
麦=mach [mai4]\n\t1. Lua te.Thong thuong chia ra hai thu (1) tieu mach 小麥 hot khong co tua,   nhieu phan, hot dung de lam mien, lam banh, lam tuong, (2) dai mach 大麥 hot co   tua dai, chuyen de thoi com an, than no dung de dan mu.

麩=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Trau, vo hat lua tieu mach.
麸=phu [fu1]\n\t1. Trau, vo hat lua tieu mach.
麫=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Bot gao. \n\t2. Tuc dung bot che thanh soi dai cung goi la mien.
麯=khuc [mian4]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu khuc 麴.
麰=mau [mou2]\n\t1. Lua dai mach goi la mau.
麴=khuc [qu1]\n\t1. Men ruou.
麵=mien [mian3]\n\t1. Tuc dung nhu chu mien 麫.
麻=ma [ma1|ma2]\n\t1. Dai ma 大麻 cay gai. Co khi goi la hoa ma 火麻 hay hoang ma 黃麻. Co hai giong duc va cai, giong duc goi la mau ma 牡麻, giong cai goi la tu ma 子麻. Sang tiet xuan phan moi gieo hat, truoc sau tiet ha chi moi no hoa, sac trang xanh xanh. Gai duc co nam nhi, gai cai co mot nhi. Gai duc thi khi hoa rung het lien nho, ngam nuoc boc lay vo, mem nhun ma co tho dai, dung de det vai thua. Gai cai thi den mua thu moi cat, boc lay hat roi moi dem ngam, dung de det so gai, vi no den va xu xi nen chi dung lam do tang va tui dung do thoi. Hat no cung an duoc. \n\t2. Ho ma 胡麻 cay vung, co khi goi la chi ma 脂麻 hay du ma 油麻. Hat no co hai thu den va trang. Tuong truyen rang ong Truong Khien dem giong o Tay Vuc 西域 ve, nen goi la ho ma.
麼=ma [me5|mo2]\n\t1. Yeu ma 么麼 be nho, nho xiu. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tro ngu. Nhu thap ma 什麼 cai gi vay ?
麽=ma [me5|mo2]\n\t1. Yeu ma 么麼 be nho, nho xiu. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tro ngu. Nhu thap ma 什麼 cai gi vay ?
麾=huy [hui1]\n\t1. Co dau, co chi huy. Vong huy nhi tien, thinh co nhi dong 望麾而進，聽鼓而動 (Nam su, Luong Vu De ki thuong 南史，梁武帝紀上) trong co dau ma tien len, nghe trong ma dong quan. \n\t2. Chi huy. Nhu huy quan 麾軍 chi huy quan. \n\t3. Vay.
黄=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Sac vang, sac ngu coc chin. Ngay xua lay nam sac chia sanh voi nam phuong. Mau vang cho la sac o giua, cho nen coi mau vang la mau quy nhat. Ve doi quan chu cac to chieu menh deu dung mau vang, cho den cac do trang suc chi vua la duoc dung mau vang thoi. \n\t2. Huyen hoang 玄黄 troi dat. Nhu huyen hoang phau phan 玄黄剖判 luc moi chia ra troi dat. \n\t3. Nguoi gia long toc deu vang, cho nen goi la hoang phat 黄髮 va hoang cu 黄耇. \n\t4. Tre con. Phep tinh so dan cua nha Duong 唐, cu ba tuoi tro xuong la hoang. Cho nen tre con goi la hoang khau 黄口. \n\t5. Sac loai kim (sac vang), cho nen vang bac goi la hoang bach vat 黄白物. \n\t6. Ho Hoang.
黃=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoang 黄.
黄=hoang [huang2]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu hoang 黄.
黌=huynh [hong2]\n\t1. Trang hoc. Cac trang hoc ngay xua thuong trang suc sac vang cho nen goi la huynh cung 黌宮. Con goi la huynh mon 黌門 hay huynh hieu 黌校.
黉=huynh [hong2]\n\t1. Trang hoc. Cac trang hoc ngay xua thuong trang suc sac vang cho nen goi la huynh cung 黌宮. Con goi la huynh mon 黌門 hay huynh hieu 黌校.
黍=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Lua, lua mua. Vi hot lua deu nhau nen ngay xua lay thoc ma che dinh tac thuoc va can lang.
黎=le [li2]\n\t1. Den. Bach tinh, dan chung goi la le dan 黎民 nghia la ke so nguoi toc den vay. Cung goi la le nguyen 黎元. \n\t2. Le minh 黎明 to mo sang. \n\t3. Ho Le.
黏=niem [nian2]\n\t1. Dinh, vat gi uot ma co chat dinh goi la niem 黏. \n\t2. Dan vao.
黐=li [chi1]\n\t1. Nhua danh bay chim.
黑=hac [hei1]\n\t1. Sac den, den kit. \n\t2. Toi den.
黔=kiem [qian2]\n\t1. Den. Nha Tan 秦 goi dan den la kiem thu 黔首, cung nhu chu le dan 黎民. \n\t2. Tinh Quy Chau 貴州 goi la tinh Kiem 黔. \n\t3. Ho Kiem.
默=mac [mo4]\n\t1. Lang yen, khong noi khong cuoi goi la mac. Nhu mac toa 默坐 ngoi im.
黛=dai [dai4]\n\t1. Thuoc den cua dan ba ve long may. Vi the goi do trang suc la phan dai 粉黛. Cung de vi nguoi dan ba dep. Bach Cu Di 白居易. Hoi mau nhat tieu bach mi sinh, Luc cung phan dai vo nhan sac 回眸一笑百媚生，六宮粉黛無顏色 (Truong han ca 長恨歌) Nang liec mat lai, mim mot nu cuoi, tram ve dep phat sinh, (khien cho) cac phi tan trong sau cung deu nhu khong co nhan sac. Tan Da dich tho. Mot cuoi tram ve thien nhien, Sau cung nhan sac thua hon phan son. \n\t2. Thanh dai 青黛 bot cham, dung de lam thuoc, mau no xanh sam. \n\t3. Cai gi xanh sam cung goi la dai.
黜=truat [chu4]\n\t1. Gat di, xua di khong dung nua. Vi the quan bi giang hay bi cach deu goi la truat. \n\t2. Bo.
黝=uu [you3]\n\t1. Sac den hoi xanh xanh. Nhu uu hac 黝黑 den xanh.
點=diem [dian3]\n\t1. Cai vat be ti. Tuc noi cai gi be ti goi la la nhat diem 一點. Cai gi te toai vun vat goi la diem diem 點點. \n\t2. Net cham. Noi rong ra pham cai gi dinh liu vao mot ti lien buong ra ngay deu goi la diem. \n\t3. Dau cham cau. \n\t4. Cho xoa hay cho chua trong bai van cung goi la diem. Nhu van bat gia diem 文不加點 y noi tai tu nhanh nhen, lam van xong khong phai chua nua. \n\t5. Gio. Nhu thap diem 十點 muoi gio. \n\t6. Xet net. Nhu kiem diem 檢點, tra diem 查點. \n\t7. Chi dinh cho, chi diem cho. \n\t8. An lot da. Nhu diem tam 點心. \n\t9. Trong phep tinh (mon hinh hoc), cho phan chi co vi tri ma khong co lon be, dai ngan, day mong goi la diem. Nhu luong tuyen dich giao diem 兩線的交點 diem gap nhau cua hai duong cheo. \n\t10. Nho ban. \n\t11. Giot nuoc rot vao. \n\t12. Ho nong.
点=diem [dian3]\n\t1. Cai vat be ti. Tuc noi cai gi be ti goi la la nhat diem 一點. Cai gi te toai vun vat goi la diem diem 點點. \n\t2. Net cham. Noi rong ra pham cai gi dinh liu vao mot ti lien buong ra ngay deu goi la diem. \n\t3. Dau cham cau. \n\t4. Cho xoa hay cho chua trong bai van cung goi la diem. Nhu van bat gia diem 文不加點 y noi tai tu nhanh nhen, lam van xong khong phai chua nua. \n\t5. Gio. Nhu thap diem 十點 muoi gio. \n\t6. Xet net. Nhu kiem diem 檢點, tra diem 查點. \n\t7. Chi dinh cho, chi diem cho. \n\t8. An lot da. Nhu diem tam 點心. \n\t9. Trong phep tinh (mon hinh hoc), cho phan chi co vi tri ma khong co lon be, dai ngan, day mong goi la diem. Nhu luong tuyen dich giao diem 兩線的交點 diem gap nhau cua hai duong cheo. \n\t10. Nho ban. \n\t11. Giot nuoc rot vao. \n\t12. Ho nong.
黟=y [yi1]\n\t1. Ten nui. \n\t2. Go den. \n\t3. Ve den.
黠=hiet [xia2]\n\t1. Sang, thong tue. Nhu hiet tri hoac tue hiet 慧黠 thong minh, minh man. Cung nhu ta noi tri tue 智慧 vay.
黥=kinh [qing2]\n\t1. Thich vao, mot thu hinh phep ngay xua thich chu boi muc vao mat goi la kinh.
黦=uat [yu4]\n\t1. Phai mau, cai mau nguyen da phai nhat loang lo goi la uat. \n\t2. Mau den hoi vang.
黧=le [li2]\n\t1. Den xam.
黨=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Mot khu co nam tram nha o goi la dang. \n\t2. Lu, be dang, cac nguoi dong chi hop lai lam mot doan the goi la dang. \n\t3. A dua theo. Nhu Luan Ngu 論語 noi quan tu bat dang 君子不黨 (Thuat nhi 述而) nguoi quan tu khong a dua voi ai.
党=dang [dang3]\n\t1. Mot khu co nam tram nha o goi la dang. \n\t2. Lu, be dang, cac nguoi dong chi hop lai lam mot doan the goi la dang. \n\t3. A dua theo. Nhu Luan Ngu 論語 noi quan tu bat dang 君子不黨 (Thuat nhi 述而) nguoi quan tu khong a dua voi ai.
黯=am [an4]\n\t1. Den sam. \n\t2. Am nhien 黯然 ve mat u ru, buon thiu. Ta cai dang thuong nho luc biet nhau di.
黰=chan [zhen3]\n\t1. Toc dep. \n\t2. Den muot.
黴=mi, vi [mei2]\n\t1. Moc, meo, nam. La mot giong thuc vat be kem nhat, hat giong bay di cac noi, he xuong cho nao uot nong thi moc ngay. Ta quen doc la chu vi. \n\t2. Mat cau den, mat den ban.
黶=yem [yan3]\n\t1. Cai not ruoi. Tuc goi la yem tu 黶子. Con goi la chi 痣.
黷=doc [du2]\n\t1. Nham. Phien nhieu luon luon khien cho nguoi chan ghet goi la doc. Co keu cau mai goi la can doc 干黷, tham lam khong chan goi la tham doc 貪黷.
黩=doc [du2]\n\t1. Nham. Phien nhieu luon luon khien cho nguoi chan ghet goi la doc. Co keu cau mai goi la can doc 干黷, tham lam khong chan goi la tham doc 貪黷.
黹=chi [zhi3]\n\t1. May ao (cai ao dung kim chi may nen). Tuc goi viec nu cong la cham chi 鍼黹. Cung viet la 針黹.
黻=phat [fu2]\n\t1. Cai ao le phuc ngay xua theu hoa nua xanh nua den nhu hinh hai chu di 己 ap lung voi nhau. \n\t2. Cung nghia voi chu phat 韍 nghia la cai bit dau goi khi te le.
黼=phu [fu3]\n\t1. Cai le phuc ngay xua theu hoa nua den nua trang nhu hinh cai bua.
黽=manh, man [mian3|min3]\n\t1. Con chau, con ech. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Gang goi. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi man mien tong su 黽勉從事 gang goi lam viec.
黾=manh, man [mian3|min3]\n\t1. Con chau, con ech. \n\t2. Mot am la man. Gang goi. Nhu Kinh Thi 詩經 noi man mien tong su 黽勉從事 gang goi lam viec.
黿=ngoan [yuan2]\n\t1. Con giai, con ba ba.
鼋=ngoan [yuan2]\n\t1. Con giai, con ba ba.
鼂=trao [chao2]\n\t1. Chu trao 朝 co. Co khi viet la 晁. \n\t2. Ho Trao.
鼃=oa [wa1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu oa 蛙.
鼇=ngao [ao2]\n\t1. Con ngao. Mot giong ba ba lon o bien.
鼈=miet [bie1]\n\t1. Con ba ba.
鼉=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Con da. Mot loai nhu ca sau, dai hon hai truong, bon chan, da no dung de bung trong.
鼍=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Con da. Mot loai nhu ca sau, dai hon hai truong, bon chan, da no dung de bung trong.
鼎=dinh [ding3]\n\t1. Cai dinh. Duc bang loai kim, ba chan hai tai, lon be khac nhau, cong dung cung khac. Vua Vu 禹 nha Ha 夏 thu vang trong chin chau lai, duc lam chin cai dinh. Ve doi Tam Dai 三代 (Ha 夏, Thuong 商, Chu 周) cho la mot vat rat trong luu truyen trong nuoc. Cho nen ai lay duoc thien ha goi la dinh dinh 定鼎. \n\t2. Cai do dung do an. Nhu dinh chung 鼎鍾 noi ve nha quy hien. Le ngay xua ai co cong thi khac cong duc vao cai dinh. Vi the chu trien ngay xua co loi chu viet nhu cai chuong cai dinh goi la chung dinh van 鐘鼎文. \n\t3. Cai vac. \n\t4. Cai lu dot tram. \n\t5. Dang. Nhu xuan thu dinh thinh 春秋鼎盛 dang luc manh khoe trai tre. \n\t6. Dinh dinh 鼎鼎 lung lay. Nhu dai danh dinh dinh 大名鼎鼎 tieng ca lung lay. \n\t7. Ba mat dung deu nhau goi la dinh. Nhu dinh tri 鼎峙 ba mat dung doi ngang nhau. \n\t8. Ngay xua noi vi chuc tam cong nhu ba chan dinh, nen doi sau goi chuc te tuong la dinh.
鼏=mich [mi4]\n\t1. Cai nap dinh. \n\t2. Cai day do an, cai long ban. \n\t3. Phu len.
鼐=nai [nai4]\n\t1. Cai dinh rat lon.
鼒=ti [zi1]\n\t1. Cai dinh bop mieng. Cung doc la chu tai.
鼓=co [gu3|hu2]\n\t1. Cai trong. \n\t2. Danh trong. \n\t3. Gay, khua. \n\t4. Quat len, co dong. \n\t5. Trong canh.
鼕=dong [dong1]\n\t1. Dong dong 鼕鼕 tieng trong keu tung tung. Nguyen Du 阮攸. Tieu co dong dong so xuat mon 簫鼓鼕鼕初出門 (Minh Giang chu phat 明江舟發) tieng tieu, tieng trong am i luc moi ra den cua (song).
鼗=dao [tao2]\n\t1. Cai trong com. Hinh giong nhu cai trong ma be, ben co hai tai, cam chuoi ma lac tu khac no keu.
鼙=be [pi2]\n\t1. Trong tran 
鼠=thu [shu3]\n\t1. Con chuot. \n\t2. Chuot hay truyen benh dich hach cho nguoi, nen goi chung dich hach la thu dich 鼠疫. \n\t3. Nguoi hay tru tru, du di, ba phai goi la thu thu 首鼠. Cung goi la thu thi 首施.
鼢=phan [fen2]\n\t1. Con chuot lo.
鼦=dieu [diao1]\n\t1. Cung nhu chu dieu 貂.
鼧=da [tuo2]\n\t1. Da bat 鼧鼥 mot giong chuot rat lon o lo, tuc goi la tho bat thu 土撥鼠 hinh nhu con rai ca, da long no lam ao cuu rat am.
鼪=sinh [sheng1]\n\t1. Con chon. Cung nhu chu sinh 狌.
鼫=thach [shi2]\n\t1. Thach thu 鼫鼠 mot giong thu giong nhu con chuot ma lon, duoi to ma dai, lam hang o trong nui hay duoi cay co thu, hay an cac thu qua, co khi goi la thac thu 碩鼠 hay tuoc thu 雀鼠.
鼬=duu [you4]\n\t1. Con chon soc. Mot giong thu minh dai hon mot thuoc, co con sac do kenh kech, co con sac vang, bon chan nho ma ngan, luc di van khuat khuc tu do, cho nen nen chui qua hang hoc nhu ran duoc, tai bat chuot, dem hay bat trom ga an thit, he bi duoi quan qua thi trong lo dit phun ra mot thu hoi rat thoi hang, khien cho nguoi kho chiu ma khong duoi nua, tuc goi la hoang thu lang 黃鼠狼 hay ti tu 貔子, long dung lam but goi la lang hao 狼毫.
鼮=dinh [ting2]\n\t1. Con chuot va, thu chuot co van nhu con bao.
鼯=ngo [wu2]\n\t1. Ngo thu 鼯鼠 con soc bay, mot giong chuot be, dai do bay tam tac, giong nhu con tho, tai nho duoi dai, co canh mang thit nhu con doi, bay duoc. Con goi la phi thu 飛鼠.
鼴=yen [yan3]\n\t1. Chuot chui. Mot giong chuot sinh hoat o trong dat, minh dai hon nam tac, long nau nau ma ram va muot, hinh trong y nhu con chuot, chi khac rang co ngan chan ngan, chan truoc ke sat voi dau, mong chan to va cung nhu rang bo cao, mat be ma sau hoam, mui nhon hoat ma rat thinh, hay dui dat bat giun an. Cung goi la yen thu 鼴鼠.
鼹=yen [yan3]\n\t1. Chuot chui. Mot giong chuot sinh hoat o trong dat, minh dai hon nam tac, long nau nau ma ram va muot, hinh trong y nhu con chuot, chi khac rang co ngan chan ngan, chan truoc ke sat voi dau, mong chan to va cung nhu rang bo cao, mat be ma sau hoam, mui nhon hoat ma rat thinh, hay dui dat bat giun an. Cung goi la yen thu 鼴鼠.
鼷=he [xi1]\n\t1. Con chuot nhat. Con goi la he thu 鼷鼠, cam thu 甘鼠 hay tieu gia thu 小家鼠.
鼻=ti [bi2]\n\t1. Cai mui. \n\t2. Truoc tien. Nhu ong thuy to goi la ti to 鼻祖. \n\t3. Xo mui. \n\t4. Cai chuoi am. \n\t5. Cai num an.
鼾=han, han [han1]\n\t1. Ngay. Ngu ngay khe khe goi la han 鼾. Co khi doc la chu han.
齆=ung [weng4]\n\t1. Ngat mui.
齇=tra [zha1]\n\t1. Mui xui do len, mui moc not do goi la tra 齇.
齊=te, tu, trai [ji4|qi2]\n\t1. Chinh te, khong co so le lan lon goi la te. \n\t2. Deu. Cai trinh do tien hanh deu ngang nhau goi la tinh gia te khu 並駕齊驅. \n\t3. Tuan te 徇齊 nhanh chong, man tiep, thong tue. \n\t4. Nuoc Te, thuoc tinh Son Dong 山東 bay gio. Vi the co khi goi tinh Son Dong la tinh Te. \n\t5. Nha Te 齊. Te Cao De 齊高帝 la Tieu Dao Thanh 蕭道成 duoc nha Tong 宋 trao ngoi   cho lam vua goi la nha Nam Te 南齊 (409-502). Cao Duong 高洋 duoc nha Dong Nguy 東魏   trao ngoi cho lam vua goi la nha Bac Te 北齊 (550-577). \n\t6. Tuc goi su gi duoc du ca goi la te. \n\t7. Cung khoi len lam trong mot luc cung goi la te. \n\t8. Mot am la tu. Cai gau ao. Ao tang ven gau goi la tu thoi 齊衰. \n\t9. Lai mot am nua la trai. Cung nghia voi chu trai 齋. 
齐=te, tu, trai [ji4|qi2]\n\t1. Chinh te, khong co so le lan lon goi la te. \n\t2. Deu. Cai trinh do tien hanh deu ngang nhau goi la tinh gia te khu 並駕齊驅. \n\t3. Tuan te 徇齊 nhanh chong, man tiep, thong tue. \n\t4. Nuoc Te, thuoc tinh Son Dong 山東 bay gio. Vi the co khi goi tinh Son Dong la tinh Te. \n\t5. Nha Te 齊. Te Cao De 齊高帝 la Tieu Dao Thanh 蕭道成 duoc nha Tong 宋 trao ngoi   cho lam vua goi la nha Nam Te 南齊 (409-502). Cao Duong 高洋 duoc nha Dong Nguy 東魏   trao ngoi cho lam vua goi la nha Bac Te 北齊 (550-577). \n\t6. Tuc goi su gi duoc du ca goi la te. \n\t7. Cung khoi len lam trong mot luc cung goi la te. \n\t8. Mot am la tu. Cai gau ao. Ao tang ven gau goi la tu thoi 齊衰. \n\t9. Lai mot am nua la trai. Cung nghia voi chu trai 齋. 
齋=trai [zhai1]\n\t1. Tam chi chuyen chu ca vao mot cai. Ngay xua sap te le tat kieng ruou, kieng thit, ngu nha rieng goi la trai gioi 齋戒. \n\t2. Cai trai ngoai, cai nha rieng de o trong luc sap te le goi la trai. Cai phong rieng de hoc goi la thu trai 書齋. \n\t3. An chay, anh rau dua. \n\t4. Com cua su an goi la trai. \n\t5. Thet com su an cung goi la trai. \n\t6. Su lam dan cau cung goi la trai tieu 齋醮.
斋=trai [zhai1]\n\t1. Tam chi chuyen chu ca vao mot cai. Ngay xua sap te le tat kieng ruou, kieng thit, ngu nha rieng goi la trai gioi 齋戒. \n\t2. Cai trai ngoai, cai nha rieng de o trong luc sap te le goi la trai. Cai phong rieng de hoc goi la thu trai 書齋. \n\t3. An chay, anh rau dua. \n\t4. Com cua su an goi la trai. \n\t5. Thet com su an cung goi la trai. \n\t6. Su lam dan cau cung goi la trai tieu 齋醮.
齌=te [ji4]\n\t1. Te no 齌怒 noi xung, noi mau gian len.
齎=te [ji1]\n\t1. Dem cho, mang cho. \n\t2. Tien dua. \n\t3. Hanh trang. \n\t4. Tieng than tho.
齏=te [ji1]\n\t1. Do gia vi. Nhu cac thu gung, toi bam nho de hoa vao do an goi la te.
齑=te [ji1]\n\t1. Do gia vi. Nhu cac thu gung, toi bam nho de hoa vao do an goi la te.
齒=xi [chi3]\n\t1. Rang. Moc luc nho goi la nhu xi 乳齒 rang sua, moc luc lon goi la vinh cuu xi 永乆齒 rang gia. \n\t2. Tuoi. \n\t3. Ke tuoi ma dinh tren duoi goi la tu xi 序齒. \n\t4. Ke. Ke lam nguoi cung bon voi minh goi la xi 齒, khong ke lam bon voi minh goi la bat xi 不齒. \n\t5. Vat gi xep bay nhu ham rang deu goi la xi. Nhu cu xi 鋸齒 rang cua. \n\t6. Luong so tuoi ngua cung goi la xi.
齿=xi [chi3]\n\t1. Rang. Moc luc nho goi la nhu xi 乳齒 rang sua, moc luc lon goi la vinh cuu xi 永乆齒 rang gia. \n\t2. Tuoi. \n\t3. Ke tuoi ma dinh tren duoi goi la tu xi 序齒. \n\t4. Ke. Ke lam nguoi cung bon voi minh goi la xi 齒, khong ke lam bon voi minh goi la bat xi 不齒. \n\t5. Vat gi xep bay nhu ham rang deu goi la xi. Nhu cu xi 鋸齒 rang cua. \n\t6. Luong so tuoi ngua cung goi la xi.
齔=san [chen4]\n\t1. Gay rang sua, moc rang gia. Vi the luc con tre goi la dieu san 齠齔.
龀=san [chen4]\n\t1. Gay rang sua, moc rang gia. Vi the luc con tre goi la dieu san 齠齔.
齕=hot [he2]\n\t1. Can.
齗=ngan [ken3]\n\t1. Loi, thit chan rang. \n\t2. Ngan ngan 齗齗 gan go, ta cai dang cai le voi nhau.
齘=gioi [xie4]\n\t1. Nghien rang.
齚=trach [cuo4]\n\t1. Can.
齟=tro [ju3]\n\t1. Tro ngu 齟齬 rang vau, rang so le khong deu nhau. \n\t2. Y kien khong hop nhau cung goi la tro ngu 齟齬. \n\t3. Ta quen doc la tro ngo.
龃=tro [ju3]\n\t1. Tro ngu 齟齬 rang vau, rang so le khong deu nhau. \n\t2. Y kien khong hop nhau cung goi la tro ngu 齟齬. \n\t3. Ta quen doc la tro ngo.
齠=dieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Dieu san 齠齔. Xem chu san 齔.
龆=dieu [tiao2]\n\t1. Dieu san 齠齔. Xem chu san 齔.
齡=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tuoi.
龄=linh [ling2]\n\t1. Tuoi.
齣=xich, xuat [chu1]\n\t1. Het mot tan tuong goi la nhat xich 一齣. Cung doc la nhat xuat.
齦=ngan, khan [ken3|yin2]\n\t1. Loi, chan rang. \n\t2. Mot am la khan. Can xuong, nha xuong.
龈=ngan, khan [ken3|yin2]\n\t1. Loi, chan rang. \n\t2. Mot am la khan. Can xuong, nha xuong.
齧=niet, khiet [nie4]\n\t1. Can, lay rang can dut goi la niet. \n\t2. Khuyet, sut. \n\t3. An mon. Ta quen doc la chu khiet.
齩=giao [yao3]\n\t1. Can. Tuc hay viet la 咬.
齪=xuc [chuo4]\n\t1. Ac xuc 齷齪 hep hoi, cau nhau, nguoi luong hep, tinh hay ban hay cau goi la ac xuc.
龊=xuc [chuo4]\n\t1. Ac xuc 齷齪 hep hoi, cau nhau, nguoi luong hep, tinh hay ban hay cau goi la ac xuc.
齬=ngu [yu3]\n\t1. Tro ngu 齟齬. Xem chu tro 齟.
龉=ngu [yu3]\n\t1. Tro ngu 齟齬. Xem chu tro 齟.
齮=nghi [yi3]\n\t1. Can. Nhu nghi hot 齮齕 nhai nghien. \n\t2. Cay bay, ghen ghet nguoi co tai ma xo day nguoi ta ra.
齲=cu, khu [qu3]\n\t1. Sau rang, sun rang. Cung doc la chu khu.
龋=cu, khu [qu3]\n\t1. Sau rang, sun rang. Cung doc la chu khu.
齷=ac [wo4]\n\t1. Ac xuc 齷齪. Xem chu xuc 齪.
龌=ac [wo4]\n\t1. Ac xuc 齷齪. Xem chu xuc 齪.
龍=long, sung [long2]\n\t1. Con rong. \n\t2. Nguoi xua noi no hay lam may lam mua, cho nen cho no la mot trong bon giong linh. \n\t3. Lai dung de vi voi cac ong vua. Cho nen vua len ngoi goi la long phi 龍飛. \n\t4. Ngua cao tam thuoc tro len goi la long. \n\t5. Loi mach nui di goi la long. Nhu nha xem dat (thay dia ly) keu la long mach 龍脈 vay. \n\t6. Noi vi du nguoi phi thuong. \n\t7. Mot am la sung. Cung nghia voi chu sung 寵.
龙=long, sung [long2]\n\t1. Con rong. \n\t2. Nguoi xua noi no hay lam may lam mua, cho nen cho no la mot trong bon giong linh. \n\t3. Lai dung de vi voi cac ong vua. Cho nen vua len ngoi goi la long phi 龍飛. \n\t4. Ngua cao tam thuoc tro len goi la long. \n\t5. Loi mach nui di goi la long. Nhu nha xem dat (thay dia ly) keu la long mach 龍脈 vay. \n\t6. Noi vi du nguoi phi thuong. \n\t7. Mot am la sung. Cung nghia voi chu sung 寵.
龐=bang, lung [pang2]\n\t1. Ho Bang. \n\t2. Roi beng. \n\t3. Nha cao. \n\t4. Hau hi. \n\t5. Mot am la lung. Day dan. Mat mui day dan goi la thiem lung 臉龐.
庞=bang, lung [pang2]\n\t1. Ho Bang. \n\t2. Roi beng. \n\t3. Nha cao. \n\t4. Hau hi. \n\t5. Mot am la lung. Day dan. Mat mui day dan goi la thiem lung 臉龐.
龔=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Kinh. Cung nghia voi chu cung 恭. \n\t2. Cung cap. \n\t3. Ho Cung.
龚=cung [gong1]\n\t1. Kinh. Cung nghia voi chu cung 恭. \n\t2. Cung cap. \n\t3. Ho Cung.
龕=kham, kham [kan1]\n\t1. Cai nha o duoi thap, cai kham tho Phat. Cung doc la kham. \n\t2. Chiu dung. \n\t3. Lay.
龛=kham, kham [kan1]\n\t1. Cai nha o duoi thap, cai kham tho Phat. Cung doc la kham. \n\t2. Chiu dung. \n\t3. Lay.
龜=quy, cuu, quan [gui1|jun1|qiu1]\n\t1. Con rua rua. Tinh cham chap ma tho hang tram tuoi. Ngay xua dung mai no de boi, cho nen goi la vat linh. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tieng de mia nguoi. \n\t3. Doi nha Duong 唐 bon ca nhac chit khan xanh nhu con rua, cho nen goi ke chit khan xanh la quy. Vo con bon ca nhac deu lam con hat, nen goi nhung ke mo nha hat, nha tho cho vo con mai dam la quy. \n\t4. Dau ngoc hanh cung goi la quy dau 龜頭. \n\t5. Mot am la cuu. Cuu Tu 龜茲 ten mot nuoc o Tay Vuc 西域, thuoc tinh Tan Cuong 新疆 bay gio. \n\t6. Lai mot am la quan. Bat quan thu 不龜手 tuy ret gia ma khong nut no. Trang Tu 莊子. Tong nhan huu thien vi bat quan thu chi duoc gia 宋人有善爲不龜手之藥者 (Tieu dao du 逍遙遊) nguoi nuoc Tong co ke kheo lam thu thuoc khong cong tay.
龟=quy, cuu, quan [gui1|jun1|qiu1]\n\t1. Con rua rua. Tinh cham chap ma tho hang tram tuoi. Ngay xua dung mai no de boi, cho nen goi la vat linh. \n\t2. Tuc dung lam tieng de mia nguoi. \n\t3. Doi nha Duong 唐 bon ca nhac chit khan xanh nhu con rua, cho nen goi ke chit khan xanh la quy. Vo con bon ca nhac deu lam con hat, nen goi nhung ke mo nha hat, nha tho cho vo con mai dam la quy. \n\t4. Dau ngoc hanh cung goi la quy dau 龜頭. \n\t5. Mot am la cuu. Cuu Tu 龜茲 ten mot nuoc o Tay Vuc 西域, thuoc tinh Tan Cuong 新疆 bay gio. \n\t6. Lai mot am la quan. Bat quan thu 不龜手 tuy ret gia ma khong nut no. Trang Tu 莊子. Tong nhan huu thien vi bat quan thu chi duoc gia 宋人有善爲不龜手之藥者 (Tieu dao du 逍遙遊) nguoi nuoc Tong co ke kheo lam thu thuoc khong cong tay.
龝=thu [qiu1]\n\t1. Cung nghia nhu chu thu 秋.
龠=duoc, thuoc [yue4]\n\t1. Cai duoc, mot thu nhu cai sao co ba lo. \n\t2. Do de dong, dung duoc 1200 hat thoc. Ta quen doc la chu thuoc.
龡=xuy [chui1]\n\t1. Cung nghia voi chu xuy 吹 di voi chu co xuy 鼓吹. 
龢=hoa [huo2]\n\t1. Dieu hoa, hop. Cung nghia voi chu hoa 和.
